name: Valera Health
cb_description: Valera Health operates as a tele-mental health service provider in the healthcare sector. The company offers therapy and psychiatry services, including individual and group therapy, medication management, and mental healthcare through an online platform. Valera Health primarily serves individuals seeking mental health services remotely. Valera Health was formerly known as Ethosmart Health. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Bestow
cb_description: Bestow operates as an insurance technology company and develops products and software for insurance companies. It provides an application programming interface (API) enabling partners to offer life insurance coverage to customers. The company was formerly known as Coverlife. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: Caura
cb_description: Our main product is a credit scoring solution based on data from social networks and loan applications. We provide Scoring-as-a-Service through our brokerage platform to Microfinance organizations. Our business model is to be the outsource destination for IT and Risk services in the Russian microfinance market.

name: PlainID
cb_description: PlainID is an Identity Security Posture Management company that operates in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform that provides insights into identity risks, standardizes authorization for SaaS applications, and extends identity security across the enterprise. Its solutions cater to various sectors including workforce, customer, and B2B access control, as well as data privacy and compliance. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Snapcart
cb_description: Snapcart specializes in real-time offline shopper engagement and data services within the marketing and data analytics sectors. The company offers solutions for brands to connect with customers by utilizing AI-powered receipt processing and crowdsourced data to enhance marketing strategies and optimize return on investment. Snapcart primarily serves sectors such as consumer goods, electronics, and food & beverage industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Slice
cb_description: Slice operates as a financial technology company focusing on providing consumer payment solutions. The company offers a digital prepaid account for everyday payments, a fast and simple way to make payments via credit or UPI. The company primarily serves the financial services industry. Slice was formerly known as Slice Pay. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Barn2Door
cb_description: Barn2Door focuses on facilitating direct sales for farmers. The company offers a suite of services including website design, email marketing, eCommerce solutions, and point-of-sale systems to streamline farm operations. It primarily serves the agriculture sector by helping farmers with sales, managing orders, and connecting with customers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: Deep Sky
cb_description: Deep Sky builds infrastructure for carbon dioxide removal systems within the environmental services industry. The company offers direct-air and ocean carbon capture technologies that absorb CO2 from the atmosphere and water and then permanently store it underground. Deep Sky was founded in 2022 and is based in Outremont, Canada.

name: Synapticure
cb_description: Synapticure specializes in providing virtual care for individuals with neurodegenerative diseases within the healthcare sector. The company offers services such as consultations with neurologists, mental health support, care coordination, and assistance with insurance and clinical trials. Synapticure primarily serves patients and caregivers dealing with conditions like Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, ALS, and other related disorders. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Ant Group
cb_description: Ant Group focuses on the digital transformation of the service industry, particularly in the financial sector. The company provides a platform that facilitates access to financial services for consumers and small businesses, emphasizing inclusivity, environmental consciousness, and sustainability.  Ant Group was formerly known as Zhejiang Ant Small and Micro Financial Services. It was founded in 2004 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

name: Dovetail
cb_description: Dovetail offers a flexible customer insights platform for teams to get data-driven insights. The company's platform stores user research notes, transcripts, images, videos, and audio recordings and discovers patterns across research data collected from interviews, usability testing, and customer interviews, enabling organizations and users to work together in real-time and share projects and notes with internal and external stakeholders. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Narvar
cb_description: Narvar is a company specializing in post-purchase customer engagement within the retail industry. Its main offerings include solutions for order tracking, delivery notifications, and management of returns and exchanges, designed to enhance customer loyalty and increase lifetime value. Narvar's platform serves a broad range of sectors within the retail industry, providing tools to streamline the post-purchase experience for both businesses and consumers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: OwnHome
cb_description: OwnHome focuses on providing solutions in the real estate industry. It offers a service that helps individuals overcome the deposit hurdle when buying a home, by providing a deposit boost Loan that allows customers to secure a home loan with any bank or lender they qualify with. The company primarily serves individuals in the real estate market who are looking to buy a home. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Potts Point, Australia.

name: Decent
cb_description: Decent is a company focused on providing health insurance solutions. The company offers health insurance for self-employed people, managing employee benefits and paperwork. Its services primarily cater to the small business sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Lottie
cb_description: Lottie is a company that focuses on the development of child-friendly technology in the digital entertainment industry. The company offers an application designed for children aged 2-5, providing curated content that encourages self-exploration and interest development, while also supporting parents in setting healthy screen time limits. Lottie primarily serves the digital entertainment sector for children. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Germany.

name: AI Squared
cb_description: AI Squared specializes in integrating artificial intelligence into business applications across various sectors. The company offers technologies that enable the embedding of AI insights into front-end applications, facilitating a collaborative environment for AI consumers and developers. AI Squared primarily serves sectors that are looking for decision-making and workflow optimization through AI adoption. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Grinta
cb_description: Grinta is a technology company operating in the sports industry. The company provides an e-commerce solution for sports clubs, enabling them to create online stores for their members. These stores offer a range of sports equipment and merchandise, with purchases contributing to the club's funding. Grinta primarily serves the sports industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Saint-Etienne, France.

name: ReflexAI
cb_description: ReflexAI specializes in AI-based training and quality assurance solutions for contact centers. The company offers products that enhance agent training through realistic simulations and personalized feedback, as well as streamline quality assurance processes by assessing every interaction and providing standardized evaluations. ReflexAI primarily serves sectors such as crisis management, education, healthcare, and mental health. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Harmonic Security
cb_description: Harmonic Security focuses on providing zero-touch data protection solutions in the cybersecurity industry. Its services include safeguarding sensitive data, coaching users on safe AI usage, and tracking and assessing risks associated with Generative AI applications. Harmonic Security primarily caters to healthcare, insurance, and financial services sectors. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Bitmovin
cb_description: Bitmovin specializes in video streaming infrastructure within the technology sector. The company offers cloud-native solutions for media encoding, playback, and analytics designed to deliver video content reliably across a multitude of devices. Bitmovin primarily serves the entertainment and OTT industry, providing tools for live and on-demand video streaming. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Stader
cb_description: Stader is a liquid staking platform that operates within the cryptocurrency sector, focusing on providing staking solutions and enhancing the DeFi ecosystem. The company offers users the ability to stake their digital assets to earn rewards while maintaining liquidity, enabling participation in various DeFi protocols without locking up their tokens. Stader primarily serves retail cryptocurrency users, exchanges, and custodians with its non-custodial, smart contract-driven services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Upheal
cb_description: Upheal is an Artificial Intelligence (AI)-powered platform designed to assist mental health professionals by automating therapy notes and providing session analytics. The company offers a suite of tools that includes secure video calling, session transcription, and analytics to streamline clinical workflows. Upheal primarily serves the mental health care sector, It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ukio
cb_description: Ukio is a company specializing in monthly furnished apartment rentals and corporate housing within the real estate sector. The company offers beautifully decorated, fully furnished apartments with flexible rental terms, designed to provide a hassle-free living experience for stays of one month or longer. Ukio primarily serves individuals and businesses looking for temporary housing solutions without the commitment of long-term contracts. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Panorama Education
cb_description: Panorama Education focuses on educational technology, providing a platform that supports student success across various domains. The company offers a suite of software solutions that enable educators to track and improve student outcomes in areas such as academics, behavior, social-emotional learning, and family engagement. Panorama Education's products are designed to facilitate a holistic view of student data, support multi-tiered systems of support (MTSS), and enhance school climate and culture through targeted interventions and progress monitoring. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: DispatchHealth
cb_description: DispatchHealth is a healthcare company that focuses on providing urgent medical care services. The company offers in-home medical care services, treating a variety of conditions and illnesses, and coordinating with insurance companies for billing. They primarily serve patients in their homes, including those in senior living and home health sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Amberstone Biosciences
cb_description: Amberstone Biosciences focuses on developing immunotherapies within the biotechnology sector. The company offers therapeutic agents designed to target tumors selectively without harming healthy tissues, addressing the issue of dose toxicity in traditional therapies. Amberstone Biosciences caters to the healthcare sector, particularly in areas involving tumor treatment and auto-immune diseases. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: Astro
cb_description: Astro is a workplace productivity company that uses artificial intelligence to surface important information from emails and calendar. Astro built Astrobot, a plug-in that lets users check emails and calendar information directly from Slack.

name: ThayerMahan
cb_description: ThayerMahan focuses on maritime surveillance solutions, operating within the defense and industrial sectors. The company offers services such as monitoring the world's oceans for security purposes, providing actionable intelligence for decision-making, and delivering Search-as-a-Service solutions tailored to each customer's needs. ThayerMahan primarily serves sectors such as offshore renewables, commercial monitoring, defense and intelligence, subsea infrastructure, and acoustic sciences. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Groton, Connecticut.

name: Atmosphere
cb_description: Atmosphere analyzes text for mood and matches that mood with music, delivering music that matches the mood of the text youre reading.  Think of it as a soundtrack for your novel.  The Atmosphere bookstore allows users to create custom playlists to share with other users, sortof DVD extras for your book.

name: CREXi
cb_description: CREXi is a platform developed to advance the trillion-dollar commercial real estate (CRE) industry by supplying users with technology to simplify and expedite the transaction process. It provides industry professionals access to a CRE toolset. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: LivSpace
cb_description: Livspace is a home interior design and renovation service company with a focus on creating beautiful and functional living spaces. The company offers a range of services including modular kitchen solutions, custom wardrobe designs, and turnkey interior solutions for residential and commercial spaces. Livspace provides a one-stop solution for homeowners, encompassing design, delivery, and installation, backed by technology to ensure a seamless and efficient process. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Indicina
cb_description: Indicina is a technology company focused on the financial services industry. The company provides innovative credit tools that enable businesses to build smarter, safer, and faster credit products. These tools are designed to manage customer loans, provide insights for safer credit decisions, and assess risk and affordability. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: FlexSea
cb_description: FlexSea is a company focused on sustainable packaging solutions within the bioplastics industry. Its main offering is an innovative, home-compostable biopolymer material derived from seaweed and other sustainably sourced products, designed to replace traditional plastic film packaging. This material degrades naturally and rapidly, posing no harm to the environment. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Aisera
cb_description: Aisera specializes in Generative AI Solutions for enterprises, focusing on enhancing user productivity and reducing operational expenses across various business sectors. The company offers a suite of products including AI-driven conversational interfaces and domain-specific large language models that facilitate human-like interactions and improve workforce productivity. Aisera's solutions cater to a broad range of domains such as IT, HR, customer service, sales, marketing, finance, healthcare, life sciences, financial services, and retail. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: NymCard
cb_description: NymCard operates as an end-to-end payment platform. It offers corporate cards, cryptocurrency cards, travel cards, youth banking solutions, credit cards, buy now pay later (BNPL) options, and more. The company primarily serves the financial technology sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: WEAVR
cb_description: WEAVR designs and develops VR platforms on PC and mobile for businesses to create and share immersive stories using their 2D and 360 content. It curates VR stories for users' target audience, supports 360 photos and videos, and is customizable.

name: ONE
cb_description: ONE operates within the sports and entertainment industry, providing services that include martial arts entertainment through ONE Championship and gaming content via ONE Esports. The company serves the sports media and entertainment sectors, targeting a millennial audience with its events and content. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Singapore.

name: Mosaic Microsystems
cb_description: Mosaic Microsystems specializes in microelectronics and photonics packaging, focusing on the use of thin glass substrates. The company offers packaging solutions that include thin glass with custom through-glass vias, metallization, and other features tailored to meet the needs of technology applications. Mosaic Microsystems serves sectors such as radio frequency (RF) communications, sensing, and photonics, providing substrates and packaging that leverage the properties of glass. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Rochester, New York.

name: Sardine
cb_description: Sardine focuses on fraud prevention and compliance. The company offers a platform that provides services such as fraud detection, risk scoring, transaction monitoring, and case management, all aimed at protecting customer interactions and preventing money laundering and scams, primarily serving sectors such as banks and retailers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Vanta
cb_description: Vanta operates a youth esports development platform in the digital entertainment and education sectors. It offers a digital esports platform, organizes competitive esports leagues and development camps, and offers expert coaching and programming for children. Vanta primarily serves the education sector, partnering with schools and community organizations. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Credo
cb_description: Credo offers software for electronic cash management.

name: ENVIRIA
cb_description: ENVIRIA focuses on the energy sector, specifically in the domain of solar energy. The company offers solar solutions for businesses, covering the entire process from financing and planning to installation and operation of solar power systems. ENVIRIA primarily serves the B2B sector, specializing in the needs of businesses and companies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

name: Dasera
cb_description: Dasera is a company specializing in Data Security Posture Management (DSPM) within the data security and governance sector. The company offers a platform that automates security and governance controls for data across cloud and on-premises environments. Dasera's solutions cater to businesses looking to secure their data infrastructure, manage compliance, and mitigate risks associated with data usage and access. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mountain View, California. In October 2024, Dasera was acquired by Netskope.

name: Tava Health
cb_description: Tava Health focuses on providing mental health services in the healthcare industry. The company offers a technology-enabled platform that allows individuals, couples, and families to access mental health resources, including matching with licensed therapists and psychologists. Tava Health primarily serves employers, offering mental health benefits for employees. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: Deako
cb_description: Deako specializes in the development and production of plug-and-play light switches. It offers a range of light switches that can be easily installed by users, providing the ability to control and personalize home lighting. These products are primarily marketed to homeowners. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Switch Bioworks
cb_description: Switch Bioworks is a biofertilizer company operating in the agricultural sector. The company's main service involves engineering naturally occurring microbes to produce sustainable nitrogen fertilizer, which is then formulated into a powder for use by farmers. The company primarily serves the agricultural industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Commonplace
cb_description: Commonplace is a citizen engagement platform that specializes in leveraging AI-driven insights for community input analysis in various sectors. The company provides a solution for gathering and interpreting geolocated sentiment data, facilitating inclusive decision-making for a wide range of projects. Commonplace primarily serves sectors such as public and private planning, housing associations, transport planning, climate initiatives, and residential development. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Botify
cb_description: Botify is a company that focuses on performance marketing and operates in the SEO (Search Engine Optimization) industry. The company offers a platform that provides unified data and analytics for SEO performance, AI-powered recommendations for prioritizing opportunities, and automated organic search optimizations. Botify primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce, publishing, classifieds, and travel. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Paris, France.

name: FlexxPay
cb_description: FlexxPay operates as a cloud-based salary tracking platform. The company's platform offers an alternative to the traditional pay cycle through which employees access their already-earned income and other benefits. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Survios
cb_description: Survios is a leading VR games studio known for developing immersive virtual reality experiences across various genres. The company specializes in creating action-packed VR games that offer players engaging narratives and interactive gameplay, such as boxing simulations, futuristic shooters, and apocalyptic combat scenarios. Survios markets its products primarily to the virtual reality gaming community. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Marina del Rey, California.

name: Ironclad
cb_description: Ironclad is a leading provider in the contract lifecycle management software domain, offering a comprehensive platform for managing contracts from inception to completion. Their main offerings include AI-powered tools for contract creation, negotiation, compliance, and analytics, designed to streamline the entire contract management process. Ironclad's solutions cater to various sectors including legal, sales, procurement, and IT. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: iSono Health
cb_description: iSono Health focuses on early breast cancer detection and monitoring through advanced medical imaging technology. The company offers an automated, portable, and wearable three-dimensional (3D) ultrasound scanner designed to simplify and expedite breast imaging for healthcare providers and patients. iSono Health's technology is utilized primarily in physicians' offices, women's health clinics, and potentially in radiology centers, walk-in, and mobile clinics. It was founded in 2015 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: EyeControl
cb_description: EyeControl is a pioneer in the medical technology sector, specializing in innovative communication solutions. The company's main offerings include a wearable eye-tracking device and smart platforms that facilitate communication between patients who cannot speak, their families, and medical teams. These solutions are primarily used in healthcare facilities and for patients transitioning to remote home care. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Credenc
cb_description:
Credenc is an online platform for students to apply for student loans for college tuition.

On August 20th, 2021, Credenc was acquired by Capital India Finance. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: BriteCo
cb_description: BriteCo is a company that focuses on providing insurance services, specifically in the jewelry sector. The company offers insurance coverage for various types of jewelry including engagement rings, fine jewelry, and luxury watches, providing protection against loss, theft, damage, and mysterious disappearance. BriteCo primarily serves individuals seeking to insure their personal jewelry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Evanston, Illinois.

name: Cometeer
cb_description: Cometeer operates as a coffee manufacturing company. It provides frozen coffee extract pods and mixed roast boxes. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Gloucester, Massachusetts.

name: Sharebite
cb_description: Sharebite is a meal benefits platform serving the corporate sector. The company provides meal benefits solutions tailored for in-office, remote, and hybrid work environments, aiming to enhance employee performance and company culture. Sharebite primarily caters to the corporate sector, offering services that support employee well-being and engagement. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Curacel
cb_description: Curacel specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) powered insurance software and products for various sectors, focusing on streamlining insurance operations. The company offers solutions for managing and distributing insurance, processing claims, detecting fraud, and automating payment operations, all by artificial intelligence. Curacel primarily serves industries such as logistics, fintech, e-commerce, healthcare, and automotive. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Anomalo
cb_description: Anomalo provides data quality solutions. It offers a platform that automatically detects and explains issues in enterprise data, providing root cause analysis and data monitoring services. It primarily serves businesses that rely heavily on data for decision-making and product development. It was formerly known as Data Gravity. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Ion Mobility
cb_description: Ion Mobility manufactures, designs, builds, and maintains electric vehicle (EV) motorcycles. It provides hardware and software technology for electric motorbikes and energy storage devices. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore.

name: Recurrent
cb_description: Recurrent focuses on providing transparency and insights into electric vehicle (EV) battery performance within the automotive industry. The company offers battery and range reports for used electric cars, utilizing data from a network of EVs to inform potential buyers, current owners, and sellers about battery health and performance. Recurrent's services are aimed at EV shoppers, owners, and sellers, assisting them in making decisions in the used electric car market. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Sitemate
cb_description: Sitemate provides no-code software tools in the industrial sector. The company offers a range of services including data capture and information management platforms, integration platforms for business process automation, and mobile apps for site and workforce management. Its services primarily cater to the built world industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Entitle
cb_description: Entitle focuses on security-first permissions management in the cloud computing domain. The company offers a platform for access management, providing centralized entitlement visibility, self-serve access, and policy enforcement and access reviews. It primarily serves the cloud computing industry. It was formerly known as Deepcred. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York. In April 2024, Entitle was acquired by BeyondTrustetween $100M and $150M.

name: Visional
cb_description: Visional focuses on driving digital transformation in various industries, with a core emphasis on the Human resource(HR)  Tech sector. The company offers recruitment platforms and talent management platforms, aiming to build a comprehensive human capital management (HCM) ecosystem for businesses. While their primary market is the HR technology sector, they are also expanding into business succession Mergers and acquisitions, logistics tech, cybersecurity, and sales tech domains. Visional was formerly known as BizReach. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Peak Energy
cb_description: Peak Energy is an independent company focused on oil and gas exploration in the energy sector. The company's main services include the acquisition and development of oil and gas leases, as well as the acquisition of mineral, royalty, and overriding royalty interests. Peak Energy primarily sells to the oil and gas industry. It is based in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma.

name: Bankingly
cb_description: Bankingly is a technology company specializing in digital banking solutions for the financial sector. The company offers a suite of products including web and mobile banking platforms, conversational banking tools, digital onboarding and loan origination systems, an admin portal, and fraud prevention services. Bankingly primarily serves financial institutions such as banks and credit unions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Montevideo, Uruguay.

name: PocketHealth
cb_description: PocketHealth focuses on healthcare technology. It offers a platform that allows patients to access, understand, and share their medical records and imaging, as well as store all their important health information in one place. The company primarily serves patients and healthcare providers. PocketHealth was formerly known as PocketSix Technology. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Sunhero
cb_description: Sunhero specializes in the installation of residential solar panels and operates within the renewable energy sector. The company offers services including the design and financing of photovoltaic systems, handling of necessary documentation, and assistance with obtaining subsidies for solar energy self-consumption. Sunhero also provides ongoing support post-installation, such as continuous monitoring and maintenance plans for solar panel systems. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Menlo Security
cb_description: Menlo Security provides cybersecurity solutions for enterprises. It protects organizations from cyber attacks by eliminating the threat of malware. It offers a cloud security platform that provides ransomware prevention solutions, and malware prevention solutions, neutralizes malicious document downloads, and more. It serves industries such as financial services, educational sectors, and more. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Creatio
cb_description: Creatio is a company that focuses on providing IT solutions in the education sector. The company offers a configurable IT system designed to streamline processes, reduce costs, and ensure regulatory compliance for awarding organizations. Their main services include product development, customer management, registration-assessment-awarding, and governance. It was founded in 2008 and is based in United Kingdom.

name: Kalshi
cb_description: Kalshi operates as an online trading platform. It functions as a federally regulated exchange where users can trade on the outcome of events. It allows investors to place their trades on possible events through an asset class called event contracts. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: KikOff
cb_description: KikOff develops credit-building software. It offers a credit-building solution that helps individuals establish a positive payment history and lower credit utilization, both key factors in calculating credit scores. It primarily serves the financial services industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: AI21 Labs
cb_description: AI21 Labs operates as an artificial intelligence (AI) lab and product company. The company offers a range of AI-powered tools, including a writing companion tool to assist users in rephrasing their writing, and an AI reader that summarizes long documents. It also provides language models for developers to create AI-powered applications. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: Seismic
cb_description: Seismic specializes in unified communications and IT infrastructure within the technology sector. The company offers end-to-end services, including planning, deployment, and management of IT environments for original equipment manufacturers, distributors, and managed service providers. Seismic's Serv360 platform provides an all-in-one ITSM solution designed to simplify service management for service providers. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.

name: Kewazo
cb_description: Kewazo specializes in construction robotics, focusing on automating and digitizing material handling on construction sites and industrial plants. The company's flagship product, LIFTBOT, is a battery-powered, remote-controlled lifting robot that is designed to improve efficiency and safety in material handling tasks. LIFTBOT is primarily utilized in the construction and industrial sectors, enhancing productivity and safety in scaffolding assembly and other material movement applications. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Garching bei Munchen, Germany.

name: Relish
cb_description: Relish is a company focused on recruitment, specifically within the education and employment sectors. The company offers a recruiting platform designed for master's-level students and alumni, allowing them to discover employers, apply for open positions, and plan their career moves. The platform also provides services for employers, including the ability to connect with potential candidates. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Charlottesville, Virginia.

name: Penn Connected
cb_description: Penn Connected is a company that operates in the online betting industry, providing a comprehensive list of active slot machine websites. The company curates a selection of trusted slot 777 websites, aiming to enhance the online gambling experience with a focus on safety and maximizing winnings. It primarily serves the online gaming community. Penn Connected was formerly known as Zeto. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

name: Mangata Networks
cb_description: Mangata Networks operates as a global telecommunications company in the satellite-enabled network and cloud services industry. The company's main offerings include providing business-to-government (B2G) and business-to-business (B2B) connectivity through a combination of satellite constellations and terrestrial systems, extending the cloud to the edge of the network. Mangata Networks primarily serves businesses, communities, and government sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Gold Canyon, Arizona.

name: SourceDay
cb_description: SourceDay specializes in supply chain software solutions within the procurement and supply chain management domain. The company offers a platform that facilitates real-time collaboration between buyers and suppliers, ensuring accurate and efficient management of direct material purchase order changes and communication. SourceDay's software integrates with ERP systems to enhance data accuracy, reduce buffer stock, and improve on-time delivery of materials. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Moneytree
cb_description: Moneytree develops a personal financial management tool. It offers an application that enables individuals to automatically view all of their bank accounts, credit cards, digital money, mileage, points, and securities together in one place. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Luminopia
cb_description: Luminopia is a company focused on creating digital therapeutics for significant neuro-visual disorders, specifically in the healthcare sector. The company's main product is a binocular therapy for amblyopia, a condition that causes vision loss in children. This therapy involves a software that works with commercially available Head-Mounted Displays (HMDs) and uses a dual-action mechanism to rebalance input between the eyes, encouraging the brain to combine the images from both eyes. The therapy is delivered through a controlled environment with no distractions, and patients can choose from a variety of TV shows and movies to watch during treatment. Luminopia primarily sells to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Addionics
cb_description: Addionics specializes in battery technology within the energy sector. The company offers rechargeable batteries with an architecture applicable to current and emerging lithium-ion battery (LIB) technology. Addionics serves sectors that require advanced energy storage solutions, leveraging both hardware innovations in smart 3D current collectors and software-driven AI optimization for performance attributes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Ambient Photonics
cb_description: Ambient Photonics specializes in the development of low-light energy harvesting solar cells for connected devices within the clean energy sector. The company's main offerings include photovoltaic cells that convert ambient indoor and outdoor light into electrical energy, aiming to replace batteries in smart IoT devices with a more sustainable power source. These solar cells are designed to be integrated seamlessly into various product designs, providing a high power density and a maintenance-free energy solution. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mill Valley, California.

name: BuildOps
cb_description: BuildOps provides a project management platform for commercial service contractors. Its platform helps integrate scheduling, dispatching, inventory management, contracts, workflow, and accounting for commercial real estate contractors. It serves the industrial sector. BuildOps was founded in 2018 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: GigFinesse
cb_description: GigFinesse is a concierge booking platform specializing in live entertainment solutions within the hospitality industry. The company offers services such as talent sourcing, booking, communication, and payout management for various venues. GigFinesse primarily serves local establishments, nation-wide chains, and concert halls looking to host live music events. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Kard
cb_description: Kard specializes in rewards-as-a-service for the financial and marketing sectors, offering a platform that enhances loyalty programs. The company provides an API that allows banks, card issuers, and marketers to create customizable loyalty programs quickly, aiming to increase cardholder engagement and merchant customer retention. Kard's services are primarily utilized by financial institutions and marketing agencies looking to incentivize consumer loyalty and spending. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cornelis Networks
cb_description: Cornelis Networks specializes in fabrics for the computing (HPC), high-performance data analytics (HPDA), and artificial intelligence (AI) sectors. The company offers a range of hardware and software solutions designed to facilitate computing and data processing capabilities. Cornelis Networks primarily serves government, academic institutions, and commercial enterprises with their technology solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Chesterbrook, Pennsylvania.

name: Tarana Wireless
cb_description: Tarana Wireless specializes in next-generation fixed wireless access (ngFWA) technology within the broadband telecommunications sector. The company's main offerings include the G1 platform, which provides fiber-class broadband services using both licensed and unlicensed spectrum to deliver high-speed internet connectivity. Tarana Wireless primarily serves broadband service providers looking to address the digital divide and compete in both mainstream and underserved markets. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Celmatix
cb_description: Celmatix is a preclinical-stage biotech company with a focus on women's health, specifically in the domain of ovarian health. The company's main offerings include the development of novel therapeutics for conditions related to ovarian health, such as endometriosis, PCOS, and ovarian senescence. These products aim to improve women's lives by addressing conditions caused by poor ovarian health, which have traditionally been treated with outdated hormonal interventions. The company primarily sells to the healthcare industry, with a specific focus on women's health. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Hone
cb_description: Hone operates as a live learning platform for organizations. It offers live, cohort-based training programs, research-backed curriculum, and learner assessments through a scalable platform. The company primarily serves the corporate sector, providing training solutions for leaders, managers, and individual contributors across various industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Encinitas, California.

name: Cube
cb_description: We provide on demand office space and a thriving ecosystem for entrepreneurs in Rochester, MN.

name: Air
cb_description: Air is a P2P ecosystem which is completely decentralized by eliminating centralized servers to insure that no one cloud computing company has access to the users' data and information.

name: Tagore Technology
cb_description: Tagore Technology operates as a fabless semiconductor company focusing on new semiconductor processes in the technology sector. The company offers highly integrated circuit (IC) solutions that enable high radio frequency (RF) power for various markets, with products such as RF switches designed for use in wireless infrastructure and radios. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Arlington Heights, Illinois.

name: Nomad Homes
cb_description: Nomad Homes operates as a real estate company specializing in the buying sector. The company offers services such as finding and acquiring homes and investment opportunities and providing expert and impartial advice to secure the property. Nomad Homes serves the real estate industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: QI Tech
cb_description: QI Tech is a technology company with a banking license that specializes in the financial technology sector. It provides automated financial tools designed to meet the needs of a highly regulated banking environment. The company's main offerings include digital investment platforms, credit asset management, and digital debt issuance services, aimed at simplifying the banking processes for its clients through a full-stack Bank-as-a-Service platform with APIs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: G2 Esports
cb_description: G2 Esports is an organization focused on esports and entertainment. The company offers esports competitions and entertainment content, with a roster of players and content creators. It primarily serves the esports industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Arkestro
cb_description: Arkestro specializes in Predictive Procurement Orchestration within the procurement industry. The company offers a platform that leverages behavioral science, game theory, and machine learning to optimize procurement cycles and facilitate better buying decisions. Arkestro's solutions are designed to scale strategic procurement execution and amplify the impact of procurement's influence across various industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Urban
cb_description: Urban produces Urban Gold, CBD flavored cigarettes with a tobacco blend.

name: Solar Foods
cb_description: Solar Foods focuses on sustainable food production through biotechnology within the food industry. The company's main offering is a protein called Solein, which is produced using a unique bioprocess that grows microorganisms into edible food using air, electricity, and fermentation. Solar Foods primarily serves the food industry with its agriculture-independent protein production technology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Vantaa, Finland.

name: DigitalOwl
cb_description: DigitalOwl is a Software (non-internet/mobile) company based in Winter Park, Florida. DigitalOwl's investors include New Atlantic Ventures and Noro-Moseley Partners.

name: Exponent Energy
cb_description: Exponent Energy is a full stack energy company operating in the energy and technology sectors. The company's main offerings include the development of chargers and batteries that enable rapid 15-minute charging for electric vehicles. The company's products are primarily targeted towards the electric vehicle industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Charlie
cb_description: Charlie is a financial technology company focused on personal finance management. The company's main service was a digital application that provided users with personalized financial recommendations and strategies for debt repayment. The primary target market for Charlie's services was everyday Americans seeking to improve their financial health. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Pando
cb_description: Pando is a tech news site that aims to be a site-of-record for the startup root-system and everything that springs up from it, cycle-after-cycle.  In November 2013, PandoDaily was renamed Pando after acquiring the talent of NSFW Corp which was founded by Paul Carr.

name: Vecna Robotics
cb_description: Vecna Robotics engages in automated material handling and workflow optimization in the distribution, e-commerce, warehousing, and manufacturing sectors. It offers solutions including self-driving vehicles and an orchestration engine technology, allowing diverse robot types and humans to work together to automate workflows. It primarily serves the distribution, e-commerce, warehousing, and manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Facio
cb_description: Facio is a financial services company specializing in salary advance services. It offers a solution for financial emergencies by allowing users to receive funds in their bank account within minutes and repay upon their next salary payment. Facio primarily serves individuals in need of immediate financial assistance to cover unexpected expenses. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Lentra
cb_description: Lentra focuses on providing digital lending software solutions in the financial sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform that enables financial institutions to create custom loan products and streamline their lending processes. It covers a wide range of lending needs, from personal and business loans to education and vehicle financing. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Pune, India.

name: Arryved
cb_description: Arryved is a point-of-service software company specializing in solutions for the craft food and beverage service industry. The company offers a suite of products including a mobile POS system, data reporting dashboard, online ordering, loyalty programs, and contactless ordering solutions. Arryved primarily serves bars, breweries, restaurants, cideries, distilleries, and other related businesses. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Life House
cb_description: Life House is a company that specializes in vertically integrated hotel software and operates within the hospitality industry. Their main offerings include a suite of software solutions designed to make independent hotels more profitable and easier to manage, leveraging their operational expertise from managing over 50 hotels. They also provide hotel brand management services to complement their software solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Klaim
cb_description: Klaim specializes in healthcare revenue cycle management. The company offers services that ensure healthcare providers receive payments and provides tools for automated eligibility checking, smart claim analysis, and real-time reporting. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. Its services include Klaim X-Ray, Klaim Kapital, Klaim Inspector and Klaim Eligible. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Pachama
cb_description: Pachama focuses on climate change solutions within the environmental technology sector. The company offers services that allow businesses to invest in carbon credits, using artificial intelligence and satellite data to verify and monitor nature-based carbon sequestration projects. Pachama primarily serves businesses of all sizes, from large enterprises to small businesses, as well as individuals. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Guru
cb_description: Guru is a company that operates in the online freelancing industry, providing a platform for professionals to connect and collaborate. The company's main service is to offer a secure and flexible platform where businesses can find and hire expert freelancers from around the world for various tasks and projects. The company primarily serves businesses across various sectors looking for freelance talent. It was founded in 1998 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Canopy
cb_description: Canopy specializes in employee assistance and organizational wellbeing within the mental health sector. The company offers comprehensive Employee Assistance Programs (EAP), wellbeing coaching, digital therapy tools, and organizational training and development services designed to support both individual employees and the overall organizational health. Canopy primarily serves various sectors including construction, healthcare, public safety, and more, with a focus on creating inclusive and supportive workplace environments. It was founded in 1975 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Sapient Industries
cb_description: Sapient Industries specializes in energy efficiency and smart building technology within the energy sector. The company offers a platform that collects granular energy data to enable efficient, grid-responsive buildings, and provides actionable insights for energy, facility, and sustainability management. Sapient Industries primarily serves organizations looking to improve their building operations and contribute to a low carbon future. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: 7shifts
cb_description: 7shifts is a company focused on providing comprehensive team management solutions for the restaurant industry. Its main offerings include a platform for employee scheduling, time tracking, tip management, payroll, and team engagement. The company primarily serves the restaurant sector, including quick service, full service, and other food service establishments. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan.

name: Flaviar
cb_description: Flaviar is a premium spirits club that specializes in whiskey subscriptions and curated spirit selections. The company offers a range of products including tasting boxes, exclusive member pricing on bottles, and gift subscriptions, allowing customers to explore and enjoy a variety of premium spirits. Flaviar also provides educational content and events for spirit enthusiasts. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AnyRoad
cb_description: AnyRoad is a leading provider in the experiential marketing platform domain, focusing on optimizing events and experiences for brands. The company offers a suite of tools for automating event management, capturing and analyzing customer feedback, and measuring the ROI of marketing programs. AnyRoad's platform is designed to enhance consumer brand loyalty and drive revenue growth through actionable insights. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SafeGraph
cb_description: SafeGraph specializes in curating high-quality geospatial data for analytics and is a key player in the data services industry. The company offers a comprehensive suite of products including detailed point of interest (POI) data, building footprint information, and attributes that provide context and precision to geospatial analyses. SafeGraph's data solutions cater to a variety of sectors such as retail site selection, competitive intelligence, risk assessment, and consumer behavior analysis. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Sense
cb_description: Sense is a professional services firm that specializes in digital transformation and modernization within the IT and business consulting sectors. The company offers a range of services including business consulting, IT modernization, digital transformation, application services, and managed services, all designed to help organizations navigate complex challenges and maximize their potential. Sense primarily serves sectors such as banking, healthcare, government, and utilities, among others. It was founded in 1996 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Typeform
cb_description: Typeform focuses on data collection. The company offers a form-builder service that allows businesses to create interactive forms, surveys, and quizzes for data-gathering purposes. Its primary market includes businesses across various sectors that require data collection and analysis. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: ZStack
cb_description: ZStack is a global IT vendor specializing in cloud computing technologies and services. The company offers a suite of cloud solutions, including private and hybrid cloud services, cloud management platforms, hyper-converged infrastructure, distributed storage systems, container cloud platforms, cloud-native hyper-convergence, and database cloud platforms. ZStack's products are designed to empower enterprises with the ability to manage their own cloud infrastructure, providing a productized approach to cloud computing that supports a wide range of industry applications. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hong Kong.

name: SkySelect
cb_description: SkySelect focuses on the automation of aircraft parts procurement, operating within the aviation industry. The company offers an AI-powered platform that facilitates the sourcing, procurement, and tracking of aircraft parts for airlines and maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) organizations. The primary sectors that SkySelect serves are the aviation and aerospace industries. SkySelect was formerly known as DeltaBid. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: QuiX Quantum
cb_description: QuiX Quantum specializes in photonic quantum computing and operates in the quantum computing hardware sector. The company offers photonic quantum computing solutions that utilize light particles for information processing, and its products include a universal quantum computer, a special-purpose quantum computer, and a quantum photonic processor. It primarily serves the supercomputer industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Enschede, Netherlands.

name: Satori
cb_description: Satori specializes in data security and compliance within the technology sector. The company offers a Data Security Platform that manages access, permissions, and security policies, and ensures compliance across various data stores. Satori primarily serves the data analytics, data engineering, and security teams across industries such as financial services, healthcare, and technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Rehovot, Israel.

name: Alembic
cb_description: Alembic develops a marketing activities platform designed for digital marketing for companies. The company's platform provides media valuation, attribution, correlation analysis, and forecasting, enabling clients to discover audience-first, cross-brand, insights. It was formerly known as TwoThink. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sidecar Health
cb_description: Sidecar Health operates as a provider of modern health insurance solutions in the healthcare sector. The company offers ACA-compliant major medical plans that empower consumers with cost control and the freedom to choose any doctor without network restrictions. It caters to both individuals seeking personal coverage and employers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Covina, California.

name: Imperia
cb_description: Provider of enterprise content management (ECM) systems. The company provides ECM systems based on a workflow engine designed to graphically represent content-related processes and optimize the creation and administration of online content. The company also offers additional modules intended to facilitate full-text search, advertising, and media database functionalities.

name: Rose Rocket
cb_description: Rose Rocket provides transportation management software (TMS) services. The company offers order management software that helps trucking companies manage critical steps in their order process, including pricing, dispatch, and order entry. Rose Rocket was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Addi
cb_description: Addi provides consumer finance applications for the Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) category. It facilitates credit purchases and interest-free installment payments. The company offers credit card and digital banking solutions through a mobile application that enables customers to pay in monthly installments. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: DataX
cb_description: DataX specializzes in developing risk analytics focused on positive decisioning. DataX leverages the most advanced non-prime credit reporting in the market. DataX provides real0time credit reporting, data cerficiation and authentication services that benefit  financial institutions and private equity lenders.

name: Praxis
cb_description: The Praxis Company uses gamification to improve financial literacy. Praxis simulates financial challenges to teach money management. The company offers its services to financial services firms, schools, universities and corporate clients.

name: Mobly
cb_description: Mobly operates as a sales technology company specializing in mobile lead capture and CRM integration. The company offers a mobile app that scans badges and business cards, enriches contact data, and logs sales activities directly into a user's marketing automation platform or customer relationship management system. Mobly serves various sectors within the sales and marketing industries, providing tools for lead management and accelerating the sales process. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Lehi, Utah.

name: Futurae
cb_description: Futurae is a company specializing in AI-based, user-centric authentication solutions within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a suite of services including multi-factor, passwordless, and adaptive authentication to enhance online security and user experience. Futurae primarily serves sectors such as banking, fintech, insurance, payment, and retail with its authentication and fraud prevention solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: NFTfi
cb_description: NFTfi is a lending platform specializing in the decentralized finance sector, providing non-fungible token (NFT) collateralized loans. The company enables NFT holders to use their Ethereum Virtual Machine (ERC)-721 tokens as collateral to borrow cryptocurrencies such as wrapped ether (wETH) or United States dollar coin (USDC) from lenders, with the assurance of getting their NFTs back upon loan repayment. NFTfi primarily serves the NFT community, including collectors, artists, and institutions seeking liquidity without selling their digital assets. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tortola, Virgin Islands.

name: Mosaic Manufacturing
cb_description: Mosaic Manufacturing operates in the 3D printing industry. The company offers products that enable 3D printers to print in multiple colors or materials and provides automated 3D printing processes that can handle high-temperature materials. Mosaic Manufacturing primarily serves the manufacturing sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Databox
cb_description: Databox specializes in foundational 'core' hardware technology innovation, aiming to become a competitive global leader in the big data industry, spanning from chips to complete systems and cloud solutions. The company focuses on the storage and computation needs of the big data industry, developing and successfully fabricating leading-edge dedicated chips for big data storage and computation; it is not only the first Chinese enterprise to successfully fabricate such chips but also a global technology leader surpassing international manufacturers like Intel and Huawei. It was founded in 2015 and is based in China.

name: Okteto
cb_description: Okteto is a company focused on automating the modern developer experience, operating in the cloud computing and software development industry. The company offers a platform that automates the creation and management of development environments on Kubernetes, aiming to increase developer productivity and streamline workflows. Okteto primarily serves the software development and cloud computing industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Moove
cb_description: Moove is a tech-enabled real estate broker. It charges a flat rate to sell the user's property rather than commission based and with no upfront fees. It offers landlords guaranteed monthly rent for their properties and a much smaller letting fee than most real estate agents.

name: Flatfair
cb_description: Flatfair is a company specializing in rental solutions and protection within the real estate sector. The company offers products such as an alternative to traditional cash deposits for tenants, enhanced protection for landlords, and streamlined deposit processing services. Flatfair primarily serves the real estate industry, catering to tenants, landlords, and agents with its innovative services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Meru Health
cb_description: Meru Health is a company focused on providing a new standard of mental healthcare through a holistic mind-body approach. They offer a comprehensive mental health care program that includes continuous therapist support, structured lessons, biofeedback, and community support, aimed at overcoming mental health challenges. The company primarily serves individuals, health plans, employers, and healthcare providers seeking effective mental health solutions. Meru Health was formerly known as Blooming Solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Edgeless Systems
cb_description: Edgeless Systems specializes in confidential computing within the cybersecurity sector. It offers software solutions that keep data encrypted even during processing, aiming to protect against infrastructure-based threats and ensure compliance with privacy laws. Edgeless Systems primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, the public sector, financial services, telecommunications, Web3, and blockchain. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bochum, Germany.

name: Ternary
cb_description: Ternary is a multi-cloud FinOps platform that specializes in cloud cost management and financial operations optimization. The company offers a suite of tools that enable businesses to visualize, understand, and optimize their cloud spending across various cloud environments without the need for technical expertise. Ternary's solutions cater to FinOps teams, engineers, finance departments, and managed service providers, aiming to facilitate better financial planning, analysis, and decision-making. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Feals
cb_description: Feals is a wellness company that operates in the cannabinoid-based supplements industry. The company offers a range of products designed to promote calmness, clarity, and daily relief, including CBD and THC remedies that help manage distraction, anxiety, and sleeplessness. These products are primarily targeted towards individuals seeking natural and organic solutions for wellness and relaxation. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Fleksy
cb_description: Fleksy is a virtual keyboard technology provider specializing in the development of customizable text input solutions. The company offers a suite of software development kits (SDKs) that enable the creation of personalized and secure virtual keyboards for various digital platforms. Fleksy's products are designed to enhance the typing experience with features like predictive text, autocorrection, and swipe input, and are utilized across industries such as healthcare, AR & VR, generative AI, banking, and cybersecurity. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Vyrill
cb_description: Vyrill specializes in electronic commerce. The company offers artificial intelligence-powered tools to analyze user-generated content, providing insights to enhance video marketing strategies and e-commerce sales. It primarily serves brands, agencies, content creators, retailers, and tech platforms in the e-commerce industry. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: MyGlamm
cb_description: MyGlamm is a company that specializes in the sale of premium beauty products and luxury cosmetics. The company offers a wide range of makeup, skincare, hair care, bath and body products, as well as sanitizing care items. These products cater to various beauty needs, from color cosmetics like lipsticks and foundations to personal care essentials such as shampoos and body lotions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pune, India.

name: Clear Skye
cb_description: Clear Skye is a company that focuses on Identity Security and Governance in the Information Technology sector. The company offers a range of services including identity lifecycle management, access request and review, and workflow management, all designed to streamline, simplify, and secure business operations. Clear Skye primarily serves businesses in need of efficient and secure identity and access governance solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Emeryville, California.

name: Censia
cb_description: Censia focuses on talent intelligence in the human resources industry. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI)-powered solutions that help organizations find, evaluate, and hire talent, with a particular emphasis on mitigating unconscious bias and privilege. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Arbor Biotechnologies
cb_description: Arbor Biotechnologies runs a life sciences company with a focus on biodiscovery. The company's main services include the development of genetic medicines through the discovery of programmable deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) editors. It aims to provide curative outcomes for patients. Arbor Biotechnologies primarily serves the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Quibim
cb_description: Quibim specializes in medical imaging analysis within the life sciences domain, focusing on health. The company offers a suite of artificial intelligence (AI)-driven tools that analyze medical images from various modalities such as magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), computed tomography (CT), and positron emission tomography (PET), transforming them into actionable insights for healthcare providers and life sciences companies. Quibim's cloud-based platform facilitates data management and harmonization, ensuring standardized image quality and integrating with electronic health records and multi-omics data. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Valencia, Spain.

name: Stack
cb_description: Stack is a communication platform. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Nift Networks
cb_description: Nift Networks specializes in customer acquisition and engagement within various business sectors, leveraging a unique platform that connects companies and consumers. The company offers a gift card network that uses AI to match consumers with new products and services, facilitating brand discovery and customer appreciation. Nift primarily serves sectors that include ecommerce, direct-to-consumer brands, and high-engagement consumer apps. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: StockGro
cb_description: StockGro focuses on financial education, in the domain of stock trading and investing. The company offers a trading platform where users can learn about stock market trading and investing from industry experts, build their portfolios, and engage in social trading. The primary customers of. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Meritize
cb_description: Meritize is a company focused on providing student loans for skills-based education, operating in the financial services sector. The company offers non-traditional lending methods to fund students' skills-based careers, evaluating not only credit scores but also past academic or military achievements to determine loan eligibility. Meritize primarily serves the education sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Frisco, Texas.

name: Semperis
cb_description: Semperis specializes in Active Directory security and recovery solutions. The company offers a platform for hybrid AD threat prevention, detection, response, and recovery, as well as services for identity risk management and attack pattern detection. Semperis primarily serves sectors such as critical infrastructure, financial services, healthcare, insurance, retail, public sector, and transportation. Semperis was formerly known as Cloudify D.R. Technology. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Hoboken, New Jersey.

name: Smartlabs
cb_description: Smartlabs is an electronic home improvement and automation company based in Irving, Calif. Smartlabs is the parent company of Insteon, which makes technology for Internet of Things (IoT) devices, and Smarthome, an e-commerce store for home automation products. INSTEON is a networking technology for the connected home, featuring a dual-mesh control and sensing, remote control technology. Lighting, leak, door and motion sensing, garage door control are amongst INSTEON's most popular applications. Smarthome is a home automation retailer, an easy-to-use source for thousands of affordable lighting, security, and home entertainment products that the average do-it-yourselfer can safely install.

name: Nirvana Health
cb_description: Nirvana Health focuses on insurance eligibility verification and cost estimation. The company offers automated benefit verification technology that enables healthcare providers to check patient benefits, reducing the need for manual work. Nirvana's solutions cater to the healthcare industry, particularly benefiting providers by simplifying patient intake and billing processes. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: XILO
cb_description: XILO is a workflow automation platform specializing in modernizing the insurance quoting process for agencies. The company offers solutions such as digital intake forms that streamline data entry, sales automation to enhance customer touchpoints, and analytics to monitor performance in real-time. XILO's platform is designed to increase productivity and reduce costs for insurance agencies by integrating with various industry tools and providing a superior customer experience. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Hussle
cb_description: Hussle is self-serve staffing, bringing Uber-like ease and logistics to any type of task you need done.

name: 1Fort
cb_description: 1Fort focuses on providing AI-powered preventive insurance solutions within the insurance sector. The company offers a platform that integrates risk mitigation services with insurance coverage to help businesses manage risks and potentially save on insurance premiums. 1Fort primarily serves sectors such as construction, education, financial services, healthcare, professional services, manufacturing, real estate, and retail. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Umoja Biopharma
cb_description: Umoja Biopharma specializes in the development of immunotherapy treatments within the biotechnology sector. The company's main offerings include an integrated platform for in vivo reprogramming of T cells to target and treat various forms of cancer. Umoja Biopharma's products are designed to address solid tumors and hematological cancers that are resistant to current immunotherapies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Alida Biosciences
cb_description: Alida Biosciences is a biotechnology company focused on developing advanced tools for epigenetic and epitranscriptomic analysis within the biotech sector. The company offers products such as reagent kits for multiplexed detection and quantitation of RNA modifications, which are used in research, therapeutics, and diagnostics. Alida Biosciences primarily serves sectors such as pharmaceuticals, diagnostics, and agricultural sciences. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Lucky Saint
cb_description: Lucky Saint focuses on the production of alcohol-free beer, operating in the beverage industry. The company offers a superior unfiltered lager that is brewed using four natural ingredients, providing a refreshing and non-alcoholic alternative to traditional beers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: FirstBase
cb_description: FirstBase specializes in facilitating the incorporation and management of US businesses for clients globally, operating within the business services and legal technology sectors. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including company formation, compliance management, banking setup without an EIN, payroll, bookkeeping, and tax filing services, all accessible through an online platform. FirstBase primarily serves entrepreneurs and startups looking to establish and grow their business in the United States. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Virtuous
cb_description: Virtuous is a software company that operates in the nonprofit sector, focusing on customer relationship management (CRM) and donor management. The company offers a responsive fundraising platform that provides CRM, fundraising, volunteer management, and marketing tools to help nonprofits create personalized donor experiences and increase their giving. Its services are primarily utilized by various sectors within the nonprofit industry, including human services, healthcare, higher education, ministries, animal welfare, and arts & cultural organizations. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.

name: Percepto
cb_description: Percepto develops autonomous inspection and monitoring solutions. It offers products that automate visual data workflows, including drone-in-a-box technology, for the inspection and monitoring of critical infrastructure and assets. Its major products are Percepto AIM Software and Drone-in-a-box. It primarily serves sectors such as electric utilities, solar energy, mining, oil and gas, ports and terminals, and industrial sites. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Hevel Modi'in Industrial Park, Israel.

name: Clear Street
cb_description: Clear Street specializes in modernizing the brokerage ecosystem within the capital markets industry. The company offers a cloud-native platform that provides services such as clearing and custody, execution, prime financing, and investment banking, all designed to enhance access, speed, and service for various market participants. Clear Street primarily serves institutions, professional traders, and brokers with tools and services for trading U.S. equities and options. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Tigera
cb_description: Tigera specializes in secure networking and comprehensive protection for containers and Kubernetes within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers products such as Calico Open Source for container networking and security, Calico Cloud for security in Kubernetes environments, and Calico Enterprise for advanced zero trust security in Kubernetes. Tigera's solutions cater to a range of needs including vulnerability management, workload access controls, runtime threat defense, security policy management, observability, troubleshooting, and compliance across various cloud environments. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Saturn Cloud
cb_description: Saturn Cloud focuses on providing a platform for data science and machine learning development, deployment, and data pipelines. The company offers a cloud-based solution allowing users to run analyses, train models, deploy application programming interfaces (APIs), and more. It primarily serves the data science and machine learning industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Candivore
cb_description: Candivore operates as a game development company. The company's main product is Match Masters a match-3 game that allows players to challenge their friends in a multiplayer setting. The company primarily targets the online gaming industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: igloohome
cb_description: igloohome specializes in smart access solutions within the security products industry. The company offers smart locks and lock boxes that can be managed via a mobile app, providing convenient access without the need for physical keys. igloohome primarily serves the residential, rental, and business sectors with its advanced access management systems. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Cosaic
cb_description: Cosaic provides a financial data visualization and integration platform. The platform facilitates the making of HTML5 financial charts as well as links financial applications together to help create smart, modern desktops, enabling financial companies to combine third-party applications into their in-house systems with no additional development work required. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Charlottesville, Virginia. In January 2023, Cosaic was acquired by S&P Global. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Omnia Fishing
cb_description: Omnia Fishing is a personalized e-commerce platform and app-based mapping service in the fishing gear and tackle industry.
