The company offers a unique shop-by-lake concept, allowing customers to find and purchase fishing gear tailored to specific water bodies, along with providing comprehensive data layers and real-time information for planning fishing trips. Omnia Fishing primarily serves the recreational fishing community with its innovative approach to tackle shopping and trip planning. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Golden Valley, Minnesota.

name: Pequity
cb_description: Pequity provides compensation management solutions in human resources. The company offers a software platform that combines the ease of use of a spreadsheet with automation to manage employee compensation, including planning, budgeting, and executing promotion and merit increases, pay adjustments, and more. It primarily serves sectors such as human resources, finance, and talent acquisition. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: RentoMojo
cb_description: RentoMojo specializes in asset leasing, in the furniture, appliances, and electronics sectors. The company offers a range of products for rent, providing a flexible solution for setting up homes, with maintenance services. RentoMojo primarily caters to individuals and families looking for temporary furnishing and appliance solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Zuddl
cb_description: Zuddl is a company that focuses on event management in the tech industry. It offers a modular platform that allows users to build and manage in-person, virtual, and hybrid events, providing features such as event landing page creation, communications, engagement tools, ticketing and registration, insights, and mobile app support. The company primarily serves the B2B event marketing sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Plano, Texas.

name: BeAM
cb_description: BeAM is a French company manufacturing industrial metal 3D printers/additive manufacturing machines using the LMD technology (Laser Metal Deposition). BeAM's machines allow a layer-by-layer metal deposition in order to manufacture and repair parts, but also add functions and shapes on already existing parts directly from a CAD file.

name: RaySecur
cb_description: RaySecur specializes in mail security focusing on technology that detects threats within mail and packages. It offers a proprietary scanning technology that provides three-dimensional (3D) imaging of mail contents using millimeter waves, designed to detect threats such as liquids and powders. Its solutions are primarily utilized by sectors such as corporate security, government agencies, and executive protection. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Westwood, Massachusetts.

name: Clue
cb_description: Clue focuses on health technology, specifically in the domain of menstrual and reproductive health. The company offers a period and ovulation tracking application that provides users with predictions and insights about their menstrual cycle, fertility windows, and cycle-related symptoms. The app is designed to help users understand their bodies better and make informed health choices. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Ocient
cb_description: Ocient provides hyperscale data analytics solutions in the data warehouse platform industry. The company offers a hyperscale enterprise data warehouse platform designed for rapid transformation and analysis of massive data sets. Ocient's solutions cater to various industries, including ad tech, telecom, government, financial services, and geospatial sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Haber
cb_description: Haber specializes in AI-driven automation solutions for the industrial sector, focusing on plant efficiency and sustainability. The company offers process monitoring and control, utilizing data from sensors and devices to optimize operations and reduce resource consumption. Haber's technology serves the pulp and paper, food and beverage, and institutional sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pune, India.

name: Netskope
cb_description: Netskope operates as a cybersecurity company. It focuses on redefining cloud, data, and network security. The company offers a range of products and solutions, including the intelligent security service edge (SSE) platform, which provides, security for people, devices, and data wherever they are. Its services include protection against advanced and cloud-enabled threats, secure access to web and cloud applications, and data loss prevention. The company primarily serves the cybersecurity industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Contingent
cb_description: Contingent is a company that specializes in providing a Supplier Insight Platform within the procurement and supply chain management sectors. The company offers services that enable businesses to manage third-party risks, monitor supply chains in real-time, and ensure regulatory compliance. Contingent's platform is designed to integrate seamlessly into existing procurement workflows, facilitating collaboration and strategic decision-making among stakeholders. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Justworks
cb_description: Justworks focuses on providing payroll and Professional Employer Organization (PEO) solutions. The company offers a range of services including payroll management, human resources tools, compliance support, and access to corporate-level benefits. These services are designed to help businesses streamline their operations, stay compliant, and take better care of their employees. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Train Fitness
cb_description: Train Fitness specializes in AI-enabled fitness tracking technology within the health and fitness industry. The company offers a solution for automatically tracking exercises, sets, and reps using an Apple Watch. This technology primarily serves individuals seeking to enhance their gym workout experiences through advanced analytics. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: newcleo
cb_description: newcleo is a company focused on innovating in the nuclear energy sector to generate safe, clean, and economically viable energy. The company specializes in metal-cooled fast reactors and liquid-lead cooling systems, aiming to address the nuclear industry's challenges related to waste, safety, and cost. It also invests in MOX fuel manufacturing to harness energy from nuclear industry by-products. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Ozlo Sleep
cb_description: Ozlo Sleep specializes in audio technology designed to improve sleep quality within the health and wellness sector. The company offers wireless earbuds, known as Ozlo Sleepbuds, which are engineered to provide a better sleeping experience through science-based audio technology. Its products are primarily targeted at individuals seeking natural sleep aids. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Hemper
cb_description: Hemper is a regenerative fashion brand operating in the fashion industry. The company primarily offers sustainable backpacks, bags, and accessories, all handcrafted using natural fibers and dyes. Their products are designed to generate a positive impact socially, culturally, and environmentally. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: RIOT
cb_description: RIOT is a company that focuses on providing RFID software solutions in the retail industry, specifically for fashion retailers. The company's main service is offering real-time inventory management software that allows fashion retailers to track sales and manage their inventory, reducing manual labor. RIOT primarily serves the retail industry, with a specific focus on fashion retailers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: oVice
cb_description: oVice is a company that specializes in providing a virtual office platform for remote teams across various sectors. Their platform offers features such as live avatar communication, screen sharing, and an interactive online work environment to facilitate collaboration and engagement. oVice primarily serves businesses, educational institutions, and communities seeking to enhance remote interactions and productivity. oVice was formerly known as Nimaru Technology. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Ishikawa, Japan.

name: Simple
cb_description: Simple opeartes as an online banking platform that offers budgeting and saving tools within the financial services industry. The company provided customers with services such as online checking, savings accounts, shared checking options, certificates of deposit, and personal loans, for personal finance management. Simple provided budgeting tools to allocate funds for expenses and goals, while its 'Safe-to-Spend' feature aided in spending decisions. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Portland, Oregon. Simple ceased operations in January 2021.

name: Pigment
cb_description: Pigment specializes in organizational development and marketing within the public, service, and technology sectors. The company offers strategic action planning, business modeling, digital communication strategies, content marketing, and CSR road mapping. Pigment primarily serves clients in the public sector, service industry, and technology field. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Sint-Katelijne-Waver, Belgium.

name: Cradle
cb_description: Cradle focuses on the intersection of biology and artificial intelligence, operating within the biotechnology industry. The company offers a platform that aids biologists in designing improved proteins swiftly, utilizing advanced prediction algorithms and AI design suggestions. Cradle primarily serves the biotechnology sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Delft, Netherlands.

name: Affinity
cb_description: Affinity is a relationship intelligence platform focused on automating the dealmaking process for various sectors including venture capital, private equity, and investment banking. The company offers a suite of tools that leverage artificial intelligence to analyze relationship strength, automate contact management, and provide insights for deal sourcing and management. Affinity's products are designed to facilitate warm introductions and enhance cross-team collaboration by maintaining a centralized, automatically updated database of contacts and interactions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Vitestro
cb_description: Vitestro operates as a medical device company focused on transforming patient care with its autonomous blood-drawing technology. It offers a device that streamlines the blood drawing workflow using AI-based, ultrasound-guided imaging and robotic needle insertion to perform the procedure automatically. Vitestro primarily sells to the healthcare industry, including hospitals and clinical laboratories. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Utrecht, Netherlands.

name: Greywing
cb_description: Greywing is a company specializing in maritime data management, offering a suite of AI-driven solutions to optimize maritime operations. Their main services include AI-powered tools for crew planning, vessel tracking, and coordination of crew changes, designed to enhance decision-making and operational efficiency. The company primarily serves the maritime industry, providing technology to streamline processes for shipping companies, crew management firms, and port agencies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Quintessent
cb_description: Quintessent provides optical connectivity solutions for the computing and artificial intelligence sectors. The company develops optical interconnect technology that can be integrated with compute chips, enabling communication across datacenters. This technology is based on over a decade of research and includes elements such as O-band quantum dot lasers, silicon photonic integrated circuits, and communication architectures. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Goleta, California.

name: Local Infusion
cb_description: Local Infusion is a healthcare company focused on providing infusion therapy services. The company offers a range of infusion therapies for various conditions such as Allergy and immunology, Asthma, Crohns Disease, and Multiple Sclerosis, among others, in a patient-centered and digitally powered environment. Local Infusion primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Concord, New Hampshire.

name: mPharma
cb_description: mPharma is a company focused on improving access to medicines in the healthcare industry. The company provides innovative financing and inventory management solutions to hospitals, pharmacies, and patients, ensuring that high-quality medicines are always available and affordable. mPharma primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Lexington, Massachusetts.

name: Kalderos
cb_description: Kalderos specializes in drug discount management within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that leverages AI and machine learning to monitor Medicaid and commercial discounts, ensuring compliance and preventing noncompliant discounts. Kalderos primarily serves healthcare providers, drug manufacturers, and state payers, aiming to improve transparency and efficiency in drug discount programs. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Idoven
cb_description: Idoven is a health technology company focused on detection and medicine in the cardiovascular domain. The company offers an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered platform that improves the speed, consistency, and accuracy of electrocardiogram (ECG) interpretation, and works with existing ECG devices to support clinician decision-making and disease management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Shellworks
cb_description: Shellworks focuses on creating packaging solutions within the materials industry. Its main offerings include bio-based, vegan, and home compostable materials designed to replace single-use plastics and reduce environmental impact. It primarily serves the personal care and skin care industries with packaging products and is certified for food contact. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Klearly
cb_description: Klearly is a company focused on simplifying payment acceptance for small and medium-sized businesses in the financial technology sector. The company offers a digital payment solution that turns smartphones and tablets into secure payment processing devices, allowing businesses to accept various forms of payments without monthly fees or complex contracts. Klearly primarily serves sectors such as SMBs, restaurants, delivery services, beauty and fitness industries. Klearly was formerly known as LemonPay. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Poolside
cb_description: Poolside is a technology company that focuses on the development of artificial intelligence (AI) for software development. The company's main service is creating an AI system that assists in software development. Poolside primarily serves the software development industry. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Paris, France.

name: nextProtein
cb_description: nextProtein is a company focused on sustainable agriculture and resource management in the animal feed industry. The company produces insect-based protein for animal feedstocks, utilizing Black Soldier Fly larvae raised on otherwise unconsumed food, which is then processed into protein powder, lipid products, and natural fertilizer. These products are primarily used in the aquaculture, pet food, and other animal feed sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: FarmHQ
cb_description: FarmHQ operates as an agricultural technology company with a focus on irrigation solutions. The company offers an irrigation control system that allows farmers to monitor and control their irrigation equipment remotely via a mobile app. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Burlington, Washington.

name: Smartrr
cb_description: Smartrr is a company that specializes in subscription management solutions for Shopify brands. Their platform offers a suite of features including a customizable customer account portal, loyalty rewards, referral programs, and comprehensive analytics to help businesses grow their subscriber base and retain customers. Smartrr's services are primarily targeted at direct-to-consumer brands looking to enhance their subscription offerings and customer engagement. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Constrafor
cb_description: Constrafor focuses on construction procurement and financial services. The company offers a suite of software tools and financial services that automate and streamline back-office tasks and financial transactions for general contractors and subcontractors. These services include contract management, insurance compliance, invoice tracking, payment processing, and diversity procurement. Additionally, it provides financial solutions such as receivables financing and an early pay program for subcontractors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Span
cb_description: Span focuses on the development of Sulfurized Polyacrylonitrile (SPAN) cathode materials for energy storage and power applications. The company engages in new material technology research and development, electronic special material manufacturing, and synthetic material sales. Its main offerings include the production of SPAN cathode materials. Its products are used in energy storage and power sulfur-based batteries. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Minhang, China.

name: Nuview
cb_description: Nuview specializes in Earth observation through a commercial satellite constellation equipped with light detection and ranging (LiDAR) technology, serving the remote sensing and geospatial industries. The company provides high-resolution, three dimensional (3D) digital representations of the earth's surface, including both digital surface models (DSMs) and digital terrain models (DTMs), which capture natural and man-made features. Nuview's offerings support a wide range of applications such as environmental management, infrastructure planning, and national mapping initiatives. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Orlando, Florida.

name: Duetti
cb_description: Duetti is a music financing platform that specializes in the acquisition and marketing of music catalogs. The company offers transparent, data-driven deals to artists, allowing them to sell individual tracks or percentages of their catalogs for upfront payment. Duetti primarily serves independent artists looking to fund their careers while maintaining some degree of ownership over their music. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Deepwave Digital
cb_description: Deepwave Digital is a company that focuses on integrating artificial intelligence (AI) into radio frequency (RF) and wireless systems. The company offers hardware and software solutions that allow the incorporation of AI directly into these systems, reducing network bandwidth, latency, and the need for human-driven analysis. It serves the wireless technology and AI industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Mercaux
cb_description: Mercaux specializes in enhancing the retail experience through its digital platform, focusing on in-store and remote customer engagement. The company offers a suite of solutions including clienteling, assisted selling, mobile POS, and analytics to improve customer interactions and sales performance. Mercaux's platform is designed to support retailers across various verticals such as apparel, footwear, beauty, and electronics, providing tools for task management, fulfilment, appointments, and remote selling. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Abata Therapeutics
cb_description: Abata Therapeutics provides biotecnology services. It offers developed therapies for autoimmune diseases. The company's main offerings include targeted, autologous Treg cell therapies designed to halt immune-mediated destruction, restore homeostasis, and promote repair in tissues affected by serious autoimmune diseases such as progressive multiple sclerosis. It serves the healthcare and biotechnology industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Watertown, Massachusetts.

name: Virgil
cb_description: Virgil is a company that focuses on real estate and financial services. The company offers a unique service where it co-invests with individuals to help them purchase their dream homes, providing additional capital to supplement their financing. This is not a loan, but an investment, where Virgil contributes up to 100,000 to the purchase price. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Foresight Diagnostics
cb_description: Foresight Diagnostics specializes in precision medicine, focusing on the development of liquid biopsy tests within the healthcare sector. Its main product, Foresight CLARITY, is a minimal residual disease (MRD) test that utilizes PhasED-Seq technology to detect early signs of cancer relapse with high sensitivity. The company primarily serves academic and research institutions looking for advanced diagnostic tools in cancer management. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Aurora, Colorado.

name: LALO
cb_description: LALO is a company that focuses on the production of footwear, operating within the apparel industry. The company primarily offers tactical boots and athletic shoes, designed to provide support, comfort, and traction in high-stress situations. LALO primarily caters to the needs of Special Forces Operators and individuals participating in high-intensity activities such as adventure races or CrossFit. It is based in San Diego, California.

name: PlanRadar
cb_description: PlanRadar specializes in digital SaaS solutions for the construction and real estate sectors. The company offers a platform for documentation, task management, and communication that facilitates the management of projects throughout the building lifecycle. PlanRadar's software enables digital asset and property management, defect management, and provides tools for quality and safety assurance, aiming to increase productivity and project success for various stakeholders such as contractors, developers, facility managers, and architects. PlanRadar was formerly known as DefectRadar. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: SuperMeat
cb_description: SuperMeat is a food technology company focused on the production of cultured meat. The company's main offering is high-quality chicken meat, grown directly from cells, in a process that is sustainable and animal-friendly. SuperMeat primarily serves the food technology industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Pando
cb_description: Pando is a tech news site that aims to be a site-of-record for the startup root-system and everything that springs up from it, cycle-after-cycle.  In November 2013, PandoDaily was renamed Pando after acquiring the talent of NSFW Corp which was founded by Paul Carr.

name: Mate Fertility
cb_description: Mate Fertility operates technology-enabled fertility clinics offering fertility services. It offers services such as fertility assessment, assisted reproduction, donor and gestational carrier, cryopreservation, and genetic screening. Mate Fertility was formerly known as WonderHealth. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Back Market
cb_description: Back Market offers a global marketplace focusing on the refurbishment and resale of electronics. The company offers a wide range of refurbished electronic products, including smartphones, laptops, tablets, and gaming consoles. Back Market primarily serves the consumer electronics industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Revuze
cb_description: Revuze is a company that focuses on consumer insights, specifically in the domain of online reviews, using Generative AI technology. The company's main services include collecting unstructured data from various sources such as eCommerce reviews and user-generated content, and then organizing this data into actionable insights that describe consumer needs. These insights are used by businesses in various sectors including the consumer goods, personal care, sporting goods, fashion and apparel, home appliances, food and beverages, technology, personal health, toys, footwear, and cosmetics industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Netanya, Israel.

name: Intento
cb_description: Intento focuses on machine translation and multilingual generative artificial intelligence (AI). The company offers a platform that provides immediate, tailored, and personalized language experiences, supporting over 650 languages. The platform is used by global businesses to translate documents, support tickets, and enterprise apps, and to provide real-time machine translation for customer support teams. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Altoida
cb_description: Altoida specializes in brain health assessment and neurocognitive testing within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers digital cognitive assessments that utilize augmented reality and machine learning to measure brain function and diagnose neurological diseases. Altoida's products are designed for use on smartphones and tablets, providing accessible brain health diagnostics. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: UserGems
cb_description: UserGems develops a sales and marketing platform. The company offers services that track job changes of key contacts and capture buying groups in target accounts, helping in manual processes with automated playbooks. Primarily, It caters to the sales, marketing, customer success, and revenue operations sectors. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Worlds
cb_description: Worlds provides AI-based automation within the industrial metaverse sector. The company offers a platform that enables large industrial companies to measure, analyze, and integrate AI-driven automation into their foundational operations. It serves sectors that require advanced AI solutions for automation. Worlds was formerly known as Hypergiant Sensory Sciences. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Plano, Texas.

name: Vectorious Medical Technologies
cb_description: Vectorious Medical Technologies is a company focused on the development of medical technology, specifically within the cardiovascular health sector. The company's main product is an in-heart microcomputer, which provides early detection of heart failure by directly measuring left atrial pressure. This technology is primarily aimed at the healthcare industry, particularly those dealing with cardiovascular health. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Faro
cb_description: Faro is a software platform specializing in digital clinical protocol development within the healthcare sector. The platform orchestrates complex clinical development by integrating words, data, and teams into a single, flexible interface, thereby streamlining protocol design and enhancing operational efficiency. Faro primarily serves the healthcare industry, focusing on clinical trial design and management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: TransferGo
cb_description: TransferGo specializes in international remittances within the financial sector. The company offers low-cost, secure, and fast money transfer services to individuals and businesses that enable them to send funds to bank accounts, e-wallets, and as cash transfers. TransferGo primarily serves the financial services sector, catering to the needs of migrants and businesses requiring international payment solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: SkyRyse
cb_description: Skyryse develops a hardware and software operating system, FlightOS, to power all general aviation (GA) aircraft. It was founded in 2016 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Republic
cb_description: Republic is a media network that focuses on news broadcasting in the media and entertainment industry. The company offers a range of services including live news updates, current affairs coverage, and investigative journalism across multiple platforms such as television and digital media. Republic primarily serves the general public with a keen interest in national and international news, sports, and entertainment. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Phytolon
cb_description: Phytolon is a company focused on the production of natural food colors, operating within the food industry. The company offers a range of vivid, natural colors for food products, produced through a sustainable, fermentation-based technology. These colors are designed to be compatible across various food categories, offering stability, easy blending, and cost-efficiency. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Yokne'am Illit, Israel.

name: Fasset
cb_description: Fasset provides a diversified offering through a mix of property and facilities management consultancy and delivery services across Southern England and the Midlands.

name: Inspectify
cb_description: Inspectify is a company that focuses on property inspections, operating within the real estate and technology sectors. The company offers property inspection services, including the generation of inspection reports and the provision of tools for property rehabilitation. Inspectify primarily serves real estate investors, wholesalers, agents, buyers, sellers, and homeowners. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Hangry
cb_description: Hangry a food app targeting campus establishments, and allow students to order and pay for on-campus food in advance. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Toronto, Ontario. On July 13th, 2022, Hangry was acquired by Transact. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: PadSplit
cb_description: PadSplit is a company focused on providing affordable housing solutions and financial empowerment through its coliving marketplace. The company offers furnished rooms for rent on a weekly basis, which include utilities, WiFi, and access to shared amenities, catering to low-income workers seeking stable and budget-friendly living options. PadSplit primarily serves individuals such as teachers, security guards, bus drivers, and retail employees who require flexible and cost-effective housing. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Magic
cb_description: Magic is a company that focuses on providing outsourcing services and virtual assistance, operating in the business services industry. The company offers a range of services including executive assistance, sales support, customer service, bookkeeping, and other administrative tasks. These services are primarily targeted towards high-growth companies across various sectors such as marketing, operations, customer support, sales, finance, and recruiting. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: AllVoices
cb_description: AllVoices focuses on employee relations within the human resources industry. The company offers a platform that provides services such as anonymous reporting, human resource (HR) case management, performance improvement, and workplace investigations, all aimed at resolving and preventing workplace issues. The company primarily serves businesses in various sectors that require effective employee relations management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: NewCampus
cb_description: NewCampus is a leadership development school focused on training and organizational growth within the edtech sector. The company offers a range of services including talent development, performance management systems, and organizational structure enhancement to help startups scale sustainably. NewCampus primarily caters to the tech startup sector, providing solutions to enhance team performance, leadership capabilities, and HR strategies. NewCampus was formerly known as QLC.io. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Origin
cb_description: Origin specializes in Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and Decentralized Finance (DeFi) solutions. The company's main offerings include a platform for NFT ecosystems, a yield-generating stablecoin, and a governance token that enables holders to earn fees from the growth of its DeFi products. It primarily serves the cryptocurrency industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands.

name: AgentSync
cb_description: AgentSync specializes in insurance compliance software within the insurance industry. Its main offerings include automating producer management, ensuring compliance, and optimizing distribution management through modern application programming interface (API) integrations and data solutions. It primarily serves insurance carriers, agencies, and managing general agents (MGAs ) with compliance and producer management needs. AgentSync was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Aurora Labs
cb_description: Aurora Labs focuses on the development and provision of 3D metal printing technology for industrial applications. The company offers a range of services including the production of metal parts using various 3D printing technologies such as Material Extrusion and Powder Bed Fusion, as well as research and development in additive manufacturing. Aurora Labs primarily caters to industries requiring high-volume, high-accuracy 3D metal printing solutions. It is based in West Perth, Western Australia.

name: Nodle
cb_description: Nodle operates as a wireless network connecting and securing the Internet of Things (IoT) using smartphones and Bluetooth low energy (BLE). The company offers Nodle Cash App is a cryptocurrency application that detects sensors and smart devices and eventually connects them anonymously. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Elyos Energy
cb_description: Elyos Energy specializes in energy optimization and demand response for the commercial sector. The company offers a software platform that leverages machine learning to manage and reduce energy consumption in commercial buildings, as well as automating participation in demand response markets. Elyos Energy's solutions are designed to integrate with building management systems, smart meters, and HVAC systems to provide comprehensive energy management across multiple commercial properties. It was founded in 2023 and is based in London, England.

name: Bitwave
cb_description: Bitwave specializes in enterprise cryptocurrency management. The company offers automated accounting workflows, regulatory compliance, tax burden reduction, payment streamlining, and data unification services. Bitwave primarily serves sectors such as DeFi, crypto mining, blockchain gaming, and institutional investors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: VendorPM
cb_description: VendorPM provides a software-enabled marketplace. The company provides property management work with vendors by helping vendor management, sourcing, procurement, and compliance. It primarily serves the real estate industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Red Points
cb_description: Red Points specializes in digital brand protection and intellectual property rights enforcement across various industries. The company offers a suite of services to detect and remove counterfeit products, manage domain names, eliminate piracy, and recover revenue lost to brand abuse. Red Points primarily serves sectors such as fashion, sports, beauty, homeware, software, automotive, health, and financial services. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Betterplace
cb_description: Betterplace is a biometrics oriented company that bases its product on geolocation data for commercial finance companies and foundations using public and private data.

name: Ganymede
cb_description: Ganymede specializes in lab data integration and management within the life sciences and manufacturing sectors. The company offers a cloud-based platform that connects laboratory instruments and applications into a unified FAIR data layer, enabling automation of data analysis and scientific workflows. Ganymede's solutions cater to scientists, developers, and leadership teams, aiming to enhance data accessibility, interoperability, and reusability for improved efficiency and compliance in scientific research and production. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: OrCam Technologies
cb_description: OrCam Technologies is a company focused on the development of assistive technology in the artificial intelligence sector. The company offers handheld and wearable AI devices designed to assist individuals with low vision, visual impairments, and reading fatigue by communicating text and other visual information audibly. These products are primarily targeted towards the education sector, particularly for students with learning differences such as dyslexia and ADHD. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: InnovaFeed
cb_description: InnovaFeed is a biotechnological company focused on the production of insect-based protein for animal and plant nutrition. They offer sustainable and efficient technologies for large-scale insect farming, aiming to create a circular and zero waste agri-food chain. The company primarily serves the animal feed and agriculture industries with its innovative products. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Drapr
cb_description: Drapr offers a virtual platform for online retailers enabling their customers to try on clothing online. It enables users to try on different clothing, matches the sizes, compares the products, and buy them. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Berkeley, California. In August 2021, Drapr was acquired by Gap.

name: Algorithmics
cb_description:
Algorithmics provides analytics software and advisory services to banks, including HSBC, Societe Generale and Nedbank, as well as insurance and investment companies, according to a news release. It has more than 350 clients according to the company.

On December 2, 2019, Algorithmics was acquired by SS&C. The terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

name: Recyclops
cb_description: Recyclops is a technology-driven startup focused on providing sustainable recycling solutions. The company offers convenient and affordable recycling pickup services for households and businesses, as well as handling hard-to-recycle materials. Recyclops primarily serves the residential sector and businesses looking to enhance their sustainability efforts. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: Cabify
cb_description: Cabify offers ride-hailing services to improve urban living by reducing congestion. The company provides a platform connecting private users and companies with various transportation options, focusing on safety and quality. Cabify caters to corporate transportation needs, offering a platform for managing travel expenses, real-time trip tracking, and setting limits on schedules, prices, and areas. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Yellowheart
cb_description: YellowHeart is a company that focuses on utilizing Web3 technology to revolutionize the ticketing industry. The company offers services such as smart tickets that limit fraud and engage fans, digital memberships for exclusive access to content, and digital communities that foster relationships between ticket issuers and fans. YellowHeart primarily serves the live event and entertainment industry. Yellowheart was formerly known as Ticketchain. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Evozyne
cb_description: Evozyne develops proteins with functionality based on data-driven molecular engineering. It includes the creation of highly functional proteins, referred to as natural machines, which are designed to address challenges in therapeutics and sustainability. It develops products for a span of purposes including industrial, agricultural, biopharmaceuticals, energy, and environment. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Axela Technologies
cb_description: Axela Technologies is a company that focuses on providing software solutions in the collections and real estate industry. The company offers a range of services including accounts receivable and collections tools for management companies, condo and homeowners associations, and others in the real estate industry. These tools help in streamlining the collections process, predicting recoverable funds, and facilitating post foreclosure recovery. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Sintavia
cb_description: Sintavia focuses on the additive manufacturing of aerospace components within the aerospace industry. The company specializes in the digital design and production of complex mechanical components such as thermodynamic, propulsion, and power systems. Sintavia's products are designed to outperform traditional manufacturing methods and are used in new generations of flight and launch vehicles. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Hollywood, Florida.

name: EVMatch
cb_description: EVMatch is a company focused on electric vehicle charging in the energy sector. The company provides affordable and customer-focused EV charging solutions for apartments, homes, and businesses, including the ability to rent home chargers to offset electric bills and empower communities. Their services primarily cater to the residential, commercial, and utilities sectors. It is based in Santa Barbara, California.

name: SecFi
cb_description: SecFi is a financial services company specializing in equity planning and stock option financing for tech professionals. The company offers a suite of services including wealth management, secondary market transactions, and non-recourse financing, aimed at helping employees and executives optimize their financial outcomes related to equity compensation. SecFi also provides asset management services and educational resources to support informed decision-making around equity and finances. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Corti
cb_description: Corti specializes in artificial intelligence for healthcare, focusing on augmenting and automating patient consultations. The company provides a voice-based artificial intelligence (AI) platform that assists healthcare practitioners in analyzing patient interviews, offering decision support, and streamlining triaging and documentation processes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Groyyo
cb_description: Groyyo is a B2B manufacturing and automation company offering real-time production software. Its platform digitizes factories by enabling production tracking and intelligent inputs to help optimize efficiency. The company serves clients operating in the manufacturing industry, including brands, garment manufacturers, and raw material suppliers. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: EndoSpan
cb_description: EndoSpan specializes in the endovascular repair of aortic arch diseases, operating within the medical device industry. Its main offerings include the NEXUS Aortic Arch Stent Graft System, which is designed to address the unique challenges of aortic arch anatomy and provide treatment for a range of aortic pathologies, such as arch aneurysms and thoracic dissections, through a minimally invasive approach. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

name: SpotOn
cb_description: SpotOn provides payment processing and customer engagement tools. It brings together payment processing and a software solution to give merchants data and tools to market effectively to their customers. The platform offers comprehensive tools for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) including payments, marketing, reviews, analytics, and loyalty.  It serves the Financial Technology sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Firework
cb_description:
Firework is the fastest way to get code to customers.

It was built to solve a few things about existing deploy tools:

1. Most companies dont know the code theyre running
Youve made those fixes. Are they in production yet Firework shows the people, dates and changes beside each environment so you always know what youre running. Live search any commit to know if its included.

2. Companies dont know the point when something broke
If something breaks suddenly, when was the change introduced Firework ties logs with changes so you know what versions of code have are affected, and you know what versions you can roll back to safely.

3. Companies avoid deploys because they fear rollbacks
The time taken to deploy, work out if somethings acceptable, and roll back is so great that companies avoid doing this. Firework uses docker containers, which launch in a fraction of the time as EC2, Azure, or Google Compute instances. Deploys and rollbacks are phased and zero downtime.

name: Tracksmith
cb_description: Tracksmith is an independent brand specializing in performance running apparel and accessories within the athletic sector. The company offers a range of products designed for runners, including clothing and gear that supports both training and competitive events. Tracksmith also engages with the running community by hosting events, producing publications, and supporting track and field participation through its foundation. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Kinara Capital
cb_description: Kinara Capital focuses on providing collateral-free business loans to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). The company offers a range of financial products including working capital loans, machinery purchase financing, and a special discount program for women entrepreneurs, all aimed at facilitating business growth and expansion. Kinara Capital caters primarily to the MSME sector, offering services such as rapid loan disbursement, minimal documentation, and a digital-first loan application process. Kinara Capital was formerly known as Visage Holdings and Finance. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Allium
cb_description: Allium is a technology consulting company that operates in the cloud computing industry. The company offers services such as cloud implementations, managed services, and Salesforce integrations, aimed at helping businesses maximize their potential within the Salesforce platform. Allium primarily serves sectors such as energy, manufacturing, healthcare, consumer goods, and financial services. It is based in Brookfield, Wisconsin.

name: TXOne Networks
cb_description: TXOne Networks specializes in cybersecurity solutions within the industrial sector, focusing on safeguarding industrial environments from security vulnerabilities. The company delivers network- and endpoint-based products designed to protect operational technology (OT) networks and critical devices, ensuring real-time, defense-in-depth security. These solutions provide comprehensive visibility into industrial control system (ICS) assets, protocols, control commands, risks, and threats, aiming to maintain operational continuity even during security breaches. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Irving, Texas.

name: GameTree
cb_description: GameTree focuses on the gaming industry, providing an advanced discovery network for gamers. The company's main service is an app that helps gamers find new teammates and friends, discover new games, and coordinate gameplay sessions with non-toxic individuals. The app uses innovative AI technology to match users based on their unique tastes, values, playstyle, and personality. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: FloCareer
cb_description: FloCareer is a company that specializes in providing interview-as-a-service solutions, operating within the recruitment and technology sectors. The company offers a platform that facilitates a smooth hiring process for both candidates and recruiters, with services including structured interviews, interview scheduling, and fraud detection. FloCareer primarily serves the startup, midsize, and enterprise sectors of the economy. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Burlington, Massachusetts.

name: Atakama
cb_description: Atakama is a company that focuses on data protection and operates in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a range of services including multifactor encryption, secure file transfer, and encrypted search, all aimed at protecting sensitive data and simplifying the user experience. Atakama primarily serves organizations that require high-level data security. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ogury
cb_description: Ogury is a global technology leader focused on personified advertising within the advertising technology industry. The company offers a unique advertising engine that provides impactful ads, future-proof targeting, and brand protection. Its services are primarily utilized by advertisers and publishers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: Movable Ink
cb_description: Movable Ink operates as a company and focuses on data activation and artificial intelligence (AI) decision-making in the marketing sector. The company offers services for data into personalized content for marketers. Movable Ink primarily serves sectors such as retail, financial services, media organizations, and the travel and hospitality industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: RudderStack
cb_description: RudderStack specializes in customer data platform services within the data management and analytics industry. The company offers solutions for collecting, unifying, and activating customer data across various platforms without storing the data. RudderStack's services are primarily utilized by technical data teams and engineers for data-driven decision-making and marketing strategies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Atrato
cb_description:
Atrato Inc. aims to enable vastly richer content and  applications to be delivered to the customers of internet service providers, IP Television providers, cable multiple system operators, and scientific/defense contractors. 

Atrato supplied Velocity storage systems based on SAID (Self-maintaining Array of Identical Disks) technology. The sealed canisters of 2.5-inch hard disk drives offered a 3-year maintenance free period as well as high performance per the company. 

The company, previously known as Sherwood Information Systems, was founded by Eric Wendel, Dan McCormick, and Jonathan Hall.  In 2004, the company was renamed Atrato.

name: Veremark
cb_description: Veremark focuses on background screening and reference checking, operating in the human resources and recruitment industry. The company offers services such as managing employment background checks, continuous employee rescreening, and providing a blockchain-secured, fully verified candidate career passport. Veremark primarily serves sectors such as fintech, tech, HR, staffing & recruitment, BPO, EOR, and the gig economy. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Censinet
cb_description: Censinet is a company that focuses on risk management and cybersecurity within the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of services including third-party risk assessments, cyber program coverage, and remediation strategies, with a particular emphasis on protecting patient safety, data, and care operations. Its primary customers are healthcare delivery organizations and vendors within the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Flex Finance
cb_description: Flex Finance specializes in digitizing business spend management across various sectors. The company offers a platform for managing and controlling company spending, tracking expenses, and facilitating payments. It primarily serves industries such as logistics, manufacturing, education, finance, food and hospitality, tech, event planning, and agro-allied. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Matter
cb_description: Matter specializes in employee recognition and engagement solutions within the human resources technology sector. The company offers a platform for peer-to-peer recognition, rewards redemption, and conducting various types of surveys to enhance workplace culture. Matter primarily serves organizations looking to improve employee morale and engagement through structured feedback and recognition programs. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Popsa
cb_description: Popsa is a company that focuses on digital photo services in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that allows users to create and order personalized photobooks, using their own photos, in a quick and easy manner. Popsa primarily serves the consumer goods industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Surrey, England.

name: Chattermill
cb_description: Chattermill operates as an artificial intelligence (AI) powered customer feedback analysis platform in the customer experience intelligence sector. The company specializes in unifying and analyzing customer feedback data from various sources such as reviews, support tickets, and social media to provide actionable insights for businesses. Chattermill primarily serves sectors such as eCommerce, retail, finance, travel, and marketplaces. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: CrowdSec
cb_description: CrowdSec is an open-source and collaborative security suite operating in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a range of products that detect internal and external threats, manage security assets, and provide access to a comprehensive threat intelligence source. These products work by analyzing visitor behavior, responding to various types of attacks, and sharing signals across the user community. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Montrouge, France.

name: Mercor
cb_description: Mercor offers artificial intelligence based services for talent acquisition in the human resources sector. It provides a platform that matches candidates with job opportunities and facilitates the hiring process for companies. Mercor's services are designed to streamline the recruitment process by offering tools for resume indexing, interview scheduling, and global payment compliance. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cordial
cb_description: Cordial is a company that focuses on cross-channel marketing and customer engagement in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables brands to automate their marketing strategies, sending high-conversion messages based on data. This platform is primarily used by brands in sectors such as fashion and apparel, beauty, health and wellness, home and lifestyle, sports and outdoors, and media and publishing. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: GroMo
cb_description: GroMo is a platform focused on enabling individuals to earn money online by selling financial products in various sectors. The company provides a mobile application that allows users to register, receive training, and share links to financial products, facilitating a zero-investment business model for earning income. GroMo primarily serves individuals seeking to generate additional income through the sale of financial products such as insurance, credit cards, savings accounts, loans, and investment options. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: Bevi
cb_description: Bevi is a mobile app that helps you quickly gather friends and pick a place to meet. We connect to your existing social networks as well as multiple location databases to make finding people and suggesting locations totally seamless and rad. Once youve decided where to go, well help you get the group to the right place at the right time by distributing directions to everyone and adding the event to their calendar.

name: Crossbeam
cb_description: Crossbeam is a privately owned real estate firm specializing in multifamily investments. The company focuses on value-add acquisitions and ground-up development opportunities, leveraging market expertise to identify and act on promising real estate ventures. Crossbeam primarily serves the real estate investment sector, offering capital appreciation and strategic investment opportunities to accredited and sophisticated investors. It is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Highline
cb_description:
Highline is an independent provider of infrastructure solutions for the telecommunications industry.

On December 10, 2019, Highline was acquired by Digital Colony Management. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed

name: FreshMenu
cb_description: FreshMenu is a food delivery company operating in the food and beverage industry. The company offers a variety of cuisines for home delivery, including Chinese, Continental, and Mexican food. The food is prepared by in-house chefs and delivered fresh to customers' doorsteps. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Causaly
cb_description: Causaly is a generative AI platform focused on accelerating research and knowledge automation in the life sciences sector. The company offers a solution that enhances research productivity by providing insights and reducing reading time through the analysis of scientific literature, enabling the discovery of novel relationships between diseases, pathways, and genes. Causaly primarily serves the pharmaceutical industry, aiding in drug discovery, biomarker identification, and understanding of disease biology. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Lakera
cb_description: Lakera is an advanced AI security platform operating in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a suite of products designed to protect GenAI applications from a range of threats, including prompt injection attacks, data loss, and inappropriate content, without compromising on performance. Lakera's solutions cater to enterprises, foundation model providers, and startups seeking robust AI security measures. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Abatable
cb_description: Abatable specializes in end-to-end carbon market solutions within the environmental sector. The company offers tools and services that enable organizations to source carbon credits, understand market risks, and amplify their impact on climate action. Abatable primarily serves companies and buyers looking to execute decarbonization strategies, climate investors, and project developers seeking finance and distribution of carbon credits. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

name: Envoy
cb_description: Envoy is a company that specializes in connecting people, spaces, and data to enhance workplace collaboration and efficiency within various industries. The company offers a range of products including visitor management solutions, desk and room booking systems, and tools for organizing office deliveries. Envoy primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, pharma and biotech, professional services, and technology. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Nelo
cb_description: Nelo is a company that focuses on providing credit solutions in the financial services industry. The company offers credit services that allow customers to make purchases, pay for services, and even withdraw cash, all managed through their app. The credit services are designed to be flexible, allowing customers to pay in installments and even improve their credit score. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: ARTBIO
cb_description: ARTBIO is a clinical-stage radiopharmaceutical company. The company's main offerings include the development and distribution of therapies to redefine cancer care by offering safety to patients. ARTBIO primarily sells to the healthcare industry, specifically in the field of cancer treatment. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: nTop
cb_description: nTop specializes in advanced computational design software for the engineering and manufacturing sectors. The company offers solutions that enable engineers to create complex geometries, optimize designs, and automate workflows for efficient production. nTop primarily serves industries such as automotive, aerospace and defense, medical, consumer goods, and industrial and energy sectors. nTop was formerly known as nTopology. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Fanplayr
cb_description: Fanplayr is a company that focuses on e-commerce and website behavioral data, operating within the technology and data analytics industry. The company offers services that include the collection, processing, and analysis of first-party behavioral data, the delivery of personalized multichannel customer experiences, and the display of products to users at optimal times to increase propensity to purchase. Fanplayr primarily serves sectors such as ecommerce, telecom, utilities, automotive, travel, media, finance, and betting games. It is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Upgrade
cb_description: Upgrade is a financial technology company operating in the consumer credit sector. The company offers services such as personal loans, credit lines, and rewards checking and premier savings accounts, all aimed at helping customers access and manage credit. Their primary market includes families across America. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ConductorOne
cb_description: ConductorOne focuses on identity security and access control within the cloud computing industry. The company offers a platform that provides automated access controls, identity governance, and compliance management to secure cloud apps and infrastructure. ConductorOne primarily serves sectors that require robust identity security solutions, such as the ecommerce industry, real estate tech industry, and cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Polycam
cb_description: Polycam operates as a technology company specializing in 3D capture and scanning through its app available for iOS, Android, and web platforms. The company offers solutions for creating 3D models using LiDAR scanning and photogrammetry, which are accessible to professionals and enthusiasts alike. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FabHotels
cb_description: FabHotels is a budget hospitality brand that operates in the accommodation and hospitality sector, offering a chain of budget hotels across multiple cities. The company provides online hotel booking services, ensuring comfortable stays with amenities like free high-speed Wi-Fi and rigorous housekeeping, backed by courteous trained staff. FabHotels caters to travelers seeking economical lodging options with user-friendly booking interfaces and flexible policies such as free cancellation and pay-at-hotel options. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Jetti Resources
cb_description: Jetti Resources operates as a technology-driven company operating in the natural resources sector. The company's main service involves the use of proprietary catalytic technology to extract copper from low-grade primary sulfides, such as chalcopyrite, in a cost-effective and environmentally responsible manner. Jetti Resources primarily serves the mining industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Aspinity
cb_description: Aspinity specializes in analog machine learning processors for the technology sector, focusing on energy-efficient AI-driven event detection and classification. The company offers semiconductor technology that combines machine learning accuracy with ultra-low power analog processing, aimed at enhancing the performance and efficiency of always-on AI systems. Aspinity's solutions cater to various applications including automotive security, smart home monitoring, and a broad range of IoT devices. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: kojo
cb_description: Kojo is a company focused on digital solutions in the sports industry. Its main service is a mobile application that allows users to create and share professional-looking sports-related graphics on social media. The company primarily serves the sports and social media industries. It is based in Rovaniemi, Finland.

name: elice
cb_description: elice provides an online social coding education platform that offers various tutorials for topics such as Python, data structure, data science, and algorithms, providing a learning platform where tutors and students can communicate online and solve coding problems. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Yassir
cb_description: Yassir operates as a super application focused on providing on-demand transportation and digital financial services. The company offers ride-hailing, last-mile delivery, and financial solutions through a mobile application designed to serve the general consumer market and businesses requiring fleet management solutions. Yassir was formerly known as MN Technologies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bir Mourad Ras, Algeria.

name: Sightline Payments
cb_description: Sightline Payments is a company that focuses on digital payments and mobile app development in the sports betting and casino gaming industry. The company offers an integrated suite of solutions that includes omnichannel payment solutions for casino and digital gaming, as well as bespoke mobile apps to enhance the casino experience. Sightline Payments primarily serves the sports betting, lottery, racing, and online and brick-and-mortar casino markets. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada. Sightline Payments operates as a subsidiary of Bally Technologies.

name: Knowledgehook
cb_description: Knowledgehook is an educational technology company that focuses on the domain of mathematics learning. The company offers an Instructional Guidance System (IGS) that provides engaging assessments and personalized solutions to support students' mathematics learning journey, both in the classroom and at home. Knowledgehook primarily serves the education sector, with its main customers being teachers, parents, and school districts. It is based in Kitchener, Ontario.

name: NLX
cb_description: NLX specializes in conversational AI within the customer experience automation sector. The company offers a no-code platform, conversations by NLX, which enables the creation, management, and analysis of automated multimodal conversations across various channels. NLX primarily serves enterprises looking for customer service with analytics and deployment capabilities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Visier
cb_description: Visier specializes in people analytics and workforce planning solutions. The company offers solutions that help businesses understand their workforce holistically, enabling them to make informed decisions that drive business impact. Its solutions include identifying leaders, managing revenue growth, managing through economic cycles, retaining key employees, hiring effectively, making compensation decisions, creating a positive workplace environment, promoting diversity, and facilitating internal mobility. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Cleanwatts
cb_description: Cleanwatts is a climate tech company focused on the energy sector. The company's main services include the creation and management of Renewable Energy Communities (RECs), offering digital solutions to make clean energy accessible and affordable, and providing energy infrastructure as a service with zero upfront investment. Cleanwatts primarily serves the energy sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Coimbra, Portugal.

name: Tickitto
cb_description: Tickitto is a company focused on providing ticketing solutions within the event ticketing industry. They offer an API that allows brands to sell tickets to various events, including sports, music, and tours, without the need for affiliate models. Tickitto primarily serves brands looking to build ancillary revenues and deepen customer relationships through access to global events and experiences. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bath, England.

name: Unisound
cb_description: Unisound is a company focused on providing artificial intelligence solutions across various sectors, including smart home and healthcare. The company offers products and services that enable intelligent voice interaction, smart device integration, and AI-driven decision support systems. Unisound primarily serves sectors such as smart home automation, intelligent medical systems, and AIoT platform deployment. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Shenzhen, Guangdong.

name: EGYM
cb_description: EGYM provides global fitness technology and workout solutions in the fitness and health industry. It offers a suite of connected gym equipment and digital products that integrate with third-party hardware and software, creating a fully connected training experience that drives measurable business and health outcomes. It delivers subscription-based corporate wellness solutions that combine gym access with fitness programs to improve employee health and productivity. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Coast
cb_description: Coast is a women's fashion brand.

name: ANKA
cb_description: ANKA is an all-in-one e-commerce platform that facilitates the selling, shipping, and payment processing for African products globally. The company offers an online marketplace, global shipping services with integrated customs management, and a multi-currency payment system that supports local and international methods. ANKA primarily serves the e-commerce industry, enabling sellers to reach a global audience and manage their sales, shipments, and payments in one place. ANKA was formerly known as Afrikrea. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France. ANKA ceased operations in March 2024.

name: Cyolo
cb_description: Cyolo specializes in remote privileged access management (RPAM). The company offers a hybrid secure access solution to enable operational technology (OT) professionals to connect and manage critical infrastructure remotely, ensuring secure and controlled access to applications and systems. Cyolo's solutions cater to a diverse range of industries requiring access control and cybersecurity measures. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: HYPR
cb_description: HYPR specializes in identity security and passwordless authentication solutions within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers an identity assurance platform that includes passwordless multi-factor authentication, risk policy orchestration, and identity verification services. HYPR's solutions cater to various sectors, including financial services, critical infrastructure, and retail, aiming to enhance security and user experience. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cogni
cb_description: Cogni is a financial technology company specializing in digital banking and lifestyle services. The company offers a free checking account, a Visa debit card, and a self-custody crypto wallet, aiming to simplify personal finance management and integrate traditional and Web3 financial services. Cogni's products are designed to provide secure, instant, and fee-free transactions, along with tools for budgeting, spending categorization, and early access to paychecks. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Boldin
cb_description: Boldin is a company specializing in financial and retirement planning within the financial services industry. The company offers a comprehensive suite of tools and services designed to help individuals manage their retirement planning, investment strategies, tax optimization, and estate planning. Boldin primarily serves individuals seeking financial planning assistance and enterprises looking for financial planning solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mill Valley, California.

name: Matchpoint Therapeutics
cb_description: Matchpoint Therapeutics is a biotechnology company focused on the discovery and development of precision small molecule medicines in the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include the development of covalent medicines that harness the power of covalency to transform the treatment of immune diseases and other serious illnesses. Their services primarily cater to the healthcare and pharmaceutical industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Celsius
cb_description: Celsius operates a cryptocurrency lending platform. It allows users to earn interest on their crypto assets, and borrow against them. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Hoboken, New Jersey.

name: Inceptio Technology
cb_description: Inceptio Technology specializes in autonomous driving technologies for the logistics and transportation sector. The company offers full-stack proprietary technology for mass-produced autonomous trucks, aiming to enhance safety and efficiency in line-haul logistics. Inceptio Technology also operates a nationwide Transportation-As-A-Service (TaaS) freight network. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Shanghai, Shanghai.

name: Tracklib
cb_description: Tracklib is a company focused on music sampling in the music industry. It offers a service where users can legally sample and license over 100,000 recordings from various genres, decades, and regions, providing studio-quality WAV files of masters and multi-tracks from original recordings. The company primarily serves music producers and artists, simplifying the sample licensing process for them. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Opsera
cb_description: Opsera is a company focused on CI/CD orchestration and DevOps intelligence within the software development industry. The company offers a unified DevOps platform that automates toolchains, facilitates CI/CD pipeline automation, and provides governance, security, and compliance solutions to streamline software delivery. Opsera's platform also delivers unified insights for end-to-end visibility into the DevOps process. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Fernride
cb_description: Fernride provides logistics automation solutions in autonomous, electric trucking. The company offers a platform that connects driverless trucks with remote operators, providing modular driverless transportation-as-a-service (TaaS) to manage the transition to autonomous logistics. It primarily serves the logistics industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Faception
cb_description: Faception is a facial personality analytics technology company operating in the public safety, fintech, and retail sectors. The company offers proprietary computer vision and machine learning technology that profiles individuals and predicts personality traits from facial images. Faception's technology serves various sectors by enhancing decision-making and improving safety and customer experiences. It is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Dunamu
cb_description: Dunamu is a technology company specializing in blockchain, securities, and metaverse services. The company offers secure and transparent blockchain services, investment support through securities services, and explores new possibilities with metaverse technology. Dunamu primarily serves the financial and investment sectors with its digital asset exchange and securities trading platforms. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Descomplica
cb_description: Descomplica is an online education platform offering a range of academic courses and preparatory content for tests. The company provides online preparatory courses for the Exame Nacional do Ensino Mdio (Enem) and other vestibular exams, digital undergraduate and postgraduate programs, as well as free courses and corporate training solutions. Descomplica's offerings cater to individuals preparing for higher education entrance exams, seeking online degrees, or pursuing further education through postgraduate courses. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: Gradient Health
cb_description: Gradient Health is a medical technology company focused on providing medical image datasets for AI development in the healthcare sector. Their main offerings include curating large, unbiased datasets to train and validate medical AI technologies, aiming to accelerate the creation of accurate and equitable algorithms. They primarily serve companies and researchers in the medical AI development space. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Candex
cb_description: Candex operates as a financial technology consolidator for organizations. The company develops collaboration applications that manage payments between companies and their vendors, allowing businesses to control and report requirements, while users are able to execute transactions in a chat interface. It primarily serves the financial technology industry. Candex was formerly known as Candex Solutions. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in New York.

name: Boulder
cb_description: Boulder develops a digital health platform. It provides access to treatment for substance abuse. It delivers care and helps participants work toward their individual goals collaborating across medical, behavioral, and psychosocial dimensions. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Everlaw
cb_description: Everlaw develops a cloud-based litigation platform. The company offers cloud-native software that aids in litigation and investigations, for legal work and provides tools for document review, data analytics, and machine learning. It primarily serves law firms, corporations, and government agencies. It was formerly known as EasyESI. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Legl
cb_description: Legl helps firms to digitize and automate core business operations like payments, onboarding, and anti-money laundering (AML) compliance.  The platform digitizes client-facing processes across the client lifecycle. With modular, flexible workflows, it automates core business processes from new client onboarding to billing and payments, unlocking billable hours across your firm.
