It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: SkySafe
cb_description: SkySafe specializes in comprehensive drone management solutions within the aerospace and defense industry. The company offers a cloud-based platform for drone detection as a service (DDaaS), providing actionable insights, comprehensive coverage, and real-time data analytics for airspace awareness. SkySafe primarily serves sectors such as airports, correctional facilities, universities, stadiums, critical infrastructure, military, government, and public spaces. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: JOW
cb_description: Jow is a meal planning and grocery shopping platform that operates within the food technology and electronic commerce sectors. The company offers a service that simplifies meal planning and grocery shopping by recommending personalized menus and automatically adding the ingredients to the user's shopping cart, with options for home delivery or pickup. Jow primarily serves the electronic commerce industry by partnering with retailers and brands to enhance the grocery shopping experience. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Saint-Denis, France.

name: Valerann
cb_description: Valerann offers an intelligent transportation system (ITS) for road operators. It enables road operators to sense the traffic environment, report to control centers, communicate with drivers, and support autonomous vehicles to make users' journeys safer. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: PatchRx
cb_description: PatchRx specializes in medication adherence technology within the healthcare sector. The company offers a smart-cap platform that provides insights on medication adherence and supports better patient outcomes through proactive care interventions. PatchRx primarily serves the healthcare industry, including clinics and providers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Antonio, Texas.

name: Labster
cb_description: Labster specializes in virtual lab simulations for educational purposes within the science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) fields. The company offers a platform where students can engage in virtual laboratory experiments and explore scientific concepts in a safe, interactive environment. Labster primarily serves the education sector, with a focus on institutions such as high schools, colleges, and universities. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Odyssey Therapeutics
cb_description: Odyssey Therapeutics develops precision immunomodulators and oncology medicines. The company's main offerings include the discovery, development, and commercialization of these medicines. It primarily sells to the healthcare industry, specifically in the sectors of immunology and oncology. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Klue
cb_description: Klue offers a competitive intelligence platform. The company offers a platform that collects, curates, and delivers competitive intelligence, enabling businesses to understand their market position and strategize accordingly. It primarily serves the business service sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Vidsy
cb_description: Vidsy is a creative technology platform operating in the digital advertising industry. The company's main service involves helping global brands create effective and consistent video ads for digital platforms. Vidsy primarily serves the digital marketing sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: Meru
cb_description: Meru specializes in healthcare communication and documentation technology, focusing on improving efficiency and accuracy for medical professionals. The company offers ambient documentation services for nurses, HIPAA compliant messaging for physicians, and patient-facing cost estimates for e-visits. Meru's solutions are designed to reduce workforce burnout, enhance productivity, and ensure accurate medical documentation. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Eyebot
cb_description: Eyebot specializes in eye testing systems within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers fully automated, self-service eye testing units that provide clinically validated results. These systems are designed to be integrated into various retail environments, emphasizing accessibility and for proactive vision care. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: bluShift Aerospace
cb_description: bluShift Aerospace focuses on launching aerospace solutions within the commercial spaceflight industry. The company offers commercial rocket launches powered by carbon-neutral biofuel, designed for research payloads and small satellites. Their services cater to the needs of the research community, educational institutions, and the growing demand for sustainable practices in space exploration. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Brunswick, Maine.

name: FourKites
cb_description: FourKites specializes in supply chain intelligence, offering a platform that provides real-time visibility and execution across various transportation modes. The company's services include tracking multimodal shipments, optimizing inbound logistics, providing order lifecycle insights, managing inventory, and innovating yard logistics. FourKites serves a diverse range of sectors, including food and beverage, retail, consumer packaged goods, chemical, oil and gas, manufacturing, and pharmaceuticals. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Raus
cb_description: Raus provides cabin rental services. It offers sustainable, smart cabins designed to offer minimalist getaways and a digitized guest experience including facilities like a keyless entry system, allowing customers to experience stress-free time outside of the city. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Autolab
cb_description: Autolab is a digital platform that connects car owners with repair shops, specializing in the automotive repair and maintenance sector. The company offers a range of services including general automotive repairs, specialized mechanical work, automotive diagnostics, and aesthetic car services, all with a focus on affordability and reliability. Autolab caters to both individual car owners and companies, providing fleet management solutions and digital tools for efficient vehicle maintenance. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Canela Media
cb_description: Canela Media operates as a digital media technology company offering brands a complete ecosystem to connect with multicultural audiences leading with its free streaming service, Canela television. It offers on-demand Latino-focused movies and television entertainment through multiple platforms. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ProGrad
cb_description: ProGrad is a company focused on addressing the skill gap in the Indian IT sector. It offers tailored talent hiring and training solutions to help tech organizations meet their talent objectives and supports job-seekers and students in developing industry-grade tech skills and launching their careers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India. In April 2024, ProGrad was acquired by GenSpark.

name: Tamr
cb_description: Tamr specializes in data mastering and enrichment, focusing on creating golden records for various business sectors. The company offers AI-powered solutions for entity resolution, data quality improvement, and third-party data enrichment to ensure accurate and comprehensive data records. Tamr primarily serves sectors that require robust data management and analytics, such as healthcare, finance, and retail. Tamr was formerly known as DataTamer. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: AiCure
cb_description: AiCure is an artificial intelligence company specializing in clinical trial management within the life sciences industry. The company offers a platform that monitors patient behavior, manages remote patient engagement, and analyzes digital biomarkers to support clinical research operations. AiCure's technology is designed to improve medication adherence, provide real-time patient dosing data, and facilitate various types of clinical trials, including traditional, decentralized, and hybrid models. It was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Home From College
cb_description: Home From College provides a career-focused platform. The company offers services such as resume building and job application assistance, aimed at helping young professionals kickstart their careers. It caters to the student demographic, offering them opportunities to gain experience and connect with employers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Okendo
cb_description: Okendo provides a customer marketing platform. It builds connections between consumers and their preferred brands. Okendo was founded in 2016 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: WareIQ
cb_description: WareIQ is a company specializing in eCommerce fulfillment services within the logistics and supply chain sector. The company offers an all-in-one platform for logistics and fulfillment, enabling businesses to execute, manage, and optimize their shipping and delivery processes. WareIQ's services cater to a variety of sectors including beauty, fashion, electronics, home furnishing, health and wellness, and more. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Monad
cb_description: Monad specializes in data-driven security strategies within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers services that integrate and organize security data, transform it into customizable schemas, and deliver it to data warehouses for analytics purposes. Monad primarily serves the cybersecurity industry by providing infrastructure that supports sophisticated security analytics. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Force
cb_description: Force Therapeutics is a leader in digital patient engagement, focusing on musculoskeletal health management within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that facilitates remote patient monitoring and rehabilitation, providing clinicians with tools to manage patient recovery and deliver evidence-based care remotely. Force Therapeutics' platform is designed to integrate with healthcare providers' existing systems, streamline workflows, and enhance patient education, all while ensuring compliance with healthcare regulations. It was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Unbabel
cb_description: Unbabel specializing in language operations and translation services within various business sectors. The company offers a language operations platform that combines advanced artificial intelligence with human editors to provide translations. Unbabel's solutions cater to industries such as gaming, retail, tech, and travel, providing multilingual support and seamless integration with customer service workflows. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Spring Health
cb_description: Spring Health specializes in providing mental health solutions within the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of services including personalized care plans, access to a network of mental health professionals, and support from dedicated Care Navigators, utilizing a proprietary assessment and machine-learning technology to tailor care to individual needs. Spring Health primarily serves the employer and health plan segments within the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Notion
cb_description: Notion is a company with a high-level focus on editorial publishing and curation within the music, fashion, and creative industries. The company offers a range of services including digital content curation, a creative agency, event organization, and bi-annual magazine publication, all aimed at promoting and partnering with pioneering talent and brands. Notion primarily sells to sectors such as the music industry, fashion industry, and various cultural sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: Facilio
cb_description: Facilio is a company specializing in AI-driven property operations for the real estate sector. Its main offerings include a platform that aggregates building data to optimize performance and control operations, along with tools for maintenance, energy management, and compliance. Facilio primarily serves industries such as commercial real estate, corporate facilities, healthcare, and retail. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ThinkCyte
cb_description: ThinkCyte specializes in single-cell technology for the biomedical sector, focusing on biological research and the development of treatments and diagnostics. The company offers a platform that integrates hardware, machine learning, and biotechnology to enable label-free cell sorting and high-throughput cell profiling. ThinkCyte's solutions are utilized in cell therapy research and development, drug discovery, and disease profiling. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Heru
cb_description: Heru is a company specializing in virtual accounting and tax management solutions for individuals and businesses. Their services include electronic invoicing, fiscal profile management, and assistance with tax declarations to ensure compliance with the Servicio de Administracin Tributaria (SAT). Heru was formerly known as Kuarto. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: JustPaid
cb_description: JustPaid focuses on artificial intelligence (AI)-powered billing and revenue management in the financial technology sector. The company offers services such as managing accounts payable and receivable, generating invoices, processing payments, and conducting custom collection efforts. It primarily serves businesses in need of efficient revenue management and billing systems. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: PONY
cb_description: PONY is a company that focuses on the retail industry, specifically in the domain of footwear, apparel, and accessories. The company offers a range of products including shoes, clothing, and fashion accessories. These products are designed to cater to the needs of individuals seeking to express their style through their attire. It was founded in 1972 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Blackbird
cb_description: Blackbird is a cross-curricular coding education platform that specializes in integrating coding into core K-12 education. The company offers a version of JavaScript tailored for educational purposes, along with comprehensive curricula that enable teachers without prior coding experience to incorporate coding lessons into science and math classes. Blackbird's services are primarily utilized by the educational technology sector. It is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Certn
cb_description: Certn specializes in tech-driven background screening solutions within the human resources and compliance sectors. The company offers a range of services including identity verification, criminal record checks, credit assessments, and employment and education verification. Certn primarily serves industries such as property management, healthcare, hospitality, transportation, staffing, technology, retail, manufacturing, finance, construction, and non-profit organizations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Victoria, British Columbia.

name: Klang Games
cb_description: Klang Games is a game development studio focused on creating simulation multiplayer online games and virtual worlds. The company specializes in developing engaging multiplayer online games that offer immersive experiences. Klang Games primarily serves the entertainment and gaming industry with a focus on simulation and virtual world creation. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Beni
cb_description: Beni is an AI-powered shopping assistant specializing in the facilitation of secondhand shopping within the e-commerce industry. The company offers a browser extension and mobile app that aggregate resale deals from over 40 partner sites, allowing users to find pre-loved items at discounted prices while shopping online. Beni primarily serves the e-commerce industry, with a focus on customers interested in sustainable shopping and finding secondhand fashion and accessories. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Santa Barbara, California.

name: Sakara Life
cb_description: Sakara Life is a wellness company that operates in the food and health industry. The company provides 100% plant-based, organic ready-to-eat meals, with a focus on using food as a form of medicine. Sakara Life primarily serves individuals seeking health-conscious and convenient meal options. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Pricefx
cb_description: Pricefx is a company that focuses on providing pricing software solutions, operating in the technology and software industry. The company offers a suite of services that support pricing-related needs, including pricing analytics, management and setting, quoting and rebate management, and pricing optimization. These services primarily cater to the B2B and B2C sectors. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Pfaffenhofen an der Glonn, Germany.

name: 100ms
cb_description: 100ms specializes in live video infrastructure within the technology sector. The company offers a range of services including video conferencing, live streaming, and virtual event solutions that are customizable and designed for high performance. 100ms primarily serves sectors such as EdTech, fitness, and telehealth, providing interactive and secure video communication tools. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Fremont, California.

name: Plexium
cb_description: Plexium operates as a biotechnology-based cancer-treating platform. It focuses on the identification of E3 ligase modulating small molecules to treat cancer and neurodegenerative diseases. The company's screening platform, named DELPhe for deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA)-encoded library (DEL) phenotypic (Phe) screening, utilizes droplet and microcell confinement to miniaturize cell-based assays yielding high content readouts. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Clinikally
cb_description: Clinikally is a digital clinic specializing in skin and hair care, offering telehealth services and an e-pharmacy. The company provides personalized treatment plans and consultations with dermatologists for a range of skin and hair concerns. Clinikally's product offerings include a curated selection of skin and hair care products, nutritional supplements, and cosmeceuticals, all formulated to address specific issues such as acne, pigmentation, aging, and hair loss. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Baseten
cb_description: Baseten focuses on providing infrastructure for deploying and serving machine learning models within various industries. Its services include AI model deployment, machine learning infrastructure, and model serving. Baseten's offerings cater to the needs of companies scaling inference in production. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Elite HRV
cb_description: Elite HRV is a company that focuses on health technology. The company offers a heart rate variability (HRV) tracking app that provides insights into health, stress, recovery, and nervous system balance. The primary market for Elite HRV's services is individuals seeking to improve their health and wellness. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Asheville, North Carolina.

name: SimplyInsured
cb_description: SimplyInsured is a company focused on providing health insurance solutions for small businesses within the insurance industry. The company offers an online platform where small businesses can compare and purchase medical, dental, and vision insurance plans, and provides tools for automated payroll deductions and online employee onboarding. SimplyInsured serves the small business sector by offering unbiased recommendations and support from licensed insurance agents. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Richmond, California.

name: Balance Technology
cb_description: Balance Technology is a financial technology company. It develops an application to help individuals make smart savings and invest in low-risk mutual funds. It utilizes chatbots to understand the spending patterns of individuals and uses its proprietary spend analysis engine to suggest saving methods. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India. Balance Technology was acquired by One97 Communications.

name: Tarabut
cb_description: Tarabut is a software company. It develops an open banking platform in the MENA region. As a specialization in open banking, it integrates financial services into the daily lives of people in the region, offering immediate, personalized, and integrated solutions. Tarabut gateway enables and secures data flow and connectivity between banks and fintechs, supports the creation of a thriving ecosystem, and provides a consumer experience. Tarabut was founded in 2017 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Cardless
cb_description: Cardless is a company specializing in embedded credit card platforms within the financial services industry. They offer a suite of services that allow businesses to integrate co-branded credit card programs into their products, providing a seamless credit card experience for customers, including application processing, card issuance, and account management. Cardless primarily serves sectors that benefit from offering branded credit cards, such as airlines and retail groups. Cardless was formerly known as Guild Technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FundPark
cb_description: FundPark offers a trade finance platform connecting businesses with fund providers. The company provides invoice financing, data approval, and purchase order financing for small and medium-sized companies by using its propriety data analysis model for due diligence, verification, and pricing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

name: XUND
cb_description: XUND specializes in digital health solutions, focusing on connecting patients to appropriate care through API-first medical devices. The company offers a suite of products that facilitate the entire patient journey, from preventive health assessments to diagnosis, illness understanding, and ongoing monitoring. XUND primarily serves sectors such as healthcare providers, payers, pharmaceutical companies, and pharmacies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Rippl Care
cb_description: Rippl Care focuses on providing mental health services for seniors, particularly those with dementia, within the healthcare industry. The company offers a suite of services including dementia care, care navigation and coordination, counseling for patients and caregivers, and medication management. Rippl Care's model emphasizes delivering, wrap-around care to seniors and their families, leveraging technology to ensure care is accessible and effective. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Float
cb_description: Float ceased operation. Float provides a cloud-based banking platform. It offers credit services and manages clients' debit card operations. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California. Float ceased its operation.

name: Ennabl
cb_description: Ennabl focuses on the insurance industry. It offers a cloud-based platform that unifies, enriches, and integrates data from various systems used by insurance brokers, providing insights and metrics to drive growth and commissions. The company primarily serves the insurance brokerage industry. Ennabl was founded in 2020 and is based in Greenwich, Connecticut.

name: Monetizr
cb_description: Monetizr operates as a blockchain-based universal game reward engine. It helps game developers and studios turn engagement and loyalty into revenue with branded merchandise. It takes care of the shop, product manufacturing, shipping, and customer service. Monetizr was formerly known as TheMonetizr. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Clearcover
cb_description: Clearcover specializes in car insurance, leveraging technology to streamline the insurance process within the financial services sector. The company offers a range of car insurance products that include liability, comprehensive, and collision coverage, with a focus on fast and hassle-free claims processing through its mobile app. Clearcover's technology enables customers to customize their coverage, file claims, and manage their policies with ease. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: UENI
cb_description: UENI is a company that specializes in creating and managing online presences for small businesses within the digital marketing and web development industry. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including website creation, e-commerce solutions, booking management, and digital marketing support, all tailored to help small businesses establish and grow their online visibility. UENI primarily serves small businesses across various sectors, providing them with tools and services to enhance their digital footprint and reach new customers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: Framer
cb_description: Framer operates as a web development and designing company. The company provides a platform for users to design and publish websites, offering features such as animations, interactions, and content management systems. It primarily serves freelancers, agencies, startups, and marketing teams. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Planned
cb_description: Planned is a company that focuses on strategic meetings management in the event planning industry. The company offers a platform that allows users to source suppliers, manage events, handle contracts and payments, and maintain visibility and control over all their events. Its primary customers are medium and large-sized companies that organize in-person events. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Web3 Pro
cb_description: Web3 Pro focuses on providing enterprise-grade Web3 marketing technology. The company offers services that enable businesses to create Web3 marketing campaigns and monetize their digital identity through non-fungible tokens (NFTs), enhancing customer engagement and loyalty. Their main offerings include a marketing engagement platform and development tools for seamless deployment across industries. It was formerly known as NFT PRO. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Rise
cb_description: Rise is a company focused on energy management through sleep optimization, operating within the health and wellness technology sector. The company offers a mobile application that tracks sleep debt and circadian rhythms to improve users' sleep quality and daily energy levels. Rise's app provides personalized sleep and energy insights, as well as recommendations for science-based habits to enhance overall well-being. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Fanbase
cb_description: Fanbase is a web-based almanac of pro and college athletes, built entirely by fans.  Eventually, Nirav Tolia, the founder of Fanbase "pivoted" and used the company's remaining funding and team to start neighborhood networking site, NextDoor.  Fanbase, therefore, was added to the deadpool at the launch of NextDoor.

name: ODAIA Intelligence
cb_description: ODAIA Intelligence specializes in AI-powered intelligence for pharmaceutical commercial teams, operating within the technology and healthcare sectors. The company offers a cloud-based platform, MAPTUAL, which integrates data science, behavioral science, and AI to provide insights into healthcare professional (HCP) behaviors and patient decisions throughout the customer journey. ODAIA's solutions are designed to enhance customer engagement, improve targeting for sales teams, and support data-driven decision-making for better commercial effectiveness. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Cheetah
cb_description:
Cheetah Software Systems is a provider of real-time logistics & dispatch solutions for delivery, less-than-truckload (LTL), courier and private fleet operations.  Their software enables communication, scheduling, loading, delivery and pickup.

On April 6, 2021 Cheetah was acquired by MercurcyGate. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Legacy
cb_description: Legacy is a last will solution for smart property and cryptocurrencies.

name: Nextory
cb_description: Nextory is a digital platform focused on the streaming services industry. The company offers a wide range of audiobooks, ebooks, and digital magazines, allowing users to read or listen to their favorite stories on their devices. Nextory caters to the digital media and entertainment industry. Nextory was formerly known as E2GO. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Cargofive
cb_description: Cargofive specializes in digital solutions for the freight forwarding industry, focusing on optimizing and automating the pricing process for maritime shipping. The company offers a platform for procurement and quoting by centralizing and standardizing freight rates from various carriers, enabling freight forwarders to manage rates and generate quotes efficiently. Cargofive primarily serves the logistics and maritime shipping sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

name: Steadily
cb_description: Steadily is a company focused on providing insurance services for landlords, operating in the insurance industry. Their main offerings include property and liability insurance designed to protect rental property owners from various risks such as fire, water damage, natural disasters, and legal liabilities. Steadily caters to a diverse range of clients including owners of single-family homes, multi-family units, and vacation rental properties such as Airbnbs and VRBOs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Paces
cb_description: Paces is a software provider focused on accelerating green project development within the renewable energy sector. The company offers a platform that assists green infrastructure developers in identifying optimal locations for their projects by integrating various data sources such as interconnection, permitting, zoning, and environmental information. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: MDClone
cb_description: MDClone operates as a company focused on healthcare data analytics. It offers a self-service data analytics platform that enables healthcare collaboration, research, and innovation. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Beer-Sheva, Israel.

name: Sonovate
cb_description: Sonovate is a company that specializes in finance and payment solutions for the contingent labour market, operating within the financial services industry. The company offers a range of products including invoice financing, back office automation, and funding solutions designed to enhance cash flow and manage contractors. Sonovate primarily serves sectors such as recruitment agencies, consultancies, freelance platforms, and contractors. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Cardiff, Wales.

name: StoryStream
cb_description: StoryStream is a company that specializes in visual commerce, operating within the eCommerce industry. The company offers a platform that manages and delivers engaging visual commerce experiences, with a focus on user-generated content and live video shopping. StoryStream primarily serves sectors such as automotive, beauty, fashion & apparel, grocery & FMCG, home & entertainment, and online retail. It is based in East Sussex, United Kingdom.

name: DrayNow
cb_description: DrayNow is a technology company focused on the intermodal freight industry, providing a real-time marketplace for connecting intermodal freight with carriers. The company offers a proprietary freight-matching platform that enables customers to move freight efficiently and carriers to find loads and manage their hauls with ease. DrayNow primarily serves the intermodal logistics sector, offering solutions to improve capacity and efficiency for shippers and transporters. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Conshohocken, Pennsylvania.

name: StudyFree
cb_description: StudyFree is an EdTech startup focused on facilitating international study opportunities for students. The company assists students in gaining admission to study abroad programs and secures financing through scholarships and grants. StudyFree collaborates with a network of partner organizations and ambassadors to create an ecosystem connecting students to global educational opportunities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: 75F
cb_description: 75F specializes in internet-of-things (IoT) based building management systems within the commercial building automation sector. Its main offerings include sensors and controls designed to optimize indoor air quality and energy efficiency in commercial buildings. The company primarily serves sectors such as office spaces, retail, education, multi-family residences, and hospitality. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Chaos Labs
cb_description: Chaos Labs specializes in on-chain risk management, economic security, and incentive optimization for decentralized finance protocols. The company offers a suite of services including risk parameter recommendations, real-time protocol monitoring, and liquidity incentive program design to enhance protocol security and growth. Chaos Labs primarily serves the decentralized finance industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Imvela
cb_description: Imvela specializes in the design and supply of superculture ingredients within the food, beverage, and personal care industries. The company's main offerings include a portfolio of functional ingredients derived from natural microbes, provided as live cultures or fermentates, aimed at enhancing health benefits and extending product shelf-life without artificial chemicals. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Splash
cb_description: Splash is a nonprofit organization focused on providing water, sanitation, hygiene, and menstrual health solutions in the child welfare sector. The company offers high-quality water filtration systems, durable drinking and hand washing stations, improved toilets, and hygiene education to promote healthy habits among children. Splash primarily serves child-serving institutions such as schools, orphanages, hospitals, and shelters. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Miraex
cb_description: Miraex specializes in photonic sensing and distributed quantum computing within the technology sector. The company offers fiber optic sensors for monitoring in harsh environments and develops quantum transducers and converters for advanced quantum computing applications. Miraex's technology serves various industries requiring robust sensing solutions and quantum computing advancements. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Ecublens, Switzerland.

name: RebelMouse
cb_description: RebelMouse operates as a creative agency. It focuses on digital publishing and artificial intelligence. The company offers a comprehensive digital publishing toolbox powered by artificial intelligence, which includes features for creating user-friendly websites with fast page speeds, organic reach, diversified monetization methods, and secure uptimes. It primarily serves the digital media and content creation industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Genesis
cb_description: Genesis Global specializes in software application development for financial markets, offering a platform that facilitates the rapid creation of high-performance, resilient, and secure applications. The company provides a suite of tools and frameworks that enable developers to automate workflows, enhance existing systems, and develop new applications tailored to the needs of the financial industry. Genesis primarily serves sectors such as investment management, banks and broker-dealers, and market infrastructure. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Daki
cb_description: Daki operates an online marketplace offering a range of products across various categories. The company provides a platform for customers to purchase groceries, beverages, household items, and more, with a focus on quick delivery services. Daki primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Marker Learning
cb_description: Marker Learning specializes in providing assessments and support for learning disabilities within the education and psychological services sectors. The company offers virtual psychoeducational evaluations, diagnosis, and personalized learning plans to help individuals with learning challenges. Marker Learning primarily serves individuals and educational institutions seeking to understand and accommodate learning disabilities. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Hoboken, New Jersey.

name: Andium
cb_description: Andium focuses on industrial internet-of-things (IoT) solutions, primarily serving the energy sector. The company offers software services that provide visibility, insights, and control over operations, particularly for oil and gas site locations. These services include monitoring of production levels, flare stacks, methane leaks, liquid leaks, fires, and onsite assets, as well as automated management based on detected events. Andium primarily sells to the energy industry, with a particular focus on helping companies achieve their emissions goals. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Theya
cb_description: Theya is a financial technology company specializing in Bitcoin self-custody solutions. The company offers multisig vaults that enhance security for Bitcoin transactions by requiring multiple key signatures, and provides options for shared custody and sovereign vault recovery. Theya primarily serves individuals and businesses looking for secure Bitcoin storage and management solutions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Axtria
cb_description: Axtria specializes in cloud software and data analytics in the life sciences industry. The company offers various products such as life sciences products, including data management, advanced analytics, and omnichannel customer engagement. It primarily serves the life sciences sector, including pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, and medical devices. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Berkeley Heights, New Jersey.

name: WUNDERKIND
cb_description: WUNDERKIND provides a platform for creators engaged in a partnership with brands, artists, curators, editors, designers, and institutions. It offers strategy and creative direction, art direction, branding and visual identity, creative consulting, website design, and more. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Skyroot Aerospace
cb_description: Skyroot Aerospace focuses on aerospace technology, specifically in the design and construction of space-launch vehicles. The company offers cost-effective launch services, providing transportation systems from Earth to space. Its services primarily cater to the global small and medium satellite market. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: SwiftComply
cb_description: SwiftComply is an integrated platform  connecting cities & food businesses  that enables the management, communication, and verification of fat, oil, & grease (FOG) compliance. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Labelbox
cb_description: Labelbox develops a training data platform for machine learning teams to build real-world artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The platform consists of label editor tools for batch, and real-time labeling workflows, collaboration, quality review, analytics, and more. It serves the government, retail, insurance, manufacturing, and healthcare sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is located in San Francisco, California.

name: Smart Access
cb_description: Smart Access specializes in frontline performance management within the supply chain and logistics sectors. The company offers a Unified Frontline Operations Platform that provides performance analytics, mobile skill-building, and frontline feedback tools to manage and improve workforce productivity. Smart Access primarily serves the supply chain and logistics industry, enhancing operational efficiency and workforce performance. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Edmonton, Alberta.

name: Pathalys Pharma
cb_description: Pathalys Pharma focuses on the development of therapeutics in the healthcare sector, specifically for the management of late-stage chronic kidney disease (CKD). The company's main offerings include the development of enhanced therapeutics that aim to improve the management of CKD, with a particular focus on the treatment of secondary hyperparathyroidism (SHPT), a condition common in kidney failure patients. It primarily sells to the healthcare industry, specifically those dealing with kidney-related diseases. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Rebelstork
cb_description: Rebelstork is a company focused on the liquidation and re-commerce of baby gear, operating within the parenting industry. The company offers open box and overstock baby products that are quality-checked and approved, providing a sustainable shopping option for parents. Rebelstork primarily sells to the consumer market, particularly parents and caregivers looking for baby gear at reduced prices. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lebanon, Tennessee.

name: Planys Technologies
cb_description: Planys Technologies specializes in underwater inspection services within the marine robotics and non-destructive testing (NDT) sectors. The company offers a range of services including visual inspections using remotely operated vehicles (ROVs), asset integrity management, and advanced NDT solutions, complemented by AI-enabled analytics and digital reporting dashboards. It primarily serves asset owners and managers in the maritime, infrastructure, and energy sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: CoinScan
cb_description: CoinScan is a cryptocurrency analytics platform that specializes in providing market insights and trading tools for the blockchain economy. The platform offers features such as market cap rankings, sector performance analysis, and tools to check the sellability of tokens on decentralized exchanges. CoinScan primarily serves individuals and entities involved in cryptocurrency trading and investment. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: Influ2
cb_description: Influ2 is a company that focuses on person-based advertising within the marketing and advertising industry. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to target specific individuals within their target accounts with ads, track the engagement of these individuals, and provide sales teams with the necessary context to secure valuable accounts. Influ2 primarily serves the B2B sector, with a focus on both enterprise and mid-market accounts. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Moment Energy
cb_description: Moment Energy is a cleantech company specializing in providing clean, affordable, and reliable battery energy storage systems by repurposing retired electric vehicle batteries. Their main offerings include energy storage solutions that ensure uninterrupted power and facilitate the transition to clean energy for both on and off-grid facilities. Moment Energy's products are particularly beneficial for the commercial and industrial sectors, offering peak shaving and backup power capabilities. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Coquitlam, Canada.

name: Zen Educate
cb_description: Zen Educate focuses on education recruitment within the education sector. The company offers an online platform that connects schools with teachers and teaching assistants for short-term, long-term, and permanent roles. Zen Educate primarily serves educational institutions looking to hire qualified, vetted, and safeguarding trained supply staff. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Goldcast
cb_description: Goldcast is a company that focuses on providing a revenue-driven event marketing platform, operating in the digital event experiences industry. The company offers a suite of products that enable businesses to conduct various types of digital events such as webinars, client summits, workshops, product launches, and conferences, and provides tools for marketers to measure event ROI and gain lead qualification insights. Goldcast primarily serves the B2B marketing sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Martie
cb_description: Martie focuses on the retail industry, specifically in the domain of groceries. The company offers a wide range of grocery items, including organic and gluten-free products, snacks, beverages, and household items, all at discounted prices. Martie serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SkyLark Labs
cb_description: SkyLark Labs has created advanced AI systems to solve far-reaching issues including surveillance, healthcare, and education.

name: Exclusible
cb_description: Exclusible operates as a gaming and immersive technology studio focusing on revolutionizing brand engagement. The company offers strategic solutions to integrate global brands into gaming communities, leveraging platforms like Roblox, Fortnite, and Minecraft to craft immersive experiences to resonate with younger audiences. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cascais, Portugal.

name: Sensible Weather
cb_description: Sensible Weather is a weather protection platform for the travel and hospitality industry. The company offers a Weather Guarantee service that reimburses customers if bad weather affects their travel or event experiences. Sensible Weather primarily serves the travel, outdoor activities, and event sectors by partnering with various businesses to integrate their Weather Guarantee into the booking process. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: PTO Exchange
cb_description: PTO Exchange is a benefits platform that specializes in transforming unused paid time off into valuable assets for employees. The company enables workers to convert their accrued vacation time into various rewards such as retirement contributions, student loan payments, and charitable donations, without the need for technical financial knowledge. PTO Exchange primarily serves sectors that offer employee benefits and manage workforce engagement and financial wellness. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Woodinville, Washington.

name: Kyruus Health
cb_description: Kyruus Health is a company specializing in healthcare technology, focusing on provider data management and patient access solutions. The company offers a platform that facilitates the matching of patients with appropriate healthcare providers, streamlines patient scheduling, and enhances data management for health systems, hospitals, and health plans. Kyruus Health serves various sectors within the healthcare industry, including health systems, medical groups, and health plans. The company was formerly known as Kyruus. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Atato
cb_description: Atato is a company focused on providing secure digital asset custody solutions within the cryptocurrency sector. Their main offerings include a regulated crypto custodian service that utilizes multi-party computation (MPC) technology to secure custodial wallets, which support a wide range of tokens across various blockchain networks without charging transaction, withdrawal, or assets under management (AUM) fees. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Ondo
cb_description: Ondo is a company focused on developing financial infrastructure within the finance sector. Their main offerings include improving market efficiency, enhancing transparency, and increasing accessibility to financial services using on-chain technology. The company caters to a broad audience seeking financial solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Vyriad
cb_description: Vyriad is a company focused on the development of targeted cancer therapies within the biotechnology and healthcare industry. The company's main services involve the creation of engineered viruses that selectively attack cancer cells and stimulate robust immune responses to prevent cancer recurrence. These oncolytic viruses are being tested in various cancer indications through clinical trials, both as standalone treatments and in combination with immuno-oncology drugs. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Rochester, Minnesota.

name: SteadyMD
cb_description: SteadyMD operates as a business-to-business (B2B) telecommunication health infrastructure company. Its products enable professionals to manage their telehealth offerings. The company offers a clinician workforce, clinical operations, legal and regulatory guidance, and product and technology. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Anytype
cb_description: Anytype focuses on providing a tool for data management and organization across various sectors. Its main offerings include the creation of personal dashboards, project management solutions, and knowledge graphs, all designed to enhance user privacy and autonomy without the need for coding skills. The company primarily caters to individuals and businesses who prioritize data privacy and wish to manage their information securely. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Apiiro
cb_description: Apiiro operates as a company focused on application security and cloud delivery in the technology sector. It offers a platform that provides deep code analysis and runtime context to unify application risk visibility, prioritization, and remediation, essentially helping to secure the development and delivery of applications to the cloud. It primarily serves the software development and cloud computing industries. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Instabase
cb_description: Instabase is a company focused on automating business processes through artificial intelligence, operating within the technology and AI sectors. Its main offerings include AI-powered solutions for understanding, extracting, and analyzing unstructured data to streamline document processing and generate actionable insights. Instabase primarily serves sectors such as financial services, insurance, healthcare, and the public sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Freenome
cb_description: Freenome serves as a biotechnology company focused on early cancer detection through advanced diagnostic tools. The company develops blood tests that identify early signs of cancer by analyzing biomarkers from tumor and non-tumor sources using a multiomics platform. These tests are designed to be non-invasive and accessible, aiming to detect various types of cancer at its most treatable stages. It was founded in 2014 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: CyCognito
cb_description: CyCognito specializes in cybersecurity, focusing on exposure management and attack surface management. The company offers a platform that enables organizations to discover, test, and prioritize their web assets and applications to mitigate security risks. CyCognito primarily serves large enterprises and Fortune 500 companies across various sectors with their cybersecurity needs. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Flux Marine
cb_description: Flux Marine specializes in electric propulsion systems for the boating industry. The company designs and builds all-electric outboard motors and partners with hull manufacturers to offer boat packages that enhance the boating experience with sustainability, performance, and low maintenance. Flux Marine primarily serves the recreational boating sector with its innovative electric boating solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bristol, Rhode Island.

name: Coinrule
cb_description: Coinrule specializes in automated trading within the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform for users to create custom trading strategies without the need for coding, enabling the automation of trades across various investment platforms. Coinrule primarily caters to individual investors and traders looking to automate their investment strategies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: WealthKernel
cb_description: WealthKernel focuses on digital investing in the fintech industry. It offers services such as portfolio management, trading, custody of assets, user onboarding, and payments, all powered by its API. Its customers are fintech startups, established businesses, and wealth managers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Code Biotherapeutics
cb_description: Code Biotherapeutics is a biotechnology company focused on the development of precision genetic medicines. The company offers a proprietary synthetic DNA delivery platform, 3DNA, designed to address challenges in delivering genetic medicines, such as toxicity, off-target effects, and bioavailability. Code Biotherapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, advancing treatments for rare and prevalent genetic diseases. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Hatfield, Pennsylvania.

name: Onfly
cb_description: Onfly provides a travel and expense management platform. Its products include expense management and travel management platforms and offers consulting services to sectors including agriculture, travel, retail, construction, and healthcare. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Belo Horizonte, Brazil.

name: Prediko
cb_description: Prediko is a company that specializes in inventory management and optimization for digital native brands within the eCommerce sector. Its main offerings include a software platform that provides real-time inventory monitoring, AI-powered sales forecasting, and efficient purchase order management. The company primarily serves Shopify brands, helping them to manage stock levels, predict demand, and streamline their inventory operations. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

name: Luminous
cb_description: Luminous focuses on developing advanced artificial intelligence (AI) accelerators and operates in the artificial intelligence and supercomputing industry. The company is dedicated to creating and computing hardware designed to support the next generation of AI applications. Luminous aims to address the hardware limitations currently hindering AI advancements by engineering breakthroughs that push technological boundaries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Boundless
cb_description: Boundless is a global employment solution specializing in Employer of Record services within the human resources sector. The company enables businesses to compliantly employ staff in different countries by managing payroll, taxes, benefits, and ensuring adherence to local employment laws. Boundless provides a unified platform for managing international hiring, payroll processing, benefits administration, and legal compliance, simplifying the complexities of employing a distributed workforce. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: CloudFret
cb_description: CloudFret is a digital platform in the transportation industry, focusing on optimizing freight shipping between Europe and Africa. The company offers a marketplace that connects shippers to a network of carriers, aiming to reduce empty truck returns and streamline the freight shipping process. CloudFret primarily serves the shipping and logistics industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Marseille, France.

name: Railz
cb_description: Railz is a fintech company specializing in providing Accounting Data as a Service to various sectors within the financial industry. The company offers an API that enables the integration, normalization, and analysis of financial data from major accounting, banking, and eCommerce platforms, catering to the needs of small and medium-sized businesses. Railz primarily serves financial institutions, fintechs, and developers, offering solutions that facilitate real-time financial decision-making and credit assessments. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: InfinyOn
cb_description: InfinyOn is a company focused on data streaming, operating in the technology and data analytics industry. The company offers a platform that enables engineers to build robust event-driven data pipelines for various functions such as log processing, data enrichment, IoT edge processing, clickstream analytics, and real-time microservices. The platform is primarily used in sectors such as ecommerce, real estate tech, and cloud computing. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Saratoga, California.

name: OneLayer
cb_description: OneLayer specializes in security and management for private 5G/LTE networks within various business sectors. The company offers a comprehensive suite of solutions for asset management, threat prevention, and network segmentation to ensure secure and efficient operation of IoT devices. OneLayer primarily serves sectors such as utilities, manufacturing, airports, healthcare, and mining, providing them with tools to secure and manage their private cellular network devices. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: YoLa Fresh
cb_description: YoLa Fresh focuses on revolutionizing the fresh produce supply chain in Africa's agricultural sector. The company offers a technology platform that connects small-holder farmers directly with traditional retailers, aiming to streamline the process of getting fruits and vegetables from farms to consumers while optimizing pricing and demand through data analytics and artificial intelligence. YoLa Fresh primarily serves stakeholders within the agricultural and retail sectors, leveraging technology to enhance efficiency and sustainability. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Casablanca, Morocco.

name: Emulate
cb_description: Emulate specializes in advanced in vitro models for research and development in the biotechnology sector. The company offers a Human Emulation System that includes instruments, consumables, and software designed to mimic human biology and predict human responses to various stimuli. Emulate's technology is primarily utilized in the fields of drug development and disease research. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Earli
cb_description: Earli serves as a biotechnology company focused on transforming cancer into a benign experience through early detection and treatment. The company develops a synthetic biopsy technology that forces cancer cells to produce synthetic biomarkers, enabling precise localization and characterization of tumors using PET scans. Earli's approach aims to improve the accuracy and timeliness of cancer diagnosis, potentially leading to more effective treatments and better patient outcomes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: NotedSource
cb_description: NotedSource is a platform that specializes in fostering collaborations between businesses and academic experts for research and development projects across various industries. The company provides access to a global network of vetted scholars and facilitates streamlined engagements for project management, including built-in confidentiality and intellectual property protection. NotedSource primarily serves sectors that require in-depth research and expert insights to drive innovation and product development. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Monograph
cb_description: Monograph provides project management software for architects and engineers. The company offers budget-tracking solutions built for architecture, landscape, and interior firms. Its solutions include pricing, online invoicing, project management, online time tracking, project planning, and more. primarily It serves the business sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: WorkMotion
cb_description: WorkMotion is a global HR platform that specializes in enabling companies to hire and onboard employees internationally. The company offers solutions such as employer of record services, compliant onboarding processes, and remote team management. WorkMotion provides tools for global payroll processing, access to legal expertise, and detailed country-specific employment guides to ensure full compliance with local labor laws. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Hologram
cb_description: Hologram focuses on providing cellular connectivity solutions. The company's platform provides a cloud-friendly cellular network to connect and interact with any device to the internet, and route incoming and outgoing messages. It primarily serves the networking industry. Hologram was formerly known as Konek. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Branch
cb_description: Branch is a deployment tool that simplifies the CI/CD process for WordPress developers within the software development industry. The company offers automated deployment solutions that integrate with Git repositories and provide pre-configured recipes for various hosting platforms, eliminating much of the manual configuration work. Branch's services are tailored to modern WordPress development needs, including asset compilation, dependency installation, and automated testing, to ensure a smooth and error-free deployment process. It is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: DuploCloud
cb_description: DuploCloud focuses on DevOps automation in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that automates the provisioning of applications to the cloud, integrating operations, DevOps, and security/compliance with 24x7 monitoring and support. Its services are primarily used in the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Jose, United States.

name: Transreport
cb_description: Transreport develops technology solutions for the transportation industry. It provides a passenger assistance platform that allows users to request assistance from transportation operators in a simple, streamlined manner. Also offers a service quality regime (SQR) system for transportation operators and managers. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Connected Robotics
cb_description: Connected Robotics specializes in innovating the food industry through robotics technology. The company offers automated plating systems and AI inspection software to enhance food preparation and safety. Its primary market includes businesses within the food industry seeking automation solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: AXIO
cb_description: AXIO revolutionizes the way people interact with their brain. The company's platform helps users understand, optimize, measure focus, and improve performance.

name: Avalon
cb_description: Avalon specializes in web hosting services and operates within the internet services industry. The company offers a range of products including domain registration, SSL certificates, and hosting solutions tailored for WordPress and WooCommerce platforms. Avalon's hosting services are designed to provide fast, reliable, and secure online presence for businesses and individuals. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Silvr
cb_description: Silvr specializes in providing short-term financing solutions within the financial services sector. The company offers a range of products including invoice financing, inventory financing, growth financing, and working capital loans designed to improve cash flow for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). It was founded in 2020 and is based in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France.

name: Payabli
cb_description: Payabli serves as a payment platform focused on integrating payment processing capabilities into software companies' business models. The company offers a suite of services that enable businesses to accept customer payments and automate vendor payouts, with an emphasis on API-first technology and strategic advisory to enhance payment monetization. Payabli primarily serves software providers, financial institutions, and various partners in the payments ecosystem. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Symbrosia
cb_description: Symbrosia focuses on reducing livestock methane emissions through a seaweed-based feed additive in the agriculture industry. The company's main product, SeaGraze, is sustainably grown in Hawaii and has been shown to reduce methane emissions from livestock while providing essential minerals and antioxidants. It primarily serves the agriculture sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Kailua Kona, Hawaii.

name: Promethium
cb_description: Promethium is an AI-native data fabric company focused on simplifying data management and analytics. The company offers a platform that enables the creation of data products in real-time, providing a single, unified view and access to data from multiple sources. Promethium's solutions cater to a range of personas, from data engineers to business users, aiming to democratize data consumption and decision-making. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Relativity6
cb_description: Relativity6 is a company specializing in AI-powered data enrichment for various business sectors, including insurance, lending, and payment processing. The company offers an industry classification API that predicts NAICS codes and provides business activity data to improve risk selection in commercial underwriting. Relativity6's solutions are designed to enhance data quality for sales, marketing, underwriting, and analytics by integrating into existing systems for real-time business research and CRM data enhancement. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Delix Therapeutics
cb_description: Delix Therapeutics focuses on the development of brain health therapeutics in the pharmaceutical industry. The company's main offerings include the development of a novel class of compounds known as psychoplastogens or neuroplastogens, which are intended to be safe, fast-acting, and long-lasting treatments that leverage the brain's ability to grow and form connections, potentially improving mental function for patients with various needs or conditions. It primarily sells to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Immusoft
cb_description: Immusoft is a cell therapy company specializing in the development of novel therapies for rare diseases. The company's main offering is a technology platform called Immune System Programming (ISP), which reprograms a patient's B cells to produce therapeutic proteins, effectively turning them into sustained delivery systems for gene-encoded medicines. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Fairplay
cb_description: Fairplay is a financial services provider specializing in funding solutions for small and medium-sized businesses within the retail sector. The company offers a range of financial products including working capital loans and factoring services, designed to help businesses manage their cash flow and invest in growth. Fairplay's solutions are tailored to the needs of various business roles and use cases, such as ecommerce platforms, marketplaces, retailers, and wholesale vendors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Alentis Therapeutics
cb_description: Alentis Therapeutics is a biotech company focused on developing treatments for cancer and fibrosis. The company's main offerings include anti-Claudin-1 monoclonal antibodies designed to treat solid tumors and reverse organ fibrosis by targeting the pathological overexpression of Claudin-1. Alentis Therapeutics' products are intended for the healthcare sector, specifically for patients with CLDN1+ tumors and fibrotic diseases. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Allschwil, Switzerland.

name: Glints
cb_description: Glints is a career discovery and development platform in the human capital empowerment sector. The company offers services for job seekers to explore and apply for jobs, and for employers to post job listings and manage applicants. It primarily serves the talent recruitment and career growth needs of professionals and organizations in Southeast Asia. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: ImpriMed
cb_description: ImpriMed provides personalized medicine for pets, specifically in the domain of veterinary oncology. The company offers advanced testing services to identify the most effective chemotherapy drugs for dogs diagnosed with lymphoma or leukemia, using artificial intelligence and comprehensive analysis of the pet's live cancer cells. ImpriMed primarily serves the veterinary healthcare sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: VIAVIA
cb_description: VIAVIA is a video-first online fashion retailer focused on the Gen-Z consumer demographic within the e-commerce industry. The company offers a curated selection of international culture-making brands and its own Italian-made fashion and streetwear, enhanced by live and short-form video content for a modern shopping experience. VIAVIA also develops a technology stack for fashion brands, including AI-powered product lifecycle and supply-chain management tools, as well as retail integration solutions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Tandem PV
cb_description: Tandem PV focuses on the development and production of solar panels in the renewable energy sector. The company's main product is a solar panel that is to visible wavelengths of light, enabling it to light into electricity than traditional technologies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Greeneye Technology
cb_description: Greeneye Technology focuses on precision agriculture, specifically in the pest control process. The company offers a proprietary selective spraying (PSS) system that uses artificial intelligence (AI) and deep learning technology to transition from broad, wasteful pesticide spraying to precise, selective spraying. Greeneye primarily serves the agricultural industry. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: MarketForce
cb_description:
MarketForce is a full-service digital agency that drives objective, measurable ROI through outstanding services across SEO, paid media, email, analytics, and more.

On February 1st, 2021, MarketForce was acquired by Astound Commerce. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: YBVR
cb_description: YBVR operates as a technology company specializing in immersive broadcasting within the sports and entertainment sectors. It offers solutions for transforming live event streams into immersive and social experiences with video quality and bandwidth requirements. Its services cater to enhancing in-venue experiences and providing fans with multiviewing options of live events in various formats. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Toka
cb_description: Toka specializes in providing digital forensics and intelligence solutions within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a range of products and services designed to support government, law enforcement, and security agencies in their efforts to safeguard against threats and crimes, including tools for forensic investigations, real-time intelligence gathering, and covert operations. Toka also provides strategic services for national cyber defense, including capacity building, risk assessments, and the development of security operations centers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Gigs
cb_description: Gigs is a company focused on connecting job seekers with hourly positions across various industries. The company operates an online marketplace that facilitates the matching of businesses with reliable hourly workers based on geographic location and shift availability. Gigs primarily serves sectors that offer part-time, full-time, and gig opportunities in hourly roles. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: CoreBone
cb_description: CoreBone specializes in the development of coral-based bone graft materials for the medical sector. Their products offer a natural alternative to synthetic, bovine, and human-derived bone grafts, providing volume maintenance, osteoclastic remodeling, and required bone formation qualities with a better biological safety profile. CoreBone primarily serves the dental and maxillofacial sectors, as well as orthopedic applications. It is based in Israel.

name: Demodesk
cb_description: Demodesk specializes in virtual meeting solutions and sales coaching technology within the software and technology sector. The company offers a video conferencing platform that integrates coaching and artificial intelligence (AI)-driven insights, along with scheduling process automation tools. Demodesk primarily serves industries such as software and technology, financial services, and energy and home. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Interplay Learning
cb_description: Interplay Learning specializes in online and virtual reality training for the skilled trades sector. The company offers immersive simulation training and certification programs designed to quickly and effectively develop workforce skills. Interplay Learning primarily serves sectors such as HVAC, plumbing, electrical, solar, and facilities maintenance. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: CytoAgents
cb_description: CytoAgents is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing treatments for Cytokine Release Syndrome (CRS) within the pharmaceutical industry. The company's main product is a novel therapy that modulates the immune system's response to reduce inflammation and prevent organ damage caused by CRS. CytoAgents' treatment is designed to manage the side effects of CAR T-cell therapy and other immunotherapies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Optivolt
cb_description: Optivolt is a technology company focused on providing resilient, sustainable energy solutions in the solar power industry. The company offers shade-tolerant solar panels and custom-designed solar energy systems that can function effectively in shaded and non-ideal conditions. Optivolt primarily serves the residential sector, the off-grid market, and the defense sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: BirdEye
cb_description: BirdEye provides a customer experience and reputation management platform that operates in the digital marketing and customer service sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for businesses to generate and manage reviews, engage with customers across multiple channels, and utilize AI-driven insights to improve their online presence and reputation. BirdEye caters to a range of industries including healthcare, real estate, legal, and automotive, providing solutions tailored to the unique needs of each sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Genially
cb_description: Genially is a platform specializing in the creation of animated digital content within various sectors such as business and education. The company offers tools for building presentations, infographics, gamified experiences, and other interactive materials without the need for coding. Genially's services are utilized by individuals and organizations to aid learning outcomes, marketing engagement, and overall audience interaction. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Cordoba, Spain.

name: Rupa Health
cb_description: Rupa Health develops and operates a website-based laboratory portal intended to assist doctors with ordering specialty lab work, handling samples, and delivering results. The company's platform processes the entire lab work experience from beginning to end with no membership. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California. In October 2024, Rupa Health was acquired by Fullscript.

name: HypnoVR
cb_description: HypnoVR is a company focused on digital therapy in the healthcare industry. The company offers digital therapies designed to reduce pain and anxiety, primarily through the use of virtual reality technology that combines the benefits of medical hypnosis. These therapies are primarily used in various medical specialties including anesthesia, surgery, dental care, imaging, oncology, and pediatrics. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Strasbourg, France.

name: Timeshifter
cb_description: Timeshifter is a company focused on improving human performance and health through circadian technology in the health and wellness sector. The company offers science-based applications designed to help individuals manage jet lag and shift work by optimizing sleep, alertness, and overall well-being. Timeshifter's products are utilized by a diverse range of users, including travelers, shift workers, astronauts, and athletes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Southampton, New York.

name: Grin
cb_description: Grin offers software that allows direct-to-consumer brands to run influencer programs in-house. It helps to automate recruitment, fulfillment of products, revenue tracking and aggregation, management of influencers, collections, and sending payments. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: Airstack
cb_description: Airstack is a developer platform focused on integrating web3 on-chain and off-chain data for application development within the blockchain technology sector. The company provides a suite of tools that allow developers to perform complex queries and integrate diverse ecosystem data without the need to host their own infrastructure.
