Airstack primarily serves developers in the blockchain and cryptocurrency industries. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Miami Beach, Florida.

name: Anonos
cb_description: Anonos is a company that focuses on data security in the technology industry. The company offers a full-spectrum data security platform that provides high fidelity data products, ensuring data protection and compliance for all use cases. Anonos primarily serves sectors that require robust data security and privacy, such as the healthcare, finance, and insurance industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: TaKaDu
cb_description: TaKaDu is a company that focuses on providing software solutions for water utilities, operating within the water management and technology sectors. The company offers a comprehensive analytics software solution that enables water distribution utilities to manage their network efficiently and intelligently. It uses the utility's network data and integrated information from other solutions to detect diverse asset failures such as leaks and broken meters, and then enables the utility's personnel to manage these incidents until resolution. The company primarily sells to the water utilities sector. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Yehud, Israel.

name: Distyl AI
cb_description: Distyl AI specializes in generative AI solutions for various business sectors, focusing on integrating artificial intelligence into enterprise workflows. The company offers AI-driven solutions that are customized to an organization's unique data and systems, aiming to enhance human productivity without disrupting existing technologies. Distyl AI primarily serves industries such as CPG, Retail, Healthcare, Finance, and Manufacturing, as well as federal agencies. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Checkly
cb_description: Checkly serves as a developer-first platform specializing in synthetic monitoring and API monitoring within the software development sector. The company offers a suite of tools that enable monitoring as code, allowing developers to create, test, and deploy monitoring checks programmatically alongside their application deployments. Checkly provides a comprehensive solution for end-to-end testing and monitoring, with features such as HTTP-based checks for APIs, notifications for scheduled jobs, and internal application monitoring, all designed to integrate seamlessly into modern DevOps workflows. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Atlantic Quantum
cb_description: Atlantic Quantum focuses on developing scalable quantum computers within the quantum computing industry. Its main offerings include advances in superconducting qubit technology and the deployment of scalable hardware architecture designed to tackle computational challenges. It aims to provide fault-tolerant quantum computers with a focus on quality engineering and error correction. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Allure Security
cb_description: Allure Security specializes in online brand protection and cybersecurity, focusing on defending against impersonation scams and phishing attacks. The company offers solutions that include detecting various forms of online fraud such as credential theft, identity theft, and payment data theft, and responds with measures like automated takedowns and blocklisting to mitigate risks. Allure Security's deception technology also plays a key role in proactively combating scammers by disrupting their operations. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Fullpath
cb_description: Fullpath develops digital marketing and customer data solutions. The company offers a Customer Data and Experience Platform (CDXP) that helps dealers consolidate and leverage their first-party data to create personalized shopping experiences. Its platform also facilitates audience activation, digital advertising, ChatGPT, website views, and more. It primarily serves the automotive industry. It was formerly known as AutoLeadStar. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: True Anomaly
cb_description: True Anomaly specializes in space security technology within the aerospace and defense industry. The company offers a holistic hardware and software platform that includes an intelligent operating system and autonomous orbital vehicles, designed to support space-based missions with enhanced capabilities through the integration of spacecraft, software, and artificial intelligence. True Anomaly primarily serves the U.S. government, its allies, and commercial partners in the space security sector. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Englewood, Colorado.

name: Climb Credit
cb_description: Climb Credit is a financial services provider specializing in student payment solutions within the education sector. The company offers private loans to individuals seeking career-focused training, with a model that emphasizes partnership with schools that have a track record of improving graduate earnings. Climb Credit's financial products are designed to be accessible and tailored to the needs of students pursuing career advancement through specialized training programs. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.

name: Luna
cb_description: Luna is a company that focuses on data processing in the software development industry. The company offers a visual programming language that allows for data analysis, automation of data-driven processes, and development of dashboards and apps, all without the need for coding. Luna primarily serves data analysts, data scientists, and business leaders. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Poland.

name: Sundae
cb_description: Sundae operates as an off-market real estate platform specializing in the sale of homes as-is within the real estate industry. The company provides homeowners with competitive cash offers for their properties without the need for repairs, cleanings, or showings, and offers a transparent sales process. Sundae's marketplace connects sellers with real estate investors, facilitating transactions that bypass traditional home selling hassles. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Fiit
cb_description: Fiit is a fitness-focused company operating in the health and wellness industry. The company offers a fitness app that provides access to a wide range of interactive classes including functional fitness, high-intensity interval training (HIIT), strength training, yoga, and pilates, among others. These classes are designed to cater to different fitness levels, from beginners to advanced. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Yalla Fel Sekka
cb_description: Yalla Fel Sekka (YFS) operates in the logistics and courier services industry. The company's main offerings include intra-city urban logistics and courier services, with a focus on improving efficiency and reducing delivery times. It primarily serves the delivery industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Infinia
cb_description: Infinia develops and manufactures free piston Stirling generator applications that converts readily available and low cost heat sources like solar, biogas and natural gas, into reliable electrical energy. Infinia is the producer of the PowerDish - a Stirling-based solar power generation system suitable for automotive-scale manufacturing and deployment from small distribution-scale arrays to multi-megawatt, utility-scale solar power plants.

name: Silk
cb_description: Silk is a cloud-based data-publishing platform that makes it easy to research, store and manage structured and unstructured content in easy-to-search collections of web pages and visualizations that people can share in secure private groups or publicly on the web. Unlike corporate databases and content management systems that require technical skills, Silk enables anyone to easily organize a collection of information and publish it on the web.

name: Gimo
cb_description: GIMO specializes in providing financial wellness solutions in the employee benefits sector. The company offers on-demand salary access and real-time earnings tracking to empower employees with financial flexibility and security. GIMO's services are primarily utilized by businesses seeking to enhance their employee benefits programs and improve financial health for their workforce. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Hanoi, Vietnam.

name: Our Next Energy
cb_description: Our Next Energy is a company focused on innovating energy storage technologies for electric vehicles and the grid. The company offers battery packs for electric vehicles, including dual-chemistry and lithium iron phosphate options, and develops energy storage solutions for grid applications. Our Next Energy primarily serves sectors such as the electric vehicle industry and renewable energy storage. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Novi, Michigan.

name: Formlabs
cb_description: Formlabs develops and manufactures high-resolution stereolithography (SLA) and selective laser sintering (SLS) 3D printers. The company provides a range of printers, materials, and post-processing solutions for rapid prototyping, end-use part production, and manufacturing aids across various industries. Formlabs serves sectors such as engineering, manufacturing, automotive, aerospace, dental, medical, education, entertainment, and jewelry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: OpenPhone
cb_description: OpenPhone operates as a business communication company. It offers a business phone system that allows startups and small businesses to manage calls, texts, and contacts across multiple devices. It primarily serves sectors such as startups, small businesses, education, real estate, logistics and transportation, and professional services. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Paerpay
cb_description: Paerpay provides contactless payment solutions within the restaurant industry. It offers a range of services that enable restaurants to accept payments through mobile devices without the need for customers to download applications or for the restaurant to change their existing point-of-sale (POS) systems. It primarily serves the restaurant sector, offering solutions that integrate with various POS systems and payment technologies. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Shrewsbury, Massachusetts.

name: Aleph Alpha
cb_description: Aleph Alpha specializes in generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology for enterprises and governments within the artificial intelligence sector. The company offers language models and multimodal AI solutions for human expertise, compliance, and AI applications. Aleph Alpha's technology is tailored for various architectures and value chains. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Heidelberg, Germany.

name: AtoB
cb_description: AtoB specializes in modernizing payment infrastructure for the trucking and logistics industry. The company offers fleet fuel cards with competitive fuel discounts and robust security controls. AtoB's main services include instant payment solutions for drivers and a comprehensive discount network for both fuel and non-fuel-related purchases. The company primarily serves sectors such as local and over-the-road fleets, public services, education, construction, delivery, and trucking industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Surfly
cb_description: Surfly is a high-growth company specializing in interaction middleware and the transformation of web experiences within the technology sector. Their main offerings include a collaborative layer for web applications that enables co-browsing, video and voice chat, secure document signing, and file sharing without the need to alter the original application. Surfly primarily serves sectors that require enhanced online customer interactions and secure digital transactions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Incorta
cb_description: Incorta focuses on data analytics and business intelligence. It offers an operational lakehouse to simplify the process of extracting, modeling, and preparing data from multiple sources for analysis and provides prebuilt analytic content and integrations. The company primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, retail, financial services, healthcare, and high-technology. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Foster City, California.

name: NEWTWEN
cb_description: NEWTWEN specializes in advanced software solutions for the electrical drive and automation industry. The company offers real-time, adaptive digital twins that can be integrated into control chips, providing optimal cooling management, real-time monitoring, and model predictive control to enhance efficiency and reduce production costs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Padova, Italy.

name: Hokodo
cb_description: Hokodo specializes in B2B (business-to-business) payment solutions, offering a digital platform for trade credit and financing services within various industries. The company provides credit terms to businesses, enabling a frictionless checkout experience and real-time credit decision-making. Hokodo's solutions cater to sectors such as B2B marketplaces, food and beverages, agriculture, industrial supplies, construction and building materials, freight and logistics, freelance and workplace management, and corporate travel. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Novelship
cb_description: Novelship provides an online marketplace for authentic limited-edition fashion items. The company retails sneakers, apparel, and collectibles. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: Trezy
cb_description: Trezy is a new generation intelligent solution that specializes in automating financial processes and reporting for small and medium-sized businesses within the financial technology sector. The company offers a range of services including real-time cash flow monitoring, predictive financial forecasting, and providing insights for better financial decision-making. Trezy's AI-powered platform is designed to simplify cash management and enhance financial performance without the need for in-depth financial knowledge. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Ganaz
cb_description: Ganaz connects farmers with seasonal workers, translating communications into their native language. Farmers can use Ganaz to post job listings and communicate directly with workers, cutting out the middlemen often required to bring the employer and employee together on farms. Ganaz also allows farmers to send urgent messages out to their workforce. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Airtm
cb_description: Airtm is a financial services company that provides a digital dollar account. The company offers a platform for adding, withdrawing, and transferring funds using payment methods aiding users to earn money through its peer-to-peer network and other community-driven initiatives. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: enspired
cb_description: enspired focuses on the commercial optimization of power assets within the energy trading sector. It offers trading services that enable the monetization of assets and facilitate participation in European power spot markets. enspired primarily serves sectors that operate flexible assets such as utilities, asset developers, VPP operators, and energy-intensive industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: ElasticRun
cb_description: ElasticRun is a business-to-business (B2B) e-commerce platform focused on connecting brands and services. The company facilitates the distribution of fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) and grocery products through a network of small stores and enables business-to-consumer (B2C) e-commerce companies to reach rural customers with its logistics network. ElasticRun assists banking institutions in extending financial services to rural consumers by leveraging technology, data, and artificial intelligence (AI) for supply and demand aggregation. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pune, India.

name: Tattle
cb_description: Tattle is a Customer Experience Improvement platform focused on the hospitality sector, specifically designed for restaurants. It offers a suite of tools for collecting, analyzing, and acting on customer feedback and online reviews. It primarily serves the restaurant industry, providing insights and actionable data to improve menu performance and customer service. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lendable
cb_description: Lendable is a technology-enabled investment and alternatives platform that focuses on providing debt to fintechs in emerging and frontier markets. The company offers financing solutions for high-growth companies with a positive impact, leveraging its proprietary technology for understanding risk and impact. Lendable primarily serves the fintech industry, enabling market access for global investors through funds, co-investments, and technology solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Jumbotail
cb_description: Jumbotail offers a B2B marketplace and a retail platform focusing on the food and grocery sector. The company connects mom and pop grocery retailers with brands and staples producers, offering a wide selection of products supply chains, and logistics. Jumbotail also provides fintech solutions including payment services access to working capital credit, as well as a cloud-based retail operating system for small grocery stores. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Pubinno
cb_description: Pubinno is a company specializing in advanced draft beer technology and smart beverage operating systems within the beverage industry. Their main offerings include AI-powered devices and robotics that automate and standardize draft beer dispensing, ensuring optimal efficiency and sustainability. Pubinno's solutions cater to various sectors including stadiums, hotels, bars, restaurants, breweries, and draft beer distributors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Vint
cb_description: Vint is a company focused on fitness and gym equipment within the health and wellness industry. The company primarily offers detailed product reviews, buying guides, and informative blog posts about various fitness exercises and equipment. Its main customer base includes individuals interested in home fitness and gym equipment. It is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Cor
cb_description: Nueon DBA Cor, provides feedback about the 3-4 month history of blood pressure control and the resulting harmful effects of hypertension. The company uses optical technology to measure red blood cell membrane chemistry, in whole blood from a fingerstick, in less than a minute in the point of care. Cor's technology helps provide actionable data to the physician at the point of care. Since it is immediate, it also drives engagement and compliance, in the quest for prevention and wellness. Point of Care ("POC") lab tests are where proactive medicine begins, and can improve outcomes, reduce hospitalizations and reduce costs.

name: Picap
cb_description: Picap is a mobility and logistics company offering a range of transportation services. The company provides on-demand motorcycle rides, car services, and express courier deliveries, aiming to reduce travel time and improve convenience for users. Picap's services are primarily utilized by individuals and businesses seeking efficient and flexible transportation solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ArmorCode
cb_description: ArmorCode focuses on application security and vulnerability management in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform that integrates with various security tools to help organizations unify, prioritize, and remediate vulnerabilities, providing a holistic view of application security posture and automating complex DevSecOps workflows. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: YourChoice Therapeutics
cb_description: YourChoice Therapeutics provides drug development for non-hormonal contraceptives. The company's main offering is a daily pill designed for men, which works by blocking cell division and sperm release, providing a contraceptive effect. The company serves the family planning and healthcare sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Instawork
cb_description: Instawork operates an online job marketplace intended to connect businesses with potential employees. The company's marketplace features job shifts for qualified professionals and hourly workers as per their schedules, enabling hospitality businesses to hire talent for work on demand. It primarily serves the staffing industry. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Veho
cb_description: Vho is a mobile service that provides customers and technicians a platform for collaborative vehicle diagnostics and management of repairs.

name: blink
cb_description: Blink is a no-code headless ecommerce platform in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that allows businesses to create and manage ecommerce websites with fast load times and without the need for developer involvement. Blink primarily serves the ecommerce industry by providing tools for site maintenance autonomy, conversion optimization, and SEO enhancement. It is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Malou
cb_description: Malou provides digital marketing solutions, specifically in the restaurant industry. The company offers an all-in-one platform that helps restaurant owners and managers boost their online visibility, attract customers, and manage their online reputation. Its platform includes features for updating business information, responding to customer reviews, and managing social media interactions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Ome
cb_description: Ome develops smart stove knobs that connect with sensor hubs through simple devices that allow customers to automate and improve the safety of their cooking. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Troy Medicare
cb_description: Troy Medicare is a data-driven company focused on the healthcare sector, specifically in the domain of Medicare Advantage plans. The company offers a comprehensive Medicare plan with features such as $0 monthly premiums, $0 copays for generic medications at independent pharmacies, and free visits to primary care providers and specialists. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly seniors, physicians, and pharmacies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.

name: Holisto
cb_description: Holisto is a technology company focused on providing optimized hotel booking services within the travel industry. Its platform aggregates data from various sources to offer travelers better rates on accommodations without using overly technical language. The company leverages technology to scan, combine, and build the best price possible for hotel stays. Holisto was formerly known as Splitty. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Greenwich, Connecticut.

name: Mitiga Solutions
cb_description: Mitiga Solutions specializes in providing climate risk intelligence, focusing on the intersection of science, artificial intelligence (AI), and technology within the climate technology sector. The company offers a self-serve platform and risk models that enable businesses and investors to analyze, report, and act on their exposure to climate-related risks. It primarily serves sectors that require climate risk assessment and management, including insurance, asset management, and various industries. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Increff
cb_description: Increff is a retail SaaS company specializing in inventory management and supply chain optimization within the retail sector. The company offers a suite of products including merchandising software, warehouse management systems, and omnichannel inventory management solutions designed to automate decision-making and enhance process accuracy. Increff primarily serves the retail industry, providing tools and services to improve efficiency and sustainability in retail operations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Flip
cb_description: Flip is a company that specializes in the auction and sale of popular, limited edition sneakers within the ecommerce industry. The company offers a platform for super-fast sneaker auctions, guaranteeing that every approved item will sell within 90 minutes or Flip will buy it, and allows buyers to set their own prices with all transactions handled within the Flip app. Flip's services are currently available exclusively in the U.S. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: PropheSee
cb_description: PropheSee is a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform that empowers brands with data driven insights that allow managers to compare and analyse digital campaigns and execute directly from the platform.

name: Caribou
cb_description:
Caribou is an England-based company that provides parcel delivery and courier services internationally and domestically.

On August 4th, 2021, Caribou was acquired by Inc & Co. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Pearl Health
cb_description: Pearl Health helps primary care providers with stable payments to primary care practices. It allows providers to focus on patient care while compensating them for improving their patients health. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Rutter
cb_description: Rutter specializes in radar image processing technology within the marine safety, security, and environmental monitoring sectors. The company offers a suite of products that enhance radar systems for improved detection, tracking, and analysis of marine-related challenges, such as ice navigation, oil spill response, and small target surveillance. These products are utilized across various maritime industries, including shipping, oil and gas, and coastal security. It is based in Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada.

name: Knowde
cb_description: Knowde focuses on accelerating digital transformation in the chemical industry by providing a marketplace for chemicals, polymers, and ingredients. The company offers a platform for sourcing raw materials, engaging with suppliers, and managing product master data, aimed at streamlining the procurement process for businesses. Knowde primarily serves sectors such as food and nutrition, cosmetics and personal care, healthcare and pharma, and sustainability, among others. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Eleven Therapeutics
cb_description: Eleven Therapeutics is a company focused on the development of RNA therapeutics in the healthcare and biotechnology industry. The company's main offerings include the creation of RNA therapeutics using synthetic chemistry and AI, with a particular focus on reprogramming disease-causing genetic circuits responsible for respiratory illnesses. The company primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a specific emphasis on respiratory disease treatment. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: Omorpho
cb_description: Omorpho is a company focused on fitness and wellness, operating in the sportswear industry. The company offers weighted training gear, designed to help users burn more calories, build strength, and boost their cardio by adding small amounts of weight to their bodies during training. The primary customers of Omorpho are individuals seeking to enhance their fitness and athletic performance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Recharge
cb_description: Recharge allows Bay Area guests to nap or shower in luxury hotels all day. It operates in Hyatt, Hilton, and Starwood hotels throughout the Bay area. The company is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Funnel
cb_description: Funnel is a software-as-a-service (SaaS) company. The company offers a platform that allows users to gather, store, organize, and share marketing data from various sources, aiming to enhance reporting and decision-making processes. Its services are utilized by sectors such as digital marketing, data analysis, information technology (IT), and various industries, including agencies, business-to-consumer (B2C), and business-to-consumer (B2B). It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: CompScience
cb_description: CompScience operates as a warehouse risk management platform. The company uses artificial intelligence technology to provide solutions including actionable insights, safety monitoring, metrics, and a website interface for business performance and worker safety. It primarily serves the monitoring and security industry. CompScience was formerly known as Kinetic Eye. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: liwwa
cb_description: liwwa operates as a financial services company that provides collateral-free financing solutions for small to medium-sized businesses. The company offers a range of financial products including Sharia-compliant loans, trade finance, and working capital solutions, designed to meet the diverse needs of businesses without requiring collateral. Liwwa primarily serves the financial needs of businesses in various sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Amman, Jordan.

name: SmartRecruiters
cb_description: SmartRecruiters is a company focused on providing a comprehensive talent acquisition platform and recruiting software within the human resources technology sector. Their main offerings include an enterprise hiring platform that streamulates the recruitment process, a suite of tools for job advertising, candidate sourcing, and onboarding, as well as advanced features like AI recruiting and collaborative hiring solutions. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Hedvig
cb_description: Hedvig provides software-defined storage for enterprises building private, hybrid, or multi-cloud environments. Hedvig is designed for both primary and secondary data, making it ideal for legacy, modern, and backup workloads. The Hedvig Distributed Storage Platform consolidates block, file, and object into a single, API-driven platform that keeps pace with ever-growing data needs. Hedvig's patented Universal Data Plane technology forms a distributed, scale-out cluster that transforms commodity servers or cloud computing into a flexible foundation for bare metal, hypervisor, and container infrastructure.

name: Zuoyebang
cb_description: Zuoyebang is a technology-driven online education services provider in the K12 education sector. The company offers a comprehensive suite of online tutoring tools and services for primary and secondary school students, covering all academic subjects without the use of overly technical language. Zuoyebang primarily serves the K12 educational segment, providing accessible quality education to a wide user base. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Guangzhou, Guangdong.

name: Vizit
cb_description: Vizit is a company that offers aftermarket software solutions for Microsoft SharePoint.

name: Phaidra
cb_description: Phaidra specializes in providing artificial intelligence controls for mission critical facilities within the industrial sector. The company offers a closed-loop artificial intelligence control service that enhances plant stability, energy efficiency, and sustainability by integrating existing building automation and management systems. It primarily serves the industrial sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Onepilot
cb_description: Onepilot focuses on revolutionizing customer care outsourcing by providing efficient, transparent, and flexible services. The company offers customer care, sales support, and KYC services across various channels, enhanced by AI technology to ensure availability and cost-effectiveness. Onepilot caters to a diverse range of sectors including ecommerce, fintech, and education, among others. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Apptronik
cb_description: Apptronik specializes in the development of humanoid robots for various automation tasks across multiple industries. Its main product, Apollo, is a general-purpose humanoid robot designed to perform a wide range of tasks that typically require human effort, such as case picking, palletization, and machine tending. Apptronik's robots are intended to address labor shortages, reduce workplace injuries, and improve operational efficiency in sectors like third-party logistics (3PL), retail, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Kooltra
cb_description: Kooltra specializes in providing end-to-end solutions for the foreign exchange and global payments industry. The company offers a cloud-based platform that streamlines compliance, automates regulatory reporting, and facilitates multi-currency transactions for financial institutions. Kooltra's platform is designed to optimize workflows, enhance risk controls, and provide a digital customer portal for efficient onboarding and transaction management. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Humi
cb_description: Humi is a company that specializes in providing integrated payroll, human resources, and benefits software solutions for Canadian businesses. Their platform offers functionalities such as payroll processing, HR information management, benefits administration, time off tracking, and employee onboarding, all designed to comply with Canadian regulations. The company primarily serves small to medium-sized businesses across various sectors, offering tools to streamline their HR and payroll processes. Humi was formerly known as Humi Payroll. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Neighbor
cb_description: Neighbor specializes in modular outdoor furniture that combines the comfort of indoor living with the durability required for outdoor use. The company offers a range of products including outdoor sectionals, dining sets, and accessories designed to enhance outdoor living spaces. Neighbor's furniture is customizable, allowing customers to select the size, shape, color, and style to fit their specific needs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.

name: Vara
cb_description: Vara is a company that specializes in environmental compliance solutions for the manufacturing sector. It provides an AI-powered platform that automates data collection, simplifies compliance paperwork, and offers analytics and insights for sustainability data management. The company primarily serves manufacturers looking to streamline their environmental compliance processes. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Helsing
cb_description: Helsing is a company focused on artificial intelligence for defense, operating within the security and technology sectors. Its main offerings include advanced AI solutions that process information and analyze sensor data to support democratic governments. The company partners with industry and governments to integrate AI with existing and new hardware platforms. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Evenflow
cb_description: Evenflow specializes in the acquisition and scaling of e-commerce businesses within the online retail sector. The company identifies promising e-commerce businesses, acquires them, and integrates them across various operational aspects such as sourcing, supply chain, and marketing to enhance their growth. Evenflow primarily serves the e-commerce industry by transforming small businesses into consumer brands through strategic growth playbooks. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Ayla Networks
cb_description: Ayla Networks is a company that focuses on the Internet of Things (IoT) sector, providing a platform for the development and support of connected products. The company offers a platform-as-a-service (PaaS) that enables secure connectivity, data analytics, and feature-rich customer experiences for smart home IoT solutions. This platform allows for the creation of custom-built, smart-connected products that enhance the user experience. Ayla Networks primarily serves the smart home industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Astrus
cb_description: Astrus is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence and operates in the microchip design industry. The company's main service is to automate analog layout for microchips using AI, without disrupting the workflow of its clients. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Sportlogiq
cb_description: Sportlogiq is an artificial intelligence powered sports analytics company operating in the sports and technology sectors. The company offers advanced analytics software that tracks the location and actions of every player in various sports, using standard game footage to extract meaningful insights. These insights are primarily sold to sports teams, leagues, media organizations, and performance enhancement companies across the world of sport. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Alma
cb_description: Alma is a platform that allows users to discover, engage and invest in non-profits that make a difference in their community. For non-profits, the Alma platform allows fundraising in a completely measured, quantifiable and ROI positive way.

name: Lawmatics
cb_description: Lawmatics provides client intake and marketing automation CRMs to law practices. It was founded in 2017 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: Sprinter Health
cb_description: Sprinter Health is a mobile diagnostics company focused on reimagining in-home healthcare delivery within the healthcare sector. The company offers comprehensive diagnostic services that include in-home visits for hands-on diagnostics and virtual consultations to close care gaps and improve patient access to preventive care. Sprinter Health primarily serves healthcare organizations looking to enhance patient engagement and outcomes through actionable data and preventive care services. Sprinter Health was formerly known as Pulsetera. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Pendella
cb_description: Pendella is a company that specializes in providing a white-labeled embedded insurance platform within the insurance industry. Their main offerings include an online platform that allows for the effortless provision of individual life and disability insurance policies, which are underwritten and issued entirely online. The platform is designed to serve various sectors such as professional employer organizations (PEOs), enrollment firms, employers, and brokers, offering a turnkey solution that integrates with existing benefits strategies and requires no administrative costs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Fort Myers, Florida.

name: DBeaver
cb_description: DBeaver develops a universal database tool designed to support relational databases such as Oracle and SQL Server. It develops and provides DBeaver PRO, an open-source database management platform. The platform features a connection to various data sources, extensions for big data databases, a data viewer and editor, a mock data generator, a metadata browser, and a visual query builder, enabling organizations to work with multiple databases within one tool. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Manual
cb_description: Manual is a design and branding studio that specializes in creating iconic brand identities and beautiful experiences. The studio offers a range of services, including brand identity and development, naming and copywriting, art direction, packaging, print and publishing design, web design, motion graphics, and branded environment design. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Supercritical
cb_description: Supercritical is a company focused on facilitating access to the carbon removal market within the environmental services industry. The company offers a marketplace for corporate buyers to navigate, build portfolios of vetted carbon removal credits, and engage in secure transactions including spot purchases and ofttake agreements. Supercritical primarily serves corporate buyers looking to achieve their sustainability goals through impactful carbon removal projects. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Kent, England.

name: Zero
cb_description: Zero develops automation software that enables home retrofits.

name: NOCD
cb_description: NOCD provides telehealth services for the treatment of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD). The company offers online therapy sessions through its platform, connecting patients with licensed therapists who specialize in exposure and response prevention therapy (ERP), a recognized treatment for OCD. In addition to live video sessions, the platform provides access to therapeutic tools, exercises, and peer communities for continuous support. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Blueboard
cb_description: Blueboard delivers as an employee rewards and recognition platform for the modern workplace. It allows companies to reward their employees with curated activities and experiences, including yoga, skydiving, mixology classes, spa treatments, and more. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Zafrens
cb_description: Zafrens is a therapeutics company focused on leveraging nanofabrication technology to advance drug discovery and cell analysis. The company offers a platform that enables the analysis and manipulation of cells, aiming to democratize the drug discovery process across various modalities. Zafrens' technology is capable of performing experiments, analyzing, and manipulating, which facilitates scientific discoveries. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: TimelyCare
cb_description: TimelyCare offers a virtual health and well-being platform that focuses on serving the higher education sector. The company offers 24/7 mental health, medical, and self-care resources to support the physical and mental health of students, faculty, and staff. TimelyCare's services are designed to complement existing campus healthcare resources and provide equitable access to care through a diverse network of providers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Fort Worth, Texas.

name: Dendra Systems
cb_description: Dendra Systems operates as an environmental technology company. It focuses on the restoration and management of biodiverse ecosystems. It offers services such as ecosystem insights, environmental management, and aerial seeding, which involve the use of high-resolution imagery and artificial intelligence (AI) to restore ecosystems at scale and manage biodiversity and carbon measurement. It primarily serves the mining, government, and infrastructure sectors. Dendra Systems was formerly known as BioCarbon Engineering. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Oxford, United Kingdom.

name: Cloud Campaign
cb_description: Cloud Campaign is a company that specializes in social media management, operating within the digital marketing industry. The company provides a white-label platform that offers tools for content creation, scheduling, client approval, and data-driven decision making, all aimed at facilitating efficient social media management. The primary customers of Cloud Campaign are marketing agencies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Routefusion
cb_description: Routefusion provides international bank-to-bank payments API services. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: ThinCats
cb_description: ThinCats focuses on providing alternative finance solutions in the business sector. The company offers funding services to mid-sized businesses, supporting their growth, acquisitions, refinancing, and restructuring needs. Their primary market is the mid-sized SMEs across various sectors. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Leicestershire, United Kingdom.

name: Parallel Learning
cb_description: Parallel Learning provides education support services in the education sector. The company offers a range of services including psychoeducational assessments, behavioral and mental health counseling, executive function coaching, speech-language pathology, and specialized instruction. Its services primarily cater to the education industry, particularly schools requiring special education programs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: OpenSpace
cb_description: OpenSpace specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) enabled analytics in construction. The company offers services that allow for comprehensive visual documentation of construction sites, enabling verification of work-in-place, simplification of dispute resolution, and team accountability. Its AI enabled tools provide visibility and insights, including the ability to compare building information modeling (BIM) to as-built structures, automatically track progress, and maintain schedules. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cedar
cb_description: Cedar focuses on reducing administrative friction in the healthcare system through its enterprise fintech platform. The company offers a platform that connects providers and payers, optimizing the patient experience from pre-service through payment without using overly technical language. Cedar primarily serves the healthcare industry, including providers and payers, by offering solutions that integrate with electronic health records (EHRs) and enhance the end-to-end digital patient experience. Cedar was formerly known as Careportal. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: VenoStent
cb_description: VenoStent serves as a clinical-stage medical device company focused on improving vascular surgery outcomes through bioengineered solutions. The company's main offering is SelfWrap, a bioabsorbable, flexible vascular wrap designed to reduce the failure rates of dialysis access sites. VenoStent's technology focuses on the lives of patients with end-stage renal disease by addressing the high failure rate of dialysis access sites. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Instaclustr
cb_description:
Instaclustr is an open-source as-a-service company delivering an automated management environment that offers database, analytics, search, and messaging services.

On April 7th, 2022, Instaclustr was acquired by NetApp. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Urban Sports Club
cb_description: Urban Sports Club operates as a wellness-focused company in the fitness and corporate wellness industry. It offers a range of sports and wellness activities, including access to fitness studios and wellness offerings through a mobile-application-based membership. It primarily serves individuals seeking fitness and wellness activities, as well as companies looking to boost the well-being and productivity of their employees. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: RAD
cb_description: RAD is specialized in IT security solutions and offers managed services of cyber security monitoring, incident response, cyber threat intelligence, cyber threat identification and simulation, digital identity, data protection, fraud detection, prevention, and response. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Milan, Italy. In May 2023, Wind Tre took a corporate majority in RAD. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Bombas
cb_description: Bombas operates as a comfort-focused apparel brand in the clothing industry. It offers a variety of comfortable socks and apparel, with a business model where for every item sold, a corresponding item is donated to those in need. It primarily serves the general consumer market with a strong emphasis on social impact through clothing donations. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Abacus Insights
cb_description: Abacus Insights specializes in data management solutions in healthcare. The company offers solutions that consolidate, normalize, clean, and deliver healthcare data in a usable and interoperable format, aiming to improve data quality and drive valuable insights. Its primary customers are in the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Overwolf
cb_description: Overwolf operates as a company focused on empowering in-game creators in the gaming industry. The company offers a platform for creators to build, grow, and monetize in-game applications and mods, enhancing the gaming experience for players. It primarily serves the gaming industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Craftwork
cb_description: Craftwork is a professional home painting company that operates in the home improvement industry. It offers interior and exterior painting services, as well as cabinet finishing, using a technology-driven approach to provide quick estimates and transparent pricing. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.

name: Bitpanda
cb_description: Bitpanda operates as a financial technology company focused on democratizing investing and finance. The company offers a platform for commission-free investing in stocks, cryptocurrencies, and precious metals, designed to be safe, easy, and accessible for everyone. Bitpanda primarily serves the personal investment industry, providing tools for individuals to invest in various assets starting with minimal capital. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: The Muse
cb_description: The Muse is a career discovery platform operating within the human resources and recruitment industry. The company provides job seekers with tools for career exploration and job search, including insights into company cultures, professional advice, and resources for personal career development. Additionally, The Muse offers services to employers, such as employer branding and targeted job postings to build a robust candidate pipeline. The Muse was formerly known as The Daily Muse, Company. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: GIBLIB
cb_description: GIBLIB is a company focused on providing high-quality medical education through video content, serving the healthcare education sector. The company offers on-demand streaming of surgical videos, medical lectures, and scientific presentations, as well as continuing medical education (CME) for healthcare professionals. GIBLIB's content is sourced from subject matter experts at top academic medical institutions, available through web-video, mobile-audio, and virtual reality applications. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Quantum Source
cb_description: Quantum Source develops technology to enable a commercially viable, photonic quantum computer with millions of qubits. The company serves drug design, material development, cybersecurity, and the processing of large datasets for artificial intelligence (AI) applications. Quantum Source was founded in 2021 and is based in Ness Ziona, Israel.

name: Ecobot
cb_description: Ecobot is a cloud-based platform that specializes in optimizing data collection and management for environmental permits within the construction and mitigation banking industries. The company offers a suite of tools that automate field data collection, enhance data accuracy, and streamline the generation of regulatory reports. Ecobot primarily serves the architectural, engineering, and construction (AEC) sector, natural resources consulting firms, and various government and private entities involved in environmental compliance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Asheville, North Carolina.

name: Haya Therapeutics
cb_description: Haya Therapeutics develops RNA therapies targeting the regulatory genome for serious health conditions. The company leverages its platform to create cell-state modifying therapeutics that provide novel insights into long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs), aiming to treat conditions such as cardiovascular disease and cancer. Haya Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on developing treatments for rare and chronic diseases. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: OpenSooq
cb_description: OpenSooq is a leading classified ads marketplace focusing on facilitating user-to-user sales across various categories. The platform offers a space for buying and selling items such as vehicles, real estate, job opportunities, and consumer goods, with features like real-time chat for easy communication between buyers and sellers. OpenSooq primarily serves individuals looking to engage in personal buying and selling activities, as well as businesses seeking to reach potential customers in the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Amman, Jordan.

name: Mammaly
cb_description: Mammaly specializes in premium dog supplements, focusing on pet health within the animal nutrition industry. The company offers a range of scientifically formulated supplements designed to address common health issues in dogs, such as digestion, joint health, and stress, without using technical jargon or promotional language. These supplements are developed in collaboration with veterinarians and nutrition scientists to support the overall well-being of dogs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cologne, Germany.

name: Marble
cb_description: Marble is a technology company focused on the maritime sector. It offers end-to-end services for maritime surveillance, including the development and deployment of hardware and software systems designed for monitoring maritime environments. The company primarily serves Coast Guards, Maritime Police, Governments, and NGOs. It is based in London, England.

name: Inotrem
cb_description: Inotrem is a biotechnology company that specializes in immunotherapy, operating within the healthcare and pharmaceutical industry. The company's main offerings include the development of immunomodulation therapies that target the TREM-1 pathway to control unbalanced and dysregulated inflammatory responses, with applications in acute and chronic inflammatory diseases. Inotrem primarily serves the healthcare sector, focusing on conditions such as septic shock and myocardial infarction. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Hash
cb_description: Hash is a content aggregation platform that focuses on delivering topical stories by aggregating popular tweets. The company provides a simple, visual way for users to stay informed about global events without the need for technical knowledge. Hash primarily serves individuals interested in current events and social media trends. It is based in Brisbane, Queensland.

name: Rossum
cb_description: Rossum offers a document processing platform. It is an artificial intelligence (AI)--based cloud document gateway for automated business communication. It understands complex structured documents and enables companies to capture data from financial documents with human-level accuracy. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Prague, Czech Republic.

name: Qualia
cb_description: Qualia is a global social intelligence tool that operates within the data analytics and business intelligence sector. The company specializes in analyzing online conversations and providing real-time alerts and insights about brands, products, competition, and industry trends. Qualia primarily serves sectors that require social media and market intelligence, such as marketing agencies and corporate communication departments. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Greece.

name: Pensa Systems
cb_description: Pensa Systems focuses on retail shelf inventory management in the retail industry. The company offers a data-as-a-service portfolio that uses computer vision and artificial intelligence to provide visibility of store shelves, helping to reduce stockouts. Pensa Systems primarily serves consumer packaged goods brands and retailers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Mindstate Design Labs
cb_description: Mindstate Design Labs is a preclinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing psychedelic-inspired therapeutics for mental health. The company's main offerings include a platform for target discovery and phenotypic screening of altered conscious states, a pipeline of psychedelic primer compounds, and non-psychedelic probe compounds designed to modulate these states. Mindstate Design Labs primarily serves the mental health therapeutics sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Dixa
cb_description: Dixa is a conversational customer service platform. It specializes in combining artificial intelligence (AI) with a human touch to deliver personalized service experiences. The company offers a solution that includes omnichannel support, AI-driven interactions, and automation tools to enhance customer service efficiency. Dixa's platform is designed to improve customer loyalty and is trusted by leading brands across various industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Pilot
cb_description: Pilot is a decentralized exchange platform.

name: Treasure
cb_description: Treasure specializes in embedded treasury management. The company offers a treasury-as-a-service application program interface (API) that enables financial platforms to integrate yield-generating products such as Treasury bills and money market funds, designed for investment opportunities. Treasure primarily caters to the financial technology sector, providing tools for businesses to manage their treasury functions more effectively. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Learnerbly
cb_description: Learnerbly is a Workplace Learning Platform focused on creating progressive learning cultures within organizations. The company provides a curated marketplace of learning resources, managing personal learning budgets, and offering AI-driven content discovery to facilitate employee upskilling. Learnerbly primarily serves businesses looking to develop and retain talent by enhancing their learning and development strategies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Comanche Biopharma
cb_description: Comanche Biopharma operates as a biopharmaceutical company. The company's main service is the development of a novel small interfering RNA (siRNA) therapy for the treatment of preeclampsia, aiming to lower the risks of pregnancy and prematurity by safely sustaining pregnancy. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly in the area of maternal health. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Concord, Massachusetts.

name: Encantos
cb_description: Encantos is a children's entertainment and technology company that operates in the education and media sectors. The company offers a storyteaching platform that uses diverse stories and characters to create engaging learning experiences for children, primarily through apps and books. Encantos primarily serves the children's education and entertainment industries. It is based in Culver City, California.

name: IFTTT
cb_description: IFTTT is a company focused on providing automation services for both business and home use within the technology sector. The company offers a no-code platform that allows users to integrate and automate their favorite apps and devices, streamlining tasks such as social media management, lead tracking, and content creation. IFTTT primarily serves sectors that benefit from automation, such as the smart home industry and businesses looking to enhance productivity through technology. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Captur
cb_description: Captur is a company specializing in the tokenization and fractional ownership of renewable energy assets, particularly in the solar energy sector. The company offers a platform for managing and investing in tokenized solar power plants, providing an innovative way for investors to engage in alternative investments using blockchain technology. Captur primarily serves individual investors and entities interested in renewable energy investments. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Pelotas, Brazil.

name: Karma
cb_description: Karma is a company focused on enhancing DAO governance through data-driven tools. It offers a suite of services that track and analyze governance contributions, provide visibility into delegate and contributor activities, and automate operations to increase engagement and accountability. These tools are primarily utilized by the decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) sector. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Medford, Massachusetts.

name: Boomitra
cb_description: Boomitra operates in the environmental sector, focusing on carbon removal through agricultural soils. The company offers a soil carbon marketplace that leverages AI and remote sensing technology to measure, report, and verify soil carbon credits, facilitating global climate action. Boomitra supports farmers and ranchers in increasing soil carbon and crop yields, providing them with additional income through the sale of carbon credits. Boomitra was formerly known as ConserWater Technologies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: MachineMetrics
cb_description: MachineMetrics is a company that focuses on industrial IoT solutions for the manufacturing sector. The company offers a platform that provides production monitoring and analytics, enabling manufacturers to optimize machine operation and increase productivity. Its services include real-time data collection, condition monitoring, predictive maintenance, and process optimization. The company primarily serves sectors such as aerospace and defense, automotive, heavy machinery, medical devices, and oil and gas. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Northampton, Massachusetts.

name: Twentyeight Health
cb_description: Twentyeight Health serves as a women's health platform specializing in reproductive and sexual healthcare services. The company offers online prescriptions and delivery for birth control, STI prevention, menstrual care products, and other related health services. Twentyeight Health primarily serves the healthcare sector, focusing on accessible care for underserved communities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: CrowdHealth
cb_description: CrowdHealth is a company that focuses on providing healthcare services in the health sector. The company offers a range of services including medical bill negotiation, member crowdfunding for healthcare costs, care advocacy, unlimited access to licensed therapists and virtual primary care, and discounted prescriptions. CrowdHealth primarily serves individuals and families seeking an alternative to traditional health insurance. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: AZA Finance
cb_description: AZA Finance specializes in cross-border payment solutions and foreign exchange services for the B2B sector. The company offers a robust online payment platform that facilitates multi-currency transactions, treasury management, and payment collections, designed to support businesses operating in Africa. AZA Finance primarily serves enterprises requiring financial services across multiple African and global markets. AZA Finance was formerly known as BitPesa. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, Luxembourg.

name: Cohere
cb_description: Cohere sees electric Vehicles (EV) not as a goal, but as a beginning. Due to large energy storage capacity, Cohere believes that EV is a crucial link and accelerator of the large scale adoption of (locally produced) sustainable energy. Cohere's core business consists of two pillars: A full-service provider for charging EV's at home, offices, car parks and campuses care-free; including charging stations, installation, solar and charging station accessories. As well as product development and the marketing  sales of the Smart Charger, which fits in a user's electrical cabinet and dynamically manages the charging power of one or more charging stations for EV on the basis of available grid capacity, electricity price or produced solar energy. This way EV are charged faster, cheaper and on sustainable energy.

name: Loyal Guru
cb_description: Loyal Guru is a company that specializes in customer loyalty and offer personalization for the retail sector. Their platform provides tools for loyalty management, including points, discounts, tiers, rewards, and gamification, as well as capabilities for offer personalization through segmentation, coupons, and automated campaigns. They also offer retail analytics and customer data management to help businesses optimize their revenue and understand their customers better. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: LanzaJet
cb_description: LanzaJet operates as a fuel technology company focused on decarbonizing the aviation industry through its production of sustainable aviation fuel and renewable diesel. The company's main offerings include the conversion of low-carbon ethanol into SAF using its Alcohol-to-Jet (ATJ) technology. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Deerfield, Illinois.

name: Eruditus Executive Education
cb_description: Eruditus Executive Education specializes in providing accessible executive education programs in collaboration with global universities. The company offers a portfolio of high-impact programs for working professionals, focusing on preparing individuals for C-suite roles through various executive courses. The programs are designed to equip senior executives with the skills and knowledge required for leadership positions across various industries. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Singapore.

name: ForwardX Robotics
cb_description: ForwardX Robotics specializes in vision-based autonomous mobile robots (AMRs) within the warehousing and manufacturing automation sectors. The company offers a suite of products and solutions designed to enhance material handling, including robotic picking systems, autonomous forklifts, and advanced fleet management software. ForwardX Robotics primarily serves industries such as third-party logistics (3PL), eCommerce, retail, healthcare, grocery, home furnishing, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: Leap
cb_description: Leap uses artificial intelligence technology to give candidates and companies an online career platform which provides useful resources throughout the recruitment cycle. For candidates, Leap provides a free job application resource. An interactive profile can be used to demonstrate skills, personality and experience. Candidates can view detailed information and media about companies in the region  including "behind the scenes" videos  and have access to career resources including coaching and informative articles. The scoring system matches a candidate's suitability for each role.

name: BigRentz
cb_description: BigRentz is a full-service online equipment rental network operating in the construction industry. The company offers a wide range of heavy equipment for rent, including aerial work platforms, material handling equipment, earthmoving equipment, and compaction equipment, as well as jobsite services such as portable toilets, storage, and fencing. BigRentz primarily serves sectors such as agriculture, electrical contracting, engineering, facilities maintenance, general contracting, government, HVAC, IT services, media and entertainment, plumbing, retail construction, roofing and wall covering, telecommunications, and warehousing. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: XTEND
cb_description: XTEND focuses on the development of autonomous machine systems. The company's main offering includes an operating system that facilitates advanced human and machine collaboration, enabling operators to perform accurate maneuvers and actions in various environments with minimal training. It primarily serves the defense, public safety, and security sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Vienna, Virginia.

name: Gemini Sports Analytics
cb_description: Gemini Sports Analytics specializes in artificial intelligence solutions for the sports industry. The company offers a platform that enhances decision-making in areas such as roster management, tactics, and player performance through system integration, streamlined data processes, and self-service model creation. Its services cater to sports organizations looking to leverage data for strategic insights. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: GentiBio
cb_description: GentiBio operates as a biotherapeutics company in healthcare and life sciences. The company focuses on the development of engineered regulatory T cells that are designed to treat a range of diseases including autoimmune, alloimmune, autoinflammatory, and allergic diseases. Its services primarily cater to the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Skynet Labs
cb_description: Skynet Labs ceased operations in August 2022. Skynet Labs provides oil and gas companies with information technology and software to increase the efficiency of drilling and workover operations.

name: Deliverect
cb_description: Deliverect operates in food service and technology. The company provides a platform that integrates online orders from various food delivery channels. Its main services include menu management, order management, analytics, and operational notifications. It primarily serves the food service industry, including restaurants, ghost kitchens, and franchises. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Ghent, Belgium.

name: Niricson
cb_description: Niricson specializes in digital infrastructure condition assessment and risk management within the civil engineering sector. The company offers an AI-backed platform, AUTOSPEX, for defect detection, quantification, and tracking, as well as a proprietary drone technology for data collection on infrastructure assets. Niricson primarily serves asset owners and civil engineers in sectors such as dams, bridges, and airfields. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Victoria, British Columbia.

name: Polar Signals
cb_description: Polar Signals focuses on profiling applications and infrastructure. The company's main service is a zero-instrumentation product that aids in performance improvement, incident understanding, and infrastructure cost reduction. The company primarily serves the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Claymont, Delaware.

name: PUMP
cb_description: PUMP focuses on enhancing urban mobility and building convenient daily life through sustainable transportation solutions. The company offers a user-centric life mobility system aimed at increasing everyday satisfaction by prioritizing safety, promoting clean city initiatives, and simplifying daily routines. PUMP primarily serves the urban mobility and smart city sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Convex
cb_description: Convex develops olorful and family-friendly adventure games.

name: Angle Health
cb_description: Angle Health is a healthcare technology company specializing in providing tech-enabled health insurance plans to modern employers and their employees. The company offers a range of fully-insured group medical plans that are ACA-compliant and feature access to a broad network of physicians and hospitals through PPO plans. Angle Health's digital platform facilitates a streamlined enrollment process and offers 24/7 access to telemedicine services and personalized member support. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: PayZen
cb_description: PayZen is a financial technology company. The company offers a platform that simplifies patient payments and provider collections, providing custom payment plans and AI-driven financial assistance to make healthcare more accessible. Primarily, PayZen's services are utilized by hospitals, health systems, and physician groups. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: UserIQ
cb_description: UserIQ is a customer success platform that specializes in SaaS customer lifecycle management. The company provides tools for health insights, predictive analytics, and user engagement to help businesses improve customer retention and drive growth. UserIQ's platform is designed to simplify account management and provide actionable insights through visual data reporting and customer health score dashboards. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Coterie
cb_description: Coterie specializes in high-performing, sustainable baby care products within the baby care industry. The company offers a range of products including absorbent diapers, soft baby pants, and plant-based wipes, all designed to be hypoallergenic, free of harmful chemicals, and made with sustainably sourced materials. Coterie's products are primarily targeted at parents looking for premium, eco-friendly diapering solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bunker Protect
cb_description: Bunker Protect is a company focused on providing business insurance solutions across various sectors. The company offers a range of insurance products including general liability, professional liability, commercial property, and workers' compensation, designed to meet the needs of small businesses and professionals. Bunker Protect caters to a diverse clientele, including contractors, IT professionals, healthcare providers, and real estate companies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Rafay Systems
cb_description: Rafay Systems provides cloud environment service. The company offers automated lifecycle management for containerized applications. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Phylos
cb_description: Phylos was a Healthcare/Biotechnology company based in Lexington, Massachusetts.  Phylos was acquired in 2003.

name: Levity
cb_description: Levity focuses on providing no-code artificial intelligence (AI) workflow automation solutions in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to automate manual tasks using AI, without the need for coding. This includes extracting essential information from text data, categorizing text data, generating text, and summarizing lengthy documents. The company primarily serves sectors that require automation of repetitive tasks, such as customer support and email management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Entropica Labs
cb_description: Entropica Labs develops software for fault-tolerant quantum computing within the quantum computing industry. It offers a platform for designing, analyzing, and transforming quantum programs into executable, fault-tolerant circuits suitable for quantum hardware. It primarily serves sectors that require advanced quantum computing strategies and error correction capabilities. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: Bolt
cb_description: Bolt was a Internet/Internet Software & Services company based in New York, New York.  Bolt was acquired in 2004.

name: Mush Foods
cb_description: Mush Foods focuses on the food technology sector, specifically in the cultivation and production of mushroom mycelium. The company uses innovative technology to grow mushroom mycelium, which is then used as a sustainable, nutritious, and tasty ingredient for food companies, retail, and food services. It primarily serves the food industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Knoma
cb_description: Knoma is a finance provider and knowledge marketplace focused on enabling access to lifelong education in various technical and digital domains. The company offers services to fund educational courses through ethical, compassionate finance, allowing students to spread the cost of their learning over time without upfront payments. Knoma partners with industry-leading schools and bootcamps to facilitate career advancement and skill development in high-demand areas. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Centerline Biomedical
cb_description: Centerline Biomedical develops technology that reduces radiation exposure to patients and caregivers and provides the surgeon with a mapping tool, making these procedures safer and more accurate. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Cleveland, Ohio.

name: Thoughtfull
cb_description: ThoughtFull operates as a social enterprise focusing on the mental health sector. The company offers a comprehensive mental well-being program for employees, providing end-to-end solutions that range from preventive to curative interventions. Its services are primarily targeted toward organizations seeking to improve employee performance, productivity, and retention through mental health support. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore.

name: Bird
cb_description: Bird operates as a customer relationship management (CRM) company focusing on marketing, sales, and payments. The company offers a platform that includes tools for marketing automation, customer data management, and payment processing, enabling personalized interactions across email, and WhatsApp. Bird's services cater to businesses looking to enhance customer engagement and efficiency in their marketing and sales efforts. Bird was formerly known as MessageBird. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Coherent
cb_description: Coherent is a company that focuses on spreadsheet management and optimization in the technology sector. The company's main service is to convert, control, and connect spreadsheets, enabling business experts and IT to collaborate and optimize spreadsheet models and logic. Coherent primarily serves sectors such as financial services, insurance, supply chain, manufacturing, and telecoms. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Hong Kong.

name: Chaser
cb_description: Chaser is a company that focuses on credit control and accounts receivable management in the financial technology sector. The company offers automation software that simplifies and streamlines the process of managing unpaid invoices, tracking debtors, conducting credit checks, and collecting outstanding payments. Chaser primarily serves small and medium-sized businesses, helping them to improve their cash flow and reduce the time spent on manual tasks. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Upsolver
