cb_description: Upsolver provides a cloud-native data movement solution. It offers ingesting batch and streaming data from production environments to analytics users, ensuring data quality and observability without compromising on data freshness or scale. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Playtomic
cb_description: Playtomic provides a sports booking platform specializing in racket sports with a focus on community building and court reservations. It offers a system for players to find and book courts, organize matches, and connect with other players based on skill level. It serves the racket sports community, providing a platform for players, clubs, and professionals to engage their playing experience. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Ingresse
cb_description: Ingresse operates as a ticketing platform for events and entertainment. It allows users to discover events and purchase tickets in a social way. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Click Therapeutics
cb_description: Click Therapeutics develops and commercializes software as prescription medical treatments for people with unmet medical needs. It offers prescription through mobile app and can be used independently or in conjunction with biomedical treatments. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Jolt
cb_description: Jolt is an online business school focused on transforming careers within the technology industry. The company offers programs such as Switch, a boot camp designed to help individuals land roles in technology, and provides training for the Kickstart Scheme. Jolt primarily serves individuals seeking career advancement or transition into the tech sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: PosiGen
cb_description: PosiGen focuses on residential solar energy and energy efficiency solutions within the renewable energy sector. The company offers solar leases, energy efficiency audits, and solar battery storage solutions. PosiGen primarily serves the residential sector, providing affordable and accessible solar options to homeowners. It was formerly known as Green Grants. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New Orleans, Louisiana.

name: Cylera
cb_description: Cylera operates as a company focused on internet of things (IoT) cybersecurity, specifically within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that provides asset management, risk analysis, threat detection, and other cybersecurity solutions for IoT devices in healthcare institutions. Its services primarily cater to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Tive
cb_description: Tive is a global leader in providing real-time supply chain visibility solutions. The company offers products and services that enable the tracking of shipment location and condition, utilizing sensor technology and a cloud-based platform to deliver actionable insights. Tive primarily serves sectors such as food & beverage, high-value goods, life sciences, and transportation & logistics. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Interius BioTherapeutics
cb_description: Interius BioTherapeutics is a preclinical-stage gene therapy company developing novel methods for in vivo cell-specific gene delivery. The company develops next-generation delivery technology to engineer cells inside the human body, with a particular emphasis on treating hematologic malignancies by generating chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cells directly in vivo. Interius BioTherapeutics was founded in 2019 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: BigPanda
cb_description: BigPanda provides an incident intelligence and autonomous platform for information technology (IT) network operations centers and development operation teams. It helps to detect, investigate, and resolve IT incidents and offers alert intelligence solutions, incident intelligence solutions, workflow automation solutions, and more. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Belong
cb_description: Belong is a company specializing in predictive outbound hiring within the talent acquisition sector. Their main service is a data-driven solution that identifies candidates who best match a company's requirements and are most likely to be open to new opportunities, facilitating engagement through personalized interactions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: imgIX
cb_description: imgIX is a visual media platform operating in the technology sector. The company offers image and video processing, global content delivery, and intelligent asset management services. These services are primarily utilized by businesses in various sectors, including ecommerce, news and media, and social sharing. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: testRigor
cb_description: testRigor is an AI-based company specializing in codeless test automation within the software testing industry. The company offers a platform that enables manual testers to create, execute, and maintain tests using plain English, which simplifies the testing process for web, mobile, and desktop applications, as well as ERP systems like Salesforce and SAP. Its solution is designed to increase test coverage and efficiency while significantly reducing the time spent on test maintenance. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: vidIQ
cb_description: vidIQ is a technology company that operates in the digital content creation industry, with a specific focus on YouTube. The company provides a suite of tools and services designed to help YouTube creators grow their audience, including features for keyword generation, competitor analysis, channel auditing, and content generation. These offerings primarily cater to the digital content creation industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Chunk Foods
cb_description: Chunk Foods specializes in the creation of plant-based meat alternatives within the food industry. Their products mimic traditional meat cuts, offering a succulent and tender experience, designed to be versatile in cooking and suitable for a variety of recipes. The company focuses on delivering high-protein, non-GMO, and cholesterol-free food options that are environmentally friendly. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Captura
cb_description: Captura was a Software (non-internet/mobile) company based in Kirkland, Washington.  Captura was acquired in 2002.

name: LatchBio
cb_description: LatchBio is a technology company focused on the biotechnology sector. It offers a data platform that allows biotech companies to store, organize, transform, and analyze their data, with a particular emphasis on biological R&D. The company primarily serves the biotech industry. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Gorilla
cb_description: Gorilla specializes in energy data applications, focusing on pricing, forecasting, and portfolio analysis within the energy sector. The company offers solutions that enable energy suppliers to create innovative pricing strategies, conduct accurate forecasting, and perform in-depth portfolio analysis. Gorilla primarily serves the energy retail industry, providing tools to enhance financial management and operational efficiency. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Antwerpen, Belgium.

name: Arrive Logistics
cb_description: Arrive Logistics is a company that focuses on multimodal transportation and technology within the freight brokerage industry. The company offers strategic solutions for shippers and carriers, including optimizing operations, identifying efficiencies, and providing innovative technology to streamline the shipping process. Primarily, Arrive Logistics serves the transportation and logistics industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Compado
cb_description: Compado is a business-to-business (B2B) technology platform focusing on contextual advertising and content monetization within the advertising industry. The company offers a platform that enables consumer brands to place contextually relevant advertisements and allows publishers to monetize their content through targeted brand recommendations, all while prioritizing user privacy and avoiding third-party cookies or fingerprinting. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Mootral
cb_description: Mootral focuses on sustainable animal agriculture and addressing climate change and antimicrobial resistance. The company offers natural feed supplements that reduce methane emissions from cattle and support gut health in various livestock, to improve animal health and productivity. Mootral primarily serves the dairy and beef farming sectors, as well as monogastric producers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Novakid
cb_description: Novakid is an online English school specializing in language education for children aged 4 to 12. The company offers one-to-one and group lessons with certified teachers, employing a full language immersion approach and interactive activities to facilitate English learning. Novakid's curriculum is aligned with the European Standards CEFR, ensuring a structured and effective learning experience. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Triomics
cb_description: Triomics focuses on enhancing cancer care and oncology research. The company offers solutions to help in trial enrollment, improve quality of care, and help in healthcare operations by using artificial intelligence to interpret health records and medical terminology. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, particularly oncology care providers. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: BandLab
cb_description: BandLab offers an all-in-one cloud-based social platform that simplifies the process of making music. It allows a community of musicians and fans works to create and collaborate on music, which can be shared across the global community. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore.

name: Capitolis
cb_description: Capitolis operates as a financial technology company. It offers capital marketplace solutions providing access to capital and portfolio optimization solutions. It allows market participants to reduce meaningful positions with banks and counterparties in their trading portfolios. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Synapse Medicine
cb_description: Synapse Medicine is a company focused on clinical decision support in the healthcare industry. The company offers a platform and user interface components that provide up-to-date drug data, medication suggestions, dosage checks, and analysis of drug-drug interactions, among other features, to assist in prescribing, dispensing, and managing medications. Synapse Medicine primarily serves the healthcare sector, including hospitals and digital health companies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bordeaux, France.

name: Optalitix
cb_description: Optalitix is a finance software provider that specializes in no-code, scalable, cloud-based products for the insurance, banking, and healthcare industries. The company offers solutions that convert existing models into API-enabled systems, facilitating pricing, underwriting, risk management, and credit decision processes. Optalitix primarily serves sectors such as the insurance industry, banking and finance sector, and healthcare domain. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: bitFlyer
cb_description: bitFlyer provides a cryptocurrency exchange platform. It allows buying, selling, spot trading, margin trading, and futures trading of cryptocurrency assets. It also offers to make online donations through cryptocurrencies, credit cards, and more. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Tokyo, Japan. In May 2023, bitFlyer was acquired by D&I Investment.

name: 8i
cb_description: 8i operates as a company specializing in hologram technology, within the technology industry. The company provides an end-to-end solution for capturing, transforming, and streaming real human holograms, which can be experienced through various devices, browsers, and virtual reality and augmented reality (VR/AR) headsets. It serves sectors such as technology, media, retail, manufacturing, and government. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: AlgoDriven
cb_description: AlgoDriven is a company specializing in automotive data intelligence and offers a suite of software solutions for vehicle appraisal and valuation. Their main products include tools for car dealerships, banks, and insurance companies to appraise, inspect, and evaluate vehicles efficiently using real-time data. AlgoDriven's software supports multi-user operations, integrates with existing technologies for an omni-channel experience, and provides comprehensive vehicle specification data, market value analytics, and future residual value forecasts. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Goals.com
cb_description: Goals.com focuses on enhancing sales performance through a comprehensive CRM platform. The company offers a suite of tools for goal setting, tracking, lead management, and customer data organization, designed to align sales teams and improve their productivity. Goals.com primarily serves the sales sector, providing solutions to streamline sales processes and communication. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Habyt
cb_description: Habyt is a company specializing in housing solutions within the real estate sector. It offers a range of private and shared apartments that cater to various accommodation needs. The company primarily serves individuals looking for modern, furnished living spaces with flexible rental terms. Habyt was formerly known as Projects Co-Living. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Remarkable
cb_description: Remarkable specializes in digital paper technology, offering devices that simulate the experience of writing on paper within the consumer electronics sector. The company provides digital notebooks that aim to replace traditional paper notes and printed documents with a paper-like writing and reading experience. These devices also offer features such as handwriting conversion to typed text, organization tools, and sync capabilities with apps for mobile and desktop. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: Wren Therapeutics
cb_description: Wren Therapeutics, now known as WaveBreak, is a biopharmaceutical company focused on transforming drug discovery for neurodegenerative diseases. The company has developed a drug discovery platform targeting transient protein intermediates in amyloid disease pathways with small-molecule therapeutics. WaveBreak's initial focus is on addressing Alzheimer's and Parkinson's diseases, which represent significant unmet medical needs. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, England.

name: Keeper
cb_description: Keeper is a company that operates in the mobile application industry, with a focus on social interaction and matchmaking. The company's main service is an application where friends can play matchmaker for singles by creating their profiles and swiping for them, bringing the fun of matchmaking to the mobile platform. It is based in Israel.

name: ARTA
cb_description: ARTA is a real estate company with a focus on property brokerage. The company offers services in residential and commercial property sales and rentals. It primarily serves the real estate industry. It is based in United Arab Emirates.

name: Finova Capital
cb_description: Finova Capital operates as a non-banking financial company (NBFC). It is a Reserve Bank of India (RBI)-registered non-banking financial company (NBFC) providing business loans to financially excluded micro and small enterprises. The company specializes in lending to small-time manufacturers, handymen, and service providers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Jaipur, India.

name: Essential AI
cb_description: Essential AI focuses on artificial intelligence in the enterprise sector. The company develops AI products designed to increase productivity by automating time-consuming and repetitive workflows, such as data analysis and supply chain management. The primary customers of Essential AI are businesses seeking to enhance their operations through AI technology. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Beyond
cb_description: Beyond is a creative digital agency specializing in augmented reality, virtual fashion, and virtual worlds. It helps brands connect with their audience through Snapchat, Instagram, and TikTok. The company is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Lysto
cb_description: Lysto builds tools to standardize and showcase gamer credentials and reputation across games and platforms. It develops software tools for on-chain verification, providing tools for gamers to verify their credentials on a blockchain. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Wescover
cb_description: Wescover is a platform focused on the art and decor industry. The company offers a marketplace for unique, mindfully made items, including furniture, lighting, art, and decor, sourced directly from independent creators. Wescover primarily serves the interior design industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Coalition
cb_description: Coalition operates in the cyber insurance and cybersecurity sectors. The company offers comprehensive insurance coverage and cybersecurity tools designed to help businesses manage and mitigate digital risks. Coalition primarily serves businesses worldwide that are seeking resilience against cyber attacks. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: MyForest Foods
cb_description: MyForest Foods specializes in plant-based meat alternatives using farm-grown mycelium as its core ingredient. The company offers products like MyBacon, a meatless bacon alternative made from mycelium, brined and prepared to mimic traditional bacon in flavor and texture. MyForest Foods primarily caters to the alternative protein sector, providing options for vegans, vegetarians, and those seeking meat substitutes. MyForest Foods was formerly known as Atlast Foods. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Albany, New York.

name: Scispot
cb_description: Scispot specializes in providing an operating system for the biotech sector. Their main offerings include an all-in-one platform for lab documentation, project management, inventory tracking, and data analytics, designed to streamline R&D processes and enhance data integrity for AI applications. Additionally, Scispot offers tools for GxP compliance, data integration, and preparation for machine learning, catering to the needs of modern biotechnology companies. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Kitchener, Canada.

name: Equilibrium Energy
cb_description: Equilibrium Energy is a power company focused on sustainable energy and technology innovation in the energy sector. They offer solutions that combine deep energy expertise with Artificial intelligence-centric technology to provide cleaner power options. The company primarily serves sectors that are looking to integrate sustainable and innovative energy solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Eterneva
cb_description: Eterneva specializes in creating personalized memorial diamonds from the ashes of loved ones and pets. Their service transforms ashes or hair into custom diamonds, offering a unique way to remember and celebrate the life of someone special. The company caters to individuals seeking a meaningful connection to their departed loved ones or pets through a tangible and lasting tribute. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: INCRMNTAL
cb_description: INCRMNTAL is a company focused on marketing measurement in the advertising industry. The company offers an AI-powered platform that allows advertisers to measure the incremental value of their marketing activities, both online and offline, without the need for user-level data or pausing campaigns. The platform is primarily used by marketers in various industries including gaming, fintech, travel, lifestyle, eCommerce, and retail. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Nexl
cb_description: Nexl is a provider of legal technology solutions, focusing on collaboration and relationship management for law firms. The company offers a suite of tools that includes customer relationship management (CRM), enterprise relationship management (ERM), email marketing systems (EMS), and collaborative workspaces. These solutions are designed to enhance client engagement, streamline event management, and improve business development processes within legal practices. It was founded in 2018 and is based in North Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Apron
cb_description: Apron is a provider of ground and cargo handling services.

name: UtilizeCore
cb_description: UtilizeCore is a software platform focused on automating the management of subcontracted services within various industries. The company offers a suite of products designed to streamline operations, manage tasks, ensure compliance, process invoices, and facilitate client communications, all aimed at enhancing the delivery of quality services. UtilizeCore primarily serves sectors that manage national networks of subcontractors, vendors, and service providers across industries such as snow removal, maintenance, landscaping, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: StreamNative
cb_description: StreamNative is a company that focuses on cloud-native data streaming technology in the tech industry. The company offers services such as event-driven architecture, data pipelines, message queues, and geo-replication, all aimed at delivering a mature cloud-native data-streaming platform. StreamNative primarily sells to sectors that require real-time data processing and event-driven applications, such as the ecommerce industry and cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: VoltaIQ
cb_description: VoltaIQ provides battery quality analytics for cell manufacturers in sectors like electric vehicles, consumer electronics, and energy storage. The company has a platform that analyzes battery manufacturing data to identify defects and determine root causes, aiming to decrease ramp-up time and scrap rates. Voltaiq serves the battery production industry, including validation labs and gigafactories. VoltaIQ was formerly known as Subway Labs, Inc.. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Arine
cb_description: Arine is a company focused on improving health outcomes through medication optimization in the healthcare sector. The company offers a comprehensive medication management platform that leverages AI, clinical expertise, and advanced data analytics to deliver proactive care interventions at the population level. Arine primarily sells to the healthcare industry, including health plans and at-risk provider organizations. Arine was formerly known as Akeso. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Carbyon
cb_description: Carbyon is a company focused on tackling climate change, operating in the environmental technology sector. The company's main service involves the direct air capture of CO2, using a unique machine design and breakthrough technology to clean up the atmosphere. Carbyon primarily sells to sectors of the economy that are focused on climate action and carbon dioxide removal. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Eindhoven, Netherlands.

name: MeMed
cb_description: MeMed is a medical technology company focused on diagnostic solutions within the healthcare sector. The company specializes in machine learning-based diagnostics that differentiate between bacterial and viral infections, and provide actionable insights for managing acute infections. MeMed's primary offerings include a host immune response assay that delivers results in 15 minutes and a compact immunoassay platform for sensitive protein measurements. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Tirat Carmel, Israel.

name: ScreenPoint Medical
cb_description: ScreenPoint Medical specializes in the development of advanced image analysis and machine learning applications for the healthcare sector, with a focus on enhancing breast cancer detection. Their flagship product, Transpara, is an AI-driven software designed to assist radiologists in interpreting mammograms more efficiently and with greater confidence, by providing workflow optimization and image-based risk assessments. Transpara is utilized by healthcare professionals within the medical imaging and radiology fields to improve early detection of breast cancer. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Nijmegen, Netherlands.

name: Pylon
cb_description: Pylon develops a customer operations platform designed to help scale a new way of operating which includes workflow automation. It offers solutions such as broadcasting product updates, upcoming events, and more at once and gets live link click reaction, and reply data, enabling clients to get services. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: ThreatLocker
cb_description: ThreatLocker provides onsite and cloud-based security solutions. It protects from unauthorized software including malware, viruses, other security threats, and other solutions. Its products include Ringfencing, Allowlisting, storage control, elevation control, network control, ThreatLocker Ops, and more. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Orlando, Florida.

name: DroneDeploy
cb_description: DroneDeploy specializes in reality capture software, focusing on drone mapping and photo documentation across various industries. The company provides a platform that enables commercial drones and ground robots to capture and organize photos, generate maps, and produce inspection reports, all integrated with AI for data analysis. DroneDeploy serves sectors such as construction, agriculture, and energy, offering solutions tailored to automate inspections and improve operational efficiency. DroneDeploy was formerly known as Infatics. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Unqork
cb_description: Unqork is a company focused on providing a codeless application development platform for the enterprise sector. Their main offerings include a visual designer for creating complex, mission-critical enterprise applications without the need for traditional coding. The company primarily serves sectors such as financial services, insurance, government, and healthcare. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Volato
cb_description: Volato operates private jets. It operates in the luxury travel industry. The company offers services such as fractional jet ownership, private jet chartering, and aircraft management. Its primary customers are individuals and businesses seeking private jet travel solutions. Volato was formerly known as Aerago. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Cloudline
cb_description: Cloudline focuses on autonomous aviation in the transportation industry. The company's main service involves using autonomous airships to deliver goods and services, utilizing battery and solar-powered propulsion for carbon emission-free flight operations. The company primarily serves the logistics and delivery industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Praso
cb_description: Praso is a wholesale distribution company that focuses on bridging the gap between manufacturers and retailers in various sectors. The company offers a wide range of products including food items, beverages, cleaning supplies, and packaging materials, catering to the needs of businesses without requiring a minimum order and providing free shipping for businesses with CNPJ (Brazilian National Registry of Legal Entities). It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Bench.
cb_description: Bench. is a British sweater brand designed to highlight the culture of Manchester skateboarding in the 1990s.

name: Ebb Carbon
cb_description: Ebb Carbon focuses on ocean-based carbon dioxide removal within the climate change mitigation sector. The company offers a solution that accelerates the natural ocean alkalization process through electrochemistry, enabling atmospheric carbon to be removed and safely stored as bicarbonate in the ocean, while also reducing seawater acidity. Ebb Carbon's technology aims to remove gigatons of CO2 annually. Ebb Carbon was formerly known as Ebb Environmental Solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: AVO
cb_description: AVO specializes in providing data roaming solutions through its eSIM technology for the telecommunications industry. The company offers affordable international data plans that enable travelers to stay connected globally without incurring high roaming costs. AVO primarily caters to the travel and tourism sector, offering seamless coverage in over 200 countries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chisinau, Moldova, Republic of.

name: Cardurion
cb_description: Cardurion engages in therapeutics discovery and development services for the healthcare sector, specifically for cardiovascular diseases. It offers clinical programs that aim to transform the treatment of cardiovascular diseases and heart failure through the inhibition of PDE9 and CaMKII. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly the cardiovascular health sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Burlington, Massachusetts.

name: Factris
cb_description: Factris is a financial services provider specializing in invoice factoring and cash flow solutions for businesses. The company offers services that convert outstanding invoices into immediate working capital and provides additional services such as debtor management and credit insurance to protect against non-payment risks. Factris primarily serves small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), self-employed individuals, and specific sectors such as transport and employment agencies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Zephyr AI
cb_description: Zephyr AI focuses on data to precision medicine within the healthcare sector. The company develops proprietary algorithms to extract insights from clinicogenomics data, patient outcomes in oncology and cardiometabolic diseases. Zephyr AI's platform serves the pharmaceutical industry, healthcare payers, and providers by enhancing personalized care and supporting clinical decision-making. It was founded in 2020 and is based in McLean, Virginia.

name: Printify
cb_description: Printify provides custom printing services for electronic-commerce stores. It allows users to create and sell custom products such as t-shirts, hoodies, mugs, phone cases, and more. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: BookClub
cb_description: BookClub is a technology company focused on professional development and learning in the business sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies and scales professional development using books, partnering with publishers and authors to create team-based micro-learning experiences. These experiences allow meaningful ideas from books to be spread and applied within organizations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Alpine, Utah.

name: Merge
cb_description: Merge specializes in fintech infrastructure, focusing on the integration of compliance, banking, and payments for digital platforms within the financial sector. The company offers a platform that facilitates global real-time payments, multi-currency accounts, and intelligent reconciliation services, designed to streamline financial operations for businesses. Merge primarily serves digital marketplace platforms with its financial services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Fold Health
cb_description: Fold Health is a technology company focused on modernizing primary care through outcome-based solutions. The company offers a platform that enhances the efficiency of care teams by automating administrative tasks, optimizing care coordination, and improving patient engagement and outcomes. Fold Health primarily serves healthcare organizations seeking to improve their clinical and financial performance. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Michroma
cb_description: Michroma is a biotech company focused on producing natural ingredients using synthetic biology. The company specializes in creating stable and vibrant colors, natural flavors, and fragrances through the utilization of filamentous fungi, offering a sustainable and scalable alternative to traditional ingredient production methods. Michroma's products cater to the food and beverage industry, as well as the cosmetics sector, providing high-performance natural ingredients. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: doctorly
cb_description: Doctorly is a company focused on digital healthcare technology, providing a cloud-based software solution for medical practice management. Their main offerings include a practice management system that allows for efficient digital management of patient records, scheduling, and billing, with a user-friendly interface designed for medical professionals. Doctorly's software is tailored to the needs of healthcare providers, enabling them to access and manage patient data in real-time from any device. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Arc
cb_description: Arc specializes in the manufacturing and selling of electric boats. The company's main offerings include electric boats designed for watersports. It facilitates Arc One, its electric boat on the water. It primarily targets the watersports and watercraft industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Inglewood, California.

name: Alice
cb_description: Alice is an online Israeli flight search engine. It allows searches for flights to up to four destinations at once, and over a date range, allowing the user to find the best price within that range, including in business and first class.

name: NalaGenetics
cb_description: Nalagenetics specializes in deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA)-based precision healthcare, focusing on genetic testing and analysis within the health and wellness industry. The company offers a range of non-invasive genetic tests that provide personalized insights into nutrition, lifestyle, medication compatibility, and disease risk. It primarily serves healthcare providers, laboratories, insurers, and corporate clients in the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore.

name: MatrixSpace
cb_description: MatrixSpace provides AI (artificial intelligence) sensing solutions. It uses edge-based sensing to sense and detect objects, motion, and direction. The company serves clients in the radio frequency (RF), radar, artificial intelligence, and autonomy sectors. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Burlington, Massachusetts.

name: SuperMom
cb_description: SuperMom operates as a women and family-focused digital platform in the social networking and e-commerce sectors. The platform offers exchange of shopping and parenting recommendations, as well as the distribution of freebies, and allows women to earn rewards. SuperMom primarily serves the e-commerce industry and the social networking community for parents. SuperMom was formerly known as Rise and Shine. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore.

name: Stemson Therapeutics
cb_description: Stemson Therapeutics is a company focused on the healthcare and biotechnology sector, specifically addressing hair loss. The company's main service is the development of a cell therapy that generates new hair follicles, offering a potential cure for hair loss rather than just treating the symptoms. This innovative solution primarily targets individuals suffering from hair loss. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: V2food
cb_description: V2food is a company focused on creating plant-based meat alternatives within the food industry. Their products are designed to replicate the flavors and textures of traditional meat, offering a sustainable and healthy option for consumers looking to incorporate plant-based protein into their diets. The company primarily caters to individuals seeking vegan and vegetarian-friendly food options. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Agora
cb_description: Agora is a company focused on concept development within the real estate sector. It specializes in creating side businesses and brands that complement property management operations and enhance customer satisfaction. Agora's offerings include conference facilities, one-stop shopping areas for tradespeople, flexible office hotel solutions, and parking management services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Fuse Energy
cb_description: Fuse Energy is a company specializing in commercial and municipal energy procurement and management within the energy sector. The company offers services such as electricity and natural gas supply, energy consulting and account management, community solar programs, and assistance with energy efficiency incentive programs. Fuse Energy primarily serves commercial and municipal entities looking to manage their energy spend effectively. Fuse Energy was formerly known as paddington power limited. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Groton, Massachusetts.

name: Included
cb_description: Included specializes in human resource analytics and decision-making tools within the human resources technology sector. The company offers a platform that provides artificial intelligence-driven insights and automated reporting to streamline HR data analysis and enhance talent management strategies. It primarily serves the human resources industry, offering solutions to improve diversity recruiting, attrition risk assessment, and employee engagement analysis. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: DatologyAI
cb_description: DatologyAI specializes in automated data curation for the artificial intelligence sector, focusing on optimizing the data used to train machine learning models. The company offers tools that automatically select and curate data, essential for training efficient and effective deep learning models without the need for manual labeling. Its tools are designed to be modality-agnostic, capable of handling various data types such as text, images, and video, and scalable to support large datasets. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Blackpanda
cb_description: Blackpanda is a cyber security firm that operates in the technology and security sectors. The company offers a range of services including incident response, digital forensics, compromise assessments, and loss adjusting. These services are primarily targeted towards businesses in the Asia Pacific region, including small and medium-sized enterprises. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore.

name: Oula Health
cb_description: Oula Health is a maternity center that specializes in combining obstetrics and midwifery care to provide an evidence-based and personalized pregnancy experience. The company offers full-service pregnancy care, including prenatal appointments, birth education, virtual coaching, and postpartum support, with a focus on patient-centered services and accessibility. It primarily serves the maternity care sector, providing services to expectant mothers and families. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: MedScout
cb_description: MedScout specializes in transforming healthcare claims data into actionable insights for MedTech commercial teams. The company offers a platform that enables sales representatives, sales management, and marketing teams to focus and streamline their sales cycles by utilizing the latest medical data. MedScout's services include market analysis, strategy development, and sales execution tools that integrate with existing CRM systems and provide insights on providers, patient journeys, and referral patterns. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Leander, Texas.

name: Atomwise
cb_description: Atomwise develops machine learning-based discovery engines and uses artificial intelligence (AI)--based neural networks to help discover new medicines. It predicts drug candidates for pharmaceutical companies, start-ups, and research institutions and designs drugs using computational drug design. It was formerly known as Chematria. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Flutterwave
cb_description: Flutterwave operates as a financial technology company. It provides a variety of payment solutions, including online payment acceptance, cross-border payouts and transfers, currency swapping, and point-of-sale (POS) systems. It primarily serves businesses, individuals, and startups, particularly in emerging markets. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Curacity
cb_description: Curacity is a technology company operating in the travel and hospitality industry. The company's main service involves transforming editorial content into direct bookings for hotels, providing a unique approach to guest acquisition. It primarily serves the hotel industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Neurophet
cb_description: Neurophet specializes in the development of solutions for brain diseases, operating in the healthcare and artificial intelligence sectors. The company offers a range of software products that assist in the diagnosis and treatment of brain diseases, including tools for brain MRI imaging analysis, PET scan analysis, and brain stimulation simulation. These products are designed to support healthcare professionals in diagnosing and treating a variety of brain conditions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Strivacity
cb_description: Strivacity is a company focused on providing customer identity and access management solutions within the technology sector. Their main offerings include a cloud-native platform designed to facilitate secure and simple registration, sign-in, and identity management for customer-facing applications. Strivacity's platform serves various sectors that require robust customer identity management, such as ecommerce and B2B tech industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Herndon, Virginia.

name: Valeo
cb_description: Valeo is a health-focused company that specializes in at-home medical testing and wellness services. The company offers a range of services including at-home blood testing, IV therapy, food intolerance testing, and personalized health programs, all designed to enhance personal wellbeing from the comfort of the customer's home. Valeo primarily caters to individuals seeking convenient and personalized healthcare solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Morressier
cb_description: Morressier focuses on transforming scholarly communications within the academic and publishing sectors. The company offers a platform that supports the entire pre-publishing journey, including hybrid and virtual conferences, journal submissions, peer-review workflows, and AI-powered integrity checks. These services are primarily targeted towards the academic and publishing industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Bone Health Technologies
cb_description: Bone Health Technologies specializes in non-pharmaceutical solutions for improving bone health, within the medical device sector. The company's flagship product, osteoblast, is a vibration belt designed to mitigate bone density. Osteoboost inspired research to deliver mechanical stimulation to the hips and spine. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Jasper
cb_description: Jasper operates as an artificial intelligence (AI) content creation platform. The company's main services include the creation of on-brand AI-assisted content, language translation, and the generation of marketing campaigns. It is primarily used in the marketing and advertising industry Jasper was formerly known as Proof Technologies. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Primer
cb_description: Primer builds and deploys mission-ready artificial intelligence (AI) solutions meeting defense and security needs. It serves analysts, operators, and decision-makers to take out insights from proprietary datasets. It caters to U.S. government, strategic allies, and Fortune 100 companies which use it to extract timely insight and decision advantage from massive datasets. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: MindImmune Therapeutics
cb_description: MindImmune Therapeutics is a pharmaceutical company with a focus on developing first-in-class drugs in the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include novel therapeutics that target the immune system to treat diseases of the central nervous system, such as Alzheimers and Huntingtons disease, pain, and psychiatric disorders. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kingston, Rhode Island.

name: QuotaPath
cb_description: QuotaPath specializes in sales compensation and commission tracking software within the sales and revenue operations sector. The company offers solutions for building compensation plans, automating commission calculations, and ensuring accurate commission payments to drive sales revenue. QuotaPath primarily serves the sales industry, providing tools to streamline compensation processes and enhance sales team performance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: CLASSUM
cb_description: CLASSUM is a communication-centered growth platform operating in the education technology sector. The company offers a platform that facilitates active communication, engagement, and knowledge sharing within organizations, with features such as online sessions, data-driven learning, and customization options. It primarily serves the corporate learning and development sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: GetLinks
cb_description: GetLinks offers a platform that connects tech professionals with job opportunities. It provides skill development and career mobility services. The platform features an AI job board and recruitment consulting services. It primarily serves tech professionals, such as developers, designers, data scientists, and technology companies across Asia. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

name: Intrinsic
cb_description: Intrinsic is a company that operates in the artificial intelligence sector, focusing on trust and safety workflows. The company offers a platform that enables the creation of AI agents to enhance human review with automation and provides services such as detection, automated moderation, and the ability to craft personalized policies. It aims to give safety teams the tools necessary to prevent abusive behavior on their products. It primarily serves the tech industry, particularly platforms that require content moderation and workflow tooling. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Bubblehouse
cb_description: Bubblehouse is a company specializing in e-commerce loyalty solutions, focusing on enhancing customer engagement and retention. The company offers a suite of loyalty and referral programs designed to incentivize repeat purchases, increase customer lifetime value (LTV), and drive revenue growth for online stores and brands. Bubblehouse primarily serves the e-commerce industry, providing tools to reward VIP customers, encourage referrals, and offer subscription rewards and gifts with purchase. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Albany, New York.

name: Cape Privacy
cb_description: Cape Privacy is a company focused on data privacy in the technology sector. The company offers services that encrypt documents and redact sensitive data, allowing users to utilize large language models while maintaining their privacy. Their primary customers are developers and individuals who require secure data handling when using large language models. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Choice
cb_description: Choice is a way to pay that reduces and redistributes transaction fees for businesses, giving those savings to charities.

name: Slice Labs
cb_description: Slice Labs operates as a technology company in insurance. The company offers digital insurance products designed to protect small businesses, all of which are accessible via its cloud-based platform. Its products primarily cater to the small business sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bnext
cb_description: Bnext operates as a financial technology company offering a range of financial management services. The company provides an online banking platform with features such as international money transfers, virtual cards, expense tracking, and a marketplace for various financial products. Bnext also supports cryptocurrency transactions and integrates with mobile payment services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Finmatics
cb_description: Finmatics specializes in automated accounting solutions within the financial technology sector. The company offers AI-based software that streamlines accounting processes by digitizing financial documents, classifying them, and generating bookkeeping entries, all aimed at reducing time and effort for businesses and accounting firms. Finmatics primarily serves tax advisory firms and companies of various sizes, from small to large enterprises. Finmatics was formerly known as Abacus. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Exyn Technologies
cb_description: Exyn Technologies is a company focused on the development of autonomous aerial robot systems. The company's main offerings include aerial robot software enabling it to operate in GPS-denied environments and perform safe, and 3D mapping in high-risk areas. It serves the mining, government, and construction sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Imagen
cb_description: Imagen focuses on providing technology-enabled diagnostic solutions in the healthcare sector. The company offers AI-enhanced medical interpretation and FDA-cleared diagnostic software designed to improve the accuracy and efficiency of medical imaging. Imagen primarily serves the healthcare industry, equipping primary care practices with advanced diagnostic tools and support. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Opendatasoft
cb_description: Opendatasoft is a company specializing in data portal solutions within the data management and visualization sector. Their services include creating centralized data hubs, providing tools for data integration, visualization, and sharing, as well as offering AI-powered search capabilities and comprehensive data governance. They cater to various sectors such as energy, government, transport, and banking, providing tailored data solutions to meet diverse needs. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Paris, France.

name: MycoWorks
cb_description: MycoWorks is a biotechnology company focused on the development of sustainable materials using its proprietary Fine Mycelium technology in the materials science sector. The company offers a high-quality, non-animal leather alternative made from mycelium, designed to meet the needs of the luxury goods market. MycoWorks' products are primarily targeted towards industries looking for sustainable material solutions, including the automotive and fashion sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Emeryville, California.

name: BiomEdit
cb_description: BiomEdit is an innovation company that focuses on the discovery, design, and development of novel probiotics, microbiome derived bioactives, and engineered microbial medicines in the animal health sector. The company's main offerings include probiotics that have been selected for specific functions, bioactive compounds that are more cost-effective and efficient to administer to animals, and engineered microbial medicines that deliver proteins and peptides directly into the gastrointestinal system. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Fishers, Indiana.

name: Pearl
cb_description: Pearl is a company specializing in electronic drumming technology and instruments within the music industry. Their main offerings include electronic drum kits that integrate advanced sound generation technologies and realistic pad systems designed to emulate the feel and response of acoustic drums. The company primarily caters to musicians and performers seeking electronic drumming solutions. It was founded in 1946 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: Apono
cb_description: Apono specializes in cloud permission management within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a platform that automates and simplifies the granting of just-in-time and just-enough access privileges, ensuring secure and compliant cloud operations. Apono primarily serves sectors that require stringent access controls and compliance, such as finance, healthcare, and technology. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Amira Learning
cb_description: Amira Learning is a company that focuses on educational technology. The company offers an intelligent reading assistant that uses artificial intelligence and speech recognition to provide personalized tutoring to students as they practice reading. This service is primarily used in the education sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Napa, California.

name: Blooma
cb_description: Blooma specializes in providing a digital solution for commercial real estate lending, focusing on automated underwriting and portfolio management. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to help in deal origination, simplify workflows, and enhance loan monitoring. Its services are primarily utilized by commercial real estate bankers, lenders, and brokers. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Encinitas, California.

name: Kymeta
cb_description: Kymeta specializes in providing broadband satellite connectivity solutions, integrating with cellular networks to enable mobile global communications. The company offers innovative flat-panel satellite antennas and services for seamless connectivity across satellite and hybrid networks, designed for vehicles, vessels, aircraft, and fixed platforms. Kymeta serves various sectors including government and military, land mobility, maritime, and public safety. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Redmond, Washington.

name: AutoFi
cb_description: AutoFi is a leading provider of sales and finance technology in the automotive industry. The company offers a platform that facilitates online and showroom automotive sales and financing, streamlining the transaction process for dealers and consumers. AutoFi's solutions are primarily utilized by the automotive industry, including dealerships, OEMs, and lending institutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Centrifuge
cb_description: Centrifuge focuses on on-chain finance within the blockchain and financial services industry. The company specializes in tokenizing assets and providing a decentralized fund management system. Centrifuge's platform facilitates access to decentralized finance (DeFi) capital, offers a transparent securitization process, and enables participation in decentralized governance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands.

name: Stackshine
cb_description: Stackshine is a software development company. The company provides a SaaS Management platform designed to help companies easily track their software spend and usage. Its platform automatically detects an organization's software, shows where to save money, automates employee usage, onboarding/offboarding, and more. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California. In August 2023, Stackshine was acquired by LeaseQuery. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Oloid

The company offers products such as workflow automation, passwordless authentication, and physical access control systems designed to enhance workplace efficiency and security. Oloid primarily serves sectors such as offices, factories, warehouses, commercial real estate, and large enterprises. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Viisights
cb_description: Viisights focuses on behavioral recognition analytics in the domain of real-time video intelligence. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI) powered services to transform video streams into actionable insights, enhancing security, safety, and resource optimization. Its services are primarily used in sectors such as smart cities, enterprises, campuses, financial institutions, critical infrastructures, transportation hubs, and industrial, manufacturing, and healthcare facilities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Emissary
cb_description: Emissary focuses on logistics and e-commerce. The company offers smart fulfillment services, which include receiving and distributing stock, tracking and updating inventory, preparing orders for shipment, and shipping products from the nearest warehouse to their destination. Emissary primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Monterrey, Mexico.

name: TRES
cb_description: TRES specializes in telecommunication services within the telecommunications industry. The company offers a suite of services including the development and deployment of BTS infrastructure, network optimization, and the installation of telecom equipment. TRES primarily serves the telecommunications sector. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Kigali, Rwanda.

name: Swingvy
cb_description: Swingvy is a provider of cloud-based human resources management software, focusing on streamlining HR processes for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). The company offers a suite of tools for managing employee data, automating HR workflows, and facilitating various HR tasks such as leave management, time tracking, expense claims, payroll processing, and benefits administration. Swingvy's platform is designed to cater to the needs of SME owners, HR managers, and employees, offering a centralized system for all HR-related activities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore.

name: AllPlants
cb_description: AllPlants focuses on delivering chef-made, plant-based meals, operating within the food delivery industry. The company offers a variety of nutritionally balanced, ready-to-heat vegan meals, which are flash-frozen and delivered to customers' doors. AllPlants primarily serves individuals seeking convenient, healthy plant-based food options. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Invesdor

The company facilitates investments in renewable energy, scale-ups, and small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), offering opportunities for financial returns and sustainable growth. Invesdor connects investors with companies through equity offerings and bond investments, starting from a minimum investment threshold. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Toposens
cb_description: Toposens is the developer of a 3D ultrasound sensor that can be used for collision avoidance in autonomous vehicles and anonymous people tracking for building automation, robotics, consumer electronics, and more. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: P97
cb_description: P97 specializes in providing a cloud-based mobility services platform within the convenience retail and energy sectors. The company offers a suite of solutions that enable mobile commerce, digital marketing, and consumer engagement, including mobile payment processing and data analytics for retail environments. P97 primarily serves the convenience retail, utilities, energy companies, and automotive OEMs. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: GamerSafer

The company offers solutions to prevent online harms, fraud, and abusive behaviors, supporting platforms in regulatory compliance and decreasing misuse. GamerSafer serves various sectors within the gaming industry, including esports organizations and multiplayer gaming platforms. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Nomba
cb_description: Nomba provides a mobile application for bill payments. The company offers features such as bill payment, bill reminders, airtime purchases, and funds transfers. It accepts card and transfer payments, manages money, and helps to grow the business. It was formerly known as Kudi. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Volumez
cb_description: Volumez specializes in composable data infrastructure solutions in cloud computing. The company's main service involves transforming public and private clouds into a single, managed data infrastructure, allowing for precise control of application input/output (I/O) and optimizing resource utilization. It facilitates Kubernetes, databases,  artificial intelligence, machine learning, and more related solutions. It primarily serves the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Seven Starling
cb_description: Seven Starling is a digital platform focused on providing mental healthcare services. The company offers specialized therapy, community support, and medical evaluations for new mothers and caregivers, particularly those dealing with perinatal mood disorders such as postpartum depression and anxiety. Seven Starling was formerly known as June Motherhood. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: ThingTrax
cb_description: ThingTrax specializes in IoT SaaS solutions for the manufacturing sector, focusing on performance enhancement and operational efficiency. The company offers a suite of products that leverage Vision AI technology to provide real-time data analytics, optimize line productivity, and improve quality assurance. These solutions are designed to support continuous improvement and empower employees across various levels of the manufacturing process. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Staines-upon-Thames, England.

name: Eclypsium
cb_description: Eclypsium is a company focused on supply chain security, operating within the cybersecurity industry. Its platform offers services to build trust in enterprise devices by identifying, verifying, and fortifying software, firmware, and hardware across enterprise infrastructure. Eclypsium primarily caters to the cybersecurity industry, offering solutions for digital supply chain security, firmware protection for enterprises, and zero-trust for endpoints. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: GridRival
cb_description: GridRival provides an interactive platform for motorsports enthusiasts, operating in the sports and entertainment industry. It offers cash-based fantasy games, allowing users to join leagues with friends or participate in daily fantasy tournaments. It primarily caters to the sports and gaming industry. It was formerly known as Fantasy Sport. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Multiverse
cb_description: Multiverse's technology platform aims to allow independent game developers to create high-quality, Massively Multiplayer Online Games (MMOGs) and non-game virtual worlds. Per the company, Multiverse solves the prohibitive challenges of game creation by providing developers with a comprehensive, pre-coded client-server infrastructure and tools, a wide range of free content--including a complete game for modification--and a built-in market of consumers. The intent is that the Multiverse Network will give video game players a single program--the Multiverse Client--that lets users play all of the MMOGs and visit all of the non-game virtual worlds built on the Multiverse platform. n

name: Skyfri
cb_description: Skyfri specializes in transforming the management of distributed solar and storage portfolios within the renewable energy sector. The company offers an advanced operating platform designed for revenue stacking, asset optimization, and automated operations and maintenance of renewable assets. Skyfri's solutions cater to asset owners, service providers, financial asset managers, and technical asset managers in the renewable energy industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: Nezasa

The company offers a platform known as TripBuilder, which facilitates the creation of personalized, multi-product travel itineraries with real-time booking capabilities. Nezasa primarily serves tour operators, travel agencies, OTAs, and destination management companies. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: NOMAD Transportable Power Systems

The company offers mobile energy storage systems that can be deployed virtually anywhere, providing reliable energy solutions that can be grid-tied or powered by renewables like wind or solar. NOMAD primarily serves commercial businesses, utility companies, and governmental agencies. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Waterbury, Vermont.

name: Osigu
cb_description: Osigu specializes in health revenue cycle management platforms. It offers automation technology within the healthcare sector. The company provides digital solutions that streamline workflows between healthcare payers and providers, from validations to reimbursements. Osigu was formerly known as Paycode GT. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Key Biscayne, Florida.

name: Gabriel
cb_description: Gabriel develops antenna solutions for broadband wireless

name: Zeta
cb_description: Zeta operates as a financial technology company in the banking sector. The company offers modern-day joint and personal bank accounts designed to help families manage their finances, including paying bills, saving for goals, and tracking shared spending. Zeta primarily serves families and couples. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Vectice
cb_description: Vectice is a company that focuses on machine learning operations (MLOps) and artificial intelligence (AI) regulations within the technology sector. The company offers an auto-documentation software that generates comprehensive project documentation from existing AI tools, enabling cross-functional collaboration, transparency, and regulation-readiness. Vectice primarily serves data scientists, data science managers, compliance officers, and business stakeholders. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Podcastle
cb_description: Podcastle is a web-based platform that specializes in podcast creation and audio content production. The company offers tools for recording, editing, enhancing, transcribing, and publishing podcasts, utilizing AI technology to simplify these processes. Podcastle primarily serves content creators, educators, and businesses in the digital media and podcasting sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: Terradepth
cb_description: Terradepth operates as an ocean data-as-a-service company focusing on scaling ocean data collection and dissemination, enabling exploration of the underwater environment. It uses autonomous robots to collect data on subsea environments paired with a cloud-native geospatial data management solution for ocean data visualization, collaboration and analysis. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Omni
cb_description: Omni operates as a precision manufacturer and service provider of tolerance consumable medical products focused on spinal, cardiovascular and tendon related surgeries. It specializes in computerized numerical control (CNC) swiss machining, vertical milling, prototyping, among others. It produces complex medical consumables that are core products for leading medical device manufacturers. The company was founded in 1978 and is based in Hudson, New Hampshire. In April 2023, Omni was acquired by Vander-Bend. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Infraspeak
cb_description: Infraspeak is an Intelligent Maintenance Management Platform (IMMP) that specializes in empowering facility managers and service providers with operational control, compliance assurance, and productivity enhancements. The platform offers a suite of tools for preventive and reactive maintenance, analytics and reporting, asset management, and more, all designed to streamline facility operations and maintenance tasks. Infraspeak primarily serves industries such as facility management, hospitality, healthcare, education, and retail, among others. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Porto, Portugal.

name: Ello
cb_description: Ello is a simple, beautiful, and ad-free social network created by a small group of artists and designers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Codacy
cb_description: Codacy is a company that specializes in code quality and security for developers within the software development and DevOps sectors. The company offers automated code review and static code analysis tools that integrate seamlessly into developer workflows, supporting over 40 programming languages. Codacy's products help engineering teams save time on code reviews, manage technical debt, and ensure software quality and security. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Lisboa, Portugal.

name: Treet
cb_description: Treet is a digital healthcare company operating in the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers a mobile application that serves as a digital pharmacy, allowing users to update their medication list, get medication advice via chat or phone, and order medicines for home delivery or pick-up from their nearest pharmacy. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Turku, Finland.

name: Helix
cb_description: Helix works as a population genomics company operating in the healthcare and life sciences sectors. The company provides solutions that enable health systems, public health organizations, and life science companies to integrate genomic data into patient care and public health decision-making. Its primary customers are health systems, public health entities, and life science companies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: EstateGuru

The company offers an investment platform where individuals can invest in diversified portfolios of loans secured by real estate mortgages. EstateGuru primarily serves the real estate investment and fintech sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Jina AI
cb_description: Jina AI specializes in multimodal AI technology, focusing on search foundational models and tools for enterprises. The company offers products such as high-quality embeddings for search and RAG systems, rerankers to enhance search relevancy, and tools for converting text to LLM-friendly formats. Jina AI's solutions cater to a diverse range of sectors including enterprise search, ecommerce, and cloud computing industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Mooncard
cb_description: Mooncard operates as a software-as-a-service (SaaS) company focused on business expenses and corporate spend management. The company offers smart payment cards linked to accounting and management software, which automate expense reports and simplify the daily lives of employees. It primarily serves companies of all sizes across various sectors. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Remedee Labs
cb_description: Remedee Labs focuses on chronic pain management through its innovative endorphin stimulation technology in the health and wellness sector. The company offers a non-pharmaceutical solution that includes a wearable endorphin stimulator bracelet designed to alleviate pain, improve sleep, and reduce stress, complemented by a digital service platform for personalized coaching and progress tracking. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Montbonnot Saint Martin, France.

name: EnTouch Controls
cb_description: EnTouch Controls is a company that specializes in energy management and smart building technology. The company offers a solution that optimizes operations and reduces energy usage. It serves sectors such as retail, healthcare, childcare, fitness, convenience stores, and senior living communities. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Richardson, Texas.

name: Picus Security
cb_description: Picus Security specializes in breach and attack simulation (BAS) within the cybersecurity domain. The company offers a platform that simulates real cyber attacks to validate the effectiveness of security controls and provides AI-driven insights for threat exposure management. Its platform serves various sectors, including financial services, retail, and technology, by enhancing their security posture and compliance capabilities. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Moment
cb_description: Moment is a company focused on providing products and resources for creative photography and filmmaking. They offer a range of mobile filmmaking gear, photography equipment, and accessories designed to enhance the capabilities of camera phones and cameras. Moment also provides educational courses and tools like LUTs and presets to support the creative community in honing their skills. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Woodinville, Washington.

name: accessiBe
cb_description: accessiBe operates as a company specializing in web accessibility solutions. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI)-powered services that help businesses make their websites compliant with various accessibility standards such as the Americans with disabilities act (ADA) and web content accessibility guidelines (WCAG 2.1). It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Once Upon a Farm
cb_description: Once Upon a Farm is a company focused on the production of nutritious foods, operating within the food industry. The company offers cold-pressed, organic fruit and veggie blends for babies, as well as plant-rich meals and refrigerated snacks for toddlers and big kids. Their primary market is the consumer goods sector, specifically targeting parents seeking healthier food options for their children. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Multiomic Health
cb_description: Multiomic Health focuses on the development of precision medicine for metabolic syndrome-related conditions within the healthcare sector. The company leverages AI-enabled data science and computational systems biology to discover and develop therapeutics and companion diagnostics optimized for specific patient subpopulations. Multiomic Health primarily engages in licensing arrangements and partnerships with biopharma and diagnostic companies to commercialize its therapeutic programs and implement biomarkers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

name: CrowdRiff
cb_description: CrowdRiff is a visual marketing platform operating in the travel and hospitality industry. The company offers services such as sourcing, sharing, and scaling original content, including short-form videos and user-generated content, to help destination marketers connect with travelers. Primarily, CrowdRiff caters to the travel and tourism industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Upvest
cb_description: Upvest is a financial technology company specializing in investment application programming interface (API) within the financial technology (fintech) sector. The company provides a platform for businesses to offer various investment experiences, including account creation, trade execution, and digital reporting, without the need for extensive backend infrastructure. Upvest primarily serves the financial technology industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Komodo Health
cb_description: Komodo Health specializes in healthcare analytics and operates within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a platform that provides insights by analyzing a range of healthcare data, aiming to improve patient care and reduce disease burden. Komodo Health primarily serves life sciences companies, healthcare practitioners, payers, and patient advocacy groups with its suite of software applications designed to deliver value in healthcare through data-driven insights. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Hang
cb_description: Hang, aka Hang - Join the Now, is a community engagement mobile app that increases awareness of gatherings, hangouts, and local events to help users be more present in their lives and communities.

name: Casai
cb_description: Casai operates as an online hospitality platform. It offers fully-furnished apartments or homestays for travelers. It allows customers to search and rent for apartments and homestays. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico. Casai ceased operations in July 2023.

name: Sidekick
cb_description: Sidekick is a company focused on enhancing remote team collaboration in the technology sector. The company offers a device that facilitates coworking sessions, allowing teammates to work side by side virtually. Primarily, Sidekick's services are utilized by companies in the tech industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Trella
cb_description: Trella operates as a technology platform in logistics and transportation. The company offers a digital platform that connects shippers with carriers, aiming to create transparency, efficiency, and reliability in the logistics industry. It provides services such as global positioning system (GPS) tracking, live updates, and a centralized dashboard for efficient management and performance analysis. The company primarily serves the logistics and transportation industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Velocity Global
cb_description: Velocity Global develops human resource (HR) solutions. The company offers services such as hiring, payroll management, and employee benefits administration, all designed to facilitate the management of distributed teams.
