It also provides immigration services and office spaces, enabling businesses to expand and operate in multiple countries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: OhmConnect
cb_description: OhmConnect specializes in home energy management solutions within the energy sector. The company offers a platform that allows residential users to save on energy bills by reducing electricity usage during peak periods and provides financial incentives for doing so. OhmConnect primarily serves the residential energy market, enabling customers to participate in demand response programs. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: TravelTriangle
cb_description: TravelTriangle provides an online travel marketplace. The platform allows travelers to plan, book, and share vacations. It also allows travel agents to sell, analyze, track, and manage all the holidays sold. The platform offers different tour packages for couples, families, solo travelers, and more. TravelTriangle was founded in 2011 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Evinced
cb_description: Evinced specializes in digital accessibility software, focusing on helping enterprises ensure their web and mobile offerings are accessible to all users. The company offers AI-enabled products that automatically detect, categorize, and monitor accessibility issues within software development workflows. Evinced's solutions are designed to save developer time and reduce risk by integrating proprietary discovery and analysis algorithms directly into development pipelines. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: Viome
cb_description: Viome is a health and longevity company focused on preventing, diagnosing, and reversing chronic diseases and aging through its at-home health tests and personalized nutrition. The company offers products and services that analyze microbial and human gene expressions to provide personalized health insights and recommendations. Viome's main offerings include at-home microbiome health tests that utilize advanced RNA sequencing technology to generate health scores and nutrition recommendations tailored to an individual's unique biology. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.

name: Zaptic
cb_description: Zaptic focuses on enhancing operational efficiency within the manufacturing sector. They offer a connected worker platform that facilitates job instruction and collaboration among frontline teams, aiming to digitize daily operations and improve workforce engagement. Zaptic's platform is utilized by manufacturing leaders to empower their workers with the necessary information and tools to achieve operational excellence. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Manchester, United Kingdom.

name: Waterplan
cb_description: Waterplan develops a corporate water sustainability platform in the environmental technology sector. The company provides a suite of tools for measuring, responding to, and reporting on water risk, aimed at facilitating better water management strategies for businesses. Its services are primarily utilized by sustainability teams within various corporations to enhance their water stewardship and operational water risk management. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Wildflower Health
cb_description: Wildflower Health is a technology and services company focused on transforming care delivery and payment models in women's health. The company offers a modular suite of software, support, and services, including digital tools and human touch, to improve healthcare outcomes, particularly in the area of maternity care. Wildflower Health primarily serves patients, healthcare providers, and payers, with a special focus on value-based maternity care. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Cotati, California.

name: Talkdesk
cb_description: Talkdesk is a global leader in cloud contact center solutions, leveraging AI and automation to enhance customer service across various industries. The company offers a suite of AI-powered products designed to improve customer experiences, operational efficiencies, and agent performance. Talkdesk's solutions cater to a range of sectors including financial services, healthcare, retail, and more. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Zeta Energy
cb_description: Zeta Energy focuses on the development of advanced battery technology, specifically within the energy sector. The company's main offering is its lithium-sulfur battery technology, which has been designed to provide superior performance, cost-effectiveness, and safety compared to existing lithium-ion batteries. The batteries are based on lithium, carbon, and sulfur, which are abundant and economical materials. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Mozio
cb_description: Mozio develops mobility software solutions in transportation. It offers a platform that partners with various local transportation services such as shared-ride shuttles, taxis, limos, express trains, and even helicopters, providing a unified application program interface (API) and white-label solution for travel agencies, airlines, hotels, and car rental agencies to facilitate ground transportation. The company primarily serves the travel and hospitality industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Beaverton, Oregon.

name: Loginno
cb_description: Loginno specializes in transforming shipping containers into smart, IoT-enabled assets within the logistics and shipping industry. The company offers a comprehensive solution that converts traditional container fleets into intelligent systems capable of real-time data mining, which enhances operational efficiency and opens up new revenue streams. Loginno's services cater to the shipping industry, aiming to advance marine logistics into the digital era. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Shoham, Israel.

name: Bimaplan
cb_description: Bimaplan develops an insurance technology platform. The company creates over-the-counter (OTC), low-premium insurance products to cater to low- and middle-income people with annual premiums. It was founded in 2020 an dis based in Bangalore, India.

name: Healthie
cb_description: Healthie provides cloud-based electronic health record (EHR) services and practice management software for healthcare providers. Its platform includes tools for scheduling, billing, telehealth, patient engagement, and clinical care. Healthie's services are suitable for various healthcare sectors including private practices, group practices, digital health startups, and enterprise-level healthcare organizations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: The Rounds
cb_description: The Rounds operates a professional network created specifically for Canadian physicians. Its network is used by physicians to collaborate on cases, discuss journals, reconnect with colleagues, and share knowledge. The Rounds was formerly known as Mlkmn. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Halifax, Canada.

name: Clearspace
cb_description: Our product allows users applying to any jobs worldwide with just simple clicks, on both desktop and mobile.

name: Baton Systems
cb_description: Baton Systems is a company that focuses on post-trade processing in the financial sector. The company offers a secure platform for the settlement of assets and wholesale payments, providing services such as real-time reconciliation, automated settlement orchestration, and risk management. Its main customers are large financial institutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Fremont, California.

name: Trybe
cb_description: Trybe is a company focused on electronic music discovery through a community-based application within the entertainment and technology sector. The app allows users to discover new electronic music tracks, mixes, podcasts, and stay updated on events, festivals, and music news. It caters to the electronic music industry, connecting fans with trending content and happenings. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Beirut, Lebanon.

name: Orbion Space Technology
cb_description: Orbion Space Technology specializes in the development and manufacturing of electric propulsion systems for small satellites within the aerospace industry. It offers Hall-effect thrusters and integrated propulsion systems designed for spacecraft maneuverability and extending satellite lifetime. Its products are utilized by various sectors within the space industry, including satellite operators and space mission designers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Houghton, Michigan.

name: Podium Education
cb_description: Podium Education is a company focused on experiential education within the higher education sector. The company partners with universities to offer innovative, for-credit learning experiences that enable undergraduate students to gain in-demand technical skills and work experience. These services primarily cater to the higher education industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Detect Technologies
cb_description: Detect Technologies is a industrial artificial intelligence (AI) company focused on automating industrial processes and advancing the industrial ecosystem. The company offers a broad portfolio of patented technology and AI solutions designed to unite data, workforce, equipment, and processes to address complex industrial challenges and enhance safety and efficiency. Detect Technologies provides solutions for asset-intensive industries, leveraging machine vision, sensors, robotics, and machine learning to drive industrial automation and support the transition to industry 4.0. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: Shoreline Biosciences
cb_description: Shoreline Biosciences is a company focused on cellular immunotherapy within the biotechnology industry. The company's main offerings include the development of next-generation cellular immunotherapies, specifically iPSC-derived natural killer cell (iNK) and macrophage (iMACs) cellular immunotherapy candidates, designed to provide safe, effective, and affordable treatments to patients. These therapies are primarily targeted towards the healthcare sector, particularly in the field of cancer treatment. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: The Helper Bees
cb_description: The Helper Bees is a technology platform focused on enabling aging in place for older adults within the healthcare sector. The company offers a comprehensive suite of non-medical in-home care services, facilitated through a rigorously vetted provider network, designed to help older adults live independently while streamlining administrative processes for insurers. The Helper Bees primarily serves the long-term care insurance and Medicare Advantage sectors by providing digital claims tools, nurse assessments, and care concierge services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Codoxo
cb_description: Codoxo provides an artificial intelligence (AI) platform for analyzing healthcare data to detect problems and provide insights. It primarily serves healthcare payers and agencies, such as managed care plans, medicaid agencies, and employer-sponsored health plans. Codoxo was formerly known as Fraudscope. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Duluth, Georgia.

name: VerImmune
cb_description: VerImmune develops Anti-Tumor Immune Redirection (AIR), an approach in the biotechnology sector aimed at cancer treatment. The company's main innovation involves redirecting pre-existing immune memory from pathogens or childhood vaccines to target and destroy cancer cells. This therapeutic strategy leverages the body's own immune system to recognize and attack tumor cells by modifying them to appear as virally infected cells, prompting an immune response. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Ackcio
cb_description: Ackcio is a company that focuses on the development of wireless monitoring systems, operating primarily in the construction, infrastructure, mining, and rail industries. The company's main offerings include systems that automate the monitoring of geotechnical and structural sensors, providing reliable data acquisition for industrial operations. Ackcio primarily serves sectors such as the construction industry, mining industry, and rail industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore.

name: SupportLogic
cb_description: SupportLogic is a company specializing in support experience management within the customer support and success sector. The company offers a platform that leverages predictive and generative AI to monitor customer interactions, analyze sentiment, and provide actionable insights to prevent escalations and improve customer relationships. SupportLogic's solutions cater to various aspects of customer support, including escalation management, sentiment analysis, backlog management, and intelligent case routing, among others. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Armut
cb_description: Armut is a leading services marketplace focused on various home and personal services. The company offers a platform where users can easily find and book services ranging from cleaning and renovation to tutoring and health services. Armut primarily serves the home services sector, providing a convenient way for customers to compare service providers and receive quotes. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: EasyKnock
cb_description: EasyKnock provides residential sale-leaseback solutions as an alternative to traditional home equity loans. Its main offerings include converting homeowners' equity into cash, allowing them to sell their homes and remain as renters, with options to repurchase or direct it to sell the property. EasyKnock caters to homeowners who need to access their home equity without the constraints of credit scores or debt-to-income ratios. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cleveland, Ohio.

name: Birdseye
cb_description: Birdseye is an artificial intelligence company that specializes in marketing solutions for the retail and e-commerce sectors. The company offers AI-powered tools for marketing management, content creation, customer segmentation, and product recommendations. Birdseye's services are designed to help businesses automate their marketing workflows, increase sales, and reduce costs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Parity
cb_description: Parity focuses on HVAC optimization and energy management in the multifamily residential and hospitality sectors. The company offers a software platform that uses data and automation to reduce energy usage and CO2 emissions, while also decreasing the workload of on-site staff. This platform allows building owners to remotely monitor and control HVAC systems and provides expert advice to identify potential system issues and secure future savings. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Quip
cb_description: Quip provides a productivity platform operating in the technology sector. The company offers a suite of services that facilitate real-time collaboration, including documents, spreadsheets, and chat features, all embedded within salesforce business processes. It primarily serves salesforce customers, transforming their processes such as account planning, mutual close plans, and qualification notes. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California. In August 2016, Quip was acquired by Salesforce.

name: Hightouch
cb_description: Hightouch is a Composable Customer Data Platform (CDP) that specializes in data activation and reverse ETL services. The company offers a suite of products that enable businesses to sync data from their data warehouses to over 200 tools, build and manage customer profiles, and deliver personalized marketing campaigns without the need for coding. Hightouch primarily serves sectors such as retail & eCommerce, media & entertainment, financial services, healthcare, and B2B SaaS. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Paire
cb_description: Paire focuses on fashion, specifically in the domain of women's clothing. The company offers a range of clothing items including pants, tops, jackets, and dresses, with a special emphasis on creating the perfect pair of pants. The products are designed to be comfortable, machine washable, and sustainable, made from responsibly sourced materials. It was formerly known as Aella. It was founded in 2016 and is based in South Gate, California.

name: Splitwise
cb_description: Splitwise specializes in financial management tools, focusing on expense tracking and sharing within the personal finance sector. The company provides a platform for users to manage and split expenses with friends, family, and others, simplifying the process of tracking shared costs and settling debts. Splitwise's services are utilized by various sectors including travelers, roommates, and anyone engaging in shared financial transactions. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Providence, Rhode Island.

name: Mux
cb_description: Mux is a company that specializes in video infrastructure services within the technology sector. Its main offerings include APIs that enable developers to build live and on-demand video experiences, tools for customizing video players, and analytics to monitor and improve video streaming performance. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Kayrros
cb_description: Kayrros is a leading company in the field of environmental intelligence, focusing on asset observation and climate governance. The company offers services that leverage AI and geoanalytics to analyze satellite imagery and ground-truth data, providing insights into energy, climate, and sustainability. Kayrros's solutions are designed to measure the human impact on the environment, assist in reducing greenhouse gas emissions, and support the management of the energy transition. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Shakudo
cb_description: Shakudo specializes in providing a data and AI operating system for businesses, focusing on creating a more reliable, performant, and cost-effective data stack. The company offers a platform that integrates best-of-breed data tools with automated DevOps experiences, enabling workflow automation, text to SQL conversion, and vector database management, among other services. Shakudo primarily serves sectors such as aerospace, automotive, climate and energy, financial services, healthcare, education, manufacturing, real estate, retail, sports, and technology. Shakudo was formerly known as DevSentient. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: GAIIA
cb_description: GAIIA uses Artificial Intelligence to analyze multiple data sources to help companies and farmers make smarter agribusiness decisions. By combining satellite imagery, weather information, historical yields, and market data to develop benchmarks, forecasts, and simulation tools, the solution helps reduce risk and increase profits. The technology uses Machine Learning.

name: Talkiatry
cb_description: Talkiatry specializes in providing virtual psychiatry services within the mental health care domain. Its offerings include medication management and supportive therapy for conditions such as ADHD, anxiety, bipolar disorder, depression, OCD, and PTSD, all covered by insurance. Talkiatry primarily serves individuals seeking accessible mental health treatment through virtual consultations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Pixxel
cb_description: Pixxel focuses on hyperspectral earth imaging and analytics within the aerospace industry. The company offers a constellation of hyperspectral imaging satellites and analytical tools to extract actionable insights from the data they collect. It primarily serves sectors such as agriculture, energy, environment, and government by providing detailed earth observation data. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: equipifi
cb_description: equipifi provides Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) by financial institutions, powering banks, and credit unions. It provides seamless, white-labeled integrations for banks and credit unions to offer BNPL for their members. Its users have instant access to the cash needed for purchases they want, all without disconnecting from their bank. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Claravine
cb_description: Claravine is a company focused on marketing data standardization within the marketing and advertising industry. Their platform offers solutions for standardizing taxonomies, naming conventions, and metadata to ensure data consistency and integrity across digital experiences. Claravine's services enable enterprises and agencies to optimize campaign tracking, structure content and creative data, ensure advertising data compliance, and enhance mobile marketing analytics. Claravine was formerly known as Tracking First. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Lehi, Utah.

name: NephroPlus
cb_description: NephroPlus is a healthcare provider specializing in kidney care and dialysis services. The company offers a range of dialysis treatments including in-clinic dialysis, home hemodialysis, and dialysis on wheels, as well as nutritional guidance and mental health support for patients with kidney disease. NephroPlus primarily serves patients requiring dialysis and kidney care services. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: IrriGreen
cb_description: IrriGreen is a company that specializes in the development and manufacturing of all-digital sprinkler systems for efficient landscape irrigation. Their products are designed to reduce water usage by precisely delivering water to match the exact shape of any lawn, using software-controlled sprinkler heads. The technology is adapted from the high-tech printer industry and aims to conserve water by minimizing wasteful overlap and overspray. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Edina, Minnesota.

name: Dewpoint Therapeutics
cb_description: Dewpoint Therapeutics focuses on the application of biomolecular condensates in drug discovery. The company develops drugs for a range of conditions that are regulated by condensates or arise from the dysfunction of condensates, including diseases in oncology, neurodegeneration, cardiopulmonary, and virology. Dewpoint primarily sells to the healthcare industry, with collaborations with leading global pharmaceutical partners. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: AttackIQ
cb_description: AttackIQ specializes in breach and attack simulation products for security control validation within the cybersecurity industry. The company emulates adversary tactics, techniques, and procedures, aligning with the MITRE ATT&CK framework, to provide insights into security program performance and offer data-driven analysis and mitigation guidance. AttackIQ's solutions cater to various sectors, including energy, financial services, healthcare, and federal organizations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Los Altos, California.

name: AudioShake
cb_description: AudioShake specializes in advanced audio separation technology within the music and audio domain. The company offers services that include isolating dialogue, creating music stems, separating effects, and transcribing lyrics, all aimed at enhancing the usability and accessibility of audio content. It primarily serves sectors such as music production, film and television, and digital media platforms. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Chain Reaction
cb_description: Chain Reaction specializes in the development of disruptive blockchain and privacy technologies. The company's main offerings include the design of hardware to accelerate blockchain and privacy, and the development of solutions that enhance compute performance. Its solutions primarily cater to sectors such as cloud and data centers, financial institutions, healthcare and big pharma, defense and government, and oil and gas. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Yokneam Ilit, Israel.

name: UpWave
cb_description: UpWave is a visual productivity platform that specializes in collaboration and project management tools for businesses. The company offers a suite of web-based applications designed to facilitate project collaboration, workflow optimization, and data collection through user-friendly forms. UpWave's solutions are tailored to enhance team productivity, streamline communication, and support real-time collaboration across various departments and external partners. It is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: Gray Matter Analytics
cb_description: Gray Matter Analytics is a company that focuses on data analytics in the healthcare sector. The company offers analytics solutions that help healthcare providers and payors monitor and manage performance, maximize revenue, and improve health outcomes as they transition from fee-for-service to value-based care. Gray Matter Analytics primarily serves the healthcare industry. It is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Savonix
cb_description: Savonix operates in the online gambling and healthcare sectors, providing a platform for sports betting and cognitive function assessments. The company offers a range of services including online sports betting, live casino games, and a mobile application for cognitive screening. Savonix primarily serves the online gambling community and healthcare providers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: mPulse Mobile
cb_description: mPulse Mobile specializes in conversational AI for healthcare, focusing on digital health engagement solutions. The company offers a suite of services that include personalized communication through AI, integrated streaming health content, and data analytics to improve health outcomes and operational efficiencies. mPulse Mobile primarily serves sectors such as Medicare, Medicaid, life sciences, health systems, and pharmacies. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: LeaseCake
cb_description: LeaseCake provides a lease and location management platfrom. The company offers a range of services including lease management, lease accounting software, and artificial intelligence tools to help businesses manage their leases and real estate portfolios. Their services are used by businesses in the food and beverage and retail industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Winter Park, Florida.

name: Taplytics
cb_description: Taplytics is a company specializing in A/B testing and feature management solutions for digital products. They offer a suite of tools that enable product, engineering, and marketing teams to conduct experiments and manage feature rollouts across web, mobile, and other platforms. The company primarily serves sectors such as finance and insurance, retail and ecommerce, media and entertainment, and food and quick service restaurants. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Manifold Bio
cb_description: Manifold Bio is a therapeutics company that focuses on engineering precision biologics in the pharmaceutical industry. The company's main service is the development of a high-throughput in vivo drug design platform, which uses protein barcoding technology to design drugs with more precise molecular testing. Manifold Bio primarily sells to the pharmaceutical industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Allston, Massachusetts.

name: Wevr
cb_description: Wevr focuses on creating applications within the augmented reality and virtual reality sectors. The company offers a virtual studio platform for 3D development, enabling creators to collaborate, create, and share projects across various industries. Wevr's services cater to content creators and developers in the entertainment and gaming industries, providing tools and collaborations for building virtual worlds and applications. Wevr was formerly known as WemoMedia. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Venice, California.

name: Jobbatical
cb_description: Jobbatical specializes in employee relocation and global mobility services within the human resources sector. The company offers an all-in-one solution for managing the immigration and relocation process, including visa and permit assistance, housing, healthcare, and education support services. Jobbatical's platform serves businesses looking to relocate employees internationally, providing a streamlined and automated experience. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Neo Financial
cb_description: Neo Financial specializes in providing intuitive and accessible financial tools. The company offers a range of services including high-interest savings accounts, artificial intelligence-powered budgeting tools, and credit cards with customizable rewards. It primarily serves the personal finance sector, offering solutions that cater to individual spending, saving, and investment needs. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Calgary,Canada

name: Cladwell
cb_description: Cladwell operates an application that provides users daily outfit recommendations based on the items they already have, and they're personalized based on the weather or separated by activity like workout or work. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Cincinnati, Ohio. In January 2019, Cladwell was acquired by Erin Flynn and Colin Flynn. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: AirEye
cb_description: AirEye is a company that specializes in network airspace control and protection, operating within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) solution that provides protection against digital airborne attacks on organizational networks, focusing on preventing unauthorized access, data leakage, device hijacking, and segmentation hopping. The primary sectors that AirEye serves include the healthcare industry and other sectors that require robust network security. It is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Riiid
cb_description: Riiid offers an AI-powered EdTech mobile platform and web platform that help students with studying for standardized exams such as TOEIC, SAT, ACT and others. The company's AI-powered application provides customized learning services driven by data technology, enabling people to receive optimal learning services. It provides its services to the education sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Pave
cb_description: Pave provides a data-driven compensation platform. The company offers services that help businesses make informed compensation decisions, manage compensation data, and communicate total compensation packages to employees. It primarily serves the human resource and workforce management industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: NEON
cb_description: NEON aids in the support and expansion of the metaverse's vision. It is based in New York, New York.

name: DAMAE Medical
cb_description: DAMAE Medical focuses on skin imaging technology in the healthcare sector. It offers deepLive, a medical device that provides three-dimensional (3D) images of different skin layers at a cellular level, aiding in the screening, management, and follow-up of skin cancers. The device is primarily used in the healthcare industry, particularly by dermatologists, as well as by cosmetic and pharmaceutical companies for research and evaluation purposes. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Mobius Motors
cb_description: Mobius Motors engages in the design, manufacturing, and sale of vehicles, operating within the automotive industry. Its offerings are vehicles specifically built for the African mass market, designed to handle common road terrain and typical vehicle loading. The company primarily serves the automotive market in Africa. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya. In August 2024, Mobius Motors filed for bankruptcy.

name: Ultraviolette
cb_description: Ultraviolette is a company focused on sustainable transportation, specifically within the electric vehicle industry. The company's main offerings include high-performance electric vehicles, designed with advanced engineering and seamless user experiences. These vehicles are equipped with proprietary battery technology, advanced safety features, and connected features that enhance the ownership experience. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Kotani Pay
cb_description: Kotani Pay is a financial technology company focused on providing stablecoin and fiat currency conversion services. The company offers solutions for businesses to facilitate liquidity through stablecoin settlements, connect decentralized applications to local payment channels via API, and enable blockchain functionality without internet through an SMS wallet. Kotani Pay primarily serves businesses looking for remittance solutions, forex arbitrage, lending, insurance, savings, social protection, business financing, and gig work within the financial sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Axonius
cb_description: Axonius specializes in cybersecurity asset management and SaaS management solutions within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform that aggregates and correlates asset data from various sources to provide a comprehensive asset inventory, identify security gaps, and automate policy enforcement. Axonius serves sectors such as energy, finance, healthcare, manufacturing, government, education, retail, and technology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Amenitiz
cb_description: Amenitiz is a company that specializes in providing all-in-one management software solutions for the hospitality industry. Its main offerings include a property management system, a channel manager to connect with various booking platforms, a booking engine for direct reservations, and tools for creating hotel websites. These products are designed to streamline operations, increase direct bookings, and enhance the overall guest experience for independent hotels, bed and breakfasts, and holiday rental properties. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: @Stake
cb_description: @stake a digital security company that helps corporations secure their critical infrastructure and applications. @stake provides digital security consulting services and security auditing and analysis products to assess and manage risk in the technologies that are deployed in corporate environments. Its consultants have a strong foundation in research and combine technical expertise with a business focus to create comprehensive security solutions to manage risks across complex enterprise IT environments. @stake's solutions enable electronic business in a variety of industries including banking and finance, e-business, software development, and telecommunications.

name: Tajir
cb_description: Tajir is a company that operates in the ecommerce industry, focusing on providing a platform for retail distribution. The company offers an online network where stores can order products 24/7 with next-day delivery and transparent, real-time pricing. Tajir's platform serves as a software-powered distribution channel that requires no investment from sellers in sales and logistics. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Lahore, Pakistan.

name: Iterable
cb_description: Iterable operates as a cross-channel marketing platform. It empowers growth marketers to create user engagement campaigns throughout the full lifecycle and across all channels. It supports marketers in segmenting users, building workflows, automating touchpoints, and test strategies at scale, and more. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Waterdrop
cb_description: Waterdrop provides a range of hydration products, including micro drinks with vitamins and zero sugar for daily water intake. Waterdrop's product line also includes electrolyte supplements for exercise recovery, energy-boosting formulas, and a range of bottles and accessories. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Ditto
cb_description: Ditto is a technology company that focuses on the eyewear industry. The company offers a range of innovative solutions to improve the eyewear shopping experience, including augmented reality virtual try-on, facial analysis, and frame recommendation engine. These services primarily cater to eyewear retailers, brands, and doctors. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Oakland, California. In October 2023, Ditto was acquired by Fittingbox.

name: Manna Drone Delivery
cb_description: Manna Drone Delivery specializes in local delivery services using drones within the logistics and transportation sectors. It offers an app-based ordering system for customers to receive meals or drinks to home in 3 minutes using electric, zero-emission drones. It primarily caters to the food and beverage industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Clonskeagh, Ireland.

name: Laguna Health
cb_description: Laguna Health operates as a recovery assurance company. It offers a digital care platform designed for post-hospitalization recovery and focuses on data, technology, and live behavioral health experts to support recovery times and readmissions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Base
cb_description: Base is a vegan beauty brand that specializes in skincare and beauty products. The company offers a range of beauty items including eyeshadow palettes, multi-use color products for cheeks, eyes, and lips, lip tints, body acne solutions, and lip masks, all formulated with vegan ingredients. Base's products are designed to address various beauty needs such as makeup application, skincare concerns, and anti-aging solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Bungalow
cb_description: Bungalow is a company focused on residential leasing within the real estate domain. It offers services related to room and home rentals, providing living spaces for individuals seeking co-living arrangements. The company primarily caters to individuals looking for flexible and shared housing options. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Devron
cb_description: Devron is a federated data science platform company that specializes in machine learning and analytics. The company offers a platform that enables data science teams to build and train AI models on distributed data while maintaining data privacy and reducing the need for data movement. Devron primarily serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare, government, insurance, and energy with its data science solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BlastPoint
cb_description: BlastPoint specializes in providing customer intelligence and analytics solutions across various business sectors. The company offers a platform that delivers AI-powered insights to optimize revenue growth and enhance customer engagement without the need for in-depth data management expertise. Its solutions cater to the energy, financial, automotive, and nonprofit sectors, among others, helping businesses understand and engage with their customers more effectively. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Booster
cb_description: Booster research develops, processes, sales, and services testing and automation equipment. It specializes in electronic technology, specifically in the domain of manufacturing test and automation solutions. The company offers a range of solutions including automation for all test production lines, intelligent factory systems, and standardized specialized test modules for electronic signal collection. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Zhongshan, China.

name: @Motion
cb_description: @Motion, formerly Arabesque Communications, is a developer of a voice-activated platform for narrowband wireless Internet access.

name: Swell
cb_description: Swell focuses on providing e-commerce solutions. It offers a customizable platform that allows businesses to create unique online shopping experiences. It provides services such as building and managing online storefronts, handling payments, managing product content, and tracking inventory. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Rhino Health
cb_description: Rhino Health specializes in federated computing for the healthcare sector, focusing on AI development and data analytics. The company offers a platform that enables secure collaboration on healthcare data without compromising privacy, utilizing federated learning and edge computing to streamline research and AI development. Rhino Health primarily serves the healthcare and life sciences industries, offering solutions that facilitate data harmonization, image annotation, exploratory analysis, and AI model training across a network of data custodians. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: GoodsMart
cb_description: GoodsMart is a grocery e-commerce company. The company offers a wide variety of products, including fresh fruits, vegetables, home care, personal care items, and more, which customers can order through a smart application. The orders are delivered daily in a contactless manner to a GoodsMart box installed at the customer's home. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: INVISION
cb_description: INVISION is a provider of cross-device advertising sales software. INVISION serves the cable, broadcast, syndication, satellite and MVPD markets, to profitably operate and monetize ad-supported inventory distributed on linear and non-linear outlets. The INVISION software suite automates the end-to-end advertising sales workflow, supports cross-device deals (linear and non-linear), and provides advanced addressable inventory decisioning.

name: AvoMD
cb_description: AvoMD focuses on enhancing clinical decision support within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that digitizes and optimizes clinical evidence for use at the point of care, available both within electronic health records (EHR) and as a standalone application. AvoMD primarily serves provider organizations, life sciences companies, and medical societies by facilitating the integration and utilization of clinical pathways and guidelines. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Kinetica
cb_description: Kinetica specializes in the design and implementation of solid-damping technologies within the structural engineering sector. It offers products that mitigate vibrations and enhance the seismic response of structures, as well as services in advanced analysis and seismic design using isolation and damping technologies. Its technologies are utilized in the construction of new buildings and the retrofitting of existing ones to improve resilience against loads such as earthquakes and wind. It is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Instant Financial
cb_description: Instant Financial specializes in providing fee-free earned wage access solutions within the financial services sector. The company offers a platform that allows employees to access their earned wages in real-time, make purchases, transfer funds to a bank account, and manage their finances through an app, all without incurring fees. Instant Financial's solutions are primarily tailored to businesses seeking to improve employee satisfaction and retention. Instant Financial was formerly known as PayHero Inc.. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Alpharetta, Georgia.

name: Modvion
cb_description: Modvion specializes in the renewable energy sector by constructing wind turbine towers using engineered wood, a sustainable alternative to traditional materials. The company's main offerings include modular wind turbine towers made from laminated veneer lumber, which are designed to be cost-efficient and reduce carbon emissions. Modvion's towers are transport-efficient. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Gothenburg, Sweden.

name: Allocate
cb_description: Allocate operates as a digital investment platform providing portfolio diversification solutions. It provides all types of investors with a programmatic way to discover and invest in emerging, and established venture capital funds. It also provides fund managers with a streamlined way to access the fragmented private wealth market. Allocate was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Hello Divorce
cb_description: Hello Divorce is a company that focuses on providing online divorce solutions in the legal services industry. The company offers online divorce plans that allow individuals to complete their divorce proceedings from home, with additional services such as mediation and financial help available as needed. The company primarily serves individuals seeking a divorce. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: Luminate Medical
cb_description: Luminate Medical focuses on healthcare technology to mitigate the side effects of cancer treatment. It develops devices designed to prevent hair loss and peripheral neuropathy caused by cancer therapies, aiming to improve patient quality of life. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, providing solutions for patients undergoing cancer treatment and the physicians who treat them. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Galway, Ireland.

name: Hakimo
cb_description: Hakimo specializes in AI-powered security monitoring within the physical security operations sector. The company offers a software platform that automates routine security monitoring tasks, enabling organizations to identify and respond to real threats efficiently. Hakimo's AI solution is designed to enhance security, efficiency, and compliance for various industries, including airports, automotive, construction, energy, and property management. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Fraction
cb_description: Fraction democratizes investment. The company offers a platform for users to invest, sell, and manage fractional ownership. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

name: Next Gen Foods
cb_description: Next Gen Foods develops and produces plant-based foods in the food industry. The company offers plant-based alternatives to traditional meat products, providing consumers with options that mimic the flavor, texture, and overall experience of eating chicken and dairy products. Its primary market includes consumers seeking plant-based food alternatives. Next Gen Foods was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: TravClan
cb_description: TravClan is a company focused on the travel industry, specifically targeting the offline travel market. The company provides a platform for travel agents to book flights, hotels, and holiday packages at competitive B2B prices, and also offers tools for customizing holiday packages and generating demand through personalized travel websites and marketing materials. TravClan primarily serves the travel industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Curate
cb_description: Curate is a software platform focused on the event planning industry. The company offers a range of services including the automation of proposal generation, shopping list creation, and profitability calculations, all designed to streamline the event planning process. Curate primarily serves the event professionals sector, including florists and caterers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Blavity
cb_description: Blavity operates as a digital media company. It is focused on creating content that resonates with Black millennials across the entertainment and cultural news. The company offers a platform for entertainment content, editorial opinions, and highlights of small businesses and community events, with a particular emphasis on supporting black-owned businesses. Blavity also produces original shows that cater to its audience's interests. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: CareAcademy
cb_description: CareAcademy is a company specializing in online training and education for caregivers within the healthcare sector. Their main offerings include video-based training programs for home health aides, specialized certifications for chronic condition care, and comprehensive courses for dementia care and hospice training. CareAcademy primarily serves the home care, hospice, home health, and assisted living facility sectors with their educational content. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Vivoo
cb_description: Vivoo is a company that provides health insights through at-home urine tests and a mobile application. The company offers various products that allow users to monitor key body markers such as Vitamin C, Magnesium, and Calcium, and receive nutritional and lifestyle advice. Vivoo's primary customers are individuals looking for self-testing solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Gig Wage
cb_description: Gig Wage operates as a financial technology company specializing in businesses managing independent contractors. The company offers a platform for instant payments, compliance with tax laws, and tools for managing the entire 'gig-cycle' from onboarding to retention. Gig Wage primarily serves businesses looking to optimize their engagement with the gig economy workforce. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: Base
cb_description: Base is a vegan beauty brand that specializes in skincare and beauty products. The company offers a range of beauty items including eyeshadow palettes, multi-use color products for cheeks, eyes, and lips, lip tints, body acne solutions, and lip masks, all formulated with vegan ingredients. Base's products are designed to address various beauty needs such as makeup application, skincare concerns, and anti-aging solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Pulley
cb_description: Pulley operates as an equity management platform for fundraising. The company offers solutions including cap table management, fundraising modeling, crypto and tokens, communications hub, and more. It primarily serves the financial service sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Tigerhall
cb_description: Tigerhall is an organizational enablement platform focused on driving change and growth within companies. The platform offers strategic communications, internal knowledge sharing, and access to external industry best practices, all integrated into the flow of work. Tigerhall primarily serves organizations looking to overcome internal resistance and align their workforce with strategic initiatives, leveraging tools such as Microsoft Teams for seamless integration into daily workflows. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: BeAM
cb_description: BeAM is a French company manufacturing industrial metal 3D printers/additive manufacturing machines using the LMD technology (Laser Metal Deposition). BeAM's machines allow a layer-by-layer metal deposition in order to manufacture and repair parts, but also add functions and shapes on already existing parts directly from a CAD file.

name: Vetted
cb_description: Vetted is a Romanian marketplace to sell electronics. It allows buyers to acquire second-hand devices.

name: Ochre Bio
cb_description: Ochre Bio is a biotechnology company focused on developing RNA therapies for chronic liver diseases. Their approach combines genomic deep phenotyping and precision RNA medicine to increase donor liver supply and reduce cirrhosis complications. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Oxford, England.

name: BitFury
cb_description: BitFury is a full-service blockchain technology company focused on developing and providing security and infrastructure for the Bitcoin Blockchain. The company offers a range of products including custom semiconductor chips, mobile datacenters, a private blockchain framework, and advanced analytics platforms. BitFury's solutions cater to various sectors including financial institutions, law enforcement, and data center operations. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Team SoloMid
cb_description: Team SoloMid is a leading esports organization with a focus on competitive gaming and content creation. The company manages professional teams and individual streamers across various video game genres, including first-person shooters, battle royale games, and strategy games. Team SoloMid also engages with the gaming community through participation in esports tournaments, offering branded merchandise, and providing training programs for aspiring gamers. Team SoloMid was formerly known as SoloMid Corporation. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Medal
cb_description:
Medal provides enterprise software that enables secure, HIPAA compliant sharing and cataloging of clinical information from any electronic medical records system, including reports and summaries using natural language processing. The company allows users to collect and utilize updated individual data to create holistic patient profiles to feed decision support and drive better health outcomes.
On July 28th, 2020, Medal was acquired by Ciox Health. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Ivix
cb_description:
Ivix aims to use achievements in the fields of molecular biology and physiology to develop a medicinal product aimed at treating female sexual and reproductive dysfunctions.

On May 14, 2020, Ivix was acquired by Ovoca Bio at a valuation of approximately $12.47M.

name: myKaarma
cb_description: myKaarma is a cloud-based software company that operates in the automotive industry. The company offers a range of services including digital communication tools, appointment setting, and smart payment systems, all designed to enhance the retail experience at franchise car dealerships. These services primarily cater to the automotive retail industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Long Beach, California.

name: Exporo
cb_description: Exporo operates in the financial and real estate sectors. It provides a platform where investors can participate in real estate projects and infrastructure development such as renewable energy projects, offering services like private real Estate debts, which allows investors to lend money for real estate projects outside the banking sector. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

name: Mosa Meat
cb_description: Mosa Meat focuses on sustainable and animal-friendly beef alternatives within the food industry. The company specializes in producing cultured beef burgers, utilizing cell-based meat technology to create real beef without the need to raise and slaughter animals. It primarily serves the food industry. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Maastricht, Netherlands.

name: Anagenex
cb_description: Anagenex is a company focused on AI-driven drug discovery within the pharmaceutical industry. It offers services that include testing billions of custom-synthesized compounds to identify those that can modulate disease-causing proteins, using proprietary neural networks and generative AI to design new compounds, and rapidly iterating through these processes to accelerate the development of medicines. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lexington, Massachusetts.

name: Nalu Medical
cb_description: Nalu Medical operates as a medical device company that operates in the healthcare sector. The company offers a neurostimulation system, a battery-free, micro-implantable device that is used to manage chronic pain by using electrical impulses to interrupt pain signals before they reach the brain. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Carlsbad, California.

name: MOVO
cb_description: MOVO is a company that focuses on digital banking in the financial services industry. The company offers services such as online shopping, money transfers, bill payments, and the creation of digital cash cards for secure payment experiences. It also provides a platform for fast, private peer-to-peer and mobile point-of-sale payments, along with 24/7 account management. MOVO was formerly known as SnapCash. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Stenon
cb_description: Stenon is a company that focuses on the development of sensor technology in the agricultural sector. The company offers a real-time soil analysis tool, FarmLab, which helps farmers and advisors optimize nitrogen fertilization, potentially saving up to 20% of costs and maximizing crop yields. The company primarily serves the agricultural industry. It is based in Potsdam, Germany.

name: Insilico Medicine
cb_description: Insilico Medicine offers biotechnology software operating in pharmaceutical research and development. It offers services such as novel target discovery, generation of molecular structures with desired properties, and clinical trial analysis. Its services primarily cater to the healthcare industry, with a particular emphasis on the discovery and development of innovative drugs for a range of conditions including cancer, fibrosis, immunity, central nervous system diseases, infectious diseases, autoimmune diseases, and aging-related diseases. It was founded in 2014 and is based in  New Territories, Hong Kong.

name: AutoLeap
cb_description: AutoLeap is a cloud-based auto repair shop management software designed to modernize the operations of auto repair businesses. The platform offers a suite of tools for workflow management, digital vehicle inspections, customer communication, parts ordering, and more, aimed at increasing efficiency and profitability. AutoLeap primarily serves the auto repair industry, providing solutions tailored to independent repair shops, multi-location businesses, and franchises. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Intron Health
cb_description: Intron Health provides speech-to-text transcription tools for healthcare workers. The company offers speech-to-text services designed to understand African accents to help in clinical documentation and facilitate the digitization of medical records. It serves the technology industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Levelpath
cb_description: Levelpath focuses on procurement in enterprise software. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence to streamline procurement processes, including business requests, projects, contracts, and key performance indicators. It primarily serves sectors such as information technology (IT) and Security, Legal, and Finance. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: LiveEO
cb_description: LiveEO specializes in earth observation technologies within the asset monitoring and analytics sector. The company leverages satellite data and AI to provide actionable insights for infrastructure monitoring and management. LiveEO's solutions cater to various industries, including electrical grids, railway networks, and pipeline operations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Oni
cb_description:
Oni is a Portuguese communications solutions provider focused exclusively on the B2B market.

On November 10th, 2020, Oni was acquired by Gigas.

name: Roadrunner
cb_description: Roadrunner provides recycling and waste management services for businesses. It offers cardboard recycling services, paper recycling services, waste and compost services, and more. The company serves the banking sector, logistics sector, manufacturing sector, and more. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Fishbrain
cb_description: Fishbrain facilitates the fishing experience by providing data-driven recommendations and tools. It offers features such as fishing spot prediction, catch location sharing, and access to fishing regulations, aiming to assist anglers in planning and optimizing their fishing trips. Fishbrain caters to the needs of the global sport fishing community by facilitating the sharing of catches and experiences among users. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Kintsugi
cb_description: Kintsugi specializes in developing voice biomarker software for the mental healthcare sector, focusing on detecting signs of depression and anxiety. The company's main offerings include an API-first platform that analyzes speech to identify mental health challenges and a self-care app that provides insights into mental wellness through journaling and cognitive behavioral therapy exercises. Kintsugi primarily serves the healthcare industry, including providers, payers, and patients, by integrating with telehealth systems and remote patient monitoring apps. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Swan Systems
cb_description: Swan Systems was a Software (non-internet/mobile) company based in San Francisco, California.  Swan Systems was acquired in 2002.

name: Checkstep
cb_description: Checkstep is a company specializing in AI-powered content moderation services for online platforms. The company offers a suite of tools that scan and moderate text, images, videos, and audio in real-time, ensuring user-generated content adheres to platform policies and regulatory compliance. Checkstep's solutions are designed to detect a wide range of harmful content, automate reporting for compliance, and manage content policies efficiently. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Mindset Health
cb_description: Mindset Health specializes in digital therapeutics, focusing on the development of hypnotherapy apps for various health conditions. The company offers a suite of mobile applications designed to help individuals manage health issues such as irritable bowel syndrome, menopause symptoms, and smoking cessation through evidence-based hypnotherapy and educational resources. These applications serve as self-management tools for patients and provide resources for clinicians to integrate into patient care. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Melbourne, Victoria.

name: EventsCase
cb_description: EventsCase is a company that specializes in event management, operating within the technology and event planning sectors. The company offers a comprehensive event management software that facilitates the planning, organization, and enhancement of in-person, virtual, and hybrid events. This includes features for online registration, event website creation, mobile app support, badge design, check-in app, exhibitor's area management, video streaming and production, and a digital venue for virtual and hybrid events. It is based in London, England.

name: Forsea Foods
cb_description: Forsea Foods specializes in the cultivation of seafood meat, operating within the biotechnology and food sectors. Its offerings include the production of cultivated seafood meat using tissue formation methods. Forsea Foods primarily serves the food industry, with a focus on providing cultivated meat for endangered species such as eel. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Rehovot, Israel.

name: Allonnia
cb_description: Allonnia is a bio-ingenuity company focused on providing solutions to environmental challenges within the biotechnology and engineering sectors. The company offers technologies for the treatment and detection of persistent pollutants like PFAS and 1,4-dioxane, as well as applications for sustainable mining. Allonnia primarily serves sectors that deal with emerging contaminants and sustainable mining practices. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Ethic
cb_description: Ethic is a platform for consumers with similar profiles to directly cover each other's small claims and rely less on their personal insurers. Ethic ceased its operation.

name: Lutra
cb_description: Lutra AI focuses on integrating artificial intelligence into workflows and applications. The company offers a platform that allows users to automate workflows using AI, without the need for coding. This includes tasks such as email categorization, data extraction from documents, and basic internet research. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Feedvisor
cb_description: Feedvisor is an artificial intelligence (AI) first optimization and intelligence platform, focusing on large sellers and brands on Amazon. It offers dynamic pricing, real-time repricing, advertising optimization, and inventory-aware technology. Feedvisor's solutions cater to various customer segments including private labels, brands, and sellers. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: 10Beauty
cb_description: 10Beauty focuses on beauty and technology, specifically in the development of automated manicure solutions. The company offers a manicure machine that performs a complete five-step manicure process without the need for human intervention. The machine is designed for use in salons, aiming to turn nail care into a profitable and labor-free service. 10Beauty was formerly known as Nailpro. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Burlington, Massachusetts.

name: Konnecto
cb_description: Konnecto focuses on intelligence and prescriptive analytics solutions providers. The company offers a platform to identify purchase patterns and prescribes recommendations for actions to yield impact and return on investment. Its services are utilized by consumer brands seeking to manage their online sales. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Codagenix
cb_description: Codagenix is a biotechnology company focused on the development of vaccines and therapeutics in the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include designing live-attenuated viruses using codon deoptimization technology to create vaccines and treatments for infectious diseases and cancer. Codagenix primarily serves the healthcare industry, with solutions aimed at infectious disease prevention and cancer therapy. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Farmingdale, New York.

name: Stacks
cb_description: Stacks is an award-winning mobile real estate tech platform catering to individual agents, teams, brokerages, and coaches. The platform offers a suite of tools including lead and referral management, performance tracking with gamification elements, and comprehensive team management capabilities. Additionally, Stacks provides financial and tax forecasting tools, a variety of real estate calculators, and CRM features designed to streamline the real estate business process. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Morpheus Space
cb_description: Morpheus Space is focused on satellite mobility within the aerospace industry. The company offers electric propulsion systems and mission analysis and design tools, which provide mobility solutions for various sizes of CubeSats and SmallSats. These services are primarily offered to the satellite and space exploration sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Teleport
cb_description: Teleport develops a platform for nomadic workers to move from place to place. It maximizes the quality of life by figuring out where to stay, what to expect, where to pay taxes, or which visa to get. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California. In April 2017, Teleport was acquired by Topia.

name: Alviere
cb_description: Alviere is an enterprise embedded finance platform operating in the financial services industry. The company offers a suite of financial products including accounts, payments, branded cards, and global money transfers, all designed to be integrated into clients' existing business models. Alviere primarily serves sectors such as travel and hospitality, retail, marketplaces, financial services, and telecommunications. Alviere was formerly known as Mezu. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Conjure
cb_description: Conjure is a modern take on business publishing. Conjure allows readers to reuse any part of a business publication (e.g. books, articles, whitepapers, etc), and remix it for their own use. Conjure makes publishers content go viral in the enterprise, while maintaining the integrety of their content with a DRM system that makes everyone happy.

name: LegitFit
cb_description: LegitFit is a company that specializes in fitness management software within the health and fitness industry. Their main offerings include a gym management system that allows fitness professionals to manage memberships, streamline bookings and payments, and gain insights into their business operations. LegitFit's software is designed to cater to various business types such as gyms, studios, personal trainers, and franchises. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cork, Ireland.

name: Power to Hydrogen
cb_description: Power to Hydrogen provides clean energy solutions. The company specializes in the development and commercialization of technology that converts renewable electricity and water into hydrogen. It serves various markets including fuels production, petroleum refining, glassmaking, steelmaking, and utility-scale solar and wind installations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

name: 3i
cb_description: 3i is a company that focuses on designing and developing both hardware and software solutions. The company's main offerings include smart pods that transform smartphones into personal cameramen, and a spatial intelligence platform for immersive Facility Management, which helps bridge the gap between distributed teams and the facilities they manage. The company primarily serves individuals, professionals, and enterprises. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: GeoPura
cb_description: GeoPura focuses on renewable energy solutions within the green technology sector. The company specializes in generating and distributing zero-emission energy using hydrogen technology, primarily for off-grid applications. GeoPura's services cater to various sectors including transportation, construction, film and TV production, and outdoor events. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Newcastle upon Tyne, United Kingdom.

name: Geniemode
cb_description: Geniemode is a global B2B cross-border sourcing and supply chain technology company. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: fizz
cb_description: Fizz is a company that operates in the financial services sector, with a focus on credit building for students. The company offers a student debit card that helps users build their credit score while also providing rewards for spending. The card is designed to prevent overspending by setting smart spend-limits and offers daily autopay to avoid overdue bills. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Southfield, Michigan.

name: Cohealo
cb_description: Cohealo is a technology company focused on the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that enables health systems to share medical equipment across facilities, thereby optimizing expenditure, improving cash flow, and enhancing access to care. Cohealo primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: SatSure
cb_description: SatSure focuses on decision intelligence within the sectors of agriculture, infrastructure, and climate action. The company offers solutions that combine satellite remote sensing, machine learning, and data analytics to provide actionable insights for various industries. SatSure's products enable decision-making by integrating satellite imagery with additional data sources for applications such as agricultural finance, infrastructure monitoring, and climate change mitigation. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: NeuroFlow
cb_description: NeuroFlow operates as a digital health company focused on integrating behavioral health with physical health across various care settings. The company offers workflow automation, patient engagement solutions, and applied artificial intelligence (AI) to facilitate remote patient monitoring, improve risk stratification, and support collaborative care. NeuroFlow primarily serves healthcare providers, payors, and the federal government with its health insurance portability and accountability act (HIPAA)-compliant, cloud-based tools designed to enhance population behavioral health and reduce the cost of care. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Almentor
cb_description: Almentor offers an online video learning platform. It provides users exclusive video courses and talks in Arabic and English to help them learn and improve skills in different areas including health, technology, humanities, entrepreneurship, and business management. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Salonkee
cb_description: Salonkee is an online platform specializing in the scheduling and booking of beauty services. The company provides a system for customers to book appointments for a variety of beauty treatments, including hairdressing, massages, and nail care, without the need for calling the service providers. Salonkee primarily serves the beauty and personal care sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg.

name: Lokal
cb_description: Lokal is a platform focused on providing local updates, job opportunities, and matrimonial services in regional languages, primarily catering to the Bharat market. The company offers a range of services including a local news aggregator, a job search platform with direct recruiter contact, and a matrimonial service to help users find suitable partners. Lokal also provides advertising solutions for businesses looking to enhance their visibility and reach within local communities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Devo
cb_description: Devo is a company that operates in the grocery delivery sector, providing an end-to-end operating system for convenience stores. The company's main service is to facilitate the delivery of a wide range of products, including food, drinks, alcohol, and cigarettes, from local shops to customers' doors in as little as 10 minutes. Devo primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: SonderMind
cb_description: SonderMind provides mental health care services. The company offers therapy and psychiatry services, enabling individuals to connect with licensed therapists and psychiatric providers for personalized mental health care. Its services are available for all ages and cater to a wide range of mental health needs. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Velyvelo
cb_description: Velyvelo specializes in long-term electric bike leasing and fleet management services for the delivery industry. The company offers a comprehensive service package that includes bike insurance, real-time tracking, regular maintenance, and support. Velyvelo primarily caters to professionals in the delivery sector, including restaurants, independent couriers, and various businesses. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Arcueil, France.

name: Filmhub
cb_description: Filmhub is a full-service film and TV distribution company that focuses on delivering distribution services for producers. The company offers a range of distribution channels including theatrical, digital streaming, broadcast, Pay TV, and physical media. Filmhub serves world-class producers and distribution partners, maximizing value for content creators. Filmhub was formerly known as Kinonation. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: La Vie Foods
cb_description: La Vie Foods focuses on creating plant-based meat alternatives within the food industry. It main offerings include a range of vegan bacon, vegetarian ham, vegan lardons, and vegetarian sandwiches. These products are crafted for consumers seeking plant-based food options. La Vie Foods was formerly known as 77 FOODS. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Insurely
cb_description: Insurely is a company that focuses on insurance brokerage and risk advisory in the insurance industry. The company offers services such as providing tailored advice and support to help businesses understand and manage their risks, organizing and reviewing insurance policies, and managing claims on behalf of their clients. They primarily cater to businesses ranging from startups to large manufacturers and exporters. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New Zealand.

name: Enboarder
cb_description: Enboarder specializes in enhancing employee experiences through its human-centric communication platform within the human resources sector. The company offers solutions for employee onboarding, career transitions, learning and development, and organizational change, all designed to foster connections and engagement. Enboarder's platform provides insights and integrations to streamline HR processes and improve employee engagement and retention. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: VideaHealth
cb_description: VideaHealth focuses on transforming dentistry through artificial intelligence and operates within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers an FDA-cleared dental AI platform that enhances diagnostic accuracy, increases treatment plan values, and improves case acceptance rates for dentists and dental service organizations (DSOs). VideaHealth's solutions are designed to provide real-time clinical insights, facilitate patient education, and promote clinical consistency across dental practices. VideaHealth was formerly known as DentistAI. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Motive
cb_description: Motive operates in the domain sales sector, offering acquisition services for domain names. Its services include a customer support system and a 30-day money-back guarantee for its products.  It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California. In September 2021, Motive was acquired by BetterUp.

name: Collectly
cb_description: Collectly provides healthcare financial solutions. The company offers a platform that streamlines patient billing operations, improves the patient's financial experience, and accelerates cash flow. Collectly primarily serves the healthcare industry, including practitioners and medical groups, billing and revenue cycle management (RCM) companies, health systems and hospitals, insurance companies, and electronic health record/precision medicine software companies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pasadena, California.

name: Yemaachi
cb_description: Yemaachi is a biotechnology company focused on cancer research.
