The company uses immunogenomics, bioinformatics, and artificial intelligence to develop strategies for cancer detection and cure, with a particular emphasis on understanding human genetic diversity. Yemaachi primarily serves the healthcare and biotechnology sectors, offering molecular cancer testing services and partnering with pharmaceutical companies to develop new diagnostics and therapeutics. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Accra, Ghana.

name: Upflex
cb_description: Upflex provides hybrid workspace solutions. The company offers a platform that facilitates the booking and management of flexible workspaces, providing businesses with tools to manage distributed workforces and reduce real estate costs. It serves sectors that require flexible office arrangements, such as companies with distributed teams. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ForMotiv
cb_description: ForMotiv specializes in behavioral analytics within the insurance sector, providing insights into the intent and risk associated with digital applicants. The company offers solutions that analyze behavioral data in real-time to predict user intent and assess risk, which aids in improving conversion rates and reducing fraud. ForMotiv's services are primarily utilized by the insurance industry, enhancing digital experiences and decision-making processes for life, home, auto, and commercial insurance providers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: CARTA
cb_description: CARTA, also known as the Charleston Area Regional Transportation Authority, is a public transportation service provider in the transit industry. The company offers a range of services including fixed route buses, on-demand transportation, park and ride facilities, and a downtown area shuttle. These services primarily cater to the needs of commuters, students, tourists, and individuals seeking access to healthcare facilities. It is based in North Charleston, South Carolina.

name: Springbok Analytics
cb_description: Springbok Analytics is a life sciences company specializing in muscle analytics to enhance health and performance outcomes. The company's main offerings include transforming 2D MRI data into detailed 3D muscle visualizations using AI-powered analysis, providing comprehensive insights into musculoskeletal health. Springbok Analytics primarily serves sectors such as life sciences, elite sports, and human performance. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Charlottesville, Virginia.

name: Pheon Therapeutics
cb_description: Pheon Therapeutics is a company that specializes in the development of Antibody-Drug Conjugates (ADCs), operating within the healthcare and biotechnology sectors. The company's main focus is on creating ADCs that can be used to treat a variety of hard-to-treat cancers, including both solid tumors and liquid cancers that have proven resistant to other treatments. Pheon Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically the oncology sector. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Harpenden, United Kingdom.

name: Verdigris Technologies
cb_description: Verdigris Technologies specializes in smart building management through advanced sensor technology and AI analytics within the energy sector. The company provides detailed energy data monitoring and adaptive automation solutions to improve the efficiency and reliability of electrical systems in buildings. Verdigris primarily serves sectors such as data centers, commercial buildings, and industrial facilities. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Los Altos, California.

name: Voidless
cb_description: Voidless specializes in packaging solutions within the packaging and machinery industry. The company focuses on the development, design, production, marketing, and maintenance of packaging systems and machines that create custom-sized boxes on demand. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: EasyMile
cb_description: EasyMile specializes in autonomous vehicle technology and solutions within the transportation and logistics sectors. The company offers driverless mobility for passengers and goods transportation, including autonomous shuttles, tow tractors, and yard trucks, designed with safety and real-world application in mind. EasyMile primarily serves sectors such as airports, passenger transport, industrial sites, and ports with its turnkey solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toulouse, France.

name: DNAnexus
cb_description: DNAnexus specializes in cloud computing and bioinformatics in healthcare. The company offers a platform that allows biomedical organizations to manage, analyze, and collaborate on multimodal data, with the aim of accelerating scientific discovery and improving patient care. It primarily serves sectors such as pharmaceutical and biotech, clinical diagnostics, and biobanks, and population programs. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Ceribell
cb_description: Ceribell operates as a medical device company. The company offers a system that enables rapid seizure triage and continuous bedside electroencephalogram (EEG) monitoring, which can be set up by any healthcare provider within minutes. The main sectors that cater to this are the emergency and intensive care units in the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Flo
cb_description: Flo develops a mobile calendar to improve everyday life. The app, which is released in a month, aims to unite calendars, to-do lists and e-mail  both work as well as private  to provide a better overview of a person's to-do and tasks.

name: UXCam
cb_description: UXCam focuses on mobile application analytics within the technology sector. Its main offerings include in-depth insights into user behavior, product success metrics, and optimization tools for mobile applications. It primarily serves sectors that require robust analytics for mobile applications, such as the e-commerce industry and technology companies with mobile application products. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Memfault
cb_description: Memfault helps hardware companies catch and fix embedded software bugs. It helps by providing a view of errors their devices are encountering in the field and infrastructure to deploy targeted fixes. Its services include remote debugging, device monitoring, over-the-air (OTA) updates, and more. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Einride
cb_description: Einride is a freight technology company specializing in the provision of digital, electric, and autonomous shipping solutions. The company offers solutions that enable the decarbonization of road freight through the integration of electric and autonomous vehicles, managed by its data-driven operating system, Saga. Einride primarily serves the retail logistics sector, helping businesses comply with environmental, social and governance (ESG) regulations and meet eco-conscious consumer demands. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Polywork
cb_description: Polywork is a company focused on personal branding and online presence enhancement within the professional services sector. It offers a service that converts LinkedIn profiles into personalized websites using artificial intelligence, catering to individuals looking to establish or improve their professional online presence. The platform is tailored for various professionals including software engineers, founders, product managers, designers, and writers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Embrace
cb_description: Embrace operates in the healthcare technology sector, focusing on resolving communication challenges within medical and caregiving environments. The company's main offering is a social medical coordination platform known as Medical Care Station (MCS), which connects people, information, and data to facilitate multi-disciplinary collaboration and improve patient-centered care. The platform is widely adopted by medical associations across the nation and is used by over 250,000 healthcare and caregiving professionals. It was founded in 2001 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Kanarys
cb_description: Kanarys provides business analytics services. The company offers a platform that provides tools, benchmarking, and data to help organizations incorporate Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) into their operations and measure its impact on business outcomes. It serves the business sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: AdmitKard
cb_description: AdmitKard is an Ed-Tech platform focused on assisting students with their study abroad endeavors. The company offers services such as personalized guidance for university shortlisting, profile building, test preparation, scholarship and visa application assistance, and securing education loans. AdmitKard primarily serves students seeking to study in international universities across various countries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Noida, India.

name: JetCool
cb_description: JetCool operates as a company specializing in advanced cooling solutions for electronics in various sectors. The company offers direct-to-chip liquid cooling technology. JetCool's products are designed to improve thermal management, increase device efficiency, and reduce energy and water consumption. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Littleton, Massachusetts.

name: Mira
cb_description:
Mira tailors the content on Digital Out-of-Home screens based on the mobile devices nearby. Whether they're displays in a mall, giant billboards in Times Square, or in the back of a taxi, these screens all have two things in common: they're serving us ads, and none of them know anything meaningful about us as an audience. Mira changes that by "listening" for anonymous profiles from mobile devices and triggering relevant content on enabled Digital Out-of-Home screens based on what it hears.

On October 5th, 2021, Mira was acquired by Reveal Mobile. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Fiat Republic
cb_description: Fiat Republic provides a banking-as-a-service (BaaS) platform. The company offers a banking and payments application programming interface (API) allowing crypto platforms to automate and embed fiat flows for their end-users and internal treasury teams. Fiat Republic primarily serves the cryptocurrency industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Contra
cb_description: Contra provides a platform to connect professional communities for the freelance, remote, and independent workforce. The company's main service is to connect freelancers with potential employers, facilitating the discovery of talent, and management of payments, contracts, and projects. It primarily serves the recruiting industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sano Genetics
cb_description: Sano Genetics focuses on helping in the transition to precision medicine within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that includes services such as clinical trial recruitment, deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) testing, and patient engagement. It primarily caters to healthcare sector. Sano Genetics was formerly known as Heterogeneous. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Leap
cb_description: Leap uses artificial intelligence technology to give candidates and companies an online career platform which provides useful resources throughout the recruitment cycle. For candidates, Leap provides a free job application resource. An interactive profile can be used to demonstrate skills, personality and experience. Candidates can view detailed information and media about companies in the region  including "behind the scenes" videos  and have access to career resources including coaching and informative articles. The scoring system matches a candidate's suitability for each role.

name: MatchaBar
cb_description: MatchaBar is a company focused on the production and distribution of matcha-based products in the food and beverage industry. The company offers a range of matcha products, including ceremonial grade matcha powder, which provides a healthier, stress-free energy boost without the jitters or crash typically associated with caffeine. The company primarily serves the consumer goods sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: PlanetScale
cb_description: PlanetScale offers a serverless database platform. The company offers a MySQL-compatible database that provides scale, performance, and reliability, with features such as horizontal sharding, non-blocking schema changes, and data replication across multiple regions. PlanetScale primarily serves the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Green Check Verified
cb_description: Green Check Verified specializes in providing software solutions for the cannabis industry, focusing on compliance and financial service integration. The company offers a suite of products that facilitate banking, lending, and other financial services for cannabis businesses, as well as compliance and growth software for financial institutions. Green Check Verified primarily serves the cannabis industry, financial institutions, and business service providers seeking to navigate the complexities of cannabis-related commerce. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bonita Springs, Florida.

name: Happeo
cb_description: Happeo is an intranet company operating in the information technology sector. The company offers a platform for teams to manage knowledge and internal communications, featuring a template-based page builder and integrations with various company tools. Happeo primarily serves businesses of all sizes, helping them to keep their teams informed, aligned, and productive. Happeo was formerly known as Universe. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Traceable AI
cb_description: Traceable AI specializes in API security solutions within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform that provides API discovery, threat detection, attack protection, fraud and bot security, and API testing services. Traceable AI primarily serves sectors such as finance and banking, government and public sector, healthcare, high tech, and retail and eCommerce. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Overjet
cb_description: Overjet focuses on dental artificial intelligence, operating within the healthcare technology sector. It offers a platform that supports dental providers and payers by enhancing clinical care and administrative efficiency through AI-driven radiographic analysis and claims processing optimization. The company primarily sells to the dental industry, including dental service organizations (DSOs), dental groups, and insurance companies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Jobble
cb_description: Jobble is a company that focuses on providing on-demand staffing solutions in the gig economy and hourly workforce industry. The company offers a platform that connects businesses with workers for temporary, temp-to-perm, and on-demand staffing needs, catering to various sectors such as warehousing, logistics, events, general labor, seasonal demands, and the restaurant and hospitality industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Raincoat
cb_description: Raincoat provides insurance products. It enables customers to buy insurance online, monitors policy locations for hurricane-force winds, and pays automatically if they detect hurricane winds over land within 25 miles of their location. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Juan, Puerto Rico.

name: Clutch!
cb_description: Clutch! is a company specializing in gameday parking solutions within the sports and entertainment event industry. The company offers a digital parking pass system that enables simplified management of parking spaces, cashless transactions, and real-time tracking of parking activities. Clutch! primarily serves sectors such as college athletics, professional sports, and various event organizers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Birmingham, Alabama.

name: David Energy
cb_description: David Energy is a power company focused on smart energy management and electricity supply within the energy sector. The company offers services that integrate clean energy sources with smart technology to provide cleaner electricity for homes and businesses. David Energy's solutions cater to the residential and commercial sectors, optimizing energy consumption and reducing electric bills through intelligent system management and demand response services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Nest Health
cb_description: Nest Health focuses on providing whole-family healthcare services within the healthcare industry. The company offers a range of services including in-home and online medical visits, medical advice, and care for families, integrating these services with existing health insurance benefits. It offers primary care, pediatric care, mental health support, and more. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New Orleans, Louisiana.

name: SpotHero
cb_description: SpotHero offers on-demand parking services. It offers a mobile application that enables drivers to reserve parking spots such as garages, parking lots, and more. It also allows customers to reserve parking spots, compare rates, and find open parking. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: InCountry
cb_description: InCountry provides data residency-as-a-service and cross-border data transfers. It develops software development kits (SDKs) in a range of popular programming languages so that companies can access their customer data to build new applications and services. It serves sectors such as automotive, energy, financial services, and much more. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Peptone
cb_description: Peptone operates as a translational biophysics company. The company focuses on the discovery of novel therapeutics targeting disordered proteins, which lack rigid three-dimensional (3D) structures but play critical roles in biological processes. It primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Zeller
cb_description:
Zeller is a value added distributor of electrical and automation components and solutions, including motion control, programmable logic controller (PLC) based automation, machine vision, electrical controls and power distribution products. A premier Schneider Electric distribution partner, Zeller also represents other quality manufacturers including Kollmorgen, Phoenix Contact, Rittal and Sick.

In September 2012, Zeller was acquired by Kaman Industrial Technologies. The valuation of Zeller was undisclosed. Other terms of the deal were not released.

name: PortalOne
cb_description: PortalOne is a company specializing in the creation of hybrid games, a new category of entertainment that blends gaming with live shows. The company offers a platform where users can play games, participate in daily tournaments, and watch shows broadcasted within the games, with opportunities to win prizes. PortalOne primarily serves the mobile gaming and entertainment industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: Diagrid
cb_description: Diagrid specializes in providing unified APIs for messaging, data, and workflow automation within the cloud computing industry. Its main offerings include enterprise-grade Dapr for Kubernetes and fully managed Dapr APIs that facilitate microservice orchestration, event-driven architectures, and state management. Diagrid primarily caters to application developers seeking to build cloud-native applications with enhanced productivity and resilience. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Federal Way, Washington.

name: Go1
cb_description: Go1 is a company that specializes in learning and development, operating within the education sector. The company provides a platform that curates educational content from top providers, offering a wide range of courses for upskilling and training purposes. Go1 primarily serves businesses, providing them with a comprehensive learning ecosystem for their employees. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Underwood, Australia.

name: Provus
cb_description: Provus is a payment provider that supports companies in outsourcing, acquiring, and card processing, eCommerce payment transactions and point-of-sale operations.

name: Graze
cb_description: Graze operates as a snack company. It offers snack combinations through snack subscription boxes, an online shop, and retailers. It delivers packaged foods directly to consumers via mail. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Kingston upon Thames, United Kingdom. In February 2019, Graze was acquired by Unilever.

name: Refurbed
cb_description: Refurbed operates in the refurbished products sector. It offers a wide range of refurbished products including electronics, household appliances, sports equipment, and more. Its products undergo a 40-step refurbishment process to ensure they function like new. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Savvy
cb_description: Wisdom Collective, dba Savvy, offers an easy way to teach online. Teach anyone, anywhere with simple scheduling, elegant video chat, and automatic payments.

name: Pennylane
cb_description: Pennylane is a comprehensive financial management and accounting platform for businesses. The company offers a suite of tools for invoice creation, purchase management, cash flow tracking, and professional account management, all designed to simplify financial operations and decision-making for entrepreneurs and accountants. Pennylane primarily serves small and medium-sized enterprises, independent professionals, and accounting firms. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cherbourg-Octeville, France.

name: Inari
cb_description: Inari develops technology for networking over electric power cables

name: Dexterity
cb_description: Dexterity focuses on developing mobile technology and consumer products within the technology sector. Its main offerings include mobile technology, which aims to simplify everyday life, embrace green technology, and provide cost-saving solutions for consumers. It primarily collaborates with teams and start-up companies to develop new ideas in technology. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Greenville, North Carolina.

name: Spectro Cloud
cb_description: Spectro Cloud is a company focused on providing enterprise Kubernetes management solutions across various sectors. Their main offerings include a platform named Palette, which facilitates the management of Kubernetes environments, ensuring control and efficiency in deployment, orchestration, and lifecycle management of clusters across clouds, data centers, bare metal, and edge environments. Spectro Cloud's Palette platform is designed to cater to the needs of organizations managing complex, multi-cluster Kubernetes environments, offering features such as enterprise-grade security, decentralized architecture, and full-stack orchestration. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: UNTUCKit
cb_description: UNTUCKit specializes in casual apparel designed to be worn untucked, catering to the fashion and retail industry. The company offers a range of products including men's and women's shirts, sweaters, tees, henleys, polos, pants, dresses, shoes, and accessories, all crafted to suit various body types and sizes. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: GetWork
cb_description: GetWork is a fresher hiring platform that specializes in connecting recent graduates with potential employers across various industries. The platform leverages AI technology to match job seekers with verified job openings, facilitating a streamlined job application process. GetWork also offers additional support services such as a resume builder, a 24x7 career helpline, and interview preparation training to enhance the employability of freshers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: eddii
cb_description: eddii develops a diabetes-tracking mobile application. The company's platform offers a virtual in-app character designed to engage people living with diabetes to track and record their health through gamification and witty conversations, providing users with helpful tips in the form of a weekly report, and also rewards healthy practices and performance through in-app rewards. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ROLLER
cb_description: ROLLER focused on the leisure and attractions industry. It offers a software platform that supports various aspects of business operations, including ticketing, point-of-sale, customer relationship management, memberships, gift cards, waivers, self-serve kiosks, and cashless wallets. The company serves the leisure and attractions industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in South Melbourne, Australia.

name: MyCarrier
cb_description: MyCarrier specializes in providing a web-based platform for less-than-truckload (LTL) and full truckload (FTL) shipping services within the logistics and transportation industry. The company offers a suite of tools for real-time quoting, booking management, invoice auditing, and seamless integration with existing systems. MyCarrier's platform is designed to serve various sectors of the economy, including small and medium-sized businesses, by offering efficient freight management and connectivity with trusted carriers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Sandbox VR
cb_description: Sandbox VR operates as a gaming software company. The company combines motion with virtual reality technology to create a digital dualism and develops games with virtual reality experiences for groups at a wide range of locations where users can see and physically interact with everyone while playing. It primarily serves the gaming industry. Sandbox VR  was formerly known as Glo Games. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Roomi
cb_description: Roomi offers a free mobile app for roommate and housing searches.

name: Borrowell
cb_description: Borrowell  operates as a financial technology company. It focuses on credit education and financial well-being. The company offers free access to credit scores and reports, alongside monitoring, personalized financial product recommendations, and educational resources to help individuals improve their financial health. Borrowell serves customers looking for insights and products related to personal finance management. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Melodics
cb_description: Melodics is a company that focuses on music education, specifically in the domain of electronic music instruments. The company offers a desktop application that provides interactive lessons for learning to play MIDI keyboards, pad controllers, and electronic drum kits. The primary customers of Melodics are individuals interested in learning or improving their skills in playing electronic music instruments. It is based in Aukland, New Zealand.

name: Lookback
cb_description: Lookback is a company that focuses on usability testing and user interviews in the tech industry. The company offers services that allow businesses to test their apps and websites, conduct interviews with their customers, and analyze the results to improve their products. Lookback primarily sells to the tech industry, including ecommerce and cloud computing sectors. It is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Innovist
cb_description: Innovist is a company focused on providing hair and skin care products, operating within the personal care and beauty industry. The company offers a range of products including shampoos, conditioners, serums, body washes, and sunscreens designed to address various concerns such as hair fall, dandruff, skin aging, and sun protection. Innovist prides itself on creating clean, transparent, and scientifically-backed products, ensuring high quality and efficacy. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: Dot
cb_description: Dot is a company that operates in the food and beverage, retail, and service sectors. It provides a range of business tools including point of sale systems, online store creation, QR solutions, inventory management, payment integration, and delivery integration. The company primarily serves the food and beverage industry, the retail industry, and various service professionals. Dot was formerly known as DotPe. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: GoShare
cb_description: GoShare is a company that focuses on logistics and delivery services. The company offers on-demand delivery services for last mile delivery, middle mile logistics, and moving services, catering to the needs of individuals and businesses alike. Their services are primarily utilized in sectors such as retail, construction, and business-to-business logistics. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: TriEye
cb_description: TriEye is a pioneer in the development of short-wave infrared (SWIR) sensing solutions within the sensor technology industry. The company's main offerings include image data and depth perception capabilities that function reliably in all weather and lighting conditions. TriEye's technology is primarily utilized in the automotive, industrial, biometrics, and consumer mobile sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Icon Savings Plan
cb_description: Icon Savings Plan specializes in providing retirement savings solutions, focusing on the financial services industry. Icon Savings Plan primarily serves businesses of various sizes, offering them retirement plan design, automated system integration with payroll providers, and comprehensive support services. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Stonly
cb_description: Stonly is a company focused on knowledge management and customer service automation within the customer support sector. The company offers a platform that provides AI-powered self-service, interactive guides, and knowledge base creation to improve customer support operations. Stonly's solutions are designed to reduce support tickets, accelerate agent training, and enable customers to self-serve effectively. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Levallois-Perret, France.

name: Bazaart
cb_description: Bazaart offers personalized fashion catalogs for tablets. Bazaart also offers a photo collage application that allows users to work with adobe creative cloud. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Haifa, Israel.

name: UVeye
cb_description: UVeye operates as a computer vision technology company. It offers automated inspection systems for vehicles, utilizing artificial intelligence (AI) and proprietary hardware to detect vehicle issues and security-related threats. Its major products are Apollo, Helios, and Atlas Lite. Its services primarily cater to vehicle manufacturers, dealerships, fleet companies, and logistical centers. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Teaneck, New Jersey.

name: pureLiFi
cb_description: pureLiFi specializes in LiFi technology within the wireless communications industry. The company offers a range of products that use light to transmit data, providing a similar user experience to traditional wireless systems but with the potential for significantly greater data capacity and bandwidth. Their primary market includes both consumer and industrial sectors, with applications ranging from smart cars to smartphones. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Edinburgh, United Kingdom.

name: Swiftly
cb_description: Swiftly is a company focused on providing software solutions for the public transportation sector. Their main offerings include real-time passenger information systems, analytics and insights for transit operations, and tools for service planning and scheduling. These products aim to improve the reliability of transit services and enhance the overall passenger experience. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Horizon Robotics
cb_description: Horizon Robotics specializes in advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) and autonomous driving (AD) solutions within the automotive industry. The company offers a range of products including energy-efficient automotive grade computing solutions and a software development toolkit for application developers in smart vehicle technologies. Horizon Robotics primarily serves the automotive sector, partnering with OEMs, Tier1s, ODMs, ISVs, and sensor manufacturers to enhance vehicle safety and driving experience. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: QuoteToMe
cb_description: QuoteToMe is a company that focuses on procurement automation in the construction industry. The company offers a cloud-based software that streamlines the purchasing process for construction contractors, enabling them to easily request multiple quotes for materials and equipment, issue digital purchase orders, and track orders. This service primarily caters to the construction industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Edmonton, Alberta.

name: Fundpath
cb_description: Fundpath operates as a business intelligence service provider in the wealth and asset management industry. It offers data analysis and intelligence sharing to facilitate better engagement between fund buyers and sellers. Fundpath primarily serves the financial services sector, enhancing investment distribution processes. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: BlissClub
cb_description: BlissClub is a brand that specializes in women's activewear, focusing on creating technical movewear for the Indian market. The company offers a range of comfortable athletic apparel, including leggings, sports bras, and tops, designed with high-quality materials and inclusive sizing to cater to the Indian woman. BlissClub also fosters a fitness and wellness community, encouraging women to lead active lifestyles. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: 86 Repairs
cb_description: 86 Repairs is a company that focuses on repair and maintenance management, primarily serving the restaurant industry. The company offers a tech-enabled solution that includes on-demand repair management and preventative maintenance, providing restaurants with data-driven insights and 24/7 support to control their facilities and reduce repair and maintenance costs. The company primarily sells to the restaurant industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Revolut
cb_description: Revolut is a financial technology company offering a suite of money management tools. It provides services such as international money transfers, currency exchange, stock trading, and savings accounts. Revolut caters to both personal and business financial needs, with a focus on providing more control and visibility over users' finances. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Sirona Technologies
cb_description: Sirona Technologies focuses on environmental technology, specifically in the domain of direct air capture. The company's main service involves the development and implementation of technology that removes CO2 from the atmosphere. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Brussels, Belgium.

name: Qover
cb_description: Qover specializes in insurance orchestration within the insurance sector. The company offers a platform-as-a-service to enable businesses to integrate insurance services into their digital experiences, including claims management and customer support. Qover primarily serves sectors that require integrated insurance solutions, such as fintech, automotive, retail, and the gig economy. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brussels, Belgium.

name: Goodlord
cb_description: Goodlord is a company that specializes in providing a cloud-based platform for the lettings industry. Its main offerings include a core platform that automates the entire tenancy process, from tenant referencing and rent collection to insurance products and utility management. The company primarily serves the real estate tech industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: Pidge
cb_description: Pidge is a logistics company focused on enhancing the last-mile delivery ecosystem through its advanced technology solutions. The company offers a suite of products that streamline logistics operations, including AI-driven delivery optimization, omni-category fulfillment, and the creation of hybrid delivery networks. Pidge primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce, grocery, restaurants, and subscription services. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Ranovus
cb_description: Ranovus is a company focused on developing advanced interconnect solutions for data center infrastructure. Its main offerings include a monolithic silicon photonics platform capable of 100Gbps interconnects and designed for multi-terabit optical interconnect applications, aiming to enhance the capacity and efficiency of data centers. Ranovus' products are primarily utilized in the data center industry, particularly for AI/ML workloads. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Ottawa, Ontario.

name: Unit
cb_description: Unit is a company that focuses on the knowledge sector. The company provides services and products for education and research. These include infrastructure, data, and shared services that aim to enhance user experiences and meet overarching goals of digitalization, data sharing, and open research. The company primarily serves the education and research sectors. It is based in Trondheim, Norway.

name: Observe
cb_description: Observe focuses on providing an observability cloud platform for enterprise-scale data analytics. The company offers a solution that ingests data from various sources, enabling users to correlate and troubleshoot complex system data effectively. It serves sectors that require monitoring and analytics capabilities, such as cloud computing and SaaS providers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Pryon
cb_description: Pryon specializes in AI-powered knowledge management within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that transforms unstructured content into a secure and responsive source of truth, enabling users to access critical information quickly and efficiently. Pryon primarily serves sectors such as energy, financials, government, healthcare, industrials, materials, technology, and utilities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Doola
cb_description: Doola specializes in eco-friendly end-of-life services within the deathcare industry. The company offers aquamation, a water-based cremation process that is environmentally friendly, and manages all related logistics for a stress-free experience. Doola primarily serves individuals seeking green burial alternatives. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Illumio
cb_description: Illumio operates as a data center and cloud security platform. It helps in micro-segmentation and defense against cyber threats in data centers and cloud environments. It offers a zero trust segmentation (ZTS) platform providing breach mitigation solutions. The company serves industries such as energy, healthcare, financial services, and others. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: ARABLE
cb_description: ARABLE focuses on hydroponic vegetable production within the agricultural sector, specializing in creating farms suited for arid climates. The company offers locally grown vegetables using hydroponic technology that requires significantly less water than traditional farming and operates year-round. ARABLE primarily serves the agricultural industry with an emphasis on enhancing food security and sustainability in regions with limited water resources and arable land. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Occupier
cb_description: Occupier specializes in lease management and accounting software within the commercial real estate sector. The company offers a suite of products that facilitate lease administration, accounting compliance, and real estate transaction management for commercial tenants. Occupier's software is designed to serve various industries including retail, restaurants, healthcare, and banking. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Feel Therapeutics
cb_description: Feel Therapeutics specializes in digital precision medicine, focusing on the mental healthcare sector. It offers a platform integrating continuous data collection from wearables and apps with proprietary algorithms to provide objective mental health metrics and personalized digital therapeutic programs. It primarily serves the healthcare and life science sectors. It was formerly known as Sentio Solutions. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Itilite
cb_description: Itilite is a company that focuses on providing unified corporate travel and expense management solutions. The company offers a platform that simplifies the booking process for business travel, including flights, hotels, and cabs, and also manages expense reimbursement, with features for policy controls and audits. It primarily serves businesses looking to optimize their travel and expense management processes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: ECOncrete
cb_description: ECOncrete is a company focused on providing nature-inclusive solutions for marine construction, enhancing biodiversity with its patented technology in the construction industry. The company offers products that modify the chemical and physical properties of concrete to promote the growth of marine organisms and improve the structural strength of marine infrastructures. ECOncrete's technology is designed to meet industry standards and provide environmental benefits while complying with regulatory requirements. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Shinobi Therapeutics
cb_description: Shinobi Therapeutics focuses on the development of immune evasion technology for cell therapies. The company's main offering is a cell therapy that works with the patient's immune system, rather than against it, to potentially cure cancer and other devastating diseases. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: CollegeVine
cb_description: CollegeVine is a company that focuses on providing guidance and resources for college admissions, operating in the education sector. The company offers a range of services including advising, connecting students with colleges, providing tools for calculating admission chances, and facilitating community discussions. These services are primarily targeted towards high school students preparing for college admissions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: FibriCheck
cb_description: FibriCheck focuses on cardiac care through advanced heart rhythm monitoring and management of atrial fibrillation. The company offers a medically certified application that enables users to measure their heart rhythm using their smartphone's camera, providing immediate and actionable results. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Hasselt, Belgium.

name: Avant Meats
cb_description: Avant Meats specializes in the cultivation of fish products using sustainable and scalable processes within the alternative protein industry. The company offers cultivated fish and seafood products that are designed to be nutritious, authentic, and free from pollutants and animal cruelty. Avant Meats primarily serves the food industry with a focus on meeting the cultural preferences of consumers in Asia. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Hong Kong.

name: butter
cb_description: butter is a Berkley, Michigan-based company providing cannabis products to consumers.

name: Ai Palette
cb_description: Ai Palette specializes in accelerating food and beverage innovation through artificial intelligence tools within the consumer packaged goods (CPG) sector. It offers a suite of AI-driven services that enable the discovery of emerging trends, new product concept creation, and virtual validation of these concepts based on consumer preferences. It primarily serves CPG brands, flavor and fragrance houses, ingredient companies, and consulting firms in the food and beverage industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: Payslip
cb_description: Payslip is a global payroll control platform that specializes in AI-powered automation for multinational organizations. The company offers a suite of products designed to streamline the end-to-end payroll process, including data collection, validation, and reporting, while providing actionable insights for decision-making. Payslip primarily serves sectors that require integrated payroll management solutions, such as multinational corporations with complex payroll needs across various countries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Shuttlers
cb_description: Shuttlers is a shared transportation service provider focusing on commuting solutions. The company offers scheduled mass-transit services, vehicle rental, and event-specific transportation arrangements. Shuttlers primarily serves businesses and individual commuters seeking reliable and comfortable transit options. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Quizizz
cb_description: Quizizz is an educational technology company that focuses on creating an adaptive learning platform for educators and students. The company offers a suite of tools that enable the creation of engaging and personalized quizzes, lessons, and activities, enhanced with artificial intelligence to cater to the diverse learning needs of students. Quizizz primarily serves the education sector, offering solutions that support inclusive and flexible learning across various subjects and grade levels. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Expert360
cb_description: Expert360 is a company that focuses on providing talent solutions in various business sectors. The company offers services such as hiring exceptional talent for various roles including management consultants, software engineers, data scientists, project experts, and more. They primarily cater to businesses in need of skilled professionals for short-term or project-based roles. It is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: SellerX
cb_description: SellerX is a high-growth eCommerce company operating in the online retail industry. The company's primary service involves acquiring and scaling Amazon businesses, with the aim of transforming these brands into globally recognized entities. SellerX primarily serves the eCommerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Synthace
cb_description: Synthace focuses on providing a digital experiment platform for the life science research and development sector. Its platform aids scientists to design, automate, and run experiments without the need for coding and automatically collects structured data and metadata. Synthace primarily serves the life science research and development (R&D) teams looking for experimental processes and data analysis. It was founded in 2011 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Descope
cb_description: Descope specializes in authentication and user management within the cybersecurity sector. It offers a platform that enables developers to create and manage user authentication and identity management processes, including passwordless login, multi-factor authentication, and single sign-on, in a simplified, no-code environment. Descope's solutions cater primarily to B2C and B2B SaaS applications, providing tools and integrations to enhance security and user experience. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Altos, California.

name: Brilliant
cb_description: Brilliant specializes in smart home automation, focusing on the home control and lighting system industry. The company offers products that allow users to control various aspects of their home, such as lighting, music, cameras, locks, and climate, through a single mobile app or in-wall control system. These products are primarily sold to the home building industry, including single-family home builders and multifamily property developers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: ThoughtRiver
cb_description: ThoughtRiver is a company that focuses on contract acceleration using advanced artificial intelligence technology, operating within the legal tech industry. The company offers an automated contract review solution that identifies potential issues in contracts and manages the negotiation process around these issues, thereby speeding up the contract negotiation process. This service primarily caters to the legal sector, including law firms and corporate legal departments. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Supabase
cb_description: Supabase provides an open-source platform providing backend services, primarily focused on database management and development tools. The company offers a suite of services including a managed Postgres database, user authentication, instant APIs, serverless functions, file storage, and real-time data synchronization. Supabase caters to developers and businesses looking to build and scale applications. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: AtmosZero
cb_description: AtmosZero focuses on providing industrial electric boilers for the energy sector. The company's main product is a modular electrified boiler that converts ambient heat into decarbonized steam, tailored to meet various temperature requirements. AtmosZero primarily serves industries and sectors aiming to achieve carbon neutrality through decarbonization initiatives. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Fort Collins, Colorado.

name: Opal
cb_description: Opal specializes in fitness technology, focusing on workout optimization and injury prevention. The company offers a unique thin film sensor product that collects data from sweat to provide insights into muscle fatigue, aerobic to anaerobic transitions, and hydration levels. Opal's products are designed for individuals seeking to enhance their workout experience through data-driven insights. It is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Sublime Systems
cb_description: Sublime Systems develops and commercializes low-carbon cement. The company's main offering is a low-carbon cement that performs similarly to traditional cement but with a significantly reduced environmental impact. Its product is created through a process that eliminates the need for the energy and fossil fuel-intensive kiln stage of cement manufacturing. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Tongo
cb_description: Tongo develops a smart device that can control things such as smartphones, computers, and wheelchairs by using ones tongue, giving those who may be paralyzed or without the ability to use ones fingers more control over devices they use daily.

name: Faye
cb_description: Faye specializes in whole-trip travel insurance within the insurance industry. The company offers a range of travel insurance services, including coverage for health, trips, personal belongings, and real-time assistance, all accessible through a user-friendly mobile app. Faye's insurance products are designed to provide travelers with peace of mind by offering proactive solutions and support to address travel mishaps efficiently. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Newark, Delaware.

name: InsightFinder
cb_description: InsightFinder specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) for enterprise information technology (IT) efficiency, operating within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that uses machine learning to predict and prevent IT incidents, analyze system health in real-time, and automate root cause analysis. InsightFinder's solutions are designed to improve decision-making and operational efficiency for DevOps, IT operations, and site reliability engineering teams. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Citizen
cb_description: Citizen is a personal safety network that focuses on providing real-time updates and safety tools to individuals. The company offers services such as instant 911 alerts, live broadcasts of incidents, and a platform for community engagement to enhance personal and public safety. Citizen sells primarily to the general consumer market, offering both free and subscription-based services to enhance individual safety and awareness. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Plotly
cb_description: Plotly specializes in app development and data visualization within the technology sector. The company offers a platform for building, scaling, and deploying data apps in Python, and maintains open-source graphing libraries that enable interactive data visualization in web browsers. Plotly's solutions are primarily utilized by data science teams to integrate complex Python analytics into business operations for real-time data sharing and decision-making. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Provision Analytics
cb_description: Provision Analytics provides digital solutions for food safety and quality assurance within the agriculture, manufacturing, and distribution sectors. The company has a cloud-based platform that supports compliance, supply chain management, and process analytics by offering tools for digital recordkeeping, automated alerts, and reporting to aid food safety operations. Provision Analytics serves the food safety and quality assurance roles within these industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: Platform9
cb_description: Platform9 focuses on unified infrastructure management. The company offers managed services for Kubernetes, KubeVirt, Bare Metal, and OpenStack, providing solutions for virtualization, cloud-native artificial intelligence/machine learning, edge cloud, retail, and private cloud. It primarily serves sectors such as retail, telecommunications, and private cloud industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: upSWOT
cb_description: upSWOT develops as a white-label embedded finance and business management platform. The company provides a suite of tools that aggregate real-time data from various software as a service (SaaS) applications, offering interactive dashboards and actionable insights to small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs), while also equipping financial institutions with analytics to enhance client relationships. It primarily caters to the financial services industry, delivering solutions that help banks and financial technologiess engage with and support their SMB customers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Fort Mill, South Carolina.

name: Mavenoid
cb_description: Mavenoid specializes in product support automation for complex products and devices within the customer support industry. The company offers troubleshooting and personalized remote support services, leveraging conversational AI to enhance customer support experiences. Mavenoid's solutions are designed to provide clear step-by-step instructions for product discovery, warranty registration, and more, aiming to increase self-service resolution rates and support efficiency. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: StoryFit
cb_description: StoryFit specializes in artificial intelligence insights and machine learning solutions within the book publishing, movie, and television production industries. The company offers a technology platform that provides audience analytics and content analysis to enhance the performance and profitability of narrative content. StoryFit primarily serves the entertainment industry, aiding publishers, studios, and creative professionals in making data-driven decisions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Spotawheel
cb_description: Spotawheel is a technologically advanced platform specializing in the sale of used cars. The company offers a transparent online showroom experience, thoroughly inspected vehicles, and a range of services including direct home delivery, a money-back guarantee, and a limited warranty. Spotawheel primarily serves individual consumers and businesses looking for pre-owned vehicle purchasing and leasing options. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Athens, Greece.

name: Adalo
cb_description: Adalo is a platform focused on the technology sector, specifically in the domain of no-code app development. The company offers a service that allows users to design and build custom web and mobile applications without the need for coding skills. These applications can be published directly to various platforms such as the App Store, Google Play, or the web. Adalo primarily serves individuals and businesses looking to create their own applications, including freelancers, creatives, startup founders, and organizations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: MDI Health
cb_description: MDI Health develops a framework for artificial pharmacology intelligence. The company uses technology, methodology, and algorithms to ensure early detection of potential medication-related problems (MRPs) during a drug treatment regimen. It is an add-on to electronic health records systems (EHRs) supporting physicians, helping them make more informed medication-related decisions, and providing personalized multi-drug treatment. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Pathao
cb_description: Pathao serves as a digital platform offering a suite of services including transportation and delivery within the ridesharing and logistics sectors. The company provides on-demand services such as bike and car rides, food delivery from local restaurants, and parcel and courier delivery solutions. Pathao's services cater to individuals and businesses seeking transportation and delivery options. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Dhaka, Bangladesh. In December 2019, Pathao merged with SureCash.

name: Tasso
cb_description: Tasso is a company that focuses on the healthcare and diagnostics sector, providing patient-centric technology for remote blood collection. The company offers devices for easy and virtually painless remote blood sample collection, which are designed to integrate seamlessly with standard lab processes. These devices are primarily used in decentralized clinical trials, pharmaceutical clinical trials, and by hospital systems. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: PhonePe
cb_description: PhonePe is a leading digital payments company offering a range of financial services across various sectors. The company provides a platform for UPI payments, online payment gateway services, and financial products including insurance and investment options. PhonePe caters to both businesses and consumers, offering solutions like offline payment services, merchant lending, and an app marketplace, as well as personal loans and digital gold investments. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bangalore, India. PhonePe operates as a subsidiary of Walmart.

name: Climeworks
cb_description: Climeworks serves as a carbon removal company focused on direct air capture technology. The company offers carbon dioxide removal services using direct air capture and storage technology to enterprises, small-medium businesses, and individuals aiming for net zero emissions. Climeworks' DAC facilities. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Infermedica
cb_description: Infermedica is a company that specializes in automating primary care through its Medical Guidance Platform, operating within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a suite of intelligent healthcare technologies for early symptom assessment, digital triage, and facilitating communication between physicians and patients. Infermedica primarily sells to sectors such as insurers, public health and government, healthcare providers, and telemedicine companies. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Wroclaw, Poland.

name: CoachHub
cb_description: CoachHub is a global talent development platform that specializes in providing personalized, measurable, and scalable digital coaching programs across various industries. The company offers services that include matching individuals with certified business coaches, scheduling coaching sessions, and providing personalized learning content through its digital platform. CoachHub primarily serves organizations looking to improve employee engagement, productivity, job performance, and retention. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Copper
cb_description: Copper Labs specializes in providing real-time data analytics for electric, gas, and water meters within the utility industry. The company offers solutions that enable utilities to collect and share meter data in real-time, facilitating a transition to a low-carbon economy, improving demand management, and enhancing customer experiences. Copper Labs' technology is compatible with both smart (AMI) and drive-by (AMR) meters, extending the life of existing meter infrastructure and supporting cloud-based utility solutions without the need for extensive infrastructure overhauls. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: THREAD
cb_description: THREAD is a company that focuses on providing a decentralized clinical trial platform in the healthcare and life sciences industry. The company offers a platform and supporting services that enable biopharma, CROs, and life science organizations to remotely capture data from participants and sites during, in-between, and in lieu of in-clinic visits. The platform includes features such as electronic consent (eConsent), electronic clinical outcome assessment (eCOA), sensors, reminders, and telehealth virtual visits. It was founded in 2005 and is based in Tustin, California.

name: Even
cb_description: Even is a company that specializes in personal audio technology within the consumer electronics industry. The company's main product is a set of headphones that uses patented EarPrint technology to adapt sound to the user's unique hearing profile, essentially functioning as 'glasses for your ears'. It is based in San Jose, California.

name: Maad
cb_description: Maad focuses on modernizing FMCG distribution through digital services in the B2B e-commerce sector. The company offers a mobile app for small retailers to manage supply needs, including reliable delivery and working capital finance, as well as a software platform for FMCG brands to track market data and deploy targeted sales promotions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dakar, Senegal.

name: GliaPharm
cb_description: GliaPharm focuses on the development of treatments for neurological and psychiatric disorders. The company's main service is the development of therapeutic approaches that target glial cells, which are the 'support cells' of neurons, to sustain their function and survival, and support brain metabolism in pathological conditions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Geneva, Switzerland.

name: Privado
cb_description: Privado is a company focused on bridging the privacy engineering gap within the software development industry. Its main offerings include a privacy code scanning platform that provides full data lifecycle visibility and continuous privacy governance to integrate privacy by design into product development. Privado's platform is designed to automate the generation of data maps and compliance reports, facilitate real-time monitoring of data flows, and enable developer collaboration for proactive privacy risk mitigation. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Faraday
cb_description: Faraday is a company that focuses on predictive marketing and personalization, operating within the technology and marketing sectors. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence to predict consumer behavior, enabling businesses to enhance consumer experiences and leverage these predictions across multiple teams and systems. Faraday primarily serves the marketing and growth sectors of the economy. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Burlington, Vermont.

name: nference
cb_description: nference is a science-first software company that focuses on transforming unstructured data from electronic medical records (EMR) into powerful software solutions in the healthcare and life sciences industry. The company's main services include the development of software products that enable the synthesis of biomedical information, the creation of AI-enabled solutions for healthcare, and the provision of tools that unlock insights from structured and unstructured patient records. nference primarily sells to the healthcare ecosystem, with a focus on medical centers and biopharmaceutical companies. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Headway
cb_description: Headway is a provider of mobile, programmatic, data and performance digital marketing solutions primarily in the U.S., Mexico and Latin America.

name: Conjure
cb_description: Conjure operates as a food service company specifically in the domain of on-demand services. It develops and helps retailers to deploy their self-driving stores. It provides features such as inventory management, on-store, and in-store advertising, and more solutions. It primarily serves the food service industry. Conjure was formerly known as Robomart. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Apollo Graph
cb_description: Apollo Graph specializes in developing a GraphQL platform for modern application stacks in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that aggregates and orchestrates application programming interfaces (APIs) across various clients and services, enabling backend teams to build a self-service, self-documenting graph that powers multiple applications. Apollo Graph's solutions are designed to reduce technical debt, streamline collaboration between backend and frontend teams, and improve application performance through GraphQL-native metrics. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FINBOURNE Technology
cb_description: FINBOURNE Technology specializes in financial data management within the FinTech sector. The company offers a suite of products designed to control, consolidate, and understand financial data for investment operations, including operational data stores, investment book of records, and portfolio management systems. FINBOURNE primarily serves asset managers, alternative asset managers, asset owners, asset servicers, and the banking and capital markets sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Fortem Technologies
cb_description: Fortem Technologies specializes in airspace awareness, security, and defense, focusing on the detection and defeat of dangerous drones within various sectors. The company offers an advanced end-to-end system that includes distributed radar, AI at the Edge, deep sensor integration, and autonomous drone capture capabilities. These solutions are designed to monitor and protect venues, infrastructures, cities, and regions, while also facilitating the safety of airspace for urban air mobility. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pleasant Grove, Utah.

name: Orbita
cb_description: Orbita is a company that focuses on the development of conversational artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, primarily operating in the healthcare and life sciences sectors. The company's main offerings include voice and chat solutions that automate workflows and communications between healthcare providers and patients, facilitating tasks such as patient self-scheduling, intake, procedure preparation, disease management check-ins, and care reminders. Orbita primarily serves the healthcare industry, with customers ranging from hospitals to life sciences organizations. Orbita was formerly known as Bebaio. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: NewsWhip
cb_description: NewsWhip specializes in real-time media monitoring and predictive analytics within the public relations and communications sector. The company offers a suite of products including a media monitoring platform, analytics tools, and an API that collectively help to identify, predict, and analyze public engagement with content. NewsWhip primarily serves brands, PR agencies, publishers, government entities, and nonprofits seeking insights into media trends and crisis management. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: CorePower Magnetics
cb_description: CorePower Magnetics focuses on advancing magnetic solutions for electric vehicles and the energy grid within the power electronics industry. The company specializes in the development and manufacturing of inductors, transformers, and motors that are designed to reduce size and weight while improving efficiency. CorePower Magnetics' products are primarily utilized in the electrification of transportation and grid modernization sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Deep Render
cb_description: Deep Render operates as a deep technology startup company. It focuses on developing the next generation of image and video compression technology. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI) based compression technology that aims to increase global bandwidth and reduce data and bandwidth bottlenecks. Its technology primarily serves internet service providers and content owners. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Pluto Health
cb_description: Pluto Health optimizes care coordination with an emphasis on personalized care. Pluto Health identifies gaps in care for patients by connecting the dots through applying technology, data science, and clinical practice knowledge. It offers a platform that enables care providers to access critical patient data, offers personalized care, and delivers the right resources at the right time. Its tools are available on a mobile application, the web, and through API integrations for care services. Pluto Health was founded in 2020 and is headquartered in Durham, North Carolina.

name: oda
cb_description: ODA is an architecture, interiors, and landscape design firm focused on creating a better urban future. The company offers design services that aim to improve life through imaginative and mold-breaking designs, with a focus on blending indoor and outdoor spaces and enhancing urban living. ODA primarily serves sectors that require architectural and design services for urban development, including residential, commercial, and public projects. It was founded in 1969 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AmpUp
cb_description: AmpUp operates as an electric vehicle (EV) charging company operating in the energy sector. It provides charging solutions for the EV community, including the management of multiple charge stations and the deployment of commercial EV charging. It primarily serves sectors such as hospitality, residential, workplace, municipality, and education. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Flux
cb_description: Flux is a financial education platform that gamifies personal finance management and financial literacy. The company offers a suite of tools for tracking finances, improving credit scores, and learning about money through games, podcasts, and newsletters. Flux primarily serves the personal finance management sector, targeting individuals seeking to enhance their financial knowledge and health. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Melbourne, Victoria.

name: Hover
cb_description: Hover is a company that specializes in the domain name industry. The company's main services include domain name registration and management, offering a wide range of domain extensions for customers to choose from. Additionally, Hover provides professional email services that match the customer's domain, enhancing their online communication. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Solidus Labs
cb_description: Solidus Labs focuses on security and compliance within the digital asset lifecycle, operating in the financial technology sector. The company offers solutions including trade surveillance to monitor market activities, transaction monitoring to identify suspicious behavior, and staking guard services for Ethereum validators. Solidus Labs serves the cryptocurrency market, providing tools for market integrity and regulatory compliance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Relativity
cb_description: Relativity operates as a commercial launch company focused on the aerospace industry. The company specializes in providing launch services using reusable rockets and manages additive manufacturing to reduce vehicle complexity and production costs. Relativity primarily serves the growing space infrastructure sector with its launch capabilities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Long Beach, California.

name: Velostics
cb_description: Velostics is a company focused on streamlining supply chain operations through scheduling orchestration in the logistics industry. Their main offerings include a unified scheduling suite that facilitates the coordination of shipments, dock and yard management, and a text-based driver check-in/out system, all designed to enhance logistics efficiency and throughput. The company's solutions are tailored to improve cash flow, customer experience, and value chain optimization for shippers and logistics service providers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Chowly
cb_description: Chowly is a technology company that specializes in off-premise platform solutions for the restaurant industry. The company offers a suite of services including online ordering, digital marketing, smart pricing, and POS integration to help restaurants increase profitability. Chowly primarily serves the restaurant industry, enabling businesses to streamline operations and enhance their digital presence. It is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Fauna Bio
cb_description: Fauna Bio is a biotechnology company focused on leveraging genomics for advancements in human health. The company's main offerings include examining disease resistance across species to enrich for human druggable targets in multiple disease areas, and validating genes and compound predictions in human cell assays. Fauna Bio primarily sells to the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries, utilizing genetic data to improve human health. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Emeryville, California.

name: Hadean
cb_description: Hadean specializes in electrolysis technology within the renewable energy sector. The company has developed a tubular Solid Oxide Electrolyser (tSOE) that offers a method for hydrogen production compared to traditional PEM and Alkaline electrolysis systems. Hadean's technology is particularly beneficial for hard-to-abate industries seeking to decarbonize their energy systems, such as chemicals, green steel, power and heat, refineries, and heavy transport. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Skyhawk Therapeutics
cb_description: Skyhawk Therapeutics is a biotechnology company focused on developing small molecules that modify RNA expression for the treatment of various diseases. The company's main offerings include drug candidates for neurological conditions such as Huntington's Disease and for cancers like Multiple Myeloma and Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma. Skyhawk's proprietary SKYSTAR platform is utilized to accelerate the development of these RNA-targeting small molecules across neurology, oncology, and fibrosis sectors. Skyhawk Therapeutics was formerly known as Rare Genetix. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: TerraPay
cb_description: TerraPay operates as a cross-border payment network. The company simplifies the movement of money worldwide by providing direct access to global markets through a single connection. Its services primarily cater to partners seeking global financial inclusion. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Groopit
cb_description: Groopit is an AI-driven platform focused on problem-solving within the business intelligence sector. The company offers a suite of applications that integrate with existing technology stacks to provide real-time intelligence and actionable insights from employee data, aiming to improve decision-making and business outcomes. Groopit's solutions cater to various aspects of business intelligence, including competitive, customer satisfaction, cyber security, operational, product, sales enablement, and retail execution intelligence. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Fullife
cb_description: Fullife specializes in the development and manufacturing of nutritional supplements using effervescent technology in the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of products including vitamins, electrolytes, sleep aids, and nutrition for active lifestyles and women's health, all utilizing proprietary effervescent formulations. Fullife primarily serves sectors such as sports nutrition, women's health and beauty, and general wellness. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: MedStack
cb_description: MedStack is a company that develops healthcare compliance software within the digital health sector. It provides services that include establishing compliance programs, deploying and maintaining compliant digital health applications, and offering security controls aligned with major healthcare frameworks. MedStack serves the digital healthcare industry by addressing compliance with regulations such as HIPAA, PIPEDA, and GDPR. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Believer
cb_description: Believer operates as a global games company focusing on the entertainment industry. The company's main offerings include the creation and service of various games, providing immersive experiences and communities for players. The company primarily serves the gaming industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Comun
cb_description: Comun is a financial technology company focused on providing banking services tailored to the needs of Latino immigrants in the United States.
