The company offers digital banking accounts with Visa debit cards, without requiring minimum balances or charging monthly fees, and ensures deposits are FDIC insured. Comun also facilitates international remittances, provides early access to paychecks, and supports customers in both English and Spanish through their mobile banking application. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Likarda
cb_description: Likarda is a biotech company that focuses on developing technologies to enhance the delivery and optimization of cell therapies. The company's main offerings include a unique method called Core Shell Spherification (CSS) which coats cells with stealth hydrogels, protecting them and maintaining their location within the body. This technology is used to improve the efficacy of cellular therapies. It is based in Kansas City, Kansas.

name: Insurify
cb_description: Insurify is a digital insurance comparison platform that specializes in providing real-time quotes for auto, home, and life insurance policies. The company enables customers to compare insurance options from over 100 providers, including major carriers, to find the best rates and coverage. Insurify also offers expert guidance and support through licensed insurance agents, ensuring customers can make informed decisions about their insurance needs. Insurify was formerly known as Ensurify. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Island Cannabis Co
cb_description:
Island Cannabis Co produces artisanal quality cannabis products. The company creates pre-rolled joints using high-quality Californian cannabis. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Redondo Beach, CA.

On March 30, 2022 Island was acquired by 4Front Ventures. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Celona
cb_description: Celona operates in the private wireless market, focusing on fully turnkey enterprise 5G LAN systems within the network infrastructure industry. The company offers a solution that leverages shared cellular spectrum to enable organizations to own and operate their private mobile network infrastructure, designed to address challenges such as reliability, coverage, and security. Celona's products are engineered for seamless integration with existing enterprise network infrastructures, providing quality of service and cloud-based orchestration to support Industry 4.0 digital business initiatives. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Campbell, California.

name: Upbound
cb_description: Upbound is a company focused on pioneering the next generation of cloud computing through enterprise cloud control and management. Its main offerings include a managed control plane platform that leverages Crossplane to enable centralized management of cloud infrastructure across multiple providers, ensuring consistency and governance. Upbound's solutions cater to various sectors, including those requiring robust cloud infrastructure management, such as AI and ML, database services, and internal developer platforms. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: deepc
cb_description: deepc specializes in the development of a cloud-native radiology artificial intelligence operating system known as deepcOS, which operates within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a platform that facilitates the integration of artificial intelligence solutions into radiology workflows, ensuring secure connections to healthcare information technology systems and providing access to a marketplace of commercial artificial intelligence applications. deepc was founded in 2019 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Pontoro
cb_description: Pontoro is a digital asset securitization and liquidity platform. It enables investors to access asset liquidity and price transparency for private market assets. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Syndio
cb_description: Syndio is a company specializing in HR analytics technology with a focus on workplace equity within the human resources sector. The company offers a platform and services designed to help organizations measure, achieve, and sustain equity in pay and opportunities for their employees. Syndio primarily serves global enterprise companies seeking to close pay and opportunity gaps, ensure legal compliance, and enhance their reputation as equitable employers. Syndio was formerly known as Edge Analytics, Inc.. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Silkhaus
cb_description: Silkhaus is a company focused on reinventing the infrastructure for short-term rentals, operating within the real estate and hospitality sectors. The company offers a variety of furnished boutique flats and apartments for both short and long-term stays, providing a seamless and sophisticated experience for renters. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Xendit
cb_description: Xendit is a financial technology company specializing in payment solutions within the fintech sector. The company offers a range of services including a payment gateway that enables businesses to accept various payment methods, disburse funds through automated and on-demand systems, and manage operations with tools for marketplaces, financing, and mobile applications. It was founded in 2014 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Super73
cb_description: Super73 is a company that focuses on the design, manufacture, and distribution of electric motorbikes in the electric vehicle industry. The company's main offerings include a range of electric bikes and related accessories, as well as lifestyle apparel. These products are designed to cater to the needs of individuals seeking adventure and style. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: ProNavigator
cb_description: ProNavigator is a company that focuses on knowledge management in the insurance industry. The company offers an AI-driven platform that helps insurance organizations capture, organize, and scale their knowledge, enabling staff to quickly and accurately find answers to their questions and ensuring the consistency and control of content. ProNavigator primarily serves the insurance industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kitchener, Ontario.

name: Volta Medical
cb_description: Volta Medical is a company that focuses on the intersection of artificial intelligence and interventional cardiac electrophysics. The company offers cutting-edge software solutions that utilize machine and deep learning algorithms to assist medical professionals during cardiac ablation procedures. Volta Medical primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Marseille, France.

name: Bujeti
cb_description: Bujeti is a financial management platform offering a suite of tools for expense management and budgeting within the business services sector. The company provides solutions such as corporate credit cards, spend management software, and integrated accounting services to streamline financial operations for businesses. Bujeti primarily serves sectors like technology, healthcare, travel, hospitality, and more, offering tailored financial solutions to various industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: CoreView
cb_description: CoreView specializes in Microsoft 365 management, offering a platform for IT governance and administration within the technology sector. The company provides a unified approach to delegated administration, automated governance, and tenant configuration, aiming to optimize Microsoft 365 environments for enterprises. CoreView primarily serves sectors such as the public sector, higher education, healthcare, and technology industries. CoreView was formerly known as 4ward365. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Homzmart
cb_description: Homzmart operates as an e-commerce platform focused on the home furnishing and decor industry. The company offers a range of products including home furniture, decor, lighting, and home supplies. Its primary market is the eCommerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New Cairo, Egypt.

name: Kyligence
cb_description: Kyligence is a company focused on providing a metrics platform and AI-augmented OLAP solutions for the data analytics industry. Its main offerings include a metrics catalog for defining and managing business metrics, and an AI-powered engine designed to optimize performance for processing and analyzing petabyte-scale data volumes. Kyligence primarily serves sectors such as financial services, manufacturing, and retail. Kyligence was formerly known as Apache Kylin. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Cloverly
cb_description: Cloverly is a digital infrastructure company focused on scaling climate action within the voluntary carbon markets. The company offers a platform that facilitates the purchase and management of carbon credits for businesses aiming to achieve their climate goals. Cloverly primarily serves businesses looking to buy carbon credits and suppliers of carbon removals and credits. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Pleo
cb_description: Pleo operates as a business spend management platform. It provides virtual cards, expenses, automated expense reports for employees, invoices, and more. It serves industries such as retail, healthcare, technology, and more. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Kobenhavn N, Denmark.

name: Vocode
cb_description: Vocode specializes in automating phone calls using artificial intelligence, focusing on the telecommunications sector. The company provides solutions for automating inbound and outbound calls with AI. Vocode's offerings cater to businesses looking to streamline their customer service and call handling processes. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: BasiGo
cb_description: BasiGo focuses on advancing clean, electric public transport within the e-mobility sector. The company provides electric buses equipped with safe battery technology that can operate all day on a single charge, along with a network of charging depots and maintenance services. Additionally, BasiGo offers a pay-as-you-drive financing model to make the transition to electric buses more affordable for bus operators. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: HockeyStack
cb_description: HockeyStack is a company that specializes in marketing and sales analytics for B2B revenue teams, operating within the marketing and sales technology sector. The company provides tools for modern attribution, holistic buyer journeys, and account insights to help marketing teams drive pipeline efficiently and sales teams close deals faster. HockeyStack offers a suite of services including account-based marketing, multi-touch attribution, revenue forecasting, and the creation of custom dashboards without the need for coding. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: m3ter
cb_description: m3ter focuses on automating usage-based billing and managing complex pricing for business-to-business (B2B) software scale-ups. The company offers a platform that processes usage data, integrates with existing systems, and provides tools for managing pricing configurations to ensure accurate billing. m3ter primarily serves the B2B software industry, with solutions tailored to finance and billing operations, product development, engineering, and sales and customer success teams. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Crehana
cb_description: Crehana is a talent development platform that operates within the human resources sector. The company offers a suite of products including a learning management system (LMS), performance management tools, and electronic learning solutions aimed at employee development, engagement, and productivity. The company primarily serves sectors such as financial services, education, non-profit organizations, and industrial manufacturing. Crehana was formerly known as Flikn. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: 4G Capital
cb_description: 4G Capital specializes in financial services, focusing on providing working capital loans and enterprise training to small businesses. The company offers instant loans coupled with business training, utilizing a 'touch-tech' approach that combines human customer service with digital accessibility, aiming to grow businesses sustainably. 4G Capital's products are designed to meet the needs of traders in fast-growing markets, with a commitment to responsible lending and financial inclusion. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Grand Baie, Mauritius.

name: Ecomap Technologies
cb_description: EcoMap Technologies specializes in ecosystem intelligence, operating within the information technology and services industry. The company offers a digital platform that centralizes ecosystem data and employs AI to enhance visibility and connectivity for businesses, industries, and communities. EcoMap Technologies provides tailored solutions to various sectors, including economic development, higher education, and industry-specific ecosystems. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Baltimore, Maryland.

name: Alluxio
cb_description: Alluxio specializes in data orchestration software for the cloud, focusing on the big data and AI/ML sectors. The company's software facilitates memory-speed data access and intelligent data tiering for files and objects, aiming to optimize data management and performance across various computing frameworks and storage systems. Alluxio primarily serves sectors that require high-performance data access, such as financial services, high tech, retail, and telecommunications. Alluxio was formerly known as Tachyon. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: WellX
cb_description: Developer of open telecommunications platforms. The company designs, develops, manufactures and markets a complete range of private branch exchange (PBX) systems with from 10 to 500 extensions in network mode. Internet-oriented, the company's products are open telecommunication platforms taking account of voice and data convergence of applications, such as voice messaging, unified messaging, computer assisted telephony, call centers, voice over Internet protocol (VoIP), least cost routing and email reading.[Keywords: integration system, telecom*]

name: Innovapptive
cb_description: Innovapptive provides configurable mobile workforce management solutions. The company offers a cloud-based platform that provides mobile and desktop applications for tasks such as inspections, work order management, work instructions authoring, spare parts management, operator rounds, fixed asset tracking, materials management, inventory management, and transaction processing. Its solutions primarily cater to industries such as oil and gas, chemicals, mining and metals, manufacturing, and utilities. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Wombat
cb_description: Wombat is a company that operates in the gaming and blockchain industries. It offers a platform where users can play games and earn non-fungible tokens (NFTs), which they can collect, trade, or share. The company primarily serves the gaming and blockchain sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Onit
cb_description: Onit is a company that specializes in enterprise software and artificial intelligence platforms, primarily serving the legal, compliance, sales, IT, HR, and finance sectors. The company offers a range of products that transform best practices into smarter workflows, better processes, and operational efficiencies, with a focus on enterprise legal management, matter management, legal spend management, contract lifecycle management, and legal holds. Onit primarily sells to the legal operations industry, providing solutions that bridge the gap between systems of record and systems of engagement. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Interactio
cb_description: Interactio specializes in providing remote simultaneous interpretation solutions for multilingual meetings and events across various sectors. The company offers a platform that facilitates virtual, hybrid, and in-person events with services including certified interpreters, interpretation streaming, and comprehensive technical support. Interactio primarily serves sectors such as government, corporate businesses, non-profits, and the broader event industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Vilnius, Lithuania.

name: CloudMile
cb_description: CloudMile is a company specializing in cloud technology and artificial intelligence, focusing on digital transformation services. The company offers a range of services including IT modernization, cloud migration, and the implementation of cloud management platforms, as well as AI-driven solutions to enhance business productivity and decision-making. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

name: Resolution Games
cb_description: Resolution Games focuses on the development and publishing of virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) games. The company offers a wide range of immersive gaming experiences across various platforms, including VR, AR, and mixed reality (MR), without the use of overly technical or specific product names. The primary customer segments of Resolution Games are the gaming and entertainment industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Transmute
cb_description: Transmute is a technology company that operates in the data management and supply chain sectors. The company's main service is its Verifiable Data Platform, which transforms data from various stages of digitization into secure, interoperable, machine-readable, and context-rich data. This service primarily caters to the supply chain and ecommerce industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: ARRIS
cb_description: ARRIS operates as a communications technology company. It specializes in the design, engineering, and supply of broadband services for residential and business customers around the world. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Suwanee, Georgia. In April 2019, Arris was acquired by CommScope.

name: Persefoni
cb_description: Persefoni developed a climate management and accounting platform (CMAP). The company's software-as-a-service solutions enable enterprises and financial institutions to meet stakeholder and regulatory climate disclosure requirements and provide users with a single source of carbon reporting across the organization. It primarily serves the software industry It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mesa, Arizona.

name: Privacera
cb_description: Privacera is a company focused on data security, access control, and privacy compliance within the cloud computing industry. The company offers a platform for simplified data access and security governance for analytical workloads, including sensitive data discovery, centralized data access control, data encryption, data masking, and sensitive data access audit and reporting. Privacera's solutions cater to various sectors, including healthcare, finance, and telecommunications, where data security and compliance are critical. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Fremont, California.

name: Cellevate
cb_description: Cellevate specializes in the development of cell culture systems within the biopharmaceutical industry. The company offers microcarriers for upstream bioprocessing, utilizing proprietary nanofiber technology to create scalable and customizable platforms that replicate the extracellular environment for enhanced cell growth. Its solutions aim to increase productivity and reduce biopharmaceutical development and manufacturing risk. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Lund, Sweden.

name: GigPro
cb_description: Gigpro is a company that provides staffing solutions for the hospitality industry, focusing on connecting businesses with experienced workers for various staffing needs. The company offers a platform where hospitality businesses can post shifts that need to be filled, and workers, referred to as 'Pros', can apply to these gigs; successful applicants are paid through the app after completing their shifts. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Charleston, South Carolina.

name: Moda Operandi
cb_description: Moda Operandi is a high-end retailer specializing in women's designer clothing and runway fashion. The company offers a curated selection of apparel, accessories, bags, jewellery, beauty products, and home decor from established and emerging designers. Moda Operandi was formerly known as Trunk Show. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: IntrCity
cb_description: IntrCity is a company that focuses on providing intercity travel solutions in the transportation industry. The company offers online bus ticket booking services, featuring amenities such as air conditioning, washrooms, WiFi, and comfortable seating, all aimed at ensuring a comfortable and safe journey for travelers. Primarily, IntrCity serves consumers seeking convenient and quality intercity travel options. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Noida, India.

name: Osmoses
cb_description: Osmoses operates as a company focusing on transforming industrial chemical separations through its membrane technology. The company's main offerings include molecular filters designed to address separation challenges. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Skeps
cb_description: Skeps is a microservices platform that specializes in embedding banking services into various merchant interfaces within the retail, home improvement, telecom, travel, and health sectors. The company offers a lending gateway that connects customers to financial solutions, enabling purchases of products and services over $500 through secure and real-time financing. Skeps primarily serves industries that require flexible payment options for considered purchases, such as home improvement and healthcare. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Beyonk
cb_description: Beyonk is a company focused on providing an online ticketing system and visitor experience platform for the events and attractions industry. Their main offerings include a suite of tools for ticket sales, booking management, and operational efficiency designed to enhance the visitor experience and streamline business processes. Beyonk's solutions cater to a variety of sectors including visitor attractions, activities, tours, and events. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Qase
cb_description: Qase is a test management platform specializing in both manual and automated quality assurance testing and reporting within the software industry. The platform offers features such as real-time testing results, AI-powered conversion of manual tests to automated ones, and a suite of integrations with popular tools for a comprehensive testing experience. Qase primarily caters to software development teams looking to streamline their quality assurance processes. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Hostfully
cb_description: Hostfully is a company that focuses on property management in the vacation rental industry. The company offers a comprehensive platform that provides solutions for managing bookings, communications, financial reporting, and marketing for short-term and vacation rentals. It also provides digital guidebooks that convey all necessary information from check-in to check-out in a professional and easy-to-use format. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ShapeTX
cb_description: ShapeTX focuses on developing programmable RNA medicines within the biotechnology sector. The company leverages artificial intelligence and RNA technology to create treatments that can reprogram cells to prevent or fight disease, ensuring safety, efficacy, and ease of manufacturing. ShapeTX's platform serves the pharmaceutical industry by enabling the design of RNA-based treatments for a variety of diseases, including rare genetic disorders and conditions like Alzheimer's and Parkinson's. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: WoodSpoon
cb_description: WoodSpoon is a marketplace for private chefs, operating in the food and catering industry. The company offers customizable catering services, providing meals prepared by chefs from various cultural backgrounds. Their primary customers are offices and individuals seeking home-cooked meals. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Tandym
cb_description: Tandym operates as a financial technology company. The company offers a comprehensive solution that enables e-commerce businesses to offer their own private-label credit cards, driving customer loyalty and increasing revenue. Tandym primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: SetSail
cb_description: SetSail is a company specializing in the development of AI-driven sales data platforms for revenue teams. Their main offerings include automating the capture of sales activities, providing revenue intelligence, and enhancing sales performance. SetSail's solutions are designed to deliver timely, actionable insights that help go-to-market teams sell more effectively. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: webAI
cb_description: webAI specializes in the development and deployment of enterprise-grade AI applications within various business sectors. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to create, customize, and deploy AI models locally, using existing infrastructure, without the need for cloud services. webAI's solutions are designed to address specific challenges in industries such as aerospace, retail, manufacturing, logistics, education, and medical. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Grand Rapids, Michigan.

name: Finesse
cb_description: Finesse ceased operations. Finesse develops mobile applications. The platform provides full-body workouts as well as distributes its product SomaSole, a resistance training kit. It is based in Washington, DC.

name: Evermile
cb_description: Evermile is a delivery platform focused on optimizing logistics for local businesses within the delivery services industry. The company offers a range of delivery options including express, same-day, next-day, and scheduled deliveries, as well as a platform for businesses to manage and automate their delivery processes. Evermile primarily serves small to medium-sized businesses across various sectors such as bakeries, flower shops, wine stores, and more. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, England.

name: Cohere Technologies
cb_description: Cohere Technologies specializes in the development of Universal Spectrum Multiplier software for enhancing the performance of mobile networks in the telecommunications industry. Their software is designed to optimize 4G and 5G networks by leveraging technologies such as Massive MIMO and cloud-based architectures to improve network efficiency and performance. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Indiagold
cb_description: Indiagold is a financial technology company operating in the asset-backed lending sector. The company's main service is providing online gold loans, enabling customers to monetize their assets in a secure and efficient manner. Indiagold primarily serves the financial services industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: ConverseNow
cb_description: ConverseNow operates as a technology company for restaurants. The company's main offering is a voice artificial intelligence platform that automates the order-taking process in restaurants, allowing staff to focus on food preparation, order fulfillment, and guest service. The platform is primarily used by quick-service restaurants. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Klassroom
cb_description: Klassroom specializes in educational communication tools designed to connect schools and families within the education sector. The company offers a suite of applications that facilitate communication between teachers, parents, and school administrators, as well as tools for managing classroom activities and creating photo books. Klassroom's products are primarily aimed at the educational technology industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ile de France, France.

name: Spendflo
cb_description: Spendflo specializes in optimizing procurement and managing expenditures for software as a service (SaaS) products. The company offers a platform that streamlines the buying, negotiation, and renewal processes for SaaS subscriptions, and provides tools for spend analysis, vendor management, and contract oversight. Spendflo primarily serves the finance, procurement, and information technology (IT) sectors, offering solutions that enhance visibility, control, and savings in SaaS investments. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: NoTraffic
cb_description: NoTraffic is a leading IoT platform focused on urban mobility within the transportation sector. The company offers an AI-powered traffic signal platform that connects road users to the city grid, aiming to improve traffic flow and safety while preparing for future mobility demands. NoTraffic primarily serves municipal and urban environments, providing solutions to enhance traffic management and smart city infrastructure. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Trustpair
cb_description: Trustpair is a company that focuses on payment fraud prevention in the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform that provides reliable global vendor data, automated international account validations, and cross-functional workflows to protect the payment-to-payment chain. Trustpair primarily sells to the financial services industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: ecoworks
cb_description: ecoworks specializes in the energetic refurbishment of multi-family homes within the construction and real estate technology sectors. The company offers modular construction solutions that encompass prefabricated thermal building envelopes, including integrated insulation, windows, and ventilation systems, as well as the installation of renewable energy systems like photovoltaic modules for net zero energy buildings. These solutions are designed to significantly reduce construction time and improve quality, enabling the economic transformation of properties towards climate neutrality. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Orbee
cb_description: Orbee is a technology service provider specializing in analytics, data, and automation solutions within the automotive industry. The company offers a platform that integrates all of a dealership's data sources into a Customer Data Platform, enabling the measurement of marketing investments, understanding of shopper behaviors, management of first and third-party data, and the activation of marketing and advertising channels. Primarily, Orbee sells to the automotive industry, including franchise and independent dealers, large dealership groups, and dealer-centric media agencies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: INBRAIN Neuroelectronics
cb_description: INBRAIN Neuroelectronics specializes in the development of advanced neuroelectronic therapies within the medical device industry. The company offers a platform that includes skin-like, bi-directional, high-resolution brain-computer interfaces and implantable neural processors for real-time neural decoding and modulation, aimed at restoring function or mobility for patients with neural disorders. Their solutions leverage graphene technology to enhance treatment efficiency and patient comfort. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Matternet
cb_description: Matternet is a company that specializes in the development and operation of autonomous drone networks for package delivery within the healthcare and commerce sectors. The company offers ultra-fast, low-cost, and zero-emission delivery services using drones that are FAA Type Certified. Matternet's technology is designed to transform logistics in developed economies and provide innovative solutions for new economies. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Flybits
cb_description: Flybits focuses on providing advanced contextual engagement solutions, primarily for the financial industry. The company offers a platform that transforms data into personalized experiences, aiming to enhance customer engagement and loyalty. Its services are primarily utilized by financial services companies, including banks and insurance providers. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Dazz
cb_description: Dazz provides a cloud security platform. It maps the code-to-production pipeline across all cloud environments, collapses security alerts, identifies the root cause, and enables code to fix for one-click approval. Its platform helps solve vulnerabilities and prevents risks in cloud development environments. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Arena
cb_description: Arena develops a platform that uses predictive analytics and artificial intelligence (AI) to help employers discover and retain talent, while also mitigating bias in the hiring process. The primary sectors Arena serves include the human resources and recruitment industries. Arena was formerly known as Pegged Software. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Baltimore, Maryland.

name: Windfall
cb_description: Windfall operates as a people intelligence and artificial intelligence (AI) company specializing in providing insights for go-to-market teams across various industries. The company offers a suite of services including customer data enrichment, wealth screening, and machine learning-driven propensity modeling to help organizations prioritize resources and engage with the target audiences. It primarily serves sectors such as retail, financial services, education, healthcare, and nonprofit organizations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Help Scout
cb_description: Help Scout is a company that focuses on providing customer support solutions, operating within the Software as a Service (SaaS) industry. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to manage customer communications across various channels such as email and live chat, and also provides tools for creating help centers with frequently asked questions. Help Scout primarily serves sectors such as logistics, ecommerce, manufacturing, education, media, financial services, professional services, healthcare, and property management. It is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Zipline
cb_description: Zipline is a company that specializes in the development of community-powered platforms within the technology sector. The company offers services such as creating custom-built social media platforms and apps, which are designed to foster community engagement and interaction for businesses, brands, and organizations. These platforms can include features such as live chat, e-learning capabilities, crowdfunding, and event management. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Norwich, England.

name: ALEX
cb_description: ALEX is a company focused on building financial applications on the Bitcoin blockchain. The company offers a suite of tools and services for deploying, managing, and trading digital assets, providing liquidity, and connecting various blockchain networks. ALEX primarily serves the decentralized finance (DeFi) sector within the cryptocurrency industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Enzymit
cb_description: Enzymit specializes in the design and creation of enzymes for the bioproduction sector, focusing on streamlining production processes and promoting sustainability. The company offers a cell-free production platform that utilizes advanced computational design algorithms and deep learning to develop enzymes for a variety of applications, including fine chemicals, foodtech, and health. Enzymit's solutions cater to industries such as biochemicals, food and beverages, personal care, and health and nutrition. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Ness Ziona, Israel.

name: NOTHING
cb_description: NOTHING, aka NOTHING, is an invite-only mobile platform for the fashion blogging community. Users can share the styles of thousands of the most fashionable influencers, discover & purchase millions of fashion items, apply to become NOTHING bloggers, share their own style on their personal profile page, and more. The platform also helps bloggers & influencers to achieve fan growth, enhance their content, and improve the all-around profit model, and provides data tools that help bloggers analyze their social networking influence, brand impact, content distribution, exposure metrics, and more.

name: BlockSpaces
cb_description: BlockSpaces is a company that focuses on Bitcoin-based collateral optimization in the financial technology sector. The company offers services such as post-trade auto-reconciled Bitcoin collateral optimization, seamless on-and-off-chain payment processing, and streamlined data capture to various ERP systems. BlockSpaces primarily serves sectors such as OTC desks, Bitcoin-collateral lenders, corporate treasury and risk managers, exchanges, licensed custodians, traditional finance collateral management, and counter-parties. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tampa, Florida.

name: Mindee
cb_description: Mindee specializes in document processing within the technology sector. It offers a suite of OCR APIs that enable developers to extract data from various types of documents and images, transforming them into machine-readable formats without the need for model training. These services cater to a range of industries that require automated data extraction and document processing. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Inkbit
cb_description: Inkbit focuses on additive manufacturing within the industrial production sector. It specializes in the mass production of end-use polymer parts using their proprietary Vision-Controlled Jetting (VCJ) technology. The company's main offerings include 3D printing services that enable the creation of dimensionally accurate and precise components with multi-material capabilities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Medford, Massachusetts.

name: InnerPlant
cb_description: InnerPlant is a biotechnology company focused on developing crops that can communicate their needs, operating within the agricultural technology sector. The company offers genetically modified plants that emit optical signals to indicate stress from factors such as nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium deficiency, or drought, which can be detected by field equipment and satellites. InnerPlant serves the agriculture industry by providing data-driven insights and recommendations to improve crop management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Davis, California.

name: Carepatron
cb_description: Carepatron provides various healthcare workspace solutions in the health tech industry. It offers a range of services including online scheduling, client management, telehealth services, automated workflows, invoicing, and payments. These services primarily cater to sectors such as physical therapy, psychiatry, psychology, nursing, and general healthcare. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tauranga, New Zealand.

name: Lalamove
cb_description: Lalamove is an on-demand delivery technology company. The company on-demand and same-day delivery services. The company offers delivery services for couriers, on-demand products, and more. The company also offers delivery services for couriers, on-demand products, and more. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Hong Kong.

name: Ace Games
cb_description: Ace Games operates as a mobile gaming company focused on creating entertaining games for a global audience. The company's main offerings include colorful puzzle games and interactive farm-building adventures that provide engaging experiences for players. It primarily sells to the mobile gaming market. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Innovaccer
cb_description: Innovaccer is a healthcare technology company focused on data activation and care delivery transformation. The company offers a healthcare data platform that unifies patient data across various systems and settings, providing healthcare organizations with applications that aim to improve clinical, financial, operational, and experiential outcomes. Innovaccer's solutions cater to providers, payers, life sciences companies, and government sectors within the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Doceree
cb_description: Doceree specializes in programmatic marketing within the pharmaceutical advertising and healthcare marketing sectors. Its main offerings include a suite of digital tools for targeting and engaging healthcare professionals (HCPs) through physician-only platforms, powered by its proprietary identity-resolution technology, ESPYIAN. Doceree provides a full tech stack for programmatic marketing, including a demand-side platform (DSP), supply-side platform (SSP), ad server, and data management platform (DMP), along with real-time analytics for campaign optimization. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Parsippany, New Jersey.

name: LiME
cb_description: LiME is a company focused on providing innovative software solutions for the beauty industry, specializing in customer chart and appointment management. The company offers a comprehensive platform that simplifies the management of voluminous customer charts and salon scheduling through a smartphone application, ensuring efficient salon operations and enhanced customer satisfaction. LiME's platform also includes features for sales data analysis, secure cloud data management, and tools for increasing brand recognition and customer acquisition. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: League
cb_description: League operates as a digital health platform. The company delivers personalized healthcare experiences for consumers and helps people use solutions powered by League to access, navigate, and pay for care. Primarily, It serves the healthcare industry. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Plumery
cb_description: Plumery specializes in creating mobile and website experiences for financial institutions. The company offers a suite of application programming interface (API)-only capabilities designed to facilitate rapid development and deployment of digital banking services. It primarily serves the financial service sector. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Viral Launch
cb_description: Viral Launch is a company that focuses on providing tools and services for Amazon sellers, operating in the ecommerce industry. The company offers a suite of tools that help sellers identify market demands, research products and competitors, optimize product listings, manage paid marketing campaigns, and automate the creation of reviews. Primarily, Viral Launch caters to the ecommerce industry, specifically Amazon sellers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: HungryPanda
cb_description: HungryPanda specializes in food delivery and lifestyle services for Chinese communities globally, operating within the food delivery and e-commerce sectors. The company offers a platform for ordering Chinese cuisine, and fresh groceries, and provides various lifestyle services. HungryPanda primarily serves the overseas Chinese population with its food delivery and e-commerce platforms. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United kingdom.

name: Wristcam
cb_description: Wristcam is a company focused on enhancing the Apple Watch experience by providing a camera system for it, operating within the wearable technology sector. The company offers a camera band that includes both self-facing and world-facing cameras, enabling users to capture 4K photos and 1080p videos directly from their wrists. Wristcam also provides a smartphone app designed to improve emergency response through features like AI analysis and smart 911 integration. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: WorkIndia
cb_description: WorkIndia is a leading online recruitment portal specializing in blue and gray-collar jobs across various industries. The platform offers a comprehensive job posting and candidate matching service, leveraging AI technology to connect employers with suitable candidates efficiently. WorkIndia primarily serves small to medium-sized businesses and enterprises looking for a diverse range of job roles. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: PebblePost
cb_description: PebblePost is a marketing technology company specializing in Programmatic Direct Mail within the digital to direct mail marketing platform sector. The company offers solutions that transform online interest and intent data into timely, relevant direct mail aimed at activating buying decisions and driving conversions. PebblePost's services cater to various sectors including retail, travel, financial services, non-profit, education, and wellness. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Laronde
cb_description: Laronde operates as a biotechnology company focused on Enhancer Ribonucleic acid-based therapeutics within the pharmaceutical industry. The company's main offerings include a proprietary modular Enhancer Ribonucleic acid(eRNA) platform designed to enable the production of various therapeutic proteins within the body, aiming to create predictable and impactful medicines. Laronde primarily targets the healthcare sector with its innovative Ribonucleic acid technology to address multiple disease areas. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts. In October 2023, Laronde merged with Sail Biomedicines.

name: Delfi Diagnostics
cb_description: Delfi Diagnostics is a company focused on early cancer detection, operating in the healthcare and biotechnology sectors. The company's main service involves the use of novel machine-learning algorithms to analyze fragments of cell-free deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA), which allows for the accurate detection of cancer from a single blood sample. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Beryl
cb_description: Provider of footwear and leather goods. The company provides 95 outlets of clothing and retail.

name: Babyscripts
cb_description: Babyscripts is a company focused on improving maternal health outcomes through technology, operating within the healthcare sector. The company offers a risk detection program that includes remote patient monitoring, perinatal education, and mental health assessments to support expectant and new mothers. Babyscripts primarily serves healthcare providers, including hospitals, physicians, midwives, birth centers, and health plans, with virtual tools designed to enhance patient care and outcomes in maternity care. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: CaptivateIQ
cb_description: CaptivateIQ operates a sales commission management software. It offers compensation management solutions, revenue and sales operation management solutions, finance and accounting solutions, and more. Its primary customers are in the enterprise sector, including roles such as compensation managers, sales leaders, and finance and accounting professionals. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Nuada
cb_description: Nuada is a company focused on the development of soft active exoskeletons in the healthcare industry. Their main product is a glove that enables users to hold up to 40 kg's of weight with their hands completely relaxed, providing a solution for hand weakness or loss of hand function due to various causes. The company primarily serves the healthcare sector, offering a non-intrusive, light, and safe solution for everyday use. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Braga, Portugal.

name: Iziwork
cb_description: Iziwork provides a temporary employment platform. Its platform offers temporary workers access to a range of assignments, but also personalized support throughout the assignments which gives meaning to individual merit. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France. In September 2023, Iziwork was acquired by Proman. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Cytonus Therapeutics
cb_description: Cytonus Therapeutics focuses on revolutionizing drug discovery and delivery within the biotechnology sector. The company's main offerings include a synthetic biology-delivery platform and AI-driven precision medicine solutions, designed to enhance the efficacy and safety of therapeutics. Cytonus primarily sells to sectors involved in healthcare and medical treatment, leveraging advanced technologies to target specific diseases. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Carlsbad, California.

name: SurrealDB
cb_description: SurrealDB is a database company that supports various types of applications across different industries. It offers a scalable platform with real-time data updates, search capabilities, and support for machine learning. SurrealDB helps manage and query data efficiently, supporting SQL-like language, graph database features, and advanced computations. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Cheshire, United Kingdom.

name: Ori Biotech
cb_description: Ori Biotech specializes in the field of cell and gene therapy (CGT) manufacturing, offering a platform designed to manage the production of personalized lifesaving treatments. The company's main offering includes a fully automated and standardized manufacturing system that allows for scaling from pre-clinical process development to commercial manufacturing. Ori Biotech primarily serves therapeutic developers looking to overcome complex manufacturing challenges in the CGT domain. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Bounce
cb_description: Bounce is a provider of indoor recreational activities, specializing in trampoline parks. The company offers a variety of trampoline-based attractions and programs such as freestyle jumping, dodgeball, basketball, and fitness classes. Bounce primarily caters to individuals and groups looking for active entertainment and event hosting services. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Glen Iris, Victoria.

name: Fohlio
cb_description: Fohlio is a brand specification and procurement software company that specializes in streamlining project management and procurement processes for various industries. The company offers a suite of tools for creating product specifications, managing product and materials libraries, estimating and prototyping projects, and tracking procurement activities. Fohlio's solutions are designed to standardize internal workflows, provide analytics and cross-project reporting, and facilitate collaboration among teams. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Stensul
cb_description: Stensul provides a collaborative platform for email and landing page creation in the marketing sector. It provides a platform that allows teams to create marketing assets such as emails and landing pages. It primarily serves the marketing industry, with a focus on both business-to-business and business-to-consumer email marketers. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Anaconda
cb_description: Anaconda specializes in outdoor adventure and sporting goods, catering to a variety of outdoor activities. The company offers a wide range of products including camping and hiking gear, fishing equipment, water sports accessories, and outdoor apparel. These products are designed to enhance the outdoor experience for enthusiasts of all levels. It was founded in 2004 and is based in South Melbourne, Victoria.

name: Eclipse Foods
cb_description: Eclipse Foods specializes in the creation of plant-based dairy alternatives within the food industry. Its main offerings include a range of non-dairy ice creams that replicate the creaminess of dairy using a blend of plants such as cassava, corn, rapeseed, and potato. Eclipse Foods caters to consumers seeking vegan food options. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: Lingoda
cb_description: Lingoda is a company that focuses on online language education. It offers live, online language courses in English, German, French, and Spanish, taught by native-level teachers. The company primarily serves individuals seeking to learn a new language, from beginners to advanced learners. Lingoda was formerly known as Easy Languages. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: EatClub
cb_description:
EatClub provides restaurants with a service to incentivize customers to dine at their venues during slower or off-peak times via live app notifications. It is a virtual cafe that delivers meals to offices.

On April 29th, 2021 EatClub was acquired by Compass Group. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: PayEm
cb_description: PayEm operates as a company focused on spend management and procurement in the financial services industry. The company offers a platform that automates finance and procurement processes, including spend management, reimbursement, procure-to-pay, corporate cards, and cross-border payments. Its platform is designed to provide real-time visibility and control over expenses, streamline approval workflows, and enhance compliance and transparency. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Buildkite
cb_description: Buildkite is a company that focuses on providing a platform for continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) in the tech industry. The company's main services include offering a scalable CI/CD platform that allows businesses to run fast, secure, and scalable integration pipelines on their own infrastructure. This platform includes features such as real-time tracking and monitoring for tests, and the ability to deploy artifacts in production with end-to-end supply chain integrity. The company primarily sells to sectors such as deep tech and ecommerce. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Melbourne, Victoria.

name: Myria
cb_description: Myria is a private marketplace operating in the service industry. The company offers a range of goods, services, and unique experiences that are not readily available through conventional search engines. Myria primarily caters to high-profile individuals across various sectors, including Fortune 500 CEOs, renowned artists, and Nobel laureates. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Havoc Shield
cb_description: Havoc Shield is a company that specializes in providing comprehensive cybersecurity solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. Their services include a suite of tools for threat protection, software patching, email security, password management, and cybersecurity training, all designed to protect businesses from digital threats and ensure compliance with industry regulations. Havoc Shield's offerings cater to various sectors, including insurance brokers, agencies, and companies with remote workforces. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: bemyfriends
cb_description: bemyfriends is a company focused on transforming fandom into successful business ventures within the global entertainment and creator economy sectors. The company offers comprehensive solutions including IT-based platforms, expert consulting, and services such as content management, global e-commerce, live streaming, and IP business management. bemyfriends primarily serves sectors such as K-Pop, entertainment, creators, brands, esports, and gaming. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Textio
cb_description: Textio specializes in inclusive language guidance and is in the human resources technology sector. The company offers a platform that provides real-time bias interruption and diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging (DEIB) data insights to enhance hiring and retention practices. Its services are primarily utilized by organizations looking to improve their workforce diversity and inclusivity. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Itential
cb_description: Itential is a company that focuses on network automation and orchestration in the technology sector. The company offers a suite of products that simplify and scale network management, reducing manual operations and ensuring network compliance. These products are primarily used in the enterprise business sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: LocalizeOS
cb_description: LocalizeOS delivers artificial intelligence (AI)-based software to help real estate agents. It provides operating systems for the real estate industry and helps in sales enablement, real estate brokerage, real estate agents, lead conversion, and sales automation. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Stord
cb_description: Stord specializes in omnichannel fulfillment services and supply chain technology, operating within the logistics and supply chain management industry. The company offers a suite of services including fulfillment, warehousing, and transportation, as well as integrated software solutions like an Order Management System (OMS) and Warehouse Management System (WMS) to optimize supply chain operations. Stord's solutions are tailored to meet the specific needs of mid-market and enterprise brands, aiming to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and improve customer experiences. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Union City, Georgia.

name: Divibank
cb_description: Divibank is a data-driven financing platform that specializes in providing non-dilutive capital for businesses. The company offers funding solutions to invest in marketing campaigns, pay suppliers, and manage cash flow, aiming to help businesses scale their operations. Divibank primarily serves companies looking to enhance their digital marketing efforts and improve their supply chain financing. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: CoverTree
cb_description: CoverTree operates as an insurance provider focusing on manufactured homes and related structures within the insurance industry. It offers insurance products designed to protect homes, and personal belongings, and provide liability coverage, which can be purchased online. CoverTree caters to the needs of homeowners, renters, and landlords, offering tailored policies for different types of factory-built homes, including modular, tiny homes, and accessory dwelling units (ADUs). It was founded in 2020 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: Strider Technologies
cb_description: Strider Technologies focuses on strategic intelligence and security in the technology sector. It offers products that utilize open-source data and artificial intelligence to provide insights into critical areas of an organization, including risk intelligence, email security, and supply chain risk and compliance. Strider primarily sells to sectors such as governments, research institutions, and various industries that require protection against state-sponsored IP theft and supply chain vulnerabilities. It was founded in 2019 and is based in South Jordan, Utah.

name: Rec Room
cb_description: Rec Room focuses on athleisure market with its performance lifestyle apparel. The company offers a range of clothing made from Italian performance fabric, designed for all-day wear from casual to professional settings. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Culver City, California.

name: Deciphex
cb_description: Deciphex is a company that focuses on the development of software applications in the pathology industry. The company's main offerings include digital pathology solutions and artificial intelligence tools designed to enhance the productivity of pathologists and improve the efficiency of pathology services. Deciphex primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: CareGuide
cb_description: CareGuide is a company that specializes in connecting individuals with high-quality care providers across various domains such as child care, home care, pet care, and elder care. The company offers a platform for users to find and hire caregivers, as well as payroll services to manage financial transactions between clients and caregivers. CareGuide primarily serves the personal and family care sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Trendex
cb_description: Trendex is a company focused on providing a gamified experience connecting fans with top and emerging talents across various domains such as sports and entertainment. The company offers a platform where users can buy, trade, and collect limited edition cards of athletes and artists, which are influenced by the real-world performances of these talents. Trendex also organizes competitions where fans can win exclusive prizes based on the performance of their selected talents. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Ajaccio, France.

name: Filecoin
cb_description: Filecoin is a decentralized storage network focused on providing secure data storage solutions. The company offers a marketplace and protocol for users to store and retrieve data, utilizing a cryptocurrency incentive system. Filecoin primarily serves sectors that require decentralized data storage and management, such as web3 applications. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Cavli Wireless
cb_description: Cavli Wireless specializes in IoT connectivity management technology within the telecommunications sector. The company offers intelligent hardware solutions, network access services, and a modem management cloud platform, all designed to simplify the integration and management of IoT devices. Cavli Wireless primarily serves sectors that require robust IoT solutions, such as industrial automation, smart cities, automotive, and healthcare. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Appital
cb_description: Appital is a technology company focused on the financial sector, specifically the equity capital marketplace. The company offers a platform for institutional investors to source liquidity, including in highly illiquid securities, and provides full transparency and control over the distribution, bookbuilding, and allocation process in over 20 global markets. Appital primarily serves the financial industry, with a particular emphasis on institutional investors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Empathy
cb_description: Empathy provides bereavement support services. The company offers assistance for individuals dealing with grief and the logistical, financial, and health challenges that come with the loss of a loved one. It includes providing guidance, resources for healing, and tools to simplify tasks related to settling the estate. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cleancult
cb_description: Cleancult focuses on cleaning products, aiming to reduce plastic waste. Its main offerings include laundry detergent sheets and a refill system for cleaning products that utilizes paper-based refills and bottles. The company targets consumers looking for household cleaning solutions that are less harmful to the planet. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Radiant
cb_description: Radiant specializes in clean energy solutions, focusing on the development of portable nuclear microreactors within the energy sector. The company's main product, the Kaleidos microreactor, is designed to generate electricity and thermal power for various applications, aiming to replace diesel generators with a more sustainable and efficient alternative. Radiant's microreactors are targeted towards providing resilient backup power for critical infrastructure such as hospitals, data centers, and military installations, as well as supplying energy to remote locations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Verifiable
cb_description: Verifiable builds an application programming interface (API) to automate license verification for healthcare providers. The company offers services such as prescreening, licensing, credentialing, provider enrollment, and network management to automate the process of verifying and monitoring healthcare providers. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: ALT TEX
cb_description: ALT TEX operates as a sustainable polyester fashion and textile manufacturing company. It makes biodegradable and carbon-neutral textiles engineered from food waste through patent-pending fermentation technology. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Kitchener, Canada.

name: Ambee
cb_description: Ambee is a company focused on providing climate and environmental intelligence in the technology sector. The company offers reliable and ready-to-integrate APIs that provide real-time environmental data on aspects such as air quality, weather, pollen, and forest fires, which can be used to make informed decisions. Ambee primarily serves sectors such as marketing and advertising, logistics and supply chain, pharma and digital health, smart cities, banking and finance, and retail and consumer goods. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Zaihui
cb_description: Zaihui is a full-stack e-commerce SaaS provider in the local lifestyle sector. The company offers a suite of services including online store setup, marketing platforms, member management, and payment solutions, designed to help local merchants operate more independently and effectively. Zaihui's solutions cater to various industries within the local lifestyle domain, such as dining, entertainment, beauty, and hospitality. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Shanghai, Shanghai.

name: Atom Computing
cb_description: Atom Computing focuses on the development of scalable gate-based quantum computers within the quantum computing industry. Its main offerings include quantum computers that utilize atomic arrays of optically trapped neutral atoms designed to enable significant computational breakthroughs. These quantum systems are aimed at providing developers with large numbers of error-corrected qubits, long coherence times, optimized connectivity, and fast operations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Arize
cb_description: Arize specializes in artificial intelligence observability and large language model (LLM) evaluation within the machine learning infrastructure domain. The company offers a platform for monitoring, troubleshooting, and evaluating machine learning models, including natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, and recommender systems, without requiring technical expertise. Its platform is primarily utilized by industries such as financial services, electronic commerce, media & entertainment, autonomous vehicles, manufacturing, and biotechnology & pharmaceutical research. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Lafayette, California.

name: Mitra Chem
cb_description: Mitra Chem focuses on commercializing iron-based cathode materials within the battery materials sector. The company's main offerings include the development of iron-based cathodes for lithium-ion batteries, aiming to accelerate the lab-to-production timeline significantly. It primarily serves sectors that require mass-market electrification, such as the electric vehicle and energy storage industries. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Motivo
cb_description: Motivo uses analytics and AI to help design companies improve their yields by transforming raw data into knowledge and insights. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Zeotap
cb_description: Zeotap focuses on helping brands monetize customer data, operating within the data solutions and marketing industry. It offers services such as a customer data platform for integrating and managing customer data, a data delivery service for targeted marketing, and a universal marketing ID initiative. Zeotap primarily serves the marketing and programmatic advertising sectors. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Hallow
cb_description: Hallow is an app that focuses on Christian and Catholic prayer, meditation, and spiritual nourishment. The app offers a variety of guided prayer sessions, meditations, and audio content designed to help users deepen their faith and find peace through prayer. Users can personalize their experience with different lengths, guides, background music, and more, and engage with community challenges and daily reflections to build a regular prayer habit. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: trym
cb_description: Trym provides micro business insurance.

name: Houm
cb_description: Houm is a technology-driven company focused on streamlining the process of leasing, selling, and buying properties. The company offers a marketplace platform that simplifies real estate transactions for landlords and tenants by leveraging technology and data. Houm primarily serves the real estate tech industry. Houm was formerly known as ArriendoAsegurado. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Huechuraba, Chile.

name: Ox Security
cb_description: Ox Security specializes in software supply chain security solutions. The company offers services that help manage security risks in the software development process, including automating protective actions, managing security findings from a single location, and ensuring the security and integrity of all cloud artifacts. It primarily serves the software development and cloud computing industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Zluri
cb_description: Zluri is a leader in the SaaS management platform sector, focusing on providing comprehensive visibility and control over SaaS applications for modern enterprises. The company offers solutions for detecting shadow IT, optimizing SaaS costs, and governing user access, all through a unified platform with workflow automation and built-in iPaaS capabilities. Zluri's platform is designed to serve IT and security teams across various industries, including gaming and biotech. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Instanda
cb_description: Instanda specializes in providing no-code software solutions for the insurance industry, focusing on policy administration and product innovation. The company offers a platform that enables carriers, MGAs, and brokers to design, build, and launch insurance products rapidly, with capabilities for seamless integration into existing systems. Instanda's platform is utilized by various sectors within the insurance industry, including property & casualty and life & health. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, England.

name: Base
cb_description: Base is a vegan beauty brand that specializes in skincare and beauty products. The company offers a range of beauty items including eyeshadow palettes, multi-use color products for cheeks, eyes, and lips, lip tints, body acne solutions, and lip masks, all formulated with vegan ingredients. Base's products are designed to address various beauty needs such as makeup application, skincare concerns, and anti-aging solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Nuritas
cb_description: Nuritas is a biotechnology company focused on the discovery and development of bioactive peptides through artificial intelligence. The company's main offerings include the identification and clinical testing of natural peptides to enhance the efficacy of products across various industries. Nuritas primarily sells to sectors such as the dietary supplements industry, functional food and beverage industry, medical foods sector, and the cosmetics industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Dublin 2, Ireland.

name: Tellus Therapeutics
cb_description: Tellus Therapeutics is a neonatal care company focused on developing treatments for preterm infants with brain injuries. Their main product, TT-20, is designed to induce regeneration of myelin-producing cells and reverse white matter injury, aiming to improve neurodevelopmental outcomes in newborns. The company's efforts are concentrated on addressing the unmet medical needs within the neonatal healthcare sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Hillsborough, North Carolina.

name: CaliberMind
cb_description: CaliberMind operates as a B2B marketing insights platform that specializes in the integration and analysis of marketing data. The company offers solutions for marketing attribution, engagement scoring, funnel analytics, and pipeline conversion rates. CaliberMind's platform is designed to help marketing professionals understand and optimize campaign performance and marketing spending. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Flipboard
cb_description: Flipboard is a content curation and sharing platform within the digital media industry. It aggregates quality articles, videos, podcasts, and other media to provide personalized content for users. Flipboard's services cater to individuals seeking to explore their interests and share curated content with others. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Medable
cb_description: Medable specializes in providing digital clinical trial software solutions within the healthcare and pharmaceutical sectors. The company offers a comprehensive platform that facilitates the management of clinical trials, including tools for remote data collection, electronic consent (eConsent), patient-reported outcomes (ePRO), and clinical outcome assessments (eCOA), all designed to streamline the trial process and enhance data quality. Medable was formerly known as Dermatrap. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Alchemab Therapeutics
cb_description: Alchemab Therapeutics focuses on the development of antibody therapeutics. The company's main service involves identifying resilient individuals, such as long-term survivors of cancer, and using their antibodies to create therapeutics for hard-to-treat diseases. Alchemab primarily sells to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Settle
cb_description: Settle ceased operations. Settle is an online payment application. It offers loyalty rewards, payment services, leaves without waiting for a check, and more. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Base
cb_description: Base is a vegan beauty brand that specializes in skincare and beauty products. The company offers a range of beauty items including eyeshadow palettes, multi-use color products for cheeks, eyes, and lips, lip tints, body acne solutions, and lip masks, all formulated with vegan ingredients. Base's products are designed to address various beauty needs such as makeup application, skincare concerns, and anti-aging solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: RailVision Analytics
cb_description: RailVision Analytics is a company focused on advanced data analysis in the rail industry. The company offers advanced analytics software that uses artificial intelligence to provide actionable business intelligence, with a focus on reducing greenhouse gas emissions, increasing fuel savings, and improving rail safety. RailVision Analytics primarily serves the rail industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Cove
cb_description:
Cove is a stealth company founded by Aditya Agarwal and Ruchi Sanghvi, formerly of Facebook. As per the company, Cove is re-imagining the way groups communicate, coordinate, and collaborate.

In February 2012, Cove was acquired by Dropbox. The valuation of Cove was undisclosed. Other terms of the deal were not released.

name: ClickHouse
cb_description: ClickHouse is an open-source OLAP database management system focused on real-time analytics and data warehousing. It provides a column-oriented DBMS that enables fast generation of analytical reports using SQL queries for real-time applications. ClickHouse primarily serves sectors such as financial services, fraud and cybersecurity, gaming, and machine learning and general AI. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: SlashNext
cb_description: SlashNext is a cybersecurity company specializing in integrated cloud messaging security across various platforms. The company offers protection against business email compromise (BEC), smishing, account takeovers, and zero-hour phishing attacks for email, mobile, and web browsers. SlashNext's solutions are designed to secure communication channels such as Microsoft 365, Zoom, SMS, LinkedIn, WhatsApp, and more, utilizing advanced technologies like AI for threat detection and prevention. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Pleasanton, California.

name: Quadric
cb_description: Quadric is a company focused on artificial intelligence computing, specifically in the domain of processor architecture. The company offers a general purpose neural processing unit (GPNPU) known as Chimera, which is designed to deliver high machine learning inference performance and run complex code. The primary customers of Quadric are likely to be in the technology and artificial intelligence industries. It is based in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

name: Skillup
cb_description: Skillup is a company that focuses on talent management in the human resources sector. The company offers a software as a service (SaaS) platform that assists human resources teams in managing employee training, performance reviews, and skills management. The primary sectors that Skillup serves are businesses seeking to digitalize their human resources processes. It is based in Boulogne-Billancourt, France.

name: CurrencyFair
cb_description: CurrencyFair specializes in international money transfers and currency exchange within the financial services sector. The company offers secure and low-cost transfers across borders, providing customers with access to competitive exchange rates and a transparent fee structure. CurrencyFair serves individuals and businesses needing to send money abroad, including for purposes such as property purchases, pension transfers, tuition fee payments, and more. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Dublin 4, Ireland.

name: Niryo
