cb_description: Niryo specializes in the design and assembly of collaborative robots, operating within the robotics and artificial intelligence industry. The company's main offerings include 6-axis collaborative robots, along with an ecosystem of products and services that facilitate the exploration of robotics, artificial intelligence, and Industry 4.0 concepts. Niryo primarily serves the education sector, including high schools, universities, technical schools, and research and development programs, as well as the industrial market. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Wambrechies, France.

name: Thanx
cb_description: Thanx operates as a guest engagement platform operating in the retail and hospitality sectors. The company provides digital experiences, personalization, and loyalty services to help businesses increase customer lifetime value. Its primary offerings include loyalty program management, customer relationship management, and personalized marketing campaigns. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Partillion Bioscience
cb_description: Partillion Bioscience specializes in advanced single-cell assay technologies within the life science sector. The company offers a nanovial platform for compartmentalization and analysis of single cells, facilitating the study of biological functions such as protein secretion. Partillion Bioscience's products are primarily utilized in the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industries for research and development purposes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Oxipital AI
cb_description: Oxipital AI specializes in visual artificial intelligence solutions within the manufacturing sector. The company offers visual AI inspection systems and vision-guided pick-and-place robotic systems. Oxipital AI primarily serves industries such as food processing, agriculture, and consumer packaged goods. It was founded in 2024 and is based in Bedford, Massachusetts.

name: Cleo
cb_description: Cleo provides an end-to-end support to working families. It facilitates planning a family to caring for an adult loved one. It offers certified care practitioners who guide and provide advice to parents on parenthood, pregnancy, and more. It provides an application for parents that includes coaching, content, and community with a network of certified experts to guide families through their journey into parenthood and back to work again. It was formerly known as Lucy. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Tavus
cb_description: Tavus specializes in AI-driven video personalization within the marketing and sales automation sector. Its platform enables the creation of personalized videos using advanced voice and face cloning technology, designed to enhance customer engagement and conversion rates. Tavus primarily serves sectors that benefit from personalized outreach, such as sales, marketing, customer success, and recruitment. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: pgEdge
cb_description: pgEdge specializes in distributed PostgreSQL solutions optimized for the network edge within the database and cloud computing industries. The company offers products designed to reduce data latency and provide ultra-high availability for databases, leveraging a multi-master, multi-region, and multi-cloud architecture. pgEdge's services cater to various sectors, including financial services, SaaS media analytics, and companies requiring data residency compliance. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Alexandria, Virginia.

name: Bluesheets
cb_description: Bluesheets specializes in finance, accounting, and data automation software, focusing on artificial intelligence-driven workflow automation across various industries. The company offers solutions that automate and help in financial processes, data reconciliation, and document management using their proprietary file processing tool, fileAI, and workflow builder. It primarily serves sectors such as accounting firms, finance teams, insurance companies, banking institutions, and operations teams. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: Britive
cb_description: Britive is a cloud-native security solution specializing in privileged access management for multi-cloud environments. The company offers a platform that provides just-in-time permissions, dynamic privilege management, and zero standing privileges to enhance security and operational efficiency. Britive primarily serves cloud-forward enterprises across various sectors, including healthcare, automotive, retail, media, and entertainment. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Glendale, California.

name: Scalapay
cb_description: Scalapay is a financial technology company offering a buy-now-pay-later service that enables customers to make purchases and defer payments through interest-free installments. The company's main service allows consumers to receive their orders immediately while splitting the payment into three monthly installments without interest, which is facilitated through both online and in-store transactions. Scalapay primarily serves the ecommerce industry, as well as brick-and-mortar retailers, by providing a payment solution that aims to increase basket size and conversion rates for merchants. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Cariuma
cb_description: Cariuma is a sneaker brand that operates in the footwear industry with a focus on sustainability. The company offers a range of sneakers that are handcrafted from natural premium materials such as organic canvas, leather, and suede. Cariuma primarily sells to the consumer goods sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: InfoBionic
cb_description: InfoBionic operates as a company focused on advancing the field of diagnostic remote cardiac monitoring within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a suite of products including a virtual cardiac telemetry platform with analysis and interchangeable biosensor lead sets designed for various levels of patient acuity. InfoBionic primarily serves sectors such as cardiology practices, medical leaders, and health administrators. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Chelmsford, Massachusetts.

name: Bitrefill
cb_description: Bitrefill is a crypto ecommerce platform specializing in the provision of digital gift cards and mobile airtime refills across various sectors. The company enables customers to purchase these services using Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, leveraging technologies such as the Lightning Network for transactions. Bitrefill's offerings cater to a global market, allowing users to 'Live on Crypto' by facilitating everyday purchases with digital currency. Bitrefill was formerly known as Pupot AB. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: HData
cb_description: HData specializes in automated compliance and business intelligence for the regulated energy domain. The company provides regulatory technology (RegTech) and legal technology solutions that helps in regulatory and legal processes. It primarily serves clients within the regulated energy sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Lockport, Illinois.

name: Buywith
cb_description: Buywith is a company specializing in live commerce, operating within the social commerce industry. It offers a livestream shopping platform that transforms e-commerce into dynamic video shopping experiences, featuring shoppable videos, live event hosting, and social media multi-streaming. The platform primarily caters to brands looking to engage with the creator economy and modern consumers, particularly Gen Z and Millennials. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: BetterHalf
cb_description: BetterHalf is a company that specializes in wedding planning services and AI matchmaking within the matrimonial and events industry. The company offers end-to-end wedding solutions, including venue booking, event management, and personalized wedding proposals, designed to cater to the diverse needs of couples planning their special day. BetterHalf also provides an AI matchmaking platform to help individuals find compatible life partners. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Arch
cb_description: Arch specializes in heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) sales software as a service designed to streamline heat loads and system design for the climate technology industry. The company offers a suite of tools that facilitate pre-visit home analysis, automated system designs, and proposal dispatch. Arch primarily serves HVAC contractors looking for sales. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Covina, California.

name: ID5
cb_description: ID5 specializes in user identification for the digital advertising sector. It offers services that enable advertisers to engage with customers and publishers to monetize audiences, with a focus on privacy and data protection. The company primarily serves the digital advertising ecosystem, including brands, publishers, and technology partners. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: tvScientific
cb_description: tvScientific is a connected TV advertising platform focused on performance marketing for brands and apps of all sizes. The company offers a self-managed solution that simplifies TV buying and optimization, using massive data to demonstrate the actual value of TV advertising. tvScientific primarily serves consumer brands seeking precise targeting and measurable advertising outcomes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Redondo Beach, California.

name: Eneba
cb_description: Eneba is an online marketplace focused on digital game distribution and related services within the gaming industry. The company offers a platform for buying and selling games, gift cards, top-ups, and e-money vouchers, as well as providing pre-order options and downloadable content for various gaming platforms. Eneba caters to a diverse customer base, including individual gamers, game publishers, sellers, and affiliate partners. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Vilnius, Lithuania.

name: Lucky
cb_description: Lucky develops a financial application to offer credit products, sale offers, and cashback rewards. It provides access to a range of credit services, discounts, and cashback rewards that can be used in person and virtually with partnered local and global brands. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Giza, Egypt.

name: Sherpa
cb_description: Sherpa is a Scottish property service platform. It includes maintenance, cleaning and operations for property owners. The company is based in Edinburgh, Scotland. In October 2022, Sherpa was acquired by Altido. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: TeraWatt Infrastructure
cb_description: TeraWatt Infrastructure is a company focused on electric vehicle charging solutions in the energy sector. The company offers comprehensive charging solutions for light, medium, and heavy-duty fleets, including the financing, development, ownership, and operation of charging assets, as well as providing software, operations, and maintenance services. TeraWatt Infrastructure primarily serves the transportation industry, catering to various types of commercial fleets. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: WorkFusion
cb_description: WorkFusion specializes in AI-driven automation solutions for anti-money laundering (AML) risk mitigation within the financial services industry. The company offers AI Digital Workers that perform tasks such as sanctions screening, transaction monitoring, and customer due diligence to enhance compliance operations and reduce risk. These AI solutions are designed to scale team capacity, improve program efficiency, and support higher-value investigative work. WorkFusion was formerly known as Crowd Computing Systems. It was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Misen
cb_description: Misen specializes in high-quality kitchen tools and cookware designed for home use. The company offers a range of products including chef's knives, nonstick pans, stainless steel skillets, and other cooking utensils that cater to the needs of cooking enthusiasts seeking professional-grade equipment. Misen primarily serves the home cooking market, with a focus on customers looking to enhance their cooking experience with reliable and well-crafted tools. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Latent AI
cb_description: Latent AI specializes in edge AI solutions, focusing on the development of ultra-efficient, secure, and scalable artificial intelligence models for edge devices. The company offers an automated MLOps pipeline that enables the creation of lightweight and compressed AI models, ensuring fast deployment and consistent development across various hardware platforms. Latent AI primarily serves federal and commercial organizations seeking to enhance their edge computing capabilities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Hello Clever
cb_description: Hello Clever provides payments and financial management platform. It enables consumers to manage their spending, and social media payments and offers quick response (QR) code invoice options for businesses. It offers cash back for customers while shopping and allows users to track their spending across multiple bank accounts in real-time. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Bzaar
cb_description: Bzaar is a company that specializes in streamlining the sourcing process for US retailers and brands from India, operating within the supply chain and logistics industry. The company offers end-to-end supply chain solutions, including vendor vetting, product development, quality control, and delivery services. Bzaar primarily serves the retail and e-commerce industries, providing them with a reliable partner for quality and transparency in sourcing. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Salv
cb_description: Salv specializes in financial crime compliance solutions within the financial compliance sector. The company offers a suite of anti-money laundering products including transaction monitoring, customer risk scoring, and politically exposed persons and sanction screening. Salv's solutions are modular, allowing for tailored integration into existing compliance systems, and focusing on reducing manual tasks and false positives while facilitating collaborative investigations and data sharing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Cognito Health
cb_description: Cognito Health specializes in medical device manufacturing and focuses on improving the healthcare environment through technology. The company offers a predictive, contact-free, and continuous patient monitoring system designed to reduce patient falls and pressure injuries. Cognito Health primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Goodyear, Arizona.

name: Particle.One
cb_description: Particle.One Alpha is an artificial intelligence system that specializes in processing and modeling data for the commodity market sector. It offers services that transform structured and unstructured data into actionable intelligence for market participants. The company's technology facilitates the exploration and modeling of economic relationships, aiding in the comprehension and utilization of market information. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: MojiWorks
cb_description: MojiWorks specializes in creating social games within the gaming industry. Its products are designed to be played on social platforms, offering gaming experiences that require no installation and are accessible to enhance social interactions among friends. MojiWorks primarily serves the social gaming sector, with a focus on integrating games into popular communication platforms where people already connect. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Guildford, United Kingdom.

name: SenseOn
cb_description: SenseOn specializes in cybersecurity solutions within the technology sector. The company offers a self-driving cyber defence platform that automates the process of threat detection, investigation, and response across various digital environments. SenseOn's services are utilized by a diverse range of sectors including government, retail, healthcare, and financial services. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Matik
cb_description: Matik specializes in data-driven content automation software within the business content creation sector. The company offers solutions that enable the integration of personalized metrics, text, charts, and tables into presentations and documents such as Google Slides, PowerPoints, and PDFs, tailored to specific audiences without storing data on the platform. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: CrazyLabs
cb_description:
CrazyLabs is a publisher of children's and family apps. The company produces interactive e-books, games, and educational experiences for children.

On August 5th, 2021, CrazyLabs was acquired by Embracer Group. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Vico Therapeutics
cb_description: Vico Therapeutics focuses on RNA modulation for the treatment of genetic neurological disorders in the healthcare and biotechnology industry. The company's main service involves the development of RNA modulating therapies, specifically antisense oligonucleotides, to address specific genetic defects at their source. The company primarily serves the healthcare sector, particularly in the area of neurological disorders. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Leiden, Netherlands.

name: BitGo
cb_description: BitGo focuses on providing secure and solutions for the digital asset economy. The company offers a range of services including regulated custody, financial services, and core infrastructure. BitGo primarily serves investors and builders in the digital asset economy, including exchanges, retail platforms, crypto-native firms, and institutional investors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Nuevocor
cb_description: Nuevocor is a biotech company focused on the development of genetic medicines for cardiomyopathies. The company's main offerings include innovative mechanobiology-based genetic medicines designed to treat heart conditions known as genetic cardiomyopathies. These medicines aim to address the underlying biomechanical root cause of the disease, going beyond traditional gene therapy which treats single gene mutations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: BenchSci
cb_description: Benchsci develops a research intelligence platform. It uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to translate closed and open-access data into recommendations for specific experiments regarding antibody extraction. Benchsci was formerly known as Scinapsis. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Omnix Medical
cb_description: Omnix Medical is a biopharmaceutical company focused on the development and commercialization of novel antibiotic agents for the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include the creation of genetically engineered antimicrobial peptides designed to treat infections caused by drug-resistant bacteria. Omnix Medical's technology emphasizes the production of selective, degradation-resistant peptides that are potent in combating resistant pathogens. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: RedShelf
cb_description: RedShelf is an EdTech company that specializes in providing affordable digital textbooks and course materials across various academic disciplines. The company offers a platform that allows for the purchase and reading of eBooks, with features such as built-in study tools, cross-device access, and the ability to highlight text, take notes, and generate citations. RedShelf primarily serves the educational sector by facilitating the transition to digital learning materials for students, schools, and publishers. RedShelf was formerly known as Virdocs Software. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Arrakis Therapeutics
cb_description: Arrakis Therapeutics operates as a biotechnology company focused on the discovery of small-molecule therapeutics that target Ribonucleic acid(RNA). The company develops a platform for identifying compounds that act directly on RNA to address targets previously considered 'undruggable'. Arrakis Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on developing new therapies for various diseases. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Bigeye
cb_description: Bigeye is a full-service creative agency focused on brand strategy and consumer engagement across various sectors. The company offers services including market intelligence, creative development, content creation, media planning, and digital commerce solutions. Bigeye primarily serves brands looking to establish or scale their presence in the market. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Orlando, Florida.

name: ScaleOps
cb_description: ScaleOps creates an online platform to manage kubernetes resources. It offers services for elastic pod rightsizing, node headroom, container-based scaling policies, cost visibility, insights and alerts, and more. The company delivers services to eliminate repeated ongoing resource configuration cycles and reduce Kubernetes (K8s) cloud costs. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Evrnu
cb_description: Evrnu develops engineered fibers made from discarded clothing. Its fiber transformation technologies turn old clothing into a new, useful raw material for the creation of premium garments. Evrnu was formerly known as Future Resource Collective. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Rootine
cb_description: Rootine is a company that focuses on personalized health and wellness, operating in the health tech and supplement industry. The company offers personalized multivitamins and at-home health tests, designed to optimize individual health based on unique biological data. Rootine primarily serves the health and wellness sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: The Naked Market
cb_description: The Naked Market specializes in consumer packaged goods (CPG). The company offers a range of health-conscious products designed to appeal to younger demographics. The Naked Market primarily sells to the online retail sector. The Naked Market was formerly known as The Modern Food Ko. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Ansel Health
cb_description: Ansel Health is a company focused on providing supplemental health insurance in the insurance industry. The company offers a comprehensive insurance plan that covers a wide range of injuries and illnesses, providing financial support to individuals in the event of health hardships. The services are primarily targeted towards employers, offering them a way to provide additional health benefits to their employees. Ansel Health was formerly known as Brella. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Claymont, Delaware.

name: Gigs
cb_description: Gigs is a company focused on connecting job seekers with hourly positions across various industries. The company operates an online marketplace that facilitates the matching of businesses with reliable hourly workers based on geographic location and shift availability. Gigs primarily serves sectors that offer part-time, full-time, and gig opportunities in hourly roles. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: ShopMy
cb_description: ShopMy operates as a platform focused on product promotion in the beauty, fashion, and home decor industries. It offers a service that connects content creators with brands, empowering them to collaborate on product promotion. Its marketing platform equips creators with the tools they need to earn from their product recommendations, like building digital storefronts, accessing a catalog of millions of products, making commissionable links, and chatting directly with companies via the mobile app.The company primarily serves the e-commerce industry. ShopMy was formerly known as ShopMy Shelf. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Worcester, Massachusetts.

name: Spiderwort
cb_description: Spiderwort is a tissue engineering company that operates in the biotechnology and regenerative medicine industry. The company develops innovative plant-based biomaterials that are used to promote the repair and regeneration of living tissues, including the spinal cord. Spiderwort primarily serves the medical and healthcare sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Ottawa, Canada.

name: Titan
cb_description: Titan is a company focused on engineering and technology within the automotive and motorsport industries. It offers design, manufacturing, and assembly services for steering, suspension, and engine components. The company caters primarily to the motorsport and automotive sectors, providing solutions for complex engineering challenges and supply chain management. It was founded in 1978 and is based in Saint Neots, England.

name: Robin
cb_description: Robin is a company that focuses on providing a hybrid workplace experience platform, operating in the technology and software industry. The company offers a range of services including desk booking, room scheduling, workplace analytics, and visitor management, all designed to streamline office workflows and enhance workplace experiences. Robin primarily caters to sectors such as higher education and financial services. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: RIFT
cb_description: RIFT is a company focused on renewable energy technology in the clean energy sector. The company's main offering is the Iron Fuel Technology, a clean technology that provides renewable heat supply to energy-intensive industries such as district heating, industrial processes, and electricity generation. This technology primarily serves the energy sector, with a particular focus on industries seeking to transition to cleaner, more sustainable energy sources. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Eindhoven, Netherlands.

name: TymeBank
cb_description: TymeBank develops a software (SaaS) based banking service platform offering various digital banking services. The company provides digital banking ecosystems and online banking services such as personal banking, business banking, and more. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa

name: Wecasa
cb_description: Wecasa is a company that specializes in providing a range of home services across various sectors including beauty, wellness, cleaning, childcare, and personal training. The company offers services such as home cleaning, babysitting, hairdressing, beauty treatments, massages, and personal fitness coaching, catering to the needs of individuals seeking convenience and quality service at home. Wecasa primarily serves the domestic market, with a focus on busy individuals and families looking for professional and reliable home services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Nexxiot
cb_description: Nexxiot specializes in digitalizing freight asset management, focusing on technology solutions for the logistics and supply chain industry. The company offers real-time data and insights for fleet management, automating logistics processes, and improving operational efficiency and safety for shipping containers and railcars. Nexxiot's technology is designed to withstand extreme conditions, providing long-term, detailed insights into events affecting freight assets. Nexxiot was formerly known as Nexiot. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Essentialist
cb_description: Essentialist specializes in the creation of travel experiences within the travel and tourism industry. The company offers travel planning and booking services, leveraging insights from a network of travel writers and insiders to craft itineraries tailored to individual member preferences. Essentialist primarily caters to travelers seeking curated journeys. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palma de Mallorca, Spain.

name: Audion
cb_description: Audion is an adtech company specializing in digital audio advertising solutions. The company offers a suite of tools for hosting, streaming, and monetizing audio content, as well as planning, producing, and measuring digital audio campaigns for advertisers and media agencies. Audion primarily serves the digital audio sector, including radio, music, and podcast industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Everclear
cb_description: Everclear is a company focused on coordinating global liquidity settlement between chains, addressing fragmentation in the modular blockchain sector. Its main offerings include integration services for intent protocols, solver networks, and decentralized applications to facilitate efficient transaction settlements. Everclear's solutions are designed to reduce costs and complexities for users, solvers, and bridges. Everclear was formerly known as Connext Labs. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Park City, Utah.

name: Digs
cb_description: Digs offers a financial platform for residential real estate. It helps renters save for their first home through rewards and financial tools and connects aspiring homeowners with real estate agents and mortgage lenders. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois. On October 15th, 2020, Digs was acquired by OJO Labs.

name: KA Imaging
cb_description: KA Imaging focuses on developing X-ray imaging technologies and systems within the medical, veterinary, and industrial sectors. The company's main offerings include digital X-ray detectors and solutions that facilitate medical diagnostics, veterinary care, and non-destructive testing for various industries. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Waterloo, Canada.

name: Decodable
cb_description: Decodable is a company focused on real-time data engineering and stream processing within the technology sector. They offer a serverless platform for real-time data ingestion, integration, analysis, and event-driven service development, utilizing tools like Apache Flink and Debezium for data movement and processing. The platform primarily serves sectors that require real-time data capabilities, such as AI applications, data warehousing, and event-driven architectures. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Covina, California.

name: PharmEasy
cb_description: PharmEasy operates as an online pharmacy and healthcare platform that delivers prescription medicines and healthcare products. It offers a range of services including diagnostic test bookings and delivery of over-the-counter products and medical equipment. It serves a diverse customer base, providing healthcare solutions that emphasize accessibility and affordability. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Bot M.D.
cb_description: Bot M.D. is a company that focuses on developing artificial intelligence (AI) solutions for the healthcare industry. The company's main offerings include an AI chat assistant that allows healthcare professionals to instantly search for hospital information and a system that automates patient monitoring and engagement. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: Pasqal
cb_description: Pasqal specializes in quantum computing technology. It focuses focuses on industries such as energy, mobility, healthcare, finance, and public services. The company offers quantum computing solutions for simulations and optimizations for various applications. It primarily sells to sectors that require computational capabilities, such as risk management, battery design, weather forecasting, quantum materials research, grid power management, and logistics optimization. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Massy, France.

name: Xyte
cb_description: Xyte provides cloud-based solutions for hardware manufacturers. The company's main service is a connected device platform (CDP) that allows manufacturers to manage, service, and commercialize their connected devices. Its platform offers features such as remote device management, customer support, data analysis, and integration with existing business tools. It primarily serves the industrial and robotics sector, smart buildings industry, workplace technology providers, and managed service providers. It was formerly known as SyncPro. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Kochav Yair, Israel.

name: Zus Health
cb_description: Zus Health specializes in healthcare data interoperability. The company offers a shared health data platform that provides patient data at the point of care through application program interface (API), embedded components, and direct electronic health records (EHR) integrations. The platform is primarily used by healthcare organizations to understand patient history, streamline intake processes, and monitor patient medication adherence. It was formerly known as Zeus Healthcare Technologies. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: FullStory
cb_description: FullStory operates as a behavioral data analytics company. It specializes in understanding user sentiment and interactions within digital environments. The company offers a platform that captures, analyzes, and visualizes user behavior to help businesses improve their digital products and customer experiences. FullStory primarily serves sectors that require deep insights into user behavior, such as e-commerce, finance, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) industries. FullStory was formerly known as Monetology. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Grabango
cb_description: Grabango is a provider of checkout-free technology for the retail sector, focusing on enhancing the shopping experience in grocery and convenience stores. The company offers a solution that allows customers to shop without waiting in checkout lines by using a mobile application to scan a code and automatically tally their items. Grabango's technology is designed for large-scale store chains and aims to save shoppers time by streamlining the purchasing process. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berkeley, California. Grabango ceased operations in October 2024.

name: Teikametrics
cb_description: Teikametrics is a company specializing in AI-powered marketplace optimization for the ecommerce sector. It offers a suite of services that include advertising management, inventory forecasting, and multichannel feed optimization, all designed to enhance online retail performance. The company primarily serves businesses operating on large ecommerce platforms such as Amazon and Walmart. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Orange EV
cb_description: Orange EV is a company that focuses on the design and delivery of pure electric, industrial-strength vehicles, operating within the automotive and clean energy sectors. The company's main offerings are heavy-duty electric trucks, which are designed to improve performance and safety, reduce costs, and eliminate emissions. These trucks are primarily sold to sectors such as rail intermodal, distribution, parcel/package delivery, third-party logistics, trucking, retail, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Riverside, Missouri.

name: Artizan Biosciences
cb_description: Artizan Biosciences is a biotechnology company that focuses on creating precision therapeutics for serious diseases triggered by intestinal inflammation. The company's main offerings include the development of novel small molecule and monoclonal antibody approaches to inhibit specific, disease-associated microbial virulence factors in the intestinal tract. Artizan primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New Haven, Connecticut.

name: Mys Tyler
cb_description: Mys Tyler is a fashion technology company that provides personalized style inspiration and shopping recommendations. The company offers a platform where users can discover fashion creators similar to their body type and receive daily outfit inspiration and styling tips tailored to their physique. Mys Tyler primarily serves individuals seeking fashion advice and personalized clothing recommendations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: env0
cb_description: env0 focuses on Infrastructure as Code (IaC) environment management within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies IaC management, enforces governance and policy, optimizes costs, automates deployment workflows, supports multi-cloud infrastructure, and enhances team collaboration. Its services are primarily used in the cloud computing industry. env0 was founded in 2018 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Risk Ledger
cb_description: Risk Ledger specializes in supply chain security and third-party risk management within the cybersecurity domain. The company offers a platform that facilitates real-time monitoring and management of supply chain risks, compliance with cybersecurity frameworks, and automated reassessments for supplier due diligence. Risk Ledger's solutions cater to various sectors including public sector, critical national infrastructure, financial services, insurance, and technology. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: GoodShuffle
cb_description: GoodShuffle specializes in event rental management software within the event planning and services industry. It offers a range of tools for tracking inventory, managing conflicts, generating quotes and contracts, processing payments, and handling client relationships. GoodShuffle primarily serves sectors such as event and party rentals, A/V and lighting, event design and production, and various other event-related industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Apify
cb_description: Apify serves as a full-stack web scraping and data extraction platform that operates in the cloud computing industry. The company provides tools for developers to build, deploy, and publish web scraping, data extraction, and web automation solutions. Apify's platform offers a range of services including serverless microapps called Actors, proxy management, and data storage solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Prague, Czech Republic.

name: Extendeal
cb_description: Extendeal operates as a health tech company focused on providing purchasing solutions for the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers a platform that compares prices from multiple pharmacies, identifies deals, and selects the lowest prices to facilitate purchasing for its clients. Extendeal primarily serves the pharmaceutical industry, enabling pharmacies to streamline their daily purchasing processes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Caba, Argentina.

name: Near Earth Autonomy
cb_description: Near Earth Autonomy is a company focused on the development of technology for uncrewed aircraft in the aerospace and robotics industry. The company offers a comprehensive autonomy stack, including sensors, computing, and software, to enable aircraft to perceive and avoid environmental hazards. Their services are primarily utilized in the aviation sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: HELIXintel
cb_description: HELIXintel specializes in asset management and predictive maintenance. The company offers a platform enabling facility managers to proactively track, maintain, and manage their equipment and properties, while also optimizing energy efficiency and reducing insurance-related risks. HELIXintel's solutions cater to a variety of sectors, including those with extensive property and equipment assets that require efficient management and maintenance. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Buffalo, New York.

name: Eye Security
cb_description: Eye Security provides cybersecurity solutions for various business sectors, focusing on protecting companies from cyber threats. Its main offerings include managed extended detection and response (xDR) services, round-the-clock incident response, and cyber insurance to ensure business continuity. Eye Security caters to a wide range of industries, including logistics, manufacturing, professional services, and healthcare. It was founded in 2020 and is based in The Hague, Netherlands.

name: Onum
cb_description: Onum specializes in data observability within the IT and security sectors. It offers a platform that provides data reduction, management, and exfiltration services, as well as data enrichment to help organizations gain insights and control over their data. The platform caters to various sectors that require data analytics and observability, including those that need to maintain regulatory compliance and optimize IT infrastructure. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Kubecost
cb_description: Kubecost specializes in Kubernetes cost monitoring and management within the cloud computing industry. The company offers cost visibility and insights, cost allocation, unified cost monitoring, optimization insights, and alerts and governance for Kubernetes environments. Kubecost was formerly known as Clusterwatch. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California. In September 2024, Kubecost was acquired by IBM.

name: Honeycomb Credit
cb_description: Honeycomb Credit is a company focused on providing financial services in the domain of local business investment. The company offers a platform where local businesses can borrow money from everyday investors, allowing business owners to share their future financial success with customers, fans, and their community. Honeycomb Credit primarily serves the small business sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Juno
cb_description:
Juno provides corporate services to new and existing companies. Its services include fund, fiduciary, and compliance services. It is based in Gibraltar.

On December 29th, 2021, Juno was acquired by Valereum Blockchain.15M.

name: Headout
cb_description: Headout is an online booking platform that specializes in providing curated travel experiences, including tours, activities, and events. The company offers a wide range of services, such as instant access to expert-led tours, landmark visits, and tickets to cultural and entertainment events. Headout caters to a global audience seeking to explore top destinations and enjoy unique experiences. Headout was formerly known as Tourlandish. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Brilliant Labs
cb_description: Brilliant Labs is a charity organization that focuses on experiential learning in the education sector. The company provides a platform for youth to develop coding and digital skills through hands-on, creative, and innovative projects. These projects are designed to support the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals and foster a socially responsible entrepreneurial spirit. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Saint John, New Brunswick.

name: Vopero
cb_description: Vopero offers a full-service fashion resale marketplace. Its products include accessories, footwear, pants, tops, and more for men, women, and children. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Ciudad de Mexico, Mexico.

name: Route 92 Medical
cb_description: Route 92 Medical operates as a medical device company. It offers a platform that provides neurovascular intervention solutions for diseases such as stroke. It offers several devices for neurovascular intervention techniques such as FreeClimb 70, FreeClimb 88, and more catheter systems. It was formerly known as CBGB Medical. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Volumental
cb_description: Volumental is a company that focuses on the retail technology sector, specifically in the footwear industry. The company offers a suite of 3D scanning and data tools that provide shoe recommendations for shoppers by leveraging 3D foot scans, retail purchase data, and artificial intelligence. These services primarily cater to the retail industry, both in physical stores and online. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Decentraland
cb_description: Decentraland is a virtual world platform focusing on user-generated content and experiences within the metaverse sector. It offers tools and applications for creating three-dimensional (3D) content, games, and applications, all accessible on a decentralized virtual reality (VR) platform. The platform enables users to buy or rent virtual land, create and manage digital assets like wearables and emotes, and participate in social events. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Carlsbad, California.

name: WelbeHealth
cb_description: WelbeHealth operates as a healthcare company. The company offers a range of services including medical care, home care, dental services, physical therapy, and coordination of social activities and meals, all aimed at enabling seniors to age well at home and in their community. Its primary market is the healthcare sector, specifically targeting the elderly population. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Coconut
cb_description: Coconut is an online recruitment platform focused on the hospitality sector. The company connects job seekers with employers, offering a range of positions from waitstaff and bartenders to managerial roles in the hospitality industry. Coconut primarily serves the hospitality industry, facilitating the hiring process for both job seekers and recruiters. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Fujairah, United Arab Emirates.

name: Disclo
cb_description: Disclo is a company that specializes in automating ADA accommodations for workplace inclusivity within the human resources technology sector. Their main offerings include a platform that streamlines the process of managing employee accommodation requests, ensuring legal compliance and enhancing employee satisfaction. Disclo's solutions cater to various job functions and industries, focusing on improving operational efficiency and mitigating legal risks for organizations. Disclo was formerly known as Chronically Capable, Inc.. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Kando
cb_description: Kando is an Israeli startup that develops a SaaS platform which monitors wastewater collection systems in real-time. The company monitors wastewater in real-time through a cloud-based software solution that tracks and monitors key wastewater quality parameters.

name: Remento
cb_description: Remento is a company focused on preserving personal and family memories by transforming them into hardcover keepsake books. Their main service involves converting voice-recorded memories into written narratives using their proprietary Speech-To-Story technology, without the need for writing. Remento's offerings cater to individuals looking to document and share their personal stories or family histories in a tangible, book format. Remento was formerly known as Heirloom. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Nexla
cb_description: Nexla is a data integration platform that focuses on data management and analytics across various sectors. The company provides services including ETL/ELT/R-ETL integrations, real-time data processing, API integration, and a data fabric architecture. Nexla serves sectors such as asset management, financial services, retail and ecommerce, and healthcare and life sciences. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Scoot
cb_description: Scoot is a global skyscanner for taxis in real time offering prices comparison, ETA, and surge.

name: Polarr
cb_description: Polarr specializes in AI-powered photo and video editing tools within the creative technology sector. The company offers advanced editing tools and filters that enable users to enhance their digital media with aesthetic effects. Polarr's products are designed for both individual creators and developers looking to integrate these tools into their applications. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Harness Wealth
cb_description: Harness Wealth specializes in providing bespoke tax and financial advisory services within the financial sector. The company offers a range of services including tax planning, estate planning, and personalized financial advice, all facilitated through a technology platform. Harness Wealth primarily caters to business and equity owners, offering support for life milestones such as marriage, having a child, and retirement. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: FairMoney
cb_description: FairMoney is a fintech company focused on providing digital banking and financial services. The company offers instant personal loans, savings and investment products, and convenient bill payment options through its mobile application. FairMoney primarily serves individuals and small businesses seeking accessible financial services. FairMoney was formerly known as Predictus. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Ikeja, Nigeria.

name: Deed
cb_description: Deed is a place to find, join and create activities of any type - contests, raffles, causes, events and more. Through Deed's fresh and fun challenge format, even simple activities become irresistible, easy to share, achieve and be proud with! Managers and human resources can use Deed to increase employee engagement.

name: BetterCloud
cb_description: BetterCloud provides software-as-a-service (SaaS) solutions. It offers automation, benchmarking reporting, and tools to automate onboarding, offboarding, mid-lifecycle changes, and security policies for information technology (IT) administrators, and end-users. It primarily serves the information technology sector. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BondCliQ
cb_description: BondCliQ provides data optimization services focusing on the corporate bond market, providing solutions for institutional trading. It offers a central market system that centralizes pre-trade quotes and formalizes the price formation process, alongside tools for historical data visualization and analysis. It primarily serves financial institutions and market participants involved in the trading and analysis of corporate bonds. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: primeNumber
cb_description: primeNumber is a data technology company that develops trocco, a software-as-a-service (SaaS)-based data integration service that enables engineers to automate the data acquisition process and systemN, a general-purpose data engineering platform as a service (PaaS) platform. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: vivenu
cb_description: vivenu specializes in event ticketing solutions across various industries. The company offers a flexible and customizable ticketing platform that enables event organizers to manage, market, and analyze ticket sales. vivenu's platform is designed to cater to a wide range of events, including sports, music, festivals, performing arts, and conventions, providing tools for both online and physical ticket sales. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Dusseldorf, Germany.

name: Supersocial
cb_description: Supersocial is a metaverse company operating in the gaming and digital entertainment industry. The company focuses on developing, producing, and operating high-quality games, experiences, and virtual worlds on platforms like Roblox and Fortnite. Its primary customer base includes digital communities and online gamers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Ometria
cb_description: Ometria is a customer data and experience platform focused on increasing CRM revenue for the retail sector. The company offers a solution that combines a customer data platform (CDP) with cross-channel marketing orchestration, enabling retail marketers to create personalized customer experiences across various channels such as email, mobile, and social media. Ometria's Retail Success Model leverages AI algorithms to analyze CRM performance and provide tailored marketing strategies to achieve revenue goals. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Plus One Robotics
cb_description: Plus One Robotics specializes in robotic and automated material handling solutions within the logistics and warehousing industry. The company provides systems that enhance efficiency and productivity in material handling through advanced vision-guided robotics and human-in-the-loop oversight. Plus One Robotics primarily serves sectors such as general merchandise, parcel and post, and third-party logistics (3PL). It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Antonio, Texas.

name: SolarMente
cb_description: SolarMente specializes in solar energy solutions and operates within the renewable energy sector. The company offers installation of solar panels through various payment methods, including a subscription model that allows customers to start saving on energy costs without an initial investment. SolarMente also provides software to monitor and optimize energy usage, as well as maintenance services to ensure the efficiency of the solar systems. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Deasie
cb_description: Deasie specializes in data governance for language model applications within the artificial intelligence and data governance domains. The company offers a platform that structures, labels, and ensures the safety and quality of data used in language models. It primarily serves sectors that require the integration of language models into their technology stack. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: C TWO
cb_description: C TWO is a technology-agnostic automation management platform that specializes in orchestrating and managing automated work to enhance efficiency and value creation. The company offers solutions such as intelligent orchestration, automated operations, insight & analytics, and integration capabilities to streamline robot operations, reduce costs, and facilitate scaling. C TWO primarily serves sectors that require robust automation and operational management, including but not limited to, mass media, telecommunications, and various industries seeking to optimize their robotic workforce. C TWO was formerly known as RPA Supervisor. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bergen, Norway.

name: Weller
cb_description: Weller is a wellness company that operates in the food and beverage industry. The company's main offerings include functional snacks and drinks, such as sparkling water and drink mixes, that are infused with broad-spectrum CBD and other natural ingredients for wellness benefits. The company primarily serves the health and wellness sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: TRAY
cb_description: TRAY focuses on providing point-of-sale (POS) solutions. The company offers a range of services including cloud-based POS systems, online ordering and delivery systems, handheld POS systems, kitchen display systems, enterprise menu management, and self-service kiosks. Its services are primarily targeted towards the restaurant industry. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Sedna
cb_description: Sedna is a company that specializes in maritime email software and AI-driven workflow enhancements for the shipping industry. Their main offerings include a communication platform designed to improve email management and provide data-driven insights for maritime operations. Sedna's products are tailored to support various sectors within the maritime industry, such as shipbrokers, chartering, trade execution, port agents, and freight forwarding. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: LiveControl
cb_description: LiveControl specializes in remote video production services across various sectors. They offer a comprehensive solution that includes hardware installation, software for remote videography, and live streaming capabilities for events. The company primarily serves sectors such as education, worship, entertainment, government, and funerals. It is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: PayJoy
cb_description: PayJoy focuses on providing credit solutions in the financial services industry. The company's main offerings include providing customers with the ability to afford their first smartphone on credit, using the phone itself as collateral, and offering cash loans with minimal requirements. It primarily serves the financial services sector in emerging markets. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: EmpowerHealth
cb_description: EmpowerHealth specializes in digital health engagement services, focusing on healthcare communication and automation within the health sector. The company offers a platform named Angel, which provides omni-channel monitoring, care management, and care coordination solutions. It primarily serves health providers, payers, and employers. EmpowerHealth was formerly known as Care Angel. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Route
cb_description: Route operates as a company to focuses on the electronic commerce experience, specifically in the post-purchase domain. The company offers a suite of tools including visual tracking, one-click package protection, and tailored brand discovery, to help in the customer's experience after making a purchase. It primarily serves the electronic commerce industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Lehi, Utah.

name: Tonal
cb_description: Tonal is a company that specializes in smart home fitness equipment, revolutionizing the strength training and personal fitness industry. The company offers an all-in-one home gym system that uses machine learning and digital weight resistance to provide personalized workout programs and track performance metrics. Tonal's products are designed to cater to individuals seeking a comprehensive, tailored strength training experience at home. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Elektra Health
cb_description: Elektra Health operates as a digital health company. It focuses on women's health, specifically in the area of menopause. The company provides evidence-based education, personalized support, telemedicine care, and a private community for women navigating menopause. Its services are primarily targeted towards the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Orange
cb_description: Orange is a professional event space booking and rental platform operating in the commercial real estate sector. The company provides a platform for booking and renting spaces for various activities such as exhibitions, promotional events, and pop-up stores, catering to the needs of brands and businesses for temporary event locations. Orange offers a one-stop service that includes event planning and execution, helping to streamline the process of organizing and running events. It is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: Overhaul
cb_description: Overhaul specializes in supply chain visibility and in-transit risk management for global enterprises within various sectors. The company offers real-time tracking of multimodal transportation, risk monitoring, compliance management, and cargo insurance services. Overhaul primarily serves industries such as healthcare, technology, logistics, manufacturing, and food and beverage. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Finoa
cb_description: Finoa focuses on providing a cryptocurrency-asset platform for institutions, operating within the cryptocurrency and decentralized finance (DeFi) sectors. The company offers services such as secure custody of crypto-assets, in-custody staking, and integrated trading solutions, all designed to protect, manage, and grow assets for institutional needs. Finoa primarily serves sectors such as institutional cryptocurrency investors, venture capital firms, corporations, and financial institutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Potsdam, Germany.

name: Future
cb_description: Future focuses on personal training, operating within the fitness and health industry. The company offers a dedicated coach and personalized training plans, providing unlimited workouts for its users. It primarily serves individuals seeking online fitness coaching and personal training. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Huckleberry
cb_description: Huckleberry focuses on wellness-oriented grocery retail, offering a wide range of products from fresh produce to household essentials. The company provides an online grocery delivery service, including premium meats, quality groceries, and gift baskets, catering to various customer needs. The company was formerly known as Tmaki Makaurau. It was founded in 1990 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand. In May 2024, Huckleberry filed for bankruptcy.

name: Fabric
cb_description: Fabric is a new app that allows its community to build want-to lists for entertainment and lifestyle activities by browsing through hundreds of curated packs. The current product covers movies, TV, music, and travel and is expanding its coverage to additional categories.

name: Zetaris
cb_description: Zetaris is a company that focuses on analytical data virtualization in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables connection to existing data sources without moving, ingesting or duplicating data, speeding up time-to-insight, eliminating data redundancy and creating a single, unified view of data. It primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, finance, telecommunications, energy, and water utilities. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Docklands, Victoria.

name: GoFormz
cb_description: GoFormz is a digital forms solution provider operating in the data capture and mobile forms industry. The company offers a platform that allows businesses to create and fill out digital forms on mobile devices and computers, even when offline. These forms can be used to collect various types of data such as images, GPS locations, and signatures. The company primarily serves businesses across various industries, aiding in their digital transformation initiatives. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Allume Energy
cb_description: Allume Energy focuses on providing shared solar energy solutions for apartment buildings within the renewable energy sector. The company's main offering is the SolShare technology, which allows a single rooftop solar system to be connected and distributed across apartments. Allume Energy primarily serves the residential, social housing, and new build sectors with its innovative solar-sharing technology. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Richmond, Australia.

name: dscout
cb_description: dscout is a company that specializes in experience research through its flexible Experience Research Platform within the user research industry. The company offers a suite of tools for recruiting participants, fielding research projects, analyzing data, and sharing insights to facilitate both moderated and unmoderated studies. dscout's platform is designed to support a variety of research needs, including usability testing, concept testing, journey mapping, and competitive analysis. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: NCX
cb_description: NCX is a software company that operates in the event-driven platform sector. The company offers the An-ser platform, which enables organizations to sense, analyze, and respond intelligently to critical business events within their customer, supplier, and partner ecosystems. NCX primarily serves the logistics, retail, technology, and professional services sectors. It was founded in 1998 and is based in Richmond Hill, Ontario.

name: Kodiak Robotics
cb_description: Kodiak Robotics operates as a technology company focusing on autonomous vehicles. The company's main offering is the development of autonomous technology for long-haul trucking, providing a solution that is designed to increase efficiency and safety in the transportation of goods. Its SensorPods utilizes cameras, light detection and ranging (LiDARs), and radars to perceive any environment. It primarily serves the freight and logistics sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: smalt
cb_description: Smalt is a talent development and services platform focused on the green trades sector. The company offers specialized training and certification programs in clean energy, along with smart dispatching, AI-driven workflow guidance, and customer analytics to transform service fulfillment. Smalt primarily serves large B2B customers in the clean energy industry, including solar and heat pump OEMs, energy companies, and green energy asset retailers. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Sage
cb_description: Sage is a tech-enabled allied health recruiting firm operating within the healthcare sector. The company specializes in utilizing artificial intelligence to expedite the hiring process of allied health professionals, managing the entire recruiting workflow from job description provision to the final interview stage. Sage primarily serves the healthcare industry, focusing on hospitals and health systems in need of efficient recruiting solutions. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Oculogica
cb_description: Oculogica specializes in concussion diagnosis technology within the healthcare sector. Its main product, EyeBOX device designed to aid the diagnosis of concussions by measuring eye movement abnormalities in a baseline-free, non-invasive test that takes less than four minutes. It provides immediate, objective screening results and a report to facilitate clear communication among patients, families, and healthcare providers. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in New Richmond, Wisconsin.

name: Diffbot
cb_description: Diffbot specializes in AI-driven web data extraction and knowledge graph creation for various business sectors. The company offers services that transform unstructured web content into structured data, enabling applications to access the web as if it were a database. Diffbot primarily serves sectors such as market intelligence, news monitoring, machine learning, and e-commerce. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Voxel
cb_description: Voxel is a platform that virtualizes apps to the cloud where they can be streamed to any device rather than downloaded. All apps streaming from the Voxel platform offer the same features and capabilities on the native device - GPS, accelerometer, and multi-touch. Voxel replicates remotely any of the features or services that would be used in an app on the user's device so that the app experience is identical.

name: Ray Studios
cb_description: Ray Studios specializes in laser tattoo removal, utilizing advanced picosecond laser technology in the cosmetic treatment industry. The company offers services such as tattoo lightening, complete tattoo removal, and eyebrow tattoo removal, all performed by medical professionals. Ray Studios provides aftercare advice and personalized treatment plans to ensure optimal skin rejuvenation post-treatment. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sevres, France.

name: Tiny Organics
cb_description: Tiny Organics focuses on nutrition and health in the food industry. The company offers a range of organic, ready-made meals specifically designed for babies and toddlers, with a focus on introducing a variety of flavors and textures to promote adventurous eating habits and healthy development. The meals, which are plant-based and free of major allergens, are delivered frozen to customers' doors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lendai
cb_description: Lendai is a fintech company operating in the financial services and real estate sectors. The company provides online financing solutions for foreign investors looking to invest in the US residential real estate market. Its services include short-term and long-term rental financing, tax and legal services, and insurance services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Rishon LeTsiyon, Israel.

name: Chicory
cb_description: Chicory is a contextual commerce advertising platform that specializes in transforming digital recipe content into shoppable experiences. The company offers solutions that enable CPG brands and retailers to engage with consumers through contextually relevant ads and in-recipe commerce, driving them from inspiration to purchase. Chicory primarily serves the consumer packaged goods industry and the digital recipe network. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Waybetter
cb_description: Waybetter is a behavior change company that operates in the health and fitness industry, offering a novel solution to weight loss and wellness. The company provides a platform that combines gamification, social support, and financial incentives to motivate users to adopt healthier habits and achieve their personal health goals. Waybetter's services cater to individuals seeking to lose weight, improve their fitness, and enhance their overall well-being through a community-driven approach. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bold Metrics
cb_description: Bold Metrics is a company that specializes in AI-driven body data solutions within the apparel industry. Their main offerings include a platform that uses digital twin technology to provide size recommendations and optimize fit for the apparel sector, aiming to improve conversion rates and reduce returns. They primarily serve the ecommerce industry, providing tools for personalization and data-driven insights to enhance the online shopping experience. Bold Metrics was formerly known as Fashion Metric. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: The Exploration Company
cb_description: The Exploration Company focuses on democratizing space exploration within the aerospace industry. It develops, manufactures, and operates Nyx, a modular and reusable orbital vehicle designed for a variety of space missions, including resupplying space stations and potential lunar landings. Nyx is engineered to be refueled in orbit and its components are available for use by space and non-space companies through a platform called SpaceStore. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Planegg, Germany.

name: Team8
cb_description: Team8 is a venture group focused on creating and investing in companies within the enterprise technology, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, fintech, and digital health sectors. The company partners with entrepreneurs to co-found companies, offering services such as leading investments in Seed and Series A rounds, and providing a community of C-level executives for collaboration and insight. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Devoted Health
cb_description: Devoted Health is a healthcare company specializing in Medicare Advantage plans. The company offers a range of services including dental, vision, and prescription drug coverage, as well as fitness and wellness programs, primarily to older Americans. Devoted Health's Medicare Advantage plans are designed to provide comprehensive benefits and savings to its members. Devoted Health was formerly known as Orinoco Health. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Inrupt
cb_description: Inrupt focuses on data infrastructure software, operating within the data management and web technology sectors. The company offers enterprise-grade software and services that enable the deployment and management of Solid-compliant solutions, which facilitate user-centric data storage and sharing. Inrupt primarily serves enterprises and governments looking to innovate with personal data sharing and consent management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Tendo
cb_description: Tendo is a company that specializes in the development of robotic medical aids for individuals with gripping limitations. Their main product, Tendo OneGrip, is a device that assists users in gripping, holding, and releasing objects using an artificial tendon system, designed specifically for those with spinal cord injuries to help them regain independence in daily activities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lund, Sweden.

name: Blue Ocean Gear
cb_description: Blue Ocean Gear specializes in intelligent tracking solutions for marine equipment within the technology sector. The company offers smart buoys that provide real-time monitoring and tracking of fishing gear, utilizing satellite and radio communications to relay data to users. These products primarily cater to the fisheries, aquaculture, and marine research sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Sausalito, California.

name: ShardSecure
cb_description: ShardSecure focuses on data security, privacy, and resilience within the technology domain. The company offers a data control platform that provides advanced file-level protection, mitigates cloud ransomware, and supports regulatory compliance for data privacy. It primarily serves sectors that handle sensitive data, such as financial services, healthcare, and technology. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Float
cb_description: Float ceased operation. Float provides a cloud-based banking platform. It offers credit services and manages clients' debit card operations. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California. Float ceased its operation.

name: JobGet
cb_description: JobGet is a company that focuses on connecting job seekers and employers, operating in the employment industry. The company offers a platform where users can create a profile, apply for jobs, and communicate with potential employers. It primarily serves the job market, catering to both individuals seeking employment and businesses looking for employees. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: LiveIn
cb_description: LiveIn operates as a property technology company. It focuses on the long-stay rental community. The company provides fully furnished rental homes with integrated services such as regular cleaning and maintenance, primarily targeting young people seeking affordable housing solutions.LiveIn was formerly known as Hostel Hunting Sdn Bhd. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

name: Goodpath
cb_description: Goodpath is a healthcare company that focuses on providing integrative, whole-person care for chronic conditions. The company offers a range of services that address various health issues including musculoskeletal conditions, sleep disorders, mental health issues, long COVID, and digestive health problems. These services are designed to treat both the symptoms and the underlying causes of these conditions, taking into account factors such as habits, diet, sleep, and stress. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Meero
cb_description: Meero specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) powered visual content creation and enhancement for digital businesses. The company offers solutions for producing and improving the quality of images using artificial intelligence. Meero's technology is primarily utilized by industries requiring visual content, such as real estate, automotive, and e-commerce fashion. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Horizon
cb_description: Horizon focuses on the development of web3 games, operating within the gaming and blockchain industries. The company offers an all-in-one development platform for web3 games, as well as a web3 trading card game where players can win, own, trade, sell, and gift their cards. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: cheqd
cb_description: Cheqd is a company focused on creating infrastructure for trusted data markets in the technology sector. The company offers services that allow for the exchange and monetization of verifiable, portable, and privacy-preserving data. Its technology, which includes self-sovereign identity and blockchain technologies, enables consumers to fully own their data and businesses to build upon a foundation of trusted data. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Pie Insurance
cb_description: Pie Insurance operates a platform for workers' compensation insurance. It matches price with risk across a broad spectrum of small business types that offer sustainable insurance to small business owners. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: iLoF
cb_description: iLoF is a digital health company focused on accelerating personalized medicine within the drug discovery and development industry. The company offers a cloud-based library of optical fingerprints, utilizing photonics and AI for non-invasive tracking, screening, and stratification tailored to clinical trial needs. iLoF's platform is designed to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of patient selection for clinical trials by offering cost savings, time reduction in screenings, and a non-invasive process. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Generate Biomedicines
cb_description: Generate Biomedicines is a therapeutics company that operates at the intersection of machine learning, biological engineering, and medicine. The company's main offerings include the development of novel medicines with specific therapeutic functions using a platform that applies learned rules from the study of proteins. Generate Biomedicines primarily serves the biopharmaceutical industry with its drug discovery and development processes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: GGWP
cb_description: GGWP is an artificial intelligence (AI)--powered game moderation platform operating in the gaming industry. The company offers services that use AI to identify both positive and disruptive player behavior, providing tools to automate and streamline the moderation process. GGWP primarily serves the gaming industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Hillsborough, California.

name: Plenty
cb_description: Plenty is a company specializing in indoor vertical farming and sustainable agriculture. The company offers a range of pesticide-free, non-GMO leafy greens that are grown and delivered locally, ensuring fresh produce is available year-round.
