Plenty's proprietary technology and data-driven approach enable the cultivation of a variety of crops with minimal environmental impact, focusing on water conservation and reduced land use. It was founded in 2013 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Vendelux
cb_description: Vendelux is an AI-Powered Event Intelligence Platform operating in the event technology sector. The company provides services that help event organizers and marketers generate leads and create meaningful networking connections at conferences. Its main offerings include data on speakers, sponsors, and attendees for over 50,000 trade shows and conferences. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: XSET
cb_description: XSET is a professional gaming organization that operates in the gaming and fashion industries. The company offers gaming content, clothing, music, and athletics, and also participates in esports. XSET primarily caters to the gaming and esports industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Biofourmis
cb_description: Biofourmis is a company focused on revolutionizing healthcare delivery and drug development through its technology platform. The company offers solutions for remote patient management, digital clinical trials, and health analytics to improve care and optimize medication management. Biofourmis primarily serves the healthcare and life sciences sectors, partnering with health systems, pharmaceutical companies, and risk-bearing organizations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Needham, Massachusetts.

name: Atlys
cb_description: Atlys specializes in streamlining the visa application process for travelers, operating within the travel and technology industry. The company ensures timely visa deliveries and offers a suite of tools to assist with various aspects of visa applications, without making subjective claims about their services. Atlys primarily serves individuals and businesses in need of efficient travel document processing. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Leanspace
cb_description: Leanspace is a company that focuses on the digitalization of space missions, operating within the space technology industry. The company offers a platform that enables the building of cloud-native satellite command and control systems, mission planning, and flight dynamics systems, tailored to specific needs. These systems are designed to automate constellation operations and integrate various software tools, from system design to satellite operations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Illkirch-Strasbourg, France.

name: Jetty
cb_description: Jetty is a financial services company focused on the real estate sector, offering products designed to improve the financial lives of renters and property managers. The company provides alternatives to traditional security deposits, modern renters insurance, and a credit building service for renters. Jetty's solutions aim to make renting more affordable for tenants and more profitable for property managers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: LimaCharlie
cb_description: LimaCharlie develops a cloud platform specializing in cybersecurity operations. The company offers a unified platform that provides endpoint security, an observability pipeline, and automated detection and response capabilities, designed to help organizations build flexible and scalable security programs. It caters to enterprise organizations, managed security service providers, and product builders by offering comprehensive enterprise protection and the ability to integrate with existing security stacks. LimaCharlie was formerly known as Refraction Point. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Covina, California.

name: YesWeHack
cb_description: YesWeHack offers services such as crowdsourcing vulnerability discovery, managing vulnerability disclosure policies, pentest report management, attack surface management, and ethical hacking training. YesWeHack primarily serves sectors that require cybersecurity measures, including technology companies, telecommunications, and government agencies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Portal
cb_description: Portal is a Web3 infrastructure provider specializing in the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to integrate various Web3 applications and services, such as non-custodial wallets, smart wallet functionality, and token swaps, without extensive technical knowledge. Portal primarily serves industries that require embedded Web3 solutions, such as financial services, retail brands, and enterprises seeking to engage with Web3 technology. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SmithRx
cb_description: SmithRx is a pharmacy benefits manager focused on providing transparent healthcare technology solutions within the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers a modern technology platform that connects self-insured employers, pharmacies, and patients to facilitate access to drugs. SmithRx primarily serves the healthcare and insurance sectors by aligning incentives with self-insured employers and offering programs. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Mythical Games
cb_description: Mythical Games operates as a game technology studio in the video games and economics sectors. The company's main offerings include innovative games that incorporate digital asset ownership, verifiable scarcity, and integrated secondary markets, aiming to create new economies within the gaming world. Its products primarily cater to the video gaming industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: The Black Tux
cb_description: The Black Tux operates in designing and provision of modern formal wear. The company offers both rental and purchase options for a range of products including suits, tuxedos, shirts, vests, shoes, and accessories. It primarily serves customers in need of formal wear for events such as weddings and proms. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Beautylish
cb_description: Beautylish provides a wide range of beauty products including makeup, skincare, haircare, fragrances, and beauty tools, as well as educational content such as makeup tutorials and product reviews. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Kalepa
cb_description: Kalepa focuses on enhancing underwriting performance in the commercial insurance industry. The company's main service is an artificial intelligence(AI) powered underwriting workbench, which helps underwriters focus on high return on investment opportunities, quickly evaluate submissions, and understand the hidden risks associated with each case. It primarily serves the commercial insurance industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Rock The Bells
cb_description: Rock The Bells is a company focused on classic and timeless hip-hop, operating within the music and entertainment industry. The company offers a range of content including news, interviews with artists, and coverage of hip-hop music releases and cultural events. Rock The Bells also provides a platform for streaming hip-hop documentaries and purchasing artist merchandise. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Maybell
cb_description: Maybell specializes in quantum technology tools and operates within the quantum computing industry. Its products are designed to increase the number of experiments per fridge and offer more qubit capacity with a reduced footprint. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Kyra
cb_description: Kyra is an artificial intelligence (AI) powered Creator Agency that specializes in influencer marketing and content creation for global brands. The company offers services such as influencer campaign management, AI-driven creator matching, and content production aimed at driving brand engagement and awareness. Kyra primarily serves the influencer marketing industry, with a focus on connecting brands with Gen Z audiences through authentic storytelling and innovative product positioning. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Galley Solutions
cb_description: Galley Solutions is a technology company that focuses on the food service industry. The company offers a culinary operating system that centralizes recipe management, inventory controls, purchasing, and production in a single platform. This platform is primarily used by contract foodservice providers, multi-unit restaurants, ghost kitchens, and small businesses. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Carlsbad, California.

name: Quantum Metric
cb_description: Quantum Metric is a company focused on digital analytics and customer experience optimization within various business sectors. The company offers a platform that provides real-time data analysis, session replay, and insights into customer behavior to help businesses understand and improve their digital experiences. Quantum Metric primarily serves industries such as retail, financial services, travel and hospitality, telecommunications, gaming, and healthcare. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Colorado Springs, Colorado.

name: Tugende
cb_description: Tugende focuses on addressing the credit gap for small businesses in Africa, operating within the financial services sector. The company's main services include enabling informal entrepreneurs to own income-generating assets and build a verifiable digital credit profile, as well as providing them with future growth opportunities through their digital platform. It primarily serves the micro, small, and medium-sized enterprises (MSMEs) sector. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Kampala, Uganda.

name: Rapyd
cb_description: Rapyd is a fintech company specializing in global payment processing and financial technology solutions. The company offers a platform for businesses to accept payments online, send payouts, and manage multi-currency accounts, with a focus on simplifying financial transactions across borders. Rapyd's services cater to various sectors including eCommerce, marketplaces, and the gig economy. Rapyd was formerly known as CashDash. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: ChartHop
cb_description: ChartHop is a dynamic People Operations Platform that specializes in connecting and visualizing HR data for organizations across various sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for organizational charting, headcount planning, compensation management, employee engagement, and performance reviews, all designed to facilitate data-driven decision-making and streamline HR processes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: InVideo
cb_description: InVideo is a company focused on AI-driven video creation within the digital content creation sector. Its main offerings include a platform that allows users to generate videos from text prompts, complete with script, visuals, subtitles, voiceover, and music, requiring no prior video creation skills. The company primarily serves content creators, marketers, and businesses looking to enhance their brand presence and engagement through video content. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cellibre
cb_description: Cellibre is a biotechnology company that focuses on sustainable manufacturing using synthetic biology. The company specializes in strain engineering, biochemistry, and precision fermentation to produce high-value products. It serves sectors that require sustainable production methods and biologically derived products. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: LineLeap
cb_description: LineLeap is a mobile app focused on enhancing the nightlife experience by streamlining transactions in the entertainment industry. The app allows users to skip lines, order drinks, pay for cover, and purchase event tickets at various nightlife venues. LineLeap primarily serves the nightlife and entertainment sectors, offering digital solutions for venue owners to manage revenue streams and customer engagement. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Amuse
cb_description: Amuse is an e-commerce cannabis delivery business operating in the cannabis industry. The company offers a wide range of cannabis products including flowers, vape pens, edibles, pre-rolls, concentrates, beverages, tinctures, topicals, pills, and accessories. It primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Culver City, California.

name: Helaina
cb_description: Helaina is a biotech company focused on advanced nutrition through the replication of functional proteins. The company's main offering is a technology platform that produces bioactive proteins like human lactoferrin, which are used to enhance health and nutrition. These proteins are intended to support immune health, optimize iron utilization, and maintain healthy gut function. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BlueTape
cb_description: BlueTape is a company that focuses on providing financial services in the construction industry. The company offers services such as trade credit, invoice automation, and lines of credit, which are designed to facilitate faster payments, manage cash flow, and reduce credit card fraud risk. BlueTape primarily serves sectors such as LBM dealers, suppliers, manufacturers, and distributors, as well as builders, remodelers, contractors, and subcontractors. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Vortexa
cb_description: Vortexa specializes in real-time energy cargo tracking and analytics within the energy sector. It offers insights into global energy flows, including crude oil, clean and dirty petroleum, Liquefied petroleum gas, and Liquefied Natural Gas, as well as freight market outlooks and inventory levels, all aimed at facilitating high-value trading decisions for energy and shipping companies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: ThreatQuotient
cb_description: ThreatQuotient is a company focused on enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of security operations through its threat intelligence platform within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers solutions that prioritize, automate, and facilitate collaboration in threat detection, investigation, and response, integrating with an organization's existing processes and technologies. ThreatQuotient's platform serves multiple use cases including incident response, threat hunting, spear phishing, alert triage, and vulnerability management. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Ashburn, Virginia.

name: Postie
cb_description: Postie is a marketing technology company that operates in the direct mail industry. The company offers services that transform direct mail to perform like a digital channel, including prospecting, retargeting, and CRM reengagement. These services utilize machine learning algorithms to create highly segmented audiences, set up programmatic triggers for retargeting, and identify audience segments within CRM data for personalized campaigns. It is based in Marina del Rey, California.

name: Aerin Medical
cb_description: Aerin Medical focuses on providing non-invasive solutions for chronic nasal airway conditions in the healthcare sector. The company has two main products that use temperature-controlled technology to treat nasal airway obstruction and chronic rhinitis. Its products are primarily sold to ear, nose, and throat (ENT) physicians. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Ecom Express
cb_description: Ecom Express provides technology-enabled logistics solutions. The company offers services such as first-mile pickup, processing, network optimization, and last-mile delivery. Its primary customer base is within the Indian e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: CatalYm
cb_description: CatalYm is a biopharmaceutical company focused on catalyzing immunotherapy and developing treatments for solid tumors. The company's main offerings include the development of monoclonal antibodies designed to neutralize GDF-15, a key cancer therapy resistance mechanism, thereby reinstating efficient anti-tumor immune responses. CatalYm's products aim to enhance the efficacy of existing cancer therapies through combination treatments. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Martinsried, Germany.

name: Nada
cb_description: Nada Digital is a global game development company focused on delivering the highest level of enjoyment to gamers worldwide. The company specializes in developing mobile games, including idle RPGs, that aim to provide fun and engaging experiences for players across the globe. Nada Digital also integrates metaverse elements into its gaming products, enhancing the digital entertainment experience. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Daegu, South Korea.

name: Vivodyne
cb_description: Vivodyne engages in the development of cures for human diseases, operating in the biotechnology and artificial intelligence sectors. It offers a platform that cultures lab-grown human tissues for drug testing and uses artificial intelligence to analyze biological complexity. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: DermaSensor
cb_description: DermaSensor is a health technology company focused on the development of non-invasive, AI-powered devices for skin cancer detection. The company offers a handheld device that utilizes Elastic Scattering Spectroscopy to analyze skin lesions and assist primary care physicians in making informed referral decisions. DermaSensor's device is designed to integrate into clinical workflows, providing rapid assessments and objective results to improve the accuracy of skin cancer detection. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Qualifi
cb_description: Qualifi is an awarding organisation that provides regulated qualifications and vocational training within the education sector. The company offers a range of services including vocational training, university degree pathways, and employer services designed to ensure quality standards and valid, valued learning. Qualifi primarily serves educational institutions, employers, and learners seeking to enhance their skills and qualifications. It is based in Nottingham, England.

name: Radical
cb_description: Radical focuses on the development of high-altitude solar-powered aircraft, operating in the aerospace industry. Its main products are aircraft that can continuously fly in the stratosphere without landing, providing a method for connectivity and observation of the earth. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: VendEase
cb_description: VendEase provides a procurement platform and an online marketplace for food businesses. The company allows food service business owners and managers to digitize, track, and automate their procurement and inventory management processes. It primarily serves the food business sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Coderhouse
cb_description: Coderhouse is an online education platform specializing in digital skills training. The company offers live online courses with a practical, project-based approach, taught by industry experts, and includes personalized mentorship to enhance professional development. Optional: The company primarily serves individuals seeking to improve their skills in the digital economy. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

name: Charm Therapeutics
cb_description: Charm Therapeutics focuses on the healthcare and technology sectors, specifically in the field of drug discovery. The company utilizes 3D deep learning technology and drug discovery methods to develop novel small-molecule inhibitors aimed at targeting cancer and other diseases with high unmet medical needs. Charm Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Gigasheet
cb_description: Gigasheet is a company that focuses on big data analysis in the cloud computing industry. The company offers a web-based spreadsheet service that allows users to upload, automate, and collaborate on large data files, with support for billions of rows. Gigasheet primarily serves the sales, marketing, healthcare, and cybersecurity sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Leesburg, Virginia.

name: CAIS
cb_description: CAIS is a fintech company focused on transforming the world of alternative investing. The company provides a platform that connects independent financial advisors with leading alternative asset managers, enabling them to transact alternative investments and structured notes at a large scale. The company primarily serves the financial advisory sector and the alternative asset management industry. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Moises
cb_description: Moises is a company specializing in AI-powered music tools designed for audio manipulation and music practice enhancement. The company offers a suite of features including vocal and instrument isolation, pitch and tempo adjustment, and chord detection to assist musicians in practicing and mastering their craft. Moises primarily serves individual musicians and producers seeking to improve their music practice and production capabilities. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: Parse Biosciences
cb_description: Parse Biosciences focuses on providing single-cell sequencing solutions in the biotechnology sector. The company offers kits that enable researchers to perform single-cell sequencing, transforming the output into understandable results. Its services primarily cater to the scientific research and healthcare industries. Parse Biosciences was formerly known as Split Biosciences. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Cribl
cb_description: Cribl focuses on observability, security, and telemetry data. The company offers a suite of products that provide the flexibility to collect, reduce, enrich, normalize, and route data from any source to any destination within an existing data infrastructure. Its products also allow for intelligent, scalable data collection and in-place data searching without prior collection or storage. It primarily serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare, manufacturing and logistics, and the public sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Valiant
cb_description: Valiant is a Swiss financial services provider focused on offering financial products and services. It provides banking solutions for private clients and small to medium-sized businesses, including account management, payment processing, investment opportunities, financing options, and advisory services. Valiant primarily serves the private banking sector and the small and medium enterprises market. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Bern, Switzerland.

name: Nayya
cb_description: Nayya specializes in employee benefits optimization using data science and artificial intelligence within the human resources technology sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies and personalizes employee benefits through data-driven recommendations and a holistic financial approach. Nayya's services are primarily utilized by employers seeking to enhance their benefits offerings and employee engagement. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cato Networks
cb_description: Cato Networks operates as a company focused on providing a secure access service edge (SASE) platform in the technology and cybersecurity industry. The company offers a range of services including network security, secure web gateway, data loss prevention, and secure remote access. Its services work together to provide secure and optimized connectivity for all branches, data centers, people, and clouds. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: HZO
cb_description: HZO is a company that specializes in protective nano and Parylene conformal coatings, operating within the electronics and industrial sectors. The company offers a range of protective coating solutions that safeguard electronics, electrical products, and critical applications from various environmental hazards. These solutions are primarily utilized in the medical devices, automotive, consumer electronics, IoT, and industrial sectors. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Draper, Utah.

name: Causely
cb_description: Causely specializes in causal artificial intelligence for DevOps within the IT industry, focusing on cloud application management. The company offers a Causal Reasoning Platform that automates root cause analysis, enhances service reliability, and maximizes the utility of observability data. Causely primarily serves DevOps and Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) teams, aiming to improve application reliability and support development and engineering efforts. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Newton, Massachusetts.

name: Heartbeat Health
cb_description: Heartbeat Health is a virtual-first cardiology provider offering tech-enabled specialty care in the healthcare sector. The company delivers services such as remote diagnostic interpretations, virtual consultations, and cardiology chronic care management programs. Heartbeat Health primarily serves providers, payers, and accountable care organizations within the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BurnBot
cb_description: BurnBot specializes in wildfire risk reduction solutions within the utilities and forestry sectors. It offers systematic fuel treatment services, including remote prescribed burning machines, to mitigate wildfire risks. BurnBot's technology is primarily utilized in areas where reducing vegetation and creating defensible space for community and infrastructure protection. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Zingbus
cb_description: Zingbus is a company focused on providing online bus ticket booking services for intercity travel, operating within the transportation sector. The company offers a platform for booking a variety of bus tickets, including AC, Volvo, and sleeper buses, with features such as live tracking, travel insurance, and customer support. Zingbus primarily serves the intercity bus travel industry, offering services like on-time guarantees, lowest price promises, and access to premium lounges. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: LifeMine
cb_description: LifeMine focuses on reinventing drug discovery. The company's main service includes the discovery of genetically encoded small molecules (GEMs) from the biosphere, using a combination of artificial intelligence, genomic sequencing, and synthetic biology to create novel medicines. It aims to tackle previously unconquerable human diseases. LifeMine primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Hungry?
cb_description: Hungry? is a mobile app with an algorithm to simplify the decision of what and where to eat, helping users find dining options.

name: Mason
cb_description: Frank, dba Mason, is an API for user interfaces plus all the stuff that makes them work in your app. Deploy production-ready software architectures and their UI in one line of code, then move on to the next big challenge.

name: Variantyx
cb_description: Variantyx is a precision medicine company specializing in molecular diagnostics across various sectors including rare genetic disorders, reproductive genetics, and oncology. The company offers comprehensive testing services using whole genome sequencing to identify genetic changes, aiming to optimize treatments and improve patient outcomes. Variantyx's technology platform is designed to provide detailed diagnostic information to both healthcare providers and patients, facilitating informed decisions in precision medicine. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Framingham, Massachusetts.

name: Clearbox Decisions
cb_description: Clearbox Decisions provides a decision-enabling platform to optimize business performance. The company provides a product called Cloverpop, which is a decision intelligence platform that collaborates, learns, and activates artificial intelligence (AI) to improve business decision-making. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Mon Petit Placement
cb_description: Mon Petit Placement operates as a fintech company that focuses on simplifying the investment experience by making it accessible to everyone, operating in the financial services sector. The company offers personalized investment services and premium placement options in life insurance, along with expert advice. Mon Petit Placement primarily caters to individual investors seeking to manage their savings and investments online. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lyon, France.

name: Jackpocket
cb_description:
Jackpocket provides a platform for ordering official state lottery tickets. The company's main service is its mobile application, which allows users to order lottery tickets, check results, join lottery pools for better odds, and receive automatic alerts when they win. It primarily serves the gaming industry. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York. In February 2024, Jackpocket was acquired by DraftKings.

Approximately 55 percent of the consideration payable in cash funded from the Companys balance sheet with no capital raise required and approximately 45 percent of the consideration payable in the Companys Class A common stock.

DraftKings expects the acquisition to drive $260 million to $340 million of incremental revenue and $60 million to $100 million of incremental Adjusted EBITDA in fiscal year 2026.

name: Soteria Battery Innovation Group
cb_description: Soteria Battery Innovation Group focuses on enhancing lithium-ion battery safety within the energy storage and power sector. The company offers patented technologies including thermally stable separators and metallized film current collectors designed to prevent thermal runaway and ensure battery functionality after damage. Soteria's consortium facilitates collaboration across the supply chain, from raw material providers to end-users, to promote the commercialization of safe battery technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Greenville, South Carolina.

name: Genero
cb_description: Genero provides production solutions within the marketing and advertising industry. Its platform connects brands with a network of specialists to enhance in-house marketing capabilities. Its services are designed to streamline the production process, offering end-to-end efficiency and support for brands to produce content at scale, with significant time and cost savings. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Elwood, Australia.

name: Uncommon
cb_description: Uncommon is a company that combines the expertise of seasoned recruiters with advanced artificial intelligence technology in the recruitment industry. Their main service involves utilizing AI to expedite and simplify the process of finding talent, offering a cost-effective solution. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California. Uncommon ceased operations.

name: Binarly
cb_description: Binarly specializes in firmware security and supply chain risk management within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers an AI-powered platform that detects and remediates known and unknown vulnerabilities in firmware and software supply chains. Binarly's services are designed to provide visibility into firmware and software vulnerabilities, identify malicious code, and offer prescriptive fixes for rapid resolution. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Sea2Cell
cb_description: Sea2Cell specializes in the development of cultivated fish meat within the alternative food production sector. The company utilizes technology to grow fish cells in controlled environments, creating fish meat without the need for traditional fishing or aquaculture practices. It primarily serves the food industry. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Kiryat Shmona, Israel.

name: Dyte
cb_description: Dyte is a technology company that specializes in the development of software development kits (SDKs) for live experiences. The company's main offerings include real-time video and audio conferencing, live streaming, and an upcoming chat feature, all designed to be integrated into other products. Dyte primarily serves sectors such as education technology, telehealth, human resources technology, fitness, social media, gaming, events, and dating. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Faridabad, India.

name: Strike
cb_description: Strike is a mobile first email productivity platform for Gmail. With Strike, an email user can get all the popular apps it uses on the web, right inside their mobile. Currently, a user can perform multiple actions on the web, like checking social profiles, sending tracked emails, snoozing and email, adding it to CRM, etc. But when it comes to mobile, all a user can do is read and sometimes respond. Strike with its platform approach, is allowing businesses to integrate apps inside strike.

name: PATH
cb_description: Path is a social network app for the iPhone that lets users capture and share moments with a limited number of friends and families.

name: Insightin Health
cb_description: Insightin Health runs a company focusing on healthcare member engagement. The company offers a platform to use artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) to integrate and analyze healthcare data, providing insights that drive personalized strategies for member engagement. Its primary customers are healthcare payers, aiming to improve member experience and increase overall plan profitability. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Baltimore, Maryland.

name: OpenEnvoy
cb_description: OpenEnvoy specializes in finance transformation through its Applied AI platform, focusing on automating and streamlining financial processes within the accounts payable, receivable, and contract management domains. The company offers solutions for real-time invoice reconciliation, fraud detection, and optimization of working capital, aiming to improve operating efficiency and cash flow for businesses. OpenEnvoy's platform is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing systems, providing touchless processing and actionable insights without the need for extensive IT changes or AI expertise. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.

name: Kindred
cb_description: Kindred is a members-only home swapping and exchange community operating within the travel and hospitality industry. The company facilitates a network where members can swap homes and travel with reduced accommodation costs, without the need for nightly fees, by using a credits system based on hosting and referrals. Kindred's service is designed for both renters and homeowners, offering features such as member verification, video introductions, and host insurance coverage. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Karbon
cb_description: Karbon is a practice management platform focused on enhancing collaboration and efficiency for accounting firms. The company offers a suite of tools that automate workflows, manage projects, and facilitate client management, all designed to integrate seamlessly with existing systems and data. Karbon's software is tailored to support small, mid-sized, and large firms, providing solutions that drive firm-wide productivity and growth. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: MENTA
cb_description: MENTA is a company that specializes in the audiovisual production sector, with a particular focus on advertising and branded content. The company's main services include the creation of advertising spots and branded content for a variety of brands. It primarily serves the advertising industry. It is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: ConcertoCare
cb_description: ConcertoCare is a provider of comprehensive at-home care services for seniors and other adults with complex health and social needs. The company offers in-home healthcare services, including primary care and support services, enhanced by virtual care technology, advanced analytics, and proprietary care pathways. ConcertoCare's interdisciplinary teams work to improve health outcomes and quality of life for patients, providing coordinated care programs that address both medical and social needs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: The Mobility House
cb_description: The Mobility House focuses on integrating electric vehicles into the power grid within the energy and mobility sector. The company offers smart charging and energy management solutions to intelligently manage electric vehicle charging and energy storage. Their services cater to a range of sectors including automotive manufacturers, energy suppliers, and operators of charging infrastructure. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Reperio Health
cb_description: Reperio Health specializes in providing biometric health screenings within the healthcare industry. Its services offer health insights and results through at-home and on-site screening options, designed to be accessible and convenient for individuals and organizations. It serves sectors such as corporate wellness programs, health plans, telehealth providers, and individuals. Reperio Health was formerly known as BoxDoctor. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Kite Hill
cb_description: Kite Hill is a company focused on the production of plant-based foods, operating in the food industry. The company offers a range of products that serve as alternatives to traditional dairy, including yogurts, cream cheeses, pastas, and ricotta, all made from almond milk. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Hayward, California.

name: Patreon
cb_description: Patreon develops a platform focused on providing a space for creators to build memberships and connect with their communities. It offers services that allow creators to share their work, such as videos, podcasts, writing, art, music, and more, and to monetize these offerings through memberships and digital product sales. It primarily serves creators in sectors such as podcasting, video creation, music, art, and game development. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Akko
cb_description: Akko focuses on device protection in the insurance industry. It offers a comprehensive protection plan for various items, including electronics, photography equipment, music gear, and sports equipment. The company primarily serves individuals seeking to insure their personal belongings. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: BoomPop
cb_description: BoomPop focuses on corporate event planning and management. The company offers a suite of services including artificial intelligence-powered event software, expert event planning, and management of bookings and contracts for various types of corporate events such as offsites, retreats, and client events. BoomPop primarily serves small businesses and supports causes such as sustainability, women-owned, and minority-owned businesses. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Clir Renewables
cb_description: Clir Renewables is a company that focuses on providing market intelligence in the renewable energy sector. The company offers a platform that combines data, software, and industry expertise to provide insights into the production, health, risk, and financing of renewable energy projects. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: SendCloud
cb_description: SendCloud is a company that focuses on providing shipping software solutions in the ecommerce industry. The company offers a range of services including shipping automation, returns management, checkout optimization, tracking, and packing solutions, all aimed at streamlining and enhancing the shipping process for businesses. It primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Eindhoven, Netherlands.

name: Ensoma
cb_description: Ensoma is a biotechnology company. It develops genomic medicine. It combines delivery technology with the deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) editing toolkit to tackle diseases that affect it, such as cancer and autoimmune disease, as well as inherited conditions. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Nouscom
cb_description: Nouscom is an immunotherapy company focused on the development of engineered viral vectored vaccines for the treatment of cancer. The company offers a portfolio of neoantigen-based therapies designed to induce potent anti-tumor T-cell responses and selectively eliminate tumor cells. Nouscom's products include personalized and off-the-shelf cancer vaccines that target a broad range of solid tumors by harnessing the body's immune system. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Basel, Switzerland.

name: ReversingLabs
cb_description: ReversingLabs is a company that focuses on software supply chain security and threat intelligence in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform that provides security for software development workflows, containers, and release packages, detecting high-risk threats, malware, backdoors, exposed secrets, and software tampering across the software development cycle. Its primary customers are organizations and DevSecOps teams in various industries. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Studiospace
cb_description: Studiospace is a digital and marketing services platform operating in the business services industry. The company provides on-demand access to a variety of specialist services, offering a marketplace where clients can brief, select, and kick off projects with vetted agencies. Studiospace primarily serves clients in the digital and marketing sectors. It was formerly known as Studioworks. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Telness Tech
cb_description: Telness Tech specializes in providing automated digital solutions for the telecommunications industry. Their main offerings include a fully automated Business Support System/Operations Support System (BSS/OSS) platform, self-service Private Branch Exchange (PBX), and Internet of Things (IoT) services designed to enhance customer satisfaction and reduce operational expenses for telecom companies. The company primarily serves Communication Service Providers (CSPs), Mobile Virtual Network Operators (MVNOs), and other telecom-related businesses. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: WeMaintain
cb_description: WeMaintain operates as a PropTech scale-up that focuses on platforming and building operations in the real estate industry. The company offers end-to-end maintenance solutions for buildings, including services for lifts, escalators, fire and safety systems, and automatic doors. Its solutions provide information to asset owners and operators, helping to reduce costs and energy consumption and manage the performance of their equipment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France.

name: TruePic
cb_description: TruePic specializes in digital content authenticity infrastructure within the technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools for securely capturing, signing, and verifying the authenticity and editing history of digital media, including photos, videos, and audio. TruePic primarily serves sectors that require content verification and transparency, such as media publishers, content creators, and digital platforms. It was founded in 2015 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: TS Conductor
cb_description: TS Conductor focuses on modernizing the power grid infrastructure. The company offers conductors for transmission and distribution grids, which are designed to reduce line losses and accelerate the integration of renewable energy sources like wind, solar, and battery storage. The company primarily serves utilities and other grid operators. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Huntington Beach, California.

name: Honeycomb
cb_description:
Honeycomb is a TV and video ad management platform. Honeycomb's platform streamlines the process of TV and video ad delivery by automating elements of the submission process, which typically involves a lot of tedious data entry. But by utilizing Honeycomb's tech, creative agencies and post production houses can submit content in about half of the time or less, while the possibility of human error is reduced significantly.

On December 21, 2017, Honeycomb merged  with Peach. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: BillingPlatform
cb_description: BillingPlatform providing an agile, cloud-based platform within the billing and subscription management industry. The company offers services that automate cash processes, enabling businesses to offering, integrate with any system, and create a experience that turns value into revenue. It primarily serves the consumption economy sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Englewood, Colorado.

name: TILT Biotherapeutics
cb_description: TILT Biotherapeutics focuses on the development of oncolytic immunotherapies for the treatment of cancer. The company's main offering includes a patented TILT technology that modifies the tumor microenvironment and enhances immune responses to cancer, with its lead therapeutic asset, TILT-123, being a cytokine-armed oncolytic adenovirus currently in clinical trials. It primarily serves the oncology healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: MontyCloud
cb_description: MontyCloud provides intelligent cloud management solutions in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies provisioning, security, compliance, cost optimization, and routine operations of cloud resources and services. Its platform is designed to help businesses manage and optimize cloud resources, providing insights into resource usage, performance, and cost, and automating routine operations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Redmond, Washington.

name: CircleCI
cb_description: CircleCI is a company focused on providing continuous integration and delivery solutions within the software development industry. Their platform enables engineering teams to build, test, and deploy code with confidence, offering features such as automated testing, pipeline automation, and progressive delivery. CircleCI's services cater to a wide range of applications, including mobile, web, AI, and cloud-based solutions. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: TetraScience
cb_description: TetraScience provides a cloud-based platform for collecting, centralizing, and harmonizing scientific data to manage scientific outcomes. It is a company focused on data science in the life sciences-based solutions. The company offers Its services are primarily utilized in the biopharma industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Restream
cb_description: Restream is a company focused on live video creation and distribution across multiple platforms in the streaming industry. It offers a multistreaming service that allows users to broadcast live video content simultaneously to various social media channels. Restream's platform is designed for creators and businesses to enhance audience engagement through live events, webinars, and interactive chats. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Standard AI
cb_description: Standard AI operates as a company focused on transforming the retail industry through artificial intelligence. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence (AI)-powered cameras and deep algorithms to provide checkout-free shopping experiences, real-time reporting on shopper behavior, and insights into inventory and stocks. Its primary services are utilized in the retail sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: GrayMatter Robotics
cb_description: GrayMatter Robotics specializes in advanced robotics and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies for the manufacturing sector. The company provides smart robotic cells that assist with surface treatment and finishing tasks, designed to enhance productivity and quality in manufacturing environments. GrayMatter Robotics primarily serves industries such as aerospace & defense, marine & boat building, specialty vehicles, general manufacturing, and recreation & consumer products. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Gardena, California.

name: Strados Labs
cb_description: Strados Labs operates as a digital health company specializing in respiratory health monitoring technology. The company offers the RESP Biosensor, a wearable device that enables clinicians and researchers to remotely monitor lung sounds and respiratory events such as coughs and wheezes, providing insights into patient respiratory health. The technology is utilized by various sectors including hospitals, health systems, skilled nursing facilities, the pharmaceutical industry, and physicians' practices. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Copia
cb_description: Copia is a B2C e-commerce platform focused on serving the middle and low-income consumer sectors in Africa. The company provides an online marketplace that caters to the needs of millions of households, offering a variety of goods and services. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Ruiru, Kenya. In May 2024, Copia filed for bankruptcy.

name: Fundbox
cb_description: Fundbox provides an embedded working capital platform for small businesses, operating within the financial services industry. It offers services such as business loans and lines of credit, which are designed to help businesses manage their cash flow and cover expenses. It primarily serves the small business sector. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Replica Studios
cb_description: Replica Studios uses artificial intelligence to create games, films, music, and other media with access to "Replica" voice actors on demand. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Brisbane, Australia.

name: SkyFlow
cb_description: SkyFlow was a Internet/Internet Software & Services company based in Emeryville, California.  SkyFlow was acquired in 2004.

name: Splend
cb_description: Splend is a company that focuses on supporting on-demand drivers, operating within the transportation and logistics industry. The company provides eco-friendly and affordable cars, along with resources, training, and community support to help drivers maximize their earnings and improve their ratings. Splend primarily serves the on-demand driving sector, which includes industries like ridesharing and delivery services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Bugcrowd
cb_description: Bugcrowd operates as a crowdsourced cybersecurity company that focuses on identifying and mitigating digital threats. The company offers a range of services including penetration testing, vulnerability disclosure, and attack surface management, all designed to help organizations protect their digital assets. Its platform leverages a global community of security researchers and AI-powered tools to provide security testing and actionable insights. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Singularity Energy
cb_description: Singularity Energy specializes in data and software solutions aimed at grid decarbonization within the energy sector. The company offers a software platform that enables utilities, grid operators, corporations, and technology providers to measure emissions accurately and optimize decision-making processes. Singularity Energy primarily serves the energy industry, with a focus on entities involved in utility and grid operations. Singularity Energy was formerly known as Carbonara. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Nymbl Science
cb_description: Nymbl Science provides digital balance training for older adults. The company's scientifically balance training program trains the brain and body to work together, which is known as dual-tasking. Nymbl Science was formerly known as Nymbl Sciences. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: MetaBlox
cb_description: MetaBlox specializes in decentralized WiFi networking within the telecommunications industry. The company offers a global WiFi network with seamless roaming, advanced security, and a rewards system for users who connect and contribute to the network. MetaBlox primarily serves sectors that require robust wireless connectivity and user incentivization. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Panama City, Panama.

name: Oaky
cb_description: Oaky is a company that focuses on providing software solutions in the hospitality industry. Its main product is a hotel upselling software that automates the process of offering additional services to guests, such as room upgrades, airport transfers, and additional amenities. The software is designed to enhance the guest experience and increase hotel revenue. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Pindrop
cb_description: Pindrop provides mobile shopper services for retail stores. The company offers a leading-edge platform of application kits, cloud services, and indoor location technologies that enable retailers to add unique in-store. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boulder, Colorodo.

name: Volt
cb_description: Volt is an Istanbul-based tech startup that connects any car owner driving in the city with passengers going in the same direction at the same time.

name: Engagedly
cb_description: Engagedly is a talent management software provider specializing in performance appraisals and employee engagement within the human resources sector. The company offers a suite of tools that facilitate 360 feedback, continuous performance reviews, and goal management, all designed to enhance the performance review process and integrate employee engagement. Engagedly's platform serves various sectors, including technology, healthcare, manufacturing, and professional services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Kissht
cb_description: Kissht is a financial technology company that focuses on providing instant credit solutions in the financial services industry. The company offers a range of services including personal loans, credit for small business purchases, and a line of credit. These services are primarily targeted toward the e-commerce industry. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: LawnStarter
cb_description: LawnStarter is a company that specializes in providing outdoor home services through an online marketplace. The company offers a range of services including lawn mowing, landscape maintenance, and various yard care services. Customers can easily schedule and manage their services using a convenient mobile app, which also allows for payment processing and feedback. LawnStarter primarily serves residential customers looking for reliable lawn care solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Cresta
cb_description: Cresta operates a company focused on the application of generative artificial intelligence (AI) in the contact center industry. It offers products that provide real-time coaching to sales and service agents, visibility into team performance, customer insights from conversational data, and automation of common interactions. It primarily serves sectors such as automotive, retail, telecommunication, airlines, finance, insurance, and travel and hospitality. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Nursa
cb_description: Nursa operates as a healthcare staffing platform. It specializes in providing per diem shift opportunities for nurses and other healthcare professionals. The company offers a mobile marketplace where clinicians can find flexible work opportunities and facilities can post and fill short-term staffing needs efficiently. Nursa serves various healthcare sectors by facilitating the connection between healthcare facilities in need of staffing and qualified professionals seeking employment. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Murray, Utah.

name: RxAll
cb_description: RxAll is a health-tech platform that provides digital infrastructure for the healthcare industry. The company offers a suite of products, including an AI-powered drug testing platform, pharmacy management software, and financial solutions for invoice financing. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, including hospitals, pharmacies, and wholesalers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New Haven, Connecticut.

name: Lumen
cb_description: Lumen is a health and wellness company that operates within the personal health technology sector. The company provides a portable device that measures metabolism by analyzing the concentration of CO2 in a person's breath, allowing users to determine whether the body is burning fats or carbohydrates. Lumen serves individuals who aim to manage weight and improve metabolic health. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Chargetrip
cb_description: Chargetrip is a company specializing in e-mobility intelligence, providing an API for software development in the electric vehicle sector. The company offers solutions for predicting energy consumption and optimizing EV routing, including range prediction and charging station recommendations. Chargetrip's products are designed to facilitate the transition to electric mobility for private drivers and commercial fleets. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: LayerX
cb_description: LayerX provides a browser security platform. It specializes in browser security, focusing on protecting enterprise data, applications, and devices from website-related risks. The company offers a browser security platform that provides visibility and control over user activities across all browsers, aiming to mitigate threats without compromising user experience. LayerX was formerly known as Mirovia Security. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Taxfix
cb_description: Taxfix is a mobile application focused on simplifying the tax filing process for individuals. The company offers a guided and intuitive tax filing process, including an automatic plausibility check of entered data and an estimated tax refund calculation, without the need for users to have prior tax knowledge. Taxfix primarily serves individuals and couples looking to file their tax returns efficiently and securely. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: ImmunoScape
cb_description: ImmunoScape focuses on the discovery and development of TCR-based therapeutics in the field of oncology. The company leverages its proprietary Deep Immunomics and Machine Learning platforms to identify novel TCRs for treating solid tumors. ImmunoScape's pipeline includes various cell therapy programs to address different types of solid tumors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore.

name: Hemlane
cb_description: Hemlane operates as a property management platform in the real estate industry. The company offers a suite of services including rental listing and tenant placement, lease tracking, online rent collection, document storage, and repair coordination. It primarily serves rental owners and property managers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Emma
cb_description: Emma is a provider of email marketing software and services that help organizations of all sizes get more from their marketing. Through tailored editions of its platform for businesses, franchises, retailers, universities and agencies, Emma aims to offer enterprise-level capabilities in a team-friendly experience that's simple and enjoyable. Key features include mobile-ready design templates, email automation, audience segmenting and dynamic content, plus integration with top CRM solutions, ecommerce platforms and social networks. Headquartered in Nashville, and with offices in Portland, New York and Melbourne, Emma powers the emails of more than 45,000 organizations worldwide, including Mario Batali, Bridgestone and Sylvan Learning Center.

name: Ledger
cb_description: Ledger specializes in secure hardware wallets and digital asset management solutions within the cryptocurrency sector. The company offers products that store private keys for cryptocurrencies and NFTs, enabling secure transactions and asset management. Ledger's hardware wallets are designed to work with the Ledger Live app, which facilitates the buying, selling, swapping, and staking of various cryptocurrencies. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Noetik
cb_description: Noetik focuses on the development of precision immunotherapies for cancer treatment. The company uses advanced machine learning methods, including self-supervised learning, to analyze human multimodal data and drive therapeutic development. It primarily serves the healthcare setor. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Moment
cb_description: Moment is a company focused on providing products and resources for creative photography and filmmaking. They offer a range of mobile filmmaking gear, photography equipment, and accessories designed to enhance the capabilities of camera phones and cameras. Moment also provides educational courses and tools like LUTs and presets to support the creative community in honing their skills. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Woodinville, Washington.

name: Circle
cb_description: Circle specializes in enhancing online presence through user experience and interface design, no-code development, and digital marketing. The company offers a suite of services including market research, brand diagnostics, media planning, and performance marketing, all aimed at improving user engagement and business growth. Circle's solutions cater to businesses looking to modernize and digitize their operations with a focus on user-centered design. It is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Orb
cb_description: Orb is a company that specializes in the development and provision of distributed ledger technology, specifically in the financial technology sector. The company's main service is providing middleware that can be utilized for the construction of unique currencies (such as proprietary payments) by businesses, municipalities, and various communities. This technology is specialized for payments and is designed to drastically reduce the construction cost and operational risk of complex payment systems. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Clarifai
cb_description: Clarifai operates an artificial intelligence (AI) company. The company develops technology for operational scale offering a platform for natural language processing, automatic speech recognition, and computer vision. It helps enterprises and public sector organizations transform video, images, text, and audio data into structured data. It serves electronic commerce, manufacturing, media, and entertainment. retail and transportation industries. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Willmington, Delaware.

name: Beautycon Media
cb_description: Beautycon Media is a global community for content creators, celebrities, fans and brands to come together to celebrate all things fashion, beauty and lifestyle.

name: IRONSCALES
cb_description: IRONSCALES provides an artificial intelligence-driven email security platform. The company offers ransomware protection, credential theft protection, account takeover protection, security awareness training, phishing stimulation testing, and more. It primarily serves the cybersecurity industry. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Solera
cb_description: Solera is a health-focused company operating in the managed services and health intervention sectors. The company offers a platform that provides evidence-based lifestyle and behavioral interventions to prevent and manage chronic conditions, with a focus on diabetes prevention, weight management, mental health, women's health, and more. Solera primarily serves the healthcare industry, including health plans, employers, and network partners. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.

name: Trunk Tools
cb_description: Trunk Tools specializes in AI solutions for the construction project management sector. Its main offerings include a platform for instant access to project documents and a management system designed to streamline project delivery. Trunk Tools primarily serves professionals within the construction industry, offering tools to enhance productivity and project management. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cococart
cb_description: Cococart operates as an online store builder platform. It offers the service of building websites without coding, enabling small businesses to manage their own sales without using apps or paying high fees and commissions on marketplaces. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: Sanegene Bio
cb_description: Sanegene Bio provides biopharmaceutical solutions focusing on developing RNA interference (RNAi) therapeutics. It offers RNAi therapeutics designed to treat a broad range of diseases, including cardiovascular and metabolic diseases, immunology-related diseases, and nervous system diseases, by leveraging its proprietary delivery technologies. It primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Suzhou, China.

name: Instabox
cb_description: Instabox operates as a logistics firm that provides e-commerce deliveries across its locations in Sweden through a smart locker network. It offers shipping services that is available through select online retailers. Its software helps users to schedule a pickup or delivery of e-commerce packages using smartphones and other devices. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Sweepr
cb_description: Sweepr develops an AI-based digital care platform operating in the service and smart home provider sectors. The company offers a platform that enables superior digital customer care through personalized insights, integrating with other data sources, and observing customer context and behaviors during care interactions to dynamically manage customer interactions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Medicom
cb_description: Medicom specializes in healthcare interoperability and operates within the health information technology sector. The company offers a federated health information network that aggregates and facilitates the exchange of health data through a single interface, enabling healthcare providers to access and share clinical records. Medicom's primary customer segments include the healthcare industry, government health agencies, and life sciences organizations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Chord
cb_description: Chord is a company focused on providing news and information within the online gambling sector. It offers insights and analysis on various aspects of gambling, including casino games, lotteries, and betting strategies, catering to enthusiasts and professionals seeking to understand the industry better. It is based in Havre De Grace, Maryland.

name: Soundcharts
cb_description: Soundcharts help the music industry make decisions by tracking social, charts, playlists & airplay data in real-time and making them available from any device. Soundcharts is a full-stack solution (database, desktop, mobile apps & API) that combines real-time and historical music consumption data, (social networks, charts positions, playlists, airplay monitoring) to improve project management, reporting, and artist scouting. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Justos
cb_description: Justos is a digital auto insurance provider in the insurance industry. The company offers monthly insurance plans with customizable coverage options and 24/7 assistance services. Justos primarily serves the automotive sector with its insurance products. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Pinheiros, Brazil.

name: Yard Stick
cb_description: Yard Stick specializes in soil carbon measurement technology. The company offers services that allow for the measurement of soil carbon, as well as the planning, analysis, and tracking of soil carbon data. Its primary customers are in the agricultural and scientific sectors. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Mendel
cb_description: Mendel is a technology company focused on streamlining and optimizing financial management for large enterprises in the finance and technology sectors. The company offers an integrated solution for intelligent expense management and control, providing real-time reporting, automated workflows, and smart corporate Visa cards. Mendel primarily serves large corporations seeking to digitize their financial processes and increase payment transparency. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Zoth
cb_description: Zoth serves as an RWA ecosystem that specializes in bridging traditional finance with on-chain finance, focusing on providing institutional-grade yield opportunities. The company offers a fixed-income marketplace that allows investors to access top-tier assets such as trade finance receivables, US treasury bills, and corporate bonds through stablecoins, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards. Zoth primarily caters to the financial services sector, offering liquidity solutions and investment opportunities to stablecoin issuers, treasuries, and traditional financial entities. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Singapore.

name: Tipalti
cb_description: Tipalti is a global payables automation company that specializes in streamlining all phases of the accounts payable and payment management workflow. The company offers a cloud-based platform that simplifies the management of supplier payments, encompassing supplier onboarding, tax and regulatory compliance, invoice processing, and payments to suppliers worldwide in various methods and currencies. Tipalti's solutions are designed to reduce the workload for accounts payable departments and enhance financial and compliance controls. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: ArsenalBio
cb_description: ArsenalBio builds programmable cell therapy solutions to create effective and accessible immune cell therapies. It focuses on integrating technologies such as clustered regularly interspaced short palindromic repeats (CRISPR) based genome engineering, scaled and high throughput target identification, synthetic biology, and machine learning to advance a new paradigm to discover and develop immune cell therapies. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Windmill
cb_description: Windmill specializes in modern, smart air care solutions within the home comfort industry. The company offers a range of products including energy-efficient air conditioners with dual-filtration systems, eco-friendly fans, and accessories designed to enhance the air quality and comfort of living spaces. Windmill primarily serves the home consumer market with a focus on eco-conscious and tech-savvy customers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BusRight
cb_description: BusRight specializes in school bus management solutions within the transportation sector. The company offers a platform that enhances student safety, streamlines bus communication, and manages bus routes efficiently. BusRight primarily serves the education sector, partnering with school administrators, families, and bus companies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Medmo
cb_description: Medmo operates as a healthcare technology platform. It gives uninsured and underinsured consumers the means to obtain medical imaging services without hidden fees or confusion, from accredited healthcare providers in their area. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Glamera
cb_description: Glamera specializes in software as a service (SaaS) and payment solutions within the beauty and lifestyle industry. The company offers an all-in-one platform that assists beauty service providers, such as barber shops, beauty salons, spas, and gyms, in streamlining their booking processes, managing operations remotely, minimizing product waste, and marketing efforts to attract more customers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Houwzer
cb_description: Houwzer is a modern real estate agency that focuses on providing full-service realty solutions. The company offers services to both home buyers and sellers, aiming to save clients money by utilizing salaried agents and proprietary technology. Houwzer primarily serves the residential real estate market. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Onkos Surgical
cb_description: Onkos Surgical specializes in musculoskeletal oncology and complex orthopaedic procedures within the medical devices sector. The company offers personalized solutions including virtual surgical planning, 3D modeling and printing, and implant design to improve patient outcomes. Onkos Surgical primarily serves the healthcare sector, focusing on institutions that require advanced orthopaedic surgical tools and personalized patient care. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Parsippany, New Jersey.

name: Universe
cb_description: Universe is a website builder platform that specializes in no-code site creation and design. The company offers a drag and drop editor that allows users to build custom websites, online stores, portfolios, and more without any coding knowledge. Universe primarily serves individuals and businesses looking to establish an online presence with ease. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Floatpays
cb_description: Floatpays operates as a financial services provider to focuses on employee benefits. The company offers services such as on-demand access to earned wages, paycheck-linked savings, and financial education, all aimed at helping employees build financial wellness. It primarily serves the business sector, providing these services as employee benefits. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Attabotics
cb_description: Attabotics is a company focused on warehouse and supply chain automation. The company offers an intelligent platform, known as The Studio, which provides a complete solution for warehouse fulfillment, including storage, sequencing, sortation, and conveyance. The system is designed to be scalable and efficient, reducing space, labor costs, and time. Attabotics primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: KPI6
cb_description: KPI6 is a company that focuses on consumer intelligence, operating within the artificial intelligence and market research industries. The company offers a suite of tools that analyze online discussions and reviews, providing brands and marketing agencies with insights into their target audiences' interests and behaviors. These tools also enable real-time monitoring of market trends and consumer sentiment, and facilitate the creation of effective marketing strategies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: HackerOne
cb_description: HackerOne is a cybersecurity company specializing in ethical hacking and vulnerability coordination. The company offers a platform for vulnerability disclosure, bug bounty programs, and other security services to identify and address security flaws. HackerOne's solutions cater to various sectors including financial services, government, healthcare, and transportation. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: AmplifAI
cb_description: AmplifAI is a company focused on enhancing contact center operations through its AI-driven People Enablement Platform within the technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools that analyze employee data to provide performance intelligence, automate quality assurance, and facilitate AI-driven coaching and gamification. AmplifAI primarily serves sectors such as retail, financial services, health care, travel and tourism, communications and media, technology, BPOs and outsourcers, hospitality, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Plano, Texas.

name: Samp
cb_description: Samp is a Brazilian healthcare company offering dental care, preventive medicine programs, national care and other services.

name: Antora Energy
cb_description: Antora Energy focuses on providing zero-emissions industrial heat and power solutions within the renewable energy sector. The company's main innovation is thermal batteries that store energy from renewable sources and deliver it as heat and power for large industrial operations. Antora Energy's technology aims to reduce industrial emissions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Praxis Labs
cb_description: Praxis Labs is an immersive learning company focused on driving behavior change in the workplace. It offers solutions that combine immersive technology with evidence-based curricula to improve company culture, foster equity and inclusion, and enhance engagement and retention. The company primarily serves organizations looking to integrate diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) best practices into their workplace culture. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Tide
cb_description: Tide is a financial business platform offering digital banking services in the financial sector. The company provides FSCS-protected bank accounts in partnership with ClearBank and e-money accounts through PrePay Solutions, with a suite of business account administration tools including accounting software integration, expense management, and customizable invoicing. Tide caters to UK and Indian SMEs with a focus on saving time and money for its members. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: OpenCare
