cb_description: OpenCare delivers a healthcare platform for dental care. It helps users to find any health providers nearby, see their availabilities in real-time, and book appointments online. It was formerly known as HealthAware. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: HearMe
cb_description: HearMe  provides web collaboration services and products

name: Pace
cb_description: Pace, now a part of FLYR, is a technology company focused on the travel and transportation industry. The company offers AI-driven decision intelligence services that help businesses optimize pricing, forecast revenue, and provide a modern consumer experience. These services primarily cater to the airlines, cargo, and hospitality sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Notpla
cb_description: Notpla serves as a packaging company focused on creating alternatives to plastic using seaweed and plant-based materials. Its products include a variety of containers, utensils, and sachets designed to biodegrade naturally within weeks, offering a solution for packaging needs. Notpla's offerings cater to the food, home care, and personal care sectors with an emphasis on reducing environmental impact through innovative material use and design. Notpla was formerly known as Skipping Rocks Lab. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Yumi
cb_description: Yumi focuses on providing nutritional solutions for early childhood, operating in the food industry. It offers a meal delivery service that provides baby food, designed with the child's needs in mind. Yumi primarily serves the parent consumer sector, particularly those seeking convenient and healthy food options for their children. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Whym
cb_description: Whym provides a universal wishlist platform operating in the e-commerce industry. The company offers a tool that allows users to create and manage a wishlist of products from various online retailers, all in one place, facilitating product comparison and sharing. It primarily serves the online shopping market, catering to consumers looking to streamline shopping experience across multiple brands. It was founded in 2018 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: SoloLearn
cb_description: SoloLearn specializes in interactive technology education, focusing on providing a platform for learning coding and programming skills across various domains. The company offers a range of hands-on courses designed to teach coding fundamentals and advanced topics to both beginners and professionals, enabling users to earn certifications and engage with a community of learners. SoloLearn primarily serves individuals seeking to enhance their technical skills in the technology and education sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Clean Food Group
cb_description: Clean Food Group specializes in sustainable oils and fats solutions within the food and cosmetics sectors. The company offers scalable and healthier alternatives to traditional oils and fats, aiming to impact the planet's health. It primarily serves the food industry. Clean Food Group was formerly known as Eden Skinfood. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Barnet, United Kingdom.

name: Phenix
cb_description: Phenix is a company focused on reducing waste and providing solutions for inventory management in various sectors. The company offers a platform for managing unsold goods, supported by anti-waste experts, and provides services to optimize donations, handle short-dated products, and ensure compliance with anti-waste regulations. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Chromologics
cb_description: Chromologics is a biotechnology company focused on the development of natural colorants for various industries. The company specializes in producing pigments through fungal fermentation, offering sustainable and cost-competitive color solutions. Chromologics primarily serves the food and beverage industry, as well as non-food sectors such as textiles and cosmetics. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sborg, Denmark.

name: oDoc
cb_description: oDoc operates as a digital health company. The company's platform offers a combination of mobile and artificial intelligence technology with clinical expertise and allows users to request or schedule in-person consultations, compare doctor profiles, consult anonymously, search for health information including disease symptoms, and store health records. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Colombo, Sri Lanka.

name: AppZen
cb_description: AppZen focuses on autonomous spend-to-pay software. The company offers artificial intelligence software that processes information from various data sources to help organizations understand enterprise spend. The software integrates with existing accounts payable, expense, and card workflows to read, understand, and make real-time decisions, resulting in faster processing times and fewer instances of fraud or duplicate spend. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: DoorFeed
cb_description: DoorFeed is an investment platform focused on the residential real estate sector. The company offers a service that aggregates residential properties into portfolios for investors, utilizing artificial intelligence and property experts to identify and manage these properties. DoorFeed serves family offices and institutional investment firms. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Elysium
cb_description: Elysium is a company that focuses on developing interoperability solutions for the digital design and Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) markets. The company offers services such as translating, repairing, and ensuring the quality of 3D CAD/CAM and CAE models, making it easier for businesses to maintain high standards of data quality across their supply chains. Elysium primarily serves sectors such as aerospace, defense, automotive, manufacturing, electronics, and heavy industry. It is based in Shizuoka, Japan.

name: Kavak
cb_description: Kavak is a company that specializes in the buying, selling, and financing of pre-owned cars within the automotive industry. They provide a platform for customers to purchase certified and guaranteed vehicles, offer vehicle inspection services, and facilitate car financing and after-sales support. Kavak primarily serves individuals looking for a reliable and convenient way to buy or sell used cars. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Improovy
cb_description: Improovy is a next-generation painting service provider in the home improvement and property technology sectors. The company offers a comprehensive range of services including residential and commercial painting, as well as associated services like drywall repair and full clean-up. Improovy primarily serves the residential and commercial property owners looking for renovation and painting services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Robovision
cb_description: Robovision focuses on computer vision and artificial intelligence within the technology sector. The company offers a central platform that manages vision intelligence in smart machines, enabling businesses to introduce AI in dynamic environments without needing AI experts. Robovision primarily serves sectors such as agriculture, manufacturing, healthcare, and retail. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Ghent, Belgium.

name: Upswing Financial Technologies
cb_description: Upswing Financial Technologies operates as an open finance business-to-business (B2B) ecosystem enabler. The open finance-as-a-service platform is highly customizable, simple, and modular and reduces the integration efforts of tech players to launch financial products like savings accounts, deposits, and services. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Bhanzu
cb_description: Bhanzu is a math-learning platform focused on enhancing mathematical skills and cognitive abilities within the education sector. The company offers a curriculum designed to make students four times quicker and better at math by employing personalized AI-aided methodologies and nurturing core math acumen. Bhanzu primarily serves the educational sector, aiming to build confidence in students and enable them to apply mathematical concepts in real-world scenarios. Bhanzu was formerly known as Exploring Infinities. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: Tecovas
cb_description: Tecovas is a company that focuses on the production of western-style goods, operating primarily in the fashion and retail industry. The company offers a range of products including handmade cowboy boots, apparel, accessories, and other leather goods. Tecovas primarily caters to the fashion and retail industry. Tecovas was formerly known as Zock Commerce. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Opto Investments
cb_description: Opto Investments is a technology firm focused on providing private markets investment solutions within the wealth management sector. The company offers a platform for fiduciaries to invest in private markets, featuring curated investments across private credit, private equity, real estate, venture capital, and customized solutions. Opto Investments primarily serves the wealth management community, offering technology-driven portfolio construction, client communication, and investment lifecycle management. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cleerly
cb_description: Cleerly is a digital healthcare company that focuses on the treatment of heart disease. The company's main service is an AI-based digital care platform that works with coronary computed tomography angiography imaging to help clinicians identify and define atherosclerosis earlier, enabling them to provide personalized treatment plans. The platform measures atherosclerosis, or plaque build-up in the heart's arteries, and offers simpler, faster, and more accurate heart disease evaluation and reporting. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Genomenon
cb_description: Genomenon is a genomics company that operates in the healthcare and pharmaceutical sectors. The company offers genomic intelligence services, transforming complex genetic data into actionable insights for the diagnosis and treatment of genetic diseases and cancer. Its primary customers are in the clinical diagnostics and pharmaceutical drug research and development industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: WayCool
cb_description: WayCool is a food and agritech company, focusing on the development and distribution of food products across various sectors. The company operates a supply chain from soil to sale, offering a broadline product range that includes fresh produce, staples, and dairy products. WayCool serves clientele including general trade, modern trade, and food services space. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: Forethought
cb_description: Forethought was the maker of presentation software including PowerPoint.  In July 1987, Forethought was acquired by Microsoft for $14M in cash.  Forethought's product, PowerPoint, was subsequently bundled as part of Microsoft Office allowing Microsoft and PowerPoint to dominate the presentation software market.  This is regarded by some as one of the best acquisitions in history.

name: Yellowbird
cb_description: Yellowbird is a company specializing in the production of artisanal hot sauces, operating within the food and condiments industry. Their products are made with farm-fresh ingredients and are subtly sweetened with organic sweeteners, catering to both spice enthusiasts and those who prefer milder flavors. The company offers a range of hot sauces, including classic, organic, and small batch varieties, each crafted for a unique flavor profile. Yellowbird was formerly known as RealStuff, LLC. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Marcos, Texas.

name: Inflammatix
cb_description: Inflammatix operates as a molecular diagnostics company. It develops rapid tests that read the immune system to resolve clinical and public health challenges, focusing on acute bacterial and viral infections and sepsis. The test informs the clinician about the bacterial or viral infection and the need for intensive care unit (ICU)-level care in the emergency department. Inflammatix was founded in 2016 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Sofar
cb_description: Sofar focuses on reimagining the live event experience, operating within the entertainment and music industry. The company's main service involves organizing secret, curated performances in a variety of unique locations, providing a platform for artists to connect with engaged audiences. These performances are hosted in everyday spaces, transforming them into captivating venues and fostering an inclusive and accessible global community. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Vandria
cb_description: Vandria that focuses on the development of small molecule mitophagy inducers. The company's main offerings include treatments for age-related and chronic diseases, particularly in the areas of muscle and central nervous system diseases. These products aim to address significant unmet medical needs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: Sibill
cb_description: Sibill is a company that focuses on providing financial management solutions in the business sector. The company offers an all-in-one platform that allows businesses to monitor and organize cash flows, manage accounting flows, and reconcile invoices in an easy and automated manner. Sibill primarily serves the small and medium-sized enterprises sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Agropoli, Italy.

name: Wiz
cb_description: Wiz provides cloud security software within the cybersecurity industry. Its main offerings include a unified cloud security platform that enables security, development, and operations teams to collaborate and secure cloud environments effectively. Wiz's platform offers solutions for continuous security posture management (CSPM), container and Kubernetes security, cloud workload protection (CWPP), identity and access management (CIEM), and data security posture management (DSPM), among others. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: VanHack
cb_description: VanHack is a global recruitment platform specializing in the tech industry, connecting employers with a vast pool of tech talent ready for relocation or remote work. The company offers AI-powered candidate matching and comprehensive support throughout the hiring process, including job posting, candidate previews, and end-to-end assistance with hiring and salary negotiations. VanHack primarily serves the tech sector, offering access to a diverse range of candidates skilled in software engineering, design, and digital marketing. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Pathzero
cb_description: Pathzero is a company focused on accelerating the decarbonisation of the global economy through its emissions data network in the environmental services industry. The company offers a secure technology platform that enables asset owners, fund managers, and operating entities to calculate and share emissions data, ensuring high-integrity carbon information for corporate and financed emissions. Pathzero's solutions cater to the needs of the private markets, providing tools for emissions risk management and compliance with global reporting standards. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Jock MKT
cb_description: Jock MKT combines elements of fantasy sports with a live trading platform, operating within the sports betting and investment sectors. The company offers a trading game where users can buy, sell, and short-sell shares of players during sports events to win real money based on performance outcomes. Jock MKT primarily caters to the sports betting industry, providing an alternative to traditional betting by integrating investment mechanisms. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Kallyope
cb_description: Kallyope is a biotechnology company focused on developing oral, small-molecule therapeutics for metabolic, neurological, and gastrointestinal diseases. The company leverages its Klarity platform to discover medicines that address conditions such as obesity, diabetes, migraines, and celiac disease through the exploration of the gut-brain axis. Kallyope's innovative approach combines a broad set of integrated technologies to enhance the understanding of gut biology and interorgan signaling pathways. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Yuno
cb_description: Yuno specializes in simplifying real estate investment through automation and analytics within the real estate sector. The company offers a platform that automates the search for ideal properties across numerous sites in real-time, provides investment simulations with varying assumptions, and analyzes and rates property listings. Yuno also enables users to track their rental income, expenses, and loan repayments in real-time. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Flobiz
cb_description: Flobiz develops a mobile-first billing application. It is a neo bank for growing small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs). The company caters to businesses like distributors, wholesalers, traders, and retailers, It offers a product myBillBook.  These solutions are particularly beneficial for traders, merchants, wholesalers, distributors, manufacturers, and retailers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Invygo
cb_description: Invygo is a company specializing in car subscriptions and rental services within the automotive industry. They offer flexible car rental plans on a monthly or weekly basis, with a digital process that includes free basic insurance and routine maintenance. The company primarily serves individuals seeking hassle-free, short to mid-term vehicle access. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Recykal
cb_description: Recykal focuses on providing digital solutions for the waste management sector. The company offers a platform that connects waste generators with aggregators and recyclers, facilitating transparent and traceable material flows and transactions. Recykal primarily serves brands, government agencies, and educational institutions with its suite of sustainability solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: CloudNC
cb_description: CloudNC develops software for factories to autonomously create components. The company's technology automates many of the manual steps involved in manufacturing components and parts, aiming to help companies and workers to make products efficiently and consistently. It serves industries such as aerospace, defense, automotive, energy, and more. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: ThingLink
cb_description: ThingLink is a company that specializes in the development of visual media interaction tools, operating within the digital media and education technology sectors. The company's main offerings include tools that allow users to add interactive tags to images, videos, or 360/VR images, which can then be shared on various platforms. These tools are primarily used in the education, eLearning, marketing, and communications sectors. It is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Bungii
cb_description: Bungii is a company specializing in last mile delivery services, focusing on the rapid and reliable transportation of large items. The company offers a tech-enabled platform that provides same-day delivery, real-time tracking, and a suite of services tailored to both individual and business needs, including reverse logistics and local carrier services. Bungii primarily serves the retail and e-commerce sectors, as well as other industries requiring large item logistics. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Shawnee Mission, Kansas.

name: CipherStash
cb_description: CipherStash is a security company that specializes in encryption-in-use technology to protect customer data. Their main product, CipherStash Proxy, is a tool that encrypts data even while it is being used, ensuring that sensitive information remains secure without compromising functionality or performance. CipherStash offers a suite of tools that can be used together or independently to secure and audit data, providing a balance of security and operational simplicity. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Accrue Savings
cb_description: Accrue Savings specializes in customer loyalty and financial technology within the retail and ecommerce sectors. The company offers solutions that incentivize customers to save and pre-fund purchases, optimize refunds to encourage repurchases, and provide a pay-by-bank option to enhance customer loyalty. Accrue Savings primarily serves the retail industry, offering tools to increase average order value and encourage repeat business. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Toothio
cb_description: Toothio is a dental temp staffing agency that specializes in providing on-demand staffing solutions for dental practices. The company offers a platform where dental offices can find qualified dental professionals for temporary shifts, and dental professionals can find flexible work opportunities that suit their schedules. Toothio differentiates itself by handling administrative tasks, offering a robust rating system, and ensuring a seamless experience with no hidden fees. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Insolight
cb_description: Insolight is a company specializing in agrivoltaics, a sector that combines agriculture and solar energy. They offer a dynamic agrivoltaic solution called insolagrin, which involves translucent solar modules that replace traditional plastic tunnels in agriculture, allowing for the dual use of land for both crop protection and solar energy production. Insolight primarily serves the agricultural sector by helping farmers optimize land use and crop growth while also generating solar energy. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Ecublens, Switzerland.

name: Dibbs
cb_description: Dibbs is a company specializing in the tokenization of physical collectibles, operating within the blockchain and NFT sectors. They provide a platform for brands and intellectual property holders to create and manage asset-backed NFTs, offering services such as regulated custody, proprietary 3D imaging, and minting of digital tokens. Dibbs primarily serves sectors that deal with consumer products in sports, music, entertainment, toys, and luxury goods. It was founded in 2020 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: StatusPro
cb_description: StatusPro serves as a sports technology and gaming company focused on virtual and extended reality products. The company offers gaming and training products designed to provide strategic advantages for players and coaches, as well as authentic sports experiences for fans. StatusPro primarily serves the professional sports sector, with a focus on football training and fan engagement. StatusPro was formerly known as ByteCubed Labs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: Yuvo
cb_description: Yuvo Health specializes in supporting community health centers by facilitating access to value-based care within the healthcare industry. The company offers services that enable health centers to leverage new revenue opportunities without risk, utilize scalable infrastructure, and partner with a network of local and national organizations for comprehensive care delivery. Yuvo Health primarily serves community health centers and partners within the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Open Cosmos
cb_description: Open Cosmos specializes in the design, construction, and operation of satellite missions within the space industry. Its main services include end-to-end mission management encompassing satellite assembly, launch, in-orbit operations, and delivery of satellite data. It provides a cloud-based platform that offers satellite imagery and advanced visualization tools for better decision-making. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Didcot, United Kingdom.

name: Kinnos
cb_description: Kinnos is a company focused on infection prevention technology within the healthcare sector. Its main product, Highlight, is a color-adding solution for disinfectants that provides visual confirmation of surface coverage, aiming to improve cleaning quality and efficiency. Highlight is designed to work with commonly used disinfectants in healthcare facilities and helps standardize cleaning performance. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Honor
cb_description: Honor operates within the metaverse gaming sector. The company offers an artificial intelligence-driven interactive game that engages users in a virtual universe. It primarily sells to the gaming industry and metaverse enthusiasts. The company is based in Singapore.

name: CADDi
cb_description: CADDi operates as a global supply chain company. It features an automated quotation system based on proprietary cost calculation algorithms, enabling matching companies with products that meet their quality, delivery, and price needs. It uploads three-dimensional computer-aided design data and specific parameters such as quantity, material, design, prices, and delivery times. It serves semiconductor, medical, construction, and other industries. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Slang
cb_description: Slang is a marketplace for shoes, including sales tracking and analytics. Slang is a mobile sneaker marketplace for iPhone.

name: Pilot
cb_description: Pilot is a decentralized exchange platform.

name: Elucid
cb_description: Elucid focuses on improving human health through supply chain management. The company offers a data-driven solution to assess and mitigate risks to human rights in supply chains, with a particular emphasis on improving the health and livelihoods of small-scale producers. Its services primarily cater to businesses seeking to enhance their sustainability and compliance efforts. Elucid was founded in 2022 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: ALICE
cb_description: ALICE specializes in construction simulation software within the construction technology sector. Its main offerings include a platform that enables construction professionals to optimize scheduling and planning through advanced scenario analysis and resource management. ALICE primarily serves general contractors, owners, and consultants in the industrial, infrastructure, and general building sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: SoBanHang
cb_description: SoBanHang focuses on providing digital solutions for business management. The company offers intelligent sales management solutions, customer management, and financial management, enabling businesses to manage cash flow and increase sales through hyperlocal online storefronts. SoBanHang primarily serves the e-commerce industry, modern retail, and multi-channel sales. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Dien Bien Phu, Vietnam.

name: ISEE AI
cb_description: ISEE AI operates as a technology company focused on autonomous driving systems, specifically in the logistics and supply chain industry. The company offers advanced autonomous yard truck solutions, and operations, improves efficiency, and enhances safety in yard operations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Cureatr
cb_description: Cureatr specializes in comprehensive medication management within the healthcare sector, focusing on leveraging clinical pharmacists and patient data to improve medication-related outcomes. The company offers services that include medication reconciliation, patient engagement, and support for healthcare providers to enhance quality performance and reduce readmission rates. Cureatr primarily serves payers and health systems, aiming to address medication management challenges and improve adherence to treatment plans. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Levels
cb_description: Levels is a venture studio focused on creating, growing, and investing in digital businesses within the technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services for digital transformation, including co-founding startups, supporting scaleups, and empowering corporate venturing, all through a risk-sharing investment model. Levels primarily serves startups, scaleups, and large enterprises looking to innovate and grow in the digital space. It is based in Stocksund, Sweden.

name: Grove
cb_description: Grove provides web3 infrastructure and remote procedure call (RPC) protocol within the blockchain and data platform industry. It offers services that coordinate and distribute data at scale, helping in interactions between blockchains and applications, and allowing developers to integrate blockchain use into websites, mobile applications, and the Internet of Things (IoT). Its primary customers are in the web3 and blockchain application development sectors. It was formerly known as Pocket Network. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Tampa, Florida.

name: Surge
cb_description: Surge is an artificial intelligence-powered assistant. It automates the administrative task for sales professionals by interacting with their customer relationship management (CRM) simply by conversing with Surge via email, voice or slack. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: FlipGive
cb_description: FlipGive is a company focused on fundraising through cashback rewards, operating within the ecommerce and fundraising sectors. It provides a platform where teams can earn cashback from everyday shopping, which is then used for fundraising purposes. The service is inclusive to various groups such as sports teams, community groups, and charities, allowing them to raise funds without traditional fundraising activities. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Shipwell
cb_description: Shipwell specializes in supply chain efficiency and service solutions for logistics. The company offers a comprehensive platform that combines transportation management, visibility, and procurement capabilities, enabling shippers to operate, manage, and optimize the shipping process seamlessly. Shipwell primarily serves the logistics and supply chain sectors of the economy. It was formerly known as OtterLogic. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Stream
cb_description: Stream specializes in automated menu and order management solutions for the restaurant industry. The company offers a platform that allows restaurants to manage and synchronize their menus across various online delivery services and receive orders directly to their point-of-sale (POS) systems. Stream primarily serves the food service sector, enabling establishments to streamline their online ordering and delivery processes. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: 360Learning
cb_description: 360Learning is a company that specializes in collaborative learning solutions within the corporate learning technologies sector. Their platform leverages artificial intelligence and collaborative tools to transform in-house experts into learning and development collaborators, enabling organizations to upskill quickly and continuously. 360Learning offers a suite of services including compliance training automation, employee onboarding, sales enablement, and frontline staff training, all designed to be accessible on various devices and adaptable to hybrid learning environments. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Justt
cb_description: Justt operates as a company specializing in chargeback mitigation and friendly fraud prevention, operating within the financial technology sector. The company offers a solution that uses machine learning (ML) to automatically fight fraudulent chargebacks, gather evidence, submit disputes, and recover lost revenue for merchants. It primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce, travel and hospitality, cryptocurrency, gaming, software-as-a-service (SaaS), gambling, and event ticketing. It was formerly known as AcroCharge. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Middesk
cb_description: Middesk is a leading Business Identity Platform that operates in the financial services sector. The company specializes in providing solutions for business verification, risk evaluation, and compliance, including KYB, credit assessment, and tax registration services. Middesk primarily serves the fintech, banking, lending, marketplace, insurance, and payroll platform sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Koidra
cb_description: Koidra is a company focused on intelligent automation, operating within the manufacturing and high-tech greenhouse industries. The company offers software-based automation technologies that help industrial facilities optimize operations, increase yield, and reduce costs. Koidra primarily serves the horticulture, thermal energy, and food processing sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Camino Financial
cb_description: Camino Financial offers an artificial intelligence (AI) based community lending platform. The company specializes in originating loans for first-time business borrowers who are unable to get a loan from a bank. It provides ongoing credit monitoring and advice to ensure clients improve their business credit in an effort to qualify for a bank loan. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Revelator
cb_description: Revelator is a company that focuses on providing digital IP infrastructure to the music industry. The company offers a range of services including catalog management, digital distribution, income tracking, rights management, and royalty distribution. These services are designed to enhance speed, accuracy, and transparency in rights management, digital supply chain management, and royalty distribution. Revelator primarily serves the music industry. It is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Selfbook
cb_description: Selfbook specializes in providing e-commerce solutions for hospitality services. The company offers a suite of products that streamline hotel bookings, enhance payment processes, and improve the overall guest experience without the need for complex technical integrations. It primarily serves the hospitality sector, offering modern checkout experiences, digital wallet integration, and secure payment technology to hotels. It was founded in 2018 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Salad Technologies
cb_description: Salad Technologies specializes in leveraging distributed GPU resources for AI/ML inference at scale within the cloud computing industry. It offers a platform that enables the deployment of containerized applications on a global network of consumer-grade GPUs, providing an alternative to traditional cloud services. It caters to various sectors including AI inference, batch processing, and molecular dynamics. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: Koniku
cb_description: Koniku operates as a synthetic biotechnology company focused on integrating synthetic biology with silicon technology to create devices for various sectors. The company specializes in developing 'smell cyborgs' that can autonomously detect and analyze volatile organic compounds, with applications in health diagnostics and environmental monitoring. Koniku's technology is utilized across industries such as security, military, and agriculture to provide real-time data and insights. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Rafael, California.

name: Field Effect
cb_description: Field Effect is a cybersecurity company that provides comprehensive security solutions and services. The company offers managed detection and response, cybersecurity assessments, incident response services, and training programs to enhance organizational security. Field Effect primarily serves small and mid-size businesses seeking advanced cybersecurity protection and compliance. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ottawa, Ontario.

name: TrustLayer
cb_description: TrustLayer develops a risk management platform. The company offers a comprehensive platform for tracking, collaborating, and automating the verification of insurance, licenses, and compliance documents, thereby simplifying the process of contractual risk transfer. It primarily serves risk managers, finance teams, executives, administrators, coordinators, brokers, and carriers. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Brandon, Florida.

name: Trefoil Therapeutics
cb_description: Trefoil Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biotechnology company that focuses on the advancement of regenerative therapies for corneal diseases. The company's main offerings include the development of therapies based on the regenerative properties of naturally occurring corneal cells, with a lead investigational medicine, TTHX1114, being studied for the treatment of various corneal conditions. Trefoil Therapeutics primarily sells to the healthcare industry, specifically in the field of ophthalmology. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Zenda
cb_description: Zenda is a health spending account platform. The company automatically detects and routes medical expenses to the HSA or FSA, while non-eligible purchases are charged to the everyday account. It is based in Palo Alto, California. In August 2023, Zenda was acquired by InComm Payments. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed. It is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Plural
cb_description: Plural focuses on legislative tracking and stakeholder collaboration tools within the public policy domain. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI)-powered software that enables users to track legislation, receive updates on bill progress, and collaborate with stakeholders. Plural primarily serves advocacy organizations, chambers of commerce, corporations, law firms, lobbyists, libraries, universities, associations, and news media entities. Plural was formerly known as Civic Eagle. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Brookhaven, Georgia.

name: Elephas
cb_description: Elephas is a company focused on the development of innovative cancer diagnostic products and services in the biopharma industry. The company's main offerings include a technology suite that assesses how live tumor fragments respond to cancer therapies, aiming to remove the trial-and-error approach to cancer care by utilizing advances in cancer biology, multimodal microscopy, and artificial intelligence. Elephas primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Madison, Wisconsin.

name: Frontier Medicines
cb_description: Frontier Medicines focuses on developing treatments within the pharmaceutical industry. The company specializes in creating small-molecule drugs aimed at disease-causing proteins that were previously considered undruggable, using a combination of chemoproteomics, covalent chemistry, and machine learning. Frontier Medicines primarily serves the healthcare sector, particularly in the area of oncology where it targets genetic mutations in cancer. It was founded in 2018 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Comet
cb_description: Comet connects large companies with freelance tech and data specialists.

name: Pallet
cb_description: Pallet offers white-labeled job sites to creators and professional communities with access to talent.  Creators and communities can offer job sites that get their members hired and companies can access talent in niche communities. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: RareCyte
cb_description: RareCyte operates as a precision biology company. The company provides spatial biology and liquid biopsy solutions, including multiplexed fluorescent imaging systems and reagents, which help researchers understand the spatial context of key biomarkers and analyze rare cells. Its products are CyteFinder II Imaging Instruments, CytePicker Retrieval Module, and more. Its primary customers are in the research, translational medicine, and clinical sectors. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Kredi
cb_description: Kredi is a financial technology company specializing in digital mortgage lending within the financial services sector. The company offers products such as home acquisition loans and mortgage refinancing, designed to be flexible and accessible through a digital application process. Kredi's services cater to individuals seeking to purchase or refinance their homes with a streamlined, technology-driven approach. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Nuevo Leon, Mexico.

name: REPOWR
cb_description: REPOWR is a company focused on providing a commercial trailer marketplace within the logistics industry. It offers a platform for reserving various types of trailers, such as dry vans, flatbeds, and refrigerated trailers, with a simple reservation process and without long-term contracts. The company primarily serves the logistics sector, including shippers, carriers, and leasing companies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Birmingham, Alabama.

name: TrueFort
cb_description: TrueFort is a company that specializes in cybersecurity, specifically in the domain of microsegmentation solutions. The company offers a range of services including microsegmentation, service account protection, file integrity monitoring, and workload hardening, all aimed at enhancing network security and preventing cyber attacks. TrueFort primarily caters to large enterprises, particularly those operating in data center and cloud environments. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Union City, New Jersey.

name: SignalWire
cb_description: SignalWire focuses on providing software-defined telecom network solutions. The company offers various services including communication platforms, messaging, voice, and video conferencing application programming interfaces (APIs), artificial intelligence (AI) agents, and trunking. It serves in sectors such as healthcare and telecommunications. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Marvel
cb_description:
Marvel carries out road freight transport throughout Brazil and in the international market: Argentina, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay, and Peru.

On June 10, 2021, Marvel was acquired by JSL.29M.

name: ThinkCERCA
cb_description: ThinkCERCA is a company focused on education technology, specifically in the domain of literacy instruction. The company offers a personalized literacy platform that provides close reading and argumentative writing lessons, aiming to enhance critical thinking skills in students. These services are primarily targeted towards the education sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Medway
cb_description: Medway is a French telemedicine company based in Paris.

name: Ria Health
cb_description: Ria Health offers a technology-enabled telehealth medical practice. It focuses on providing evidence-based treatment for alcohol use disorder (AUD). The company offers a range of services including medication-assisted treatment, digital progress tracking tools, harm reduction, peer support, and one-on-one coaching, all delivered through a convenient telehealth platform. Ria Health primarily serves individuals seeking to change their relationship with alcohol, health plans, self-insured employers, and health systems. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: beehiiv
cb_description: Beehiiv is a company that focuses on providing a platform for newsletter creation and growth, operating within the digital communication and media industry. The company offers a comprehensive platform that enables users to create, publish, grow, and monetize their newsletters without the need for coding or complex integrations. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AlGooru
cb_description: AlGooru is a company focused on providing personalized educational services within the private tutoring sector. It connects students with expert private tutors for one-on-one sessions, both in-person and online, across various educational stages and subjects. The company offers flexible subscription packages for individual tutoring tailored to the Saudi curriculum. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: CloudFactory
cb_description: CloudFactory focuses on providing workforce solutions for machine learning and business process optimization. The company offers services such as data labeling, accelerated annotation, and human-in-the-loop automation, which support workflows and fill gaps in artificial intelligence (AI) and automation. CloudFactory primarily serves sectors such as the autonomous vehicles industry, finance, healthcare, insurance, and retail. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Reading, United Kingdom.

name: Tiki
cb_description: Tiki is a B2C e-commerce platform operating in various sectors including fashion, electronics, home appliances, and groceries. The company offers a wide range of products and services, from smartphones and laptops to fresh fruits and vegetables, along with super-fast delivery services. It primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

name: Clover
cb_description:
Clover is an automated investment service bringing online personal financial management to Australians. Clover's robo-advisor uses a goals-based approach to advise provision and portfolio construction. Those goals guide the algorithm so as to create portfolios that are periodically rebalanced in order to attain those goals.

On October 26, 2020 Clover was acquired by SuperEd. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: UnaliWear
cb_description: UnaliWear is a maker of a Personal Emergency Response System (PERS) watch. UnaliWear provides the Kanega watch, which provides support for falls, medication reminders, and a guard against wandering, and features a use speech interface rather than buttons. The company combines cellular, Wi-Fi, GPS, BLE (for hearing aids and telemedicine devices), an accelerometer for automatic fall detection, and continuous speech to provide an active medical alert that works anywhere, along with artificial intelligence that learns the wearer's lifestyle to provide predictive, pre-emptive support. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Proof
cb_description: Proof is a company that focuses on AI-driven marketing analytics in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to plan, predict, and optimize their go-to-market investments in real time. Their services are primarily used by businesses in the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paradise Valley, Arizona.

name: Nova Credit
cb_description: Nova Credit is a credit infrastructure and analytics company that enables lenders to evaluate thin file and foreign credit applicants. Nova Credit's cross-border credit product, Credit Passport, cash flow underwriting product, Cash Atlas, and income verification product, Income Navigator, are used by leading organizations like American Express, Verizon, HSBC, SoFi, Scotiabank, and Yardi to help them reach valuable new applicants from traditionally credit excluded populations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: Banca AideXa
cb_description: Banca AideXa focuses on providing financial services to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) within the fintech sector. The company offers business loans, credit assessment tools, and online savings accounts designed to facilitate simple, fast, transparent, and secure financial experiences for Italian entrepreneurs. Banca AideXa serves a diverse range of industries, including bars, pharmacies, travel agencies, restaurants, construction companies, retail stores, and manufacturing businesses. Banca AideXa was formerly known as AiDEXA. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Armis
cb_description: Armis develops an asset intelligence and security platform. The platform helps protect devices such as laptops and smartphones, smart televisions (TVs), webcams, printers, industrial robots, medical devices, and more. It offers cyber asset attack surface management solutions, medical device security solutions, operational technology asset management solutions, and more. Armis serves healthcare, manufacturing, retail, and other industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Needed
cb_description: Needed is a company focused on providing nutrition for women, particularly during the stages of pre-pregnancy, pregnancy, and post-pregnancy, operating in the health and wellness industry. The company offers a range of nutritional plans and products designed to address the specific nutrient needs of women during these stages, including prenatal vitamins, omega-3 supplements, collagen protein, and pre/probiotics. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Flybuy Technologies
cb_description:
Flybuy grants people access to Curbside Pickup for local food and coffee through a mobile application.

On February 1st, 2021, Flybuy Technologies was acquired by Radius Networks. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Mozaic
cb_description: Mozaic is a company focused on providing online entertainment and gambling services within the sports betting and casino gaming industry. The company offers a range of betting options including sports events, live dealer casino games, slot machines, and lottery, as well as horse racing and fishing games, all accessible through a multilingual platform. Mozaic caters to a global audience with a strong emphasis on providing a reliable and legally certified online betting experience, supported by a robust customer service team available around the clock. It is based in Canada.

name: Sencrop
cb_description: Sencrop designs and sells connected weather forecast solutions used to measure humidity, temperature, wind speed, and rainfall by farmers. It offers assistance to all types of farmers to make the right decisions at the right time and to improve their yields. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Lille, France.

name: DePoly
cb_description: DePoly specializes in the chemical recycling of PET plastics, operating within the sustainability and recycling industry. The company's main service is an innovative recycling process that converts all types of PET waste into high-quality raw materials, such as purified terephthalic acid and mono-ethylene glycol, without the need for pre-sorting or pre-washing. This process is designed to be energy-efficient and capable of handling mixed and contaminated PET streams that are traditionally non-recyclable. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sion, Switzerland.

name: Hubble
cb_description: Hubble is a flexible workspace platform that specializes in providing solutions for businesses seeking various office and meeting space arrangements. The company offers a range of services including full-time office leases, part-time office arrangements, and on-demand access to meeting rooms, coworking spaces, and event venues. Hubble caters to businesses looking for hybrid working configurations and flexible office solutions. Hubble was formerly known as Spacious. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Verishop
cb_description: Verishop is an online retail platform specializing in a diverse range of products across multiple sectors including fashion, home decor, and beauty. The company offers a curated selection of items from independent brands and creators, encompassing clothing, accessories, home goods, and personal care products. Verishop provides a unique shopping experience with a focus on emerging names and trends in the industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: ViCentra
cb_description: ViCentra is a medical devices company that focuses on the development, manufacturing, and commercialization of insulin pumps. The company's main product is the Kaleido insulin pump, which is designed to deliver insulin in a consistent and reliable manner, offering users the flexibility to wear it on their body or in their pocket. The pump is aimed at reducing the impact of diabetes on daily life. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Utrecht, Netherlands.

name: Autochek
cb_description: Autochek is an online marketplace for car sales. The company builds solutions aimed at enabling and enhancing commerce within the automotive sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: uLesson
cb_description: uLesson is a company focused on education technology. It offers an online learning platform designed for primary, junior secondary, and senior secondary school students, providing interactive and engaging lesson plans from qualified tutors. The company primarily serves the education sector in Africa. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Jabi-Abuja, Nigeria.

name: Sublime
cb_description: Sublime focused on email security, leveraging artificial intelligence and detection-as-code to combat email threats. The company offers a platform that provides threat hunting, attack surface reduction, and prevention of various email attacks such as business email compromise (BEC), credential phishing, and malware. Sublime's solutions cater to organizations looking for email security measures and reduce the time spent on managing email-originated incidents. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Quaise
cb_description: Quaise is an energy company focused on unlocking the potential of clean geothermal energy through innovative drilling technology. The company's main offering is a gyrotron-powered drilling platform that enables access to deep geothermal heat, aiming to provide a sustainable and powerful energy source. Quaise primarily serves the energy sector, with a focus on transitioning existing fossil fuel infrastructure to clean geothermal energy. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Kasisto
cb_description: Kasisto is a company that focuses on conversational artificial intelligence solutions, primarily in the banking and finance sector. The company offers a platform that provides intelligent digital assistants, designed to facilitate accurate, human-like conversations and empower teams with financial knowledge. Kasisto primarily serves global financial institutions, regional banks, community banks, and credit unions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AutogenAI
cb_description: AutogenAI provides artificial intelligence and large language model (LLM) technology solutions. It offers a service that uses AI to help businesses create marketable bids, proposals, and tenders more efficiently. Its product Bowdleriser, removes confidential information from corporate documents, which allows for a wider distribution within a company, fundamentally changing the way knowledge is managed, retrieved, and reused. It primarily serves businesses across various sectors that require bid writing. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Typeface
cb_description: Typeface is a generative AI platform specializing in personalized content creation for the enterprise sector. The company offers a suite of tools that streamline the content creation process, enabling businesses to produce on-brand content at an accelerated pace. Typeface primarily serves sectors that require robust content marketing strategies, such as email marketing, advertising, SEO, and eCommerce. Typeface was formerly known as Cortex6. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: GRO Biosciences
cb_description: GRO Biosciences focuses on redefining protein therapeutics through its proprietary synthetic biology platform in the biotechnology sector. The company's main offerings include the development of protein therapies using non-standard amino acids to enhance potency, reduce immunogenicity, and improve stability. GRO Biosciences primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries with its therapeutic solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Glitzi
cb_description: Glitzi focuses on providing at-home beauty and spa services within the personal care industry. The company connects customers with a network of vetted and trained professionals for services such as spa treatments, nail care, hair styling, makeup, and special occasion beauty services. Glitzi's offerings cater to individuals seeking the convenience and comfort of receiving beauty services at their own location. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Thinkerbell Labs
cb_description: Thinkerbell Labs is a company focused on creating solutions for pressing social problems, particularly in the education sector. Their main product is a self-learning Braille device for the visually impaired, which allows students to learn to type and read in Braille independently, while also providing a platform for parents and teachers to monitor progress. The company primarily serves the education sector, with a focus on inclusive education for visually impaired students. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Neocis
cb_description: Neocis provides dental implant surgery through robotics in the healthcare industry. The company's main product is a robotic device that assists in both the planning and surgical phases of dental implantation procedures, aiming to enhance precision, efficiency, and patient experience. Neocis primarily serves the healthcare sector, particularly dental practices. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Niyo
cb_description: Niyo offers finance and banking services. The company offers a single card for all employee payouts and is linked to the web and mobile platforms. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Ordr
cb_description: Ordr is a company that focuses on enhancing the customer experience in stadiums, operating within the food and beverage industry. The company offers a mobile application that allows customers to order food and beverages from their seats, eliminating the need to wait in lines and ensuring they don't miss any part of the event. Ordr primarily serves the sports and entertainment industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Edmonton, Alberta.

name: Rokt
cb_description: Rokt focuses on electronic commerce technology. The company offers solutions to increase revenue, acquire customers at scale, and form relationships with existing customers. These solutions include optimizing and monetizing the checkout experience, providing payment providers during checkout, and offering premium post-purchase offers. The company operates in the e-commerce sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Away
cb_description: Away operates as an electronic commerce platform. The company offers a range of products including suitcases, bags, and travel accessories designed for traveling. Away's primary market is the travel industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Terra Kaffe
cb_description: Terra Kaffe is a company focused on transforming the in-home coffee experience, operating in the consumer goods and coffee industry. The company offers a super automatic espresso machine that allows coffee lovers to discover and design their daily rituals, along with a subscription service for roasted-to-order coffee. Terra Kaffe primarily targets the consumer market, particularly coffee enthusiasts. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: LunaJoy
cb_description: LunaJoy specializes in providing online therapy and counseling services for women, focusing on mental health care across various life stages. The company offers a range of services including individual therapy, medication management, wellness coaching, and group therapy, all delivered virtually. It caters primarily to the mental health care sector, serving women in need of support for issues such as anxiety, depression, and life transitions. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Saint Petersburg, Florida.

name: Flyp
cb_description: Flyp is a telecommunications company that focuses on enhancing the global consumer communication experience. The company offers a platform that allows users to have multiple phone numbers on a single device, enabling high-quality voice and text communications both within and outside the network. The company primarily serves the telecommunications industry. It is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: WASE
cb_description: WASE develops decentralized sanitation solutions for wastewater treatment. The company offers modular electro-methanogenic systems for biogas production for waste treatment processes. It allows to turn the waste into biogas, fertilizers, and recovery water It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bristol, United Kingdom.

name: Turnip
cb_description: Turnip provides mobile streaming and monetization applications for gamers. It allows content creators to stream on platforms like YouTube, Facebook, and Twitch and run interactive experiences for their communities, as well as monetize user engagement. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Step
cb_description: Step specializes in process optimization and the provision of digital solutions and services for complex organizations within various sectors. The company offers services such as digital transformation, supply chain management, and operational support to enhance efficiency and anticipate market trends. Step primarily caters to the finance sector, offering solutions that support digital transformation and process optimization for businesses. It was founded in 1854 and is based in San Nicol, Italy.

name: Lemon Cash
cb_description: Lemon Cash is a fintech company specializing in cryptocurrency services within the financial sector. The company enables users to buy, sell, and exchange various cryptocurrencies, offers a prepaid VISA card with Bitcoin cashback, and provides access to decentralized finance (DeFi) investments. Lemon Cash primarily serves individuals interested in cryptocurrency transactions and investments. It was founded in 2019 and is based in La Libertad, El Salvador.

name: Verto
cb_description: Verto is a technology company that focuses on 3D modeling and visualization in the e-commerce industry. The company's main service is creating high-quality, fully textured 3D models from 2D images, which can be integrated into e-commerce platforms to enhance customer engagement and reduce product returns. Verto primarily serves the e-commerce industry, with a particular emphasis on footwear retailers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Bloomreach
cb_description: Bloomreach specializes in e-commerce personalization and marketing automation using artificial intelligence (AI). The company offers a suite of products that enable businesses to personalize customer experiences across various channels, including email, short message service (SMS), applications, and websites, by using real-time data and AI. Bloomreach's solutions cater to sectors such as retail, travel and hospitality, beauty, and food and beverage. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: SafeTraces
cb_description: SafeTraces is a company focused on indoor air quality verification within the healthcare, education, government, and corporate real estate sectors. The company offers a performance management platform, veriDART, which provides actionable data to ensure indoor spaces are healthy, profitable, and sustainable by simulating airborne pathogen mobility and exposure levels. SafeTraces primarily serves the healthcare, education, government, and commercial real estate industries. It is based in Pleasanton, California.

name: DressX
cb_description: DressX is a digital fashion company that specializes in the creation and retail of 3D clothing collections. The company offers a wide range of digital garments and accessories designed for online personas, providing an eco-conscious alternative to traditional fashion consumption. DressX primarily serves the digital fashion industry, catering to customers looking to enhance their virtual presence with innovative and non-physical apparel. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Swimm
cb_description: Swimm provides a code-coupled editor and integrated development environment (IDE) integration solutions. it enables businesses to streamline internal code documentation and share developer knowledge across teams and repositories through the integrated platform. It is a knowledge management tool for code, built for development teams committed to knowledge sharing. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: SmartHR
cb_description: SmartHR is a provider of cloud-based human resources and labor management software. The company offers solutions for paperless employment procedures, employee data management, and talent management features to facilitate organizational activation and transformation. SmartHR's services are designed to improve productivity and contribute to creating a work environment that is accessible and efficient for everyone. SmartHR was formerly known as KUFU. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: AccuLine
cb_description: AccuLine operates as a digital healthcare company. The company focuses on the early detection of coronary artery disease. The company's main service includes the development of CORA. The exam uses machine learning algorithms to analyze bio-signals in the heart's electrical activity, indicating a patient's risk of having coronary artery disease. AccuLine primarily sells to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Petach-Tikva, Israel.

name: ROLI
cb_description: ROLI is a music technology company focused on the innovation of music learning and creation through hardware and software. The company offers products such as the Seaboard RISE keyboard and the LUMI learning platform, which are designed to make music learning and creation more effective. ROLI's offerings cater to both professional musicians and beginners, providing tools for music expression and educational content. It was founded in 2009 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Wisetack
cb_description: Wisetack operates as a financial technology company specializing in consumer financing solutions for service-related industries. The company offers point-of-sale financing options that enable customers to pay over time for services such as home improvement, auto repair, dental care, and veterinary services, without the need for extensive paperwork or hidden fees. Wisetack primarily serves sectors that provide essential real-life services to consumers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Magenta Medical
cb_description: Magenta Medical specializes in the development of medical devices for circulatory support, focusing on innovative cardiac technologies. The company offers a percutaneous Left Ventricular Assist Device (pLVAD), designed as a temporary support solution for patients experiencing high-risk coronary interventions or cardiogenic shock. This device operates as a low-profile, high-flow arterial pump to assist with heart function during critical medical procedures. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Kadima, Israel.

name: Proscia
cb_description: Proscia focuses on the development of software for the pathology sector. The company offers include a digital pathology platform and artificial intelligence (AI) powered applications to facilitate routine pathology operations, research breakthroughs, and patient outcomes. Proscia primarily serves the life sciences and diagnostics sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Optimus Technologies
cb_description: Optimus Technologies is a clean energy technology company focused on emissions reduction in the transportation sector. The company offers the Vector System, an advanced fuel system that enables diesel engines to operate on 100% biodiesel, facilitating a seamless transition to low-carbon fuels for medium and heavy-duty fleet applications. Optimus Technologies primarily serves government and commercial fleet sectors, helping them to reduce carbon emissions and meet sustainability goals. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Mahmee
cb_description: Mahmee provides maternal healthcare solutions focused on improving birth outcomes, particularly in historically marginalized communities. It offers an all-inclusive care experience to expecting and new parents, providing services such as nursing, lactation consulting, doula support, mental health coaching, nutrition advice, and care coordination. Its services are primarily targeted towards the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Ion Storage Systems
cb_description: Ion Storage Systems specializes in the development of solid-state lithium metal batteries within the energy storage sector. Its batteries feature a patented nonflammable ceramic structure and are designed for charging, energy density, and sustainability. The company's products are aimed at enhancing performance across various applications without the need for cooling systems. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Beltsville, Maryland.

name: ANYbotics
cb_description: ANYbotics specializes in AI-driven robotic inspection solutions within the robotics and industrial automation sectors. The company offers autonomous legged robots designed for automated routine inspections in industrial environments, providing real-time data collection and analysis. ANYbotics primarily serves sectors such as energy, power, metals, mining, and chemicals. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Cyberhaven
cb_description: Cyberhaven provides various data security services, including data detection and response, data loss prevention, insider risk management, and cloud data security. These services work to understand how data flows within a company, prevent important data from being lost or stolen, accelerate internal investigations, and detect and stop risky behavior. It serves manufacturing, financial services, pharma, professional services, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Sehat Kahani
cb_description: Sehat Kahani is a telemedicine company focused on providing accessible healthcare services through digital platforms. The company offers online consultations with a network of healthcare professionals, enabling patients to receive medical advice and treatment remotely. Sehat Kahani's solutions cater to individual consumers, corporate clients, and e-clinics, with services that include mental health support and well-being sessions, as well as at-home sample collection and medicine delivery. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Karachi, Pakistan.

name: Thrilling
cb_description: Thrilling helps local thrift stores to sell their items on an e-commerce platform. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Burbank, California.

name: Wify
cb_description: Wify is a local virtual communication platform that enables companies to reach their customers. Without an application or internet connection, customers receive all information and advertising messages on their smartphones, tablet, or laptop. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Knokke-Heist, Belgium.

name: Belvo
cb_description: Belvo is the leading open finance data and payments platform in Latin America, focusing on financial data aggregation, enrichment, and payment initiation services. The company provides a platform that allows financial innovators to connect to user accounts, interpret financial data for insights, and facilitate bank-to-bank payments. Belvo's solutions cater to various sectors including banking, lending, ERP, insurance, personal finance management, e-commerce, and fintech. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Dust
cb_description: Dust develops generative AI-based software to build workflows on top of large language models and semantic search. The platform offers a range of training and support resources, scales to meet the needs, and helps secure compliance with industry standards. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Paris, France.

name: AppDirect
cb_description: AppDirect provides a business-to-business (B2B) subscription commerce platform. It enables organizations to quickly launch a marketplace to sell their services, and third-party services such as Microsoft, Google, and Amazon web services build their software ecosystem. It simplifies aspects of selling cloud products with automated billing, provisioning, and subscription management. AppDirect was formerly known as Origo Networks. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: XMTP
cb_description: XMTP focuses on developing a web3 messaging. The company offers a platform that enables the creation of applications that facilitate messaging between blockchain accounts, including features such as event-based notifications, one-to-many messaging, and one-to-one direct messaging. XMTP primarily serves the blockchain and cryptocurrency industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Transmit Security
cb_description: Transmit Security focuses on providing cloud-native customer identity and access management (CIAM) services. The company offers a range of identity services including identity orchestration, detection and response, identity management, identity verification, authentication services, and data validation. These services are designed to consolidate identity stacks, centralize decision-making, automate customer journeys, monitor and analyze risk signals, and more. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: ViAqua Therapeutics
cb_description: ViAqua Therapeutics focuses on preventing aquaculture diseases through an oral delivery platform within the aquaculture industry. The company offers a solution that involves an encapsulated RNA particle administered through feed to enhance shrimp health and resistance to viral diseases. ViAqua's products are primarily aimed at the aquaculture sector, targeting the health management of species such as shrimp. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Haifa, Israel.

name: Wootag
cb_description: Wootag is a company that operates in the digital marketing industry, with a focus on interactive video technology. The company offers an interactive video platform that allows users to engage with brands and make purchases directly from within the video content. This platform is primarily used by businesses in the advertising and marketing sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore.

name: Form3
cb_description: Form3 specializes in providing a cloud-native, account-to-account payment platform for the financial sector. The company offers a fully managed payment technology platform that integrates with multiple payment schemes through a single API, designed to be scalable, adaptable, and resilient. Form3 primarily serves financial institutions, including large enterprise banks and digital challenger banks, offering services such as payment orchestration, fraud prevention, and regulatory compliance management. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Trade Hounds
cb_description: Trade Hounds is a digital platform focused on the construction industry. The company offers a mobile application that allows skilled tradespeople to showcase their work, connect with others in their field, compare their pay, and earn rewards. The platform primarily serves the construction industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Pronto
cb_description:
Contactless Ultrasonic Connections
Build instantaneous mobile connections into applications within minutes. Enable payment, social connection, access, photos and much more.
The Pronto SDK enables simple, secure cross platform mobile connections in any application. All you need is a few line of code and you are ready to go.

Fully Secure, Easy to Use 
Pronto is a fully secure connection solution with a one action user experience. Simply shake.
Any Device, Any Platform
Devices and platform are no barrier when you are using the Pronto SDK. Mobile or stationary your connectivity is enabled with us.
Pure Software, No Hardware
Connections with Pronto are available for any smartphone or device. We require no special hardware in order to enable the connection.

name: Glooko
cb_description: Glooko is a healthcare technology company focused on the management of diabetes and other chronic conditions. The company offers a centralized platform that integrates patient data from various devices, providing insights and support to both individuals with diabetes and healthcare providers. Glooko was formerly known as OTA Health. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: ImmunOs Therapeutics
cb_description: ImmunOs Therapeutics serves as a biotechnology company focused on the development of novel immunotherapies for the treatment of cancer and autoimmune diseases. The company's main offerings include a technology platform that generates biologic therapeutics by targeting specific human leukocyte antigen (HLA) molecules. ImmunOs Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on oncology and immunology. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Schlieren, Switzerland.

name: Kenbi
cb_description: Kenbi operates a tech-enabled outpatient care provider. It offers a range of professional home care services, including household help, companionship, basic care, medical treatments, palliative guidance, diabetes therapy, and advisory services. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Scalinx
cb_description: Scalinx specializes in the design and marketing of mixed-signal products, operating in the semiconductor industry. The company offers signal conversion ASIC and ASSP design services, as well as evaluation boards and software for system prototyping.
