Scalinx primarily serves the Defense and Aerospace, Test and Measurement equipment, and Communications markets. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: QuintoAndar
cb_description: QuintoAndar is a technology company focused on simplifying the process of renting and buying homes in the real estate sector. The company offers an online platform for property listings, digital rental agreements, and support for property purchases, all aimed at facilitating a better living experience for its users. QuintoAndar primarily serves individuals looking for residential properties and property owners seeking to advertise their real estate. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: ShapeShift
cb_description: ShapeShift is an instant exchange for Litecoin, Bitcoin, Peercoin, Dogecoin, Darkcoin, Namecoin, Feathercoin, Blackcoin and other cryptocoins.

name: Mento
cb_description: Mento is a service for sharing links with the people users care about.nIt was built so that users can ...      * Tell friends about great links and talk about themn      Send links and messages to friends and groups - it's only a click away.n    * Get feedback and stay in touchn      Which friends clicked their links What did they say What else did they liken    * Know which links their friends are recommendingn      Because links are filtered by their friends, not strangers.  Read more about the Why and What in Mento's inaugural blog post:nn    Hello Mento - Introducing a new way to share links with friends and the peeps who matter to users nnIn short: Today's tools for sending links could be a lot better. They could be smarter, more personal and more fun to use. Mento was started with to be such a tool, their friendly companion as users share their Web with the people around users.  I'm excited to share Mento with users now and to work together on making & friendliest tool it can be. Be sure to get invited, get in touch and share their feedback.n

name: Silverback Therapeutics
cb_description: Silverback Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company that operates in the healthcare and biotechnology sectors. The company focuses on developing systemically delivered, tissue-targeted therapeutics for the treatment of cancer, chronic viral infections, and other serious diseases, leveraging its proprietary ImmunoTAC technology platform. This platform enables the creation of targeted immuno-oncology agents that direct a myeloid cell activator to the tumor microenvironment in solid tumors to promote cancer cell killing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Arcade
cb_description: Arcade is a social-gaming startup focused on mobile gaming with friends.

name: Unite Us
cb_description: Unite Us specializes in social care coordination and technology solutions within the healthcare and community support sectors. The company offers a platform for closed-loop referrals, data insights, payment management, and care coordination services to streamline processes and support whole-person care. Unite Us primarily serves government entities, healthcare providers, health plans, and non-profit organizations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: MetaCX
cb_description: MetaCX is a company focused on developing collaborative software for multi-stakeholder initiatives within the technology sector. Its main offerings include a platform that facilitates the building of impact networks, enabling organizations to address complex global challenges through enhanced digital connectivity and collective problem-solving. The company primarily serves sectors that engage in large-scale strategic initiatives and require robust outcome measurement and management tools. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Enlitic
cb_description: Enlitic specializes in healthcare data solutions, focusing on the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) to improve clinical workflows and data management. The company offers products that standardize and anonymize medical imaging data, contributing to the creation of a real-world evidence database for healthcare providers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Fort Collins, Colorado.

name: Cobot
cb_description: Cobot develops, manufactures, and supplies industrial robots for a wide range of industries, including pharmaceuticals, food and beverage, logistics, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Wuhan, China.

name: Singular
cb_description: Singular specializes in marketing analytics and attribution within the marketing technology domain. The company's services include providing cross-platform analytics, cost aggregation, mobile attribution, fraud prevention, and marketing extract, transform, and load (ETL) to unify and analyze marketing data. Its solutions cater primarily to industries such as agencies, electronic commerce, finance, gaming, and various application markets. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Waspito
cb_description: Waspito is a healthcare platform that connects individuals in Africa with doctors and laboratories. The company offers services such as online doctor consultations, a network of laboratories, and mobile healthcare services that include medication delivery and in-home lab sample collection. Waspito primarily serves the healthcare industry by providing accessible and affordable quality healthcare services. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Douala, Cameroon.

name: Sportiqo
cb_description: Sportiqo is a fantasy cricket platform that combines elements of sports trading and stock market dynamics within the cricket domain. The platform allows users to buy, sell, and trade stocks that represent cricket players' performances, with the aim of earning profits based on those performances. Sportiqo primarily caters to the sports and entertainment sector, offering a unique way for fans to engage with cricket and utilize their knowledge to potentially win prizes. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Kolkata, India.

name: Lively
cb_description: Lively specializes in health savings and flexible benefits solutions for individuals and businesses across various sectors. The company offers a suite of products including Health Savings Accounts (HSA), Flexible Spending Accounts (FSA), Health Reimbursement Arrangements (HRA), and other employer-funded healthcare benefits designed to manage and save on healthcare costs. Lively's technology platform and mobile app provide a streamlined experience for benefits administration, aiming to simplify the process for employers and employees alike. Lively was formerly known as HealtheeSavings. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: xCures
cb_description: xCures is a company specializing in healthcare data management, focusing on providing a platform for healthcare data access and integration. The company offers an artificial intelligence-assisted platform that can automatically retrieve, normalize, and structure medical records from various healthcare sources, providing clinically actionable insights and supporting decision-making for research and treatment. xCures primarily serves the healthcare and clinical research sectors with its comprehensive data solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Synack
cb_description: Synack is a company that specializes in security testing within the cybersecurity industry. Its main offerings include Penetration Testing as a Service (PTaaS), which combines automated tools with human-led security testing for continuous risk reduction, and vulnerability management that identifies, assesses, and remediates security weaknesses. Synack's platform also provides on-demand security testing and is recognized for operating in a FedRAMP Moderate environment. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Worky
cb_description: Worky focuses on providing human resources and payroll solutions for businesses. Its main offerings include a platform for managing employee data, processing payroll, tracking time and attendance, and facilitating various HR processes. Worky primarily serves sectors with HR incidents such as manufacturing, logistics, retail, food and beverage, financial services, and others. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Ciudad de Mxico, Mexico.

name: Passport
cb_description: Passport specializes in facilitating financial innovation through its open banking platform within the fintech sector. The company offers a suite of APIs that enable the integration and creation of modern financial products, as well as documented REST APIs for an enhanced developer experience. Passport primarily serves financial institutions and fintech companies looking to launch or expand their financial services offerings. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Mitte
cb_description: Mitte engages in purification and mineralization technology within the home appliance sector. The company offers a water system that purifies, mineralizes, and carbonates tap water, providing users with an alternative to bottled water. Mitte primarily serves the home and office segments with its water subscription service. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany. In March 2024, Mitte filed for bankruptcy.

name: Bedrock
cb_description: Bedrock specializes in autonomous marine surveys and data management within the marine survey industry. The company offers services such as hydrographic, geophysical, and response surveys, and is developing capabilities for sub-bottom profiling. It primarily serves the marine service industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Clumio
cb_description: Clumio specializes in autonomous backup and recovery solutions for critical cloud data within the cloud computing industry. The company offers services that enable secure data protection, rapid recovery from ransomware and operational disruptions, and compliance management for various regulatory frameworks. Clumio primarily serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare, SaaS, education, and more. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Santa Clara, California. In September 2024, Clumio was acquired by Commvault.

name: CodaMetrix
cb_description: CodaMetrix focuses on autonomous medical coding in the healthcare industry. The company offers a multi-specialty coding platform that uses artificial intelligence (AI) to translate clinical information into accurate sets of medical codes for patient care and revenue cycle processes. This platform is primarily used by healthcare providers and health systems. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Quandela
cb_description: Quandela focuses on photonic quantum computing in the technology sector. The company offers quantum computing solutions that are modular, scalable, energy-efficient, and accessible both on the cloud and on-premise, providing both software and hardware solutions for a variety of quantum applications. It primarily serves sectors such as cybersecurity, logistics, automotive and aerospace, pharmaceuticals, chemistry, energy, and finance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Massy, France.

name: PixieBrix
cb_description: PixieBrix specializes in enhancing web applications through automation and artificial intelligence within various business sectors. The company offers a low-code platform that allows users to create custom browser modifications to streamline workflows and improve productivity. PixieBrix primarily serves sectors such as logistics, healthcare, contact centers, and financial services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Kredit
cb_description: Kredit focuses on providing financial services within the SME finance sector. The company offers a range of financial solutions designed to support small and medium enterprises. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: GoBolt
cb_description: GoBolt is a tech-logistics company that operates in the supply chain and logistics industry. The company provides express supply chain services, including line haul and short haul trucking, planning and order management, trip management, tracking, and warehouse management. It primarily serves the e-commerce, FMCG, FMCD, and liquor industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Cockroach Labs
cb_description: Cockroach Labs focuses on the development of distributed structured query language (SQL) databases. It provides CockroachDB, offering features such as elastic scaling, cloud-native compatibility, built-in survivability, and consistent SQL, primarily serving industries such as finance, gaming, manufacturing and logistics, media and streaming, retail and e-commerce. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Case Status
cb_description: Case Status focuses on providing client service software solutions. The company offers a platform that includes a mobile client portal, automation features, built-in text messaging, and a client happiness tracker, all designed to streamline communication between law firms and their clients. It serves law firms and legal service providers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in North Charleston, South Carolina.

name: Capitalize
cb_description: Capitalize specializes in simplifying the process of rolling over 401(k) retirement accounts into individual retirement accounts (IRAs) within the financial services industry. The company offers a free service that assists individuals in finding their old 401(k)s, comparing IRA providers, and managing the rollover process with the support of proprietary technology and expert guidance. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: StreamElements
cb_description: StreamElements operates as a streaming platform. It helps live content creators manage and monetize streams. It offers a range of tools and services for livestream and video production, monetization, audience engagement, influencer marketing, and brand sponsorships. It primarily serves digital content creators across various platforms. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Hibob
cb_description: Hibob is a company that specializes in human resources technology, offering a comprehensive HR platform designed to streamline various HR processes for businesses. Their main services include core HR functions, onboarding, time and attendance management, compensation, payroll integration, hiring, time off management, surveys, performance management, people analytics, and workforce planning. These tools are aimed at improving productivity, engagement, and retention within organizations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ampaire
cb_description: Ampaire focuses on the electrification of air travel within the aerospace industry. The company develops hybrid-electric aircraft systems designed to reduce emissions, noise, and operational costs. Its technology is aimed at making air travel more frequent with a strong emphasis on environmental and economic benefits. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Hawthorne, California.

name: Victory Farms
cb_description: Victory Farms is a rapidly expanding tilapia farm and a white protein platform in the aquaculture industry. The company specializes in cultivating, processing, and distributing fresh Kenyan tilapia through an efficient cold chain system to the mass market. Victory Farms primarily serves market women and end consumers in Kenya, providing a sustainable source of protein and supporting local micro businesses. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: UrbanSitter
cb_description: UrbanSitter provides care solutions for childcare and household services. The company offers a range of services including childcare, pet sitting, senior care, housekeeping, and tutoring. It primarily caters to families, caregivers, and employers, providing a platform for finding and booking trusted care services. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: MoneyFarm
cb_description: MoneyFarm is a digital wealth manager focused on providing investment solutions and financial guidance. The company offers a range of products including tax-free investment accounts, managed portfolios, and retirement planning services, all designed to help individuals achieve their financial goals. MoneyFarm's investment strategies cater to both active and passive management styles, with options for global diversification and ESG investing. It was founded in 2011 and is based in London, England.

name: Pairwise
cb_description: Pairwise focuses on the application of CRISPR technology in the food and agriculture sectors. It offers gene-editing services to create varieties of crops with benefits for growers, consumers, and the environment, as well as licensing proprietary CRISPR tools for research and commercial product development. Its products are aimed at improving nutrition and sustainability in the agriculture industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Snappt
cb_description: Snappt is a company focused on fraud detection within the property management industry. It offers AI-enabled tenant screening software that analyzes financial documents to identify fraudulent activity. Snappt's technology is designed to improve the efficiency of leasing decisions and is trusted by leading property management companies for its high accuracy in detecting document tampering. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ojai, California.

name: Dover
cb_description: Dover is a diversified global manufacturer that delivers equipment and components, consumable supplies, aftermarket parts, software and digital solutions, and support services. Its segments include engineered products, clean energy and fueling, imaging and identification, and climate and sustainability technologies. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Downers Grove, Illinois.

name: Salto
cb_description: Salto specializes in DevOps for business applications configuration within the enterprise systems management sector. The company offers solutions for automating the change management process, enabling efficient and streamlined workflows for system operations teams. Salto's services include metadata customization, change migration automation, and environment alignment, as well as version control integration and CI/CD pipeline development for system configurations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Change Foods
cb_description: Change Foods specializes in the creation of dairy products within the food technology sector. Its main offerings include dairy alternatives such as cheese, yogurt, and ice cream, produced through precision fermentation of microbes, which replicate real dairy proteins without the use of animals. These products are designed to taste and function like traditional dairy. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: ZEDEDA
cb_description: ZEDEDA specializes in computing orchestration and management within the cloud computing industry. The company offers a cloud-native software-as-service (SaaS)-based solution that simplifies the security and remote management of distributed edge infrastructure and applications. ZEDEDA's platform is built on an open-source operating system and supports a wide partner ecosystem with an extensive application marketplace. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: OPER
cb_description: OPER is a company that focuses on providing a fully custom enterprise platform, operating primarily in the food and beverage, retail, and commercial business sectors. The company offers a suite of solutions that include mobile ordering, direct communication with customers, mobile payments, and rewards customization. Additionally, OPER's services are utilized by businesses in the food and beverage industry, the retail industry, and the commercial business sector. It is based in St. Louis, Missouri.

name: Aerospike
cb_description: Aerospike specializes in data management solutions within the NoSQL database sector. The company offers a distributed NoSQL database designed for high-speed reads and writes, capable of scaling from gigabytes to petabytes without performance trade-offs. Aerospike's database supports applications requiring consistent, sub-millisecond latency at a massive scale. Aerospike was formerly known as Citrusleaf. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Spectalix
cb_description: Spectalix is a technology company specializing in user-generated content (UGC) video platforms for content-heavy industries. Their main offering is a white-label video platform that enables users to create personalized videos by inserting themselves into branded content in real-time. Spectalix primarily serves sectors such as broadcasting, sports, music, e-learning, and consumer brands. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Yokneam, Israel.

name: deskbird
cb_description: deskbird specializes in workplace management solutions for hybrid office environments. Its main offerings include a desk booking system, room reservation tools, and comprehensive workplace management software designed to streamline office operations and enhance employee engagement. The company's products are tailored to meet the needs of businesses looking to optimize their office space, improve scheduling efficiency, and ensure data privacy compliance. It was founded in 2020 and is based in St. Gallen, Switzerland.

name: Imagindairy
cb_description: Imagindairy operates as a food technology company. It focuses on the development of animal-free dairy products. The company uses a combination of deep technology and system biology to create dairy proteins through the process of fermentation, resulting in products to mimic the taste and nutritional value of traditional dairy, but are lactose-free, growth hormone-free, and cholesterol-free. Imagindairy primarily serves the food industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tirat Carmel, Israel.

name: Afriex
cb_description: Afriex focuses on financial services, specifically in money transfer. It provides a platform for sending and receiving money quickly and securely, without the need for traditional banking methods. Its primary customers are individuals who need to transfer money to and from various countries, particularly in Africa. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Richmond, Texas.

name: Ridepanda
cb_description: Ridepanda focuses on promoting micro-mobility through employer-sponsored subscriptions in the transportation sector. It offers a selection of pedal bikes, e-bikes, and e-scooters as part of a benefits package for organizations, aiming to reduce carbon emissions and improve urban living. Ridepanda's services include theft insurance, maintenance, and accessories, as well as marketing support and data insights for organizations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Haul
cb_description: Haul specializes in modern compliance, maintenance, and safety solutions for fleet management within the transportation sector. The company offers a suite of services that utilize AI to monitor regulatory compliance, maintain vehicles, and ensure safety across drivers, vehicles, and equipment. Haul's products are designed to streamline operations through intelligent document management, automated alerts, and AI-powered recommendations for safety improvements. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cupertino, California.

name: Azos
cb_description: Azos is a company focused on providing life insurance solutions within the insurance industry. The company offers a range of products including life insurance coverage, protection against critical illnesses, total disability coverage due to accidents, and funeral assistance services. Azos caters to individuals seeking straightforward and accessible insurance options. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: HealthJoy
cb_description: HealthJoy is a company that focuses on simplifying the healthcare experience, operating within the healthcare and technology sectors. The company offers a digital platform that connects employees with various benefits and virtual care services, including musculoskeletal treatment, urgent care, mental health support, and chronic disease management. HealthJoy primarily serves the human resources and employer sectors, as well as third-party administrators and broker consultants. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: HiddenLayer
cb_description: HiddenLayer specializes in providing security for artificial intelligence, operating within the cybersecurity and AI industries. The company offers a security platform that helps enterprises protect their machine learning models from adversarial attacks, without adding complexity or requiring access to sensitive data. HiddenLayer's solutions are designed to safeguard proprietary AI models, prevent data exposure, and ensure the integrity of model performance. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Leander, Texas.

name: Farcast
cb_description: Farcast specializes in aerospace and automotive safety technologies, focusing on advanced drone and dash camera system solutions. The company offers precision UAV delivery hardware for cargo and state-of-the-art dash camera systems to enhance road safety. Farcast's technology serves the logistics and cargo industry by enabling efficient deliveries and improving safety in both aerial and ground transportation. Farcast was formerly known as DASH Systems. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Hawthorne, California.

name: KETS Quantum
cb_description: KETS Quantum specializes in quantum-safe communications within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers hardware solutions that facilitate secure key transmission over communication networks to protect data. KETS Quantum's systems leverage integrated photonic technologies for benefits in miniaturization and cost-effective manufacturing without compromising on complexity. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bristol, United Kingdom.

name: Gamalon
cb_description: Gamalon specializes in artificial intelligence solutions for the ecommerce sector, enhancing Shopify store performance. The company offers AI-driven personalization tools that increase customer engagement by providing individualized product recommendations and content. Gamalon's technology is designed to understand shopper behavior and preferences, facilitating a more tailored and interactive shopping experience. Gamalon was formerly known as Gamelan Labs. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Zeeve
cb_description: Zeeve is an enterprise-grade Blockchain Infrastructure Automation Platform that specializes in providing Rollups-as-a-Service (RaaS) and dedicated node infrastructure for the web3 domain. The company offers secure and scalable infrastructure solutions with 24x7 monitoring, Enterprise SLA, and 99.9% uptime, catering to the needs of dApp developers, established enterprises, and emerging Web3 startups. Zeeve's platform supports a wide range of blockchain protocols and frameworks, including major L0, L1, L2 protocols, permissive blockchains like Hyperledger Fabric, and app-chain solutions such as Cosmos SDK. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: InvestCloud
cb_description: InvestCloud focuses on transforming the financial industry's approach to digital, operating within the financial technology sector. The company offers a no-code software platform for digital and commerce enablement, providing cloud-native, multi-tenanted solutions that help banks, wealth managers, and asset managers overcome technology debt and meet the needs of their clients. The company primarily serves the financial industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Kahun
cb_description: Kahun is a company that focuses on the application of artificial intelligence in the healthcare sector. Its main service involves the use of a clinical reasoning AI engine that navigates within a vast network of evidence-based medical insights to perform high-standard clinical assessments. This technology is primarily used by healthcare organizations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: SouSmile
cb_description: SouSmile is a dental beauty startup specializing in orthodontic care with a focus on invisible aligners. The company offers personalized treatment plans with invisible aligners and whitening gels through its retail locations, facilitated by a team of professional dentists. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Brightwheel
cb_description: Brightwheel is a comprehensive platform specializing in childcare management software for the early education sector. The company offers solutions for streamlining administrative tasks, facilitating billing and payments, enhancing communication between educators and families, and supporting child development with digital tools. Brightwheel's software serves as an all-in-one system that caters to preschools, childcare centers, and educational administrators. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FlutterFlow
cb_description: FlutterFlow serves as an online application development platform operating in the tech industry. It offers a platform that allows users to build mobile and web applications with features such as visual building, Firebase integration, API support, and direct deployment to app stores. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Electives
cb_description: Electives is an enterprise live learning platform operating in the education technology sector. The company offers a platform that streamlines planning, curation, administration, and measurement of learning programs, enabling businesses to deliver high-quality learning experiences with less effort. Electives primarily serves the human resources and people operations sectors, providing solutions for employee education and training. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Charlestown, Massachusetts.

name: SafetyWing
cb_description: SafetyWing is a company focused on providing a global safety net for remote companies, remote workers, and nomads, operating in the insurance industry. The company offers health and insurance products designed to replace national welfare systems, providing travel medical insurance and comprehensive health insurance. Their primary market is the remote work industry. SafetyWing was formerly known as Safety Nest Inc.. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Gleamer
cb_description: Gleamer specializes in AI solutions for the radiology sector, focusing on enhancing medical imaging interpretation and diagnostics. The company's main offerings include AI-powered tools that assist in detecting fractures, lesions, and other urgent findings in X-ray images, as well as automating musculoskeletal measurements and bone age assessments. These solutions aim to improve patient care by increasing diagnostic accuracy and accelerating the workflow for health institutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Saint Mande, France.

name: Welltory
cb_description: Welltory serves as an AI copilot for peak wellbeing, operating in the health and wellness technology sector. The company offers an app that provides insights into heart rate variability, stress, energy, sleep, and overall health, aiming to improve users' wellbeing. Welltory's technology integrates with apps and devices to deliver health guidance and actionable insights. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Cents
cb_description: CentsApp is an online bill-pay and debt reduction platform that makes monthly payments using the roundups from members purchases to help erase compounding interest on user's debt, with the goal of saving the average member hundreds of dollars.

name: Explorium
cb_description: Explorium offers an external data cloud platform connecting multiple data sources. It provides solutions including lead scoring and qualification, market analysis and segmentation, revenue solutions, feature discovery and generation, and more. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Obligo
cb_description: Obligo is a financial technology company operating in the real estate sector. The company offers a deposit-free rental solution, providing electronic deposit refunds and certified move-in payments for renters, while also enabling landlords to customize their deposit-free programs. Primarily, Obligo's services are utilized by the real estate industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: MishiPay
cb_description: MishiPay specializes in mobile self-checkout technology for the retail sector. The company offers a suite of products that enable customers to scan items and pay using their smartphones, thereby reducing the need for traditional checkout processes. MishiPay's solutions cater to various retail segments including grocery, fashion, travel, and small to medium-sized businesses. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Dyad
cb_description: Dyad specializes in the industrial packaging of agri-food and cosmetic products in France.

name: Cooks Venture
cb_description: Cooks Venture produces regenerative food products to offer chicken and beef through farming systems and agriculture. The food products include grass-fed beef, pasture-raised heirloom chickens, grass-fed lamb, and wild-caught traceable seafood. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: FiVerity
cb_description: FiVerity provides financial institutions with cyber fraud defense solutions. It offers information sharing among financial institutions, data providers, and anti-fraud solutions through the anonymized exchange of fraud intelligence. The company accelerates the detection and prevention of both known and unknown fraud, delivering proactive alerts, transparent risk scoring, and automated fraud classification. It helps strengthen users defense by responding to fraudulent activity detected through the companys partnerships with banks, credit unions, regulators, and law enforcement agencies. FiVerity was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Strata Oncology
cb_description: Strata Oncology operates as a precision oncology company. The company offers services that integrate molecular profiling, decision support, and clinical trial participation into routine practice, providing care for cancer patients. Strata Oncology primarily serves healthcare providers, health systems, biopharma, and patients. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: Freyr Energy
cb_description: Freyr Energy provides solar energy solutions in the renewable energy sector. The company offers solar panels for residential and commercial use, aiming to make solar energy accessible and simple for everyone. These solar panels help customers harness solar energy and significantly reduce their electricity bills. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: Natrx
cb_description: Natrx specializes in solutions for coastal resilience and ecosystem restoration within the climate resilience infrastructure sector. The company offers proprietary technology to create solutions for erosion control, storm surge mitigation, and habitat restoration, avoiding the ecological damage associated with traditional methods. Natrx's products are designed to be habitat-specific, promoting ecological benefits and getting stronger over time. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Marqo
cb_description: Marqo specializes in storing and querying unstructured data such as text and images. The company offers services that enable fine-tuning of embedding models with interaction data to enhance search relevance and performance and provides a developer-friendly application programming interface (API) for easy integration. It primarily serves sectors that require advanced search capabilities, such as the ecommerce industry and tech companies with a focus on AI and machine learning. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ISA
cb_description: ISA specializes in management consulting, education and training, and systems engineering and integration within the intelligence and national security sectors. The company offers a range of services including strategic planning, change management, data management, dashboard support, assessments and studies, and programming and budget services. ISA primarily serves clients in the federal government, national defense, local government, and academia. It is based in Arlington, Virginia.

name: HUUE
cb_description: HUUE focuses on providing plant-based vaporizable cannabis products within the wellness and lifestyle sector. The company offers all-natural, compressed cannabis pucks designed for use with dry herb vaporizers, aiming to deliver targeted effects such as focus, recovery, fun, relaxation, and sleep. HUUE's products are tailored for consumers seeking a convenient and controlled cannabis experience. It is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

name: Hippocratic AI
cb_description: Hippocratic AI specializes in developing safety-focused generative artificial intelligence for the healthcare sector. The company offers a large language model that is designed to assist healthcare professionals by providing information and support without making diagnoses. Hippocratic AI's services are primarily utilized within the healthcare industry, healthcare access and responsible AI deployment. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Parafin
cb_description: Parafin specializes in providing embedded financing infrastructure for online platforms, focusing on the financial services sector. The company offers growth capital and merchant cash advance services to small and medium-sized businesses through partner platforms, enabling these businesses to invest and grow. Parafin's infrastructure allows platforms to offer financing under their own brand, fostering loyalty and revenue growth. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Check
cb_description: Check is a mobile payments and personal finance company. It allows users to track bank accounts, credit cards, investment and travel plans, monitor bills and manage money, from mobile devices and the web. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Propel
cb_description: Propel is a company focused on employee well-being through its customizable digital platforms within the corporate wellness industry. The company offers a comprehensive well-being program platform that includes a mobile-optimized portal, program tracking, incentive management, and engagement strategies to foster healthy living within organizations. Propel primarily serves various sectors including global banking, hospitality, utilities, and sports & entertainment industries. It was founded in 2002 and is based in Brentwood, Tennessee.

name: AppOmni
cb_description: AppOmni is a company focused on providing security solutions for Software as a Service (SaaS) applications within various business sectors. The company offers a platform that identifies data exposure, detects threats, and maps compliance requirements to prevent breaches in SaaS environments. AppOmni's services are primarily utilized by industries such as financial services, healthcare, technology, and legal sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Tropic
cb_description: Tropic specializes in spend management and procurement software within the SaaS industry. The company offers a unified platform that provides visibility and control over spending, contracts, and supplier relationships, as well as tools for automating procurement workflows and financial compliance. Tropic primarily serves sectors that require robust financial and procurement management, such as finance, procurement, and IT & security. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Auradine
cb_description: Auradine focuses on web infrastructure through blockchain technology, artificial intelligence, and security within the tech industry. The company offers solutions that include energy-efficient bitcoin miners, software, and silicon systems designed for scalability, sustainability, and security. Auradine primarily serves sectors that require advanced internet infrastructure, such as the blockchain and AI industries. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Avaamo
cb_description: Avaamo is a deep-learning software company that specializes in conversational interfaces, operating in the artificial intelligence industry. The company's main offerings include a conversational AI platform for enterprises, which uses machine learning and deep learning to provide services such as intelligent virtual assistants and contact center AI. These services are designed to automate and streamline complex enterprise workflows, transforming them into full-fledged conversations between users and enterprise systems. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Altos, California.

name: Banxware
cb_description: Banxware specializes in embedded lending technology and financial solutions within the fintech sector. The company offers fully digital business loans that are integrated into digital platforms, enabling sellers to access financing quickly and efficiently. Banxware's services cater to various sectors, including ecommerce, marketplaces, and payment service providers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: InEvent
cb_description: InEvent provides event management software that includes tools for event registration, attendee engagement, CRM integration, and analytics. The platform supports in-person, virtual, and hybrid events and is applicable across sectors such as pharmaceuticals, financial services, technology, and education. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Carbo Culture
cb_description: Carbo Culture is a project developer specializing in proprietary climate technology within the carbon removal and renewable energy sectors. The company's patented Carbolysis reactors convert waste biomass into stable biochar, effectively sequestering carbon for centuries and simultaneously generating renewable energy. Carbo Culture's biochar is utilized in agricultural and construction applications, contributing to the decarbonization of these industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Nicoya Lifesciences
cb_description: Nicoya Lifesciences is a biotechnology company that focuses on the development of innovative and accessible biosensor technology. The company offers benchtop Surface Plasmon Resonance (SPR) instruments that provide real-time data for the in-depth characterization of biomolecular interactions. These instruments are primarily used in the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industries to accelerate drug discovery and increase efficiency in product pipelines. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Kitchener, Ontario.

name: Cratejoy
cb_description: Cratejoy specializes in subscription box services. The company offers a platform for businesses to launch, grow, and scale their subscription box services, providing a wide range of products from beauty, food and drink, books, arts and crafts, and more. It primarily serves businesses in the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Abwaab
cb_description: Abwaab is an online learning platform that provides educational services in the e-learning sector. The company offers video lessons, assessments, and personalized learning journeys to help students improve their academic performance. Abwaab primarily serves the education technology sector, catering to students seeking to enhance their learning experience outside the traditional classroom. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Amman, Jordan.

name: MarketerHire
cb_description: MarketerHire is a company that focuses on providing marketing talent in the business services industry. The company offers a platform that matches businesses with pre-vetted, freelance marketers who have experience from global brands and startups. These marketers provide a range of services, including brand marketing, content marketing, email marketing, and social media marketing, among others. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: TestCard
cb_description: TestCard is a company focused on digital health diagnostics within the healthcare technology sector. It offers a platform that transforms a smart device into a clinical-grade scanner for accurate reading, recording, and reporting of non-invasive test results. TestCard's main offerings include at-home medical testing kits and software for integration with electronic patient records, aimed at making healthcare more accessible and reliable. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Scarborough, England.

name: Aledade
cb_description: Aledade is a public benefit corporation focused on supporting independent primary care practices through the development and management of Accountable Care Organizations (ACOs) within the healthcare sector. The company provides a scalable model that includes healthcare data analytics, user-friendly workflows, healthcare policy expertise, and strong payer relationships to help practices improve care quality and achieve financial success in value-based care arrangements. Aledade primarily serves private practices, group practices, community health centers, and networks of ACOs. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bethesda, Maryland.

name: SeLux Diagnostics
cb_description: SeLux Diagnostics specializes in precision diagnostics for infectious diseases within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that helps increase the speed and accuracy of Antimicrobial Susceptibility Testing (AST). SeLux Diagnostics primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a focus on hospitals and laboratories requiring rapid diagnostic tools for infectious disease management. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Opentrons
cb_description: Opentrons is a life science company focused on laboratory automation within the research and healthcare sectors. The company provides flexible, user-friendly liquid-handling robots and genome-scale cell engineering solutions to automate Research and development (R&D) operations. Opentrons primarily serves academic, biopharma, synthetic biology, and clinical research labs. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Utilidata
cb_description: Utilidata is an AI-powered technology company focused on accelerating the clean energy transition within the energy sector. The company offers a distributed artificial intelligence platform that enhances real-time visibility and operational efficiency at the edge of the electric grid. Utilidata's solutions primarily cater to utility companies seeking to optimize grid performance, integrate renewable energy sources, and improve resilience against power outages and extreme weather events. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Providence, Rhode Island.

name: PasarPolis
cb_description: PasarPolis is an Insurance Technology (Insurtech) company with a strong emphasis on microinsurance. The company offers affordable insurance services, aiming to simplify and expedite the process from policy purchase to claim retrieval. Primarily, PasarPolis caters to the insurance sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

name: Compass Datacenters
cb_description: Compass Datacenters specializes in the design and construction of customizable data centers for the hyperscale and cloud computing sectors. The company offers solutions that include the use of prefabricated components and sustainable practices to ensure rapid delivery and environmentally responsible operations. Compass Datacenters primarily serves the needs of hyperscale and cloud service providers. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: Opencomp
cb_description: OpenComp is a compensation management solutions provider in the human resources technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive platform for compensation intelligence, including market data, benchmarking, salary bands, merit cycles, and total rewards, designed to bring clarity to pay decisions for various stakeholders. OpenComp's software is tailored to support company leaders, people managers, and HR professionals in high-growth companies, startups, and public enterprises. Opencomp was formerly known as FastComp, LLC. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Alterome Therapeutics
cb_description: Alterome Therapeutics operates as a biotechnology company focused on oncology and the development of targeted therapies for cancer treatment. The company specializes in creating small molecule therapies designed to target validated oncogenic drivers, utilizing a structure-guided drug discovery approach. Alterome Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on providing treatment options for cancer patients with limited alternatives. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: IndyKite
cb_description: IndyKite is a company focused on providing digital identity solutions and data management services within the technology sector. Its main offerings include an identity knowledge graph for trust foundation in product and application creation, identity insights for dynamic context in decision-making, and knowledge-based access control for secure and compliant data sharing. IndyKite's solutions primarily cater to the retail, finance, and manufacturing industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FLAIM
cb_description: FLAIM specializes in immersive learning solutions for hazardous and emergency situations within the training and education sector. The company offers virtual reality training environments that simulate firefighting and emergency scenarios to enhance safety and preparedness. FLAIM's products are primarily utilized by the fire and rescue services and workplace safety training sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Waurn Ponds, Victoria.

name: Sternum
cb_description: Sternum is a company specializing in embedded security and observability for connected devices within the cybersecurity industry. They provide an end-to-end platform that offers built-in security, granular remote visibility, and valuable business insights for device manufacturers. Their services include runtime protection against known and zero-day threats, continuous monitoring for device and fleet-level insights, and threat detection with real-time awareness of malicious behaviors and security blindspots. Sternum was formerly known as DoMed Security. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: PassionFruit
cb_description: PassionFruit focuses on enabling content creators to launch their own branded mobile networks within the telecommunications sector. The company provides a platform for hosting, branding, billing, and customer support, allowing creators to connect with fans and monetize their brand through a mobile network service. It primarily serves individuals and entities within the creator economy, offering them a new channel for revenue and fan engagement. It was founded in 2024 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Meter
cb_description: Meter, also known as Lumafield, specializes in industrial X-ray CT scanning and AI-powered analysis for the engineering sector. The company offers products such as an industrial X-ray CT scanner for inspecting hidden features and detecting invisible flaws, and cloud-based software for collaborative analysis and decision-making in engineering. Their AI engine assists in solving complex engineering problems by analyzing scan data. It is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Confirm
cb_description: Confirm is a performance management platform that specializes in leveraging Organizational Network Analysis (ONA) within the human resources sector. The company offers solutions such as performance reviews, engagement surveys, OKRs and career goals tracking, talent management, and continuous feedback tools to improve employee performance and talent decisions. Confirm's services are primarily utilized by human resources departments to enhance performance management and talent retention strategies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Auvik Networks
cb_description: Auvik Networks is a company that specializes in network management in the information technology sector. The company offers services such as network mapping, inventory management, configuration backup, performance monitoring, and network traffic analysis. It also provides software as a service (SaaS) management and Wi-Fi management solutions. Auvik Networks primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, financial services, education, healthcare, and government. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Waterloo, Ontario.

name: Envoy America
cb_description: Envoy America specializes in providing personalized transportation services for older adults within the healthcare and mobility sector. The company offers a suite of services that include safe and compassionate transportation, companionship, and assistance for daily tasks, facilitated by professional companion drivers. Envoy America primarily serves the healthcare industry, partnering with facilities and care providers to enhance the quality of life for seniors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Phenix, Virginia.

name: Provenance
cb_description: Provenance specializes in digital tools for personalizing wedding ceremonies, vows, and toasts within the wedding industry. The company offers a suite of online tools that assist couples, officiants, and guests in creating meaningful and customized wedding ceremonies, vows, and speeches. Its tools include interactive builders and professional coaching services to ensure that every word spoken at the wedding is heartfelt and tailored to the individual's preferences. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Varjo
cb_description: Varjo specializes in the development of virtual and mixed reality headsets tailored for professional use across various industries. The company's products are designed to deliver experiences with photorealistic visual fidelity, suitable for training, design, and research applications. Varjo's headsets, including the XR-4 series, offer features such as gaze-driven autofocus and are available in secure editions for classified environments. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Tendo
cb_description: Tendo is a company that specializes in the development of robotic medical aids for individuals with gripping limitations. Their main product, Tendo OneGrip, is a device that assists users in gripping, holding, and releasing objects using an artificial tendon system, designed specifically for those with spinal cord injuries to help them regain independence in daily activities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lund, Sweden.

name: Aclima
cb_description: Aclima is a technology company specializing in environmental intelligence through advanced air quality measurement and analysis. The company offers a suite of products including a professional analytics software, Aclima Pro, and a free app, air.health. Aclima primarily serves governments, companies, and communities seeking to reduce emissions, improve public health, and achieve cleaner air. It was founded in 2007 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cloaked
cb_description: Cloaked focuses on online privacy protection and personal information security within the cybersecurity industry. It offers identity theft insurance, data removal from data brokers, and the generation of virtual identities to safeguard personal contact information. It primarily serves individuals with personal data security and privacy. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Plotlogic
cb_description: Plotlogic is a global technology company. It allows the mine operator to understand the location and material properties of every rock in their mine. It helps mining companies in ore recovery, reduces dilution, and enhances environmental and social governance performance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Red Hill, Australia.

name: PlayVS
cb_description: PlayVS focuses on amateur electronic sports, operating within the gaming and sports industries. The company provides a platform for high school electronic sports, offering organized amateur competitions for gamers, and providing resources for coaches and players. It primarily serves the education sector, specifically high schools. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Afficiency
cb_description: Afficiency is a company focused on reinventing the life insurance buying process through digital innovation within the insurance industry. The company offers a suite of life insurance products that are designed to be easily understood and purchased, leveraging a fully digital platform that streamlines the entire customer journey from quotation to policy administration. Afficiency primarily serves the life insurance industry, including carriers, distributors, and technology platforms, by providing digital solutions that facilitate the sale and management of life insurance products. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bunch
cb_description: Bunch specializes in the breeding and care of miniature pigs, operating within the pet industry. The company offers a range of services including adoption, nutrition guidance, health maintenance, and training for teacup pigs. Bunch primarily sells to individuals seeking pet pigs and to sanctuaries or shelters. It is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Komodor
cb_description: Komodor operates as a Kubernetes (K8) native troubleshooting platform. It tracks all changes across an entire K8s stack, analyzes their ripple effect, and provides users with the actionable context they need to troubleshoot. It offers Kubernetes troubleshooting, cost optimization, operations, and, access control and security. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Rockville, Maryland.

name: Outbound AI
cb_description: Outbound AI operates as a technology company focused on phone-based administrative work in the healthcare sector. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI)-powered virtual agents that automate administrative tasks, such as billing and claims processes, thereby enhancing productivity and improving the job experience for human staff. It primarily serves healthcare organizations, including physician practices and healthcare enterprises. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Zora
cb_description: Zora helps landlords land and keep great tenants by removing uncertainty about who to rent to and when they will get paid.

name: youVerify
cb_description: youVerify focuses on consumer protection in the online shopping sector, providing a service to identify counterfeit goods. The company offers an online service that helps users spot fake products before making a purchase, working across various marketplaces and product categories. It primarily serves the online retail industry, assisting consumers in avoiding scams. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Neptune
cb_description: Neptune specializes in providing flood insurance using advanced mapping technologies and analytics within the insurance industry. The company offers quick and intuitive online flood insurance policies, leveraging sophisticated algorithms to assess risk and streamline the insurance process. Neptune primarily serves residential property owners seeking flood insurance coverage. It was founded in 2016 and is based in St. Petersburg, Florida.

name: Engine
cb_description: Engine specializes in corporate lodging solutions within the business travel industry. It offers a platform for booking and managing business lodging, providing access to exclusive hotel rates and a suite of tools to streamline travel management. Hotel Engine primarily serves sectors such as travel management companies, operations management, finance management, and individual business travelers. It was formerly known as Hotel Engine and changed its name to Engine in September 2024. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: AOA
cb_description: AOA is a full-service e-commerce agency specializing in brand growth and engineering within the digital retail sector. The company offers a suite of services including brand design, web and mobile development, and growth strategy to enhance online presence and sales. AOA primarily caters to aggressive-growth startups, Digitally Native Vertical Brands, and large enterprises seeking to optimize their e-commerce platforms. It is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Anvil
cb_description: Anvil is a web app development platform that enables users to build applications using Python. The platform offers a drag-and-drop interface for UI design and allows for instant deployment of web apps, with no web development experience required. Anvil primarily serves sectors that require rapid development of internal tools, data analysis applications, mobile web apps, e-commerce solutions, and Tableau dashboard extensions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Cambridge, England.

name: AiDash
cb_description: AiDash is an artificial intelligence (AI) first vertical software-as-a-service (SaaS) company that offers systems using satellite data and artificial intelligence to help manage vegetation, sustainability, climate risk, and infrastructure integrity. AiDash primarily serves the electric utilities, gas utilities, water and wastewater, energy, mining, and transportation sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Forter
cb_description: Forter focuses on fraud prevention and protection in the digital commerce industry. The company offers services such as fraud management, payment optimization, chargeback recovery, identity protection, and abuse prevention, all aimed at increasing revenue, reducing losses, and enhancing the customer experience. It primarily serves the digital commerce industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: OpenNode
cb_description: OpenNode is a Bitcoin payment processor operating in the financial technology sector. The company provides services for accepting and sending Bitcoin payments, including features such as currency conversion, settlement and transfer, and security and protection. It primarily serves businesses across various sectors, enabling them to integrate Bitcoin transactions into their operations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Inito
cb_description: Inito is a company focused on healthcare and wellness, operating in the health tech industry. The company's main product is a fertility monitor that allows users to track their fertility hormones at home, providing a comprehensive picture of their fertility cycles. This product is primarily targeted towards couples trying to conceive. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Banza
cb_description:
Banza specializes in digital transformation and business process automation within the banking and retail sectors. The company offers customer relationship management 
(CRM) and business process management (BPM) solutions to streamline sales, marketing, and customer service processes. Banza primarily serves the banking and retail industries with comprehensive solutions for credit management, sales, customer service, and omnichannel customer interactions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Uzhhorod, Ukraine.

name: Rage Coffee
cb_description: Rage Coffee is a craft coffee brand that specializes in the production and distribution of instant coffee products enhanced with natural brain vitamins and cognitive enhancers. Its offerings include a range of coffee products that are designed for convenience, such as ready-to-mix shots, and are made with plant-based ingredients. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Ornikar
cb_description: Ornikar offers an educational platform for conducting driving tests. The driving lessons are taught by qualified instructors freely chosen by each student based on evaluations of other students. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Snappy
cb_description: Snappy offers a comprehensive platform that allows restaurants to manage and track orders, integrate with delivery apps, manage reservations and waitlists, control their online storefront, and run loyalty programs. The company serves the restaurant industry. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Markham, Ontario.

name: Squeeze
cb_description: Squeeze Animation Studios is an animation company. It provides 3D character animation for feature films, video game cinematics, TV series, and theme parks. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Quebec City, Canada.

name: Functionize
cb_description: Functionize is a company that focuses on providing an intelligent testing platform in the software industry. The company's main services include offering a cloud-based platform that uses artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies to automate the software testing process, enabling end-to-end tests, visual testing, API testing, and functional testing. The company primarily sells to the software development and quality assurance sectors of the economy. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: OATSIDE
cb_description: OATSIDE specializes in the production of oat-based beverages and frozen desserts within the food and beverage industry. The company offers a variety of oat milk flavors and ice cream, catering to those seeking plant-based alternatives to dairy products. OATSIDE's products are designed to appeal to both plant milk enthusiasts and those typically not fond of plant-based milks by focusing on taste and sustainability. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: Slope Software
cb_description: Slope Software is a company that focuses on actuarial financial projection modeling in the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform that allows users to develop complex financial models, manage and track input data, and generate instant reports for analysis. The primary customers of Slope Software are in the financial services industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Ambri
cb_description: Ambri specializes in energy storage solutions, focusing on the development of long-duration battery technology for the renewable energy sector. The company offers a sustainable energy storage solution that enables increased use of renewable resources and reduces reliance on traditional power plants, with a product that is designed for daily cycling. Ambri was formerly known as Liquid Metal Battery. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Marlborough, Massachusetts.

name: Mecho
cb_description: Mecho specializes in solar shading solutions within the commercial building sector. The company offers a range of products including manual and motorized shades, automated shade systems, and various shadecloths designed for energy efficiency and aesthetic appeal. Mecho primarily serves the architectural and design communities, providing tailored solutions for unique and challenging window configurations. It was founded in 1969 and is based in Long Island City, New York.

name: Plobal Apps
cb_description: Plobal Apps develops mobile applications for direct-to-customer (D2C) brands. The applications offer omnichannel solutions, artificial intelligence (AI)-based product recommendations, personalized push notifications, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pune, India.

name: Hubilo
cb_description: Hubilo focuses on providing webinar solutions and event marketing tools within the technology sector. Its main offerings include a platform for hosting webinars that facilitates audience engagement, content repurposing, and marketing attribution analytics to prove the impact of events. Hubilo primarily serves demand generation marketers, content marketers, event marketers, field marketers, marketing operations professionals, and chief marketing officers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FirstVet
cb_description: FirstVet is a digital veterinary clinic operating in the pet care industry. The company offers on-demand access to advice from licensed veterinarians through video meetings, providing a convenient and accessible way for pet owners to receive professional guidance. It serves the pet care sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Menlo Microsystems
cb_description: Menlo Microsystems is a company focused on the design and fabrication of high-power RF MEMs switches, operating in the electronics industry. The company's main offerings include electronic switches that are smaller, faster, and more powerful, combining the benefits of electromechanical and solid-state switches. These products primarily cater to industries such as medical, aerospace and defense, telecommunications, consumer electronics, industrial IoT, and test and measurement. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: LaunchNotes
cb_description: LaunchNotes is a company focused on product communication for modern enterprises within the software industry. The company offers a platform that facilitates the coordination of product roadmaps, communication of product updates, and collection of customer feedback to enhance alignment with go-to-market teams. LaunchNotes primarily serves sectors such as product management, product operations, product marketing, and customer success. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ClearFlame
cb_description: ClearFlame focuses on reducing emissions in the engine sector by retrofitting diesel engines to run on cleaner fuels. Its main service involves transforming existing diesel engines to operate on renewable, plant-based fuels, such as ethanol, which significantly reduces carbon dioxide emissions and soot. This technology allows for an approach to power generation, agriculture, and other industries reliant on heavy-duty engines without the need for new infrastructure or a green premium. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Geneva, Illinois.

name: Evident
cb_description: Evident focuses on certifying renewable energy and clean assets, operating within the clean economy sector. The company offers services such as certification of activities like renewable electricity production and low-methane natural gas and provides registries that ensure every transaction and consumer claim is traceable to the activity associated with a certificate's creation. Evident primarily serves the renewable energy industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Sheffield, United Kingdom.

name: Two Boxes
cb_description: Two Boxes specializes in returns processing solutions for the e-commerce industry. The company offers software and services that streamline the returns process, provide analytics on return performance, and integrate with third-party logistics providers to manage and inventory restocking. Two Boxes primarily serves the e-commerce and logistics sectors, offering tools to digitize standard operating procedures, train warehouse staff, and capture critical data. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Outpace Bio
cb_description: Outpace Bio focuses on revolutionizing cell therapy for cancer treatment through protein design and cellular engineering. The company develops technologies that program cells to make the right decisions inside patients, aiming to improve the efficacy and safety of cell therapies for solid tumors. Outpace Bio's suite of technologies includes optimizing CAR T cell function, designing cytokines to stimulate immune responses, enhancing cell therapy persistence, and incorporating safety features and specificity in targeting cancer cells. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Relivion
cb_description: Relivion develops digital therapeutics neuromodulation technology, operating within the healthcare and technology sectors. The company's main offerings include electronic head-mounted devices designed to target neural pathways in the head, providing an alternative or complementary treatment to pharmaceutical therapies for neurological and neuropsychiatric disorders such as migraine and depression. Relivion was formerly known as Neurolief. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Netanya, Israel.

name: Wealthsimple
cb_description: Wealthsimple operates in the investment management industry. The company offers a range of services including managed investing, investing, and high-interest savings accounts. These services are designed to help individuals build long-term wealth by maximizing returns and minimizing risk. Wealthsimple was formerly known as Canadian Shareowner Investments. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Cabana
cb_description:
Cabana, developed by Department of Behavior & Logic, is a tool that allows users to quickly build an iPhone app. With Cabana's visual interface, designers can assemble a full-featured HTML5 web application for the iPhone.

In October 2012, Twitter acquired the team behind Cabana. The company will shut down effective December 2012.

name: Knot
cb_description: Knot specializes in providing infrastructure for micromobility services, focusing on the design, production, and installation of docking stations. The company offers a range of products including charging stations, scooters, bikes, and a software suite comprising an app and dashboard for the operation of bike and scooter services. Knot primarily serves the micromobility sector, offering solutions to cities, companies, and operators looking to implement sustainable and efficient transportation systems. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Strasbourg, France.

name: SLUSHY
cb_description: SLUSHY is a tech-driven platform focused on providing content creators with tools to find, grow, and monetize their audiences within the digital content industry. The company offers a secure mobile web-based solution with features for discoverability, audience insights, and a legal framework for content moderation and compliance. SLUSHY serves professional content creators looking for alternatives to platforms like OnlyFans and Patreon, monetization, support, and management. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Lumen Bioscience
cb_description: Lumen Bioscience focuses on the development of biologic drugs within the pharmaceutical industry. The company's patented technology enables the rapid development of these drugs. Lumen Bioscience primarily serves sectors that have been neglected by traditional drug-making tools, such as infectious diseases, gastrointestinal disorders, and metabolic diseases. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Radar
cb_description:
Radar develops an HR and Payroll solution for small businesses. It is based in South Africa.

On May 9th, 2022, Radar was acquired by SnapScan. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Fresco
cb_description: Fresco provides a counter-top appliance, EVA, to produce fresh olive oil using REVOILUTION frozen olives pulps, Le Polpe.

name: intelis
cb_description: Intelis is an AI-powered pricing optimization software company focused on the eCommerce sector. The company offers a platform that provides real-time pricing adjustments and market insights to help online stores maximize profitability and maintain a competitive edge. Intelis primarily serves retailers, brands, and distributors looking to enhance their pricing strategies and market positioning. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Growbots
cb_description: Growbots is an outbound sales software company that focuses on automating lead generation and sales prospecting processes for small and medium businesses. The company offers a platform that enables users to find leads, automate cold email outreach, and improve email deliverability, as well as integrate with other tools for a workflow. Growbots primarily serves sectors such as sales teams, marketing teams, and HR teams within various industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

name: BryteFlow
cb_description: BryteFlow specializes in data integration and enterprise data liberation, operating within the cloud computing and data analytics sectors. The company offers solutions for data replication, change data capture, and automated data reconciliation, enabling businesses to manage and analyze large volumes of data. BryteFlow's products are designed to support the creation and maintenance of cloud data lakes and analytics environments without the need for coding. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chatswood, Australia. In October 2024, BryteFlow was acquired by SingleStore.

name: GoSite
cb_description: GoSite provides software solutions for small businesses in the service sector. The company offers a suite of mobile and web tools for businesses to manage customer interactions, bookings, payments, and invoices, as well as to build an online presence and manage online listings. It primarily serves the home and professional services industries, including, electricians, plumbers, and landscapers. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: EdfaPay
cb_description: EdfaPay is a financial technology company specializing in payment processing solutions for online and offline merchants. The company offers a range of services including a software-based point-of-sale system, an online payment gateway, and electronic invoicing capabilities. These services are designed to facilitate efficient and secure financial transactions for businesses of various sizes. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Jago
cb_description: Jago operates in the beverage industry, offering brewed coffee and tea through electric coffee carts. The company's main offerings include a variety of coffee and tea beverages made from directly traded Arabica beans and crafted with roasting recipes. Jago caters to individual customers and events, with an emphasis on quality and accessibility through an app-based ordering system. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Clustermarket
cb_description: Clustermarket is a company that focuses on laboratory management in the research and development sector.
