It offers an easy-to-use software solution that helps laboratories optimize their operations by coordinating equipment usage, planning maintenance activities, and generating reports and forecasts for resource planning. The company primarily serves the research and development industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Casavo
cb_description: Casavo is a company that focuses on providing smart solutions for selling and buying homes in the real estate sector. The company offers services such as instant home valuation based on market data, a digital platform for managing real estate transactions, and additional services like professional photography and virtual tours to enhance property listings. Casavo primarily serves individuals looking to sell or buy homes, leveraging technology to streamline the real estate process. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Silc Technologies
cb_description: Developer of circuit design software incorporating logic synthesis for ultra large-scale integrated circuits; behavioral level inputs.

name: MPOWER Financing
cb_description: MPOWER Financing specializes in educational financial services, focusing on providing international student loans and scholarships. The company offers fixed-rate loans for international and DACA students without requiring a cosigner or collateral, along with scholarship opportunities and career support services. MPOWER Financing primarily serves students attending eligible U.S. or Canadian colleges and universities. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Sonect
cb_description: Sonect is a financial technology company specializing in cash distribution and management solutions. The company offers a platform that transforms local shops into virtual ATMs, allowing users to withdraw cash using their smartphones. Sonect primarily serves the financial sector and retail businesses by optimizing ATM operations and facilitating in-store cash management. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Odyssey Interactive
cb_description: Odyssey Interactive is a game development studio focused on creating competitive, free-to-play titles within the gaming industry. Their main offerings include cross-platform games that are designed to be replayable, support player growth, and foster a sense of community, all set in anime-inspired intellectual properties. The studio targets the gaming community, aiming to build games that provide a sense of purpose and facilitate connections among players. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Waterloo, Ontario.

name: Matsmart-Motatos
cb_description: Matsmart-Motatos is an e-commerce company focused on sustainable shopping and reducing food waste in the grocery sector. The company offers a wide range of discounted groceries, household items, and personal care products. Matsmart-Motatos primarily serves the online retail market, offering bulk purchasing options and a variety of products to cater to different customer needs. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Paubox
cb_description: Paubox is a company that specializes in the healthcare technology sector, with a focus on email security. The company offers HIPAA compliant email services, ensuring secure and easy communication for healthcare providers. The primary customers of Paubox are organizations within the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: LawHive
cb_description: LawHive connects clients with licensed solicitors in the UK. The company offers a range of legal services including employment, family law, litigation, property, and more, all facilitated through an online process. LawHive primarily serves individuals and small businesses seeking legal assistance. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: CloudEats
cb_description: CloudEats is a pioneer in the cloud restaurant industry, focusing on creating next-generation digital food brands. The company offers a variety of online-optimized food brands, utilizing proprietary technology to manage multi-cuisine, multi-brand, multi-platform operations and ensuring high-quality food delivery. Primarily, CloudEats serves the food delivery industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Makati City, Philippines.

name: Campus
cb_description: Campus is building a network of community houses.

name: Bridgit
cb_description: Bridgit is a company that specializes in workforce planning solutions within the construction industry. Its main offerings include software that provides real-time updates, visibility into projects and labor forecasting, and tools for collaborative workforce management. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Kitchener, Ontario.

name: Enigma
cb_description: Enigma specializes in data infrastructure and analytics for the B2B sector, focusing on risk management and business decision automation. The company offers a suite of data-driven services that facilitate sales and marketing campaigns, business onboarding, risk underwriting, and compliance screening. Enigma's solutions primarily cater to financial services, merchant services, and SaaS companies seeking to refine their customer profiles and manage business risks. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Shopic
cb_description: Shopic specializes in intelligent retail solutions. The company offers a unique clip-on device that uses computer vision to transform regular shopping carts into smart carts, providing a personalized shopping experience with on-cart checkout. It also provides an in-store retail media channel and real-time analysis of shopper carts and store shelves for actionable insights. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: Nexar
cb_description: Nexar develops smart artificial intelligence (AI) dashboard cameras. Its main offerings include (AI) enabled dashboard cameras and a companion application, which records drives, backs up important videos to the cloud, and provides immediate evidence to the user's phone. It primarily sells to the public sector, the insurance industry, and other enterprises. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: The Wing
cb_description: The Wing ceased operation on August 31, 2022. The Wing is a social, co-working, and networking club. It offers workspaces designed for productivity, creativity, and inspiration. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Sonder
cb_description: Sonder is a company specializing in collaborative marketing analytics within the data analytics and marketing sectors. The company offers a platform that interprets data and assists users in finding answers without the need for coding or SQL knowledge, aimed at simplifying data analysis for marketers. Sonder's services are primarily utilized by marketing professionals seeking to analyze and visualize data without technical barriers. It is based in United States.

name: Harness
cb_description: Harness focuses on the software delivery market. The company offers an intelligent software delivery platform that enables engineers to deliver software more efficiently and with higher quality. This platform includes services such as continuous integration, continuous delivery, feature flags, cloud cost management, service reliability management, security testing orchestration, and chaos engineering. The company primarily sells to sectors that are accelerating their cloud initiatives and adopting containers and orchestration tools. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Aspen RxHealth
cb_description: Aspen RxHealth focuses on providing clinical pharmacy services within the healthcare sector. The company offers solutions to enhance medication adherence, manage therapy, educate members, and handle specialty medication and care transitions. Aspen RxHealth primarily serves health plans, life sciences companies, provider groups, and strategic partners. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tampa, Florida.

name: SynFutures
cb_description: SynFutures operates a Web3 company focused on decentralized derivatives infrastructure. It provides an open and trustless derivatives market, enabling users to trade any assets and list futures contracts freely. This service is primarily targeted towards the decentralized finance (DeFi) industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: GoStudent
cb_description: GoStudent provides online tutoring services in the education sector. The company offers personalized, one-on-one tutoring across subjects and educational levels, aiming to improve academic performance. GoStudent serves a diverse clientele, focusing on students and families seeking educational support. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Paleo
cb_description: Paleo specializes in the development of animal-free proteins for the food industry, focusing on creating ingredients for plant-based meat and fish alternatives. The company's main offerings include the production of heme proteins through precision fermentation, which are designed to enhance the taste, aroma, and nutritional value of plant-based foods without the use of genetically modified organisms. Paleo's products are primarily aimed at plant-based food manufacturers seeking to improve the quality and appeal of their meat and fish alternatives. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Leuven, Belgium.

name: The Sill
cb_description: The Sill is a company focused on the retail industry, specifically in the domain of indoor plants and related accessories. The company offers a wide range of indoor plants, planters, and plant care accessories, as well as providing plant care advice and resources. The Sill primarily serves the home decor and indoor gardening sectors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Fudo
cb_description: Fudo is a mobile app that offers last-minute table reservations at restaurants. It is based in Paris, France.

name: Architect
cb_description:
We design & develop a range of products - from interactive webpage storytelling for Ciscos core CES keynote to building a real-time education platform in partnership with UC Berkeley. 

Whilst were part of a bigger network (we have a London mothership that was acquired by Interpublic Group 2 years ago), we operate as if an independent start-up team.

name: PayMongo
cb_description: PayMongo is a financial technology company specializing in online payment processing for businesses. The company provides a suite of tools that enable merchants to accept various payment methods including e-wallets, credit cards, and buy now, pay later options, through customizable checkout experiences and integration APIs. PayMongo primarily serves businesses looking to streamline their payment systems and enhance their e-commerce capabilities. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Taguig City, Philippines.

name: Elodie Games
cb_description: Elodie Games operates as a game development studio focused on the creation of crossplay games in the entertainment industry. The company's main offerings are engaging games that can be played on any platform without compromising the gaming experience. The primary customer base of Elodie Games is the global gaming community. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Venice, California.

name: Locale
cb_description: Locale operates as a residential hospitality company. The company offers modern furnished apartments with amenities such as full kitchens, in-unit laundry, and access to property features like pools and fitness centers. These apartments are primarily marketed to travelers and renters seeking flexible, all-inclusive accommodation options. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Workweek
cb_description: Workweek is a media company that provides service by creating and distributing content in multiple forms such as tweets, newsletters, and memes, designed to influence business decisions and provide insights. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Bit
cb_description: Bit is a company focused on the development of composable software within the software development industry. Its main offerings include a platform for building, reusing, and managing software components in a modular fashion. Bit primarily serves sectors that require rapid software development and collaboration, such as the ecommerce industry and cloud computing industry. Bit was formerly known as Cocycles. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Upflow
cb_description: Upflow specializes in geothermal intelligence and operates within the renewable energy sector, focusing on the application of science and technology to develop sustainable solutions. The company offers services that translate geothermal science into practical applications for businesses, including project management, research and development, and expert guidance in geothermal energy utilization. Upflow primarily serves clients in the renewable energy sector, offering solutions that align with sustainable development goals and cater to the unique needs of businesses in this industry. It is based in Taupo, New Zealand.

name: Hyalex Orthopaedics
cb_description: Hyalex Orthopaedics is a medical device company focused on developing synthetic cartilage technology for joint surface restoration. The company's main offering is the HYALEX Knee System, a biomimetic material designed to replicate the structure and function of native cartilage and address cartilage damage during surgery. Its products target medical professionals in the orthopaedic sector. It was formerly known as Hyale Surgical. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Lexington, Massachusetts.

name: Shieldpay
cb_description: Shieldpay is a technology-led payments partner that specializes in the legal services sector, offering a digital platform for complex transaction management. The company provides a suite of services including compliance and due diligence, funds safeguarding, and efficient payment disbursement, designed to streamline the payment process for legal transactions. Shieldpay primarily serves the legal industry, catering to needs such as mergers and acquisitions, litigation, and real estate transactions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England. Shieldpay operates as a subsidiary of SPG.

name: Edurino
cb_description: Edurino focuses on combining analog and digital learning for children, operating in the educational technology sector. It offers a play learning system that includes a variety of modules for exploring fundamental and future competencies through interactive, game-based experiences. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Artificial Labs
cb_description: Artificial Labs is a provider of algorithmic technology solutions for the commercial and specialty insurance sectors. The company offers an algorithmic underwriting platform that facilitates data ingestion and risk triaging, and integrates with existing systems through APIs to support the underwriting process. They also provide a Contract Builder tool that assists in the creation of compliant contracts. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Mejuri
cb_description: Mejuri specializes in handcrafted fine jewelry with a focus on everyday wear in the luxury goods sector. The company offers a range of products including customizable charms, necklaces, earrings, rings, and bracelets, catering to both men and women who seek personalized accessories. Mejuri also provides piercing services and styling appointments for customers looking to enhance their personal style. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: LynxCare
cb_description: LynxCare is a company focused on healthcare data, operating in the healthcare and technology sectors. The company uses artificial intelligence and natural language processing to unlock and structure unused hospital and patient data, creating data warehouses that can be used for research and evidence generation. LynxCare primarily serves healthcare organizations and life science companies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Taimi
cb_description: Taimi specializes in functional supplements within the health and wellness industry. The company offers a range of products designed to support the immune system, enhance cognitive function, and improve sleep quality, all formulated without artificial additives. These supplements are microencapsulated powders that can be easily incorporated into food or drinks, suitable for the entire family. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Qolo
cb_description: Qolo is a company that focuses on B2B payments in the financial transactions industry. The company offers a range of services including card issuing, payment processing, and treasury management through a single API platform. This allows businesses to manage payments efficiently, with a particular emphasis on speed, security, and cost-effectiveness. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

name: byrd
cb_description: byrd is an independent e-commerce fulfillment platform that operates in the logistics and supply chain sector. The company offers a range of services including warehousing, picking and packing, delivery, and returns management, all designed to streamline the fulfillment process for online retailers. byrd's software provides seamless shop integrations, real-time tracking, and analytics to optimize the supply chain and facilitate cross-border fulfillment. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Greenlite
cb_description: Greenlite operates as a cannabis dispensary and dispensary assets company. It is based in Denver, Colorado. On June 7, 2018 Greenlite was acquired by Enlighten. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: ContraForce
cb_description: ContraForce specializes in security operations management for the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform that enables managed service providers (MSPs) and managed security service providers (MSSPs) to automate security incident responses, orchestrate workflows, and manage security services efficiently. ContraForce's solutions are designed to enhance productivity for security analysts and accelerate incident response for their customers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in McKinney, Texas.

name: Highbeam
cb_description: Highbeam is a financial technology company operating in the banking sector, with a focus on supporting brand owners in making informed decisions. The company offers banking services that include real-time cash flow insights, transparent credit options, and high-yield deposit accounts, all designed to automate and optimize financial operations. Highbeam primarily caters to the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Coadjute
cb_description: Coadjute develops a network to decentralize workflow and data sharing within the property industry. The network optimises and tracks construction projects from inception to occupation through open data, shared ledgers, orchestrated workflow, contract automation, and analytics. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: DUST Identity
cb_description: DUST Identity focuses on creating identity and authentication platforms. The company's main product is the Diamond Unclonable Security Tag (DUST), a technology that uses microscopic engineered diamonds to create an identity layer on any object, ensuring trusted data and verifiable products are used and traced across their lifecycle. DUST Identity primarily serves sectors such as aerospace and defense, art, collectibles, part suppliers, and more. The company was formerly known as Diamond Nanotechnologies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Newton Center, Massachusetts.

name: Avant
cb_description: Avant! developed software that helps design computer chips and was acquired by Synopsis

name: Gearflow
cb_description: Gearflow offers a marketplace for heavy equipment. Its platform gives fleet managers access to suppliers, communication tools, and more. It was formerly known as Equiprent. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Capsule VC
cb_description: Capsule VC ceased operations. Capsule VC is a venture capital firm. It invests in early-stage companies and startups. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: ShoppingGives
cb_description: ShoppingGives is a Certified B Corp that specializes in cause marketing software solutions within the corporate social responsibility domain. The company offers a Social Impact Stack that enables businesses to integrate charitable giving into their customer journey, including features like donation on purchase, round-up, add-on, and post-purchase donations. ShoppingGives serves a diverse range of clients, from direct-to-consumer brands to enterprise retailers, looking to enhance their charitable giving strategies and customer engagement. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Dobot
cb_description: Dobot is a mobile personal financial advisor app that makes it easy to budget, save, and invest. By combining the core components of financial health - saving, spending, borrowing, and investing  into one mobile platform, Dobot provides a holistic financial solution with tools and strategies designed to help users build their financial foundations and achieve their goals.

name: Abhi
cb_description: Abhi is a fintech company specializing in financial wellness and empowerment services. The company offers Earned Wage Access, allowing employees to withdraw their salary at any time, as well as Invoice Factoring and Payroll Solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Kyt
cb_description: Kyt operates as an online global academy. The company focuses on extracurricular learning for children. It offers online singing classes, yoga classes, language classes, dance classes, and chess classes for kids. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Elo
cb_description: Elo specializes in personalized nutrition within the health and wellness sector, leveraging technology to tailor supplements to individual health profiles and goals. The company offers Smart Nutrition products, including sugar-free gummies and protein support, that are customized based on dietary assessments, biomarkers, and data from wearables. Elo's products are designed to fill nutrient gaps and support daily health, muscle building, and recovery, with the assistance of registered dietitians and AI-driven recommendations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in West Yellowstone, Montana.

name: Penfold
cb_description: Penfold is a company that specializes in providing auto-enrolment pension solutions within the financial services sector. Their main offerings include a pension platform for employers to manage auto-enrolment, payroll integration, and compliance, as well as services for individuals to consolidate pensions, select investment plans, and set retirement goals. Penfold primarily serves the financial wellbeing needs of accountants, employers, and individual savers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Veritonic
cb_description: Veritonic is a company that specializes in audio analytics and research within the digital advertising sector. It offers a platform for researching, testing, and measuring the return on investment of audio assets, including ads, logos, and campaigns. The company's services are designed to help clients optimize their audio strategies and assess the impact of their audio advertising efforts. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ShipBob
cb_description: ShipBob develops a technology-enabled third-party logistics (3PL) offering simple and fast e-commerce fulfillment for direct-to-consumer brands. It helps brands to ship orders to their customer's shops. It also offers order and inventory management, warehouse management, predictive data and analytics, and more. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Soona
cb_description: Soona is a virtual product photography studio operating in the e-commerce industry. The company offers product photography and video production services. Soona primarily serves sectors such as beauty, skincare, health, wellness, food, beverage, clothing, shoes, jewelry, pet products, home, garden, and technology. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Glue
cb_description: Glue is a company that focuses on providing smart, controlled in-home access solutions in the retail, logistics, and home services sectors. The company offers a plug-and-play solution that enables last-mile delivery for various services, including groceries, online shopping, and home services like cleaning and plumbing. This solution allows consumers to manage their homes securely and remotely, and select and rate product and service providers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: SpectrumAi
cb_description: SpectrumAi develops an electronic health record system. It offers applied behavior analysis (ABA) therapy for children with autism. It captures and measures objective treatment and outcome data to understand drivers. Its system simplifies documentation improves oversight, and aids in utilization management and the transition to value-based contracting. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Alamitos, California.

name: Swan
cb_description: Swan enables instant delivery of beauty services.  Browse and order carefully selected, celebrity-tier professionals and track their journey to your home or office.  In-app payment and ratings create the ultimate experience.  Manicures, Makeup, Waxing, Threading, Blowouts, Spray Tans, and more!

name: Opkit
cb_description: Opkit is a company focused on automating healthcare communications through AI technology within the healthcare industry. It offers a platform that automates routine phone calls for medical practices, telehealth companies, and healthcare provider organizations, aiming to reduce manual work and human error. The company's services are utilized by various healthcare sectors, including medical practices and telehealth services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Aesyra
cb_description: Aesyra focuses on developing oral appliance technology, operating within the healthcare and technology sectors. The company's main offerings include oral appliances designed to improve sleep quality by addressing conditions such as Sleep Bruxism and Obstructive Sleep Apnea. Its appliances are embedded with sensors to collect and display metrics and are customizable to fit the user's teeth. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: Ampersand
cb_description: Ampersand is Africas first electric transport energy company focusing on electric motorcycles and battery swapping networks. The company offers electric motorcycles that are cost-effective and designed to increase the income of motorcycle taxi drivers by reducing fuel and maintenance costs. Ampersand primarily serves the transportation sector with a focus on motorcycle taxi drivers, providing them with a cleaner and more profitable alternative to petrol bikes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Kigali, Rwanda.

name: Brigit
cb_description: Brigit is a financial services company that offers tools for cash advances, credit building, and financial management. The company provides instant cash advances without credit checks, credit building services without upfront deposits, and financial insights to help users manage their finances. Brigit's products are designed to help individuals avoid overdraft fees, improve their credit scores, and gain better control over their financial health. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Sorare
cb_description: Sorare is a company focused on the intersection of digital collectibles and fantasy sports within the gaming and sports industry. The company offers a platform where users can collect, play, and win with officially licensed digital cards featuring professional athletes from football, the National Basketball Association (NBA), and Major League Baseball (MLB). The platform primarily caters to sports enthusiasts and gamers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Saint Mande, France.

name: GPS Renewables
cb_description: GPS Renewables specializes in renewable natural gas, second-generation ethanol, and green hydrogen. The company offers a range of services including technology delivery, project execution, biofuel asset ownership, and specialized products for gas purification and project integration. GPS Renewables primarily serves sectors involved in bioenergy, waste management, and decarbonization initiatives. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: FEMSelect
cb_description: FEMSelect is a medical technology company focused on providing solutions for Pelvic Organ Prolapse (POP). The company's main offering is EnPlace, a minimally invasive surgical system that aids in the treatment of POP, providing a simpler and safer alternative to traditional procedures. FEMSelect primarily serves the medical sector, particularly in areas related to women's health. FEMSelect was formerly known as POP Medical Solutions Ltd.. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Modi'In, Israel.

name: ClearEstate
cb_description: ClearEstate focuses on the estate planning and settlement sector. The company offers services such as estate planning and settlement, which includes handling probate, tax filing, and relations with government agencies and financial institutions. Their services primarily cater to estate executors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Project44
cb_description: Project44 is a company that focuses on supply chain visibility in the logistics and transportation industry. The company offers a platform that provides real-time tracking of shipments, enabling proactive management of inventory in transit, optimization of carrier and lane performance, and management of port congestion. It primarily serves sectors such as consumer goods, food and beverage, retail, manufacturing, and life sciences. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Viably
cb_description: Viably is a financial technology company specializing in providing funding and banking solutions for the ecommerce sector. The company offers services such as growth capital, cash advances, and financial management tools to help online sellers manage their cash flow and scale their businesses. Viably's products are designed to integrate with sellers' marketplace and banking data, offering insights and projections to support business growth. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cary, North Carolina.

name: Odyssey
cb_description: Odyssey focuses on the distributed renewable energy sector. The company offers finance, procurement, and operation solutions for distributed energy projects, enabling renewable energy companies, financiers, and suppliers to deploy more projects efficiently. Primarily, Odyssey serves the renewable energy industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: RapidSOS
cb_description: RapidSOS operates as an intelligent safety platform. The company's solution allows connected devices to transfer data, such as location, and vehicle telematics, and connects building data, and health information, to telecommunicators and first responders in an emergency. It provides situational awareness and critical data, such as the location and severity of the emergency. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Chainguard
cb_description: Chainguard specializes in fortified software delivery within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers hardened container images designed to reduce attack surfaces and integrates tools for vulnerability remediation, compliance, and risk mitigation. Chainguard's solutions cater to the needs of developers and organizations aiming to secure their software supply chains and maintain open source software security. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: Carputty
cb_description: Carputty specializes in auto financing solutions within the financial services sector. The company offers a flexible line of credit for purchasing, refinancing, or managing vehicles as investments, with a single application process for all future vehicle financing needs. Carputty's services are designed for individuals with good credit who seek to manage their vehicles as a portfolio of assets. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Uptycs
cb_description: Uptycs is a cloud security company that specializes in protecting hybrid cloud environments and providing visibility from development to runtime. The company offers a suite of security solutions including workload protection, compliance automation, threat detection and response, and security for containers and Kubernetes. Uptycs serves enterprises by optimizing security operations, ensuring compliance, and accelerating remediation across cloud workloads, containers, Kubernetes, and software pipelines from a unified security console. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Reggora
cb_description: Reggora specializes in modern appraisal management software within the real estate and mortgage lending industry. The company offers a platform that streamlines the appraisal process for mortgage lenders and appraisal vendors, including features such as payment processing, scheduling, automated underwriting, and real-time updates. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Kepler Communications
cb_description: Kepler Communications focuses on space-based data relay services and operates within the aerospace and communications industry. It provides a constellation of satellites that facilitate real-time, on-orbit data transfer and Internet connectivity for space missions. Kepler's solutions are designed to address the downlink bottleneck in data transmission, offering dynamic and flexible communication options for various space-related activities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Bluejay Therapeutics
cb_description: Bluejay Therapeutics is a healthcare company operating in stealth.

name: ClimateView
cb_description: ClimateView is a technology company focused on facilitating the transition to carbon-neutral economies within the public sector. The company offers a data-driven platform that assists governments in modeling and managing their climate policies, energy transitions, and economic shifts. ClimateView's platform is primarily utilized by local governments and public sector entities aiming to achieve carbon neutrality and enhance their climate action strategies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Umea, Sweden.

name: Atidot
cb_description: Atidot specializes in integrating artificial intelligence into life insurance. The company offers a cloud-based platform that uses predictive analytics to generate insights, helping insurers identify untapped opportunities and grow their customer's lifetime value. It primarily serves the life insurance industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Novoron Bioscience
cb_description: Novoron Bioscience is a biotechnology company focused on developing therapies for neurological repair and disease in the central nervous system. The company's main offerings include treatments designed to promote neurological repair, enhance remyelination, and reduce disease progression in conditions such as spinal cord injuries, multiple sclerosis, and Alzheimer's disease. Novoron Bioscience's technology targets lipoprotein receptors to restore the body's natural ability to regenerate brain and spinal cord tissues after damage or disease. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Vertice
cb_description: Vertice offers a software as a service (SaaS) purchasing platform. The platform offers pricing data intelligence, procurement, human resource, and other solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Curio
cb_description: Curio seeks to simplify clinical trial participant sourcing, while connecting users to research that they can engage with.

name: Toolio
cb_description: Toolio is a cloud-based merchandising platform that specializes in automating retail workflows and providing real-time insights for the retail industry. The company offers services such as merchandise financial planning, assortment planning, and inventory allocation, all designed to enhance data-driven decision-making for retailers. Toolio primarily serves the retail sector, offering tools to streamline merchandising activities and improve inventory management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Grazzy
cb_description: Grazzy is a company focused on digital tipping and instant payout solutions within the service industry. It offers a platform for cashless tipping via quick response (QR) codes and kiosks, as well as flexible tip distribution methods including direct transfers to employee debit cards, bank transfers, or through payroll. The company primarily serves sectors such as hotels, car washes, bars and restaurants, and salons and spas. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Avibra
cb_description: Avibra provides financial, insurance, and wellness benefits. The company offers a Well-Being Advisor, insurance coverage, and a Dollar Benefits Store to support the physical and mental health and financial and career advice needs of its community. It serves individuals seeking essential benefits and advice to improve their well-being, regardless of employment status. It was formerly known as Lifex. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Iselin, New Jersey.

name: Ayble Health
cb_description: Ayble Health is a company focused on improving gastrointestinal health through digital solutions in the healthcare sector. The company offers a personalized plan that includes a nutrition program and a mind-gut program, along with access to a dedicated health coach and a food discovery engine, all aimed at identifying and eliminating foods that trigger gut symptoms. Ayble Health primarily serves individuals with gastrointestinal conditions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Barte
cb_description: Barte focuses on improving the cash flow of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in the financial technology sector. The company offers a payment platform that automates billing processes, allows for the anticipation of receivables, and provides a line of working capital for businesses. Barte primarily serves the economic sector, with a particular focus on SMEs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Ion Energy
cb_description: Ion Energy is a distributed renewable energy provider specializing in the solar energy sector. The company's main services include the installation of solar rooftops equipped with cutting-edge solar panels and the utilization of advanced data analytics to optimize energy usage. It is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

name: LevelTen Energy
cb_description: LevelTen Energy specializes in providing transaction infrastructure for the renewable energy sector. The company offers a marketplace platform that connects buyers, sellers, advisors, and financiers, facilitating efficient energy transactions and providing tools such as project data, analytics, and standardized contracts. LevelTen Energy primarily serves the renewable energy industry, including sectors such as energy procurement and asset management. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Push Security
cb_description: Push Security specializes in identity security monitoring and management within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a browser-based agent that detects and prevents identity breaches, providing security teams with tools to monitor and secure their identity attack surface and respond to threats. Push Security's solutions are designed to enforce in-browser security measures and generate unique telemetry to aid in the detection and prevention of identity-based attacks. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Hertfordshire, England.

name: UnaBiz
cb_description: UnaBiz is an IoT service provider specializing in solution design, manufacturing, and data platform services across various network communication technologies. The company offers a range of IoT solutions including smart utilities management, supply chain and logistics monitoring, security systems, and facilities and building management. UnaBiz's products and services are designed to support sustainable business growth through the use of simple, cost-efficient, and low-maintenance technology. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore.

name: Hometime
cb_description: Hometime operates as a prop-technology company in the short-term rental management industry. The company offers a range of services, including property management, guest management, revenue management, and booking management. Hometime primarily serves the short-term rental sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Akridata
cb_description: Akridata is an artificial intelligence (AI) platform for visual data. It provides an end-to-end suite of products that support both the smart ingestion and smart exploration of visual data. The company's product, Data Explorer, is a data-centric Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) platform that helps data scientists explore, curate, and use visual data at a large scale. It caters to the automotive, healthcare, smart cities, manufacturing, and retail industries. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Altos, California.

name: IrisVision
cb_description: IrisVision is a company that focuses on vision health, operating in the medical technology sector. The company offers wearable low vision glasses designed to assist individuals with moderate to severe visual impairment, using advanced technology to enhance their ability to see and interact with their surroundings. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically targeting individuals with vision-related health conditions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Pleasanton, California.

name: PlanetWatchers
cb_description: PlanetWatchers operates in the crop insurance industry, with a focus on automating policy data capture and claims validation. The company offers services such as acreage reporting and claims validation, which include crop damage maps and automated collection of acreage reporting. These services are designed to aid in efficiency and to provide customer service in the crop insurance industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: SocialSuite
cb_description: SocialSuite specializes in sustainability and impact solutions within the ESG reporting sector. The company offers a suite of software tools designed to simplify sustainability reporting, ensure compliance with regulations, and facilitate materiality assessments for a variety of organizations. SocialSuite primarily serves public companies, private firms, and non-profits seeking to enhance their ESG strategies and reporting. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Melbourne, Victoria.

name: Flybuy
cb_description: Flybuy focuses on location-based services within the technology industry. The company offers a range of solutions including curbside pickup, buy online pick up in-store (BOPIS), drive-thru services, and delivery optimization. Flybuy primarily serves sectors such as restaurants, retail, grocery stores, convenience stores, and the hospitality industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Compt
cb_description: Compt is an employee benefits reimbursement platform that specializes in customizable lifestyle benefits and expense management solutions. The company offers a range of services including Lifestyle Spending Accounts, personalized stipends for various needs such as remote work, health and wellness, and family support, as well as rewards and recognition programs that are IRS-compliant and cater to global teams. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Telda
cb_description: Telda focuses on providing peer-to-peer payment solutions. The company offers services such as sending, spending, and saving money in a simplified manner, and provides a card that can be used for online and in-store purchases, as well as cash withdrawals. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Livly
cb_description: Livly specializes in rental property management software within the real estate tech industry. The company offers a suite of tools including a community management platform, an all-in-one resident mobile app, and smart apartment solutions designed to streamline property operations and enhance resident experiences. Livly primarily serves the multifamily housing sector, providing property managers with AI-powered operational tools, smart access control, and amenities management to increase efficiency and resident satisfaction. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Zolar
cb_description: Zolar is a company that focuses on renewable energy, specifically in the solar power industry. The company offers home solar power solutions, providing services from planning to installation, and enabling homeowners to generate electricity. It sells to the residential sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: eBanqo
cb_description: eBanqo develops a conversational artificial intelligence (AI) platform. The company offers services such as AI chatbots for customer service, live chat for real-time customer interaction, and automation of business services on various messaging platforms. Its services primarily cater to businesses looking to automate their customer support and sales functions. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Alpharetta, Georgia.

name: Koywe
cb_description: Koywe provides digital asset negotiation solutions within the cryptocurrency sector. They offer services that facilitate the conversion of cryptocurrencies to local currency and ensure secure and rapid cross-border transactions. It primarily serves businesses requiring cryptocurrency transaction services, including local bank transfers, KYC and KYB compliance, and stablecoin conversions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: New Era ADR
cb_description: New Era ADR specializes in providing a fully digital platform for alternative dispute resolution within the legal services industry. The company offers virtual mediation and arbitration services designed to streamline the dispute resolution process. Its platform caters to businesses and legal professionals seeking efficient and fair conflict resolution. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Surglogs
cb_description: Surglogs focuses on regulatory compliance in the healthcare sector. The company offers a digital platform that enables healthcare facilities to record and access crucial regulatory compliance information, including administration of logbooks, medications, supplies, and drills. The primary customers of Surglogs are healthcare facilities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Coronado, California

name: Wellth
cb_description: Wellth focuses on improving adherence in chronic disease populations. The company offers a mobile platform that uses behavioral economics to help people with chronic conditions form healthy habits, such as taking medication on time and engaging with their care team. Wellth primarily serves sectors such as medicare advantage, medicaid, ACA marketplace, providers, and employers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Found
cb_description: Found was a Internet/Internet Software & Services company based in San Francisco, California.  Found was acquired in 2002.

name: Valsoft
cb_description: Valsoft focuses on the acquisition and development of vertical market software businesses. The company's main offerings include mission-critical solutions for various industries, provided by the software companies it acquires and develops. Valsoft primarily sells to a wide range of industries, as its portfolio comprises software companies from multiple verticals. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: SonicIncytes
cb_description: SonicIncytes specializes in medical devices for liver health assessment within the healthcare sector. The company offers Velacur, an AI-guided 3D S-WAVE ultrasound elastography device that measures liver stiffness and attenuation to aid in the diagnosis and management of fatty liver disease. Velacur is designed for use in various healthcare settings, providing real-time, non-invasive liver assessments to medical professionals. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Fortanix
cb_description: Fortanix offers a unified data security platform. The company allows users to run applications securely in public clouds with complete privacy from the cloud provider. It serves healthcare, technology, university, and payment companies. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Evidation
cb_description: Evidation focuses on harnessing real-world health data to measure and improve health outcomes. The company offers a digital health measurement and engagement platform that utilizes data science and machine learning to provide health guidance, treatments, and tools. Evidation primarily serves life sciences companies, government bodies, and academic institutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Pixelgen Technologies
cb_description: Pixelgen Technologies specializes in spatial proteomics, focusing on the analysis of cell surface proteins and their spatial relationships. The company offers molecular pixelation technology to provide detailed maps of cell surface proteins for single cells, aiding in the understanding of biological processes and the development of new medicines and diagnostics. Pixelgen's products enable researchers to perform high-resolution, multiplex analysis of protein interactions and spatial dynamics without the need for traditional microscopy techniques. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Chronus Health
cb_description: Chronus Health operates as a healthcare technology company focused on diagnostics. The company's main offering is a portable platform designed to provide diagnosis at the point of care, delivering blood test results. This service primarily caters to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Fremont, California.

name: Brightflow AI
cb_description: Brightflow AI is a financial intelligence platform that specializes in providing AI-driven financial tools for the ecommerce industry. The company offers services such as cash management, business health monitoring, and access to growth capital for brands. Brightflow AI primarily serves ecommerce businesses seeking to manage their finances and secure funding. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Covina, California.

name: Column
cb_description: Column is a nationally chartered bank that focuses on providing infrastructure for developers and builders in the financial services industry. It offers a range of services, including the ability to move and hold money, manage card programs, and lend money, all through an API-first approach. Its primary customers are developers and builders looking to create new financial products. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Horizon Quantum Computing
cb_description: Horizon Quantum Computing is a technology company focused on the quantum computing industry. The company's main service is a software development tool that allows users to write programs in classical languages that can be compiled and run on both conventional and quantum computers, without requiring any knowledge of quantum computing. It primarily serves the software development and quantum computing industries. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: Liftit
cb_description: Liftit is a technology platform that specializes in automating and optimizing truck delivery operations across various stages of the supply chain. The company offers a configurable transportation management platform that helps shippers in Latin America to streamline their delivery processes. Liftit's services include optimizing first mile readiness, middle mile distribution, and last mile delivery to ensure efficient operations and customer satisfaction. The platform also provides tools for route optimization, real-time tracking, and data analytics to improve supply chain management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Bumper
cb_description: Bumper operates as an all-in-one billing and financial ops platform for supply chain. It provide Accounts Payables and Receivables workflows, contract management for carriers and shippers, and built-in invoice auditing. It is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: PERQ
cb_description: PERQ is a company that specializes in artificial intelligence and marketing automation, operating within the multifamily real estate industry. The company offers a range of services including automated prospect communication, marketing automation, and website conversion tools, all designed to streamline the process of lead generation and conversion for multifamily properties. Their primary market is the real estate tech industry. PERQ was formerly known as BizProps. It was founded in 2001 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Yes Hearing
cb_description: Yes Hearing is a company focused on providing hearing aids and telehealth services in the healthcare industry. The company offers premium hearing aids and in-home audiologist care, aiming to make these services more accessible and affordable. Their primary customers are individuals with hearing loss who require hearing aids and related healthcare services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Chili Piper
cb_description: Chili Piper is a company that focuses on Meeting Lifecycle Automation in the tech industry. The company offers a platform that automates the process of scheduling meetings, qualifying and routing leads to the appropriate representatives, and facilitating lead handoff between different teams. Its primary customers are sales and revenue teams across various sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Bite
cb_description:
Bite makes it easy for you to know where and when your friends are eating. We help you spend more time with friends. 

Instead of texting and calling each friend only to find out you forgot someone, you can just start a table and have all your friends know about it. 

1. Start your own table so friends can join 
2. Join your friends table 
3. Send messages to friends at your table

name: Cashmere
cb_description:
The Premium Retail Experience.

Were redefining mobile shopping from the ground up  delivering a beautiful, elegant and efficient experience for buying incredible clothes.

name: Token
cb_description: Token is a financial technology company that operates in the payment system platform sector. The company provides both physical payment devices and digital payment solutions, offering a range of services that enable secure transactions. Token primarily serves the retail industry, providing solutions that help businesses of all sizes establish and run their operations. Token was founded in 2018 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Contextual AI
cb_description: Contextual AI specializes in the development of contextual language models and enterprise AI applications within the technology sector. The company offers customizable AI systems that are optimized for both retrieval and generation. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Abcuro
cb_description: Abcuro is a clinical stage biotechnology company focused on developing therapies for autoimmune diseases and cancer. The company's main offerings include the development of monoclonal antibodies that modulate cytotoxic T cells and NK cells, targeting specific immune receptors to treat conditions like inclusion body myositis and various cancers. Abcuro's products are designed to selectively deplete harmful cells or reactivate inhibited cells within the body's immune system. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Newton, Massachusetts.

name: Zenas BioPharma
cb_description: Zenas BioPharma operates as a biopharmaceutical company with a focus on the development and delivery of immune-based therapies. It offers therapeutics for autoimmune and rare diseases. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Kindo
cb_description: Kindo is an internationally-focused web-based family networking platform. The company allows users to build their free next-generation family tree and stay in touch with their loved ones. Kindo was founded in 2007 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Neuromod Devices
cb_description: Neuromod Devices is a medical technology company focused on establishing bimodal neuromodulation as a new standard of care for tinnitus. The company's main offering is Lenire, a groundbreaking tinnitus treatment device that has undergone extensive clinical trials to prove its safety, efficacy, and patient tolerability. Neuromod Devices primarily sells to the healthcare industry, providing training and support to hearing healthcare providers. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Dublin 8, Ireland.

name: Salvy
cb_description: Salvy is a digital B2B telecommunications provider specializing in mobile telephony services for businesses. The company offers a suite of mobile telephony management services that enable businesses to control and optimize their mobile communications with ease and transparency. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Curitiba, Brazil.

name: ChangeEngine
cb_description: ChangeEngine focuses on elevating the employee experience within various business sectors. It offers a platform that provides multi-channel communication templates, content personalization, and tools for automating and mapping out key employee journeys. The company primarily serves sectors such as HR, operations, and marketing, offering solutions for onboarding, rewards and recognition, manager coaching, and employee engagement, among others. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Hazelcast
cb_description: Hazelcast is a software provider specializing in real-time data management and distributed computing for mission-critical applications across various industries. The company offers a unified real-time data platform that combines distributed compute capabilities, in-memory data storage, and stream processing to support AI-driven applications and event-driven architectures. Hazelcast's platform is designed to deliver high performance, resilience, and scalability for data-intensive applications. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Rippling
cb_description: Rippling serves as a workforce management system that specializes in integrating HR, IT, and Finance applications on a unified platform. The company offers tools to manage and automate the employee lifecycle, secure and configure IT resources, and control financial operations without the need for multiple disparate systems. Rippling primarily serves sectors such as technology, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, marketing, non-profits, professional services, financial services, and restaurants. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Greenlyte Carbon Technologies
cb_description: Greenlyte Carbon Technologies specializes in carbon capture technology and operates within the environmental sector. The company offers a low-energy process that captures carbon dioxide and simultaneously produces hydrogen, thus reducing emissions and creating value from the air. Greenlyte primarily serves sectors that require carbon sequestration solutions and hydrogen production. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Essen, Germany.

name: CureSkin
cb_description: CureSkin is a health and wellness company focused on providing personalized skincare and haircare solutions. The company offers AI-powered analysis and dermatologist-formulated regimens tailored to individual skin and hair needs, accessible through their mobile app. CureSkin's services include personalized product recommendations, nutritional diet plans, lifestyle guidance, and regular checkups with dermatologists to ensure effective and holistic care for skin and hair health. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Basking Biosciences
cb_description: Basking Biosciences engages in the development of therapeutic solutions in the healthcare sector, specifically in the field of cardiovascular diseases. Its offering is a thrombolytic drug designed to reopen arteries and whose activity can be quickly reversed in the event of bleeding. It targets towards the healthcare industry, particularly in the treatment of acute ischemic stroke. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

name: Cover Genius
cb_description: Cover Genius is the insurtech company specializing in embedded protection for various industries. It main offerings include a global distribution platform, XCover, which provides seamless insurance and protection services, and an API that enables instant claims payments in over 90 currencies. It primarily serve sectors such as retail, fintech, logistics, mobility and auto, gig economy, travel, property, and live event ticketing. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Skydance Media
cb_description: Skydance Media is a diversified media company that operates in the entertainment industry. The company's main offerings include the creation of high-quality, event-level entertainment across feature film, television, and interactive platforms, bringing to life stories of immersive worlds. It primarily caters to the global entertainment industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Hasura
cb_description: Hasura is a software company that operates in the application development industry. The company provides a platform that generates instant GraphQL and REST APIs on new and existing data sources, simplifying and accelerating the process of application development. Hasura primarily serves the software development and tech industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Haystack
cb_description: Haystack is a company that focuses on providing digital business card solutions, operating in the technology and marketing sectors. The company offers digital business cards that can be shared virtually, aiding in sales efficiency, building quality connections, and promoting sustainability by reducing the use of paper. Haystack primarily serves the retail, real estate, and enterprise sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Kelvin Grove, Queensland.

name: Lucid
cb_description: Lucid specializes in visual collaboration tools within the software industry. The company offers a suite of products that facilitate ideation, planning, design, and execution for teams and organizations. Lucid's solutions are widely used across various sectors including the public sector, education, healthcare, and financial services. It was founded in 2010 and is based in South Jordan, Utah.

name: Qnovo
cb_description: Qnovo specializes in lithium-ion battery management software, focusing on the electric vehicle, energy storage, and consumer electronics sectors. The company offers predictive analytics and software solutions that enhance battery performance without the need for additional hardware. Qnovo's technology is utilized by automotive original equipment manufacturers (OEMs), energy companies, and consumer electronics manufacturers to address challenges in battery health and efficiency. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: NirogStreet
cb_description: NirogStreet provides a technology-driven platform for Ayurveda doctors and medicine on a global scale. Its key offerings include an online marketplace for alternative Ayurveda medicine brands. The platform features doctors and Ayurveda healthcare facilities finding solutions. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Chefclub
cb_description: Chefclub operates as a global food-themed entertainment brand. It provides an online portal for recipes and cooking instructions. Chefclub's offerings cater to a broad audience, extending beyond cooking enthusiasts to include families and individuals looking for culinary inspiration and fun. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Kasheesh
cb_description: Kasheesh is a financial technology company specializing in payment solutions within the fintech sector. The company offers a service that allows users to split online payments across multiple credit and debit cards, creating a one-time virtual card for each transaction. Kasheesh primarily serves individuals looking to manage their finances without the need for traditional loans or credit inquiries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lean
cb_description: Lean develops and runs a financial technology platform. It offers an application programming interface (API) for innovators to connect to their customers' bank accounts, initiate real-time payments, and retrieve account information. The company facilitates financial data, insights, identity verification, credit and risk scoring, finance management, account top-ups and deposits, invoicing, e-commerce payments, and more. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Skyways
cb_description: Skyways is building vertical take-off and landing drones to be used by the military for transporting things without putting people in danger. Since the military currently operates in places with little infrastructure, Skyways can provide a way to deliver goods without putting people in danger. Its drones are fully autonomous and have a payload capability of 45 pounds. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cedar Park, Texas.

name: Yas
cb_description: YAS is a company that focuses on digital health prevention in the insurance and business sectors. The company offers digital health and prevention products, including digital bonus programs and app solutions, that use gamification and rewards to encourage health-conscious behavior. These products are primarily targeted towards health insurers, insurance companies, and businesses. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: SESAMm
cb_description: SESAMm is a leading artificial intelligence company that specializes in the analysis of over 20 billion documents to generate insights for investment firms and corporations. The company's main offerings include real-time monitoring of ESG controversies, risk assessment, and the provision of ESG and positive impact scores. SESAMm's solutions are primarily utilized by the private equity, asset management, and corporate sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Metz, France.

name: Zennify
cb_description: Zennify operates as an online consultancy firm for financial institutions. Using cloud-based systems, it offers businesses marketing tools, monetary management services, and consultative services. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: Naboo
cb_description: Naboo allows users to telecommute with colleagues in villas surrounded by nature.

name: Redefine Meat
cb_description: Redefine Meat focuses on creating plant-based meat alternatives that cater to both the food service industry and home cooking enthusiasts. The company's products, which include a variety of meat substitutes such as burgers, mince, and sausages, are designed to mimic the taste, texture, and versatility of traditional animal meat without the use of any animal-based ingredients. It primarily serves the food industry. Redefine Meat was formerly known as Jet-Eat. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Rehovot, Israel.

name: Caraway
cb_description: Caraway is a company that focuses on the design and production of non-toxic, ceramic-coated cookware and bakeware in the home goods industry. The company offers a range of products including cookware sets, bakeware sets, food storage containers, and kitchen linens, all designed to facilitate healthier and more convenient cooking and baking experiences. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Akasa
cb_description: Akasa specializes in computer hardware and electronics, focusing on thermal solutions and PC components. The company offers a range of products including cooling systems for CPUs and PCs, fanless and active cases, power supplies, and a variety of PC expansions and peripherals. Akasa primarily serves the computer hardware industry with a focus on thermal management and PC customization. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Greenford, England.

name: Quinio
cb_description: Quinio is a company that focuses on acquiring and building ecommerce brands. The company offers services such as business valuation, acquisition, and strategic partnership to help brands grow and expand. Quinio primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Lomas de Chapultepec, Mexico.

name: Five Sigma
cb_description: Five Sigma focuses on providing a cloud-native claims management solutions platform. It offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform that uses intelligent automation and advanced data modeling to simplify and optimize the claims process, from first notice of loss to settlement. It primarily serves the insurance industry. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: NanoNets
cb_description: NanoNets is a company specializing in intelligent automation AI for business process optimization across various sectors. The company offers a range of services including OCR technology for financial documents, workflow automation, and data extraction to streamline operations and enhance decision-making. NanoNets primarily serves sectors that require automation of complex business processes, such as finance, healthcare, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Thinknum
cb_description: Thinknum is a company that focuses on indexing the public web in real-time using proprietary machine learning algorithms, operating within the data analytics and financial analysis sectors. The company offers services that track various metrics such as job listings, headcount, social media traction, employee sentiment, product pricing, and store locations for over 500,000 public and private companies around the world. These services primarily cater to the financial analysis and market analysis industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Daupler
cb_description: Daupler specializes in response management solutions for the public works and utilities sectors. The company offers a suite of software products that optimize call management, dispatch, and response coordination, leveraging AI technology to enhance efficiency and customer service. Daupler's solutions cater to a range of organizations, including water, sewer, electric, gas, streets, and emergency dispatch services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Shawnee Mission, Kansas.

name: Treeline Biosciences
cb_description: Treeline Biosciences operates as an oncology biotechnology company. It offers drug discovery and development through data sets, model systems, and independent labs. The company provides mechanistic biology, medicinal chemistry, structural biology, protein science, and computational science. It was formerly known as JHB Explorations. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

name: Zenarate
cb_description: Zenarate specializes in AI simulation training within the professional development and training sector. The company offers a platform for skill-based learning and performance measurement to enhance agent interactions with customers. Zenarate primarily serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare, insurance, telecommunications, technology, and travel and hospitality. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Federated Wireless
cb_description: Federated Wireless focuses on shared spectrum and private wireless solutions. The company's main offerings include the provision of private wireless networks, spectrum management services, and fixed wireless services, all designed to connect businesses and industries to the future. It primarily sells to sectors such as telecommunications, energy, hospitality, education, retail, office space, municipal and residential. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Arlington, Virginia.

name: Odeko
cb_description: Odeko specializes in supply management and operations software for the caf industry. Its main offerings include a platform for managing inventory, placing orders, and integrating mobile orders and rewards programs, all designed to streamline caf operations and reduce costs. Odeko's services are tailored to meet the unique needs of local cafs and eateries, aiming to save time, money, and reduce environmental impact through efficient supply chain management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Kanastra
cb_description: Kanastra provides capital market infrastructure for alternative investment. The company provides fund management, fund administration, and alternative asset securitization solutions. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Minas Gerais, Brazil.

name: Princeton NuEnergy
cb_description: Princeton NuEnergy operates as a clean-technology company. The company offers a solution for recycling lithium-ion batteries, using its low-temperature plasma-assisted separation technology. Its technology allows the company to produce cathode active materials from spent lithium-ion batteries, which are primarily used in electric vehicles, consumer electronics, and energy storage batteries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bordentown, New Jersey.

name: BIGC
cb_description: BIGC focuses on the connection between fans and Korean pop culture through its engagement platform in the entertainment industry. It offers a platform for global fans to participate in concerts and fan events related to KPOP and Korean culture. It primarily caters to the entertainment sector, specifically targeting Korean pop music and culture fans. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Landing
cb_description: Landing is a community-powered inspiration engine that operates in the social networking and content creation sectors. The company offers a platform where users can connect with a global network of creators to share and explore niche fandoms, creative content, and aesthetic inspirations. Landing's main offerings include a Discover Feed with visually rich boards and a desktop Studio for creating and curating content, as well as an iOS app for engaging with the community. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: StormX
cb_description: StormX is a company that focuses on integrating blockchain technology with cashback rewards for online shopping. It offers a platform where users can earn cryptocurrency as cashback from their purchases at a variety of online retailers. The company primarily serves the ecommerce industry by providing a crypto cashback service. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: EnsoData
cb_description: EnsoData is a healthcare technology company specializing in the application of artificial intelligence to improve the diagnosis and treatment of sleep disorders. The company offers a suite of tools including EnsoSleep, a cloud-based software platform that provides clinicians with capabilities for viewing, scoring, editing, and reporting of polysomnograms (PSGs) and home sleep apnea tests (HSATs). EnsoData's solutions are designed to streamline sleep study management, enhance diagnostic accuracy, and support the entire sleep care continuum. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Madison, Wisconsin.

name: Cedar
cb_description: Cedar focuses on reducing administrative friction in the healthcare system through its enterprise fintech platform. The company offers a platform that connects providers and payers, optimizing the patient experience from pre-service through payment without using overly technical language. Cedar primarily serves the healthcare industry, including providers and payers, by offering solutions that integrate with electronic health records (EHRs) and enhance the end-to-end digital patient experience. Cedar was formerly known as Careportal. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ZOE
cb_description: ZOE is a health technology company focused on individual health through personalized nutrition programs, utilizing scientific research and artificial intelligence. The company offers a personalized nutrition program designed to help users eat well for their bodies and improve their microbiome, supported by scientific findings published in leading journals. ZOE primarily serves individuals seeking to enhance lifestyle through tailored dietary guidance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Great Jones
cb_description:
Great Jones provides technology-fueled property management for the several trillion dollars in rental homes owned by small-scale investors, specializing in single-family homes. The company's digital and operational platform elevates rental investors above the complexity of property ownership, optimizing for performance, ease, and transparency.

On August 25, 2021, Great Jones was acquired by Roofstock. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Capital Rx
cb_description: Capital Rx operates as a health-tech company that focuses on pharmacy benefits management and healthcare technology. The company offers a range of services including a cloud-native enterprise health platform called JUDI, pharmacy benefit management, and prescription savings cards, all designed to improve drug price visibility and patient outcomes. Capital Rx primarily serves employers, unions, public sector entities, and hospitals. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: StethoMe
cb_description: StethoMe focuses on the development of artificial intelligence in the fields of healthcare and telemedicine. It detects abnormal sounds in the respiratory system.
