Its core product is an electronic stethoscope that coordinates with a smartphone application and specially designed algorithms. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Poznan, Poland.

name: Anomali
cb_description: Anomali is a company specializing in AI-powered security operations and defense capabilities within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a cloud-native big data solution that integrates threat detection, security analytics, and threat intelligence management to enhance security operations. Anomali provides access to a cybersecurity marketplace with a variety of threat intelligence feeds and analysis tools, catering to the needs of security system partners and technology integrations. Anomali was formerly known as Threat Stream Inc.. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: LuxWall
cb_description: LuxWall is a leader in innovative glass solutions within the building materials industry. The company specializes in high-performance vacuum insulating glass products designed to significantly reduce energy consumption and carbon emissions in both new constructions and existing buildings. LuxWall's main offerings include energy-efficient glass that provides high thermal insulation values, customizable to climatic regions and window sizes, which can lead to substantial energy savings and reduced carbon footprint for property owners. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Ypsilanti, Michigan.

name: Ultromics
cb_description: Ultromics provides an artificial intelligence (AI)-based echocardiography imaging analysis platform. The company provides software solutions such as the EchoGo product, which enhances the accuracy of the diagnosis of cardiovascular situations and provides reports for clinicians without any need for physical software on-site. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Oxford, United Kingdom.

name: Tamatem
cb_description: Tamatem is a mobile game publisher operating in the gaming industry. The company's main service is to localize and publish international mobile games, making them culturally relevant for the Arabic-speaking market. Tamatem primarily serves the mobile gaming industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Amman, Jordan.

name: Middleware
cb_description: Middleware operates an observability platform for cloud-native, microservices, and distributed applications. It offers various observability from infrastructure monitoring, logs monitoring, application performance monitoring (APM), synthetic monitoring, and alerting solutions. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Zeffy
cb_description: Zeffy is a company that specializes in providing fundraising solutions for nonprofit organizations. Their services include a range of fundraising tools such as customizable donation forms, event ticketing, peer-to-peer campaigns, eCommerce, donor management, memberships, and raffles & lotteries. Zeffy's platform is unique in that it offers these services with zero platform fees, credit card fees, or any other fees, ensuring that nonprofits receive 100% of the donations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: SweepSouth
cb_description: SweepSouth is a technology-driven company offering a range of home cleaning services. They provide an online platform for booking domestic cleaning, garden maintenance, car washing, pool cleaning, and heavy lifting services. SweepSouth primarily serves the residential sector, enabling homeowners to easily schedule and manage home service appointments. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: HoxHunt
cb_description: HoxHunt specializes in human risk management within the cybersecurity domain, leveraging artificial intelligence and behavioral science to transform employee behavior. The company offers a suite of security awareness and training solutions designed to educate employees on phishing detection and foster proactive cybersecurity practices. HoxHunt's platform serves various sectors, including IT, manufacturing, financial services, and consumer businesses, by providing tailored security training programs. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: RefleXion
cb_description: RefleXion operates as a therapeutic oncology company. The company's main service is SCINTIX therapy, a treatment that detects signals from cancer cells and uses them to deliver immediate treatment for tumors in the lung or bone that may arise from primary or metastatic disease. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically cancer treatment centers. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Hayward, California.

name: Ubco
cb_description: Ubco is a company focused on electric utility motorbikes within the electric vehicle industry. Their main offerings include all-wheel drive electric motorbikes designed for both on-road and off-road use, providing an all-terrain, lightweight, and low maintenance mode of transportation. Ubco's products cater to individual users and fleet managers, with a range of accessories and cloud-based software to enhance the user experience. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bay of Plenty, New Zealand.

name: Sova Health
cb_description: Sova Health is a full-stack gut health company that specializes in the wellness and healthcare sector. The company offers gut microbiome testing, personalized supplements, and one-on-one coaching to address a range of conditions from digestive issues to chronic and metabolic health concerns. Sova Health's products and services cater to individuals seeking to improve their digestive health and overall well-being through scientifically-backed methods. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Kobiton
cb_description: Kobiton provides mobile device testing solution. The company offers a platform for testing mobile applications on real devices, providing services such as real-device testing, visual testing, mobile performance testing, and mobile accessibility testing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Finovox
cb_description: Finovox specializes in document fraud detection within various business sectors. The company's main offerings include software that utilizes machine learning algorithms to analyze and verify the authenticity of documents . Its solutions are designed to serve a broad range of sectors, including insurance, banking, real estate, telecom, and recruitment, by providing tools for fraud investigation and evidence of fraudulent activities. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Cooby
cb_description: Cooby specializes in improving sales communication and customer relationship management within the CRM software domain. The company offers tools that integrate WhatsApp with CRM systems like HubSpot and Salesforce, allowing for synchronization of conversational data, organization of inbox, and automation of contact management. Cooby's solutions are designed for sales teams, consultants, and business professionals to improve efficiency and customer engagement. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Velocity
cb_description: Velocity is a Berkeley, California-based Software (non-internet/mobile) company.

name: SupplyHive
cb_description: SupplyHive provides supplier performance management (SPM) software designed to help corporations improve efficiency by centralizing, standardize, scale and automate the supplier performance process.

name: Vahak
cb_description: Vahak is an online transport services company focused on providing a marketplace for truck load bookings within the logistics industry. The company offers a platform where users can connect with over 20 lakh transporters across India, book trucks and loads, and benefit from a variety of services including KYC and GST-verified transporter listings, secure payment gateways, and customer support. Vahak primarily serves the logistics sector, connecting transporters, shippers, and transport agents. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Karnataka, India.

name: Linktree
cb_description: Linktree specializes in providing a bio link tool that allows individuals and businesses to unify their digital presence across various platforms. The company offers a service that aggregates social media content into a single, customizable landing page, facilitating online engagement and sales. Linktree primarily serves creators, influencers, small businesses, and other professionals looking to streamline their online interactions and monetization efforts. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Collingwood, Victoria.

name: Measurabl
cb_description: Measurabl specializes in ESG solutions for the real estate sector, focusing on environmental, social, and governance data management. The company offers a platform for measuring, managing, reporting, and acting on ESG data, designed to optimize sustainability performance and facilitate sustainable finance opportunities. Measurabl's services cater to a range of stakeholders in the real estate industry, including owners, investors, property managers, and lenders. Measurabl was formerly known as Green In A Box. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Payaut
cb_description: Payaut focuses on providing payment solutions, specifically for online platforms and marketplaces. The company offers a range of services including the ability to accept and collect payments via any payment service provider (PSP), manage split payments and payouts, and handle seller onboarding processes. Payaut primarily serves the ecommerce industry, providing its services to online marketplaces. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: StoreCash
cb_description: StoreCash provides alternative payment methods and instant cashback rewards for everyday shopping. The company offers a platform where users can earn cash back on online and in-store purchases, with the ability to manage store cards and receive savings. StoreCash primarily serves the e-commerce industry, offering solutions that enhance customer engagement and retention for business and banking customers through its cash-back API. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Front Office Sports
cb_description: Front Office Sports operates as a multiplatform media brand in the sports industry. The company provides coverage on the influence of sports on business and culture, offering content through newsletters, podcasts, and social media channels. It primarily serves the sports consumer market. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Le Collectionist
cb_description: Le Collectionist focuses on the luxury vacation rental industry. It offers high-end vacation homes for rent, providing exceptional services and memorable experiences to its clients. These services include fully tailor-made holidays, with on-site teams in every destination to ensure a seamless experience. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Smartpricing
cb_description: Smartpricing specializes in revenue management in the hospitality industry. The company offers a software solution that helps hotels and other accommodation facilities optimize their pricing strategies, by analyzing market data and suggesting the best prices at any given time. The primary customers of Smartpricing are businesses in the hospitality industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Rovereto, Italy.

name: Mayan
cb_description: Mayan specializes in PPC optimization and Amazon FBA software within the advertising technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools and services designed to automate and enhance advertising campaigns for Amazon sellers, leveraging machine learning for campaign creation, targeting, and bid optimization. Mayan primarily serves the ecommerce industry, particularly those involved in Amazon's marketplace. Mayan was formerly known as Mayanalytics. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.

name: Plural
cb_description: Plural was a Computer Hardware & Services/IT Services company based in New York, New York.  Plural was acquired in 2002.

name: TissueLabs
cb_description: TissueLabs focuses on 3D bioprinting technologies within the biotechnology sector. The company offers a range of products including bioprinters, bioinks, and hydrogels designed to facilitate the creation of tissues and organs in laboratory settings. Researchers utilize these products in fields such as tissue engineering, and medicine. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Manno, Switzerland.

name: Labrador Systems
cb_description: Labrador Systems focuses on the development of assistive robots within the robotics industry. The company's main offerings include robots that assist with daily activities such as meal delivery, laundry handling, and ensuring essential items are within reach, all designed to support independent living. These robots are equipped with advanced three-dimensional (3D) vision for navigation and can be controlled via smartphone applications, voice commands, or scheduled tasks. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Calabasas, California.

name: Fanimal
cb_description: Fanimal is a live events platform and zero-fee ticket marketplace. Fanimal further enriches the user experience for fans with a number of features that go beyond the transactional aspect of buying a ticket, most notably, a messaging product that allows group members to not only coordinate logistics surrounding the event itself, but also send each other GIFs and discuss all the other details of their unforgettable experience. Fanimal was founded in 2019 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Crosschq
cb_description: Crosschq provides a range of products including analytics for recruiting and quality of hire, digital reference checking, and tools for candidate and hiring team services. Crosschq primarily serves sectors that require talent acquisition and management solutions, such as technology, retail, and professional services. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Danville, California.

name: Bytelearn
cb_description: Bytelearn is a company specializing in educational technology with a focus on AI-driven math tutoring. It provides an AI math teaching assistant that supports both teachers and students by offering personalized, step-by-step math practice and assistance. The platform caters to the educational sector by facilitating differentiated learning and addressing individual student's knowledge gaps. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Noida, India.

name: Decentro
cb_description: Decentro is a fintech company specializing in providing a suite of APIs and SDKs for payments and banking integrations. The company offers solutions for payment collections, settlements, banking-as-a-service, and customer onboarding, including KYC processes. Decentro primarily serves businesses looking to integrate financial technology into their platforms, enhancing their capabilities in payment processing and customer verification. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: ILLA
cb_description: ILLA is a company focused on creating a networking platform for women+ in the adventure and outdoor activities sector. Its main service is to facilitate connections among women+ who share interests in activities such as hiking, skiing, climbing, and riding, by providing a web app for planning and joining outdoor activities. ILLA's platform allows users to build outdoor profiles, explore nearby matches, and join group chats based on location, activity, and skill level. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Jackson, Wyoming.

name: Lynx
cb_description: Lynx is a system integration company specializing in the design and implementation of software solutions supporting companies in the finance, utilities, and service markets. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Padova, Italy.

name: Amaka
cb_description: Amaka is a company that specializes in accounting integrations and business automation. The company offers services such as automatic synchronization of sales, payments, and other business data into accounting software, as well as managed reconciliation services where their team of experts handle accounts reconciliation. They primarily cater to the ecommerce industry, providing integrations with various ecommerce platforms. It is based in Redfern, New South Wales.

name: Stability AI
cb_description: Stability AI focuses on developing generative artificial intelligence across various domains including imagery, video, audio, and language. The company offers a suite of AI models that enable the creation of photorealistic images, videos, audio, and 3D objects, as well as language processing capabilities. Stability AI provides flexible licensing options for the commercial use of their AI models and platforms. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Branch
cb_description: Branch is a deployment tool that simplifies the CI/CD process for WordPress developers within the software development industry. The company offers automated deployment solutions that integrate with Git repositories and provide pre-configured recipes for various hosting platforms, eliminating much of the manual configuration work. Branch's services are tailored to modern WordPress development needs, including asset compilation, dependency installation, and automated testing, to ensure a smooth and error-free deployment process. It is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: Yonder
cb_description: Yonder specializes in marketing automation for the tourism industry, leveraging AI technology to enhance customer engagement and feedback management. The company offers an AI chatbot that responds to customer inquiries around the clock, integrates with booking systems to facilitate reservations, and manages online reviews to improve reputation. Additionally, Yonder provides tools for distributing NPS surveys and analyzing customer feedback to help businesses understand and improve their service offerings. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Taranaki, New Zealand. In June 2024, Yonder was acquired by TOMIS.

name: D3 Bio
cb_description: D3 Bio operates as a biotechnology company specializing in the development and registration of innovative medicines within the oncology and immunology sectors. The company's approach to new medicine development is to identify unmet patient and market needs and guide research to create precision therapies. D3 Bio's research and development programs aim to establish a robust portfolio of assets with foundational properties for future therapies in multiple indications. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Wuxi, China.

name: Swipe
cb_description: Swipe is a digital studio that includes a team of consultants, concepters, designers, developers and marketers. Together we create solutions for the mobile era. We are masters at finding the means to do so - or inventing them.

name: Zipline
cb_description: Zipline is a company that specializes in the development of community-powered platforms within the technology sector. The company offers services such as creating custom-built social media platforms and apps, which are designed to foster community engagement and interaction for businesses, brands, and organizations. These platforms can include features such as live chat, e-learning capabilities, crowdfunding, and event management. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Norwich, England.

name: Trustmi
cb_description: Trustmi provides a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform to eliminate the risk of business-to-business (B2B) fraud. Its platform uses a combination of traditional cybersecurity and machine learning to equip accounting, treasury, and security teams with a counter-weapon against financial fraud. It assesses the safety of financial transactions, warns against suspected fraud, and identifies flaws in the process that may result from human error. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Urban Sky
cb_description: Urban Sky specializes in remote sensing technology within the aerospace industry. The company offers broad area aerial imagery and wildfire monitoring services using its zero-emission Stratospheric Microballoon, which provides data capture over large areas. Urban Sky's technology is utilized by sectors such as state and local government, disaster response, agriculture, and urban planning. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Hello Heart
cb_description: Hello Heart focuses on preventive heart health within the digital health sector. It offers a connected blood pressure monitor and an Artificial intelligence (AI) driven digital coaching application designed to help individuals manage their heart health by tracking key metrics like blood pressure and cholesterol. Its solutions are primarily utilized by employers and health plans to facilitate wellness programs and improve health outcomes. Hello Heart was formerly known as  Hello Doctor. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Lendio
cb_description: Lendio is a small business lending platform that operates in the financial technology sector. The company offers a range of financing solutions to small businesses through an integrated online application process, including loan matching with multiple lenders and automated loan decisioning. Lendio primarily serves the small business sector by providing access to various types of loans and financing options. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Lehi, Utah.

name: Guidewheel
cb_description: Guidewheel focuses on factory operations through its AI FactoryOps platform within the manufacturing sector. The company offers a suite of tools for machine monitoring, overall equipment effectiveness (OEE) tracking, predictive maintenance, and production optimization to improve efficiency and reduce costs. Guidewheel primarily serves the manufacturing industry, providing solutions to optimize production, reduce energy costs, and drive continuous improvement. Guidewheel was formerly known as Safi. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Tidio
cb_description: Tidio is a company that specializes in customer service software in the technology industry. The company offers a range of services including live chat, helpdesk support, multichannel communication, and analytics, all powered by artificial intelligence. These services are primarily targeted towards the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Szczecin, Poland.

name: Alaffia Health
cb_description: Alaffia Health specializes in artificial intelligence-powered payment integrity services within the health tech sector. The company offers solutions that automate pre-payment claim reviews and optimize claims processing for healthcare payers, aiming to reduce fraud, waste, and abuse. Alaffia Health primarily serves healthcare payers, cost-containment firms, and government agencies. Alaffia Health was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Allumia
cb_description: Allumia specializes in providing energy efficiency as a service (EEaaS) for the energy sector, focusing on energy efficiency upgrades. The company offers a software and internet of things (IoT) platform that enables utilities and businesses to manage energy efficiency programs, from planning to execution, including upgrades to lighting, heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC), and refrigeration systems. Allumia primarily serves small and medium-sized businesses and utility companies, helping them achieve their clean energy goals. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Fabric8Labs
cb_description: Fabric8Labs specializes in advanced metal 3D printing technologies within the additive manufacturing industry. The company offers Electrochemical Additive Manufacturing (ECAM) services that produce complex, high-resolution metal parts without the need for thermal processing. Fabric8Labs primarily serves sectors that require high-performance metal components, including industries that utilize temperature-sensitive substrates. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Rally
cb_description: We would like to introduce the most revolutionary application and website to join the social networking world. Lets take a look at the cornerstone of social networking, that is Facebook. The market has dissected Facebooks key features and formed companies that reflect those features. For example, Twitter took The wall, and formed a status sharing network, and Instagram took the picture sharing concept. Rally is here to take the event planning feature and dominate the shallow market. We are developing a prototype to begin our journey. Upon perfecting the app and website, we will be launching a cross country, college and big city tour, sponsoring events at every location. We are not only developing an app and website, we are building a brand, a lifestyle if you will. Rally will have a clothing line, a youtube channel, and a team of event promoters that will revolutionize the way we meet new people and create and attend events.

name: Hypersonix
cb_description: Hypersonix is a generative AI platform focused on commerce analytics and decision-making acceleration for the retail and eCommerce sectors. The company offers insights and recommendations for pricing, promotions, inventory management, and competitive analysis to help businesses make data-driven decisions rapidly. Hypersonix's solutions cater to the needs of merchandising and marketing teams, providing them with tools to optimize strategies and gain market share. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Equabli
cb_description: Equabli operates as a fintech company focused on creating a credit ecosystem within the financial sector. The company offers a debt management platform designed to for the debt recovery process for lenders, debt buyers, collection agencies, and providers. Equabli's platform provides tools and technologies that optimize outcomes for both lenders and borrowers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: UBQ Materials
cb_description: UBQ Materials specializes in transforming unrecyclable household waste into a sustainable thermoplastic material within the climate tech and advanced materials industry. The company's main offering is a patented bio-based thermoplastic that serves as an alternative to conventional plastics, designed to reduce carbon emissions. UBQ Materials' products are utilized across various industries, including automotive, construction, and consumer goods, to create environmentally friendly solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Turtlemint
cb_description: Turtlemint is an insurance brokerage firm that specializes in the comparison and purchase of various insurance products online. The company offers a range of services including car, bike, health, and life insurance, as well as assistance with insurance claims and policy renewals. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Sunroom Rentals
cb_description: Sunroom Rentals specializes in the residential leasing sector, simplifying the home rental process. The company offers a platform for renting single-family homes and provides leasing products and services to manage rental portfolios. Sunroom Rentals primarily serves property managers and real estate investors looking to expand their holdings. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Virtualness
cb_description: Virtualness is an authentication, verification, and engagement platform specializing in credentials, awards, events, phygital goods, and experiences, utilizing AI-powered blockchain technology. The company offers an end-to-end solution for designing authenticated badges with generative AI, minting them on the blockchain, adding rewards, and securely distributing them to a global audience efficiently. Virtualness primarily serves sectors that require secure digital authentication and engagement, such as award ceremonies, corporate events, and digital collectibles. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Cortex
cb_description: Cortex is a France-based print and document-processing firm.

name: Darwinbox
cb_description: Darwinbox is a company that specializes in human capital management and offers a suite of cloud-based HR solutions. Their platform leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning to automate day-to-day HR processes, provide actionable insights, and enhance employee experiences across various industries. Darwinbox's comprehensive offerings include workforce management, talent acquisition, payroll compliance, performance management, and employee engagement tools. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: Mend
cb_description:
Mend develops a self-care application designed to offer mental health and wellness. The company offers online programs designed to help individuals recover from heartbreak and burnout, using tools from psychology, mindfulness, coaching, nutrition, and science-backed research. It primarily serves the health and wellness sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.
.

name: CaPow
cb_description: CaPow develops a wireless power delivery ecosystem for autonomous robotics at logistics centers and last-mile delivery. It employs adaptive lock-in technology for power transfer over a capacitive field that continuously tunes the system characteristics to facilitate optimal transfer conditions under dynamic variations. The company offers services in power electronics, engineering, energy transfer, robotics, supply chain, fulfillment, wireless energy, manufacturing, automotive, and automation. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Beersheba, Israel.

name: Yik Yak
cb_description: Yik Yak is an anonymous chat app that helps college students connect with others. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia. In March 2023, Yik Yak, was acquired by Flower Ave. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Prismm
cb_description: Prismm is an online event planning software platform. It specializes in the event industry. The company offers a suite of tools for creating digital twins of physical spaces, immersive 3D visualization for event planning, and collaborative features for designing and managing event layouts. It primarily serves clients in the event planning and hospitality sectors. It was formerly known as Allseated and changed its name to Prismm. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: HomeLight
cb_description: HomeLight is a real estate company focused on simplifying residential real estate transactions for buyers, sellers, agents, and lenders. The company offers a platform that connects individuals with top real estate agents, facilitates cash offers for homes, and provides tools to eliminate home sale contingencies through bridge loans. HomeLight's services also include market analysis tools, home value calculators, and a streamlined closing process. HomeLight was formerly known as AgentBrain. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: LUNAR
cb_description: LUNAR is a design consulting firm that builds creative strategies that deliver stand-out products. The company offers design, engineering, user experience, insights and strategy services.

name: Mundimoto
cb_description: Mundimoto specializes in the sale of second-hand motorcycles and operates within the automotive retail industry. The company offers pre-owned motorcycles, which are professionally inspected and come with a one-year warranty, along with services such as financing, renting, and home delivery. Mundimoto caters to individuals looking to buy or sell motorcycles without visiting a dealership. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: 24M Technologies
cb_description: 24M Technologies is a company focused on the technology sector, specifically in the area of energy storage. The company's main offering is a revolutionary lithium-ion battery cell manufacturing process that aims to provide a simpler, more reliable, and safer production method. This technology is primarily targeted at sectors such as electric mobility, aerospace, stationary power, and lead-acid replacement. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Presagen
cb_description: Presagen is a company that focuses on AI-enhanced healthcare, operating within the healthcare and technology sectors. The company offers a decentralized data-centric AI platform that connects clinics and patients globally, enabling collaboration and data sharing to create scalable AI healthcare products. These products are designed to improve women's health outcomes, with a particular emphasis on fertility treatments. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Adelaide, South Australia.

name: Climax Foods
cb_description: Climax Foods specializes in the development of plant-based superfoods within the food industry, leveraging artificial intelligence to innovate in food production. The company offers a range of plant-based products designed to replicate the taste and texture of animal-based foods, focusing on cheese alternatives that are sustainable, nutritious, and free from common allergens. Climax Foods primarily serves the food industry, aiming to provide superior plant-based alternatives at a lower cost to consumers and the environment. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Monet
cb_description: Monet is a commercial capital and mortgage loan broker. It specializes in providing funding for a myriad of commercial projects as well as offering full business development and technical services.

name: LightForce
cb_description: LightForce specializes in advanced orthodontic solutions, focusing on the development and provision of 3D-printed dental braces and related software for the healthcare sector. The company offers fully customized ceramic braces, patient-specific indirect bonding trays, and a web-based treatment planning platform to optimize orthodontic practices and personalize patient care. LightForce primarily serves the orthodontic healthcare sector with its innovative technology. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Burlington, Massachusetts.

name: Anomaly
cb_description: Anomaly is a company that focuses on various projects, primarily in the dance industry. The company offers a range of services including dance, event management, media, film production, casting, promotion, and choreography. It primarily caters to the entertainment and media industry. It was founded in 2004 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: BioMap
cb_description: BioMap focuses on leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) to advance life sciences. The company develops AI Foundation Models to understand and predict biological behaviors and creates task models for various life science applications, including therapeutic antibodies and industrial enzymes. BioMap primarily serves the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industries with its AI-driven solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Preemadonna
cb_description: Preemadonna is a company focused on creative expression through interactive smart hardware in the beauty industry. The company's flagship product, Nailbot, is a device that prints personalized nail art and decals on fingernails in a matter of seconds. This product is primarily targeted towards the Gen Z demographic. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: WorkOS
cb_description: WorkOS is a developer-focused API platform that provides enterprise feature integration for SaaS applications. The company offers a suite of tools including user management, single sign-on, directory synchronization, and audit logs to streamline the process of making apps enterprise-ready. WorkOS primarily caters to the software development industry, enabling developers to incorporate complex enterprise functionalities with ease. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Smiler
cb_description: Smiler is a company focused on connecting clients with professional photographers for personalized photoshoot experiences in various cities around the world. The company offers a platform for booking photography sessions at iconic landmarks and other special locations, catering to individuals who wish to capture high-quality memories of their travels. Smiler primarily serves the travel and tourism sector, offering its services to travelers seeking to document their city trips with professional photographs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Mosaic
cb_description: Mosaic is a minority-certified commercial real estate development company with a focus on inclusive and sustainable projects across various sectors. The company specializes in ground-up construction and adaptive reuse of properties, including mixed-use residential, affordable housing, educational institutions, sports complexes, life sciences facilities, university housing, and hospitality. Mosaic aims to create positive community impacts through job creation, diversity, environmental sensitivity, and community acceptance. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: GetAccept
cb_description: GetAccept is a comprehensive digital sales room platform that operates within the sales and marketing technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools designed to streamline the sales process, including electronic signature facilitation, contract and proposal management, and sales engagement features. GetAccept's solutions are primarily utilized by revenue teams in industries such as IT & Tech, professional services, wholesale & retail, telecom & media, and staffing & recruitment. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Vertalo
cb_description: Vertalo is a company specializing in digital asset management and securities within the financial technology sector. It offers a B2B SaaS and API-based platform that serves as an SEC-registered Transfer Agent, enabling the tokenization and management of digital assets and securities. The company primarily caters to financial institutions and large enterprises seeking to modernize their shareholder registries and manage digital assets on-chain. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Elpha
cb_description: Elpha operates as a professional network for women offering content and access to a directory for women in the technology industry. It helps individuals learn from industry experts, and access opportunities and resources to help them grow and search for jobs. The company was formerly known as Leap. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Leocare
cb_description: Leocare is a neoinsurance company specializing in digital insurance services for various sectors. The company offers a range of insurance products including policies for cars, homes, motorbikes, student housing, bed bugs, and smartphones, all managed through a highly-rated mobile application. Leocare's platform allows customers to subscribe, customize, and manage their insurance policies online, as well as submit and track insurance claims with the support of AI-based tools. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: GetHarley
cb_description: GetHarley operates a skincare platform. It helps consumers find a personalized skincare plan and steer clear of illegitimate and unreliable products. It allows users to purchase products as part of a personalized plan that is suited to their specific skincare needs, with the support of dermatologists and plastic surgeons. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Endear Health
cb_description: Endear Health is a company focused on enhancing member experiences within the healthcare sector, specifically targeting older adults with their technology solutions. Their main offerings include a payor agnostic platform that facilitates onboarding and engagement for Medicare Advantage plans, leveraging an AI-driven smart benefits engine to provide personalized support and improve program engagement. The company primarily serves organizations involved in value-based care, such as Medicare Advantage plans and entities taking on healthcare-related risks. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Odilo
cb_description: Odilo is a company focused on providing digital learning solutions within the educational technology sector. Their main offerings include a digital learning platform that features a vast content ecosystem, utilizing artificial intelligence to deliver personalized learning experiences. Additionally, Odilo offers professional growth services and tools for learning engagement and data analytics. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Murcia, Spain.

name: Rainforest
cb_description: Rainforest is an e-commerce aggregator and brand builder specializing in the acquisition and scaling of e-commerce brands, particularly in the home and mom and baby product sectors. The company offers a suite of services including in-house marketing, product innovation, and brand development to enhance the growth and financial returns of the brands they acquire. Rainforest targets brands with a strong presence on Amazon FBA and seeks to expand them across new marketplaces and channels. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: StoreHub
cb_description: StoreHub is a company that focuses on providing an all-in-one platform for retailers and restaurants, operating primarily in the technology and retail sectors. The company offers a range of services including a cloud-based Point of Sale (POS) system, inventory management, customer engagement tools, and a loyalty program, all designed to automate and grow businesses. StoreHub primarily serves the retail and restaurant industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.

name: Ai Build
cb_description: Ai Build specializes in AI-powered 3D printing software within the additive manufacturing industry. The company offers a platform that facilitates the design and production of large-scale 3D printed parts and structures, with a focus on automation, optimization, and collaboration across various manufacturing sectors. Ai Build's software is designed to integrate with a range of hardware and materials, supporting technologies such as polymer extrusion, metal DED, WAAM, cold spray, and concrete and paste extrusion, while providing a digital thread for teams to manage production and scale operations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Abridge
cb_description: Abridge is a Software (non-internet/mobile) company based in New York, New York. Abridge's investors include Venrock, Angel Investors LP and EMC.

name: Magic
cb_description: Magic is a company that focuses on providing outsourcing services and virtual assistance, operating in the business services industry. The company offers a range of services including executive assistance, sales support, customer service, bookkeeping, and other administrative tasks. These services are primarily targeted towards high-growth companies across various sectors such as marketing, operations, customer support, sales, finance, and recruiting. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: AccurKardia
cb_description: AccurKardia specializes in electrocardiogram (ECG)-led diagnostics software in healthcare technology. The company offers clinical-grade, device-agnostic, and application programming interface (API) accessible software for automated ECG interpretation and arrhythmia detection. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Visibly
cb_description: Visibly focuses on providing on-demand and on-site certification and supervision courses in the education sector. The company offers recognised certification courses that equip field teams with the necessary knowledge and skills, without taking time away from their jobs. Visibly primarily serves sectors such as telecoms, utilities, construction, and green energy. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Gitpod
cb_description: Gitpod offers an open-source developer platform. The platform allows users to write, review, and run code to build and run projects. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Kiel, Germany.

name: 54gene
cb_description: 54gene develops an online genetics platform. It offers drug discovery and clinical trial programs. The company's main service involves the collection and utilization of genetic material, particularly from African populations, for pharmaceutical research and development. This service primarily caters to the pharmaceutical industry. The company was formerly known as Stack Diagnostics. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria. In September 2023, 54gene ceased operations.

name: Helius
cb_description: Helius was a Mobile & Telecommunications/Telecom Devices & Equipment company based in Lindon, Utah.  Helius was acquired in 2008.

name: Duos
cb_description: Duos provides financial management solutions specifically designed for couples in the personal finance sector. Its main offering is a free app that facilitates couples tracking and managing their finances together, simplifying the conversation around money. Its app provides tools for budget tracking, expense monitoring, and managing joint accounts without technical jargon. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Florianopolis, Brazil.

name: Kinetik
cb_description: Kinetik is a new way to get the best app recommendations from the people you care about. No more searching and browsing over 600.000 apps, with Kinetik you get app recommendations from your friends, peers, and the press.

name: Mile Auto
cb_description: Mile Auto is a pay-per-mile auto insurance company that operates in the insurance industry. The company's main service is offering auto insurance policies that are priced based on the miles driven by the customer, which is reported through their smartphone's camera once a month. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: RedStone
cb_description: RedStone specializes in cross-chain data oracles, providing pricing data for smart contracts and decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols within the blockchain industry. The company offers data streams that are frequently updated and delivered in a cost-efficient manner, catering to the needs of various decentralized applications (dApps). RedStone's services are tailored to support a wide range of assets and use cases in the DeFi space, ensuring reliable and affordable access to data across multiple blockchain ecosystems. RedStone was formerly known as Warp Contracts. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Baar, Switzerland.

name: everstox
cb_description: Everstox is a company that focuses on providing B2B and e-commerce logistics solutions in the consumer goods industry. The company offers a range of services including fulfillment of direct-to-consumer and B2B orders, shipping services, and warehousing services. These services are primarily targeted towards e-commerce brands and enterprises. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: LearnWorlds
cb_description: LearnWorlds is a comprehensive platform specializing in the creation, sale, and promotion of online courses for a variety of industries. The company provides a suite of tools for interactive video learning, course creation, and the management of online educational content. LearnWorlds serves a diverse clientele, including individual creators, enterprises, and educational institutions, offering solutions for customer and employee training, as well as professional development. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Limassol, Cyprus.

name: DeepL
cb_description: DeepL is a company that specializes in neural machine translation. The company offers a range of services including text translation in over 30 languages, document translation for various file formats, and an AI-powered writing tool that helps improve grammar, punctuation, and tone of voice. Its primary customers are individuals and businesses that require translation services. It was formerly known as Linguee. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Cologne, Germany.

name: Subskribe
cb_description: Subskribe is an adaptive quote-to-revenue platform tailored for modern SaaS companies in the software industry. The company offers a unified system for configuring, pricing, and quoting (CPQ), billing, and revenue recognition that is designed to streamline the quote-to-cash process. Subskribe's platform is built to support complex SaaS transactions, enabling businesses to close deals faster, bill with precision, and automate financial close processes without the need for extensive reconciliation. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Ramon, California.

name: Machinify
cb_description: Machinify focuses on leveraging healthcare data to optimize medical care and reduce costs within the healthcare industry. The company offers a software platform that utilizes machine learning, data analytics, and cloud processing to automate health claims processing, treatment authorization, and medical billing reviews. Machinify's solutions primarily serve the healthcare sector, including patients and payers, by streamlining complex processes and improving decision-making accuracy. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Pocket FM
cb_description: Pocket FM is a digital entertainment company specializing in audio storytelling within the entertainment sector. The company offers a platform for audio series that provides a personalized storytelling experience, encouraging 'binge listening' among its users. it primarily caters to the digital entertainment industry with its extensive diverse and engaging audio content repository. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Eloelo
cb_description: Eloelo is a live social entertainment platform operating in the media industry. The company offers interactive video and audio livestreams that allow creators to connect with viewers and fans, providing a space for community building and entertainment. Eloelo primarily caters to the digital and social media needs of Indian youth. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: All G Foods
cb_description: All G Foods is a biotech startup focused on the food and beverage industry, as well as the nutraceutical and infant nutrition sectors. The company uses precision fermentation technology to create proteins identical to those found in nature, offering sustainable solutions such as dairy proteins and plant-based meat alternatives. Their products primarily cater to the food-tech industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Waterloo, New South Wales.

name: Tiney
cb_description: Tiney operates as a childminder agency focused on providing early childhood education within the childcare sector. The company offers services that include supporting self-employed childminders with training, business setup, and ongoing professional development, as well as providing families with flexible, home-based learning environments for their children. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Endel
cb_description:
Endel is an industrial group in France that provides industrial maintenance and manages complex industrial projects. The company was founded in 1835 and is based in Colombes, France.

On April 4th, 2022, Endel was acquired by Altrad Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Armilla AI
cb_description: Armilla AI develops an artificial intelligence based governance platform to drive ethical decisions with transparency. The company helps its clients govern, validate, test, and monitor any models across the enterprise in a repeatable manner. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Hiboo
cb_description: Hiboo is a company focused on providing AI-driven assistance to women and underrepresented groups in the workplace, operating within the technology and AI sectors. The company offers an AI assistant that helps users with career planning, finding motivation, accountability, identifying mentors, and navigating salary raises. This AI assistant is designed to understand users' moods and deliver content to improve their emotional state. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Flatfile
cb_description: Flatfile specializes in AI-assisted data exchange solutions within the technology sector. The company offers a platform for importing, mapping, cleaning, and validating file-based data, designed to streamline data workflows and enhance data quality for businesses. Flatfile's platform is utilized by various sectors, including software development and enterprise data management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: RouteThis
cb_description: RouteThis is a company that focuses on providing WiFi installation, troubleshooting, and support software solutions, operating within the Service Providers, Internet of Things (IoT), and Smart Home industries. The company offers a platform that helps these industries troubleshoot, educate, and resolve customers' in-home device and WiFi connectivity issues through easy-to-use desktop and mobile applications. The primary sectors RouteThis serves are the service provider industry and the smart home/IoT industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Kitchener, Ontario.

name: Aardvark Therapeutics
cb_description:
Aardvark Therapeutics provides drug development services. 
It focused on developing small molecule therapeutics for metabolic and inflammatory diseases. The company's main offerings include developing and commercializing drugs that leverage gut-brain signaling to achieve therapeutic effects. It serves the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: RevenueCat
cb_description: RevenueCat specializes in subscription management and revenue growth for mobile and web applications. The company provides a platform that allows in-app purchases, automates receipt validation, and offers tools for monetization strategies such as A/B testing, paywall customization, and data analytics. It primarily serves software development teams, marketing departments, product managers, and customer support teams within the mobile app industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Brandon, Florida.

name: RoGO
cb_description: RoGO specializes in advanced satellite communication solutions for the emergency response and disaster management sectors. The company offers products that enable real-time critical communications and situational awareness for wildland firefighters and other first responders in remote, cellular-denied areas. RoGO's proprietary DropBlock technology facilitates GPS tracking of assets, transmission of IoT sensor data, and supports seamless integration with various communication platforms. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Westminster, Colorado.

name: Stytch
cb_description: Stytch is a developer-focused identity platform offering authentication, authorization, and fraud prevention services within the tech industry. The company provides a suite of tools including APIs and SDKs to enable secure and scalable identity management for various applications. Stytch caters to sectors such as SaaS, ecommerce, fintech, Web3, consumer tech, and healthcare. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Koya Medical
cb_description: Koya Medical focuses on developing treatments for venous and lymphatic diseases. The company offers a portable active compression system designed to support patient mobility and provide personalized care for conditions such as venous disease and lymphedema. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Flyability
cb_description: Flyability specializes in the development of drones designed for confined space inspections within various industries. The company's primary offerings include collision-tolerant drones that enable remote visual inspections and data collection in environments that are hazardous for humans. It caters to sectors such as oil and gas, maritime, power generation, chemicals, mining, and infrastructure. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Paudex, Switzerland.

name: Flinks
cb_description: Flinks is a financial data aggregator dedicated to the Canadian market. Flinks allows FinTech companies to connect their apps with customers' banks, allowing them to validate account ownership, verify account balances, or access transaction histories. The company was founded in 2016 and i sbased in Montreal, Canada. In August 2021, National Bank acquired a majority stake in Flinks.

name: BYHOURS
cb_description: BYHOURS is an online platform specializing in micro-stays at hotels, allowing customers to book rooms for short durations. The company offers flexible check-in times and bookings in hourly packages of 3, 6, or 24 hours, catering to travelers' specific time needs without the commitment of a full-day rate. BYHOURS primarily serves the travel and hospitality industry, providing services to individuals seeking accommodations for brief periods, such as during layovers, business trips, or short city breaks. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: theSkimm
cb_description: theSkimm is a digital media company focused on providing women with information to make confident decisions in various aspects of their lives, operating within the media and news industry. The company offers daily newsletters, non-partisan news coverage, and lifestyle advice, aiming to integrate seamlessly into women's daily routines. theSkimm primarily serves the digital media sector, with a particular emphasis on empowering female audiences. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Convene
cb_description: Convene offers end-to-end solutions for seamless payment and transaction management, handling all types of payments, including mobile payments, debt collection, and financing. It primarily serves the financial technology industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: Prelude
cb_description: Prelude offers a platform that offers a job interview scheduling solution. Its products include Prelude Coordinate for interview scheduling, Prelude Engage for personalized candidate journeys, Prelude Train for providing training, and Prelude Analyze for analyzing progress. Prelude was formerly known as Interview Schedule. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California. In September 2022, Prelude was acquired by Calendly. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Aprende Institute
cb_description: Aprende Institute is an online education platform that offers a wide range of programs and courses designed to empower individuals to start and grow their own businesses. The company provides training in various fields such as gastronomy, entrepreneurship, wellness, beauty, trades, and hospitality and events, with a focus on practical skills and professional development. Aprende Institute primarily serves the Spanish-speaking community, offering personalized learning experiences and support to help students achieve their career goals. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Coral Gables, Florida.

name: Flow
cb_description: Flow specializes in customer engagement solutions for the financial sector, offering a no-code platform that leverages payment data to drive revenue. The company provides AI-driven tools for segmenting customers, optimizing payment moments, and delivering real-time merchant offers, as well as upsell and cross-sell opportunities, without the need for engineering support. Flow's platform is designed to integrate seamlessly with financial institutions' existing systems, enabling personalized customer experiences and actionable insights. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Element
cb_description: Element is a modern AI company that operates in the digital identity sector. The company offers services such as real-time verification of biometrics data and government-issued documents, biometrics and liveness detection for customer engagement, and fraud risk assessment to strengthen digital account creation and financial product enrollment. Element primarily serves sectors that require digital delivery of products and services. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: FAVE
cb_description: FAVE is a mobile video content company that produces DIY SURAN, a hobby video class focusing on handmade crafts, and T:M, a text-based emotional app.

name: Headspace
cb_description: Headspace is a digital health company focused on mental wellness and mindfulness. It offers a suite of products including guided meditations, sleep aids, and mindful movement exercises designed to improve mental health and well-being. The company primarily serves individuals seeking personal mental health support and organizations looking to enhance employee well-being. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Karma
cb_description: Karma is a company focused on enhancing DAO governance through data-driven tools. It offers a suite of services that track and analyze governance contributions, provide visibility into delegate and contributor activities, and automate operations to increase engagement and accountability. These tools are primarily utilized by the decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) sector. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Medford, Massachusetts.

name: Biome Makers
cb_description: Biome Makers operates as an agriculture technology company. The company focuses on optimizing farming practices, improving soil health, and empowering sustainability. It provides an intelligence computing system (ICS) based on artificial intelligence (AI) with a proprietary database of microbial profiles, deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) sequencing workflow, and computing to monitor the relevant bio-indicators and analyze the functions of the existing microbe network. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Davis, California.

name: Qbiq
cb_description: Qbiq specializes in generative AI for real estate layout design and virtual tours within the real estate technology sector. The company offers automated architectural planning tools that enable quick visualization and optimization of office spaces. Qbiq primarily serves the real estate industry, including landlords, brokers, and architects, by providing technology that accelerates real estate deal cycles and enhances property marketing. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Seurat Technologies
cb_description: Seurat Technologies operates as a company focusing on transforming the manufacturing industry through its technology in the domain of metal additive manufacturing. The company offers a three-dimensional (3D) metal printing process that aims to compete with traditional manufacturing in terms of volume, quality, and price, with the added benefit of helping to offset carbon emissions. It primarily serves sectors such as energy and automotive. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Wilmington, Massachusetts.

name: Arccos Golf
cb_description: Arccos Golf specializes in golf performance tracking technology within the sports industry. The company offers a suite of products that include smart sensors and grips for golf clubs, an A.I. powered rangefinder, and an analytics platform that provides automatic shot tracking and real-time caddie advice to help golfers improve their game. Arccos Golf was formerly known as GolfKick LLC. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

name: Nanochon
cb_description: Nanochon focuses on advancing joint treatment technology within the medical device industry. The company specializes in developing a minimally invasive implant that supports immediate weight-bearing and motion, aiming to provide faster recovery and encourage new tissue growth for patients with joint injuries. Its technology targets the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: LineVision
cb_description: LineVision operates as a climate technology company. It specializes in electric utility grid monitoring and analytics. The company offers non-contact sensor technology and patented software solutions to provide dynamic line ratings, transmission line analytics, and insights into conductor health to enhance grid flexibility, resilience, and security. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Velotix
cb_description: Velotix provides a data security platform that operates within the data security and compliance sector. The company offers a suite of tools for data discovery, permission analysis, policy-based access control, and automated policy management to ensure secure and compliant data usage. It serves sectors such as financial services, insurance and healthcare, pharma/biotech, telecommunications, and higher education. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Treasury Prime
cb_description: Treasury Prime is an embedded banking platform that specializes in connecting businesses with a network of banks and financial service providers. Their main offerings include API banking integrations that enable companies to develop and launch financial products such as FDIC insured accounts, payment processing solutions, and debit card issuance. Treasury Prime's platform is designed to support compliance program integration and multi-bank operations, facilitating the creation of investment vehicles and instant payout ecosystems for various industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Finaloop
cb_description: Finaloop specializes in e-commerce accounting software and services, focusing on providing financial reconciliation and bookkeeping for direct-to-consumer (DTC), multichannel, and wholesale businesses. The company offers a solution that replaces traditional accounting software, bookkeepers, and tax CPAs. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: TrustCloud
cb_description: TrustCloud owns and operates an online platform. It offers the ability to respond to security questionnaires, confidently share security and compliance programs with customers, and complete compliance certifications by automating programs with application programming interfaces (APIs), using artificial intelligence (AI) to reduce manual work, and testing controls and policies to achieve continuous compliance and earn trust. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Trax
cb_description: Trax specializes in regulatory compliance solutions. It offers a digital platform for building code management. The company provides AI-based tools for searching, navigating, and managing building codes, as well as automating compliance processes for construction projects. Trax primarily serves professionals in the architecture, engineering, and construction (AEC) sector, as well as building officials and government bodies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Datalogz
cb_description: Datalogz bridges the gaps in its business intelligence environment. The company provides a data discovery and understanding platform for eliminating data confusion from any source. It also offers data analytics and insights, data-based decision-making, a data catalog, and cloud deployment, and it also assists in finding and understanding document data. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Long Island City, New York.

name: Predibase
cb_description: Predibase specializes in fine-tuning and serving large language models (LLMs) within the artificial intelligence and machine learning industries. The company provides a platform for developers to efficiently train and deploy task-specific open-source LLMs using optimized techniques such as quantization, low-rank adaptation, and memory-efficient distributed training. Predibase's infrastructure supports scalable managed deployments in both private clouds and their own serverless environment. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Ritual
cb_description: Ritual is a health and wellness company focused on the development of daily essential supplements. The company offers a range of multivitamins and health products that are non-GMO, vegan, and third-party tested, designed to support daily health, pregnancy, sleep, stress relief, gut health, and skin. Ritual primarily sells to individuals seeking transparent and traceable health supplements. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Culver City, California.

name: Elypta
cb_description: Elypta is a molecular diagnostics company focused on advancing cancer detection through a metabolism-based liquid biopsy. The company offers a noninvasive test to measure system biomarkers of tumor metabolism, known as the GAGome, and employs machine learning algorithms to detect cancer signatures. Elypta's primary market includes the healthcare sector, specifically in cancer diagnostics and patient monitoring. Elypta was formerly known as Aurora Life Sciences. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Solna, Sweden.

name: Payground
cb_description:
https://www.payground.me

payground is a sales tool that allows individuals to sell and distribute their digital creations directly to their audience without having to create their own website or share large portions of their proceeds with existing marketplaces. 
In less than 30 seconds, you can simply upload your product, set its price and start selling on Facebook, Twitter or your own website by only sharing a link. We take care of storage, payment process and product delivery.

name: Centricity
cb_description: Centricity operates as a software-as-a-service (SaaS) company providing micro-market pre-purchase intent data. It develops a workflow solution that measures consumer demand in real-time without complexities. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York. In June 2021, Centricity was acquired by Semios.

name: Tynt Technologies
cb_description: Tynt Technologies specializes in the development of dynamic windows for residential use, focusing on smart home technology. Their main offerings include windows that allow homeowners to control natural light and privacy levels, as well as improve energy efficiency through an innovative reversible metal electrodeposition technology. Tynt's products are designed to cater to the modern home, providing a seamless transition from clear to blackout states, and are aimed at reducing global greenhouse gas emissions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Floom
cb_description: Floom is an online marketplace that operates in the floral industry. The company's main service is providing a platform for independent florists to sell their unique floral arrangements, which are then delivered to customers, often on the same day. The company primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Pipedream Labs
cb_description: Pipedream Labs focuses on revolutionizing logistics through technology. The company offers an autonomous underground logistics system that enables the delivery of objects to and from homes and businesses. Pipedream Labs primarily serves the logistics and delivery industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Zedify
cb_description: Zedify focuses on sustainable and zero-emission delivery services within the logistics and transportation industry. The company offers urban last-mile delivery solutions using cargo bikes, aiming to reduce carbon emissions and improve delivery efficiency. It primarily serves the electronic commerce industry, providing integrated delivery services for online retailers. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: Spyderbat
cb_description: Spyderbat is a company that focuses on cloud-native runtime security in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that visualizes runtime app behavior, collects kernel-level workload data, and provides continuous monitoring to surface risk in real time. It primarily serves the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Onego Bio
cb_description: Onego Bio focuses on producing animal-free egg white protein through precision fermentation. The company offers Bioalbumen, a bioidentical egg white protein, as a sustainable and functional ingredient for the food industry. It primarily serves the food production sector, providing a stable and sustainable alternative to traditional egg proteins. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Chairish
cb_description: Chairish operates as an online marketplace specializing in vintage and contemporary furniture, decor, and art. The company offers a selection of home furnishings and designer accessories, providing a platform for buyers and sellers to transact. Chairish primarily caters to the interior design community, collectors, and home decor enthusiasts. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: WUZZUF
cb_description: WUZZUF is a leading job search platform and recruitment service in the employment sector. The company provides an online marketplace for job seekers to find career opportunities and for employers to post job vacancies and search for talent. WUZZUF caters to a wide range of industries and career levels, offering tools and services for career development and talent acquisition. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Bcomp
cb_description: Bcomp specializes in sustainable lightweighting solutions using bio-based materials within various industries. The company offers natural fibre-based reinforcement technologies include proprietary technologies such as powerRibs and ampliTex which are used to create materials that reduce weight and environmental impact. Primarily it serves the industrial sector. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Fribourg, Switzerland.

name: Airly
cb_description: Airly is a company that focuses on air quality monitoring and control, operating in the environmental technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive platform that provides real-time air quality data, enabling governments and businesses to make data-driven decisions to reduce emissions and protect public health. Its main customers are local governments, businesses, and communities seeking to improve their local air quality. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Workboard
cb_description: WorkBoard is a company that specializes in strategy execution and offers a platform designed to enhance organizational performance within various sectors. The company provides a suite of tools for aligning objectives and key results (OKRs), simplifying business reviews and scorecards, and focusing on outcomes through analytics and coaching. WorkBoard's products are primarily utilized by enterprises seeking to improve strategic alignment and execution. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: BuildClub
cb_description: BuildClub operates as a consolidated materials and logistics provider. The company offers a wide range of building materials, from drywall and electrical to paint and plumbing. BuildClub primarily serves small, mid-sized, and large contractors, as well as owner material buyers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: EPIC
cb_description: EPIC empowers creative professionals by facilitating creative rallies, and collaboration. It pairs hand-picked volunteers from creative class communities with nonprofit clients focused on children and education. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Kindred Motorworks
cb_description: Kindred Motorworks is a company focused on the automotive industry, specifically dealing with vintage vehicles. The company's main service involves taking vintage cars, trucks, or SUVs, and modernizing them to create high-quality, reliable vehicles that combine the nostalgia and timeless design of the past with today's safety and performance standards. Kindred Motorworks primarily caters to the automotive industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Rafael, California.

name: Teachmint
cb_description: Teachmint develops education-infrastructure solutions for the education ecosystem to deliver learning outcomes. Its service-as-a-software solution (SaaS) combines live classes, student engagement, and admin tools that focus on tutor-student connectivity with mobile-first and video-first teaching platforms. It helps teachers digitize their classrooms. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Cargobase
cb_description: Cargobase is a global logistics software company that operates in the transportation and freight management industry. The company offers a cloud-based logistics solution that supports the full shipment lifecycle, from procurement to tracking, auditing, and analytics. Its services are primarily used by sectors such as Automotive, Electronics, Semiconductor, Fashion, Oil & Gas, Aviation, and Agriculture. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Singapore.

name: Lucidya
cb_description: Lucidya is a company focused on customer experience management (CXM) within the technology sector. Its main offerings include tools for social media analytics, sentiment analysis, and integration of customer interactions across digital touchpoints. Lucidya's products are designed to provide insights into market and customer behavior, optimize customer service, and personalize customer experiences. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: FINN
cb_description: FINN is a strategic communication agency that specializes in integrated communication services for a diverse range of clients including Fortune 100 companies, scale-ups, government agencies, NGOs, and associations. The company offers high-level services such as corporate communication, digital marketing, public affairs, and media relations, designed to enhance clarity and purpose in organizational messaging. FINN's approach is rooted in principles that align communication with strategic business objectives, reflect organizational culture, engage in continuous dialogue with stakeholders, and utilize all relevant communication channels. It was founded in 2006.

name: Kuli Kuli
cb_description: Kuli Kuli is a health and wellness company focused on the production and distribution of moringa-based superfood products. The company offers a range of moringa powders, energy bars, teas, and supplements designed to provide nourishing, caffeine-free energy and a rich source of plant protein, vitamins, and antioxidants. Kuli Kuli's products are aimed at consumers seeking healthful dietary supplements and snacks. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Oakland, California.
