name: Tvision
cb_description: TVision is a company that specializes in enterprise resource planning (ERP), specifically in the domain of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central. The company offers services such as system implementation, support, and training, with a focus on integrating and managing key business functions like accounting, sales, purchasing, HR, and supply chain. TVision primarily serves various industry sectors, with a special emphasis on the drinks industry. It is based in Woking, England.

name: Behavox
cb_description: Behavox is a company specializing in AI-driven compliance solutions within the enterprise risk management and compliance sectors. The company offers a suite of products that secure text and voice communications data, monitor regulatory, conduct, and insider threat risks, and provide AI-powered archiving and analytics. Behavox's solutions cater to businesses seeking to enhance their compliance programs and safeguard against various risks. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: Lightbend
cb_description: Lightbend specializes in providing solutions for building, operating, and securing distributed applications in the cloud computing industry. The company offers tools and frameworks for creating resilient microservices, APIs, and data streams that can handle high concurrency and transactional workloads. Lightbend's services cater to businesses looking to modernize applications and infrastructure for digital experiences, data processing, AI inference, and edge computing tasks. Lightbend was formerly known as TypeSafe. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FruitSpec
cb_description: FruitSpec is a technology company focused on the agricultural sector. The company offers innovative inventory management services and autonomous technology to help fruit growers and marketers optimize yield-to-price. These services include accurate measurements, predictions, and decision tools that facilitate yield to market demand optimization. The company primarily serves the fresh produce supply chain. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Klaxoon
cb_description: Klaxoon specializes in work collaboration solutions. The company offers an all-in-one work collaboration platform to centralize information, enhance engagement, and boost productivity for various teams and projects. Klaxoon primarily serves sectors such as project management, sales, information technology (IT), human resources, and agile methodologies, offering tools like digital whiteboards, interactive sessions, and a suite of engagement tools to facilitate both in-office and remote work. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Rennes, France.

name: Divvy
cb_description: Divvy specializes in rent-to-own housing solutions, enabling customers to transition from renters to homeowners. The company offers a program where clients can rent their desired home with a portion of their monthly payments contributing to a down payment, while also providing tools and services to improve their credit score and prepare for a mortgage. Divvy primarily serves individuals and families looking to own a home without the immediate financial burden of a mortgage. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SamCart
cb_description: SamCart is an e-commerce platform focused on providing solutions for selling digital products online within various business sectors. The company offers a suite of features including innovative checkout options, conversion rate optimization tools, and the ability to manage subscriptions and affiliate programs. SamCart's services cater to creators and entrepreneurs in industries such as health & fitness, business & finance, self-help & wellness, and arts & creative. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Fulton, Maryland.

name: Dragos
cb_description: Dragos specializes in industrial cybersecurity for operational technology (OT) environments. The company offers a platform to provide visibility into industrial control systems (ICS) and OT assets, manage vulnerabilities, and detect and respond to threats. Dragos serves a diverse range of industries, including electric, oil and gas, manufacturing, and more, with solutions tailored to each sector's unique cybersecurity challenges. Dragos was formerly known as Dragos Security Services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Hanover, Maryland.

name: Queenly
cb_description: Queenly operates as a marketplace and search engine specializing in the formalwear domain. The company offers a platform for buying and selling a wide range of formal dresses, ensuring authentication, dry cleaning, and shipping services. It primarily serves the formal event sectors, including proms, weddings, pageants, and other special occasions. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Olive Diagnostics
cb_description: Olive Diagnostics focuses on digital diagnostics in the healthcare domain. The company offers a passive, non-invasive urinalysis sensor that can be mounted to any toilet, providing real-time health data. Its technology is primarily used in the healthcare industry for disease prevention, early detection, and chronic disease management. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: Delysium
cb_description: Delysium is a company focused on integrating artificial intelligence with blockchain technology to create a network for AI Agents within the Web3 domain. Its main offerings include an AI-powered Web3 operating system and a digital native financial infrastructure designed to facilitate autonomous interactions and enhance virtual commerce and personal engagements for AI Agents. The company primarily caters to sectors that require advanced AI collaboration and blockchain integration, such as virtual commerce and digital asset management. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: PassionFlix
cb_description: PassionFlix is a premium streaming service focused on adapting bestselling romance novels into visual media within the entertainment industry. The company offers a platform where users can watch movies and series that bring to life the stories from their favorite romance books. PassionFlix primarily caters to the entertainment and media sectors, specifically targeting audiences who enjoy romance novels and films. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Orchard Hill, Georgia.

name: Halo Investing
cb_description: Halo Investing provides a technology platform for protective investment solutions. The company offers a marketplace that connects financial advisors and investors to various protective investment products such as structured notes, buffered exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and annuities. Its products help manage market risks within wealth and retirement planning. It primarily serves the financial advisory sector and financial institutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Bicara Therapeutics
cb_description: Bicara Therapeutics serves as a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing first-in-class biologics for cancer treatment. The company's main offerings include dual-action biologics that combine targeted therapy with tumor modulators to enhance immune cell activity within the tumor microenvironment. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Plentina
cb_description: Plentina is a fintech startup focused on providing credit solutions in emerging markets. The company offers instant qualification for loans to purchase goods and services, which can be spent with partner merchants and repaid through various electronic methods. Plentina primarily serves consumers looking to build their credit history and make cashless payments to merchants. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Belmont, California.

name: OM1
cb_description: OM1 is a technology and data company focusing on personalized medicine and real-world evidence research within the healthcare sector. The company offers solutions for real-world data analytics, evidence generation, and AI-driven predictive medicine, aiming to transform patient data into actionable insights for healthcare providers and researchers. OM1's services are primarily utilized by the healthcare industry, including pharmaceutical and medical device companies. OM1 was formerly known as Better Outcomes. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: defi SOLUTIONS
cb_description: defi SOLUTIONS specializes in providing comprehensive software solutions for the auto lending industry. The company offers a suite of products that facilitate the entire lending lifecycle, including loan origination, loan servicing, and managed servicing, all designed to enhance digital borrower interaction and automate decisioning processes. defi SOLUTIONS' software suite is tailored to meet the needs of lenders by offering scalable, configurable, and API-enabled platforms that support loan acquisition, servicing, default management, and disposition. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Westlake, Texas.

name: FleetOps
cb_description: FleetOps is a company focused on transforming the trucking industry through a freight matching platform that leverages ELD and TMS solutions. The company offers services that integrate smart applications across the freight industry to optimize operational data and facilitate better planning and delivery of freight. FleetOps primarily serves logistics service providers, trucking companies, and broker partners by providing tools for automating repetitive tasks, making informed decisions, and accessing personalized load recommendations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Ontario. FleetOps operates as a subsidiary of FleetRover.

name: Zet
cb_description: Zet is a marketplace for designer products and operates within the e-commerce industry. The company offers an e-commerce platform that allows users to create online stores, list products, and conduct sales over the internet without requiring technical knowledge. Zet primarily caters to individual designers and small businesses looking to sell products online. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Mustard
cb_description: Mustard ceased operations. Mustard platform allows companies to apply to interview pre-screened engineers. Its platform connects tools and automates workflows. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Dublin 2, Ireland.

name: Pngme
cb_description: Pngme is a digital finance platform that provides financial insights and credit scoring for financial institutions. The company offers services that enable the analysis of users' financial behavior and the creation of real-time digital financial products using machine learning models and data from multiple financial institutions. Pngme's platform is designed for developers, offering an Android SDK and REST APIs to build and optimize financial services, while maintaining a strong commitment to security and privacy compliance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Atlar
cb_description: Atlar specializes in financial management for modern finance teams, operating within the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform that manages cash, processes payments, and integrates with ERP systems to provide real-time financial data and analytics. Atlar's platform serves various sectors, including finance, treasury, and product teams within mid-market and enterprise organizations. Atlar was formerly known as Avantir. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Acceldata
cb_description: Acceldata is a company focused on enterprise data observability within the data management and analytics industry. The company offers a platform that monitors enterprise data systems, ensuring data reliability, optimizing costs, and providing observability for compute and query operations. Acceldata's platform is designed to support data-driven enterprises by providing insights into data pipelines, quality, and performance across cloud, on-premises, and hybrid environments. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Campbell, California.

name: Atom
cb_description: Atom is a company that focuses on Computerized Maintenance Management Systems within the technology industry. The company offers a robust and intuitive desktop and mobile application that allows users to manage their work, inventory, team, scheduling, budgeting, and reporting. It primarily serves sectors such as maintenance management, asset management, operations management, inspections, and mobile workforce management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in North Hollywood, California.

name: Outer
cb_description: Outer focuses on the production and sale of outdoor furniture. It offers a range of outdoor furniture products, including sofas, chairs, fire pit tables, and other accessories, all designed to enhance the outdoor living experience. Outer primarily sells to consumers, utilizing a direct-to-consumer model. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Picterra
cb_description: Picterra focuses on providing geospatial artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The company offers services that allow users to detect objects, monitor changes, and discover patterns in geospatial data, with a focus on sustainability. Its main customers are from various sectors including forestry and carbon markets, agriculture and regenerative farming, mining, and quarries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chavannes, Switzerland.

name: FRANQ
cb_description: FRANQ provides strategic insights to businesses, operating within the business intelligence and customer feedback industry. The company offers services that help businesses understand why they win or lose prospects and customers through buyer feedback, aiming to improve their win and retention rates. FRANQ primarily serves the sales, marketing, and customer success sectors. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Big Health
cb_description: Big Health focuses on digital therapeutics in the mental health sector. The company offers digital programs that provide support for individuals dealing with common mental health conditions such as insomnia, anxiety, and depression. Its programs deliver non-drug alternatives, offering cognitive and behavioral techniques to improve mood and emotional well-being. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Rimsys
cb_description: Rimsys provides Regulatory Information Management (RIM) software specifically designed for the medical technology sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform that digitizes and automates regulatory activities, helping medtech companies manage product registrations, submissions, UDI, standards, and essential principles more efficiently. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Strangeworks
cb_description: Strangeworks provides quantum computing software. It helps accessibility by building and delivering tools for software developers and researchers, and systems management for administrators. The company provides quantum tools to the aerospace, energy, finance, and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Oddle
cb_description: Oddle is a technology company that focuses on providing online solutions for the restaurant industry. The company offers a range of services including online ordering for deliveries and takeaways, reservation management, QR ordering, and payment terminal services. Additionally, Oddle provides customer relationship management and marketing services to help restaurants understand their customer data and grow their sales. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Singapore.

name: Skims
cb_description: Skims operates as a solutions-oriented brand. The company offers technically constructed shapewear that enhances curves and underwear that can stretch to twice its size. Skims was formerly known as Kimono Intimates. It operates in the apparel industry,  It was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: ClientSuccess
cb_description: ClientSuccess focuses on customer success management in the Software as a Service (SaaS) industry. The company offers a platform that provides tools, insights, and analytics to manage customer relationships, measure customer health, and minimize churn, thereby maximizing revenue. It primarily serves the SaaS industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in American Fork, Utah.

name: Saporo
cb_description: Saporo specializes in cybersecurity, focusing on identity attack surface management within the information technology domain. The company offers solutions for reducing attack surfaces, resisting ransomware, prioritizing vulnerabilities, and monitoring security postures, aimed at helping in cyber resistance by managing and securing user and system access. It primarily serves sectors that require robust identity and access management, such as financial institutions, healthcare organizations, and large enterprises. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: Sevco Security
cb_description: Sevco Security specializes in asset intelligence and vulnerability management within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a platform that provides comprehensive visibility and prioritization of vulnerabilities, automates remediation processes, and validates the effectiveness of security measures. Sevco Security's solutions are designed to enhance the security posture of organizations by ensuring that all assets are accounted for and properly managed. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Mapbox
cb_description: Mapbox is a real-time location platform that specializes in location-aware technologies for various businesses. The company offers a suite of tools including custom map rendering, navigation SDKs, geocoding services, and comprehensive geospatial datasets. Mapbox primarily serves sectors that require location intelligence, such as automotive, logistics, real estate, and telecommunications. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Akkio
cb_description: Akkio is an AI data platform focused on enhancing performance optimization for agencies within the marketing and advertising sector. The platform offers predictive analytics and real-time decision-making tools to improve client engagement throughout the lifecycle, from pitching to campaign optimization. Akkio's solutions are designed to integrate and prepare data, provide AI-powered analytics, and automate reporting processes without the need for coding expertise. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Coris
cb_description: Coris specializes in merchant risk management for the financial services sector, offering a suite of tools designed to enhance small business risk assessment and monitoring. The company provides solutions such as real-time data intelligence, automated risk actions, and merchant profiling to streamline the risk management process. Coris's products are primarily utilized by Vertical SaaS companies, Fintechs, and Payment processors to improve their services in areas like payments, banking, payroll, and insurance. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Scrut
cb_description: Scrut specializes in governance, risk, and compliance for modern businesses within the GRC sector. The company offers a platform that focuses on these processes, amis to make them more accessible and manageable for companies. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Delhi, India.

name: Pipedream
cb_description: Pipedream is a workflow automation platform that specializes in connecting APIs for developers across various industries. The company provides a serverless infrastructure where developers can integrate APIs using both code and no-code options, manage authentication, and eliminate the need for managing infrastructure. Pipedream's platform is designed to process events, execute custom logic in multiple programming languages, and offer a suite of pre-built components for rapid development. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Ruangguru
cb_description: Ruangguru provides an online marketplace connecting private tutors and students. The company offers courses ranging from traditional classroom subjects to less-common computer education and sports skills, and tutors that specialize in test preparation, language studies, and musical theory. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: 3Bee
cb_description: 3Bee develops Internet of Things (IoT) systems designed to monitor beehives. Its products include the HiveTech system that interprets the needs of bees through special sensors placed within the monitored beam; BioScan, an automatic pollinator counting system that uses artificial intelligence to recognize wild pollinator types; and Terra, a neural network system that analyzes vegetation biodiversity over European states, in collaboration with ESA. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: ZEBEDEE
cb_description: ZEBEDEE is a company that focuses on integrating Bitcoin and Lightning support into digital experiences, particularly in the gaming industry. The company offers solutions that allow game developers to implement real money rewards into their games, thereby enhancing player engagement and retention. ZEBEDEE primarily serves the gaming industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Hoboken, New Jersey.

name: Wyebot
cb_description: Wyebot is a company that specializes in AI-driven WiFi automation, operating within the technology and wireless network industry. The company's main offering is a platform that uses artificial intelligence to analyze, optimize, and automatically identify and solve problems for WiFi networks. Wyebot primarily serves sectors such as education, manufacturing, warehousing, enterprise, and healthcare. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Marlborough, Massachusetts.

name: Trusted
cb_description: Trusted Labs offers an on-demand babysitting app. In minutes, users can review and select a child care provider for guaranteed same day, next day, or next week coverage.

name: BasicBlock
cb_description: BasicBlock focuses on providing financial services in the trucking sector. The company offers freight factoring services, which allow truck drivers to request and track payments, with a promise of payment within 48 hours of invoice submission. The company primarily serves the transportation industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Omaha, Nebraska.

name: 11Sight
cb_description: 11Sight is a customer engagement platform specializing in inbound video call solutions and AI-driven lead qualification within the sales and marketing technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools that facilitate live video chat engagements, automate lead qualification and meeting preparation, and integrate with CRM systems to enhance sales team efficiency and pipeline conversion rates. 11Sight primarily serves revenue teams looking to optimize their sales processes and customer engagement strategies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Infogrid
cb_description: Infogrid specializes in building intelligence, focusing on the smart building solutions sector. The company offers services that include smart cleaning, energy reduction, and energy reporting to optimize building operations and sustainability. Infogrid primarily serves stakeholders in commercial real estate and facilities management who are looking for operational efficiency and sustainability. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Gradia Health
cb_description: Gradia Health focuses on providing integrated concierge healthcare services within the healthcare industry. The company offers a platform for clinics to enhance their services to patients, particularly those with chronic conditions, aiming to improve patient care and clinic revenue. Gradia Health primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on clinics looking to offer high-touch, personalized care to their patients. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Orlando, Florida.

name: Landmark Health
cb_description: Landmark provides home-based medical care services. The company offers mobile teams of healthcare, including doctors, physician's assistants, and nurse practitioners, to make house calls to patients with chronic conditions. It primarily caters to the Healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Huntington Beach, California. In February 2021, Landmark Health was acquired by Optum.

name: Kapwing
cb_description: Kapwing specializes in digital storytelling. The company offers a suite of browser-based tools that enable people to produce videos from any device, providing infrastructure for collaborative video creation and helping media companies scale content production. It primarily serves the media industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Tines
cb_description: Tines is an automation platform that focuses on enhancing team efficiency across various business sectors by automating repetitive manual tasks. The company offers a no-code solution that allows integration with any technology stack and provides a library of prebuilt templates for common actions, enabling users to automate complex workflows without the need for custom code. Tines primarily serves sectors that require workflow automation, such as security operations, IT, infrastructure, engineering, and product development. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Wirepas
cb_description: Wirepas focuses on the Internet of Things (IoT) sector. The company offers a Connectivity Suite and a 5G Mesh technology, which provide reliable and scalable connectivity solutions for massive IoT deployments. These solutions are primarily used in sectors such as smart tracking, smart energy and city management, smart building, and smart manufacturing. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Tampere, Finland.

name: Aerones
cb_description: Aerones specializes in robotic wind turbine maintenance and inspection services within the renewable energy sector. The company offers a range of services including blade and tower cleaning, lightning protection system inspections, internal and external blade inspections, and various repair and coating applications, all performed using advanced robotic technology. Aerones primarily serves the renewable energy sector, with a focus on wind turbine operators seeking maintenance and inspection solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Riga, Latvia.

name: Resend
cb_description: Resend specializes in email solutions for developers within the technology sector. The company offers a platform for sending transactional and marketing emails, providing a simple interface, easy integrations, and email templates that can be used by developers to ensure emails reach their intended recipients effectively. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Mosyle
cb_description: Mosyle specializes in Apple device management and security across various sectors, offering a unified platform for businesses, schools, and managed service providers. Their services include advanced device management capabilities, next-generation security tools, and privacy solutions specifically designed for Apple products. Mosyle caters primarily to the education sector, enterprise businesses, and managed service providers, providing them with comprehensive tools to manage and secure their Apple devices. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Winter Park, Florida.

name: AltoVita
cb_description: AltoVita is a company that focuses on providing corporate housing solutions, operating within the property-tech industry. The company offers a platform for sourcing and booking vetted corporate accommodation, catering to both business travel and global mobility needs. AltoVita primarily serves the corporate travel and global mobility sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: American Theological Library Association
cb_description: American Theological Library Association is a membership association and producer of research tools focused on advancing the study of religion and theology. The company offers bibliographic information and full-text collections of journal articles covering a wide range of topics and languages, designed to support the research needs of students, scholars, and religious leaders. These research tools are available through subscribing libraries and include resources developed collaboratively by Atla members. It is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Qodo
cb_description: Qodo specializes in enhancing code integrity and quality within the software development industry. The company offers a suite of tools that integrate with development environments to generate meaningful tests, ensure code quality, and automate parts of the development process. It primarily serves the software development industry. It was formerly known as CodiumAI. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Delphinus Medical Technologies
cb_description: Delphinus Medical Technologies is a medical imaging company that develops SoftVue, a circular array transducer technology. The technology is a whole breast ultrasound imaging device that delivers no radiation and images the entire breast with a single scan. It is indicated for use as a B-mode ultrasonic imaging system. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Novi, Michigan.

name: INURU
cb_description: INURU specializes in low-cost OLED technology, focusing on the lighting and display industry. The company offers printed OLED products that are designed to be paper-thin, recyclable, and integrated into various applications such as packaging, clothing, and marketing materials. INURU's solutions cater to sectors that require innovative lighting and display technologies, including the medical packaging industry, fashion, and retail marketing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Upstream
cb_description: Upstream provides automotive cybersecurity and data management solutions. It offers a cloud-based platform that secures, optimizes, and enhances connected vehicles, providing cybersecurity detection and response, application program interface (API) security, and advanced analytics. It serves such as automotive manufacturers, suppliers, and other stakeholders in the automotive industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: Candidly
cb_description: Candidly is an Android app that allows users to click and share pictures and make them disappear from friends' phones after 10 seconds. Candidly allows users to click pictures, doodle on top of them or put their comments on them in voice or text messages, and share them with friends.

name: hiyacar
cb_description: Hiyacar is a peer-to-peer car sharing platform operating in the transportation industry. The company's main service involves facilitating car owners to rent out their vehicles, and providing a platform for individuals to rent these cars for their personal use. The company primarily serves the transportation sector. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: ClusterTruck
cb_description: ClusterTruck plans to partner with food trucks, license their recipes, prepare them in non-restaurant kitchens and transport them to online order-placers.

name: beoble
cb_description: Beoble is a company focused on messaging and social ecosystem development for Web 3.0. The company offers an end-to-end encrypted communication window for wallet-to-wallet interactions and a user-owned Web 3.0 product. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Jinx
cb_description: Jinx is a clothing brand that focuses on the apparel industry, specifically targeting the geek and nerd culture. The company offers clothing items that celebrate various aspects of geek culture, including computer technology, gaming, and popular science fiction and fantasy franchises. Jinx primarily caters to the consumer goods sector, with a particular emphasis on the gaming and tech communities. It was founded in 2004 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: LearnLux
cb_description: LearnLux focuses on providing financial well-being services in the financial planning and advisory industry. The company offers a digital platform that provides employees with financial planning tools and access to certified financial planner professionals for personalized guidance. The platform includes features such as benefits education, digital planning tools, and interactive content to help employees manage their finances. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: SuperCede
cb_description: SuperCede was a Software (non-internet/mobile) company based in Bellevue, Washington.  SuperCede was acquired in 1999.

name: Superpedestrian
cb_description: Superpedestrian operates and develops a range of transportation robotics in the technological industry. The company develops technologies for micro-electric vehicles, focusing on optimizing safety and performance. It primarily sells to the micromobility sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Superpedestrian ceased its operations in December 2023.

name: Iris Automation
cb_description: Iris Automation provides artificial intelligence (AI) solutions for industrial drones. It offers Casia, an onboard computer vision system that uses machine learning algorithms to detect and classify objects in the drone's flight path. Casio allows drones to operate beyond visual line of sight (BVLOS), which is used for many commercial applications such as surveying, inspection, and delivery. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Reno, Nevada. In October 2023, Iris Automation was acquired by uAvionix.

name: Astronomer
cb_description: Astronomer focuses on data orchestration and workflow management within the data engineering domain. The company offers Astro, a data orchestration platform powered by Apache Airflow, which helps companies for the deployment of data pipelines, scale operations, and maintain enterprise-grade security. The platform primarily serves sectors that require data pipeline management, such as financial services, technology, retail, and electronic commerce. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Opontia
cb_description: Opontia is a company that specializes in the acquisition and growth of e-commerce brands within the Eastern Europe, The Middle East, and Africa (EEMEA) region. They offer a streamlined process for small e-commerce business owners to sell their companies, focusing on brands with a strong competitive advantage and customer loyalty. Opontia targets profitable online businesses with a minimum of $10k USD in monthly revenue and a strong, independent brand presence. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Embr Labs
cb_description: Embr Labs specializes in wearable thermal technology, focusing on personal temperature control within the consumer electronics sector. The company offers a device that provides heating and cooling sensations to improve personal comfort, manage hot flashes, aid sleep, relieve stress, and assist with temperature regulation during and after exercise. Embr Labs primarily serves individuals seeking personal climate control solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Charlestown, Massachusetts.

name: Electric
cb_description:
Electric is an independently owned eyewear and accessories brand. Designed in California and made in Italy, it is rooted in and inspired by Southern Californias rich music, art, surfing and snowboarding cultures.

On January 14th, 2022, Electric was acquired by FitLab. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: CannaSoul Analytics
cb_description: CannaSoul Analytics is a drug discovery company specializing in the development of therapeutics derived from natural compounds within the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers a range of services including analytical chemistry support, bioanalytics, compound extraction and isolation, as well as pre-clinical and clinical study support. CannaSoul Analytics primarily serves the pharmaceutical and botanical research sectors with a focus on cannabis and psilocybin research. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Caesarea, Israel.

name: Virohan
cb_description: Virohan operates as an Ed-Tech company that specializes in healthcare education, providing training for careers in the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of paramedical courses and certifications that are recognized by UGC, NSDC, and NCrF, utilizing a blended learning approach to deliver technical skills and workplace readiness. Its programs cater to individuals seeking to advance their careers in the healthcare industry, with a focus on job placement support and career development. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Haryana, India.

name: TrustInSoft
cb_description: TrustInSoft is a company that focuses on software security and safety in the technology industry. The company offers an exhaustive static analysis tool, TrustInSoft Analyzer, which interprets source code to detect threats and coding errors, ensuring software is immune from vulnerabilities and does not crash. TrustInSoft primarily serves sectors such as semiconductors, telecom/mobile, automotive, and industrial IoT. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Paris, France.

name: AdaSwap
cb_description: AdaSwap is a decentralized exchange platform focused on the Cardano blockchain ecosystem. It offers services such as token swapping, bridging, and trading between Cardano-based tokens and stablecoins, as well as providing staking rewards and governance participation through its native token. AdaSwap primarily serves the decentralized finance sector, with a particular emphasis on the Cardano community. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Sweet Security
cb_description: Sweet Security operates as a company focused on cloud security in the technology sector. It offers a cloud runtime security suite, which provides security for cloud workloads, enabling companies to discover everything in their environment and proactively mitigate attacks. The company primarily serves the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Renude
cb_description: Renude specializes in personalized skincare routines within the beauty and personal care industry. The company offers AI-driven skin analysis and consultations with licensed aestheticians to create customized skincare regimens tailored to individual needs and budgets. Renude's services cater to those seeking professional and unbiased skincare advice, with a focus on using dermatologist-approved products. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Spacemesh
cb_description: Spacemesh delivers a block mesh operating system powering a secure and scalable smart contracts global computer and a cryptocurrency in permissionless settings. It offers blockchain protocols for running a node on a standard desktop to use cloud computing. The company protocols also eliminate the advantages of joining a virtual mining pool. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in North Pole, Alaska.

name: Sure
cb_description: Sure is a technology company in the insurtech industry that provides a platform for insurance distribution, policy management, and claims processing, along with tools for agents and APIs for integration. Sure serves insurance carriers, brands, marketplaces, SaaS providers, and managing general agents (MGAs) with its offerings. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CLAIR
cb_description: Manufacturer of solutions for improving indoor air quality. The company provides systems which use the principles of air filtration and re-circulation to capture airborne particles. The mobile air purifiers use replaceable filters that require no tools to change.  [Keywords: cleantech, environment, air]

name: Visolis
cb_description: Visolis focuses on the manufacturing of carbon-negative materials within the synthetic biology sector. The company's technology leverages synthetic biology and chemical catalysis to produce a range of chemicals suitable for various industries to offer alternatives to traditional materials. Visolis primarily serves sectors that require specialty materials, such as the cosmetics and automotive industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Hayward, California.

name: Tangibly
cb_description: Tangibly focuses on trade secret compliance within the business sector. The company offers a web-based platform that aids in the management and protection of trade secrets and confidential information within an organization. It primarily serves businesses across various sectors that need to protect their intellectual assets. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.

name: Vui App
cb_description: Vui App is a technology company focused on providing financial services through its Earned Wage Access platform. The company offers a solution that allows employees to access their earned wages on-demand, aiming to empower workers with safe financial services and assist employers in attracting and retaining talent. Vui App primarily serves the human resources and financial sectors by offering services that enhance employee benefits and reduce financial stress. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Ha Noi, Vietnam.

name: DNABlock
cb_description: DNABlock specializes in AI-assisted 3D animation and character creation within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables creators to produce high-fidelity, real-time animated content and digital humans with ease. DNABlock's services cater to various creative industries, including gaming, virtual production, and social media content creation. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Retool
cb_description: Retool is a development platform focused on accelerating the creation of internal software within various business sectors. The company offers a suite of tools that enable drag-and-drop interface design, workflow automation, mobile app development, and integration with databases and external applications. Retool primarily serves engineering teams in startups and Fortune 500 companies, providing solutions that enhance developer productivity and enterprise-scale deployment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Waymark
cb_description: Waymark is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence (AI) in the video production industry. The company's main service is an AI video creator that automatically generates personalized commercials and spec spots based on a single prompt, making it easy and quick for users to create high-impact ads. The primary sectors that Waymark sells to include the media industry, sales industry, and advertising agencies. Waymark was formerly known as Stik. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: mParticle
cb_description: mParticle is a customer data platform that specializes in data management and personalization for multi-channel consumer brands. The company offers a suite of services that enable businesses to gather AI-powered customer insights, create unified customer profiles, and activate data across various channels for personalized experiences. mParticle's solutions are designed to enhance customer understanding, lower acquisition costs, and increase the lifetime value of customers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: DevZero
cb_description: DevZero focuses on providing a cloud development environment platform. The company offers a platform that provides cloud-developed environments to help in infrastructure management solutions and virtualized desktops. Primarily, It caters to the needs of the software development industry. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: SupPlant
cb_description: SupPlant specializes in precision agriculture. The company offers sensor-based and autonomous irrigation solutions, as well as sensorless technology, which collects crop-related data and provides personalized irrigation recommendations. The company primarily serves the agriculture industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Afula, Israel.

name: Smartcat
cb_description: Smartcat specializes in language AI solutions for the translation and localization industry. The company offers a comprehensive AI translation platform that provides automatic translations, content generation, and streamlined human workflows for various types of content. Smartcat primarily serves global enterprises, enabling them to localize content across multiple formats and languages, manage translation projects efficiently, and access a vast marketplace of language professionals for scalable editing processes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: ShopShops
cb_description: ShopShops specializes in retail livestream shopping experiences. The company offers a platform where customers can join live shopping events, interact with hosts and other shoppers, and purchase a variety of pre-owned and new luxury fashion items across various categories. The company offers a wide range of products including bags, shoes, jewelry, accessories, and watches from top designers, providing a platform for customers to purchase authenticated luxury goods at reduced prices. ShopShops features a livestream shopping platform, available worldwide 24/7. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Griptape
cb_description: Griptape is a company focused on providing an AI development platform for enterprises in the technology sector. They offer a framework and cloud services that enable developers to build, deploy, and manage AI-powered applications with a focus on retrieval-driven tasks and AI agent integration. Their services facilitate the creation of data ETL pipelines, retrieval patterns, and scalable AI workflows without the need for extensive AI or prompt engineering knowledge. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Mercer Island, Washington.

name: Stellar Labs
cb_description: Stellar Labs is a technology company focused on the business aviation sector. The company offers an online exchange platform for business aviation, along with technology solutions for pricing, charter quoting, customer interactions, and analytics. Its primary customers are charter operators, brokers, and corporate flight departments. It is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: GreenLight
cb_description: GreenLight is a social discovery platform that finds new people you are likely to get along with based on your personality. As we all get busier and demand things to happen faster, social discovery will become a more and more prevalent part of our lives. Its already easy to stay in touch with the people you know - now its easy to find new people you will want to know. We do this by using the things you like, and the things you dont, to build a profile of the type of person you are.

name: Acorai
cb_description: Acorai focuses on developing medical devices within the healthcare sector, specifically targeting heart failure management. The company offers a non-invasive heart monitor that utilizes a combination of seismic, acoustic, visual, and electrocardiographic sensors, along with machine learning, to estimate intracardiac pressures for personalized treatment. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Helsingborg, Sweden.

name: Podium
cb_description: Podium is a company that focuses on the creation and organization of sporting events, operating in the sports and event management industry. The company's main services include the organization of professional and amateur sporting events, sports tourism consulting, sports travel management, and brand design and communication. Podium primarily serves the sports industry. It is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

name: RightBound
cb_description: RightBound is a company that focuses on sales development in the technology industry. The company offers services such as autonomous list building, contact enrichment, account prioritization and discovery, and AI-generated sequences, all aimed at optimizing outbound sales processes. RightBound primarily serves the sales and marketing sectors of the economy. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: Mobile Data Labs
cb_description: Mobile Data Labs provides digital solutions in transportation. The company offers a service that automatically tracks mileage for individuals and teams, which can be used for tax deductions and reimbursements. Its service primarily caters to individuals and businesses that require accurate mileage tracking for financial purposes. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Treggo
cb_description: Treggo specializes in last-mile delivery solutions for the e-commerce sector. The company offers same-day delivery, logistics management, real-time shipment tracking, and route optimization to ensure timely and secure package deliveries. Treggo primarily serves online businesses, SMBs, retailers, and third-party logistics providers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

name: HeyJobs
cb_description: HeyJobs is a talent acquisition platform. The company leverages machine learning algorithms and performance marketing to match job seekers with suitable job opportunities. HeyJobs offers a variety of job listings across multiple industries, enabling users to filter by preferences such as salary, work hours, and location. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Beep
cb_description: Beep is an audio hardware and software startup. Beep offers a companion controller that can hook into any speaker or amplifier that has an auxiliary or optical input and make that speaker WiFi enabled.

name: Nawah Scientific
cb_description: Nawah Scientific develops advanced research equipment in natural and medical sciences. The company offers a range of services including the analysis of samples, product development and analysis for various industries, and support for academic research in life sciences. Its primary customers are industries such as pharmaceuticals, chemicals, and agriculture, as well as academic institutions in disciplines of life sciences. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Metaview
cb_description: Metaview specializes in automating the note-taking process for recruitment interviews within the human resources technology sector. It offers AI-powered tools that generate, summarize, and structure interview notes, allowing recruiters to focus on the interaction with candidates and hiring teams. Its solutions integrate with existing recruitment tools and workflows, ensuring seamless adoption and compliance with privacy regulations. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: AppsFlyer
cb_description: AppsFlyer provides mobile marketing analytics and attribution within the digital marketing sector. The company offers tools for measuring marketing ROI, analyzing campaign performance, optimizing creative strategies, enhancing customer engagement, and protecting against ad fraud. AppsFlyer's solutions aim to help businesses make data-driven decisions while addressing customer privacy. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: zkMe
cb_description: zkMe specializes in decentralized identity verification within the blockchain sector. The company offers identity oracles that utilize zero-knowledge proofs to provide secure, private, and self-sovereign credential verifications. zkMe's solutions cater to both individual users, who can control their credential visibility and earn rewards, and businesses, which can integrate compliance tracking and leverage user data for insights without compromising privacy. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

name: Archbee
cb_description: Archbee specializes in knowledge sharing and customer support automation for technical teams. The company offers a suite of tools for creating, maintaining, and sharing both private and public documentation, with features including artificial intelligence (AI) - powered assistance, real-time collaboration, and customizable content blocks. Archbee's platform is designed to answer questions for users, developers, and team members efficiently. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Newark, Delaware.

name: Polly
cb_description: Polly is a company that focuses on providing life insurance services in the financial sector. The company offers life insurance policies designed to provide financial protection for families, particularly targeting mothers, by paying out a lump sum in the event of the policyholder's death. Polly primarily serves the financial services industry. It is based in Bristol, England.

name: Duality
cb_description: Duality specializes in digital twin simulation technology within the artificial intelligence and robotics domains. The company offers a digital twin platform that enables customers to test and refine artificial intelligence models for real-world applications, ensuring safety and predictability. It primarily serves sectors that require advanced simulation for autonomous systems, process automation, and AI model validation. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Vega
cb_description: Vega creates and trades derivatives on a decentralized network. It offers a Vega wallet, validate and secure network, permission-less market creation, purpose-built blockchain, cross-chain support, and more. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Gibraltar, Gibraltar.

name: aCommerce
cb_description: aCommerce is a company that focuses on e-commerce enablement, operating within the e-commerce and software solutions industry. The company offers a range of services including digital marketing, online store development and management, data analytics, customer care, and fulfillment and delivery services. These services primarily cater to the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

name: Voxel51
cb_description: Voxel51 specializes in the development of tools for computer vision and machine learning. The company offers a suite of products that enable users to explore, visualize, and curate visual data, as well as evaluate and refine machine learning models for improved performance. Voxel51 primarily serves sectors that require visual AI applications, such as agriculture, aviation, driving, healthcare, manufacturing, retail, robotics, security, and sports. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: Credgenics
cb_description: Credgenics specializes in debt collection and resolution. The company offers a platform that uses technology and automation to manage debt collection, and litigation systems for financial institutions, banks, and non-banking financial companies. It provides services such as automated debt collections, resolution software, and debt recovery services. It works with financial institutions, banks, non-banking financial companies (NBFCs), and digital lending firms for their collection. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Noida, India.

name: SingleOps
cb_description: SingleOps is a company that focuses on providing business software solutions, specifically in the landscaping and tree care industry. The company offers a range of services including customer and sales management, jobs management, team and equipment management, financial management, and data management. These services are primarily targeted towards sectors such as tree care, residential landscaping, commercial landscaping, design build, plant health care, irrigation, and synthetic turf. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Eligo Bioscience
cb_description: Eligo Bioscience provides biotechnology services. It focuses on the development of biotherapeutics for microbiome precision editing. The company's service involves the use of in vivo gene editing technologies to target the microbiome and address diseases with unmet needs. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Cosmo Tech
cb_description: Cosmo Tech specializes in artificial intelligence (AI)-simulation technology and enterprise digital twins for optimizing complex industrial systems. The company offers a decision-making tool that enables users to simulate operational strategies and assess the impact of various scenarios on enterprise decision-making. Cosmo Tech's solutions are designed to help organizations manage their supply chain and asset lifecycle, utilizing advanced modeling and simulation capabilities to anticipate disruptions, improve decision-making, and balance sustainability with profitability. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Lyon, France.

name: Prevedere
cb_description: Prevedere specializes in intelligent forecasting solutions. The company offers services that allow businesses to understand and quantify the impact of external factors on their operations. These services include predictive analytics technology and econometric modeling, which help in strategic planning and forecasting. It primarily serves sectors such as consumer goods, retail, manufacturing, insurance, logistics, private equity, automotive, and travel and hospitality. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: NeuralSpace
cb_description: NeuralSpace is a technology company focused on artificial intelligence for content creation and localization within the AI industry. The company offers a platform that provides tools for AI dubbing, subtitling, and content amplification, enabling creators to produce and scale authentic content in over 100 languages. NeuralSpace caters to individual creators, creative teams, and large enterprises, offering solutions that enhance the creative process and ensure content reaches a global audience. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: WayRay
cb_description: WayRay is a deep technology company specializing in holographic augmented reality (AR) technologies within the automotive industry and beyond. The company's main offerings include holographic AR head-up displays for vehicles, which integrate information into the driver's view without the need for eyewear or headgear, and smart glass applications for various environments. WayRay's products primarily cater to the automotive sector, transportation and heavy machinery industries, and infrastructure by enhancing navigation and operational efficiency with their AR solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland. In September 2023 WayRay filed for bankruptcy.

name: NowPay
cb_description: NowPay operates as a financial technology company. It focuses on improving the financial wellness of corporate employees by enabling employees to get paid at any point of time during the month. It offers all-time salary access, bill payments, shopping installments, and internal money transfers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Echodyne
cb_description: Echodyne specializes in advanced radar solutions with a focus on defense, government, and commercial sectors. The company offers products that provide situational awareness and data accuracy for intelligent systems and autonomous machines, utilizing their proprietary metamaterials electronically scanned array (MESA) technology. Echodyne's radars are designed to integrate seamlessly with other systems and offer high data fidelity for decision-making processes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: Branch International
cb_description: Branch International offers a mobile application. The company offers a range of digital banking products such as instant loans, money transfers, bill payments, high-yield investments, and savings, all accessible via a smartphone-based application. Branch International primarily serves customers in emerging markets. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: NEON
cb_description: NEON aids in the support and expansion of the metaverse's vision. It is based in New York, New York.

name: AlphaPoint
cb_description: AlphaPoint specializes in white-label software solutions for cryptocurrency exchange operators in the financial technology sector. The company provides a comprehensive suite of tools for digital asset and cryptocurrency exchange operations, including exchange technology, liquidity solutions, digital asset wallets, custody software, and yield platforms. AlphaPoint's technology also supports the creation and management of security tokens using blockchain. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Captain Experiences
cb_description: Captain Experiences provides an adventure sports planning portal that offers an outdoor sports experience. The platform allows users to filter their results based on location, prices, and target species such as tarpon, blue marlin, salmon, large-mouth bass, redfish, trout, cobia, and kingfish. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Galveston, Texas.

name: Flow
cb_description: Flow specializes in customer engagement solutions for the financial sector, offering a no-code platform that leverages payment data to drive revenue. The company provides AI-driven tools for segmenting customers, optimizing payment moments, and delivering real-time merchant offers, as well as upsell and cross-sell opportunities, without the need for engineering support. Flow's platform is designed to integrate seamlessly with financial institutions' existing systems, enabling personalized customer experiences and actionable insights. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Signifyd
cb_description: Signifyd provides e-commerce fraud protection and prevention services. The company offers services, including revenue protection, abuse prevention, and payment compliance, all aimed at maximizing conversion and eliminating fraud and consumer abuse. These services primarily cater to the e-commerce industry. Signifyd was founded in 2011 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Strava
cb_description: Strava is a social network platform focused on connecting athletes and providing tools for tracking and analyzing athletic activities in various sports sectors. The company offers a mobile app and website that allow users to record activities, analyze performance data, and engage with a community of athletes. Strava's services cater to a diverse range of sports including running, cycling, hiking, and many others, with features that support activity tracking, social interaction, and event discovery. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Melonn
cb_description: Melonn is a company focused on providing end-to-end fulfillment solutions for the ecommerce sector. They offer services that integrate inventory management, reduce stock errors, improve delivery times, and ensure customer satisfaction without the use of technical jargon. Melonn primarily serves the ecommerce industry, with a particular focus on enabling businesses to scale across sales platforms and regions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Medellin, Colombia.

name: Mubert
cb_description: Mubert specializes in music licensing. The company offers AI-powered, real-time generative music services, allowing users to create custom soundtracks for their content, such as videos, podcasts, and applications. It also provides a platform for artists to earn money by contributing tracks, samples, and loops. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: LongPath Technologies
cb_description: LongPath Technologies focuses on methane emissions monitoring and measurement within the oil and gas industry. The company offers continuous methane emissions monitoring solutions that provide real-time, quantitative emission rate data for mitigation and abatement of methane, aiming to enhance regulatory compliance and operational efficiency. LongPath's technology is adaptable for various asset types. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Embroker
cb_description: Embroker is a digital insurance brokerage firm specializing in business insurance solutions across various industries. The company offers a range of commercial insurance packages, including professional liability, cybersecurity, and directors and officers insurance, tailored to meet the specific needs of businesses. Embroker primarily serves sectors such as startups, law firms, tech companies, and financial services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Outmin
cb_description: Outmin specializes in automated accounting services for the hospitality sector, leveraging artificial intelligence to streamline financial operations. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including bookkeeping, tax compliance, payroll management, and real-time financial reporting, all designed to provide actionable insights for business growth. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: EthonAI
cb_description: EthonAI provides an AI-enabled platform designed to detect and prevent quality defects in manufacturing. It offers a suite of software tools designed to improve overall equipment effectiveness (OEE) by providing insights, root cause analysis, visual inspection capabilities, material flow analysis, and process monitoring. Its products cater to various manufacturing industries, including electronics, semiconductors, and food production. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: SmileMD
cb_description: SmileMD is a company focused on providing mobile dental anesthesia services within the healthcare sector. They specialize in offering safe and convenient in-office anesthesia for dental practices, ensuring a standard of care comparable to hospitals. The company primarily serves dental practices looking to improve patient care through accessible anesthesia solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

name: Alan
cb_description: Alan is a company focused on providing health insurance services and preventive health solutions within the healthcare industry. The company offers health insurance plans, a healthcare system navigation tool through Alan Clinic, and mental well-being support with Alan Mind, designed to improve the health and productivity of individuals and corporate employees. Alan primarily serves diverse sectors including tech startups, hospitality, public sector, retail, and industrial businesses. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Flossy
cb_description: Flossy makes prescription oral care affordable and accessible online, offering virtual consultations and custom formulas for cavities, sensitivity and much more. Flossy was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: SunCulture
cb_description: SunCulture focuses on the integration of solar energy systems and irrigation equipment within the renewable energy and agriculture sectors. The company offerings include Internet of Things (IoT) enabled solar energy systems that provide reliable access to water, irrigation, lighting, and mobile charging for smallholder farmers. It serves the smallholder farming sector. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Nimble Science
cb_description: Nimble Science specializes in small intestine sampling technology within the biotechnology sector. The company offers a platform for direct sampling and analysis of targeted regions of the gastrointestinal tract, aiming to provide comprehensive microbiome data sets. Nimble Science primarily serves the healthcare and medical research industries with its innovative sampling technology. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Calgary, Canada.

name: Lattice
cb_description: Lattice operates as a people management platform and specializes in performance and engagement software for businesses. The company offers various tools for performance management, employee engagement, compensation alignment, and professional growth, all powered by artificial intelligence (AI) driven insights. It primarily serves sectors such as technology, professional services, and financial institutions, among others. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: NEWPhotonics
cb_description: NEWPhotonics is a fabless chip startup focused on improving the energy efficiency of data centers. The company's main product is a highly efficient 'All-Optic' processing chip that replaces power-hungry CMOS electronic chips, reducing power consumption and latency while increasing capacity. NEWPhotonics primarily serves the data center industry. It is based in Petah Tikva, Israel.

name: Trovata
cb_description: Trovata specializes in automating cash management processes within the financial technology sector. The company provides solutions for cash flow analysis, cash reporting, cash forecasting, cash positioning, transaction search, and payments, aimed at simplifying financial data aggregation and enhancing decision-making for businesses. Trovata's platform serves various sectors within the economy, including treasury, finance, accounting, and the C-suite, by offering a modern approach to managing cash operations and strategic insights. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Solana Beach, California.

name: DeltaStream
cb_description: DeltaStream is a company focused on unified stream processing within the data management and analytics sector. It offers a serverless platform for managing, securing, and processing data streams, enabling organizations to build real-time streaming applications and pipelines with SQL. The platform caters to a variety of use cases including real-time analytics, data management, security, and modernization. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Ampverse
cb_description: Ampverse is a company that focuses on the esports and gaming industry. It offers data-driven, tech-enabled, and creative marketing solutions, primarily targeting gaming communities and intellectual properties. The company's main services include the operation of esports teams, social communities, and original content formats, as well as the development of esports tournament IPs. Additionally, Ampverse provides marketing solutions for esports influencers and tech products for marketers that optimize strategies with advanced algorithms and data-driven insights. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore.

name: Prenuvo
cb_description: Prenuvo is a health tech company specializing in whole body MRI screening for the early detection of cancer and other diseases. The company offers comprehensive, non-invasive scans that utilize AI-augmented analysis to provide detailed medical reports, without the use of harmful ionizing radiation. Prenuvo's services are designed to empower patients and physicians with accurate diagnostic information for proactive health management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Circular
cb_description: Circular offers an infinitely scrolling feed of content based on people you follow and topics that interest you.

name: HoneyBook
cb_description: HoneyBook offers a client flow management platform for independent businesses. The company offers a range of services including online contracts, invoices, payments, scheduling, and automation tools, all designed to streamline business operations. Its primary market is the independent business sector. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Scalable Capital
cb_description: Scalable Capital is a financial technology company specializing in digital wealth management and brokerage services. The company offers a platform for trading stocks, exchange-traded funds, and other financial instruments, as well as automated wealth management services using globally diversified exchange-traded fund portfolios. Scalable Capital primarily serves private individuals looking to invest and manage their assets. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: FanUp
cb_description: FanUp is a gamified fantasy sports and pop culture gaming platform that operates within the entertainment and gaming industry. The company offers a variety of contests and challenges that allow users to engage with sports, esports, and pop culture events, and win prizes such as sports memorabilia and experiences with celebrities. FanUp primarily caters to a community of Gen Z, women, and casual fans, offering social experiences and integrating with popular social media platforms. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Securden
cb_description: Securden is a company focused on privileged access governance within the cybersecurity sector. Its main offerings include solutions for managing and securing privileged accounts, storing sensitive credentials, and enforcing least privilege across IT environments. Securden's products are designed to serve various sectors, including financial institutions, government agencies, healthcare organizations, educational institutions, IT service providers, MSPs, and manufacturing companies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Sennder
cb_description: Sennder operates as a digital road freight forwarder specializing in full truckload (FTL) services within the logistics and transportation industry. The company connects large commercial shippers with small freight carriers, offering a platform that automates, and provides transparency for the road freight market. Sennder's services include booking, live tracking of shipments, and logistics management solutions that integrate with shippers' existing systems. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: DataPelago
cb_description: DataPelago focuses on developing advanced analytics solutions in the data industry. Its main offerings include a differentiated solution for extracting instantaneous insights from data, regardless of its scale, speed, or structure, with exceptional performance and cost efficiency. The company primarily serves sectors that require cutting-edge data processing and analytics capabilities. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Idle Smart
cb_description: Idle Smart specializes in idle reduction technology for the transportation sector. The company offers an automated idle reduction system that monitors and controls engine and cabin temperature, as well as battery voltage levels, to reduce fuel costs and prevent vehicle downtime. Idle Smart primarily serves the trucking industry, providing solutions that ensure operational efficiency and cost savings for fleet owners and owner-operators. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Lenox, Massachusetts.

name: VitroLabs
cb_description: VitroLabs is a biotechnology company focused on producing lab-grown leather within the sustainable materials sector. Their main offering is the cultivation of real, ethical leather through a process that harnesses tissue engineering and cellular agriculture, aiming to provide a humane and environmentally friendly alternative to traditional leather. VitroLabs primarily collaborates with fashion brands to integrate their cultivated leather into various products. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Relation Therapeutics
cb_description: Relation Therapeutics focuses on drug discovery. The company combines machine learning and biological data to understand diseases and discover new therapeutics. Its main service involves using machine learning to understand the relationships between genes, proteins, and drugs, and a system to integrate active learning at every step of drug discovery. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: DataStax
cb_description: DataStax specializes in providing a comprehensive generative AI stack for the development and deployment of production-ready applications within the technology sector. The company offers a RAG API that supports both vector and structured data, ensuring secure, compliant, and scalable solutions that are integrated with leading AI ecosystem partners. DataStax primarily caters to developers and enterprises looking to leverage generative AI technologies across various cloud platforms. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Koa Health
cb_description: Koa Health is a company that focuses on providing mental healthcare services in the healthcare industry. The company offers a range of digital and human-delivered mental health services, including prevention, treatment, and personalized care options. These services are primarily targeted towards employers and health plans, aiming to provide accessible mental healthcare for their workforce and members. It is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Tagboard
cb_description: Tagboard is an Emmy-nominated audience experience platform operating in the media and entertainment industry. The company provides tools for interactive storytelling, real-time content curation, and social media integration to enhance live broadcasts and engage audiences. Tagboard's solutions are primarily utilized by the sports, news, and entertainment sectors to create dynamic and interactive content experiences. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Redmond, Washington.

name: Carsome
cb_description: Carsome provides an e-commerce platform, specializing in the online buying and selling of used cars. The company offers a comprehensive service that includes car inspection, valuation, an online bidding portal for dealers, and logistics support, ensuring a seamless selling experience for customers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.

name: QTUM
cb_description: QTUM is a hybrid blockchain platform that focuses on combining the strengths of Bitcoin and Ethereum technologies to offer a scalable and decentralized proof-of-stake network. The platform provides an environment for smart contracts and decentralized applications, with compatibility for Ethereum Virtual Machine and support for industry-standard tokens and NFTs. QTUM's ecosystem is designed to facilitate fast transactions and offers a multi-wallet infrastructure and various tools for developers, including a web3 proxy adapter for easy porting of applications. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: yummy
cb_description: Yummy Town (2726.TW) is a Taiwan-based company that operates several casual dining and bubble tea brands worldwide. It mainly operates its businesses in mainland China.

name: Carmoola
cb_description: Carmoola specializes in providing digital car finance solutions within the financial services sector.
