The company offers hire purchase and personal contract purchase plans, as well as refinancing options to facilitate the ownership and management of vehicles. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: watchTowr
cb_description: watchTowr is a cybersecurity technology company specializing in external attack surface management and continuous automated red teaming. The company offers a platform that simulates cyber attackers to help organizations identify and defend against vulnerabilities in their IT infrastructure. watchTowr primarily serves industries such as technology, banking, pharmaceuticals, insurance, managed security service providers, and gambling. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Aviva
cb_description: Aviva serves as a financial services company that focuses on providing credit solutions to underserved communities in Latin America. The company offers loans and credit cards using a digital strategy that combines physical kiosks and digital processes, facilitated by documentless video onboarding and AI risk assessment. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Cuauhtemoc, Mexico.

name: MoveEasy
cb_description: MoveEasy is a company that focuses on providing moving and home management services in the real estate sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies the process of moving and managing a home, providing services such as insurance, utility transfers, home security, and access to service providers for mortgage and cleaning. It also provides a personal concierge service to assist homeowners in managing their homes and finding deals. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

name: Ascent Integrated Tech
cb_description: Ascent Integrated Tech specializes in advanced technology solutions for indoor location monitoring in GPS-denied environments, primarily serving the public safety sector. The company offers a system that provides tracking of personnel, including their elevation and health status. Ascent's technology is designed to integrate with existing platforms, adding precise indoor tracking capabilities to software solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: SplashLearn
cb_description: SplashLearn is an educational technology company that specializes in game-based learning for children in pre-kindergarten to grade 5. The company offers a curriculum that includes educational games and interactive worksheets designed to make learning math and English fun and engaging. SplashLearn primarily serves the educational sector, providing resources for teachers and engaging content for students. SplashLearn was formerly known as Minglebrain Solutions Pvt Ltd. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: baraka
cb_description: Baraka operates as a financial technology company in investment and trading. The company provides a platform that enables users to invest in a diverse range of stocks and exchange-traded funds (ETFs). It provides educational content, market news, and in-depth stock analysis, and offers access to the stock markets. It primarily serves the financial services sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Buffer
cb_description: Buffer is a social media management platform that operates in the marketing and advertising industry. The company offers a suite of tools that enable users to create, publish, analyze, and engage with content across various social media channels. Buffer's products are designed to help users grow their audience, manage their social media presence, and improve their marketing efficiency without requiring extensive technical knowledge. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Kidizen
cb_description: Kidizen provides an online marketplace. It offers a platform for buying and selling gently used and new children's clothing, shoes, and essentials. Kidizen was formerly known as Itizen. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Saint Paul, Minnesota.

name: Tripp
cb_description: Tripp operates as a digital wellness company developing immersive experiences and an extended reality (XR) solution that supports mental wellness, focus, and productivity. It builds the metaverse through a mobile application that compiles hours of meditations, sound frequencies, nature sounds, music, and teachings with animations to support patients. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Tripleseat
cb_description: Tripleseat focuses on providing website-based event management and catering solutions. The company offers a platform that focuses on the booking process for restaurants, hotels, and unique venues. The platform captures leads, generates necessary documents, and provides a calendar for easy event management. It primarily serves restaurants, hotels, and, special venues. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Concord, Massachusetts.

name: Fairmarkit
cb_description: Fairmarkit operates an intelligent sourcing platform. It offers procurement and supply chain services such as procurement transformation, strategic sourcing, and transforming tail spending with automation and artificial intelligence. It serves clients in the logistics sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Lemonada Media
cb_description: Lemonada Media is a podcast network focused on delivering content that aims to enhance the human experience within the audio entertainment industry. The company produces a wide array of podcasts covering various topics, designed to provide listeners with engaging, thought-provoking, and entertaining narratives. Lemonada Media's podcasts cater to a diverse audience looking for quality storytelling and insightful discussions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Stable
cb_description: Stable provides hedging solutions in the financial sector, specifically for commodity prices. The company offers a platform that aids clients to protect themselves against commodity prices. Stable primarily serves sectors that require risk management for untraded commodity markets. It was formerly known as AOX Capital. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.

name: Keyzy
cb_description: Keyzy works as a company that specializes in providing a rent-to-own housing solution within the real estate sector. The company offers a zero deposit option for potential homeowners to rent a property with the ability to buy it later, while locking in today's property price and converting a portion of the rent into a deposit for future purchases. Keyzy primarily serves young professionals, key workers, and first-time buyers looking to own a home without the traditional mortgage constraints. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Virtru
cb_description: Virtru specializes in data privacy and protection, operating within the data security industry. The company offers end-to-end encryption services for data shared through various platforms, including email and file-sharing, cloud, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) solutions. It primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, education, government, and financial services. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Roam
cb_description: Roam is a global co-living provider operating in the hospitality industry. The company offers a unique service where customers sign a single lease and gain access to various properties across three continents, each equipped with co-working spaces, commercial-grade kitchens, media and laundry rooms, and diverse programming. Roam primarily caters to the needs of digital nomads and individuals seeking flexible housing solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AltSchool Africa
cb_description: AltSchool Africa focuses on education and skill development. It offers a variety of programs and courses in areas such as engineering, product development, data analysis, business, and the creative economy. The company primarily serves individuals seeking to upskill or change careers, with a particular emphasis on the tech industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Kigali, Rwanda.

name: Garuda Therapeutics
cb_description: Garuda Therapeutics operates as a company focused on the development of hematopoietic stem cell therapies. It provides the creation of off-the-shelf blood stem cell therapies designed to treat a broad range of severe and life-threatening diseases, to eliminate dependency on donor or patient cells. Garuda Therapeutics was formerly known as L Stem. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: ArchiPro
cb_description: ArchiPro is a platform focused on the architecture, building, and design industry. The company offers a marketplace where users can discover and specify quality products for their building projects, and also find trusted professionals in the field. ArchiPro primarily serves the architecture and construction industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: DevRev
cb_description: DevRev specializes in AI-native platforms and applications for the SaaS industry. Its main offerings include modern CRM apps for support, product, and growth teams, designed to streamline collaboration, analytics, and customer engagement. Its products are tailored to enhance the customer experience, automate product management, and provide advanced analytics for decision-making. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: YUBO
cb_description: YUBO lunchboxes are stylish, easy to clean, and help to prevent waste, not create it. The lunchboxes come in different designs and can also be personalized.

name: GuardKnox
cb_description: GuardKnox is an autotech company focused on developing high-performance products for next-generation vehicle E/E architecture within the automotive technology sector. The company offers solutions such as secure service-oriented frameworks, advanced communication systems, and cybersecurity technologies designed to enable software-defined vehicles and enhance driver-centric mobility. GuardKnox's products are secure by design, offering flexibility and scalability to meet the evolving needs of automotive manufacturers and consumers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ramla, Israel.

name: Remix Therapeutics
cb_description: Remix Therapeutics focuses on the development of therapies. The company's main offerings include the development of small molecule therapies that reprogram ribonucleic acid (RNA) processing to treat diseases. It aims to correct dysregulation or eliminate deleterious genes, providing a novel approach to treating diseases. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Watertown, Massachusetts.

name: CancerIQ
cb_description: CancerIQ is a healthcare technology company that focuses on cancer prevention and early detection. It offers solutions that standardize risk assessment, track medical management changes, and automate documentation. Its services are primarily used in the healthcare sector, particularly by providers in oncology, genetics, breast centers, and preventive care. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Cumulus Digital Systems
cb_description: Cumulus Digital Systems builds an internet of tools-powered platform. It offers bolted joint management, digital pressure testing, workflow builder, intelligent welding, and more. The company serves energy, construction, manufacturing, transportation, chemicals, and other industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: XR Games
cb_description: XR Games is an award-winning game development studio, focusing on the creation of immersive content in the gaming industry. The company specializes in developing console and mobile games, with a particular emphasis on augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) games. The primary customer base of XR Games is likely to be within the gaming industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Leeds, England.

name: Illuma
cb_description: Illuma serves as a company specializing in voice authentication and fraud prevention within the financial technology sector. Its product, Illuma Shield, offers seamless voice verification and fraud protection services for contact centers at credit unions and community banks, aiming to enhance caller experience, reduce call handle times, and increase account security. The company primarily serves the financial industry, with a focus on community financial institutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Plano, Texas.

name: Soldo
cb_description: Soldo operates as a financial services and software company in the financial technology industry. The company offers a spend management platform that automates business and employee spending, along with prepaid company cards that provide real-time tracking and control over expenses. It primarily serves businesses across various sectors, with a focus on reducing financial administrative burdens. It was formerly known as PX Technology. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Instreamatic
cb_description: Instreamatic is a company specializing in AI-driven optimization for audio and video advertising within the digital marketing sector. The company offers a platform that transforms existing ads into personalized versions using AI, automates A/B testing, and provides campaign management services to enhance ad relevance, conversion, and return on ad spend. Instreamatic primarily serves sectors that include automotive, quick-service restaurants, retail, e-commerce, and sports betting. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Sonoma Biotherapeutics
cb_description: Sonoma Biotherapeutics operates as a clinical-stage biotechnology company. It develops adoptive cell therapies for autoimmune and degenerative diseases. It focuses on the research and development of T-cell (Treg) therapies for rheumatoid arthritis, inflammatory bowel diseases, and other autoimmune diseases. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: BOLD
cb_description:
BOLD is a consultancy firm that has the knowledge, expertise and experience to support and lead businesses by combining strategies with its hands-on analyze, advise, execute approach. In addition, BOLD provides clients with an interim service utilizing a network of experts who can be brought into assignments on an as-needed basis. It is based in Utrecht, Netherlands.

On December 14th, 2021, BOLD was acquired by FTI Consulting. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Qashier
cb_description: Qashier specializes in integrated point-of-sale and payment solutions within the financial technology sector. The company offers a flagship terminal that combines POS functionality with payment processing, designed to be sleek, portable, and powerful. Qashier primarily serves small and medium-sized enterprises across various industries seeking efficient transaction processing systems. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: BotGuard
cb_description: BotGuard provides a cyber technology platform. The company offers cloud-based website protection services, focusing on mitigating malicious bots, crawlers, and scrapers as well as preventing hacking and content theft. Its customers are webmasters, eCommerce platforms, and Internet Service Providers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Unmind
cb_description: Unmind is a workplace wellbeing platform creating mentally healthy work environments across various sectors. The company offers tools and services to support mental health, utilizing a data-driven approach to provide personalized care and insights for organizational well-being strategies. Unmind primarily serves enterprises looking to enhance their employees' mental health and well-being. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Parfait
cb_description: Parfait is a company that focuses on the beauty industry, specifically in the domain of hair products. The company offers custom-made wigs, using AI technology to match the wig size and skin tone of the customer, providing a natural-looking product. The company primarily sells to the beauty and fashion industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Griffin
cb_description: Griffin is a technology company that focuses on providing contextual intelligence for financial institutions. The company offers a marketing and analytics platform that helps community banks and credit unions improve client relationships and increase sales by using location-based retargeting and geolocation reports. Griffin primarily serves the financial sector, specifically community banks, credit unions, and fintech companies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Kansas City, Missouri.

name: Seebo
cb_description: Seebo specializes in predictive and prescriptive artificial intelligence (AI) for industrial manufacturing. The company offers AI insights into machines, processes, and operations to improve business outcomes, predict and prevent machine failures, and manage production lines. It primarily serves sectors such as food and beverage, consumer packaged goods, forest products, pulp and paper, glass, metals and mining, chemicals, building materials and cement, pharmaceutical, commercial services, and energy. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. In May 2022, Seebo was acquired by Augury.

name: HyperComply
cb_description: HyperComply is a company that focuses on automating security questionnaires in the information security and sales sectors. The company offers services that allow users to share compliance information, automate security questionnaires, and accelerate sales processes. Its primary customers are sales teams at startup companies and security teams with SOC 2 certification. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brampton, Ontario.

name: GHGSat
cb_description: GHGSat specializes in emissions monitoring, operating within the environmental technology and space technology sectors. The company provides services that involve the use of satellites and aircraft sensors to measure greenhouse gas emissions from industrial sites, offering valuable data to businesses, governments, and regulators. GHGSat primarily serves the industrial sector, government agencies, and regulatory bodies. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Verqor
cb_description: Verqor is a fintech platform that specializes in providing financial solutions within the agricultural sector. The company offers accessible credit options for farmers to purchase agro-inputs and machinery, simplifying the financing process without complicated procedures. Verqor also provides a monitoring system for companies to track purchase data from their suppliers and crops, leading to greater control over the supply chain and more financially capable agro suppliers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Nowports
cb_description: Nowports operates as a digital freight forwarder in logistics and technology. The company offers services that centralize international trade operations using digital and financial tools, providing secure and efficient cargo shipping solutions. Its primary offerings include cargo export and import, cargo and container insurance, and flexible financial options. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Monterrey, Mexico.

name: LeadIQ
cb_description: LeadIQ is a B2B prospecting platform that operates in the sales intelligence and CRM data enrichment sectors. The company offers a suite of tools designed to identify and capture contact data, track sales triggers, generate personalized messages using AI, and maintain accurate CRM data over time. LeadIQ primarily serves sales teams, enabling them to enhance their prospecting workflows and improve their sales productivity. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: EnCharge AI
cb_description: EnCharge AI specializes in the field of artificial intelligence (AI) hardware and software systems. The company offers advanced AI computation technology that provides compute efficiency and density, enabling AI models to operate without being hindered by power, space, and constraints. It primarily serves businesses that require AI capabilities in power, energy, and space-constrained applications. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Splice
cb_description: Splice develops digital solutions in the music domain. It offers a vast library of royalty-free sounds and samples, artificial intelligence (AI) software for sound discovery, and a unique marketplace for music production gear. The company primarily serves the music production industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Eyrus
cb_description: Eyrus runs a company focusing on workforce management and safety. The company offers a platform to automate workforce data collection, providing services such as worker registration and onboarding, time and attendance tracking, access control, and safety monitoring. Eyrus primarily serves sectors such as general contractors, owners, subcontractors, and public agencies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Workit Health
cb_description: Workit Health specializes in telemedicine addiction treatment for substance use disorders, operating within the healthcare sector. The company offers medication-assisted treatment and virtual recovery support for individuals dealing with opioid and alcohol use disorders. Workit Health provides a platform for virtual consultations with licensed clinicians, e-prescribing of medications to local pharmacies, and access to online recovery groups and skills-based therapeutic courses. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: Conta Simples
cb_description: Conta Simples focuses on business expense management in the financial services sector. The company offers a platform that allows businesses to manage their expenses through the use of multiple corporate cards. The company primarily serves sectors such as startups, e-commerce, digital marketing, consultancies, and construction. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Replika
cb_description: Replika is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence in the mental health and online therapy industry. The company offers an AI companion that learns and mimics the user's texting style, providing a platform for users to express their thoughts and feelings in a safe and nurturing environment. The AI companion is designed to provide emotional support, improve the user's emotional well-being, and help them learn new coping skills. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Trafi
cb_description: Trafi specializes in Mobility-as-a-Service (MaaS) technology, focusing on the development of smart urban mobility solutions. The company offers a platform that integrates various transportation options into a single application, facilitating sustainable and efficient travel for city dwellers. Trafi primarily serves the urban transportation sector, working with cities to connect public transport with micro-mobility options. It was founded in 2007 and is based in London, England.

name: The Health Factory
cb_description: The Health Factory specializes in nutritional baked goods, focusing on high-protein and whole wheat flour products within the food industry. Their main offerings include a variety of breads that are freshly baked, free from chemical preservatives and artificial colors, and delivered to customers. These products cater to health-conscious individuals seeking nutritional alternatives to traditional bread. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Allied Payment Network
cb_description: Allied Payment Network focuses on providing payment technology solutions, primarily operating in the financial services industry. The company offers innovative and secure payment technology services to financial institutions, enabling them to modernize and innovate their operations. These services primarily cater to banks and credit unions of all sizes. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Fort Wayne, Indiana.

name: Curve
cb_description: Curve provides a financial services platfrom. It offers a payment card and an application that allows users to link multiple payment cards and use them all through one card. The application automatically selects the card that offers the best rewards or benefits for a particular purchase, when users make a payment with the Curve card. Curve was formerly known as Curve 1. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Rewind
cb_description: Rewind specializes in cloud data backups and SaaS data protection across various industries. The company offers automated backup solutions and data recovery services to safeguard businesses' critical data. Rewind's services enable clients to recover from data loss quickly and maintain compliance with data regulations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Ottawa, Ontario.

name: Inspectorio
cb_description: Inspectorio specializes in AI-powered supply chain management software within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that digitizes supply chain processes, provides real-time visibility, and facilitates decision-making for brands, retailers, and suppliers. Its solutions cater to various industries, including apparel, footwear, food and beverage, home and furniture, and multi-category retail. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Daybreak Health
cb_description: Daybreak Health provides online counseling for teenagers through a mobile app. Its evidence-based model treats students to a place of concrete improvement to drive academic outcomes such as better grades, higher attendance, and behavioral improvements. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: MadeRight Technology Group
cb_description: MadeRight Technology Group offers custom-built data-driven websites, graphic design, flash animation, video production, and hardware support. It serves small businesses, professionals, real estate agencies, non-profit organizations and more. It is based in Shamokin Dam, Pennsylvania.

name: Dinie
cb_description: Dinie is a provider of embedded lending infrastructure and B2B payment solutions for digital platforms. The company offers services that enable instant credit provision and comprehensive financial services integration within client platforms, simplifying and accelerating the process. Dinie primarily serves the financial technology sector, offering products such as revolving credit limits, Buy Now Pay Later options, corporate cards, and credit proposal origination, along with risk and compliance management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Candid Health
cb_description: Candid Health specializes in revenue cycle management automation within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that automates and optimizes healthcare billing processes, including claims tracking and financial reporting, to improve insurance collection rates. Candid Health primarily serves fast-growing healthcare providers looking to streamline their revenue cycle management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: GEEIQ
cb_description: GEEIQ is an enterprise platform leveraging data to help companies navigate the metaverse effectively. It provides a detailed analysis of esports teams, streamers, and events to educate and inform gaming sponsorship and advertising decisions. The company offers content distribution, content production, digital marketing, and campaign management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Tabby
cb_description: Tabby focuses on reshaping consumer shopping experiences. The company offers a 'buy now, pay later' service, allowing customers to split their purchases into four interest-free payments, both online and in-store. Tabby primarily serves the retail industry, with a wide range of businesses from global brands to small enterprises utilizing its technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Cavelo
cb_description: Cavelo offers a platform that uses machine learning to continuously scan, identify, classify, and report on sensitive data across an organization's cloud applications, cloud-hosted servers, and on-premises servers and desktops. It focuses on cybersecurity and data protection. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Kitchener, Canada.

name: Arcturus
cb_description:
Arcturus is a penetration testing consultancy based in England.

In 2018, Arcturus was acquired by Cyberfort Group. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Niobium Microsystems
cb_description: Niobium Microsystems focuses on the development of microelectronic components in the microelectronics industry. The company's main offerings include secure data collection, processing, and distribution solutions. Its solutions are primarily used in the defense and commercial sectors. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Dayton, Ohio.

name: Soulbound
cb_description: Soulbound develops a metaverse gaming platform intended to provide a go-to proof-of-play for the dedicated player. The company's platform provides a community and platform connecting guilds, gamers, and game developers, rewarding gameplay and creating engagement across play and earn, enabling gamers to experience blockchain gaming. It primarily serves the gaming industry. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Lewes, Delaware.

name: SEEQC
cb_description: SeeQC specializes in digital quantum computing within the technology sector, focusing on the integration of classical and quantum technologies. The company offers a digital quantum management system-on-a-chip for quantum computing systems. SeeQC's services include custom chip fabrication for superconductor chip designs and a platform that supports various qubit modalities for quantum computing solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Elmsford, New York.

name: Nest Collaborative
cb_description: Nest Collaborative operates as a telehealth company to focus on maternal-child health, specifically in the lactation support domain. The company provides online lactation consultations, offering guidance and support to parents. It primarily serves the childcare sector. Nest Collaborative was formerly known as Gorman & Associates. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Farmington, Connecticut.

name: WhyLabs
cb_description: WhyLabs operates as a company focusing on artificial intelligence (AI) observability, operating in the technology and data analytics sectors. The company offers a platform that monitors the quality and performance of machine learning models and data pipelines, enabling users to detect data and ML issues faster, deliver continuous improvements, and avoid costly incidents. WhyLabs primarily serves sectors such as financial services, logistics and manufacturing, retail and e-commerce, and healthcare. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: TinyBird
cb_description: TinyBird specializes in the production of confectionery products within the food industry. The company offers a range of candies that are 100% natural, vegan-friendly, and free from artificial colors and preservatives. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Vaux-Le-Penil, France.

name: ChannelEngine
cb_description: ChannelEngine is a company that specializes in connecting brands, distributors, and retailers to marketplaces and online sales channels worldwide, operating within the ecommerce industry. The company offers a platform that facilitates order and inventory management, AI-powered product bundling, and content syndication, among other features, to streamline operations and enhance online sales. ChannelEngine primarily serves sectors such as fashion, home & living, electronics, FMCG, and other industries that require robust ecommerce solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Leiden, Netherlands.

name: Tacto
cb_description: Tacto serves as a company that focuses on developing data-driven and automated solutions for procurement in the industrial sector. The company's main product is an Artificial Intelligence (AI) based software that provides a transparent overview of procurement activities, highlights risk and potential using algorithms, and automates all transactional workflows in sourcing and supplier management. This allows customers to focus on strategic work, leverage resource savings potential, and reduce complexity. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Cynomi
cb_description: Cynomi focuses on providing AI-powered, automated vCISO (Virtual Chief Information Security Officer) services in the cybersecurity industry. The company's main offerings include risk and compliance assessments, tailored security policies, and actionable remediation plans, all generated automatically by their platform. These services primarily cater to managed service providers and consulting firms. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Tennr
cb_description: Tennr focuses on automating back-office operations in the healthcare sector. The company offers a document reasoning model that processes healthcare paperwork with high accuracy, aiming to improve operational efficiency. Tennr's solutions are tailored for healthcare practices looking to optimize their administrative tasks. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Khazna
cb_description: Khazna operates as a financial technology company in smartphone-based financial services. It offers a digital benefits application to provide financial solutions to corporate employees, allowing them to use the earned portion of their salary to meet their monthly financial needs. It primarily serves the financial technology industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Giza, Egypt.

name: MarketMuse
cb_description: MarketMuse is a company that focuses on content planning and optimization, operating within the artificial intelligence and software industry. The company offers a platform that uses AI to identify content quality issues on websites and generates blueprints for comprehensive topic coverage, aiding in content creation and optimization. Its primary customers are publishers, content creators, and e-commerce managers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts. In October 2024, MarketMuse was acquired by Siteimprove

name: Incredible Health
cb_description: Incredible Health develops a healthcare career marketplace specializing in permanent nurse staffing using artificial intelligence (AI) enabled technology. The company offers a platform where nurses can find permanent roles, manage their careers, and access free continuing education resources. Hospitals and health systems utilize Incredible Health to streamline their hiring processes, reducing the time to hire and connecting with a pool of qualified nursing professionals. Incredible Health was formerly known as Lift League. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Thirdweb
cb_description: Thirdweb is a full-stack, open-source web3 development platform that operates within the blockchain technology sector. The company provides a suite of tools for creating, deploying, and managing smart contracts, as well as connecting applications to decentralized networks. Thirdweb's offerings cater to various sectors, including the gaming industry and blockchain networks, by providing solutions for integrating web3 into games and offering all-in-one development tools for chains. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Mercy BioAnalytics
cb_description: Mercy BioAnalytics focuses on early-stage cancer detection through a novel liquid biopsy assay platform in the biotechnology and healthcare industry. The company has developed a proprietary test, Mercy Halo, which analyzes tumor-derived extracellular vesicles in the blood for the early detection of cancers such as ovarian and lung. Mercy BioAnalytics' test is designed to identify cancer at its most treatable stages by examining the abundance and characteristics of extracellular vesicles. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Natick, Massachusetts.

name: GPTZero
cb_description: GPTZero serves in the domain of AI-text detection, specializing in distinguishing human-written content from that generated by AI models. The company offers a suite of tools including a Chrome extension, API integration, and writing reports to verify the authenticity of text and prevent AI misuse. GPTZero primarily serves the education sector, offering solutions for teachers, students, and academic institutions to ensure the integrity of written work. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Princeton, New Jersey.

name: Connected Cannabis
cb_description: Connected Cannabis is a vertically integrated company that operates in the cannabis industry. The company specializes in breeding, growing, manufacturing, and distributing top-shelf cannabis products, including premium cannabis flower, pre-rolls, and vapes. Its primary market is the cannabis industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: Produze
cb_description: Produze specializes in AI-driven analytics for the ecommerce sector, focusing on root cause analysis of sales fluctuations on Amazon. The company offers an AI assistant that analyzes relationships between various Amazon sub-metrics to quickly identify issues affecting sales performance. Produze primarily serves ecommerce sellers looking to optimize their presence and performance on Amazon. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Kea
cb_description: Kea is a medical software that allows patient users to store medical history in a QR code that doctors can scan to gain access to. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cotonou, Benin.

name: Irys Photographie
cb_description: Irys Photographie specializes in photography and video services aimed at enhancing corporate value. The company offers a range of services including the creation of personalized image banks, professional photography for various sectors such as corporate portraits, industry reportages, event coverage, and more, all facilitated through an online project management platform. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Nantes, France.

name: Sorbet
cb_description: Sorbet operates a chain of salons and grooming outlets to offer beauty-related services. Its activities include operating salons, nail bars, and dry bars providing manicures, pedicures, skin care, and body massages. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Gauteng, South Africa. In November 2022, Sorbet was acquired by Clicks Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Meetcaregivers
cb_description: Meetcaregivers is an innovative senior care marketplace that specializes in connecting seniors with caregivers and providing a range of care services. The company offers in-home care and companionship, medical care coordination, transportation assistance, and a technology platform for managing care. Meetcaregivers serves the healthcare industry by providing solutions that cater to the needs of seniors, caregivers, and healthcare providers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Newtonville, Massachusetts.

name: LogRocket
cb_description: LogRocket is a software company focused on providing digital experience insights and optimization tools for software teams. The company offers a suite of products that enable session replay, product analytics, and error tracking to help teams understand and resolve user issues. LogRocket's solutions are designed to improve technical and user experience issues, aiding in conversion and retention optimization. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Pura
cb_description: Pura is a company that focuses on the production and distribution of natural and organic seasonings, primarily in the food industry. The company offers a range of products including sea salt and various seasonings, all of which are sourced from natural ingredients and are designed to enhance the flavor of food. Pura primarily sells to the food and beverage industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Indonesia.

name: Mindtickle
cb_description: Mindtickle specializes in sales enablement and revenue productivity solutions within the information technology and services sector. The company offers a comprehensive platform that includes sales training, content management, coaching, and analytics to enhance sales team performance. Mindtickle's platform is designed to serve various industries, including automotive, medical devices, consumer goods, chemical, and technology sectors. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Boulevard
cb_description: Boulevard is a client experience platform focused on providing software solutions for the self-care industry. The company offers a suite of tools for appointment scheduling, business management, and marketing automation designed to streamline operations for salons, spas, barbershops, and medspas. Boulevard's platform is tailored to enhance the client experience, improve business efficiency, and support growth for self-care service providers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: The Boring Company
cb_description: The Boring Company specializes in the development of transportation infrastructure through the construction of tunnels. It offers an underground public transportation system called Loop, and tunneling equipment named Prufrock, aimed at accelerating infrastructure projects. The company primarily serves sectors that require solutions for transportation, utility, and freight infrastructure. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bastrop, Texas.

name: Slate
cb_description: Slate specializes in high protein shakes and iced coffees within the health and wellness beverage industry. The company offers a range of lactose-free, low sugar, and keto-friendly canned drinks that are rich in protein and electrolytes. These products are designed to provide strength and energy for health-conscious consumers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Westwood, Massachusetts.

name: Runway
cb_description: Runway is a SaaS company specializing in financial modeling and business planning software. The company offers a platform that facilitates collaborative planning, intuitive modeling, and interactive reporting, designed to align teams and enhance decision-making processes. Runway primarily serves sectors that require robust financial planning and analysis tools, such as businesses seeking to streamline their financial operations and improve team collaboration. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: GetMega
cb_description: GetMega operates as a company focusing on the online gaming industry, with a focus on card games. The company offers online platforms for playing popular card games such as Poker and Rummy, where users can compete against each other for real money. The company primarily serves the online gaming industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Skyven Technologies
cb_description: Skyven Technologies specializes in industrial decarbonization, focusing on reducing carbon emissions in the manufacturing sector. The company provides energy-as-a-service, delivering clean process heat through advanced steam-generating heat pumps, with no capital expenditure required from clients. Skyven primarily serves the manufacturing industry, helping facilities to lower their CO2 emissions and operational expenses. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Richardson, Texas.

name: Checkerspot
cb_description: Checkerspot is a biotechnology company focused on designing materials and ingredients for more sustainable and high-performing products within various industries. The company's main offerings include the development of unique oils through the WING Platform, which are biomanufactured from microalgae to replace commodity oils and petroleum-based inputs, enhancing the performance properties of hardgoods, textiles, and personal care products. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: Hike
cb_description: Hike focuses on developing the Rush Gaming Universe within the entertainment sector, specifically targeting the gaming industry. The company is creating a game economy that allows players to engage, earn, and gain ownership within the gaming networks they contribute to. Hike's services cater to the gaming community, offering economic opportunities through their gaming platform. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Bigleaf Networks
cb_description: Bigleaf Networks provides network and connectivity services. The company offers services that enhance internet connectivity and application performance, adapting to circuit conditions to maintain optimal user productivity. It serves sectors such as healthcare, finance, legal, and the restaurant industry. Bigleaf Networks was founded in 2012 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Cylib
cb_description: Cylib specializes in battery recycling within the renewable energy and waste management sectors. The company offers a process for the recycling of lithium-ion batteries, transforming waste into marketable raw materials. Its process is designed to serve the electric vehicle industry by recovering valuable elements from end-of-life batteries and production scrap. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Aachen, Germany.

name: Y42
cb_description: Y42 is a company specializing in data orchestration with a focus on streamlining data management processes. The company offers a platform that allows users to build, monitor, and maintain data flows, ensuring a reliable and unified data management experience. Y42 primarily serves sectors that require robust data pipeline management and analytics capabilities. Y42 was formerly known as Datos-Intelligence. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: UniPlaces
cb_description: UniPlaces is a global platform specializing in furnished rentals for various types of tenants. The company offers a secure and easy-to-use service for finding and booking rooms, apartments, flats, and residences. UniPlaces primarily serves students, digital nomads, young professionals, and families seeking accommodation. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Posh
cb_description: Posh is a company specializing in conversational AI solutions for the banking sector. It offers products such as voice and digital assistants to automate customer service and enhance employee efficiency, as well as a knowledge assistant for information management. Posh's AI platform is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing banking processes, providing secure and efficient AI management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: TurbineOne
cb_description: TurbineOne specializes in data processing and military intelligence within the defense sector. The company offers software solutions that refine raw data for military applications, featuring machine learning retraining at the edge and a no-code, no-cloud toolkit designed for the Department of Defense. TurbineOne's products are primarily utilized by the defense industry, enhancing situational awareness and decision-making for military personnel. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Swift Navigation
cb_description: Swift Navigation operates as a navigation satellite system (GNSS) positioning technology platform. It helps to improve location accuracy and provides centimeter-accurate, real-time kinematics, global positioning system (GPS), and positioning technology for autonomous vehicles, unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), precision agriculture, robotics, surveying, space applications, and more. Its positioning technology platform improves location accuracy and enables safer driving, last-mile delivery, and commercial transport operations. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Bodyport
cb_description: Bodyport is a data-driven virtual clinic for the prevention and management of heart disease. The firm provides advanced cardiac monitoring and connected care in every home. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Shinesty
cb_description: Shinesty is a company that specializes in creating unique and outrageous party clothing and themed apparel. Their main offerings include a variety of novelty garments such as ball hammock boxer briefs, swimwear, ski suits, and suits for special occasions, designed to add a fun and eccentric touch to social events. The company caters to individuals looking for distinctive and attention-grabbing clothing options for parties and other social gatherings. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Selma Finance
cb_description: Selma Finance is a fintech company specializing in digital wealth management and financial advisory services. The company offers AI-powered financial advice and personalized investment plans tailored to individual life goals, managed by experts to align with market movements and personal needs. Selma Finance primarily serves individuals seeking transparent, independent financial advice and those interested in sustainable investment options. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: SparkMeter
cb_description: SparkMeter is focused on providing comprehensive metering solutions in the energy sector. The company offers a range of products that deliver intelligence on customer trends, supply costs, use patterns, and more, primarily for utility management. These products include software for grid management, financial performance tracking, and utility billing, as well as hardware for metering and transformer sensing. It primarily serves the distribution utilities and energy access sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Patchwork
cb_description: Patchwork connects organizations to a growing number of workers to reduce reliance on agency staff and to solve the temporary staffing challenges faced by the NHS and the healthcare sector. It also helps NHS Trusts and Health Boards team up with others in their region to create collaborative staff banks, making it possible for them to pool their networks of temporary staff and allow clinicians to safely move between hospitals easily and work where they are needed most. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Proximie
cb_description: Proximie is a healthcare platform. The company offers a range of services, including telepresence, content management, and data insights, which allow healthcare organizations, surgeons, and medical device companies to collaborate, share expertise, and generate new insights from anywhere. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a particular focus on hospitals, surgeons, and medical device companies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: SPEC
cb_description: SPEC provides substation support contractor services. The company offers maintenance packages for original equipment manufacturers, main contractors, sub-contractors, and more. It is based in West Yorkshire, United Kingdom. In January 2018, Aliter Capital acquired SPEC.

name: Coral Care
cb_description: Coral Care focuses on the healthcare sector, specifically pediatric therapy. The company provides a platform that matches families with trusted speech-language pathologists, occupational therapists, and physical therapists for in-home sessions. Coral Care primarily serves families seeking pediatric developmental therapy services. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Larchmont, New York.

name: Spinny
cb_description: Spinny is a full-stack used car trading platform that specializes in offering high-quality, thoroughly inspected second-hand cars. The company provides a transparent and seamless car buying and selling experience, featuring a rigorous 200-point quality check and a 5-day money-back guarantee for all vehicles. Spinny also offers additional services such as car financing, a one-year comprehensive warranty, and buyback options to enhance customer satisfaction. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Swiftmile
cb_description: Swiftmile is a company specializing in the development of charging infrastructure for micromobility within the transportation sector. They provide safe and sustainable charging stations for e-bikes, e-scooters, and e-mopeds, as well as a back-end system for charge management and digital advertising solutions. Swiftmile primarily serves public sector entities, micromobility operators, and site partners such as businesses and campuses. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Antidote Health
cb_description: Antidote Health is a telehealth company operating in the healthcare sector. The company provides a range of health services including primary care, mental health support, and management of chronic conditions such as hypertension and diabetes. Its services are primarily targeted towards individuals seeking medical care and support. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Inato
cb_description: Inato is a company focused on creating a global clinical trial marketplace within the pharmaceutical industry. It offers a platform that connects pharmaceutical companies with a diverse range of research sites, streamlining the trial application and verification process to facilitate patient enrollment and site performance. The company primarily serves the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors, aiming to make clinical trials more accessible and inclusive. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Xorlab
cb_description: Xorlab is a cybersecurity company focused on providing enhanced email security solutions. Their main offerings include a data-driven platform that adapts to an organization's specific context to protect against sophisticated email threats such as phishing, business email compromise (BEC), and ransomware. Xorlab's security platform is designed to learn communication patterns and apply contextual analysis to effectively identify and mitigate potential threats. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Cymbio
cb_description: Cymbio develops a digital growth platform. The company offers a comprehensive solution for brands to manage and automate their operations and collaborations with retail, marketplace, and social commerce partners, covering areas such as product data, inventory, order management, billing, and analytics. It primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: AstroForge
cb_description: AstroForge is a company focused on expanding humanity's capabilities through asteroid mining within the aerospace industry. The company specializes in extracting valuable minerals from asteroids in space, aiming to provide a lower-cost and more environmentally friendly alternative to traditional terrestrial mining methods. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Huntington Beach, California.

name: Thunkable
cb_description: Thunkable operates as a no-code platform for mobile application development across various operating systems. The platform features a drag-and-drop interface that allows users to create mobile applications without coding, allowing integration of features and publishing to application marketplaces. Thunkable serves sectors such as operations, education, information technology (IT), and agencies with tools for application creation and minimum viable product (MVP) development. Thunkable was formerly known as Rappidly. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Tempo
cb_description: Tempo is a company that focuses on transforming the hiring experience within the recruitment industry. The company offers a platform that matches job seekers with potential employers based on their skills, experiences, and preferences, aiming to streamline the recruitment process. The platform primarily serves the startup sector, connecting candidates with fast-growing companies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: CallRail
cb_description: CallRail is a call tracking software that allows customers to match inbound calls, text, forms, and live chats to their clients' marketing campaigns to help them learn what's working and what's not.

name: Cloudsmith
cb_description: Cloudsmith is a company that focuses on cloud-native software artifact management in the technology sector. The company offers a platform for securely developing and distributing software, centralizing software artifacts to streamline operations and workflows, and enhancing security by proxying and caching dependencies, scanning for vulnerabilities, and checking against licensing policies. Cloudsmith primarily serves sectors such as machine learning and AI, fintech and financial services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Belfast, United Kingdom.

name: ReturnGO
cb_description: ReturnGO offers an artificial intelligence (AI) driven returns management platform helping to manage customers' lifetime value and post-purchase experience. The company aims to empower online stores to recover losses that result from returns and convert returns into revenue. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Anumana
cb_description: Anumana is an AI-driven health technology company focused on transforming cardiac care through advanced analysis of electrical signals from the heart. The company offers AI solutions that enable earlier diagnosis of cardiovascular diseases and improve clinical decision-making in electrophysiology. Anumana's products are designed for seamless integration into clinical workflows, aiding healthcare providers in early disease detection and intervention, and enhancing patient safety and outcomes. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: ZET
cb_description: ZET is a financial technology company focused on credit score improvement through its flagship product, the Magnet FD Credit Card, within the fintech sector. The company offers a credit card that is secured by a fixed deposit and designed to help users build their CIBIL score without requiring income proof. ZET primarily serves individuals looking to improve their financial credibility and access to credit. ZET was formerly known as OneCode. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Jaipur, India.

name: Qumulo
cb_description: Qumulo operates as a company focused on data management in the technology sector. It offers a platform for managing exabyte-scale data, simplifying the handling of unstructured data, and enabling hybrid workflows. The company's services are primarily utilized in sectors such as energy, financial services, healthcare, higher education, intelligent manufacturing, life sciences, media and entertainment, and the public sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Protai
cb_description: Protai operates as as company focusing on proteomics and artificial intelligence (AI) in the drug discovery industry. it offers a proteomics-centered, vertically integrated platform that uses machine learning (ML) and proteomics data to simulate disease on the molecular level and aid in discovering and developing new drugs. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Giv'atayim, Israel.

name: CybSafe
cb_description: CybSafe is a company that focuses on human risk management in the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a platform that provides guidance, training, and support for teams, along with phishing simulations and ransomware support, and behavior measurement and automation. CybSafe primarily serves sectors such as banking, insurance, legal, and technology. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Joy
cb_description: Joy is a wedding technology company that provides comprehensive wedding planning solutions. The company offers a suite of digital tools that assist with creating personalized wedding websites, managing guest lists, sending invitations, and organizing registries. Joy primarily serves the wedding industry, offering services to couples planning their nuptials. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cryptio
cb_description: Cryptio focuses on providing accounting solutions for digital assets, operating within the financial technology and blockchain industries. The company offers a platform that transforms data from decentralized finance, custody, over-the-counter trading, and exchanges into auditable records for accounting, treasury, and tax filings. Cryptio primarily serves financial institutions, corporates, and crypto-native companies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Blue Shift PDX
cb_description: Blue Shift PDX develops capacitor-based consumer electronics within the audio equipment sector. Its main products are portable speakers that offer six hours of playback and are designed for audiophiles seeking sound without digital signal processing. Blue Shift PDX primarily caters to consumers looking for durable and charging audio solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Portland, Oregon. Blue Shift PDX ceased operations.

name: Vital
cb_description: Vital is a company focused on creating digital, accessible learning content for individuals with visual and learning impairments. Their main offerings include software that transforms existing educational materials into accessible formats that can be interacted with through touch, sound, and text-to-speech on tablets. The company primarily serves the educational sector, providing solutions for K-12, higher education, and parents seeking to support their children's learning at home. It is based in St. Louis, Missouri.

name: BaubleBar
cb_description: BaubleBar specializes in fashion jewelry and custom accessories within the luxury goods sector. The company offers a wide range of products including fine jewelry, personalized nameplates, and charm bracelets, as well as home decor and tech accessories. BaubleBar primarily caters to the fashion and personal styling industry. BaubleBar was formerly known as eight1six. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Qohash
cb_description: Qohash provides data security solutions for the technology sector. It offers a platform that provides data discovery, insider risk tracking, and data security posture management. It is known as Qostodian, and it scans various data sources such as Microsoft 365, workstations, and on-premise file drives, and provides continuous monitoring of individual data elements. It primarily serves the information security and compliance sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Quebec City, Canada.

name: Cellares
cb_description: Cellares is a pioneering Integrated Development and Manufacturing Organization (IDMO) focused on accelerating access to life-saving cell therapies within the biotechnology sector. The company develops and operates advanced technologies for cell therapy manufacturing, including a modular platform that enables end-to-end automation of the production process. Cellares' solutions are designed to support a range of cell therapy modalities, offering scalability, cost savings, and quality improvements over traditional methods. It was founded in 2019 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Boat
cb_description: Boat is a company that operates in the online gambling industry. The company provides a platform that publishes short and long articles related to various aspects of online casinos, focusing on experiences in online casinos. The company primarily serves the online gambling industry. It is based in London, England.

name: Thriva
cb_description: Thriva operates as a healthcare platform providing personalized health tests. It is a digital health business providing tests to monitor and track a range of biomarkers, from gut health to heavy metals to hormones, to help people understand the state of their health. It offers finger-prick blood tests that can be done at home. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Stance
cb_description: Stance is a company that focuses on the fashion industry, specifically in the realm of socks, underwear, and apparel. The company offers a wide range of products including socks for various activities, underwear, t-shirts, sweatshirts, hoodies, jackets, joggers, sweatpants, shorts, and accessories. Stance primarily sells to the fashion industry. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Clemente, California.

name: 2trde
cb_description: 2trde operates as a technology company focusing on the automotive industry. It provides a multichannel platform for digital vehicle trading, offering services such as vehicle data capture, payment processing, and vehicle pickup. The company primarily serves auto dealers, fleet managers, and leasing companies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Perlego
cb_description: Perlego is an online platform offering a subscription service for academic books within the education and learning industry. The company provides access to a digital library of over a million textbooks and educational resources. Perlego caters primarily to students, educators, and institutions seeking comprehensive academic materials and study aids. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Homeday
cb_description: Homeday offers an online real estate platform. Its platform helps in matching property owners and streamlining the selling process and also helps buyers find property. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany. In June 2023, Homeday was acquired by Axel Springer. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Vedanta Biosciences
cb_description: Vedanta Biosciences operates as a biotechnology company focused on developing drugs to treat gastrointestinal diseases through microbiome modulation. The company specializes in creating defined consortia of bacteria as therapeutic agents, utilizing the natural gut ecosystem to regulate and potentiate the immune system. Vedanta Biosciences primarily serves the healthcare sector, offering innovative treatments for autoimmune and infectious diseases. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Dimension Inx
cb_description: Dimension Inx focuses on the development of therapeutic products within the regenerative medicine industry. The company designs and manufactures biomaterials that facilitate tissue and organ function restoration by providing a blueprint for the body's natural regenerative processes. Dimension Inx collaborates with partners to develop new materials for tissue therapeutics and solve complex materials challenges. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Styra
cb_description: Styra focuses on providing policy-as-code solutions in the cloud-native environments sector. The company offers services that allow enterprises to define, enforce, and monitor policy across their cloud-native environments, providing security, operations, and compliance guardrails to protect applications and the infrastructure. It primarily sells to the cloud computing industry. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: YAC
cb_description: YAC is a multi-disciplinary engineering consulting firm that specializes in architecture, structure, electromechanical, and landscaping design. The company offers a broad range of services including urban planning, interior and structural design, mechanical and sanitary engineering, fire fighting system design, HVAC, electrical engineering, project management, real estate development, and construction supervision. YAC caters to various sectors including residential, educational, hospitality, commercial, and administrative project development. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Giza, Egypt.

name: Ultimate
cb_description: Ultimate specializes in providing a self-custody crypto wallet for the financial technology sector. Their main offerings include a platform to buy, sell, and manage tokens and NFTs across multiple blockchain networks such as Solana, Ethereum, and Bitcoin. The company targets individuals seeking to engage with decentralized finance and NFT markets. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: DhiWise
cb_description: DhiWise is an app development platform that specializes in converting design prototypes into developer-friendly code for mobile and web applications. The platform automates the application development lifecycle, offering instant generation of readable, modular, and reusable code. DhiWise supports integration with design tools like Figma, provides real-time design rendering, and facilitates API and Firebase integration, Git synchronization, and deployment to Vercel. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Surat, India.

name: VEE
cb_description: VEE Corporation is one of the most experienced and respected names in family-friendly entertainment. VEE Corporation has delighted millions of children around the world with live touring stage shows since Sesame Street Live's debut performance in 1980. VEE also provides entertainment, promotion and event marketing services for the world's most respected brands and agencies. Clients and partners in the corporate, sports, museum and event marketing sector come to VEE for imaginative solutions to capture the undivided attention of their customers and audiences through custom designed/built interactive environments.

name: Starburst
cb_description: Starburst specializes in data lake analytics with a focus on AI data analytics platforms. The company offers a platform that integrates with open source Trino to enable data discovery, organization, and consumption without the need for extensive data migrations. Starburst's solutions are designed to provide access to complete data sets, reduce infrastructure costs, offer flexibility in tool usage, and prevent vendor lock-in, catering to data-driven companies seeking to make faster and better-informed decisions. Starburst was formerly known as Project Flex. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: CHEQ
cb_description: CHEQ provides solutions for Go-to-Market Security, focusing on protecting marketing, revenue, and data operations across various business sectors. The company offers products aimed at eliminating bots and invalid traffic, safeguarding against cyber threats, and ensuring privacy compliance for digital marketing initiatives. CHEQ's services serve organizations interested in securing their online interactions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Blueheart
cb_description: Blueheart is a digital platform focused on relationship and sex therapy within the health and wellness sector. The company offers private digital sex therapy, utilizing science-backed techniques to help individuals and couples address and overcome challenges related to emotional intelligence, stress, and libido. Blueheart provides a suite of courses and exercises designed to enhance relationship health and happiness. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Rickmansworth, England.

name: Patronus AI
cb_description: Patronus AI specializes in automated AI evaluation and security within the artificial intelligence industry. The company offers a platform that scores Large Language Model (LLM) performance, generates adversarial test cases, benchmarks LLMs, and conducts retrieval-augmented generation analysis to ensure reliable AI model outputs. Patronus AI primarily serves enterprise development teams looking to deploy AI products with a degree of confidence and security. It was formerly known as Zeno AI. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Main Street Health
cb_description: Main Street Health provides healthcare services. It offers partner clinics with the staff, technology, hospitals, community health centers, and financial opportunities. It serves the healthcare industry. Main Street Health was founded in 2021 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: Ace Turtle
cb_description: Ace Turtle is a company focused on transforming retail through technology, operating within the fashion and lifestyle brand sectors. The company offers omnichannel commerce technology and a vertical commerce business model to manage and scale international fashion and lifestyle brands. Ace Turtle specializes in providing end-to-end services from design and local sourcing to retailing for international brands in the Indian market. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Fever
cb_description: Fever focuses on fitness and wellness, operating in the health and fitness industry. The company offers a platform that combines a bike with a 21.5-inch tablet PC, providing workout data and live coaching services. Its primary customers are individuals seeking a home-based fitness solution. Fever was founded in 2019 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Phase Four
cb_description: Phase Four specializes in electric propulsion systems for spacecraft within the aerospace industry. The company designs and manufactures the maxwell plasma propulsion system, radio frequency (RF) electronics, and an electrodeless thruster to provide a compact form factor. Its products are primarily utilized by satellite operators. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Hawthorne, California.

name: Paxos
cb_description: Paxos specializes in regulated blockchain infrastructure and financial solutions within the financial services sector. The company offers a suite of services including crypto brokerage, stablecoin issuance, and tokenization infrastructure for assets like gold. Paxos primarily serves enterprises in the financial services industry, providing technology that enables them to launch innovative blockchain and digital asset solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Daphne Technology
cb_description: Daphne Technology is a climate deep-tech company focused on addressing greenhouse gas challenges in hard-to-decarbonize industries. The company specializes in measuring, reducing, and monetizing greenhouse gas emissions from industrial sources through the development and integration of innovative technology, providing solutions like PureMetrics for accurate GHG measurement and reporting, SlipPure for methane emission reduction, and SulPure for sulfur oxides removal. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Saint-Sulpice, Switzerland.

name: CloudBees
cb_description: CloudBees specializes in DevOps technology and provides an enterprise software delivery platform. The company offers solutions for continuous integration (CI), continuous delivery (CD), feature management, and DevSecOps, aimed at optimizing software delivery and reducing risks. CloudBees primarily serves sectors that require robust software delivery and management systems, such as technology companies and enterprises with significant software development needs. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Neol
cb_description: Neol Bio is devoted to the development of innovative processes within the microbial industrial biotechnology for its application in the oleochemistry, bioenergy and biopolymer sectors.

name: Twelve
cb_description: Twelve is like speed dating, but better ...

name: Optina Diagnostics
cb_description: Optina Diagnostics is a company focused on healthcare, specifically addressing the challenges related to an aging population. The company offers a Retinal Deep Phenotyping platform that aids in the early detection of Alzheimer's disease, utilizing artificial intelligence to improve diagnostic accuracy. This platform collects data-rich retinal images, providing more information than current retinal imaging platforms. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Spherex
cb_description: Spherex is a cannabis engineering company that operates in the cannabis industry. The company's main offerings include high-quality cannabis extracts and a variety of distillate products, which are designed to provide a consistent and flavorful experience. The company primarily sells to the cannabis retail industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Aurora, Colorado.

name: Zama
cb_description: Zama operates as an open-source cryptography company specializing in Fully Homomorphic Encryption (FHE) solutions for the blockchain and AI sectors. The company offers products that enable computation on encrypted data, allowing for privacy-preserving machine learning and confidential smart contracts. Zama's solutions cater to industries that require data privacy and security, such as finance, healthcare, and identity verification. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: PineTree Therapeutics
cb_description: PineTree Therapeutics provides preclinical-stage biotechnology solutions focusing on developing therapies in oncology and other diseases. It specializes in creating bi-specific and multi-specific antibodies designed to degrade disease-causing proteins emphasizing cancer treatment. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, with solutions for unmet medical needs in targeted therapy. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: HiHello
cb_description: HiHello is a software platform specializing in digital brand and identity within the business networking sector. The company offers digital business cards, interactive email signatures, and professional virtual backgrounds designed to enhance brand consistency and lead generation for individuals and businesses. HiHello's solutions cater to a diverse range of customers, including individuals, small and mid-sized businesses, and enterprise clients. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Exein
cb_description: Exein specializes in IoT-embedded cybersecurity within the technology sector. The company offers solutions that automatically detect and secure connected devices, analyze and identify security vulnerabilities, and monitor software integrity to protect against malicious activity. Exein's technology serves various sectors, including the automotive, computer & electronics, manufacturing, and healthcare industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Rome, Italy.

name: Aircall
cb_description: Aircall is a cloud-based voice solution designed for sales and support teams within the customer communication and engagement sector. The company offers a platform that integrates with CRMs and helpdesk software, facilitating reliable and efficient communication.
