Aircall's services are tailored to enhance productivity and customer satisfaction, which are vital for business growth. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Spyke Games
cb_description: Spyke Games operates as a mobile gaming company focused on creating engaging games. It offers free-to-play casual puzzle games that provide challenges and allow players to progress through levels and complete various tasks. The company primarily caters to the mobile gaming market with a portfolio of games designed for universal fun and interaction. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Banked
cb_description: Banked is a financial technology company specializing in real-time payments for consumers, businesses, and banks within the fintech sector. The company offers a suite of products that facilitate fast, secure, and simple account-to-account payments, including a modular checkout solution, payment links, and QR codes, as well as services for payouts, refunds, and fraud management. Banked's solutions are designed to improve payment security, enhance business efficiency, and reduce costs associated with traditional payment methods. Banked was formerly known as StudioH67. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Carevive Systems
cb_description: Carevive Systems specializes in oncology-focused health technology, providing EHR-integrated cancer care management software. It offers a suite of tools for remote symptom monitoring, symptom management pathways, and embedded symptom trending dashboards for cancer patients. It serves oncology practices and life science researchers with its data-driven patient engagement and clinical management solutions. Carevive Systems was formerly known as On Q Health. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Miami, Florida. In June 2024, Carevive Systems was acquired by Health Catalyst.

name: Prepared
cb_description: Prepared focuses on communication systems within the public safety sector. Its main offerings include platform centers, providing situational clarity, improvement, and efficiency in emergency response. Prepared primarily serves the public safety industry, including centers and field responders. Prepared was formerly known as  Prepared Live. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Attentive
cb_description: Attentive is a company focused on sales assistance, operating in the technology and sales sectors. The company offers a service that integrates with Slack to allow users to manage sales deals and tasks without needing to open their HubSpot CRM. This service is primarily targeted towards the sales industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Braga, Portugal.

name: Zencity
cb_description: Zencity focuses on the hospitality and real estate sectors. It offers comfortable short-term stays for travelers, providing a range of modern amenities and 24/7 access to customer service. The company primarily serves the travel and tourism industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chicago, Illinois. In June 2023, Zencity was acquired by Frontdesk.

name: Nexu
cb_description: Nexu provides financing solutions for car dealerships. It offers a variety of financing solutions through its platform, including leasing, installment plans, and balloon payments. It facilitates auto finance products via a point of sale (POS) platform for car dealerships in the market. Nexu was founded in 2014 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Tara AI
cb_description: Tara AI is a company focused on enhancing software engineering practices through artificial intelligence(AI) within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that provides engineering analytics, project management tools, and insights to optimize software development processes. Tara AI primarily serves software engineering teams looking to improve efficiency and delivery outcomes. Tara AI was formerly known as Gradberry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: HomeThrive
cb_description: HomeThrive provides a technology-enabled healthcare services platform. It enables seniors to live independently at home for as long as possible while simultaneously reducing stress and work for family caregivers. The company delivers this value to families through employers and payers by combining a technology platform and multi-sourced data inputs with expert coaching and personal assistant services provided by a social worker. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Northbrook, Illinois.

name: Bubble
cb_description: Bubble is a company that operates in the childcare industry, providing a platform for family support services. The company offers an app that connects parents with babysitters and nannies, allowing them to find, book, and pay for childcare services. Bubble primarily serves the family support and childcare sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Kent, England.

name: Community
cb_description: Community is a social platform that gathers people in order to learn, practice, and share languages in different parts of the city.

name: Cay Skin
cb_description: Cay Skin focuses on suncare and body care. The company offers a range of skincare products that provide sun protection and nourishment for the skin, with a special emphasis on products that are vegan, cruelty-free, and dermatologist-tested. Its products are designed to protect all skin tones from harmful blue light, while also promoting a healthy glow. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Trusk
cb_description: Trusk is a company that focuses on urban transport and logistics. The company offers professional transportation services, delivering all types of items, including heavy and bulky objects, at the customer's convenience. Trusk primarily serves sectors such as furniture, appliances, DIY, sports, and construction. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Spotnana
cb_description: Spotnana operates as a company focusing on modernizing the infrastructure of the travel industry. The company offers a travel-as-a-service platform that simplifies travel and makes it more affordable for corporations, while also enabling operational efficiency, new revenue sources, and innovation for its partners in the travel industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Magic
cb_description: Magic is a company that focuses on providing outsourcing services and virtual assistance, operating in the business services industry. The company offers a range of services including executive assistance, sales support, customer service, bookkeeping, and other administrative tasks. These services are primarily targeted towards high-growth companies across various sectors such as marketing, operations, customer support, sales, finance, and recruiting. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Asset Class
cb_description: Asset Class specializes in software solutions for the private capital and asset management sectors. Their offerings include customer relationship management, investor and fund management, and deal and portfolio management tools designed to streamline operations and enhance investor relations. The company primarily serves private equity, venture capital, and wealth management industries with its modular software solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Fluree
cb_description: Fluree specializes in providing a cryptographically-secure semantic graph database for enhanced data governance and trust. The company offers a platform that combines knowledge graph construction, AI data pipelines, and ledger-based systems to ensure data security and verifiability. Fluree's solutions cater to sectors that require robust data governance and security, such as enterprise AI applications, data sharing, and compliance with data privacy regulations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Winston-Salem, North Carolina.

name: Benepass
cb_description: Benepass is a company focused on providing a benefits platform for employee benefits customization within various business sectors. The company offers a range of services including pre-tax benefits programs, wellness and family benefits, professional development, and remote work benefits, all designed to adapt to the diverse needs of a global workforce. Benepass primarily serves sectors that require robust employee benefits packages to attract and retain talent. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ordway
cb_description: Ordway provides financial software applications in the software as a service (SaaS), cloud, and financial technology. The company's main services include offering solutions for billing, accounts receivable, revenue recognition, and business key performance indicators (KPI) reporting. It primarily serves the cloud and fintech industries. It was formerly known as PJX Ventures. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Cailabs
cb_description: Cailabs specializes in photonics technology within the aerospace and defense, industrial laser processing, and fiber networks sectors. It shapes laser light for industrial processes, improve data transmission, and provide solutions for aerospace and defense applications. Cailabs primarily serves industries that require advanced laser light shaping and photonics solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Rennes, France.

name: Refundid
cb_description: Refundid specializes in providing instant refund services for online retail customers and solutions for retailers to enhance customer satisfaction. The company offers a platform that allows consumers to receive immediate refunds directly to their bank accounts upon initiating a return, without waiting for the returned items to be shipped or processed. Refundid primarily serves the ecommerce industry, offering a value-added service for both online shoppers and retailers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bronte, New South Wales.

name: EpiBiologics
cb_description: EpiBiologics specializes in the development of targeted therapies within the biotechnology sector, focusing on protein degradation. The company offers a proprietary platform known as EpiTAC, which facilitates the creation of therapies aimed at degrading disease-causing membrane and extracellular proteins. These therapies are designed to address a variety of disorders that currently have limited treatment options. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Canvas Medical
cb_description: Canvas Medical focuses on the development of electronic medical records (EMR). The company offers a certified EMR platform that handles compliance and core workflows, and a unified revenue cycle management and payments platform. These platforms are programmable and extensible, allowing customers to build differentiated patient experiences and integrate healthcare data, primarily serving care delivery companies, ranging from specialty startups to risk-bearing medical groups. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Jasper Health
cb_description: Jasper Health is a digital oncology company focused on providing supportive care for individuals dealing with cancer. The company offers virtual sessions and 24/7 chat support to manage the emotional, mental, and physical challenges associated with cancer diagnosis, treatment, and survivorship. Jasper Health's services include creating personalized care plans, providing emotional support, and assisting with nutrition, exercise, and side-effect management, as well as helping patients navigate financial resources and insurance coverage. Jasper Health was formerly known as RH Studio Opco 13. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boise, Idaho.

name: Peakflo
cb_description: Peakflo is a company that specializes in automating accounts payable and receivable processes within the financial operations sector. Their main offerings include solutions that streamline the entire procure-to-pay and invoice-to-cash cycles, as well as manage travel expenses and vendor onboarding, all designed to enhance efficiency and cash flow management for businesses. Peakflo's software integrates with various ERP systems, providing customizable approval workflows, financial reporting, and insights to support finance teams in their operations. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Wiliot
cb_description: Wiliot is a company that provides connectivity and intelligence to products and packaging using its Internet of Things (IoT) platform. The company's offerings include IoT Pixels, which are tags that collect data about their environment, and a cloud-based platform that analyzes this data. Wiliot serves sectors such as grocery retail, post and parcel, and quick service food, providing tracking, inventory management, and food safety compliance solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Caesarea, Israel.

name: Blue Wire
cb_description: Blue Wire focuses on the creation and support of podcasts, operating within the media and entertainment industry. The company's main service involves providing a platform for independent podcasts, offering sales and other support to ensure their success and monetization. Its podcasts cover a range of topics including sports like baseball, basketball, football, and hockey, as well as comedy and culture. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Beverly Hills, California.

name: 3Bar Biologics
cb_description: 3Bar Biologics operates as a biotechnology company focused on the development and manufacturing of microbial products for the agricultural industry. The company specializes in biological manufacturing and just-in-time activation technology to enhance the viability and shelf life of beneficial microbes used in crop production. 3Bar Biologics primarily serves the agricultural sector by providing solutions that help overcome traditional barriers to microbe productization and accelerate time to market for their partners. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

name: Strive
cb_description: Strive specializes in online coding education for children, focusing on personalized one-on-one instruction in the educational technology sector. The company offers tailored coding classes that cater to the individual skill level and interests of kids aged 8-16, teaching them to create real-world projects such as games and applications. Strive's curriculum integrates coding with academic subjects like math and science, enhancing students' understanding and application of school-learned concepts. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Lassie
cb_description: Lassie is a digital pet insurance provider focused on preventive services for pets. The company offers a range of insurance plans that cover veterinary care costs and include access to digital veterinary consultations and educational resources on pet health. Lassie's insurance packages are designed to cater to different levels of coverage needs, from basic to comprehensive protection. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: OMIE
cb_description: OMIE is the nominated electricity market operator (NEMO). It works to connect wholesale electricity markets and manage intraday wholesale electricity markets. It also enforces a regulatory framework at the European level on integrity and transparency in the energy market. It is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Zero Emission Industries
cb_description: Zero Emission Industries is a hydrogen technology company operating in the maritime sector. The company develops simplified and cost-effective fuel cell and refueling systems that utilize hydrogen technology, aiming to reduce the environmental impact of maritime activities. Their primary market is the maritime industry. It was formerly known as Golden Gate Zero Emission Marine. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: NinjaCart
cb_description: Ninjacart is an agritech company that focuses on the agricultural ecosystem by utilizing technology. The company provides solutions for the supply chain of fresh produce, commerce, and financial services to farmers, traders, wholesalers, retailers, and importers/exporters. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Stringr
cb_description: Stringr is a cloud-based video platform operating in the media and technology sectors. The company offers a range of services including video acquisition, collaboration and video production, distribution and asset management. Its primary customers are in the broadcast and online journalism industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Filigran
cb_description: Filigran specializes in cybersecurity and crisis management solutions. The company offers a range of services including cyber threat intelligence, adversary simulation, and crisis management solutions, all designed to enable organizations to understand their information security environment and respond to incidents. It primarily serves private and public organizations around the world. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Asnires-sur-Seine, France.

name: Next Insurance
cb_description: Next Insurance focuses on providing insurance services, specifically tailored to the needs of small businesses. The company offers a range of insurance products including general liability insurance, workers compensation insurance, professional liability insurance, commercial auto insurance, and commercial property insurance among others. The company primarily serves sectors such as retail, food and beverage, construction, consulting, education, entertainment, fitness, financial services, real estate, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Formance
cb_description: Formance operates as an open-source ledger company that focuses on providing financial infrastructure for money-moving platforms. The company offers services such as a programming language for money movement, an immutable system of record for transactions, and a set of connectors to integrate with various payment providers. It primarily serves the fintech and platform industries. Formance was formerly known as Numaire. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: GetAgent
cb_description: GetAgent is a data-driven estate agent comparison platform that operates within the real estate industry. The company provides a service that allows homeowners to compare the performance and fees of estate agents to aid in the selling of their homes. GetAgent caters primarily to the real estate sector, offering tools and insights to both homeowners and estate agents. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: PerfectScale
cb_description: PerfectScale develops Kubernetes configuration management software. It leverages artificial intelligence to provide configuration recommendations that optimize the resources. It enables developers to understand the cost, performance, and usage of the Kubernetes ecosystem. It tracks issues, remediation, and system configuration changes. Its platform makes it easy for DevOps, platform engineering, and site reliability engineer (SRE) professionals to improve the stability and cost-effectiveness of their complete Kubernetes environment. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Shaped
cb_description: Shaped specializes in AI infrastructure within the personalization domain, offering APIs for semantic understanding, search, and recommendation systems. It provides solutions that allow integration with data warehouses, enabling businesses to support user engagement, conversions, and retention through personalized feeds, notifications, and recommendations. Its services cater to various sectors, including marketplaces, social media platforms, media platforms, and e-commerce. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Escape
cb_description: Escape is a company focused on API security within the cybersecurity industry. It offers automated API discovery and security testing, enabling the detection of business logic flaws and integration with continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes. Escape primarily serves sectors that require robust API security measures, such as e-commerce, finance, technology, and Web3 industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Biarritz, France.

name: Zencargo
cb_description: Zencargo is a digital freight forwarder specializing in supply chain management within the logistics industry. The company offers a suite of services including ocean, air, and road freight solutions, complemented by a technology platform that provides tracking, data analytics, and inventory management. Zencargo's platform streamlines supply chain operations, offering insights and tools for businesses to make informed decisions and optimize their logistics. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Smartwyre
cb_description: Smartwyre is a technology company focused on the agribusiness sector. The company offers software and data services that help farm input supply organizations manage costs, prices, and incentives more effectively. Its main services include providing real-time cost data, empowering sales teams, tracking rebate earnings, and simplifying planning. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: DimOrder
cb_description: DimOrder specializes in providing comprehensive point-of-sale (POS) solutions for the food and beverage industry. Their main offerings include a self-service ordering system that simplifies the ordering process for customers and a delivery platform app that connects the front and back end of restaurant operations, facilitating the management of takeout orders. The company's systems are designed to increase restaurant revenue, customer base, and table turnover rates. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

name: Teleport
cb_description: Teleport develops a platform for nomadic workers to move from place to place. It maximizes the quality of life by figuring out where to stay, what to expect, where to pay taxes, or which visa to get. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California. In April 2017, Teleport was acquired by Topia.

name: Space Perspective
cb_description: Space Perspective is a company specializing in carbon-neutral spaceflight experiences within the aerospace industry. Their main offering is the Spaceship Neptune, a pressurized capsule propelled by a SpaceBalloon, providing a safe and accessible six-hour journey to the edge of space with amenities such as the largest windows ever flown to space, meal and cocktail service, Wi-Fi, and a lavatory. The company primarily caters to the space tourism industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Titusville, Florida.

name: Resemble AI
cb_description: Resemble AI specializes in generative AI voice technologies and deepfake audio detection within the artificial intelligence sector. The company offers products that enable the creation of synthetic voices through text-to-speech and speech-to-speech synthesis, as well as tools for detecting and watermarking deepfake audio content. Resemble AI's solutions cater to various industries, including entertainment, gaming, customer service, and security. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brampton, Ontario.

name: MeliBio
cb_description: MeliBio focuses on creating sustainable, plant-based honey alternatives using food science and technology. Its main offerings include a bee-free honey product that mimics the taste and functionality of traditional honey, catering to both consumers and businesses. MeliBio's products are designed to provide a sustainable solution for the food industry, reducing reliance on bee populations and promoting environmental well-being. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Guardian Agriculture
cb_description: Guardian Agriculture develops autonomous lithium-battery-powered electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) systems for farming on a commercial scale. It develops robotic drones for offering crop protection as a service, precision agriculture, and aerial utility services. Guardian Agriculture was formerly known as Kiwi Technologies. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Woburn, Massachusetts.

name: Skopenow
cb_description: Skopenow operates as a technology company providing comprehensive threat intelligence and open-source intelligence (OSINT) solutions. The company offers products that enable organizations to gather and analyze open-source information, identify trends and patterns in the data, and detect emerging threats and fraud. It primarily serves sectors such as insurance, legal, global security, law enforcement, government, and media. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Vermut
cb_description: Vermut focuses on enhancing the lifestyle of the senior population through digital means. The company offers a platform where users can interact, join, and create leisure activities and courses, providing opportunities for meaningful human connection and active lives, primarily serving the senior population sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Merkle Science
cb_description: Merkle Science is a predictive cryptocurrency risk and intelligence platform operating in the financial technology sector. The company provides tools for detecting, investigating, and preventing illegal activities involving cryptocurrencies, with services that include transaction monitoring, compliance training, and forensic analysis. Its offerings cater to crypto businesses, DeFi participants, financial institutions, government agencies, and insurers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Manhattan, New York.

name: Kangaroo
cb_description: Kangaroo is a company that focuses on customer loyalty and rewards within the retail and service industry. The company offers a software solution that helps businesses attract, retain, and engage customers through loyalty rewards and marketing strategies. Kangaroo primarily serves sectors such as retail, restaurants, professional services, golf courses, wholesale, and e-commerce. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Oxford Quantum Circuits
cb_description: Oxford Quantum Circuits focuses on the development and commercialization of quantum computers, operating within the technology and computing industry. The company's main offerings include the construction of quantum computers and the provision of Quantum Computing as-a-Service (QCaaS), which allows enterprises to access and utilize quantum computing technology. The primary customer base of Oxford Quantum Circuits is the enterprise sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Reading, United Kingdom.

name: BRAVE
cb_description: BRAVE is a provider of temporary staffing services mainly for the fields of nursing care and medical care.

name: SHIFT
cb_description: Shift operates as a social media advertising company within the digital marketing industry. The company's main offerings include a platform for managing social media ad campaigns, scoring content performance, and optimizing advertising budgets. Shift's technology and services are designed to enhance the effectiveness of social marketing efforts for brands and agencies The company was formerly known as GraphEffect. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Eatron
cb_description: Eatron develops software for battery management in the automotive and mobility sectors. The company offers AI-powered software that improves the performance, safety, and durability of batteries, providing estimations of battery states and operation, and enabling maintenance and recall prevention. Eatron primarily serves vehicle and battery manufacturers worldwide. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Warwick, United Kingdom.

name: Igloo
cb_description: Igloo develops a cooled mattress protector. It uses a thermoelectrical device that cools and circulates water through the mattress pad, keeping the surface of the mattress cool for the user. It is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Hume
cb_description: Hume focuses on artificial intelligence (AI), specifically in the domain of emotional understanding and human well-being. The company offers a toolkit that uses AI to understand and measure human emotional expression in various forms such as images, videos, audio, and text, aiming to align technology with human well-being. Hume AI primarily serves sectors such as voice assistants, health tech, and social networks. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Pristyn Care
cb_description: Pristyn Care is a healthcare provider specializing in advanced elective surgical treatments across various medical conditions. The company offers minimally invasive surgical procedures for proctology, urology, ENT, gynecology, vascular diseases, and more, utilizing state-of-the-art technology such as laser and laparoscopy. Pristyn Care ensures a seamless surgical experience by providing a 24/7 Personal Care Buddy to assist patients with all aspects of the surgery process, including insurance paperwork and post-surgery care. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: Bambee
cb_description: Bambee focuses on providing human resources solutions. The company offers services such as employee performance management, document storage, and on-demand human resource guidance, all aimed at small to medium-sized businesses. Its primary market is the small business sector. Bambee was formerly known as HellowWii. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Motorway
cb_description: Motorway is a technology-driven company in the automotive sector that specializes in facilitating the sale of used cars. The company offers an online platform where car owners can receive instant valuations, create profiles for their vehicles, and receive competitive offers from a network of over 5,000 dealers. Motorway's service includes free home collection of the vehicle and fast payment, streamlining the car selling process for consumers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Workstream
cb_description: Workstream provides on-demand compensation, performance and talent management solutions and services that help companies manage the entire employee lifecycle " from recruitment to retirement. Workstream's TalentCenter provides a unified view of all Workstream products and services including Recruitment, Performance, Compensation, Development and Transition. Access to TalentCenter is offered on a monthly subscription basis under an on-demand software delivery model to help companies build high performing workforces, while controlling costs. With offices across North America, Workstream services customers including Chevron, The Gap, Home Depot, Kaiser Permanente, Motorola, Nordstrom, VISA and Wells Fargo. For more information visit www.workstreaminc.com or call toll free 1-866-470-WORK.

name: Vahan
cb_description: Vahan provides workforces using AI-based solutions. It offers a platform that streamlines the hiring process for blue- and grey-collar workers, providing services such as recruitment, staffing, and payroll management. It serves businesses to hire large volumes of on-demand workers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: May Mobility
cb_description: May Mobility focuses on converting mobility through manufacturing autonomous vehicles. The company's main offerings include the development of autonomous vehicle technology that can safely handle unexpected situations, making transit more sustainable, safe, accessible, and equitable. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: LinkSquares
cb_description: LinkSquares specializes in AI-powered contract management and legal project management for legal teams. The company offers a comprehensive platform that facilitates the creation, review, management, and signing of contracts, as well as centralizing legal work to improve efficiency and connectivity. LinkSquares' solutions are designed to streamline legal operations, enhance productivity, and provide actionable insights through advanced data analysis. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Uhnder
cb_description: Uhnder focuses on the development of digital automotive radar technology within the automotive industry. The company's main product is a software-defined digital radar chip and sensor modules that can detect and track thousands of objects, including their height, speed, and distance, providing more accurate information for safety algorithms. These products are primarily used in the automotive and automated mobility sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Rinse
cb_description: Rinse is a company that specializes in laundry and dry cleaning delivery services, operating within the clothing care industry. The company offers scheduled pickup and delivery for Wash & Fold and Dry Cleaning services, providing a convenient solution for everyday laundry needs and high-quality cleaning for garments. Rinse primarily serves individual consumers who value convenience and quality in clothing care. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cotopaxi
cb_description:
Cotopaxi is a digitally enabled, global energy consulting and optimization specialist.

On January 24th, 2022, Cotopaxi was acquired by Spirax-Sarco Engineering.9 million.

name: Seismic
cb_description: Seismic specializes in unified communications and IT infrastructure within the technology sector. The company offers end-to-end services, including planning, deployment, and management of IT environments for original equipment manufacturers, distributors, and managed service providers. Seismic's Serv360 platform provides an all-in-one ITSM solution designed to simplify service management for service providers. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.

name: 15Five
cb_description: 15Five focuses on performance management in the business sector. The company offers a platform that combines coaching, manager training, performance reviews, engagement surveys, goal tracking, and feedback tools to improve employee performance, engagement, and retention. The company primarily sells to the human resources sector. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Exergyn
cb_description: Exergyn is a clean-tech company focused on the commercial application of shape memory alloys in the energy sector. The company's main offering is the development of an emission and refrigerant free heat pump, which is a device that can provide heating and cooling solutions in an environmentally friendly manner. This technology primarily serves industries looking to reduce their carbon footprint and transition to green and renewable energy solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Dublin, Northern Ireland.

name: Upland
cb_description: Upland is a company focused on brewing ales, lagers, and sours in the beverage industry. The company offers a variety of beers, including traditional ales and lagers, sour ales, and seasonal offerings, all of which are crafted with unique twists on traditional recipes or innovative techniques. Upland primarily sells to the beverage industry. It is based in Bloomington, Indiana.

name: Deep Instinct
cb_description: Deep Instinct specializes in cybersecurity, utilizing a deep learning AI framework to predict and prevent cyber threats. The company offers a suite of products designed to protect against ransomware, zero-day threats, and unknown malware in real-time across various environments including cloud storage, applications, and endpoints. Deep Instinct's solutions cater to the cybersecurity industry, providing predictive prevention capabilities to safeguard data and systems. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Convex
cb_description: Convex develops olorful and family-friendly adventure games.

name: DEEP
cb_description: DEEP provides end-to-end content automation tools. It uses artificial intelligence (AI) and practical machine learning technologies to create contextual visual storytelling elements, including semiautomated video production. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Momento
cb_description: Momento is a digital journaling company operating in the tech industry. The company offers a smart private journaling app that allows users to capture, organize, and share their life experiences, events, and activities. The company's app primarily caters to individuals seeking a platform to record their daily activities, thoughts, and experiences. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Stafford, United Kingdom.

name: XP HEALTH
cb_description: XP HEALTH is a digital-first vision care platform operating in the healthcare and technology sectors. The company offers online eye exams, a marketplace for eyewear, and uses AI to personalize the glasses-buying experience, aiming to make vision care more affordable and accessible. XP HEALTH primarily serves the employee benefits sector, providing vision care solutions to employers and their workforce. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Otter
cb_description: Otter is a company that focuses on providing a Restaurant Operating System (rOS) in the food service industry. The company's main services include a point of sale system that handles sales from dine-in to delivery, online order management across all delivery apps, digital dine-in services, menu management, and financial data consolidation. Otter primarily sells to the restaurant industry. It is based in Beverly Hills, California.

name: Lago
cb_description: Lago provides open-source metering and usage-based billing solutions, operating in the fintech and cloud infrastructure sectors. It offers a range of services including usage metering, price plan management, invoicing, and billing integrations, all designed for the billing process of businesses. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Atani
cb_description: Atani develops a digital assets platform designed to provide trading, hardware wallets, and taxes for multiple exchanges. The company's platform allows users to trade in all of their exchanges, manage their digital assets at a portfolio level, and receive real-time information on tax liability and one-click downloadable tax reports. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: New Motion Labs
cb_description: New Motion Labs is a company focused on the reinvention of motion technology within the cycling, micromobility, and industrial sectors. Its main offering is revolutionary chain drive system. The company's solutions are aimed at improving efficiency and durability in performance cycling, e-mobility, and various industrial applications. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Exeter, United Kingdom.

name: LyGenesis
cb_description: LyGenesis provides biotechnology services. The company's main offering is the use of lymph nodes as bioreactors to grow functioning ectopic organs for patients with diseases such as end-stage liver disease, type 1 diabetes, and end-stage renal disease. Its therapies aim to provide an alternative to traditional organ transplantation. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Nucleus
cb_description: Nucleus focuses on vulnerability management in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform that automates vulnerability analysis, prioritization, and response, aiming to help organizations make better risk decisions and mitigate faster. It primarily serves sectors that require robust cybersecurity measures, such as the federal government and application security. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sarasota, Florida.

name: Kindred
cb_description: Kindred is a members-only home swapping and exchange community operating within the travel and hospitality industry. The company facilitates a network where members can swap homes and travel with reduced accommodation costs, without the need for nightly fees, by using a credits system based on hosting and referrals. Kindred's service is designed for both renters and homeowners, offering features such as member verification, video introductions, and host insurance coverage. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ZeroEyes
cb_description: ZeroEyes provides monitoring and security solutions. Its software integrates with existing security camera systems to detect firearms and provide alerts to first responders and law enforcement. It serves sectors such as education, commercial businesses, government facilities, and non-profit organizations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Conshohocken, Pennsylvania. In October 2024, ZeroEyes was acquired by AiN Group.

name: DealCart
cb_description: DealCart specializes in group buying within the e-commerce sector. The company offers a gamified shopping experience where users can purchase a variety of products, including groceries, clothing, and personal care items, often at discounted prices through community-driven deals. DealCart primarily serves the e-commerce industry by providing a platform for customers to 'buy together and save together', promoting locally manufactured brands. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Karachi, Pakistan.

name: Zenith Aerospace
cb_description: Zenith Aerospace focuses on the aerospace industry, specifically the high-altitude pseudo-satellite market. The company aims to become a key player in the new aerospace industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Belmont, California.

name: Blue Ocean Barns
cb_description: Blue Ocean Barns is a public benefit corporation focused on addressing the global climate impact of cattle within the agricultural industry. The company offers a red seaweed-based supplement for cows, which helps them retain more energy from their feed and reduces their greenhouse gas emissions. Blue Ocean Barns primarily sells to the food industry, working with industry leaders committed to sustainability. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Kailua Kona, Hawaii.

name: Shop Circle
cb_description: Shop Circle provides software as a service (SaaS) for e-commerce companies. Its software is designed for independent brands to scale their stores. The company's platform gathers data and analyzes the current performance of a company, on the basis of which, it makes an offer to buy. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Tushop
cb_description: Tushop is a company focused on providing grocery delivery services and household essentials to consumers. They offer a platform for customers to schedule and automate their weekly and monthly deliveries of fresh produce and other household items, aiming to save time and reduce costs. The company primarily serves the general consumer market with an emphasis on convenience and savings. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Nourished
cb_description: Nourished offers nutrient combinations, known as 'stacks', which are created based on a customer's lifestyle, needs, and goals. These stacks are made from scientifically-backed ingredients and are designed to target specific health and wellness areas. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Birmingham, United Kingdom.

name: Ambiq
cb_description: Ambiq specializes in ultra-low power semiconductors for the Internet of Things (IoT) with a focus on artificial intelligence applications. The company offers a range of System on Chip (SoC) solutions and Real-Time Clock (RTC) modules that enable energy-efficient AI on battery-powered IoT endpoint devices. Its products are designed to reduce total system power consumption, leveraging their proprietary Subthreshold Power Optimized Technology (SPOT) platform. Ambiq was formerly known as Cubiq Microchip. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: URTOPIA
cb_description: URTOPIA specializes in the design and manufacture of smart electric bicycles for urban riders within the e-mobility industry. The company offers e-bikes with AI integration. URTOPIA's products cater to individuals seeking sustainable urban transportation solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

name: Third Eye Health
cb_description: Third Eye Health specializes in telehealth solutions within the post-acute care sector, providing virtual medical services to long-term care facilities. The company offers a platform that enables virtual call coverage by experienced physicians, aiming to prevent unnecessary hospital visits and improve patient care. Third Eye Health primarily serves skilled nursing facilities, health systems, and health plans. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: quantilope
cb_description: quantilope is a Consumer Intelligence Platform that specializes in automating advanced research methodologies within the market research industry. The company offers a suite of quantitative and qualitative research tools designed to provide actionable insights and a comprehensive view of consumer behavior. quantilope primarily serves research departments across various sectors with its insights automation platform and advanced consumer research methods. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

name: CurbWaste
cb_description: CurbWaste offers a business-to-business (B2B) vertical order management platform built for trash haulers. The company provides modular solutions for commercial, residential, roll-off, and live load service businesses allowing haulers to optimize and digitize order and inventory management, dispatching, and billing. It primarily serves the business industry. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ZEPTO
cb_description: ZEPTO is a global ophthalmic technology company that operates in the healthcare sector. The company's main product, the ZEPTO IOL Positioning System, is a device used in cataract surgery to enhance lens positioning and improve long-term visual outcomes for patients. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically the ophthalmology sector. It is based in Carlsbad, California.

name: Hipcamp
cb_description: Hipcamp focuses on providing outdoor stays. It offers services such as reservation of tent camping spots, RV parks, cabins, and glamping sites. It primarily caters to the outdoor recreation and travel industry. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Foodles
cb_description: Foodles provides a comprehensive catering solution. It offers a physical and digital company canteen. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Clichy, France.

name: Whatnot
cb_description: Whatnot operates as a livestream shopping platform. It connects buyers and sellers in real-time for a variety of categories including collectibles, fashion, and sneakers. Primarily, Whatnot caters to the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Marina del Rey, California.

name: AristaMD
cb_description: AristaMD is a company that focuses on improving patient outcomes through timely access to specialty care, operating in the healthcare and telehealth sectors. The company offers an eConsult solution platform, which provides a telehealth service that empowers primary care providers with clinical workup checklists and the ability to conduct electronic consults. This significantly improves the patient referral process and allows greater access to timely, high-quality care. AristaMD primarily serves the healthcare industry, including payors, health systems, primary care clinics, specialists, and patients. It was founded in 2013 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: Florence Healthcare
cb_description: Florence Healthcare focuses on streamlining clinical trial processes through its Site Enablement Platform within the healthcare and clinical research industry. The company offers digital solutions that facilitate remote workflows, document management, and collaboration between clinical trial sponsors, CROs, and research sites. Florence Healthcare primarily serves the clinical research sector, including pharmaceutical companies, contract research organizations, and healthcare institutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Elementum 3D
cb_description: Elementum 3D focuses on the development and supply of advanced metal additive manufacturing (AM) powders for the three-dimensional (3D) printing industry. The company offers alloyed materials designed to enhance the capabilities of 3D printers and enable the production of components. Elementum 3D's patented RAM technology facilitates the creation of new metal-alloy powders with improved properties, catering to the needs of mission-critical applications across various sectors. Elementum 3D was formerly known as Sinter Print. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Erie, Colorado.

name: Lovys
cb_description: Lovys operates as a digital insurance provider offering an all-in-one subscription service. The company provides a range of insurance products including home, auto, pet, smartphone, health, and borrower's insurance, all manageable online with customizable coverage options and a monthly payment model. It primarily serves insurance sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: LogicSource
cb_description: LogicSource is a company that specializes in procurement services and technology, operating within the sourcing and procurement industry. The company offers services and technology solutions that aim to reduce costs and increase efficiencies in indirect expenditures, which are purchases not for resale. These services encompass all critical components of successful sourcing and buying, and are supported by a fully integrated Source-to-Pay technology platform. LogicSource primarily serves sectors such as retail, consumer goods, healthcare, and financial services. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Norwalk, Connecticut.

name: Shift5
cb_description: Shift5 is a company focused on providing an observability platform for onboard operational technology (OT) within the defense, aviation, and rail industries. Their main offerings include real-time data access and analytics for operations, maintenance, and cybersecurity, enabling actionable insights and decision-making for fleet management. Shift5 serves sectors such as the defense industry, commercial aviation, and passenger and freight rail, providing solutions for fleet readiness, risk management, and operational efficiency. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Arlington, Virginia.

name: Reelgood
cb_description: Reelgood is a comprehensive streaming service search engine that operates within the entertainment and technology sectors. The company provides a platform for browsing, tracking, and watching TV shows and movies across various streaming services without the need to navigate each one individually. Reelgood's service is primarily utilized by consumers seeking a centralized solution to access content from multiple streaming providers. Reelgood was formerly known as MyFlickList, Inc.. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cialfo
cb_description: Cialfo is a company focused on simplifying the college application and career guidance process within the education technology sector. It offers a comprehensive platform that connects students, counselors, and higher education institutions, facilitating the management of college applications, providing career guidance, and supporting post-application needs. Cialfo primarily serves the education industry, including schools, universities, and students seeking higher education opportunities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Herndon, Virginia.

name: Crezco
cb_description: Crezco focuses on providing cardless payment solutions in the financial technology sector. The company offers a range of services including instant and international payments, invoice reconciliation, fraud protection, and integrations with accounting software. Crezco primarily serves businesses, with a particular emphasis on the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Nowsta
cb_description: Nowsta is a cloud-based workforce management platform that operates within the gig economy sector. The company offers a comprehensive solution for businesses to hire, schedule, manage, and analyze their flexible workforce, including W-2 and 1099 employees, temporary staff, and gig workers. Nowsta primarily serves industries such as catering and events, colleges and universities, hotels and hospitality, stadiums and arenas, and warehouse and distribution. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Playbook
cb_description: Playbook provides a worker training solution for gig-economy businesses. It offers in-app training and engagement solution by creating step-by-step, story-like guides for operational tasks using images, videos, and text. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. In March 2023, Playbook was acquired by EduMe. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Speedata
cb_description: Speedata operates as a technology company focusing on data analytics solutions. The company's main offering is a hardware accelerator, known as the Analytics Processing Unit (APU), designed to significantly speed up data analytics workloads without requiring code changes. Speedata primarily serves the big data and analytics industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Netanya, Israel.

name: TooMuchWifi
cb_description: TooMuchWifi specializes in providing affordable internet services, focusing on uncapped wifi and hotspot options for homes and businesses. The company offers a range of internet plans that are cost-effective, with no contracts and no usage limits, catering to the needs of developing communities. TooMuchWifi is committed to community development through job creation, training, and revenue sharing initiatives. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Heuritech
cb_description: Heuritech is a company specializing in demand forecasting within the fashion and sportswear industries. It offers AI-powered insights and analytics tools to help brands quantify and predict market trends, enabling more sustainable production and improved sell-through rates. Heuritech's services are primarily utilized by fashion and sportswear companies seeking to enhance their decision-making processes with data-driven insights. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Detectify
cb_description: Detectify specializes in external attack surface management (EASM) for product security and application security teams. The company offers a platform that provides payload-based vulnerability assessments. Detectify's services include continuous monitoring of internet-facing assets and in-depth scanning of web applications to identify security weaknesses. The company leverages a global community of elite ethical hackers to crowdsource the latest security tests, ensuring up-to-date protection against emerging threats. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: DocStation
cb_description: DocStation is a technology company focused on the healthcare sector, specifically pharmacy services. The company offers a comprehensive electronic health record platform and practice management suite, enabling pharmacies to provide patient care, submit medical claims, and participate in payer-sponsored programs. DocStation primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a particular emphasis on pharmacies and health plans. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Puttshack
cb_description: Puttshack is a company that focuses on providing an upscale, tech-infused mini golf experience in the entertainment industry. The company offers a modernized version of mini golf, utilizing technology to enhance gameplay, and also provides food and beverage services in a vibrant environment. It primarily caters to the leisure and hospitality sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Arch
cb_description: Arch specializes in heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) sales software as a service designed to streamline heat loads and system design for the climate technology industry. The company offers a suite of tools that facilitate pre-visit home analysis, automated system designs, and proposal dispatch. Arch primarily serves HVAC contractors looking for sales. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Covina, California.

name: Pepperfry
cb_description: Pepperfry is an online and offline retailer specializing in furniture, home decor, and related products. The company offers a wide range of furniture for living rooms, bedrooms, dining areas, offices, and outdoor spaces, as well as home decor items like lighting, kitchenware, bedding, and spiritual items. Pepperfry caters to customers seeking to furnish and decorate their homes with a variety of styles and preferences. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Restaurant365
cb_description: Restaurant365 specializes in integrating and automating accounting, operations, and workforce management for the restaurant industry. The company offers a cloud-based platform that centralizes data to help operators efficiently manage finances, optimize store operations, and streamline workforce tasks. Restaurant365 serves a variety of business types and restaurant styles, including small businesses, multi-location groups, enterprises, franchise brands, and accounting firms, with a focus on improving profitability and growth for its clients. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: Swiggy
cb_description: Swiggy operates as an on-demand delivery platform in the food service industry. Its main service is providing a platform for customers to order food online from various restaurants. Swiggy primarily serves the food delivery industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Shikho
cb_description: Shikho operates as an education technology startup focusing on transforming the learning experience. The company offers a learning application that provides animated video lessons, interactive live classes, visualized learning journeys, and performance analytics, enabling students to learn at their own pace and test their knowledge. It primarily serves the education sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

name: Busbud
cb_description: Busbud is an online platform specializing in the comparison and booking of intercity bus and train travel. The company provides a service that allows users to search, compare, and reserve transportation tickets from a global network of bus and train operators. Busbud caters to a diverse clientele with a multilingual platform and dedicated customer support, facilitating travel in over 80 countries. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Omnistream
cb_description: Omnistream specializes in live video transmission and streaming solutions within the digital media and broadcasting sectors. The company offers a platform that enables high-quality live streaming from smartphones and DSLR cameras, utilizing advanced cellular bonding technology for seamless connectivity. Omnistream's services cater to a variety of industries, including digital media, news, social networks, video production, and companies seeking white label streaming solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: LetsGetChecked
cb_description: LetsGetChecked is a virtual care company that operates in the healthcare sector. The company provides telehealth services, pharmacy services, and at-home laboratory tests for a variety of health conditions. These services are primarily aimed at individuals seeking to manage their health from home. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: HelloTech
cb_description: HelloTech provides professional in-home business and remote technology support on demand with a network of fully vetted technicians throughout the United States. It provides a wide range of services, focusing on computers, home theater, virus removal, networking, and more. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California. In June 2024, HelloTech was acquired by Door.

name: Hackmetrix
cb_description: Hackmetrix operates in the cybersecurity domain. The company provides a platform for obtaining certifications, along with services to monitor and repair vulnerabilities in a company's cybersecurity infrastructure. It serves sectors that require security certifications and compliance with industry regulations. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: SaliCrop
cb_description: SaliCrop specializes in agricultural innovation, focusing on seed enhancement technology to improve plant resilience against environmental stressors. The company offers solutions that enable crops to withstand abiotic stressors such as salinity, heat, and drought, aiming to transform challenging agricultural conditions into productive opportunities. SaliCrop primarily serves the agricultural sector, providing technologies to enhance crop resilience and productivity, especially in regions facing extreme environmental conditions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Kfar Vitkin, Israel.

name: Juro
cb_description: Juro is an AI-enabled contract automation platform that operates within the legal technology sector. The company provides solutions for creating, executing, and managing contracts, utilizing artificial intelligence to streamline legal workflows and electronic signatures for efficient contract finalization. Juro primarily serves legal, sales, human resources, and finance teams across various industries, including B2B SaaS, food delivery, auto marketplace, and travel marketplace. Juro was formerly known as TERMSCLOUD. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: MonkeyLearn
cb_description: MonkeyLearn is a text analysis platform with machine learning to automate business workflows. It provides a graphical interface where users can create customized text classification and extraction analysis by training machine learning models such as sentiment analysis, topic detection, keyword extraction, and more. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California. In February 2022, MonkeyLearn was acquired by Medallia. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: dataPlor
cb_description: dataPlor specializes in providing global location intelligence and operates within the data analytics and geospatial industry. The company offers data that is updated and human-reviewed to support data-driven decision-making. dataPlor's services are utilized by various sectors including retail, fintech, quick service restaurants, and third-party logistics site selection, investment decisions, and marketing strategies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Manhattan Beach, California.

name: Barnebys
cb_description: Barnebys specializes in the aggregation of art, antiques, and collectibles auctions. The company provides a search engine to list items from auction houses, dealers, and galleries worldwide, offering access to a variety of categories such as furniture, jewelry, art, and more. Barnebys also offers a price database for auction results and appraisal services. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Cybord
cb_description: Cybord develops an inline visual artificial intelligence (AI) platform. It aims to get counterfeit and defective components off the production lines. Its products include Cybord Kingfisher an inspection machine that takes an image of each component from the top, Cybord AI engine processes the images of all components in the reels to detect marking, and date codes, Cybord Aquila uses the images generated from the pick and place system. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: NewtonX
cb_description: NewtonX is a leading company in the B2B market research industry. The company offers a range of services including large-scale quantitative surveys, qualitative interviews, long-term consultations, and customized research plans. These services are primarily targeted towards sectors such as advertising and marketing, automotive, financial services and institutions, healthcare and life sciences, and technology among others. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Tizona Therapeutics
cb_description: Tizona Therapeutics is a biotechnology company focused on developing first-in-class immunotherapies for cancer treatment. The company's main offerings include novel scientific insights translated into immunotherapies designed to modulate the activity of immunosuppressive cells and activate the body's immune response against cancer. These therapies primarily target the tumor microenvironment and biological mechanisms responsible for immune suppression. It was founded in 2015 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Crabi
cb_description: Crabi is a company focused on providing digital auto insurance services within the insurance industry. The company offers a range of auto insurance coverages including material damage, total theft, third-party liability, medical expenses, roadside, and legal assistance, all managed through a mobile application. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Guadalajara, Mexico.

name: Mulberri
cb_description: Mulberri is an AI-powered business insurance platform operating in the insurtech industry. The company offers an embedded insurance platform, a risk engine, and a cyber insurance service, all designed to boost revenue, increase profitability, and protect small and medium-sized businesses. Mulberri primarily serves the payroll and HR provider industry, insurance carriers, and professional employer organizations (PEOs). It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Forum Brands
cb_description: Forum Brands is a company focused on acquiring high potential digital brands and transforming them into omnichannel leaders within the family, health & wellness, and pet product sectors. The company's main offerings include identifying promising brands, providing growth strategies, and managing brand development to enhance their presence across various sales channels. Forum Brands primarily serves the ecommerce industry, targeting brands that cater to family, health & wellness, and pet care markets. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Docquity
cb_description: Docquity is a health tech company that focuses on creating a professional community for healthcare professionals. The company provides a platform where healthcare professionals can exchange ideas, access educational resources, and attend virtual discussions. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore.

name: Sana Benefits
cb_description: Sana Benefits is a company focused on providing health insurance solutions, operating within the healthcare and insurance industries. The company offers comprehensive health plans for small businesses, including medical, dental, and vision coverage, with a variety of healthcare options available at no additional cost. Sana Benefits primarily serves the small business sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: QualSights
cb_description: QualSights is a consumer insights platform that specializes in qualitative and quantitative research within the market research industry. The company offers a suite of tools for collecting and analyzing real-time consumer insights through remote observation and interaction, utilizing a mix of proprietary technology and AI analysis tools. QualSights primarily serves brands, agencies, and consulting firms seeking in-depth understanding of consumer behavior and product usage. QualSights was formerly known as Georama. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: CounterCraft
cb_description: CounterCraft was created in 2005 to address a need expressed by the food service industry for innovative, high-end serving counters.

name: Storyblok
cb_description: Storyblok is a content management system that specializes in providing developers and marketers with tools to create and manage digital content across various channels. The company offers a headless CMS that enables seamless content management and delivery, along with visual editing capabilities and API integrations for personalized experiences. Storyblok's solutions cater to industries such as retail, technology, manufacturing, finance, and education, focusing on improving time to market, content efficiency, digital innovation, and security. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Linz, Austria.

name: Qualys
cb_description: Qualys (NASDAQ: QLYS) provides information technology (IT) and regulatory compliance solutions. It offers a range of solutions such as cloud security, asset management, vulnerability and configuration management, and more. It provides solutions for small businesses, mid-size businesses, enterprises, and more. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Foster City, California.

name: Veracity
cb_description: Veracity is a company that focuses on providing nondestructive inspection solutions, operating primarily in the military, aerospace, and power generation sectors. The company offers services such as power generation inspections, end of life and lifetime extension inspections, industrial nondestructive testing inspections, and aerospace inspections. Veracity primarily serves the aerospace industry and the power generation industry. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Pensacola, Florida.

name: Movandi
cb_description: Movandi is a leader in 5G mmWave technology, focusing on semiconductor technology development for enhancing wireless connectivity. The company offers smart repeaters, beamforming software, and AI-based cloud control to solve deployment challenges and improve network performance. Movandi's products are designed to extend range, enhance coverage, and support cost-effective deployment of 5G networks. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: AviadoBio
cb_description: AviadoBio focuses on the development of gene therapies within the biotechnology sector, targeting neurodegenerative diseases. The company's main offerings include the creation of potentially life-changing medicines for conditions such as frontotemporal dementia (FTD) and amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), utilizing proprietary gene therapy platforms and delivery technologies. AviadoBio's therapies are primarily aimed at the healthcare sector, specifically addressing unmet medical needs in neurodegenerative disease treatment. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Cubyn
cb_description: Cubyn specializes in supply chain, fulfillment, and delivery solutions within the e-commerce sector. The company offers a suite of services including multi-channel delivery fulfillment, storage solutions, business-to-business (B2B) shipments, freight services, custom packaging, and a comprehensive tracking experience. Cubyn primarily serves online brands and marketplace sellers looking to enhance their logistics and delivery capabilities. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: AZUL Energy
cb_description: AZUL Energy focuses on the development of air battery technology as a next-generation energy device within the clean energy sector. The company's main offerings include the innovation of catalyst electrodes for renewable energy devices, aiming to improve performance and reduce environmental impact. It primarily sells to sectors that are involved in the advancement of sustainable energy solutions. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Sendai, Japan.

name: Verity
cb_description: Verity is a service that allows people to check if a digital document that they have received was legitimately issued by an organization. If a document has been altered or forged it will not be recognized by Verity and the user will be notified. Verity ceased operations.

name: Yolda
cb_description: Yolda is a digital freight forwarder specializing in AI dispatching within the logistics and transportation industry. The company offers full truckload (FTL) and less-than-truckload (LTL) shipping, international transportation, and contract logistics, aiming to streamline supply chains and automate logistics operations. Yolda's services cater to businesses looking to optimize their shipping processes, reduce their carbon footprint, and improve cost-efficiency through advanced technology and a robust carrier network. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

name: Lokavant
cb_description: Lokavant operates an intelligence platform that offers live visualizations, risk alerts, artificial intelligence, and human insight services through data-driven analytics solutions. It uses analytics and visualization to manage analysis, thereby allowing for trial risk management and also simplifies the monitoring process. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Sigma360
cb_description: Sigma360 operates as an artficial intellenge (AI)-driven risk intelligence platform specializing in the financial sector. The company offers a suite of solutions for AML screening and monitoring, perpetual KYC, AML investigations, customer due diligence, counterparty credit risk, and country risk ratings, all designed to enhance compliance workflows and risk analysis. It primarily serves organizations within the financial industry, including fintech, banking, and insurance sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Topsort
cb_description: Topsort specializes in auction-based advertising and retail media solutions within the e-commerce and media sectors. It offers a platform that facilitates the buying of ads across multiple retailers with a focus on maximizing return on ad spend (ROAS) and providing deep insights into consumer behavior without compromising user privacy. It primarily serves the e-commerce industry, enabling marketplaces and retailers to implement and scale retail media networks. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Flux
cb_description: Flux is a financial education platform that gamifies personal finance management and financial literacy. The company offers a suite of tools for tracking finances, improving credit scores, and learning about money through games, podcasts, and newsletters. Flux primarily serves the personal finance management sector, targeting individuals seeking to enhance their financial knowledge and health. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Melbourne, Victoria.

name: FlexNode
cb_description: FlexNode operates as a digital infrastructure company. The company's main offerings include the manufacturing, deployment, and operation of modular, liquid-cooled micro data center systems, which are designed to support data processing methods. Its systems provide computing capabilities wherever there is power and connectivity. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bethesda, Maryland.

name: Virtuleap
cb_description: Virtuleap provides health and education-based virtual reality (VR) solutions to improve brain health. Its solutions include brain training, assessment modules, enterprise access, and more. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

name: Acorn Finance
cb_description: Acorn Finance is a lending marketplace focused on home improvement financing. The company provides a platform where borrowers can compare and choose the best lending rates, contractors can offer financing options to their customers, and software providers can integrate Acorn Finance's solution into their services. The company primarily serves the home improvement industry. Acorn Finance was formerly known as Headway Sales Inc.. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: Workiz
cb_description: Workiz focuses on providing field service management software solutions. The company offers a range of products to help businesses manage scheduling, invoicing, dispatching, and tracking performance, among other tasks. Workiz primarily serves industries such as junk removal, electrician services, heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC), locksmith services, garage door services, appliance repair, and plumbing. Workiz was formerly known as Send A Job. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Whoop
cb_description: Whoop is a Internet/Internet Software & Services company based in Atlanta, Georgia. Whoop has received investment from Glengary.

name: Neuron Mobility
cb_description: Neuron Mobility is a leading e-scooter rental company and micromobility technology developer in the personal mobility industry. The company designs and manufactures its own e-scooters with a focus on safety and sharing, and offers carbon-neutral rides with zero carbon emissions. Neuron Mobility's services are utilized by cities looking to integrate smart transportation solutions and reduce urban congestion. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore.

name: Orbital Therapeutics
cb_description: Orbital Therapeutics focuses on the development of ribonucleic acid (RNA) based medicines. The company's main offerings include the development of a platform for RNA technology, delivery methods, data science, and automation to create a wide range of medicines, with an initial focus on vaccines, immunomodulation, and protein replacement. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: SmartX
cb_description: SmartX is a leading provider of hyperconverged infrastructure and software-defined storage products in the enterprise cloud domain. The company offers solutions for virtualization, private cloud, and cloud-native storage, aimed at simplifying IT infrastructure and supporting enterprise digital transformation. SmartX serves multiple industries, including finance, healthcare, manufacturing, and real estate, with its innovative IT solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: CellX
cb_description: CellX is a cellular agriculture company focused on developing cultivated meat products. The company aims to provide sustainable animal protein alternatives that contribute to better human health and improved animal welfare. CellX primarily serves the food technology sector, with a focus on scaling up production and reducing costs to make cultivated meat accessible. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Shanghai, China.

name: BrightCHAMPS
cb_description: BrightCHAMPS provides a school-supportive curriculum. It is centered on coding, social collaboration, Industry 4.0 concepts, and scientific experiments for students in Grades 1-12.
