BrightCHAMPS primarily serves the education technology industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: Rugged Robotics
cb_description: Rugged Robotics is a technology company focused on the commercial construction industry. The company offers intelligent automation solutions, primarily an autonomous vehicle that replaces manual field layout with automated marking of architectural and engineering designs onto unfinished floors. The company's primary customers are in the commercial construction industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Resec
cb_description: Resec is a cybersecurity company focused on providing Zero Trust gateway security solutions. The company offers a platform that eliminates all known and unknown file-based malware threats without compromising usability, utilizing advanced detection and Content Disarm and Reconstruction (CDR) technology. Resec's solutions are designed to maintain native file format and functionality, ensuring secure and efficient operations for organizations across various industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

name: Lavender Convenience Store
cb_description: Lavender Convenience Store is a retail shop. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

name: Loctax
cb_description: Loctax offers a tax governance and management platform. Its platform helps firms achieve full control of compliance, projects, audits, transfer pricing, and all other tax responsibilities. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Gent, Belgium.

name: The Brandtech Group
cb_description: The Brandtech Group opertaes as a generative AI marketing company in the digital marketing industry. The company offers a suite of digital marketing solutions designed to help brands enhance their marketing efforts through technology, including in-house digital marketing capabilities, influencer marketing, content creation, mobile marketing, e-commerce and social commerce technology, data analytics, and marketing science. It primarily serves global brands looking to leverage cutting-edge technology for marketing strategies. The Brandtech Group was formerly known as You & Mr Jones. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: PlexTrac
cb_description: PlexTrac operates as a cybersecurity company in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that penetration test reporting, collaboration, and management, automating planning, documentation, communication, and remediation tracking. It primarily serves the cybersecurity industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boise, Idaho.

name: Houzz
cb_description: Houzz develops a home remodeling and design platform. It connects people with homeowners, home designers, and home improvement professionals. The firm allows customers to find design inspiration, research and hire home professionals, and shop for products to complete home renovation. It primarily serves the home renovation and design sector. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Kukua
cb_description: Kukua is an education entertainment company operating in the edutainment industry. The company's main offerings include animated cartoons, games, music, toys, and experiences designed to empower and educate children. Kukua primarily targets the children's entertainment and education sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Anacardio
cb_description: Anacardio focuses on the development of novel drugs in the healthcare sector, specifically for heart failure. The company's main offering includes the development of drugs that aim to improve the contractility of the heart muscle, addressing the underlying cause of heart failure. The drugs are designed to increase cardiac output without causing adverse effects, potentially improving organ function, and quality of life, and reducing the risk of hospitalization and death. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Motorq
cb_description: Motorq is a connected vehicle data platform specializing in fleet management analytics within the automotive industry. The company offers insights for preventive maintenance, vehicle tracking, and integration of electric vehicle data, among other services, to improve fleet operations without the need for additional hardware. Motorq primarily serves sectors that manage large fleets of vehicles, including traditional and electric vehicles. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Comeet
cb_description: Comeet focuses on enhancing the employee experience as a key driver of performance in the real estate and corporate sectors. The company offers an integrated service package aimed at strengthening community ties, animating corporate life, and enhancing the value of services and spaces within and around office buildings. Its solutions cater to the needs of property owners, operators, and businesses, particularly in adapting to hybrid work models and improving workplace engagement and collaboration. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Courbevoie, France.

name: Aceable
cb_description: Aceable is a company that focuses on providing online certification and licensing education, operating within the education technology industry. The company offers state-approved online courses in areas such as driver's education, defensive driving, and real estate licensing and continuing education. Primarily, Aceable serves individuals seeking certification in the driving and real estate sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Kebotix
cb_description: Kebotix focuses on accelerating the discovery and development of new materials and chemicals through its use of artificial intelligence (AI) and robotics. The company offers enterprise AI solutions and operates a self-driving laboratory for materials discovery, which integrates machine learning, physical modeling, and advanced automation to optimize the research and development process. Kebotix primarily serves sectors that require rapid innovation and development of materials. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Aspire
cb_description: Aspire specializes in security solutions for the retail sector, offering products and services designed to enhance the safety and efficiency of commercial environments. The company's main offerings include a universal locking system known as the OneKEY ecosystem, which simplifies access control with a single key solution, and various theft prevention products that protect merchandise without compromising the customer experience. Aspire also provides point of sale systems that facilitate personalized customer service and seamless transactions. It is based in Washington, DC.

name: Oomnitza
cb_description: Oomnitza is a company that focuses on Enterprise Technology Management in the IT sector. The company offers solutions that provide visibility of technology assets across the IT lifecycle, integrating with existing technology systems. These solutions automate critical IT processes such as onboarding, offboarding, audit readiness, procurement forecasting, and SaaS lifecycle management, aiming to increase IT efficiency, reduce costs, and improve security. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ChargeLab
cb_description: ChargeLab offers an electric vehicle (EV) charging software designed to operate and optimize electric vehicle charging equipment. Its software works as an operating system for EV chargers that can be used across a variety of charging networks. The company's customers include fleets, building owners, convenience stores, and utilities. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Dremio
cb_description: Dremio focuses on providing data lakehouse solutions. The company offers services such as unified analytics, structured query language (SQL) query engine, and lakehouse management, which provide self-service access across all data, interactive analytics, and data cataloging with versioning respectively, primarily sells to sectors that require high-scale, high performance, and self-service for business such as marketing, trading, and supply chain. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: MBX Biosciences
cb_description: MBX Biosciences operates as a preclinical-stage biotechnology company. It uses validated molecular targets to create medicines for rare endocrine diseases where current therapies are inadequate. The company offers precision endocrine peptide (PEP) therapeutics for the treatment of hypoparathyroidism, post-bariatric hypoglycemia (PBH), and more. It caters to the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Carmel, Indiana.

name: Torum
cb_description: Torum is a SocialFi ecosystem with a focus on connecting cryptocurrency enthusiasts in the technology sector. The platform offers a social media experience integrated with decentralized finance and non-fungible token features, catering to the needs of a growing digital currency community. It serves as a dedicated space for users to network, share, and engage with cryptocurrency-related content. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bangsar South, Malaysia.

name: Didimo
cb_description: Didimo specializes in automated 3D character creation technology for the gaming industry. The company offers a tool called Popul8, which enables rapid creation and rendering of unique 3D characters, designed to integrate seamlessly with game developers' existing art styles and technical specifications. Popul8 serves the gaming industry by providing a solution that accelerates game production and enhances in-game character diversity. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Leca da Palmeira, Portugal.

name: Journee
cb_description: Journee is a technology company focused on improving public transportation through real-time data. The company offers a platform that provides digital ticketing, trip planning, and data analytics to make public transport more efficient for commuters and more profitable for operators. Journee primarily serves state transport agencies aiming to create smarter cities. It is based in India.

name: Lemon
cb_description: Lemon analyzes users' spending habits and provides insights and information. The company shows spending across credit cards and bank accounts. It is based in Brooklyn, New York. Lemon ceased operations.

name: Gradient
cb_description: Gradient is a company that focuses on providing intelligent insights for the ecommerce industry. The company offers a platform that uses proprietary machine learning technology to help brands understand and optimize their digital point-of-sale presence on Amazon. The platform provides real-time, in-depth, accurate, and data-driven insights to maximize shelf presence and customer conversion. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Medallion
cb_description: Medallion is a healthcare operations company specializing in provider network management. The company offers a platform that streamlines credentialing, payer enrollment, provider licensing, and renewals, aiming to reduce regulatory complexity for healthcare providers. Medallion primarily serves digital health companies, health systems, payers, and provider groups, enhancing their operational efficiency and allowing them to focus on patient care. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Taskade
cb_description: Taskade offers artificial intelligence (AI)- powered collaboration tool for remote teams. It offers chat assistance, project management, mind mapping, and more. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Focal Systems
cb_description: Focal Systems specializes in retail automation technology, focusing on optimizing retail operations and increasing EBITDA through AI-driven solutions. The company offers a suite of products that automate and optimize inventory management, shelf space utilization, and employee productivity, while also reducing food waste. Focal Systems primarily serves the retail sector, providing tools that enhance store management and operational efficiency. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Burlingame, California.

name: TRANSFR
cb_description: TRANSFR specializes in immersive VR training solutions aimed at workforce development across various industries. The company offers virtual reality job-training simulations that facilitate hands-on skills development for career success without the need for traditional educational qualifications. TRANSFR primarily serves the education sector, government agencies, and industries seeking to upskill their workforce. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Teal Drones
cb_description: Teal Drones delivers commercial drones. The company offers a battery-operated and camera-equipped unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV). It was formerly known as iDrone. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in South Salt Lake, Utah. In July 2021, Teal Drones was acquired by Red Cat Holdings. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Fitprime
cb_description: Fitprime is a company focused on personal wellbeing, operating in the corporate welfare services sector. The company offers a range of services including access to fitness centers, online workout sessions, and personalized nutritional plans. Fitprime primarily serves the corporate sector, providing wellbeing solutions to both small and large businesses. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Rome, Italy.

name: Homa
cb_description: Homa is a gaming technology lab focused on providing data-driven tools and services to the game development industry. The company offers a suite of tools that assist game creators in developing, publishing, and monetizing mobile games with the potential for high user engagement and commercial success. Homa's offerings include market trend analysis, a powerful mobile software development kit (SDK) for developers, and analytics for game performance optimization. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: RealWear
cb_description: RealWear is a company specializing in the development of industrial smart glasses designed for frontline workers across various sectors. Their products are AI-voice-powered smart glasses that aim to enhance productivity, safety, and efficiency by providing hands-free operation and real-time access to information and expertise. RealWear's solutions are widely adopted in industries such as automotive, mining, oil & gas, warehousing, healthcare, and manufacturing. RealWear was formerly known as WearNext. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Vancouver, Washington.

name: Octopai
cb_description: Octopai focuses on data intelligence, operating within the data management and analytics domain. The company offers a metadata management solution that provides services such as data lineage, data discovery, and an automated data catalog, enabling businesses to map, track, and understand their data assets across complex, multi-vendor data ecosystems. It primarily serves sectors such as finance, healthcare, and insurance. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Kfar Saba, Israel.

name: Shackle
cb_description: Shackle develops a hospitality software platform specifically for hotel management. It is based in London, England.

name: AllSpice
cb_description: AllSpice is a company that focuses on providing a git platform specifically designed for hardware, operating within the technology and software industry. The company offers a platform that enables modern revision control and collaboration for native electronic designs, essentially providing a system for controlled evolution of design files. AllSpice primarily serves the hardware development sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Every
cb_description: Every is a company that focuses on providing smart business banking solutions, primarily in the financial technology sector. The company offers a range of services including invoicing, payments, accounting, payroll, and advisory services, all designed to help small businesses manage their finances more effectively. The company primarily serves the small business sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Higlobe
cb_description: Higlobe is a financial service company specializing in international payment transfers for global professionals. The company provides a US receiving bank account for non-US residents to receive payments from American companies, offering instant withdrawals and competitive foreign exchange rates. Higlobe primarily serves the freelance and business sectors, enabling professionals and small businesses to manage cross-border transactions efficiently. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Bria
cb_description: Bria specializes in visual generative AI within the technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive solution for creating and modifying visuals, including foundation models, APIs, and web integration, all designed for commercial use. It primarily serves sectors such as digital content platforms, creative agencies and marketers, eCommerce and retail, and digital asset management platforms. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Bitrise
cb_description: Bitrise develops a mobile continuous integration and delivery platform. It offers automation, a visual workflow editor, an automatic repository scan, and workflow configuration to build, test, and deploy applications. The platform enables developers to build applications for mobile platforms. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Recogni
cb_description: Recogni focuses on artificial intelligence and vision-oriented inference systems within the automobile industry. The company offers a power-efficient solution for object detection and visual perception, enabling autonomous vehicles to navigate safely and efficiently. Recogni primarily serves the autonomous vehicle industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Whistic
cb_description: Whistic specializes in third-party risk management and customer trust software within the information security sector. The company offers an AI-powered platform that streamlines vendor assessments, manages security postures, and facilitates the exchange of compliance information. Whistic primarily serves sectors that require robust security and compliance assurance, such as healthcare, manufacturing, energy, and education. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pleasant Grove, Utah.

name: DetraPel
cb_description: DetraPel is a clean-tech advanced materials company specializing in PFAS-free protective coatings across various industries. The company offers sustainable coatings for industrial applications, household essentials with higher safety and performance standards, and contract manufacturing services including private labeling and custom formulation. DetraPel's technology platform is notable for its patented, award-winning chemistries that blend and disperse immiscible particles into water-based systems, aiming to replace harmful PFAS chemicals with non-toxic alternatives. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Framingham, Massachusetts.

name: Bttn
cb_description: Bttn specializes in Internet of Things (IoT) technology and operates in the automation and customer experience enhancement sector. The company offers programmable IoT buttons that enable businesses to automate operations, workflows, and improve customer interactions. Bttn's products are designed to facilitate simple and efficient communication between people and processes, often used in various industries to trigger predefined actions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Flair
cb_description: Flair specializes in smart climate control technology. The company offers wireless thermostats and smart vents to work with central heating and air conditioning systems, mini splits, and window air conditioners, providing room-by-room temperature control. It primarily serves the home automation and energy efficiency sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Pigmentum
cb_description: Pigmentum focuses on the sustainable and scalable production of high-value natural compounds within the biotechnology sector. The company's main offerings include the production of natural metabolites for the food, pharmaceutical, and cosmetic industries using a proprietary plant genetics inducible mechanism. This technology enables the efficient and accurate production of compounds such as pigments, flavor and aroma molecules, proteins, and more. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Rehovot, Israel.

name: Aerial
cb_description: Aerial specializes in motion intelligence technology within the smart ecosystem sector. The company offers a no-hardware solution that uses existing wireless fidelity (WiFi) infrastructure and artificial intelligence to provide insights into human motion for various applications. Aerial primarily serves sectors such as elder care, smart home automation, and remote patient monitoring. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Taxdoo
cb_description: Taxdoo is a cloud-based platform that specializes in automated VAT compliance and accounting for the e-commerce sector. The company offers a solution that aggregates transaction data, recognizes tax liabilities, and facilitates VAT reporting and filings across the EU and the UK. Taxdoo's platform integrates with major marketplaces and ERP systems, streamlining the accounting process and ensuring compliance with tax regulations for online merchants and tax consultants. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

name: Chemify
cb_description: Chemify specializes in the digitization of chemistry and chemical discovery within the pharmaceutical and materials science sectors. It offers technology that facilitates the conversion of chemical processes into digital code, enabling reproducible chemical synthesis and molecular optimization for drug and materials development. The technology primarily serves the pharmaceutical industry, chemical research institutions, and materials science entities. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Glasgow, United Kingdom.

name: Botkeeper
cb_description: Botkeeper is a company specializing in automated bookkeeping solutions for accounting firms, leveraging artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies. The company offers a suite of services that include data extraction from receipts, payroll processing, bill payment, invoice management, account reconciliation, and the generation of detailed financial reports, all designed to streamline and enhance the bookkeeping process. Botkeeper's solutions are tailored to support accounting professionals by automating routine tasks and providing high-level advisory capabilities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Open as App
cb_description: Open as App is a no-code platform specializing in the automated creation of mobile apps within the technology sector. The company enables the transformation of spreadsheets into customizable, data-driven mobile applications without the need for programming skills. Open as App's primary offerings include tools for real-time collaboration and sharing of apps across various platforms, catering to businesses seeking to enhance productivity and digitize processes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: eMerge
cb_description: eMerge is an email-based marketing platform for the real estate industry. Subscribers can use the platform's do-it-yourself tools to create, schedule and analyze email campaigns and workflows or gain a helping hand with one of the real estate campaigns designed to help busy real estate pros stay on task and engaged with their online audience.

name: Windward
cb_description: Windward (LON: WNWD) provides maritime artificial intelligence (AI) insights. The company offers services such as ocean freight visibility, vessel estimated time of arrival prediction, and risk and compliance management, enabled by artificial intelligence. It facilitates sanction compliance, business intelligence, exception management, lead investigation, and more. Its services are primarily targeted towards sectors such as trading and shipping, oil and energy, marine insurance, and government and public sector. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Ignition
cb_description:
Ignition is an exerience-based marketing agency offering Sustainable Brand Experiences.

In April 2012, Ignition was acquired by Havas Sports & Entertainment. The valuation of Ignition was undisclosed. Other terms of the deal were not released.

name: Tropic
cb_description: Tropic focuses on the agriculture sector. The company specializes in improving tropical crops like bananas, coffee, and rice by enhancing their taste, hardiness, and resilience to climate change using advanced genetic breeding technologies such as CRISPR. Tropic's technology supports farmers by increasing crop resistance to diseases and reducing waste in the supply chain. Tropic was formerly known as Tropic Biosciences. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Norwich, United Kingdom.

name: Phasecraft
cb_description: Phasecraft develops quantum software for quantum information processors. It encompasses both near-term intermediate-scale devices and universal fault-tolerant quantum computers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bristol, United Kingdom.

name: Cariloop
cb_description: Cariloop provides employee benefit solutions within the caregiving support sector. It offers a caregiver support platform that facilitates personalized guidance from expert Care Coaches as well as access to digital tools and resources for managing caregiving responsibilities. It primarily sells to employers looking for packages and support for their workforce's caregiving needs. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Richardson, Texas.

name: Funderbeam
cb_description: Funderbeam is a technology-powered marketplace focused on facilitating the buying and selling of shares in ambitious companies within the financial sector. The platform enables founders to raise capital without geographical limitations and offers investment opportunities in early-stage companies. It primarily serves the investment and startup sectors by connecting investors with growing businesses. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: UCM Digital Health
cb_description: UCM Digital Health is a company that focuses on digital health solutions in the healthcare industry. The company offers a digitally integrated health solution that provides patients with immediate access to a range of services, including emergent and urgent care, primary and specialty care, and behavioral health. These services are delivered through a digital platform, a multi-disciplinary team of providers, and a 24/7 telehealth triage, treatment, and navigation service. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Troy, New York.

name: BridgerPay
cb_description: BridgerPay offers a payment operations platform operating in the financial technology sector. The company provides a platform that allows businesses to build, manage, and optimize their connections to any payment gateway or method worldwide, ensuring secure and efficient payment processing. It primarily serves businesses across various sectors that require streamlined payment operations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Limassol, Cyprus.

name: Continual
cb_description: Continual specializes in mobile user experience analytics and improvement within the telecommunications sector. The company offers solutions that analyze mobile usage patterns, network experiences, and employs machine learning to enhance the quality of service for mobile subscribers. Its services cater to businesses in the connected car market and other sectors requiring high-quality, uninterrupted mobile connectivity. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Caesarea, Israel.

name: Numan
cb_description: Numan is a healthcare company focused on personalized treatment plans and care for common health conditions. The company offers services in diagnostics, medication, supplements, and digital health programs to address symptoms and root causes of health issues. Numan primarily serves individuals seeking to manage their health through a digital platform. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Thunder
cb_description: Thunder is a Salesforce consulting partner focused on helping organizations optimize their use of Salesforce products and services. The company offers a range of services including implementation and customization of various Salesforce clouds, DevOps, AI integration, and data analytics solutions. Thunder primarily serves sectors such as consumer & business services, energy, manufacturing, media, technology, and travel & hospitality. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: TabTrader
cb_description: TabTrader is a mobile and web-based platform focused on cryptocurrency trading across various exchanges. The platform offers real-time market data, advanced charting tools, and a non-custodial DeFi wallet, enabling users to trade and manage their cryptocurrency portfolio. TabTrader's services cater to both novice and experienced traders, providing access to a wide range of trading instruments and exchanges, along with features like price alerts and portfolio management. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Raylo
cb_description: Raylo specializes in the leasing of consumer electronics within the financial services sector. The company offers a range of SIM-free smartphones, laptops, tablets, and wearables, providing customers with flexible lease terms and the option to trade in their devices. Raylo's business model promotes sustainability by refurbishing and reusing devices, making technology more accessible and affordable. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Wheelocity
cb_description: Wheelocity is a supply chain network specializing in fresh commerce within the logistics and supply chain industry. The company offers an integrated network for efficient supply chain management of fresh goods, including fruits, vegetables, dairy, poultry, and meat, aimed at reducing food waste and improving nutrition. Wheelocity's services cater to both B2C and B2B sectors, providing resources and ecosystems for cost reduction, quality maintenance, inventory optimization, and customer satisfaction. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: Tagado
cb_description: Tagado is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence and data analytics in the customer experience industry. The company offers a platform that uses machine learning and natural language processing to analyze customer feedback data, providing actionable insights to improve customer satisfaction and retention. The platform primarily serves professionals in customer experience, product development, customer service, and operations. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: AHARA
cb_description: AHARA specializes in precision nutrition, offering services in the health and wellness sector. The company provides personalized nutrition plans, identifies nutrient deficiencies, and assesses health risks, supported by clinical-grade supplements and optional genetic and biomarker testing. AHARA's solutions cater to individuals seeking to improve their health through tailored dietary recommendations and supplement regimens. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Century City, California.

name: Atom Limbs
cb_description: Atom Limbs specializes in the development of prosthetic limbs within the healthcare technology sector. The company's product, Atom Touch, is an artificial arm that offers near-full human range of motion, restores a basic sense of touch, and is controlled by the user's mind through non-invasive methods. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: ObvioHealth
cb_description: ObvioHealth is a company focused on providing digital health solutions, specifically in the realm of decentralized clinical trials. The company offers a suite of services including digital trial design, remote patient monitoring, virtual site services, and integration of sensors and wearable devices. It's platform, ObvioGo, and accompanying services such as electronic patient-reported outcomes (ePRO), electronic consent (eConsent), and clinical outcome assessments (eCOA) streamline the clinical trial process for sponsors and participants. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Our Place
cb_description: Our Place specializes in home cooking essentials within the kitchenware industry. The company offers a range of products including nonstick cookware, ceramic dinnerware, and various kitchen appliances designed to simplify cooking and dining experiences. These products cater to home cooks looking for multifunctional and toxin-free options for preparing and serving meals. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Culver City, California.

name: Casana
cb_description: Casana supports companies in digital product development. It focuses on matching companies with IT freelancers on factors such as technical skills, soft skills, and communication styles, providing clients with freelancers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Mnchen, Germany. In May 2023, Casana was acquired by Andela. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Immertec
cb_description: Immertec provides live surgical training using virtual reality technology within the healthcare education sector. It offers immersive VR experiences that allow for observation and interaction with surgical procedures. This technology is primarily utilized by medical professionals and educational institutions for training purposes. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Tampa, Florida.

name: Hotglue
cb_description: Hotglue is a production company and media agency focused on connecting brands with consumers. The company offers services such as production, media strategy, planning and buying, and social media marketing, aimed at the overall growth of its clients. Hotglue primarily serves clients across various industries and works on media strategies and social media presence. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Richmond, Australia. In July 2024, Hotglue was acquired by Havas Group.

name: SuperSim
cb_description: SuperSim specializes in providing online personal loans and promoting financial inclusion in the financial services sector. The company offers quick and accessible loans, leveraging technology for credit analysis, and caters to individuals with varying credit histories, including those with negative credit. SuperSim's products include loans with and without collateral, insurance options, and a referral program that allows customers to earn by referring others. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Pente Networks
cb_description: Pente Networks specializes in cloud-based private wireless network orchestration for the telecommunications industry. The company offers solutions that facilitate the rapid deployment and management of private LTE and 5G cellular networks, with a focus on ease of integration with existing IT systems. Pente Networks' services cater to a variety of sectors including corporate enterprise, industry 4.0, healthcare, and military and defense. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Hackensack, New Jersey.

name: Dream Games
cb_description: Dream Games is a mobile gaming company focused on creating casual puzzle games. Its main offerings include free-to-play mobile games designed with engaging levels and themes that encourage long-term play.  It was founded in 2019 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Bite Ninja
cb_description: Bite Ninja provides a virtual workforce to restaurants. It helps virtually staff their drive-thru and front counter to create an efficient, error-free ordering system, allowing in-store workers to focus on food quality and customer service. Bite Ninja primarily serves fast food and fast-casual restaurants. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Memphis, Tennessee.

name: Yellowbrick
cb_description: Yellowbrick is a company specializing in SQL data platforms for enterprise data warehousing and analytics across various sectors. Their main offerings include a data platform that supports enterprise data warehousing, ad-hoc and streaming analytics, and AI and BI workloads, built on a Kubernetes-based architecture that allows deployment across public and private clouds, data centers, laptops, and the edge. The platform is designed to ensure data residency and sovereignty compliance for businesses. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: HotSpot Therapeutics
cb_description: HotSpot Therapeutics focuses on allosteric drug discovery in the biotechnology sector. The company develops allosteric medicines by targeting natural regulatory hotspots on proteins, aiming to treat diseases such as cancer and autoimmune disorders. Its therapies are designed to modulate protein function with pharmacology. HotSpot Therapeutics was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Susu
cb_description: Susu provides health insurance services in the healthcare industry. The company offers a range of services including health insurance, personalized health bundles, and custom offers, providing healthcare coverage. The company primarily caters to the African diaspora. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lyon, France.

name: Opay
cb_description: Opay operates as a company in the financial technology sector, with a focus on providing digital banking solutions. The company offers services such as easy money transfers, bill payments, and the provision of debit cards, all aimed at simplifying financial transactions for its users. It primarily serves the financial services industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: RightData
cb_description: RightData focuses on data management and data governance. It offers a no-code platform that enables users to ingest, cleanse, prepare, verify, and catalog data products without writing a line of code. The platform also provides data observability, monitoring, verification, and reconciliation services, as well as the ability to build and deploy a catalog of all data products. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Metycle
cb_description: Metycle is a digital platform specializing in the international trade of scrap and recycled metals. The company connects buyers and sellers, facilitating transactions of various types of metal scrap without subscription or sign-up fees. Metycle primarily serves the metal recycling sector, offering a secure and efficient marketplace for the trade of secondary metals. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Cologne, Germany.

name: Auransa
cb_description: Auransa is a clinical stage, AI-native biopharma company focused on developing novel therapeutics for cancer care. The company leverages a proprietary AI platform to analyze human disease data and identify potential treatments for various diseases, with a current emphasis on liver cancer. Auransa's technology is designed to discover therapies that are most effective for responsive patients, advancing precision medicine in oncology. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Qupital
cb_description: Qupital operates as a financial technology company focused on providing financing services and solutions to the e-commerce sector. The company offers data-driven funding options for e-commerce businesses, utilizing a digitalized process and proprietary big data credit assessment models to facilitate rapid financing. Qupital primarily serves e-commerce merchants seeking capital and investors looking for opportunities in the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

name: MagniLearn
cb_description: MagniLearn is an Education as a Service (EaaS) company focused on revolutionizing learning efficiency in the education sector. The company offers personalized and precise instruction services, using artificial intelligence and natural language processing to understand learners' struggles and adapt lessons to individual needs. The teaching method is interactive and tailor-made, based on data-driven lessons generated in real-time. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: Chemix
cb_description: Chemix develops electric vehicle (EV) batteries working within the renewable energy and automotive sectors. The company offers a platform known as MIX, which accelerates battery design by leveraging a proprietary dataset to create batteries. Chemix primarily serves the electric vehicle industry by providing advanced battery technology solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Cleary
cb_description: Cleary is a company focused on enhancing the digital employee experience within organizations. Its main offerings include a platform that automates onboarding processes, facilitates internal communications, and manages employee engagement throughout the employee lifecycle. Cleary's solutions are designed to support distributed, remote, and hybrid teams in scaling their culture and improving operational efficiency. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Air Doctor
cb_description: Air Doctor is a company that operates in the healthcare sector, focusing on connecting travelers with private doctors worldwide. The company offers a digital platform where users can find and book appointments with local doctors and specialists, both in-person and online. The platform also provides information about the doctors, including their professional background, languages spoken, and reviews from other patients. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Motza Illit, Israel.

name: Superluminal Medicines
cb_description: Superluminal Medicines is a generative biology and chemistry company focused on drug discovery and development. The company leverages machine learning, deep biology and chemistry expertise, and proprietary big data infrastructure to create candidate-ready compounds for therapeutic use. Superluminal Medicines primarily serves the pharmaceutical industry with its innovative drug discovery platform and pipeline of small molecule therapeutics. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Bioheng
cb_description: Bioheng is a biopharmaceutical company focusing on the development and commercialization of disease treatment products. The company's main offerings include immunotherapy and gene therapy, providing solutions that aim to address the challenges of high cost, long duration, production difficulty, and personalization in CAR-T cell therapy. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Nanjing, China.

name: Convergent Therapeutics
cb_description: Convergent Therapeutics provides a biotechnology solution that focuses on developing next-generation targeted radiotherapies for cancer treatment. The company offers a therapeutic platform that targets validated and novel cancer antigens, aiming to improve antitumors with reduced toxicity. It serves the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Enable Medicine
cb_description: Enable Medicine focuses on spatial biology within the healthcare and biotechnology sectors. The company offers a cloud-based platform that generates, manages, and analyzes spatial biology data, with a particular emphasis on creating searchable maps of human disease to guide drug discovery and treatment strategies. Its primary customers are academic institutions and pharmaceutical companies, particularly those working in oncology and autoimmune diseases. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Monolith
cb_description: Monolith specializes in AI software solutions within the engineering product development sector. The company offers a no-code AI platform with engineering-specific algorithms designed to optimize test plans, validate test data, analyze root causes, and calibrate complex systems. Monolith primarily serves industries such as automotive, aerospace & defense, and industrial engineering with its enterprise SaaS platform. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Chowbus
cb_description: Chowbus offers a platform for ordering Asian food from various restaurants. It also provides a point-of-sale system specifically designed for Asian restaurants. The company primarily serves the food delivery industry. Chowbus was formerly known as Fantuan Group. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Midi
cb_description: Midi is a virtual healthcare platform specializing in female midlife health, including perimenopause and menopause. The company offers personalized care plans that may include prescription medications, lifestyle coaching, and wellness therapies tailored to each woman's health history, lifestyle, and genetics. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Altos, California.

name: hC Bioscience
cb_description: hC Bioscience focuses on healthcare solutions. The company's main focus is on the development of ribonucleic acid (RNA) based therapeutics, which are designed to target protein dysfunction in genetically defined diseases. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Blickfeld
cb_description: Blickfeld focuses on LiDAR technology in the tech industry. The company offers advanced LiDAR sensors that capture 3D data in perception software that converts this data into actionable insights. Its products are used in a variety of sectors including volume sensing, people counting, security systems, and smart mobility solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Gousto
cb_description: Gousto is a company that focuses on simplifying home cooking by delivering recipe boxes. They provide customers with pre-measured ingredients and easy-to-follow recipe cards for a variety of meals, including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and dairy-free options. The company primarily serves individuals and families looking to enjoy home-cooked meals without the hassle of meal planning and grocery shopping. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, England.

name: Reilo
cb_description: Relio is a Swiss fintech company offering digital banking solutions for businesses. The company provides online business accounts with Swiss IBAN, premium support, and is developing features for foreign currency exchange, international payments, and smart debit cards. Relio primarily serves small to large businesses, including those with complex business cases such as international activities, foreign ownership, and innovative business models. Reilo was formerly known as Forto. It is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Treinta
cb_description: Treinta is a digital platform focused on providing business management solutions for small businesses, merchants, and entrepreneurs. The company offers a suite of tools that enable users to digitize and monitor their finances, manage inventory, create virtual catalogs, sell online, and process various forms of digital payments. Treinta's software facilitates business operations across multiple devices, allowing for efficient management from any location. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: MindFi
cb_description: MindFi is a company focused on employee wellbeing in the mental health sector. It offers a centralized platform that integrates various wellbeing initiatives, providing resources for self and professional care, community-based initiatives, education, and personalized care experiences. The company primarily serves businesses, with a particular emphasis on HR departments. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: Xwing
cb_description: Xwing develops a suite of technologies necessary for pilotless commercial flight of vertical takeoff and landing (VTOL) and fixed-wing aircraft. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Evox Therapeutics
cb_description: Evox Therapeutics focuses on the development of exosome-based therapeutics within the biotechnology sector. The company specializes in creating treatments for life-threatening rare diseases using its proprietary DeliverEX platform to engineer extracellular vesicles for targeted drug delivery. Evox Therapeutics serves the healthcare sector, particularly in areas with limited treatment options. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Oxford, England.

name: Civitas Learning
cb_description: Civitas Learning is a company that focuses on providing intelligent student success software in the higher education sector. The company's main services include offering real-time insights and workflow solutions to support the entire student lifecycle, aiming to achieve equitable outcomes and build sustainable institutions. The primary sectors the company sells to are institutions in the higher education industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Adentro
cb_description: Adentro operates as a marketing platform. It helps offline businesses discover and drive the metric and allows users to build a marketing database by increasing and measuring traffic, engagement, and loyalty. It was formerly known as Zenreach and Wifast. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Naked Energy
cb_description: Naked Energy focuses on engineering, innovation, and sustainability within the renewable energy sector, specifically in solar thermal and solar photovoltaic thermal (PVT) technologies. The company offers high energy-density solar collectors designed to decarbonize heat and power in the built environment, providing solutions for constant heat demand such as in hospitals, residential developments, and manufacturing. It primarily serves sectors with high hot water and electricity demands, including hospitality, leisure, food & beverage manufacturing, and healthcare. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in West Sussex, United Kingdom.

name: Plate IQ
cb_description: Plate IQ is a company that focuses on automating accounts payable, operating within the financial technology sector. The company offers services such as digitizing invoices, assigning them to the correct general ledger codes, syncing this information with accounting software, and providing features like one-click bill pay, approval workflows, expense management, and cloud-based data storage. These services primarily cater to businesses seeking to streamline and automate their accounts payable process. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Alpaca
cb_description:
We are creating a travel search engine that makes organising trips as easy as possible. All you need to do is to choose preferred dates, city where you start and set budget. We will show you where you can afford to go for the price including flight and accommodation. Just choose the most interesting destination, book and start packing your suitcase! You dont have to spend long hours looking for travel opportunities you can afford. 
We have strong competitive advantages: 
1. Alpaca saves your time - you wont have to visit many websites to organise trip that suits your budget. 
2. Alpaca saves your money - thanks to our supplier we will show correct prices of low cost carriers. Most of popular flight search engines show incorrect prices and charge you high fees. We will redirect you to airlines website to avoid fees.
3. Alpaca saves your effort - you wont have to think where it would be cool to go before checking prices. Use our search engine and then decide. Its simpler, isnt it

name: Vectra
cb_description: Vectra is a cybersecurity company specializing in AI-driven threat detection and response across hybrid and multi-cloud enterprise environments. The company offers a platform that provides integrated signals for extended detection and response (XDR), equipping security operations centers (SOCs) with real-time Attack Signal Intelligence to prioritize and respond to threats. Vectra's solutions cater to a diverse range of sectors including finance, healthcare, government, and more, with a focus on protecting critical infrastructure and managing risks associated with remote workforces and operational technology environments. Vectra was formerly known as TraceVector. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Sensel
cb_description: Sensel focuses on the development of touch technologies, operating in the technology and electronics industry. The company offers touch sensing, multi-finger force sensing, and haptic technologies, which are integrated into a single, ultra-thin solution that allows users to interact physically with the digital world. Sensel primarily sells to the consumer electronics industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Tranch
cb_description: Tranch offers a buy-now-pay-later (BNPL) platform for software-as-a-service (SaaS) sellers and professional service providers. It helps to transform businesses' pay for large invoices, from software-as-a-service and cloud to professional and marketing expenses. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Doctrine
cb_description: Doctrine is a legal intelligence platform that operates within the legal technology sector. The company provides a centralized database of legal information, including case law, legislative texts, and real-time updates, designed to support legal professionals in their research and decision-making processes. Doctrine primarily serves law firms, corporate legal departments, and public sector legal entities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Level
cb_description: Level specializes in online custom framing services for pictures and art within the home decor industry. The company offers a platform for customers to upload images for printing and framing, as well as options to custom frame existing artwork, posters, and vinyl records. Level primarily serves individual consumers looking to decorate their personal spaces with framed memories and art. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: HummingBird
cb_description:
ihumm.org

ihumm.org/howthisworks

ihumm.org/aboutus

Hummingbird lets users create actions such as "bring your own bags to the grocery store" or "skip meat for one meal" and see individual, friends, and total community impact per action in tangible units such as "trees" or "gallons of water" saved per action and across all actions in the ecosystem.

Hummingbird is a new, light, fun way to learn about and participate in environmental protection (to expand to other actions areas in the future). HummingBird has ceased operation.

name: Pliant
cb_description: Pliant was a Industrial/Basic Materials/Chemicals company based in Schaumburg, Illinois.  Pliant was acquired in 2000.

name: SiSu
cb_description: SiSu is a company focused on the wellness and health industry, providing plant-based beverages. The company offers a range of products including wellness shots, cold-pressed juices, and organic kombucha, all aimed at supporting a healthier lifestyle. SiSu primarily caters to individual consumers, as well as corporate partners for office or home deliveries and event catering. It is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Seemplicity
cb_description: Seemplicity operates as a company focusing on security operations within the technology industry. It offers a platform that automates risk reduction workflows, providing security teams with full visibility of the end-to-end remediation lifecycle. It primarily serves the cybersecurity industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Fasal
cb_description: Fasal focuses on horticulture farming, operating within the agricultural technology sector. The company provides a range of services including farm-level weather forecasts, disease and pest predictions, irrigation management, and farm finance management. These services are designed to help farmers optimize cultivation costs, increase yield, and improve the quality of their produce. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: mmhmm
cb_description: mmhmm focuses on video communication and presentations within the digital communication sector. It offers a video presentation platform that allows users to create video content for meetings and presentations, with features such as virtual backgrounds, slide integration, and live video connection capabilities. The platform is primarily utilized by professionals seeking to improve their video presentations and meetings in various industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Omaze
cb_description: Omaze is a for-profit entertainment company that focuses on online fundraising through charity sweepstakes. The company raises money for charity by offering the chance to win life-changing prizes, aiming to make giving fun and efficient for their charity partners. Omaze primarily serves the nonprofit sector by collaborating with various charities to raise funds and awareness. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Culver City, California.

name: Autofleet
cb_description: Autofleet provides an end-to-end software platform focused on the optimization of fleet and mobility operations within the transportation industry. The company offers solutions for maximizing fleet utilization and revenues, automating fleet operations, and planning for fleet electrification, all aimed at enhancing the sustainability and efficiency of transportation services. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. In August 2024, Autofleet was acquired by Element Fleet Management.

name: Echobox
cb_description: Echobox is a company that focuses on publishing automation in the technology sector. The company offers products that automate and optimize the distribution of content on social media and through newsletters, using advanced artificial intelligence technology. Echobox primarily serves the publishing industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Thistle
cb_description: Thistle specializes in providing nutritious, plant-forward meals and snacks within the food delivery industry. The company offers a subscription service delivering ready-to-eat meals, snacks, and juices designed by nutritionists and crafted by chefs, focusing on health and sustainability. Thistle primarily serves individuals seeking convenient, healthy eating options. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Vacaville, California.

name: DFINITY Foundation
cb_description:
Dfinity operates as a not-for-profit organization focused on blockchain technology, specifically contributing to the development of the Internet Computer blockchain. The company's main offerings include the promotion and maintenance of the Internet Computer, enabling smart contracts to serve web content directly to users and supporting a decentralized ecosystem of decentralized 
applications (dapps) and services. It primarily serves sectors that require blockchain solutions, such as dapps, decentralized finance (DeFi), and enterprise systems. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Chowdeck
cb_description: Chowdeck operates in the logistics industry. The company offers a platform for customers to order a variety of meals from local restaurants and have them delivered quickly. Chowdeck primarily serves the food and beverage sector by connecting customers with restaurants and delivery riders. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Grid
cb_description: Grid is a sandbox for ideas.

name: iVexSol
cb_description: iVexSol is a company focused on the development of advanced production technologies for cell and gene therapies within the biotechnology sector. The company offers a proprietary lentiviral vector manufacturing process that includes the creation of stable producer cell lines, vector fitness testing, and a scalable supply of vectors on demand. iVexSol's solutions are designed to support clients from preclinical stages through to clinical development and commercial launch. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lexington, Massachusetts.

name: NextPoint
cb_description: NextPoint focuses on the development of immunotherapies in the pharmaceutical industry. Its main offerings include the creation of immunotherapies, which are treatments designed to enhance the body's natural defenses against cancer. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Lionize
cb_description: Lionize specializes in influencer marketing software within the digital marketing industry. The company offers a platform that automates the process of finding, managing, and collaborating with social media influencers for brand marketing efforts. Lionize's software streamlines the influencer partnership lifecycle, from recruitment to payment and performance tracking, making it easier for brands and agencies to execute effective influencer campaigns. Lionize was formerly known as Digital Prezence. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Hive
cb_description: Hive is an electric scooter sharing platform that can be booked via the company's mobile app.

name: Halter
cb_description: Halter is a company specializing in virtual fencing technology and livestock management within the agriculture sector. Their main offerings include solar-powered smart collars for livestock that enable farmers to monitor and manage their herds remotely, optimizing grazing and pasture management while also tracking animal health and behavior. The company's products are designed to serve the agriculture industry, particularly in enhancing productivity and sustainability on pasture-based farms. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: Korea Credit Data
cb_description: Korea Credit Data is a company that focuses on leveraging data to solve business problems, operating primarily in the data and technology sector. The company offers a range of services aimed at making the process of starting, operating, and growing a business easier, including sales management, customer management, financial services, and community building for business owners. The company primarily serves small and medium-sized businesses. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Momint
cb_description: Momint specializes in the tokenization of real-world assets within the blockchain and non-fungible token (NFT) marketplace sectors. The company offers a marketplace for purchasing fractional ownership in digital assets secured by smart contracts, with a focus on sustainability and security. It caters to individuals and businesses interested in investing in tokenized assets and participating in a marketplace. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Improbable
cb_description: Improbable is a metaverse technology company focused on the development and operation of virtual worlds across various sectors. It specializes in creating metaverse experiences and worlds for brands, utilizing gaming expertise, blockchain, and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive business and revenue. Improbable also initiates and develops new businesses powered by its technologies, catering to entertainment, social, and enterprise applications. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: causaLens
cb_description: causaLens specializes in the development of causal artificial intelligence, focusing on decision-making AI for various domains. The company offers a decision-making platform called decisionOS, which uses causal AI to help organizations discover cause-effect relationships, build explainable models, and drive better decisions. It serves sectors such as financial services, manufacturing, media and entertainment, retail and consumer goods, and telecommunications. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Andela
cb_description: Andela is a company that specializes in connecting highly-skilled global technology talent from emerging markets with leading companies to scale their technology teams quickly and cost-effectively. The company offers services such as software engineering, data science, and cloud engineering solutions, facilitated by an AI-powered talent matching platform. Andela's Adaptive Hiring models provide flexible engagement options for businesses seeking to fill specific roles, manage projects, or integrate talent into existing teams. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Optibus
cb_description: Optibus focuses on providing software solutions. Its main offerings include an end-to-end software platform to aid in transportation planning, scheduling, rostering, and operations, aiming to increase efficiency and improve service quality. The company primarily serves transportation agencies and operators. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: Pandion
cb_description: Pandion is involved in the development, realization and sale of high-class residential and commercial properties.

name: VTS
cb_description: VTS specializes in 3D reality capture and digital twin services within the technology sector. The company offers highly accurate 3D laser scanning, digital documentation, and virtual model creation to support decision-making and reduce costs in various industries. VTS primarily serves sectors such as telecom, engineering, construction, and insurance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Brighton, Michigan. In July 2024, VTS was acquired by Ceinsys.

name: Seatfrog
cb_description: Seatfrog is a mobile application focused on the train travel experience by offering ticketing and upgrade services. The application allows users to purchase train tickets, bid for first-class seat upgrades, and change train times seamlessly. Seatfrog primarily serves the rail transportation sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Outsight
cb_description: Outsight is a company that specializes in the field of 3D LiDAR data processing. The company's main offerings include software solutions that transform large volumes of live 3D sensor data into actionable information and alerts, and extract operational insights from pre-processed 3D data. These solutions primarily cater to sectors such as transportation hubs, smart cities and roads, site monitoring, industrial and logistics, and vehicles and robots. Outsight was formerly known as Dibotics. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Remesh
cb_description: Remesh is an audience intelligence platform. It is used for engaging and understanding large groups of people, employees, consumers, or constituents. It enables users to launch a live conversation with any audience and analyzes and organizes audience responses. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Cleveland, Ohio.

name: Cafe X Technologies
cb_description: Cafe X Technologies specializes in the development of robotic coffee bars within the food and beverage industry. They offer AI-powered, fully autonomous caf systems designed to serve coffee. These systems are primarily sold to businesses seeking innovative solutions for beverage services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Ring Therapeutics
cb_description: Ring Therapeutics is a biotechnology company focused on developing programmable genetic medicines. The company's main offering is a platform that utilizes commensal viruses to create viral-based therapies aimed at delivering treatments to specific cells and tissues. Ring Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, particularly in the field of gene therapy. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: SRTX
cb_description: SRTX is a company focused on innovating in the textiles industry. The company offers a range of technologies, including a durable knit material designed to resist ripping, a software platform for automating manufacturing operations in textile factories, and a water-resistant textile designed to revolutionize the swimwear industry. SRTX primarily serves the apparel and manufacturing sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: SpyBiotech
cb_description: SpyBiotech is a clinical stage biotechnology company focused on developing vaccines for infectious diseases and cancer. The company leverages its proprietary protein superglue technology to create safe and effective vaccines. SpyBiotech's primary market includes the healthcare sector, particularly in vaccine development for diseases lacking effective treatment or prevention. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Oxford, England.

name: Mendaera
cb_description: Mendaera is a company focused on developing technology to enhance the capabilities of healthcare providers in the medical sector. Its platform integrates real-time imaging, robotics, and artificial intelligence to facilitate precise and consistent medical interventions. The company aims to improve the patient care experience by removing barriers, speeding up recovery, and reducing healthcare costs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Northflank
cb_description: Northflank is a comprehensive developer platform operating in the cloud computing industry. The company offers services that allow developers to deploy and release projects on their cloud platform, simplifying infrastructure management and scaling operations. Northflank primarily serves the software development and tech industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Alation
cb_description: Alation provides enterprise data intelligence solutions. The company offers inbuilt collaboration capabilities and open interfaces. It combines machine learning with human insight to tackle demanding challenges in data and metadata management. It primarily sells to sectors such as finance, healthcare, insurance, manufacturing, retail, technology, and the public sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: SparkCognition
cb_description: SparkCognition specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) solutions across various sectors including energy, manufacturing, government, education, and retail. The company offers products and services that enable predictive maintenance, fraud detection, and cybersecurity, with a focus on preventing zero-day attacks. SparkCognition's AI technology is designed to analyze and optimize data, augment human intelligence, and enhance operational efficiency. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: BioLite
cb_description: BioLite provides consumer energy products for off-grid use in the outdoor and emerging markets sectors. It offers clean-burning stoves, portable power stations, and solar panels designed to meet the energy needs of outdoor enthusiasts and individuals living in energy-poor regions. Its products are tailored for activities such as camping, running, and emergency preparedness, offering solutions for cooking, charging, and lighting without reliance on traditional power grids. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: VisIC Technologies
cb_description: VisIC Technologies engages in the field of gallium nitride (GaN) power semiconductor devices, operating within the automotive, data centers, and industrial sectors. It offers high-voltage GaN devices that are used in power conversion systems, providing applications such as electric engines, data centers, and renewable energy. Its products are primarily utilized in the automotive industry, data center operations, and various industrial applications. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Nes Ziona, Israel. In October 2022, Wafer Level CSP acquired a majority stake in VisIC Technologies that values the company at $147.06M.

name: IntelyCare
cb_description: IntelyCare is a healthcare talent platform operating in the healthcare industry. The company offers a service that matches nursing professionals with job opportunities in various care settings, using an AI-based platform to provide per diem, contract, full-time, and part-time roles. The primary customers of IntelyCare are nursing professionals and healthcare organizations. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Quincy, Massachusetts.

name: GiveCampus
cb_description: GiveCampus is a social fundraising and engagement platform for non-profit educational institutions. The company provides software, services, and expertise to colleges, universities, and K-12 schools. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Regulus Cyber
cb_description: Regulus Cyber operates a company that specializes in global navigation satellite system (GNSS) manipulation-based counter unmanned aircraft systems (UAS) and software-based global positioning system (GPS) and GNSS security. It offers two main products Ring, a counter-drone technology that uses GNSS manipulation techniques to control and neutralize intrusive drones, and Pyramid GNSS, a cybersecurity solution that detects and alerts of advanced GNSS spoofing and jamming attacks. Regulus Cyber primarily serves the defense and security sectors. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Haifa, Israel.

name: Didomi
cb_description: Didomi is a company that focuses on data privacy and operates in the technology sector. The company offers a range of services including consent management, preference management, compliance monitoring, and privacy request management, all aimed at helping businesses comply with global data privacy laws and regulations. Didomi primarily serves sectors such as media and publishing, banking and finance, healthcare and pharmaceuticals, consumer goods and entertainment, retail and e-commerce, and gaming. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Immunai
cb_description: Immunai is a biotechnology company focused on mapping the immune system with unparalleled scale and precision to advance the field of immunomodulatory therapeutics. The company offers a platform that combines multi-omic single-cell analysis with machine learning and functional genomics to drive therapeutic discovery and accelerate drug development. Immunai partners with biopharmaceutical companies and academic research institutions to leverage patient-derived multi-omic data for target and therapeutic discovery. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Onapsis
cb_description: Onapsis specializes in cybersecurity for business-critical applications, focusing on ERP, CRM, PLM, HCM, SCM, and BI applications from SAP, Oracle, and leading SaaS providers. The company offers advanced threat protection and compliance tools to safeguard these applications. Onapsis primarily serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, and government, among others. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Pax8
cb_description: Pax8 is a cloud marketplace platform focused on facilitating the buying, selling, and management of cloud solutions. The company offers a comprehensive platform that allows partners to access a range of cloud services and products, providing tools and insights for an end-to-end business solution. Pax8 primarily serves the IT and managed service provider sectors, enabling them to scale their businesses and enhance their service offerings. Pax8 was formerly known as Nuage 8. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Greenwood Village, Colorado.

name: Current
cb_description: Current operates as a financial technology platform. The company offers services such as banking, credit building, financial education, and buying and selling cryptocurrency options. It primarily serves the financial technology sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Strise
cb_description: Strise is a company focused on revolutionizing anti-money laundering (AML) processes through automation in the financial sector. The company offers a suite of products that provide immediate AML risk assessments, augmented KYC and KYB, continuous monitoring, and end-to-end AML process automation. Strise primarily serves financial institutions and fintech companies looking to enhance their AML operations with AI-driven solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: Manticore Games
cb_description: Manticore Games operates as a company focused on game development and operation. It offers a digital playground and community platform, designed to stimulate imagination and provide new play experiences. This platform serves as a game construction kit and social game-playing platform, allowing users to play a variety of games, explore virtual worlds, and even create their game designs. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: Ample Hills Creamery
cb_description: Ample Hills Creamery owns and operates a chain of ice-cream shops to offer ice cream. It offers various flavors of ice cream. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Brooklyn, New York. In June 2023, Ample Hills Creamery was acquired by Brian Smith and Jackie Cuscuna. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: EcoSoul
cb_description: EcoSoul specializes in eco-friendly goods, focusing on products made from renewable resources within the sustainability industry. The company offers a range of items including compostable tableware, kitchen essentials, and personal care products, all designed to be environmentally friendly and biodegradable. EcoSoul's products cater to consumers seeking sustainable alternatives for everyday use. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.

name: Rest Less
cb_description: Rest Less is a digital community that focuses on providing content, guidance, and resources for individuals in their 50s and beyond, operating within the employment, education, and lifestyle sectors. The company offers a job search platform, career advice, online learning courses, and financial planning resources tailored to the needs of the over-50s demographic. Rest Less also provides health and wellness services, lifestyle content, travel deals, and volunteering opportunities to enrich the lives of its members. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Colchester, United Kingdom.

name: Ballerine
cb_description: Ballerine operates as an open-source identity and risk management platform operating in the financial services sector. The company offers solutions for merchant monitoring, blocklisting, case management, and digital onboarding, and provides a risk tools application programming interface (API) to ensure compliance, prevent fraud, and reduce operational costs.
