It primarily serves the payments, marketplaces, and financial technology industries. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Voltron Data
cb_description: Voltron Data develops an open-source platform to connect data, hardware, and developers. It specializes in making data science ecosystems with modular and composable analytics building blocks. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Hazel Technologies
cb_description: Hazel Technologies specializes in developing solutions aimed at extending the shelf life of fresh produce within the agricultural sector. The company offers a range of products that regulate environmental conditions, control ethylene exposure, and combat fungal spores to maintain the quality and freshness of fruits and vegetables throughout the global supply chain. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Fresno, California.

name: Frontdesk
cb_description:
Frontdesk provides accommodations for travelers and hospitality services. The company offers fully furnished stays in multifamily communities, aiming to meet the needs of work, rest, and leisure for modern travelers. Its software solution enables automating and scaling operations for a better-managed portfolio. It also manages occupancy, rates, cleanings, communication, and much more. It primarily serves the travel and tourism industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

In January 2024, the company laid off its entire staff and said it was filing for receivership/bankruptcy.

name: KEMA
cb_description: KEMA delivers laboratories for high-voltage and high-power electrical studies and research. KEMA provides services as a global energy consultancy company.

name: Rallyware
cb_description: Rallyware is a company that focuses on performance enablement in various business sectors such as retail, direct selling, franchises, insurance, and technology. The company offers a Performance Enablement Platform that drives revenue by enabling productive sales force behaviors, providing tools for clienteling, CRM, communications, onboarding, training, learning, and incentives. It primarily serves sectors such as the retail industry, direct selling industry, franchise industry, insurance industry, and technology industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Dark
cb_description: Dark is a software company that specializes in cloud-based point-of-sale solutions for various service industries. The company provides systems that help businesses increase productivity, attract and retain customers, market their services, and reduce human error. It primarily serves small and medium-sized businesses in the restaurant, retail, hospitality, and dry cleaning sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Alpharetta, Georgia.

name: ClassDojo
cb_description: ClassDojo focuses on enhancing education through digital connectivity. The company offers a communication app that connects teachers, students, and families, allowing them to share updates, photos, videos, and messages throughout the day. This service primarily caters to the education sector. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Arzeda
cb_description: Arzeda is a synthetic biology company focused on protein design and operates within the biotechnology sector. The company specializes in creating proteins and enzymes through a combination of physics-based protein design and AI. Arzeda's products are utilized in a range of applications, including polymers, pharmaceuticals, industrial chemicals, and other advanced applications. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: CreditBook
cb_description: CreditBook is a fintech company focused on providing accessible financial solutions to businesses in emerging markets. The company offers a suite of products that simplify compliance, technical integration, and financing, aiming to enhance profitability and customer satisfaction for businesses. CreditBook primarily serves the financial services sector, offering tools like white-label UI components, lending operating systems, and customizable APIs and SDKs to integrate financial features rapidly. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Karachi, Pakistan.

name: Z1
cb_description: Z1 is a digital banking platform focused on providing financial services. The company offers instant payments, peer-to-peer money transfers, and tools for managing personal finances, all accessible through its app. Z1 caters to a younger demographic, emphasizing respect for users' autonomy, privacy, and social identity. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Byte Foods
cb_description: Byte Foods is a company specializing in self-service kiosk technology and software solutions within the food and retail service industry. Their main offerings include controlled-access kiosks that provide secure, convenient, and 24/7 access to fresh food and retail products, along with a smart system for inventory and sales management. The company primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, education, and workplace environments, offering solutions to combat labor shortages and enhance customer experience. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Petaluma, California. Byte Foods operates as a subsidiary of Garten.

name: Kindur
cb_description: Kindur focuses on retirement financial wellness. The company offers a suite of financial tools and educational resources to help individuals navigate retirement, including understanding changes in social security, medicare, and retirement savings accounts. It primarily serves credit unions and financial institutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Claymont, Delaware.

name: Automotus
cb_description: Automotus provides automated curb management solutions designed to reduce emissions, congestion, and safety hazards. These solutions include data collection and analytics, automated payment and invoicing, and real-time enforcement of violations. Automotus primarily serves cities, airports, and fleet operators. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Proof
cb_description: Proof focuses on digital transaction management and identity verification in the technology industry. It offers a platform that secures transactions ranging from online notarization to identity-assured eSignatures, providing identity verification and an audit trail for each transaction. Proof primarily serves sectors such as real estate, financial services, auto, credit unions, solar and energy, and insurance. Proof was formerly known as Notarize. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: smol
cb_description: Smol focuses on home cleaning products within the consumer goods industry. The company offers a range of concentrated cleaning products packaged and delivered directly to consumers, including laundry capsules, dishwasher tabs, and multi-purpose sprays. Smol primarily sells to environmentally conscious consumers looking for eco-friendly cleaning solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Crawley, United Kingdom.

name: Eyeware
cb_description: Eyeware specializes in AI-powered head and eye tracking software for webcams and 3D sensors within the consumer electronics and automotive sectors. The company offers software solutions that enable users to transform standard webcams into advanced eye tracking devices for gaming, streaming, and various interactive applications. Eyeware's technology is also adaptable for integration into a variety of products through software development kits, catering to industries such as gaming, automotive, and academic research. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Martigny, Switzerland.

name: Biomilq
cb_description: Biomilq is a women-owned and science-led company that operates in the biotechnology sector. The company's main service is the production of cell-cultured human milk components using patented mammary biotechnology, aiming to bridge the nutritional gap between breast milk and traditional infant formula. Biomilq primarily targets the early-life nutrition market. Biomilq was formerly known as Meshek Net. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Pawlicy Advisor
cb_description: Pawlicy Advisor is a company that operates in the insurance industry, with a specific focus on pet insurance. The company offers a platform where customers can compare pet insurance quotes from various providers, enabling them to find the most suitable coverage for their pets. The company primarily serves pet owners. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Vaxess Technologies
cb_description: Vaxess Technologies provides biotechnology services. The company focuses on developing novel vaccine formulations and delivery technologies, with a particular emphasis on creating accessible vaccines and therapeutics. Their main product is a patch that delivers a microarray of bioactive tips into the body, gradually releasing their payload after the patch is removed. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: 1910 Genetics
cb_description: 1910 Genetics integrates AI, computation, and biological automation to accelerate the design of small molecule and protein therapeutics. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Galileo
cb_description: Galileo is a company that focuses on the development and marketing of products in the satellite navigation sector. The company's main offerings include software-based GPS receivers, indoor navigation systems, and satellite navigation simulators. These products are primarily used in the location-based services market and Internet of Things (IoT) devices. It is based in Israel.

name: upGrad
cb_description: upGrad provides a range of online degree courses and professional upskilling opportunities across various domains such as business administration, data science, and technology. It caters to professionals looking to enhance their skills and advance their careers through rigorous and immersive learning experiences. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Assignar
cb_description: Assignar is a company that specializes in construction operations software within the construction industry. Their main offerings include workforce and asset scheduling, project planning, compliance management, and a full field mobility solution that allows for efficient data and timesheet collection. Assignar's software is designed to increase efficiency, transparency, and management cost savings for highly regulated industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Headversity
cb_description: Headversity is a company focused on preventative mental health solutions in the healthcare industry. The company offers a digital platform that provides proactive mental health training experiences for workforces, aiming to support employees' mental health before and beyond crisis situations. The company primarily serves the corporate sector, providing its services to organizations of various sizes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: CargoX
cb_description: CargoX is a technology company focused on revolutionizing the cargo transportation sector through digital solutions. The company offers a comprehensive logistics platform that simplifies operations for carriers, shippers, and truck drivers by providing services such as digital freight documentation, risk management, cargo tracking, and secure freight payment systems. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Tiimo
cb_description: Tiimo focuses on daily planning applications with a focus on neurodiversity, operating in the assistive technology sector. The company offers a visual planning application designed to support individuals with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), autism, dyslexia, and other learning differences, featuring a color-coded timeline, icon-based tasks, artificial intelligence (AI)-powered checklists, and focus sessions. Tiimo primarily serves individuals seeking neurodiversity-friendly planning tools and inclusive learning resources. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Kbenhavn, Denmark.

name: Sharegain
cb_description: Sharegain is a company that specializes in providing a securities lending platform for the financial services sector. Their main offering is a service known as Securities Lending as a Service (SLaaS), which is a fully digital, customizable, end-to-end solution designed to automate front- and back-office operations, enabling online brokers, private banks, and wealth managers to offer securities lending to their clients. This service aims to make it possible for every investor to earn revenue from lending their stocks, bonds, and ETFs. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: TouchBistro
cb_description: TouchBistro is a company that focuses on providing an all-in-one point of sale (POS) and restaurant management system in the restaurant industry. The company offers a range of services including front of house, back of house, and guest engagement solutions, which help restaurateurs streamline their operations, manage their menu, sales, staff, and more. These services are designed to increase sales, improve guest experiences, and save time and money. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Alcemy
cb_description: Alcemy is a company focused on sustainable cement and concrete production, operating in the construction and technology sectors. The company offers AI software that predicts and controls the quality of cement and concrete production. Alcemy primarily serves the construction industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Tuio
cb_description: Tuio serves as a digital insurance provider offering a range of personal insurance products. The company specializes in home, life, and pet insurance policies that can be purchased online. Tuio primarily serves individual consumers seeking insurance solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Portside
cb_description: Portside provides an aviation software solutions platform. The platform helps aviators and support teams communicate information through digital data operations. It offers a software solution for aviation management companies, aircraft owners, corporate flight departments, and fractional operators. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cary, North Carolina.

name: Mantle
cb_description:
Mantle allows users to display movies they love and compare with friends via Facebook. People can rank, comment and add films to their "WatchList" so they have a digital shopping list next time they go to rent or buy a movie.

Mantle is studio, medium and retail channel agnostic and will be the de facto go-to reference list before anyone buys, rents or downloads a film.

name: NAV Communications
cb_description: NAV Communications specializes in internet services and operates in the information technology sector. The company offers a range of services, including domain registration, web hosting, server administration, and IT services. It provides these services to a variety of sectors, including the e-commerce industry and the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Bucharest, Romania.

name: Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals
cb_description: Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals operates a clinical-stage neuroscience biotech company focused on developing therapies for neurological diseases. It specializes in creating new chemical entities that aim to address the root causes of mental health conditions, rather than managing symptoms. Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a particular emphasis on mental health therapeutics. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Liqid
cb_description: Liqid is a company focused on high-performance computing solutions within the technology sector. The company offers a composable infrastructure software platform that enables dynamic allocation and management of physical bare-metal server resources in real-time. Liqid's platform is primarily utilized in the artificial intelligence (AI), high-performance computing (HPC), and datacenter efficiency sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Broomfield, Colorado.

name: Koop Technologies
cb_description: Koop Technologies provides an autonomous insurance platform and services. It specializes in insurance for autonomous vehicles, machine learning, computer vision, big data, artificial intelligence, insurance technologies, predictive analytics, traffic safety, commercial fleets, and more. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: SmartNews
cb_description: SmartNews provides a news application platform. It offers politics, sports, world news, and entertainment news. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Wunderflats
cb_description: Wunderflats specializes in providing temporary furnished housing solutions within the real estate sector. The company offers a platform for tenants to find and rent verified furnished apartments with the convenience of online contract signing and inclusive pricing. Wunderflats primarily serves individuals and businesses in need of mid-term accommodation solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: SOLASTA Bio
cb_description: SOLASTA Bio specializes in biotechnology solutions for precision insect control in the agriculture sector. The company offers bio-safe, environmentally friendly, and precision-targeted pest control products that are non-toxic to non-targeted species and degrade naturally without building up resistance. SOLASTA Bio primarily serves the agriculture industry, providing growers and agri-businesses with sustainable crop protection solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Glasgow, United Kingdom.

name: Envisagenics
cb_description: Envisagenics develops an artificial intelligence (AI)-driven biotechnology company. The SpliceCore offers a platform for discovering novel targets to develop successful therapies. The company provides a cloud-based discovery platform that uses machine learning (ML) to prioritize new drug target candidates from patients' ribonucleic acid (RNA). It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: OPUS
cb_description: Opus offers an online platform that is a secure way for people and companies to share verified information.

name: Stanza Living
cb_description: Stanza Living provides managed accommodation spaces, focusing on student housing and co-living for professionals. It offers furnished residential options such as hostels, co-living spaces, and managed apartments with essential amenities. Its accommodations cater to students and young working professionals. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Aviso
cb_description: Aviso offers software as a service (SaaS) that provides predictive analytics designed to help sales teams optimize their performance and exceed their revenue goals. Aviso transforms and automates tedious sales forecasting processes with an easy-to-use, secure cloud application using a combination of machine learning algorithms and portfolio management techniques. Aviso Insights delivers a powerful data-driven decision-making framework to prioritize deals, deploy resources, and mitigate risks, driving revenue growth for small and large enterprises. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: RealSage
cb_description: RealSage operates as an AI based decision-making engine for real estate asset managers. It offers a data intelligence platform that specializes in the multi-family real estate sector. The company offers AI-powered analytics and optimization tools for rental portfolios, aiming to enhance decision-making for owners and operators. RealSage was formerly known as SoulRooms. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Paylode
cb_description: Paylode serves as a customer engagement platform specializing in the creation and management of customer perks programs. The company offers a suite of tools that enable businesses to incentivize customer behavior, increase conversion rates, and enhance customer loyalty through a marketplace of pre-vetted perks, omnichannel distribution, and performance tracking. It primarily serves industries such as real estate, insurance, hospitality, and subscription-based services. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Flip
cb_description: Flip is a company that specializes in the auction and sale of popular, limited edition sneakers within the ecommerce industry. The company offers a platform for super-fast sneaker auctions, guaranteeing that every approved item will sell within 90 minutes or Flip will buy it, and allows buyers to set their own prices with all transactions handled within the Flip app. Flip's services are currently available exclusively in the U.S. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Bower
cb_description: Bower provides a mobile application that rewards users for recycling consumer packaging at regular recycling bins, with the rewards taking the form of points or money that can be withdrawn, donated, or used for discounts on future purchases. Bower was formerly known as Pantap. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Mandolin
cb_description: Mandolin ceased its operations in April 2023. It is a music live stream platform that emulates live experiences with different options for artists, venues, and fans. It aims to recreate live experiences with interactive shows and offers ticket booking, payment, and other options through its platform. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Canditech
cb_description: Canditech specializes in providing skill assessment solutions. The company offers a range of products that assess both the technical and soft skills of candidates, utilizing job simulation tests and video interviews to evaluate their suitability for a role. It facilitates building, designing and sharing of assessments. It primarily serves sectors such as engineering, data and business intelligence, marketing, sales, human resources, technical support, finance, and healthcare. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: PredictHQ
cb_description: PredictHQ is a global demand intelligence and data platform operating in the business intelligence and data analytics industry. The company offers services that help businesses forecast shifts in demand by providing data on verified global events, enabling them to adjust inventory, labor, pricing, and overall operations more efficiently. It primarily serves sectors such as travel, retail, and mobility. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: BlueVoyant
cb_description: BlueVoyant offers a cyber security platform. It combines internal and external cyber defense capabilities into an outcomes-based cloud-native platform by monitoring networks, endpoints, attack surfaces, and supply chains, as well as the web for threats. The company was formerly known as BlueteamGlobal. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Traive
cb_description: Traive is a company focused on revolutionizing the agricultural market through the use of artificial intelligence. They offer a comprehensive credit management and receivables sales platform that leverages AI for risk analysis and decision-making. The company primarily serves the agricultural sector and capital markets, connecting investors with qualified producers to facilitate credit flows and optimize financing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: WhatFix
cb_description: WhatFix specializes in digital adoption solutions for enhancing software experiences across web, desktop, and mobile platforms. The company offers a digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, step-by-step instructions, and support to users, as well as analytics to track user engagement and behavior. Additionally, WhatFix provides tools for creating training environments and analyzing IT training. WhatFix was formerly known as Quicko Technosoft Labs. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Fonoa
cb_description: Fonoa is a global tax automation platform specializing in compliance solutions for digital businesses. The company offers services such as validating tax IDs, determining applicable tax rates, issuing compliant invoices, and managing real-time e-invoicing and tax return filings. Fonoa primarily serves marketplaces, software providers, digital content creators, and the travel industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: THNDR
cb_description: THNDR works as a mobile gaming platform specializing in Bitcoin-integrated games. The company offers a variety of mobile games that allow players to earn Bitcoin as they play, targeting casual gamers with an interest in cryptocurrency. THNDR's games are designed for both Android and iOS devices, appealing to a broad mobile gaming market. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Octant Bio
cb_description: Octant Bio is a biotechnology company focused on developing next-generation small molecule therapeutics. They engineer biology and chemistry to modulate complex cellular mechanisms that cause diseases, with a focus on protein misfolding and mistrafficking. The company primarily serves the pharmaceutical and healthcare sectors with a drug discovery platform. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Emeryville, California.

name: Raycast
cb_description: Raycast is a productivity software company that offers an extendable launcher designed for native performance on macOS. The company provides a suite of productivity tools that are accessible via a keyboard-first interface, aiming for fast, ergonomic, and reliable user experiences. Raycast's platform allows users to integrate and automate tasks with various extensions, including AI-powered features, for a streamlined workflow. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Formic
cb_description: Formic provides robotic automation solutions within the manufacturing sector. Their main offerings include automated palletizing and packaging services, designed to enhance productivity and efficiency for manufacturers. Formic Technologies primarily serves sectors such as food, chemical, and consumer packaged goods industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Orchid Marketplace
cb_description: Orchid Marketplace operates as a platform focused on providing privacy and internet freedom. The company offers a decentralized marketplace that enables an onion routing network and a multi-hop virtual private network (VPN) client, essentially providing a service that protects user privacy and offers unrestricted internet access. It primarily serves individuals and businesses seeking enhanced online privacy and unrestricted internet access. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Zaxe
cb_description: Zaxe is a company focused on developing user experience-oriented industrial 3D printers and additive manufacturing technologies. The company offers a range of 3D printer ecosystems, which include designs, hardware, and software that are entirely owned by Zaxe, aimed at providing fast, scalable, and repeatable manufacturing solutions across various industries. Zaxe primarily serves sectors such as architecture, manufacturing, defense, automation, automotive, aerospace, education, product design, and medicine. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: NeoLight
cb_description: NeoLight is a medical device company that focuses on developing technologies for the newborn care market. The company offers products for ocular screening, jaundice care, and non-nutritive sucking, all designed to treat preventable conditions in newborns. These products include a portable system for high-quality retinopathy of prematurity (ROP) screening, a neonatal phototherapy system for jaundice treatment, and a device that encourages effective non-nutritive sucking in premature infants. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.

name: Pixso
cb_description: Pixso is a company that focuses on providing integrated design collaboration tools in the technology sector. The company offers services that assist product research and development teams in creating prototypes, UI/UX design, visual design, and low-code delivery, aiming to provide a smoother work experience and enhance team collaboration. Pixso primarily serves sectors such as the automotive manufacturing, smart manufacturing, financial, city planning, military enterprises, and innovative materials industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

name: Certora
cb_description: Certora specializes in smart contract security within the blockchain technology sector. The company offers formal verification tools and smart contract audit services to ensure the security and correctness of smart contracts. Certora primarily serves the blockchain and cryptocurrency industries, where smart contract security is critical. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Fragment
cb_description: Fragment develops an API for building compliant fintech apps.

name: Kloudless
cb_description: Kloudless focuses on providing a software-as-a-service (SaaS)  application programming interface (API) integration platform in the technology sector. The company's main services include offering unified APIs that allow for easy integration with various cloud services such as cloud storage, calendar, customer relationship management (CRM), email, chat, and accounting applications. The company primarily sells to the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. In August 2021, Kloudless was acquired by Netskope.

name: Pixion Games
cb_description: Pixion Games specializes in the development of competitive multiplayer games with a focus on the play-to-own model within the gaming industry. Their flagship product, Fableborne, is an isometric multiplayer game that combines action RPG and base building elements, designed for mobile platforms and incorporating blockchain technology to enable players to own in-game assets. The company targets the gaming community with offerings that include asynchronous PvP battles, PvE modes, and participation in the Pixion League for in-game rewards. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: ThoughtSpot
cb_description: ThoughtSpot is an AI-Powered Analytics company that specializes in data analytics and business intelligence. The company offers a platform that enables users to ask data-related questions in natural language and receive insights, facilitating decision-making across various organizational levels. ThoughtSpot's main offerings include live data querying, search-driven analytics, and the ability to visualize and operationalize data insights for businesses. ThoughtSpot was formerly known as Scaligent. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Rael
cb_description: Rael is a company focused on providing holistic cycle care and personal beauty products. They offer a range of products including organic cotton menstrual pads, reusable period underwear, acne treatment patches, and feminine hygiene washes, all designed with clean and natural ingredients. Rael's products cater to individuals seeking natural and effective personal care solutions. Rael was formerly known as Hesta Organic. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Buena Park, California.

name: GoodRx
cb_description: GoodRx (NASDAQ: GDRX) provides prescription drugs through a platform. The platform allows consumers to compare drug prices at different pharmacies, find coupons and discounts, and sign up for prescription savings programs. It offers drugs for depression, hypertension, urinary tract infections, and more. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Cargomatic
cb_description: Cargomatic focuses on the logistics and supply chain industry. It offers services such as drayage, intermodal, less-than-truckload (LTL), full-truckload (FTL), and white glove delivery, connecting shippers with a marketplace of professional drivers to ensure goods delivery. The company primarily serves sectors such as automotive, beverages, clothing and apparel, electronics, furniture, home improvement, and retail. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Long Beach, California.

name: Mantra Health
cb_description: Mantra Health is a digital mental health clinic that focuses on improving mental healthcare access for college students. The company offers a comprehensive treatment service for various mental health conditions, providing clinical services, software, and design tailored to young adults' needs. Mantra Health primarily serves the higher education sector, partnering with institutions to enhance student mental health and wellness. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Daedalus
cb_description:
Daedalus is a company that received a SBIR Phase I grant for a project entitled: Handcycle Attachment for Manual Wheelchairs. Their Phase I project aims to develop a hand cycle attachment for push-rim wheelchairs. The design will allow wheel chair user to remain active by preventing repetitive stress injuries (RSI). Preliminary analysis and test results have consistently shown that hand crank propulsion is a more biomechanically efficient propulsion motion, reducing or eliminating RSI. The proposed design will allow users to benefit from the efficiency and biomechanics of hand crank propulsion in everyday situations. The reduction or elimination of RSI in conjunction with greater mechanical and biomechanical efficiency will ultimately extend user's range and encourage physical fitness and participation in society. 

Daedalus is a company that received a SBIR Phase II grant for a project entitled: Folding Power Wheelchair with Modular Battery System. Their project aims to develop a lightweight modular wheelchair that can be easily lifted and handled by either the user or a companion. This wheelchair can be loaded into any vehicle, thus dramatically improving the mobility of the user. The research project focuses on designing the frame, drivetrain, motor and battery system to allow more of synergistic effect and lightweight to aid the user in his/her mobility. The commercial and societal benefits from this project will result in not only greater mobility but also drastic increase in the quality of life for the user, improved family mobility.

name: Unit21
cb_description: Unit21 operates as a detection and investigations platform for anti-money laundering. It helps protect businesses against adversaries through a simple application programming interface (API) and dashboard for detecting and managing money laundering, fraud, and other sophisticated risks across multiple industries. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Salsify
cb_description: Salsify specializes in Product Experience Management (PXM) within the ecommerce sector. The company offers a unified platform that centralizes product content, connects it across digital channels, and automates processes to deliver engaging product experiences. Salsify's services cater to brands, retailers, and distributors seeking to improve efficiency, drive growth, and achieve leadership on the digital shelf. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Wingtra
cb_description: Wingtra is a producer of VTOL drones that operate in the surveying and mapping industry. The company's main offerings include drones equipped with advanced sensors for collecting survey-grade aerial data, suitable for photogrammetry, LIDAR mapping, and multispectral imagery. Wingtra's drones are utilized across various sectors such as urban planning and land management, mining and metals, construction and infrastructure, agriculture, and environmental monitoring. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: TileDB
cb_description: TileDB is a modern database company that specializes in managing diverse data modalities and integrating code and compute into a single product. The company offers a multi-dimensional array database that caters to various data types and workloads, providing a platform for data management, analytics, and machine learning. TileDB serves sectors such as life sciences, geospatial research, and data science, offering solutions for genomics, 3D point clouds, and more. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Radar
cb_description:
Radar develops an HR and Payroll solution for small businesses. It is based in South Africa.

On May 9th, 2022, Radar was acquired by SnapScan. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Lookiero
cb_description: Lookiero is a company that focuses on personal shopping services in the fashion industry. It offers an online platform where customers receive a selection of five clothing items, handpicked by a personal shopper based on their style and budget preferences. The company primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Erandio, Spain.

name: Naya Homes
cb_description: Naya Homes offers a short-term and vacation rental and hospitality platform. Its rental and vacation rental management platform leverages data-fueled revenue management, technology, hospitality operations, multi-channel listing, and marketing to assist clients in earning revenue and remove the burden of operating the rental property. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Copia
cb_description: Copia is a technology company operating in the foodtech and social good sectors. The company's main service is a platform that enables businesses to donate their excess food, track surplus trends, and make informed food purchasing decisions. This service primarily targets businesses such as restaurants, hotels, hospitals, and corporate cafeterias. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: WalletConnect
cb_description: WalletConnect focuses on web three communications protocols within the blockchain and cryptocurrency industry. It offers wallets and applications to securely connect and interact, facilitating interoperability across blockchains. It primarily serves the decentralized applications (dapps) and mobile wallet sectors. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Newark, Delaware.

name: Nanotronics
cb_description: Nanotronics specializes in automated inspection systems within the manufacturing sector. The company offers products that combine optical microscopy, computational super-resolution, artificial intelligence, and robotics to enhance quality control and process efficiency in manufacturing. Nanotronics primarily serves industries such as aerospace, consumer electronics, automotive, semiconductors, biotechnology, and advanced materials. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Sitenna
cb_description: Sitenna operates in the infrastructure management sector. The company offers an ecosystem management platform that aids in the delivery, collaboration, and management of vast infrastructure networks. Its platform is primarily used by sectors such as real estate, local government, infrastructure providers, utilities, and operators. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Birmingham, England.

name: Lyric
cb_description: Lyric specializes in artificial intelligence for supply chains, operating within the technology and AI sectors. The company offers the Lyric Studio, a platform that enables supply chain teams to utilize AI through out-of-the-box products, tailored solutions, and the creation of organization-specific intellectual property. Lyric's platform is designed to cater to various roles within the supply chain ecosystem, allowing for the application of AI to improve decision-making processes. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Remedial Health
cb_description: Remedial Health focuses on streamlining procurement and pharmacy operations for healthcare providers within the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers a suite of services including automation of pharmacy operations, inventory management, and financing solutions, as well as providing a digital marketplace for pharmaceutical products. Remedial Health primarily serves healthcare retail businesses, including large pharmacies and remote chemists. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Vanilla
cb_description:
Vanilla is an open-source, standards-compliant, multi-lingual, fully extensible discussion forum for the web.

On May 4th, 2021, Vanilla was acquired by Higher Logic. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Boundless
cb_description: Boundless is a global employment solution specializing in Employer of Record services within the human resources sector. The company enables businesses to compliantly employ staff in different countries by managing payroll, taxes, benefits, and ensuring adherence to local employment laws. Boundless provides a unified platform for managing international hiring, payroll processing, benefits administration, and legal compliance, simplifying the complexities of employing a distributed workforce. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: AgroScout
cb_description: AgroScout offers leaf-level visual detection of bugs and diseases in field crops using deep learning algorithms, drones, and cloud-based smartphone software. Its platform monitors crop development in real-time, to more accurately plan to process and manufacturing operations across regions, crops, and growers. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Yir'on, Israel.

name: Hotmart
cb_description: Hotmart is a global technology company that specializes in the creator economy, offering a platform for selling and distributing digital products. The company provides tools for building, monetizing, managing, and growing membership sites, courses, subscriptions, communities, and events, with a focus on seamless integration and ease of use. Hotmart also offers international payment processing, currency conversion, and fraud detection services to facilitate global sales. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Bump
cb_description: Bump ceased operations. Bump provides a location-based networking application. The application helps users connect and share contact and social information with people they meet. It is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Deep Genomics
cb_description: Deep Genomics specializes in the development of life-saving genetic therapies within the biotechnology sector. The company leverages an AI-powered platform to streamline the discovery and programming of RNA therapies aimed at treating a wide array of genetic conditions. Deep Genomics' AI platform simplifies the complexity of RNA biology, enabling the identification of novel targets and the efficient evaluation of therapeutic candidates. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Spark Systems
cb_description: Spark Systems specializes in developing smart trading platforms. Its main offerings include a stable and ultra-low latency marketplace for foreign exchange trading, equipped with an aggregator and execution algorithms designed to optimize the trading experience for various market participants. It also provides analytics tools to help users manage their liquidity and review their trading history. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore.

name: Aeromine Technologies
cb_description: Aeromine Technologies specializes in renewable wind energy systems for the commercial and industrial sectors. It offers a motionless wind energy system designed for installation on large flat rooftops, utilizing a patented aerodynamic design to capture and amplify building airflow for power generation. Aeromine primarily serves sectors with large buildings such as warehouses, distribution centers, manufacturing facilities, and retail spaces. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Irvin, California.

name: Ethoderm
cb_description: Ethoderm specializes in transdermal delivery systems within the healthcare sector. The company offers technology for minimally invasive delivery of therapeutics, focusing on small molecules and peptides to manage symptoms of chronic diseases. Ethoderm was formerly known as Outplay. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Henderson, Nevada.

name: Karat
cb_description: Karat is a Russian processed cheese company. The company produces processed, curd, young cheeses, grained cottage cheese and special cheeses for HORECA, cosmonauts, officers and employees of the Russian Army, the Northern and Pacific Fleet.

name: Bitwage
cb_description: Bitwage is a leading provider of payroll and benefits software solutions that facilitate payments in Bitcoin, cryptocurrency, and stablecoins for the global remote workforce. The company offers services that enable employers to manage and compensate international teams efficiently, while employees and freelancers can receive payments in their preferred currency mix. Bitwage primarily serves the remote workforce sector, offering compliant reporting and integration with existing payroll systems. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: RunPod
cb_description: RunPod operates as an online platform that focuses on providing cloud GPU computing services in the technology sector. The company offers services that allow users to develop, train, and scale AI applications, with features such as a globally distributed GPU cloud, template environments, and serverless endpoints. It primarily caters to the artificial intelligence and machine learning industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Explo
cb_description: Explo specializes in embedded analytics solutions within the technology sector, offering tools for customer-facing analytics and self-service reporting. Their services include interactive dashboards, report building capabilities, and AI-generated analytics designed for integration into existing platforms. The company primarily caters to sectors such as SaaS, e-commerce, ed-tech, healthcare, transportation and logistics, CRM, and fintech. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: KoBold Metals
cb_description: KoBold Metals focuses on mineral exploration using advanced technologies in the mining and metals sectors. The company utilizes artificial intelligence, comprehensive data aggregation, and geoscience to manage the efficiency of mineral discovery. It serves sectors that require critical minerals for clean energy technologies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: PatientFi
cb_description: PatientFi provides a payment solution for out-of-pocket medical and dental procedures. Its patients can use the PatientFi platform to secure payment plans for elective procedures. It serves a network of healthcare specialties such as plastic surgery, dermatology, ophthalmology, dentistry, fertility, audiology, and medical spas. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: Novicap
cb_description: Novicap offers a platform focused on providing end-to-end working capital solutions to mid-market corporates, and public administrations. It offers credit and software-as-a-service(SaaS) solutions to enable its customers to fuel business growth. It digitally provides origination, underwriting, and servicing capabilities to, mid-market corporates, and public administrations. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Acadeum
cb_description: Acadeum is a company focused on expanding academic portfolios for higher education institutions through its educational technology platform. The company offers services such as course and program sharing, in-demand certifications, and degrees to help colleges and universities attract and retain learners, as well as improve graduation rates and generate revenue. Acadeum primarily serves four-year institutions, community colleges, industry partners, and associations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Renda
cb_description: Renda is a company specializing in order fulfillment and retail distribution for e-commerce businesses across Africa. They offer a suite of solutions including storage booking, order fulfillment, vehicle booking, delivery and returns management, and cash collection and reconciliation. Their services cater primarily to the e-commerce industry, providing businesses with the infrastructure and technology to streamline their fulfillment processes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Lexop
cb_description: Lexop is a company that focuses on providing digital collections software in the financial services sector. The company's main service is a software solution that helps businesses retain past-due customers by facilitating payment and enabling them to self-serve, thereby improving recovery rates. The company primarily serves sectors such as financial services, telecommunications, utilities, and service providers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Meltano
cb_description: Meltano is an open source data movement tool that specializes in providing data engineers with comprehensive control and visibility over their data pipelines. The company offers a platform for building, managing, and automating data pipelines, including the development of custom connectors for various data sources and integration with existing data tools. Meltano's solutions cater to the needs of data professionals seeking to streamline their extract, load, and transform (ELT) processes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Prisma Photonics
cb_description: Prisma Photonics specializes in monitoring and maintaining critical large-scale infrastructure within various sectors, utilizing advanced sensing technology. The company offers real-time monitoring solutions that provide actionable insights for utility operators, leveraging existing optical fiber networks to ensure continuous operation. Prisma Photonics primarily serves industries that manage power lines, oil and gas infrastructure, and transportation systems such as rail and road networks. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Kitchenmate
cb_description: KitchenMate is a company that specializes in providing 24/7 hot and fresh food micro-markets, primarily serving the food service industry. The company offers self-serve kiosks equipped with smart fridge technology and induction heating to prepare meals quickly and efficiently. KitchenMate's solutions cater to various sectors including commercial spaces, condos, workplaces, schools, and hospitals. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Chamberlain Coffee
cb_description: Chamberlain Coffee specializes in providing a variety of coffee and tea beverages in the food and beverage industry. The company offers a range of products including specialty coffee beans, cold brew options, matcha, and tea, as well as related accessories and apparel. Chamberlain Coffee caters to consumers looking for coffee options, as well as a selection of tea and matcha products. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Beverly Hills, California.

name: Ethyca
cb_description: Ethyca specializes in automated data privacy compliance and operates within the data protection and privacy sector. The company offers a suite of tools that automate the majority of data privacy requirements, simplifying compliance for businesses and developers. Ethyca's solutions cater to various sectors including financial services, healthcare, retail & e-commerce, advertising, and data & analytics. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Agentero
cb_description: Agentero provides a platform for independent insurance agents. Agentero helps independent insurance agents grow their business by providing access to carriers and a technology platform to identify the needs of their customers, quote, and bind. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Pelago
cb_description: Pelago is a virtual clinic for substance use management. It transforms substance use support from prevention to treatment by delivering education, management skills, and opportunities for positive change to members struggling with substance use, most commonly tobacco, alcohol, or opioids. Its solutions give employers the means to offer on-demand, personalized support to workers seeking to live healthier lives. Its cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and medication-assisted treatment (MAT) programs deliver convenient, accessible, and effective support that seamlessly integrates with health plans, pharmacy benefit managers, and wellness platforms. It was formerly known as Quit Genius. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: FarmWise
cb_description: FarmWise specializes in agricultural technology, focusing on automated weeding and cultivation solutions. The company offers artificial intelligence and computer vision-powered weeding technology designed to enhance productivity and profitability for farmers. It primarily serves the agriculture industry with its advanced weeding and cultivation equipment. FarmWise was formerly known as Deeplook Technologies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Salinas, California.

name: Volopay
cb_description: Volopay operates as a purpose-built spend management platform for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). It maintains business cards, approves expense requests, pays bills, and reconciles all accounts on a single platform. It offers corporate cards, expense management, business accounts, accounts payable, accounting automation, and more. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: KatKin
cb_description: KatKin focuses on pet health, specifically operating in the pet food industry. The company offers human-quality meat products for cats, which are cooked, frozen for freshness, and delivered to customers' doors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Normalyze
cb_description: Normalyze specializes in data security posture management (DSPM) within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers solutions for discovering and classifying data, assessing and prioritizing risks, and remediating and preventing issues across cloud, on-premises, and hybrid environments. It primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, retail, technology, media, and mergers and acquisitions. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Altos, California.

name: Paytient
cb_description: Paytient is a financial technology company focused on providing solutions to help individuals manage healthcare expenses through its Health Payment Accounts (HPA). The company offers a sponsored, interest-free line of credit that enables people to pay for medical, dental, vision, pharmacy, behavioral health, and veterinary care over time without interest or fees. Paytient partners with employers, insurers, and health systems to integrate this financing solution with existing health benefits, facilitating better access to care for employees and their families. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Columbia, Missouri.

name: Finch
cb_description: Full Fat Finch, dba Finch, helps web designers and developers test their development sites on multiple devices without the need for lengthy deployments or public staging servers.

name: polySpectra
cb_description: polySpectra develops photopolymer resins for industrial additive manufacturing. The company offers resins designed for three-dimensional (3D) printing end-use components.. polySpectra also provides cleaning solutions and post-curing processes. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: CGTrader
cb_description: CGTrader is a company that operates in the technology and digital design industry, with a focus on 3D modeling. The company offers a platform where users can download 3D models for various applications such as gaming, animation, and advertising, and also provides a space for professional 3D designers to showcase and sell their work. CGTrader primarily serves sectors such as the gaming industry, advertising industry, and the animation industry. It is based in Vilnius, Lithuania.

name: Finally
cb_description: Finally specializes in digital financial planning and budget optimization within the financial services industry. It offers a do-it-yourself financial planning tool that helps users create custom financial plans, track savings goals, and optimize their budgets. The company primarily serves individuals looking to manage their finances more effectively. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: ComplyAdvantage
cb_description: ComplyAdvantage operates as a financial crime risk data and detection platform using artificial intelligence (AI). It offers a database of people and companies to help organizations identify risk events from structured and unstructured data points. It serves banks, insurance, payments, cryptocurrency, and more sectors. ComplyAdvantage was formerly known as Mimiro. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Cohesion
cb_description: Cohesion delivers IT solutions and talent that enhance business agility, productivity and competitiveness.

name: Lyfegen
cb_description: Lyfegen is a global software analytics company operating in the healthcare sector. The company provides a platform that identifies and operationalises value-based payment models for health insurances, pharmaceutical companies, medical technology firms, and hospitals, using real-world data and machine learning. Its primary customers are in the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Basel, Switzerland.

name: Secoda Risk Management
cb_description: Secoda Risk Management is a data management platform that operates in the data analytics and governance sector. The company offers a suite of tools for metadata management, data cataloging, lineage tracking, analysis, ticketing, and monitoring, aimed at simplifying data management processes. Secoda primarily serves data teams across various sectors, providing solutions for data leads, engineers, analysts, consumers, and governance managers. It was founded in 2002 and is based in London, England.

name: OfBusiness
cb_description: OfBusiness provides an online marketplace for business-to-business (B2B) commerce. The company sells products such as chemicals, steel, cement, agriculture, textile, solar, and more. It was founded in 2015 and is based in South Delhi, India.

name: Carwow
cb_description: Carwow is a digital platform specializing in automotive sales and services. The company facilitates the buying and selling of new and used cars, including electric and hybrid vehicles, and offers car leasing options. Carwow primarily serves the automotive retail industry by connecting customers with dealerships for car purchasing and selling experiences. The company was formerly known as Digital Blurb. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Puls
cb_description:
Puls is a distributor of a variety of medical products and equipment.

On May 22nd, 2019, Pulse was acquired by Mediq.54M.

name: Lulalend
cb_description: Lulalend offers an integrated platform and funding solutions to small businesses. It empowers businesses across South Africa with the funds to grow. It leverages technology and a proprietary credit-scoring algorithm to evaluate applicants and provide funding. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Osmo
cb_description: Osmo aims to create peer-learning communities.

name: Zerigo Health
cb_description: Zerigo Health develops handheld phototherapy medical devices. It offers solutions for the treatment of psoriasis, vitiligo, and eczema. It is a handheld device that emits narrowband ultraviolet light penetrating the skin and slows the growth of affected skin cells for psoriasis. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: WealthArc
cb_description: WealthArc is a company focused on providing a wealth management platform for the financial services industry. The company offers a suite of tools for automated data consolidation, portfolio management, and client reporting, designed to enhance the efficiency and accuracy of wealth managers' daily operations. WealthArc primarily serves wealth managers, private banks, family offices, and provides investor services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Bloomfilter
cb_description: Bloomfilter specializes in process mining for the software development lifecycle, aiming to make the process more transparent, predictable, and efficient. The company offers a platform that provides real-time visibility into software development projects, enabling teams to identify risks and roadblocks, make ROI-driven decisions, and forecast business value with greater accuracy. Bloomfilter's solutions are designed to support product directors, chief product officers, CTOs/CIOs, scrum masters, VPs of engineering, and business executives in optimizing their software development processes. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Akron, Ohio.

name: 1v1Me
cb_description: 1v1Me is a platform focused on competitive gaming and esports betting. The company enables users to stake on outcomes of video game matches and offers instant payouts for successful wagers. It primarily caters to the online gaming and esports industry. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Envisics
cb_description: Envisics specializes in holography and augmented reality technologies within the automotive industry. The company develops augmented reality head-up displays (AR HUDs) that provide additional driving information to improve safety and decision-making for drivers. It primarily serves sectors such as automotive, supplying holographic technology to vehicle manufacturers and tier-one suppliers. Envisics was formerly known as Daqri Automotive. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Milton Keynes, United Kingdom.

name: Whip Media
cb_description: Whip Media specializes in content licensing and royalties management within the media and entertainment industry. The company offers a suite of software solutions that automate and streamline content performance tracking, financial operations, and consumer insights for various content distribution channels. Whip Media's products are designed to increase efficiency and profitability for studios, distributors, and streaming platforms by providing actionable intelligence and automating complex processes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Amperity
cb_description: Amperity provides a comprehensive enterprise customer data platform. It helps companies build the first-party data foundation required for customer acquisition and retention, personalize experiences that build loyalty, and manage privacy compliance. This data is primarily used by marketing, information technology, and analytics teams. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: PV Nano Cell
cb_description: PV Nano Cell is a company focused on the development and production of printed electronics in the technology sector. The company offers a complete solution for mass-produced inkjet-based printed electronics, which includes proprietary silver-based conductive inks, inkjet production printers, and a comprehensive printing process. PV Nano Cell's solutions are primarily used in the automotive, Internet of Things (IoT), photovoltaics, and digital printing industries. It is based in Migdal HaEmek, Israel.

name: unitQ
cb_description: unitQ is a company focused on providing AI-powered insights into user feedback across various platforms in the tech industry. The company offers services that aggregate and analyze user feedback in real-time, enabling businesses to detect and address quality issues and improve their products and user experiences. unitQ's solutions cater to product, engineering, customer experience, and marketing teams, among others, to drive growth and enhance customer satisfaction. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Burlingame, California.

name: Cambly
cb_description: Cambly specializes in online English tutoring, providing a platform where users can engage with native English-speaking tutors across various sectors of language learning. The company offers personalized 1-on-1 lessons, group sessions, and a range of English courses tailored to different skill levels and interests, including academic test prep and business English, all delivered via a video chat interface. Cambly's services cater to individuals seeking to improve their English proficiency for personal, academic, or professional development. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Covina, California.

name: DBmaestro
cb_description: DBmaestro is a company that focuses on providing DevOps for databases in the IT sector. The company offers a platform that automates the Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) processes of databases, including release automation, source control, and compliance automation. It primarily serves the IT ecosystem, with a particular focus on DevOps teams, database teams, and developers. It is based in Concord, Massachusetts.

name: Gridware
cb_description: Gridware is a cybersecurity company that operates in the information security sector. The company offers services such as security consulting, incident response, penetration testing, and governance and audit services, aimed at protecting businesses from cyber threats and minimizing the impact of cyber attacks. Gridware primarily serves sectors such as education, finance, fintech, government, healthcare, legal, nonprofit, technology, and utilities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Uncover
cb_description: Local classifieds site

name: ScriptDrop
cb_description: ScriptDrop provides a prescription delivery service. It connects businesses to the medication access expertise, coast-to-coast delivery network, and flexible technology to provide patient care and medication adherence rates. It sends a courier to pick up the delivery and tracks the delivery until the patient signs for it. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

name: Rune Labs
cb_description: Rune Labs is a software and data analytics company focused on neurology within the healthcare sector. The company offers a care delivery ecosystem for Parkinsons disease, utilizing technology to provide clinicians with patient data dashboards and to connect patients with clinical trials, as well as supporting life sciences companies in therapy development with data and clinical trial support. Rune Labs primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly in areas related to neurodegenerative diseases and neuromodulation. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: vested
cb_description: Vested is a company focused on personal financial savings within the finance sector. It offers an application designed to help users set and achieve simple savings goals, functioning similarly to a fitness tracker but for managing money. The app provides a system to determine how much a user can save each month and encourages them to stick to their savings plan. It is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Definely
cb_description: Definely specializes in LegalTech solutions, focusing on the creation, drafting, and review of legal documents. The company offers a suite of tools that assist lawyers in drafting legal documents and scanning PDFs for reference access. Definely primarily serves the legal industry, including law firms and in-house legal teams. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: handdii
cb_description: Handdii serves as a technology company that specializes in streamlining the property insurance claim process by connecting insurance companies with contractors. The company offers a digital platform that facilitates direct communication and coordination between customers, contractors, and insurance companies for efficient claim fulfillment and property repairs. Handdii primarily serves the insurance industry by providing a three-sided marketplace that simplifies the claims process for all parties involved. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Marina del Rey, California.

name: Lucky
cb_description: Lucky develops a financial application to offer credit products, sale offers, and cashback rewards. It provides access to a range of credit services, discounts, and cashback rewards that can be used in person and virtually with partnered local and global brands. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Giza, Egypt.

name: Axion Ray
cb_description: Axion Ray specializes in AI-driven solutions for product integrity management within various industries. The company offers a platform that utilizes artificial intelligence to automatically detect, investigate, and resolve quality issues in products, significantly accelerating the process. Axion Ray's services are primarily utilized by quality, service, and engineering teams to enhance product reliability and customer satisfaction. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New Castle, Delaware.

name: Poplar Homes
cb_description: Poplar Homes is a property management company that specializes in providing comprehensive services for homeowners and residents. Their main offerings include managing rental properties, facilitating tenant placement, and coordinating maintenance needs. Poplar Homes primarily serves the residential real estate sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Cupertino, California.

name: ADPList
cb_description: ADPList is a global community focused on mentorship within the professional development sector. The company facilitates connections between mentors and learners, offering a platform for knowledge sharing to elevate careers. It primarily serves individuals seeking professional growth and mentorship opportunities. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: Runway
cb_description: Runway is a company focused on fostering innovation and entrepreneurial thinking within the startup ecosystem. They offer a variety of programs such as bootcamps, incubators, and workshops designed to support and accelerate the growth of startups and small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). It is based in Melbourne, Victoria.

name: Spruce Finance
cb_description: Spruce Finance provides renewable energy financing to consumers and businesses. The company offers purchase agreements, leases, and loans for distributed energy technologies, including solar Photovoltaic (PV) and energy efficiency improvements. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SkyWatch
cb_description: SkyWatch specializes in providing commercial satellite imagery and geospatial data services. The company offers a platform called EarthCache that enables users to access and integrate earth observation data into their business processes. It primarily serves sectors that require remote sensing data, such as agriculture, critical infrastructure, and environmental monitoring. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Kitchener, Canada.

name: Bravely
cb_description: Bravely is a training and coaching platform operating in the professional development industry. The company offers on-demand, personalized development and coaching services to employees, aiming to enhance their skills and boost performance. Bravely primarily serves the corporate sector, with a focus on organizations seeking innovative approaches to employee development. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Droplet
cb_description: Droplet is a mobile payment app that's easy to use and completely fee-free for everyone. Droplet Rewards lets users collect rewards on their phone when they spend  meaning no more fiddling around with bits of stamped paper.

name: FilSwan
cb_description: FilSwan is a company focused on decentralized storage and computing solutions, operating within the technology and blockchain sectors. The company offers services that integrate data, computing, and payment into one suite, providing a complete solution for web3 developers to incorporate decentralized storage, edge computing, and payment across multiple chains. FilSwan primarily serves sectors such as universities, VR/AR, and other high-performance computing companies. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Friendlier
cb_description: Friendlier focuses on reusable food packaging solutions. The company offers various reusable containers and operates a return-and-reuse system that includes delivery, pick-up, and washing services. Its products cater to a range of food businesses. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Guelph, Ontario.

name: Switch Therapeutics
cb_description: Switch Therapeutics operates as a biotechnology company. It focuses on the development of ribonucleic acid (RNA) interference (RNAi) therapies. The company's main offering is the development of biomarker-gated, genetic medicines aimed at transforming disease treatment. Its medicines are based on a unique platform known as conditionally activated siRNAs (CASi), which combines properties of single and double-stranded RNAs in a single molecule, allowing for cell-selective RNAi activity. It was founded in 2020 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Entera
cb_description: Entera was a Internet/Internet Software & Services company based in Fremont, California.  Entera was acquired in 2000.

name: CybelAngel
cb_description: CybelAngel is a global leader in cybersecurity solutions, focusing on External Attack Surface Management within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a suite of services including real-time internet scanning for threats, data breach prevention, and risk mitigation for digital assets. CybelAngel caters to various sectors such as Pharmaceutical, Manufacturing, Retail, and Financial Services. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Universal Hydrogen
cb_description: Universal Hydrogen is focused on decarbonizing the aviation industry by enabling hydrogen-powered flight. The company offers an end-to-end solution for hydrogen logistics, including modular capsules for hydrogen transport and conversion kits for retrofitting aircraft with hydrogen fuel cell powertrains. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Hawthorne, California. In June 2024, Universal Hydrogen filed for bankruptcy.

name: Greenfly
cb_description: Greenfly focuses on automating the flow of short-form digital media in the sports and entertainment industries. Its main service is its artificial intelligence (AI)-integrated software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform, which provides access to short-form digital media for staff, partners, athletes, and talent, automating digital media operations including content capture, collection, automated organization, and distribution of digital media. It primarily sells to the sports, esports, entertainment, politics, and brand sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Wildlife Studios
cb_description: Wildlife Studios is a mobile gaming company focused on developing and publishing engaging games across various genres. The company offers a portfolio of games including battle royale, sports simulations, and multiplayer online battle arenas, designed to provide entertainment to a global audience. Wildlife Studios caters to the gaming industry, with a significant number of downloads and a broad range of titles appealing to diverse gaming preferences. Wildlife Studios was formerly known as TFG. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: FeelBetter
cb_description: FeelBetter provides a pharmaco-clinical intelligence, changing the polypharmacy paradigm on both individual and population health. The company improves financial and clinical outcomes and quality of care by analyzing each patients health journey and identifying interventions before deterioration. Its services include risk stratification and quality metrics, patient-specific recommendations, patient journey monitoring, and more. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Rive
cb_description: Rive specializes in interactive motion graphics and operates in the design and animation software industry. The company offers a platform for designing, animating, and integrating functional graphics with motion and interactivity across various platforms without the need for complex designer-developer handoffs. Rive's products are used to create interactive 2D characters, props, UI for games, and animated assets for apps and websites. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Lumos
cb_description: Lumos is a company that focuses on data analytics and advisory services in the financial sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform that provides insights from untapped data, predictive modeling, and risk assessment to help grow and diversify small business loan portfolios. Lumos primarily serves the financial institutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Wilmington, North Carolina.

name: FieldIn
cb_description: FieldIn is a company focused on smart farming innovation in the agriculture industry. The company offers a platform that provides real-time insights and data to improve the efficiency and accuracy of farming operations, particularly for high value crops. This is achieved through the use of smart sensors, mobile applications, and a cloud-based platform that tracks all aspects of farming operations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Yokne'am Illit, Israel.

name: Daring Foods
cb_description: Daring Foods is a company focused on the food industry, specifically in the domain of plant-based alternatives. The company offers a range of plant-based products that mimic the taste and texture of chicken, providing a nutritious and environmentally friendly alternative to traditional poultry. These products are primarily sold to consumers through various retail channels, as well as to restaurants looking to expand their plant-based offerings. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Culver City, California.

name: Hack The Box
cb_description: Hack The Box specializes in gamified cybersecurity upskilling, certification, and talent assessment for individuals and organizations. The company offers a range of services including ethical hacking courses, professional labs, and community-driven learning experiences designed to enhance offensive and defensive security skills. Hack The Box primarily serves the cybersecurity industry, with a focus on providing training and assessment solutions to businesses, government institutions, and academic entities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Folkestone, England.

name: Mainstay
