cb_description: Mainstay provides market intelligence and tools for the single-family rental industry. It offer actionable data and tools designed to renters with information, expand opportunities for market participants, and enhance clarity and trust within the single-family rental ecosystem. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Maven
cb_description: Maven serves as a virtual clinic specializing in women's and family health within the healthcare sector. The company offers continuous, holistic care services, including fertility and family building, maternity, parenting, pediatrics, and menopause management. Maven primarily serves employers and health plans, aiming to improve health outcomes and reduce healthcare costs. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Medeloop
cb_description: Medeloop focuses on accelerating clinical research through artificial intelligence within the healthcare sector. It offers a suite of products designed to streamline the clinical research process, including tools for grant writing, study management, data analytics, and automated research publication. Medeloop primarily serves the healthcare research industry, providing solutions for researchers and participants alike. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Serverless
cb_description: Serverless is a company that focuses on providing solutions for serverless application development in the technology sector. The company offers a framework that allows developers to easily define their applications as functions and events, deploy infrastructure and code with a single command, and extend their use-cases and workflow with plugins. The primary customers of Serverless are developers and organizations in the technology industry. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Perennial
cb_description: Perennial is a design firm focused on creating and delivering design strategies for major retail brands in Canada and around the world.

name: SELECT
cb_description: SELECT offers staffing and recruiting services. It aims to help organizations in the energy sector hire professionals through specialized executive searches. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil. In March 2023, SELECT merged with FESA Group.

name: Alokai
cb_description: Alokai specializes in providing frontend as-a-service solutions for the composable commerce sector. Its main offerings include a production-ready application for building enterprise e-commerce storefronts, an orchestration layer for integration with various technologies, and cloud hosting services optimized for e-commerce performance. It also offers a console for deploying, monitoring, and managing e-commerce applications. Alokai was formerly known as Vue Storefront. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: TermScout
cb_description: TermScout is a legal-tech company that offers solutions for contract review services. It provides clients with competitive data to draft competitive contracts. Its platform enables clients to engage in a third-party contract review process. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Netlify
cb_description: Netlify is a platform that specializes in building and deploying dynamic web experiences, e-commerce stores, and applications across various industries. The company offers a composable web architecture that integrates modern web frameworks, serverless functions, and edge computing to facilitate highly performant and dynamic web experiences. Netlify's main offerings include global network deployment, custom domain management, HTTPS support, deploy previews, rollbacks, and a suite of developer tools for enterprise team management, security, analytics, and more. Netlify was formerly known as MakerLoop. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Tradier
cb_description: Tradier operates as a financial technology company. The company offers a customizable trading platform with enhanced trading features and capabilities, providing tools for investing and trading in stocks, options, and cryptocurrencies. It primarily serves platform providers, developers, digital advisors, registered investment advisors, and registered broker-dealers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.

name: RainFocus
cb_description: RainFocus is a company that focuses on event marketing in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies event management, unifies program experiences, and optimizes omnichannel marketing for virtual, in-person, and hybrid events. The platform integrates with sales and marketing technologies, providing services such as event registration, content management, and exhibitor activation. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Lehi, Utah.

name: Upflowy
cb_description: Upflowy is a company focused on increasing conversions through its drag and drop tool designed for creating and optimizing various types of user flows. The company offers solutions for building lead generation forms, onboarding flows, quizzes, and surveys that aim to enhance user engagement and gather valuable data. Upflowy primarily serves sectors such as solopreneurs, marketing and sales, product development, and education by providing tools to create personalized experiences and streamline customer interactions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: BlueStone
cb_description: An IP Telephony technology provider that can switch telephone conversations in new flexible ways, making it easy to link together branch offices, home offices and mobile workers using.

name: Lezzoo
cb_description: Lezzoo is a company specializing in on-demand delivery services within the technology sector. The company offers a super app that provides users with a variety of services including food and grocery delivery, home services, express courier, and pharmacy delivery. Lezzoo primarily serves the consumer sector, offering convenience and simplifying daily tasks for individuals. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Erbil, Iraq.

name: Rivet
cb_description: Rivet specializes in open-source multiplayer infrastructure for the gaming industry. The company offers services such as dedicated game server deployment, DDoS mitigation, content delivery networks, and backend modules for game development. Rivet's solutions cater to game developers looking to integrate multiplayer functionality with support for various game engines and networking frameworks. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Ravelin
cb_description: Ravelin specializes in fraud prevention and payment security within the online business sector. The company offers a suite of solutions that utilize machine learning and human insights aiming to protect against online payment fraud, account takeovers, policy abuse, marketplace fraud, and optimization of three-dimensional secure transactions. Ravelin primarily serves online merchants looking to secure their transactions and enhance customer journey. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Coverdash
cb_description: Coverdash is a digital business insurance agency that specializes in providing tailored insurance solutions for various business sectors. The company offers a range of products including general liability, business owner's policies, workers' compensation, cyber, professional, and management liability insurance. Coverdash primarily serves small businesses, startups, e-commerce merchants, and freelancers. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Fixico
cb_description: Fixico is a digital car repair management platform in the automotive industry. The company offers a marketplace for car repair services, providing a digital and streamlined repair experience for various customer segments, including fleet operators, rental companies, insurers, and OEMs. Fixico primarily serves sectors such as fleet management, vehicle rental services, leasing companies, insurance providers, and original equipment manufacturers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Dataminr
cb_description: Dataminr specializes in real-time event and risk detection, operating within the AI and public data analysis sectors. The company's AI platform processes vast amounts of public data to generate timely alerts on high-impact events and emerging risks, enabling organizations to respond effectively to crises. Dataminr's solutions cater to a diverse clientele, including global corporations, public sector agencies, newsrooms, and non-governmental organizations. Dataminr was formerly known as EBH Enterprises. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bringg
cb_description: Bringg provides delivery management in the logistics and supply chain. It offers a platform that provides services such as fleet and resource management, multi-carrier delivery management, route optimization, auto dispatch, delivery tracking, and returns management. The company primarily serves sectors such as the grocery, furniture, appliances, and white glove carriers industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Mori
cb_description: Mori is a major platform in the distributed generation (GD) sector, focusing on solar energy. The company enables consumers to access solar power through community solar programs, converting sunlight into electricity using photovoltaic panels. These services cater to various customer segments including residential, commercial, industrial, and rural properties. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Ada
cb_description: Ada is a company that operates in the real estate tech industry, focusing on providing virtual assistant services. The company offers a chatbot service that assists users in finding apartments that suit their budget, location preferences, and neighborhood requirements. The service connects tenants directly with landlords, simplifying the apartment hunting process. It is based in Warsaw, Poland.

name: Go Autonomous
cb_description: Go Autonomous specializes in autonomous commerce and AI-powered automation software within the B2B commerce sector. The company offers solutions for quotation automation, sales order automation, document data capture, and AI-powered case management, all designed to streamline business operations and integrate with enterprise resource planning systems. These solutions aim to reduce the manual handling of quotes and orders and facilitate digital commerce. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Copenhagen V, Denmark.

name: Daytona
cb_description: Daytona provides development environment management solutions. The company offers an enterprise-grade platform for managing self-hosted, secure, and standardized development environments, providing solutions for development environments. It primarily sells to the software development industry. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Lifelink Systems
cb_description: Lifelink Systems is a technology company focused on the healthcare sector. The company offers a conversational patient engagement platform that automates patient interactions before, during, and after healthcare visits, improving operational efficiency and customer satisfaction. Lifelink Systems primarily serves healthcare systems and life sciences companies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Avilar
cb_description: Avilar Therapeutics is a biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery and development of novel protein degraders within the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include the development of ATACs (ASGPR Targeting Chimeras), which are designed to target and degrade extracellular and membrane-bound proteins implicated in various diseases. Avilar primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly in the development of new treatments for serious diseases. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Bipsync
cb_description: Bipsync is a company that focuses on providing research management software in the investment management industry. The company offers a platform that enhances investor productivity by speeding up data capture, automating research maintenance, and identifying insights to drive better decision-making. Bipsync primarily serves the asset management sector, including hedge funds, pensions, sovereign wealth funds, and foundations. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: GuestReady
cb_description: GuestReady is a tech-driven hospitality company specializing in property management services for short and mid-term rentals. The company offers a full suite of services including listing creation, price optimization, guest management, housekeeping, and maintenance, all aimed at maximizing rental revenue for property owners. GuestReady primarily serves the short-term and mid-term rental markets, leveraging technology to streamline operations and enhance guest experiences. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Reposit
cb_description: Reposit is a company that offers a no deposit renting solution as an alternative to traditional cash deposits in the rental market. Their main service provides landlords with increased rent protection and tenants with the opportunity to save on upfront costs, while also offering a compliant way for agents to earn commissions. Reposit primarily serves the real estate tech industry, catering to letting agents, build to rent companies, landlords, and tenants. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Akur8
cb_description: Akur8 leverages machine learning and predictive analytics to improve insurance pricing processes in the insurance industry. It offers a solution that automates the generation of insurance pricing models, enabling insurers to make more accurate predictions and pricing decisions faster and more efficiently. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: ChargeAfter
cb_description: ChargeAfter focuses on providing embedded financing and consumer finance solutions. The company offers a platform that enables merchants and financial institutions to provide personalized financing options to their customers at the point of sale, both in-store and online. The platform connects customers with multiple lenders, streamlining the lending process and managing compliance requirements, underwriting processes, and regulations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: OpenWeb
cb_description: OpenWeb specializes in providing wireless internet services and operates in the telecommunications sector. The company offers a range of products including uncapped LTE data, mobile 4G and 5G data SIMs, and MTN fixed LTE WiFi, as well as hosting services. OpenWeb's services cater to individuals and businesses looking for reliable, high-speed internet solutions without the need for a landline. It is based in Ballito, South Africa.

name: NavVis
cb_description: NavVis specializes in reality capture technology and digital twin solutions within the surveying and AEC industries. The company offers products that enable the creation of photorealistic digital twins of the built environment, utilizing advanced SLAM technology for accurate spatial data acquisition. NavVis's solutions cater to various sectors, including surveying, construction, automotive, and process and plant industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Arieca
cb_description: Arieca focuses on the development of modern materials for various industries, with a specialization in the semiconductor sector. The company offers liquid metal embedded elastomers (LMEE) that provide solutions for thermal management in semiconductors, as well as stretchable materials for wearables and industrial applications. Arieca's products are designed to meet the demanding requirements of sectors such as aerospace, automotive, and healthcare. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: albo
cb_description: albo specializes in personal and business finance management within the fintech sector. It offers services such as personal and corporate debit accounts, payroll management, personal and business loans, as well as cryptocurrency buying and selling. It primarily serves individuals and businesses. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: VAST Data
cb_description: VAST Data specializes in data infrastructure for deep learning and artificial intelligence (AI) within the technology sector. The company offers a data platform that unifies storage, database, and compute capabilities to support AI and deep learning applications, while simplifying data management and aiming to enhance productivity. VAST Data's solutions cater to organizations looking to leverage AI and analytics for data-driven insights. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: TravelPerk
cb_description: TravelPerk is a SaaS business travel platform that specializes in corporate travel management. The company offers an all-in-one platform for booking, organizing, and controlling business travel, with features such as travel policy automation, expense management, and 24/7 customer support. TravelPerk primarily serves sectors that require robust travel management solutions, including finance teams and travel managers within various organizations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: FabFitFun
cb_description: FabFitFun is a subscription-based lifestyle membership platform. It offers a shopping platform to provide women with products from premium and emerging brands. It offers products across beauty, fashion, fitness, wellness, and more. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Cyclr
cb_description: Cyclr is a company focused on providing an embedded integration platform for SaaS applications, operating in the tech industry. The company offers a low-code design interface that assists developers in creating, publishing, and maintaining integrations within their own applications. Cyclr primarily serves the SaaS industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Croydon, England.

name: Nectar
cb_description: Nectar specializes in the development of connected devices for the beverage industry, focusing on automatic replenishment and data-driven insights. The company offers products such as smart pourers and stoppers equipped with ultrasound sensors for real-time tracking of pours, alongside software solutions for bar inventory management and analytics. These products and services are designed to reduce liquor costs, prevent theft, and provide valuable data to bar owners and operators. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Tradeteq
cb_description: Tradeteq operates as a company operating in the financial services sector, with a focus on private debt investment. It offers a platform that connects asset sellers with investment managers, providing services such as transforming assets into investable notes, performing the due diligence process, and supporting transactions. It primarily serves the financial industry, particularly banks and financial institutions. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Fam
cb_description: FamApp by Trio is a financial services company that focuses on providing UPI and card payment solutions for the younger generation. The company offers a spending account called FamX, which allows users to manage their finances, make payments, and receive rewards without the need for a traditional bank account. FamApp by Trio caters to individuals starting from the age of 11, promoting financial literacy and inclusion among teens. Fam was formerly known as Fampay. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: FreeWire Technologies
cb_description: FreeWire Technologies operates as an intelligent energy system platform for the industry's needs of energy and transportation. It creates energy delivery systems brings clean power to applications and manufactures electric vehicle charging solutions that free customers from the limitations of the electric grid. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Newark, California.

name: Everee
cb_description: Everee is a discovery app with offline notifications.

name: ByHeart
cb_description: ByHeart focuses on infant nutrition within the health and wellness sector. Its main product is an infant formula that aims to closely mimic breast milk, using a patented protein blend and organic, grass-fed whole milk and is backed by clinical trials to prove its benefits. The company primarily sells to the infant nutrition market. ByHeart was formerly known as Second Science. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Nu Quantum
cb_description: Nu Quantum specializes in the development of quantum networking technologies and operates within the quantum computing industry. The company's main offerings include single-photon technologies and the creation of an entanglement fabric to enhance the scalability of quantum computers. Its products are designed to advance the quantum information processing field. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: Nectero Medical
cb_description: Nectero Medical focuses on developing treatments for aneurysmal diseases. The company's main innovation is a treatment designed to stabilize the growth and minimize the risk of rupture of mid-sized Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms (AAA) using a proprietary endovascular approach. This treatment may prevent or significantly delay the need for more invasive surgical interventions, potentially allowing patients to maintain their quality of life without facing major surgery. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tempe, Arizona.

name: Tire Agent
cb_description: Tire Agent is a search engine and aggregator for tires and wheels. Features include an 'Ask The Expert' tool that guides customers in their purchases. Recommendation criteria considers location, the vehicle's purpose, average yearly mileage, budget, make, model, year, and more. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ElevationSpace
cb_description: ElevationSpace focuses on the development of small satellites for space experiments within the aerospace industry. Its offering includes satellites that serve as alternatives to the International Space Station for conducting experiments in space. Its satellites are designed to frequently return materials to Earth using re-entry capsules, facilitating space experiments, manufacturing, and entertainment. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Miyagi, Japan.

name: SomaDetect
cb_description: SomaDetect is a company specializing in dairy farm analytics and herd health management. Their main offerings include an in-line sensor and software system that provides dairy producers with real-time, milk-based data to monitor milk quality, reproduction, and overall herd health. This technology aids in improving milk quality, managing reproduction more effectively, and enhancing herd health without adding extra labor or disrupting milk flow. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Thornhill, Canada.

name: Swift Medical
cb_description: Swift Medical focuses on digital wound care management in the healthcare sector. The company offers smartphone-ready software that provides advanced wound care visualization, and touchless 3D measurement, and streamlines both clinical and administrative wound care management workflows. The company primarily serves healthcare providers, payers risk-bearing providers, and clinical research and trials. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Moteefe
cb_description: Moteefe is a print-on-demand platform focused on providing eCommerce solutions for selling custom merchandise. The company offers a suite of tools to help merchants increase sales through features like discounting, cross-selling, and upselling, as well as a selection of printers for product fulfillment. Moteefe primarily serves the eCommerce industry, enabling sellers to create and market their products with ease. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Mosaic
cb_description: Mosaic is a minority-certified commercial real estate development company with a focus on inclusive and sustainable projects across various sectors. The company specializes in ground-up construction and adaptive reuse of properties, including mixed-use residential, affordable housing, educational institutions, sports complexes, life sciences facilities, university housing, and hospitality. Mosaic aims to create positive community impacts through job creation, diversity, environmental sensitivity, and community acceptance. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Inworld AI
cb_description: Inworld AI specializes in advanced artificial intelligence for the gaming industry, enhancing the player experience with dynamic non-player characters (NPCs) and evolving game worlds. The company offers a suite of tools, including the Inworld Engine for real-time AI gameplay, Inworld Studio for streamlined game design, and Inworld Core for robust AI infrastructure solutions. Its products serve game developers looking to integrate sophisticated AI into their games for improved engagement and immersion. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Faraway
cb_description: Faraway is a game studio focused on developing open economy games within the blockchain and Web3 sectors. The company offers a range of products including player-driven economy games, Web3 technology tools for developers, and services related to non-fungible tokens (NFTs) such as minting, staking, and crafting. Faraway's offerings cater to the gaming industry, particularly those integrating blockchain technology into their platforms. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: NEURA Robotics
cb_description: NEURA Robotics develops an artificial intelligence (AI) enabled collaborative armed robot system for multiple applications. Its features include voice recognition, object detection, three-dimensional (3D) imaging, waterproofing, light-emitting diode (LED) lights, mapping tools, gesture recognition, and control tools. It serves the automotive, education, aviation, and healthcare sectors. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Metzingen, Germany.

name: Threads Styling
cb_description: Threads Styling is a lifestyle shopping platform. It provides dresses, knitwear, tops, coats, jackets, skirts, trousers, jewelry, watches, bags, and shoes. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in London, United Kingdom. In September 2022, Threads Styling was acquired by Chalhoub Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Mercator AI
cb_description: Mercator AI is a market intelligence platform for the construction industry that specializes in driving strategic business development with real-time data. The company offers services that include tracking land development, analyzing competitive landscapes, and identifying emerging project opportunities using machine learning and AI. Mercator AI primarily serves large general contractors, product manufacturers, and real estate firms seeking operational efficiency in their business development efforts. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: Mojo Vision
cb_description: Mojo Vision develops micro light-emitting diode (LED) technology for consumer, enterprise, and government applications. It develops High-Performance Quantum Dot (HPQD) Technology to make RGB pixels. The company also offers Mojo Lens, a contact lens with a built-in display that delivers invisible computing. Mojo Vision was formerly known as Tectus. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Saratoga, California.

name: Groover
cb_description: Groover operates in the music industry, focusing on music promotion. It provides a platform where artists can send their music to curators, radio stations, and music professionals for feedback and potential coverage. This service is primarily aimed at the music industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Audioscenic
cb_description: Audioscenic specializes in 3D audio reproduction technology within the audio technology sector. The company offers immersive spatial audio experiences through its proprietary Amphi AI Beamforming technology, which provides accurate surround sound without the need for headphones or complex setups. Audioscenic's solutions are primarily targeted at OEMs and ODMs for integration into various consumer electronics, including monitors, laptops, and in-car entertainment systems. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Southampton, England.

name: Welcome Homes
cb_description: Welcome Homes operates as an online platform in the homebuilding sector, offering a turnkey solution for building new homes with a guaranteed price. The company simplifies the homebuilding process by providing services that include land selection, home customization, and construction management, all accessible through an online design studio. Welcome Homes primarily serves the residential real estate market. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Aroma Bit
cb_description: Aroma Bit is a company focused on digital olfaction technology in the sensor industry. The company offers compact, high-performance odor imaging sensors that can digitize smells, and provides digital smell data solutions. These products and services are primarily sold to corporate customers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: CARPE
cb_description: CARPE is a story content startup specializing in the creation and service of female-oriented romance story games. Their main offerings include interactive mobile otome games that allow users to choose and engage with characters in a narrative, providing a sense of joy through freedom of choice and active participation. CARPE aims to produce a wide range of content, including original stories and adaptations of webtoon IPs. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Datafold
cb_description: Datafold specializes in automated testing solutions for data engineers within the data analytics and quality assurance sectors. The company provides tools for data diffing, column-level lineage, and continuous integration testing to ensure data quality throughout development, deployment, and migration processes. Datafold's solutions are designed to help data teams deploy pipelines with confidence, accelerate development, and maintain high data quality standards. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Let'sDressUp
cb_description: Let'sDressUp engages in women's clothing across various styles and occasions. It offers a range of apparel including ethnic wear, casual tops, and kaftan dresses, catering to an array of customer preferences and sizes. It provides clothing options for women of all sizes, from XS to 8XL, ensuring that women can find their perfect fit and style. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: Peckwater Brands
cb_description: Peckwater Brands is a platform that operates in the food delivery and hospitality industry. The company provides a service that assists existing kitchen operators in improving their food delivery performance, offering options such as a software package, a digital food license to produce one of their brands, or a full high-street dark kitchen fit-out. Peckwater Brands primarily serves the hospitality industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Amenify
cb_description: Amenify is a real estate technology company focused on providing lifestyle services for multifamily residents. The company offers a range of services including professional cleaning, housekeeping, dog walking, and food delivery to enhance the living experience of apartment dwellers. Amenify's platform also enables property operators to generate ancillary income and supports local small businesses by integrating their services. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Chexy
cb_description: Chexy is a tenant-facing payments platform that specializes in the financial services sector. The company enables renters to pay their rent via credit card, earn rewards, and build credit without requiring landlord participation. Chexy's services cater to individuals looking to maximize their credit card benefits and improve their credit score through timely rent payments. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Principia
cb_description: Developer of recombinant biological products with prolonged therapeutic activity. The company is initially focusing on developing three albumin-based fusion proteins for the treatment of cancer, viral diseases and growth deficiencies.

name: Narrative
cb_description: Narrative is an AI-powered automation platform operating in the software and e-commerce sectors. The company specializes in eliminating manual data workflows for businesses, allowing for the automation of operations such as data consolidation, workflow creation, and custom app development. Narrative primarily serves sectors that require extensive data management and workflow automation, such as supply chain, logistics, and business operations. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Circuit
cb_description: Circuit is a collaboration platform from Unify. The platform enables consumers to share, interact, and share files. It is based in London, England.

name: Felix
cb_description: Felix is an insurance e-commerce comparison and automation platform for insurance brokers. Felix allows brokers to sell health insurance by automating processes and leveraging the internet for sales and distribution. It was formally known as Felix, changed it's name to Liberation Cover, and then changed it's name back to Felix. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Willow
cb_description: Willow is a company focused on personalized weight loss solutions in the healthcare industry. The company offers GLP-1 weight loss medication, personalized for each individual by board-certified doctors, along with ongoing support and care throughout the weight loss journey. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Ontopical
cb_description: Ontopical provides business intelligence solutions for unstructured data from local government organizations. The company provides a platform that offers insights into topics of interest being discussed by local government organizations across North America. Ontopical was formerly known as BoxOfDocs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Calgary, Canada.

name: Transcend
cb_description: Transcend focuses on providing data privacy infrastructure and data governance solutions within the technology sector. Its main offerings include a unified platform for privacy and data governance that simplifies compliance, automates data subject requests, and provides AI governance tools to manage risks associated with large language model deployments. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Infarm
cb_description: InFarm operates as a vertical farming company providing the tools to grow fresh plants produced indoors for urban communities. The company's main services include growing a variety of plants such as herbs, leafy greens, salads, and microgreens using efficient modular farming systems. These systems require significantly less land and water than traditional farming methods. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Raiinmaker
cb_description: Raiinmaker provides a technology company in the Web3 domain. The company offers a platform where users can create content, join campaigns, share on their social channels, and earn rewards, thereby monetizing their social influence. The platform also allows users to create unique or branded artificial intelligence (AI) generative art. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Joshu
cb_description: Joshu is a company focused on insurance product development and distribution within the insurance industry. It offers a self-service platform that enables insurance product owners to configure, launch, and manage their products with minimal reliance on IT resources. Joshu's main offerings include a builder for creating digital insurance products, ready-made stores for distribution, an underwriting desk for policy management, and integration options with third-party data APIs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Tepbac
cb_description: Tepbac operates within the aquaculture industry, focusing on providing information and technological solutions. The company offers a comprehensive suite of software and hardware designed to simplify and bring transparency to aquaculture farming practices. Tepbac aims to promote sustainable fisheries, ensure traceable seafood, and make a positive environmental impact. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

name: Maisonette
cb_description: Maisonette is a curated marketplace specializing in children's products, including clothing, toys, and home decor. The company offers a wide range of items for babies and kids, such as stylish apparel, essential gear, and educational playthings, without using technical jargon or promotional language. Maisonette primarily serves the consumer retail sector, particularly parents and families looking for quality children's products. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Turbi
cb_description: Turbi focuses on digital vehicle rental in the transportation industry. The company offers a service where customers can rent cars for varying lengths of time, from a few hours to several days, all managed through a mobile application. The service includes features such as fuel, insurance, and 24-hour assistance. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Daasity
cb_description: Daasity is a company that focuses on data-driven solutions for consumer brands, operating in the data analytics and reporting industry. The company offers a modular data platform that provides data extraction, transformation, and analytics services, enabling brands to drive results, scale their operations, and support high growth. Its services are primarily targeted towards the ecommerce, retail, and wholesale sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Oort
cb_description: Oort develops a distributed identity threat detection platform for enterprise security. Its platform provides edge computing, distributed systems, cybersecurity, and network security services. The company offers integrations, governance risk and compliance, identity access management, security operations center, and identity security services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts. In July 2023, Oort was acquired by Cisco.

name: Factorial
cb_description: Factorial specializes in human resource management software, offering a suite of tools designed to automate and centralize HR processes across various business sectors. Its main offerings include time and attendance tracking, talent management, payroll processing, and expense management, all aimed at improving productivity and reducing manual workload. Factorial's solutions cater to a range of industries, including manufacturing, consulting, technology, healthcare, and more, providing scalable and agile HR tools to meet the needs of small and medium-sized businesses. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Caplight
cb_description: Caplight specializes in the trading of pre-IPO assets and derivatives within the financial technology sector. The company offers market data, price discovery tools, and derivatives to facilitate trading for shareholders, institutional investors, and brokers. Caplight primarily serves institutional investors, registered brokers, shareholders, and accredited investors in the private markets. Caplight was formerly known as Savory. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Mintifi
cb_description: Mintifi is a company specializing in supply chain financing and working capital solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) within various industries. The company offers tailored financing solutions, including inventory financing, purchase credit lines, and short-term business loans, designed to facilitate faster inventory turnover and efficient receivables management. Mintifi's platform integrates with enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems to streamline invoice settlements and provides a WhatsApp banking platform for convenient transaction management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Beatdapp
cb_description: Beatdapp focuses on the music industry, providing a tracking system for music labels and artists. The company's main service is to verify and validate media streamed to reduce discrepancies in tracking between Digital Service Providers and rights holders. This service primarily benefits the music industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

name: JIT
cb_description: Just In Time Group (JIT) is a leading ICT Systems and Solutions Integrator with a focus on digital integrated solutions in the technology sector. The company offers services such as systems integration, software solutions based on geographical information systems, information security, data analytics, infrastructure solutions, ERP solutions, and IT resource outsourcing. JIT primarily serves the banking, telecommunications, government, and enterprise sectors. It was founded in 1996 and is based in Colombo, Sri Lanka.

name: NuORDER
cb_description: NuORDER provides a cloud and mobile business-to-business (B2B) electronic commerce (e-commerce) solution empowering brands and retailers to streamline business operations. It offers retailers a central hub to browse products and catalogs, access real-time inventory data, and place orders from a computer or mobile application. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Los Angeles, California. In June 2021, NuORDER was acquired by Lightspeed.

name: Orb Health
cb_description: Orb Health is a company that focuses on healthcare management, specifically in the domain of care management services. The company offers a range of services including remote contact centers, care management programs, and patient access solutions, all aimed at improving clinical outcomes and financial success in the healthcare sector. Their primary customers include health centers, hospitals, health systems, and unions. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.

name: Elemeno Health
cb_description: Elemeno Health specializes in modernizing healthcare training and support for frontline teams through its cloud-based platform within the healthcare industry. The company provides an app customized to the specific needs of hospital units, offering microlearning tools, real-time support, and digitized content to streamline training and communication. Elemeno Health's solutions are primarily tailored to the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Vulcan Cyber
cb_description: Vulcan Cyber is a company specializing in cyber risk management, providing a SaaS platform for vulnerability prioritization, risk aggregation, and remediation orchestration. The company offers a comprehensive suite of tools to manage and mitigate cyber risk across infrastructure, applications, and cloud environments. Vulcan Cyber's platform is designed to integrate with over 100 security stack components, enabling security teams to streamline their cyber risk management processes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: ClassWallet
cb_description: ClassWallet specializes in digital wallet solutions within the education and government sectors. The company offers a platform for managing purchasing and reimbursement processes, ensuring compliance and control while streamlining financial transactions. ClassWallet primarily serves sectors such as K-12 education, state agencies, and organizations managing scholarships and grants. ClassWallet was formerly known as Kleo. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Hollywood, Florida.

name: Billdr
cb_description: Billdr is a company that focuses on home renovation within the construction industry. The company offers a platform that helps homeowners plan and manage their renovation projects, providing access to architects and general contractors, and enabling management of the renovation from a digital dashboard. Billdr primarily serves the residential sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Shippabo
cb_description: Shippabo is a developer of software used to help importers manage freight and shipping, including comparing quotes from freight forwarders, filing government paperwork, and other related functions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Benchling
cb_description: Benchling is a cloud-based platform focused on biotechnology research and development within the biotech sector. The company offers a suite of software tools designed to enhance scientific data management, collaboration, and insights for R&D processes. Benchling primarily serves biotech organizations, including Fortune 500 companies, startups, and academic institutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Picsart
cb_description: Picsart operates as a mobile photo-editing application. The application offers tools for photo manipulation, freehand drawing, text, layout templates, and more. The company was formerly known as Socialin. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: StrideBio
cb_description: StrideBio is a company focused on gene therapy in the healthcare industry. It develops gene therapies for people with life-threatening diseases, leveraging its proprietary adeno-associated virus (AAV) vector engineering platform to create unique and differentiated vectors that improve upon naturally occurring AAV serotypes. The company primarily serves the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Research Triangle Park, North Carolina.

name: Certify
cb_description: Certify provides solutions for digital health companies. The company offers a network management platform that uses an application programming interface (API) agnostic system to offer real-time credentialing, monitoring, licensing, provider health plan enrollment, provider sourcing, and more enabling insurance companies and virtual care providers to manage and scale their provider networks. It primarily serves the digital healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Skipify
cb_description: Skipify focuses on streamlining the shopping experience in the e-commerce industry. The company offers a digital wallet service, known as Connected Wallet, that connects shoppers with their payment options, rewards, and points during the checkout process. This service is primarily used by merchants, financial institutions, and shoppers. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: DISQO
cb_description: DISQO is a company that focuses on customer experience (CX) in the market research and advertising measurement sectors. The company offers a platform that provides insights, agile testing, and advertising measurement products, enabling businesses to understand every customer experience and make better decisions. DISQO primarily sells to the consumer brands, ad agencies, media and publishing, and market research firms sectors. DISQO was formerly known as Active Measure. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Glendale, California.

name: TalkShopLive
cb_description: TalkShopLive develops a platform that offers live streaming and social selling services in the online retail industry. It helps individuals to sell a wide range of products online. The company primarily serves the ecommerce industry. TalkShopLive was founded in 2018 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Vitesse
cb_description: Versatile designed and built optical subsystems comprised of WDM components, optical switches and optical photo-diodes and laser arrays.

name: Portea
cb_description: Portea provides general primary healthcare services. It offers post-hospitalization care, chronic disease management, and allied services such as diagnostics and medical equipment on hire. It works with hospitals, insurance companies, and individuals to improve health outcomes by providing a continuity of care in the home setting through doctors, nurses, physiotherapists, and nursing attendants employed by itself. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: SafeGuard Privacy
cb_description: SafeGuard Privacy provides an auditable privacy compliance platform. It automates the assessment of both company and vendor compliance with privacy laws to help reduce risk, save money, and increase efficiency. SafeGuard Privacy was formerly known as SafeGuard GDPR. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Pound Ridge, New York.

name: Kasada
cb_description: Kaskada focuses on providing a streaming engine for real-time AI, operating within the data processing and artificial intelligence sectors. The company offers a platform that enables real-time aggregation, event detection, and history replay by connecting AI models to both real-time and historical data. Kaskada's solutions are designed for scale and reliability, integrating seamlessly with Python's AI/ML ecosystem and utilizing columnar data for efficient query execution. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Qure4u
cb_description: Qure4u is a company that focuses on digital health solutions within the healthcare industry. The company offers an all-in-one digital health platform that automates tasks, improves access to healthcare, optimizes workflows, and engages patients at home. The platform is primarily used by practices, clinics, hospitals, and health systems. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Bradenton, Florida.

name: Bhub
cb_description: BHub specializes in providing integrated accounting and financial solutions through technology for various businesses. The company offers a suite of services including financial management, accounting automation, tax compliance, and human resources management, all to streamline back-office operations and ensure regulatory compliance. BHub's solutions cater primarily to startups and small to medium-sized enterprises, helping them to optimize processes and reduce operational costs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Nalu Bio
cb_description: Nalu Bio operates as a biotechnology company providing a category of chemistry-based cannabinoids for the consumer and pharmaceutical markets. The company offers a proprietary, flexible chemistry platform that is setting an industry standard for purity, quality, and sustainability. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Fransisco, California.

name: Holidu
cb_description: Holidu is a travel technology company specializing in the vacation rental industry. It operates a search engine platform for comparing and booking a wide range of vacation accommodations, such as villas, apartments, and chalets. The company primarily serves the vacation rental market, offering services to both guests looking for holiday homes and hosts wanting to list their properties. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Lingvist
cb_description: Lingvist is a language learning platform that utilizes advanced artificial intelligence technology to provide language education. The company offers a suite of tools that facilitate vocabulary acquisition through smart algorithms and spaced repetition, catering to users from complete beginners to advanced learners. Lingvist's Custom Decks feature allows learners to create tailored courses based on their interests or professional needs, enhancing the relevance and applicability of the language skills acquired. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Arketa
cb_description: Arketa develops digital solutions for wellness-related services. It offers a platform that enables wellness studios to manage their businesses by offering services such as scheduling and managing group classes, one-on-one appointments, events, and retreats, as well as selling digital products and on-demand content. It primarily serves the fitness and wellness sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Thrive Causemetics
cb_description: Thrive Causemetics is a company that focuses on the beauty industry, specifically in the domain of cosmetics. The company offers a range of beauty products including makeup for eyes, face, and lips, as well as skincare products and tools. These products are designed to enhance beauty and are made with vegan, cruelty-free formulas without the use of parabens or sulfates. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Plantible Foods
cb_description: Plantible Foods is a biology company focused on developing plant-based proteins for the food industry. Their main product, Rubi Protein, is a non-allergenic and nutritious ingredient derived from the aquatic plant Lemna, intended to improve the taste and texture of various food products. The company utilizes sustainable aqua-farming methods that require minimal water and no arable land, contributing to a more sustainable food supply chain. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Marcos, California.

name: 8base
cb_description: 8base is a technology company specializing in providing a full stack low-code platform for building, running, and scaling digital products such as SaaS solutions and marketplaces. The company offers a backend-as-a-service that includes an instantly-available serverless GraphQL backend powered by AWS, along with tools for transforming ideas into digital product specifications and designs. 8base's platform is designed to cater to entrepreneurs, established companies, and digital agencies, aiming to streamline the development process from conception to deployment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: 9Fin
cb_description: 9Fin specializes in debt market intelligence, providing a comprehensive suite of data and analytics tools for financial professionals. Their platform offers AI-powered capabilities for credit analysis, market predictions, and legal risk assessment, catering to the needs of investment banks, asset managers, and law firms. The company's services include real-time news alerts, extensive financial data search and analysis, predictive analytics for capital markets, and detailed covenant analysis, all designed to enhance decision-making and competitive advantage in the finance sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Catalina Crunch
cb_description: Catalina Crunch specializes in low-carb, keto-friendly cereals and snacks within the health food sector. The company offers a variety of cereals, cookies, and crunch mixes that cater to health-conscious consumers looking for tasty yet nutritious alternatives to traditional snacks. Catalina Crunch primarily serves individuals following a ketogenic diet or those seeking healthier snack options. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bloomscape
cb_description: Bloomscape is a company that specializes in the delivery of indoor plants and provides plant care support. They offer a variety of ready-to-go houseplants, tools, and accessories to help customers maintain and enjoy their plants. The company caters to individuals looking for home decor, gifts, and green living solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: Kardome
cb_description: Kardome specializes in voice user interface technology. The company's main offerings include technology that manages speech recognition accuracy in challenging soundscapes, isolates target speech from multiple speakers, and provides voice biometrics. It primarily sells to manufacturers and original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) looking to improve their existing speech recognition systems. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv-Jaffa, Israel.

name: Sealed
cb_description: Sealed is a climate tech company specializing in home energy efficiency within the energy sector. The company offers home weatherization, HVAC project management, and smart home technology integration, all designed to reduce energy waste and improve home comfort. Sealed provides a rebate solution for contractors, facilitating the process of obtaining rebates for energy efficiency projects. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Harbinger
cb_description:
Harbinger turns the lens of mobile apps inward, providing city-specific apps that bring users closer to their community and in turn, each other. Our apps are also incredibly useful to travelers, giving them a natives eye on the city.

Our first release, Columbus - The App, has taken root in the Columbus (OH) metro community with over 1200 downloads in the past 3 months with tremendous potential as we develop relationships with local press and businesses.

name: Pecan
cb_description: Pecan provides an artificial intelligence (AI) based predictive analytics platform. It offers analytics, and data science solutions, and generates business intelligence predictions for companies and organizations. It primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce, wellness services, fast fashion retail, and high-tech manufacturing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: HappyVore
cb_description: HappyVore is a company focused on the food industry, specifically in the domain of plant-based meat alternatives. The company offers a range of products that mimic the taste and texture of meat, but are made entirely from plant-based ingredients. These products are designed to provide a satisfying and healthy alternative to traditional meat products. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Briya
cb_description: Briya focuses on healthcare and life sciences, operating in the domain of data management and research. The company offers a platform to enable real-time retrieval and sharing of harmonized longitudinal data, simplifying data discovery and access. Its global healthcare data network taps into the potential of RWE, fostering collaboration between hospitals, clinics, health systems, researchers, and life sciences organizations worldwide while upholding regulations. Through this comprehensive solution, data sharing is facilitated in real-time, enabling standardization and harmonization of longitudinal patient-level data from diverse sources and systems. It primarily serves healthcare providers, life science companies, and research institutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Kovrr
cb_description: Kovrr specializes in cyber risk quantification in cybersecurity. The company offers services that enable businesses to financially quantify their cyber risk exposure, manage cyber insurance coverage, and make informed decisions about managing cyber risk. Its solutions include cyber materiality reporting, cyber insurance analysis, cyber insurance coverage, and more. It primarily sells to sectors that require cyber risk management, such as the insurance industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: A.day
cb_description: A.day is a hands-off multi-location workforce management platform that cuts labor cost and increases employee satisfaction by enabling team members to participate in scheduling and alleviate the burden of scheduling for managers while increasing team member satisfaction.

name: DiffBlue
cb_description: DiffBlue focuses on generative AI for code within the software development industry. The company's main service is an AI-powered platform that autonomously writes Java unit tests, which helps in catching regressions. Its service primarily caters to the software development and DevOps industries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Oxford, United Kingdom.

name: Elevate
cb_description: Elevate is a Canadian non-profit organization focused on uniting innovators to address society's most pressing challenges within the technology, arts, and social innovation sectors. The organization orchestrates the Elevate Festival, offers startup accelerator programs, and hosts various events aimed at fostering diversity and inclusion in the tech industry. Elevate primarily serves the tech startup community, investors, and social innovators looking to scale their impact. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Bumpa
cb_description: Bumpa is a comprehensive business management application designed for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). The app facilitates the creation of business websites, enables the recording of sales and expenses, issues invoices and receipts, and provides financial reports, all aimed at streamlining business operations. Bumpa's platform also supports integration with social media and payment processing services to enhance business efficiency and customer engagement. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: AMOpportunities
cb_description: AMOpportunities focuses on providing clinical training experiences in the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of services including clinical training solutions and software that assist medical trainees, schools, and hospitals. Its main offerings include facilitating in-person and virtual hands-on experiences and observerships for medical trainees and providing infrastructure for universities and healthcare providers to expand clinical education. AMOpportunities was formerly known as American Medical Opportunities Worldwide. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Leap
cb_description: Leap uses artificial intelligence technology to give candidates and companies an online career platform which provides useful resources throughout the recruitment cycle. For candidates, Leap provides a free job application resource. An interactive profile can be used to demonstrate skills, personality and experience. Candidates can view detailed information and media about companies in the region  including "behind the scenes" videos  and have access to career resources including coaching and informative articles. The scoring system matches a candidate's suitability for each role.

name: Papaya Global
cb_description: Papaya Global operates as a financial technology company. The company offers a global payroll technology platform to automate payroll processes, ensuring compliance, and provides flexibility and security. It primarily serves global enterprises, helping them manage workforce spending and payments. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ramani
cb_description: Ramani focuses on capturing supply chain data. The company provides point-of-sale, inventory management, and procurement software enabling micro-distribution centers (MDCs) to track their inventory, register their customers, and record their sales transactions. It primarily serves the logistics industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.

name: Carry1st
cb_description: Carry1st focuses on mobile game publishing and digital content distribution within the gaming industry. The company develops, licenses, and publishes mobile games, and monetizes them through a proprietary fintech platform. Carry1st primarily serves the rapidly growing mobile gaming market in Africa. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Siren Biotechnology
cb_description: Siren Biotechnology focuses on developing treatments in the biotechnology sector, specifically targeting cancer. The company specializes in combining AAV gene therapy and cytokine immunotherapy into a single treatment modality aimed at solid tumor cancers, including brain and eye cancer. Siren Biotechnology primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on oncology and regenerative medicine. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ByteDance
cb_description: ByteDance operates as a technology company. It focuses on content platforms that span across commerce, content, entertainment, and enterprise services. The company offers a range of products that enable users to create, share, and engage with short-form videos and other forms of digital content. ByteDance primarily serves sectors such as online entertainment, digital advertising, and social media services. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Beijing, China.

name: Apiday
cb_description: Apiday specializes in environmental, social, and governance (ESG) data management for organizations. The company offers solutions for automated ESG reporting, compliance with regulations, and performance analytics to facilitate sustainability initiatives. Apiday primarily serves the venture capital, private equity, and enterprise sectors with its suite of ESG tools and services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Vincennes, France.

name: Artiria Medical
cb_description: Artiria Medical focuses on the medical technology sector, specifically in the domain of neurovascular care. The company develops technologies to enhance the functionality of catheters and guidewires, improving neuro-interventional procedures and improving stroke treatment. Artiria primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly neuro-interventional surgeons. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Borex, Switzerland.

name: VeriSIM Life
cb_description: VeriSIM Life is a company focused on the pharmaceutical research and development sector, with a particular emphasis on drug discovery and development technology. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence to accelerate and de-risk the process of translating drug candidates to clinical trials, predicting patient outcomes, and providing insights for pharmaceutical companies, biotechs, and academic & research institutions. Its services are primarily utilized in the pharmaceutical research and development industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: VIA
cb_description: VIA is recognized for offering solutions in the areas of legal contracts, cross-border litigation and eDiscovery, healthcare compliance, learning localization, and global product and brand management.

name: Blues Wireless
cb_description: Blues Wireless specializes in providing IoT wireless connectivity solutions across various sectors, including cellular, Wi-Fi, LoRa, and satellite. The company offers a range of products such as the Notecard series, which are developer-friendly modules designed to enable secure and low-power data communication for physical products. Additionally, Blues Wireless provides services like Notehub, a hosted service for routing Notecard data to cloud applications. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Akinon
cb_description: Akinon is a global software development company specializing in cloud-native, headless digital commerce platforms. The company offers a comprehensive suite of solutions that enable B2B and B2C businesses to create unique shopping experiences, manage orders, and operate across multiple channels seamlessly. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Cherre
cb_description: Cherre provides real estate data and insights solutions. The company offers services that allow users to connect all their real estate data, providing a single source of truth for better investment, management, and underwriting decisions. It primarily serves the real estate, insurance, and startup industries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Paradigm
cb_description: Paradigm focuses on providing software solutions. Its main offerings include software to assist in various stages of the oil and gas exploration and production process. It was founded in 1987 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: AccessPay
cb_description: AccessPay is a financial technology company specializing in payment automation and bank integration solutions for the finance and treasury sectors. The company offers a cloud-based platform that enables businesses to automate their payment processes, connect with over 16,000 banks, and enhance financial operations through features like BACS-approved software, direct debit collections, and fraud and error prevention tools. AccessPay's solutions cater to a diverse range of industries, including financial services, construction, retail, and more. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Manchester, England.

name: Dutchie
cb_description: Dutchie is a comprehensive technology platform that specializes in the cannabis retail sector, offering a suite of tools to support dispensaries. The company provides an online marketplace for cannabis products, alongside integrated solutions for point of sale, payments, and ecommerce to streamline dispensary operations. Dutchie's services cater to the needs of cannabis retailers looking to enhance their in-store and online sales capabilities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bend, Oregon.

name: Transcarent
cb_description: Transcarent is a health and care experience company that operates within the healthcare sector. It offers a platform that simplifies access to healthcare services through a personalized app and an on-demand care team, aiming to provide high-quality, affordable, and appropriate care. The company primarily serves employers and consultants, providing a comprehensive healthcare solution that integrates with existing benefits programs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: CollX
cb_description: CollX offers a mobile application that provides valuation and trading services for collectible cards within the collectibles industry. The app allows users to scan their sports and trading cards to identify and receive current market valuations, manage their collections, and engage in buying, selling, grading, and trading with other collectors. CollX caters to individual collectors and professional card sellers, offering features like bulk scanning and business inventory management. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Haddonfield, New Jersey.

name: PrimaryBid
cb_description: PrimaryBid is a capital markets technology platform that specializes in democratizing access to public market investments. The company provides solutions that enable individual investors to participate in Initial public offers and public company fundraises alongside institutional investors. PrimaryBid primarily serves individual investors looking to engage in public equity offerings. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Homebase
cb_description: Homebase provides a real estate syndication CRM and admin platform. It offers a suite of tools to simplify deal administration and investor relations for real estate syndications. The platform serves real estate fund managers and syndicators to streamline their operations. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Arch Systems
cb_description: Arch Systems is a company focused on providing Industrial IoT solutions and AI-driven insights for the manufacturing sector. The company offers products and services that enable the collection and analysis of machine data to drive operational improvements and optimize manufacturing processes. Arch Systems primarily serves the manufacturing industry, offering solutions such as retrofitting legacy machines for cloud connectivity, tracking machine utilization and performance, and implementing predictive maintenance. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Big Cabal Media
cb_description: Big Cabal Media is the media company responsible for online like TechCabal, Zikoko and Radar. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Lodgify
cb_description: Lodgify specializes in vacation rental software solutions, catering to property owners and managers in the hospitality sector. The company offers a suite of tools for creating websites with booking capabilities, managing reservations, and synchronizing listings across various platforms. Lodgify primarily serves individual hosts and property managers across different accommodation types, including bed & breakfasts, cabins, resorts, and villas. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Rugby, United Kingdom.

name: Cigent
cb_description: Cigent is a company that focuses on data security in the technology sector. The company offers solutions to prevent ransomware and data theft, and to ensure compliance, by embedding prevention-based defenses into storage and individual files. These solutions include making data invisible and inaccessible to unauthorized users, protecting data with multi-factor authentication, and offering secure file sharing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Fort Myers, Florida.

name: Strapi
cb_description: Strapi provides an open-source headless content management system (CMS) to manage content and distribute it anywhere. Its product gives developers the freedom to use their favorite tools and frameworks while allowing editors to easily manage their content and distribute it anywhere. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Yellowdig
cb_description: Yellowdig specializes in helping student engagement through an online learning platform. Its main offerings include building active learning communities for various educational programs and providing tools for learner retention and academic burnout reduction. Its platform is designed to work with existing Learning Management Systems. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: FloorFound
cb_description: FloorFound focuses on the e-commerce sector, specifically dealing with oversized items. The company provides an end-to-end platform that manages the entire process of item pickup, intake, inspection, merchandising, selling, and delivery, aiming to turn liabilities into new revenue. The primary customers are brands in the e-commerce industry, particularly those dealing with large or oversized items. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Nearthlab
cb_description: Nearthlab is a company focused on providing autonomous drone solutions for the wind power industry. Its main offerings include AI-powered drone inspections for wind turbine blades and a cloud-based analytics platform for defect tracking and management. The company primarily serves sectors that require industrial-level inspection and monitoring, such as the wind energy sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Maude
cb_description: Maude operates a modern sexual wellness company operating in the health and wellness industry. The company offers a range of products including sexual wellness essentials, skin care products, supplements, and scents. These products are designed to promote intimacy and are made for all bodies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Double
cb_description: Double specializes in conversion and enrichment using artificial intelligence (AI) in sales and marketing. The company offers a platform that automates the research and qualification of leads by utilizing AI to gather and analyze information from the web. Double primarily serves the sales and marketing sectors, providing tools for generation and conversion processes. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Cymulate
cb_description: Cymulate specializes in security posture management in cybersecurity. The company offers a platform that provides threat intelligence-led risk assessments, enabling security professionals to continuously challenge, validate, and optimize their cybersecurity posture. The platform also allows for the creation and automation of red and purple teaming by generating penetration scenarios and advanced attack campaigns tailored to unique environments and security policies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Pepper
cb_description: Pepper is a company that focuses on developing software solutions for the hospitality industry. The company's main offerings include digital ordering, loyalty programs, and payment solutions that aim to streamline service and increase profitability for businesses such as restaurants, pubs, bars, and coffee shops. Primarily, Pepper sells to the hospitality sector, including the restaurant and quick service restaurant industry, pubs and bars, and coffee shops. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Super!
cb_description: Super! is a performing arts company specializing in music events and artist representation. The company's main services include concert and festival production, artist touring, event programming, and event production. Super! primarily caters to the music entertainment industry, working with a wide range of international artists and producing notable events such as the Pitchfork Music Festival Paris. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Knowify
cb_description: Knowify is a company that specializes in construction management software for the contracting business sector. Its platform offers a suite of tools for project budgeting, job costing, project management, scheduling, and invoicing, designed to streamline operations for trade contractors and remodelers. Knowify's software is tailored to improve project workflow and integrates seamlessly with QuickBooks for financial management. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ForwardLane
cb_description: ForwardLane focuses on financial data analytics and artificial intelligence (AI), operating within the financial technology sector. The company provides AI-driven insights and tools for client engagement prioritization, automated communications, and personalized investment strategies. ForwardLane primarily serves professionals in asset management, wealth management, and insurance industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Paro
cb_description: On May 24th, 2022, Paro was acquired by Renewi. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed. Paro specializes in processing construction and industrial waste. It was founded in 2004 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: accuRx
cb_description: AccuRx is a company focused on improving communication in healthcare through its technology platform. The company's main service is a software platform that facilitates communication between patients and healthcare professionals, aiming to make healthcare delivery more efficient and effective. AccuRx primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: dumpling
