cb_description: Dumpling is a company that focuses on providing tools and technology in the grocery delivery sector. The company offers services such as vacation grocery delivery, branded ordering and fulfillment services for vacation rental companies, resorts, and concierge businesses, and personal grocery delivery tools. The company primarily sells to the vacation rental industry, the resort industry, and the concierge industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Cerevance
cb_description: Cerevance operates as a pharmaceutical company. It focuses on developing precision therapies for central nervous system (CNS) disorders. The company leverages its proprietary nuclear-enriched transcript sort sequencing (NETSseq) platform to identify novel targets and develop symptomatic and disease-modifying treatments. Cerevance's pipeline includes therapies for conditions such as Parkinson's disease, Alzheimer's disease, and schizophrenia. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Dreamdata
cb_description: Dreamdata is a B2B revenue attribution platform that operates in the data analytics and marketing technology sector. The company provides a solution that collects, models, and analyzes go-to-market data to offer insights into customer journeys, measure marketing ROI, and reveal buying signals, thereby enabling businesses to optimize their sales and marketing strategies. Dreamdata's services cater primarily to small to midsize B2B companies seeking to align their marketing and sales efforts with revenue generation. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Carv
cb_description: Carv is a company focused on enhancing ski technique through wearable technology in the sports industry. It offers a smart insert that fits into ski boots to analyze motion and pressure, providing real-time audio coaching and detailed technique feedback to skiers. Carv primarily serves the sports and recreation sector, with products aimed at casual, advanced, and professional skiers seeking to improve their skills. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: VOW
cb_description: Vow is a company focused on the development of cultured meat, operating within the food technology and sustainable agriculture sectors. The company's main offering is the production of unique and sustainable meat products, created directly from animal cells, providing a nutritious and environmentally friendly alternative to traditional farming methods. Vow primarily serves the food industry with its innovative approach to meat production. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Plaid
cb_description: Plaid is a technology company focused on maximizing human value through data. The company offers a customer experience platform, KARTE, and various services such as CX strategy design, organizational development, DX support, and digital marketing efficiency tools. Plaid's products are primarily aimed at enhancing service experiences across various industries. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Senseye
cb_description: Senseye is a company focused on mental health diagnostics within the healthcare sector. Their main offering is a diagnostic platform that utilizes smartphone technology to identify PTSD and other mental health conditions by analyzing disruptions in the sympathetic nervous system through the eyes. Senseye's platform is designed to provide clinicians with fast, accurate tools for establishing a clear baseline and tracking patient outcomes over time, without the need for specialized equipment. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Tiamat Sciences
cb_description: Tiamat Sciences is a life sciences company focused on leveraging plant-based platforms to revolutionize reagent production in the biotech sector. The company specializes in growing next-generation proteins, including growth factors, cytokines, enzymes, and high-value, animal-free proteins, aimed at enhancing the development of innovative therapies and supporting research across healthcare and medicine. Tiamat Sciences primarily serves the pharmaceutical industry, with applications in cell therapy, vaccines, and mRNA technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Minerva
cb_description: MInerva is an independent trust company headquartered in Jersey. It provides private client, corporate, fund and treasury services to locations in Europe, Africa, the Middle East, and Asia.

name: Moesif
cb_description: Moesif develops a debugging and error analysis platform. The company offers a platform that provides application programming interface (API) analytics, monitoring, and billing services, enabling businesses to understand and monetize their API usage. It primarily serves sectors such as financial technology, health technology, logistics, and enterprise software. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sova
cb_description: Sova specializes in talent assessment technology within the human resources sector. The company offers a suite of digital tools for evaluating candidates, including comprehensive assessments, video interviews, virtual assessment centers, and interview management systems. Sova's platform primarily serves sectors that require volume hiring, such as retail, financial services, public sector, and professional services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Lapse
cb_description: Lapse operates as a social media platform focused on privacy and authentic sharing within the domain of digital photography. The platform offers an app that transforms an iPhone into a disposable camera experience, coupled with a private photo journal for sharing memories with friends. It primarily serves individuals seeking a more personal and secure social media experience without the pressures of public likes and followers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Milton Keynes, United Kingdom.

name: Pulppo
cb_description: Pulppo is a real estate accelerator that focuses on enhancing and professionalizing the services of real estate agencies and advisors. The company offers a platform for buying, selling, and renting properties, as well as exclusive property listings, supported by a network of professional brokers. Pulppo also provides technology, consultancy, and marketing to streamline the professional lives of real estate brokers. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Fabric
cb_description: Fabric is a new app that allows its community to build want-to lists for entertainment and lifestyle activities by browsing through hundreds of curated packs. The current product covers movies, TV, music, and travel and is expanding its coverage to additional categories.

name: Strata Identity
cb_description: Strata Identity develops identity modernization and orchestration solutions for hybrid and multi-cloud services. It offers an identity fabric that helps customers secure, modernize, orchestrate, and analyze fragmented identity infrastructure. It provides Maverics, a distributed identity orchestration platform enabling organizations to adopt modern cloud identity systems without the need to rewrite applications. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Bankjoy
cb_description: Bankjoy is a company that specializes in providing digital banking solutions for banks and credit unions. Their services include mobile and online banking, online account opening, online loan applications, and a conversational AI chatbot designed to enhance the user experience. The company primarily caters to the financial services sector, offering technology that enables credit unions and community banks to operate digitally and efficiently. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Royal Oak, Michigan.

name: Collective Intelligence
cb_description: Collective Intelligence operates as a provider of a software platform for creating marketing content in real-time. The company provides a software-as-a-service (SaaS) site for developing crowd-sourcing marketing content. The objective is to offer applications for employees in marketing departments to categorize ideas, build content, and deploy projects strategically based on feedback from other departments during the development process. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lakewood, Colorado.

name: RealWorld
cb_description: RealWorld focuses on developing quality accounting and business solutions for a wide variety of businesses. The company offers accounting software solutions for all major single- and multi-user operating systems. The company's software applications are used in a wide variety of businesses, including advertising agencies, medical and law offices, banks, government services, restaurants, and more. It was founded in 1980 and is based in Manchester, New Hampshire.

name: Payrails
cb_description: Payrails is a financial technology company specializing in payment processing and financial services for high-growth businesses. The company offers a ledger-based operating system (OS), payrails OS, which enables enterprises to build, operate, and scale payment acceptance and embed financial services. Payrails primarily serve sectors that require robust payment solutions, such as marketplaces and software-as-a-service (SaaS) products. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Andrena
cb_description: Andrena is a company focused on providing high-speed internet services. They offer affordable internet plans with speeds up to 1 Gbps, emphasizing simplicity, security, and quick setup without installation requirements. The company primarily serves residential customers and buildings seeking reliable internet connectivity. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lemon Perfect
cb_description: Lemon Perfect is a company focused on the beverage industry, specifically in the domain of flavored hydration products. The company offers a variety of flavored lemon waters, designed to provide a refreshing and healthy alternative to traditional beverages. These drinks are made by infusing water with the juice of half an organic lemon and other natural flavors, resulting in a product that is full of flavor but low in sugar. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Nutri & Co
cb_description: Nutri & Co is a company that focuses on the nutraceutical industry. The company offers natural products with pure and active ingredients that serve as alternatives to traditional dietary supplements. These products are designed to support various aspects of health, including immunity, stress management, sleep, energy, and beauty. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Aix-en-Provence, France.

name: ShareChat
cb_description: ShareChat is a social media platform focused on content sharing and networking in multiple Indic languages. The platform allows users to share videos, images, and messages in various regional languages, catering to a diverse user base. ShareChat primarily serves the social media and entertainment sectors by enabling users to engage with content that resonates with their cultural and linguistic preferences. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: ForeVR Games
cb_description: ForeVR Games is a gaming company focused on creating virtual reality experiences based on popular real-life games. They offer a range of VR games that simulate activities such as bowling, darts, cornhole, and pool, allowing users to engage in these activities in an immersive virtual environment. The company targets the consumer gaming market, particularly users of VR platforms like Meta Quest, Steam VR, and PSVR2. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: BeyondMath
cb_description: BeyondMath specializes in AI-driven numerical simulation within the engineering and design sectors. The company offers services that enable rapid assessment and optimization of designs using AI-based physics simulations, eliminating the need for physical prototypes and extensive supercomputing resources. BeyondMath's solutions are tailored to incorporate real-world data, enhancing the accuracy and reliability of simulations for clients in various industries. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: Pathios Therapeutics
cb_description: Pathios Therapeutics provides biotechnology solutions. It focuses on oncology and immunology, targeting the GPR65 receptor to transform cancer treatment. The company develops therapies that inhibit the GPR65 receptor to counteract the immunosuppressive effects of acidic tumor microenvironments in solid tumors. Its approach is designed for the existing cancer immunotherapies by addressing the root cause of immune cell dysfunction within tumors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Abingdon, United Kingdom.

name: Roboflow
cb_description: Roboflow specializes in computer vision technology within the software-as-a-service domain. The company offers a platform that enables users to manage image data, annotate and label datasets, apply preprocessing and augmentations, convert annotation file formats, and train a computer vision mode. It primarily serves the software industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Des Moines, Iowa.

name: autone
cb_description: autone specializes in inventory management within the retail sector, leveraging AI to improve supply chain efficiency. The company offers a platform that provides inventory forecasting, market trend analysis, and AI-driven recommendations to optimize stock levels and decision-making processes. It primarily serves the fashion and apparel, accessories, beauty and cosmetic, sport and outdoor, and furniture and home industries with its inventory management solutions. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Ontop
cb_description: Ontop is a company specializing in multi-country payroll and HR solutions within the global employment and financial services sectors. The company offers a platform for onboarding, payroll, and compliance management, facilitating the hiring and payment of international talent. Ontop provides financial services that enable remote workers to receive payments in US dollars, simplifying the process for both employers and employees. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Traefik Labs
cb_description: Traefik Labs provides solutions for application connectivity and application programming interface (API) management in the cloud-native architecture sector. The company offers a range of products that accelerate API lifecycle management, act as a single entry point for microservices deployments, and provide traffic management solutions. Its products primarily cater to the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lyon, France.

name: Fashinza
cb_description: Fashinza is a tech-enabled manufacturing platform specializing in the apparel industry, offering a range of services from design to delivery. The company provides end-to-end production management for brands, leveraging AI for supplier matching and ensuring transparency and efficiency in the supply chain. Fashinza caters primarily to the fashion and retail sectors, offering solutions for womenswear, activewear, menswear, and kidswear. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Companion
cb_description: Companion specializes in AI-powered enrichment and training solutions for dogs within the animal technology sector. The company offers an innovative device that uses computer vision, a precision treat launcher, and various sensors to interact with and train dogs, alongside an app for owners to track progress and customize experiences. Companion's products are primarily designed for dog owners seeking to improve their pets' mental and physical well-being. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Waymark
cb_description: Waymark is a company that focuses on artificial intelligence (AI) in the video production industry. The company's main service is an AI video creator that automatically generates personalized commercials and spec spots based on a single prompt, making it easy and quick for users to create high-impact ads. The primary sectors that Waymark sells to include the media industry, sales industry, and advertising agencies. Waymark was formerly known as Stik. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: Azuro
cb_description: Azuro is an electronic design automation (EDA) software company that aims to deliver design tools that reduce the power consumption of digital chips. Azuro's software aims to allow electronics companies around the world to offer more talk time, play time and functionality in mobile phones and wireless devices.

name: Breadboard
cb_description: Breadboard specializes in automating the electronics supply chain, focusing on streamlining the sourcing and procurement processes for the electronics manufacturing industry. The company offers a platform that facilitates real-time bill of materials (BOM) analysis, automated request for quotation (RFQ) management, and optimized component allocation, leveraging a comprehensive database and AI to improve decision-making and efficiency. Breadboard's solutions are designed to serve the electronics manufacturing sector by reducing the time and effort required for sourcing electronic components and managing supplier negotiations. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Eksab
cb_description: Eksab operates as an online platform focusing on providing interactive football-related games and challenges. The company offers a variety of games where participants can predict game scores, engage in tactics and trivia, and compete for cash and other prizes. Eksab primarily caters to football fans looking for an engaging and competitive online experience. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Wowzi
cb_description: Wowzi specializes in connecting brands with African creators for marketing and advertising campaigns. The company offers a suite of tools to automate creator marketing workflows, manage influencer campaigns, and provide analytics for performance tracking. Its platform serves various sectors including advertising, development, research, and more, by facilitating scalable engagement with creators to deliver targeted messaging and insights. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Style3D
cb_description: Style3D specializes in digital fashion software and platforms, focusing on the fashion and sustainability sectors. The company provides solutions for 3D garment modeling, digital fabric creation, and cloud-based asset management, designed to enhance the efficiency and creativity of fashion design. Style3D's offerings cater to various sectors including brands, manufacturers, fabric suppliers, and educational institutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Shanghai, Shanghai.

name: xplore
cb_description: Xplore is a company focused on data management and analysis within the technology sector. It offers a self-serve data discovery platform that allows users to find, visualize, and interact with enterprise data. The platform primarily serves sectors that require robust data management and analysis capabilities, such as finance, healthcare, and retail. It is based in Herzeliya, Israel.

name: Veerum
cb_description: Veerum is a global software provider specializing in visual asset management within various capital-intensive industries. The company's main offerings include digital twin technology that enables users to create and manage visualizations of physical assets, and a cloud-based platform for storing and managing 3D data. Veerum's solutions cater to sectors such as mining, oil and gas, heavy industry construction, petrochemicals, power and utilities, and more. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: GrowthSpace
cb_description: GrowthSpace specializes in talent development in human resources. It offers services such as one-on-one coaching and mentoring, team coaching, cohort-based workshops, and internal mentoring aimed at managing employee and team performance, reducing attrition, increasing employee engagement, and supporting organizational change. It primarily serves the sectors that require robust employee development programs, such as the technology industry and large corporations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Iyris
cb_description: Iyris focuses on adaptive agroclimatic technology within the agriculture science and technology sector. Its main offerings include solutions for mitigating the harmful effects of radiation on crops and improving performance in hydroponic systems by reducing energy and fertigation costs. The company primarily serves growers in hot climate territories seeking sustainable agriculture practices. Iyris was formerly known as RedSea. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

name: VideoElephant
cb_description: VideoElephant is a company specializing in video content aggregation and distribution within the digital media sector. It offers a comprehensive video library and content distribution network, providing services such as content licensing, discovery, curation, and delivery solutions for various platforms. The company primarily serves businesses looking to engage audiences through video content, including publishers, streaming platforms, and retail media. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: PartnerStack
cb_description: PartnerStack is a comprehensive partner ecosystem platform focused on enabling companies to build, manage, and scale channel partner programs. The company provides a suite of tools for automating partner recruitment, activation, tracking, commissioning, and performance optimization. PartnerStack primarily serves the software as a service (SaaS) industry, helping businesses to leverage partnerships for growth and revenue expansion. PartnerStack was formerly known as GrowSumo. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Workable
cb_description: Workable specializing in recruiting software and talent acquisition within the human resource (HR) technology sector. Its main offerings include an applicant tracking system with built-in artificial intelligence (AI) sourcing to streamline the hiring process and a configurable human resources information system (HRIS) platform for employee management. The company primarily serves sectors that require recruiting and HR management tools, such as technology, healthcare, and retail industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Norwood, Massachusetts.

name: Loupe
cb_description: Loupe offers a skill-based career-matching app.

name: Breakr
cb_description:
Breakr is mobile application that allows users to join break rooms nearby based on their location and chat with the collective through shared experiences anonymously.

 - No Logins
 - No Passwords
 - Pure Anonymously and Ephemeral Chat in Real Time. 

Breakr is social truth serum in real-time. Trade thoughts, ask questions or just shoot the shit. Say Something

name: Enstack
cb_description: Enstack is a company focused on providing an AI-powered omnichannel platform for entrepreneurs within the e-commerce sector. The company offers a suite of tools that enable businesses to manage inventory, process payments across multiple channels, and handle shipping logistics. Enstack's solutions cater to small and medium-sized enterprises looking to sell both online and offline. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Taguig City, Philippines.

name: Tigeraire
cb_description: Tigeraire specializes in airflow acceleration technology for protective headgear in the industrial and sports sectors. The company offers products that provide cooling airflow for helmets and hard hats, enhancing comfort and safety for active individuals. Tigeraire primarily serves the industrial safety market and the sports equipment industry with its innovative cooling solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Richmond, Virginia.

name: GelSight
cb_description: GelSight specializes in three-dimensional (3D) tactile sensing technology within the metrology and robotics sectors. The company offers tactile sensors that provide detailed surface analysis, enabling precise measurements and object manipulation. GelSight's technology serves various industries, including aerospace, automotive, robotics, and more, with applications in metrology and tactile robotics. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: PowerToFly
cb_description: PowerToFly is a company focused on promoting economic equality by upskilling and connecting underrepresented talent, operating within the employment and education sectors. The company offers services such as hosting free live virtual events, providing career advice, and featuring a job board with open remote, hybrid, and in-person roles. PowerToFly primarily serves the employment industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Profluent
cb_description: Profluent focuses on integrating artificial intelligence with biology, operating in the biotechnology and AI sectors. They develop machine learning models that interpret and manipulate biomolecules for applications in human health and various industries. The company's technology is aimed at advancing protein design to address complex biological challenges. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Prima
cb_description: Prima provides commodity markets research services. It develops proprietary pricing software that offers a range of price assessment services that include benchmarks for markets in renewable commodities. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in London, U.K. In November 2022, Prima was acquired by ResourceWise. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Postscript
cb_description: Postscript develops an e-commerce short message service (SMS) platform enabling brands to communicate and engage with customers through text message marketing. It enables to overcome declining email engagement by sending customers targeted customizable short message service (SMS) marketing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Clare
cb_description: Clare is an online retailer specializing in home painting solutions within the home improvement industry. The company offers a range of products including zero VOC interior paint, exterior paint, and painting supplies, all designed to simplify the painting process for consumers. Clare's products are aimed at homeowners looking to refresh their living spaces with high-quality, environmentally friendly paint options. It is based in New York, New York.

name: TravelNest
cb_description: TravelNest is a company that operates in the vacation rental industry, providing a comprehensive platform for managing rental properties. The company offers services that streamline the process of listing, booking, and managing vacation rentals, including features such as smart pricing, guest messaging, and a management dashboard. It also provides global exposure for properties by listing them on over 30 top travel sites. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Edinburgh, Scotland.

name: Lunio
cb_description: Lunio specializes in cloud solutions. The company provides cloud computing services that include public and private cloud infrastructure, desktop virtualization, and cybersecurity measures such as firewalls and vulnerability management. Lunio also delivers IT monitoring, consulting, and management services. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Recife, Brazil.

name: Assembled
cb_description: Assembled focuses on support operations, operating within the workforce management and customer support industry. The company offers a range of services including workforce and vendor management, scheduling, short-term forecasting, real-time management, performance and metrics management, and quality assurance. These services are designed to help companies make optimal staffing decisions, gain visibility into performance and productivity, and improve their support operations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: HIVED
cb_description: HIVED is a parcel delivery company that operates within the retail sector. The company provides a delivery service that includes live tracking, customer service, and delivery options. HIVED serves the ecommerce industry, offering solutions that focus on the purchase journey and customer loyalty. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Abode
cb_description: Abode, also known as Moved, specializes in streamlining the resident onboarding process for the multifamily real estate sector. The company offers a platform that automates move-ins, provides a property-branded portal for residents, and facilitates a hospitality-driven experience to enhance customer satisfaction and drive ancillary revenue for property managers. While primarily serving the multifamily real estate industry, Moved's solutions are designed to improve efficiency for property management teams and to offer a seamless move-in experience for residents. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Turion Space
cb_description: Turion Space focuses on building the servicing infrastructure for a resilient space domain within the aerospace industry. The company's main offerings include satellites equipped with sensors for space situational awareness and surveillance, as well as services aimed at minimizing space debris and managing non-maneuverable objects in orbit. Turion Space also explores the potential for asteroid resource utilization as part of its long-term vision for extending mankind's reach into the solar system. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: COVU
cb_description: COVU provides AI-enabled operations outsourcing for the insurance industry. The company supplies licensed staff support, market access, and technology solutions including AI-powered CRM and marketing tools, as well as consulting to assist with agency growth and customer retention. Its services are designed for insurance agencies of various sizes and lines of business. COVU was formerly known as Vero Intelligence. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Sagetap
cb_description: Sagetap is a company that specializes in B2B SaaS discovery, providing a platform for technology buyers to connect with software vendors. The company offers AI-powered product recommendations, a feature for anonymity to avoid unwanted sales follow-ups, and tools for organizing vendor discovery processes. Sagetap primarily serves technology executives and professionals looking to streamline their vendor evaluation and discovery efforts. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Gardenuity
cb_description: Gardenuity provides home gardening solutions. It offers natural, non-genetically modified organism (GMO) garden components aligned to fit the landscape, season and preferences of customers. Gardenuity caters to individuals and organizations in healthcare, insurance, technology and more industries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: Verisart
cb_description: Verisart is a company that focuses on the use of web3 and blockchain technology in the art industry. The company offers a platform that enables creators to certify their creations, mint and sell NFTs, and connect with their community. Verisart primarily serves the art, fashion, and music industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: FOSSA
cb_description: FOSSA specializes in open-source risk management within the software industry. The company offers solutions for license scanning, compliance automation, and vulnerability management to ensure secure and compliant software development. FOSSA primarily serves sectors that require robust open source compliance and security measures, such as the healthcare and federal sectors with Food and Drug Administration and Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program (FedRAMP)compliance needs. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Flexcar
cb_description: Flexcar is a car-as-a-service company. It offers ready-made cars in excellent condition from Greek dealerships. It offers a wide variety of popular makes and models to match customers needs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: idwall
cb_description: idwall is a company focused on digital identity within the enterprise market. They provide a comprehensive digital identity management solution that integrates the entire customer lifecycle, ensuring increased security, improved user experience, and scalable processes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Quartzy
cb_description: Quartzy is a company focused on providing a cloud-based lab management platform for the life sciences sector. The company offers services that include tracking lab inventory, streamlining order workflows, and facilitating the procurement and shopping of over 10 million scientific products. Quartzy's platform is designed to digitize lab workflows, reduce time to market, and enhance operational efficiency for life sciences organizations. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Hayward, California.

name: Datagen
cb_description: Datagen develops a data-as-a-service (DaaS) platform. It creates customized, photorealistic, synthetic visual data to train neural networks. The company primarily serves industries such as automotive, security, office technology, fitness, cosmetics, and facial recognition applications. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Laiye
cb_description: Laiye specializes in intelligent automation and work execution systems within the technology sector. The company offers a unified platform that integrates tools such as intelligent document processing, conversational AI, and process automation to optimize digital tasks and workforce efficiency. Laiye serves various industries, including retail, travel and transportation, logistics, finance and insurance, and healthcare. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: WizeHire
cb_description: WizeHire is a company that focuses on providing an end-to-end hiring platform in the human resources and recruitment industry. The company offers services such as an intuitive applicant tracking system, hiring experts, and resources like research-driven screening methodologies, industry-optimized job templates, and onboarding integrations. WizeHire primarily serves a wide variety of industries including accommodations, automotive, dental, fitness, food services, home services, insurance, legal, mortgage, and real estate. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Royersford, Pennsylvania.

name: Grid
cb_description: Grid is a sandbox for ideas.

name: Molekule
cb_description: Molekule (NASDAQ: MKUL) operates as an air purification company. It develops a molecular air purifier that utilizes photoelectrochemical oxidation (PECO) nanotechnology and machine learning to destroy viruses, bacteria, mold, and other pollutants. It was formerly known as Transformair. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California. In October 2023, Molekule filed for bankruptcy.

name: Wagely
cb_description: Wagely is a financial wellness platform operating in the employee benefits sector. The company provides a service that allows employees to gain visibility into their daily earnings, access their earned wages instantly, and utilize tools for financial planning. Wagely primarily serves businesses looking to improve employee financial health, retention, and savings. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: ImmPACT Bio
cb_description: ImmPACT Bio engages in the development of cell therapies within the biotechnology sector. Its offerings include bispecific chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) T cells designed to prevent antigen escape, target the immunosuppressive tumor microenvironment, and potentially help cure autoimmune diseases. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in West Hills, California.

name: Swimlane
cb_description: Swimlane is a leader in AI-enabled, low-code security automation within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a cloud-scale platform that unifies security operations across various sectors, streamlining processes and enhancing threat detection and response capabilities. Swimlane primarily serves industries such as banking, finance, insurance, healthcare, energy, utilities, government, education, and retail with its security automation solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Louisville, Colorado.

name: Projector
cb_description:
Projector has undertaken the challenge of fixing notifications on mobile platforms from intrusive and obnoxious banners to adaptive, intelligent alerts that are uniquely tailored to each user's specific needs and preferences. Combining machine learning, rules-based engines and a resilient back-end platform, Projector enables developers to add intelligent notifications to their Android and iOS apps through an easy-to-use SDK and robust APIs.

On November 9th, 2021, Projector was acquired by Medium. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Prolific
cb_description:
Prolific is a developer of IC design optimization software tools that reduce development time and improve the performance of cell-based designs.

In November 2011, Prolific was acquired by ARM Holdings. The valuation of Prolific was undisclosed. Other terms of the deal were not released.

name: Talent.ly
cb_description: Talent.ly operates as an online marketplace for buying and selling online businesses, websites, and apps across various sectors. The company facilitates transactions of digital assets including domain names and provides services such as business valuation, due diligence, legal assistance, and financing options. Talent.ly serves a diverse clientele, including individual entrepreneurs, investors, and companies looking to acquire or divest digital properties and online businesses. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Imubit
cb_description: Imubit specializes in AI process optimization for the hydrocarbon processing industry. The company offers a Closed Loop Neural Network Platform that leverages deep learning process control to enhance profitability, energy efficiency, and sustainability in refineries and chemical plants. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Channable
cb_description: Channable provides an online marketing tool for retailers, marketers, and web shops. It allows users to display and compare products on shopping websites, marketplaces, and affiliate networks. The product information is downloaded via a data feed or plug-in and then optimized using rule-based actions in order for the feed to comply with the specifications of the desired platform. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Utrecht, Netherlands.

name: Thrive Market
cb_description: Thrive Market is an online retailer specializing in organic and non-GMO groceries and sustainable products. The company offers a wide range of items including healthy snacks, cruelty-free beauty products, and eco-friendly cleaning supplies, catering to various dietary and lifestyle needs. Thrive Market operates on a membership model, providing discounted prices on high-quality goods and sponsoring memberships for families in need through their Thrive Gives initiative. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Astrotalk
cb_description: Astrotalk operates a digital platform offering astrological services and consultations in the personal services industry. The company provides personalized horoscope predictions, kundli matching, and various astrological consultations through a network of verified astrologers. Astrotalk primarily caters to individuals seeking guidance on personal matters such as career, relationships, and life decisions through astrology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Noida, India.

name: Pathrise
cb_description: Pathrise is an online program that focuses on the tech industry. The company offers 1-on-1 mentorship, training, and advice to help individuals land jobs in various sectors such as software engineering, product design, data, marketing, and sales & customer success. Pathrise primarily serves the tech industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Skello
cb_description: Skello is a social trading platform to use knowledge, predict the future, and earn money. Users can also create their own opinions and challenge others. Skello was founded in 2022 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Brew
cb_description: Brew develops a strategic marketing platform. The company offers a Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform that provides marketing teams with a comprehensive view of their competitors, market insights, benchmarks, and data breakdowns, as well as AI-generated content for various channels. Brew primarily serves the marketing industry. It was formerly known as Ever There. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Rezilient
cb_description: Rezilient provides healthcare services. It combines telehealth services with in-person care capabilities. The company offers primary and urgent care services, accessible through both virtual and physical examinations, including labs and imaging. It provides individuals and families with convenient healthcare solutions. Rezilient was formerly known as DynamicSurgical. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Quantum-Systems
cb_description: Quantum-Systems is a company that focuses on the development and deployment of drone technology within the unmanned aerial systems (UAS) sector. The company offers small unmanned aircraft systems (sUAS) equipped with electric vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) capabilities, automatic transitioning, and artificial intelligence (AI) edge computing. Quantum-Systems primarily serves the commercial and government sectors, providing solutions for aerial intelligence, surveillance, reconnaissance, and GIS mapping. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Moorpark, California.

name: Solaris
cb_description: Solaris specializes in the development and sales of soft robotics utilizing artificial muscles within the robotics industry. The company offers solutions such as a peristaltic pump robot for high-viscosity fluid transport, an earthworm-like robot for pipe inspection and cleaning, and an upper arm assist device without the need for batteries. Solaris primarily serves sectors that require innovative maintenance and support solutions for infrastructure and industrial applications. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Rayon
cb_description: Rayon is a company focused on architectural design software, specifically for collaborative space planning. Its main product allows users to draw floor plans in a multiplayer environment, facilitating faster project completion and teamwork. Rayon's software supports various file formats for import and export, such as AutoCAD Drawing file, drawing exchange format, and portable document format, and offers advanced editing tools, block libraries, and cloud-based collaboration features. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Axiom
cb_description: Axiom is a company that focuses on data management in the technology sector. The company offers a serverless log management solution that enables the ingestion of large volumes of data with high efficiency, and provides tools for querying, visualizing, and extracting insights from this data. It primarily serves developers and organizations in the technology industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Xona Systems
cb_description: Xona Systems is a technology company that focuses on providing secure user access to operational technology and critical systems. The company offers a user access platform that is designed to provide secure control of operational technology from any location or device, using proprietary protocol isolation and zero-trust architecture to eliminate common attack vectors. Xona Systems primarily serves sectors such as energy, oil and gas, manufacturing, and government. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Hanover, Maryland.

name: Full Harvest
cb_description: Full Harvest operates as a B2B marketplace within the agriculture sector, focusing on connecting commercial buyers directly to farms for the purchase of all grades of produce. The company's platform facilitates the sale of USDA Grade 1, surplus, and imperfect produce, aiming to streamline the procurement process and reduce food waste. Full Harvest also offers Innovation Services to assist in developing new consumer packaged goods and sustainable supply chains, targeting the reduction of CO2 emissions and water usage while providing additional revenue streams for farmers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: JIA
cb_description: JIA is a global benefits partner specializing in remote work solutions for the enterprise sector. The company offers services that assist businesses in hiring, managing, and retaining talent, as well as enabling individuals to live and work from anywhere. JIA primarily serves top businesses and individuals who are part of the work-from-anywhere movement. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Hong Kong.

name: Modulate
cb_description: Modulate is a company focused on combating toxic online behavior within the gaming industry. Its main offering, ToxMod, is an AI-driven solution that moderates voice chat to create safer and more inclusive gaming experiences. Modulate also assists game studios with compliance and regulatory needs, providing services such as code of conduct audits and player behavior insights. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Justo
cb_description: Justo serves as a digital supermarket that operates without physical stores, focusing on delivering grocery items. The company offers products including fresh fruits and vegetables, meats, pantry staples, cleaning supplies, alcoholic beverages, personal care items, and pet products, delivered to customers' homes. Justo primarily serves individual consumers seeking online grocery shopping and delivery services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Cellarity
cb_description: Cellarity is a company focused on redesigning the process of drug creation, operating in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industry. The company's main service involves the development of medicines by shifting the focus from a single molecular target to the underlying cellular dysfunction, leveraging a deep understanding of disease biology. This approach allows them to address a wide array of diseases, including those in metabolic disease, hematology, and immuno-oncology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: MATRIXX Software
cb_description: MATRIXX Software specializes in converged charging and digital monetization solutions within the telecommunications industry. The company offers a cloud-native platform that enables service providers to rapidly configure, deploy, and monetize personalized offerings, with a focus on real-time customer engagement and revenue generation. MATRIXX's solutions cater to a diverse range of market segments including consumers, small and medium enterprises, large enterprises, government networks, private cellular networks, and wholesale. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Saratoga, California.

name: 7bridges
cb_description: 7bridges is a company focused on reinventing supply chain management through its SaaS platform within the logistics and supply chain industry. The company offers a platform that provides end-to-end visibility, operational resilience, and enhanced performance for supply chains, utilizing AI to facilitate data-driven decision-making and strategy simulation. 7bridges primarily serves businesses looking to optimize their logistics and supply chain operations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Bobbie
cb_description: Bobbie provides the construction solution. The company offers a wide range of professional building materials, providing comprehensive logistics and personal service for the delivery of these materials to construction sites across Germany. It serves the construction industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Quantinuum
cb_description: Quantinuum focuses on quantum computing in the technology sector. It offers quantum computing solutions, including cybersecurity, computational chemistry, machine learning, and optimization, designed to address complex problems in various fields. Quantinuum primarily serves sectors such as cybersecurity, pharmaceutical development, and supply chain optimization. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Broomfield, Colorado.

name: Stardog
cb_description: Stardog is a data and artificial intelligence (AI) company that specializes in enterprise knowledge graph technology within the data management and AI sectors. The company offers a platform that enables data virtualization, semantic search, and AI-driven insights to facilitate better decision-making and innovation. Stardog primarily serves sectors such as financial services, life sciences, and manufacturing. Stardog was formerly known as Clark & Parsia. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Posit
cb_description: Posit focuses on providing open-source data science tools and enterprise solutions for the R and Python programming languages. The company offers a suite of products that enable robust and reproducible data analysis, as well as platforms for sharing insights and collaborative work at scale. It caters to a wide range of sectors, including academia, small and medium businesses, and large enterprises within the data science domain. It was formerly known as RStudio, PBC. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Playbook
cb_description: Playbook provides a worker training solution for gig-economy businesses. It offers in-app training and engagement solution by creating step-by-step, story-like guides for operational tasks using images, videos, and text. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. In March 2023, Playbook was acquired by EduMe. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Saluda Medical
cb_description: Saluda Medical develops a platform of closed-loop neuromodulation technologies, based on the neural response to stimulation. The company produced spinal cord stimulation (SCS) systems. It provides optimized therapy for chronic intractable pain management. Saluda Medical primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Artarmon, Australia.

name: Renofi
cb_description: Renofi provides home renovation loans. It facilitates loan products designed to help homeowners finance their renovation projects. It includes home equity loans and lines of credit, which allow homeowners to borrow against the future value of their home after renovations. The company primarily serves homeowners looking to finance their home renovation projects. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Pyn
cb_description: Pyn is a company focused on enhancing employee communications and experience within the human resources technology sector. It offers a platform that automates employee communications, providing personalized guidance and support throughout various stages of the employee journey. Pyn primarily serves the human resources and internal communications sectors with its employee experience solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Newtown, New South Wales.

name: AIDOC
cb_description: AIDOC is a company that focuses on the intersection of healthcare and technology, specifically in the domain of artificial intelligence and blockchain. The company offers a range of services that utilize medical data and AI technology to provide constant health and wellness insights, including a 24-hour health analysis from a digital medical expert capable of anticipating problems and prescribing solutions. AIDOC primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tianyi, China.

name: Hiya
cb_description: Hiya specializes in children's nutritional supplements, focusing on the health and wellness industry. The company offers a range of chewable vitamins and probiotics designed to meet the essential nutritional needs of kids without added sugars or artificial additives. Hiya primarily serves the children's health and nutrition sector with products aimed at promoting lifelong health and well-being. It was founded in 2018 and is based in West Palm Beach, Florida.

name: Jus Mundi
cb_description: Jus Mundi serves as a legal technology company specializing in AI search and analytics for international law and arbitration. The company provides a comprehensive database for legal research, offering access to case documents, institutional rules, and publications in various practice areas such as commercial and investment arbitration. Jus Mundi's platform is designed to assist legal professionals in building strategies, conducting due diligence, and staying informed on legal developments. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Roubaix, France.

name: Grey Wolf Therapeutics
cb_description: Grey Wolf Therapeutics focuses on next-generation immuno-oncology within the biotechnology sector. The company develops immunotherapies designed for the visibility of non-responsive tumors to the immune system for their destruction. It serves the healthcare sector, particularly in the field of cancer treatment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Oxford, United Kingdom.

name: Fashol
cb_description: Fashol focuses on improving agricultural supply chains. The company offers solutions to supply chain challenges faced by farmers and retailers, including customer service and fair pricing strategies. It primarily serves the agriculture and retail sectors with its fresh produce supply chain network. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

name: VISO Trust
cb_description: VISO Trust specializes in AI-powered third-party cyber risk management within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a platform that automates the risk assessment process, providing security teams with rapid and accurate risk intelligence for vendor management. VISO Trust's services enable organizations to assess vendor security, reduce risk, and maintain compliance with various industry standards without the need for extensive manual analysis. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Geronimo, California.

name: Zetwerk
cb_description: Zetwerk is a manufacturing services provider specializing in the production of precision parts and capital goods across various industries. The company offers a range of custom manufacturing services, including CNC machining, injection molding, and die casting, to produce high-quality components and assemblies. Zetwerk primarily serves sectors such as aerospace, defense, energy, utilities, and construction. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Branch
cb_description: Branch is a deployment tool that simplifies the CI/CD process for WordPress developers within the software development industry. The company offers automated deployment solutions that integrate with Git repositories and provide pre-configured recipes for various hosting platforms, eliminating much of the manual configuration work. Branch's services are tailored to modern WordPress development needs, including asset compilation, dependency installation, and automated testing, to ensure a smooth and error-free deployment process. It is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: Saleo
cb_description: Saleo is a company that focuses on providing a platform for live sales demo environments in the software industry. Its main service is to transform existing demo environments into data-complete, authentic, and powerful demos using a no-code AI modeling engine. This service primarily caters to the software sales industry. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Cumming, Georgia.

name: Refyne
cb_description: Refyne is a financial wellness company that specializes in providing earned wage access services. The company offers a platform where employees can access their earned salary in real-time, as well as tools and resources to improve financial literacy and planning. Refyne primarily serves the workforce of various organizations, aiming to enhance financial well-being and workplace productivity. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: LogicGate
cb_description: LogicGate specializes in governance, risk, and compliance (GRC) solutions within the software industry. The company offers a platform known as Risk Cloud, which provides tools for risk management, policy enforcement, and compliance reporting. LogicGate's services cater to various sectors including software, FinTech, healthcare, and energy, among others. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: AVA
cb_description: AVA is an intelligent eating platform that's transforming the way people think about food and nutritional health. On November 19, 2019 AVA was acquired by Royal DSM, the terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

name: Grand-Attic
cb_description: Grand-Attic is a company focused on the development and distribution of mobile games within the entertainment industry. They specialize in leveraging technology and creativity to produce high-quality mobile games designed to entertain a global audience. The company fosters small independent teams to encourage innovation and enable rapid development cycles. Grand-Attic was formerly known as Hadi. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

name: Gladly
cb_description: Gladly serves as a customer service software provider specializing in AI platforms designed for customer support experiences. Its main offerings include a people-centric record system that consolidates all customer interactions across various channels into a single, continuous conversation. Gladly primarily serves the B2C sector, focusing on brands looking to improve customer loyalty and support team performance. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Shift
cb_description: Shift specializes in AI decisioning solutions for the insurance industry. The company offers a suite of products that automate and optimize decisions in areas such as fraud detection, claims processing, and underwriting risk assessment. Shift's AI-driven tools are designed to enhance operational efficiency and improve the policyholder experience. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Peach Finance
cb_description: Peach Finance specializes in API-first loan management and servicing technology within the financial services sector. The company offers a fully configurable loan management system and an integrated suite of proprietary loan servicing tools designed to support a wide range of non-mortgage asset classes. Peach Finance primarily caters to fintech companies and traditional financial institutions looking to launch and scale innovative lending programs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Ceremonia
cb_description: Ceremonia is a clean hair care brand that focuses on products rooted in Latinx heritage within the beauty industry. The company offers a range of hair care solutions including shampoos, conditioners, treatments, and styling products that utilize natural ingredients sourced from Latin America. Ceremonia's products are designed to nourish hair from the roots, promote scalp health, and cater to various hair concerns such as frizz control and curl care. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Spruce
cb_description: Spruce is a fintech company that operates in the financial services industry. The company offers a mobile banking app that provides a range of services including budget tracking, early access to tax refunds and paychecks, cash back rewards, and savings goals. It primarily serves individuals seeking to manage their personal finances. It is based in Kansas City, Missouri.

name: Responsibly
cb_description: Responsibly focuses on supplier sustainability in the procurement industry. It offers an AI-enabled service that provides sustainability due diligence for suppliers, covering aspects such as human rights compliance, decarbonization targets, and sustainability reporting. It primarily serves the procurement sector. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Coalesce Automation
cb_description: Coalesce Automation specializes in data transformation solutions within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables the visual development of data pipelines, standardizes data transformations, and integrates specifically with Snowflake. Coalesce Automation primarily serves industries such as manufacturing, retail, financial services, advertising, healthcare, and technology. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Identiq
cb_description: Identiq provides fraud prevention and identity validation in cybersecurity. The company offers a peer-to-peer network that allows businesses to collaborate and validate trusted customers without sharing any sensitive data or identifiable information. Its service is primarily used by companies in various sectors that require identity validation and fraud prevention. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Harbr
cb_description: Harbr focuses on trade credit. The company offers services to automate financial analysis and decision-making processes using generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology. It includes the extraction of crucial data from credit applications, the testing and deployment of decision trees, and the generation of essential financial summaries. Harbr primarily sells to the financial services industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Halifax, Canada.

name: Empower
cb_description: Empower specializes in environmental sustainability in plastic recycling. The company offers a digital platform that incentivizes the collection, sourcing, and recycling of plastic waste. It provides tools for every link in the plastics value chain, from waste collectors to manufacturers, and offers services such as plastic credits, tracking, marketplace, and product passport. Its services aim to bridge the gap between local waste collectors and the recycled plastic market. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: FloodFlash
cb_description: FloodFlash operates as a flood insurance company that offers parametric insurance coverage. The company offers flood insurance that utilizes computer models, cloud software, and internet-of-things sensors to provide coverage. It pays out a pre-agreed, fixed sum as soon as a pre-defined level of flooding occurs and the payment is made directly to the policyholder. It primarily serves the insurance industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: WeRoad
cb_description: WeRoad offers group travel services, organizing road trips to over 90 destinations worldwide. The company's services are primarily targeted towards the travel and tourism industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Milano, Italy.

name: Letrus
cb_description: Letrus provides a literacy program that combines technology and pedagogy to help improve writing skills for students to write their own stories. Letrus primarily sells to the education sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Brandless
cb_description: Brandless is a fast-growing omnichannel commerce platform operating in the retail industry. The company offers a wide range of products including kitchenware, home decor, nutritional supplements, and wellness products, all aimed at promoting a healthier lifestyle. Its primary customer base includes individuals and families seeking better-for-you products. Brandless was formerly known as Dhosi. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Gordian Software
cb_description: Gordian Software is a technology company focused on the travel industry. The company provides an API that enables travel organizations to sell airline ancillaries such as seat selection and baggage. Gordian Software primarily serves the travel industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Sunflower Labs
cb_description: Sunflower Labs develops security systems for the consumer household. Its system includes lights and flying cameras. The company's sensor-laden lights are solar-powered and can detect motion, sounds, and vibrations while illuminating the perimeter of a property or its walkways. Sunflower Labs was formerly known as BBot. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Presail
cb_description: Presail is a company that focuses on providing investment infrastructure for the Web 3.0 sector. The company offers a range of services including fundraising, allocation management, token distribution, compliance, and over-the-counter (OTC) trading. These services are primarily targeted towards the Web 3.0 investment groups and projects. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: LeaseLock
cb_description: LeaseLock operates as a financial technology company. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence to optimize coverage based on property history and integrates within the native online leasing checkout results in industry-leading adoption rates, significant conversion lift, and helps to reduce deposit administration risk. It primarily serves the real estate industry. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Marina del Rey, California.

name: AgBiome
cb_description: AgBiome operates as a product-oriented biotechnology company. It focuses on delivering research and discovery to the agriculture industry. It discovers and develops biological and trait products for crop protection. The proprietary GENESIS discovery platform captures microbes for agriculturally relevant applications and screens them with assays for insect, disease, and nematode control. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Research Triangle Park, North Carolina. In April 2024, AgBiome was acquired by Ginkgo Bioworks.

name: Aktivate
cb_description: Aktivate is an influencer marketing company that focuses on connecting brands with influencers through a technology-driven platform. It offers services that facilitate brand-influencer collaborations, streamline payments, and amplify marketing campaigns. Aktivate primarily serves brands, SMEs, marketing agencies, and creators looking to enhance their presence in the African market. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Chainalysis
cb_description: Chainalysis is a blockchain data platform that operates in the cryptocurrency sector, providing insights and analytics to support various industries. The company offers solutions for crypto investigations, regulatory compliance, and market intelligence, enabling businesses, financial institutions, and government agencies to engage with digital assets securely and effectively. Chainalysis primarily serves law enforcement agencies, financial institutions, and regulatory bodies seeking to understand and leverage blockchain technology for security and compliance purposes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: TierPoint
cb_description: TierPoint specializes in IT solutions and operates within the data center sectors. The company offers services including cloud management across various platforms, disaster recovery, cybersecurity, and IT infrastructure modernization designed to support business continuity and regulatory compliance. TierPoint's solutions cater to a set of industries, including financial services, healthcare, technology, and government sectors. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Conduktor
cb_description: Conduktor focuses on streamlining operations and providing data mesh solutions within the data infrastructure domain. The company offers a platform that enables platform teams to enforce standards, instrument Kafka applications, and grants developers autonomy and ownership. Conduktor's services cater to improving developer productivity, ensuring data security, and optimizing infrastructure through governance and management tools. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: NoRedInk
cb_description: NoRedInk is a company focused on enhancing writing skills and critical thinking in the education sector. It provides an adaptive writing curriculum that engages students with personalized exercises and offers instructional support throughout the writing process. The platform serves educators and students in grades 3 through 12 with tools for practice, assessment, and feedback. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ALT Sports Data
cb_description: ALT Sports Data provides alternative sports services to proprietary sports trading and customer data to sports book operators. It partners partnering with leading executives, vendors, operators, and regulators in sports betting. It offers coverage and visibility to alternative sports. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Oceanside, California.

name: Steno
cb_description: Steno specializes in court reporting and litigation services within the legal sector. The company offers a range of services including court reporting, remote depositions, litigation financing, and legal technology solutions designed to streamline the litigation process. Steno primarily serves the legal industry, catering to the needs of court reporters, plaintiff firms, and defense firms. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Apollo
cb_description: Apollo is a company focused on consumer wellness through the development of wearable technology designed to manage stress and improve sleep. Their main product, the Apollo wearable, utilizes gentle vibrations to help users relax, focus, and enhance their sleep quality without the need for medical intervention. The wearable leverages neuroscience research to provide non-invasive stress relief and support for various mindfulness practices. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Metaspectral
cb_description: Metaspectral is a company specializing in advanced computer vision technology within the AI sector. It offers products that enable real-time detection and analysis of materials, chemical compositions, and defects using AI-powered hyperspectral data analysis. The company's Fusion platform allows users to process and analyze hyperspectral data without the need for complex programming or AI expertise. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

name: Notable
cb_description: Notable engages in the intersection of digital and physical art within the blockchain and NFT marketplace sector. It offers curated digital artworks in the form of NFTs, which include physical prints and utilizes blockchain technology to ensure the authenticity and provenance of each piece. It primarily serves art collectors and enthusiasts looking for exclusive digital and physical art pieces. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Pasarnow
cb_description: Pasarnow is a food supply chain startup focused on streamlining the connection between farmers, brand principals, and various business customers. The company offers a platform for the distribution of fresh produce, including vegetables, fruits, proteins, and groceries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Virti
cb_description: Virti is an immersive learning platform that specializes in transforming traditional education and training methods across various sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for creating, learning, analyzing, and scaling interactive and immersive learning experiences without the need for technical expertise. Virti primarily serves industries such as healthcare, transportation, manufacturing, and corporate training, providing solutions that integrate virtual reality, artificial intelligence, and scenario-based training to enhance learning outcomes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Shropshire, England.

name: Veri
cb_description: Veri focuses on improving metabolic health through a technology-driven approach in the health and wellness sector. The company offers a program that combines a continuous glucose monitor (CGM) with a mobile app to provide users with personalized insights and recommendations for nutrition and lifestyle habits. Veri primarily serves individuals seeking to enhance their health and well-being. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Helsinki, Finland. In September 2024, Veri was acquired by Oura.

name: Brelyon
cb_description: Brelyon develops a headset-free, virtual display for gaming and enterprise applications. The technology uses physics with optical and computational techniques to create true depth and panorama, replicating a cinema-like experience in a 32 monitor form factor. The company's goal is to provide display solutions that amplify a user's computer experience. Brelyon was founded in 2019 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Mintlify
cb_description: Mintlify is a company focused on providing modern documentation solutions for software development. They offer a platform that creates beautiful, easy-to-maintain documentation optimized for user engagement and conversion. Their services cater to a range of customers from fast-growing startups to large enterprises. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Ithaca, New York.

name: Candi Solar
cb_description: Candi Solar provides solar and battery solutions for businesses across various sectors. It offers financing options, installation, and performance management to support energy efficiency and reliability. Its primary customers are businesses looking to manage energy costs and utilize renewable energy. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Shadow
cb_description: Shadow utilizes artificial intelligence and community engagement in pet care. Their main service involves using these technologies to assist in reuniting lost pets with their owners. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CoverGo
cb_description: CoverGo develops a no-code insurance platform in insurance technology. The company offers a configurable platform that enables insurance companies to manage their operations, build and launch insurance products, enable omnichannel distribution, and manage policies and claims. Its platform facilitates CoverGo for health, CoverGo for property and casualty, and CoverGo for life. It primarily serves the insurance industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: EdSights
cb_description: EdSights is a company that focuses on improving student retention in the education sector. The company offers a service that combines artificial intelligence, behavioral science, and texting to collect non-cognitive data from students, enabling institutions to understand their students' experiences and needs better. EdSights primarily serves the higher education industry. EdSights was formerly known as Classpulse. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Graft
cb_description: Graft is a company that specializes in conversational AI and enterprise knowledge integration within the technology sector. Their main offerings include an AI-powered chat interface that facilitates self-service discovery and supports data-driven decision-making for businesses. Graft's solutions are designed to serve various sectors, including manufacturing and construction, by providing customizable and scalable AI tools that enhance productivity and efficiency. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Neteera
cb_description: Neteera is a company specializing in contactless remote patient monitoring within the healthcare technology sector. Their FDA-cleared RPM platform offers continuous monitoring of vital signs and behavioral parameters without the need for patient or caregiver interaction. Neteera primarily serves the healthcare industry, providing solutions to improve patient care and optimize clinical workflows. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: Smilo
cb_description: Smilo is a company focused on providing essential baby and toddler products. The company offers a range of items including feeding bottles, pacifiers, teethers, and products for pregnancy and nursing, all designed with input from doctors, engineers, and parents. Smilo's products are aimed at improving the well-being of babies and the experience of parenting. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Wayland, Massachusetts.

name: Showpad
cb_description: Showpad is a sales enablement platform that specializes in uniting marketing and revenue teams to improve seller effectiveness and drive revenue growth. The company offers AI-powered solutions for content management, sales coaching, buyer engagement, and performance analytics. Showpad primarily serves sectors that require advanced sales strategies and tools, such as the medical devices industry and technology sales. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Ghent, Belgium.

name: Aforza
cb_description: Aforza specializes in providing trade promotion management and sales execution solutions for the consumer products industry. The company offers a suite of artificial intelligence (AI) powered cloud and mobile applications designed to help businesses manage revenue growth, optimize retail execution, and enhance distributor management. Aforza's products are utilized in various roles within the consumer products sector, including trade planners, key account managers, and field sales professionals. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Offr
cb_description: Offr operates as a prop-tech start-up focusing on the real estate industry. The company offers a digital platform that facilitates the buying, selling, and renting of residential and commercial properties. It includes features such as online auctions, private offers, viewing bookings, document uploads, and digital contract signing. The company primarily serves the real estate industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Lytics
cb_description: Lytics is a customer data platform (CDP) provider that specializes in data management and analytics for enterprises.
