The company offers solutions to unify customer data into comprehensive profiles, enable personalized marketing experiences, and automate data-driven workflows. Lytics' products are designed to optimize advertising spend, deliver personalized email and website experiences, recommend products for e-commerce, and create targeted audience segments. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: EliseAI
cb_description: EliseAI is an artificial intelligence (AI) platform that empowers businesses to respond automatically to customer inquiries and requests without losing their human touch. Its products include AI-managed communications, AI-managed scheduling, and AI customization and management. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Path Robotics
cb_description: Path Robotics specializes in robotic welding systems. The company offers welding robots that operate autonomously, using AI and machine learning to adapt and optimize the welding process without manual programming. It serves industries such as transportation, manufacturing, infrastructure, farming, mining, and construction with its robotic welding solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

name: Coda Payments
cb_description: Coda Payments provides secure, cross-border monetization solutions for digital products and services. It enables merchants to accept payments using payment channels that every consumer can use. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Singapore.

name: Docyt
cb_description: Docyt is a company that specializes in accounting automation software, operating within the financial technology sector. The company offers a range of services including automated bank reconciliation, expense management, bookkeeping, and real-time financial reporting, all powered by artificial intelligence and machine learning. Docyt primarily serves sectors such as accounting firms, dental practices, high growth startups, hotels, quick service restaurants, and retail businesses. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Atoa
cb_description: Atoa specializes in financial technology services, offering alternative payment solutions within the payments industry. The company provides instant bank payments, QR code payments, and SMS payment links, enabling merchants to receive funds directly from customers' bank accounts quickly and with lower fees. Atoa primarily serves sectors such as retail, restaurants, hair and beauty, automotive, and e-commerce. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, England.

name: Minu
cb_description: Minu is a leader in corporate benefits, focusing on improving financial, physical, and mental well-being of employees. The company offers a comprehensive platform for managing a wide array of employee benefits, including on-demand salary access, savings and loan options, various types of vouchers, and wellness programs. Minu primarily serves businesses looking to enhance employee retention and productivity through competitive benefits packages. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Totango
cb_description: Totango is a company that provides customer success software, focusing on assisting businesses in managing revenue within the enterprise customer growth sector. The company offers a platform that includes tools for customer engagement, portfolio management, and reporting, aimed at improving customer health and team performance. Totango's software includes artificial intelligence features to provide insights and automate processes. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: ORDA
cb_description: ORDA focuses on providing cloud-based software solutions for the food business domain. The company's main services include processing orders, accepting payments, connecting to logistic providers, and customer engagement, all aimed at facilitating growth for food businesses. Primarily, it caters to the food and restaurant industry. ORDA was formerly known as StarKitchens. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: ORI
cb_description: ORI specializes in conversational AI technology within the commerce sector, focusing on enhancing customer interactions and sales processes. The company offers AI-driven chatbot services that facilitate human-like conversations, aiming to improve customer satisfaction and conversion rates. ORI's solutions are primarily utilized in industries such as automotive, telecom, education, banking & finance, real estate, retail, and travel & aviation. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Noida, India.

name: Patientory
cb_description: Patientory focuses on personal health data management within the healthcare sector. The company offers a digital health data wallet that allows users to store and manage their medical records on a blockchain network, and provides tools for tracking health metrics and participating in clinical trials. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: InsightRX
cb_description: InsightRX offers a cloud-based platform for precision dosing and clinical analytics. It empowers life science and provider healthcare organizations to individualize treatment from clinical development to the point of care. The platform leverages peer-reviewed mathematical models, patient physiology, pharmacogenomics, drug concentrations, and biomarkers to optimize dose and treatment. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Toggle Robotics
cb_description: Toggle Robotics focuses on transforming the construction industry through digital tools and automation in the domain of urban infrastructure and renewable energy projects. The company develops hardware, software, and services designed to automate the pre-assembly of critical construction materials, such as rebar, to enhance safety, speed, and scale in building processes. Toggle Robotics primarily serves the construction industry, offering solutions that integrate robotic efficiency with human collaboration to improve the pre-assembly phase of construction projects. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Nacelle
cb_description: Nacelle specializes in gas conditioning technologies and services within the energy and renewable industries. The company offers decarbonization technologies and services designed to improve business operations and support environmental sustainability initiatives. Nacelle's solutions are primarily aimed at the renewables and oil & gas sectors, focusing on strategic ESG initiatives and clean fuel production. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Charleston, West Virginia.

name: Soil Connect
cb_description: Soil Connect is a software and construction services company operating in the construction industry. The company provides a marketplace for construction professionals to locate, transport, and track soil and aggregates, simplifying the process of managing bulk material supply, demand, and transportation. Its primary customers are contractors, builders, and haulers in the construction sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Plainview, New York.

name: Shortcut
cb_description:
Shortcut is a fast, smart and fun way to control all your connected devices and favorite services.  

Its already integrated with Nest, Dropcam, SmartThings, Philips Hue, Lockitron, Foursquare, Dwolla and more.

Talk to Shortcut as you would to a person.  Say something like "turn the light on", "set the temperature to 70 degrees", or "show my living room".  Not only it understands what you say, Shortcut will get it done for you.

Dont feel like talking  You can also use the smart touch interface.  Shortcut intelligently learns what you want to do and when you need it.  After a few days, it will start bringing you the right shortcut at just the right time.  The more you use Shortcut, the smarter it will be.

Its a new and exciting way to interact with the world around you.

name: Shef
cb_description: Shef provides homemade meal delivery solutions. The company provides a platform for local, food safety-certified cooks to sell homemade dishes to customers in their community. It serves the food delivery and electronic commerce industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: KINVENT
cb_description: KINVENT is a company that focuses on physical rehabilitation and sports biomechanics. The company offers a range of innovative measuring and training devices designed to facilitate everyday and athletic movements. These devices, connected to a dedicated application, provide real-time biofeedback data to support analysis, training, and patient follow-up in physiotherapy. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Montpellier, France.

name: Fivetran
cb_description: Fivetran is a global leader in automated data movement, focusing on data integration and ELT processes within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that extracts, loads, and transforms data from various sources into cloud data destinations, enabling efficient and reliable data centralization. Fivetran primarily serves sectors that require robust data analytics and operational efficiency, such as finance, marketing, sales, and support. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Boomerang
cb_description: Boomerang, formerly Get Out of Cambridge, is a Facebook-based gifting service.

name: EMTech
cb_description: EMTech, a spin-off of BiOva, LLC, is researching, developing, and manufacturing technologies for the metabolic enhancement of the enzymes and bacteria used in the fermentation industry. The company's current products and ongoing research projects show applications that enhance productivity in the ethanol, pharmaceutical, beer, wine, and dairy industries.

name: Sedai
cb_description: Sedai is an AI-powered cloud management platform specializing in autonomous cloud cost optimization, performance tuning, and availability improvement. The company offers services that autonomously scale, optimize resources, and reduce costs for modern applications using technologies like Kubernetes, AWS Lambda, and AWS ECS. Sedai primarily serves sectors such as ecommerce, cybersecurity, online travel, and B2B SaaS. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Pleasanton, California.

name: Vori Health
cb_description: Vori Health is a provider of integrated, virtual healthcare services focusing on musculoskeletal care. The company offers a holistic approach to health with services including medical diagnosis, treatment planning, virtual physical therapy, non-opioid pain management, medical imaging coordination, and health coaching, all accessible from the patient's home. Vori Health primarily serves individuals seeking convenient and comprehensive care for muscle and joint pain. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: Classera
cb_description: Classera provides an electronic learning platform. It specializes in the educational marketplace for education technology and educational products. The company offers student information systems, student attendance systems, social learning, grade books, and more. Its products are C-Pay, C- C-Reality, C-Smarter, and Edumalls which enable its users to learn. The company also offers corporate training services for skill enhancement. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: WiBotic
cb_description: WiBotic specializes in autonomous charging solutions and power management for the robotics industry. The company offers wireless charging hardware and software that enable efficient energy management and increased productivity for a variety of robotic applications. WiBotic's technology is versatile, supporting different battery types and power requirements, and is scalable to accommodate fleets of any size. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Citrine Informatics
cb_description: Citrine Informatics is an enterprise SaaS platform company that specializes in applying generative artificial intelligence and materials science to enhance materials and chemicals development. The company offers a suite of software tools that assist in data management, virtual experimentation, and AI-driven product development, aimed at improving the efficiency and outcomes of R&D processes. Citrine Informatics primarily serves industries involved in the production and development of materials and chemicals, including sectors such as batteries, aerospace, and consumer packaged goods. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Capsule VC
cb_description: Capsule VC ceased operations. Capsule VC is a venture capital firm. It invests in early-stage companies and startups. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Fathom
cb_description: Fathom specializes in underwater drone technology and operates within the consumer electronics and adventure gear sectors. The company offers the Fathom One, an underwater drone designed for ease of use and exploration, allowing users to experience underwater environments through a connected smart device. Fathom's primary market includes adventure enthusiasts and consumers interested in underwater exploration. It is based in Grand Rapids, Michigan.

name: Collectable
cb_description: Collectable is a company that operates in the collectibles industry, focusing on rare and historically significant items. The company's main service is providing a platform for buying, selling, and trading equity interests in these collectibles. It caters primarily to collectors and investors in the collectibles market. It was founded in 2014 and is based in White Plains, New York.

name: Claroty
cb_description: Claroty specializes in protecting cyber-physical systems across various sectors. The company offers a unified platform that integrates with existing infrastructure to provide comprehensive controls for visibility, risk and vulnerability management, threat detection, and secure remote access. Claroty primarily serves sectors such as industrial, healthcare, and commercial environments, focusing on securing the Extended Internet of Things (XIoT) which includes operational technology (OT), the Internet of Medical Things (IoMT), and enterprise Internet of Things (IoT). It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lifen
cb_description: Lifen focuses on enhancing healthcare through intelligent data management and operates within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers innovative solutions for the sharing and integration of medical documents, as well as tools to facilitate clinical research using artificial intelligence. Its services are designed to help in care pathways and support healthcare providers in making informed decisions. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Hi Auto
cb_description: Hi Auto is a company focused on providing conversational AI solutions for the quick-service restaurant (QSR) industry. Their main offerings include an AI platform that automates the drive-thru ordering process, capable of handling complex menus, upselling, and integrating with point-of-sale systems, all while maintaining high accuracy in noisy environments. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Arundo
cb_description: Arundo is a company focused on turning industrial data into sustainable business value within the technology and artificial intelligence sectors. The company offers products that utilize enterprise-scale machine learning and advanced analytics to optimize operations and improve asset uptime for various industries. Arundo's solutions are designed to be easily integrated with existing production infrastructures, enhancing sustainability and productivity without the need for significant new investments. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: Tetrate
cb_description: Tetrate operates as a company focused on application networking and security in the technology industry. The company offers a platform built on open-source projects like Istio and Envoy, providing services such as service mesh and application programming interface (API) gateway, which help manage the complexity of modern, hybrid cloud applications. It primarily serves enterprises operating in multi-cloud and hybrid environments. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Comunix
cb_description: Comunix operates as a social gaming company in the interactive entertainment industry. The company's main offering is a group video chat poker game that allows users to play live with friends and connect with new ones from around the world. It primarily serves the social gaming sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Crown Affair
cb_description: Crown Affair specializes in haircare products, focusing on post-wash essentials and tools designed to maintain and enhance hair health. It offers a range of products including hydrating formulas, scalp treatments, and styling tools that cater to various hair textures and lengths. Crown Affair's products are aimed at individuals seeking to establish a haircare routine that emphasizes quality and simplicity. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Arteria AI
cb_description: Arteria AI specializes in contract lifecycle management solutions within the legal and financial sectors. It offers a platform that transforms contracts into structured, actionable data for the contracting process, from generation to analysis. Arteria AI primarily serves the financial industry, providing tools for documentation workflows and decision-making. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Kry
cb_description: Kry is a digital healthcare provider offering medical services across various domains including primary and urgent care. The company facilitates consultations with doctors, nurses, psychologists, and physiotherapists through video calls and in-app chats, as well as providing in-person services at physical healthcare centers. Kry's platform supports digital prescription renewals, appointment bookings, and offers multilingual support, catering to a diverse patient base. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Calingo
cb_description: Calingo operates in the insurance industry. The company offers personalized insurance coverage including home and personal liability insurance and pet insurance for dogs and cats. It primarily sells to the retail industry, providing insurance coverage at the point of sale. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: GridX
cb_description: GridX is a company focused on transforming the energy sector by accelerating the transition to clean energy. The company offers a platform that helps utilities and energy suppliers design and market emerging rate structures, manage complex billing needs, and increase customer investment in sustainable technologies. GridX primarily serves the utilities and energy supply industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Varos
cb_description: Varos is a data analytics company operating in the technology sector. It provides a platform that allows companies to compare their Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) with their peers, offering insights into their performance relative to their competitors. The company primarily serves the ecommerce and Software as a Service (SaaS) industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Zenjob
cb_description: Zenjob is a modern personnel service provider operating in the employment industry. The company offers a mobile application that connects individuals looking for flexible part-time jobs with companies that need temporary staff. Zenjob primarily serves the employment sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Nozomi Networks
cb_description: Nozomi Networks specializes in operational technology cybersecurity, providing solutions to protect critical infrastructure from cyber threats. The company offers a platform that combines network and endpoint visibility, threat detection, and analysis to aid incident response and operational resilience. Nozomi Networks serves various sectors including energy, healthcare, manufacturing, and smart cities. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ZwitterCo
cb_description: ZwitterCo provides membrane solutions for the treatment of wastewater. It works with industrial operators and integration companies looking for alternatives to their filtration systems, chemically intensive processes, or processes which are not able to achieve desired discharge or reuse quality. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Woburn, Massachusetts.

name: Sweep
cb_description: Sweep develops a personal finance management application. The company offers a forward-looking view into cash flow to take control of money, grow savings and spend confidently. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California. In April 2016, Sweep was acquired by Affirm.

name: Jellyfish
cb_description: Jellyfish offers digital marketing services. It expertizes in creating content, media strategies, and training services. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in London, U.K. In June 2023, Jellyfish was acquired by The Brandtech Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: ZenGo
cb_description: ZenGo is a cryptocurrency wallet provider in the financial technology sector. The company offers a self-custodial cryptocurrency wallet that utilizes multi-party computation (MPC) for enhanced security, allowing users to buy, sell, and swap various cryptocurrencies and interact with non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms without the vulnerability of a seed phrase. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Bloomerang
cb_description: Bloomerang specializes in donor management and fundraising software for nonprofits. Their main offerings include a customer relationship management (CRM) system tailored for nonprofits, tools for marketing and engagement, online giving capabilities, and volunteer management solutions. They also provide reporting and analytics to help organizations track and improve their fundraising efforts. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Macrometa
cb_description: Macrometa focuses on providing a hyper-distributed cloud platform in the technology sector. The company's main services include storing, processing, and serving data in real-time, enabling applications to run at the edge with good performance and low latency. It primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce and retail, media and entertainment, gaming, and financial services. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: HarperDB
cb_description: HarperDB serves as a distributed systems platform that specializes in database management, application development, and data streaming services. The company offers a unified solution that integrates database functionality, caching mechanisms, application deployment, and streaming capabilities to facilitate global-scale backend services. HarperDB's platform is designed to serve various sectors including gaming, streaming media, and digital commerce. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Scality
cb_description: Scality specializes in file and object storage solutions, focusing on data management across edge, core, and cloud environments within the technology sector. The company offers scalable storage infrastructure designed to address complex data storage challenges and ensure data protection, particularly in hybrid and multi-cloud environments. Scality's solutions cater to a diverse range of sectors, including global enterprises, government, healthcare, media and entertainment, and cloud service providers. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Insitro
cb_description: Insitro focuses on drug discovery and development. The company's main services involve the use of machine learning and high-throughput biology to predict successful paths for medicine creation. It aims to avoid costly failures in pharmaceutical research and development (R&D). Insitro primarily sells to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: XRHealth
cb_description: XRHealth focuses on providing therapeutic care through the use of technology in the healthcare domain. The company offers a range of services including virtual reality therapy for physical and mental health conditions, occupational therapy, and online physical therapy. It is primarily aimed at patients seeking treatment for conditions such as chronic pain, stress and anxiety, and neurological disorders. It was formerly known as VRHealth. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Needham, Massachusetts.

name: DriveNets
cb_description: DriveNets operates as an artificial intelligence (AI)-based router networking software company. It offers Network Cloud, a cloud-based router software solution that allows service providers to transform their networks into a scalable cloud-like architecture. It allows service providers to manage their network complexity, operations, and service delivery. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Raanana, Israel.

name: CoLab
cb_description: CoLab focuses on collaboration in hardware engineering through its CAD collaboration software. The company offers a web-based tool that allows teams to share CAD files, provide contextual feedback, and automate issue tracking to streamline design reviews and decision-making processes. CoLab primarily serves sectors that involve new product development, supplier collaboration, and design for manufacturability. It was founded in 2017 and is based in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador.

name: Centaur Labs
cb_description: Centaur Labs specializes in medical data labeling solutions for the healthcare AI sector. The company offers data annotation services across various modalities, including text, images, audio, and video, leveraging a global network of medical experts. Centaur Labs primarily serves industries such as medical devices, life sciences, consumer health applications, and insurance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Automata
cb_description: Automata is a company that focuses on financial technology, specifically in the domain of artificial intelligence and blockchain technologies. The company offers a range of services including smart investment solutions, savings accounts, and cryptocurrency-related services, all aimed at optimizing money management and offering daily returns. Automata primarily serves the fintech industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Maxterial
cb_description: Maxterial focuses on advanced chemicals and coatings in the materials science sector. The company has developed a revolutionary coating platform designed to protect materials against wear, heat, and corrosion. Maxterial's technology serves various industry segments, including semiconductors, automotive, heavy-duty equipment, aerospace, and more. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pleasanton, California.

name: LOB
cb_description: LOB, based out of Leszno, Poland, specializes in the production of specialty locks, mail boxes, door closers, door handles, keys and other hardware.

name: Parsley Health
cb_description: Parsley Health operates as a healthcare provider. It specializes in functional medicine with a focus on root-cause resolution. The company offers personalized medical services addressing a range of health issues including autoimmune, digestive, hormonal, and mental wellbeing, as well as support for fertility, pregnancy, and postpartum care. Parsley Health primarily serves individuals seeking comprehensive health assessments and personalized care plans. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: MD Ally
cb_description: MD Ally provides telehealth solutions. The company offers a platform that enables dispatchers and first responders to connect non-emergent callers to telehealth services, in-network resources, and social services. It serves the public safety sector by providing virtual care options. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Swift Solar
cb_description: Swift Solar focuses on the development and manufacturing of solar technology in the renewable energy sector. The company's main offerings include solar panels and systems, designed using perovskite materials to achieve power output and flexibility. Swift Solar primarily caters to the renewable energy industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Summer
cb_description: Summer helps employers prevent and manage stress and anxiety in their workplaces by offering them self-guided and coach-assisted programs.

name: Volta
cb_description: Volta is an a/b testing framework for live, outbound phone calls. Volta is a cross-device, always-in-sync, call queue management solution for businesses.

name: Bidgely
cb_description: Bidgely is an energy intelligence company specializing in energy analytics within the utility sector. The company offers a range of services including energy efficiency solutions, demand response programs, and customer engagement strategies, all powered by their patented disaggregation technology and advanced AI/machine learning models. Bidgely primarily serves the utility industry, offering solutions to enhance grid operations, manage electric vehicle programs, and provide personalized customer engagement. Bidgely was formerly known as MyEnerSave. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Carefull
cb_description: Carefull operates as a financial safety platform focused on protecting individuals, especially older adults, from financial fraud and mistakes. The company offers services such as identity theft protection, credit monitoring, and fraud detection to safeguard users' financial assets and personal information. Carefull's technology is tailored to address the unique financial vulnerabilities that arise with aging, providing tools and resources to maintain financial independence and security. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ModernFi
cb_description: ModernFi specializes in deposit network services and balance sheet management for the financial sector. It offers products that enable banks and credit unions to attract large-value depositors, manage liquidity, extend deposit insurance, and improve financial stability. ModernFi primarily serves financial institutions such as banks and credit unions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Orangewood
cb_description: Orangewood is a company that specializes in the development of AI-powered robotic arms for the manufacturing sector. Their main offerings include collaborative robots designed to enhance efficiency, improve precision, and ensure safety in various manufacturing processes. These robots are utilized in tasks such as bin picking, visual inspection, powder coating, bartending, and spray painting. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Outset
cb_description: Outset operates as an artificial intelligence (AI) research platform in the market research domain. The company specializes in conducting and synthesizing video, audio, and text conversations with participants, enabling qualitative research with the depth of individual interviews. Its services are primarily utilized by sectors that require strategic and tactical research, such as market landscape analysis, brand equity, and customer experience studies. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Shopline
cb_description: Shopline is a global smart commerce enabler operating in the ecommerce industry. The company provides a full-featured platform that allows merchants to build their online shop, sell products globally, connect with followers, and deliver a seamless omni-channel experience. Shopline primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It is based in Central, Hong Kong.

name: Uptake
cb_description: Uptake is a company specializing in industrial intelligence and predictive analytics within the software-as-a-service (SaaS) sector. The company offers solutions that translate data into actionable insights for predictive maintenance, asset failure prediction, and optimization of maintenance strategies. Uptake primarily serves sectors that require robust maintenance analytics, such as transportation and heavy industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Omnitron Sensors
cb_description: Omnitron Sensors specializes in the development of MEMS technology for high-volume markets within the sensors industry. The company offers innovative solutions for manufacturing MEMS that enhance performance, reliability, and reduce costs, without relying on traditional, inefficient methods. Omnitron Sensors' products are utilized in various applications such as autonomous navigation, augmented reality, AI data processing, image stabilization, and environmental monitoring. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Lightship
cb_description: Lightship focuses on improving the accessibility and quality of clinical trials within the healthcare sector. It offers patient-centric clinical trials that utilize digital health technologies and remote participation to make research accessible and convenient for patients and caregivers. Lightship partners with healthcare providers to deliver seamless clinical research experiences. Lightship was formerly known as DTP Newco. It was founded in 2018 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: ZeroPoint Technologies
cb_description: ZeroPoint Technologies specializes in energy efficiency in the semiconductor industry by improving performance per watt. It offers technology solutions enabling data centers and smart device developers to maximize performance while reducing energy consumption through data compression, data compaction, and transparent memory management. It primarily serves the semiconductor industry, focusing on data centers and smart device manufacturers. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Gothenburg, Sweden.

name: Asimov
cb_description: Asimov specializes in the intelligent design of living systems within the biotechnology and synthetic biology sectors. The company offers an integrated platform that combines synthetic biology with computational tools for advanced genetic design, including the development of GMP host cells, a genetic parts library, and cloud-based design software. Asimov's platform is primarily utilized in the production of biologics and gene therapies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Noteable
cb_description: Noteable provides a collaborative notebook experience. It offers products such as Jupyter notebook delivering software and web services for all programming languages. It offers data collaboration data visualization, and more. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Metronome
cb_description: Metronome is a company that specializes in providing a usage-based billing platform for modern software companies within the financial operations and billing infrastructure sectors. Their platform enables businesses to launch products rapidly, adopt various pricing models, and streamline finance workflows without the need for coding. Metronome's services cater to software companies looking to automate their billing processes, manage pricing effectively, and integrate with various cloud marketplaces and financial systems. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Briq
cb_description: Briq focuses on employee recognition and team engagement within the software-as-a-service (SaaS) sector. The company offers a digital platform that facilitates appreciation and motivation among team members through a system of digital rewards and personalized feedback. Briq primarily serves sectors that require robust team collaboration and employee engagement solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France. In November 2020, Briq was acquired by Swile.

name: Redefine
cb_description: Redefine focuses on risk assessment and mitigation. The company offers an end-to-end service including automated due diligence, real-time portfolio risk monitoring, and active risk mitigation for DeFi investors. Its primary customer base is within the DeFi investment industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Grovara
cb_description: Grovara is a company that focuses on the exports and imports sector, specifically as a B2B Global Marketplace for wellness brands. The company's main service is to connect natural and organic brands with international retailers, streamlining the entire process from product discovery, order processing, to payments and fulfillment. Grovara primarily sells to the retail industry, particularly those interested in wellness brands. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: FitMyFoot
cb_description: FitMyFoot specializes in personalized footwear solutions within the custom orthotics and footwear industry. The company offers custom insoles and sandals, designed using a customer's unique foot shape data, which are manufactured on-demand and aimed at improving comfort and reducing pain. FitMyFoot's products are primarily sold to individuals seeking personalized comfort for their footwear, leveraging technology for a tailored fit. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Mathpix
cb_description: Mathpix specializes in AI-powered document automation within the technology sector. The company offers solutions for converting images and PDFs into editable formats such as LaTeX, DOCX, and Markdown, as well as recognizing handwritten text and chemical formulas. Mathpix primarily serves sectors that require document digitization and data extraction, such as education, research, and software development. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Orby AI
cb_description: Orby AI specializes in generative artificial intelligence-powered automation within the enterprise software industry. The company offers a platform that automates repetitive back-office processes by identifying opportunities for automation and enabling activation of its solutions. It primarily serves sectors that involve complex data and task management, such as finance, accounting, and legal operations. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Battlefy
cb_description: Battlefy offers a turn-key platform for creating and managing esports tournaments, leagues, and content. It allows esports leagues to scale globally at a fraction of current costs. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

name: DataRails
cb_description: DataRails provides financial planning and analysis solutions. The company offers a platform that automates financial reporting and planning, allowing finance teams to continue using their familiar Excel spreadsheets and financial models. It facilitates data consolidation, scenario modeling, and financial reporting, all designed to streamline and enhance the efficiency of financial operations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Sonatus
cb_description: Sonatus specializes in software-defined vehicle technology, focusing on providing in-vehicle and cloud software solutions for the automotive industry. The company offers a suite of services that enable automakers to innovate rapidly and improve vehicle capabilities, reliability, and user experience throughout the vehicle's lifespan. Sonatus' products cater to various aspects of vehicle software, including data collection, security, and over-the-air update management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Ollie
cb_description: Ollie operates as a pet wellness brand focused on providing personalized dog food delivery services. The company offers vet-crafted recipes tailored to individual dogs' needs, along with in-app health screenings to promote better health outcomes. It serves dog owners looking for customized meal options for their pets. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Reno, Nevada.

name: Relai
cb_description: Relai is a bitcoin-only investment platform that operates in the financial services industry. The company provides a user-friendly app that allows individuals to buy and sell Bitcoin instantly, offering a non-custodial wallet for users to manage their investments. Relai caters to both private individuals and businesses, offering services such as auto-invest plans for regular Bitcoin purchases and large volume trading with personal support. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Lucra
cb_description: Lucra is a company focused on real-money gamification software, operating in the technology and gaming industries. The company offers a comprehensive solution that enables businesses to increase user engagement through friendly competition, providing a platform where users can compete with each other for real money. Lucra primarily sells to businesses looking to enhance user experiences and engagement on their platforms. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Greenwich, Connecticut.

name: Veriff
cb_description: Veriff develops an artificial intelligence (AI) driven visionary verification platform. It provides AI-powered identity verification solutions for identity fraud prevention, know-your-customer compliance, and fast conversions of valuable customers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Cynet
cb_description: Cynet provides an agentless solution for the detection and remediation of advanced and unknown threats. Its proprietary product correlates and analyzes indicators from files, networks, endpoints, and user behavior to uncover threats that have bypassed the prevention layer. Cynet was formerly known as Cyber Spear. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Runna
cb_description: Runna offers a personalized running coach application that offers training plans, coaching, and in-app community services. It provides running coaching with tailored plans to achieve goals, from training to marathon coaching. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Armo
cb_description: Armo specializes in open-source Kubernetes security solutions. The company offers a security platform that aims to secure Kubernetes and continuous integration (CI) or continuous delivery (CD), providing services such as automated vulnerability assessment, compliance detection and remediation, and role-based access control (RBAC) configuration. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Meeno
cb_description: Meeno is a company that focuses on personal relationship mentoring. It offers services that provide guidance and support in managing personal relationships. It was formerly known as Amorai. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: MagicCube
cb_description: MagicCube focuses on providing security solutions for digital transactions in the internet-of-things (IoT) sector. The company offers a device-independent platform that secures digital transactions on any device, in transit, and in the cloud, providing a level of security comparable to hardware solutions but without the associated complexity and cost. MagicCube primarily serves the financial technology and retail sectors, offering solutions that transform any smart device into a secure point of sale. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: LogiNext
cb_description: LogiNext Solutions specializes in logistics automation software within the transportation and logistics sector. The company offers a platform that automates operations for a satisfying customer experience, focusing on delivery management, route planning, and real-time tracking. LogiNext serves industries such as retail, e-commerce, food and beverage, and courier services. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Jersey City, New Jersey. In August 2024, LogiNext filed for bankruptcy.

name: Rhombus
cb_description: Rhombus specializes in customizable physical security solutions within the enterprise security sector. The company offers security cameras, access control, sensors, and alarm monitoring services that integrate into a unified, cloud-based system for surveillance and management. Rhombus' solutions cater to organizations looking for security systems. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: BoxHub
cb_description: BoxHub specializes in the online sales of new and used shipping containers in the shipping and storage industry. The company offers a variety of containers including standard, refrigerated, and specialty models, as well as accessories to customize these containers for different uses. BoxHub caters to both individual and business sectors, providing solutions for storage, moving, and a range of industry-specific applications. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Halfdays
cb_description: Halfdays is a company that focuses on the design and production of ski wear and cold weather active wear, operating in the apparel industry. The company offers a range of products including snow jackets, snow pants, lightweight jackets, and various accessories, all designed to provide comfort and performance in outdoor activities. The primary market for Halfdays' products includes the ski and snowboard industry, as well as the broader outdoor activity sector. Halfdays was formerly known as Halfdays, LLC. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: DecisionNext
cb_description: DecisionNext is a company specializing in predictive analytics and risk-aware decision-making within the commodity trading sector. It offers forecasting and analytical software tools that integrate mathematical models with market expertise to improve market forecasting and commercial decision-making. The company primarily serves industries such as meat & agriculture and mining & natural resources. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Vicarius
cb_description: Vicarius operates in the domain of vulnerability management and remediation. The company offers a unified platform, vRx, that consolidates vulnerability discovery, prioritization, and remediation, providing full asset visibility and real-time threat analysis. This platform primarily serves the cybersecurity industry, helping organizations to identify and eliminate security threats before they are exploited. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: Pypestream
cb_description: Pypestream specializes in AI-powered customer experience automation within various business sectors, including insurance, telecommunications, retail, and more. The company offers an omnichannel platform that leverages conversational AI to provide personalized, efficient customer service and support through a library of microapps. Pypestream's solutions are primarily utilized by industries such as insurance, telecommunications, retail, quick service restaurants, travel, hospitality, and real estate. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Vori
cb_description: Vori operates as a company focused on providing a modern grocery operating system within the retail and grocery industry. The company offers a cloud-based platform that integrates inventory management, point-of-sale, and shopper marketing and loyalty, aiming to store profitability and competitiveness. It primarily serves the retail sector, specifically targeting brick-and-mortar retailers, online retailers, and distributors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Chargeflow
cb_description: Chargeflow is a company that specializes in automated chargeback management, operating within the eCommerce industry. The company offers a range of services including dispute management and chargeback automation, which help businesses recover funds from chargebacks without manual intervention. Chargeflow primarily serves the eCommerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: SQream
cb_description: SQream Technologies provides data and analytics services. It offers big data analytics structured query language (SQL) database for ingests and analysis of data. It serves semiconductors, manufacturing, genome, cyber, telecommunication, financial services, and healthcare sectors. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Raydiant
cb_description: Raydiant is a leading provider of in-location experience platforms for brick-and-mortar businesses, focusing on digital signage, employee engagement solutions, and AI-powered location insights. The company offers a suite of products that enhance customer and employee experiences, including digital signage, self-service kiosks, and analytics tools. Raydiant's solutions are designed to drive engagement and revenue for businesses in various sectors such as restaurants, retail, and hospitality. Raydiant was formerly known as Mira Technologies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Supersourcing
cb_description: Supersourcing focuses on artificial intelligence-driven talent acquisition within the human resource technology sector. The company specializes in matching businesses with pre-vetted software developers and managing the entire hiring and onboarding process. It primarily serves the human resource industry. Supersourcing was formerly known as EngineerBabu. It was founded in 2014  and is based in Indore, India.

name: Partake Foods
cb_description: Partake Foods specializes in the production of snacks within the food industry. The company offers a range of products including cookies, baking mixes, and pancake and waffle mixes. Partake Foods caters to individuals seeking healthy, inclusive snack options that can be enjoyed by those with and without food allergies. Partake Foods was formerly known as Vivis Life. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cloover
cb_description: Cloover provides renewable energy as a subscription service. The main service involves offering rental options for renewable technologies, allowing customers to make savings from day one, without any risk. The company primarily serves customers with renewable energy solutions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: TerraMagna
cb_description: TerraMagna specializes in providing innovative credit solutions within the agricultural sector. The company offers working capital financing, receivables assignment, and creates exclusive Fiagro funds tailored to the unique needs of agribusinesses. TerraMagna primarily serves the financial needs of input distributors and the broader agribusiness ecosystem. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sao Jose dos Campos, Brazil.

name: Oxygen
cb_description: Oxygen is a financial technology company focused on providing mobile banking solutions for personal and business finances. It offers services such as cashback rewards, virtual cards, early payroll access, and tools for business incorporation and invoicing. Oxygen primarily serves consumers, freelancers, solopreneurs, and small to medium-sized businesses with its financial products. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Princeton, New Jersey.

name: Helika
cb_description: Helika operates as a data analytics and game management platform focused on the web3 gaming industry. The company offers solutions for user acquisition, marketing attribution, game management, on-chain analytics, and social media sentiment analysis to optimize player engagement, retention, and monetization. It primarily serves game studios looking to leverage analytics for decision-making throughout the game lifecycle. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Hatch
cb_description: Hatch is a web creation platform that specializes in enabling users to design interactive websites without the need for coding. The platform offers a range of tools that allow for the creation of animations, motion, and responsive design elements through a user-friendly interface. Hatch primarily serves creative professionals looking to build unique and engaging online experiences. It is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Statiq
cb_description: Statiq identifies the connection between people, places and locations over time. Its proprietary geo-location products provide an enhanced view of consumer interactions, enriching data sets to enable businesses and marketers to make better informed decisions.

name: Norm Ai
cb_description: Norm Ai specializes in the development of artificial intelligence (AI) agents designed for regulatory compliance within various business sectors. The company offers AI enabled solutions that assist in identifying and mitigating compliance risks, accelerating compliance processes, and enabling scalable and efficient collaboration between AI agents and human compliance teams. Norm Ai's products are primarily utilized by compliance officers and teams across a range of industries to ensure adherence to legal and regulatory requirements. It was founded in 2023 and is based in New York, New York.

name: inVia Robotics
cb_description: inVia Robotics specializes in warehouse automation solutions. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI) powered software and robotic systems designed to orchestrate tasks and improve productivity in warehouse operations. inVia Robotics solutions cater to e-commerce distribution centers and supply chains seeking to enhance efficiency and accuracy. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Westlake Village, California.

name: Peek
cb_description: Peek offers software cloud services, bringing smart apps to market devices from brands globally. The company previously made portable text-and-email wireless devices, with no browser, games or other additions. In January 2012, Peek officially killed off it's e-mail and Twitter devices, focusing solely on cloud software.

name: Merit
cb_description: Merit builds AI-powered technology for hospitals and health systems. Eleanor is a 24-hour virtual assistant for medical clinics that enables patients to simply call or text Eleanor, and through a simple conversation, get help with administrative tasks like appointment scheduling, requesting prescription refills, paying bills, and getting answers to basic questions around insurance eligibility and hours of operation.

name: Litesport
cb_description: Liteboxer offers a fitness platform that specializes in virtual reality workouts within the fitness and technology industry. The company offers a variety of VR fitness experiences, including boxing, strength training, and boot camp, guided by certified trainers. Its services are accessible through the Meta Quest store, providing users with a fitness subscription. Litesport was formerly known as Liteboxer. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Hampton, New Hampshire.

name: Sentra
cb_description: Sentra is a cloud-native data security company that specializes in Data Security Posture Management (DSPM), Data Detection and Response (DDR), and Data Access Governance (DAG). Sentra's platform offers discovery, classification, prioritization, and remediation of data security risks across data estates, ensuring data security throughout its lifecycle. The company's solutions cater to various industries, including financial services, healthcare, and retail. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Sparrow Pharmaceuticals
cb_description: Sparrow Pharmaceuticals operates as a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on developing targeted therapies for endocrinology and rheumatology. The company's main offerings include a proprietary HSD-1 inhibitor used in treatments designed to reduce excess intracellular cortisol in conditions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Paragon
cb_description: Paragon is a recruiting platform that connects quality applicants to opportunities in the cannabis industry. The company's platform masks personal information, allowing qualified job seekers to look into the industry without letting the world know they are interested in cannabis. Employers post listings for free, and applicants "swipe" through opportunities.

name: Keep Company
cb_description: Keep Company focuses on supporting parents and caregivers in the workplace through coaching and group learning programs. The company offers a 12-week group coaching program and a year of dedicated support to help individuals integrate the care of themselves, their families, and their work. Keep Company primarily serves organizations looking to improve employee engagement and retention among parents and caregivers. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Bethesda, Maryland.

name: Miso Robotics
cb_description: Miso Robotics specializes in artificial intelligence and automation for the restaurant industry. The company develops robots like Flippy, designed to assist with tasks such as frying, to improve kitchen efficiency, reduce food waste, and enhance customer satisfaction. Miso Robotics primarily serves the restaurant sector with its innovative kitchen automation solutions. Miso Robotics was formerly known as SuperVolcano, Inc.. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pasadena, California.

name: Vivla
cb_description: Vivla specializes in fractional ownership of second homes within the real estate sector. The company enables customers to purchase shares of exclusive properties, offering them a portion of the home's value and usage time. Vivla primarily serves individuals seeking luxury vacation homes without the full cost and responsibility of sole ownership. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: BrightLine
cb_description: BrightLine is a company that focuses on advanced advertising in the broadcasting industry. The company offers dynamic, interactive, and engaging advertising solutions across various Advanced-TV landscapes, including Over-The-Top (OTT), connected TV, and Smart TV platforms. BrightLine primarily serves the broadcasting and advertising industries. It was founded in 2003 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Crux
cb_description: Provider of a messaging application for college students. The company's social platform allows users to share, discover and chat about things happening on campus. Its goal is to provide a private and public channel for users to communicate and organize activities with their friends and peers.

name: TranscribeMe
cb_description: TranscribeMe lets users upload audio from any smartphone or digital device and get back transcription, words, and reading material, to share, store, search and monetize. By converting audio recordings to text using crowd-sourced transcribers, users can easily search, share and market otherwise useless audio. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: BrowserStack
cb_description: BrowserStack is a software testing platform that specializes in web and mobile application testing across various browsers and real devices. The company offers a suite of services including manual and automated testing, visual review tools, and compliance testing for accessibility standards. BrowserStack serves a broad range of customers, from individual developers to large enterprises, providing tools to improve software quality and streamline the testing process. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: RevOps
cb_description: RevOps is a company that focuses on providing a modern Deal Desk platform in the business sector. The company offers a revenue acceleration platform that enables businesses to streamline their deal-making process, reduce contract errors, and centralize their agreement repository. It primarily serves the sales operations sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Prezi
cb_description: Prezi is a company specializing in presentation software and visual storytelling for various business and educational purposes. Its main offerings include tools for creating engaging video presentations, interactive infographics, and dynamic visual content that can be integrated with popular conferencing platforms. Prezi's products are primarily used by the business and education sectors to enhance communication and learning experiences. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Gecko Robotics
cb_description: Gecko Robotics focuses on ensuring the availability, reliability, and sustainability of critical infrastructure within various sectors. The company offers advanced ultrasonic inspection robots and enterprise software solutions that provide comprehensive data and predictive insights for asset health management. Gecko Robotics primarily serves the energy, manufacturing, government, and maritime industries with their technology solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Nuvocargo
cb_description: Nuvocargo is a digital platform specializing in cross-border trade between the USA and Mexico within the logistics and supply chain industry. The company offers freight forwarding, customs brokerage, cargo insurance, and managed transportation solutions to streamline logistics operations. Nuvocargo's proprietary software, Nuvo OS, provides real-time tracking, data-driven insights, and centralized vendor management to enhance cross-border shipping efficiency. Nuvocargo was formerly known as The Lobby. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ElectroNeek
cb_description: ElectroNeek focuses on workflow automation and integration within the enterprise software industry. It offers a platform that enables businesses to automate repetitive processes using robotic process automation (RPA), artificial intelligence (AI), and intelligent document processing (IDP). ElectroNeek primarily serves sectors that require process automation and document handling, such as the e-commerce, construction, and healthcare industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cedar Park, Texas.

name: Cobli
cb_description: Cobli serves as a company specializing in fleet management solutions within the telematics industry. Their main offerings include a platform for vehicle tracking, driver behavior monitoring, and telemetry for fleet operations. The company serves sectors that require fleet management and operational efficiency, such as logistics and transportation. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Topship
cb_description: Topship is a tech platform that specializes in providing shipping infrastructure for the business sector, focusing on delivery services. The company offers a range of services designed to facilitate local and international deliveries for African merchants. These services enable merchants to streamline their shipping processes and expand their reach to customers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: RightRev
cb_description: RightRev specializes in automated revenue recognition software within the financial technology sector. The company offers solutions that enable businesses to maintain compliance with ASC 606 and IFRS 15 standards, streamline revenue management processes, and provide real-time visibility into financial metrics. RightRev primarily serves businesses looking for scalable revenue recognition solutions across various revenue models, including subscriptions and consumption-based services. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Flow
cb_description: Flow specializes in customer engagement solutions for the financial sector, offering a no-code platform that leverages payment data to drive revenue. The company provides AI-driven tools for segmenting customers, optimizing payment moments, and delivering real-time merchant offers, as well as upsell and cross-sell opportunities, without the need for engineering support. Flow's platform is designed to integrate seamlessly with financial institutions' existing systems, enabling personalized customer experiences and actionable insights. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SafeBreach
cb_description: SafeBreach is a pioneer in the breach and attack simulation (BAS) sector, focusing on continuous security validation for organizations. The company offers a platform that simulates real-world cyber attacks to identify security gaps, visualize control performance, and prioritize remediation efforts. SafeBreach primarily serves sectors such as finance, healthcare, life sciences, and IT/OT environments. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Secureframe
cb_description: Secureframe focuses on providing automated compliance solutions. The company offers a platform that streamlines compliance tasks and manages security and risk. The company primarily sells to the business sector, including small businesses and enterprises. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Darkstore
cb_description: Darkstore is a delivery fulfillment platform that provides eCommerce companies and brands with affordable, on-demand, last mile delivery. Retailers use Darkstore to fulfill their orders for 1-hour and same-day delivery and have them delivered ultra fast to customers by last mile delivery companies like Deliv, UberRUSH and others.

name: UroMems
cb_description: UroMems focuses on the development of implantable medical devices. The company's main product is an automated technology designed to treat stress urinary incontinence, providing an improved quality of life for both women and men. This technology platform is transforming the industry with its ease of use and innovative approach. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Eybens, France.

name: FabricNano
cb_description: FabricNano is a biotechnology company that focuses on transforming industrial chemical processes using cell-free biomanufacturing. The company's main offerings include the development and sale of biocatalysts for high volume industrial applications, which are designed to enable profitable production of sustainable and bio-based chemicals. FabricNano primarily sells to sectors such as startups and international chemical companies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Auxa Health
cb_description: Auxa Health specializes in social care orchestration. The company provides a platform and services that connect individuals to state, federal, and health plan benefits, utilizing proprietary algorithms to match individuals with relevant benefits and assist with enrollment and ongoing management. Auxa Health primarily serves healthcare organizations looking to enhance patient satisfaction, and retention, and improve Star Ratings. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bluewhite
cb_description: Bluewhite specializes in agricultural automation. It provides technology solutions for the farming industry. The company offers a platform that equips existing tractor fleets with autonomous capabilities and integrates a management system and comprehensive support to enhance farm productivity and sustainability. Bluewhite was formerly known as Blue White Robotics (BWR). It was founded in 2017 and is based in Fresno, California.

name: Rhaeos
cb_description: Rhaeos operates as a clinical-stage medical device company. Its product FlowSense offers a wearable skin patch that can assess and monitor fluid flow subdermally throughout the body. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Evanston, Illinois.

name: Farmbot
cb_description: Farmbot is a company that focuses on the development of farming and gardening robots, operating within the agricultural technology industry. The company offers hardware kits and software services that enable users to automate their home, educational, or commercial farming and gardening activities. Farmbot primarily sells to the home gardening sector, the educational sector, and the commercial farming industry. It is based in San Luis Obispo, California.

name: Varda
cb_description: Varda is an ag-tech data service provider focused on enhancing data interoperability and supporting sustainable practices within the agriculture sector. The company offers Global FieldID, a digital platform for the standardization and identification of agricultural land plots, and SoilHive, a web-based platform that consolidates soil data for public and commercial use. These services aim to improve transparency and collaboration across the agri-food supply chain, facilitating the adoption of regenerative agriculture and contributing to a nature-positive food system. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Basel, Switzerland.

name: HireArt
cb_description: HireArt is a company focused on workforce management in the human resources industry. It offers a platform for hiring, employing, and managing contract workers, providing services such as vendor management, worker classification, compliance, and recruiting. Primarily, HireArt caters to sectors such as human resources, procurement, and finance. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cledara
cb_description: Cledara is a software-as-service (SaaS) subscription management platform catering to finance teams within various business sectors. The company offers a solution for managing software spending, providing visibility and control over subscriptions, automating procurement and accounting processes, and ensuring compliance and security. Cledara's platform primarily serves the finance sector, enabling teams to optimize their software investments and streamline administrative tasks. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: New Engen
cb_description: New Engen is a digital marketing agency. It offers services such as media planning, creative content development, analytics, and insights to help brands leverage marketing data and find breakthroughs for growth. It primarily serves clients in the digital ecosystem. New Engen was founded in 2016 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: PaintJet
cb_description: PaintJet focuses on robotics and artificial intelligence in the commercial painting sector. The company offers services such as commercial and industrial painting, specialty coatings, and maintenance and repaint services, all powered by advanced robotics and data analytics. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Hendersonville, Tennessee.

name: Paptic
cb_description: Paptic is a company specializing in the development and provision of sustainable packaging materials within the packaging industry. Their main offerings include recyclable, reusable, and biodegradable packaging solutions made from renewable wood-based materials, designed to replace conventional plastic packaging. Paptic's products cater to a variety of sectors including retail, e-commerce, and food packaging. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Espoo, Finland.

name: Carrum Health
cb_description: Carrum Health is a value-based Centers of Excellence platform that operates within the healthcare sector, focusing on simplifying the payment model for surgical and cancer care. The company negotiates directly with top healthcare providers to offer upfront bundled payments, aiming to provide better care at lower costs for employers. Carrum Health's services are designed to minimize unnecessary procedures, guarantee better health outcomes with warranties, and eliminate hidden costs for patients, primarily serving the employer healthcare solutions market. It was founded in 2015 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Endogenex
cb_description: Endogenex is a medical device company that focuses on the treatment of Type 2 Diabetes. The company develops an endoscopic procedure designed to help patients with Type 2 Diabetes regain control of their blood glucose levels. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Phlur
cb_description:
PHLUR is a digital-first fragrance company that provides transparency into its ingredients and processes, using an intentional balance of materials derived from botany and from the lab to create scents that are safer for the skin and the planet. PHLUR offers customers fragrances, body care, candles, and a line of natural deodorants under the brand Explore Naturals.

On February 24th, 2021, Phlur was acquired by The Center. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Jet HR
cb_description: Jet HR is a company focused on simplifying human resources management, operating in the HR and payroll services sector. The company offers payroll processing, employee onboarding, HR compliance automation, leasing corporate devices, and providing HR consultancy services. Jet HR primarily serves businesses looking to streamline their HR operations and reduce bureaucracy. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: EdgeQ
cb_description: EdgeQ is a technology company specializing in advanced wireless communication systems and artificial intelligence. The company offers a 5G Base Station-on-a-Chip that is fully software-customizable and programmable, catering to the needs of enterprise, telecom, and cloud services. EdgeQ's products are designed for both small cells and macro cells, supporting indoor and outdoor coverage, residential 5G broadband, and mission-critical enterprise applications. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Siren
cb_description: Siren specializes in personal safety accessories, focusing on wearable technology designed for individual protection. The company offers a line of rings that serve as personal alarms, emitting a piercing sound to deter attackers and provide immediate assistance during emergencies. These rings are engineered for both aesthetic appeal and safety, functioning without the need for a smartphone. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Linear
cb_description: Linear is a provider of platform and administration solutions to the financial services industry.

name: Adverity
cb_description: Adverity focuses on data management and operations. The company offers an integrated data platform that enables businesses to connect, manage, and use their data at scale, blending disparate datasets such as sales, marketing, and advertising. It primarily serves sectors such as marketing, engineering, and analytics. Adverity was founded in 2014 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Equinom
cb_description: Equinom develops seed breeding technology. It focuses on developing non-GMO plant-based ingredients that are nutritious, affordable, and sustainable. These ingredients are designed to make meat and dairy analogs delicious, and environmentally friendly. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Givat Brenner, Israel.

name: Composer AI
cb_description: Composer AI is an AI content marketing platform that specializes in creating and distributing digital content. The company offers services that enable businesses to generate blog posts, social media content, and other marketing materials tailored to their brand voice. Composer primarily serves sectors that require consistent and scalable content marketing solutions. It is based in Peterborough, United Kingdom.

name: Ushur
cb_description: Ushur specializes in AI-powered Customer Experience Automation within the technology sector, focusing on end-to-end customer journey automation. The company offers a no-code, cloud-native SaaS platform that enables enterprises to engage customers through conversational AI and automated workflows across various communication channels. Ushur's solutions cater to high-contact industries such as insurance, healthcare, and financial services, providing intelligent document processing and secure, omnichannel interactions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: HubLocal
cb_description: HubLocal inserts optimizes, and manages companies through an integrated digital platform. It connects the lists, maps, and internet directories. The platform connects customers searching the internet for segments, products, or services with companies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Zingtree
cb_description: Zingtree is a software company specializing in building no-code, interactive decision trees that help create agent scripts, guide customers, and manage internal processes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Larkspur, California.

name: AptDeco
cb_description: AptDeco is an online marketplace specializing in the resale of used furniture, offering a platform for buying and selling pre-loved home furnishings. The company provides a comprehensive service that includes professional pickup, delivery, and assembly, facilitating transactions of secondhand furniture from popular brands. AptDeco primarily serves individual consumers looking for sustainable furniture options and those interested in the circular economy. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Indigo
cb_description: Indigo is an education company that focuses on personal development and career readiness. The company offers services such as college and career readiness, social-emotional learning, and professional development, all designed to empower learners and educators through self-awareness, empathy, and freedom. Indigo primarily serves the education sector. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Niwot, Colorado.

name: Eyewa
cb_description: Eyewa is an omni-channel eyewear company focused on providing access to quality eyewear. The company offers a range of products including contact lenses, sunglasses, and prescription glasses, aiming to enable self-expression and confidence. Eyewa primarily serves the consumer retail sector with both online and physical store presence. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: TrueLayer
cb_description: TrueLayer is Europe's leading open banking platform, specializing in the financial services industry. The company offers a suite of products that enable instant bank payments, fast and verified payouts, streamlined user onboarding, and variable recurring payments, all designed to facilitate safer and more efficient financial transactions. TrueLayer primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce, gaming, financial services, travel, and cryptocurrency markets. TrueLayer was formerly known as Finport. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: PURE Property Management
cb_description: PURE Property Management is a tech-enabled company operating in the property management sector. The company's main services include managing residential properties and investing in property management companies, with a focus on enhancing resident and investor experiences through the use of technology.
