The company primarily serves the real estate tech industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Gatos, California.

name: Homebound
cb_description: Homebound operates as a technology-enabled homebuilding company. It offers architectural designing solutions, and home customization solutions, tracks progress, and connects with the team via an online portal. It primarily serves the real estate industry The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Santa Rosa, California.

name: CipherHealth
cb_description: CipherHealth provides health care solutions. The company offers a suite of digital solutions for communication and satisfaction between care providers and patients, as well as to support healthcare organizations. It serves sectors such as patient experience, clinical care, operations, and population health within the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Sight Machine
cb_description: Sight Machine serves as a data platform for manufacturing, operating in the industrial technology sector. The company's main service is to unlock and analyze plant data to help manufacturers improve profitability, productivity, and sustainability. Its offerings include the continuous analysis of all assets, data sources, and processes from machine to enterprise level, enabling manufacturers to make better, faster decisions for improving production performance. Sight Machine primarily serves sectors such as paper and tissue, packaging, chemicals, food and beverage, automotive, glass, life sciences, and machine builders. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Triveni Bio
cb_description: Triveni Bio serves as a biotech company focused on developing functional antibodies for the treatment of immunological and inflammatory disorders. The company utilizes a genetics-informed precision medicine approach to identify novel therapeutic targets and stratify patient subpopulations, aiming to provide insights into disease mechanisms. Triveni Bio's products are primarily intended for the healthcare sector, specifically in the development of treatments for I&I disorders. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Watertown, Massachusetts.

name: Somos
cb_description: Somos operates as a technology company focused on providing internet services. The company offers internet connectivity to its customers, utilizing its FiberWave technology. The primary sector it serves is the residential market. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Medellin, Colombia.

name: Draftea
cb_description: Draftea is a daily fantasy sports platform that allows users to engage in fantasy sports betting. The company operates in the online gaming and sports betting industry. Users can create fantasy teams, enter contests, and win monetary prizes based on the real-life performances of athletes. Draftea primarily targets sports enthusiasts who are interested in fantasy sports gaming. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Housfy
cb_description: Housfy operates in the real estate and home management sectors. The company offers a range of services including buying, selling, and renting properties, as well as providing mortgage services and home-related services such as renovations and moving. It primarily serves the real estate industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Concert Health
cb_description: Concert Health is a behavioral health medical group specializing in the integration of behavioral health into primary care through the Collaborative Care Model. The company offers a patient-centered, treat-to-target approach that improves patient experiences and outcomes while providing a sustainable service line for healthcare providers. Concert Health's services are designed to manage and treat depression and anxiety within primary care settings, utilizing evidence-based methods and a technology platform to support clinical teams. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: ActionIQ
cb_description: ActionIQ is a customer data platform that specializes in audience segmentation, journey orchestration, and real-time customer experiences within the technology sector. The company offers a composable CDP that integrates with various data sources, ensuring secure data management and enabling marketers to create personalized customer interactions. ActionIQ primarily serves sectors such as financial services, media, retail, B2B, and travel & hospitality. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Celadyne
cb_description: Celadyne focuses on accelerating industrial decarbonization within the energy sector by enhancing the performance and durability of fuel cells and electrolyzers. Its main offerings include the development of durable fuel cells for industrial applications and the production of electrolyzers for green hydrogen supply. Celadyne primarily serves sectors that require clean energy solutions, such as utilities, manufacturing, delivery, and shipping. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Bacon Work
cb_description: Bacon Work is a tech company specializing in on-demand temporary staffing within various industries. Their platform connects businesses with temporary workers for warehouse, catering, events, general labor, and commercial cleaning services, offering a flexible and reliable staffing solution. Bacon Work primarily serves sectors that require hourly labor, such as the warehousing, events, and catering industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Provo, Utah.

name: October
cb_description: October ceased operations. October offers a magazine. The magazine offers a beer culture and information site. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Residently
cb_description: Residently is a company that focuses on providing a next-generation rental operating system, operating within the real estate tech industry. The company offers a comprehensive platform that simplifies and automates the resident journey for property managers and institutional owners, encompassing services such as marketing, contracts, payments, maintenance, and renewals. The company primarily serves the real estate industry, with a particular focus on property management and institutional ownership. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Juspay
cb_description: Juspay is a fintech company specializing in payment processing and financial technology. The company offers a payments orchestration platform that facilitates seamless payment experiences, transaction routing, and end-to-end UPI infrastructure to support businesses in scaling their operations. Juspay's main offerings include a full stack solution for checkout experiences, payment gateway orchestration, analytics, and a comprehensive UPI stack designed for high success rates and reliability. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Analog
cb_description: Analog aims to help users with software development, cloud migration and user experience and specializes in engineering.

name: OmniRetail
cb_description: OmniRetail specializes in digitizing the trade value chain within the consumer goods distribution sector. It offers a B2B e-commerce platform, distribution management solutions, and embedded finance services to optimize processes and provide real-time business insights. It serves manufacturers, distributors, and retailers, enhancing their operational efficiency and financial transactions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Chatdesk
cb_description: Chatdesk focuses on customer support for electronic commerce brands. The company offers services such as active engagement, support, call deflection, and automatic customer insights. It primarily serves the e-commerce industry. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Pandorum Technologies
cb_description: Pandorum Technologies provides biotechnology services. It offers proprietary technology that combines therapeutic exosomes with biomaterials to promote the regeneration of human tissues such as the cornea, liver, and lungs. It serves medical research and healthcare. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Immuta
cb_description: Immuta focuses on data security, operating within the technology and software industry. The company offers a data security platform that provides services such as sensitive data discovery and classification, data access control, and continuous activity monitoring for risk detection. Immuta primarily serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare, the public sector, technology, and the software industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Beekeeper
cb_description: Beekeeper operates as an employee communication application service provider. It connects the workforce that includes non-desk workers, regardless of role and location, and can reach, connect, and engage these employees to create new ways of working, without requiring a corporate email or mobile number to log in. It serves hospitality, manufacturing, retail, construction, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Postclick
cb_description: Postclick is a company that focuses on digital marketing, specifically in the domain of landing page optimization. The company offers a platform that enables the creation, personalization, and optimization of landing pages for various marketing campaigns. Its services are primarily utilized by sectors such as ecommerce, education, finance, real estate, and insurance. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Acryl Data
cb_description: Acryl Data specializes in metadata management with a focus on data cataloging and observability within the data management industry. The company offers a platform that enables data discovery, governance, and real-time monitoring of data quality, aiming to provide clarity and control over data assets. Acryl Data's solutions cater to the needs of data teams, providing tools for immediate detection of data issues, streamlining resolution processes, and ensuring data reliability. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Archive
cb_description: Archive was a Computer Hardware & Services/IT Services company based in Culver City, California.  Archive was acquired in 2002.

name: Citibox
cb_description: Citibox specializes in providing a smart locker system for the online package transport industry, offering a solution to the last-mile delivery challenge. Their main service includes a platform that connects package recipients with carriers. Citibox's system ensures packages are received even when the recipient is not at home, contributing to a reduction in CO2 emissions by improving delivery efficiency. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Amitruck
cb_description: Amitruck is a logistics solutions provider specializing in tailored, transparent, and reliable logistics services within the transportation and logistics sector. The company offers advanced cargo tracking, shipping, and freight forwarding services to ensure on-time deliveries for various industries. Amitruck primarily serves businesses requiring logistics and supply chain management, including those in the agricultural, manufacturing, and retail sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Burnt
cb_description: Burnt specializes in automating back-of-house operations for the restaurant industry. The company offers real-time insights, automated accounts payable, predictive procurement, and inventory management to improve efficiency and profitability. It was founded in 2023 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Fairbrics
cb_description: Fairbrics is a company focused on environmental sustainability within the fashion, chemical, and packaging industries. The company's main service involves the innovative use of carbon dioxide emissions to produce synthetic textiles, manufacture essential products, and create regenerative packaging materials. Fairbrics primarily serves the fashion industry, chemical industries, and the packaging sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Villebon sur Yvette, France.

name: Flipdish
cb_description: Flipdish is a technology company focused on providing an all-in-one point of sale and online ordering solution for the restaurant industry. The company offers a suite of products including customizable websites, mobile apps, and self-service kiosks designed to streamline the ordering process and enhance customer engagement, as well as services for restaurant marketing and delivery management. Flipdish primarily serves the food service sector, including takeaways, quick-service restaurants, dine-in establishments, and food chains. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Rise Gardens
cb_description: Rise Gardens specializes in home hydroponic gardening systems within the sustainable agriculture sector. Their products include smart indoor gardens that enable consumers to grow fruits and vegetables year-round, using advanced hydroponic technology that requires no soil and is designed for ease of use. Rise Gardens' offerings cater to individuals seeking a farm-to-table experience, with a focus on sustainability and the nutritional value of home-grown food. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Skokie, Illinois.

name: KredX
cb_description: KredX is a leading provider of supply chain finance solutions, operating in the financial technology sector. The company offers a range of services including working capital solutions, invoice discounting, and cash flow management for businesses, as well as alternative investment opportunities for investors. KredX serves various sectors including enterprises, small and medium-sized businesses, and the global trade industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Guardz
cb_description: Guardz operates as a cybersecurity company in the technology sector. The company provides a platform that offers a range of cybersecurity services including email security, cloud data protection, endpoint security, and risk assessment. Its services are primarily targeted towards Managed Service Providers (MSPs) and business owners. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Chameleon
cb_description: Chameleon is a product adoption platform focused on enhancing SaaS user experiences. The company offers a suite of tools that enable businesses to create in-app guidance such as product tours, tooltips, and surveys without the need for coding, aimed at improving user onboarding, feature adoption, and support. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Bluefin
cb_description: Bluefin, now known as Mantis Innovation, is a national consultant specializing in roof, pavement, and building envelope management within the facility management sector. The company offers asset management services that include assessment, preventive maintenance, leak response, capital planning, design, and construction quality assurance to improve facility performance and reduce costs. Bluefin primarily serves clients with large facility footprints, such as public school districts, freight railroad networks, government services, and nationally dispersed companies. It was founded in 2005 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Dyndrite
cb_description: Dyndrite is a company focused on advancing digital manufacturing through its accelerated computation engine and toolkit. The company offers a suite of software products designed for additive manufacturing processes, including toolpath generation, process qualification, and automation of production lines. Dyndrite's products are primarily utilized in industries that require high-precision and scalable additive manufacturing solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Talmix
cb_description: Talmix is a company that focuses on providing independent business talent through its talent marketplace, operating within the human resources and technology sectors. The company offers a platform that matches businesses with independent professionals to support projects, provide expertise, fill skills gaps, and extend interim leadership. Talmix primarily serves the private equity sector, consultancy firms, and enterprises, providing flexible talent solutions to drive successful outcomes. It was founded in 2010 and is based in London, England.

name: Algenesis
cb_description: Algenesis operates as a material science and technology company focused on creating plastic materials for various industries. The company's main offerings include its Soleic technology, which produces plastic material made from algae, primarily for use in footwear and surfboard manufacturing. Algenesis's products are designed to help reduce environmental pollution and offer alternatives to traditional petroleum-based plastics. Algenesis was formerly known as Arctic Technologies, Inc. It was founded in 2016 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: PermitFlow
cb_description: PermitFlow focuses on the construction industry, specifically in the domain of construction permitting. The company develops a platform that offers various services such as permit preparation, submission, and tracking, ensuring applications for construction projects. PermitFlow serves the construction industry, aiding developers, builders, and contractors. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Atlan
cb_description: Atlan is a company focused on providing an active metadata platform for modern data teams within the data management and analytics industry. The company offers a unified experience for data discovery, cataloging, lineage, and governance, enabling teams to understand, trust, and collaborate on their data assets. Atlan's platform serves various sectors, including enterprises and startups, by integrating with popular data tools and facilitating self-service analytics. Atlan was formerly known as Peeply Technologies Private Limited. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore.

name: Strikingly
cb_description: Strikingly focuses on providing website-building solutions. It offers a platform that allows users to create mobile-optimized websites without the need for coding or design skills. It also provides features such as e-commerce functionality, audience engagement tools, and analytics. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Belmont, California.

name: Tuvalum
cb_description: Tuvalum is a leading marketplace for buying and selling quality pre-owned bicycles within the cycling industry. The company ensures all bikes are inspected, serviced, and certified by expert mechanics to meet the needs of cyclists. Tuvalum is dedicated to promoting sustainable cycling and transforming the bicycle industry through digitalization and exceptional customer experiences. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Valencia, Spain.

name: Vivent
cb_description: Vivent is a company focused on enhancing agricultural sustainability through technology, operating within the agtech sector. The company offers solutions that utilize plant electrophysiology and artificial intelligence to monitor crop health, optimize growing conditions, and detect pests and diseases early. Vivent primarily serves indoor and outdoor growers, agtech providers, and the academic and research community in plant sciences. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Gland, Switzerland.

name: FileInvite
cb_description: FileInvite is a company that focuses on providing digital solutions for document collection in various industries. The company offers a secure portal where clients can upload documents, complete forms, and sign contracts digitally, making the process of collecting information from clients faster and more efficient. FileInvite primarily serves sectors such as banking, mortgage brokerage, accounting, legal services, education, and human resources among others. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: Treasury4
cb_description: Treasury4 (T4) creates data analytics tools and solutions for corporate finance and treasury professionals. The company offers tools for corporate legal entity management, cash management, treasury forecasting, payments, forex management, and advisory. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Spokane, Washington.

name: Vantage
cb_description: Vantage provides systems integration of robotics, sensors, and automation as well as designing complex assembly, test, and sort machines. It offers project management, service and installation, manuals and documentation, and mechanical, controls and electrical engineering. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Livonia, Michigan. In November 2022, Vantage was acquired by Robex. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Dunzo
cb_description: Dunzo is an all-in-one 24X7 delivery platform operating in the quick urban logistics sector. The company offers a wide range of services including the delivery of groceries, food, medicines, pet supplies, and couriering packages across the city. Dunzo primarily serves the ecommerce industry, facilitating instant delivery services for various consumer needs. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Farewill
cb_description: Farewill is a company specializing in end-of-life legal services and funeral arrangements. They offer online will writing, fixed-fee probate services, and direct cremation planning to simplify the process of dealing with death. Farewill primarily serves individuals in need of estate planning and funeral services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom. In October Farewill was acquired by Dignity.75M.

name: Omnistrate
cb_description: Omnistrate is a cloud platform that specializes in transforming software into multi-cloud SaaS offerings. The company provides a service that enables users to convert docker images into SaaS solutions rapidly, with enterprise-grade capabilities and without the need for extensive infrastructure engineering. Omnistrate primarily serves businesses looking to launch or scale their SaaS products efficiently. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Doorvest
cb_description: Doorvest focuses on real estate investing. The company offers an online platform for monthly cash flow, property activity, legal documents, and reports of rental homes. Its primary customer base is in the real estate industry. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Peppy
cb_description: Peppy is a digital health app focused on providing support for underserved health areas such as menopause, fertility, and general men's and women's health. The company offers a range of services including one-to-one consultations with health experts, at-home testing, and access to on-demand health resources and live events, all aimed at improving employee wellness and productivity. Peppy primarily serves enterprises, offering their services as part of employee wellness programs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Coiled
cb_description: Coiled is a company focused on providing cloud-based parallel computing solutions, primarily in the data analytics and machine learning sectors. The company offers services that enable data professionals to scale Python code using Dask, facilitating the processing of large datasets and complex computations without requiring deep cloud expertise. Coiled's platform is designed for seamless integration with existing Python workflows, offering features like easy cluster management, GPU utilization, and cost-efficient resource scaling. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Biofidelity
cb_description: Biofidelity is a genomic technology company focused on developing medicine and genomic analysis technologies. The company offers products such as ASPYRE-Lung, which is concerned with the detection of genomic biomarkers for cancer diagnosis, and ENSPYRE, a genomic enrichment technology that aids sequencing accuracy by removing uninformative deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA). Biofidelity primarily serves sectors such as biopharma, healthcare providers, and patients seeking precision medical treatments. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cambridge, United KIngdom.

name: Encord
cb_description: Cord is a company that focuses on data engineering for AI model development, operating within the technology and software industry. The company offers a platform that enables the development, deployment, and evaluation of computer vision models at scale, with a particular emphasis on creating high-quality training data. Cord primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, agriculture, logistics, and retail, among others. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Highspot
cb_description: Highspot provides an artificial intelligence (AI) integrated sales engagement platform to increase and enhance sales productivity. Its solutions include sales enablement, channel enablement, sales training, marketing, and more. It serves financial services, manufacturing, life sciences, technology, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Weefin
cb_description: Weefin focuses on sustainable finance. The company offers a SaaS platform, ESG Connect, which allows financial professionals to regain control over their ESG data and maximize their impact. Weefin serves the financial sector, including asset managers, asset owners, wealth managers, and banks. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: MVMNT
cb_description: MVMNT focuses on providing freight brokerage software within the technology and transportation industry. Their software offers tools for freight brokers to manage operations, maximize profits, and enhance day-to-day activities on a single platform. The company primarily serves small and medium-sized freight brokerages seeking enterprise-level technology solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Xampla
cb_description: Xampla specializes in the development of natural, biodegradable materials as replacements for polluting plastics within various industries. The company's main offerings include a range of products such as coatings, edible films, and micro-particles, all designed to be processed using existing manufacturing equipment and to biodegrade quickly after use. Xampla primarily serves sectors that require sustainable packaging and materials solutions, such as the food and beverage industry and the homecare products sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: Harmonic Bionics
cb_description: Harmonic Bionics focuses on rehabilitation robotics, specifically in the domain of movement impairments therapy. The company's product, Harmony SHR, is a bilateral upper extremity exoskeleton designed to assist patients with neurological and musculoskeletal movement impairments by supporting the natural scapulohumeral rhythm during arm and shoulder therapy. Harmony SHR is utilized across various sectors including neuroscience research, movement disorder assessment, and rehabilitation, offering precise motion sensing and data capabilities to optimize the treatment process for patients. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: TORQ
cb_description: TORQ is a fitness company offering 3 modes of training: TORQ-CYCLE, TORQ-SWITCH, and TORQ-RELEASE.

name: Destinus
cb_description: Destinus specializes in autonomous flight systems within the aerospace and defense sectors. The company offers a range of products, from subsonic to hypersonic autonomous vehicles, including system design, airframes, turbojet engines, flight software, and AI technologies. Destinus primarily serves both civilian and defense applications with its advanced propulsion and unmanned aerial vehicle technologies. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Payerne, Switzerland.

name: Ambler
cb_description: Ambler is a company that focuses on the healthcare sector, specifically in the domain of medical transportation. It offers the service of centralizing and organizing medical transportation. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, including hospitals and clinics.  The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France. In June 2023, Ambler merged with Sanilea to form Amblea.

name: Pintarnya
cb_description: Pintarnya is a technology startup focused on connecting job seekers with employment opportunities and additional income sources in the job placement sector. The company offers a platform for users to search and apply for verified job listings, create professional resumes, and participate in skill assessment quizzes. Employers can post job vacancies, access a talent pool, and utilize recruitment services to find suitable candidates. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Atavistik Bio
cb_description: Atavistik Bio specializes in the development of allosteric therapeutics within the biotechnology sector. The company leverages proprietary screening technology and AI-enabled platforms to discover and design small molecule therapeutics targeting protein or Ribonucleic acid for the treatment of various diseases. Atavistik Bio primarily focuses on precision oncology and rare diseases, with plans to expand through partnerships in other therapeutic areas. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Grip Security
cb_description: Grip Security specializes in SaaS identity risk management within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a platform for discovering shadow SaaS usage, mitigating risks associated with SaaS sprawl, and orchestrating security measures for cloud accounts. Grip Security's solutions are designed to prioritize and secure SaaS applications by leveraging identity as a control point, without the need for agents, and to automate related security workflows. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Aporia
cb_description: Aporia operates as a company focusing on machine learning (ML) observability within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that allows users to monitor and visualize the performance of their ML models, ensuring they are always operating at their best. Its service is primarily used by data science and ML teams across various sectors of the economy. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: TaxBit
cb_description: TaxBit specializes in tax and accounting compliance solutions for the digital economy, operating within the financial technology sector. The company offers a unified enterprise compliance platform that simplifies tax information reporting and crypto accounting for enterprises, governments, and individuals. TaxBit's platform provides tools for automating information collection, validation, and reporting, as well as integrating digital asset data with traditional financial systems. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Draper, Utah.

name: Freshpaint
cb_description: Freshpaint is a company focused on providing a healthcare privacy platform within the data management and marketing sectors. Its main offerings include a platform that helps healthcare organizations manage their data in compliance with HIPAA regulations, ensuring patient privacy while enabling marketing activities. The platform is designed to replace non-compliant tracking technologies, centralize data collection, and provide HIPAA-compliant solutions for analytics and advertising. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Clikalia
cb_description: Clikalia specializes in streamlining real estate transactions within the property market. The company offers services for buying, selling, and valuing properties with a quick and direct approach, including an initial online offer and the option for virtual tours. Clikalia also provides rental services and assistance with obtaining mortgages, catering to both property owners and seekers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: ICEYE
cb_description: ICEYE focuses on providing synthetic aperture radar (SAR) satellite data and disaster management solutions within the space technology sector. The company offers near real-time insights for natural catastrophes, persistent monitoring capabilities, and an application program interface (API) platform for satellite tasking, enabling data-driven decisions in various sectors. ICEYE primarily serves the insurance industry and government agencies with solutions tailored to enhance natural catastrophe response and recovery. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Espoo, Finland.

name: Prisidio
cb_description: Prisidio is a company that focuses on digital security and organization, operating in the software and security industries. The company offers a secure digital vault service where users can store, organize, and share their most vital documents and information. The service is primarily used by individuals, families, caregivers, homeowners, and those preparing for retirement or relocation. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Naples, Florida.

name: Opyn
cb_description: Opyn focuses on decentralized finance (DeFi) options protocols within the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform for capital efficient investment strategies powered by their proprietary Squeeth products. The primary customers are individuals and entities in the DeFi ecosystem seeking to leverage options for investment purposes. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FlashFood
cb_description: FlashFood offers a mobile application to buy grocery products. The application allows users to buy surplus food products at steep discounts. It offers food products such as cucumber, peppers, mushrooms, meat, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: MiClient
cb_description: MiClient specializes in sales automation and customer relationship management within the B2B SaaS sector. The company offers a CRM platform that streamlines the deal closure process by managing sales pipelines, creating deals, and facilitating contract signing with e-signatures. MiClient's software is designed to increase sales efficiency and accuracy through AI-powered automation and intelligent pricing strategies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: FIRE1
cb_description: FIRE1 focuses on the development of remote monitoring systems for heart failure management within the healthcare technology sector. The company conducts clinical trials for the FIRE1 System, which is designed to enable remote monitoring of heart failure patients. The primary customers for FIRE1's technology are likely to be healthcare providers and patients within the cardiology and remote patient monitoring sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Dublin 11, Ireland.

name: Alba Robot
cb_description: Alba Robot specializes in autonomous micro mobility solutions within the transportation sector. The company offers a platform that utilizes self-driving electric vehicles designed to improve mobility for people with reduced mobility, integrating technologies such as AI and robotics to provide independent transportation services. Alba Robot primarily serves facilities like hospitals, airports, and museums with its autonomous and assisted mobility services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Torino, Italy.

name: Deepspin
cb_description: DeepSpin focuses on revolutionizing the medical imaging industry by developing an AI-powered, portable, and affordable MRI system. Their technology enables high-quality imaging with a significant reduction in cost and size, making it accessible to a wider range of healthcare providers. DeepSpin's products are designed to be easy to use, requiring no specialized infrastructure or cooling systems, and are aimed at improving the standard of care across various medical domains. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: QuadFi
cb_description: QuadFi is a financial technology company. The company offers straightforward loans, with a particular focus on newcomers who may not have a credit score. Their services are primarily targeted towards the financial services industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Zylo
cb_description: Zylo specializes in SaaS Management and Optimization within the technology sector. It offers a platform that provides discovery and inventory management, license optimization, and spend management to help businesses control their software investments. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Smartling
cb_description: Smartling specializes in language translation and content localization solutions within the translation and localization industry. The company offers a cloud-based translation management platform that utilizes Artificial intelligence (AI) to automate workflows, manage content, and provide real-time analytics for translation quality and performance. Its services cater to a variety of sectors that require multilingual content, such as marketing, customer support, legal, and product development. Smartling was formerly known as Pinch Digital. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York.

name: Scoutbee
cb_description: Scoutbee focuses on utilizing artificial intelligence (AI) in the procurement sector. The company offers an AI-powered platform that provides businesses with insights into their suppliers, helping them manage their supply base more effectively. The company primarily serves businesses in need of procurement solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Wurzburg, Germany.

name: The Vets
cb_description: The Vets focuses on providing mobile veterinary services, operating in the pet care industry. The company offers a range of services including wellness exams, sick care, diagnostics, vaccinations, home lab tests, microchipping, and nutrition advice, all delivered in the comfort of the pet owner's home. The Vets primarily serves the pet care sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: BigID
cb_description: BigID specializes in data security, privacy, compliance, and governance within the technology sector. The company offers a unified platform for data visibility and control, providing services such as data discovery and classification, data security posture management, and data privacy management. BigID's solutions cater to various industries including financial services, healthcare, and retail. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Victor
cb_description: Victor is a company that operates in the aviation industry, focusing on private jet charter services. The company offers on-demand private jet hire, providing customers with a wide array of private jets to choose from and the ability to book flights to over 40,000 destinations worldwide. Victor primarily serves individuals and businesses seeking private aviation services. It was founded in 2010 and is based in London, England.

name: Springboard
cb_description:
Springboard combines investment capital with an intensive 13 week mentor-led accelerator program. While the Springboard program is based at Google Campus in London and ideaSpace in Cambridge, it is aimed at ambitious and scalable early stage businesses from both UK and overseas.

In addition to office space, Springboard also provides seed capital, over $150k of free services, and most importantly on site, one to one support from over 100 high calibre experienced entrepreneurs and investors throughout the program plus access to a wider network of mentors and partners. Springboard ends with an Investor Day where the teams present propositions to an audience of Angel Investors and Venture Capitalists.

Annually, Springboard invests in over 30 companies with founder friendly investment terms for between 3-6% equity stake in the business.  Historically, over half of the companies that participate in the programme raise additional investment funding, with alumni teams around the world.

In February 2013, Springboard merged with TechStars. Springboard will operate as TechStars London.

name: Built Robotics
cb_description: Built Robotics is a technology company focused on automating construction tasks in the solar industry. Their main offerings include AI-powered robots for utility-scale solar construction and cloud-based software for remote monitoring and control of these robots. The company primarily serves the renewable energy sector, particularly in the installation of solar foundations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ManiMe
cb_description: ManiMe makes tailor-fitted, ready-to-wear nails made with cutting-edge 3D printing and scanning technologies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: MBrace Therapeutics
cb_description: MBrace Therapeutics is a biopharmaceutical company focused on developing antibody-drug conjugates (ADCs) for oncology. Their main offerings include the creation of ADC therapeutics that selectively target and kill cancer cells using proprietary target discovery technologies. MBrace primarily sells to the healthcare sector, particularly in areas of oncology with unmet medical needs. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Artiphon
cb_description: Artiphon is a consumer electronics company that specializes in designing adaptive instruments to empower musical creativity. Their main products include handheld smart instruments that allow for spontaneous music creation and can be played by anyone, regardless of musical skill. These instruments feature touch-sensitive pads, strumming interfaces, and a variety of built-in sounds that can be used standalone or with digital audio workstations. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: Switchee
cb_description: Switchee is a technology company focused on providing property insights for the social housing sector. The company offers a smart thermostat and a dashboard platform that delivers data to help housing providers optimize energy efficiency, reduce costs, and improve resident satisfaction. Switchee's products are specifically designed for social housing providers to proactively manage their housing stock and improve resident communication. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Wise Systems
cb_description: Wise Systems specializes in autonomous dispatching and routing software for the fleet management sector. The company offers a suite of tools that enhance fleet efficiency and customer service by optimizing last-mile delivery routes in real-time using machine learning algorithms. Wise Systems primarily serves industries that require dynamic routing and delivery solutions, such as wholesale and retail distribution, as well as parcel and courier services. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Mos
cb_description: Mos is a company focused on providing financial aid assistance and advisory services within the education sector. Its main offerings include personalized financial planning for students, a comprehensive database for scholarship matching, and support in applying for college financial aid. The company primarily serves students seeking financial resources for higher education. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Curtsy
cb_description: Curtsy operates as a company in the fashion and technology sectors. It offers an online platform for buying and selling second-hand clothing, shoes, and accessories. The company primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Entrupy
cb_description: Entrupy specializes in AI-powered product authentication solutions within the luxury goods and sneaker industries. The company offers services such as luxury item authentication, sneaker authentication, return fraud detection, and supply chain protection. Entrupy primarily serves sectors such as luxury resellers, sneaker resellers, pawnshops, online marketplaces, retailers, and brands & manufacturers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Clozd
cb_description: Clozd specializes in win-loss and churn analysis within the business intelligence sector. The company offers services that enable organizations to collect and analyze buyer feedback, integrate with CRM systems, and share insights to inform strategic decisions. Clozd primarily serves sectors that influence revenue, such as sales, product marketing, and executive leadership. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lehi, Utah.

name: Excision BioTherapeutics
cb_description: Excision BioTherapeutics operates as a gene-editing technology company designed to treat and remove a large, essential deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) fragment from the human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). It offers a platform for analyzing the on- and off-target effects of probes and integrates computational methods to guide ribonucleic acid (RNA). The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Dropzone AI
cb_description: Dropzone AI specializes in security operations automation within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers pre-trained autonomous AI security agents that conduct thorough, end-to-end investigations of security alerts, mimicking the techniques of analysts. Dropzone AI's solutions are designed to integrate with existing security tools, providing detailed reports and enabling security analysts to focus on threats. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: GCOO
cb_description: GCOO focuses on providing transportation options in the form of electric bicycles and scooters. The company offers a way for individuals to navigate urban areas, reducing traffic congestion and promoting accessible transit options. It primarily serves the urban micro-mobility market. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Xilis
cb_description: Xilis specializes in precision oncology and drug development, focusing on creating technologies that transform cancer treatment and therapeutic discovery. The company offers a MicroOrganoSphere (MOS) technology and Precision Oncology Platform that provide personalized therapy options by predicting patient treatment responses and facilitating the development of new drugs. These innovations serve to guide oncologists in treatment decisions and support the creation of patient-derived models for drug discovery. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Fondeadora
cb_description: Fondeadora provides digital banking services. The company offers a mobile banking application and an international master-card debit card that helps users to spend, store, and move money. It primarily serves the financial services industry. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Democrance
cb_description: Democrance provides software-as-a-service (SaaS) micro-insurance services. It offers services for both insurance companies and mobile network operators automating the value chain of insurance sales from marketing, distribution, underwriting, and policy administration to claims management. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Songfinch
cb_description: Songfinch develops an online music platform. It allows users to select a style and mood for a song that includes stories and memories to help artists craft lyrics, and then have the chosen artist create the song. Songfinch was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: BrightHire
cb_description: BrightHire provides an interview intelligence platform operating in the human resources and recruitment industry. The company offers services such as an interview process, providing real-time interviewer guidance, artificial intelligence (AI)-powered notes and highlights, and actionable talent insights to enhance the efficiency and quality of hiring. Its primary customers are talent acquisition teams across various sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: SpotDraft
cb_description: SpotDraft focuses on the contract lifecycle for businesses through its contract automation and management software. The company offers a suite of tools that enable teams to create contracts using templates, automate workflows, manage electronic signatures, and gain insights from contract data. It primarily serves sectors such as legal, sales, finance, and procurement across various industries. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: NEON
cb_description: NEON aids in the support and expansion of the metaverse's vision. It is based in New York, New York.

name: WHOOSH!
cb_description: WHOOSH! is a company that focuses on tech hygiene, operating within the cleaning products industry. The company offers specialty cleaning products designed to keep electronic devices and screens free from dust, dirt, oil, and fingerprints. These products are safe for all tech devices and are free of alcohol, ammonia, dyes, and fragrances. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Montonio
cb_description: Montonio is a company specializing in payment and shipping solutions for the ecommerce sector. The company offers a suite of services including payment processing, automated refunds, buy now pay later options, and integrated shipping solutions. Montonio primarily serves the ecommerce industry, providing tools to streamline transactions and improve customer satisfaction. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Folia Health
cb_description: Folia Health is a patient-driven health technology company operating in the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that enables individuals to actively participate in their care by tracking their symptoms and treatment observations, which contributes to precision diagnostics, patient-centered drug development, and improved care for complex diseases. Folia Health primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Rescale
cb_description: Rescale is a cloud-based platform specializing in computational engineering and R&D collaboration within the high performance computing sector. The company offers intelligent full-stack automation for big compute and facilitates R&D collaboration on a hybrid cloud, with a focus on security, architecture, and financial controls. Rescale's platform serves various industries, including aerospace, automotive, energy, life sciences, and manufacturing, providing tools for simulation, modeling, and optimization. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Antenna
cb_description: Antenna operates as a marketing and creative staffing firm. The company offers marketing strategy, brand and product management, digital marketing, integrated marketing communications, analytics, and insights. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota. In January 2021 Antenna was acquired by 24 Seven. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Easy Crypto
cb_description: Easy Crypto is a cryptocurrency exchange based in New Zealand that allows users to buy and sell instantly, as well as transfer to wallet addresses or withdraw to bank accounts.

name: Gorgias
cb_description: Gorgias provides a multi-channel helpdesk integrated with e-commerce merchants' back offices. It enables merchants to manage all of their support from one place. It connects all business applications and communication channels to provide support agents with a unified view of their users and sets automatic responses to their requests. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Snaptrude
cb_description: Snaptrude is a cloud-based collaborative three-dimensional (3D) building design tool that operates in the architecture and construction industry. The company offers a platform for architects and interior designers to create parametric models and engage in collaboration, with features such as automated bill of quantities, smart labeling, and 3D rendering. Snaptrude primarily serves professionals in the architecture, interior design, development, and contracting sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Mirvie
cb_description: Mirvie focuses on advancing pregnancy health by predicting complications before they occur within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that analyzes RNA messages from a simple blood test to provide insights into the unique biology of each pregnancy, enabling early detection and intervention for conditions like preeclampsia and preterm birth. It was founded in 2018 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Oso
cb_description: Oso specializes in authorization as a service, focusing on providing security solutions within the software industry. The company offers an API that enables developers to implement and manage access control, including role-based, relationship-based, and attribute-based access controls, without the need to overhaul their application architecture. Oso's services are primarily utilized by software development teams across various sectors looking to integrate advanced authorization features into their applications. Oso was formerly known as Keesh. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Gembah
cb_description: Gembah is a company that focuses on product development in various sectors. The company offers services such as research, product design, sourcing, production management, and logistics. Gembah primarily serves sectors such as baby products, fashion, kitchen and home, pet products, technology, toys and games, and sports and outdoors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Sensors Data
cb_description: Sensors Data offers data analysis services through its user behavior consulting and analysis platform. Its solutions include sensory analysis, sensing intelligent operations, sensor advertising analysis, and more. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Beijing, China.

name: Meniga
cb_description: Meniga specializes in digital banking solutions within the financial technology sector. The company offers a suite of products that enhance digital banking experiences by leveraging data consolidation, customer engagement, and revenue generation strategies. Meniga primarily serves financial institutions looking to improve their digital services. It was founded in 2009 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Luma AI
cb_description: Luma AI focuses on the development of artificial intelligence technologies, specifically in the domain of visual and 3D technology. The company offers services that enable users to capture and experience the world in lifelike 3D, transforming photos and videos into mixed-reality 3D experiences. Luma AI primarily caters to sectors that require advanced visual and 3D technology, such as the e-commerce industry and the virtual reality industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Calo
cb_description: Calo offers customized meal plans tailored to individual nutritional needs and preferences within the food and dietary services industry. Its main offerings include a subscription-based service where customers can receive chef-cooked meals that are personalized to their dietary goals, with the convenience of flexible scheduling and free delivery. It primarily serves individuals seeking convenient and health-conscious meal solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in seef, Bahrain.

name: Neuralink
cb_description: Neuralink focuses on the development of brain-computer interfaces. The company's main product is a fully implantable brain-computer interface designed to restore autonomy to individuals with unmet medical needs, such as quadriplegia, by enabling them to control computers and mobile devices with their thoughts. It primarily serves the medical technology and neuroscience sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Fremont, California.

name: Pina Earth
cb_description: Pina Earth specializes in providing high-quality carbon offset certificates from local forests to finance the transformation of monocultures into climate-resilient mixed forests. The company offers a digitized certification process for forest owners using remote sensing and artificial intelligence, enabling their participation in the voluntary carbon market. Pina Earth's services cater to forest owners seeking to enhance their forest's climate resilience and biodiversity, as well as to certificate buyers interested in supporting local climate protection projects. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: XM Cyber
cb_description: As of November 22, 2021, XM Cyber was acquired by Schwarz Group. XM Cyber provides an automated breach and attack simulation (BAS) platform to continuously expose attack vectors, above and below the surface, from a breach point to any organizational critical asset. This continuous loop of automated red teaming is completed by ongoing and prioritized remediation of organizations' security gaps. In effect, HaXM by XM Cyber operates as an automated purple team that fluidly combines red team and blue team processes to ensure that organizations are always one step ahead of the cyber-attackers. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

name: EasyPost
cb_description: EasyPost provides platform-integrated smart shipping solutions. It allows users to compare rates on shipments, prices, and delivery times for different courier services. Its solutions include data-backed optimization, carbon-neutral shipping, address verification, and more. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Lehi, Utah. In March 2020, EasyPost was acquired by Ruby Has.

name: Baobab Studios
cb_description: Baobab Studios is a leading independent interactive animation studio focused on creating immersive storytelling experiences across various platforms. Their offerings include virtual reality animations that combine elements of traditional film and video games to engage users in interactive narratives. Baobab Studios' content is adapted across multiple mediums, including television series, books, and games, catering to a diverse entertainment market. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: PowerX
cb_description: PowerX specializes in energy management solutions for the restaurant industry, focusing on automation and technology to enhance operational efficiency and reduce utility costs. Their system provides energy use optimization, automated temperature logging, HVAC control, and intelligent alerts to improve food safety and equipment lifespan. PowerX primarily serves the restaurant sector, offering a platform that streamulates facility management and drives cost savings. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Ontic
cb_description: Ontic serves as a leading aerospace OEM specializing in the provision of established, certified aircraft parts and MRO services for the aerospace industry. The company offers portfolio of products and services, including assemblies, and is known for supply chain management, technical support, and product part configuration. Ontic primarily serves the commercial and military aviation sectors. It was founded in 1974 and is based in Cheltenham, United Kingdom.

name: Boostly
cb_description: Boostly specializes in providing direct booking solutions for short-term rental owners within the hospitality industry. The company offers website design, a vacation rental marketing CRM, and educational resources to help property managers increase their direct bookings and manage their online presence. Boostly primarily serves the short-term rental sector, offering tools and services to enhance their clients' independence from online travel agencies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockton-on-Tees, England.

name: Formant
cb_description: Formant focuses on providing data management solutions for the robotics industry. The company offers services such as teleoperation, fleet management, data ingestion and management, and customer data portals. These services enable robotics companies to deploy, scale, and manage their robot fleets efficiently. Formant was formerly known as Archimedes Robotics. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Mill Valley, California.

name: Moonware
cb_description: Moonware specializes in automating airfield operations within the aviation industry. The company offers a Ground Traffic Control platform, HALO, which uses AI to optimize ground crew coordination, equipment allocation, and airfield traffic management. Moonware's solutions cater to commercial aviation, defense, and advanced air mobility sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Yuca
cb_description: Yuca is a proptech company focused on providing uncomplicated living experiences as a service within the real estate sector. The company offers a digital platform for medium to long-term residential rentals, including furnished and semi-furnished apartments, studios, and coliving spaces, with flexible leasing contracts and integrated services such as internet, maintenance, and tenant support. Yuca primarily serves residents, corporate clients, real estate investors, and property developers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Substack
cb_description: Substack operates as a platform facilitating publishing tools for independent writers and creators across various domains, including culture, technology, and politics. It offers an integrated system for newsletters, podcasts, and video content, enabling creators to monetize their work through subscriptions. Substack primarily serves independent writers, podcasters, and video creators looking to establish direct relationships with their audience. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Komunal
cb_description: Komunal operates as a financial technology company focused on accelerating financial inclusion by digitizing rural banks in Indonesia. The company offers a peer-to-peer lending solution to support Indonesian small and medium enterprises (SMEs) and operates a marketplace for rural bank deposit products. It primarily serves the financial sector, targeting rural banks and micro, small, and medium-sized enterprises (MSMEs). It was founded in 2018 and is based in Surabaya, Indonesia.

name: Zilingo
cb_description: Zilingo is a commerce platform focused on the fashion industry, aiding operations for businesses throughout the fashion value chain. The company offers a technology platform that integrates sourcing, wholesale and retail selling, marketing, software, and financial services for fashion businesses. Zilingo primarily serves retailers, manufacturers, and raw material suppliers within the fashion sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore.

name: AppliedXL
cb_description: AppliedXL is a computational journalism and AI company that specializes in autonomous newsgathering systems within the information industry. The company's main offerings include real-time content feeds and analytical insights generated by AI agents, which are designed to identify and articulate newsworthy events and trends for various sectors. AppliedXL's services are utilized by information providers, Fortune 500 companies, and hedge funds to gain early risk detection and actionable intelligence. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: anecdotes
cb_description: Anecdotes focuses on providing data-oriented Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC) solutions. The company offers a comprehensive suite of applications designed to manage compliance frameworks, policies, risks, user access reviews, and monitoring. These applications automate and streamline the compliance process, transforming it from a manual, time-consuming task into a strategic initiative. The company primarily serves sectors such as technology, financial services, healthcare, travel and transportation, and gaming. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Openly
cb_description: Openly is a premium home insurance provider specializing in comprehensive coverage for high-value homes. The company offers customizable insurance policies that are sold exclusively through a network of independent agents, leveraging technology to simplify the quoting and policy activation process. Openly's products are designed to enhance the customer experience and increase agency efficiency. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: AutoNxt Automation
cb_description: AutoNxt Automation specializes in the development of electric, autonomous tractors within the agricultural technology sector. The company offers electric tractors with automated steering and smart features such as crop health analysis, designed to enhance farming efficiency and reduce operational costs. AutoNxt Automation's products are primarily aimed at the agricultural industry, offering a sustainable and technologically advanced alternative to traditional farming equipment. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Hnry
cb_description: Hnry is a company specializing in tax automation and financial administration for sole traders. The company offers a comprehensive service that includes automatic tax calculations, payments, invoicing, expense management, and personalized accounting support. Hnry's platform is designed to streamline financial processes for self-employed individuals, ensuring compliance and simplifying tax obligations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Wellington, New Zealand.

name: Solvento
cb_description: Solvento provides a digital platform for automating financial processes for carriers, shippers, logistics operators, freight brokers, and owner-operators. It helps carriers to collect invoices before the client's payment. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Faddom
cb_description: Faddom specializes in application dependency mapping and visualization of IT infrastructures within the cybersecurity and IT sectors. The company's software provides dynamic mapping of on-premises and cloud topologies enabling organizations to understand and manage their servers and applications and their interdependencies. It caters its services to sectors such as banking, education, and government. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Imvax
cb_description: Imvax provides clinical-stage biotechnology solutions focused on developing patient-specific vaccines and immunotherapy strategies for treating malignant gliomas and other cancers with unmet medical needs. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Personio
cb_description: Personio specializes in providing human resources(HR) software solutions for employee management across various sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for recruitment automation, performance tracking, absence and time tracking, payroll processing, and employee onboarding and offboarding. Personio's software is designed to cater to small, medium, and large businesses,  organizations such as nonprofits, educational and research institutions, and the public sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Neodocs
cb_description: Neodocs specializes in health diagnostics through a digital platform, operating within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers instant lab tests and wellness tracking that can be accessed via a smartphone, providing low-cost and convenient health diagnostics. These services enable users to monitor and understand their body's wellness needs from the comfort of their home. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Pledge
cb_description: Pledge is an algorithm-driven lending platform operating within the decentralized finance sector. The company facilitates the supply of liquidity by users to borrowers through over-collateralized crypto assets, offering fixed interest rates and earnings that accumulate per block. Pledge primarily serves crypto-asset holders seeking to diversify their portfolios with non-crypto assets, leveraging the Binance Smart Chain for efficient transactions. It is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Zenyum
cb_description: Zenyum specializes in Smile Cosmetics and operates within the healthcare sector, offering products and services aimed at dental care. The company provides invisible braces for teeth alignment, electric toothbrushes for oral cleaning, and a range of oral hygiene products including toothpastes, mouthwashes, and floss. Zenyum's offerings cater to individuals seeking convenient and effective dental treatment solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: Swell Energy
cb_description: Swell Energy is a company focused on energy management and smart grid solutions in the clean energy sector. The company offers homeowners and businesses smart energy technology that allows them to achieve energy security and independence from rising energy costs. This includes solar power and energy storage systems that provide uninterrupted electric supply, and a virtual power plant program that networks together smart energy technology users for a more resilient and efficient energy grid. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Santa Monica, California. Swell Energy ceased its operation in August 2024.

name: Lilac Solutions
cb_description: Lilac Solutions focuses on lithium extraction technology within the energy sector. It offers patented ion exchange technology to efficiently extract lithium from brine sources, which is essential for the production of high-energy batteries for electric vehicles and grid storage. Its process is designed to have a lower environmental impact and a higher tolerance for impurities compared to traditional methods. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: GRANA
cb_description: GRANA is a fashion retailer specializing in modern basics and luxury essentials within the apparel industry. The company offers a range of high-quality clothing items made from sustainable fabrics such as cashmere, silk, and organic cotton, designed to provide timeless style and comfort. GRANA primarily caters to customers seeking eco-conscious and artisan-crafted fashion pieces. It is based in Hong Kong.

name: PrecisionHawk
cb_description: PrecisionHawk is a company that focuses on geospatial data analytics, operating within sectors such as energy, solar, oil and gas, and telecommunications. The company offers services that include drone and UAV remote sensing applications and data processing, simplifying the process of flying drones, processing data, and delivering reports. PrecisionHawk primarily sells to sectors such as utilities, telecommunications, solar, oil and gas. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina. In December 2023 PrecisionHawk filed for bankruptcy.

name: Sensefinity
cb_description: Sensefinity is a company specializing in IoT solutions for supply chain management and logistics within the technology sector. They offer a comprehensive suite of services including asset tracking, digital product passports, AI-enhanced supply chain management, and IoT insurance, with a focus on improving efficiency and transparency in cargo and freight operations. Sensefinity primarily serves sectors such as maritime shipping, organized retail, and cold chain logistics, providing technology to enhance asset management and operational visibility. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

name: Anagog
cb_description: Anagog specializes in mobile customer engagement and personalization using edge artificial intelligence technology. The company offers a platform that processes data directly on users' mobile devices, providing insights and personalized engagement without compromising privacy. Its solutions are utilized across various sectors including retail, mobility, telecoms, finance, and insurance. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. In November 2023, Anagog merged with Intent HQ.

name: Loupe
cb_description: Loupe offers a skill-based career-matching app.

name: Balto
cb_description: Balto is a healthcare platform. The platform reduces administrative responsibility for HR teams by guiding employees through open enrollment, protecting them from increased medical bills, and providing benefits guidance. It offers personal health details, predictive analytics, benefits plan details, population health information, and nationwide claims and appeals data. Balto uses AI and input from professional health advocates to provide employee-centric assistance and advocacy at every step of the healthcare journey. It was founded in 2024 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Everyware
cb_description: Everyware specializes in providing cloud-based point-of-sale solutions for the restaurant and retail sectors. Their main offerings include scalable and reliable POS systems, contactless ordering technology, and data analytics tools designed to streamline restaurant operations and enhance customer service. Everyware's products are tailored to meet the practical needs of traditional food and beverage establishments, ensuring smooth front-end operations and seamless integration with various payment methods. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

name: GTM Buddy
cb_description: GTM Buddy is a company specializing in artificial intelligence-powered revenue enablement for the sales sector. It offers a platform that integrates with sales workflows to provide dynamic sales plays, content management, and actionable insights to improve sales conversions. The company primarily serves the software as a service industry, equipping sales teams with tools to enhance their sales processes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Pair Team
cb_description: Pair Team provides clinical operations and patient support solutions through its integrated platform. It offers patient outreach, scheduling, electronic forms, care gap reports, record requests, referrals, and lab coordination to offload the traditional job functions of the front desk and medical assistants. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cobre
cb_description: Cobre provides a financial management platform. It allows businesses to centralize their treasury operations, optimizing processes such as reconciliation, collections, and payments. The company serves large and medium-sized businesses across various sectors, including e-commerce platforms, technology companies, and real estate administrators. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Rigi
cb_description: Rigi is a company that focuses on software localization in the technology industry. The company offers a cloud-based platform that provides dynamic visual context for translators and reviewers, streamlining the localization process and improving the quality of translations. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Ede, Netherlands. In November 2023, Rigi was acquired by XTM International.

name: SquadStack
cb_description: SquadStack is a tech-first company specializing in telecalling outsourcing and sales ecosystem management for various business sectors. They offer a suite of services including AI-powered call quality analysis, lead management, omnichannel outreach, and access to a network of trained telecallers to enhance sales conversions and funnel efficiency. SquadStack primarily serves sectors such as brokerage, lending, e-commerce, health and wellness, and automotive, providing tailored telecalling solutions for each. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Noida, India.

name: OnOff
cb_description: Onoff Telecom is a telecommunications operator that specializes in providing virtual phone number services. The company offers a mobile application that allows users to manage multiple phone numbers on a single device without the need for additional SIM cards, along with features such as VoIP and GSM calling, integrated voicemail, and contact synchronization. Onoff Business caters to corporate clients by offering professional number assignments for employees' smartphones. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boulogne-Billancourt, France.

name: Bandana
cb_description: Bandana is a job search platform focused on connecting hourly workers with employment opportunities in various industries. The company provides a platform where job seekers can find verified job listings with transparent pay and location details, as well as resources to help them in their job search and career advancement. Bandana primarily serves the job market for hourly workers seeking better employment conditions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Watershed
cb_description: Watershed is a restaurant company that offers food and dining. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: OYO
cb_description: OYO provides geological survey services. It operates in many segments such as infrastructure maintenance, management, and more. It was founded in 1954 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: INZMO
cb_description: INZMO is a company that operates in the insurance industry, providing a fully-digital insurance platform. The company offers insurance services for various items such as e-scooters, mobile phones, bicycles, and laptops/tablets, all managed through a digital application. The primary customer base of INZMO is individuals seeking insurance for their personal belongings. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Taurus
cb_description: Taurus is a strategic defense company focused on the manufacturing of light firearms within the defense industry. The company offers a comprehensive portfolio of products including handguns, revolvers, rifles, shotguns, submachine guns, carbines, and firearm suppressors, catering to civilian, military, and law enforcement markets. Taurus is recognized for its commitment to excellence and innovation, with a history of receiving international awards for quality and product design. It was founded in 1939 and is based in Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil.

name: Neurogene
cb_description: Neurogene focuses on the development of genetic medicines, operating within the biotechnology and healthcare industry. The company's main offerings include the development of gene therapies aimed at treating rare and devastating neurological diseases. These therapies are designed to address the underlying causes of these disorders, providing potential life-changing treatments for patients and their families. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Recycleye
cb_description: Recycleye is a technology company specializing in advanced machine learning, computer vision, and robotics for the waste management industry.
