The company provides AI-powered sorting equipment and analytics designed to improve the profitability and efficiency of waste sorting businesses. Recycleye's solutions are utilized by waste management businesses globally to enhance sorting operations through increased purity and outputs. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: MONO
cb_description: Provider of mobile-based media platform. The company provides a mobile application for digital reading via iPhone, iPad, and Android devices. It is designed to provide quality cultural vision for young generation in China.

name: Trifacta
cb_description: Trifacta develops data-wrangling software for data exploration and self-service data preparation for analysis. It offers flexibility to connect data from any source to any application, thereby enabling users to evaluate, correct, and validate data quality, accelerate data transformation, and automate data pipelines. The company serves the financial sector, telecommunication sector, life science sector, and more. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Fransico, California. In January 2022, Trifacta was acquired by Alteryx.

name: Privy
cb_description: Privy provides an e-commerce marketing platform for online brands that helps them build their list, save abandoned carts, and send money-making emails and texts. It also integrates with Shopify and Wix platforms. Privy was founded in 2011 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Lumos
cb_description: Lumos is a company that focuses on data analytics and advisory services in the financial sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform that provides insights from untapped data, predictive modeling, and risk assessment to help grow and diversify small business loan portfolios. Lumos primarily serves the financial institutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Wilmington, North Carolina.

name: Prana Thoracic
cb_description: Prana Thoracic develops medical device equipment services. The company offers the ThoraCore System, a minimally invasive device designed to obtain lung tissue for diagnosis while preserving lung function and improving patients life. Its solutions cater to healthcare providers to enhance early cancer detection and treatment planning. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: ThoughtWire
cb_description: ThoughtWire is a company focused on digital twin technology in the healthcare and real estate sectors. The company offers solutions that optimize the operations of hospitals and commercial buildings by using data from people, processes, and the physical environment to create smarter, safer, and more efficient spaces. Primarily, ThoughtWire sells to the healthcare industry and the commercial real estate industry. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Sisu Global Health
cb_description: Sisu Global Health focuses on the design and commercialization of medical devices. The company's main product includes a handheld autotransfusion device enabling clinicians to salvage, filter, and recycle blood from patients with internal bleeding, providing a solution to global blood shortages. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a particular focus on areas with limited access to donor blood. It was formerly known as Design Innovations for Infants and Mothers Everywhere. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Baltimore, Maryland.

name: Cartona
cb_description: Cartona specializes in streamlining the distribution process within the retail sector. The company provides a platform where retailers can browse, compare, and order merchandise from suppliers, wholesalers, and producers, aiming to save businesses time, money, and effort. Cartona primarily serves the retail industry, connecting retailers to FMCG producers and wholesalers to facilitate efficient business transactions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Giza, Egypt.

name: DroneUp
cb_description: DroneUp focuses on drone flight services and drone technology solutions in the drone industry. The company offers delivery programs, providing businesses with services using drones. DroneUp primarily serves sectors that require delivery services, such as retail, food, and medical sectors. DroneUp was formerly known as Dart Ventures. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Virginia Beach, Virginia.

name: AppliedVR
cb_description: AppliedVR develops a digital therapeutic platform. It provides virtual reality-based treatments addressing chronic pain complexities. It offers a virtual-reality (VR)-based prescription therapeutic for treatment-resistant fibromyalgia and chronic intractable lower back pain. AppliedVR was founded in 2015 and is based in Van Nuys, California.

name: Moss
cb_description: Moss is a company that specializes in the creation of branded environments and exhibits, operating within the events and retail industries. The company offers services such as the fabrication of tension fabric structures for exhibits, graphics and signage for events, and functional branding for corporate offices, museums, healthcare, and educational environments. Moss primarily serves sectors such as the retail industry, corporate offices, and the events industry. It was founded in 1975 and is based in Elk Grove Village, Illinois.

name: Nexkey
cb_description: Nexkey is a company that focuses on smart, secure access control systems in the technology industry. The company offers a keyless entry system that allows users to manage access to various spaces such as commercial offices, gyms, beauty and wellness centers, coworking spaces, and real estate offices using their smartphones. This system also provides intelligent insights on space utilization and occupancy. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Soundtrack Your Brand
cb_description: Soundtrack Your Brand specializes in providing licensed music streaming services for businesses across various sectors. The company offers a commercial music catalog of songs, tools for scheduling music, and features to manage and customize soundtracks for different business environments. Soundtrack Your Brand primarily caters to the retail, service industry, health and beauty, and community sectors, providing them with music solutions that brand and customer experience. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Supermetrics
cb_description: Supermetrics specializes in marketing data integration, offering solutions that connect, transform, analyze, and predict data for various marketing intelligence needs. The company provides a platform that aggregates data from multiple sources and makes it available for analysis and reporting in a user's preferred destinations, such as spreadsheets and data visualization tools. Supermetrics serves a diverse range of sectors, including agencies, ecommerce, large consumer brands, B2B SaaS, enterprises, and SMBs. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: GWI
cb_description: GWI is a company that operates in the telecommunications industry, with a focus on providing internet services. The company offers a range of services including internet, telephone, and wide area network solutions, all designed to provide fast, secure, and reliable access. GWI primarily serves residential and business sectors, with custom solutions designed to meet the specific needs of each. It was founded in 1994 and is based in Biddeford, Maine.

name: Babylist
cb_description: Babylist is a digital platform in the baby product industry that offers a comprehensive baby registry service. The company provides a universal registry allowing parents to add items from any store, curated shopping kits, and access to expert-backed parenting guides. Babylist also extends its services to include health and wellness resources for families from pre-pregnancy through postpartum. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Koltin
cb_description: Koltin focuses on providing healthcare memberships and medical insurance services for seniors in the healthcare industry. The company offers lifetime healthcare memberships that include access to medical specialists, preventive services, and cost benefits on consultations, medications, and laboratory studies. Koltin primarily serves the senior segment of the population, aiming to promote their well-being and independence. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Ciudad de Mxico, Mexico.

name: Cybera
cb_description:
Cybera is a provider of secure virtual application networks to many of the world's top enterprises. The company provides a simple solution to the growing complexity that distributed enterprises face at remote locations in managing payment networks and other sensitive, complex applications. The Cybera ONE platform reduces customer cost and complexity by integrating cloud and premise-based security technology into a single, easy-to-use offering.

On December 9th, 2020, Cybera was acquired by PDI. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Paradromics
cb_description: Paradromics provides data-rate brain-computer interfaces (BCI). It aims to enable treatment options for neurodegenerative diseases and advanced neuroprosthetic limbs for those suffering from amputation and spinal cord injuries. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Cometh
cb_description: Cometh operates as a web3 development platform. The company offers a tool for developers to create and scale web3 applications and games, and non-fungible token (NFT) marketplace creation, with a focus on experiences and zero gas fees for end-users. Cometh primarily serves sectors requiring blockchain integration and NFT functionalities, such as the gaming industry and digital collectibles markets. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: HSL Technologies
cb_description: HSL Technologies specializes in the hydrogen distribution industry with a focus on innovative storage solutions. The company offers a revolutionary process that allows for on-demand release of hydrogen through a chemical reaction, overcoming traditional storage constraints and facilitating safer, ambient temperature transport. HSL Technologies' solutions cater to various markets requiring flexible and easy-to-use energy sources. HSL Technologies was formerly known as HySiLabs. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Aix-en-Provence, France.

name: Mashgin
cb_description: Mashgin is a company specializing in AI-powered self-checkout systems within the retail automation sector. Their main product leverages 3D vision and deep learning algorithms to recognize items quickly and accurately, aiming to enhance the checkout process by reducing transaction times and increasing retailer revenue. Mashgin's technology is utilized across various sectors including convenience stores, sports and entertainment venues, and business dining facilities. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: StayTuned
cb_description: StayTuned is a smart lock screen app that allows users to discover relevant content based on their interests, location and habits. Every time that the user locks their phone, they gets a preview of something relevant, having the option to directly access it (swipe left) or access the mobile (swipe right) as they normally do. Staytuned learns from the user behavior and every time increases the relevancy of the displayed content.

name: TransactionLink
cb_description: TransactionLink is a company that specializes in KYB/KYC automation, operating within the FinTech and digital platforms industry. It offers services that streamline the onboarding process for merchants and businesses, automate due diligence, and manage credit risk checks. Its primary market includes payment providers, marketplaces, and digital platforms. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

name: VoltServer
cb_description: VoltServer specializes in power distribution solutions, focusing on the delivery of Digital Electricity across various industries. The company offers Digital Electricity Transmitters, Receivers, and Accessories designed to provide efficient, safe, and reliable power distribution for a range of applications. VoltServer's technology is utilized in sectors such as wireless network densification, intelligent building management, indoor agriculture, and industrial manufacturing. It was founded in 2011 and is based in East Greenwich, Rhode Island.

name: DataGrail
cb_description: DataGrail develops a privacy compliance and regulation platform. It provides a privacy control center where legal, security, and executive teams can run impactful privacy programs and understand the risks of companies. It offers services to automate and scale privacy and stay compliant with different regulatory reforms. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: C12 Quantum Electronics
cb_description: C12 Quantum Electronics focuses on quantum computing technology within the quantum computing industry. The company specializes in developing quantum processors using carbon nanotubes, aiming to create a scalable and reliable quantum computing platform. The company primarily serves research partners, investors, and industry partners interested in quantum computing. C12 Quantum Electronics was formerly known as CNT Nanotech. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Perci Health
cb_description: Perci Health is a virtual care clinic specializing in providing personalized healthcare and support for people with cancer. The company offers one-on-one appointments with NHS-registered cancer specialists and creates tailored healthcare plans, encompassing a range of services from psychological support to physical rehabilitation and dietary guidance. Perci Health primarily serves individuals living with cancer and their caregivers, offering access to a multidisciplinary team of experts through a digital platform. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: CowryWise
cb_description: CowryWise is a fintech company focused on providing online financial services in the wealth management domain. The company offers a platform for individuals to automate their savings, earn higher interest rates than traditional banks, and invest in a diversified global portfolio. CowryWise also provides business services to help companies invest idle cash and a developer API to integrate investment services into third-party apps. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Tagworks Pharmaceuticals
cb_description: Tagworks Pharmaceuticals focuses on developing innovative cancer treatments. The company specializes in click-to-release technology to reduce the toxicity of systemic therapies, including antibody-drug conjugates and immunomodulators. Tagworks Pharmaceuticals primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on oncology and precision medicine. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Nijmegen, Netherlands.

name: Elligo Health Research
cb_description: Elligo Health Research focuses on accelerating clinical trials within the healthcare and research sectors. The company offers services such as patient recruitment, engagement, travel services, and technology solutions to enable clinical trials, including remote and decentralized trials. Elligo Health Research primarily serves the pharmaceutical, biotechnology, and medical device industries by facilitating clinical research through its network of healthcare and research sites. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: BallotReady
cb_description: BallotReady is a company focused on enhancing democratic processes in the United States, operating within the civic technology sector. The company provides personalized ballots and nonpartisan information to voters, along with tools to facilitate early voting, vote-by-mail, and voter turnout. Additionally, under the CivicEngine brand, it offers a digital platform for companies and organizations to recruit candidates and inform voters. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Nanome
cb_description: Nanome specializes in virtual reality solutions for drug design and molecular visualization within the pharmaceutical and educational sectors. The company offers a platform for collaborative scientific research, enabling users to simulate and analyze 3D molecular structures and engage in real-time collaboration. Nanome's services cater to a diverse range of professionals, including medicinal chemists, computational chemists, structural biologists, and crystallographers, as well as educational institutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Nauto
cb_description: Nauto is an AI development company that specializes in the automotive industry, focusing on enhancing vehicle safety and operational efficiency. The company offers an AI-powered safety operation management platform that detects driver distractions in real-time and provides collision warnings, contributing to the reduction of traffic accidents and the advancement of sustainable living through safer mobility. Nauto's solutions are primarily utilized within the automotive sector, catering to companies seeking to improve fleet safety and operational management. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Kargo
cb_description: Kargo specializes in logistics technology, focusing on shipping and receiving automation within the supply chain industry. The company offers solutions such as automated scanning, damage detection, shipment and load verification, and inventory management, all designed to optimize operations and enhance supply chain visibility. Kargo's technology primarily serves sectors that require advanced logistics and inventory management, including those needing compliance with the Food Safety Modernization Act (FSMA). Kargo was formerly known as CogniSense. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Valimail
cb_description: Valimail focuses on identity-based anti-phishing solutions within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a cloud-native platform for validating and authenticating sender identity to prevent phishing, protect brands, and ensure compliance. Its main services include monitoring, enforcing, and amplifying email security protocols to provide continuous protection of domains. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Stratyfy
cb_description: Stratyfy specializes in providing interpretable AI solutions within the financial sector. The company offers products that enhance decision-making in credit risk assessment, fraud detection, and compliance, aiming to make financial decisions more accurate, efficient, and fair. Stratyfy primarily serves financial institutions looking to leverage AI for data-driven growth and risk management. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Hyperface
cb_description: Hyperface is a technology company that operates in the financial services sector, specifically focusing on credit card and 'Pay Later' solutions. The company offers a pre-integrated Credit-cards-as-a-Service platform for brands, enabling them to launch credit card programs rapidly, and a white-label 'Buy Now Pay Later' solution stack for tailored 'Pay Later' programs. Hyperface primarily serves the fintech industry, providing services to neo banks, e-commerce businesses, and emerging lending tech companies. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Clarifruit
cb_description: Clarifruit focuses on providing quality control solutions. The company offers an automated, end-to-end quality control service that facilitates fast, objective, and consistent quality control and management of fresh fruits and vegetables. Its primary customers include growers, marketing companies, wholesalers, and retailers in the fresh produce supply chain. Clarifruit was formerly known as AclarTech. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Rishon Lezion, Israel.

name: Watchmaker Genomics
cb_description: Watchmaker Genomics is a company that focuses on the intersection of biology, engineering, and computer science, operating within the life sciences industry. The company offers precision tools for life science, including DNA and RNA library preparation kits, which are used to prepare samples for next-generation sequencing, a method used to study genetic material. These tools are designed to improve the accuracy and relevance of data derived from various sample types. Watchmaker Genomics was formerly known as Alpha Catalyst Genomics, Inc.. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Primer
cb_description: Primer builds and deploys mission-ready artificial intelligence (AI) solutions meeting defense and security needs. It serves analysts, operators, and decision-makers to take out insights from proprietary datasets. It caters to U.S. government, strategic allies, and Fortune 100 companies which use it to extract timely insight and decision advantage from massive datasets. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Onward
cb_description: Onward created a visual bot builder to allow users to quickly build chat decision trees that could help address their customers requests while also knowing when it was time to hand things off to a human.

name: UrbanPiper
cb_description: UrbanPiper specializes in SaaS solutions for the restaurant and food service industry, focusing on streamlining online order management and operations. The company offers a suite of products that integrate with point-of-sale (POS) systems to manage orders from various food delivery platforms, create self-branded ordering websites and apps, and provide centralized reporting for business analytics. UrbanPiper primarily serves the restaurant industry, including cloud kitchens and food chains, by offering tools to enhance operational efficiency and customer experience. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: LTK
cb_description:
LTK offers advanced logistics solutions for the supply chain.

On February 12th, 2020, LTK was acquired by Rhenus Logistics. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: MyGate
cb_description: MyGate is a leading provider of technology solutions for community management, focusing on gated societies. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including a security management system, ERP, and accounting management to streamline operations and enhance communication within housing societies. MyGate primarily serves the real estate sector, offering its solutions to improve the safety, connectivity, and overall management of residential communities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: RightWay
cb_description: RightWay is a company that focuses on providing business advice and accounting services in various sectors. The company offers a range of services including business consulting, accounting, bookkeeping, payroll, and support for Xero accounting software. These services are designed to help businesses optimize their operations, manage their finances effectively, and achieve their growth goals. It is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: Resilinc
cb_description: Resilinc provides supply chain solutions and allows companies to access multi-tier mapping and part-origin intelligence. Its services include autonomous artificial intelligence (AI) mapping with analytics regarding vulnerabilities, risk scores, and revenue impact to predict critical failure points in their supply chain. It provides its services to various industries such as automotive, aerospace and defense, healthcare, semiconductor, and other industries. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: VAMA
cb_description: VAMA provides ecotechnology products for pest control. It offers products such as EcoBarrier Eliminator which kills bed bugs and EcoBarrier Prevention which prevents and repels bed bugs from colonizing. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Satispay
cb_description: Satispay is a financial technology company focused on simplifying payments through its mobile application within the digital payments industry. The company offers a platform for individuals to send and receive money, pay in stores and online, and save with features like cashback, while businesses can benefit from a payment method with low commission fees. Additionally, Satispay provides digital meal vouchers as part of its welfare solutions for companies and their employees. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg.

name: Archlet
cb_description: Archlet is a company that focuses on strategic sourcing and analytics in the procurement industry. The company offers an end-to-end sourcing platform that includes request for information (RFI) to request for quotation (RFQ) and negotiation, advanced sourcing analytics, and scenario optimization to support decision-making. It primarily serves procurement teams across various industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Octane
cb_description: Octane is a digital marketing firm, providing email marketing services, as well as SMS and web marketing solutions to enterprises.

name: ATLAS
cb_description: ATLAS is a leading operator in the commercial office space industry, focusing on space services, asset operations, and value enhancement. The company provides professional and excellent operation management services, including project planning and positioning, design and transformation implementation, engineering consulting, merchant management and intelligent operation, asset transaction consulting, office services, and corporate services. It primarily serves asset holders and users, aiming to maximize space efficiency and asset value. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Guangzhou, Guangdong.

name: Albedo
cb_description: Albedo specializes in developing low-flying satellites for capturing visible and thermal imagery, operating within the aerospace and defense industry. The company's main offerings include providing aerial-quality imagery that supports a wide range of applications such as mapping, insurance, and national security. Albedo's imagery products are designed to fuel insights across various industries including agriculture, infrastructure sustainability, and more. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Broomfield, Colorado.

name: KarmaCheck
cb_description: KarmaCheck operates as a software company enabling the pre-employment background check. It provides an employee background check verification platform. It streamlines and optimizes onboarding, helps to avoid hiring mistakes, and meets hiring targets. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Axle Health
cb_description: Axle Health specializes in providing workforce management solutions for in-home healthcare delivery, focusing on workforce management and patient engagement. Its platform offers features such as automated scheduling, route optimization, patient communication, and integrations with existing medical systems. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, increasing the efficiency and effectiveness of in-home care services. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Claymont, Delaware.

name: Investree
cb_description: Investree is a marketplace lending platform that provides digital business solutions and financing options for small and medium enterprises (SMEs). The company offers working capital loans and investment opportunities with measured risks to both borrowers and lenders, focusing on supply chain finance products without the need for fixed asset collateral. Investree primarily serves the financial technology sector, with a mission to foster financial inclusion for SMEs. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

name: House Rx
cb_description: House Rx is a service provider focused on enhancing the specialty pharmacy experience within the healthcare sector. The company offers a technology platform and pharmacy service that enable clinics to dispense specialty medications directly to patients, aiming to improve patient care, reduce healthcare costs, and streamline the prescriber experience. House Rx primarily serves the healthcare industry, including independent community practices and integrated health systems. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Handle
cb_description: Handle is a company that specializes in construction payment management software. Their main offerings include lien rights management, waiver exchange, and online payment solutions designed to streamline the payment process for construction businesses. These tools help users ensure compliance with state regulations, optimize job information, and facilitate efficient waiver management and payment reconciliation. Handle was formerly known as Handl. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Obsidian Security
cb_description: Obsidian Security specializes in providing comprehensive security solutions for Software as a Service (SaaS) applications within the cybersecurity industry. Their services focus on protecting business-critical applications by mitigating threats and reducing risks. The company primarily caters to businesses seeking to secure their SaaS environments. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Newport Beach, California.

name: Shapr3D
cb_description: Shapr3D is a company focused on providing intuitive computer-aided design (CAD) tools for design and manufacturing teams across various industries. Their main offerings include a multidevice CAD tool that integrates with the Siemens Parasolid engine for real-time 3D modeling and parametric design, enabling the creation of manufacturing-ready models. Shapr3D's products facilitate concepting, prototyping, engineering handoff, and design review processes, enhancing collaboration and efficiency in the product development journey. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Budapest, Hungary.

name: Nutromics
cb_description: Nutromics specializes in healthcare innovation with a focus on continuous diagnostic monitoring technologies. The company offers a lab-on-a-patch product that utilizes DNA-based sensors and microneedles to provide real-time health data collection for various clinical targets. This technology aims to improve patient outcomes and reduce healthcare costs by providing continuous and dynamic monitoring capabilities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Melbourne, Victoria.

name: RealFevr
cb_description: RealFevr is a company that focuses on the intersection of gaming, blockchain, and sports, operating within the Web3 gaming industry. The company offers licensed sports digital collectibles and innovative video games, with a particular emphasis on football digital collectibles in video format. These collectibles are not only items of interest for collectors, but also playable items in RealFevr's Web3 game, the 'FEVR Battle Arena'. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Lisboa, Portugal.

name: TrusTrace
cb_description: TrusTrace specializes in supply chain traceability software for the fashion, footwear, and textile industries. It offers a platform that provides sustainable supplier management, supply chain mapping, and real-time traceability to help businesses manage risk, prove regulatory compliance, and improve sustainability impact. The company primarily serves sectors such as fashion, footwear, and textiles that require detailed supply chain documentation and compliance. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: RedCircle
cb_description: RedCircle focuses on podcast hosting and revenue growth. The company offers services such as podcast hosting with unlimited episodes and downloads, dynamic insertion of promotions and announcements, and an advertising platform to connect podcasters with brands. RedCircle primarily serves the digital media and advertising sectors. RedCircle was formerly known as SeedCast. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Zeliq
cb_description: Zeliq provides solutions for sales and revenue teams in the lead generation and engagement sector. Its offerings include access to a database of leads, tools for engaging these leads, and a workspace for sales and marketing efforts. Zeliq's platform is designed to support the sales process, and CRM data quality, and facilitate multi-channel outreach with AI personalization. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Chingari
cb_description: Chingari is a Computer Hardware & Services/IT Services company based in Palo Alto, California. Chingari's investors include Azure Capital Partners, Charter Venture Capital and InterWest Partners.

name: Encellin
cb_description: Encellin is focused on therapies within the biotechnology sector, specifically targeting endocrine disorders. The company has developed an Encapsulated Cell Replacement Therapy (EnCRT) that functions as a minimally invasive implant to deliver therapeutics for chronic diseases. Encellin's technology is primarily utilized in the management of type 1 diabetes through its cell encapsulation platform. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: GetSetup
cb_description: GetSetUp is a company focused on providing online learning opportunities for older adults, operating within the education technology sector. The company offers an interactive learning platform designed to help individuals over 55 learn new skills, connect with others, and engage in new life experiences. Its services cater to a global audience of older adults seeking personal growth and community engagement. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Hypatos
cb_description: Hypatos develops artificial intelligence systems to automate document data capturing and processing. Its technology captures data points from documents, performs validations, and automates processes, like accounting, travel and expenses, loan underwriting, and claims processing. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Potsdam, Germany.

name: SiTration
cb_description: SiTration creates filtration membranes for separations in the harshest environments. Its technology can potentially eliminate the need for energy- and resource-intensive chemical and thermal separation methods when recycling materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel from used EV batteries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Tenyks
cb_description: Tenyks specializes in advancing computer vision technology through its MLOps monitoring and validation platform. The company offers solutions for curating computer vision data, model diagnostics, and enhancing data quality. It primarily serves sectors that require advanced computer vision capabilities, such as agriculture, automotive, healthcare, and industrial safety. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: Aye
cb_description: Aye Finance specializes in providing loans to small and micro enterprises. The company offers a variety of financial products including secured and unsecured loans to meet the working capital requirements of these businesses. Aye Finance serves the financial sector by enabling access to credit for underserved micro enterprises in India. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Terraformation
cb_description: Terraformation is a company focused on native biodiverse reforestation with an emphasis on solving climate change through ecological means. The company offers services that include the generation of biodiverse carbon credits, customization of forest carbon portfolios, and providing technology, training, and support for forest restoration projects. Terraformation's software, Terraware, is designed to track and manage reforestation projects, ensuring ecological soundness and community involvement. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Kamuela, Hawaii.

name: Axle Energy
cb_description: Axle Energy specializes in energy flexibility solutions within the renewable energy sector. The company offers a platform that connects electric vehicles, electric heating, solar panels, and energy storage systems to flexible markets, enabling users to manage and monetize their home energy assets. It primarily serves sectors that require integration with energy flexibility markets, such as the renewable energy industry and smart home technology providers. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: deepset
cb_description: deepset specializes in natural language processing (NLP) and artificial intelligence (AI), providing solutions for enterprise AI teams. The company offers deepset Cloud, an LLM platform that enables the design, deployment, and monitoring of AI applications, and Haystack, an open-source NLP framework for building applications with LLMs. deepset primarily serves sectors such as finance, legal, insurance, and online media. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Silverflow
cb_description: Silverflow focuses on payment technology within the financial services industry. It offers a cloud-based card payment processing platform that provides a direct connection to card networks, offering real-time insights and automatic updates. The company serves payment service providers, payment facilitators, acquirers, and merchants. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: R3
cb_description: R3 is an independent global marketing consultancy focused on enhancing the return on marketing, media, and agency investments across various industries. The company offers services such as agency relationship management, media strategy optimization, and marketing efficiency audits to improve client efficiency and effectiveness. R3 primarily serves large advertisers and marketers, working with some of the world's top companies to optimize their marketing strategies and agency partnerships. It was founded in 2002 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BuuPass
cb_description: BuuPass operates as a digital marketplace specializing in the transportation domain providing an online platform for urban travelers to book travel tickets. The company offers a service that allows customers to reserve bus seats and process payments, facilitating convenient travel arrangements. It primarily serves the transportation industry. BuuPass was formerly known as Magic Bus Ticketing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: FunNow
cb_description: FunNow is an instant booking app that helps locals to find new things to do in their cities. The company tailors its technology platform to local users and relies on a patented algorithm that makes real-time availability calculations to prevent overbookings by syncing with merchant databases. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. In September 2023, FunNow merges with Eatigo.

name: Fourier Intelligence
cb_description: Fourier Intelligence is a technology-driven company specializing in the development of exoskeleton and rehabilitation robotics within the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of products designed to aid in upper and lower limb mobility, balance and coordination, as well as electrical stimulation therapy for rehabilitation purposes. Fourier Intelligence primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a focus on rehabilitation centers and clinics. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Filo
cb_description: Filo develops a small electronic tracker device designed to find and locate valuables. Its smart Bluetooth tracker device can be connected to the belongings and relocated later with smartphones and an application that makes the device ring. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Rome, Italy. In May 2023, Filo was acquired by Traveler Innovations. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: wherEX
cb_description: wherEX is a B2B software company focused on providing procurement and financial solutions. The company offers a digital platform that connects businesses with a supplier ecosystem, streamlines purchasing and accounts payable processes, and enhances strategic sourcing and financial decision-making with advanced technology and analytics. wherEX was formerly known as AQMarket. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

name: MarcoPolo Learning
cb_description: MarcoPolo Learning is an award-winning early childhood education company that specializes in content and technology development for educational purposes. The company offers a suite of products including a platform for educators to enhance classroom instruction, a family-oriented app to support learning at home, and professional development series for educators. MarcoPolo Learning primarily serves the education technology sector, focusing on early childhood learning. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Autobooks
cb_description: Autobooks is a financial technology company specializing in small business banking solutions within the financial services industry. The company offers integrated services such as online invoicing, digital payment acceptance, and comprehensive accounting and bookkeeping functionalities. Autobooks partners with banks and credit unions to provide these services seamlessly within existing online and mobile banking platforms. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: ReloShare
cb_description: ReloShare operates as a technology company. The company offers a hotel booking platform that enables social services agencies to reserve rooms for their clients, including the ability to book under an alias for anonymity. Primarily, ReloShare caters to the social services industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Stride Health
cb_description: Stride Health is a healthcare technology company. The company offers a platform that simplifies insurance, finances, and tax-related complexities, providing access to health, dental, vision, and life insurance plans, as well as tools for income tracking, tax support, and expense tracking. It primarily serves the gig economy, catering to freelancers, entrepreneurs, and other independent workers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Pomelo
cb_description: Pomelo is a leading omnichannel fashion platform offering a wide range of on-trend clothing and accessories. The company provides a unique shopping experience where customers can shop online, try on items at a physical location, and pay only for what they keep. Pomelo is also committed to eco-conscious fashion through its Down To Earth initiative, offering stylish and sustainable products. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

name: Rohirrim
cb_description: Rohirrim specializes in RFP automation using generative AI technology within the aerospace, defense, and Fortune 1000 business sectors. The company's main offerings include organization-specific data to produce accurate RFP responses. Rohirrim primarily serves enterprises in the B2B, defense contracting, government procurement, and higher education sectors. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Reston, Virginia.

name: Nomic
cb_description: Nomic allows users to connect on a deeper level with their favorite businesses.

name: 8fig
cb_description: 8fig specializes in providing customizable funding and financial tools for the electronic-commerce sector. The company offers artificial intelligence-driven solutions to help eCommerce sellers manage cash flow, create growth plans, and optimize their online stores. These services are designed to support sellers in reaching significant revenue milestones without the need for equity, credit checks, or collateral. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Dipsea
cb_description: Dipsea is a company specializing in the creation of spicy audiobooks within the entertainment and media industry. They offer a range of romantic audio stories crafted by writers and narrators. The company primarily caters to the digital entertainment sector with a focus on romance content for women. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California. In September 2024, Dipsea was acquired by RevenueCat.

name: Sitka
cb_description: Sitka operates as a telehealth company. The company's main service is a platform that enables primary care providers to request video consultations, known as vConsults, from a network of specialists to assist in patient diagnosis and care. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on primary care providers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Washington, DC. In November 2023, Sitka merged with AristaMD.

name: Syzygy Plasmonics
cb_description: Syzygy Plasmonics is a decarbonization company focused on the chemical industry. It specializes in manufacturing all-electric chemical reactors that utilize light-driven chemistry to produce molecules. It serves sectors such as the production of clean hydrogen and fuels. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: BlueConic
cb_description: BlueConic operates as a company providing a customer data platform. The company's main service is to unify first-party data from various systems, for businesses to help build customer relationships and support a range of growth-focused initiatives, including customer lifecycle orchestration, modeling and analytics, digital products and experiences, and audience-based monetization. It serves the data management and analytics industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: DeHaat
cb_description: DeHaat is a company focused on agricultural technology and services within the Agri-Tech sector. The company offers an online marketplace that connects farmers with suppliers and buyers, providing a suite of services including agricultural inputs, advisory, health and growth monitoring, output management, farm intelligence, and financial services. DeHaat primarily serves the agricultural industry, catering to farmers, micro-entrepreneurs, and institutional buyers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Paradox
cb_description: Paradox is a Scandinavian production company behind Erik Poppe's "U-July 22".

name: Tapcheck
cb_description: Tapcheck is a financial wellness company that specializes in earned wage access services. The company provides an on-demand pay platform that allows employees to access their earned wages before the traditional payday, and offers a Tapcheck Mastercard for wage transfers and purchases. Tapcheck primarily serves the human resources and employee benefits sectors by integrating with employers' existing payroll systems. Tapcheck was formerly known as Prime Business Group, Inc.. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tarzana, California.

name: StudySmarter
cb_description: StudySmarter operates as an education technology company focusing on developing a platform for lifelong learning. The company offers a learning application with tools for creating study materials, finding the best flashcards, making notes, setting weekly learning goals, and more, all powered by artificial intelligence (AI). It primarily serves the education sector, catering to students and learners worldwide. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: FreedomPop
cb_description: FreedomPop is a wireless internet provider committed to delivering free internet with 4G broadband wireless internet access. FreedomPop's partnered with wholesale 4G Wimax and 4G LTE wireless internet networks to deliver fast mobile broadband internet and offer the flexibility of wireless internet.

name: Fable
cb_description: Fable offers plant-based meat alternative products made from shiitake mushrooms, coconut oil and sugar.

name: Energyworx
cb_description: Energyworx is a company that focuses on providing cloud-based software-as-a-service solutions for energy applications. The company offers services that ingest and process data from diverse sources, enabling real-time access and analysis for its clients. This data management and analysis primarily serves the energy sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Houten, Netherlands.

name: Rippleshot
cb_description: Rippleshot specializes in fraud detection and prevention for the financial sector. The company offers cloud-based technology solutions that leverage machine learning and data analytics to identify fraudulent activity and manage fraud risk. Rippleshot's services are utilized by financial institutions to proactively detect data breaches, update fraud detection rules, and minimize unnecessary card re-issuance. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Cuure
cb_description: Cuure offers personalized online health supplement consultations. The company also provides customers with personalized supplements for vitamins, minerals, immunity, energy, and stress based on their individual needs. Cuure was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: TomoCredit
cb_description: TomoCredit focuses on financial technology in the credit sector, offering services that facilitate credit building without the need for a traditional credit score. The company provides credit card services that are accessible to a broader customer base, utilizing artificial intelligence to manage personal finance tools. These services are designed to help individuals obtain financing for major purchases such as homes and vehicles. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Nium
cb_description: Nium develops nanotechnology that produces greener ammonia using nanotechnology to decarbonize chemistry. It develops nanotechnology that is capable of synthesizing ammonia at much lower temperatures and pressure than before, helping provide greener solutions. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Didcot, United Kingdom.

name: Yoto
cb_description: Yoto focuses on interactive audio platforms for children. The company offers screen-free audio players that allow children to control and explore a wide range of audio content, including stories, music, activities, sound effects, radio, and podcasts. The company primarily serves the children's education and entertainment sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Release
cb_description: Release specializes in providing Environments as a Service within the cloud computing industry. The company offers on-demand, full-stack environments that are scalable, manageable, and easily reproducible, complete with integrated data for development, testing, and production purposes. It primarily caters to engineering organizations associated with infrastructure management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Eko
cb_description: Eko specializes in providing Investments as a Service for credit unions and banks, operating within the financial services industry. The company offers a white-label solution that enables these institutions to offer digital investing on their existing platforms, with features such as personalized portfolio creation and legal compliance checks, starting with investments as low as $10. Eko's services are designed to integrate seamlessly without the need for core banking system changes, appealing to a range of clients including those with small to significant investment amounts. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Farcana
cb_description: Farcana develops video games, specifically within the arena shooter genre. The company's main product is a team-based arena shooter game, which offers strategic gameplay in a futuristic sci-fi setting. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Rubi Laboratories
cb_description: Rubi Laboratories operates as a symbiotic manufacturing company in the textile industry. The company's main service involves the creation of natural textiles from carbon emissions, a process that removes carbon dioxide (CO2) from the atmosphere and uses virtually no water or land. These textiles are primarily sold to the fashion industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: SMBX
cb_description: SMBX develops a platform for connecting small businesses with potential investors. The company facilitates the issuance and trading of small business financial securities, beginning with the small business bond. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Hyphen
cb_description: Hyphen provides decentralized finance solutions. It offers portfolio management, access to the decentralized finance (Defi) landscape, and more. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FundGuard
cb_description: FundGuard is an investment accounting utility focusing on asset management technology. The company offers a cloud-native, AI-powered platform that provides real-time investment accounting, data integration, and operational efficiency for asset managers and service providers. FundGuard's solutions cater to the needs of asset managers, asset owners, asset servicers, administrators, and software providers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CollegeDekho
cb_description: CollegeDekho is a student guidance platform that specializes in the higher education sector. The company offers comprehensive services that assist students with college admissions, including career assessment tests and AI-powered college recommendations. CollegeDekho provides a Common Application Form platform that allows students to apply to multiple colleges simultaneously, and offers mentorship and support throughout the admission process. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: Finerio Connect
cb_description: Finerio Connect specializes in providing technology solutions for the financial technology sector, focusing on enhancing the services of banks and financial institutions. The company offers a platform that facilitates the instant update and improvement of financial services, aimed at promoting financial well-being. It primarily serves the financial service sector. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Harvest
cb_description: Harvest specializes in providing low-carbon heating, hot water, and cooling systems within the home energy sector. Its main offerings include a smart thermal battery, an HVAC system that optimizes energy use based on weather forecasts and user routines, and a hyper-efficient heat pump that utilizes grid electricity. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Memrise
cb_description: Memrise is a language learning platform. It specializes in video-based lessons and interactions with native speakers. The service offers a range of language courses designed to help users speak confidently in real-world situations. Memrise provides personalized artificial intelligence (AI) tutoring and gamified tests to enhance the learning experience. It was founded in 2010 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Kula Bio
cb_description: Kula Bio develops sustainable agriculture solutions in the domain of biofertilizers. The company's main product is a cost-competitive biofertilizer that enhances a natural process to deposit significant amounts of nitrogen in the soil, optimized for a wide range of crops. It primarily serves the agricultural industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: SeatGeek
cb_description: SeatGeek operates as a mobile ticketing marketplace.  The company's primary service is providing a platform for fans to buy and sell tickets to a variety of live events, including sports, music, and theater. SeatGeek caters to the needs of both consumers looking for tickets and rightsholders in the live entertainment industry. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Epoch
cb_description: Epoch is reinventing media operations by providing a technology that virtualizes how media flows for the broadcast, film and video industries. By leveraging existing infrastructure, network and partners, Epoch's software-as-a-service model taps all underutilized resources while optimizing workflow productivity-much easier, smarter, and faster than any existing technology on the market today. The company's workflow design and monitoring capabilities ensure complete optimization through agile, on-the-fly adaptation and continuous engineering up to 40x faster than competitive solutions.

name: TodayTix
cb_description: TodayTix is a company that operates in the entertainment industry with a focus on theater performances. The company provides services such as selling discounted and full price tickets for various theater performances, including musicals, plays, and Broadway shows. It primarily caters to the entertainment industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ClearGov
cb_description: ClearGov provides budget cycle management software, focusing on the public sector. The company offers cloud-based budgeting tools designed to automate budgeting processes, enhance collaboration, and centralize data for local governments. ClearGov's solutions cater to a range of budgeting needs including capital, personnel, and operational budgeting, as well as tools for creating digital budget books and platforms for financial transparency. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Maynard, Massachusetts.

name: Kula
cb_description: Kula is a company that focuses on outbound recruitment automation in the human resources industry. The company offers a platform that automates the process of sourcing, engaging, and hiring candidates, including features such as personalized messaging, automated referrals, and analytics tracking. Kula primarily serves the recruitment sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Walnut, California.

name: New Culture
cb_description: New Culture specializes in the production of animal-free dairy products within the food industry. The company offers cheeses that replicate traditional dairy cheese in taste and functionality, such as melting and stretching, without the use of animal products. New Culture's cheeses are designed to cater to the needs of pizzerias and other food service operators. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Leandro, California.

name: Molecule
cb_description: Molecule provides solutions for 3D printing applications  including medical device, aerospace, automotive and a wide variety of consumer goods  as well as industrial inkjet materials.

name: Pogo
cb_description: Pogo is developing a picture-oriented social media application that shows people's location when they view photographs.

name: DeepScribe
cb_description: DeepScribe specializes in AI-powered clinical documentation within the healthcare sector. The company offers an ambient AI platform that transforms patient conversations into comprehensive, accurate medical notes, automating the documentation process for clinicians. DeepScribe primarily serves healthcare providers, ranging from small private practices to large healthcare organizations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: NXRT
cb_description: NXRT specializes in mixed reality driving systems for sales, engineering, and training within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that transforms real vehicles into digital experiences, aiming to redefine customer journeys, enhance vehicle feature understanding, and replace traditional simulation systems. NXRT primarily serves sectors such as automotive sales, professional driver training, and engineering research and development. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Bevy
cb_description: nnChit-chat, gossip, heart-to-hearts, and good old-fashioned debates all bring people closer. To each other, to themselves, and to the brands and companies they adore.  With the company's flagship Facebook application, we've given women a forum to express themselves, share opinions, and swap stories, connecting people through the power of conversation.  Bevy aims to start the dialogue "¦ and let the company's members do the talking.n

name: SigTuple
cb_description: SigTuple is a company that specializes in the development of smart diagnostic solutions within the healthcare sector. Their offerings include automated diagnostic screening tests that leverage microfluidics, robotics, artificial intelligence, and cloud computing for medical diagnostics and enable tele-diagnostics. SigTuple's products are designed to make quality healthcare more affordable and accessible, with a focus on diagnostic screening tests. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: SOLiD
cb_description: SOLiD is a global telecom network solution provider operating in the telecommunications industry. The company offers innovative products including distributed antenna systems for in-building and outdoor coverages, and tunable WDM-PON systems for mobile front-haul, which support 5G and Public Safety networks. SOLiD primarily serves major mobile carriers, third-party owners, and enterprise customers. It was founded in 1998 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea.

name: PayActiv
cb_description: PayActiv is a financial wellness company that provides a platform for earned wage access and financial services. The company offers solutions that allow employees to access their earned wages before payday, along with tools for budgeting, savings, and financial counseling. PayActiv primarily serves various sectors including retail, healthcare, and hospitality industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Condense
cb_description: Condense, a subsidiary of CloudForest, is a consulting firm in the building and energy efficiency industry. The company primarily offers energy audits, calculations, and improvement consulting services for existing and new building projects, with a focus on making prudent building improvements through data and complex calculations. Their main clientele includes building owners and those involved in building projects. It is based in Louisville, Colorado.

name: Osmind
cb_description: Osmind is a technology platform focused on advancing mental health treatment and research within the healthcare sector. The company offers an electronic health record (EHR) system designed to optimize clinical workflows, prescribe medications, ensure compliance, and analyze patient-reported outcomes for mental health practices. Osmind primarily serves the mental health care industry, including psychiatry practices, ketamine treatment clinics, and those involved in psychedelic medicine. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Rheaply
cb_description: Rheaply is a company focused on resource management technology within the circular economy, aiming to facilitate reuse and reduce waste across organizations. The company offers a suite of services including inventory management, internal asset reuse, decommissioning of assets, sustainability consulting, and the operation of reuse marketplaces. Rheaply primarily serves sectors that require robust inventory and asset management solutions, as well as those looking to implement sustainable practices. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: BOLD
cb_description:
BOLD is a consultancy firm that has the knowledge, expertise and experience to support and lead businesses by combining strategies with its hands-on analyze, advise, execute approach. In addition, BOLD provides clients with an interim service utilizing a network of experts who can be brought into assignments on an as-needed basis. It is based in Utrecht, Netherlands.

On December 14th, 2021, BOLD was acquired by FTI Consulting. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Liftango
cb_description: Liftango specializes in on-demand shared transport solutions within the sustainable mobility sector. The company offers a suite of services including simulation, carpooling, on-demand bus, and shuttle tracking to optimize transport systems and combat climate change. It primarily serves sectors such as public transportation, corporate transport, and smart city initiatives. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Newcastle, Australia.

name: Adaptilens
cb_description: Adaptilens is focused on developing vision improvement technology in the healthcare sector, specifically targeting the creation of an accommodating intraocular lens (IOL). The company's main product is an IOL that aims to replicate the human eye's lens, allowing patients to focus on objects at varying distances, potentially reducing the need for glasses or contact lenses. Adaptilens primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a particular focus on cataract patients seeking vision correction solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Chestnut Hill, Massachusetts.

name: Genemod
cb_description: Genemod is a company focused on streamlining scientific research within the life sciences sector. Its main offerings include a Laboratory Information Management System (LIMS) for sample inventory management and an Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN) for storing and collaborating on experiment data. Genemod primarily serves industries such as biopharmaceuticals, industrial biotech, clinical research, biomanufacturers, biorepositories, and contract services. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Edmonds, Washington.

name: CHIEF
cb_description: CHIEF is a minority- and woman-owned full-service marketing and design agency that provides high-impact technology and brand communication solutions to public and private sector clients.

name: NILE
cb_description: NILE is a next-generation title and escrow company that operates in the real estate sector, focusing on providing innovative closing services. The company offers RESPA-compliant title and escrow services, leveraging proprietary technology and concierge-level service to streamline real estate transactions for elite agents and closing professionals. NILE primarily serves the real estate industry, catering to professionals seeking efficient and forward-thinking closing experiences. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Flexport
cb_description: Flexport operates as a technology-driven company focused on logistics and supply chain. The company offers a range of services including logistics management, transportation, customs brokerage, and various freight services, all aimed at simplifying and optimizing supply chain operations. Its primary customers span across various sectors, including e-commerce, global brands, and nonprofits. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Petfolk
cb_description: Petfolk specializes in pet grooming and wellness, operating within the pet care industry. The company offers mobile grooming services, spa and salon treatments, and a range of pet care products designed to enhance the well-being of dogs and cats. Petfolk primarily caters to pet owners seeking convenient and quality grooming services for their pets. It is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: 80 Acres Farms
cb_description: 80 Acres Farms specializes in indoor farming and sustainable agriculture, producing a variety of fresh foods. The company offers salad blends, kits, herbs, microgreens, and fruits & veggies, all grown with advanced technology and without the need for soil. 80 Acres Farms primarily serves the fresh produce market with an emphasis on sustainability and local distribution. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hamilton, Ohio.

name: Creatively
cb_description: Creatively is a company that focuses on fostering and connecting the global creative community, operating in the creative industry. The company offers a platform for creators to display their work and for companies and brands to discover talented individuals. It was founded in 2019 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Pillar
cb_description: Pillar develops a mobile application. It helps people manage their student loans by analyzing loan balances, income, and spending trends to make recommendations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York. In March 2021, Pillar was acquired by Acorns.

name: Tracksuit
cb_description: Tracksuit specializes in brand tracking solutions within the marketing sector. The company offers an online dashboard for marketers to monitor brand health, assess marketing ROI, and gain insights into brand performance. Tracksuit primarily serves modern consumer brands seeking to understand and improve their brand's market position. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: Endowus
cb_description: Endowus is a financial technology company operating in the wealth management industry. The company offers data-driven wealth advice and personalized investment solutions, with a focus on providing access to institutional-quality financial products at a low cost. It primarily serves individual and institutional investors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: Velou
cb_description: Velou specializes in AI-driven product enrichment for the e-commerce sector, enhancing digital shopping experiences and streamlining operations. The company offers intelligent product catalogs that improve search conversion rates and SEO performance, as well as integrate with existing marketing technologies to boost overall sales conversions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: SubStrata
cb_description: SubStrata is a data-driven behavioral intelligence platform that operates in the domain of enterprise sales and dealmaking. The company provides a suite of tools that analyze implicit behavioral cues, both verbal and nonverbal, to assist sales executives and dealmakers in understanding and leveraging social dynamics for improved performance. SubStrata's offerings include real-time analysis of social signals, pragmatic analysis for uncovering implied meanings, and simulation features for optimizing sales strategies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Checkbook
cb_description: Checkbook specializes in digital payment processing within the financial technology sector. The company provides a platform for sending and receiving payments, including ACH transactions, real-time payments, and the issuance of digital and mailed checks. Checkbook's solutions cater to various sectors, including the e-commerce industry, real estate tech industry, and cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Earthshot Labs
cb_description: Earthshot Labs focuses on developing and financing nature-based carbon projects within the environmental sector. The company offers technology-enabled carbon development services, scientific predictive analytics, and a platform for carbon project development, verification, and investment. Earthshot Labs primarily serves sectors involved in ecological restoration, carbon markets, and environmental conservation. Earthshot Labs was formerly known as Earthshot Climate. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mill Valley, California.

name: Tabit
cb_description: Tabit provides mobile-first point-of-sale (POS) solutions in restaurants and hospitality. The company offers a range of products that help restaurants manage their operations, and enable required customer experiences. Its products include solutions for table-side ordering, customer relationship management, staff scheduling, and real-time business analytics. Its products are TabitKiosk, TabitChef, TabitPad, and more. It primarily serves the restaurant industry, including full-service restaurants, restaurant chains, and hotel restaurants. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Aventura, Florida.

name: Ribbon
cb_description: Ribbon provides a digital platform for real estate services. It helps buyers, sellers, and loan officers in buying and listing properties, selling and buying homes, commercial properties, and more. It was formerly known as Achieve. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York. In May 2023, Ribbon was acquired by EasyKnock.

name: Raydiant Oximetry
cb_description: Raydiant Oximetry focuses on improving maternal-fetal medicine by developing noninvasive sensor technology for childbirth. Its main product, Lumerah, is a fetal pulse oximeter designed to measure fetal oxygen levels accurately and reduce unnecessary cesarean deliveries. The company primarily serves the healthcare sector, offering tools for obstetric providers to better evaluate fetal well-being during labor. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Ramon, California.

name: Expedock
cb_description: Expedock specializes in automation solutions for the freight forwarding industry. The company offers products that automate document processing and provide shipment visibility, aiming to enhance efficiency and accuracy in freight operations. Expedock's services include digital BPO, customizable dashboards for real-time operational insights, and integration with various transport management systems. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Qdrant
cb_description: Qdrant focuses on providing vector similarity search technology, operating in the artificial intelligence and database sectors. The company offers a vector database and vector search engine, which deploys as an API service to provide a search for the nearest high-dimensional vectors. This technology allows embeddings or neural network encoders to be turned into applications for matching, searching, recommending, and more. Qdrant primarily serves the artificial intelligence applications industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Miro
cb_description: Miro is a company that focuses on providing open-source music and video player services in the technology sector. The company offers a unified platform for downloading, organizing, and watching videos as well as listening to music. It also provides features such as video conversion, syncing to Android devices, and the ability to buy music and apps within the platform. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: OnCue
cb_description: Provider of voice and Internet services. The company hopes to take advantage of British Telecom's unbundling of its local loops, and intends to provide high-speed Internet services to target residential and small business users using BT's ADSL wholesale offering.

name: PAPER
cb_description: PAPER is a stealth company.

name: Karius
cb_description: Karius focuses on generating genomic insights for infectious diseases. It offers the Karius test, a liquid biopsy test to detect pathogens causing both deep-seated and bloodstream infections. The company provides genomic insights by detecting microbial cell-free deoxyribonucleic acid (mcfDNA) circulating in the bloodstream from pathogens that cause infections. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Roofr
cb_description: Roofr provides a platform that connects homeowners, insurance companies, and property managers looking for roof replacements to vetted, local roofing contractors. Its platform simplifies the roof replacement process while saving its clients and roofing contractors time and money. Roofr utilizes satellite imagery to measure roofs and provide clients with instant, free estimates. Roofr was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Intenseye
cb_description: Intenseye focuses on enhancing workplace safety through its artificial intelligence-powered platform within the environmental health and safety (EHS) sector. The company offers a solution that utilizes computer vision to analyze workplaces in real time, identifying potential hazards and providing actionable insights to prevent incidents and improve compliance. It primarily serves sectors such as automotive, building materials, chemicals, consumer goods, and various other industries with a need for advanced safety monitoring. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: PathoQuest
cb_description: PathoQuest is a company that focuses on biologics quality testing and next generation sequencing in the biopharmaceutical industry. The company offers services such as adventitious virus testing, cell line characterization, and raw material testing, which are all aimed at ensuring the safety and quality of biologic therapies. PathoQuest primarily serves the biopharmaceutical industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Thrive Global
cb_description: Thrive Global offers a corporate and consumer well-being and productivity platform. It provides training, seminars, e-courses, coaching, and ongoing support based on the scientific findings from experts in the fields of neuroscience, psychology, productivity, sports, and sleep. It develops behavior change technology designed to end the stress and burnout epidemic. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: FtCash
cb_description: FtCash is a financial technology company focused on empowering micro-merchants and small to medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) with digital payment solutions and financial services. The company aggregates various payment methods, including credit and debit cards, mobile wallets, and PayPal, to facilitate offline transactions for its clients. FtCash also offers instant business loans and merchant cash advances to support the growth of its customers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Novig
cb_description: Novig enables sports betting using an online platform. It offers a commission-free sports betting exchange service, allowing users to set their own odds or take the best price on the market, and bet directly against friends or the market, rather than against the house. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: PingCAP
cb_description: PingCAP is a company that specializes in providing advanced open source distributed SQL databases for modern applications in the technology sector. Its flagship product, TiDB, offers scalability, MySQL compatibility, and supports both OLTP and OLAP workloads, catering to organizations that require reliable SQL at scale and real-time analytics. PingCAP's services include fully-managed cloud DBaaS solutions like TiDB Dedicated and TiDB Serverless, designed to handle predictable and auto-scaling workloads respectively. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Beijing, California.

name: Commons Clinic
cb_description: Commons Clinic operates multi-specialty clinics that provide healthcare treatment to patients. It features online scheduling to book a same-day virtual consult or assists patients in finding the closest Commons Clinic and scheduling personal consultations. It offers consumers comprehensive specialty and surgical care programs for pain, orthopedics, women's, and men's health, and more. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Unacademy
cb_description: Unacademy focuses on online education, operating within the edtech industry.
