The company offers a platform for learning, providing live classes, video lessons, and practice sections for various exams and courses. It primarily serves the education sector, catering to learners preparing for a wide range of examinations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: UnionTech
cb_description: UnionTech is a company that focuses on the development, production, and wholesale of 3D printers, operating within the additive manufacturing industry. The company offers a range of industrial 3D printers and related software, as well as materials for 3D printing. These products are used to create highly accurate parts with excellent resolution, full density, and smooth surfaces. UnionTech primarily serves sectors such as the aerospace, automotive, consumer products, design, education, and healthcare industries. It was founded in 2000 and is based in Shanghai, Shanghai.

name: FitOn
cb_description: FitOn operates as a digital wellness platform in the health and fitness industry. The company offers a range of fitness, meditation, nutrition, and wellness content, along with personalized programs and social features to motivate users. FitOn primarily serves individuals seeking their health and wellness, as well as employers and health plans looking for integrated preventative care solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Kontempo
cb_description: Kontempo is a B2B payments platform that operates in the industrial sector. The company offers a software solution that enables wholesalers, manufacturers, and distributors to provide flexible payment terms, including credit and installment pricing, to their customers in a user-friendly manner. Kontempo primarily serves the industrial sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: LOOP
cb_description: LOOP is a  free career development platform. It allows users to build a career path, get relevant news, jobs, and events, and connect with real-life mentors. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Elation Health
cb_description: Elation Health is a technology platform focused on delivering clinical-first solutions for primary care within the healthcare sector. The company offers a suite of products including an Electronic Health Records (EHR) system, AI-powered note dictation, telehealth services, medical billing software, and patient engagement tools designed to streamline operations and enhance patient care. Elation Health primarily serves small to medium practices, direct care providers, insurance-taking entities, new practices, care groups, and enterprises & developers. Elation Health was formerly known as ElationEMR. It was founded in 2010 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Element Biosciences
cb_description: Element Biosciences focuses on developing DNA sequencing and multiomics technology for the research market. Its main offerings include a benchtop sequencing platform that provides data and solutions for genetic research. The company caters to sectors that require precise and cost-effective sequencing capabilities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Lumotive
cb_description: Lumotive is a company focused on the development of optical semiconductors, operating within the technology and automotive sectors. The company's main offerings include beam-steering technology and Light Control Metasurfaces, which are used to enhance optical 3D sensing and lidar systems, improving their reliability, performance, and cost-effectiveness. Lumotive primarily serves the consumer electronics, industrial automation, robotics, and automotive industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Redmond, Washington.

name: Agrotoken
cb_description: Agrotoken provides agricultural technology solutions and focuses on commodities tokenization, smart contracts, and digital economy solutions for agricultural businesses. Its platform provides grain tokenization, token trading, liquidity creation, exchange of crypto assets, and other related features. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

name: ChargeBee
cb_description: ChargeBee develops a recurring revenue management platform. The platform delivers a billing solution on the cloud. It integrates with payment gateways to let users automate recurring payment collection along with invoicing, taxes, accounting, email notifications, software-as-a-service (SaaS) metrics, and customer management. The company was formerly known as BubblePath. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Rockville, Maryland.

name: Swing Therapeutics
cb_description: Swing Therapeutics is a company focused on developing digital therapies for chronic conditions within the healthcare sector. Its main offering is Stanza, an FDA-cleared digital therapy designed to manage symptoms of fibromyalgia through accessible behavioral treatments that can be used via a smartphone. Swing Therapeutics aims to provide evidence-backed treatments that improve the quality of life for patients with chronic illnesses. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Headgum
cb_description: Headgum focuses on the production, curation, and promotion of podcast content, operating within the media and entertainment industry. The company's main service is providing a platform for a variety of podcasts, offering content creation and promotion services to podcasters. Additionally, Headgum operates Gumball, a marketplace for buying host-read podcast advertisements, facilitating revenue generation for podcasters and advertising opportunities for businesses. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Guru
cb_description: Guru is a company that operates in the online freelancing industry, providing a platform for professionals to connect and collaborate. The company's main service is to offer a secure and flexible platform where businesses can find and hire expert freelancers from around the world for various tasks and projects. The company primarily serves businesses across various sectors looking for freelance talent. It was founded in 1998 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Toku
cb_description: Toku operates as a technology company specializing in recurring payments. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to automate their collection processes and facilitate payment procedures, eliminating late payments. It primarily serves sectors such as education, highways, insurance, telecommunications, finance, real estate, memberships, and basic services. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Providencia, Chile.

name: Gong
cb_description: Gong focuses on revenue intelligence in the business sector. The company offers a platform that captures and understands customer interactions, then provides insights to help revenue teams make data-driven decisions. Gong primarily sells to sectors such as sales, marketing, and customer success. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Dotfile
cb_description: Dotfile specializes in end-to-end business verification and compliance within the financial technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive KYB solution that includes AML checks, identity verification, risk assessment, and UBO discovery to ensure businesses meet global compliance standards. Dotfile primarily serves sectors such as fintech, crypto, private equity, marketplaces, and banking. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Noble.Ai
cb_description: Noble.Ai specializes in materials informatics solutions using innovative science-based AI technology within the technology sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform, the NobleAI Reactor Platform, which empowers teams to conduct virtual experiments and leverage AI-driven insights for accelerated product development and improved performance, sustainability, and reliability. Noble.Ai primarily serves sectors that require advanced materials and chemical formulations, such as battery development, energy solutions, and sustainable product design. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: AccessFintech
cb_description: AccessFintech specializes in optimizing financial market operations through its data and insights network. The company provides a platform for real-time data collaboration, workflow optimization, and management of the trade lifecycle, aiming to enhance settlement efficiency and reduce transaction costs. AccessFintech's services are primarily utilized by the financial services industry, including asset managers, banks, and other financial institutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: HigherMe
cb_description: HigherMe is a company that focuses on providing hiring software solutions, primarily in the franchise restaurant industry. The company offers a range of services including an applicant tracking system, text-to-apply feature, and paperless onboarding, all designed to help restaurant managers find, select, and hire suitable employees efficiently. HigherMe primarily serves the restaurant industry, particularly franchises and quick-service establishments. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: MiiCare
cb_description: MiiCare focuses on extending the health span for older adults at home through conversational artificial intelligence in the healthcare sector. The company offers a chronic conditions management platform, MiiCube, which gathers data to provide personalized care plans, and Monica, a virtual health assistant that supports self-care and offers caregivers insights for early intervention. It primarily serves the home care, senior living, and post-acute care sectors. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Spotahome
cb_description: Spotahome is an online accommodation booking platform. It provides detailed descriptions of properties, including photos, videos, and floor plans, allowing users to book apartments and rooms for short-term stays. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Speedoc
cb_description: Speedoc is a virtual clinic and healthcare solutions platform operating in the healthcare industry. The company offers a range of services including home visits by doctors and nurses, video consultations, non-emergency ambulance bookings, and hospital care at home. These services are designed to provide medical care and services to patients in the comfort of their own homes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: Pienso
cb_description: Pienso specializes in generative AI within the artificial intelligence industry. The company offers a no-code solution that enables subject matter experts to train Large Language Models (LLMs) to interpret and utilize their business data without requiring programming skills. It platform is designed to be interoperable with major LLM providers and can be deployed both in-cloud and on-premise, ensuring data privacy and sovereignty for organizations. Pienso was formerly known as UBQ Labs, Inc.. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Arlington, Virginia.

name: Hayden AI
cb_description: Hayden AI offers an artificial intelligence( AI) smart enforcement technologies platform. Its platform allows government agencies to enforce traffic laws while using data to gain actionable insights that help enhance the quality of life of their communities. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Carbon6
cb_description: Carbon6 focuses on providing innovative tools and software for e-commerce businesses. The company offers services designed to enhance decision-making and operational efficiency, including artificial intelligence (AI) powered analytics, inventory and demand planning, profit recovery, and listing management. Carbon6 primarily serves marketplace sellers, agencies, and aggregators looking to optimize their e-commerce operations and increase profitability. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Turnkey
cb_description: Turnkey is a company that focuses on providing ESG sustainability solutions, operating within the corporate and financial sectors. The company offers a platform that helps businesses meet ESG requirements by monitoring and making sense of key data, thereby enabling them to improve their overall business performance. Turnkey primarily serves the financial sector, supply chains, corporate sustainability, and investment funds. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore.

name: Ezoic
cb_description: Ezoic is a technology company operating in the digital publishing and content creation industry. The company offers a platform that leverages artificial intelligence to understand web visitor behavior and advertiser preferences, delivering tailored monetization models. The platform also includes features for independent content publishers, such as intelligent website analytics and tools focused on website performance, regulations/policy, search engine optimization (SEO), and more. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Carlsbad, California.

name: Owkin
cb_description: Owkin operates as an artificial intelligence (AI)-based biotechnology company. It utilizes AI to enhance the process of finding suitable treatments for patients. The company's main services include the use of AI to identify new treatments, accelerate clinical trials, and build diagnostic tools. It enables researchers in hospitals, universities, and the biopharmaceutical industry to understand how drug efficacy varies for the improvement of drug development. Its services primarily cater to the biopharmaceutical and academic research sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: C2RO
cb_description: C2RO is a technology company that specializes in AI-SaaS video analysis within the artificial intelligence and computer vision sectors. The company's main product, ENTERA, provides GDPR-compliant video analytics, offering insights into human behavior in physical spaces, socio-demographic breakdowns, and full-conversion funnel analysis, all while maintaining data privacy. C2RO primarily serves sectors such as retail, malls, enterprise and commercial real estate, smart city and transportation, public safety and security, and Industry 4.0. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Squeeze
cb_description: Squeeze Animation Studios is an animation company. It provides 3D character animation for feature films, video game cinematics, TV series, and theme parks. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Quebec City, Canada.

name: Incognia
cb_description: Incognia focuses on location identity solutions, operating in the digital security and user verification industry. The company offers services such as the detection of GPS spoofing, tamper-resistant geolocation compliance checks, and device intelligence for fraud prevention and account security. Its primary customers are in the food delivery, iGaming, social media, financial services, and marketplace sectors. Incognia was formerly known as In Loco. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Synspective
cb_description: Synspective focuses on providing geospatial data and analytics solutions, operating within the satellite and data analysis sectors. The company offers remote monitoring services using Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellites, including land displacement monitoring, flood and disaster damage assessments, and resource management. Synspective primarily serves government agencies and commercial entities in need of accurate geospatial data and insights for infrastructure development, energy and natural resources management, and disaster risk management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Enertiv
cb_description: Enertiv is an operational intelligence platform focused on enhancing asset value in the commercial real estate sector. The company offers solutions for expense control, workflow digitization, real-time monitoring, and ESG reporting to optimize operations and increase net operating income (NOI). Enertiv's platform serves various stakeholders within the commercial real estate industry, including asset managers, engineers, property managers, and sustainability teams. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Andie
cb_description: Andie is a company that focuses on the fashion industry, specifically in the swimwear domain. The company offers a range of swimwear products, including one-piece swimsuits and bikinis, designed for women of various sizes. These products are designed with a focus on coverage, compression, and support. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Base Operations
cb_description: Base Operations specializes in proactive corporate security, providing granular, street-level threat intelligence across various sectors. The company offers a platform that aggregates and analyzes data from numerous sources to help businesses anticipate and mitigate potential security threats. Their services are utilized by organizations to enhance travel safety, threat intelligence, crisis management, and site selection. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Yapily
cb_description: Yapily is an open banking infrastructure platform that specializes in providing secure connectivity between customers and banks across Europe. The company offers services that enable access to financial data and the initiation of payments, aiming to facilitate the creation of personalized financial experiences. Yapily primarily serves industries such as payment services, i-gaming, accounting, lending and credit, crypto, property technology (PropTech), investing, and digital banking. Yapily was formerly known as Acacia Connect. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Obie
cb_description: Obie is a real time secure collaborative platform that helps brokers efficiently assemble, market, and centralize workflow in a commercial real estate transaction. Commercial real estate buyers and investors are able to leverage Obies efficient and accurate tools to view and value commercial real estate transactions.  Obie connects commercial real estate brokers, investors, offering materials, transaction documents, and analysis tools all in one place, eliminating double data entry and inefficiencies in the analysis phase of property acquisition through the patent pending Obie Transaction Engine.

name: Parade
cb_description: Parade offers a direct-to-consumer company. It provides expressive underwear and lingerie with sustainable fabrics in a variety of sizes. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York. In August 2023, Parade was acquired by Ariela and Associates International.

name: Avochato
cb_description: Avochato is a company that specializes in enterprise mobile messaging within the communication technology sector. The company provides a platform that enables businesses to have ongoing, two-way messaging conversations with their customers, including features such as text messaging, live chat, and integration with other systems like Salesforce. Avochato primarily serves sectors such as sales, support, and operations teams. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Oleria
cb_description: Oleria develops security solutions in cybersecurity. The company offers security services that adapt to an organization's needs, ensuring the right people have access to what they need. It primarily serves businesses across various sectors that require advanced security measures. Oleria was formerly known as Roanoke Data Security. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.

name: Pika
cb_description: Pika is a technology company focused on sustainability and environmental conservation. The company offers reusable cloth diapers and a cleaning machine, providing an eco-friendly alternative to disposable diapers. Their products are primarily targeted towards parents, aiming to reduce plastic waste and greenhouse gas emissions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: AB Tasty
cb_description: AB Tasty operates a company focused on customer experience optimization within the technology sector. It offers services such as web experimentation, personalization, and product optimization, which are designed to streamline user experiences along the buyer journey. These services primarily cater to the e-commerce industry. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York

name: Spare
cb_description: Spare is a mobile app that allows users to roundup their dine out bills to the nearest dollar to benefit non profits at the forefront of hunger relief.

name: Genesis Therapeutics
cb_description: Genesis Therapeutics is a biotechnology company that focuses on AI-powered drug discovery. The company utilizes its proprietary platform, GEMS, to accelerate the development of new medicines by integrating deep learning predictive models, molecular simulations, and molecular generative AI. Genesis Therapeutics primarily serves the biotech and pharmaceutical industries with its AI-driven approach to discovering novel treatments for severe and devastating conditions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Burlingame, California.

name: Space Forge
cb_description: Space Forge focuses on manufacturing in the microgravity environment of space. The company's main offerings include the production of new materials for various industries, and utilizing the conditions of space to overcome challenges present on Earth. Its materials primarily find use in the electronics, pharmaceutical, and alloy industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cardiff, United Kingdom.

name: OpenPath
cb_description: Openpath operates as a software development company. It develops an access control system designed to bring frictionless access and good security to the workplace. The company serves the real estate sector, retail sector, education sector, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Culver City, California. In July 2021, OpenPath was acquired by Motorola Solutions.

name: AiSDR
cb_description: AiSDR provides AI solutions in the sales and marketing industry. The company offers services such as lead qualification, prospect engagement, and the creation of personalized email campaigns. It caters to startups, marketing teams, and sales teams, providing them with tools to automate the scheduling of sales calls, speed up lead scoring and qualification, and manage outbound email campaigns. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: CarbonCloud
cb_description: CarbonCloud is a climate intelligence platform that specializes in calculating and managing carbon footprints for the food industry. The company offers a scalable SaaS platform that provides actionable insights for corporate reporting, product carbon footprint assessment, and Scope 3 emissions management. CarbonCloud primarily serves the food industry, including retailers, wholesalers, brand portfolios, brands, and ingredient producers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Vastra Gotaland, Sweden.

name: Virion Therapeutics
cb_description: Virion Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on the development of T cell-based immunotherapies in the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include novel immunotherapies for the treatment of cancer and chronic infectious diseases, utilizing genetically encoded checkpoint modifiers to enhance and broaden T cell responses. Virion Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly in the areas of cancer treatment and infectious disease management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Newark, Delaware.

name: Qogita
cb_description: Qogita is a technology company that operates in the wholesale B2B sector. The company provides a platform for businesses to buy a wide variety of products, including perfume, makeup, hair care, skin care, nail care, and bath and body products, from a network of suppliers. Qogita primarily serves the retail industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Verkada
cb_description: Verkada provides enterprise security camera systems. It offers camera systems for emergency response, license plate recognition, vape detection, and more. It serves industries such as retail, manufacturing, healthcare, and more. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Merama
cb_description: Merama focuses on accelerating the growth of e-commerce businesses in Latin America across various categories. It partners with e-commerce brands to provide strategic investment, expertise, and proprietary technology, aiming for business performance and profitability. Merama primarily serves the e-commerce industry by helping brands scale, optimize costs, and expand internationally. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Lightbits Labs
cb_description: Lightbits Labs specializes in providing a complete cloud data platform with a focus on high-performance block storage solutions in the cloud computing industry. Their main offerings include software-defined storage that leverages NVMe over TCP technology to deliver scalable and efficient data storage solutions. Lightbits Labs' products are designed to enhance the performance and cost-efficiency of cloud-native applications, high-performance databases, and enterprise-grade data services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: MDaaS Global
cb_description: MDaaS Global focuses on providing healthcare services through a network of modern, technology-powered diagnostic clinics primarily in the healthcare sector. The company offers diagnostic services that include imaging, cardiac testing, and laboratory analysis, designed to be accessible and affordable for low-income and middle-income patients. MDaaS Global's technology infrastructure also supports healthcare facilities by optimizing operations and connecting health stakeholders. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Synapse
cb_description: Synapse is a product development and consultancy firm working with companies worldwide to drive innovation and introduce cutting-edge devices that positively impact lives.

name: LaunchDarkly
cb_description: LaunchDarkly specializes in feature management for software development within the technology sector. It offers a platform for development teams to control software releases for software delivery. The company primarily serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare, and government, providing solutions that cater to developers, product managers, and mobile app teams. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Olive
cb_description: Olive is a software sourcing platform that assists in the request for Proposals for information technology decision-making and vendor selection. The company provides tools for creating and managing requests for proposals, conducting vendor evaluations, managing requirements, and utilizing artificial intelligence technology. Olive's platform aims to support software selection for businesses across various sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Victoria, Canada.

name: prooV
cb_description: prooV provides startups and enterprises with a SaaS platform to discover, connect, execute and evaluate Proof-of-Concepts (PoCs) through remote, secure, and data-rich testing environments. prooV manages the entire PoC process, from the discovery via its PoC and solutions marketplace, to testing via deep mirroring of the enterprise testing environment, through to the deployment of the technology on the enterprise's production servers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Herzliya Pituach, Israel. On July 23rd, 2021, prooV merged with QAssure Technologies to create 1TX.

name: Yotpo
cb_description: Yotpo specializes in e-commerce retention marketing. The company offers a platform that provides various services such as mobile experiences that convert shoppers, artificial intelligence (AI) enabled customer content collection and display, custom-tailored loyalty and referral programs, subscription offerings, personalized emails, and showcasing of customer photos and videos across the buyer journey. It primarily sells to the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Kira Learning
cb_description: Kira Learning is a STEM-focused education publisher specializing in computer science and AI education for K-12 students. The company offers a range of courses that teach computer science fundamentals, coding in Python, computational thinking, and AI applications, as well as preparation for the AP Computer Science A exam. Kira Learning provides an intuitive platform with tools for course creation, live classroom support, and AI-driven feedback and grading, aimed at empowering educators and engaging students. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Bliq
cb_description: Bliq is a company focused on enhancing the passenger experience in the ride-hailing industry. It offers a platform that allows users to compare and book the quickest and most affordable rides across various ride-hailing services. Bliq also provides tools for gig workers in the transport sector to manage their jobs across multiple platforms. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Cubbit
cb_description: Cubbit specializes in distributed cloud storage solutions within the technology sector. The company offers cloud storage, along with a platform for customers to build their cloud storage services. Cubbit's solutions cater to industries including the public sector, manufacturing, media & entertainment, and healthcare. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bologna, Italy.

name: SOLV
cb_description: SOLV is a company that operates in the e-commerce and financial services sectors, with a focus on providing a business-to-business (B2B) platform for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). The company offers a marketplace where SMEs can buy and sell products, and it also provides financial services such as business loans and invoice-based financing. Additionally, SOLV offers business services like logistics and warehousing to support the operational needs of SMEs. It is based in Karnataka, India.

name: Paladin
cb_description: Paladin specializes in pro bono software for the legal industry. Its main offerings include a platform that connects legal professionals with pro bono opportunities, centralizes pro bono program management and facilitates reporting on the business and community impact of these programs. The company primarily serves legal services organizations, law firms, in-house legal teams, and bar associations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Atlas Metrics
cb_description: Atlas Metrics specializes in ESG compliance and sustainability performance management. It offers a comprehensive platform that facilitates ESG reporting, compliance automation, carbon footprint tracking, and sustainability performance analytics. The platform serves various sectors, including banking, asset management, and companies across multiple industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Ceresa
cb_description: Ceresa focuses on leadership development in the professional development industry. The company offers a platform that provides leadership training and development services, including personalized learning journeys, goal setting, group coaching, and optional one-on-one coaching and mentorship. The company primarily serves the professional development sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Canopy
cb_description: Canopy specializes in employee assistance and organizational wellbeing within the mental health sector. The company offers comprehensive Employee Assistance Programs (EAP), wellbeing coaching, digital therapy tools, and organizational training and development services designed to support both individual employees and the overall organizational health. Canopy primarily serves various sectors including construction, healthcare, public safety, and more, with a focus on creating inclusive and supportive workplace environments. It was founded in 1975 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: EasySend
cb_description: EasySend is a company that specializes in high-volume and low-spread currency exchange. The company's main service is providing low-cost transfers between bank accounts within the European Union, offering customers competitive exchange rates. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Belfast, Ireland. In November 2023, GSTechnologies acquired a majority stake in EasySend.

name: MindLabs
cb_description: MindLabs is a company focused on mental health and wellness in the digital health sector. The company offers a mobile application that provides short exercises for stress relief and sleep improvement, as well as personalized recommendations based on data from wearable devices. The app's services are primarily targeted towards individuals seeking to improve their mental fitness. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: YugaByte
cb_description: YugaByte specializes in providing a high-performance, distributed SQL database designed for cloud native applications within the database technology sector. Their main offering, YugabyteDB, is a PostgreSQL-compatible database that supports scalable, resilient, and globally distributed architectures for mission-critical applications. YugabyteDB is available as open source software and as a managed service with various deployment options for different use cases and industries, including financial services, retail, e-commerce, and telecommunications. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: GoComet
cb_description: GoComet provides an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered transportation visibility platform specializing in the logistics and supply chain management sector. The company offers a suite of software services that automate and streamline freight management, including real-time tracking of shipments across various carriers, automated freight procurement, and invoice reconciliation. GoComet's solutions cater to a range of industries looking to enhance supply chain efficiency and transparency. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: Alinea
cb_description: Alinea is an international cost consulting company. It offers construction consultancy, cost planning, project management, and value engineering services. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in London, U.K. In February 2023, Alinea was acquired by Turner & Townsend. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Subtle Medical
cb_description: Subtle Medical is a medical imaging software company focused on AI-integrated image acquisition in the healthcare sector. The company offers software solutions for accelerated imaging protocols and improved workflow efficiency. Subtle Medical's products are designed to integrate radiology workflows supporting both cloud-based and on-premises deployment and are compatible with a variety of scanners. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Unikey Technologies
cb_description: Unikey Technologies provides mobile access control platforms, operating in the technology and security sectors. The company offers a mobile key platform that replaces traditional keys with mobile technology, providing secure and convenient access control. It primarily serves the residential, commercial, and automotive industries. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Orlando, Florida.

name: Reserv
cb_description: Reserv is a leading real estate agency that specializes in facilitating property transactions. The company offers services such as property evaluation, marketing and advertising, and negotiation of prices and terms to assist clients in buying, selling, and renting properties. With over 25 years of experience, Reserv ensures customer satisfaction by providing trustworthy and professional real estate solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Wasteless
cb_description: Wasteless specializes in AI profit optimization for the retail sector, focusing on reducing food waste and improving sales through dynamic pricing. The company offers a Pricing Engine that adapts to customer behavior and buying habits to determine optimal price points, thereby enhancing the shopping experience and increasing retailers' profits. Wasteless primarily serves the retail industry, with a significant impact on supermarkets and grocery stores. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Sabanto
cb_description: Sabanto is a company that focuses on agricultural technology. The company offers a product called Steward, which is a technology upgrade that can transform existing tractors to operate autonomously. This technology allows for efficient completion of tasks without the need for a human operator, using advanced cameras, obstacle detection sensors, GNSS systems, and robotics. Sabanto primarily sells to the agricultural industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Goodr
cb_description: Goodr is a company focused on reducing waste and eliminating hunger through technology and logistics within the food surplus recovery and waste management sector. The company offers services such as surplus food recovery for donation, organics recycling, and holistic waste management solutions, as well as hunger relief programs including pop-up grocery markets and grocery delivery services. Goodr primarily serves businesses, foundations, governments, and sports teams looking to enhance their social responsibility and environmental impact. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Dyno Therapeutics
cb_description: Dyno Therapeutics develops a biotechnology platform. It applies artificial intelligence (AI) and quantitative high-throughput in vivo experiments to develop gene therapy. It enables medical researchers to access novel adeno-associated virus (AAV) vectors facilitating targeted delivery for new gene therapies. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Watertown, Massachusetts.

name: CookUnity
cb_description: CookUnity is a chef-to-food lover meal subscription service, operating in the food delivery industry. The company offers a variety of ready-to-eat gourmet meals crafted by professional chefs, accommodating a range of dietary preferences and delivered nationwide. CookUnity's service is characterized by its flexible meal plans, which can be customized or paused at any time, and its commitment to using seasonal ingredients and sustainable practices. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Windfall Bio
cb_description: Windfall Bio is a nature-based agricultural technology company that harnesses methane-eating microbes to transform harmful methane into organic soil nutrients on-site to reduce the carbon footprint of the earths food system. It provides microbes, digestors, and associated services to capture and transformation of methane from a variety of sources, including direct capture of methane carbon from the atmosphere. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Invert Robotics
cb_description: Invert Robotics provides industrial inspections, operating primarily in the sectors of food production, chemicals, pharmaceuticals, aerospace, and energy. The company offers services such as inspections, repair, and rental of their robotic platforms, which are designed to perform non-destructive inspections in confined or hazardous spaces, thus eliminating the need for human entry. Its services are primarily targeted towards industries that require regular maintenance inspections, fault detection, and emergency inspections. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Cervest
cb_description: Cervest specializes in climate intelligence solutions. It offers a platform that transforms climate science into personalized and actionable insights, helping enterprises, governments, and financial institutions analyze climate risks and opportunities on a wide range of assets. The company primarily serves sectors such as the government, financial institutions, and enterprises. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom. In June 2023, Cervest filed for bankruptcy.

name: Barkyn
cb_description: Barkyn specializes in personalized dog nutrition and operates within the pet food industry. The company offers customized dog food and supplements formulated by veterinarians, tailored to the age, breed, and preferences of each dog, and delivered directly to the customer's home. Barkyn also provides ongoing veterinary support and consultation to ensure a seamless transition to their food and to address any dietary concerns. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Porto, Portugal.

name: DSCVR
cb_description: DSCVR offers a web3 social platform with crypto-native integrations, It works as a blockchain-based social sharing platform allowing users to earn rewards for their content. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Marina del Rey, California.

name: Fairplay
cb_description: Fairplay is a financial services provider specializing in funding solutions for small and medium-sized businesses within the retail sector. The company offers a range of financial products including working capital loans and factoring services, designed to help businesses manage their cash flow and invest in growth. Fairplay's solutions are tailored to the needs of various business roles and use cases, such as ecommerce platforms, marketplaces, retailers, and wholesale vendors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Knockri
cb_description: Knockri is a company specializing in skills-based hiring and promotion within the human resources technology sector. They offer a platform that utilizes artificial intelligence and industrial-organizational psychology to assess and shortlist candidates based on their skills, aiming to improve diversity and efficiency in the hiring process. The company primarily serves enterprises focused on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Eppo
cb_description: Eppo is a next-generation experimentation platform focused on data-driven decision-making within the technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools for A/B testing, feature flagging, and personalization, all designed to enhance the reliability and speed of product experimentation. Eppo primarily serves sectors that rely heavily on data analytics and experimentation for product development and optimization. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Obsess
cb_description: Obsess focuses on experiential e-commerce. The company offers a platform to enable brands and retailers to create immersive, interactive three dimensional (3D) virtual stores on their websites, providing a new generation of consumers with a unique shopping experience. Obsess primarily serves industries such as fashion and beauty, entertainment, media, travel, and consumer goods. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Plus Power
cb_description: Plus Power is a company that focuses on the development and operation of utility-scale energy storage projects, operating within the renewable energy and energy storage industry. The company's main services include providing capacity, energy, and ancillary services from energy storage projects to electric utility companies, which can help reduce operating costs and provide benefits to rate-payers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sortium
cb_description: Sortium operates an Artificial Intelligence (AI) platform designed for the gaming and virtual production industries. The company's technology offers fuse AI, blockchain, simulation, metaverses, extended reality, and American Automobile Association (AAA) gamification to create a suite of products that deliver tools and opportunities across industries. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Wyvern
cb_description: Wyvern specializes in hyperspectral imaging data for earth observation. It offers hyperspectral satellite imagery that enables detailed analysis of the Earth's surface across various industries. Its data products primarily serve sectors such as agriculture, mining, forestry, and defense, providing them with critical insights for decision-making. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Edmonton, Canada.

name: MEMORY
cb_description: MEMORY () is a developer of blockchain-based games.

name: RWDC Industries
cb_description: RWDC Industries focuses on the development of sustainable materials within the biodegradable polymer sector. The company's main offerings include the production of a natural polymer called polyhydroxyalkanoate (PHA), which is a fully biodegradable alternative to traditional plastics. RWDC's products primarily cater to industries seeking environmentally friendly alternatives to single-use plastics, such as food packaging, consumer goods, and industrial applications. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Athens, Georgia.

name: DoControl
cb_description: DoControl provides a data access control platform for software as a service (SaaS) applications. It provides data access control, data loss prevention, shadow application governance, insider risk management, and other related services. It also offers prevention of data overexposure and exfiltration and protects business-critical data and files. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: N5 Sensors
cb_description: N5 Sensors specializes in environmental hazard detection within the safety and security industry. The company offers solutions for early wildfire detection, air quality monitoring, and chemical threat identification, all featuring autonomous detection with 24/7 alerting and real-time intelligence. N5 Sensors primarily serves sectors such as local government, utility companies, and emergency response teams. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Rockville, Maryland.

name: Glowforge
cb_description: Glowforge specializes in desktop laser cutting and engraving with a focus on 3D laser printing technology. Their products are designed to precisely cut, engrave, and score a variety of materials, making them suitable for consumers, digital designers, crafters, engineers, teachers, and artists. Glowforge offers a range of lasers, including CO2 and diode options, with features like a passthrough slot for large projects, 3D autofocus, and high-resolution engraving. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Eion
cb_description: Eion operates as a high-technology company. It produces lithium iron phosphate (LFP) battery cathode material by recycling spent LFP material, reduces carbon dioxide (CO2) emission, and converts environmental threats or waste to valuable resources in short supply. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Weston, Massachusetts.

name: Zolve
cb_description: Zolve is a financial technology company operating in the banking and finance industry. The company offers a range of services including online banking, credit cards, money transfers, insurance, and loans. Its primary customers are individuals seeking accessible and convenient financial products. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Sunday
cb_description: Sunday is a lawn care company. It provides a subscription service for lawn and pest care. The company uses a proprietary algorithm to create a custom plan for each customer's lawn and delivers all of the necessary products and tools directly to the customer's door. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Vendia
cb_description: Vendia is a company specializing in data automation with a focus on providing trusted business insights and complete data oversight across various industries. The company offers a platform that enables real-time synchronization of business data across different systems, stakeholders, and third parties, ensuring control and speed without the need for custom coding or complex configurations. Vendia's solutions cater to sectors such as financial services, manufacturing and logistics, and travel and hospitality. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Givingli
cb_description: Givingli is a company focused on modernizing the gifting process, operating within the ecommerce industry. The company offers a platform for sending customizable digital greeting cards and optional eGifts, with features such as scheduling, reminders, and a wallet for managing gifts. The primary customer base includes individuals seeking a convenient and personalized gifting solution. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Beverly Hills, California.

name: Blank Street
cb_description: Blank Street operates as a chain of online and offline coffee shops. It offers a variety of drinks, including cold brews, crafted to cater to different moods and rituals. The company primarily serves the food and beverage industry. It was formerly known as RS-RH Opco 1. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: SGNL
cb_description: SGNL specializes in access management for various business sectors, focusing on privileged identity management and access security. The company offers a solution that enables context-based policy enforcement to manage access to sensitive data and critical applications, preventing identity breaches and unauthorized access. Its technology integrates with existing identity infrastructures, enhancing policy granularity and ensuring that access is auditable by default. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Hoopo
cb_description: Hoopo offers asset and fleet visibility solutions for connected fleets. It helps businesses to track and manage their operations, inventory, and equipment by giving access to real-time data and analytics. It tracks and monitors unpowered assets by leveraging power-efficient tracking technology, creating tracking units suitable for any fleet size. The firm serves clients in the logistics sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.

name: Vouch
cb_description:
Vouch is a mobile app that analyzes users Facebook graph to connect them to all the singles on Facebook that they have common friends with. It also helps users that are already in relationships play matchmaker and anonymously match their single friends (we keep their identity a secret until they are ready to reveal themselves as the cupid).  This eliminates the fear, from the matchmaker, of making a bad match and being blamed by their friends in the aftermath - allowing for all the benefits if the match works out, and none of the risks if it doesnt.

The entire system is built into a game that encourages users to re-engage on a daily basis - whether single and looking for a date, or in a relationship and just playing matchmaker; the average user from our beta launch checks back every other day. 

We plan to eventually integrate the matchmaking into Facebook directly and award users scores for making successful matches, which they can then publish on their walls (free publicity).

name: Exo
cb_description: Exo operates as an innovative supplier in infrastructure inspection, engineering, and field repair. The company offers services such as infrastructure inspection, engineering, and field repair and reinforcement, aimed at ensuring the structural integrity of their clients' infrastructure assets. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Magnolia, Texas.

name: Webscale
cb_description: Webscale specializes in email marketing and data-driven strategies to enhance customer relationships and sales. The company offers services that include optimizing email deliverability, setting up technical aspects of email campaigns, crafting and implementing communication strategies, designing effective email templates, and executing both automated and daily email distributions. Webscale primarily serves clients looking to improve their digital marketing efforts through targeted and efficient email strategies. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Prague, Czech Republic.

name: PayShepherd
cb_description: PayShepherd operates as a contractor management platform operating in the industrial sector. The company offers a digital solution that centralizes, digitizes, and verifies all cost submissions on labor, equipment, and materials, providing transparency, control, and compliance over contracted workforces. It primarily serves industrial sites, aiding in the management of their contracted services. PayShepherd was formerly known as Project Recapture. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: Mindtech
cb_description: Mindtech specializes in synthetic AI training data and the development of AI-based vision systems within the technology sector. The company offers a Chameleon Platform that provides a behavioral simulator for creating and curating datasets, which integrates synthetic with real-world data to enhance the training of AI systems. Mindtech serves various sectors including automotive, transport, logistics, manufacturing, retail, e-commerce, safety, security, and smart city domains. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sheffield, United Kingdom.

name: Aurora Solar
cb_description: Aurora Solar is a cloud-based platform specializing in solar design and sales software for the solar energy industry. The company provides tools for creating accurate and customizable solar installation designs, sales enablement, and project management, all accessible with just an address and an electric bill. Aurora Solar's software is designed to streamline the solar project lifecycle, from initial design to sales and installation, and is used by solar professionals to design and sell advanced photovoltaic systems. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Bolt Labs
cb_description: BOLT operates a secure digital asset management system that facilitates the generation, storage, retrieval, and use of private keys while preventing key misuse and theft. Its platform eliminates lag time and high transaction fees while offering strong privacy protections allowing users to use Zcash, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other digital currencies for everyday payments and purchases. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gambrills, Maryland.

name: Heartseed
cb_description: Heartseed provides the research and development of stem cell-based heart regeneration technology. It develops various treatment methods by supplementing cardiomyocytes for heart failure. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: NetSpring
cb_description: NetSpring specializes in product and customer journey analytics within the data analytics software industry. It offers a warehouse-native analytics platform that enables businesses to understand product usage, analyze customer journeys, and derive business intelligence. NetSpring's solutions cater to various teams including product, growth, marketing, and data, BI and analytics, providing tools for behavioural analytics, marketing optimization, operational monitoring, and comprehensive customer views. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Redwood City, California. In September 2024, NetSpring was acquired by Optimizely.

name: Spekit
cb_description: Spekit develops an electronic learning platform for training and communication. The company provides customizable training content, employee onboarding training, sales playbooks, salesforce training and adoption, tool adoption features, and more also creates learning streams, tracks engagement with analytics provides feedback, and more. It primarily serves the education and training industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Solugen
cb_description: Solugen specializes in the sustainable manufacturing of chemicals using biobased solutions within various industries. Their main offerings include the production of essential materials from plant-derived substances through a process that emphasizes minimal emissions and waste. The company primarily serves sectors such as agriculture, water treatment, energy, construction, cleaning, and personal care. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Synctera
cb_description: Synctera provides partnerships between community banks and fintech companies through a two-sided marketplace. It offers business-to-business (B2B) transactions, business-to-consumer (B2C) transactions, wealth management, and investing, services for nonprofits, cannabis banking, and more. It serves individuals, enterprises, and banks. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Maze Therapeutics
cb_description: Maze Therapeutics focuses on developing precision medicines for serious diseases by leveraging advances in human genetics and functional genomics. The company's main offerings include the development of treatments that imitate protective genetic variants to address unmet medical needs, particularly in kidney disease. Maze Therapeutics' precision medicine program targets APOL1 kidney disease with the goal of halting disease progression and potentially reversing its effects. It was founded in 2018 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Vira
cb_description: Vira Health focuses on improving women's health, particularly during menopause, within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that integrates technology, self-directed care, and clinical intervention to provide personalized menopause treatment and support. Vira Health's services are designed to cater to the healthcare needs of women, with a strong emphasis on data-driven clinical best practices and behavior change. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Espresa
cb_description: Espresa focuses on enhancing employee experience and engagement in the human resources technology platform. The company offers a product to provide employees with flexible spending accounts for lifestyle choices, and supports human resource (HR) teams with tools for employee attraction, retention, and administration, all with a focus on diversity, equity, and inclusion. Espresa primarily serves the human resources technology industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: AgroStar
cb_description: AgroStar operates as an e-commerce platform for agricultural products. It provides a platform for farmers to buy seeds, nutrients, crop protection, and farm automation products. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Pune, India.

name: Coralogix
cb_description: Coralogix develops data analytics solutions. The company provides an observability platform that provides streaming analytics, monitoring, visualization, and alerting capabilities. Its solutions are log monitoring, cost optimization, contextual data analysis, and more. The platform is primarily used by businesses in the finance, video streaming, and enterprise sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Farmless
cb_description: Farmless focuses on creating sustainable food alternatives through fermentation technology in the food industry. It specializes in brewing planet-friendly proteins using microbial fermentation, independent of traditional agricultural land use. Farmless primarily serves sectors looking for sustainable and environmentally friendly food solutions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Happy Returns
cb_description: Happy Returns is a company that focuses on providing returns software and reverse logistics solutions. The company offers a range of services including a return and exchange portal, return bars, and return to store options, all designed to streamline the returns process for merchants and customers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santa Monica, California. In October 2023, Happy Returns was acquired by United Parcel Service.

name: Beacon
cb_description: CRRW, dba Beacon, is an unlimited flight solution for the Northeast corridor. For as low as $2,000 a month, Beacon members will get access to regularly scheduled flights, operated by one of Beacon's licensed operating partners, on mid-sized executive aircraft. With concierges on location at the private air terminals used by Beacon, standing ready to help with everything from car rentals, to drinks or flowers, the Beacon team is marrying high-touch service with air travel to create a one-of-a-kind experience.

name: Woltair
cb_description: Woltair is a company focused on energy savings through the installation of heat pumps and photovoltaic systems. The company offers a comprehensive service that includes the selection, financing, and installation of the most efficient heat pumps and solar power systems tailored to individual homes. Woltair primarily serves the renewable energy sector, assisting customers with obtaining subsidies and providing a digital platform for a streamlined service experience. Woltair was formerly known as Topte.cz s.r.o.. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Prague, Czech Republic.

name: ZenHR
cb_description: ZenHR is a company that specializes in providing cloud-based human resources management software (HRMS) for businesses. Their main offerings include automated payroll systems, attendance and time-tracking modules, employee self-service portals, and comprehensive onboarding and performance evaluation tools. ZenHR's solutions are tailored to meet the HR compliance and localization needs of the MENA region. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

name: Kandji
cb_description: Kandji is a company focused on providing device management and security solutions for devices within the enterprise sector. Its main offerings include a platform that integrates device management and endpoint detection and response, designed to streamline the deployment, management, and security of Mac, iPad, iOS, and tvOS devices. Kandji's platform is tailored to enhance IT and InfoSec operations with shared intelligence, automation, and workflows, catering to the needs of modern businesses that utilize Apple products. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Outfund
cb_description: Outfund is a financial services provider specializing in non-dilutive capital solutions for businesses. The company offers revenue-based financing and fixed repayment funding options to support business growth, with a range of 25k to 10M available. Outfund primarily serves sectors that require capital for marketing, inventory, and expansion, such as e-commerce and tech industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Digitt
cb_description: Digitt provides a financial platfrom that focused on domain of debt refinancing and consolidation. The company offers solutions to reduce credit card debt through refinancing, providing customers with lower interest rates and personalized payment plans. It serves the individuals. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Guadalajara, Mexico.

name: Aviron Interactive
cb_description: Aviron Interactive focuses on fitness technology in the health and wellness industry. The company offers an interactive rowing machine that provides high-intensity workouts, strength training, and a variety of content to keep users engaged. The primary market is the home fitness industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: zkPass
cb_description: zkPass is a privacy-focused protocol that specializes in secure data verification within the web3 and cybersecurity sectors. The company offers a suite of products that enable users to validate their private data across HTTPS websites into the web3 ecosystem without revealing sensitive details. zkPass primarily caters to industries that require secure and private data verification, such as legal identity, financial services, healthcare, and employment. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Planet42
cb_description: Planet42 specializes in rent-to-own car services. The company offers a subscription-based model where customers can rent cars with an option to purchase them over time. Planet42 primarily serves individuals who may have difficulty obtaining traditional bank financing for vehicle purchases. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Menlyn, South Africa.

name: Kin
cb_description: Kin is a company focused on providing affordable home insurance solutions within the insurance industry. The company offers a range of products including homeowners, mobile home, condo, flood, landlord, and hurricane insurance, all designed to protect customers' properties and interests in the event of disasters or other damages. Kin's insurance products are tailored to meet the needs of homeowners and property investors, offering customizable policies and direct purchasing options to keep costs down. Kin was formerly known as Bright Policy. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Paack
cb_description: Paack specializes in scheduled delivery services and logistics for the e-commerce and retail sectors. The company offers a range of delivery options including same-day and next-day services with the flexibility of customer-tailored time slots. Paack also provides mid-mile transportation practices. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Skydropx
cb_description: Skydropx provides a platform for shipments. The platform offers packing solutions, returns, and more. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Monterrey, Mexico.

name: GrowerIQ
cb_description: GrowerIQ is a compliant seed-to-sale and cannabis cultivation platform. It offers an integrated cannabis seed-to-sale software solution for licensed producers. It allows users to manage their facility's complexity, and get their businesses growing faster. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Goomer
cb_description: Goomer specializes in digital menu solutions for the restaurant industry. The company offers QR code and tablet-based ordering systems, as well as a platform for managing delivery channels without marketplace fees. Goomer's digital menus are customizable, and their solutions aim to reduce operational costs, store customer data, and enhance the overall customer experience. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Landa
cb_description: Landa is a technology company specializing in real estate investments, offering a platform for fractional property ownership. The company provides a full-stack real estate investment solution, enabling users to buy shares in rental properties, receive monthly income, and manage their real estate portfolio. Landa's platform caters to individual investors, institutions, and residents, offering services such as property share trading, mortgages, and educational resources for informed investing. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Skydio
cb_description: Skydio specializes in aerial robotics and autonomous drones within the technology sector. The company offers drones that autonomously capture and process data using artificial intelligence (AI) and computer vision, designed for a variety of applications including inspections, public safety, and defense. Skydio's products are utilized across sectors such as public safety, defense, energy, utilities, and other industries requiring advanced aerial data capture and analysis. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Cortica
cb_description: Cortica is a company that focuses on the development of Autonomous AI technology, operating within the artificial intelligence industry. The company's main offerings include AI technologies that enable machines to process information and learn in a manner similar to the human cortex, with applications in various sectors such as autonomous vehicles, smart cities, and autonomous drones. These technologies are used to build AI companies that address large market opportunities. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: My 1st Years
cb_description: My 1st Years is a company focused on the retail industry, specifically in the domain of personalised baby products. The company offers a range of customisable items such as toys, clothing, and backpacks, designed to provide unique and personal gifts for young children. It is based in Northampton, England.

name: Autotalks
cb_description: Autotalks specializes in V2X chipset technology, focusing on the automotive industry and autonomous vehicle market. It offers chipsets that enable vehicles to communicate with each other and their surroundings, helping in road safety and mobility. Autotalks' products are designed to complement existing vehicle sensors, particularly in challenging visibility conditions. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Kfar-Netter, Israel.

name: Natrion
cb_description: Natrion develops battery technologies in the renewable energy and electric vehicle sectors. It produces components for all-solid-state rechargeable batteries, that are designed to improve electric vehicle fire safety, driving range, charge time, and overall lifespan. It primarily sells to the automotive and battery manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Binghamton, New York.

name: Neurovalens
cb_description: Neurovalens serves as a global health-tech company specializing in the development of non-invasive neurostimulation products aimed at addressing major health challenges. The company's technology facilitates transdermal activation of brainstem and hypothalamus nuclei to modify autonomic function, circadian rhythms, and metabolic processes, providing drug-free health solutions. Neurovalens primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, wellness, and medical devices with its innovative technology. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Belfast, United Kingdom.

name: SwissDeCode
cb_description: SwissDeCode specializes in rapid food certification technology within the food industry. The company offers on-site testing kits and automated devices for detecting contaminants and authenticating food products, ensuring food quality and compliance. SwissDeCode's solutions cater to various sectors within the food supply chain, including agriculture, animal feed, and dairy. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: Brevel
cb_description: Brevel develops a scale-up microalgae photobioreactor.

name: Kili Technology
cb_description: Kili Technology specializes in data labeling and quality assurance for artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning applications across various industries. The company offers a platform that enables users to annotate, manage, and improve the quality of training data for AI models, as well as professional services for data labeling. Kili Technology's solutions cater to sectors that require training data for AI, such as healthcare, security, and insurance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Moneybox
cb_description: Moneybox is a mobile savings and investment application. It provides an application to enable users to round up the digital spare change from everyday card transactions and invest that change into three tracker funds within stocks and shares. It was founded in 2015 and the company is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Artemest
cb_description: Artemest is a company focused on contemporary Italian craftsmanship and design, operating in the furniture, home dcor, lighting, lifestyle, and art sectors. The company offers a range of products including furniture, lighting fixtures, and home dcor items, all handcrafted by skilled Italian artisans. Artemest primarily serves the luxury retail and e-commerce industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: StarTree
cb_description: StarTree was a pan-European project focused on the sustainable exploitation of forest resources for rural development within the research and development sector. The project aimed to support the full value chain of non-wood forest products (NWFPs) from primary production to marketing, including the institutional frameworks that accompany them. It primarily served sectors related to forestry, rural development, and sustainable resource management. It was founded in 2015 and is based in England, United Kingdom.

name: SwipeRx
cb_description: SwipeRx is a community and B2B commerce platform for the pharmacy sector. It provides a network for pharmacy professionals to engage in digital professional education, access a comprehensive drug directory, and utilize tools for collaboration and adverse event reporting. SwipeRx also offers a B2B commerce tool that facilitates the purchase of affordable medicines for pharmacies. It was formerly known as mClinica Pharmacy Solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Singapore.

name: Augmedics
cb_description: Augmedics specializes in augmented reality technologies within the medical devices sector, focusing on enhancing surgical outcomes. The company's flagship product, the xvision Spine System, is an FDA-approved augmented reality system designed to aid surgeons in navigating instruments and implants during spine surgeries by providing real-time 3D anatomical visualization. Augmedics' solutions are broadly applicable to various spine procedures, aiming to improve accuracy, safety, and efficiency for surgeons. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Arlington Heights, Illinois.

name: GrainChain
cb_description: GrainChain specializes in creating innovative solutions for the global agricultural industry, focusing on supply chain efficiency. The company offers a cloud-based platform that utilizes blockchain and IoT technologies to manage pre and post-harvest processes, ensuring easier, faster, and safer transactions for all supply chain participants. GrainChain's platform is designed to serve producers, storage operators, and buyers by providing transaction platforms, preharvest tools, inventory management, complex processing, and logistics solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in McAllen, Texas.

name: Infinium
cb_description: Infinium specializes in the development of clean metal production technologies within the metals industry. The company offers innovative solutions for the primary production and recycling of light metals, such as magnesium and rare earth elements, with a focus on zero emissions and energy efficiency. Infinium's technologies are primarily utilized in sectors such as aerospace, automotive, consumer technology, defense, energy, and mass transit. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Natick, Massachusetts.

name: Electrum
cb_description: Electrum is a company that specializes in providing secure Bitcoin wallet software within the cryptocurrency sector. Its main offerings include a wallet with encrypted private keys, SPV transaction verification for security, and multisig support for shared control over funds. Electrum's software is designed to be accessible across various platforms, including Windows, macOS, Linux, and Android. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Stockal
cb_description: Stockal is a global investing platform that specializes in providing retail investors with the means to invest and save in international markets. The company offers a range of financial products including global stocks and ETFs, curated investment portfolios known as Stacks, and managed funds, alongside cash management services that allow users to save, invest, and spend from a single account. Stockal's platform is designed to be smart, simple, and secure, providing users with access to world-class research and analysis, real-time stock alerts, and the ability to invest in fractional shares. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Figma
cb_description: Figma offers a graphics design platform. The company offers a collaborative interface design tool that allows teams to create, share, test, and ship designs. It provides services for design, prototyping, design systems, and development, as well as an online whiteboard for team collaboration. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Huupe
cb_description: Huupe focuses on sports technology, specifically in the basketball sector. The company offers a basketball hoop that uses a technology to track and analyze various aspects of a player's performance, such as shooting percentage, shot angle trajectory, speed, agility, and release time, providing real-time feedback to the user. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: Kencko
cb_description: Kencko is a smart food company focused on organic fruit and vegetable products aimed at helping people eat healthier, and waste less. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Ancera
cb_description: Ancera specializes in supply chain intelligence for the food production industry, focusing on advanced microbiology and data science to enhance profitability. The company offers monitoring systems and software platforms that provide actionable insights into microbial risks and production performance, enabling food producers to make data-driven decisions. Ancera's solutions cater to the poultry industry, offering tools for live production performance and microbial security. It is based in Branford, Connecticut.

name: EON
cb_description: EON is an intelligent high-speed blockchain operating system. Flexible and intelligent allocation of the entire network computing power instantly synchronizes node load and cloud network and enables the average TPS of the entire network to reach over 100,000.

name: Sudo Biosciences
cb_description: Sudo Biosciences designs and develops medicines. The company's main offerings include the development of therapeutics targeting the tyrosine kinase 2 (TYK2) pseudokinase domain, which plays a key role in cytokine signaling pathways. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Carmel, Indiana.

name: Lendflow
cb_description: Lendflow specializes in providing embedded credit infrastructure for the fintech, lending, and software industries. The company offers a credit decisioning engine, an embedded credit operating system, and a marketplace for lenders, designed to facilitate the integration and launch of credit products within various ecosystems. Lendflow's solutions support businesses of all sizes in accessing necessary credit products through the software services they already utilize. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Rewst
cb_description: Rewst operates as a Robotic Process Automation (RPA) platform in the automation software industry. The company offers a platform that integrates various tools to automate processes, enabling users to build workflows on visual canvasses without the need for coding.
