It primarily serves the Managed Service Providers (MSPs) sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tampa, Florida.

name: Calyxo
cb_description: Calyxo manufactures cadmium telluride (CdTe) thin-film solar modules and supplies turnkey photovoltaic systems.

name: Mysa
cb_description: Mysa specializes in finance automation for businesses and focuses on banking, accounting, and tax processes. The company offers services that automate accounts payable, accounting, and tax compliance, allowing businesses to manage finances. Mysa primarily serves startups, D2C brands, and tech services that require financial management solutions. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Squint
cb_description: Squint specializes in artificial intelligence and augmented reality solutions for data entry and procedure generation in the manufacturing sector. The company's main offerings include automating data entry, creating custom procedures, and providing augmented reality-based guidance to manage workforce. Squint primarily serves sectors such as automotive, food and beverage, oil and gas, heavy industrials, equipment, consumer packaged goods, and energy. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Livance
cb_description: Livance is a company focused on reinventing the medical office space within the healthcare industry. The company provides a complete infrastructure for healthcare professionals such as doctors, psychologists, nutritionists, and physiotherapists, offering services that eliminate fixed costs and administrative tasks while providing autonomy, flexibility, and mobility. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Floship
cb_description: Floship is a logistics technology company specializing in global eCommerce logistics and fulfillment solutions. They offer a range of services including supply chain management, shipping insurance, and integration with various shopping carts and marketplaces, all powered by an intelligent logistics technology platform. Floship serves the eCommerce industry, providing solutions to streamline fulfillment and distribution for online retailers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

name: Procol
cb_description: Procol is a company specializing in procurement software solutions within the technology sector. They offer a comprehensive suite of tools designed to automate and streamline the sourcing and procurement process, enhance supplier management, and optimize spend management through AI-driven insights. Procol primarily serves industries such as construction, manufacturing, retail, pharmaceutical, food & beverage, automotive, and IT/ITeS. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Flowspace
cb_description: Flowspace is an ecommerce logistics and fulfillment company that specializes in providing cloud-based software and services for brands. The company offers a suite of tools for inventory management, order management, and network optimization to streamline fulfillment operations. Flowspace primarily serves the ecommerce industry, enabling brands to meet customer expectations for fast and efficient delivery. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Astranis
cb_description: Astranis specializes in the development of small, low telecommunications satellites within the aerospace industry. The company's main offerings include the creation of spacecraft designed for geostationary orbit, and providing broadband internet services to underserved populations globally. Astranis primarily serves the telecommunications sector, delivering bandwidth-as-a-service to commercial and government entities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Paddle
cb_description: Paddle is a comprehensive payments, tax, and subscription management platform. The company offers a merchant-of-record solution that handles payments, tax compliance, subscription billing, and fraud protection to facilitate global sales for software businesses. Paddle's services are tailored to meet the needs of both business-to-business (B2B) and business-to-consumer (B2C) software companies, aiming to simplify and automate their billing operations to focus on growth. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Scorpion Therapeutics
cb_description: Scorpion Therapeutics focuses on the field of medicine within the oncology sector. The company develops targeted small-molecule drugs designed to interact with validated cancer targets. Scorpion Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on enhancing cancer treatment options. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Amount
cb_description: Amount develops digital banking and financial technology solutions. The company offers a suite of products and services that enable financial institutions to provide mobile banking experiences, including swift loan approval, automated account origination, and flexible payment solutions. Its primary customers are financial institutions and their merchant partners. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Birdie
cb_description: Birdie is a company that operates in the iGaming industry, focusing on providing online casino gaming experiences. The company offers a wide range of licensed slot games with high Return to Player (RTP) values, as well as a variety of table games like roulette, blackjack, and baccarat, catering to users looking for real-money gaming options. Birdie's platform is designed to serve the online gambling community with features such as bonuses, promotional codes, and a loyalty program. It is based in Moscow, Russian Federation.

name: Trellis Research
cb_description: Trellis Research focuses on providing legal intelligence solutions. It offers an artificial intelligence-powered state court research and analytics platform that allows users to search state trial court records, analyze judge rulings, and track legal issues in real-time. The platform primarily serves the legal industry, including law firms, legal professionals, and law students. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Prometeo
cb_description: Prometeo provides a Watson-based AI solution targeted at firefighters. The team has developed a tool designed to monitor health and safety in the industry, both long term and in real time. The company developed a smartphone-sized device that straps onto the wearer's arm to gauge things like temperature, smoke, and humidity.

name: Verdagy
cb_description: Verdagy focuses on the development of water electrolysis technology for the production of green hydrogen. The company engineers and manufactures innovative electrolyzers designed to reduce both capital and operating costs for industrial hydrogen production. Verdagy primarily serves sectors requiring decarbonization solutions, such as oil and gas, fertilizers, industrial chemicals, steel, mining, and transportation. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Moss Landing, California.

name: Checkfront
cb_description: Checkfront offers a cloud-based booking application that provides a centralized business management tool while offering self-service bookings from a merchant's own website. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Victoria, Canada. In June 2023, Checkfront merged with Rezdy.

name: DustPhotonics
cb_description: DustPhotonics focuses on advancing Silicon Photonics in the technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive technology platform for Silicon Photonics, providing solutions that enable more data rates at lower power consumption, and cost-effectiveness, while also ensuring scalability for high volumes. The company offers active and passive components, laser integration, and fiber coupling. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Modi'In, Israel.

name: Tulu
cb_description: Tulu is a company that specializes in providing end-to-end maintenance services for property managers in the real estate sector. The company offers a managed service that handles all aspects of maintenance, from intake to payment, while allowing clients to retain control and maintain their vendor relationships. Tulu customizes its processes to fit the unique needs of each property manager, integrating with popular property management software and ensuring maintenance tasks are completed efficiently. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Chronosphere
cb_description: Chronosphere is a cloud native observability platform that specializes in helping DevOps teams manage the speed, scale, and complexity of their cloud native environments. The company offers solutions for incident resolution and cost control, with a focus on resolving infrastructure and application issues before they impact customer experiences. Chronosphere provides a suite of tools for telemetry data collection, transformation, and routing, as well as scalable data storage, all designed to offer real-time insights and enhance application performance while managing observability costs. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Vizion
cb_description: Vizion provides an application programming interface (API) based solution for container shipment tracking. The company offers products such as data benchmarking, and enriched, accessible datasets built on sound information technology infrastructures. It serves logistics service providers, cargo owners, and ocean carriers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: ActivTrak
cb_description: ActivTrak is a company focused on workforce analytics and productivity management in the technology sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform that provides insights and metrics about digital work, helping organizations measure and optimize productivity and wellness. Its services include employee productivity monitoring, coaching and performance management, and workforce and technology planning. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: OpsLevel
cb_description: OpsLevel is a company that focuses on providing software solutions in the technology sector. The company offers a developer portal that provides a software catalog, sets software standards, and empowers developers with self-service tools to enhance their productivity and maintain software standards. OpsLevel primarily serves the software development and technology industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Highlight
cb_description: Highlight, offered by Math Camp, is a location-based mobile app, integrated through Facebook, that sends notifications when friends or people who share common interests are nearby.

name: Flowhub
cb_description: Flowhub specializes in cannabis production and distribution. It provides a platform that offers compliance, point of sale, payments, inventory tracking, and retail management solutions for cannabis retailers. It primarily serves the cannabis retail industry. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Conveyor
cb_description: Conveyor is a growth marketing consultancy. It specializes in multichannel customer acquisition within the digital marketing industry. It offers strategic consulting, performance-driven media buying, and conversion rate optimization services to enhance online marketing goals. It primarily serves growth-stage startups, established brands, in-house teams, and partner agencies looking to improve their paid advertising outcomes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: OpenAI
cb_description: OpenAI is an artificial intelligence research and deployment company focused on ensuring that AI benefits all of humanity. The company's main offerings include developing AI technologies with a commitment to safety, alignment with human values, and broad societal benefits. OpenAI's products and services are designed to address global challenges and promote the equitable distribution of AI advantages. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Centivax
cb_description: Centivax is a biotechnology company focused on developing vaccines to accelerate the worlds transition to a post-pathogen humanity. Their main product is a broad-spectrum vaccine currently in pre-clinical development, designed to prevent all strains of influenza. This vaccine has been recognized by the Gates Foundation Grand Challenge: End the Pandemic Threat. It was founded in 2020 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Castle
cb_description: Castle manages rental homes for landlords using automation and on-demand labor - allowing owners to kick back, relax, and never worry about their rental properties again.

name: Rwazi
cb_description: Rwazi specializes in providing actionable data for multinational consumer goods companies. The company offers consumer behavior analysis, brand intelligence, and artificial intelligence-powered market analysis services to facilitate informed decision-making. It primarily serves healthcare, consumer goods, automotive, education, finance, agriculture, energy, transport, and media sectors. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Pulumi
cb_description: Pulumi provides a cloud development model. It offers frameworks and libraries to define, deploy, and manage cloud services from serverless to container to virtual machines, using code. It enables customers to manage development tools, and the platform provides insights unlocks analytics and search across cloud infrastructure, and enables novel artificial intelligence (AI)-driven infrastructure automation. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Allstacks
cb_description: Allstacks specializes in providing insights into software delivery and operations within the software development industry. The company offers tools that aggregate data from various delivery tools to help organizations improve their software development lifecycle, including forecasting, risk assessment, performance metrics, and reporting dashboards. Allstacks primarily serves product and engineering leaders looking to align their software development efforts with business goals and improve engineering productivity. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Datch
cb_description: Datch is an AI-powered asset management platform that operates within the manufacturing and energy & utilities sectors. The company offers a mobile enterprise asset management solution that enables real-time data capture and voice-enabled data entry for frontline workers, along with integration capabilities with existing EAM systems. Datch primarily serves the manufacturing and energy & utilities industries by providing tools for maintenance order management, data enrichment, and automation to facilitate continuous improvement and compliance reporting. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Clarify Health
cb_description: Clarify Health specializes in healthcare analytics and value-based payments, operating within the healthcare sector. The company offers a unified platform, Atlas, which provides insights into patient journeys, healthcare market dynamics, and strategies for clinical and business impact. Clarify Health primarily serves healthcare providers, health plans, and life sciences companies with its analytics software. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Alkymi
cb_description: Alkymi specializes in transforming unstructured investment and financial data through AI-powered document workflows within the financial services sector. The company offers a platform that automates the extraction and standardization of data from various documents, enabling businesses to integrate this information into their existing systems. Alkymi primarily serves sectors such as private equity, wealth and asset management, and financial data operations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Salvia BioElectronics
cb_description: Salvia BioElectronics focuses on developing bioelectronic solutions for neurological conditions, particularly migraine and cluster headaches. The company offers personalized migraine therapy tailored to individual patient needs, utilizing bioelectronic technology to treat a range of neurological disorders. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Eindhoven, Netherlands.

name: Doxel
cb_description: Doxel is a company specializing in automated construction progress tracking within the construction industry. Its main offerings include software solutions that provide objective data analysis, risk management, and real-time visibility into construction projects, leveraging machine learning and image recognition technologies. Doxel's services cater to various stakeholders in the construction sector, including owners, project executives, superintendents, and BIM/VDC engineers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Dash Water
cb_description: Dash Water specializes in the production of fruit-infused sparkling water within the beverage industry. The company offers a range of natural soft drinks made from misshapen or 'wonky' fruits, ensuring no sugar, calories, or artificial sweeteners are included. Dash Water's products are packaged in fully recyclable aluminium cans and are available for one-time purchase or through subscription and bundle options. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Upswing
cb_description: Upswing is a company focused on enhancing student success and retention in the education sector. Its main offerings include a student engagement platform that provides online tutoring, virtual assistant technology, and data-driven support services to improve academic outcomes. Upswing primarily serves the higher education industry, offering solutions to colleges and universities aiming to support non-traditional learners and increase graduation rates. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Begin
cb_description: Begin is a cloud platform specializing in the development and deployment of functional web applications within the technology sector. The company offers services that simplify global deployment, enhance the resilience of fullstack web apps, and provide declarative deployment solutions, along with a community-driven AWS client. Begin primarily caters to web developers and organizations looking to build and maintain robust, scalable web applications. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sunflower Therapeutics
cb_description: Sunflower Therapeutics provides biotechnology services. It offers protein manufacturing solutions. The company offers automated and easy-to-use systems designed to simplify the process of protein manufacturing, enabling faster results for researchers and developers. It serves the biotechnology industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Growsari
cb_description: GrowSari provides a technology-enabled business-to-business (B2B) platform with sari-sari stores getting services and assortments. It develops technology to connect sari-sari store owners directly to companies and cut out middlemen traders. It offers features for load selling, bill payment, remittance, banking, loans, insurance, store layouts, re-selling programs, billboards, e-commerce drop-off points, and more. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Quezon City, Philippines.

name: Remotebase
cb_description: Remotebase provides recruitment, hiring, and training facilities to candidates. The company specializes in sourcing, recruitment, onboarding, review, training, and workspaces, enabling companies to readily recruit people from their programs. It primarily serves the human resource sector. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Clubbi
cb_description: Clubbi is a digital platform focused on streamlining the supply chain for neighborhood markets within the fast-moving consumer goods industry. The company offers a comprehensive assortment of over 8,000 grocery, beverage, cleaning, and hygiene products, ensuring competitive pricing, next-day delivery, and flexible payment terms. Clubbi primarily serves small grocery store owners, providing them with a convenient one-click ordering system and efficient logistics. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: Clipr
cb_description:
A social e-commerce platform for impulse purchase products. Impulse purchase products should have lower customer acquisition cost and should be sold differently than mobile phones and books. Clipr is a platform where people discover, clip, like, organize and share impulse purchase products.

Similar companies in US: thefancy.com, polyvore.com, pinterest.com

name: Propseller
cb_description: Propseller operates a platform for users to compare agents. The company collects and verifies ratings of agents and analyzes their historical transaction data based on both the given criteria and agents' track records. serves clients It primarily serves the real estate sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: Burrow
cb_description: Burrow, now known as Finova, is a company that operates in the technology sector. The company offers a range of cloud-based software solutions. The primary market for these services is the tech industry. It is based in London, England.

name: ClinOne
cb_description: ClinOne is a company specializing in clinical trial technology, offering a single platform for trial awareness, consent management, and patient engagement. The company provides solutions that connect, inform, and empower participants, care partners, and sites, featuring tools like eConsent, TeleVisit services, and data insights. ClinOne was formerly known as ClinTrialApp. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Needham, Massachusetts. In September 2024, ClinOne was acquired by uMotif.

name: taika
cb_description: Taika is a company that focuses on the beverage industry, specifically coffee and matcha. The company offers a range of coffee and matcha beverages that are keto-friendly and plant-based, infused with functional mushrooms and adaptogens to support immune function, enhance energy, creativity, and reduce stress. Taika primarily sells to the health and wellness sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sionna Therapeutics
cb_description: Sionna Therapeutics operates as a life sciences company with a focus on the treatment of cystic fibrosis. The company's main offering is the development of novel small molecule therapies aimed at targeting the most common genetic mutation affecting cystic fibrosis patients, to normalize CFTR function. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Lexly
cb_description: Lexly is an online platform that provides fitness services. The company's platform allows users to search and book experts for back, neck, or shoulder issues. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: NexHealth
cb_description: NexHealth is a patient experience platform operating in the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a range of services including online scheduling, digital forms, automated messaging, and online payments, all aimed at improving the patient experience. Its primary customers are healthcare providers, ranging from independent doctors' offices to public tech companies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Otis AI
cb_description: Otis AI is a digital marketing platform specializing in data-driven advertising for startups and small businesses within the digital marketing sector. The company offers a suite of services that enable businesses to launch and manage campaigns across multiple social and search platforms, utilizing customer and transaction data for marketing automation, including retargeting, creative and performance optimization. Otis AI primarily serves the ecommerce industry, leveraging AI to help businesses maximize their return on investment in advertising. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dover, Delaware.

name: Uolo
cb_description: Uolo is a company that specializes in educational technology, offering practice-based scholastic programs and school management software. The company provides a suite of learning products designed to enhance coding skills, English fluency, mathematical thinking, and general knowledge, alongside tools for managing school administrative tasks such as fee collection, attendance tracking, and communication. Uolo primarily serves the education sector, partnering with schools to implement its comprehensive learning and management solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Energetic Insurance
cb_description: Energetic Insurance provides financing solutions for the renewable energy sector, focusing on commercial and industrial infrastructure. The company offers credit insurance and lending to support projects with sub-investment grade and unrated credit risks. Energetic Insurance serves the renewable energy development sector, providing financial structures to enhance debt proceeds and platform value. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: TRANZACT
cb_description: TRANZACT specializes in direct-to-consumer insurance marketing and sales within the insurance industry. It offers services that include lead generation, enhancing brand visibility, and optimizing insurance sales through advanced analytics and a network of sales agents. Additionally, TRANZACT provides data-driven technology solutions such as web applications, mobile-responsive websites, and efficient lead purchasing and routing systems. TRANZACT was formerly known as Mosaic Performance Solutions. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Fort Lee, New Jersey.

name: Harvey
cb_description: Harvey, formerly HomeHero, focuses on providing virtual consultations with functional and naturopathic doctors, in-home lab testing and natural therapies to help optimize your health and wellness.

name: PlayPlay
cb_description: PlayPlay is a video creation platform that specializes in enabling marketing and communication teams to produce videos. The platform offers a suite of tools for creating professional-quality videos, including artificial intelligence (AI)-)-assisted video creation, editable templates, and features for adding automatic subtitles and voice-overs. PlayPlay primarily serves sectors that require communication strategies, such as marketing, corporate communications, and human resources. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Templafy
cb_description: Templafy specializes in document automation and template management within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that streamlines the creation, management, and distribution of business documents, ensuring brand compliance and integrating with popular office suites and business applications. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Carbon-12 Labs
cb_description: Carbon-12 Labs is a price-stable cryptocurrency for payments. It builds stablecoins, fiat on-ramps, and anti-fraud technology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York.

name: Innowatts
cb_description: Innowatts is a leader in Artificial intelligence-powered Energy Data Analytics within the energy sector. The company offers a software-as-a-service platform that integrates with business operations to provide energy insights, leveraging advanced machine learning models for next-generation forecast accuracy. Innowatts primarily serves Retail Energy Providers, Utilities & Grid Operators, and Commercial, Industrial & Public Entities. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Ciba Health
cb_description: Ciba Health operates as a digital therapeutics company for the treatment and reversal of chronic and metabolic diseases. The company offers online healthcare services including primary care and personalized programs for conditions such as type 2 diabetes, prediabetes, obesity, digestive health, and mental health issues like depression and anxiety. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Hysata
cb_description: Hysata specializes in developing and manufacturing high-efficiency electrolyzers for the green hydrogen industry. Their electrolyzers are designed to split water into hydrogen and oxygen to support the transition to net zero emissions. The company's technology is recognized for its potential to impact the economics of green hydrogen production significantly. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Wollongong, Australia.

name: BuildOut
cb_description: BuildOut is a company that focuses on providing software solutions in the commercial real estate sector. The company offers a range of services including prospecting, marketing, transaction management, and customer relationship management, all designed to help real estate brokers manage their operations more efficiently. The company primarily serves the commercial real estate industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: HiveWatch
cb_description: HiveWatch is a company that focuses on providing cloud-based SaaS solutions in the physical security industry. The company offers a platform that enhances existing security technologies by streamlining incident response, consolidating various programs and systems, and reducing false alarms. HiveWatch primarily serves the security industry. It is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Softwheel
cb_description: Softwheel is a smart mobility and transportation company based in Tel Aviv. The company is developing an energy-efficient and energy-absorbing wheel system aimed at helping people relying on wheels for transportation to live more comfortably.

name: AccioJob
cb_description: AccioJob is an upskilling platform specializing in tech career training in the education sector. The company offers courses in full stack development, data science and AI, and cyber security, all designed to equip learners with industry-relevant skills and provide placement assistance. AccioJob's programs cater to a wide range of individuals, from students to working professionals, aiming to transition into or advance within the tech industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Anzen
cb_description: Anzen specializes in the issuance of a stablecoin backed by institutional-grade real world assets within the financial services sector. The company's main offering is a stablecoin that maintains on-chain dollar value, supported by a diversified portfolio of private credit assets, and is integrated with decentralized finance platforms for various use cases. Anzen's stablecoin can be used for earning yields, trading, and as a medium of exchange in the crypto ecosystem. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Transcelestial
cb_description: Transcelestial specializes in wireless laser communications technology within the telecommunications sector. The company offers high-capacity network devices that provide secure, fiber-like speeds for data transmission without the need for spectrum licensing. Transcelestial's solutions are primarily utilized by industries such as ISPs, mobile operators, ports and logistics, and education. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Bounce
cb_description: Bounce is a provider of indoor recreational activities, specializing in trampoline parks. The company offers a variety of trampoline-based attractions and programs such as freestyle jumping, dodgeball, basketball, and fitness classes. Bounce primarily caters to individuals and groups looking for active entertainment and event hosting services. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Glen Iris, Victoria.

name: Virtuix
cb_description: Virtuix specializes in immersive virtual reality experiences and operates in the virtual reality industry. The company offers an omni-directional treadmill, the Omni, which allows users to walk, run, and turn in 360 degrees within virtual environments, and Omniverse, a content platform with a variety of VR games optimized for the Omni. The Omni is primarily marketed to VR arcades and family entertainment centers as a multiplayer VR attraction. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Oro Labs
cb_description: Oro Labs operates as a supplier engagement platform specializing in procurement and supply chain challenges. It helps to orchestrate end-to-end procurement and supplier onboarding across teams, systems, and processes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: ApplyBoard
cb_description: ApplyBoard serves as a platform focused on facilitating international education and streamlining the study abroad process for students. The company connects students with educational programs that match backgrounds and interests and assist with the application process. ApplyBoard also partners with educational institutions to increase presence and with recruitment partners to guide students in fulfilling international education aspirations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Kitchener, Canada.

name: Haus
cb_description: Haus ceased operations. Haus provides a social network app for neighbors. The application allows users to vote in neighborly polls, meet new people around them, and use their mobile phones as panic buttons. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

name: Progcap
cb_description: Progcap, also known as Desiderata Impact Ventures Private Limited, is a financial technology firm focused on providing specialized financing and technology products to underserved segments of the Indian retail economy. The company offers collateral-free working capital and digitizes supply chains to empower small and medium businesses with the financial tools they need to grow. Progcap primarily serves the retail ecosystem, offering solutions that facilitate access to finance and streamline business operations for micro and small enterprises. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Veryable
cb_description: Veryable is a company that focuses on providing on-demand labor solutions in the manufacturing, logistics, and warehousing sectors. The company offers a marketplace that connects businesses with high-quality workers, enabling businesses to create a labor pool for increased productivity and competitiveness. For workers, Veryable offers immediate access to work, flexible scheduling, skill-building opportunities, and fast payment. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: Akiba Digital
cb_description: Akiba Digital operates as a data aggregation and scoring technology company.  The company's main services include providing alternative credit scoring and lending-as-a-service to enable lenders, banks, fintechs, and retailers to extend credit, buy now pay later (BNPL) options, and cash advances. It primarily serves the banking, micro-lending, merchant, and financial technology sectors. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

name: QuSecure
cb_description: QuSecure specializes in quantum cybersecurity encryption within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a software solution that provides classical and quantum-resilient protection, cryptographic agility, and insights to prepare businesses and government agencies for current and future data security challenges. QuSecure primarily serves sectors such as banking, financial services, insurance, public sector, telecom, critical infrastructure, and IoT. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: AdTonos
cb_description: AdTonos is a digital audio advertising platform operating in the advertising and marketing industry. The company offers services such as programmatic audio ads, podcast advertising, and interactive audio ads, primarily focusing on digital audio for brands and agencies. It also provides monetization solutions for audio streams like live radio, podcasts, music streaming, and online radio. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: ImCheck Therapeutics
cb_description: ImCheck Therapeutics focuses on the development of immunotherapeutic antibodies within the biotechnology sector. The company's main offerings include designing antibodies that modulate the immune system for treating cancer, infectious diseases, and autoimmune disorders. Its products aim to enhance innate and adaptive immunity and may offer improved clinical outcomes compared to first-generation immune checkpoint inhibitors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Marseille, France.

name: Doppel
cb_description: Doppel focuses on digital risk protection in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers services such as anti-phishing, VIP protection, threat intelligence, anti-piracy, and anti-counterfeiting, all aimed at detecting and neutralizing cyber attacks on brands. Doppel primarily serves sectors such as finance, tech, crypto, retail, media, and government. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Inventa
cb_description: Inventa offers a business-to-business (B2B) marketplace connecting brands with independent retailers. It enables retailers to find and buy wholesale merchandise for stores to reach local retailers. The company offers products that include beauty and wellness products, makeup products, food and drinks, home equipment, and more. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Etleap
cb_description: Etleap provides ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) solutions in the data management. The company offers services that help in creating and maintaining data pipelines and data warehouses, automating most ETL setup and maintenance tasks, and simplifying the rest into manageable tasks. It primarily serves the data management sector of the economy. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SmarterDx
cb_description: SmarterDx is a company that focuses on healthcare data and artificial intelligence in the healthcare industry. The company offers a physician-trained AI that performs a second level review of medical charts, aiming to recover revenue and quality opportunities. It uses all Electronic Medical Record (EMR) data and proprietary clinical AI to ensure complete documentation and coding of diagnoses that impact hospital revenue and quality. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BetterUp
cb_description: BetterUp operates as a digital coaching platform. The company offers a coaching platform that uses a combination of artificial intelligence (AI) technology, and behavioral science to deliver change at scale, for personal and organizational resilience, adaptability, well-being, and productivity. it primarily caters business training sector. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Venatorx Pharmaceuticals
cb_description: Venatorx Pharmaceuticals is a private company that specializes in the research and development of antibacterial and antiviral drugs. The company's main offerings include the discovery and development of novel anti-infectives aimed at treating multi-drug-resistant bacterial infections and hard-to-treat viral infections. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Malvern, Pennsylvania.

name: Lessen
cb_description: Lessen is a company focused on simplifying the management and improvement of real estate properties within the property maintenance and facilities management sectors. The company offers a suite of services that streamline property repairs and maintenance, renovations, and capital projects, leveraging technology and a network of vendors to optimize operations and reduce costs. Lessen primarily serves commercial and residential property owners and managers, offering solutions to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of property maintenance and improvement. Lessen was formerly known as Project Ponos. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: RepeatMD
cb_description: RepeatMD is a technology company focused on revenue automation and patient engagement solutions for the aesthetic and wellness industries. The company offers a mobile rewards app designed to increase patient retention, generate referral revenue, and streamline the sale of high-margin services. RepeatMD primarily serves medical spas, dermatologists, plastic surgeons, wellness clinics, integrative medicine practitioners, and dentists. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: FarMart
cb_description: FarMart is a food and agritech company focused on the food supply chain through technology. The company offers a SaaS-led platform that simplifies the sourcing of raw materials and processed foods for businesses. FarMart's solutions cater to a wide range of stakeholders in the food economy, including farmers, suppliers, and food businesses. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Jirnexu
cb_description: Jirnexu is a full stack FinTech solutions provider specializing in customer acquisition and lifecycle management within the financial services industry. The company offers digital acquisition tools and solutions that facilitate online lead generation, digital application processes, and customer retention. Jirnexu primarily serves sectors such as banking, insurance, telecommunications, and e-commerce. Jirnexu was formerly known as Saving Plus. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

name: Nelumbo
cb_description: Nelumbo is a materials company that operates in the advanced surface modifications sector. The company's main offerings include the development, manufacturing, and selling of products that utilize innovative surface technologies, with a focus on improving energy performance and minimizing corrosion. These products primarily cater to the heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) market. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hayward, California.

name: Tourlane
cb_description: Tourlane specializes in travel planning and itineraries within the travel and tourism industry. The company offers personalized trip planning services facilitated by travel experts, ensuring a worry-free travel experience for its customers. Tourlane primarily caters to individuals seeking customized travel experiences, with a focus on cultural richness, wildlife, and diverse landscapes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Lola
cb_description: Lola is a leading provider of technical and creative solutions in the global video games industry. The company offers a wide range of services including game development support, art and audio production, quality assurance testing, localization, marketing, player engagement, and media and entertainment solutions. Lola's offerings are enhanced by cutting-edge technology and AI, catering to various aspects of game creation and distribution. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico. In December 2017, Lola was acquired by Keywords Studios.

name: Sakneen
cb_description: Sakneen operates as a software company focused on the real estate sector. The company provides digital tools for real estate developers, including features that allow for the display of property inventory on a map, enable online payments, and facilitate the distribution of inventory across sales teams. It primarily serves the real estate tech industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Kabata
cb_description: Kabata specializes in the development of AI-powered strength training equipment. Its main product is a set of smart dumbbells that automatically adjust weight, track performance metrics, and provide insights from correction to enhance workout effectiveness. Its offerings cater to individuals looking for technologically advanced, and personalized strength training experience. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Orus
cb_description: Orus focuses on providing insurance services, operating within the insurance industry. The company offers a range of insurance products including professional liability insurance, multi-risk restaurant insurance, ten-year insurance, and health insurance for independent workers. Its services are designed to provide coverage for various professional activities, with a particular emphasis on independent workers, startups, and small to medium-sized enterprises. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Seabound
cb_description: Seabound focuses on environmental sustainability in the maritime industry. The company's main service involves capturing CO2 emissions from ships using an onboard device, which is then unloaded when the ship docks and sold for utilization or sequestration. Seabound primarily serves the maritime shipping industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Rubedo
cb_description: Rubedo Life Sciences focuses on developing therapies for age-related chronic diseases. The company's main offerings include novel small molecules designed to selectively target senescent cells, which are implicated in various chronic disorders such as pulmonary, dermatological, oncological, neurodegenerative, and fibrotic diseases. Rubedo's proprietary ALEMBIC drug discovery platform is central to its research and development efforts in creating these innovative therapies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: MacStadium
cb_description: MacStadium is a company that focuses on providing enterprise-class Apple Mac infrastructure-as-a-service in the technology sector. The company offers scalable, reliable, and secure private clouds and dedicated servers for workloads that require macOS, including services for CI/CD, Xcode, iOS builds, and macOS testing. MacStadium primarily serves sectors such as app development, DevOps, Apple workspaces, platform service providers, and startups across various industries including education, entertainment, finance, gaming, and shopping. It is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Mio
cb_description: Mio is the creator of personal navigation devices which offer ground-level 3D views.

name: Countingup
cb_description: Countingup focuses on providing financial and accounting solutions. The company offers a business current account integrated with accounting software, designed to automate bookkeeping and tax-related tasks for businesses. This service is primarily targeted towards small businesses, sole traders, and freelancers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Electra
cb_description: Electra focuses on providing fast charging solutions for electric vehicles in the automotive industry. The company's main service involves deploying and operating fast charging stations for electric vehicles, offering a reliable and efficient charging experience. Electra primarily serves the automotive industry, with a particular focus on electric vehicle users. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Vinter
cb_description: Vinter operates as an artificial intelligence (AI) powered recruitment platform operating in the human resources technology sector. The company offers a software as a service (SaaS) platform that streamlines the recruitment process by automating applicant assessments and providing tools. It primarily serves the human resources sector, offering solutions for various job positions. It was founded in 2023 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Omnidian
cb_description: Omnidian provides continuous monitoring for residential solar systems. The company offers services such as performance assurance, system monitoring, issue detection and diagnostics, and maintenance for solar systems. It serves the commercial and industrial sectors, portfolio investors, and large residential solar providers. Omnidian was formerly known as PeGu. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: SparkCharge
cb_description: SparkCharge provides mobile electric vehicle (EV) charging solutions. The company offers a Charging-as-a-Service model, delivering portable, battery-powered charging directly to EVs, which is designed to be turnkey and grid-free, enabling businesses to charge their vehicles at any location. It serves businesses with electric vehicle fleets, as well as industries such as car rental companies, ride-sharing services, and public agencies. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: BlueDot
cb_description: BlueDot is a company focused on identifying and reimagining technological innovations, primarily in the research and development industry. The company's main service involves sourcing promising technologies from top research labs around the world and transforming these inventions into viable businesses. BlueDot primarily serves the technology and entrepreneurship sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.

name: Reltio
cb_description: Reltio specializes in AI-powered data unification and management within the master data management (MDM) sector. The company offers a cloud-native SaaS platform that unifies, cleanses, and delivers trusted and interoperable data from multiple sources in real-time. Reltio primarily serves industries such as life sciences, healthcare, financial services, insurance, retail, high tech, consumer packaged goods, and travel & hospitality. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: REN
cb_description: Make the Internet change Vietnamese lives

name: ManyChat
cb_description: ManyChat specializes in chat marketing solutions within the messaging app automation industry. The company provides a platform that automates interactive conversations on messaging apps like Instagram, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, and SMS to help businesses increase sales and customer engagement. ManyChat's services are utilized by various sectors including eCommerce, digital marketing, and customer service industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Nectar
cb_description: Nectar specializes in the development of connected devices for the beverage industry, focusing on automatic replenishment and data-driven insights. The company offers products such as smart pourers and stoppers equipped with ultrasound sensors for real-time tracking of pours, alongside software solutions for bar inventory management and analytics. These products and services are designed to reduce liquor costs, prevent theft, and provide valuable data to bar owners and operators. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Canary Technologies
cb_description: Canary Technologies develops mobile web-based end-to-end guest management systems. It provides technological solutions for hotels, resorts, and other lodging properties. Its platform replaces paper documentation with computer software to streamline hotel booking processes. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: MOLOCO
cb_description: MOLOCO specializes in operational machine learning for growth and performance across various sectors, focusing on advertising technology. The company offers performance advertising solutions that leverage advanced machine learning models to scale user acquisition for mobile apps, enable retailers and marketplaces to build their own ads business, and assist streaming media companies in developing an outcomes-based advertising strategy. MOLOCO primarily serves sectors such as mobile app marketing, commerce platforms, and streaming platforms. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Vested Finance
cb_description: Vested Finance specializes in providing investment opportunities in the US stock market and ETFs. The company offers a platform for investing in over 5,000 US stocks and ETFs, including the option for fractional share investing and curated investment portfolios. Additionally, Vested Finance provides alternative investment options such as peer-to-peer lending, corporate and government bonds, and solar energy projects. It also offers educational resources through Vested Academy and financial tools to assist with investment planning. It was founded in 2018 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Osmo
cb_description: Osmo aims to create peer-learning communities.

name: Starling Bank
cb_description: Starling Bank is a digital bank focused on providing a range of banking services within the financial sector. The company offers personal and business banking solutions, including current accounts, overdrafts, loans, and money transfer services, all accessible through an intuitive mobile app. Starling Bank primarily serves individuals and businesses looking for modern, mobile-first banking experiences. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: Alfred
cb_description: Alfred is a company that focuses on home security technology within the smart home industry. The company offers smart home touchscreen deadbolt locks that provide enhanced security and convenience for homeowners. These locks are Bluetooth enabled, network ready, and can be operated remotely via an app, allowing users to lock and unlock their doors from anywhere. It is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Graylog
cb_description: Graylog is a company focused on providing centralized log management and security information event management (SIEM) solutions. Their main offerings include the analysis and management of machine data for security, compliance, and operations, as well as incident response services. Graylog's products are primarily utilized by sectors such as government, fintech, education, telecom, healthcare, and various industries requiring audit and regulatory compliance. Graylog was formerly known as Torch. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Trulioo
cb_description: Trulioo focuses on global online identity verification, operating within the technology and security sectors. The company offers services such as individual and business identity verification, watchlist screening, and identity document verification, all aimed at ensuring know-your-customer (KYC) and know-your-business (KYB) compliance. Trulioo primarily serves sectors such as banking, cryptocurrency, online trading, and wealth management. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Epitel
cb_description: Epitel specializes in the development of wearable medical devices and AI solutions for the neurological disorder care sector. The company's main product, the REMI Remote EEG Monitoring System, offers high-fidelity EEG recordings that can be analyzed in near real-time and is designed for use in healthcare settings. Epitel's REMI System is intended for both adult and pediatric patients, providing a wireless and unobtrusive way to monitor electrical activity of the brain. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: CodeCombat
cb_description: CodeCombat develops a multiplayer programming game. It enables schools to access tools that guide students to type real code. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: We Are The Mighty
cb_description: On June 2nd, 2022, We Are The Mighty was acquired by Recurrent. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed. We Are The Mighty (WATM) is an entertainment and lifestyle brand for and the military community and for those who want to know more about it. The company creates and distributes authentic content across all genres and platforms that entertains, informs and celebrates military life. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Agoric
cb_description: Agoric specializes in secure smart contract development within the blockchain sector. The company offers a JavaScript-based programming layer with robust security features for building decentralized applications and services. Agoric's products enable developers to create interoperable applications that can manage assets across different blockchain networks. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Bionomous
cb_description: Bionomous focuses on the development of AI-powered solutions for the lab automation sector. The company's main offering is a device that screens, sorts, and dispenses small biological entities, such as zebrafish eggs, Xenopus laevis oocytes and embryos, killifish and medaka eggs, and even flower seeds. The company primarily serves the biotechnology and agricultural sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Villaz-St-Pierre, Switzerland.

name: Mazen Animal Health
cb_description: Mazen Animal Health is a biotechnology company that operates in the animal health and protein production sector. The company's main service is the development and commercialization of novel biological vaccines and therapeutics, with a unique approach of using maize as a biofactory for the production of recombinant vaccines, enabling oral delivery in an edible form. Mazen Animal Health primarily sells to the swine, poultry, livestock, aquaculture, pets and wildlife sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ames, Iowa.

name: Arcadia Finance
cb_description: Arcadia Finance is a company specializing in the optimization of yield strategies within the financial sector. It offers a non-custodial platform for asset management that aims to maximize the potential of yield-bearing assets through artificial intelligence (AI)-powered optimizations and facilitates single-click transactions. The company primarily caters to the decentralized finance (DeFi) industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Panama City, Panama.

name: Spike
cb_description: Spike is a unified business communication and collaboration tool that operates in the technology and professional services sectors. The company offers a platform that integrates email, chat, video meetings, and collaborative documents to streamline team productivity and communication. Spike's solutions cater to various industries including professional services, creative agencies, technology, and IT support. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

name: Emotive
cb_description: Emotive is an independent creative company that specializes in advertising and brand experiences. The company offers a range of services including advertising, entertainment, experiences, product design, and earned media strategies to connect brands with their audience. Emotive primarily serves sectors that require innovative marketing and brand engagement, such as consumer goods and technology. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Coogee, New South Wales.

name: Adway
cb_description: Adway is a company that specializes in digital advertising, specifically in the domain of geo-fencing on vehicles. The company offers a unique advertising medium that uses projection technology to display both static images and full HD video on vehicles, allowing for flexible and targeted advertising. Adway primarily serves the advertising industry, with a focus on businesses looking for innovative and dynamic ways to reach their target audience. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Beverly Hills, California.

name: Codasip
cb_description: Codasip operates as a processor solutions company. The company offers products such as low-power embedded cores, high-performance embedded cores, and application cores, and services such as processor customization and architectural exploration. It allows technology innovators to develop products by harnessing the power of reduced instruction set computing (RISC)-V processors. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: dcbel
cb_description: Dcbel operates in the modern energy ecosystem. Its offerings include products that allow homeowners to manage their energy supply, including the conversion of solar power for home and electric vehicle use, and the use of artificial intelligence to reduce energy costs. Dcbel primarily serves the residential sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Oishii
cb_description: Oishii specializes in the cultivation of fruit using advanced vertical farming technology within the agriculture industry. The company offers a range of pesticide-free, non-GMO, and nutrient-rich berries and tomatoes, grown indoors. Its products are primarily sold to consumers, restaurants, and specialty retailers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Jersey City, New Jersey.

name: Aigen
cb_description: Aigen is a company focused on robotics and artificial intelligence in the agriculture sector. The company offers a service that uses autonomous robots to navigate, weed, and analyze crops, reducing the workload for farmers and improving crop yield without the use of chemicals. These robots are powered by renewable energy and connected via a network for real-time data collection and analysis. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: Homeppl
cb_description: Homeppl specializes in customer risk assessment and fraud prevention within the financial services sector. The company offers a suite of products that enable Operations & Risk teams to automate credit underwriting, perform document and transaction analysis, verify account information, and provide financial and risk qualification. Homeppl's technology also extends to identity verification, delivering affordability insights, and offering international asset and liability guarantees. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Refine Intelligence
cb_description: Refine Intelligence focuses on financial crime prevention, specifically in the domain of anti-money laundering. The company offers a platform that uses customer engagement tools and analytics to identify specific life events, which helps explain anomalies in customer accounts and reduces investigation time. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Ness Ziona, Israel.

name: SecurityScorecard
cb_description: SecurityScorecard specializes in cybersecurity ratings and is a leader in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform for enterprise risk management, third-party risk management, and cyber insurance underwriting, providing a view of cyber risks through continuous monitoring and assessment. It primarily serves the security sector. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Laced
cb_description: Laced is an online marketplace focused on the trading of authentic luxury sneakers within the fashion and retail industry. The company facilitates the buying and selling of popular and limited edition sneakers, catering to enthusiasts seeking the latest and most coveted styles. Laced primarily serves the consumer fashion sector, with a particular emphasis on sneaker aficionados and collectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Outside
cb_description: Outside is a company focused on contingent staffing solutions within the human resources sector. They offer a platform for shift-based hiring that allows individuals to apply for jobs, manage their work schedule, and communicate with employers without long-term commitments. The company primarily serves businesses in need of on-demand manpower and individuals seeking flexible work opportunities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: IxamBee
cb_description: IxamBee is an online educational platform focusing on preparation for competitive exams and government job examinations. The company offers a range of services including mock tests, study materials, live classes, and personalized mentoring to help candidates prepare for various exams. IxamBee primarily serves individuals aiming to secure positions in the government sector, banking, insurance, and other public service areas. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Noida, India.

name: Hive
cb_description: Hive is an electric scooter sharing platform that can be booked via the company's mobile app.

name: Realtime Robotics
cb_description: Realtime Robotics develops automation technology for robotics. The company offers a platform for automation that includes proprietary software and hardware, enabling flexible robot control technology for a range of applications. This technology includes a specialized processor that generates safe robot motion plans in microseconds, allowing robots to operate in unstructured, collaborative workspaces and react to other motions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: 91Squarefeet
cb_description: 91Squarefeet specializes in commercial fit-outs and construction project management, operating within the design and build industry. The company offers a range of services including office and retail space fit-outs, turnkey retail solutions, and retail identity design, all underpinned by a technology-driven approach to project management and direct procurement practices. 91Squarefeet primarily serves clients in the commercial real estate sector, offering solutions to businesses looking to design and construct office and retail spaces. 91Squarefeet was formerly known as Rolling Banners. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Faction
cb_description: Faction is a company that focuses on multi-cloud data services in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that connects users to services from multiple cloud providers, enabling them to manage, access, scale, and protect their data across different clouds. Faction primarily sells to sectors that require large-scale data management, such as the technology and healthcare industries. Faction was formerly known as PeakColo Holdings, Inc.. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: AVO
cb_description: AVO specializes in providing data roaming solutions through its eSIM technology for the telecommunications industry. The company offers affordable international data plans that enable travelers to stay connected globally without incurring high roaming costs. AVO primarily caters to the travel and tourism sector, offering seamless coverage in over 200 countries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chisinau, Moldova, Republic of.

name: Intellect
cb_description: Intellect provides solutions for mental health care. The company offers services such as therapy, psychiatry, and mental health screening. It also offers self-guided cognitive behavioral therapy-based programs for individuals and workforces. It serves business employees and individuals seeking personal mental health support. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore.

name: Legit Security
cb_description: Legit Security operates as a company focused on application security posture management. It offers a platform that secures application delivery from code to cloud and protects an organization's software supply chain from attack. It primarily serves the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Ready Education
cb_description: Ready Education is a company focused on improving student success in the higher education sector. The company offers a mobile student engagement platform that empowers students and departments to collaborate and engage in events, groups, discussions, and more, with the aim of increasing student retention. The platform is primarily used by institutions in the higher education industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: ServiceTrade
cb_description: ServiceTrade is a provider of field service management software tailored for commercial service contractors. The company offers a suite of tools designed to streamline operations, enhance field technician productivity, and improve management oversight and client communications. ServiceTrade's software solutions are utilized by contractors in industries such as fire protection, mechanical services, commercial HVAC, refrigeration, electrical, and kitchen exhaust cleaning. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Honey Homes
cb_description: Honey Homes is a company that provides a subscription-based home maintenance service, focusing on delivering regular handyman services to homeowners. Their main offerings include a dedicated handyperson for monthly visits to perform a variety of tasks such as minor repairs, installations, and general upkeep, as well as coordination for more specialized work when needed. Honey Homes caters to busy families, aging seniors, and new homeowners who seek a reliable solution for their ongoing home maintenance needs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Lafayette, California.

name: Sprig
cb_description: Sprig is an on-demand meal service that makes it simple to eat well. With just a few taps on a smartphone, customers can choose from three healthy, ready to eat meal options to be delivered in 15 minutes. All of Sprig's meals are sourced from organic, local, and seasonal ingredients.

name: Merqueo
cb_description: Merqueo provides a digital shopping platform for grocery items. Its catalog encompasses multiple products including fresh fruits and vegetables, imported products, liquors, household items, personal care goods, and more. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Bonusly
cb_description: Bonusly is a company that specializes in employee recognition and rewards within the human resources sector. Their platform offers a peer-to-peer recognition system that enables employees to celebrate achievements and milestones, as well as an analytics dashboard to provide insights into team engagement and performance. Bonusly's solutions are designed to foster a positive work culture, enhance employee engagement, and support performance management. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Kaptyn
cb_description: Kaptyn is a transportation company focused on providing sustainable and professional chauffeur services. They offer a range of services including point-to-point travel, private chauffeured charters, and airport transfers, utilizing a fleet of clean, premium electric vehicles. The company caters to individual and business clients seeking reliable and eco-friendly transportation solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.

name: Tribal
cb_description: Tribal helps organizations make work meaningful for their employees. Tribal is based in Huntsville, Alabama.

name: Metaplane
cb_description: Metaplane serves as a data observability platform that specializes in monitoring and ensuring data quality for modern data teams. The company offers a suite of tools for anomaly detection, schema change alerts, and job monitoring to help data teams prevent and detect data issues efficiently. Metaplane's platform integrates with various parts of the data stack, including data warehouses, transformation tools, BI platforms, and communication channels. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: CleanRobotics
cb_description: CleanRobotics is a company focused on intelligent waste management systems within the sustainability sector. Their main product, TrashBot, is a smart recycling bin that uses robotics, computer vision, and machine learning to sort waste with high accuracy. CleanRobotics primarily serves sectors aiming for zero-waste goals, such as airports, campuses, and federal facilities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Digbi Health
cb_description: Digbi Health is a digital therapeutics company specializing in precision nutrition and lifestyle-based therapies for chronic illnesses, leveraging genetics and gut microbiome insights. The company offers a virtual care platform that provides personalized care plans, including remote monitoring, dietary interventions, behavioral coaching, and care coordination, aimed at targeting the root causes of polychronic mental and physical illnesses. Digbi Health primarily serves individuals struggling with weight management, digestive disorders, and mental health issues. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Xurya
cb_description: Xurya is a renewable energy company focusing on solar energy solutions. The company offers a comprehensive service for solar panel installation, including design, operation, and maintenance, with a pioneering zero-down investment scheme. Xurya primarily serves commercial and industrial building owners looking to switch to solar power. It was founded in 2018 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Talos
cb_description: Talos provides artificial intelligence-based disease risk assessment services. It offers risk assessment of cerebral aneurysms, prediction devices, risk ratings, and follow-up management solutions. It serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Provectus Algae
cb_description: Provectus Algae focuses on optimizing microalgae species to produce a range of biobased products within the agriculture, food & beverage, and pharmaceutical industries. The company's main offerings include the development of sustainable stock feeds that reduce methane emissions in ruminant livestock, using their proprietary technology for environmentally sustainable biomanufacturing. It primarily serves the biomanufacturing industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Noosaville, Australia.

name: Rock Content
cb_description: Rock Content specializes in content marketing solutions and creative services within the digital marketing industry. The company offers a suite of products and services designed to help businesses create high-quality content at scale, including an on-demand talent network for content creation, interactive content tools without the need for coding, and managed WordPress hosting for optimized content hubs. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boca Raton, Florida.

name: Implicity
cb_description: Implicity specializes in remote cardiac monitoring and research within the healthcare sector. The company offers artificial intelligence-driven solutions that aggregate, normalize, and standardize data from implantable cardiac electronic devices, facilitating remote care for patients with chronic heart conditions. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Ocrolus
cb_description: Ocrolus operates as a company focusing on artificial intelligence (AI) driven document automation, operating within the digital lending ecosystem and financial technology industry. The company's main services include automating document analysis and financial analysis, which helps lenders make informed decisions based on trusted data and improved efficiency. It primarily sells to the small business lending, mortgage, and consumer lending sectors. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Eradivir
cb_description: Eradivir focuses on immunotherapy treatments in the biotechnology sector. The company develops bispecific molecules designed to harness a patient's immune system to selectively target and eliminate viral infections and virus-infected cells without harming healthy cells. These treatments are aimed at addressing diseases such as influenza, multiple coronaviruses, hepatitis B, human immunodeficiency virus (HIV), and certain cancers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in West Lafayette, Indiana.

name: Atlas Obscura
cb_description: Atlas Obscura operates as a media and entertainment company focused on revealing hidden wonders around the world. It offers a variety of services including curated trips, educational experiences, and detailed guides on global destinations and foods. The company primarily caters to the travel and tourism industry, providing resources and experiences for adventurous travelers. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Passport
cb_description: Passport specializes in facilitating financial innovation through its open banking platform within the fintech sector. The company offers a suite of APIs that enable the integration and creation of modern financial products, as well as documented REST APIs for an enhanced developer experience. Passport primarily serves financial institutions and fintech companies looking to launch or expand their financial services offerings. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Joko
cb_description: Joko focuses on consumer empowerment. It offers a mobile application that provides users with access to coupons, cashback on daily expenses, carbon footprint calculations for purchases, and a centralized location for loyalty cards. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Saint-Mande, France.

name: WEGLOT
cb_description: Weglot operates as a technology start-up in the software as a service (SaaS) industry, focusing on website translation and internationalization. The company offers a user-friendly solution for website owners to translate their sites into multiple languages, with features such as automatic content detection, multilingual SEO, and workflow automation. It primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce, marketing, education, government, and enterprise. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bois-Colombes, France.

name: Spline
cb_description: Spline provides a web-based platform that enables users to model, animate, and collaborate on 3D projects without the need for coding. Spline's tools cater to a variety of creative and professional needs, including 3D modeling, animation, material editing, and the integration of interactive elements into web projects. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Reston, Virginia.

name: BrightSpec
cb_description: BrightSpec is a life science tools company that operates in the technology sector. The company offers a range of instruments that utilize Molecular Rotational Resonance (MRR) spectroscopy, a unique analytical technique that provides detailed insights into molecular structure, enabling the rapid and precise identification and quantitation of gas-phase molecules directly from complex mixtures. BrightSpec primarily serves the pharmaceutical, chemical, and consumer goods industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Charlottesville, Virginia.

name: Govly
cb_description: Govly focuses on connecting Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs), Value-Added Resellers (VARs), and prime contract holders within the government contracting sector. The company offers a network that provides opportunities from non-public contract feeds and a suite of tools designed to streamline the bidding process from discovery to award, enabling businesses to monitor, curate, and analyze the federal procurement ecosystem. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: CareerFoundry
cb_description: CareerFoundry is an online educational institution focused on the technology sector.
