The company offers a variety of programs and courses designed to equip individuals with the skills needed for careers in areas such as UX and UI design, full-stack web development, data analytics, digital marketing, and product management. The primary customers of CareerFoundry are individuals seeking to transition into or advance within the tech industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: DataCebo
cb_description: DataCebo specializes in the field of artificial intelligence, with a particular focus on synthetic data generation. The company offers a generative AI platform that enables enterprises to create and manage their own synthetic data applications, which can be used for various purposes such as software testing, simulating scenarios, and machine learning model development. DataCebo primarily serves the enterprise sector, with applications spanning various industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Weston, Massachusetts.

name: Xceed
cb_description: Xceed offers Salesforce expertise and services. It specializes in Salesforce sales cloud, Salesforce service cloud, Salesforce marketing cloud, Salesforce education cloud, and Salesforce experience cloud. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden. In December 2022, Xceed was acquired by Sofigate. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Overworld
cb_description: Overworld is a cross-platform gaming developer specializing in the creation of an online role-playing game (RPG) and multimedia property. The company's main focus is on developing web3 native universes that offer digital ownership and immersive gaming experiences. Overworld primarily serves the gaming industry, with an emphasis on bridging the gap between traditional free-to-play models and web3 integration. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Patina
cb_description: Patina operates as a healthcare company focusing on primary care services tailored to the needs of adults. The company offers a comprehensive and personalized care plan that addresses the total physical, emotional, and social needs of its patients, with services delivered both virtually and at home. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a particular emphasis on elderly care. It was formerly known as Vessel Healthcare. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bala Cynwyd, Pennsylvania.

name: Opus
cb_description: Opus specializes in cloud security orchestration and remediation within the cybersecurity domain. The company offers a platform that integrates with existing security tools to manage the remediation process, prioritizes threats based on risk, and automates responses to improve efficiency and reduce manual effort. It primarily serves the cybersecurity industry. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Sarvam AI
cb_description: Sarvam AI focuses on the development and deployment of generative artificial intelligence technologies within the research and development sector. The company specializes in creating large language models tailored to India's linguistic diversity and provides an enterprise-grade platform for the development and evaluation of generative AI applications. It primarily serves the technology sector. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Augmentir
cb_description: Augmentir is a provider of AI-based connected worker solutions within the industrial sector. The company offers a suite of software tools designed to digitize and optimize frontline processes such as maintenance, quality, safety, and assembly, utilizing skills management, digital workflow, collaboration, and knowledge sharing. Augmentir's platform serves a variety of industries, including manufacturing, service, energy, and construction, to enhance safety, quality, and productivity for the industrial workforce. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Horsham, Pennsylvania.

name: Cider Security
cb_description: Cider Security focuses on application security in the technology sector. It provides continuous visibility and security for engineering ecosystems, from code to deployment. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel. In November 2022, Cider Security was acquired by Palo Alto Networks.

name: Fountain
cb_description: Fountain is a podcast platform that focuses on community-driven content discovery and support within the podcasting industry. The platform offers features for discovering new podcasts, creating and sharing clips, and building playlists, as well as tools for audience engagement and monetization for podcast creators. Fountain primarily serves the podcasting community, including both listeners and creators, with a suite of social and financial tools to enhance interaction and support. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

name: Mesh Security
cb_description: Mesh Security is a company that focuses on cybersecurity, specifically in the domain of Zero Trust Posture Management (ZTPM). The company offers a range of services including identity threat detection and response, data detection and response, and zero trust segmentation, all aimed at hardening security postures and responding to threats. Mesh Security primarily serves modern enterprises across various industries, helping them eliminate risk, ensure compliance, and implement Zero Trust principles across their XaaS estate. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: SurgiBox
cb_description: SurgiBox provides an ultraportable sterile system that replicates the environmental control of an operating room in a compact form. SurgiBox primarily serves sectors that require rapid surgical setups, such as military field operations and disaster relief efforts. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Kayhan Space
cb_description: Kayhan Space focuses on next-generation automation for satellite operations and spaceflight safety within the aerospace industry. It provides autonomous safety of flight alerts, notifications, and decision plans to satellite operators, aiming to remove delays and errors in response to high-risk events. Kayhan Space primarily serves government and commercial satellite operators with its cloud-based orchestration software for automated space situational awareness and spaceflight operations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Broomfield, Colorado.

name: Hydrosat
cb_description: Hydrosat is focused on providing geospatial intelligence for food security, public safety, and the environment within the satellite imagery and analytics sector. It offers daily, global, thermal infrared imagery, along with analytics solutions that leverage this data for various applications. Hydrosat's services are primarily utilized in the agriculture and environmental sectors to support activities such as crop yield forecasting, irrigation optimization, and ecosystem monitoring. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Aqemia
cb_description: Aqemia serves as a pharma tech company that focuses on transforming the drug discovery process. Its main service is leveraging technology that combines quantum-inspired physics and machine learning to scale the drug discovery process, generating a rapidly growing pipeline of new drug candidates. It primarily sells to the pharmaceutical industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Loris
cb_description: Loris focuses on job site automation, specifically in the construction industry. The company offers a suite of tools that enable remote light management, progress tracking, security, WiFi provision, and centralized data collection, all aimed at creating safer, leaner, and greener job sites. Loris primarily sells to the construction industry. Loris was formerly known as MFlux Lighting. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Afterparty
cb_description: Afterparty is a creator community platform focusing on providing tools and services within the Web3 ecosystem. The company offers innovative solutions for creators, artists, and builders to deliver world-class experiences to their fans, who in turn can participate in the success of their favorite artists and creators. Afterparty was formerly known as Soin Holdings. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Corteria Pharmaceuticals
cb_description: Corteria Pharmaceuticals operates as a privately held company focused on the development of transformative therapies in the pharmaceutical industry. The company's main services include the development of first-in-class drugs for high unmet medical needs, such as heart failure, sarcopenia, and obesity subpopulations. Its drugs are designed to stratify patients and identify those who will benefit the most from their treatments. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Ox
cb_description: Ox specializes in customized apparel printing and on-demand production services within the personalized merchandise and print-on-demand industries. The company offers direct-to-garment (DTG) printing services for a range of products, including personalized polos, t-shirts, and various accessories. Ox caters primarily to entrepreneurs and businesses looking to create custom-branded merchandise without the need for inventory investment. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Lima, Peru.

name: Array Labs
cb_description: Array Labs specializes in three dimensional (3D) imagery and operates in the earth observation and defense sector. The company develops satellites designed to capture and deliver comprehensive 3D perspectives of the earth. These imaging solutions serve a variety of traditional and emerging industries seeking to understand the world around them. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: CH4 Global
cb_description: CH4 Global impacts climate change at scale, by developing gigatonne-scale greenhouse gas (GHG) mitigation solutions. The company is harnessing the power of Asparagopsis seaweed to combat climate change. It serves global industries and governments that are committed to averting climate disasters. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cayena
cb_description: Cayena is a B2B FoodTech company operating in the marketplace domain, focusing on food procurement process for businesses such as restaurants, bars, and hotels. The company provides a digital platform that facilitates the ordering of supplies, offering catalog of products, intelligent quoting, and a quick ordering process. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Dawaai
cb_description: Dawaai is a digital health platform with a focus on providing an online pharmacy and healthcare services. The company offers a range of products and services including the delivery of medicines, healthcare products, doctor consultations, and lab tests that can be conducted at home. Dawaai primarily serves the healthcare industry by providing convenient access to pharmaceutical and medical services. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Karachi, Pakistan.

name: Elucidate
cb_description: Elucidate specializes in data-driven risk management. The company offers services such as financial crime risk profiling and risk pricing for cross-border payments, enabling financial institutions to manage and mitigate risk effectively. It primarily serves the banking industry, providing tools and solutions to both network and domestic banks. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: VUNO
cb_description: VUNO is a company that focuses on the exploration of the medical field using artificial intelligence. The company offers products that assist in selecting optimal treatment methods and developing new biomarkers. These products primarily cater to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Groq
cb_description: Groq specializes in AI inference technology within the artificial intelligence sector. The company offers a hardware and software platform that is designed to provide compute speeds and energy efficiency for AI applications. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: TreeFrog Therapeutics
cb_description: TreeFrog Therapeutics is a biotech company focused on the cell therapy sector. The company's main offerings include the development of allogeneic cell therapies based on human induced pluripotent stem cells (hiPSCs) and a proprietary technology, C-Stem, which allows for scalable manufacturing of cell therapies in bioreactors. This technology aims to reduce costs, improve cell quality, and enhance the efficacy of cellular therapies through a delivery approach based on 3D microtissues. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Pessac, France.

name: Auquan
cb_description: Auquan operates in the financial services sector, with a focus on leveraging advanced artificial intelligence. The company offers services that transform unstructured data into actionable insights for financial services, providing deep insights into private companies, equities, and associated risks. Auquan primarily serves sectors such as asset management, hedge funds, investment banks, and insurance providers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Mill
cb_description: Mill provides waste management solutions. It specializes in the domain of food waste recycling. The company offers a system that recycles food waste such as peels, bones, stalks, and leftovers, transforming them into a form that can be used as animal feed. It primarily serves households looking for an eco-friendly way to manage their food waste. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Bruno, California.

name: Fleet Space Technologies
cb_description: Fleet Space Technologies specializes in space-enabled technology for the mineral exploration, defence, and space exploration sectors. The company offers AI-powered solutions for subsurface imaging and analysis, leveraging satellite connectivity and edge computing to provide detailed 3D seismic models with minimal environmental impact. Fleet Space primarily serves industries that require advanced exploration and communication technologies, such as the mineral exploration and defence sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Beverley, South Australia.

name: Wint
cb_description: Wint is a company that focuses on automating business operations, specifically in the financial management sector. The company offers a comprehensive service that automates various aspects of a company's financial management, including bookkeeping, payroll, and other administrative tasks. This service primarily targets small to medium-sized businesses. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Gothenburg, Sweden.

name: Lambent
cb_description: Lambent operates as a software company. It offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform that uses artificial intelligence to provide occupancy analytics for optimizing space usage. It primarily serves the corporate real estate and higher education industries. It was formerly known as Armored Things. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Poly.AI
cb_description: Poly.AI specializes in AI and interactive entertainment. It provides a tool for users to design and communicate with custom AI characters, such as storytelling. It caters to individuals seeking creative and social experiences through AI-driven interactions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Tulip
cb_description: Tulip builds industrial internet of thing (IoT) and advanced analytics platforms. It offers digital work infrastructure, production visibility, material tracking, quality management, compliance, machine monitoring, and more services. It serves pharmaceutical manufacturing, biotechnology manufacturing cells, gene therapy, medical device manufacturing, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Akido Labs
cb_description: Akido Labs is a healthcare technology company focused on care delivery platforms. The company develops solutions to address systemic inequities in healthcare through early interventions based on social determinants of health. Akido primarily serves healthcare, government, and non-profit sectors with programs aimed at improving public health. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Genetesis
cb_description: Genetesis is a medical imaging company focused on cardiovascular health, specifically in the domain of biomagnetism. The company offers CardioFlux, a non-invasive magnetocardiography (MCG) device that detects myocardial ischemia without radiation, providing rapid and dynamic cardiac imaging. Genetesis primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on emergency medicine and cardiology. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Mason, Ohio.

name: DeepX
cb_description: DeepX is a robotics AI startup focused on automating a wide range of machinery within the construction industry. The company develops autonomous driving systems for heavy machinery, leveraging deep reinforcement learning technology to enable flexible operation in various environments. DeepX primarily serves the construction equipment sector by providing development and on-site implementation support for their autonomous systems. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Cynerio
cb_description: Cynerio operates as a cybersecurity company. The company offers a platform that provides security solutions for internet of medical Things (IoMT) devices, including attack detection and response, preventative risk management, and inventory visibility. Its services are primarily aimed at healthcare organizations. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: OneDay
cb_description: OneDay specializes in entrepreneurship education and business launch automation within the higher education and technology sectors. It offers a platform that combines mentorship from experienced entrepreneurs, artificial intelligence (AI) enabled business tools and a part-time master of business administration (MBA)  program to guide members from idea to launch. It primarily serves individuals looking to start their own business and earn an MBA simultaneously. OneDay was formerly known as Dorm. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Luminance
cb_description: Luminance operates an artificial intelligence company specializing in legal technology. It offers tools for automating contract generation, negotiation, analysis, and legal document review. Luminance primarily serves the legal sector, providing solutions for law firms, in-house legal teams, and other legal professionals. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Rupifi
cb_description: Rupifi provides business-to-business (B2B) payments and checkouts for marketplaces. It develops payment infrastructure for small and medium enterprises (SMEs). It facilitates buy now pay later (BNPL) payment options. The company offers analytics and reports, auto reconciliation, different payment methods, and more. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: F1 Arcade
cb_description: F1 Arcade specializes in providing a simulation racing experience within the entertainment sector. The company offers full-motion racing simulators, live Formula 1 watch parties, and a venue for private events. Its services cater to the entertainment and leisure industry, with a focus on motorsports enthusiasts and social gamers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: sibros
cb_description: Sibros specializes in automotive software and cloud platforms for connected vehicles within the automotive industry. The company offers a comprehensive suite of solutions for managing software and data across the entire lifecycle of software-defined vehicles. Sibros primarily serves sectors such as commercial vehicles, passenger vehicles, and other automotive-related industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Folsom, California.

name: Impress
cb_description: Impress specializes in clear aligner orthodontic treatments within the dental healthcare sector. The company offers invisible orthodontic solutions designed to straighten teeth using patented technology and treatments led by experienced orthodontists. Impress primarily serves individuals seeking dental cosmetic improvements and orthodontic corrections. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Mezmo
cb_description: Mezmo is an observability platform that specializes in managing and actioning telemetry data across various domains. The company offers a telemetry data pipeline that enables the collection, transformation, and routing of data to costs and decision-making capabilities. Mezmo's solutions cater to a range of sectors including financial services, software technology, retail, and telecommunications. Mezmo was formerly known as LogDNA. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Gr4vy
cb_description: Gr4vy develops a cloud-based payment orchestration platform. The company offers a universal integration solution that enables businesses to deploy and optimize various payment methods and integrate with payment and anti-fraud providers without the need for coding. Its infrastructure supports dynamic payment routing, transaction tokenization, and personalized checkout experiences, catering to merchants looking to expand their payment capabilities and help in their payment ecosystem. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Tuum
cb_description: Tuum specializes in core banking solutions within the financial technology sector. They provide a modular core banking platform that allows banks to replace legacy systems and launch new financial products, including accounts, lending, payments, and cards. Tuum's platform serves the financial industry by enabling the creation of unique banking models and the integration of partner solutions. It was formerly known as Modularbank. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Lila Games
cb_description: Lila Games operates as a company focused on the development of free-to-play (F2P) shooter games. It develops a game currently code-named project black, which is described as a social looter game, aiming to provide an engaging and social gaming experience. The company's primary market is the global gaming industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Cultimate Foods
cb_description: Cultimate Foods focuses on cellular agriculture within the food industry. The company's main offering is a cultivated fat ingredient, created using cellular agriculture technologies, that creates the taste and texture of plant-based meat products. This product primarily targets the alternative meat industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: CompStak
cb_description: CompStak is a market leader in providing comprehensive commercial real estate transaction data. The company offers a platform where users can access lease comps, sale comps, loan data, and property data, all verified for accuracy and reliability. CompStak's services cater to professionals in the commercial real estate industry seeking data-driven insights for informed decision-making. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: GrabWheels
cb_description: GrabWheels is the mobility arm of Southeast Asian ride-hailing firm Grab.

name: Element Science
cb_description: Element Science is a medical device and digital health company that operates in the healthcare industry. The company's primary offering is a wearable device that detects life-threatening heart rhythms and delivers an electrical shock to restore normal heart activity. The company primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on patients at high risk for sudden cardiac arrest. Element Science was formerly known as Revive Defibrillation Systems. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SoundBite Medical Solutions
cb_description: SoundBite Medical Solutions is a medical devices company with a focus on the treatment of calcified coronary and peripheral artery disease. The company offers proprietary shockwave device and generator technology, which is used within the cardiovascular system to treat chronic total occlusions. SoundBite primarily serves the medical and healthcare industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Coutloot
cb_description: Coutloot is an online retail aggregator specializing in non-grocery items within the e-commerce sector. The platform enables users to open an online store and sell products such as fashion, electronics, and home decor, aiming to digitize the supply chain in India. Coutloot primarily serves small businesses and offline stores looking to expand their sales online. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Front
cb_description: Front is a modern customer service platform that specializes in enhancing customer experiences and operational efficiency within the customer support sector. The company offers a suite of tools including an omnichannel inbox, AI chatbots, live chat, and workflow automation to streamline communication and support processes. Front's platform is designed to facilitate real-time team collaboration and provide actionable service analytics to businesses of various sizes. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Demex
cb_description: Demex is a company that specializes in the packaging and marketing of fruits, vegetables, potatoes, and condiments. The company's main services include the conditioning and commercialization of fresh vegetables and potatoes, tailored to the needs of their customers. Demex primarily sells to the food industry. It is based in France.

name: Here
cb_description: Here engages in enterprise productivity through its specialized browser technology within the technology sector. It offers an enterprise browser that aims to improve productivity and security for various work applications, without the need for technical knowledge. It primarily serves sectors such as the financial services industry, government agencies, and contact centers, providing tailored solutions for workflow and operational automation. It was formerly known as OpenFin and changed its name to Here in June 2024. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Kinetic
cb_description: Kinetic specializes in injury reduction for the workforce, operating within the safety and insurance sectors. The company offers a technology-driven injury reduction program that utilizes wearable technology, data analytics, and safety services to mitigate workplace injuries. Kinetic primarily serves large self-insured enterprises and policyholders through insurance coverage. Kinetic was formerly known as One Million Metric. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Axiom
cb_description: Axiom is a company that focuses on data management in the technology sector. The company offers a serverless log management solution that enables the ingestion of large volumes of data with high efficiency, and provides tools for querying, visualizing, and extracting insights from this data. It primarily serves developers and organizations in the technology industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sympl
cb_description: Sympl is a company that operates in the recruitment sector. The company provides an online platform where various job vacancies are posted, facilitating the connection between job seekers and employers. It primarily serves the job market industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Antwerp, Belgium.

name: ProteinQure
cb_description: ProteinQure operates as a computational biology company specializing in the design of protein-based therapeutics. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence, machine learning, and physics-based methods to create novel protein drugs, with a focus on peptides, antibodies, and other protein-based drugs. Its computational platform serves drug discovery companies to advance their early-stage drug development programs. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Pepper Content
cb_description: Pepper Content is a content marketing platform specializing in AI-driven content creation and management for various business sectors. The company offers a suite of services including SEO optimization, video production, demand generation, and translation, all designed to enhance a brand's online presence and drive growth. Pepper Content primarily serves industries such as B2B SaaS, BFSI, Healthcare, FMCG, and Consumer Tech with its comprehensive content solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Redwood Materials
cb_description: Redwood Materials specializes in creating a sustainable circular supply chain for lithium-ion batteries within the recycling and manufacturing industry. The company's main services include recycling used batteries, refining metals through hydrometallurgical processes, and remanufacturing anode and cathode components for new batteries. Redwood Materials primarily serves the battery manufacturing sector, providing domestically sourced materials to U.S. cell manufacturers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Carson City, Nevada.

name: The Nudge
cb_description: The Nudge focuses on improving real-life experiences, operating in the leisure and entertainment industries. Its main service involves sending text messages to users with videos from locals sharing their favorite activities.  It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Obi
cb_description: Obi is a technology company focused on providing a rideshare and taxi comparison service. The company offers a smart application that aggregates real-time pricing data from various ridehail, taxi, and black car services to help users find the most cost-effective transportation options. Obi primarily serves individuals looking to save money on personal transportation. Obi was formerly known as Bellhop. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ivy
cb_description: Ivy is a company focused on facilitating instant bank payments within the open banking sector. The company offers a platform that enables direct transactions from customers' bank accounts to merchants, bypassing traditional credit card and wallet fees. Ivy primarily serves the ecommerce industry, providing merchants with tools such as smart routing technology, real-time transaction insights, and API and plugin integration for various shop systems. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: VSORA
cb_description: VSORA is a company that focuses on providing intellectual property for chipmakers in the artificial intelligence and high-end signal processing sectors. The company's main offerings include multi-core DSP architecture that eliminates the need for DSP co-processors and hardware accelerators, providing a level of flexibility achievable only with software programming. This powerful system solution allows for designing using a high-level language, without ever writing RTL. The company primarily serves the artificial intelligence and digital communications systems industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Meudon-la-Foret, France.

name: iAdvize
cb_description: iAdvize is a conversational platform operating in the e-commerce industry. The company offers a blend of human and artificial intelligence to optimize customer experience, providing instant, accurate pre-sales assistance and automated customer support. Its services are primarily utilized by the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Nantes, France.

name: Onfleet
cb_description: Onfleet is a company specializing in last mile delivery software solutions within the logistics and transportation sector. The company offers a platform that includes route optimization, real-time tracking, automated dispatch, and delivery analytics to streamline delivery operations. Onfleet's software is designed to enhance the efficiency of delivery services for various industries such as grocery, pharmacy, and furniture. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: RYDE
cb_description: RYDE is an electric kickboard sharing service.

name: Biofire
cb_description: Biofire is a company focused on enhancing firearms safety through technology in the firearms industry. They offer smart gun technology designed to reduce preventable gun injuries and deaths, with a focus on child safety. The company primarily serves the firearm community and technology sector with its safety-oriented products. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Broomfield, Colorado.

name: Acodis
cb_description: Acodis is a producer of processing machines, including toner cartridges and OPC drums.

name: Paccurate
cb_description: Paccurate is a company specializing in cartonization software designed to optimize packing efficiency for shippers across various industries. The company offers a parcel packing intelligence platform that helps businesses make better packaging decisions, aiming to reduce costs and waste by providing control over how orders are packed. Paccurate primarily serves sectors such as retail, third-party logistics (3PLs), and carriers with its smart packing solutions. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Modo Energy
cb_description: Modo Energy offers a data analysis platform focused on the energy sector. The company provides market insights, benchmarking, forecasts, and data for new energy assets. Its primary customers are energy companies seeking to build, finance, and operate the energy system of the future. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Birmingham, United Kingdom.

name: Tactile Mobility
cb_description: Tactile Mobility is a company focused on enhancing transportation through tactile sensing technology in the automotive industry. The company offers solutions that enable vehicles to 'feel' the road, providing real-time data on grip levels, tire health, vehicle weight, and road conditions, thereby improving safety. Tactile Mobility primarily serves sectors such as car manufacturers, tire manufacturers, road authorities, municipalities, and car insurers. Tactile Mobility was formerly known as MobiWise. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Haifa, Israel.

name: Unseenlabs
cb_description: Unseenlabs specializes in radio frequency data and solutions for maritime domain awareness. The company provides services to both civilian and military sectors in the maritime industry, offering the ability to locate ships by detecting and characterizing their passive electromagnetic signature. Unseenlabs primarily serves maritime agencies, insurance companies, environmental organizations, and governments. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Rennes, France.

name: Medusa
cb_description: Medusa is an open-source ecommerce platform with a focus on providing a customizable framework for digital commerce. The company offers a modular server framework that enables businesses to create unique checkout experiences, manage customer interactions, and integrate various payment options. Medusa primarily serves businesses looking to establish or enhance their online commerce presence, including B2B and B2C sectors, multi-vendor marketplaces, and omnichannel retailers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Bonfyre
cb_description: Bonfyre is a workplace culture and engagement platform operating in the business services industry. The company offers a range of digital tools designed to facilitate workplace relationships, trust, and performance, including an employee app and a solution called Culture Coach that suggests actions leaders can take to improve engagement scores and team performance. Bonfyre primarily serves sectors such as banking, healthcare, manufacturing, and retail. It was founded in 2012 and is based in St. Louis, Missouri.

name: Smartpath
cb_description: Founded in 2001, Smartpath delivers asset, maintenance and help desk management solutions via web 2.0 software and Software-as-a-Service to give companies total visibility and control of their fixed and IT assets including the location, condition, value and status.

name: ABL Space Systems
cb_description: ABL Space Systems focuses on aerospace manufacturing and services, specifically in the domain of space launch vehicles. The company specializes in the development and production of rockets designed to provide small satellite launch services. ABL Space Systems primarily serves the satellite communications industry, offering reliable access to orbit for small satellites. It was founded in 2017 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Wagmo
cb_description: Wagmo is a company that specializes in pet wellness and insurance plans within the pet care industry. The company offers wellness plans that cover routine care expenses and insurance plans that provide financial protection against accidents, illnesses, and injuries for pets. Wagmo's products are designed to alleviate the financial burden of pet care for owners, ensuring pets receive necessary treatments without compromise. Wagmo was formerly known as Get Coverd. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: DASH
cb_description: DASH is a boutique brokerage in Coral Gables. Dash aims to make buying and selling a home easier.

name: FlapKap
cb_description: FlapKap focuses on providing financial services. It offers digital financing solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), helping to manage working capital, and cash flow, and invest in marketing and inventory. The company primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

name: Gumroad
cb_description: Gumroad operates as an e-commerce platform in the digital products and services industry. The company provides a platform for creatives such as writers, designers, game developers, musicians, artists, and filmmakers to sell their digital products, memberships, and directly to their audience. Gumroad primarily serves the creative industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cobalt
cb_description: Cobalt delivers a private peer-to-peer network that reduces post-trade costs and risk for financial market participants. Its technology leverages blockchain-derived concepts of encryption, digital signatures, and consensus to deliver a single, immutable record for each trade. The company assists to free up back and middle office resources from multiple layers of reconciliation. Cobalt was founded in 2015 and is based in London, U.K. In December 2022, Cobalt was acquired by United Fintech. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Redox
cb_description: Redox conveyances software for real estate lawyers and paralegals. It creates the document package the lawyers need to complete a sale, purchase, or refinance of a property. The company is based in Calgary, Canada.

name: Botsync
cb_description: Botsync specializes in industrial automation, focusing on the development of autonomous mobile robots for intralogistics. The company offers a suite of solutions to automate the movement of goods within warehouses and factories, enabling a transition from manual to automated operations without significant infrastructural changes. Botsync's products include autonomous robots capable of transporting heavy loads, and a no-code platform, syncOS, which allows for configuration and scaling of automation solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: Stripe
cb_description: Stripe operates as a technology company that specializes in online payment processing and financial infrastructure for Internet businesses. The company provides a suite of products that enable businesses to accept payments, manage billing and subscriptions, handle in-person transactions, and integrate various financial services into their operations. Its platform is designed to support startups, enterprises, and everything in between with scalable, API-driven solutions. Stripe was formerly known as DevPayments. It was founded in 2010 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Trexo Robotics
cb_description: Trexo Robotics specializes in developing wearable robotic devices for the healthcare sector, focusing on mobility assistance. The company's flagship products include a robotic gait training device designed to facilitate walking for children with disabilities, and a wearable robotic exoskeleton that supports and enhances movement. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, offering solutions for home use and clinical settings to aid in physical therapy and rehabilitation. Trexo Robotics was formerly known as BOMBERobotics. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mississauga, Canada.

name: Igentify
cb_description: Igentify operates in the healthcare domain. The company offers a digital platform that streamlines the genomic workflow, enabling patients, laboratories, and healthcare providers to access, interpret, and utilize genetic information more effectively. It primarily serves clinics, labs, and healthcare providers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Haifa, Israel.

name: Remofirst
cb_description: Remofirst is a global human resource solutions provider specializing in remote workforce management and compliance within various sectors. The company offers an all-in-one platform for hiring, onboarding, and managing remote employees and contractors, ensuring legal compliance and streamlined payroll. Remofirst primarily serves sectors that engage in international hiring and remote team management, such as technology startups, legal firms, and finance companies. Remofirst was formerly known as Remoteam. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Wonolo
cb_description: Wonolo provides a staffing platform and focuses on labor solutions for businesses. The company connects companies with workers for various jobs such as warehouse, delivery, merchandising, event staffing, administrative roles, and more. It serves various sectors such as logistics, events, and retail. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Beaverton, Oregon.

name: BitOasis
cb_description: BitOasis is a cryptocurrency exchange focusing on providing a platform for trading Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies. The company offers services that enable users to buy, sell, and trade crypto assets using local currencies like AED and SAR in a secure and regulated environment. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tortola, Virgin Islands (British). In July 2024, BitOasis was acquired by CoinDCX.

name: Metropolis
cb_description: Metropolis is a full-service business consulting firm. It operates in various sectors, including startups, hospitality, nightlife, and manufacturing. It focuses on helping businesses overcome challenges to reach their maximum potential. It primarily serves sectors that require strategic consulting to enhance business operations and growth. It is based in Charlottesville, Virginia.

name: Lindus Health
cb_description: Lindus Health is a clinical research organization that specializes in accelerating clinical trials for life science companies. The company offers full-service trial management, including study design, patient recruitment, clinical data capture, and project management, leveraging technology and access to electronic health records to streamline processes. Lindus Health provides fixed-priced quotes with milestone-based payments, aiming to deliver clinical studies up to three times faster than traditional CROs. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

name: Cytora
cb_description: Cytora specializes in the digitization of commercial insurance workflows, operating within the insurance technology sector. The company offers a platform that digitizes incoming risks, augments them with additional data, evaluates them against various business rules, and routes them to appropriate systems for underwriting. Cytora's platform is designed to improve premium growth, profitability, and service in the commercial and specialty insurance segments by streamlining core underwriting processes and enabling data-driven decision-making. Cytora was formerly known as Bisomotion Ltd. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: Qualio
cb_description: Qualio develops a cloud-based quality management system (QMS) for life sciences. Its QMS unites teams, processes, and data all in one place for companies to get into the market. It allows users to automate the creation, review, approval, and management of policies, procedures, work instructions, forms, and related content. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Bud
cb_description: Bud specializes in financial data enrichment and analytics within the fintech sector. The company offers a range of services including transforming transactional data into actionable insights for personal financial management, lending suitability, and credit risk assessments. Bud's AI-powered platform caters to financial institutions looking to leverage open banking to enhance customer experience and drive growth. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United KIngdom.

name: ModernLoop
cb_description: ModernLoop specializes in automating the interview scheduling process within the recruitment technology sector. The company offers a platform that streamlines the coordination of interviews, enhances the candidate experience, and provides tools for interviewer training and recruitment data analysis. ModernLoop primarily serves the human resources and recruitment industries by offering solutions that improve hiring efficiency and candidate engagement. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: RevComm
cb_description: RevComm specializes in communication through AI and voice technology within the software industry. It offers cloud services that support communication by providing voice analysis, real-time transcription, and analytics for various communication channels. These services are designed to help productivity in sales, customer support, and internal communications. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Cleyrop
cb_description: Cleyrop is a company specializing in generative AI and data management within the technology sector. They offer a unified and secure platform for data collection, storage, transformation, analysis, and exposure, with advanced governance features to support generative AI applications. The company primarily serves public institutions, healthcare, banking & insurance, energy & utilities, industry & services, and transportation sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Shifted Energy
cb_description: Shifted Energy specializes in integrating renewable energy sources and providing equitable energy solutions within the energy sector. The company offers a software platform that transforms electric water heaters and other devices into smart, flexible energy resources, enabling utilities and consumers to stabilize grids and optimize energy dispatch. Shifted Energy primarily serves utilities, aggregators, and real estate companies with scalable energy management and demand response solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Honolulu, Hawaii.

name: Datarade
cb_description: Datarade is a company focused on B2B data monetization through its Data Commerce Cloud platform within the data commerce industry. The company enables organizations to set up data shops, integrate with data marketplaces, and build a global data business, providing infrastructure similar to 'Shopify for Data'. Datarade serves a diverse range of sectors, including enterprises like Databricks, Google Cloud, and SAP. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Datumate
cb_description: Datumate specializes in construction technology, focusing on a cloud-based platform for infrastructure project digitization within the construction sector. The company offers a suite of tools that transform drone and laser scanning data into actionable insights through AI and photogrammetry, enabling stakeholders to monitor, manage, and improve construction project efficiency. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Yoqneam Illit, Israel.

name: Telgani
cb_description: Telgani is a car rental application that allows customers to quickly and easily rent cars at competitive prices. It also helps users to choose the car and location they want to travel in, gives them the option to compare and book car trips from nearby providers, and allows customers to rent cars at competitive prices. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Agrofy
cb_description: Agrofy is a digital marketplace and ecosystem for the agricultural industry, focusing on connecting the entire agribusiness chain. The company offers a platform for buying and selling seeds, agricultural inputs, equipment, and various services related to the agricultural sector. Agrofy primarily serves the agricultural community, facilitating transactions between buyers and sellers and providing digital solutions to enhance the agribusiness experience. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santa Fe, Argentina.

name: Hinge Health
cb_description: Hinge Health focuses on digital healthcare, specifically in the domain of musculoskeletal care and virtual physical therapy. The company offers a digital clinic for joint and muscle care, providing services such as pain management, injury recovery, and preparation for surgery, through technology and clinical care. Hinge Health primarily sells to the healthcare sector, with its services being available through employers and health plans. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Hyperproof
cb_description: HyperProof develops a compliance solution designed for simplicity. The solution works alongside end user applications such as outlook and gmail to slack, trello and more. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Deep Blue Medical Advances
cb_description: Deep Blue Medical Advances is a company focused on the medical device industry, specifically in the area of soft tissue surgery and hernia repair. The company's main offerings include the development and launch of surgical devices designed for optimal tissue tension, reinforcement, and defect closure, with a particular emphasis on hernia repair. These devices are intended to improve surgical procedures and patient outcomes, primarily in the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: DeepHow
cb_description: DeepHow is an AI-powered company specializing in workforce training and knowledge transfer within various industries. The company offers a video-centric platform that facilitates the capture, management, and dissemination of expert knowledge to improve operational efficiency and employee skill sets. DeepHow primarily serves large enterprise and SMB customers across industries such as automotive, manufacturing, pharmaceutical, and more. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Royal Oak, Michigan.

name: AgroSmart
cb_description: AgroSmart focuses on enhancing agricultural productivity and sustainability within the agribusiness sector. The company offers climate monitoring solutions and management of ESG indicators to improve farm resilience, risk management, and profitability. AgroSmart's services cater to producers, consultants, cooperatives, agricultural groups, and agro-industries, aiming to make food systems more productive, efficient, and climate-resilient. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Topi
cb_description:
Topi develops technology for conferences, tradeshows, and social events.

On December 22nd, 2020, Topi was acquired by Hopin, terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: STORi
cb_description:
STORi is an online social media service that attracts users to build and share personal visual stories which allows other users to interact and participate with it from different perspectives.

STORi will be composed of video clips from everyday recordings. It will be a combination of fiction and nonfiction. It provides an opportunity for people to showcase, reflect upon, and to interact with each others stories in a social community. It will draw peoples attention to relational patterns, iterative changes and the social construction of meaning. STORi is reflecting and inspiring. These nonlinear stories will encourage storytellers/audiences to explore the grey, neutral middle-ground.

name: Wazoku
cb_description: Wazoku is a company that focuses on innovation management and open innovation in the technology sector. The company offers a suite of products that enable organizations to generate new ideas and turn them into impact, including tools for internal innovation, co-creation, open innovation, tech scouting, and data analytics. Wazoku primarily serves sectors such as healthcare and life sciences, energy and environment, defense and aerospace, and professional and financial services. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, England.

name: Electra
cb_description: Electra focuses on providing fast charging solutions for electric vehicles in the automotive industry. The company's main service involves deploying and operating fast charging stations for electric vehicles, offering a reliable and efficient charging experience. Electra primarily serves the automotive industry, with a particular focus on electric vehicle users. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Forward Networks
cb_description: Forward Networks specializes in network modeling software, providing solutions across various sectors within the technology industry. The company's flagship product, Forward Enterprise, offers a vendor-agnostic digital twin of networks that is designed to function seamlessly with both cloud-based and on-premises network infrastructures. Forward Networks' software facilitates network security management, multi-cloud visibility, and network data intelligence, aiming to enhance network reliability, agility, and security. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Fulcrum
cb_description: Fulcrum offers a data analytics platform that pulls information from multiple channels and then automates the "next best interaction" between a customer and business to drive sales. Fulcrum ceased operations.

name: Curri
cb_description: Curri is a logistics platform focused on delivery logistics for the industrial supply chain. The company offers a suite of services including same-day, rush, or scheduled delivery, dedicated truck and driver services, freight solutions, and an open API for booking deliveries, all aimed at improving efficiency in the delivery process. Curri primarily serves sectors such as home improvement, HVAC, electrical, auto parts, roofing, building materials, and plumbing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Ventura, California.

name: Cloudbeds
cb_description: Cloudbeds is a technology partner in the hospitality industry, offering a cloud-based hospitality management system. The company provides a platform that combines modules for reservation management, operational efficiency, revenue management, distribution, guest acquisition, and guest engagement, all enhanced by a marketplace of third-party integrations. Cloudbeds primarily serves the hospitality industry, including hotels, hotel groups, hostels, B&Bs and inns, vacation rentals, and campgrounds. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Relyance AI
cb_description: Relyance AI is a company that focuses on data protection and privacy in the technology sector. The company offers an AI-powered platform that manages privacy, data governance, and compliance operations. It uses machine learning to build a dynamic, real-time data inventory and map, allowing for monitoring of how personal data moves through code, applications, infrastructure, and third-party vendors. Relyance AI was founded in 2020 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: BioFishency
cb_description: BioFishency is a company that focuses on the development, manufacturing, and marketing of electro-chemical and biological aquaculture water treatment solutions, operating within the aquaculture industry. The company's main offerings include water treatment solutions for Recirculated Aquaculture Systems (RAS), which are designed to produce healthier seafood products and reduce the carbon footprint, resulting in cost and resource savings for its customers. BioFishency primarily serves the aquaculture industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Misgav, Israel.

name: CropX
cb_description: CropX is a company focused on agronomic farm management solutions within the AgTech industry. Its main offerings include an agronomic farm management system that leverages AI and machine learning to provide soil and crop intelligence, as well as digital tools for decision-making in agriculture. CropX's system is designed to optimize resource use, minimize environmental impact, and enhance transparency in the agricultural supply chain. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Netanya, Israel.

name: groundcover
cb_description: Groundcover focuses on cloud-native application monitoring in the technology sector. Its main services include log management, infrastructure monitoring, and application performance monitoring, that allows users to monitor their cloud operations without compromising on cost, granularity, or scale. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Continuum AG
cb_description: Continuum AG operates within the agricultural sector. The company offers a proprietary tool called TopSoil, which aids farmers in enhancing their soil health and profitability. It also provides services such as regenerative agriculture consulting, carbon intensity scoring, and CI certification to help farmers earn premiums for low-carbon-intensity crops. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Washington, Iowa.

name: Syncari
cb_description: Syncari runs a company focusing on data automation. Its main services include unifying, cleaning, managing, and distributing customer data across an enterprise, with a particular emphasis on eliminating data silos and ensuring data quality. The company primarily serves sectors such as cybersecurity, healthcare, and technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Newark, California.

name: Tempo Therapeutics
cb_description: Tempo Therapeutics serves as a biotechnology company focused on tissue engineering. The company develops materials that modulate immune cells to drive biological responses and build functional tissue and organs within patients. Tempo Therapeutics serves the healthcare sector, with products aimed at improving surgical outcomes in oncology, diabetic limb salvage, and trauma. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: LawTrades
cb_description: LawTrades provides a service that completes legal work in a few text messages at 60% off normal prices by cutting out fancy law firms and going directly to lawyers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Long Island City, New York.

name: Teraki
cb_description: Teraki specializes in AI-driven sensor data preprocessing software for the autonomous mobility sector. The company offers a suite of pre-built software development kits that facilitate the integration of Edge-AI and machine learning to enhance the performance and safety of autonomous systems. Teraki primarily serves industries that require intelligent mobility solutions, such as the automotive, industrial drones, rail, robotics, and warehouse logistics sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Penny
cb_description: Penny specializes in cloud-based digital procurement software. Its main offerings include a source-to-pay solution that streamlines sourcing, purchasing, and vendor management for businesses. Penny's software provides tools for automating purchase requisitions, managing RFQs and RFPs, handling purchase orders and payments, and integrating with existing ERP systems. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia.

name: Umiami
cb_description: Umiami is a pioneer in the plant-based fillet sector, offering meat and fish alternatives within the food industry. The company develops and markets plant-based meat and fish fillets, utilizing a proprietary technology called 'umisation' to mimic the taste and texture of animal products for a range of professional customers. These high-protein, gourmet products are designed to be 100% vegan, using less than 10 ingredients, and cater to flexitarians, vegetarians, and vegans alike. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: EBANX
cb_description: EBANX is a company focused on providing cross-border payment solutions and services for global companies looking to succeed in emerging markets. The company offers a comprehensive payment platform that supports over 100 payment methods, enabling businesses to reach customers in 29 countries across Latin America, Africa, and India. EBANX's platform is designed to simplify operations for its clients, offering features such as instant market access, advanced fraud and risk management, and a commitment to innovation with a suite of payment services tailored for various digital-driven industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Curitiba, Brazil.

name: Fringe
cb_description: Fringe is a platform focused on the intersection of investment and independent music within the entertainment industry. The company facilitates partnerships between fans and up-and-coming artists, allowing for shared growth and earnings from music streams. Fringe primarily serves the independent music sector, enabling artists to fund their growth through fan investments. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Firstleaf
cb_description: Firstleaf is a personalized wine subscription service in the wine industry. The company curates and delivers award-winning wines tailored to individual taste preferences, utilizing a proprietary technology to create a unique Wine Profile for each member. Firstleaf primarily serves wine enthusiasts looking for a customized wine discovery experience. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Napa, California.

name: Otrium
cb_description: Otrium is an online fashion outlet specializing in offering discounted designer clothing and promoting sustainable fashion consumption. The company provides a platform where consumers can find end-of-season fashion items at reduced prices, with savings of up to 75%, and brands can manage excess stock efficiently. Otrium primarily serves the fashion retail industry, connecting a global community with excess stock from leading brands. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Shipper
cb_description: Shipper is a tech company focused on digitizing logistics and supply chain management. The company offers a suite of services including warehouse distribution, e-fulfillment, transportation, and integrated technology solutions designed to streamline operational processes for businesses. Shipper's platform, Shipper360, provides an integrated dashboard for managing multiple aspects of logistics, from storage and distribution to order fulfillment and real-time shipment tracking. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: AstrumU
cb_description: AstrumU is a company that focuses on skills-matching intelligence in the education and human resources industries. The company offers a data platform that measures an individual's skills, maps these skills to in-demand job roles, and recommends possible upskilling opportunities. AstrumU primarily serves the education sector and the workforce development sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: NanoCellect Biomedical
cb_description: NanoCellect Biomedical specializes in the development and manufacturing of microfluidic cell sorting technology for the biomedical research sector. The company offers a range of cell sorters and accessories designed to enhance precision and maintain high cell viability during sorting processes, suitable for applications in genomics, antibody discovery, and other scientific research areas. NanoCellect's products are utilized by researchers in fields such as stem cell research, plant biology, genomics, antibody discovery, cell line development, and gene editing. NanoCellect Biomedical was formerly known as NanoSort. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Unlock
cb_description: Unlock specializes in blockchain-based smart contract protocols for memberships and subscription services within the technology sector. The company offers smart contracts that allow for time constraints, recurring payments, and pricing updates, catering to developers who need to manage memberships and subscriptions efficiently. Unlock primarily serves sectors that require membership management and subscription-based business models, such as content creators, software developers, and various online platforms. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Frizata
cb_description: Frizata operates as an e-commerce platform. It offers direct-to-consumer (D2C) flexitarian frozen food. It produces, markets, and distributes frozen food directly to the home. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Caba, Argentina.

name: Mable
cb_description: Mable specializes in sustainable bathroom products within the personal care industry. The company offers a range of items including compostable bamboo toothbrushes, refillable floss containers, and bamboo cotton swabs, all designed with sustainability and ethical production practices in mind. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Census
cb_description: Census is a Data Activation platform that specializes in Reverse ETL services, enabling businesses to synchronize their data warehouses with various SaaS tools. The company offers solutions for real-time data synchronization, audience segmentation without coding, and collaborative data transformation, all with a focus on enterprise-grade security. Census primarily serves sectors such as marketing, sales, and data teams, providing them with tools to activate their data for better business outcomes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Yousign
cb_description: Yousign specializes in electronic signature solutions for small and medium-sized businesses across various sectors. The company offers a range of products that enable users to prepare, send, and sign documents remotely with legally compliant eSignatures. Yousign's services cater to industries such as human resources, real estate, and banking, providing simple, advanced, and qualified eSignature options along with electronic seals and API integrations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Normandie, France.

name: ForSight Robotics
cb_description: ForSight Robotics is a company focused on the healthcare sector, specifically in the domain of ophthalmic surgery. The company offers a robotic platform designed to perform surgical procedures for widespread eye diseases, aiming to improve the quality and accessibility of surgical eye care. The primary market for ForSight Robotics' services is the healthcare industry, particularly sectors dealing with eye care and surgery. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Yokne'am Illit, Israel.

name: SmallStep
cb_description: SmallStep specializes in web development tools within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables users to create websites quickly, utilizing familiar canvas tools. The platform primarily serves individuals and businesses looking to establish an online presence without extensive coding knowledge. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Moscow, Russian Federation.

name: YouTrip
cb_description: YouTrip operates in the mobile wallet and prepaid card industry. The company offers a multi-currency mobile wallet with a prepaid Mastercard, allowing users to shop online and offline worldwide without any foreign exchange fees or hidden charges. It primarily serves to travel industry and digital consumers. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: Quantum Surgical
cb_description: Quantum Surgical focuses on interventional oncology. The company offers the Epione robotic platform, which is designed for the planning, targeting, delivery, and confirmation of tumor ablation treatments. The technology primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on improving cancer treatment through minimally invasive procedures. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Montpellier, France.

name: Lili
cb_description: Lili focuses on improving personal health through data analytics in the health and wellness sector. Its main offerings include a personal health assistant that connects to smartwatches to provide insights and generate preventive health exercises and data-driven plans for users. Lili primarily serves individuals seeking to optimize their health and prevent potential health conditions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Ljubljana, Slovenia.

name: Koda Health
cb_description: Koda Health specializes in digital care planning within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that facilitates the creation of legal directives, designed to integrate seamlessly with healthcare organizations' workflows. Koda Health primarily serves the healthcare industry, including health systems and payors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Hebbia
cb_description: Hebbia is a company focused on AI technology that enhances knowledge work across various sectors such as finance, law, government, and pharmaceuticals. Its main product, Matrix, is an AI co-pilot that assists users in extracting, structuring, and analyzing large volumes of documents, facilitating full workflow automations with language learning models (LLMs). Hebbia's AI tools are designed to be transparent and verifiable, ensuring trust and collaboration between users and AI systems. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AudioMob
cb_description: AudioMob specializes in in-game audio advertising within the mobile gaming industry. The company offers non-intrusive audio ads that allow brands and artists to reach players without disrupting their gaming experience. AudioMob's services are primarily utilized by the mobile gaming sector to monetize games and by advertisers to engage with a highly attentive audience. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Veritas Finance
cb_description: Veritas Finance is a non-banking financial company focused on providing financial services to micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs) in the informal sector. The company offers a range of products including loans for rural and urban businesses, as well as financing for home construction, aiming to facilitate credit access for underserved segments. Veritas Finance operates with a value-driven approach, emphasizing ethical dealings, responsible engagement, and transparent practices. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: Unaric
cb_description: Unaric specializes in developing a comprehensive suite of applications for the Salesforce platform, focusing on enhancing business operations across various sectors. The company offers products that streamline revenue operations, improve customer service, and optimize system administration tasks, all integrated within the Salesforce ecosystem. Unaric primarily serves businesses looking to maximize their investment in Salesforce through improved operational efficiency and customer engagement. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, England.

name: Sprinto
cb_description: Sprinto specializes in security compliance automation for tech companies, operating within the information security and compliance domain. The company offers a platform that automates the monitoring of compliance frameworks, facilitates audit readiness, and manages risk. Sprinto's platform is designed to integrate with cloud services, providing automated evidence collection, vulnerability assessments, and access control management to ensure robust security compliance. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Landline Company
cb_description: Landline Company specializes in providing multi-modal transportation solutions. It offers a platform to integrate ground transportation with air travel, enabling airlines to extend their network reach and enhance customer experience. The company primarily serves the aviation sector, partnering with major airlines to facilitate environmentally friendly and efficient travel options. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Fort Collins, Colorado.

name: Boomy
cb_description: Boomy is a generative tech company focused on artificial intelligence within the music industry. Its main offering is a software platform that enables users to create and monetize original music using AI, without the need for prior musical experience. The company primarily serves individuals ranging from first-time music makers to established artists and producers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Kyoto Fusioneering
cb_description: Kyoto Fusioneering focuses on developing fusion technology to foster a new energy industry. The company aims to solve global environmental problems by creating advanced reactor engineering technology that enables clean, safe, and limitless energy. Kyoto Fusioneering primarily serves sectors that are seeking energy solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Mistral AI
cb_description: Mistral AI focuses on the development of open-source artificial intelligence models in the technology sector. The company's main offerings include efficient, adaptable AI models that allow for full customization by users without requiring their data. Its models are primarily used in the tech industry. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Actility
cb_description: Actility specializes in low-power wide-area networks (LPWAN) for the Internet of Things, offering connectivity solutions and a platform for IoT network deployment and management. The company provides the ThingPark platform, which integrates advanced LoRaWAN network servers, low-power cellular connectivity, and satellite radio networks, along with a comprehensive catalog of pre-integrated IoT devices. Actility's solutions cater to various sectors including smart industries, smart cities, energy, utilities, logistics, building management, and precision agriculture. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Koyeb
cb_description: Koyeb develops a serverless platform to deploy applications globally. It provides features that enable businesses and developers to run website applications, application programming interfaces (APIs), and event-driven workloads. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boulogne-Billancourt, France.

name: Ellipse
cb_description: Ellipse focuses on the development and production of modernized bicycles in the transportation industry. The company offers traditional and electric bicycles that are designed to be functional, secure, and theft-resistant. These bicycles are intended to provide a balance between aesthetics, comfort, and performance. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Rosieres-Pres-Troyes, France.

name: DealShare
cb_description: Dealshare operates as a hyperlocal online buying platform. The platform allows buyers to purchase groceries in a couple of clicks and search using vernacular browsing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Phase Genomics
cb_description: Phase Genomics operates as a life science innovation company specializing in ultra-long-range genome sequencing technology and computational genomics platforms for genomics, cytogenetics, oncology, and microbiology. The company offers services and products, like Hi-C kits and genome and metagenome assembly and analysis software, designed to facilitate chromosome-scale genome assembly, metagenomic deconvolution, and the study of structural genomic variation and genome architecture. Phase Genomics serves a diverse clientele, including academic and commercial researchers across various fields and industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Castore
cb_description: Castore provides an e-commerce platform for retailing sports and active clothing. It provides sportswear to athletes belonging to football, cricket, golf, gym, rugby, running, skiing, tennis, and more. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Manchester, United Kingdom.

name: Daloopa
cb_description: Daloopa specializes in financial data automation and analysis for the investment sector. The company provides a platform that extracts, organizes, and updates financial data from public company reports, enabling model building and updating for investment professionals. Daloopa primarily serves hedge funds, mutual funds, private equity firms, equity research departments, and investment banks with its data automation solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Space and Time
cb_description: Space and Time is a company focused on providing decentralized data warehousing solutions for AI and blockchain applications. Their main offerings include a platform that enables sub-second zero-knowledge proofs for SQL queries, indexing services for blockchain data, and AI-powered SQL query generation. The company primarily serves sectors such as decentralized finance (DeFi), gaming, NFTs, and enterprise-level Web3 applications. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Clemente, California.

name: Goalsetter
cb_description: Goalsetter provides a financial literacy platform. The company offers a savings and gifting platform for children, providing services such as goal-based savings, financial education through game-based quizzes, and a debit card service. The company serves families, educators, and employers and operates in the financial technology sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Evansville, Indiana.

name: Flo Recruit
cb_description: Flo Recruit specializes in legal recruiting technology and operates within the legal and educational sectors. The company offers an Applicant Tracking System (ATS), virtual and in-person interview coordination, and event management tools designed to streamline the hiring process for law firms and law schools. Flo Recruit primarily serves the legal industry, including law firms and law schools, by providing solutions to enhance their recruitment processes. Flo Recruit was formerly known as Flo Technologies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: Liveblocks
