cb_description: Liveblocks is a technology company focused on providing collaborative solutions. The company offers a toolkit for developers to embed real-time collaborative features into their products, including text editors, forms, creative tools, and whiteboards. These services primarily cater to the software development and tech industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in France.

name: Freeda Media
cb_description: Freeda Media is a digital media company with a focus on engaging Millennials and Gen Z across various platforms. The company offers a marketing platform that leverages social media to help brands become more relevant to younger generations, aiming to create a positive impact while growing their businesses. Freeda Media specializes in creating original content and building brand partnerships that resonate with a global audience of young people. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Rhone
cb_description: Rhone specializes in premium activewear and is part of the apparel and fashion industry. The company offers a range of clothing designed for active lifestyles, including tops, bottoms, and outerwear that cater to both fitness and casual wear. Rhone primarily serves the active individual market, focusing on those who seek performance-oriented apparel for both physical activities and everyday comfort. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

name: LARK
cb_description: LARK UP - A silent, natural wake up. Let them sleep in, while you wake up using your iPhone and our LARK wristband. Built by MIT and Stanford engineers and designed with a Harvard sleep expert.

name: Autobahn Therapeutics
cb_description: Autobahn Therapeutics serves as a biotechnology company focused on developing regenerative medicines for central nervous system (CNS) disorders. The company's main offerings include a brain-targeting chemistry platform that produces small-molecule prodrugs designed to optimize the distribution of therapeutic compounds to the CNS. Autobahn Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on CNS conditions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: MoooFarm
cb_description: MoooFarm focuses on enhancing dairy farm management and livestock management solutions within the agricultural sector. The company offers a mobile application that assists dairy farmers with animal feeding, health monitoring, and business record-keeping to improve farm productivity and profitability. MoooFarm primarily serves the agricultural industry, with a special focus on dairy farmers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Exabeam
cb_description: Exabeam operates as a cybersecurity company and specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) driven security operations for threat detection, investigation, and response. The company offers various products such as cloud-scale security log management, security information and event management (SIEM), and behavioral analytics. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Foster City, California.

name: Helion Energy
cb_description: Helion Energy is focused on developing fusion power technology within the energy sector. The company is dedicated to creating the world's first fusion power plant, aimed at providing unlimited clean electricity. Helion Energy's technology is designed for electricity production through a proven approach to fusion, with the goal of enabling a future of sustainable and reliable energy. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Everett, Washington.

name: Soveren
cb_description: Soveren operates as a sensitive data observability & security (DSPM) company. The company offers a data privacy platform that helps businesses to monitor and control personal data. The solutions are designed for Kubernetes based environments and automatically discovers sensitive data and assets, mapping the flows between them and immediately alerting clients before risks become full-blown incidents. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Pitch
cb_description: Pitch specializes in presentation software with a focus on productivity and collaboration in the business sector. The company offers a platform that allows teams to create, share, and gain insights from presentations, featuring real-time collaboration, smart editing, and artificial intelligence-driven template generation. Pitch provides solutions cater to various professional needs, including pitch decks, sales presentations, and team meetings. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Upway
cb_description: Upway specializes in the reconditioning and resale of electric bicycles, operating within the cycling and e-commerce industries. The company offers a wide range of refurbished electric bikes, providing an alternative to buying new ones. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Gennevilliers, France.

name: Limbic
cb_description: Limbic specializes in artificial intelligence tools for the mental healthcare sector, focusing on enhancing therapy and clinical processes. The company offers AI-powered clinical assessment assistants and generative AI care companions that aim to improve patient outcomes and reduce administrative burdens for therapists. These products are designed to assist in classifying mental health conditions, suggesting interventions, and delivering therapeutic content, as well as integrating with electronic patient records and streamlining referral processes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Aria
cb_description: Aria is a company that operates in the retail industry, with a focus on wearable accessories. The company offers reviews and affiliate links for a wide range of watch brands, providing consumers with information to make informed purchasing decisions. It is based in London, England.

name: Clean Crop Technologies
cb_description: Clean Crop Technologies engages in food safety and waste reduction in the food and agriculture industry. It's main service involves using electricity and food-grade gases to remove contaminants from seeds and foods, which increases crop yields, reduces food waste, and enhances food safety. The company primarily serves the food and agriculture industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Holyoke, Massachusetts.

name: Ada
cb_description: Ada is a company specializing in AI-powered customer service automation within various business sectors. The company offers a platform that enables enterprises to resolve customer inquiries efficiently across multiple channels and languages, without the need for extensive human intervention. Ada's solutions cater to industries such as ecommerce, FinTech, SaaS, and gaming. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Crux
cb_description: Provider of a messaging application for college students. The company's social platform allows users to share, discover and chat about things happening on campus. Its goal is to provide a private and public channel for users to communicate and organize activities with their friends and peers.

name: IntSights
cb_description: IntSights focuses on cybersecurity, specifically in the domain of external threat detection. The company offers a range of services including threat intelligence, vulnerability risk analysis, and remediation services, all designed to neutralize cyber threats. It primarily serves sectors such as banking and financial services, manufacturing, retail and e-commerce, and healthcare among others. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York. In July 2021, IntSights was acquired by Rapid7.

name: Oyster
cb_description: Oyster, developed by Studio SBV, offers an iPhone app that gives members unlimited access to an ever-growing library of books. Users can read an unlimited amount for a single monthly price.

name: Enjoei
cb_description: Enjoei is an online marketplace focused on fashion and lifestyle products. The company provides a platform for buying and selling clothing, shoes, bags, accessories, and home items, catering to emotional and aesthetic shopping experiences. It primarily serves the e-commerce industry, offering a space for individuals to sell pre-owned or new items. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Hohm Energy
cb_description: Hohm Energy specializes in providing solar energy solutions and backup power kits for the renewable energy sector. The company offers a range of services including solar panel installation, financing options for solar systems, and subscription-based solar power, as well as maintenance and advisory services for homeowners and businesses looking to transition to solar energy. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Gauteng, South Africa. In July 2024, Hohm Energy filed for bankruptcy.

name: micro1
cb_description: Micro develops software with a focus on artificial intelligence-powered talent sourcing and management. The company offers services such as hiring and managing pre-vetted software engineers, providing a technical vetting tool, and handling compliance, global payroll, and benefits for teams. It offers product development partnerships, including design, development, quality assurance, and launch services. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in West Hills, California.

name: Matcherino
cb_description: Matcherino focuses on the esports industry, providing a comprehensive platform for tournament management. The company offers a range of services, including instant tournament payouts, tax management for global player bases, consumer engagement tools, monetization capabilities through fan donations and sales of physical and digital goods, and player registration systems. It primarily serves the esports industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Swimply
cb_description: Swimply is an online marketplace specializing in the sharing of private recreational spaces within the leisure industry. The company enables customers to rent private pools, tennis and pickleball courts, and other spaces by the hour for various activities. Swimply provides a platform for pool owners to earn income from their underutilized assets by offering them as rental spaces to individuals seeking leisure or event venues. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Arlington, Virginia.

name: Cybrary
cb_description: Cybrary is a professional development platform specializing in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers cybersecurity training courses designed to equip IT and security professionals with the knowledge and skills needed to advance their careers. Its primary customer base includes IT and security professionals across various sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Greenbelt, Maryland.

name: Viam
cb_description: Viam focuses on machine development and offers a platform for hardware-software integration. The company provides cloud-based solutions that enable users to build, monitor, and manage smart machines, incorporating features such as data visualization, AI model deployment, and fleet management. Viam's platform is designed to be open source and accessible to developers, aiming to simplify the creation and scaling of smart machines across various industries. Viam was formerly known as Echo Labs Holdings. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AllWork
cb_description: AllWork is a company that focuses on workforce management and payments, operating in the human resources and technology sectors. The company offers a platform that provides services such as scheduling, payroll, compliance, and reporting for flexible workforces, including freelancers and contract workers. It primarily serves businesses that employ hourly, consulting, contract, and project-based workers across various job functions and roles. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Edison, New Jersey.

name: thatgamecompany
cb_description: Thatgamecompany is a game studio that focuses on the design and development of video games. The company offers artistically crafted, broadly accessible games that aim to push the boundaries of interactive entertainment, providing enriching experiences that inspire human connection. The company primarily sells to the gaming industry. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Hush
cb_description: Hush is an off-price apparel marketplace on mobile. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: OnePulse
cb_description: OnePulse specializes in market research solutions for businesses. The company offers an online survey tool that allows businesses to gather real-time feedback from their audience, aiding in faster and more informed decision-making. It facilitates brand tracking, product development, and creative testing. It was founded in 2011 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: BioRaptor
cb_description: BioRaptor specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) powered data analytics for the biotechnology domain focusing on optimizing bioprocesses. The company offers a platform that integrates and analyzes bioprocess data, providing actionable insights to reduce costs, improve yields, and time to market for bioproducts. It primarily serves the biopharma, food technology, and biotechnology industries. BioRaptor was formerly known as Xact Health. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Binyamina, Israel.

name: Covercy
cb_description: Covercy is a financial technology company that operates in the real estate and banking sectors. The company provides a platform for real estate investment management, offering services such as automated distribution and capital call payment processing, an investor portal, and a wallet for capital funds. Its primary customers are in the commercial real estate investment industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Tenstorrent
cb_description: Tenstorrent focuses on developing hardware for deep learning within the AI and machine learning industries. It offers a range of products, including accelerated compute IP solutions, AI computer cards, customizable software, and dense AI/ML data center systems. Its products are designed to cater to the needs of the data center and edge computing sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Blume
cb_description:
Blume is a community for you to discover, share and organize health media with your favorite people and health experts in a visually engaging way. 

Think Pinterest meets Medpedia.

Blume has the intelligence to know your health interests and ailments, your goals, so Blume can push you content that you care about rather than searching yourself. 

Blume is your personalized health and wellness hub that will inspire you to take action around your own individual health.

name: Watershed Health
cb_description: Watershed Health focuses on improving healthcare outcomes through communication and collaboration among healthcare providers and plans. It offers a platform that facilitates communication, information sharing, and community-wide data sharing to support coordinated care. The platform serves as a virtual workspace for providers to collaborate on patient care and drive coordination with quality metrics. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New Orleans, Louisiana.

name: Bitmama
cb_description: Bitmama is a cryptocurrency platform operating in the financial technology sector. The company provides services for buying, selling, and trading various cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, and others, and also offers crypto cards for making payments. It primarily serves the financial technology industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Claymont, Delaware.

name: Saildrone
cb_description: Saildrone specializes in providing comprehensive data solutions for maritime security, ocean mapping, and ocean research. The company offers real-time intelligence and insights through its fleet of autonomous surface vehicles (USVs) that deliver high-resolution bathymetry data and scientific-grade mission data for various sectors. Saildrone's USVs are powered by renewable wind and solar power, ensuring minimal environmental impact while operating continuously in diverse maritime conditions. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: Argyle
cb_description: Argyle Search Partners specializes in talent acquisition within the venture capital sector, focusing on connecting professionals to leadership roles. They facilitate career transitions for individuals from management consulting, private equity, and investment banking backgrounds to positions at Guild Capital's portfolio companies. Guild Capital, associated with Argyle, is a venture capital firm investing in tech-enabled consumer and enterprise businesses and providing strategic support to founders. It is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Linq
cb_description: Linq is a smart home electronics company that provides perfect comfort to every room in a home everyday, plus 25% energy savings with the Linq Smart Vent. Each Smart Vent relays the temperature in each room to the Smart Hub which uses complex algorithms to decided the most efficient way to heat and cool homes, based on preferences. Individually control the comfort of each room and save money while doing it.

name: Black Sesame Technologies
cb_description: Black Sesame Technologies specializes in the development of intelligent automotive computing chips and solutions for autonomous driving within the technology sector. The company offers automotive chips and a variety of customized solutions for smart driving capabilities. Black Sesame Technologies primarily serves the automotive industry with advanced SoC designs, middleware, and sensor fusion technologies for intelligent vehicles. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Wuhan, China.

name: eNOugh
cb_description: eNOugh specializes in personal safety solutions, focusing on developing smart wearable technology for individual security. Its main product is a smart wearable badge that integrates advanced hardware, AI technology, and tailored features to help individuals, especially women, feel safer when walking alone at night. Its badge acts as a personal bodyguard, offering prevention, protection, and support through its deterring features, robust safety mechanisms, and connectivity to assistance networks. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Cube Group
cb_description: Cube Group specializes in digital marketing strategies and media planning within the marketing sector. The company offers a suite of services including media buying, marketing analytics, and technology solutions designed to optimize business performance indicators such as revenue, customer lifetime value, and customer acquisition cost. Cube Group primarily serves sectors that require comprehensive digital marketing solutions, leveraging analytics and technology to enhance customer engagement and sales. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

name: YOOBIC
cb_description: YOOBIC is a company specializing in digital workplace solutions for frontline teams, operating within the technology sector. The company offers a Frontline Employee Experience Platform that provides tools for communication, microlearning, and task management to enhance operational efficiency and employee engagement. YOOBIC primarily serves sectors such as retail, restaurants, fashion, grocery, beauty, pharmaceuticals, logistics, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Phenom
cb_description: Phenom provides coaching lessons from professional athletes. It is based in New York City, New York.

name: Callsign
cb_description: Callsign specializes in digital identity verification and fraud prevention within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers solutions for passive user authentication, fraud detection, and compliance with KYC and AML regulations. Callsign's technology is designed to provide secure and convenient user experiences while protecting against various types of fraud and ensuring adherence to regulatory standards. It was founded in 2011 and is based in London, England.

name: ENGIE
cb_description: ENGIE is a company focused on the production and sale of electricity, natural gas, and energy services, operating within the energy industry. The company offers innovative solutions for residential, professional, and industrial customers, aiming to promote more economical and rational use of energy. ENGIE's main services include the provision of electricity and natural gas, as well as energy-saving solutions. It is based in Ile de France, France.

name: Cyclic Materials
cb_description: Cyclic Materials specializes in the recycling of rare earth elements (REEs) from magnets, contributing to the circular economy within the critical metals sector. The company offers solutions for the recycling of magnet-containing products, enabling the creation of a domestic supply chain for REEs through an economical and sustainable magnet recycling process. Cyclic Materials primarily serves sectors requiring rare earth elements, such as the renewable energy, electric vehicles, and electronics industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Sift
cb_description: We write and curate news about the apps that change your life.

name: Twin Health
cb_description: Twin Health specializes in the management of chronic metabolic diseases within the healthcare sector. The company offers a comprehensive program that utilizes Digital Twin AI technology and personalized health recommendations to help individuals improve their metabolic health. Twin Health primarily serves employees and health plan members, providing tailored solutions to prevent and reverse conditions such as diabetes and prediabetes, while also aiming to reduce dependency on medications and overall healthcare costs. Twin Health was formerly known as Twins Digital. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: EarnUp
cb_description: EarnUp operates as a financial technology company. The company provides a platform that automates savings and debt paydown activities, helping individuals achieve financial stability and prepare for life events such as home buying and debt repayment. EarnUp primarily serves financial institutions, credit unions, lenders, servicers, and employers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Flare
cb_description: Flare is a comprehensive group communication and event management platform. The app provides tools for creating customizable group chats, organizing events with calendars and ticketing, and managing group members and alumni. Flare primarily caters to the needs of college organizations such as sororities and fraternities. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Concord, New Hampshire.

name: Air Protein
cb_description: Air Protein produces consumable proteins developed using the elements present in the air. It leverages culinary techniques such as cooking, cracking, and fermenting to create alternative meats and protein-rich foods while retaining similar flavors, tastes, textures, and nutritional attributes. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Leandro, California.

name: Evolve
cb_description: My True, dba Evolve, is a mobile app that gives users love advice powered by machine learning. The app helps users learn from their dating habits so they can make smarter decisions.

name: Silverfort
cb_description: Silverfort provides unified identity protection in cybersecurity. It offers a platform that consolidates security controls across corporate networks and cloud environments to prevent identity-based attacks. Its technology integrates with existing identity and access management (IAM) solutions. It includes homegrown and legacy applications, information technology (IT) infrastructure, file systems, command-line tools, and machine-to-machine access. The platform monitors all user and service account access across both cloud and on-premise environments and analyzes risk using an artificial intelligence (AI) enabled engine. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: FanAI
cb_description: FanAI operates in the sponsorship marketplace, focusing on helping rights holders monetize their fans and brands optimize their sponsorship spend. The company offers a platform that provides actionable audience insights and offline attribution, aiming to improve sponsorship outcomes by understanding the sales impact of sponsorship investments. The company primarily serves the marketing and advertising industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Arcadia, California.

name: BeAM
cb_description: BeAM is a French company manufacturing industrial metal 3D printers/additive manufacturing machines using the LMD technology (Laser Metal Deposition). BeAM's machines allow a layer-by-layer metal deposition in order to manufacture and repair parts, but also add functions and shapes on already existing parts directly from a CAD file.

name: Bluecore Company
cb_description: Bluecore Company specializes in the development and manufacturing of medical laser products within the laser medical equipment industry. The company offers a range of laser devices designed for aesthetic and medical applications, which include Q-switched Nd:YAG, Er:YAG, CO2, and picosecond pulse lasers. It is based in Busan, South Korea.

name: Candid
cb_description: Candid is a specialist in life insurance and financial protection services within the insurance industry. The company offers straightforward advice and insurance solutions tailored to meet the needs of parents, the over 50s, and working professionals, aiming to protect families from financial hardship due to loss or critical illness. Candid primarily serves the life insurance and financial protection sector, reaching out to consumers directly. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Bristol, England.

name: SVT Robotics
cb_description: SVT Robotics specializes in supply chain automation integration through its tech-agnostic SOFTBOT Platform within the automation and robotics industry. The company provides a platform that enables IT teams to integrate, monitor, and scale automation without the need for custom code, offering a unified interface for system visibility and management. SVT Robotics' solutions cater to a variety of sectors within the supply chain ecosystem, including warehousing, logistics, and distribution. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Norfolk, Virginia.

name: Nagi Bioscience
cb_description: Nagi Bioscience specializes in the development of NextGen laboratory equipment for biological testing, focusing on alternatives to animal testing within the pharmaceutical, cosmetic, and agro-chemical industries. The company offers a range of products including the SydLab One system, assay kits, and software solutions designed to automate and standardize small organism testing for research and development purposes. Nagi Bioscience's technologies are utilized primarily by the pharmaceutical and biotechnology sectors for applications such as early toxicology, pre-clinical testing, and aging research. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Saint-Sulpice, Switzerland.

name: BeeLine
cb_description: BeeLine specializes in smart navigation solutions for bicycles and motorcycles within the technology sector. The company offers intuitive navigation systems and tracking devices that provide turn-by-turn directions and route planning for two-wheeled transportation. BeeLine's products enhance the riding experience for cyclists and motorcyclists by offering a simple and safe way to navigate through urban environments. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Umaro Foods
cb_description: Umaro Foods specializes in the production of plant-based bacon alternatives within the food industry. Their main product is a plant-based bacon that mimics the taste and texture of traditional bacon using protein from red seaweed. It targets the food service sector, offering its products wholesale and to restaurants. It was formerly known as Trophic. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Albany, California.

name: Enhatch
cb_description: Enhatch specializes in providing advanced solutions for the medical sector, focusing on 3D planning and patient-specific implants for orthopedic and spine surgeries. The company offers a suite of services that includes virtual surgical planning, creation of 3D printed implants and surgical guides, and a cloud-based platform for preoperative case management. Enhatch's technology integrates with additive manufacturing processes and facilitates remote collaboration among surgical teams, engineers, and sales representatives. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Hasbrouck Heights, New Jersey.

name: Makeblock
cb_description: Makeblock is a company that focuses on the development of software and hardware for educational purposes, specifically in the fields of Computer Science and STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics). The company offers a range of robot kits and educational resources designed to make coding accessible and engaging for children. These products are primarily targeted towards the education sector, with solutions designed for various age groups, from early childhood to post-secondary institutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Shenzhen, Guangdong.

name: NetraDyne
cb_description: NetraDyne specializes in AI fleet safety technology within the transportation and logistics industry. The company offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to enhance driver safety, ensure compliance, and improve overall fleet management through real-time analytics and coaching tools. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: 401GO
cb_description: 401GO provides retirement plan solutions. The company offers automated 401(k) retirement plans for small businesses, simplifying the administration process and reducing errors through its platform. It serves small businesses, financial advisors, accountants, payroll providers, and HR providers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in West Jordan, Utah.

name: Agricarbon
cb_description: Agricarbon focuses on environmental services, specifically in the domain of soil carbon measurement. The company offers a service that rigorously quantifies soil carbon, including sample collection, automated soil analysis, and soil carbon reporting. Agricarbon primarily serves the agricultural sector, providing services to businesses, farmers, and landowners. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dundee, United Kingdom.

name: AgendaPro
cb_description: AgendaPro is a comprehensive management software focused on appointment scheduling and business operations for sectors such as aesthetics, health, and wellness. The software provides online booking, digital medical records, customizable clinical forms, and automated reminders, facilitating day-to-day management for businesses. Additionally, it offers online payments, inventory control, API integrations, management reports, and intelligent marketing tools to help businesses grow and retain customers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

name: UCAN
cb_description: UCAN is a social service organization focused on compassionate healing, education, and empowerment within the human services sector. The company offers a range of programs including clinical and counseling services, support for pregnant or parenting teens, foster care placement, a therapeutic youth home, a therapeutic day school, transitional living programs, workforce development, youth leadership development, and violence prevention. These services primarily cater to vulnerable children, youth, and families affected by trauma. It was founded in 1869 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Enode
cb_description: Enode develops digital infrastructure software as a service-based platform designed to connect energy hardware to applications. The company's infrastructures connect to energy products such as home batteries, heaters, and other energy assets with application programming interfaces (APIs) and integrate them into the app to optimize energy consumption and help to participate in flexible markets with connected hardware, enabling clients to facilitate a zero-carbon energy grid. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Oslo, Norway.

name: Hashnode
cb_description: Hashnode is a content creation platform focused on providing blogging solutions for developers within the technology sector. The company offers a range of services including a developer-centric writing editor, AI-assisted writing tools, real-time collaboration, and headless CMS options for seamless integration with existing websites. Hashnode primarily caters to individual developers and enterprise teams looking for efficient and optimized blogging tools. Hashnode was formerly known as Devmag.io. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Milton, Delaware.

name: Tookitaki
cb_description: Tookitaki operates a regulatory technology company. Its products include AFC Ecosystem to share expert advice. It offers financial crime detection and prevention to banks and financial technology. It helps to transform their anti-money laundering (AML) and compliance technology needs. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Singapore. In April 2022, Tookitaki was acquired by Thunes.

name: Modulr
cb_description: Modulr specializes in providing software solutions for the insurance industry. It focuses on contract management, customer relationship management (CRM), and electronic document management (GED). The company offers a range of digital platforms and turnkey solutions for managing insurance contracts, with features that cater to the needs of various insurance professionals. Its platforms are customizable and aim to facilitate efficient insurance management for proximity brokers, general agents, digital brokers, medium-sized brokers, wholesale brokers, brokerage networks, insurers, and mutuals. It is based in Lyon, France.

name: Medivis
cb_description: Medivis specializes in advancing surgical procedures and medical education through augmented reality and computer vision within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers an FDA-cleared surgical imaging platform that transforms complex medical imaging into real-time 3D visualizations for clinical use, alongside an augmented reality anatomy lab and learning platform designed for medical education. Medivis's technology is primarily utilized by healthcare professionals, including surgeons, hospital administrators, and medical educators. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Seismos
cb_description: Seismos focuses on the Oil & Gas industry. The company offers analytics and subsurface intelligence services, which provide direct measurements of fracture properties for fracturing treatment evaluation. Seismos primarily serves the energy and cleantech sectors, with applications in upstream operations, pipelines, geothermal, and carbon sequestration. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: PocketNest
cb_description: PocketNest is a company that specializes in financial wellness, offering a platform within the financial technology sector. The company provides a white-label software platform and mobile app designed to coach millennials and Gen Xers through various aspects of financial wellness, while also offering insights and data analytics to financial institutions and employers. PocketNest's platform is built on behavioral science and psychology to facilitate meaningful financial goal-setting and pathway mapping for users. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: Autify
cb_description: Autify develops an artificial intelligence (AI)--powered software testing automation platform. It helps companies automate their development cycle. The platform uses AI to monitor the changes in the application codes allowing the testing scenarios to be repaired automatically, thus reducing maintenance costs. The company was formerly known as Locki. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: AccelByte
cb_description: AccelByte is a company that focuses on providing backend services for the gaming industry. The company offers a range of services including player assembly and matching, cross-platform account connection, game commercialization, player engagement tracking, and game metrics visualization. These services primarily cater to game studios looking to develop, publish, and operate games-as-a-service. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Redmond, Washington.

name: Balbix
cb_description: Balbix is a company that focuses on cybersecurity, operating within the technology and security sectors. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence to automate the process of identifying, prioritizing, and mitigating cybersecurity risks. This includes services such as automated asset discovery, risk-based vulnerability management, and cyber risk quantification. Balbix primarily serves organizations in the enterprise sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Eventus
cb_description: Eventus is a global provider of trade surveillance and market risk solutions within the financial technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive platform, Validus, which includes trade surveillance, market risk management, algorithmic trading monitoring, and anti-money laundering/transaction monitoring services. These services are designed to enhance regulatory operations efficiency for various financial institutions and market participants. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Immersed
cb_description: Immersed is a provider of enterprise AI productivity solutions that helps increase worker productivity and save time and costs. The company develops spatial computing software for enterprises, which allows users to work full-time with their team in virtual AR/VR space. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Great Bay Bio
cb_description: Great Bay Bio is a biotechnology company that focuses to make biomedical products based on Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology. It develops an intelligent centralized database, where deep learning is being performed to create a next generation AI-enabled bioprocessing ecosystem. Its products including Klone4.0TM (AI-enabled cell line development platform), AlfaStaXTM (AI-enabled cell line stability prediction platform) and AlfaMedX (AI-enabled culture media development platform), AlfaCell and other AI solutions are used commercially to improve the Chemistry, Manufacturing, and Controls (CMC) process of various biological drugs including fusion proteins, monoclonal antibodies, bispecific antibody drugs and more. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Shatin, Hong Kong.

name: Aerodome
cb_description: Aerodome focuses on public safety and air support technology developing an automated drone response system. The company offers an integrated, automated, and operating system that enables the deployment of drones as first responders to emergency incidents. These drones can be remotely operated, providing air support for first responders on the ground, and are capable of automatic response to 911 calls, launching, flying, replacing themselves, landing, and charging with minimal human intervention. It was founded in 2023 and is based in West Hollywood, California. In October 2024, Aerodome was acquired by Flock Safety.

name: AeroShield
cb_description: AeroShield specializes in advanced materials for the window industry, focusing on energy efficiency and sustainability. The company offers insulating, transparent inserts for windows. AeroShield collaborates with insulated glass manufacturers to integrate their innovative material into new windows for residential and commercial buildings. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Fiture
cb_description: Fiture is a company specializing in smart home fitness equipment, offering products that integrate advanced technology to enhance workout experiences. The company's main offerings include interactive fitness mirrors that provide real-time feedback and personalized training through motion engine technology. These products are designed to cater to the home gym market with their aesthetic appeal and innovative features. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Chengdu, Sichuan.

name: UPWARDS
cb_description: UPWARDS develops CrowdLoan, a personal loan matching platform for individuals.

name: Roslin Technologies
cb_description: Roslin Technologies specializes in biotechnology within the food and agriculture sector, focusing on sustainable protein production. The company's main offerings include the development and commercialization of unique animal stem cells for cultivated meat, which are capable of self-renewal and differentiation into various tissues such as muscle and fat. Roslin Technologies aims to address the protein deficit by innovating in biotechnologies that make protein production more affordable and sustainable. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Midlothian, Scotland.

name: Aspiration
cb_description: Aspiration offers sustainable financial products. It provides solutions to consumers and enterprises to help them become carbon neutral. The company offers Zero, a credit card that rewards users for fighting climate crisis-related issues. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Marina del Rey, California.

name: Wrapbook
cb_description: Wrapbook is a smart production payroll and accounting platform that serves the film and television industry. The company offers a unified system for managing production finances, including crew onboarding, cost tracking, payroll processing, and generating real-time financial reports. Wrapbook's platform is designed to streamline production workflows and provide financial transparency for producers, accountants, cast, and crew. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Attest
cb_description: Attest provides a consumer research platform. The company offers services to simplify and expedite the process of gathering and analyzing consumer data, providing insights to inform decision-making. Its main offerings include brand tracking, consumer profiling, creative testing, market analysis, and new product development. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Pearl Street Technologies
cb_description: Pearl Street Technologies specializes in interconnection solutions for the energy sector, focusing on mitigating the utility-scale interconnection backlog and expediting the transition to a decarbonized grid. The company offers two main software products: Interconnect, which provides project developers with a risk analysis platform for projects at any point in the interconnection lifecycle, and SUGAR, which assists transmission providers in managing interconnection queue volumes by accelerating modeling and simulation studies. Pearl Street Technologies primarily serves transmission providers, project developers, and mergers and acquisition (M&A) analysts within the renewable energy industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Captions
cb_description: Captions is an AI-powered creative studio specializing in video editing and content creation tools. The company offers a suite of software solutions designed to enhance video production, including automatic subtitle generation, eye contact correction, language dubbing, and video clip extraction, all utilizing artificial intelligence to streamline the creative process. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: dWallet Labs
cb_description: dWallet Labs is a cybersecurity company specializing in the blockchain technology sector. The company's main services include developing trustless access control solutions and implementing cutting-edge cryptography to enhance the security of Web3. It primarily serves the cybersecurity and blockchain technology industries. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Mercato
cb_description: Mercato is an online grocery delivery platform that specializes in connecting consumers with fresh, quality ingredients from local specialty food shops. The company offers a wide range of products including fresh produce, hand-cut meats, artisanal cheeses, and a variety of pantry staples, all delivered to the customer's door. Mercato's platform supports independent grocers by providing them with the tools to thrive in a competitive retail landscape. Mercato was formerly known as Grocery Marketplace. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: InterCloud
cb_description: InterCloud is a Software-Defined Cloud Interconnect (SDCI) provider operating in the cloud connectivity solutions industry. The company offers end-to-end global connectivity services, simplifying the deployment of cloud technologies and providing businesses with control over the security, sovereignty, and performance of their critical data traffic. Its primary customers are global businesses seeking to reduce network complexity and accelerate growth and innovation. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Crossover
cb_description: Crossover operates as a digital asset trading technology firm specializing in providing an execution-only cryptocurrency Electronic Communication Network (ECN) for institutional clients. The company offers a platform with an ultra-low-latency matching engine and the ability to create custom liquidity pools for tailored trading experiences. Crossover primarily serves the institutional sector of the cryptocurrency market. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Bernardsville, New Jersey.

name: PocketLaw
cb_description: PocketLaw is a company that focuses on legal technology. The company offers a contract management software that integrates with an eSignature system, allowing users to navigate legal processes effortlessly. The company's services are primarily used by the legal sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Volocopter
cb_description: Volocopter specializes in urban air mobility and operates within the aerospace industry. The company develops all-electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) aircraft designed to provide quiet, sustainable, and emission-free air transportation solutions. Volocopter's primary offerings include the VoloCity air taxi for urban environments and the VoloRegion for regional connectivity, alongside VoloIQ, an AI-powered digital platform that supports the operational aspects of their eVTOL fleet. Volocopter was formerly known as E-volo. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Bruchsal, Germany.

name: Forum Mobility
cb_description: Forum Mobility is a company focused on providing solutions for zero-emission transportation in the logistics and transportation industry. The company offers services such as leasing and purchasing of electric trucks, and providing charging depots for these vehicles. These depots are conveniently located near ports and major drayage routes, offering a cost-effective and environmentally friendly solution for fleet operators. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Half Moon Bay, California.

name: Neosync
cb_description: Neosync specializes in data replication and anonymization within the software development and data management domains. The company offers solutions for creating anonymized or synthetic data and synchronizing it across various environments to facilitate local, stage, and continuous integration testing (CI testing) without compromising data privacy. It primarily serves the software development industry, with a focus on helping security, privacy, and compliance in development workflows. Neosync was formerly known as Nucleus. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Degreed
cb_description: Degreed is a company focused on lifelong learning and skills development within the corporate learning and talent management industry. It offers a learning experience platform (LXP) that facilitates workforce upskilling, reskilling, and provides a marketplace for diverse learning content, alongside analytics for skills data. Degreed primarily serves organizations looking to enhance their employee learning and development programs. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Pleasanton, California.

name: Ample
cb_description: Ample focuses on energy delivery solutions for electric vehicles. The company offers a modular battery swapping system to enable a full charge to any electric vehicle. Ample's technology serves various sectors including ridesharing, delivery, and personal commuting. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Haiper
cb_description: Haiper focuses on generative AI for video content creation within the technology sector. The company develops AI-driven tools that enable individuals to create and share video content across social media platforms. It primarily serves the creative industries, including content creators and social media influencers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Oradian
cb_description: Oradian specializes in providing a cloud-based core banking system for financial institutions in emerging markets. Its main offerings include a core banking platform enabling automated lending, risk management, and compliance, as well as a loan management system designed to serve more clients efficiently. Oradian's banking platform caters to the needs of financial institutions looking to scale their operations and enhance customer service. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Zagreb, Croatia.

name: SODA
cb_description: SODA provides fragrance preparations. The company's products offer fragrance preparations such as synthetic fragrances and chemical products. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Matillion
cb_description: Matillion offers a productivity platform for data teams, operating in the data management and cloud computing industry. The company offers services that enable both coders and non-coders to move, transform, and orchestrate data pipelines. Its primary customer segments include the financial services, healthcare, life sciences, retail, communications and media, and technology and software industries. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Manchester, United Kingdom.

name: DRUID
cb_description: DRUID produces spirits and liquors with new flavors.

name: Podimo
cb_description: Podimo is a digital platform specializing in podcasts and audiobooks within the audio entertainment industry. It offers a library of exclusive podcasts and a vast selection of audiobooks, aiming to provide personalized audio experiences for every moment of the day. Podimo primarily serves podcast listeners and audiobook enthusiasts. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Fooda
cb_description: Fooda focuses on providing workplace food programs in the food service industry. The company's main services include office lunch delivery, catering for meetings and events, and setting up popup restaurants in workplaces. Fooda primarily sells to businesses, offering solutions for corporate dining and employee meals. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: TympaHealth
cb_description: TympaHealth specializes in ear and hearing healthcare technology, providing an integrated platform for diagnosis and treatment. The company offers a comprehensive system that includes HD digital otoscopy, microsuction, hearing checks, secure cloud-based storage, and remote review capabilities. TympaHealth primarily serves sectors such as community pharmacies, care homes, domiciliary care, allied health professionals, GP clinics, audiologists, and opticians. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Navattic
cb_description: Navattic is a company that focuses on providing an interactive demo platform in the technology sector. The company's main service is to offer a platform that allows teams to create interactive product demos, aiming to increase conversion rates. This service primarily caters to the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Doctible
cb_description: Doctible is a healthcare Software as a Service (SaaS) platform operating in the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a patient engagement software that helps medical practices manage their workflow by automating tasks such as scheduling, sending reminders, and engaging with patients. The primary sectors it serves include the medical, dental, orthodontics, and optometry industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Fauna
cb_description: Fauna operates as a document-relational database delivering a cloud-based application programming interface (API) platform. It provides a database for social and mobile applications. Its solutions include security models, event streaming, programming interfaces, data import, developer tooling, and more. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: DJUST
cb_description: DJUST specializes in providing B2B commerce solutions, focusing on the digital commerce and eProcurement sectors. The company offers a platform that facilitates online business transactions, including features for marketplace integration, sales automation, and order management, designed to streamline the procurement process and enhance customer experience. DJUST's solutions cater to distributors, retailers, and manufacturers looking to digitize their sales and procurement processes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Stegra
cb_description: H2 Green Steel focuses on the decarbonization of the steel industry. The company's main offerings include the production of green steel and green hydrogen, which reduce CO2 emissions compared to traditional steelmaking methods. It serves the steel industry. Stegra was formerly known as H2 Green Steel. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Curve Health
cb_description: Curve offers health information exchange and a telemedicine platform. It offers patient care, ambulance services, and nursing services between hospital systems and surrounding post-acute facilities, resulting in care and billing. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Engageli
cb_description: Engageli is a company that focuses on the education technology sector, providing an online learning platform. The platform is designed to facilitate virtual learning in an engaging and effective manner, offering features such as interactive tools, data analytics, and integrations for a comprehensive learning environment. The company primarily serves the higher education sector, corporate learning and development, and K-12 education. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Awesomic
cb_description: Awesomic operates as a platform that designs solutions, catering to agencies, startups, and e-commerce businesses. The company offers a subscription-based service that matches design tasks with designers, providing a range of marketing design services from banners to landing pages. Awesomic's platform facilitates the management of design tasks and revisions, delivering updates on a daily business basis. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Palmetto
cb_description: Palmetto operates as a clean energy company focusing on providing solar energy solutions. The company offers solar panel purchasing, solar energy plans, and protection services for solar systems. Palmetto primarily serves residential sectors looking to adopt renewable energy sources. Palmetto was formerly known as Ecologic Solutions. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Charlotte, North Carolina.

name: Fi
cb_description: Fi is a company that focuses on the pet technology sector, specifically for dogs. The company offers a smart dog collar that uses GPS and LTE-M Cellular network technology to track a dog's location and monitor its health, including activity levels and sleep patterns. The primary customers of Fi are dog owners who want to ensure the safety and well-being of their pets. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Wrench
cb_description: Wrench develops a vehicle maintenance and repair service platform. It matches vetted mechanics with people who need vehicle repair and also aims to enable customers to maintain their vehicles without regularly going to dealerships or shops. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: OpenClassrooms
cb_description: OpenClassrooms is an online education and training platform operating in the education sector. The company offers a variety of online courses and certified degree programs, focusing on skills-based learning and mentorship for in-demand professions. OpenClassrooms primarily serves the education industry. OpenClassrooms was formerly known as Simple IT. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Quadratic
cb_description: Quadratic serves as a modern spreadsheet platform designed for data scientists, engineers, and business analysts within the data analysis and visualization sector. The company offers an infinite canvas spreadsheet that integrates real-time collaboration and coding capabilities, allowing users to work with data using Python, SQL, and AI directly in their web browser. Quadratic's spreadsheets support multi-line formulas, data visualization, and API integration, catering to professionals who require advanced data manipulation and presentation tools. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Zerocater
cb_description: Zerocater specializes in corporate catering and cafeteria solutions tailored for the hybrid workplace. The company offers a range of services including flexible corporate catering, digital cafeteria systems, and event catering, all designed to accommodate the unique tastes and dietary preferences of employees. Zerocater primarily serves companies of various sizes, from growing startups to Fortune 500 enterprises, looking for customized and consistent meal experiences for their employees. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Pulmocide
cb_description: Pulmocide operates as a biopharmaceutical company. It focuses on the development of targeted therapies for serious respiratory diseases. The company's main offerings include inhaled medicines designed to treat difficult-to-treat respiratory diseases, with a particular focus on respiratory fungal infections such as pulmonary aspergillosis. It primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: M80
cb_description: M80 is an esports and gaming organization focused on competitive gaming across various titles. The company manages teams that participate in esports tournaments, offers fan engagement, and sells branded merchandise. M80 caters to the esports industry, building teams and engaging with fans to foster a community around competitive gaming. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: OLIO
cb_description: OLIO focuses on reducing waste and promoting sustainability. The company provides an application that facilitates the exchange of food and other items among local community members, aiming to minimize waste and support environmental efforts. It primarily serves individuals looking to share or acquire goods within their local communities, contributing to a circular economy. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Pexapark
cb_description: Pexapark is a company focused on providing reference prices and market intelligence for the renewable energy sector. Their main offerings include daily market-representative reference prices for renewable energy Power Purchase Agreements (PPAs) and a suite of analytical tools and advisory services to support strategic decision-making in energy transactions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: GoSats
cb_description: GoSats offers a bitcoin stacking application. The company enables users to earn bitcoin cashback while shopping with partnered merchants. It primarily serves the financial technology sector. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Atlas AI
cb_description: Atlas AI focuses on artificial intelligence to measure and analyze socioeconomic conditions in emerging markets. It offers services that simplify enterprise data and geospatial analytics to forecast consumer locations and optimal methods of engagement. Atlas AI primarily serves sectors such as telecommunications, energy, and insurance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: TruKKer
cb_description: TruKKer is a digital freight network that operates within the logistics and transportation industry. The company offers a platform that integrates demand and supply for multimodal freight services, providing features such as real-time tracking, instant payments for carriers, and on-demand consignment insurance. TruKKer primarily serves the logistics sector, offering solutions to both carriers and shippers for efficient freight handling. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

name: Sensos
cb_description: Sensos specializes in digitizing supply chains within the logistics and supply chain management industry. The company offers a proactive supply chain solution that provides real-time, end-to-end global visibility, enabling faster shipments, reduced inventories, and more efficient production planning. It primarily serves sectors such as pharmaceuticals, medical devices, agriculture, automotive, and logistics. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

name: Xanadu
cb_description: Xanadu provides a quantum photonic platform. Its platform uses artificial intelligence to integrate quantum silicon photonic chips into existing hardware to build a full-stack quantum computer. It enables clients to receive a quantum technology-based computing facility using a photonic cluster state technology and easily solve business problems. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Aplazo
cb_description: Aplazo operates as a financial technology firm specializing in buy now pay later solutions. It integrates into online and offline merchants payment processes and allows customers to purchase items and pay in installments without a credit card. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: CareerFairy
cb_description: CareerFairy is a platform focused on facilitating the entry into the workforce for students and recent graduates within the job placement and career development sector. The company provides a service that allows users to watch videos and live streams from potential employers, showcasing job roles and company cultures, and offers a direct application process for job openings, internships, and programs that require no prior work experience. CareerFairy primarily serves the higher education sector by connecting students, universities, and employers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Totem
cb_description: Totem operates in the food and beverage industry focusing on providing a blend of restaurant quality, cafeteria friendliness, and supermarket convenience. The company offers services including daily food and drink supplies, a cafe and tea room, a snack bar, an organic grocery store, a beverage section, sports equipment, entertainment options, and logistical and information technology (IT) support. Totem primarily serves the corporate sector, providing services that enhance the workplace environment and employee satisfaction. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Nullify
cb_description: Nullify specializes in software development security through the use of AI agents within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers autonomous AI services that assist in application security tasks such as triaging, correlating, and automating security within developers' workflows. Nullify primarily serves the software development and cybersecurity sectors by integrating its AI-driven solutions into various development environments and tools. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Blue Ant Media
cb_description: Blue Ant Media is a company focused on the media and entertainment industry. It specializes in creating and distributing TV content, operating its own channels, and producing shows with acclaimed creators. The company primarily serves the global media industry. It is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Aledia
cb_description: Aledia specializes in the development of microLED technologies for the future of display screens across various industries. The company offers cutting-edge microLED displays that are multifunctional, intelligent, interactive, and energy-efficient, with capabilities such as transparency, foldability, and sound integration. Aledia's products are designed to deliver unparalleled image quality and battery life, catering to a wide range of applications from smartwatches to large TV screens and augmented reality. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Echirolles, France.

name: Onto
cb_description: Onto specializes in all-inclusive electric car subscriptions within the automotive industry. The company offers customers the ability to subscribe to electric vehicles on a monthly basis, which includes insurance, maintenance, public charging, and other services without requiring a deposit. Onto primarily serves individuals and businesses looking for flexible vehicle access without long-term commitments. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Sourcery
cb_description: Sourcery is a digital payments and commerce platform created to help restaurants, commercial kitchens, food retailers and other hospitality-industry businesses manage finances easily and paperlessly. Serving customers such as Snap Kitchen, Elephants Deli. Companies use Sourcery's easy-to-use invoicing and accounts payable technology offers real-time visibility for spend and cash flow management, enabling customers to better manage costs and increase profitability.

name: Whirli
cb_description: Whirli is a subscription-based service in the toy industry that offers a shareable toy box for children. The company provides a platform where subscribers can rent, swap, and enjoy a variety of toys, with the option to purchase any favorites. Whirli primarily serves the consumer market with a focus on families seeking a sustainable and clutter-free way to provide toys to their children. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Keighley, England.

name: Leadsales
cb_description: Leadsales specializes in customer relationship management (CRM) solutions for social media platforms. The company offers a CRM system that centralizes communication from WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram, enabling businesses to organize and track customer interactions and sales processes. Leadsales primarily serves businesses looking to enhance their sales and customer service through social media channels. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Queretaro, Mexico.

name: Apolitical
cb_description: Apolitical focuses on government effectiveness by providing a social learning network for public servants. The company offers online communities, courses, and interactive events designed to facilitate the exchange of ideas, expertise, and partnerships to address complex societal challenges. Apolitical primarily serves the public sector, with a focus on supporting public servants and government officials. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: ScorePlay
cb_description: ScorePlay is a company specializing in digital, media, and production asset management within the sports industry. The company offers an AI-powered platform that centralizes and automates the management, tagging, distribution, and collaboration of digital assets for sports organizations. ScorePlay's solutions cater to a wide range of stakeholders in the sports ecosystem, including leagues, federations, teams, and brands. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CredPal
cb_description: CredPal operates as a financial services company. The company offers a range of services including facilitating payments, providing savings and investment options, and enabling access to credit. Its primary customers are individuals and businesses seeking to manage their finances, invest, and access credit. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: GyroGear
cb_description: GyroGear is a company that focuses on the development of advanced hand stabilizers in the medical technology sector. The company's main product is a wearable device designed to mechanically stabilize hand tremors, providing relief for individuals suffering from conditions such as Parkinson's and Essential Tremor. The device uses advanced gyroscopic stabilization technology to counteract the effects of hand tremors, allowing users to regain control and stability. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: SALT
cb_description: Subsea Asset Location Technologies Ltd (SALT) is a spin-out company from the Defence Science and Technology Laboratory (Dstl), a research agency of the UK Ministry of Defence (MOD). The company was formed to exploit a new passive sonar reflector technology for the commercial marketplace. The product SonarBell works by focusing the sound energy like a lens to amplify sound levels and reflect them to the sender. This ability is delivered solely through the mechanical properties of the chosen materials and its construction.

name: Mudstack
cb_description: Mudstack is a digital asset management platform specifically designed for game studios. The company provides solutions for managing, collaborating on, and versioning art assets and pipelines, enabling teams to work more efficiently and securely. Mudstack's platform is tailored to meet the needs of artists, art leads, and engineers within the game development industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Roswell, Georgia.

name: Cove
cb_description:
Cove is a stealth company founded by Aditya Agarwal and Ruchi Sanghvi, formerly of Facebook. As per the company, Cove is re-imagining the way groups communicate, coordinate, and collaborate.

In February 2012, Cove was acquired by Dropbox. The valuation of Cove was undisclosed. Other terms of the deal were not released.

name: Ema
cb_description: Ema focuses on artificial intelligence to support women's health across various life stages. It offers a conversational AI platform that provides health and wellness support, parenting advice, and self-care tips for women. Ema's AI assistant is designed with input from healthcare professionals, including midwives and therapists. Ema was formerly known as SocialMama. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Sunsave
cb_description: Sunsave focuses on renewable energy, specifically in the solar power industry. The company offers solar panel and battery solutions, providing households with the ability to generate and store their electricity. Its service is primarily targeted towards the residential sector. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Mfine
cb_description: Mfine operates as an artificial intelligence(AI)-driven healthcare network.  It aims to offer an on-demand healthcare platform for users to access virtual consultations with doctors via chat or video. It also allows users to book routine lab tests, and medicine delivery and access comprehensive health packages. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India. In July 2022, Mfine merged with LifeCell.

name: Pitstop
cb_description: Pitstop offers an online booking platform for car repairs. It provides periodic services, body repair, inspection and diagnostic, airconditioning services, insurance claims, and many more. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Found
cb_description: Found was a Internet/Internet Software & Services company based in San Francisco, California.  Found was acquired in 2002.

name: Payhawk
cb_description: Payhawk is a spend management platform that operates in the financial technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools for managing corporate expenses, including issuance of corporate cards, automation of expense management, and comprehensive accounts payable software. Payhawk's solutions are designed to provide real-time visibility and control over business spending, streamline financial operations, and integrate with existing ERP and accounting systems. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: QuestDB
cb_description: QuestDB is a time series database in the technology sector. It offers a storage system that enables ingestion and querying of time-stamped data, with a focus on developer experience through standard query language (SQL) and time series extensions. QuestDB is utilized across various sectors, including finance, telecommunications, and aerospace, for real-time applications and analytics. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Norbert Health
cb_description: Norbert Health specializes in AI-driven health monitoring technology within the healthcare sector. The company offers contactless vital sign monitoring and health assessments for senior living facilities, utilizing AI-driven sensors to track core vitals and mobility. Norbert Health primarily serves the senior care industry with its health monitoring solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Procurated
cb_description: Procurated is a company focused on enhancing public procurement processes through technology. It offers a platform where public sector professionals can access supplier profiles, read reviews, and gain insights to make informed procurement decisions. The platform primarily serves the public sector, including governments and educational institutions, by providing tools for vendor evaluation and risk reduction. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: 42Crunch
cb_description: 42Crunch is a company that focuses on API security in the technology sector. The company offers services such as API security testing and threat protection, aiming to proactively test, fix, and protect APIs from development to runtime. The company primarily serves sectors such as automotive, energy and utilities, financial services, healthcare, and telecoms. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Fable
cb_description: Fable offers plant-based meat alternative products made from shiitake mushrooms, coconut oil and sugar.

name: Swoop
cb_description: Swoop specializes in precision healthcare marketing within the pharmaceutical and life sciences sectors. The company offers solutions for direct-to-consumer (DTC) and healthcare provider (HCP) marketing, as well as cross-channel activation using advanced technologies like conversational AI. Swoop's services are designed to identify and engage target audiences for healthcare brands, ensuring compliance with privacy standards and optimizing marketing strategies for better patient outcomes and prescription uplift. Swoop was formerly known as Shopximity. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York. In September 2024, Swoop was acquired by W2O Group.

name: Iverify
cb_description: Iverify is a full-service security company, reducing and deterring crime for large and small retailers, automotive dealerships, property management companies, and a host of other business types with basic and interactive monitoring. Headquartered in Charlotte, NC, with facilities in Burnsville, MN, Iverify provides unparalleled remote security monitoring and life safety and property protection solutions supporting our customers, nationwide. Its remote presence creates a safer environment for our clients' employees and their customers, with cost-effective flexibility, scalability and responsiveness to real-world needs. Applying a set of custom designed protocols for each individual client, Iverify aligns technology, information and people for maximum effectiveness and efficiency.

name: GroGuru
cb_description: GroGuru focuses on strategic irrigation management for the agricultural sector, leveraging artificial intelligence (AI) and technology to enhance farming practices. The company offers solutions for continuous root zone monitoring and water management, utilizing a patented Wireless Underground System (WUGS) for soil sensor installation, and an AI-based recommendation engine to optimize irrigation. GroGuru's technology is designed to increase crop yield and conserve water and other resources, providing farmers with actionable insights through an intuitive user interface accessible on various devices. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: LiveKit
cb_description: LiveKit focuses on providing scalable solutions for voice and video applications within the technology sector. Its main offerings include tools and services that enable the integration of conversational AI, robotics communication, and livestreaming capabilities into various platforms, with a focus on streaming and developer-friendly components. LiveKit was formerly known as dSa & Zhao Expedition. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Density
cb_description: Density provides financial services. It builds a blockchain-based ecosystem that will offer a variety of innovative financial products to individuals and institutions  like futures, options leveraged tokens, and synthetic tokens. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Authlete
cb_description: Authlete specializes in providing OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect (OIDC) solutions within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a suite of APIs that enable the construction of OAuth/OIDC servers and integration with existing service components such as identity and access management systems. Authlete's services are utilized across various sectors including open banking, payment, media, SaaS, healthcare, entertainment, e-commerce, and eKYC. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Showbie
cb_description: Showbie is a company that focuses on providing a hybrid learning platform in the education technology sector. The company offers a simple, easy-to-use app that manages classroom workflow and provides personalized feedback for students of all learning abilities. It primarily serves the education industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Edmonton, Alberta.

name: Blackthorn
cb_description: Blackthorn is a company that focuses on developing Salesforce-native applications, operating in the software and technology industry. The company offers a suite of applications designed to enhance customer engagement, including tools for event management, payment processing, compliance, messaging, and eCommerce.
