Blackthorn primarily serves sectors such as accounting and finance, field service organizations, healthcare, higher education, nonprofit, and public sector and government. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Uniform
cb_description: Uniform specializes in the creation of wood-aluminium and wood-bronze window and door systems within the construction and architectural sectors. The company offers a range of products that focus on innovation, quality of materials, and attention to detail, with a particular emphasis on thermoacoustic performance and sustainability. Uniform's offerings include advanced window and door systems that cater to the aesthetic and technical needs of the building industry. It was founded in 1988 and is based in Minerbe, Italy.

name: CoreTigo
cb_description: CoreTigo is a company focused on high-performance machine digitalization and wireless connectivity solutions within the industrial automation sector. The company offers IO-Link Wireless technology-based products that enable machine builders, system integrators, and industrial equipment manufacturers to create and retrofit machines and production lines, enhancing flexibility, adaptivity, and modularity. CoreTigo's solutions cater to a variety of industries, including automotive, food & beverage, pharmaceuticals, and metalworks, aiming to improve operational efficiency and production optimization. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Netanya, Israel.

name: Zoios
cb_description: Zoios provides a people analytics platform focused on employee welfare and well-being in various business sectors. It offers a suite of tools for employee feedback, automated survey analysis, and insights to improve engagement, retention, and performance. It serves sectors that are invested in workplace culture and employee satisfaction, such as human resources and corporate management. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Copenhagen K, Denmark.

name: Privyr
cb_description: Privyr is a company that specializes in mobile customer relationship management (CRM) and lead conversion tools for sales and marketing professionals. Their main offerings include a mobile CRM platform that provides instant lead alerts, auto-personalized messaging, and lead management features to help users engage with leads and improve sales conversions. Privyr primarily serves sales teams and marketing agencies, offering integrations with popular lead sources and communication channels such as Facebook, TikTok, WhatsApp, and email. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Future
cb_description: Future focuses on personal training, operating within the fitness and health industry. The company offers a dedicated coach and personalized training plans, providing unlimited workouts for its users. It primarily serves individuals seeking online fitness coaching and personal training. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Planted Foods
cb_description: Planted Foods focuses on the health and wellness industry, specifically in the domain of food and nutrition. The company offers plant-based food products that are infused with adaptogens, which are herbal medicines known to enhance overall well-being. These products are made from whole ingredients and are free from dyes, unnatural preservatives, fillers, or gums. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: BetterWorks
cb_description: BetterWorks is a company specializing in intelligent performance management within the human resources sector. Its platform offers tools for goal setting, performance tracking, structured check-ins, real-time feedback, employee engagement, and performance calibration. The company primarily serves sectors that require robust human resources management and performance optimization solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Lightmatter
cb_description: Lightmatter focuses on photonic computing within the technology industry. The company offers products that reinvent how computer chips communicate and calculate, primarily aimed at powering the AI revolution. Its products are designed to reduce power consumption and increase performance, making them particularly relevant to the data center industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: SambaNova Systems
cb_description: SambaNova Systems specializes in advanced artificial intelligence and machine learning with a focus on enterprise-scale AI platform development. The company offers a full stack AI solution, including hardware and software designed for generative AI, which enables the deployment of large complex foundation models that can transform business operations and unlock new insights from data. SambaNova's products cater to a variety of sectors, including financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, energy, and the public sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Qovery
cb_description: Qovery is an Internal Developer Platform focused on streamlining cloud infrastructure provisioning and management for developers. The company offers solutions for automating the deployment of scalable and secure cloud infrastructure, providing ephemeral environments, and enabling developer self-service with governance, security, and cost optimization features. Qovery primarily serves the cloud computing industry, offering integrations with major cloud providers and tools to enhance developer productivity and operational efficiency. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: SevenRooms
cb_description: SevenRooms is a company specializing in marketing and operations software within the hospitality industry. Its main offerings include a CRM platform designed for hospitality businesses to manage guest experiences, operations, and personalized marketing efforts. SevenRooms primarily serves sectors such as restaurants, hotel food & beverage outlets, and entertainment venues. SevenRooms was formerly known as Nightloop. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Vammo
cb_description: Vammo focuses on transportation within the electric vehicle industry. The company offers electric motorcycle rentals with batteries, providing an alternative to traditional gasoline-powered motorcycles. Vammo primarily serves individuals and businesses seeking more sustainable transportation solutions. Vammo was formerly known as Leoparda Electric. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Kate Farms
cb_description: Kate Farms is a company that focuses on the production of plant-based nutrition products, operating within the health and wellness industry. The company offers a range of nutrition shakes and formulas, designed to support daily nutrition goals, medical needs, and specific dietary conditions for both adults and children. These products are primarily sold to individuals seeking health-conscious dietary solutions and the medical sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Santa Barbara, California.

name: AirHelp
cb_description: AirHelp is a company that focuses on advocating for air passenger rights in the travel industry. The company offers services to assist passengers in claiming compensation for delayed or cancelled flights, providing a hassle-free process that includes handling all necessary paperwork and negotiations with airlines. AirHelp primarily serves the travel and tourism industry. It is based in Hong Kong.

name: GenEdit
cb_description: GenEdit specializes in the development of genetic medicine therapies within the biotechnology sector. The company offers a platform called NanoGalaxy, which is designed to enhance the delivery of genetic medicines to treat a variety of diseases. GenEdit's research focuses on diseases with unmet medical needs, aiming to create therapeutic options. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brisbane, California.

name: Netography
cb_description: Netography is a company focused on providing cloud-native network defense solutions within the cybersecurity industry. Its main offering, Netography Fusion, is a platform that monitors network traffic, detects anomalies and threats, and provides real-time alerts to enable rapid response to security incidents. The platform serves various sectors, including hybrid and multi-cloud network environments. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Annapolis, Maryland.

name: Speqtral
cb_description: Speqtral is a technology company. It specializes in the domain of quantum distribution communication networks. The company's main offerings include space-based transmission and terrestrial fiber technologies that provide data security for various entities, such as governments and corporations. Speqtral primarily sells to sectors that require data security, including sovereign networks, communication infrastructure, healthcare, and financial institutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: SkySpecs
cb_description: SkySpecs focuses on renewable energy asset management within the wind energy sector. The company offers autonomous drone inspections for wind turbines, software for blade and drivetrain management, performance monitoring, and financial asset management services to optimize operations and maintenance. SkySpecs primarily serves the renewable energy industry, particularly wind farm owner-operators. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: Heetch
cb_description: Heetch is a professional ride-hailing company operating in the transportation industry. The company's main service is providing a platform for drivers and passengers to connect for rides, with a focus on fair income for drivers and affordable prices for passengers. It primarily serves the ride-sharing market. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Paris, France.

name: ACTO
cb_description: ACTO is an AI-powered Intelligent Field Excellence platform focused on the Life Sciences industry. The company offers solutions for field professionals in engaging healthcare providers (HCPs), supported by analytics for commercial leaders to measure field force effectiveness. ACTO's platform is tailored to improve customer engagement and brand performance for biopharma sales, marketing, and medical teams. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Tebra
cb_description: Tebra is a company that specializes in providing comprehensive healthcare software solutions for independent medical practices. Their platform offers a range of services including practice management, electronic health records, patient experience enhancements, and billing and payment processing. Tebra's software is designed to streamline care delivery, improve patient engagement, and optimize financial performance for healthcare providers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in California, United States.

name: zolostays
cb_description: Zolostays specializes in providing coliving spaces for students and professionals within the real estate sector. The company offers fully furnished homes with a range of amenities, designed for comfortable and community-oriented living. Zolostays primarily caters to the student housing and corporate housing sectors. zolostays was formerly known as ZoloStays Property Solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Cameo
cb_description: Cameo operates as a fan engagement platform in the entertainment and social media industry. The company offers personalized video messages from a range of celebrities to fans for various occasions. Cameo primarily sells to individual consumers looking for gifts and to businesses seeking celebrity endorsements or participation in events. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Curebase
cb_description: Curebase provides a range of software tools designed for clinical trial recruitment, consent, and data collection processes. Curebase primarily serves the clinical research industry, including CROs, research sites, and study participants. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Entocycle
cb_description: Entocycle develops insect farming and insect farming technology. The company provides insect farms and technology that enable the breeding and rearing of insects, specifically black soldier flies, at a commercial scale. Its farms and technologies are primarily used by insect protein companies, entrepreneurial farmers, food companies, and waste management entities. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Outschool
cb_description: Outschool is an education platform operating in the e-learning industry. The company offers online classes and tutoring for children, with a focus on engaging, small-group learning experiences. These services are delivered via live video by experienced, independent teachers, covering a wide range of subjects from arts and coding to life skills and world languages. Outschool primarily serves families seeking homeschooling resources, as well as schools and districts looking to expand their enrichment, tutoring, and elective offerings. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Reco
cb_description: Reco specializes in waste management solutions, operating within the environmental services industry. The company offers a comprehensive waste solution that improves disposal environments, automates management tasks, and promotes material recycling. Reco's services cater to businesses looking to manage and recycle waste more sustainably. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chungcheongnam-do, South Korea.

name: Finom
cb_description: Finom is a fintech company providing online financial services for small and medium enterprises (SMEs), freelancers, and companies. The company offers digital business accounts with features such as Single Euro Payments Area (SEPA) transfers, prepaid business debit cards, invoicing services, and integration with accounting software. Finom's services are tailored to meet the needs of the modern entrepreneur, with a focus on ease of use, security, and comprehensive financial management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Connecteam
cb_description: Connecteam is a comprehensive employee management app designed for businesses of all sizes across various sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for time tracking, scheduling, task management, and communication, aimed at improving operational efficiency and workforce engagement. Connecteam's solutions cater to a diverse range of industries, including construction, cleaning services, and retail, among others. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Infleet
cb_description: Infleet specializes in fleet management solutions within the technology sector. The company offers a software platform that facilitates vehicle monitoring, driver behavior analysis, and fleet maintenance management. Infleet primarily serves sectors such as construction, distribution, logistics, telecommunications, and passenger transportation. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bahia, Brazil.

name: Dagger
cb_description: Dagger is a content and strategy agency that offers strategies and stand-out content to help brands navigate and quickly react to the everchanging landscape.

name: StructureFlow
cb_description: StructureFlow focuses in providing a visual modeling platform for professional services. The company's main offerings include intuitive diagramming tools for creating charts, automation features for generating charts from existing data, and collaboration tools for easy export, commenting, and secure sharing. The company primarily serves the legal, finance, and corporate sectors. StructureFlow was formerly known as Lexograph. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Team Vitality
cb_description: Team Vitality is an esports organization operating in the gaming industry. The company primarily focuses on identifying and developing esports athletes, competing in various games such as League of Legends, CS: GO, VALORANT, FIFA, Rocket League, and Call of Duty Mobile. It primarily serves the esports industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Origami
cb_description: Origami focuses on providing a digital platform for personal connections and memory archiving. The company's main service is a website where users can chat, archive memories, plan events, and stay connected with their loved ones. Its service primarily serves individuals seeking a meaningful way to connect with family and build a living legacy. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Spare
cb_description: Spare is a mobile app that allows users to roundup their dine out bills to the nearest dollar to benefit non profits at the forefront of hunger relief.

name: Microcaps
cb_description: Microcaps specializes in microencapsulation technology within the fine fragrances, cosmetics, nutrition, and pharmaceutical industries. Microcaps primarily serves sectors that require advanced ingredient delivery systems, such as the cosmetics and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Schlieren, Switzerland.

name: Conquest Planning
cb_description: Conquest Planning specializes in modern financial planning software within the financial services industry. Their main offerings include a planning engine that utilizes artificial intelligence to provide real-time, collaborative financial advice, and tools for both advisors and clients to dynamically adjust financial plans. They primarily serve financial institutions looking to enhance their financial advice delivery with technology. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

name: Bigblue
cb_description: Bigblue is a logistics and fulfillment company focused on e-commerce brands. They offer a suite of services including global shipping, tracking, integrations, and checkout solutions to enhance the customer's shopping experience. The company primarily serves direct-to-consumer brands, offering them the tools to scale operations and improve their delivery and returns processes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Productfy
cb_description: Productfy is a platform specializing in the embedding of financial products within various business sectors. The company offers a suite of services including branded card programs, digital banking solutions, secured charge card issuance, and disbursement mechanisms, all designed to be integrated seamlessly into clients' applications. Productfy primarily serves sectors such as community banks, credit unions, real estate, financial services, and insurance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Clever Real Estate
cb_description: Clever Real Estate is a company that specializes in connecting individuals with top real estate agents and providing cost-saving opportunities in the real estate market. The company offers services for home selling and buying, including agent matching, educational resources, and tools for real estate investment. Clever Real Estate primarily serves individuals looking to buy or sell residential properties, offering guidance on home selling basics, finding realtors, and investing in real estate. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Reshape
cb_description: Reshape is a company specializing in lab automation technology within the biotechnology sector. They offer a platform that integrates AI and robotics to automate visual experiments, providing services such as automated imaging, built-in incubation, and advanced image analysis to enhance research productivity. Reshape primarily caters to the biotech industry, with applications in food and ingredients, agriculture, and industrials. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Anvilogic
cb_description: Anvilogic provides a collaborative Security Operations Center (SOC) content platform. It offers a streaming content service and a framework-led, code-less content-builder environment for the development of content by SOC teams by managing their entire content lifecycle. The platform also enables secure collaboration with peer organizations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Relay
cb_description: Relay specializes in providing workflow solutions for school-based Medicaid services within the education sector. The company offers a comprehensive platform that streamlines documentation, claims processing, and compliance for K12 school districts to enhance Medicaid reimbursements. Relay primarily serves the education technology industry, focusing on financial and administrative processes for schools. It was founded in 1993 and is based in Bristol, Rhode Island.

name: Akia
cb_description: Akia provides an AI-powered engagement platform that specializes in the hospitality industry. The company offers solutions for enhancing guest communication and automating service tasks, as well as integrating with property management systems and providing digital key distribution. It serves the hospitality sector, including hotels and vacation rentals. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Solink
cb_description: Solink is a company specializing in cloud-based video security and loss prevention systems within various business sectors. The company offers a platform that combines video surveillance with integrated data analytics to enhance security, loss prevention, and operational efficiency. Solink primarily serves sectors such as restaurants, retail, financial services, property management, and healthcare, among others. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Ottawa, Ontario.

name: Tenderly
cb_description: Tenderly is a full-stack Web3 infrastructure provider in the blockchain technology sector. The company offers a suite of development tools and services designed to facilitate the creation, testing, and deployment of decentralized applications (dapps). It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Capella Space
cb_description: Capella Space develops earth observation technology, focusing on synthetic aperture radar (SAR) imaging within the space technology sector. The company offers high-resolution SAR imagery products and analytics, providing access to data for various applications regardless of weather conditions. Capella Space primarily serves industries such as defense and intelligence, supply chain, insurance, and maritime. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Clarity Movement
cb_description: Clarity Movement is a company focused on air quality monitoring and measurement within the environmental technology sector. They offer a comprehensive Sensing-as-a-Service solution that includes air quality monitoring hardware, cloud-based data management and visualization, and expert project support to facilitate reliable and cost-effective air pollution measurement. Clarity Movement primarily serves sectors such as government agencies, educational institutions, and communities seeking to improve air quality and comply with environmental regulations. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Sunfire
cb_description: Sunfire focuses on industrial electrolysis within the renewable energy sector. It manufactures electrolyzers that produce renewable hydrogen and syngas using alkaline and solid oxide (SOEC) technologies, aimed at decarbonizing energy-intensive industries. Sunfire's electrolyzers are designed to convert renewable electricity, water steam, and captured CO2 into clean fuels. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Dresden, Germany.

name: Stacklet
cb_description: Stacklet focuses on cloud governance, providing a platform for enterprises in the cloud computing domain. The company offers a suite of tools for managing security, operations, visibility, and cost optimization in cloud environments, using a policy as a code model. Its products include a real-time asset database for multi-cloud management, infrastructure as code governance solutions, and a collection of pre-built policy packs for compliance and security. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Arlington, Virginia.

name: Gremlin
cb_description: Gremlin focuses on reliability testing and chaos engineering. The company offers tools that help to improve system availability and resilience, enabling businesses to identify and mitigate reliability risks. These tools are primarily used by finance, retail, and technology organizations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Covina, California.

name: Frameplay
cb_description: Frameplay is an intrinsic advertising platform operating in the video game industry. The company offers a platform that allows brands to advertise within video games, providing targeted and personalized virtual ads. Frameplay primarily serves the advertising and video game development sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Algama
cb_description: Algama is a company that specializes in web infrastructure and cloud services. They offer a range of solutions including web hosting, virtual private servers (VPS), and dedicated servers to host various web projects. The company's services cater to the needs of individuals and businesses looking to establish and maintain their online presence. It is based in Evry, France.

name: Taranis
cb_description: Taranis develops precision agriculture intelligence. The company offers a full-stack solution for high-precision aerial surveillance imagery, utilizing computer vision, data science, and deep learning algorithms to monitor fields and prevent crop yield loss due to insects, crop diseases, and weeds. It primarily serves the agricultural industry, providing its services to agribusinesses and farmers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Westfield, Indiana.

name: Adapdix
cb_description: Adapdix specializes in edge-optimized machine learning and artificial intelligence performance within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that integrates DevOps, MLOps, and DataOps to manage AI/ML analytics, providing data-centric applications, analytics, and insights across various environments. Adapdix's solutions cater to the needs of businesses looking to implement AI/ML capabilities into their products or systems. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pleasanton, California.

name: Recharge
cb_description: Recharge allows Bay Area guests to nap or shower in luxury hotels all day. It operates in Hyatt, Hilton, and Starwood hotels throughout the Bay area. The company is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Coin Metrics
cb_description: Coin Metrics provides cryptocurrency asset market and network data. Its data empowers clients and the public to better understand, value, use, and steward open cryptocurrency networks. The company offers network data, market data, prices, indexes, risk management, and more. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Hivemapper
cb_description: Hivemapper provides mapping, visualization, analytic tools, and machine vision tools. It services the construction and logistics industries, as well as the military and local governments. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Middleton, Delaware. In April 2024, Hivemapper merged with Carypto Foundation.

name: Truework
cb_description: Truework specializes in providing a customizable platform for income and employment verification within the financial services sector. The company offers services that automate the verification process, utilizing multiple data sources to ensure efficient and accurate verifications. Truework primarily caters to the mortgage lending and tenant screening sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Gropyus
cb_description: Gropyus focuses on sustainable construction and technology to develop future-proof apartment buildings within the real estate and construction industry. The company offers turnkey solutions for timber-hybrid buildings, including planning, manufacturing, efficient assembly, and a digital building management system. Gropyus primarily serves the real estate development sector with its technologically advanced, cost-efficient, and environmentally friendly building solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Wien, Austria.

name: Vestwell
cb_description: Vestwell operates as a financial technology company focusing on savings and investment programs for both businesses and individual savers. The company offers a range of products including workplace-sponsored retirement plans, employer-sponsored student loan repayment benefits, and various savings accounts for education, emergencies, and individuals with disabilities. Vestwell's platform serves a diverse clientele, including financial advisors, employers, third-party administrators, financial institutions, payroll providers, government agencies, and individual savers. Vestwell was formerly known as Hello401. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AcuityMD
cb_description: AcuityMD offers a commercial platform that provides sales and marketing professionals with tools to identify target markets, surface top opportunities, and grow their business. The platform is specifically designed for the medical technology industry, transforming healthcare data into workflows prioritizing sales and marketing efforts. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: MindsDB
cb_description: MindsDB is an AI development platform specializing in real-time machine learning and AI model deployment within various business sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for automating AI workflows, integrating data sources, and customizing AI solutions to meet specific enterprise needs. MindsDB primarily serves developers and enterprises looking to implement and scale AI systems tailored to their data and security requirements. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Mozper
cb_description: Mozper provides financial education for children. The company offers a card and application that allow parents to manage their children's spending, assign chores, and track savings goals, providing a practical way for children to learn financial management. The company primarily serves the family sector, with a particular emphasis on parents looking to teach their children about financial responsibility. Mozper was formerly known as Geltr. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Legistify
cb_description: Legistify is a legal technology company specializing in enterprise legal management software for various business sectors. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including contract lifecycle management, matter management, intellectual property tracking, and legal notice workflows, all designed to streamline legal operations for enterprises. Legistify primarily serves large enterprises across multiple countries with its automated and customizable legal management solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Gamezop
cb_description: Gamezop operates as a plug-and-play gaming platform. It offers a variety of casual games and trivia that can be integrated into any app or website, enhancing user engagement and providing a new stream of advertising revenue. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: PABLO AIR
cb_description: PABLO AIR specializes in the development of software for drone operations, focusing on a ground control system. The company's technology facilitates tasks such as drone delivery, disaster management, and logistics, using coordinated drone swarms. It serves the drone industry. PABLO AIR was formerly known as Pablo Airlines. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Incheon, South Korea.

name: Applied Intuition
cb_description: Applied Intuition specializes in vehicle software development, focusing on advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) and automated driving (AD) within the automotive industry. The company offers a development platform that enables the development, testing, and validation of ADAS and AD systems. Applied Intuition's platform is designed to shorten development cycles, manage system safety, and utilize industry-leading technology to bring ADAS and AD systems. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Doppler
cb_description: Doppler is a company that specializes in the design, construction, and manufacturing of vertical transportation systems, operating in the elevator and escalator industry. The company offers a variety of elevator solutions for different building applications and traffic loads, including passenger lifts, car lifts, goods lifts, and bespoke designs. They also provide spare parts for these systems, such as lift motors, hydraulics, electricals, doors, and operating systems. It was founded in 2000 and is based in Greece.

name: Pyka
cb_description: Pyka focuses on aviation through automation and electrification. The company offers autonomous electric aircraft designed for crop protection and aerial logistics, which are capable of safe, clean, and operations. Pyka's aircraft serve various sectors, including agriculture for crop protection and logistics for cargo transport. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Refraction AI
cb_description: Refraction AI specializes in AI-powered last-mile delivery solutions within the logistics and transportation sector. The company offers a range of autonomous robotic platforms designed to safely and efficiently transport goods such as food and retail items directly to customers' doors. Refraction AI primarily serves the restaurant, grocery, and retail industries with its innovative delivery technology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: Datia
cb_description: Datia is a data platform specializing in sustainable finance for the financial services industry. The company provides solutions for automating ESG reporting, ensuring SFDR compliance, and aligning with the EU Taxonomy, among other services. Datia primarily serves asset managers, asset owners, wealth advisors, and tech platforms within the finance sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Immuneel Therapeutics
cb_description: Immuneel operates as a clinical-stage company specializing in cell and gene therapies and personalized immunotherapy for patients. It creates access to chimeric antigen receptor T cell therapy (CAR-T) and cellular immunotherapies for the management and treatment of cancers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Nabis
cb_description: Nabis is a leading cannabis marketplace and distribution platform in the cannabis industry. The company provides a comprehensive suite of services including fast fulfillment, warehousing, payment processing, financing, data analytics, sales, and marketing to facilitate cannabis commerce for brands and retailers. Nabis primarily serves the cannabis wholesale market, offering an online marketplace with a vast selection of products and a software-enabled portal for managing the distribution lifecycle. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: AI Rudder
cb_description: AI Rudder provides artificial intelligence-powered voice assistants. It streamlines operations such as customer information verification, appointment confirmation, payment reminders, and more. It serves industries such as insurance, e-commerce and retail, logistics and supply chain, and more. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore.

name: HILOS
cb_description: HILOS is a company that merges advanced technology with sustainable craftsmanship to revolutionize the footwear industry. Their main offerings include a platform for designing, developing, and providing an infinite restock of artisan footwear, with a focus on zero waste and on-demand production. The company caters to the needs of the footwear industry by enabling rapid production to minimize overproduction and waste. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: WeFunder
cb_description: WeFunder operates in the financial sector, focusing on equity crowdfunding for startups and small businesses. The company enables individuals to invest in a variety of companies with as little as $100, offering equity and the potential for financial returns. WeFunder supports a diverse range of businesses across multiple industries, allowing investors to build a portfolio and participate in community rounds alongside professional investors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ABK Biomedical
cb_description: ABK Biomedical is a clinical-stage medical device company focused on developing and commercializing innovative therapies for the treatment of hypervascular tumors, particularly in the liver. The company's main offerings include a novel Y90 radioembolization technology with proprietary glass composition microspheres designed for in-procedure visualization and an imageable bland embolization product for arteriovenous malformations and hypervascular tumors. ABK Biomedical's products are aimed at improving treatment outcomes for patients with liver cancers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

name: UbiQD
cb_description: UbiQD specializes in quantum dot nanotechnology for sectors such as agriculture, clean energy, and security. The company offers quantum dots that enable various industries to harness the power of sunlight without the toxicity and expense associated with traditional quantum dots. UbiQD's products are primarily utilized in industries that benefit from advanced materials and clean energy solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Alamos, New Mexico.

name: Stable Money
cb_description: Stable Money offers individuals to grow wealth by offering investment options that help returns with safety and stability. It provides a listing of various securities including financial products along with market analysis to help investors' decision-making and provides financial consulting services to investors. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Aiera
cb_description: Aiera focuses on event monitoring and search platform services within the financial and corporate sectors. The company offers one-click access to investor events with real-time transcription, search capabilities, live audio playback controls, and AI-driven analytics. Aiera primarily serves institutional finance professionals and corporate entities, providing tools for efficient event consumption and insight generation. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Local Logic
cb_description: Local Logic is a location intelligence platform that specializes in the real estate sector, providing data-driven insights to inform decisions. The company offers a suite of services that quantify various aspects of the built environment, such as demographics, location quality, and climate risks, to aid in real estate investment and urban planning. These insights cater to a range of clients including real estate professionals, developers, investors, and governments, primarily within the US and Canadian markets. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Scentbird
cb_description: Scentbird focuses on delivering fragrance and clean beauty products through a subscription-based model in the personal care industry. The company offers a monthly subscription service that allows members to select from a wide range of designer colognes and perfumes. Scentbird also owns several brands, including Goodhabit, Deck of Scarlet, Confessions of a Rebel, and Sanctuary, expanding its presence in the beauty and fragrance market. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Monroe, New Jersey.

name: Pontem Network
cb_description: Pontem Network operates as a product development studio. It engages in foundation tools for Aptos and the move ecosystem offering production-grade automated market makers. It also offers Pontem Wallet a blockchain platform for sending and receiving tokens to facilitate connecting decentralized applications (dApps). The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Spice AI
cb_description: Spice AI offers artificial intelligence (AI)-based application development software. It combines a decision engine and machine learning data, enabling developers to build AI-driven applications. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Goody
cb_description: Goody is a company that specializes in simplifying the process of sending personal and business gifts through its business gifting platform. The platform offers services such as employee engagement, client appreciation, and sales prospecting gifts, and integrates with HR platforms to facilitate automated gifting for occasions like birthdays and work anniversaries. Goody's curated gift collection features over 250 brands, and gifts can be sent using just an email or phone number, with options for recipients to swap gifts without seeing the price. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: PLUS
cb_description: PLUS is a provider of semiconductor equipment refurbishment, repair, and enhancement services.

name: Spoon Labs
cb_description: Spoon Labs provides a short-form drama platform. It offers an online video and audio live-streaming services. Its audio library includes live shows, podcasts, and music channels. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: HighLife
cb_description: HighLife focuses on the medical industry, specifically in the area of heart valve diseases. The company offers an alternative for mitral valve replacement, intended for the treatment of moderate to severe mitral regurgitation, a common heart valve condition. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. HighLife was founded in 2010 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Alkemi
cb_description: Alkemi offers a community-based liquidity solution to address the significant crypto-market price inefficiencies amidst fragmented centralized exchange markets. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Stem
cb_description: Stem is a global leader in AI-driven clean energy solutions and services within the energy sector. The company offers an enterprise software platform, Athena, designed to optimize the economic, environmental, and resiliency value of energy assets and portfolios. Stem's solutions cater to a diverse customer base including utilities, project developers, and asset owners in the clean energy industry. Stem was formerly known as Powergetics. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Apptegy
cb_description: Apptegy is a technology company focused on the education sector. It provides digital marketing tools for K-12 schools, including custom apps, websites, and communication tools that help schools build their brand and reach their audience. The company primarily serves the education industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Little Rock, Arkansas.

name: Vannevar Labs
cb_description: Vannevar Labs focuses on defense technology and strategic competition within the national security and defense sectors. The company develops software and hardware to support non-kinetic and intelligence missions, including new intelligence collection methods, maritime domain awareness, and tools to counter foreign disinformation campaigns. Vannevar Labs primarily serves sectors related to national security and defense. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Gotrade
cb_description: Gotrade is a financial services company that specializes in fractional share investing. The company offers a platform where investors can buy fractions of shares in major companies with a minimum investment of just $1. Gotrade and its partners are regulated, providing a secure environment for users to invest in the US stock market. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Meter Feeder
cb_description: Meter Feeder operates as a payment service provider for parking facilities. The company provides low-cost payment and enforcement solutions for small to mid-sized governments. It primarily serves the payment industry. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Datamaran
cb_description: Datamaran focuses on providing AI-driven analytics for the ESG landscape within the business intelligence sector. The company offers a platform that transforms vast amounts of data into actionable insights for business leaders to identify, prioritize, and monitor material ESG issues and risks. Datamaran primarily serves the needs of corporate clients looking to integrate ESG considerations into their strategic decision-making processes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London,United Kingdom.

name: Zippia
cb_description: Zippia operates as a career-focused company. It provides services such as job matching, career advice, and company insights, aiming to help job seekers find the right job for their career goals. It primarily serves individuals seeking employment across various sectors of the economy. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Ambience
cb_description: Ambience is a company that specializes in the development of an AI operating system for the healthcare sector. Their main offerings include automation of clinical documentation, integration with electronic health records (EHR), and tools to support clinical decision-making and efficiency. The company's products are designed to reduce clinician burnout, ensure coding and documentation compliance, and enhance the quality of patient care. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Keeper Security
cb_description: Keeper Security specializes in cybersecurity solutions within the information technology sector. The company offers a suite of products designed to manage passwords, protect sensitive information, and secure remote connections without the need for a VPN. Keeper Security's solutions cater to a diverse clientele, including businesses, managed service providers, public sector entities, and individual users. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Red Rover
cb_description: Red Rover is a startup incubator and consultancy within the business services industry. The company provides guidance and support to new businesses to help them grow and succeed. Its consultancy services offer strategic advice and practical solutions to organizational challenges. It was founded in 2008 and is based in United States.

name: Noodle
cb_description: Noodle provides a financial platform serving the creator economy, focusing on management, payments, and credit services. It provides a suite of tools for businesses and creators to streamline payment processes, access advanced revenue, and manage financial operations efficiently. Its solutions cater to various sectors within the creator economy, including YouTube channels, marketing agencies, and independent creators. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Dailymealz
cb_description: Dailymealz is a company focused on providing meal subscription services within the food industry. It offers a variety of meal packages that are delivered daily from a selection of over 200 restaurants, with options for healthy, keto, weight loss, and mixed diets, complete with detailed nutritional information for each meal. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Topography Health
cb_description: Topography Health is a company focused on reinventing clinical research within the healthcare sector. They offer a platform that facilitates clinical trials by providing cutting-edge technology and tailored staffing services to scale research efforts, aiming to unlock new therapies and revenue sources for organizations. Topography Health primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a focus on physicians, life sciences companies, and patients. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Reprise
cb_description: Operator of an Accounts Receivable Management (ARM) holding company. The company was formed to acquire ARM service providers. It plans to grow the businesses through acquisitions and organic growth.

name: NuBrakes
cb_description: NuBrakes is a tech-enabled mobile auto repair company operating in the automotive service industry. The company primarily offers convenient and affordable brake repair services, delivering these services directly to the customer's location. This eliminates the need for customers to spend time at an auto repair shop. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Galileo AI
cb_description: Galileo AI specializes in the application of generative AI for the creation of user interfaces within the tech industry. The company's technology enables the transformation of natural language descriptions into UI designs. This innovation serves to streamline the UI design workflow, making it accessible to a broader range of creators. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Mend
cb_description:
Mend develops a self-care application designed to offer mental health and wellness. The company offers online programs designed to help individuals recover from heartbreak and burnout, using tools from psychology, mindfulness, coaching, nutrition, and science-backed research. It primarily serves the health and wellness sector. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.
.

name: Pandas
cb_description: Pandas provides a business-to-business platform offering a variety of products. It operates as an e-commerce platform connecting small businesses directly with Asian manufacturers. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Abstra
cb_description: Abstra is a leading independent video content producer on Polish YouTube. The company specializes in creating a variety of comedy and entertainment video series, as well as educational content related to economics and finance. Abstra collaborates with consumer brands to offer dedicated episodes, product placements, partner channels, advertising campaigns, influencer campaigns, ambassadorships, and consumer activations. It is based in Poland.

name: Ziroom
cb_description: Ziroom is a professional O2O company specializing in housing asset management services within the real estate sector. The company offers a range of services including co-living spaces, full apartment rentals, and smart home solutions, as well as property management services for homeowners. Ziroom primarily serves the urban residential rental market, catering to both property owners and tenants seeking quality long-term accommodations. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: Acesion Pharma
cb_description: Acesion Pharma focuses on the healthcare sector. The company's main service is the development of drugs for the treatment of atrial fibrillation, a common type of cardiac arrhythmia. These drugs work by inhibiting the SK ion channel, a novel approach aimed at regulating cardiac rhythm. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Kanmon
cb_description: Kanmon specializes in providing embedded lending solutions within the financial services sector. The company offers a range of financial products including term loans, lines of credit, invoice financing, and trade financing, designed to integrate seamlessly with clients' existing platforms. Kanmon primarily serves industry-specific software platforms, enabling them to extend their core offerings with tailored financial services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Audette
cb_description: Audette is a decarbonization planning platform specializing in the commercial real estate sector. The company offers a technology-driven solution for asset managers to create budget-ready, property-level net zero carbon plans without the need for traditional energy audits. Audette's services cater primarily to the commercial real estate industry, providing tools for energy efficiency measures, carbon footprint reduction, and financial analysis. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Victoria, British Columbia.

name: Tonkean
cb_description: Tonkean specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) enabled business process automation solutions. The company offers solutions that allow internal teams such as legal and procurement to build and automate processes, with a focus on improving efficiency, compliance, and adoption. Its processes include procurement lifecycle orchestration and legal matter management, among others. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Fable Food
cb_description: Fable Food focuses on creating sustainable and healthy food alternatives, operating within the food industry. The company's main offerings include food products that are crafted from shiitake mushrooms, providing a meaty flavor and texture without the use of actual meat. Fable Food primarily sells to the restaurant and retail sectors, offering plant-based options for menus and home cooking. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sunshine Coast, Australia.

name: Avalo
cb_description: Avalo is a technology company focused on advancing natural crop evolution through artificial intelligence. Their AI-based platform interprets large datasets to identify genes that enhance crop traits such as taste, production ease, and resilience, and recommends crossbreeding strategies for improved agricultural outcomes. Avalo primarily serves the agricultural sector by providing solutions for predictive breeding and crop diversity to adapt to changing climates. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Ola
cb_description: Ola is a privacy-focused blockchain platform specializing in Layer 2 scaling solutions. The company offers a ZKVM (Zero-Knowledge Virtual Machine) that enables the deployment and use of decentralized applications with customizable privacy levels, as well as a developer-friendly environment for smart contract creation. Ola primarily caters to the blockchain and decentralized application industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Delaware, United States.

name: ThinkIQ
cb_description: ThinkIQ focuses on digital manufacturing transformation. The company offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform to provide material traceability and insights to improve yield, quality, safety, compliance, and brand confidence. It primarily serves the manufacturing industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Aliso Viejo, California.

name: Mercu
cb_description: Mercu is a chat-based workforce management platform. The company's platform helps forward-thinking businesses onboards, train, and engages employees via the chat apps they already use. The company specializes in learning and development, microlearning, and retention. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: UXUY
cb_description: UXUY operates as a decentralized multi-chain trading platform operating within the cryptocurrency domain. The company offers a secure non-custodial wallet that utilizes multi-party computation technology to facilitate keyless signing and seedless recovery, aiming to provide security and convenience for cryptocurrency transactions. Its platform is designed to support cross-chain transactions, promoting interoperability and equity in the digital asset ecosystem. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Singapore.

name: Footprint
cb_description: Footprint is a company that focuses on the invention of technology, operating within the sectors of energy, computing, and decentralization. The company's main offerings involve the development of innovative solutions in these areas, with a particular emphasis on research and development. It is based in Walnut, California.

name: Ovation
cb_description: Ovation is a company that focuses on providing guest feedback solutions in the restaurant industry. Its main service involves offering a platform for conducting two-question, SMS-based surveys that allow restaurants to gather real-time feedback from their customers. This feedback can then be used to improve customer retention, increase positive reviews, and drive revenue. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Mapleton, Utah.

name: Reema Health
cb_description: Reema is an AI messaging platform that supports Medicaid members in getting the care they need. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Mihup
cb_description: Mihup is a company focused on enhancing contact center performance through its conversation intelligence platform within the AI technology sector. The company offers real-time AI assistance, speech analytics, and automated virtual agent services to improve operational efficiency and customer experience. Mihup's solutions cater to various sectors including banking, insurance, fintech, healthcare, and travel. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kolkata, India.

name: Veryfi
cb_description: Veryfi is a company that specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) and data extraction, operating within the technology and financial sectors. The company offers services such as document capture and data extraction, primarily focusing on financial documents like invoices, bills, purchase orders, checks, and receipts. Its main customer segments include fintech companies, consumer packaged goods (CPG) brands, and enterprise accounts payable teams. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: RentRedi
cb_description: RentRedi is a company that specializes in providing all-in-one property management software for landlords. Their software offers a suite of services including rent collection, tenant screening, maintenance management, and lease e-signing, all designed to streamline the rental management process. RentRedi's platform is tailored to serve the needs of the real estate tech industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Latham, New York.

name: BalkanID
cb_description: BalkanID is a company specializing in intelligent identity security and lifecycle management within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a platform that automates access onboarding, certification, and off-boarding activities, while also prioritizing and remediating risks associated with entitlement sprawl. BalkanID primarily serves sectors that require robust identity governance and administration, such as security, governance, risk management, and compliance (GRC), and IT departments. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Upstash
cb_description: Upstash focuses on providing serverless data solutions in the technology industry. The company offers a serverless data platform that includes a serverless database with Redis API, serverless Kafka, connectors, and messaging for the serverless. These services are designed to manage data for businesses, enabling access from serverless and edge functions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Fero
cb_description: Fero specializes in business process automation within the logistics sector, focusing on streamlining operations and enhancing efficiency. The company offers a suite of products that leverage machine learning, artificial intelligence, and robotic process automation to automate logistics operations, manage pricing, and handle contracts. These solutions cater to various stakeholders in the logistics industry, including third-party logistics providers, manufacturers, and freight forwarders. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Stork Club
cb_description: Stork Club is a company that focuses on providing inclusive family-building benefits in the healthcare industry. The company offers a range of services that support individuals through various stages of their reproductive journey, including fertility, maternity, newborn care, return to work, and menopause. Stork Club primarily sells to employers, offering solutions that help attract and retain talent while reducing overall fertility and maternity costs. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: StrongDM
cb_description: StrongDM provides an access management platform. It offers solutions such as privileged session management, permissions management, privileged credential management, and more. It enforces and provides access to databases and helps in preventing data leaks. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Burlingame, California.

name: Gebeya
cb_description: Gebeya is a talent marketplace focusing on showcasing and connecting the workforce with startups and corporations. It offers microloans, work opportunities, mentorship, coaching, upskilling, and certification for freelancers. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

name: Vessel
cb_description: Vessel is a short-form online-video subscription service that allows users to get early access to the best web series, music videos, and TV segments.

name: OncoRes Medical
cb_description: OncoRes Medical develops intraoperative imaging technology. The company's main product is a tool that translates the surgeon's sense of touch into a microscale image, aiming to improve surgical accuracy and reduce complication rates. OncoRes Medical primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly in the area of surgical procedures. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Nedlands, Australia.

name: Cowbell Cyber
cb_description: Cowbell Cyber specializes in providing cyber insurance solutions within the insurance industry. The company offers cyber coverage tailored to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), utilizing artificial intelligence for continuous risk assessment and underwriting. Cowbell Cyber's products are designed to assist businesses in managing cyber risks through a closed-loop approach, including risk prevention, mitigation, and incident response services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Pleasanton, California.

name: StockX
cb_description: StockX provides a platform focused on the retail industry, particularly in the realm of fashion, collectibles, and electronics. Its services include providing a marketplace for buying and selling items such as sneakers, streetwear, trading cards, handbags, and watches. It primarily caters to consumers who are interested in hard-to-find fashion items and collectibles. StockX was formerly known as Campless. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: Okra
cb_description: Okra is an open finance company operating in the financial technology sector. The company provides businesses with secure access to financial data and payments through a single integration, enabling them to build innovative financial solutions. Okra's services are primarily utilized by businesses in the financial technology industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Epsilon3
cb_description: Epsilon3 operates as a software company specializing in solutions for engineering, testing, and operations within highly regulated industries. The company offers a web-based platform that facilitates the planning, execution, and analysis of mission-critical procedures, as well as the management of parts, inventory, and compliance. Epsilon3 primarily serves sectors such as aerospace, energy, robotics, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Harness
cb_description: Harness focuses on the software delivery market. The company offers an intelligent software delivery platform that enables engineers to deliver software more efficiently and with higher quality. This platform includes services such as continuous integration, continuous delivery, feature flags, cloud cost management, service reliability management, security testing orchestration, and chaos engineering. The company primarily sells to sectors that are accelerating their cloud initiatives and adopting containers and orchestration tools. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Agile Analog
cb_description: Agile Analog specializes in the customization of analog IP for various semiconductor applications across multiple sectors. The company offers a range of products including data conversion, power management, IC monitoring, security, and always-on functionalities, all tailored to meet specific customer needs. Agile Analog primarily serves sectors such as automotive, defense, high-performance computing & data centers, IoT security, and RISC-V technology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, England.

name: Niantic
cb_description: Niantic develops augmented reality (AR) technology. The company's main offerings include AR games and applications that encourage exploration of the physical world. It primarily serves the gaming and application development sectors. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SariSuki
cb_description: SariSuki is a community selling platform focused on the grocery retail industry. The company offers a service where local community leaders, known as Ka-Saris, deliver fresh groceries and everyday essentials to their neighborhoods. SariSuki primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Quezon City, Philippines.

name: Caju
cb_description: Caju is a technology company specializing in integrated solutions for corporate benefits management. Their offerings include a multi-benefit card, expense management, employee rewards, and a platform for HR operational efficiency. Caju primarily serves businesses looking to streamline their benefits and rewards programs for employees. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Nourish
cb_description: Nourish offers a telehealth platform. It provides access to nutritional counseling from registered dietitians. It helps to connect with a registered dietitian via telehealth and makes to pay using health insurance. The platform offers solutions for diseases such as anorexia, autoimmune conditions, binge eating, bulimia, cancer, diabetes, and more. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Clarapath
cb_description: Clarapath specializes in automating histopathology labs within the medical robotics sector. Its flagship product, SectionStar, is an automated, all-in-one tissue sectioning and transfer system designed to enhance capacity, reliability, and consistency in lab operations. Clarapath also offers CLIA-certified lab services for routine to complex anatomic pathology cases, catering to a range of preclinical to clinical use cases. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Hawthorne, New York.

name: Lessonly
cb_description: Lessonly delivers an enterprise educational platform providing training services online. It delivers a training, coaching, and enablement educational solution that delivers effective feedback for improvements. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana. In August 2021, Lessonly was acquired by Seismic.

name: Fello
cb_description: Fello is a mobile carrier provider that operates throughout Sweden.

name: GoCardless
cb_description: GoCardless specializes in online payment processing solutions. The company offers services to facilitate direct bank payments, including instant one-off payments, automated recurring payments, and access to bank account data for businesses. GoCardless primarily serves businesses looking to streamline their payment collection and reconciliation processes. It was founded in 2011 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Covr Financial Technologies
cb_description: Covr Financial Technologies focuses on simplifying insurance through digital platforms. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI)- guided insurance platforms for consumers and financial advisors, providing services such as digital life, long-term care, disability, and specialty insurance sales. The platforms allow users to compare and choose from competitive rates from multiple carriers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boise, Idaho.

name: Yoco
cb_description: Yoco develops a financial platform for small businesses. It offers tools to accept digital payments at both point-of-sale and online through intelligent software and grow through cash advances. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Vitally
cb_description: Vitally is a customer success platform designed for B2B SaaS companies, focusing on maximizing productivity and effectiveness in customer success operations. The platform offers tools for integrating customer data, automating workflows, and providing actionable insights to drive business growth. Vitally primarily serves customer success teams within the B2B SaaS sector, offering solutions to enhance customer experiences and streamline internal processes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Trifecta
cb_description:
Trifecta designs and develops both live and online training for hundreds of clinical trials worldwide, decreasing time for site readiness, accelerating enrollment and improving communication between sponsors, sites and CROs.

On December 3, 2020 Trifecta was acquired by WIRB-Copernicus Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: ReFrame
cb_description: ReFrame is a non-profit organization focused on advancing inclusive representation in the entertainment industry, particularly in film, TV, and media. It offers research, programs, and partnerships with various entities in the entertainment sector to promote diversity. The organization collaborates with studios, networks, agencies, and production companies to foster an inclusive environment. It is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Numida
cb_description: Numida is a financial services company that specializes in providing unsecured business loans to micro businesses. The company offers a mobile platform where entrepreneurs can apply for and receive working capital loans within 24 hours, streamlining the lending process for quick and convenient access to funds. Numida primarily serves the financial needs of micro businesses seeking to grow and expand their operations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kampala, Uganda.

name: o9 Solutions
cb_description: o9 Solutions develops an artificial intelligence-powered business planning platform. The company features graph-based enterprise modeling, big data analytics, advanced algorithms for scenario planning, collaborative portals, interfaces, and cloud-based delivery. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: Liquid AI
cb_description: Liquid AI focuses on the development of general-purpose artificial intelligence systems operating within the technology and AI industries. The company's main offerings include AI systems that can process multimodal data such as language, signals, and vision and are designed to reason, plan, and communicate their decision-making process in a manner aligned with human values. These systems are primarily targeted at sectors that require efficient and adaptable AI solutions. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Brookline, Massachusetts.

name: Leyden Labs
cb_description: Leyden Labs operates as a biotechnology company focusing on the development of products to protect against known and new respiratory viruses. Its main offerings include nasal sprays containing antibodies that target respiratory viruses in the nasal mucosa. It primarily sells to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Leiden, Netherlands.

name: TENET
cb_description: TENET is a technology startup focused on the digital transformation of the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. The company offers support for online medical consultations and develops digital therapeutics, leveraging AI and custom software solutions to extend healthy lifespans and improve patient well-being. TENET primarily serves the healthcare sector with a mission to enable a century of healthy living through technology. It is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Openprise
cb_description: Openprise is a company focused on Revenue Operations Data Automation within the technology sector. The company offers a no-code RevOps Data Automation Cloud that enables users to automate and orchestrate data across various business functions, ensuring data quality, enrichment, deduplication, and governance. Openprise primarily serves sectors that require marketing and sales operations automation, data management, and CRM integration. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Huspy
cb_description: Huspy is a company focused on providing home financing solutions and real estate services. It offers mortgage advisory, property buying and selling assistance, and rental listings, along with tools for mortgage calculation and online pre-approval. Huspy primarily serves individuals and families looking to buy, sell, or finance their homes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: GrAI Matter Labs
cb_description: GrAI Matter Labs develops programmable neuromorphic computing chips to bring sensor analytics and machine learning to every device on the edge. Its technology utilizes brain-inspired neural network architecture to overcome the limitations of traditional Von Neumann machines and application processors as well as offers multi-modal sensor analytics and machine learning at low power levels. The company was formerly known as Brainiac. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France. In October 2023, GrAI Matter Labs was acquired by Snap.

name: Opal
cb_description: Opal specializes in fitness technology, focusing on workout optimization and injury prevention. The company offers a unique thin film sensor product that collects data from sweat to provide insights into muscle fatigue, aerobic to anaerobic transitions, and hydration levels. Opal's products are designed for individuals seeking to enhance their workout experience through data-driven insights. It is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: ALE
cb_description: ALE is a company that focuses on space entertainment and atmospheric data collection. The company's main offerings include creating artificial meteor showers for entertainment purposes and collecting atmospheric data to contribute to the understanding of climate change. ALE primarily serves the entertainment and scientific research sectors. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: LightUp
cb_description: LightUp makes educational electronic kits.  The company provides electronic building blocks with optically recognizable codes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Stepful
cb_description: Stepful focuses on online training for healthcare careers, providing educational programs in the healthcare industry. The company offers online courses and hands-on clinical experience to prepare individuals for certifications as medical assistants, pharmacy technicians, and other healthcare roles. Stepful primarily serves individuals seeking to enter or advance in the healthcare sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: SPARK Schools
cb_description: SPARK Schools is a network of private schools focused on providing affordable, globally competitive education. The schools offer a personalized learning path for students, integrating academic rigor with social-emotional development. SPARK Schools primarily serves the education sector, catering to families seeking quality education options. It is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.

name: Figure
cb_description: Figure is an AI robotics company that focuses on developing general-purpose humanoid robots. Its main product, Figure 01, is a commercially viable autonomous humanoid robot designed to perform a variety of tasks across multiple industries, combining human-like dexterity with advanced artificial intelligence. Its humanoid robots are engineered to support sectors such as manufacturing, logistics, warehousing, and retail. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: NovoNutrients
cb_description: NovoNutrients is a biotechnology company focused on producing alternative protein by capturing carbon emissions. The company's main offerings include a fermentation platform that transforms emissions into single cell protein ingredients for food and feed, using a process that requires minimal water and no arable land. NovoNutrients primarily serves the food, pet food, and aquaculture feed industries with its sustainable protein production technology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Gamestream
cb_description: Gamestream provides a cloud gaming technology platform for the gaming experience. The company offers a white-label cloud gaming service that includes streaming technology, a games catalog, and a web. It caters to sectors including hospitality, telecommunications, and healthcare, delivering gaming content. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Rentable
cb_description: Rentable is a website builder and booking system for vacation rentals. It allows owners to create a beatiful site for their property and take booking online.

name: Eden Life
cb_description: Eden Life provides busy city workers with a digital room service platform. It connects users with a variety of service providers that offer services including laundry, cooking, and cleaning. The company provides an operating system for receiving and rendering essential services in Africa. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: OKY
cb_description: OKY is a technology company that operates in the digital economy and retail sectors. The company's main service is a digital platform that allows users to send prepaid vouchers for goods and services to their friends and family. These vouchers can be redeemed at over 15,000 physical stores across six countries, representing 600 brands. The company primarily sells to the immigrant community, connecting families and enabling efficient value transfer across borders. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Upside
cb_description: Upside provides financial advisor software. It helps registered investment advisors beat the "robo-advisors" by leveraging technology and algorithms to advise, manage, and service clients who want next-generation investment services. The company's automated managed account platform uses technology and algorithms to advise, manage, and service clients who want next-generation investment services from their investment advisors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California. On February 2015, Upside was acquired by Envestnet.

name: Expressable
cb_description: Expressable provides online speech therapy solutions in healthcare and education.
