The company offers live, one-on-one online sessions with experienced speech therapists, along with weekly practice activities and support, to help individuals of all ages improve their communication skills. It primarily serves individuals and families seeking speech therapy solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: BeamUp
cb_description: BeamUp develops an artificial intelligence (AI) enabled company operating in facility intelligence. The company offers a platform that provides full facility observability and insights, leveraging unified, aggregated facility data and AI to empower physical security, information technology (IT), and facilities management teams to make data-driven decisions. BeamUp serves large-scale organizations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: everdrop
cb_description: Everdrop specializes in sustainable household products and operates in the eco-friendly consumer goods sector. The company offers a range of refillable cleaning solutions, eco-friendly laundry detergents, and plastic-free dishwasher tabs, designed to minimize environmental impact and reduce the use of single-use plastics and unnecessary chemicals. Everdrop primarily serves environmentally conscious consumers looking to reduce their ecological footprint. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Wingly
cb_description: Wingly operates as a flight sharing platform connecting private pilots with passengers. The company offers a range of services including booking sightseeing flights, day trips, and aviation adventures with verified pilots and commercial operators. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: LabGenius
cb_description: LabGenius serves as a biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery of medicines through the integration of machine learning, synthetic biology, and robotic automation. The company's main offerings include the development of next-generation therapeutic antibodies using a smart robotic platform, EVA, which designs and learns from its own experiments to improve the drug discovery process. LabGenius primarily serves sectors involved in the treatment of cancer and inflammatory diseases. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Propel
cb_description: Propel is a company focused on employee well-being through its customizable digital platforms within the corporate wellness industry. The company offers a comprehensive well-being program platform that includes a mobile-optimized portal, program tracking, incentive management, and engagement strategies to foster healthy living within organizations. Propel primarily serves various sectors including global banking, hospitality, utilities, and sports & entertainment industries. It was founded in 2002 and is based in Brentwood, Tennessee.

name: 3DLOOK
cb_description: 3DLOOK specializes in artificial intelligence(AI)-the first mobile body scanning and virtual fit solutions within the apparel and technology sectors. The company offers a suite of products including a body scanning platform for accurate three-dimensional(3D) model generation and measurement capture and an AI-powered virtual fitting room to enhance the online shopping experience. 3DLOOK primarily serves sectors that require accurate human body measurements for personalized fit solutions, such as fashion and uniform apparel, health and wellness, and other related industries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Empowerly
cb_description: Empowerly focuses on education technology in the college admissions guidance sector. The company provides a platform that uses algorithms and human expertise to match students with counselors for college preparation and application assistance. It also provides various programs such as AI scholar programs, research scholar programs, test prep programs, and more. Empowerly was formerly known as Synocate. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Demostack
cb_description: Demostack focuses on providing a demo experience platform in the software as a service (SaaS) industry. The company's main service involves helping SaaS go-to-market teams create custom demo assets quickly, showcase their products effectively, and measure the impact of their demos on deals. It primarily caters to the software industry, particularly SaaS companies. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SideQuest
cb_description: SideQuest specializes in the early access distribution of virtual reality content, operating within the VR developer ecosystem. The company offers a platform for Oculus Quest games and apps, including App Lab games, providing developers with tools and services to build a community and gather feedback during development. SideQuest primarily serves the virtual reality gaming industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: Fairtility
cb_description: Fairtility is a company focused on the intersection of artificial intelligence and fertility, operating within the healthcare and technology sectors. The company offers a transparent AI-based decision support system, CHLOE, which aids IVF professionals by providing visibility into clinical and laboratory parameters, aiming to improve the outcomes of IVF care. Fairtility primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically fertility clinics. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Syncly
cb_description: Syncly specializes in AI-driven customer feedback analysis within the customer success and operations sectors. The company offers solutions for categorizing customer feedback, identifying negative trends, and providing actionable insights to enhance customer experience. Syncly primarily serves the customer success and operations sectors with its feedback analysis and trend monitoring tools. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Improvado
cb_description: Improvado is a company that focuses on automating marketing reporting and analytics in the marketing and sales industry. The company offers services that streamline inefficient spreadsheet analytics, connect data across various marketing and sales platforms, and visualize data in insightful dashboards, enabling informed budget decisions and increased ROI of marketing efforts. It primarily sells to the marketing and sales sectors of the economy. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Orkes
cb_description: Orkes focuses on microservices orchestration in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies the development and scaling of distributed workflows, microservices, and events. It primarily serves the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cupertino, California.

name: Cognata
cb_description: Cognata operates as a technology company specializing in the domain of autonomous vehicles and advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS). The company offers a simulation platform for autonomous vehicles, providing virtual environments that mimic real-world conditions for the purpose of training, testing, and validating automated driving technologies. Cognata's services are primarily utilized in sectors such as autonomous vehicles, defense, smart cities, agriculture, construction and mining, and warehouse operations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Rehovot, Israel.

name: Shiru
cb_description: Shiru operates in the food and biotechnology industry. The company uses artificial intelligence (AI), bioinformatics, and precision biology to discover and produce sustainable ingredients. Its ingredients, which are designed to exceed the performance of conventional alternatives, are primarily used in the food industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: Thrive Bioscience
cb_description: Thrive Bioscience is a company focused on the development of automated imaging and analytics technology in the biotechnology sector. The company offers instruments and software that enable automated live cell imaging and analytics, providing insights into cell behavior and advancing research and drug discovery. Thrive Bioscience primarily serves sectors such as drug discovery, drug development, in vitro fertilization, regenerative medicine, basic research, and infectious disease research. It is based in Wakefield, Massachusetts.

name: Wallarm
cb_description: Wallarm provides an application security platform. It combines an active threat verification engine and applies machine learning to traffic to adaptively generate security rules and verify the impact of malicious payloads. The company serves healthcare, financial technology, e-commerce, and technology companies. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Nym
cb_description: Nym specializes in privacy infrastructure within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a mixnet that anonymizes internet traffic by protecting communication patterns, internet protocol (IP) addresses, and metadata. Nym's services are utilized by end-users, enterprise clients, and infrastructure operators seeking to safeguard their digital communications from surveillance and unauthorized data collection. Nym was formerly known as SMG. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Neuchatel, Switzerland.

name: Varthana
cb_description: Varthana focuses on providing financial solutions and support to the education sector, specifically targeting private schools and students in India. The company offers a range of products including school loans for infrastructure and expansion, student loans for higher education and skill development, and various educational support services such as digital classroom solutions and school management systems. Varthana's financial products are designed to be flexible and collateral-free, catering to the needs of private schools and students seeking to enhance their educational opportunities. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Arado
cb_description: Arado is a company focused on providing supply chain and business solutions within the agricultural sector. It offers a platform that connects small and medium-sized farmers with food service and retail sectors, facilitating direct sales and providing end-to-end operational support. The company primarily serves the food service industry and retail businesses seeking fresh produce. Arado was formerly known as Clicampo. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Foursquare
cb_description: Foursquare is a company in the geospatial technology sector, focusing on location intelligence. The company offers a cloud-based platform that helps businesses understand locations and human mobility, enabling them to make smarter decisions and create more engaging customer experiences. Foursquare's services are primarily used by enterprises across various sectors to derive value from location intelligence. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Hashdex
cb_description: Hashdex is a company focused on crypto asset management within the financial services industry. Its main offerings include crypto index ETFs and investment solutions that provide access to digital assets through regulated products. Hashdex primarily serves innovative investors looking to allocate resources in the emerging crypto economy. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: Panorays
cb_description: Panorays develops third-party security risk management. The company offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform that manages the entire process from inherent to residual risk, remediation, and ongoing monitoring. It serves automated, dynamic security questionnaires, external attack surface evaluations, and business context to provide organizations with a rapid, accurate view of supplier cyber risk. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Northstar
cb_description: Northstar is a global research agency focused on innovation and product strategy within the market research industry. The company specializes in creating innovation opportunities, understanding target customers, developing innovation concepts, and crafting product launch strategies to maximize willingness-to-pay. Northstar primarily serves sectors that require in-depth market insights and strategic planning, such as consumer goods, automotive, and public transportation. It is based in London, England.

name: Daylight
cb_description: In May 2023, Daylight ceased its operations. Daylight provides a digital banking platform for LGBT (Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender) community. It helps users to navigate the finance system, generate saving habits and connect with the LGBT community. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Pawp
cb_description: Pawp provides pet wellness advice with the help of industry professionals. It empowers and enables, present and future pet parents, to give the best possible care to their pets, by offering insights and personalized recommendations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Monte Carlo
cb_description: Monte Carlo provides a data observability platform that detects, resolves and prevents data downtime, providing visibility and interoperability between data tools. Monte Carlo primarily serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare and life sciences, technology, advertising, media, and entertainment. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Arbolus
cb_description: Arbolus is a technology company that focuses on knowledge sharing in the consulting and investment sectors. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence to help investors and consultants gather insights from industry professionals in a time-efficient manner. The platform primarily serves the investment and consulting industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Gopuff
cb_description: Gopuff operates an instant commerce delivery platform for foods and beverages. The company also provides an application that allows customers to choose from the products such as alcohol delivery service, over-the-counter medications, groceries, snacks, drinks, and more. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Omeat
cb_description: Omeat specializes in the production of cultivated meat using cell-based technology in the food industry. The company offers real meat grown from cells without the need for animal sacrifice, aiming to provide a product with all the benefits of conventional meat but with less saturated fat and free from GMOs, antibiotics, or hormones. Omeat's proprietary process utilizes cow plasma to foster cell growth, creating a sustainable and ethical meat alternative. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Frontify
cb_description: Frontify is a brand management platform that specializes in consolidating brand assets and guidelines. The company offers a suite of tools for creating and maintaining digital brand guidelines, managing digital assets, and producing digital and print templates. Frontify's solutions are designed to enhance brand consistency and facilitate collaboration among brand teams, marketing professionals, designers, and developers. It was founded in 2013 and is based in St. Gallen, Switzerland.

name: Rivanna Medical
cb_description: Rivanna Medical runs a company focusing on the development and commercialization of imaging-based medical technologies. The company's main offerings include systems to improve the safety, speed, and efficiency of epidural and spinal anesthesia by providing enhanced bone visualization and automatic spinal landmark detection. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Charlottesville, Virginia.

name: Areteia Therapeutics
cb_description: Areteia Therapeutics is a biotechnology company focused on developing treatments for respiratory diseases, specifically eosinophilic asthma. The company's main product is dexpramipexole, an investigational oral medication designed to inhibit the maturation of eosinophils and reduce inflammation in the airways. Areteia Therapeutics primarily serves patients with severe eosinophilic asthma who have limited treatment options. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Chapel Hill, North Carolina.

name: EmCasa
cb_description: EmCasa focuses on the real estate industry. The company offers comprehensive services for buying and selling homes and apartments, including property search, financial assistance, and legal support. It primarily serves the real estate industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: Ready Player Me
cb_description: Ready Player Me provides avatar creation technology. The company offers a platform that allows developers to integrate a character creator into their games and applications, providing users with the ability to create personalized game characters. It is primarily used by developers in the gaming and application development sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Rei do Pitaco
cb_description: Rei do Pitaco operates a fantasy sports platform. It allows users to build teams by selecting players of their choice and winning cash prizes. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Mudafy
cb_description: Mudafy is a tech-enabled real estate broker operating in the real estate industry. The company facilitates the buying and selling of homes through an online platform, offering property listings and advisory services. Mudafy primarily serves the real estate market with a significant presence in Mexico and Argentina. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Anrok
cb_description: Anrok serves as a modern sales tax solution specializing in the SaaS industry. The company offers automated sales tax compliance, real-time tax calculation, and global VAT and GST management services, integrating with a business's financial stack. Anrok primarily serves the software industry, providing tools to monitor tax liability, automate tax registration and filing, and manage nexus tracking. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Aspen Neuroscience
cb_description: Aspen Neuroscience operates as a company focused on stem cell biology and genomics within the healthcare and biotechnology industry. The company's main service is providing personalized cell therapy, specifically autologous induced pluripotent stem cell-derived neuron replacement therapy, aimed at treating Parkinson's disease. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: VComply
cb_description: VComply specializes in governance, risk management, and compliance (GRC) within various business sectors. The company offers a cloud-based platform that enables organizations to manage compliance, assess and mitigate risks, automate policy management, and streamline audit processes. VComply's platform is designed to support industries such as financial services, healthcare, higher education, and more, providing tailored solutions to meet specific regulatory and compliance needs. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Krista Software
cb_description: Krista Software operates as an intelligent automation platform. The company's platform combines process automation, application building, conversational artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning, and a natural language processing (NLP)-based integration platform as a service (iPaaS) to optimize business outcomes. It primarily serves sectors such as banking and financial services, healthcare, information technology, insurance, manufacturing, and the public sector. It was formerly known as SyncApp. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: Grow Therapy
cb_description: Grow Therapy focuses on bridging the gap between therapists and individuals seeking mental health care, operating within the healthcare sector. The company offers services that enable clients to find and book therapy sessions that are covered by insurance, both online and in-person, and provides therapists with credentialing, referrals, administrative, and community support. Grow Therapy primarily serves individuals seeking mental health services and therapists looking to grow their private practices. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Mach Industries
cb_description: Mach Industries provides defense systems technology that creates a hardware solution using field-sourced hydrogen creation and techniques. It is based in Huntington Beach, California.

name: Rokid
cb_description: Rokid specializes in Augmented Reality (AR) products and services within the consumer and industrial sectors. It offers AR glasses designed for entertainment, virtual office work, and industrial applications, including remote collaboration, AI-powered inspections, and digital workflow integration. Rokid's products cater to both individual consumers. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: BioCircuit Technologies
cb_description: BioCircuit Technologies is a medical device company that operates in the healthcare sector, focusing on the development of tools for nerve and tissue repair. The company's main product is a sutureless device for nerve repair, designed to easily connect transected nerves and eliminate the need for microsutures. This product is primarily used in the medical industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Adaptive Shield
cb_description: Adaptive Shield specializes in Software-as-a-service (SaaS) Security Posture Management (SSPM) in cybersecurity. The company offers a platform that enables security teams to manage and control all SaaS and third-party connected applications and manage risks associated with their devices. It provides threat prevention, detection, and response services to ensure SaaS security for organizations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: CAST AI
cb_description: CAST AI develops a cost optimization platform to specialize in reducing cloud expenses for businesses. The company offers services such as automated scaling, provisioning, and monitoring to manage and reduce Kubernetes-related costs. Its platform is designed to provide real-time cost monitoring, workload rightsizing, and container security management to ensure optimal cloud resource utilization and security. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: GovInvest
cb_description: GovInvest is a technology company focused on the public sector. It offers software services for employee labor, compensation, and benefits cost analysis, providing a comprehensive workforce analytics platform. The company primarily serves public sector agencies, helping them prepare for economic, workforce, and policy changes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Algolia
cb_description: Algolia operates as an end-to-end AI search and discovery platform in the technology sector. The company offers a suite of search solutions that leverage natural language processing and vector search technology to deliver relevant search experiences across web, mobile, and voice-enabled devices. Algolia primarily serves sectors such as retail e-commerce, B2B e-commerce, marketplaces, media, and SaaS. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Finix
cb_description: Finix is a supply chain consulting and improvement organization. The company offers services such as identifying areas of process improvement, implementing new systems, optimizing existing software, and managing inventory using lean principles. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It is based in Grand Rapids, Michigan.

name: Protecht
cb_description: Protecht is a provider of embedded insurance technology within the experience economy sector. The company offers a range of protection services for live event tickets, registrations, bookings, and online purchases, ensuring consumers can make transactions with confidence. Protecht primarily serves sectors such as live events, sports, tourism, and e-commerce. Protecht was formerly known as TicketGuardian LLC. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.

name: JusticeText
cb_description: JusticeText is a technology company focused on legal system accountability through the analysis of video evidence. Their main offerings include automated transcription of video evidence, video editing tools, and a centralized platform for storing, analyzing, and sharing video content for legal professionals. The company primarily serves public defense agencies, nonprofit service providers, and private practice criminal defense firms. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: Laika
cb_description: Laika is a free mobile and web application that fosters collaborative adoption. Laika facilitates the homing of abandoned dogs around the world, raises awareness of animal abuse, and educates pet owners on responsible pet ownership.

name: Unravel Carbon
cb_description: Unravel Carbon develops an artificial intelligence-powered decarbonization platform. The company provides a carbon management platform that enables enterprises to measure, reduce, and report their carbon emissions across the entire supply chain. Its services include converting accounting data into full supply chain carbon data, offering detailed emission analytics, and generating climate solutions to facilitate strategic planning and collaboration for a zero-carbon economy. Primarily it serves the environmental service sector. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Mobot
cb_description: Mobot specializes in providing future-proof telephony solutions within the telecommunications sector. The company offers a range of virtual telephony solutions designed to meet the needs of small to large businesses, focusing on ease of use, flexibility, stability, and cost savings. Mobot primarily serves the telecommunications needs of various businesses, from small startups to larger enterprises requiring advanced telephony features. It is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: FRAMEWORK
cb_description: FRAMEWORK operates as a joint venture of leading Canadian design firms Stantec, Merrick and Dialog.

name: Chromatic 3D Materials
cb_description: Chromatic 3D Materials specializes in three-dimensional (3D) printing technology for producing industrial-strength elastomeric products. It offers printable polyurethanes and other thermoset elastomers, utilizing its RX-AM platform for reactive extrusion additive manufacturing without melting, lasers, or post-processing. It serves transportation, industrial seals and gaskets, textiles, medical devices, and defense sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Golden Valley, Minnesota.

name: Enthuse
cb_description: Enthuse offers a way to give fans the ability to connect with favorite sports teams via mobile devices and get rewards for checking into games and snapping photos. Users can drive engagement and strengthen the relationship through identifying & rewarding loyal fans. Whether its real-rewards, virtual benefits, or unique fan experiences, the company's platform empowers users to have a turn-key mobile social loyalty solution in minutes.

name: Crusoe
cb_description: Crusoe focuses on providing climate-aligned digital infrastructure in the cloud computing industry. The company offers computing solutions, including computing and artificial intelligence services. Crusoe primarily serves sectors that require compute-intensive workloads such as AI and high-performance computing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Mekonos
cb_description: Mekonos is a life sciences company focused on developing a proprietary cell-engineering platform for the cell therapy industry. The company's main offering is a platform that enables precise delivery of molecular cargo into cells using a unique chip architecture that aligns single nanoneedles to individually trapped cells. This technology aims to create a future where personalized medicine is more accessible by addressing the limitations of current cell and gene therapy production methods. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: InstaDApp
cb_description: InstaDApp is a company focused on democratizing finance through blockchain technology within the decentralized finance (DeFi) sector. The company offers a suite of tools designed to leverage the full potential of DeFi, making it accessible to a broader audience. These tools include a smart contract wallet for secure transactions, a protocol for DeFi operations, and platforms for governance and developer engagement. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Lewes, Delaware.

name: Havenly
cb_description: Havenly specializes in online interior design and home decorating services. The company offers a platform for virtual collaboration between clients and professional interior designers, including personalized style matching and 3D renderings of designed spaces. Havenly provides tailored design solutions that cater to individual style preferences and budgets, ensuring a unique and accessible experience for decorating various rooms. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Userpilot
cb_description: Userpilot is a product growth platform that specializes in enhancing user engagement and retention for product teams. The company offers a suite of tools for user onboarding, product adoption, customer retention, and in-app support, designed to improve the user experience and drive product growth. Userpilot primarily serves the SaaS industry, providing solutions to help software companies optimize their user journey and increase feature adoption. Userpilot was formerly known as Deepchat.ai. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Zartico
cb_description: Zartico operates in the data science and tourism sectors. It offers a strategic planning solution, known as the Destination Operating System, which provides insights into the movement of people and economic opportunities by harnessing and streamlining big data. It is primarily used by communities and organizations to make data-led decisions that influence the future of their areas. It was formerly known as Entrada Insights. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: ASTRA
cb_description: ASTRA is a cybersecurity company that operates in the technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive suite of security services, including manual and automated penetration testing tools, vulnerability assessment, and proactive threat response. These services are primarily targeted towards businesses in need of robust and continuous security measures. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Le Kremlin-Bicetre, France.

name: Strateos
cb_description: Strateos automates chemistry, biology, and tissue analysis into closed loop robotic labs that accelerate drug discovery programs.

name: Eliyan
cb_description: Eliyan focuses on chipset interconnect technology within the semiconductor industry. The company's main product, NuLink, is a PHY technology that facilitates the creation of super large System-in-Packages (SiPs) using standard packaging. Eliyan's solutions are designed to increase bandwidth and power efficiency for semiconductor applications. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: PhotoRoom
cb_description: PhotoRoom specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) photo editing within the technology and photography sectors. The company offers a suite of tools that enable users to remove and change image backgrounds, retouch photos, and create visual content with ease. PhotoRoom primarily serves businesses in industries such as beauty, clothing, entertainment, furniture, and jewelry, providing solutions for ad asset creation and e-commerce. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Spidersilk
cb_description: Spidersilk is a start-up company focused on eco-friendly polymer materials and processing technology within the adhesive tape manufacturing sector. The company offers high-quality pressure sensitive adhesive tapes and functional products designed to address environmental concerns in the electronics, automotive, and construction markets, utilizing polymer design, polymerization, and eco-friendly processes. Spidersilk's products are tailored to customer needs, featuring unique properties such as multi-layer lamination, UV curing, and optimized particle alignment for enhanced performance. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Gunpo-si, South Korea.

name: Novo
cb_description: Novo operates as a property technology company. It reduces emissions in private real estate. It automates analyzes, plans, and finances energy renovation for real estate. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Hi Marley
cb_description: Hi Marley is a technology company specializing in the property and casualty (P&C) insurance sector, offering an intelligent conversational platform designed to facilitate communication. The company's main product is an SMS-powered platform that streamlines conversations between carriers and policyholders, aiming to improve customer satisfaction and operational efficiency. Hi Marley's platform is tailored for the insurance industry, providing tools for collaboration, coaching, and analytics to enhance the claims process and customer engagement. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Hevo Data
cb_description: Hevo Data is a company focused on providing automated data integration solutions within the data management and analytics industry. The company offers a platform that enables users to set up data pipelines, synchronize data from various sources to warehouses in real-time, and prepare data for analytics without the need for coding. Hevo Data's platform is designed to serve data-driven organizations across various sectors by simplifying data integration and analytics processes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: GridWise
cb_description: GridWise is a technology company focused on providing assistance tools for gig economy workers in the rideshare and delivery sectors. The company offers a mobile application that helps drivers track their earnings, log mileage, and gain insights to improve profitability. GridWise also provides businesses with gig mobility data, advertising opportunities, and partnership options to enhance their services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Roots Automation
cb_description: Roots Automation provides digital coworkers as a service for companies of to support daily operations. Its platform uses robotic process technology to handle tasks for business operations. It serves industries such as insurance, banking and financial services, healthcare, finance and accounting, human resources, and IT. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lilt
cb_description: Lilt focuses on providing artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The company offers services that include AI-powered translation and localization, enabling businesses to deliver multilingual digital customer experiences. Its primary customers are global enterprises across various sectors such as technology, retail, government, and financial services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Emeryville, California.

name: Vial
cb_description: Vial is a biotech company focused on enhancing drug development through computational design and automation in clinical trials. The company offers a computational discovery platform that enables the creation of therapeutics with best-in-class profiles, alongside technology to automate clinical trials for improved precision and efficiency. Vial primarily serves innovative biotech companies seeking to advance their programs into clinical stages with cost-effective and efficient trial processes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: LemonBox
cb_description: LemonBox focuses on personalized nutrition solutions. It offers research-based daily vitamin solutions tailored to individual consumers' needs. The primary market for LemonBox's services is the consumer health sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Stockbit
cb_description: Stockbit is a social platform focused on stock investment and trading in the financial markets. The company offers a suite of tools for real-time stock price tracking, market news, fundamental data analysis, and professional charting, designed to simplify investment decisions for individual investors. Stockbit serves a diverse customer base, including individual retail investors and traders seeking to engage with a community and utilize analytical tools to inform their investment strategies. It was founded in 1990 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

name: DoNotPay
cb_description: DoNotPay is an AI-powered platform focused on consumer advocacy and legal information within the legal tech industry. The company offers a range of self-help tools that assist users in fighting corporations, managing subscriptions, handling financial disputes, and navigating bureaucratic processes without the need for a law firm. DoNotPay primarily serves individuals seeking to resolve consumer issues, protect their privacy, and find financial opportunities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Norfolk, Virginia.

name: MoneyHash
cb_description: MoneyHash develops a payment orchestration and revenue operations platform. The company offers a solution for managing payments, including the ability to manage payment processes, optimize and scale payment infrastructure, and provide a wide range of pay-in and pay-out methods. It primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce, social commerce, gaming, and digital content. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: NiKang Therapeutics
cb_description: NiKang Therapeutics operates as an early-stage biotech company. The company's main focus is on the discovery and development of small-molecule oncology medicines, for patients with medical needs. The primary market of the company is the healthcare industry, specifically the oncology sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: EasyCep
cb_description: EasyCep is a leading provider in the refurbished electronics marketplace, specializing in the sale of renewed electronic devices. The company offers a wide range of products including smartphones, tablets, smartwatches, computers, and televisions, as well as various electronic accessories. EasyCep primarily serves customers looking for refurbished electronics with a focus on quality and sustainability. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Kissterra
cb_description: Kissterra is a technology company with a high-level focus on the insurance industry. The company's main service is developing platforms that harness data to provide solutions for insurers' marketing and distribution needs. Kissterra primarily sells to the insurance industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: HealthVerity
cb_description: HealthVerity specializes in healthcare data synchronization and operates within the healthcare and technology sectors. The company offers a suite of services that enable the integration and management of large-scale healthcare and consumer data, ensuring privacy compliance and governance. HealthVerity's solutions are designed to facilitate the exchange and analysis of data to support healthcare organizations in making data-driven decisions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Bounce
cb_description: Bounce is a provider of indoor recreational activities, specializing in trampoline parks. The company offers a variety of trampoline-based attractions and programs such as freestyle jumping, dodgeball, basketball, and fitness classes. Bounce primarily caters to individuals and groups looking for active entertainment and event hosting services. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Glen Iris, Victoria.

name: Vantage Discovery
cb_description: Vantage Discovery is a generative AI-powered SaaS platform focused on search and discovery capabilities within the e-commerce sector. The company offers AI search, semantic product discovery experiences, and personalized recommendations. Vantage Discovery's solutions cater to retailers to provide AI for better search relevance, user personalization, and scalable search infrastructure. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: TourRadar
cb_description: TourRadar specializes in providing an Organized Adventure Platform for booking multi-day tours and travel packages globally. The company offers a wide selection of organized adventures, connecting travelers and travel agents with over 2,500 operators. TourRadar ensures customer satisfaction through round-the-clock support, flexible booking options, and comprehensive insurance choices. Additionally, the company is dedicated to sustainable travel practices and offers tools for carbon impact assessment and offsetting. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Taxdown
cb_description: Taxdown operates as an online tax management platform. It allows taxpayers to file their taxes from computers and mobile devices. The company's artificial intelligence (AI)-powered platform asks users a series of questions about their income, expenses, and deductions. The platform then uses this information to calculate the user's tax liability. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Embark
cb_description: embark offers step-by-step directions for mass transit on mobile devices. Available on iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S and Android mobile devices, embark provides accurate, detailed and fast trip routes for mass transit riders. embark works both above and underground and automatically alerts riders about any delays so riders can get to destinations as quickly as possible.

name: Alongside
cb_description: Alongside focuses on human resources technology within the recruitment industry. The company offers a software platform that aids in the hiring process, providing features such as messaging, custom templates, smart filters, and collaboration tools to help businesses connect with and select the best candidates. Alongside primarily serves the human resources sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Moncton, Canada.

name: Resourcify
cb_description: Resourcify is a digital platform focused on waste management and circular economy solutions. The company offers a comprehensive system for businesses to digitize and optimize their waste streams, implement take-back and recycling systems, and improve their sustainability practices. Resourcify primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, construction, retail, healthcare, and transportation. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

name: Cirkul
cb_description: Cirkul is a company focused on promoting hydration and environmental sustainability in the consumer goods sector. The company offers a reusable water bottle with cartridge technology that allows consumers to personalize their water with a variety of flavors and enhancements, all with zero calories, no sugar, and no artificial colors. Cirkul primarily sells to individuals seeking a healthier, more enjoyable way to stay hydrated. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sarasota, Florida.

name: RocketLane
cb_description: Rocketlane specializes in customer onboarding and professional services automation within the software industry. The company offers a platform that facilitates project management, customer collaboration, and financial oversight to ensure timely and budget-conscious project delivery. Rocketlane primarily serves sectors such as SaaS, fintech, and marketing industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Covina, California.

name: Strive
cb_description:
Strive is the operator of outpatient addiction recovery clinics with an adaptive schedule that allows patients to remain at work during recovery.

On April 5th, 2021, Strive merged with Forge Health.

name: Neo Medical
cb_description: Neo Medical is a company focused on the development, manufacturing, and distribution of medical equipment, specifically in the vascular access domain. The company offers a range of vascular access devices and accessories, designed to facilitate the delivery of nutrition, blood, antibiotics, and drug therapies for adults, children, and neonatal patients. Neo Medical primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a particular emphasis on neonatal and pediatric care. It is based in Sparks, Nevada.

name: EarlyBird
cb_description: EarlyBird is an early-stage subscription snack service that offers healthy snacks, flavoured teas, art work and even free music downloads.

name: MIDAS
cb_description: MIDAS is a financial technology company specializing in investment advisory services. The company offers simplified investment solutions through expert-designed ETF based portfolios in the US stock market, catering to individual financial goals and risk profiles. MIDAS primarily serves individuals looking to invest in the US stock market, providing them with rebalancing and reoptimization services for their investment portfolios. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Nanopath
cb_description: Nanopath operates as a molecular diagnostics company focused on improving women's health through advanced testing methodologies. The company offers diagnostic solutions that utilize bioengineering and nanotechnology to detect viral, bacterial, and fungal pathogens in women's health, providing actionable health information. Nanopath's technology is designed to serve the healthcare needs of women, particularly in underserved populations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Endor Labs
cb_description: Endor Labs is a company focused on software supply chain security within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a dependency lifecycle management platform that helps organizations select, secure, and maintain open source software dependencies effectively. Endor Labs provides solutions such as software composition analysis with reachability, container scanning, and management of software bills of materials (SBOMs) and Vulnerability Exploitability eXchanges (VEX), among other security and compliance tools. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: SWEETEN
cb_description: SWEETEN is a company specializing in home renovation matchmaking services within the construction and renovation industry. The company connects homeowners with a curated list of vetted general contractors, providing support and tools like bid-leveling and estimate comparison to facilitate successful renovation projects. SWEETEN primarily serves the residential sector, offering additional resources for commercial renovations and partnerships with architects and designers. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Glimpse
cb_description: Glimpse.com is a trendy, high-fashion site that aims to let fashionistas search for clothes, shoes, cosmetics and accessories. Fashion mongers can browse online stores, refine their searches by price, color or sale item, and see popular trends. The site is mostly aimed at women but does have some mens' products. For instance, if users search for "skinny jeans" users might find one male item per search result page.

name: Airspace
cb_description: Airspace has ceased operations. It offers proximity marketing solutions catering to the retail, leisure, airlines and advertising industries. The company provides a cloud-based Content Management System, to manage campaigns and develop, manage and optimize content to be delivered to smartphones. Its solutions help brands reach customers in physical locations and gather data, extract insight and drive engagement to improve the customer experience through interactive messages. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in London, U.K.

name: MoEngage
cb_description: MoEngage develops an intelligent marketing automation platform. It helps consumer brands understand customer behavior across digital touchpoints through inbuilt analytics and orchestrate personalized campaigns across multiple channels, including mobile, email, website, and more. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: FiSpan
cb_description: FiSpan specializes in integrating banking services with enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems within the financial technology sector. The company offers solutions that automate treasury management processes, facilitate payment automation, and streamline financial reconciliation for businesses. These services are primarily targeted at businesses seeking to enhance their accounting and financial operations through improved software integration. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: SingleFile
cb_description: SingleFile specializes in automating administrative compliance and government filings for businesses within the legal technology sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform of AI technology to streamline the filing of secretary of state documents, such as business formations and foreign qualifications, for companies, law firms, and investor organizations. SingleFile primarily serves entities that require regular compliance filings and document management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: VGS
cb_description: VGS provides ticketing solution and ticketing services. The company online platform, all the strategic functionalities required for commercial and operational management of resorts, theme parks, events, monuments, stadiums, theaters, cinemas, trade shows and other businesses in the entertainment, leisure, cultural and tourism industries. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Milan, Italy. In June 2023, VGS was acquired by accesso.6M.

name: Riverlane
cb_description: Riverlane focuses on quantum computing through the development of an error correction stack in the quantum computing industry. The company provides tools and technologies for controlling unstable qubits and correcting data errors, essential for achieving fault-tolerant quantum computing. Riverlane collaborates with technology and academic partners to address the challenges in quantum computing and enable its vast potential. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: Cleo
cb_description: Cleo provides an end-to-end support to working families. It facilitates planning a family to caring for an adult loved one. It offers certified care practitioners who guide and provide advice to parents on parenthood, pregnancy, and more. It provides an application for parents that includes coaching, content, and community with a network of certified experts to guide families through their journey into parenthood and back to work again. It was formerly known as Lucy. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: NeoCarbon
cb_description: NeoCarbon focuses on reversing climate change by specializing in carbon capture technology within the environmental sector. The company offers a direct air capture (DAC) system that captures carbon dioxide (CO2) at low cost and scale, utilizing waste heat and existing infrastructure to reduce environmental impact. It primarily serves the environmental service sector. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Odaseva
cb_description: Odaseva focuses on Salesforce data security and management, operating within the enterprise data platform sector. The company offers services including data protection, backup and restore, archiving, compliance, and security solutions designed to support large-scale Salesforce environments. Odaseva's platform is tailored to meet the needs of various sectors, including financial services, insurance, energy, transportation, technology, and non-profit organizations. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France.

name: Grabr
cb_description: Grabr operates as a global peer-to-peer delivery service that operates within the cross-border commerce industry. The company facilitates the purchase and delivery of products from abroad by connecting shoppers with travelers who can bring the items as they travel. Its platform offers a payment, a delivery, and a reward system for travelers who deliver items. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: VEIR
cb_description: VEIR specializes in the development of advanced superconducting power line solutions within the energy sector. The company offers superconducting electric transmission lines that provide higher transfer capacity compared to conventional lines. It primarily serves the energy sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Woburn, Massachusetts.

name: CRAFTY
cb_description: CRAFTY supply management solutions for workplaces. The company offers services and technology to manage pantries, catering, cafes, and supplies for both in-office and remote employees. Its main offerings include a centralized platform for managing office kitchen and pantry needs, snack boxes, corporate catering services, and office cafes. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Verto Education
cb_description: Verto Education provides educational services. The company offers a unique program where students can earn college credits while traveling abroad, combining classroom education with expeditions, hands-on projects, and cultural immersion. It primarily serves the higher education industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Vena Solutions
cb_description: Vena Solutions focuses on financial planning and analysis. The company offers a platform that transforms Microsoft Excel into a tool for budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning. Its services are primarily utilized by sectors such as banking, insurance, manufacturing, real estate, healthcare, and professional services. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Gemist
cb_description: Gemist focuses on technology solutions for the modern jeweler within the jewelry industry. The company offers a suite of technologies that enable consumers to customize, stack, and try on jewelry virtually, improving the online shopping experience. These solutions are designed to increase consumer engagement, average order values, and repeat purchase rates for jewelry retailers. Gemist was formerly known as Madeline's Ring. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Delightree
cb_description: Delightree is a technology company focused on providing a platform for franchise operations management. The company offers solutions for launching new locations, onboarding and training teams, automating tasks, and enhancing franchise communication. Delightree primarily serves emerging franchise businesses, empowering them to scale efficiently and maintain operational excellence. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Squid
cb_description: Squid is a media-tech company specializing in news aggregation and content customization within the news media app sector. Its main offerings include a personalized news feed where users can select topics of interest and engage with content using interactive tools. Squid primarily serves millennials across Europe, Latin America, and the Asia Pacific (APAC) region. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Nacka, Sweden.

name: Pine Gate Renewables
cb_description: Pine Gate Renewables is a renewable energy company operating in the energy sector, with a focus on the development and strategic financing of utility-scale solar and storage sites. The company's main services include the generation of renewable energy through solar projects, and providing clean energy to the grid in partnership with energy buyers, corporations, utilities, local communities, and capital partners. Pine Gate Renewables primarily sells to the energy sector, including utilities and energy buyers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Asheville, North Carolina.

name: Tiliter
cb_description: Tiliter is a technology company specializing in advanced product recognition AI and API solutions for the retail sector. The company offers a suite of software products that enable automatic identification of fresh produce, prevention of retail fraud, and loss prevention, aiming to improve checkout efficiency and accuracy. These solutions are designed to integrate with various retail hardware systems, enhancing operational efficiency and the customer experience without the need for barcodes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Absolute
cb_description: Absolute is a climate-focused deep tech bioscience research institute operating in the fields of agriculture, care, and materials. The company offers a range of services including decarbonizing agriculture at scale, accelerating life-critical discoveries for health and personal care, and creating a new class of climate-positive materials inspired by nature. Absolute primarily serves sectors such as sustainable agriculture, health and wellness, and environmental conservation. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Ansa Biotechnologies
cb_description: Ansa Biotechnologies focuses on advancing deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) synthesis technology within the biotechnology sector. The company offers an enzymatic DNA synthesis process that is designed for producing gene-length molecules directly. This technology primarily serves the medical, agricultural, and industrial biotechnology sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Emeryville, California.

name: BiomeSense
cb_description: BiomeSense focuses on the development of technologies in the health and biotechnology sector. The company's main offerings include tools for tracking, analyzing, and storing daily human gut microbiome profiles, which are essential for human health, development, and immunity. These tools are primarily used in the field of precision medicine, particularly in clinical trials. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Moleaer
cb_description: Moleaer is a company that focuses on the development of nanobubble technology, operating within various sectors such as agriculture, horticulture, aquaculture, food and beverage, wastewater treatment, and the oil and gas industry. The company's main offerings include equipment and services that utilize nanobubbles to enhance a range of industrial and commercial processes, such as improving water quality, increasing productivity in farming and horticulture, managing aquatic environments in lakes and ponds, and aiding in the recovery of natural resources. Moleaer primarily serves sectors including the agriculture and horticulture industry, the aquaculture industry, the food and beverage industry, the wastewater treatment industry, and the oil and gas industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Carson, California.

name: Moran Cognitive Technology
cb_description: Moran Cognitive Technology specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) with a focus on cognitive computing and natural language understanding within the tech industry. The company offers a conversational services search platform that facilitates voice interactions. Moran Cognitive Technology collaborates with sectors including the home appliance and automotive industries, to integrate its AI solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Beijing, China.

name: Emesent
cb_description: Emesent operates as a company that specializes in autonomous light detection and ranging (LiDAR) mapping and data analytics, operating within the technology and data analytics sectors. The company offers solutions for mapping and analyzing challenging and global positioning system-denied environments, with a focus on industries such as mining, engineering, and public safety. Emesent primarily serves sectors such as the mining industry, construction and engineering industry, geospatial industry, and public safety industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Brisbane, Australia.

name: Metalbook
cb_description: Metalbook specializes in the iron and steel industry. The company offers a marketplace for buying and selling steel products, along with services such as finance, logistics, metal fabrication, and metal recycling. Metalbook primarily serves stakeholders within the metal industry, including suppliers, fabricators, and recyclers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: EdiGene
cb_description: EdiGene is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on translating gene-editing technologies into genetic medicines for genetic diseases and cancer. The company develops gene-editing therapies using proprietary platforms, including in vivo RNA base editing and ex vivo gene-editing of hematopoietic stem cells and T cells for allogeneic CAR-T therapies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: Honey Insurance
cb_description: Honey Insurance provides home insurance services in the insurance industry. It offers smart home insurance services that help prevent avoidable accidents by using smart technology and data about the home to provide coverage. It provides smart home sensors to alert homeowners to potential risks such as fire, water damage, and theft. It primarily sells to homeowners, renters, and landlords. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Surry Hills, Australia.

name: Dinari
cb_description: Dinari focuses on tokenized stock trading and equity management software within the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform for trading securities backed tokens that represent shares in various companies, as well as solutions for managing equity for international employees and contractors, with automated compliance and bookkeeping. Dinari primarily serves venture-backed startups and growth stage companies looking to manage and offer equity to a global workforce. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Catch
cb_description: Catch () is a mobile app for making short videos.

name: CoinSwitch
cb_description: CoinSwitch is a cryptocurrency trading platform that operates in the fintech sector. The company offers services such as a systematic investment plan for crypto assets, an index tracking the performance of cryptocurrencies in rupees, and advanced trading capabilities through APIs. CoinSwitch primarily caters to individual investors and traders looking for cryptocurrency investment and trading solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Shezlong
cb_description: Shezlong focuses on mental health care, operating in the healthcare industry. The company provides online therapy services, offering a platform where individuals can connect with a wide range of psychiatrists and psychologists. These professionals are available to provide therapeutic services in multiple languages. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Giza, Egypt.

name: BukuWarung
cb_description: BukuWarung provides a financial application. The platform allows users to accept non-cash payments, get access to capital loans through the business capital solutions service, and more. It helps micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs) with bookkeeping and payments. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Linera
cb_description: Linera provides a layer-1 blockchain protocol focusing on enhancing scalability. The company offers a unique system of microchains, which are lightweight blockchains to run in parallel, providing unlimited blockspace and improving transaction efficiency. Linera's technology caters to a range of web3 applications, including retail payments, gaming, messaging, and proprietary trading. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: OnStation
cb_description: OnStation provides automatic email-based customer lifecycle management (CLM) solutions for automotive dealerships and service centers. It automates customer communications through strategically timed and targeted emails that maximize customer satisfaction and loyalty and increase lifecycle vehicle sales and service revenue. It was formerly known as CarStation and changed its name to OnStation. It is based in San Mateo, California. OnStation was acquired by Cobalt Group.

name: Atlas Invest
cb_description: Atlas Invest provides real estate-backed loans, particularly in the bridge financing sector. It offers a platform that simplifies and streamlines the bridge loan process. Atlas Invest caters to the financial needs of the real estate industry by connecting investors with private debt lenders for various property and loan types. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Maxwell
cb_description: Maxwell is a digital mortgage platform that provides solutions for local lenders in the mortgage industry. The company offers a suite of products including a point-of-sale system, business intelligence tools, and fulfillment services that aid the mortgage origination process. Maxwell's solutions cater to various sectors within the mortgage industry, such as mortgage banks, credit unions, brokers, and community banks. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Raenest
cb_description: Raenest focuses on providing modern financial management tools for African remote workforce talent and global businesses. The company offers services such as creating and automating invoices, receiving foreign payments, converting between multiple currencies, and making payments across various websites. Raenest primarily serves the remote workforce and global businesses. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Ikeja, Nigeria.

name: ChargeItSpot
cb_description: ChargeItSpot specializes in device management solutions. The company offers an intelligent locker system named ARC that secures device fleets and facilitates easy access for employees. It serves various businesses that require efficient device management and security. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Uncaged Innovations
cb_description: Uncaged Innovations operates as a biomaterials company focused on creating alternatives to animal leather within the materials industry. Its main offerings include the development of synthetic leather alternatives that mimic the quality and durability of traditional leather without the environmental impact, using a scalable and customizable manufacturing process. It primarily caters to the fashion, automotive, and home goods industries seeking sustainable material solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York.

name: FloodMapp
cb_description: FloodMapp specializes in providing live flood intelligence and dynamic flood data for emergency management within the environmental monitoring sector. The company offers real-time, property-level flood mapping and forecasting services, which deliver critical insights into flood inundation and depth to support decision-making during flood events. FloodMapp primarily serves sectors such as utilities, transport, mining, insurance, and the public sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Newstead, Queensland.

name: Kudos
cb_description: Kudos is a company that focuses on enhancing workplace culture and employee engagement in the human resources sector. The company offers a platform that provides services such as employee recognition, rewards, sentiment surveys, and people analytics, all aimed at driving performance, increasing engagement, and building a stronger culture. Kudos primarily sells to businesses across various sectors, aiming to improve their internal culture and employee satisfaction. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: Binalyze
cb_description: Binalyze focuses on digital forensics and incident response in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers solutions that collect digital forensic evidence, assess potential compromises, and facilitate rapid incident response investigations. Its services are primarily used in the cybersecurity sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: Muzz
cb_description: Muzz operates as an online dating application for Muslims. It helps single Muslims find a partner while respecting their religious beliefs. Muzz was formerly known as Muzmatch. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Ilford, United Kingdom.

name: PLACE
cb_description: PLACE is an all-in-one real estate technology platform that provides services to agents and consumers in the real estate industry. The company offers a suite of tools and services to facilitate the buying, selling, and financing of homes, as well as operational support for real estate agents. PLACE primarily serves the real estate industry, including agents, teams, and consumers looking for comprehensive real estate services. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bellingham, Washington.

name: Agragene
cb_description: Agragene develops biological pest control solutions within the agricultural sector. It offers a biocontrol platform that utilizes gene editing technology to prevent pest procreation and enhance crop production without pesticides, chemicals, or radiation. Its primary market includes the agricultural industry, specifically targeting crop growers seeking organic and environmentally friendly pest control methods. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Workjam
cb_description: Workjam is a company that focuses on providing digital solutions for frontline employers, operating in the technology and business services sector. The company offers a range of services including task management, shift management, employee communication, and learning, all aimed at increasing productivity, improving retention, and driving employee engagement. Workjam primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, retail, logistics, manufacturing, and hospitality among others. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Blockaid
cb_description: Blockaid offers blockchain-based software to protect users from online fraud. It uses blockchain technology, to ensure that users' data is safe and secure, enabling the market of online businesses to offer their services with confidence. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: CityFALCON
cb_description: CityFALCON specializes in the transformation of unstructured financial content into structured data using machine learning, automation, and natural language processing. The company offers personalized financial data and analytics, delivering insights through website, mobile, application programming interface (API), voice, and chatbot platforms. Its services cater to a diverse range of clients, including retail investors, traders, and various enterprises, by providing tools for investment opportunity discovery, risk management, and due diligence. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United KIngdom.

name: Soul Machines
cb_description: Soul Machines specializes in the humanization of AI, focusing on creating autonomously animated digital personas for various sectors. The company offers AI Assistants that provide real-time, personalized feedback for activities such as language practice, job interview preparation, meditation guidance, and more. These digital personas are designed to facilitate learning and practice in a pressure-free environment. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: Genoox
cb_description: Genoox operates as a platform for managing genetic data. The company offers a cloud-based artificial intelligence (AI) platform that connects clinicians, genetic counselors, and healthcare organizations, enabling them to generate actionable insights from genomic data. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was formerly known as Treemoe. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Telexistence
cb_description: Telexistence is a company focused on expanding human presence through robotics technology. They specialize in creating systems that enable humans to exist and act in remote environments as if they were physically present. The company's technology is designed to innovate at scale within the robotics sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Duve
cb_description: Duve is a company that focuses on enhancing the hospitality guest experience, operating within the hospitality industry. The company offers a platform that provides services such as online check-in, guest communication, upselling opportunities, and analytics for hotels, hostels, and vacation rentals. These services aim to increase guest satisfaction, revenue growth, and digitalization of operations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Conservis
cb_description: Conservis is a company that focuses on farm business management in the agriculture industry. The company offers a software platform that assists in planning work, managing inventory, tracking field activity, analyzing yield, and determining the true cost of production. The primary sectors that Conservis sells to include the farming and agriculture industries. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Firedome
cb_description: Firedome specializes in advanced fire protection and safety solutions. The company focuses on developing innovative materials and technologies designed to enhance fire resistance in various applications, including construction, manufacturing, and transportation. It was founded in 2024 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Planity
cb_description: Planity focuses on the beauty and wellness industry. It offers an online platform for booking beauty services such as hairdressing, barbering, manicure, and beauty treatments. The company primarily serves the beauty and wellness industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: AirGarage
cb_description: AirGarage specializes in full-service parking management solutions within the parking industry. The company offers dynamic pricing, license plate recognition, and enhanced enforcement to optimize revenue and manage parking assets. AirGarage serves various sectors including off-airport parking, mixed-use properties, and hotels. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Chroma Medicine
cb_description: Chroma Medicine develops epigenetic medicines. The company's main service includes the development of a new class of single-dose genomic medicines that utilize epigenetics, a natural mechanism for gene regulation, to treat diseases. It primarily caters healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Dren Bio
cb_description: Dren Bio is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery and development of novel antibody therapeutics for the treatment of cancer and autoimmune diseases. The company's main offerings include therapeutic antibodies designed to selectively deplete pathogenic cells and other disease-causing agents. Dren Bio's products are primarily aimed at the healthcare sector, with applications in oncology, immunology, and neurology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Foster City, California.

name: StormSensor
cb_description: StormSensor is a technology company focused on climate change adaptation and stormwater infrastructure management. They offer a sensor network and analytics platform that provides real-time insights into flood and overflow risks, helping communities adapt to climate change by improving their stormwater systems. Their solutions are designed for community leaders and urban planners to streamline maintenance, respond to emergencies, and prioritize infrastructure projects. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Elektrofi
cb_description: Elektrofi operates as a biopharmaceutical formulation technology company focused on the delivery of biologic therapies. The company offers a hyper concentration microparticle platform, Hypercon, which enables subcutaneous self-administration of biological therapies, aiming to improve patient convenience and control. Elektrofi collaborates with strategic partners to develop and commercialize therapies for monoclonal antibodies, therapeutic proteins, and other large molecule drugs. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Trala
cb_description: Trala is an online music school that focuses on making high-quality music education accessible to everyone. The company offers private music lessons and a music learning app that provides feedback and tracks progress for a variety of instruments. Trala's services are designed to cater to learners of all ages and skill levels, from beginners to advanced musicians. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Oak Park, Illinois.

name: Brightflag
cb_description: Brightflag provides legal operations software focused on electronic billing and matter management for legal teams. The company offers a platform that facilitates artificial intelligence (AI)--assisted invoice review, financial planning, legal spend management, and vendor benchmarking. Brightflag's solutions are designed to help legal departments control budgets and streamline operations without the need for extensive manual work. Brightflag was formerly known as Legalshine. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Boox
cb_description: Boox focuses on sustainable shipping solutions within the e-commerce logistics industry. The company offers reusable shipping containers and a returns network to eliminate single-use waste, alongside turnkey services that facilitate a circular economy. Boox primarily sells to the e-commerce industry, offering custom-branded packaging that enhances brand loyalty and consumer engagement. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Petaluma, California.

name: Be Biopharma
cb_description: Be Biopharma focuses on the development of engineered B-cell medicines. The company's main offering involves the creation of a proprietary class of engineered B cells designed to enhance the potential of cell therapies in various applications. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: 4M Analytics
cb_description: 4M Analytics provides a subsurface utility map with a subsurface-infrastructure database. It applies artificial intelligence (AI) and analytics to satellite and aerial imagery interpretation for the civil engineering domain. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Vesper Energy
cb_description: Vesper Energy is a developer, owner, and operator of utility-scale renewable energy projects within the energy sector.
