The company specializes in providing clean, low-cost electricity through solar and energy storage projects. Vesper Energy primarily serves sectors that require renewable energy solutions, including various industries and communities across the United States. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Irving, Texas.

name: Finless Foods
cb_description: Finless Foods is a company focused on the development of alternative seafood products using cell-cultured technology within the food industry. Their main offerings include plant-based and cell-cultured seafood solutions designed to provide sustainable and delicious alternatives to traditional seafood, starting with tuna. The company primarily serves the food industry with a focus on sustainability and innovation in seafood. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Emeryville, California.

name: Chefaa
cb_description: Chefaa focuses on the digital transformation of healthcare and supply chains in Africa and the Middle East, operating within the healthcare sector. The company provides a platform for ordering, scheduling, and refilling non-insured and insured prescriptions and a variety of healthcare products and services. It primarily serves individuals and entities looking for healthcare solutions, including personal care, cosmetics, medical supplies, and wellness products. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Tamara
cb_description: Tamara serves as a shopping and payments platform operating in the financial technology sector. The company provides a mobile application offering flexible payment solutions, allowing customers to divide their bills into multiple installments without delay fees, in compliance with Islamic law. Tamara primarily serves the e-commerce industry, with global and regional brands to local small and medium businesses. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: LegalMation
cb_description: LegalMation focuses on providing artificial intelligence solutions in the legal sector and offers a suite of generative AI tools that help litigation attorneys and other legal professionals by dynamically producing formatted legal documents such as responsive pleadings, discovery requests, and responses, all tailored to the specific legal case at hand. LegalMation primarily serves corporate legal departments and law firms. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Traba
cb_description: Traba ceased operations. Traba develops a job-seeking platform. It helps people discover, learn about, and connect with companies. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Translucent
cb_description: Translucent, a Silex subsidiary, develops a novel set of semiconductor materials known as 'crystalline Rare Earth Oxides' (cREO) for application to the manufacturing of next-generation devices in the semiconductor, digital communications, and power electronics industries.

name: Resal
cb_description: Resal focuses on digital value distribution within the alternative payment solutions sector. It offers prepaid cards, rewards, and loyalty programs designed to benefit individuals, businesses, and merchants. The company primarily serves sectors that require alternative payment methods and customer loyalty enhancement. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

name: Bottomless
cb_description: Apps and Games on social networks like Facebook and emerging platforms like Windows Phone and Windows 8

name: Mark43
cb_description: Mark43 provides a public safety platform. It develops speeches for municipal leaders to prepare for an interview, provides workload management solutions for investigators, and allows officials to collect, manage, analyze, and share information. It enables agencies to pinpoint dangerous crime hotspots, identify stabilized areas, and more. It was formerly known as Nucleik. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: NovaMeat
cb_description: NovaMeat develops plant-based meat alternatives operating in the food technology industry. It offers sustainable meat substitutes designed to mimic the taste, texture, and aroma of animal products. Its plant-based meats are intended to address environmental concerns associated with traditional animal agriculture while providing culinary experience. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Ten Thousand
cb_description: Ten Thousand specializes in premium men's activewear within the apparel industry. The company offers a range of products including training shorts, shirts, pants, and accessories designed for athletic use with a focus on high-performance and durability. Ten Thousand's gear is tailored to meet the needs of fitness enthusiasts and athletes, providing functional and robust clothing options for various physical activities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Wellhub
cb_description: Wellhub is a corporate wellness platform that offers a comprehensive subscription service for employee wellbeing across various sectors. The platform provides access to fitness, mindfulness, nutrition, and sleep support, aiming to enhance employee productivity, retention, and reduce healthcare costs. Wellhub primarily serves companies looking to invest in their employees' health and wellbeing through a scalable and integrative wellness program. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AcreTrader
cb_description: AcreTrader provides access to farmland investments, operating within the alternative investment sector. The company offers an online platform that aids in the process of investing in farmland, handling all aspects of administration and property management for investors. It primarily caters to individual investors seeking to diversify their portfolios with farmland as an alternative asset. AcreTrader was founded in 2018 and is based in Fayetteville, Arkansas.

name: ShearShare
cb_description: ShearShare is a B2B platform that specializes in the beauty and barbering industry, providing a marketplace for salon and barbershop space rentals. The company connects salon and barbershop owners with licensed professionals seeking flexible, affordable workspace without long-term contracts or commissions. ShearShare primarily serves the beauty and barbering industry by offering on-demand space rental solutions to individual stylists and salon owners. ShearShare was formerly known as HAIRbnb. It was founded in 2015 and is based in McKinney, Texas.

name: OXCCU
cb_description: OXCCU specializes in converting carbon dioxide into sustainable fuels, chemicals, and plastics within the energy sector. The company's main offerings include the production of sustainable aviation fuel through a patented one-step catalytic process and the transformation of CO2 into biodegradable plastics and valuable chemicals using renewable energy sources. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Oxfordshire, England.

name: CREDITAS
cb_description: CREDITAS is an investment company focused on managing special funds and funds for qualified investors in the financial services, real estate, and energy sectors. The company offers investment opportunities through funds that include real estate funds, mixed funds, and short-term investment funds, aiming to provide attractive returns primarily in the Czech Republic. CREDITAS caters to both public funds suitable for beginning investors and funds for qualified investors seeking relatively stable appreciation of their investments. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Karlin, Czech Republic.

name: Clarity AI
cb_description: Clarity AI specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) within the healthcare sector. The company offers a suite of services that transform unstructured patient data into structured, actionable insights and ensure seamless integration with healthcare platforms. It primarily serves healthcare providers and developers with advanced data integration and AI-driven analytics tools. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: DeepJudge
cb_description: DeepJudge focuses on leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance knowledge search capabilities within the legal sector. Its main offerings include an AI-powered search engine that allows legal professionals to intuitively access and leverage institutional knowledge from extensive document libraries using natural language processing. DeepJudge's technology is designed to transform document overload into a strategic advantage by providing intent-based search and AI-predicted metadata, thereby improving service delivery to clients and operational efficiency for legal firms. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Shopmonkey
cb_description: Shopmonkey develops shop management software. It offers a mobile application, data migration, integration, and financing providing its services for auto repair, marine repair, tire shops, and more. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Morgan Hill, California.

name: Morse Micro
cb_description: Morse Micro focuses on developing Wi-Fi HaLow solutions for the Internet of Things (IoT) market. The company's main offerings include ultra-long range, ultra-low power Wi-Fi solutions. These solutions are primarily sold to sectors such as surveillance systems, access control, industrial automation, and mobile devices. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Surry Hills, Australia.

name: Sonar
cb_description:
Todos os dias, milhes de consumidores se deslocam de suas casas a caminho do trabalho, estudo ou lazer. 
Em trnsito, os consumidores esto mais sujeitos ao consumo, afinal eles esto mais prximos dos pontos de venda.
 neste momento, quando eles no so impactados pelas mdias tradicionais, que o Sonar Ofertas atua colocando no bolso do consumidor o que ele precisa ver. 
O nosso sistema permite uma cobertura total da vida fora-de-casa destes consumidores, seja no trabalho, 
no momento onde ele se exercita, nas compras, nos locais de estudo e at mesmo nas viagens a lazer ou trabalho. 
 assim, sem que voc perceba, que o Sonar Ofertas j faz parte da sua vida.

name: Everledger
cb_description: Everledger provides technology solutions. It increases transparency in global supply chains, from insurance companies to claimants and law enforcement agencies. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: OpenSponsorship
cb_description: OpenSponsorship is a two-sided marketplace that makes it easy for brands to partner with athletes for marketing campaigns. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Crealo
cb_description: Crealo focuses on providing solutions for copyright management in the technology sector. The company offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform that automates the management of copyright rights, including automatic extraction of sales states, calculation of rights, generation of associated statements, centralized contract management, and facilitated accounting reconciliation. Crealo primarily serves sectors such as publishing, music, visual arts, video games, audiovisual, press, licenses, NFT studios, advertising, and toys. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France.

name: Loadsmart
cb_description: Loadsmart specializes in logistics and transportation services, focusing on freight brokerage and technology solutions. The company offers a suite of services including managed transportation, next-generation transportation management systems (TMS), and dock scheduling software, all designed to optimize freight operations and enhance efficiency. Loadsmart's products cater to shippers, carriers, and warehouses, providing tools for freight procurement, real-time tracking, and asset visibility. Loadsmart was formerly known as Disruptive Logistics, LLC. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: PropertyScout
cb_description: PropertyScout develops a property intelligence platform. It provides services such as property owner lookups, title searches, deed searches, and access to property records, enabling users to verify property details, ownership, and mortgage information. It caters to property insurance agents, real estate professionals, lending professionals, and legal professionals. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tacoma, Washington.

name: Paragraf
cb_description: Paragraf specializes in the development and mass production of graphene-based electronic devices within the semiconductor industry. The company offers a range of products including graphene Hall sensors for various sensing applications, graphene field-effect transistors (GFETs) for molecule sensing, and custom foundry services for the creation of solid-state devices and circuits. Its products are utilized in industries such as environmental sensing, healthcare, quantum computing, and automotive. Paragraf was formerly known as 2D Technologies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Somersham, United Kingdom.

name: nOps
cb_description: nOps provides an AI FinOps platform optimizing AWS cloud usage and costs. It offers automated solutions for cost management, resource provisioning, and spend analytics, designed to help businesses reduce its AWS expenses. It serves organizations looking to manage their cloud infrastructure allocation, rightsizing, and resource scheduling. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Motif Neurotech
cb_description: Motif Neurotech operates as a medical equipment manufacturing company. The company uses innovations in efficient wireless power and data, unlocking possibilities for new, miniature implants for tissue stimulation and diagnostic readings. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: ZBiotics
cb_description: ZBiotics operates as a biotechnology company focused on daily living through genetically engineered probiotics. Its product is a probiotic drink designed to break down acetaldehyde, a byproduct of alcohol consumption, to support mornings after drinking. ZBiotics is committed to leveraging its patented technology to develop a new category of products aimed at addressing the challenges of modern life. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: TailorMed
cb_description: TailorMed is a technology company operating in the healthcare sector. The company offers a comprehensive software solution that automates financial navigation for healthcare providers and patients, optimizing out-of-pocket expenses, providing real-time matching and enrollment to funding opportunities, and streamlining the drug ordering process. TailorMed primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Colektia
cb_description: Colektia operates in the field of digital collections, focusing on the use of artificial intelligence within the debt collection sector. The company offers digital and remote debt collection services, utilizing automated systems and chatbots to manage debt recovery processes. Its services are designed to improve debt recovery for businesses and individuals by utilizing artificial intelligence (AI) technology. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

name: TemperPack
cb_description: TemperPack is a materials engineering and manufacturing company that operates in the packaging industry. The company focuses on creating sustainable insulated packaging solutions that are used for cold chain shipments, particularly for perishable food and pharmaceutical products. TemperPack primarily serves sectors such as the pharmaceutical distribution, diagnostics, grocery, food and beverage, and healthcare industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Richmond, Virginia.

name: Bowery
cb_description: Bowery provides vertical farming solutions. It engages in the production of fresh produce using its BoweryOS, which optimizes indoor growing conditions to help yield crops with flavor. It primarily sells to the food supply chain, with its produce being available in different locations including major grocery stores. The company was formerly known as Nibi. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Retirable
cb_description: Retirable is a company that focuses on holistic retirement solutions in the financial services industry. The company offers services such as financial planning, investment strategies, and reliable monthly income plans tailored to the retirement lifestyle. Its primary customers are individuals planning for or in retirement. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ophelia
cb_description: Ophelia specializes in debt consolidation, lending, and accumulated savings. Ophelia is based out of Montreal, Quebec.

name: Kaedim
cb_description: Kaedim develops AI-enabled modeling software. It rapidly converts 2D images, sketches, and photos into 3D models. The company aims to make digital 3D asset production simpler, faster, and cheaper. The company serves game development studios. Kaedim was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Infravision
cb_description: Infravision focuses on the development of drone technology and software solutions in the energy sector. The company offers services such as power line stringing, line hardware installation, and dynamic line monitoring, all of which are designed to automate power line construction and increase grid capacity. Infravision primarily serves the energy industry, with a particular focus on power line construction and maintenance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cannon Hill, Australia.

name: Mottu
cb_description: Mottu is a startup specializing in motorbike rental and logistics services. The company offers practical bike rentals without bureaucracy and a delivery platform for businesses of all types. Mottu primarily serves the delivery and logistics sectors, providing solutions that cater to both individual couriers and retail businesses. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Diversio
cb_description: Diversio specializes in diversity and inclusion in human resources and DEI (Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion). The company offers a platform that measures, tracks, and improves employee engagement and company performance, providing insights into company culture and employee sentiment. It also offers diversity and inclusion training, consulting services, and certification programs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Human Longevity
cb_description: Human Longevity is a health intelligence company that operates in the genomics and healthcare sectors. The company offers a precision healthcare program that uses advanced technology to detect and potentially preempt various diseases, including cancer, cardiac, metabolic, and neurodegenerative diseases. The company primarily serves individuals seeking to proactively manage their health and longevity. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Copia Automation
cb_description: Copia Automation delivers modern developer tools for industrial automation. It provides a global information tracker (Git)-based source control for programmable logic controller (PLC) programming. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Monzo
cb_description: Monzo operates a digital banking platform focused on personal finance management. The company offers personal and joint accounts, allowing users to track income, manage spending, and save money through an integrated mobile app. Monzo primarily serves individuals looking for an easy-to-use banking solution. Monzo was formerly known as Mondo. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Lightship
cb_description: Lightship focuses on improving the accessibility and quality of clinical trials within the healthcare sector. It offers patient-centric clinical trials that utilize digital health technologies and remote participation to make research accessible and convenient for patients and caregivers. Lightship partners with healthcare providers to deliver seamless clinical research experiences. Lightship was formerly known as DTP Newco. It was founded in 2018 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: MEL Science
cb_description: MEL Science is a company focused on educational services, specifically in the domain of science education for children. The company offers a subscription service that delivers monthly science kits for kids, covering subjects such as coding, STEM, math, space, physics, chemistry, and medicine. These kits provide hands-on projects and digital experiences designed to make learning science fun and engaging. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Buckinghamshire, England.

name: Newsela
cb_description: Newsela is an education technology company focused on delivering engaging and relevant instructional content for teachers to support classroom learning. The company offers a platform with rigorous, standards-aligned activities, quizzes, and resources that are tailored to students' interests and abilities, aiming to facilitate literacy growth and personalized learning experiences. Newsela primarily serves the education sector, providing tools and content for teachers and students in various subjects such as ELA, social studies, and science. Newsela was formerly known as WhipSmart Learning. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Pactum
cb_description: Pactum specializes in artificial intelligence-driven autonomous negotiations within the business sector, focusing on creating value through automated supplier engagements. The company offers a suite of tools for commercial term negotiations, contract cost negotiations, and purchasing negotiations, all designed to facilitate large-scale, personalized negotiation processes between enterprises and their suppliers. Its solutions are primarily utilized in the business sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Djamo
cb_description: Djamo operates in financial technology, focusing on providing digital financial solutions. It offers a mobile application that allows users to manage their money, including features for receiving salaries, making transfers, paying and withdrawing money worldwide, and managing business expenses. The application also provides tools for saving money, tracking and controlling expenses, and making payments without fees in certain regions.  The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Abidjan, Cte dIvoire.

name: Rockbot
cb_description: Rockbot is a company specializing in onsite audio and visual solutions within the media-for-business industry. The company offers a platform that provides businesses with music, digital signage, television programming, and advertising services, designed to enhance the in-location customer experience. Rockbot primarily serves sectors such as fitness centers, retail chains, and hospitality businesses. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: YoFio
cb_description: YoFio focuses on providing financial solutions to support merchants and micro-entrepreneurs. The company offers loans to help businesses manage cash flow, pay suppliers, and restock inventory without interest. YoFio primarily serves the small business sector with its credit app. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Waabi
cb_description: Waabi specializes in the development of autonomous driving technology within the artificial intelligence and transportation sectors. The company offers a self-driving solution known as the Waabi Driver, designed for integration with trucks and aimed at large-scale commercialization and safe deployment, complemented by Waabi World, an advanced simulation platform for testing and development. Waabi primarily serves the logistics and transportation industries with its autonomous trucking solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Enklu
cb_description: Enklu focuses on the development and provision of augmented reality (AR) experiences, operating within the entertainment and technology sectors. The company's main offerings include the creation of immersive AR experiences, transforming empty spaces into interactive playgrounds with inventive stories, and engaging social interactions. These experiences are primarily targeted towards the entertainment industry, with a particular emphasis on location-based entertainment venues. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: CloudTrucks
cb_description: CloudTrucks operates as a virtual trucking carrier and a technology company. The company offers a comprehensive business management platform that includes services such as fleet management, load booking, business insights, and instant payments. It primarily serves the business service sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Wing Assistant
cb_description: Wing Assistant specializes in providing remote virtual assistant services to various business sectors. The company offers a range of services including administrative support, sales and marketing assistance, customer service, and IT helpdesk support. Wing Assistant primarily serves small and medium-sized businesses, startups, and executives looking to delegate routine tasks and focus on core business activities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Cogoport
cb_description: Cogoport is a company that specializes in simplifying international trade and logistics through its Global Trade Platform in the freight and logistics industry. The company offers a range of services including ocean and air freight, customs clearance, and financial services like cargo insurance and export factoring. Cogoport primarily serves sectors such as chemicals, pharmaceuticals, electronics, textiles, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Eagle Eye Networks
cb_description: Eagle Eye Networks specializes in cloud-based video surveillance and artificial intelligence analytics within the security and operations domain. The company offers a video management system that enables secure, encrypted recording, camera management, mobile viewing, alerts, and video search capabilities. Eagle Eye Networks caters to a broad range of industries, providing scalable, flexible solutions with advanced analytics and an open API for customization. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Fiveable
cb_description: Fiveable focuses on educational support, specifically in the domain of exam preparation. The company offers study guides, cheat sheets, practice questions, and live review events to help students prepare for exams. These services primarily cater to students preparing for Advanced Placement (AP), SAT, and ACT exams. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.

name: Khatabook
cb_description: Khatabook operates as a financial technology company facilitating business management. It offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) accounting platform for managing credit via a digital ledger application. It helps small and medium businesses with inventory management, billing and accounting, and tracking transactions. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Ankorstore
cb_description: Ankorstore operates as a wholesale marketplace within the retail industry, focusing on supporting independent brands. The company offers a platform for a range of products including home and kitchen items, food and drinks, beauty and wellness products, baby and kids essentials, jewelry, fashion, and stationery. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: GenXys
cb_description: GenXys is a company focused on precision prescribing solutions in the healthcare industry. The company offers a suite of software products that provide medication decision support, medication review, and deprescribing services, as well as laboratory software and population risk stratification tools. These services primarily cater to health systems, pharmacies, and insurance providers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Kelowna, British Columbia.

name: Submittable
cb_description: Submittable is a social impact platform that specializes in application management and program facilitation for various sectors. The company provides tools for accepting and reviewing applications, communicating with applicants, automating workflows, disbursing funds, and reporting on program impact. Submittable serves foundations, governments, and corporations, offering solutions to manage grants, volunteering, community investment, and giving programs. Submittable was formerly known as Submishmash. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Missoula, Montana.

name: Plooto
cb_description: Plooto is a financial technology company specializing in payment automation for accounts payable and receivable. The company offers a platform that streamlines payment processing and cash management, with features such as international payments, online checks, invoice management, and credit card acceptance. Plooto primarily serves businesses, accountants, and finance teams across various industries, including finance and insurance, healthcare, non-profit, professional services, real estate, and retail and ecommerce. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Tenderd
cb_description: Tenderd develops an artificial intelligence-powered analytics platform specializing in fleet operations within various industries. The company offers a suite of tools to optimize equipment utilization, manage logistics and maintenance, reduce fuel consumption, and measure carbon emissions to enhance safety, productivity, profitability, and sustainability. It primarily serves sectors such as construction, logistics, energy, and marine. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: HealthPlix
cb_description: HealthPlix is an online platform providing practice management and EMR solutions for clinics. It provides online practice management and patient outcome management solutions for doctors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Inspeq AI
cb_description: Inspeq AI specializes in the performance and reliability of large language model (LLM) applications within the enterprise sector. The company offers a low-code platform that accelerates the deployment of LLM applications by providing tools for evaluation, improvement, and monitoring. Inspeq AI's services are designed to significantly reduce development costs and time spent on prompt engineering and testing. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: ORCA Computing
cb_description: ORCA Computing specializes in the development of full-stack photonic quantum computers, focusing on the technology sector and quantum computing industry. The company offers modular, fiber-interconnected quantum computing systems designed to enhance performance, scalability, and usability for applications such as machine learning and optimization. ORCA primarily serves government and enterprise clients, guiding them from the discovery to deployment of quantum applications. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Avoma
cb_description: Avoma operates as a company that focuses on providing artificial intelligence (AI) powered technology solutions. It offers a range of services including meeting management, automatic recording and transcription of meetings, and conversation intelligence. These services are primarily targeted towards the sales and customer success sectors. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Lendtable
cb_description: Lendtable operates a consumer financial services platform operating in the financial technology sector. It provides a line of credit to individuals, enabling them to maximize their employer's 401(k), 403(b), or TSP match program and participate in their Employee Stock Purchase Plan. Lendtable primarily serves individuals in the workforce, assisting them in building long-term wealth. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Truck It In
cb_description: Truck It In operates as a technology company offering a logistics technology platform. It focuses on streamlining road freight offering load-matching, freight booking, dispatching, and delivery services. It serves agriculture, steel, furniture, coal, construction, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Karachi, Pakistan.

name: IVI
cb_description: IVI is a company that specializes in assisted reproduction techniques within the healthcare industry. The company offers a range of fertility treatments and services, including artificial insemination and in vitro fertilization, aimed at addressing infertility issues in both men and women. The company primarily serves individuals and couples seeking fertility solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Valencia, Spain.

name: eFishery
cb_description: eFishery offers a fish-feeding machine for commercial aquaculture. The company helps to sense the fish's appetite through motion sensors. It builds a systematic value chain for the fish and shrimp farming businesses. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Bandung, Indonesia.

name: ACBC
cb_description: ACBC is a sustainability consultancy specializing in the fashion and textile industries. The company offers services such as corporate sustainability, product analysis, research and development, product transformation, eco production, and materials innovation to reduce environmental impact and comply with sustainability regulations. ACBC primarily serves the fashion industry, food sector, and hospitality industry with its sustainability programs. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Estimote
cb_description: Estimote is a technology company that operates in the Internet of Things (IoT) industry. The company's main offerings include sensor-based analytics and engagement platforms, as well as Ultra Wideband (UWB) Beacons that provide precise location context for mobile applications. These products are primarily used in the retail industry, enabling businesses to enhance customer interactions within physical venues. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CyberSmart
cb_description: CyberSmart is a leading cybersecurity platform focused on providing comprehensive cyber defense solutions for SMEs. The company offers a suite of products and services designed to ensure continuous compliance, enhance cybersecurity monitoring and optimization, and provide cybersecurity training and insurance. CyberSmart's offerings cater to the cybersecurity needs of managed IT providers and SMEs, aiming to protect their most valuable assets from cyber threats. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Multiplier
cb_description: Multiplier provides a workforce management platform. It offers payroll, employment, consulting, human resources, hiring, and other professional services. It also provides services for taxes, social contributions, and local insurance policies, The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: Olivela
cb_description: Olivela is a retail company with a focus on luxury brands in the fashion and beauty industry. The company offers a range of products including women's clothing, fine jewelry, accessories, and skincare. A unique aspect of Olivela's business model is that it donates 20% of proceeds from every purchase to various children's causes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: KOTA
cb_description: KOTA is a creative digital agency specializing in web design, branding, and digital marketing within the creative industry. The company offers services such as crafting responsive and search engine-friendly websites, developing brand identities, and executing digital marketing campaigns. KOTA primarily serves sectors that require strong brand presence and innovative digital strategies, such as e-commerce, healthcare, and premium alcoholic beverages. It is based in London, England.

name: Lydia
cb_description: Lydia is a financial technology company specializing in mobile and digital banking services. The company offers a range of products including a digital current account, multi-account management, and tools for shared expenses, catering to the needs of modern consumers seeking efficient and secure online financial management. Lydia's services are designed to facilitate everyday banking, instant money transfers, and secure online payments without fees on international transactions. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Sona
cb_description: Sona is a company that focuses on the health and wellness industry, specifically in the domain of sleep and anxiety management. The company offers a sleep music app that provides neuroscience-backed calming music, designed to increase alpha and theta brain waves and help users relax and manage anxiety. The primary target market for Sona's services is individuals seeking natural and safe methods to improve their mental health. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Femtosense
cb_description: Femtosense is a technology company that operates in the artificial intelligence sector. The company offers a Sparse Processing Unit (SPU) that enables the running of AI applications under 1 mW by skipping zero connections and activations, and also provides software tools for developing compressed sparse models. Femtosense primarily caters to the electronics industry, providing solutions for smaller electronic devices. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Bruno, California.

name: Leverage Edu
cb_description: Leverage Edu is a company specializing in providing end-to-end guidance for students aspiring to study abroad. The company offers personalized counseling, university admissions guidance, test preparation, visa assistance, and financial services for education, along with student accommodation solutions. Leverage Edu caters to the higher education sector, assisting students in navigating the complexities of studying overseas. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Noida, India.

name: WIRE
cb_description: WIRE is a creative agency.

name: Honeycomb
cb_description:
Honeycomb is a TV and video ad management platform. Honeycomb's platform streamlines the process of TV and video ad delivery by automating elements of the submission process, which typically involves a lot of tedious data entry. But by utilizing Honeycomb's tech, creative agencies and post production houses can submit content in about half of the time or less, while the possibility of human error is reduced significantly.

On December 21, 2017, Honeycomb merged  with Peach. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Fairmat
cb_description: Fairmat focuses on sustainability and advanced manufacturing in the carbon fiber composites industry. The company offers a recycling service and produces second-generation materials from recycled carbon fiber composites, providing a sustainable and innovative solution to reduce carbon footprint. Fairmat recycled materials are designed to be used in various industries such as design, mobility, electronics, construction, transport, and logistics. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Salvo Health
cb_description: Salvo Health is a healthcare company focused on modernizing care for chronic gastrointestinal (GI) and metabolic liver conditions. The company offers a platform that combines cross-functional care and tech-enabled tools to improve patient outcomes and support healthcare providers. Salvo Health primarily sells to healthcare providers, including GI private practices, primary care population health ACOs, and health systems. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Disco
cb_description:
Disco is a manufacturer and distributor of cleaning and specialty products for the restaurant and food service industries including fryer filters. This company extends Continental Commercial Products' maintenance products line into the restaurant and food service market. 

In October 2011, Disco was acquired by Cellucap. The valuation of Disco was $19 million.

name: Replay
cb_description: Replay is a dating platform that uses social experiences to enhance the mobile dating experience.

name: Butternut Box
cb_description: Butternut Box focuses on providing fresh, healthy dog food. It offers a subscription service delivering perfectly-portioned, hypoallergenic meals for dogs, made with human-quality ingredients and without fillers or artificial preservatives. The company primarily sells to dog owners looking for quality, convenient meal options for their pets. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Inspirit
cb_description: Inspirit uses virtual labs, simulations, and virtual reality to transform science courses. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Stanford, California.

name: Rejuvenate Bio
cb_description: Rejuvenate Bio specializes in healthcare solutions for age-related diseases. The company develops therapies that utilize gene expression and epigenetic reprogramming to address chronic age-related conditions such as heart disease, metabolic disease, and kidney failure. Its primary market is the healthcare industry, particularly sectors dealing with chronic and age-related conditions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Luma Health
cb_description: Luma Health delivers a cloud-based patient management platform. It unifies and automates various aspects of a patient's healthcare journey, including access and operational, clinical, and financial aspects. The platform is designed to integrate with various electronic health record systems to provide a comprehensive view of the patient's health and reduce manual outreach. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Yoodli
cb_description: Yoodli focuses on communication coaching in the education and technology sectors. The company offers a service that uses artificial intelligence to provide private coaching to help individuals improve their communication skills, particularly in the context of public speaking, job interviews, and online meetings. The primary customers of Yoodli are individuals seeking to enhance their communication skills, with applications in various sectors such as business, sales, and engineering. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Micropep Technologies
cb_description: Micropep Technologies focuses on developing agricultural solutions within the biotechnology sector. The company offers natural solutions for crop protection and stimulation by leveraging micropeptides to adapt agricultural systems to climate change. Micropep Technologies serves the agricultural industry by providing farmers with crop protection and enhancement tools. Micropep Technologies was founded in 2016 and is based in Auzeville Tolosane, France.

name: AtScale
cb_description: AtScale is a company that specializes in accelerating the flow of data-driven insights through its semantic layer platform in the business intelligence and data analytics software industry. The company offers a solution that simplifies, accelerates, and extends business intelligence and data science capabilities, enabling enterprise customers to democratize data and implement self-service BI. AtScale primarily serves sectors that require agile analytics infrastructure and governance, such as enterprises across various industries seeking to optimize their cloud analytics and establish an enterprise metrics store. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Repool
cb_description: Repool specializes in providing modern solutions for hedge fund management, including fund launch and administration services within the financial sector. The company offers a comprehensive 'Fund-in-a-Box' solution that encompasses entity formation, fund document preparation, ongoing administration, compliance, and digital investor experience software. Repool's services cater to both emerging and institutional fund managers seeking to streamline their fund operations. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Top Hat
cb_description: Top Hat is a dynamic courseware platform that specializes in educational technology. The company offers a suite of AI-powered tools and interactive resources designed to enhance the learning experience for educators and students. Top Hat primarily serves the higher education sector, providing solutions for educators, students, and institutional administrators. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Curio
cb_description: Curio seeks to simplify clinical trial participant sourcing, while connecting users to research that they can engage with.

name: Juno Medical
cb_description: Provider of medical analysis devices for physiotherapy treatment. The company's products are based on a frequency analysis method (FAM) which monitors the status of a human neuromuscular system. The devices are used in planning physiotherapy treatment and monitoring efficiency of the treatment. The aim is to offer a fast and non-invasive indicative assessment of the neuromuscular system performance and recovery stage of athletes.

name: Parabol
cb_description: Parabol provides digital solutions for remote team collaboration. The company offers a remote retrospective and meeting application that facilitates online collaboration, enabling teams to conduct meetings in real-time or asynchronously, and automatically generates meeting summaries and tasks. The software also provides insights about team performance based on meeting data. It was founded in 2015 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Aura
cb_description: Aura harnesses the power of geolocation, image recognition, big data, and social networking to empower users to experience art like never before. Whether one is exploring a metropolitan art museum or just happens to stumble upon a provocative piece of art, Aura is the ultimate tool for documenting and preserving great works of art.

name: Mirakl

Abstract's valuation was not disclosed.

Nanogence's products are tailored to meet local production conditions and environmental standards, ensuring easy integration into existing manufacturing processes. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Renens, Switzerland.

name: CopyLeaks
cb_description: CopyLeaks is a company that focuses on AI-based text analysis in the domain of plagiarism and content detection. The company offers services such as detecting plagiarized content, identifying AI-generated content, verifying the authenticity and ownership of content, and aiding in error-free writing. It primarily serves the education sector, large businesses, and individual users. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

name: NationBuilder
cb_description: NationBuilder operates as a mission-driven software company. It builds the infrastructure for a world of creators by helping leaders develop and organize thriving communities. It helps to establish a web presence with social hooks, run campaigns or causes, raise funds, and manage volunteer initiatives. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: MaintainX
cb_description: MaintainX specializes in maintenance management and work execution software for various industries. The company offers a platform that streamlines maintenance operations, enhances asset management, and provides tools for work order management, preventive maintenance, and real-time inventory tracking. MaintainX primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, education, facility management, food and beverage, property management, hospitality, clubs and associations, and fleet management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Toplyne
cb_description: Toplyne provides digital marketing solutions within the technology sector, focusing on utilizing first-party data for advertising. The company offers services that identify high-value website visitors and predict their lifetime value, as well as optimizing return on ad spend for Meta and Google campaigns. Toplyne's solutions aim to convert website visitors into targeted audiences for various marketing channels. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bengaluru, India. Toplyne ceased operations in October 2024.

name: Entropik
cb_description: Entropik is an AI-powered integrated market research company specializing in consumer and user insights. The company offers platforms and technologies that measure and quantify human emotions, attention, and behavior to provide actionable insights for various industries. Entropik primarily serves market research firms, digital first brands, consumer brands, and the media & entertainment industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Port
cb_description: Port offers an e-commerce tool and payment processor to its customers. Port makes software for online and offline businesses to easily create and sell subscriptions.

name: Brenus Pharma
cb_description: Brenus Pharma serves as a biotechnology company focused on developing first-in-class tumor antigen-focused immunotherapies. The company's main offerings include an allogeneic platform that educates patients' immune systems to recognize and respond to cancer, with a particular emphasis on addressing the unmet need for solid tumor treatments. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Issoire, France.

name: ChurnZero
cb_description: ChurnZero focuses on providing digital-first customer success software. The company's main services include a platform offering tools for customer data centralization, customer engagement, process automation, churn risk prediction, and data visualization. Its tools primarily cater to the needs of subscription-based businesses. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: @Motion
cb_description: @Motion, formerly Arabesque Communications, is a developer of a voice-activated platform for narrowband wireless Internet access.

name: Allara
cb_description: Allara is a healthcare company that focuses on providing collaborative care for women with chronic health conditions, specifically in the hormonal, metabolic, and gynecological sectors. The company offers a range of services including medical expertise from board-certified physicians and nurse practitioners, nutrition and lifestyle support from registered dietitians, advanced testing to identify the root cause of symptoms, and personalized plans tailored to individual health goals. Allara primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a specific focus on women's health. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Synapticon
cb_description: Synapticon specializes in integrated motion control solutions for the robotics and machinery sectors. The company offers compact servo drives, integrated motion devices, and motion software that combine high performance with functional safety features. Synapticon's products are primarily utilized in the robotics automation industry, including applications for robot arms, cobots, AGVs, and integrated servo motors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Schonaich, Germany.

name: Taclia
cb_description: Taclia is a company that specializes in providing business management solutions across various sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for customer relationship management, invoice and quote processing, appointment scheduling, and task tracking, designed to streamline operations for small and medium-sized businesses. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: LambdaVision
cb_description: LambdaVision focuses on the development of medical technology in the healthcare industry. The company's main product is a protein-based artificial retina designed to restore vision for patients who have lost significant sight due to advanced retinal degenerative diseases. The artificial retina mimics the light-absorbing properties of human photoreceptors, replacing the function of damaged cells in the retinas of blind patients. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Farmington, Connecticut.

name: Vixtra
cb_description: Vixtra operates as a fintech company specializing in foreign trade. The company offers a solution for importers, addressing various supply chain issues. Its services include providing credit for imports, payment in local currency, protection against exchange rate fluctuations, access to compliance data and history of international suppliers, and control of import processes on a single platform. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: KETOS
cb_description: KETOS delivers a cloud-based monitoring solution. It provides water intelligence and insights. Its technology combines hardware, software, connectivity, automated reporting, predictive analytics, and maintenance to address global water management issues, mission-critical insights, and services. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Reebelo
cb_description: Reebelo is a marketplace specializing in refurbished technology and lifestyle products. The company offers a range of expertly refurbished electronics such as laptops, tablets, smartphones, and home appliances, providing consumers with cost-effective alternatives to new products. Reebelo's services cater to environmentally conscious consumers looking to purchase tech devices at reduced prices while supporting the circular economy. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Ansa
cb_description: Ansa is a company that focuses on news and information dissemination, operating in the media and journalism industry. The company provides a range of news services, offering updates on topics such as politics, business, science and technology, lifestyle, travel, arts, culture, fashion, food, wine, sports, and world events.  It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Form Health
cb_description: Form Health focuses on providing medical weight loss solutions through an online platform. The company offers personalized weight loss plans, developed by a team of medical experts, including nutritional guidance, physical activity recommendations, mindset shifts, and FDA-approved weight loss medications if appropriate. The services are primarily targeted towards individuals seeking a personalized approach to weight loss. The company was formerly known as Occom Medical Weight Loss. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Zentist
cb_description: Zentist specializes in automated revenue cycle management for the dental industry. Its product, Remit AI, centralizes and automates the management of insurance claims and payments for dental service organizations. Zentist primarily serves the dental services sector, offering solutions to enhance operational efficiency and financial performance. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SkyFi
cb_description: SkyFi aims to bring Internet connectivity to the entire globe with a network of 60 satellites costing less than one conventional satellite.

name: RetiSpec
cb_description: RetiSpec is a medical imaging company that focuses on the detection of neurodegenerative diseases using advanced artificial intelligence. The company's main service involves the use of hyperspectral camera technology combined with AI to non-invasively detect signs of diseases such as Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, Vascular Dementia, and ALS. RetiSpec primarily serves the medical and healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Blueprint
cb_description: Blueprint enables customers to purchase with 1 message, via SMS or WhatsApp. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom. On November 8, 2022 Blueprint was acquired by Klaviyo. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: ESG Book
cb_description: ESG Book is a company that focuses on sustainability data and technology within the financial markets sector. The company offers a range of services including providing environmental, social, and governance (ESG) raw data, analytics tools, and a software as a service (SaaS) data management and disclosure platform. These services are primarily used by financial institutions, corporates, and investors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Foodics
cb_description: Foodics specializes in restaurant operations and payment technology, offering a suite of software solutions for the food and beverage industry. The company provides a cloud-based point of sale (POS) and restaurant management system designed to streamline operations, along with various tools for payment processing, order management, and customer engagement. Foodics' ecosystem includes solutions for self-ordering, table payments via QR codes, waiter performance apps, and kitchen display systems to enhance efficiency and profitability. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Docker
cb_description: Docker operates as a platform-based software solution provider. It helps developers build, share, and run applications. Its container platform enables companies to accelerate key digital initiatives including cloud migration, application modernization, and edge computing. It was formerly known as dotCloud. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Pahdo Labs
cb_description: Pahdo Labs is a gaming startup focused on creating anime-inspired social worlds within the gaming industry. Their main offering includes the development of online multiplayer games that provide players with a sense of belonging, mastery, and the ability to impact a shared world. The company also emphasizes user-generated content, allowing players to contribute to the game's evolution. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Buildots
cb_description: Buildots provides a data-driven construction and project management platform. Its platform offers various services such as progress tracking and work planning, enabling users to have a comprehensive and automatically consolidated view of all site data. It primarily serves sectors such as site operations, project management, and finance. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Sanlo
cb_description: Sanlo was a Metals & Mining/Steel company based in Michigan City, Indiana.  Sanlo was acquired in 2004.

name: Venus Aerospace
cb_description: Venus Aerospace focuses on the aerospace industry, specifically in the domain of hypersonic transportation. The company's main service is the development of technology for one-hour global transport, aiming to make travel faster and safer. The primary sector caters to is the aerospace industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: World View
cb_description: World View is a company specializing in stratospheric exploration and remote sensing using high-altitude balloons within the aerospace industry. The company offers advanced un-crewed stratospheric vehicles for payload delivery to near-space environments and is developing commercial human spaceflight systems for space tourism. World View's balloons provide detailed imagery and data collection for various sectors, including agriculture, energy, maritime, and government research. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Tucson, Arizona.

name: CyLock
cb_description: CyLock specializes in cybersecurity solutions, focusing on vulnerability assessment and penetration testing services. The company offers a suite of tools that simulate cyber attacks to identify and address vulnerabilities in corporate IT systems, websites, and email systems. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Rome, Italy.

name: Vyv
cb_description: Vyv is a new way to discover content, where participation is central to surfacing diverse types of perspectives, from news to interest blogs, both locally and globally. Vyv is not only about personalized news or mainstream breaking news; its about a true tech-led democratization of content. As a result,  Vyv will help its readers discover global and diverse perspectives while enable independent creators to be broadcasted alongside established traditional channels.

name: Getlabs
cb_description: Getlabs is a company specializing in at-home diagnostics within the healthcare sector. They offer services where medical specialists are dispatched to collect diagnostic samples from patients and deliver them to laboratories such as Labcorp and Quest for testing. Getlabs primarily serves healthcare organizations by integrating at-home diagnostics into their care delivery models, thereby improving patient adherence and enabling remote medical decision-making. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Strand Therapeutics
cb_description: Strand Therapeutics is focused on the development of programmable, long-acting mRNA therapeutics within the biotechnology sector. The company offers a platform for creating mRNA drugs that are designed to deliver precise, multi-functional, and potentially curative treatments by programming logic-based circuits into mRNA to control protein expression in targeted cells. Strand Therapeutics' products are primarily aimed at improving treatment options for cancer and other life-threatening diseases. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Pipefy
cb_description: Pipefy designs and automates business workflows. It provides a business process management system (BPM) for small and midsize businesses on a subscription basis. It offers solutions such as process management, workflow management, robotic process automation (RPA) solutions, and more. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Justpoint
cb_description: Justpoint is a medico-legal tech firm operating in the legal and healthcare sectors. The company uses data to identify harmful substances and practices that negatively impact public health, and connects individuals affected by these issues with legal representation to pursue compensation. Its services primarily cater to individuals who have experienced adverse effects from medications, medical device injuries, medical malpractice, birth defects, defective products, toxic contamination, and personal injuries. Justpoint was formerly known as Intrellit, Inc. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Fast Travel Games
cb_description: Fast Travel Games is a virtual reality (VR) game developer and publisher in the gaming industry. The company specializes in creating immersive VR games with narratives and interactive environments. The products are designed to offer players new ways to explore and connect within game universes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Tornado
cb_description: Tornado Combustion Technologies specializes in the design and manufacturing of combustion systems within the energy sector. The company offers a range of products including custom-designed flare systems, ignition systems, enclosed combustion equipment, and safety arrestors. These products are engineered to ensure the effective and safe management of waste gases for energy producers and engineering firms. It was founded in 1984 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: Joshin
cb_description: Joshin is a company that focuses on providing support for neurodivergence and disability solutions. The company offers services such as virtual coaching, digital programs, and personalized navigation to help create inclusive and strong workplace cultures. It serves the corporate sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Saint Paul, Minnesota.

name: Frontegg
cb_description: Frontegg operates as a user management platform providing integration of user infrastructure designed to handle the application and its use cases. It supports application builders by covering all the way from fundamental authentication flows to advanced capabilities such as complex organizational structures, self-service admin portals for end-users, authorization, subscription enforcement, and more. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Spriggy
cb_description: Spriggy is a company focused on financial education, operating in the fintech industry. The company offers a mobile application and a prepaid Visa card, designed to help parents and children manage their money together, with features such as tracking spending, setting savings goals, and organizing regular pocket money payments. The primary target market for Spriggy's services is families with children aged 6-17. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: EDITED
cb_description: EDITED offers retail analytics services. It provides an artificial intelligence (AI)-driven merchandising experience platform. The company helps retailers improve predictability by connecting business analytics and external market data for brands to make data-backed decisions and expediting insights into automating actions. EDITED was formerly known as Stylesignal. It was founded in 2009 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Routific Solutions
cb_description: Routific Solutions is a logistics platform that operates in the route optimization and delivery management industry. The company offers a route planning software that optimizes delivery routes, provides real-time tracking of drivers, and offers customers delivery notifications and tracking links. Routific primarily serves businesses in the delivery sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Blender
cb_description: Blender is a fintech company that specializes in the consumer credit sector. The company offers a range of financial services including peer-to-peer lending, installment payments for products, car financing, and quick, responsible borrowing. These services are primarily targeted towards the consumer finance industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: AIRMART
cb_description: AIRMART covers a comprehensive range of game accessories and a trendy game club that gathers top-notch products, figures, models, and more. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

name: Trace Genomics
cb_description: Trace Genomics specializes in providing precision soil insights through advanced genomic analysis in the agriculture technology sector. The company offers comprehensive soil analysis services that leverage high-definition genome sequencing and machine learning to inform soil health management and agronomy decisions. Trace Genomics primarily serves the needs of retailers and growers within the agriculture industry. Trace Genomics was formerly known as PythoGn. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Ames, Iowa.

name: Seyna
cb_description: Seyna operates as a technology-driven company. It specializes in providing insurance infrastructure and underwriting services. The company offers a platform enabling insurance brokers to create, sell, and manage insurance products efficiently, as well as providing solutions for companies to integrate insurance offerings into their sales processes. Seyna primarily serves the insurance brokerage industry and companies looking to offer embedded insurance products. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France.

name: Florence
cb_description: Florence is a company that specializes in healthcare staffing solutions, focusing on connecting care professionals with temporary shifts in the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform for shift management, matching nurses, carers, and support workers with open shifts, and provides online training for social care teams. Florence serves as an alternative to traditional staffing agencies, aiming to simplify the process of filling staffing gaps for care home managers. Florence was formerly known as StaffAngel. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Hertfordshire, England.

name: InStride Health
cb_description: InStride Health is a healthcare company that focuses on providing evidence-based treatment for anxiety and obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD). The company offers a range of services including individual and family therapy, medication management, group therapy, and coaching, all tailored to the needs of children, teenagers, and young adults. It serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Raven
cb_description: Raven specializes in video telematics solutions within the automotive industry. It offers products that provide video monitoring, GPS tracking, and vehicle data analytics to improve driving safety, security, and operational productivity. Raven's solutions cater to both individual vehicle owners and businesses with remote field operations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Ottawa, Canada.

name: Tensorflight
cb_description: Tensorflight provides property intelligence solutions for the insurance industry, utilizing artificial intelligence and machine learning. The company offers a platform that automates commercial property inspections, assesses risk, estimates replacement costs, and streamlines claims processing. Tensorflight's services are used by insurance specialists to improve risk evaluation. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York. In October 2024, Tensorflight was acquired by Nearmap.

name: Spotta
cb_description:
Spotta provides transport, logistics, and supply chain services for folders, leaflets, and brochures.

On February 6th, 2020, Spotta was acquired by Arcis. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Pomerium
cb_description: Pomerium is a web3 gaming studio. It offers casual P2E games based on blockchain technology that provide users with ownership and control over their in-game assets, including NFTs and utility tokens. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Onymos
cb_description: Onymos is a software development company that operates in the technology industry. The company provides a platform that offers features-as-a-service for app development, including functionalities like login, OCR, and chat. It primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, education, and IoT. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Wisdomise
cb_description: Wisdomise provides a platform specializing in cryptocurrency trading and insights within the decentralized finance sector. It offers a suite of tools including trading signals, a portfolio manager, and an artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot named Athena that provides market insights and personalized investment strategies. Wisdomise caters to individual investors and traders seeking to navigate and capitalize on the complexities of the crypto market. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Baar, Switzerland.

name: Sixfold
cb_description: Sixfold specializes in generative artificial intelligence tools for the insurance underwriting sector. The company offers solutions that automate risk analysis, triage submissions, and summarize data, aiming to improve decision-making for insurers, managing general agents (MGA), and reinsurers. It primarily serves the insurance sector. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Skedulo
cb_description: Skedulo is a company that focuses on deskless productivity and mobile workforce management in the technology sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform that provides scheduling, dispatching, and management services for mobile workforces, enabling efficient coordination and communication between deskless workers and their employers. Skedulo primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, telecommunications, public sector, and real estate. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Redaptive
cb_description: Redaptive specializes in providing Energy-as-a-Service solutions within the sustainability and energy sectors. The company offers fully-funded, end-to-end services for energy efficiency and renewable upgrades, including real-time data monitoring and flexible financing options. Redaptive primarily serves organizations looking to enhance their energy savings and sustainability efforts across commercial and industrial real estate portfolios. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Pear Suite
cb_description: Pear Suite focused on empowering community health workers with a care navigation platform within the healthcare sector. Its main offerings include a platform that enables health workers to assess and address social drivers of health effectively. Pear Suite primarily serves health plans, community-based organizations, community centers, outreach nonprofits, and health systems and providers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Honolulu, Hawaii.

name: Zwift
cb_description: Zwift is a fitness company that operates in the health and wellness industry, with a particular focus on virtual training for running and cycling. The company offers a virtual training app that allows users to engage in indoor cycling and running workouts, compete with others, and follow structured training plans. The primary customers of Zwift are individuals seeking a fitness solution that can be used indoors and offers a social and competitive aspect. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Long Beach, California.

name: Fetcherr
cb_description: Fetcherr specializes in AI-driven market engines and decision-making within the aviation industry. The company offers a Generative Pricing Engine (GPE) that automates pricing strategies, forecasts demand and optimizes revenue through high-frequency, market-responsive adjustments. Fetcherr's technology is designed to integrate with existing airline systems, providing a seamless transition to a cloud-based retailing environment without the need for infrastructure replacement. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Netanya, Israel.

name: Qloo
cb_description: Qloo serves as a company specializing in cultural AI within the data science and consumer insights industry. Its main offerings include a privacy-first API that predicts global consumer preferences and provides recommendations based on demographics, cultural entities, and geospatial data. Qloo's technology is utilized across various sectors, including media, entertainment, technology, e-commerce, and more, product development and consumer experiences. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BlueDot
cb_description: BlueDot is a company focused on identifying and reimagining technological innovations, primarily in the research and development industry. The company's main service involves sourcing promising technologies from top research labs around the world and transforming these inventions into viable businesses. BlueDot primarily serves the technology and entrepreneurship sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.

name: Edge Impulse
cb_description: Edge Impulse specializes in machine learning tooling for edge devices within the AI technology sector. The company provides a platform for building datasets, training models, and optimizing algorithms to run on a variety of hardware from microcontrollers to neural accelerators. Edge Impulse primarily serves industries that require edge AI solutions, such as healthcare, industrial monitoring, and smart infrastructure. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: xAI
cb_description: xAI focuses on artificial intelligence, specifically in the domain of language learning models. The company's main product, Grok, is designed to answer questions and suggest potential inquiries, functioning as a research assistant that helps users find information online. xAI primarily caters to the AI research community and the general public seeking AI tools for information retrieval and understanding. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Burlingame, California.

name: Testlio
cb_description: Testlio is a company that focuses on software testing in the technology industry. The company offers comprehensive solutions for software quality challenges, integrating both automated and manual testing methods to ensure optimal software performance. Testlio primarily serves diverse industries such as commerce and retail, finance and banking, health and wellness, media and entertainment, learning and education, mobility and travel, and software and services. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Nextmv
cb_description: Nextmv provides a decision optimization platform operating in the technology industry. The company offers solutions for routing, scheduling, and packing, enabling businesses to model, test, and manage their operational decisions. It primarily serves sectors such as logistics, healthcare, and e-commerce. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Mixmax
cb_description: Mixmax is a sales engagement platform that specializes in enhancing the productivity of revenue teams across various sectors. The company offers a suite of tools designed to automate repetitive tasks, streamline workflows, and facilitate customer engagement through personalized communication sequences. Mixmax primarily serves sectors that involve customer interaction and sales processes, such as the ecommerce industry, real estate tech industry, and cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Kettle
cb_description: Provider of salty snack food. The company's main products include fried potato chips and baked potato chips. It also manufactures roasted nuts, nut butters, and tortilla chips.

name: Webflow
cb_description: Webflow provides a drag-and-drop website builder. The company enables users to design custom, professional websites without code by automatically generating code. It also offers services such as content management, cross-functioning collaboration, and more. Primarily it serves the technology industry. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: SaveIN
cb_description: SaveIN is a fintech platform focused on healthcare financing, operating within the healthcare and wellness sectors. The company offers financial solutions for medical services through 0% EMI plans, enabling patients to access a variety of healthcare procedures with the added benefit of cashback rewards. SaveIN primarily serves individuals seeking medical and wellness services, as well as healthcare practices looking for a platform to connect with patients. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Beckley Psytech
cb_description: Beckley Psytech is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing psychedelic therapies for neuropsychiatric disorders. The company's main offerings include the creation of licensed psychedelic medicines and the development of novel treatments using compounds such as 5-MeO-DMT and psilocin, supported by personalized psychological support and digital tools to optimize patient outcomes.
