It was founded in 2019 and is based in Oxford, England.

name: Bigle Legal
cb_description: Bigle Legal is a company that focuses on legal operations automation, specifically in the Contract Lifecycle Management (CLM) software industry. The company's main offerings include a cloud-based platform that automates and manages the entire lifecycle of legal documents, improving security and minimizing legal risks. The platform's capabilities extend to document automation, contract management, intelligent workflows, contract negotiation, and electronic signature. Bigle Legal primarily serves sectors such as real estate, corporations, law firms, and notaries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Auron Therapeutics
cb_description: Auron Therapeutics is a biotechnology company that focuses on the development of therapies for solid tumor cancers and hematological malignancies. The company's main service is the development of differentiation-based therapies, which aim to transform the way cancer is treated by targeting cellular plasticity and dysregulated differentiation. These therapies are developed using a proprietary AI-powered platform that integrates large, multi-omic datasets to compare tumor tissue to normal tissues and understand the pathways associated with tumor plasticity and treatment resistance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Wellesley, Massachusetts.

name: Pinecone
cb_description:
Pinecone is a simple email-driven social ecommerce platform that helps people sell stuff online and get distributed in a novel way. While a million online shop things already exist, what makes Pinecone special is the integration with email. 

But wait, what does that mean

Sure, people can sell stuff online already, using excellent products like Shopify, Etsy and now Gumroad, but what Pinecone brings to the table is a unique match-up with email that allows email-senders the opportunity curate their own in-email shops, sell stuff, share proceeds. Pinecones cultural matching engine makes for a fun way for both sellers, buyers and email-distributers to be matched up the right way. The world doesnt need another email app, nor another online shop builder app. Pinecone is both and neither.

Founded by Mad Mimi creator Gary Levitt, Piinecones design and joie de vivre is a key component. Stay tuned for Pinecone updates and news about the launch planned for Q2 2014.

name: Neuspera
cb_description: Neuspera develops implantable medical device technology within the healthcare sector. It offers minimally invasive implants and external wearable transmitters designed to provide relief from symptoms of chronic conditions such as Urinary Urgency Incontinence (UUI). It was formerly known as Vivonda Medical. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Hop.in
cb_description: Hop.in is a mobile app for cataloging web content. With a simple gesture, clip and organize all the things you love from the web, directly from your iPad, and upload your collections to any cloud service such as Evernote.

name: Cushion
cb_description: Cushion is a fintech company that focuses on bill management and credit building. The company offers a platform that allows users to organize and pay their bills, track their Buy Now Pay Later payments, and build their credit score. The primary customers of Cushion are individuals seeking to improve their financial management and credit scores. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Trust Lab
cb_description: Trust Lab is a company focused on online safety and compliance in the technology sector. It offers cutting-edge software and metrics that help protect users on social media platforms, online marketplaces, and apps from harmful content such as misinformation, hate speech, and identity fraud. The company primarily serves large enterprises with complex Trust & Safety needs and small companies developing their internal policies and teams. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Versatile
cb_description: Versatile shapes modern farming as a manufacturer of tractors and tillage equipment. It is focused on the needs of farmers and delivers equipment from research and development through engineering and production. It is a company that mass-produces articulated four-wheel-drive tractors. It was founded in 1996 and is based in Winnipeg, Canada.

name: Rezilion
cb_description: Rezilion focuses on software for supply chain security. It offers an automated platform that helps to detect, prioritize, and remediate software risks, providing solutions for vulnerability management, and software supply chain security. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Beer-Sheva, Israel.

name: Aibidia
cb_description: Aibidia is a platform that offers digital transfer pricing management systems. It provides multinationals, professional services firms, and tax authorities solutions to execute and manage cross-border transactions and business activities on data and intelligence. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Helinski, Finland.

name: Brill Power
cb_description: Brill Power focuses on battery management and power conversion technology in the energy storage and electric vehicle domain. The company offers a battery intelligence platform that helps in the longevity, performance, cost-effectiveness, and sustainability of batteries for electric vehicles and stationary energy storage systems. It primarily serves the electric vehicle and stationary energy storage industries. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Oxford, United Kingdom.

name: Braintrust
cb_description: Braintrust operates as a decentralized talent network in the recruiting and staffing industry, leveraging AI to connect companies with skilled professionals. The platform offers AI-driven recruiting solutions to efficiently match vetted knowledge workers with enterprises seeking to fill technical roles, while maintaining a transparent hiring process. Braintrust primarily serves the technology sector, offering access to a global pool of talent for project-based work and long-term contracts. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sanergy
cb_description: Sanergy is a collaborative organization focused on addressing the sanitation crisis through the principles of the circular economy, operating within the environmental services and waste management industry. The company's main services include empowering cities to develop safe sanitation systems, manufacturing products such as fertilizers, fuels, and animal feed from upcycled waste, and providing professional waste collection services. Sanergy primarily serves the urban development and agricultural sectors. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Finhabits
cb_description: Finhabits develops a financial wellness platform. The company offers services such as investment accounts, retirement accounts, and health insurance coverage, all aimed at helping individuals build, grow, and protect their wealth. Primarily, Finhabits caters to the Latino community. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: PresenceLearning
cb_description: PresenceLearning operates as an education and training company. The company offers a range of services including speech-language therapy, mental health counseling, psychoeducational assessments, and occupational therapy, all delivered through an online platform. Its primary customers are schools, agencies, and independent practitioners in the education industry. It was formerly known as Presence Telecare. It was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Kueski
cb_description: Kueski is an online consumer lender in the financial services sector, focusing on providing credit solutions to users who may not have access to traditional bank loans. The company offers personal loans with a quick and secure online application process, as well as a digital payment method, Kueski Pay, which allows customers to make credit purchases online or in-store without a credit card. Kueski also provides financial education resources to help users manage their finances effectively. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Jalisco, Mexico.

name: CodeSandbox
cb_description: CodeSandbox is a cloud development platform operating in the technology industry. The company provides instant cloud development environments, enabling developers to code, collaborate, and ship projects of any size from any device. Its services are primarily used by the software development industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Enschede, Netherlands.

name: StarOfService
cb_description: StarOfService is a company focused on the service marketplace industry. It offers a platform where users can hire local service professionals such as photographers, tutors, contractors, and others, simplifying the process of hiring services. The company primarily serves the service industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Courbevoie, France.

name: TagMango
cb_description: TagMango is a creators' platform focused on monetization tools within the e-learning and digital content sectors. The company provides a suite of services that enable creators to host workshops, launch courses, and manage memberships, all aimed at engaging communities and monetizing content. TagMango's offerings cater to a diverse range of creators looking to monetize their skills and knowledge through direct-to-consumer interactions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Kate Therapeutics
cb_description: Kate Therapeutics is a biotechnology company focused on developing gene therapies for muscle and heart diseases. The company offers AAV-based gene therapies designed to overcome limitations of current treatments by enhancing tissue-specific delivery and gene regulation. Its primary market includes healthcare providers and patients within the genetic disease treatment sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: SoundCommerce
cb_description: SoundCommerce is a data platform focused on the retail industry. The company offers services that connect and model marketing, operations, and merchandising data, enabling retailers to optimize order and shopper profitability across all business functions. It primarily serves the retail industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Maven
cb_description: Maven specializes in proactive pet care through its AI-Vet technology, operating within the veterinary healthcare sector. The company offers a suite of services that includes continuous health monitoring of pets, early detection of potential health issues, and seamless integration with veterinary practice management systems. Maven's AI-Vet system is designed to assist veterinary practices by automating appointment scheduling and providing detailed health data analysis to improve treatment outcomes. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Mindoula Health
cb_description: Mindoula Health is a next-generation population health management company operating in the healthcare sector. The company provides data-driven, team-based behavioral health support, focusing on identifying, engaging, and serving populations with behavioral health and medical challenges. Its main services include case management, psychiatry and therapy, and the use of technology to provide 24/7 support to complex and underserved behavioral health populations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Silver Spring, Maryland.

name: Agorus
cb_description: Agorus is a construction technology company focused on optimizing the custom home building process. They offer a digital end-to-end solution that includes automated pricing, virtual modeling, collaborative plan review, and precision robotics manufacturing for residential construction. Agorus primarily serves the housing development sector with customizable precision products for builders. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: RightHand Robotics
cb_description: RightHand Robotics specializes in artificial intelligence and robotics. The company provides robotic piece-picking solutions, which are designed to improve the efficiency and predictability of order fulfillment processes. Its solutions are used across various industries, including pharmaceuticals, apparel, and e-commerce. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Desana
cb_description: Desana specializes in hybrid workplace management, operating within the corporate real estate and workspace industry. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to manage, pay for, and utilize workspaces across their own offices and the global flexible workspace market. Desana's services include booking of hot desks, meeting rooms, private offices, and event spaces, as well as providing data analytics for office space utilization and strategic planning. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Edinburgh, Scotland.

name: Logixboard
cb_description: Logixboard focuses on providing customer experience software. It runs a platform that offers real-time visibility and sales enablement tools for forwarders and customs brokers, integrating easily with existing logistics software. The company primarily serves the logistics and supply chain management industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Spyne
cb_description: Spyne is a deep tech company specializing in AI-powered photography and editing solutions within the automotive industry. Their main offerings include a virtual studio for car imagery, 360-degree spins to showcase vehicles from every angle, and AI video tours to enhance online car sales. They primarily cater to the automotive sector, providing tools for dealerships and marketplaces to create high-quality visual catalogs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: Li Industries
cb_description: Li Industries specializes in developing advanced battery recycling technologies within the climate tech sector. The company offers solutions such as smart battery sorting and direct E2E Li-ion Battery Recycling, which automate the process of battery identification, separation, and material regeneration for reuse. It primarily serves battery manufacturers, cathode producers, battery recyclers, and collectors, providing them with technologies to enhance supply chain efficiencies. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Pineville, North Carolina.

name: Ada Health
cb_description: Ada Health is a company that focuses on the healthcare sector, utilizing intelligent technology to support better health outcomes and clinical excellence. The company offers an application that helps users understand, manage, and get care for symptoms with trusted medical expertise in minutes. Ada Health primarily serves the healthcare industry, providing powerful enterprise solutions to inform health decisions, enhance triage to appropriate care, and reduce avoidable costs. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Howbout
cb_description: Howbout focuses on social calendar management within the technology sector. It offers a digital calendar application designed to facilitate the sharing of schedules and coordination of events among friends. It simplifies the process of finding common free time and planning get-togethers without the hassle of back-and-forth communication. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Savi
cb_description: Savi focuses on providing cloud-based solutions in the retail, restaurant, and convenience store industries. The company offers a platform that integrates cloud video, data, and artificial intelligence to enhance customer experience, operational efficiency, and loss prevention. Its primary services are utilized in the retail and restaurant sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bountiful, Utah.

name: Hudson MX
cb_description: Hudson MX provides a cloud-based platform focused on advertising media activation and management within the media industry. Their main offerings include software that enables agencies and brands to manage media buying, tracking, billing, and payment processes, as well as providing real-time insights into media spend. The company primarily serves the advertising agency industry and brands that manage media buying in-house. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia. Hudson MX ceased operation in October 2024.

name: SATIM
cb_description: SATIM is a company that focuses on object detection and classification using Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellite imagery, operating in the defense, security, and commercial sectors. The company offers services that include the accurate detection and classification of various objects such as military ships, civil vessels, and aircraft using SAR satellite imagery. SATIM primarily serves sectors such as defense and security, open ocean monitoring, land and port surveillance, and commercial industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Cracow, Poland.

name: Nexus
cb_description: Nexus specializes in online sales management solutions for the hospitality industry. The company's primary focus is account management (Salesforce Automation) and contract management (RFPs). Nexus' services focus on the needs of hotel groups in managing the RFP responses that hotels send back to major corporations, travel management companies, wholesalers and group (MICE) agencies.

name: Amai Proteins
cb_description: Amai Proteins is a company focused on the development of designer proteins, specifically within the food and beverage industry. The company's main offering is the creation of sweet proteins that can significantly reduce the amount of added sugar in a variety of food and beverage products, providing a healthier and more sustainable alternative. These proteins are primarily used in the food industry, replacing a significant portion of the added sugar without altering the taste. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Rehovot, Israel.

name: WhereIsMyTransport
cb_description: WhereIsMyTransport operates a mobility technology company providing mobility and location data solutions. It offers transit data, point of interest (POI) data, real-time alerts, and more. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom. WhereIsMyTransport ceased operation in October 2023.

name: Syte
cb_description: Syte is a technology company specializing in AI-powered visual search and product discovery solutions for the eCommerce sector. The company offers a platform that enhances online shopping experiences by providing visual AI tools for search, personalized recommendations, and automated product tagging. Syte primarily serves the fashion, home decor, and jewelry industries with its product discovery platform. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: K4Connect
cb_description: K4Connect is a company that specializes in integrating smart technologies to enhance the lives of older adults and individuals with disabilities within the senior living industry. The company's main offerings include FusionOS, an enterprise software that powers senior living communities by integrating various systems, tools, and services to improve operations, care, communication, and engagement. K4Connect's solutions are tailored to benefit residents, staff, and operators by providing a suite of engagement tools, management dashboards, and smart home applications. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Morrisville, North Carolina.

name: Vessi Medical
cb_description: Vessi Medical focuses on the development of medical devices specifically within the healthcare and cancer treatment sectors. The company's main product is an IP-protected cryo spray designed for hollow and humid organs, offering a new approach to the treatment of Non-Muscle Invasive Bladder Cancer (NMIBC). Its solution provides an alternative to surgery. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Misgav, Israel.

name: Boosted Commerce
cb_description: Boosted Commerce is a consumer product goods platform that specializes in the acquisition and growth of ecommerce businesses within the online retail sector. The company focuses on purchasing businesses from third-party sellers on platforms such as Amazon FBA and Shopify, and invests in the development of original products across various market verticals. Boosted Commerce primarily targets sellers in the ecommerce industry who are looking to exit their businesses. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Beverly Hills, California.

name: Dovly
cb_description: Dovly is an automated credit engine that specializes in credit score optimization and financial health. The company offers services such as credit report monitoring, AI-powered credit disputes, and ID theft alerts to help individuals manage and improve their credit scores. Dovly also provides educational resources and personalized financial recommendations to support its users' overall financial well-being. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Phoenix, Arizona.

name: Everly Health
cb_description: Everly Health is a digital health platform specializing in diagnostics-driven care and the healthcare sector. The company offers at-home testing kits and digital tools for diagnosing and managing recurring health conditions, providing results online. Everly Health primarily serves the healthcare ecosystem, including individual consumers and enterprise clients. Everly Health was formerly known as Everly Well. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Industrious
cb_description: Industrious specializes in providing coworking and private office spaces within the commercial real estate sector. The company offers thoughtfully-designed workspaces that cater to individuals, small teams, and large teams, with a focus on flexibility and professional community support. Industrious serves a diverse clientele, including freelancers, startups, and established corporations seeking adaptable office solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Girls Who Code
cb_description: Girls Who Code focuses on closing the gender gap in technology and altering the public perception of programmers. The organization provides educational programs such as coding clubs for students, summer coding programs, and career support for college students to foster a community of women in technology. It primarily serves the edcucation sector. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Amulet
cb_description: Amulet is a Acton, Massachusetts-based Software (non-internet/mobile) company.

name: bioMason
cb_description: bioMason specializes in biotechnology-driven cement production for the construction industry. The company's main product is a biocement that is created using microorganisms to bind carbon into calcium carbonate, offering an alternative to traditional cement. This biocement technology is primarily aimed at concrete producers seeking production methods. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Iomed
cb_description: Iomed is a medical device company. It had developed the Champion Iontophoretic Drug Delivery Device.

name: Traxens
cb_description: Traxens is a company that focuses on the logistics and supply chain industry, providing advanced tracking solutions for shipping containers. The company offers smart container solutions that allow customers to track their cargo in real-time, monitor transport conditions such as temperature and humidity, and receive instant alerts for any issues. This technology is primarily used in the shipping and freight forwarding industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Marseille, France.

name: Freetrade
cb_description: Freetrade provides a mobile application platform offering trading services. It allows users to invest in the stock market and connects them with a network of professional independent advisors. It offers products including general investment accounts, stocks, shares, and pensions. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Tradeshift
cb_description: Tradeshift operates as a supply chain network for e-invoicing and accounts payable automation. It provides accounts payable, e-procurement, and strategic finance. The company offers business to business marketplace platform for e-procurement, application programming interface, supplier collaboration and analytics, and more. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Astek Diagnostics
cb_description: Astek Diagnostics specializes in precision diagnostics within the healthcare sector, focusing on the development of the JIDDU system, a clinical diagnostics platform. The company's main offering is a system that provides rapid confirmation of urinary tract infections and indications of antibiotic sensitivity within one hour. The JIDDU system is primarily aimed at improving patient outcomes in the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Baltimore, Maryland.

name: Hive
cb_description: Hive is an electric scooter sharing platform that can be booked via the company's mobile app.

name: Amenli
cb_description: Amenli operates as a licensed insurance brokerage company. The company offers a convenient and transparent experience for customers to get instant insurance quotes and make purchases, all from the comfort of their homes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Juvena Therapeutics
cb_description: Juvena Therapeutics is a biopharmaceutical company focused on developing tissue restorative biologics for the treatment of myopathies and metabolic diseases. The company leverages a computational platform to map the therapeutic potential of natural secreted proteins and engineer them into novel biologic medicines aimed at restoring tissue homeostasis. Juvena's approach includes AI-powered analysis, in vitro human cell screening, in vivo pharmacology, and advanced protein engineering to create treatments for conditions such as myotonic dystrophy, obesity, sarcopenia, and various lung and liver diseases. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: SiFive
cb_description: SiFive is a company focused on the development and innovation of RISC-V-based IP, operating within the technology and computing industry. The company offers high-performance computing solutions, with a focus on creating efficient and cost-effective cores for chips, which are used in a variety of applications including automotive, AI and machine learning, data centers, edge computing, Internet of Things, aerospace, consumer devices, and mobile technology. SiFive primarily serves sectors such as the automotive industry, data centers, consumer device companies, and the aerospace industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Switchboard Software
cb_description: Switchboard Software specializes in data engineering automation and real-time analytics within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies the integration and management of data from various sources, providing businesses with reliable and actionable insights. Switchboard Software primarily serves sectors such as media and publishing, retail, technology, franchise operations, and financial services. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Apty
cb_description: Apty is a company focused on digital adoption and process compliance in the software industry. The company offers a cloud-based platform that provides guided experiences and analytics to help enterprises streamline their operations, increase efficiency, and accelerate digital adoption. Apty's services are primarily used in sectors such as finance, healthcare, and retail. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Frisco, Texas.

name: Moderne
cb_description: Moderne is a developer collaboration platform that specializes in automated code refactoring and analysis within the technology sector. The company offers services that enable mass-scale, accurate automation for code migrations, security, and analysis, enhancing developer productivity and software maintenance. Moderne primarily serves sectors that require large-scale codebase management and improvement, such as technology companies and software development teams. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Tractable
cb_description: Tractable develops artificial intelligence (AI) systems for accident and disaster recovery. Its AI tools help to accelerate processes involving visual inspection and appraisal and cater its services to insurance and automotive companies. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Thatch
cb_description: Thatch is an online marketplace and mobile app operating in the travel industry. The company offers ready-to-book trip plans designed by travel creators around the world, which customers can personalize and book directly through the platform. Thatch primarily serves the travel and tourism industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: LIfT Biosciences
cb_description: LIfT Biosciences serves as a biotechnology company focused on developing cell therapies for the treatment of solid tumors. The company's main innovation involves Immuno-Modulatory Alpha Neutrophils (IMANs), which are designed to kill cancer cells directly and modulate the immune system to recognize and destroy tumors. LIfT Biosciences primarily targets the healthcare sector, offering solutions for oncology and cancer treatment. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Heru
cb_description: Heru is a company specializing in virtual accounting and tax management solutions for individuals and businesses. Their services include electronic invoicing, fiscal profile management, and assistance with tax declarations to ensure compliance with the Servicio de Administracin Tributaria (SAT). Heru was formerly known as Kuarto. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: OKKO Health
cb_description: OKKO Health specializes in self-monitoring vision technology for eye care, operating within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers smartphone-based vision monitoring solutions that utilize puzzle games embedded with vision science to enable patients to track eye health, particularly for conditions like AMD (Age-related Macular Degeneration). OKKO Health's technology aims to improve clinic efficiency and ensure timely treatment by facilitating remote eye care and patient engagement. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bristol, England.

name: CyberOwl
cb_description: CyberOwl specializes in cybersecurity analytics for operational assets within the maritime and critical national infrastructure sectors. The company offers technologies and services that provide visibility, security, and compliance for systems on remote assets, including near-real-time monitoring of asset behaviors and communication patterns, early warning of cyber threats, and support for cyber incident response. CyberOwl's solutions cater to asset operators with varying levels of cybersecurity expertise and are designed to function effectively in environments with intermittent connectivity and bandwidth constraints. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom. In September 2024, CyberOwl was acquired by DNV.

name: Kooply
cb_description: Kooply operates as a company focused on the development of a next-generation gaming platform, within the gaming industry. The company's main offering is a gaming platform. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Leaf
cb_description: Leaf is a company that focuses on the development of automated hydroponic home grow systems. The company's main product is a smart home appliance that allows users to cultivate their own cannabis, food, and herbs. This system features advanced automation, precise climate control, and a nutrient dosing system, all of which can be controlled remotely via a smartphone application. Leaf was formerly known as Cannagrow. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Contentful
cb_description: Contentful provides a composable content platform within the digital content and experience management industry. The company offers a suite of products that enable organizations to create, manage, and deliver digital content across various channels. Contentful's solutions cater to a range of use cases including global marketing, e-commerce, support portals, and mobile applications. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: CGHero
cb_description: CGHero specializes in outsourcing 3D and CGI production, primarily serving the video game sector. The company connects game developers with a global network of pre-vetted CG professionals and studios to scale production capacities and meet project demands. CGHero's platform supports a variety of industries, including games, architecture, automotive, retail, fashion, and film & TV, by providing talent and project management tools for remote collaboration. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Manchester, England.

name: CesiumAstro
cb_description: CesiumAstro specializes in software-defined phased array communication payloads for the aerospace and defense sectors. It offers a range of products including software-defined radios, single-board computers, power conditioning units, and up-and-down converters. Its products serve various applications such as inter-satellite links, mission data downlink, lunar communications, and multi-beam connectivity. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Daedalean
cb_description: Daedalean is a company focused on developing autonomous piloting systems for aircraft, operating within the aviation and aerospace sectors. The company offers a range of products including traffic detection, positioning, landing guidance, and their PilotEye system, which are designed to enhance situational awareness and flight control for both manned and unmanned aircraft. Daedalean's solutions cater to various sectors such as general aviation, commercial air transport, urban air mobility, and unmanned air vehicles. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: eVisit
cb_description: eVisit is a telemedicine provider operating in the healthcare sector. The company offers a virtual care platform that enables healthcare organizations to deliver services such as urgent care, primary care, specialty care, pre-post op care, and employee care using their own network of providers. eVisit primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Mesa, Arizona.

name: Total Expert
cb_description: Total Expert provides marketing solutions. The company offers a platform that unifies data, marketing, sales, and compliance solutions to provide a cohesive experience across the customer lifecycle. It serves the banking, lending, credit union, and insurance sectors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Invisible AI
cb_description: Invisible AI is a company that specializes in visual intelligence for the manufacturing sector, focusing on enhancing plant productivity, quality, and safety. The company offers an on-premise computer vision platform that analyzes manual assembly work and utilizes artificial intelligence to provide smart recommendations. Invisible AI's technology is primarily used in the automotive and aerospace industries to improve worker productivity and safety. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Oktopost
cb_description: Oktopost is a company that focuses on B2B social media engagement in the technology sector. The company offers a suite of services that include social media management, social listening, and employee advocacy, all designed to help businesses amplify their brand on social media, engage with customers and prospects, and measure the impact of their social media efforts. Oktopost primarily serves the technology, financial services, and law firms industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Wooptix
cb_description: Wooptix specializes in semiconductor metrology and wavefront phase imaging technology within the semiconductor industry. The company offers high-resolution wavefront sensors and metrology tools for semiconductor manufacturing, as well as R&D consultancy services. Wooptix's technology is primarily utilized in the semiconductor manufacturing sector for inline fab measurements and quality control. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tenerife, Spain.

name: ServiceTitan
cb_description: ServiceTitan provides software solutions for home and commercial service contractors. It offers a platform that integrates various functions such as scheduling, dispatching, marketing, reporting, and customer experience management to streamline operations and enhance productivity. Its software is designed to support contractors in optimizing workflows, improving customer experiences, and driving business growth through data-driven insights and automation. ServiceTitan was formerly known as Linxlogic. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Glendale, California.

name: Accern
cb_description: Accern is a company specializing in no-code natural language processing (NLP) for various industries, including financial services and government. The company offers a platform that enables enterprises to classify content and automate research workflows without the need for coding. Accern's solutions are designed to enhance operational efficiency and accelerate the deployment of NLP solutions across a range of sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: DragonflyDB
cb_description: DragonflyDB focuses on providing in-memory data storage solutions. The company offers a high-performance data store designed to power data-intensive, low-latency applications. DragonflyDB primarily caters to the cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: VRGL
cb_description: VRGL specializes in wealth management technology, focusing on streamlining the investment proposal process for financial advisors. The company offers a platform that automates the creation of investment proposals, assesses clients' risk tolerance, aggregates financial statements, and provides comprehensive portfolio analysis. VRGL primarily serves the wealth management industry, offering tools that facilitate advisor-client engagement, compliance with investment policies, and acceleration of client acquisition and retention. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: BillEase
cb_description: BillEase specializes in consumer credit services within the fintech sector. The company offers a range of financial products including personal loans, e-wallet top-ups, and installment plans for online and offline purchases without the need for a credit card. BillEase primarily serves the e-commerce industry, enabling customers to manage their purchases with flexible payment options. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Manila, Philippines.

name: Crisp
cb_description: A small team working on RTB for Mobile Ads. More details soon to follow.

name: Awardco
cb_description: Awardco is an employee rewards and recognition software company that operates in the human resources technology sector. The company offers a platform for managing recognition programs, service awards, incentive programs, and lifestyle spending accounts, designed to enhance corporate culture and employee engagement. Awardco's platform integrates with Amazon Business and provides access to a vast rewards marketplace, including gift cards, hotel bookings, custom swag, events, and experiences. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Lindon, Utah.

name: DataChat
cb_description: DataChat operates as a no-code, generative artificial intelligence (AI) platform specializing in making data analytics accessible across various sectors. The company offers tools that enable users to perform data analysis, create predictive models, and visualize data through a conversational interface, without the need for coding skills. DataChat's solutions are designed to cater to users like data scientists and business professionals, by allowing them to query data in plain English and integrate with spreadsheets. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Madison, Wisconsin.

name: Consentio
cb_description: Consentio is a platform for real-time opinion polls and consumer, customer, stakeholder, and audience analysis.

name: Yodawy
cb_description: Yodawy is a modern-day digital pharmacy platform in the healthcare sector. The company offers a healthcare platform that simplifies patient access to medications through monthly refills, on-demand prescriptions, and over-the-counter products, all delivered from the nearest pharmacy. Yodawy primarily serves the healthcare insurance industry by acting as a Pharmacy Benefits Manager for health insurance companies and third-party administrators. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Giza, Egypt.

name: The Blinc Group
cb_description: The Blinc Group is a company that focuses on the design, development, supply, and support of premium cannabis vaping hardware. Its main offerings include a range of cartridges, batteries, ready-to-use vaporizers, and bespoke device development. The company primarily serves multi-state operators, licensed producers, and brands in the cannabis industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Oncora Medical
cb_description: Oncora Medical specializes in healthcare technology, focusing on software solutions for oncology care. The company offers a suite of products that streamline documentation, support treatment decision-making, and facilitate research through data analytics and machine learning. Oncora's software is primarily utilized by cancer care centers and oncology professionals. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Phenomic AI
cb_description: Phenomic AI is a biotech company focused on developing new medicines that target the tumor stroma within the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include a single-cell transcriptomics platform that leverages machine learning to analyze cellular data and identify potential drug targets for solid tumor therapies. Phenomic AI's platform is designed to provide insights into the tumor microenvironment, aiming to improve patient outcomes in stroma-rich cancers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Alkira
cb_description: Alkira focuses on reinventing networking for the cloud era, operating within the cloud networking industry. The company offers a cloud networking platform that simplifies the deployment of global, hybrid and multi-cloud networks, integrating users, sites, and clouds with network and security services. Alkira's solutions enable enterprises to manage their network infrastructure on-demand without the need for hardware procurement or complex software deployments. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Abnormal
cb_description: Abnormal is a company specializing in cloud email security within the cybersecurity industry. It offers comprehensive protection against email attacks that exploit human behavior, including phishing, social engineering, and account takeovers, by utilizing a platform that understands human behavior. Abnormal's products are designed to serve various sectors that rely heavily on email communication for their operations. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Descartes
cb_description: Descartes Underwriting specializes in parametric insurance within the insurance industry, focusing on climate and emerging risks. The company offers transparent, swift-claim parametric insurance products that are designed to protect against natural catastrophes and weather-related risks, utilizing advanced data analytics and technology. Descartes primarily serves corporate clients and governments, providing bespoke insurance solutions that enhance resilience against climate-related and other emerging risks. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Anaphite
cb_description: Anaphite develops battery technology within the energy sector by developing cathode powders for Li-ion batteries. The company's main offerings include fully formulated carbon nanotube enhanced cathode powders designed for direct dry coating, which aims to provide high electrochemical performance without the need for solvents, additives, or mixing. Anaphite's proprietary DCP production process is tailored to the needs of the sustainable transportation sector, aiming to reduce the carbon footprint of battery manufacturing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bristol, United Kingdom.

name: Evidea
cb_description: Evidea is an e-commerce site and chain of stores that offers quality, broadly appealing, and easy-to-assemble products at reasonable prices for those who want to shop for their home and add value to it. The company focuses on customer experience, keeps up with the market, leads new trends, and inspires. Evidea provides a wide range of products including home decor accessories, kitchenware, bedroom textiles, bathroom accessories, storage organizers, lighting solutions, furniture items, and electrical home appliances, all designed to create comfortable and stylish living spaces. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Paperspace
cb_description: Paperspace delivers a cloud computing and deep learning development platform. It allows users to build, train, and deploy artificial intelligence (AI) models and applications. The company offers solutions featuring graphics processing unit (GPU) infrastructure and machine learning. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Brooklyn, New York. In July 2023, Paperspace was acquired by DigitalOcean.

name: Dashlane
cb_description: Dashlane is a company focused on password management and credential security within the cybersecurity industry. Its main offerings include a platform for managing passwords, securing employee access, and protecting against data breaches with features like autofill, single sign-on integration, and continuous monitoring for compromised credentials. Dashlane's solutions cater to a broad range of sectors, including businesses of all sizes and individuals seeking to enhance their digital security. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Patrowl
cb_description: Patrowl engages in cybersecurity, specifically in exposure management and external security posture management. It offers services that automate the detection and remediation of vulnerabilities, using artificial intelligence to conduct continuous penetration tests and identify assets and vulnerabilities. It provides a dashboard with real-time security level visualization and actionable solutions for improvement. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Lungpacer Medical
cb_description: Lungpacer Medical is a medical device company focused on developing solutions for respiratory and critical care. The company's main offering is a minimally invasive, temporary transvenous diaphragmatic neurostimulation system designed to strengthen the diaphragm and assist patients in weaning off mechanical ventilators. This system, which has received FDA Emergency Use Authorization for use during the COVID-19 pandemic, aims to improve the process of ventilator weaning and enhance patient outcomes in critical care settings. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Wethos
cb_description: Wethos provides a software platform operating in the technology and business services sector. The company provides a comprehensive solution for freelancers, agencies, and small studios, offering services such as creating professional proposals, invoicing, payments, and collaboration tools. It primarily serves the freelance and agency sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Segmed
cb_description: Segmed focuses on the aggregation, de-identification, and standardization of medical imaging data in the healthcare and artificial intelligence sectors. The company's main services include providing access to diverse, de-identified medical imaging data, and enabling AI teams to work with this data for their research and development needs. Segmed primarily sells to the healthcare industry and the artificial intelligence industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Pao Alto, California.

name: Hearth
cb_description: Hearth has a smart-vent system that allows homeowners to control airflow and room temperature.

name: Hero
cb_description: Hero specializes in performance-driven marketing solutions within the digital advertising sector. The company offers services that include personalized content feeds, search visibility, and targeted ad campaigns designed to engage shoppers and optimize conversion rates. Hero's solutions are primarily utilized by brands looking to increase revenue and return on ad spend through digital marketing. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York. In April 2024, Hero was acquired by Bambuser.37M.

name: Flockjay
cb_description: Flockjay focuses on sales enablement in business. It offers a unified platform for sales teams, providing services such as content and learning management, peer-to-peer learning, and AI-driven coaching, primarily selling to the sales industry, catering to both small and large businesses. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Covina, California.

name: Congruence Therapeutics
cb_description: Congruence Therapeutics operates as a drug discovery company in the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industry. The company's main service involves the use of protein dynamics, biophysics, machine learning, and computational chemistry to develop predictive models for disease pathogenesis, aiming to correct these in silico with speed and accuracy. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Socket
cb_description: Socket is the company behind mobile commerce revenue optimization platform Flipdesk, an automated revenue optimization platform for mobile commerce sites, allowing them to distribute direct messages and discount coupons to customers based on behavioral analytics.

name: BigOmics
cb_description: BigOmics is a company focused on omics data analysis software within the biotechnology sector. Their main offerings include a user-friendly platform for analyzing and visualizing RNA-Seq and proteomics data, designed to deliver robust and reproducible results. The software caters to biologists, bioinformaticians, and managers, streamlining the data analysis process and reducing overhead costs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Viganello, Switzerland.

name: 1exchange
cb_description: 1exchange operates as a stock exchange platform. The company offers the monetary authority of Singapore (MAS)-regulated private securities exchange, risk disclosure statements, and investor protection. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore, Singapore. In August 2023, 1exchange was acquired bu Fomo Pay. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: 40Seas
cb_description: 40Seas is a company focused on digital trade financing within the global supply chain sector. It offers a platform for managing and automating B2B payments, accounts receivable, and extending credit terms for businesses engaged in international commerce. The company primarily serves importers, exporters, freight forwarders, and sourcing agencies with its financial services. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Airbyte
cb_description: Airbyte focuses on ELT processes within the data engineering domain. The company offers a suite of tools for database and API replication, preparation of data for AI and machine learning models, and a framework for developing custom data connectors. Airbyte's solutions are designed to address the needs of data engineers, AI engineers, analytics engineers, and data analysts, providing a versatile platform for managing data movement and integration. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: OnChain Studios
cb_description: OnChain Studios is a digital studio focused on creating interactive experiences that educate, empower, and entertain the next generation of collectors. The company brings true ownership to these experiences without specifying a particular sector of the economy it primarily sells to. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Loggi
cb_description: Loggi is a logistics company that focuses on providing fast, cost-effective, and reliable delivery services across Brazil. The company offers a range of services including nationwide parcel delivery, real-time tracking, and integration with e-commerce platforms. Loggi caters to both personal and business shipping needs, offering solutions that simplify the sending process and optimize logistics for online retailers. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Soundstripe
cb_description: Soundstripe operates as a music licensing company. The company provides royalty-free music, sound effects, and video downloads, which can be used on various platforms. It primarily serves the music industry. Soundstripe was formerly known as Levelo Music. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: RubiBrands
cb_description: RubiBrands focuses on e-commerce, specifically in the investment and transformation of e-commerce brands. The company's main service involves acquiring leading e-commerce brands, predominantly from Amazon, and transforming them into global brands by overcoming supply chain issues, accelerating brand growth, and partnering with brand founders. RubiBrands primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Auxilius
cb_description: Auxilius provides cloud-based Clinical Trial Financial Management (CTFM) software, specializing in the life sciences sector. The company offers a platform designed to facilitate financial close, trial budgeting, and investigator spend analytics. Auxilius primarily serves life sciences companies, including biotech and biopharma, with financial planning and analysis solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Palenca
cb_description: Palenca focuses on the financial technology sector. The company offers a payroll application programming interface (API) solution for consumers to share their employment information with financial institutions through an API. This service primarily caters to the financial services industry. The platform also develops HolaMajo, a personal financial advisor for consumers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Blueground
cb_description: Blueground is a global proptech company specializing in furnished apartment rentals for flexible durations. The company offers designer-furnished apartments with a focus on convenience, comfort, and a tech-enabled rental experience for stays of a month or longer. Blueground caters to various customer segments including business travelers, students, and individuals seeking temporary housing solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Influitive
cb_description: Influitive is a company that focuses on customer advocacy in the Software as a Service (SaaS) industry. The company offers a platform that combines customer advocacy tools, expert services, and training with intelligent automation, gamification, and personalization features to drive customer engagement and growth. The platform is designed to help businesses discover, nurture, and mobilize customer advocates, leading to increased referrals, reviews, and customer loyalty. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Functionland
cb_description: Functionland specializes in decentralized cloud storage solutions within the blockchain and cloud computing industries. The company offers Blockchain-Attached Storage units known as FxBlox, and software protocols that power decentralized applications (dApps) for photo storage, sharing, and file management, all operating on the Fula Network. Functionland's products are designed to provide private, encrypted storage and data management without reliance on traditional subscription-based cloud services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Mindspace
cb_description: Mindspace is a company that focuses on providing flexible office and coworking spaces, operating in the real estate and coworking industry. The company offers a range of services including private offices, team suites, and open space desks, as well as meeting rooms and event spaces. These services are designed to cater to the unique needs of teams of any size, providing shared lounges, kitchens, phone booths, and a community of like-minded companies and professionals. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Medorion
cb_description: Medorion is a company focused on Health Behavior Management in the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that enables health plans to improve health outcomes by understanding and managing individual health behaviors. Their services are primarily targeted towards health plans, with a focus on improving member health and financial outcomes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Omniful
cb_description: Omniful provides supply chain and warehouse management. It offers a range of services including order management, inventory management, shipping and fulfillment, returns management, and business intelligence. It offers grocery, pharmacy, health and beauty, fashion, electronics, tools and hardware, toys, books, and furniture sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Zubale
cb_description: Zubale focuses on e-commerce growth and digital retail solutions. The company offers a range of software solutions, including a fulfillment optimizer for improving productivity in e-commerce picking, packing, and delivery, conversational software for enhancing the consumer's e-commerce experience, and a platform for connecting with freelancers to scale e-commerce operations. It primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Yardstik
cb_description: Yardstik provides monitoring and security services. The company offers a platform that provides services such as identity verification, background checks, and other screening tools, designed to help businesses screen, verify, and hire people at a large scale.Yardstik was formerly known as Peak Verify. Yardstik was founded in 2019 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Catalog
cb_description: Catalog is a platform for creators to manage and secure visual assets for branding campaigns. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: ICWUSA
cb_description:
ICWUSA provides a selection of medical device mounts for all major medical device manufacturers. This includes laptop mounts, tablet mounts, and VT21 workstations.

On March 23rd, 2022, ICWUSA was acquired by TouchPoint. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Abodu
cb_description: Abodu specializes in the construction of prefabricated accessory dwelling units (ADUs) within the housing industry. The company offers customizable backyard homes that include full-size kitchens, bathrooms, and various space solutions for homeowners. Abodu primarily serves the residential sector, providing additional living space for family, rental opportunities, or home offices. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Flex
cb_description: Flex offers an API that turns video game achievements into real-life skill badges, which can be used on CV or job applications. The company operates in the gaming industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Dishcraft Robotics
cb_description: Dishcraft Robotics develops robots for the commercial kitchen. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Eight Sleep
cb_description: Eight Sleep serves as a sleep fitness company that operates in the consumer electronics sector. It offers a range of sleep products that include cooling, heating, and elevation technology designed to improve sleep quality. The company primarily serves the consumer market with a focus on individuals seeking enhanced sleep experiences. Eight Sleep was formerly known as Morphy. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: IBISA Network
cb_description: IBISA Network focuses on providing climate insurance solutions for the agriculture sector. The company offers index-based insurance products designed to protect stakeholders in the agriculture value chain from weather-related risks. IBISA primarily serves sectors such as AgriTechs, Food and Beverage companies, Input Companies, Insurance and Reinsurance Companies, Government and Development Agencies, Financial Institutions, Farmer Cooperatives, and the Dairy industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg.

name: Pest Share
cb_description: PestShare develops a platform that provides pest control coverage for tenants, property managers, and property owners. It allows tenants to receive pest control services and submit claims through the Pest Share portal, which eliminates back and forth between tenants and property managers. It helps pest control service professionals connect with the tenant to coordinate when the service should be performed. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Nampa, Idaho.

name: Latitude
cb_description: Latitude is a consulting firm operating in the business services industry. The company offers services aimed at helping businesses grow their revenue and profit, and develop their capabilities. This includes planning workshops, business plan development, business case testing, market reviews, profitability reviews, competitor analysis, and strategy development. It is based in England, United Kingdom.

name: Arianee
cb_description: Arianee specializes in the creation of tokenized digital product passports and engagement tokens within the blockchain sector. The company offers a protocol that enables brands to connect directly with owners of physical products, facilitating circular business models and digital sovereignty. Arianee's solutions include a suite of smart contracts for minting and interacting with dynamic NFTs, ensuring data interoperability and integrity, and providing a user-owned data infrastructure for enhanced customer relationships. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: CourseDog
cb_description: CourseDog develops an academic scheduler platform. The platform offers integrated scheduling and curriculum management for higher education and sends out surveys to instructors to share their preferences for class times, seating layout, and technology requirements. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: eMerge
cb_description: eMerge is an email-based marketing platform for the real estate industry. Subscribers can use the platform's do-it-yourself tools to create, schedule and analyze email campaigns and workflows or gain a helping hand with one of the real estate campaigns designed to help busy real estate pros stay on task and engaged with their online audience.

name: Lemnisk
cb_description: Lemnisk is a company that focuses on real-time marketing automation and customer data management, operating in the marketing technology sector. The company offers a platform that aggregates customer data from various sources, provides a unified view of each individual user, and uses artificial intelligence to improve digital engagements and customer conversions. Lemnisk primarily serves sectors such as banking, insurance, retail, telecommunications, and travel and hospitality. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: WiShi
cb_description: WiShi focuses on digital inventory optimization and personal styling. It offers an online guided shopping experience, using data to inform their experts who then provide personalized recommendations based on clients' needs and preferences. WiShi primarily serves the e-commerce industry. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lumanu
cb_description: Lumanu is a financial technology company that focuses on providing solutions for businesses and creative talent in the creative industry. The company offers services that streamline the process of onboarding, managing, and paying creative talent, as well as providing tools for measuring return on investment and scaling creative programs. Lumanu primarily serves businesses in the marketing and creative sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Esusu
cb_description: Esusu is a financial health platform that specializes in rent reporting and credit score improvement for the real estate sector. The company offers services that enable renters to build their credit scores through rent payment reporting, while also providing property owners with tools to enhance their social impact goals and financial returns. Esusu also offers rent relief assistance in the form of zero-interest loans to support renters facing financial hardships. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Waymo
cb_description: Waymo operates as a technology company focused on autonomous driving in the transportation industry. The company offers a ride-hailing service that uses self-driving cars. Its primary customers are individuals in urban areas who require transportation services. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Precordior
cb_description: Precordior focuses on the early detection of heart diseases. The company's main product, CardioSignal, is a smartphone application that functions as a medical device for detecting signs of atrial fibrillation using gyrocardiography technology. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Turku, Finland.

name: Finbots.AI
cb_description: Finbots.AI specializes in artificial intelligence and machine learning for the financial services sector, focusing on credit risk management. The company's flagship product, CreditX, is an AI-powered platform that enables financial institutions to rapidly build and deploy accurate credit scorecards without coding, facilitating better credit decisions and risk assessment. Finbots.AI primarily serves banks, digital banks, SME lenders, consumer lenders, fintechs, and credit bureaus. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: DeepCure
cb_description: DeepCure operates as a drug discovery and research company. It offers artificial intelligence (AI) based discovery services to create better molecules and faster cures for disease-relevant protein targets. The company primarily serves the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Adcendo
cb_description: Adcendo is a biotech company focused on the development of antibody-drug conjugates (ADCs) for the treatment of cancers. The company specializes in creating ADCs that target malignant cells by directing anticancer therapeutics to overexpressed surface target molecules, particularly through the uPARAP receptor. Adcendo primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on oncology and cancer treatment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Frederiksberg, Denmark.

name: Bud
cb_description: Bud specializes in financial data enrichment and analytics within the fintech sector. The company offers a range of services including transforming transactional data into actionable insights for personal financial management, lending suitability, and credit risk assessments. Bud's AI-powered platform caters to financial institutions looking to leverage open banking to enhance customer experience and drive growth. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United KIngdom.

name: Craydel
cb_description: Craydel is a company focused on democratizing access to quality higher education, operating in the education sector. The company provides an online platform that offers career guidance and scholarships for a wide range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and vocational programs. These programs cover various fields such as business, engineering, health sciences, and arts, among others. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Sila
cb_description: Sila operates as a battery materials company focused on the development of lithium-ion battery technology. The company offers a silicon anode material that enhances the energy density of lithium-ion batteries, aimed at improving the performance of automotive and consumer electronics. Sila's products are designed to be a replacement for traditional graphite anodes, offering a significant upgrade without altering existing battery manufacturing processes. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: Sparkplug
cb_description: Sparkplug is a fixed wireless broadband service provider currently operating networks across five states, including the metropolitan markets of Chicago, Nashville, Des Moines, Phoenix, and Las Vegas. The company offers a suite of high-speed data, voice over IP, and other managed services over its own network to business, education, and government customers. All enjoy the benefits of fast, scalable and easy to deploy broadband service. Customers can choose from a range of symmetrical bandwidth service options starting at 2 Mbps with speeds up to 1 Gbps, at a fraction of the typical cost. The company also aims to provide high capacity data services and transport to many of the nations's leading telecommunications providers.

name: TigerEye
cb_description: TigerEye focuses on revenue intelligence and pipeline management in the software industry. The company offers a platform that identifies revenue risks and opportunities in sales pipelines, enabling businesses to make informed decisions and accelerate growth. TigerEye primarily serves the sales and revenue operations sectors. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Mentimeter
cb_description: Mentimeter is an audience engagement platform that specializes in interactive presentation software. The company offers services that enable input gathering and visualization during presentations, making them interactive and engaging for audiences in various settings. Mentimeter primarily serves the education sector and corporate meetings, providing tools for interactive polls, anonymous questions, and data-driven insights. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Uplift
cb_description: Uplift develops a fintech marketing platform for traveling purposes. The platform offers a buy now pay later scheme for travel through its partner websites and avails a range of payment plans. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Sunnyvale, California. In July 2023, Uplift was acquired by Upgrade.

name: Persado
cb_description: Persado provides a motivational generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) platform. The company offers AI text content generation and decision solutions that enable marketing and e-commerce teams to easily create and deliver high-performing messages that engage customers across digital channels: email, web, and social. It serves retail, travel and hospitality, technology, and other industries. Persado was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Highnote
cb_description: Highnote develops a mobile platform for healthcare professionals. It allows them to share their wisdom, get trusted answers, and build confidence. It provides AI-powered conversations, summarized information, and accurate transcription and search. The company was founded in 2021 and is headquartered in Austin, Texas.

name: Roundtrip
cb_description: Roundtrip specializes in local delivery management solutions for Shopify merchants. The company offers an all-in-one platform that includes route optimization, order tracking, delivery notifications, and a driver application. Roundtrip primarily serves the ecommerce industry, enhancing the delivery process for businesses such as bakeries, coffee shops, flower shops, grocery stores, and meal kit services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Rooser
cb_description: Rooser is a company focused on streamlining the seafood trading process within the seafood industry. It operates an online marketplace that connects wholesale buyers with seafood suppliers, facilitating efficient trade, price negotiation, and order processing. The company primarily serves the seafood supply chain, including primary processors, producers, and wholesale buyers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Edinburgh, Scotland.

name: Qatalog
cb_description: Qatalog is an enterprise intelligence platform that specializes in enhancing workplace efficiency through real-time access to information across systems. The company offers a centralized search bar that simplifies information retrieval and navigation within a business, utilizing artificial intelligence (AI) to deliver accurate and relevant answers. Qatalog's solutions are designed to integrate with existing systems, providing automated workflows. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: PicnicHealth
cb_description: PicnicHealth is a healthcare technology company that specializes in the collection and management of medical records and data for research purposes. The company offers a platform that simplifies patients' medical records into a secure, digital timeline and enables them to contribute to medical research by sharing anonymized data. PicnicHealth primarily serves the life sciences sector by providing structured, research-ready datasets for various diseases to facilitate the development of treatments. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: GuardRails
cb_description: GuardRails makes open-source security tools easily available in GitHub Pull Requests. The solution has been tuned to keep noise low and only report high-impact and relevant security issues. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: SamaCare
cb_description: SamaCare specializes in streamlining the prior authorization process for medical practices within the healthcare sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform that enables practices to submit, track, and manage prior authorizations across various payers and medications, simplifying the workflow and reducing administrative burdens. SamaCare's services are designed to integrate with any electronic medical record (EMR) system, provide actionable insights for financial and administrative management, and facilitate a paperless authorization process. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: LeoLabs
cb_description: LeoLabs specializes in space operations and tracking services within the aerospace industry. The company offers a suite of services including satellite tracking, collision avoidance, launch support, and mission risk assessment for various space-related activities. LeoLabs primarily serves satellite operators, commercial enterprises, defense agencies, and insurers in the space sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Lifesum
cb_description: Lifesum is a digital health company focused on personalized nutrition and wellness. The company offers an application that tracks food intake, provides dietary guidance, and creates personalized meal plans to support users' health and wellness goals. Lifesum's application includes features such as a barcode scanner for food items, nutrient intake customization, and integration with activity trackers to enhance the user experience. Lifesum was formerly known as ShapeUp Club. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: OtterTune
cb_description: OtterTune was a company focused on automated database tuning within the technology sector. Its services aimed to optimize the configuration of Amazon-based PostgreSQL and MySQL databases to enhance performance, reduce operational costs, and ensure database health.  It was founded in 2020 and is based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.

name: Diabeloop
cb_description: Diabeloop specializes in healthcare technology, focusing on the therapeutic artificial intelligence (AI) and automation and personalization of Type 1 diabetes treatment. The company offers a self-learning algorithm that integrates therapeutic artificial intelligence to manage diabetes by automating insulin delivery, aiming to alleviate the daily burden for patients. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Grenoble, France.

name: Fyma
cb_description: Fyma is a company that focuses on harnessing the power of computer vision AI and movement data in the commercial real estate sector. The company offers services that analyze the usage of office locations, retail spaces, and parking areas, as well as traffic volume and patterns, to help businesses optimize their spaces and improve operational efficiency. Fyma primarily sells to the commercial real estate industry. Fyma was formerly known as VISORY. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Oligo Security
cb_description: Oligo Security is company that currently operates in stealth mode. It is based in Israel.

name: Knot Standard
cb_description: Knot Standard specializes in custom menswear and womenswear within the fashion and apparel industry. The company offers tailored suits, blazers, shirts, pants, knitwear, and outerwear designed to fit each customer's unique size and style preferences. Knot Standard primarily serves individuals seeking personalized, high-quality clothing options. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Foraged
cb_description: Foraged is a marketplace specializing in wild and specialty foods, operating within the food industry. The company connects consumers with foragers, farmers, and artisan food producers to provide access to unique and hard-to-find ingredients. Foraged primarily serves the food commerce sector, enabling direct transactions between independent food producers and consumers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Asheville, North Carolina.

name: Bright
cb_description: Bright is a company that focuses on providing fractional technology leadership, operating within the technology and business consulting sectors. The company's main service involves analyzing a company's marketing, sales, product, financial, and customer data to produce actionable insights aimed at promoting growth, reducing customer churn, and facilitating smarter decision-making. Bright primarily serves startups, growth companies, and investors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: EnClear Therapies
