cb_description: EnClear Therapies is a neurotechnology business focused on improving and extending the lives of patients with central nervous system (CNS) diseases. The company offers a proprietary EnTrega CSF Platform for precision dosing of CNS therapeutics, aiming to achieve effective levels of medication while minimizing severe side effects and peripheral toxicity. EnClear Therapies targets neuro-oncology initially and plans to expand into treating neurodegenerative, lysosomal storage, and autoimmune diseases through partnerships. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Newburyport, Massachusetts.

name: Next Matter
cb_description: Next Matter is a workflow automation platform that specializes in mission-critical jobs within the compliance, customer support, and operations sectors. The company aims at solutions that make workflows reliable, scalable, and audit-ready, without the need for coding expertise. Next Matter's platform is designed to integrate with various apps, tools, and databases, aiding businesses to automate complex processes across teams and systems. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Praktika
cb_description: Praktika is a platform for beauty salons and businesses to engage management, warehousing, and financial records in one place.

name: Sourcegraph
cb_description: Sourcegraph offers a Code artificial intelligence (AI) platform. The company offers services such as code search and analysis, and an AI coding assistant named Cody, which helps developers understand, write, and fix code in large and complex codebases, and primarily serves the software development industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sprout Solutions
cb_description: Sprout Solutions specializes in providing HR management and payroll software solutions. Its main offerings include a suite of tools for HR administration, payroll management, performance and learning management, employee engagement, and HR analytics. It primarily serves various sectors including business process outsourcing, manufacturing, retail and wholesale, startups, tech-enabled companies, financial service institutions, healthcare services, and construction. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mandaluyong City, Philippines.

name: SWAY
cb_description: SWAY specializes in professional development with a focus on mastering flexible and hybrid work environments within the corporate training sector. The company offers workshops, keynote speeches, and coaching to enhance team performance, communication, and collaboration in hybrid work settings. These services are designed to equip managers, teams, and individuals with the skills and mindset necessary for successful adaptation to hybrid work models. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Castor Technologies
cb_description: Castor Technologies specializes in optimizing manufacturing through its industrial 3D printing software. The company's software automates the analysis of thousands of parts to identify those suitable for additive manufacturing, assesses cost reduction opportunities, and suggests design modifications for improved efficiency. Castor Technologies primarily serves sectors that involve low volume production, spare parts inventory management, and production line tooling. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Muon Space
cb_description: Muon Space specializes in the development and operation of satellite constellations for earth intelligence within the aerospace industry. The company offers a comprehensive service that includes designing, building, and managing low earth orbit (LEO) satellite constellations to provide dynamic and detailed earth observation data. Muon Space primarily serves sectors that require remote sensing systems for environmental monitoring, natural resource management, and global security. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Toku
cb_description: Toku operates as a technology company specializing in recurring payments. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to automate their collection processes and facilitate payment procedures, eliminating late payments. It primarily serves sectors such as education, highways, insurance, telecommunications, finance, real estate, memberships, and basic services. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Providencia, Chile.

name: Myriota
cb_description: Myriota focuses on providing direct-to-orbit satellite connectivity for the Internet of Things (IoT) sector. The company's main service involves retrieving data from anywhere on Earth, either on land or at sea, and securely transferring this data to the cloud via their nanosatellites, without the need for additional ground-based infrastructure. It primarily serves sectors such as agriculture, transport and logistics, maritime, defense, environment, mining, and utilities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Adelaide, Australia.

name: Censys
cb_description: Censys provides security monitoring solutions. It offers organizations the visibility to fight threats by continuously analyzing internet data. It helps researchers, corporations, and governments to find and analyze devices connected to the internet. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

name: Cerebro Capital
cb_description: Cerebro Capital operates in the financial services industry. The company offers a marketplace that matches businesses with loan options from a network based on its financing needs. Cerebro Capital primarily serves the corporate lending market. Cerebro Capital was formerly known as MCB Enterprises. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Baltimore, Maryland.

name: Examedi
cb_description: Examedi is a start-up focused on streamlining patient access to healthcare services within the healthcare industry. They offer a platform that enables patients to book healthcare appointments online 24-hours a day, facilitating at-home laboratory tests such as blood, urine, and PCR tests. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Las Condes, Chile.

name: Aerolane
cb_description: Aerolane specializes in enhancing air logistics through innovative technology in the aviation industry. The company offers autonomous cargo gliders designed to increase the capacity of existing aircraft while reducing operational costs and emissions. Aerolane primarily serves the government, commercial, and defense sectors with its air logistics services and technology solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Southlake, Texas.

name: Monogram Health
cb_description: Monogram Health operates as a provider of in-home care and benefit management services for patients living with polychronic conditions. The company develops an artificial intelligence algorithm to help predict necessary and timely care to promote the delay of kidney disease progression, and transition to dialysis and pre-emptive kidney transplant, as well as to help optimize patient health outcomes once on dialysis. It primarily serves the Healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Brentwood, Tennessee.

name: Kinside
cb_description: Kinside is a comprehensive platform focused on simplifying the child care search process for working parents, providers, and employers within the child care industry. The company offers a service that aggregates real-time availability, pricing, and program information from child care providers, facilitating easier access to child care for parents and supporting employers with employee benefits. Kinside also serves as a connection hub for child care providers and government agencies, aiming to improve community outcomes through real-time data. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Aspivix
cb_description: Aspivix focuses on advancing women's healthcare through products in the gynecology sector. The company's product, Carevix, is a soft-suction cervical device designed to offer a modern and gentler alternative to the traditional tenaculum, aiming to reduce pain and bleeding during various transcervical procedures such as intrauterine device (IUD) insertions and cervical biopsies. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a focus on improving the gynecological experience for women. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Epalinges, Switzerland.

name: Nova Benefits
cb_description: Nova Benefits is a company specializing in providing health insurance and wellness benefits through a tech-first platform. They offer group health insurance, wellness programs, and a suite of services designed to support mental, physical, and maternal health for employees. Nova Benefits caters to businesses of all sizes, ensuring their teams have access to comprehensive health and wellness solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Oviva
cb_description: Oviva offers personalized dietary advice through its digital application to help individuals make targeted dietary changes to improve their health. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, partnering with health insurers, healthcare systems, and doctors to provide accessible care. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Rachio
cb_description: Rachio is a software and hardware company focused on improving the water efficiency of homes. Rachio makes an intelligent sprinkler controller that helps customers water smartly for better results and lower costs by monitoring weather conditions automatically, adapting to the specifics of a user's yard, and providing control and dashboard options through a smartphone app.

name: MODE
cb_description: MODE specializes in helping in operational efficiency through data connectivity and insights within the technology domain. The company offers a suite of tools that enable businesses to connect with their data, gain valuable insights, and make informed decisions to improve their operations. It primarily serves technology industry. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Biomodex
cb_description: Biomodex is a digital health company that operates in the medical technology sector. The company provides enhanced 3D printing solutions for patient-specific rehearsal and advanced training for physicians, offering a comprehensive and tailored experience similar to a full-motion flight simulator. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France. In December 2023, Biomodex was acquired by Mentice.21M.

name: Bowtie
cb_description: Bowtie is a licensed life insurance company and the first virtual insurer in Hong Kong, specializing in the provision of medical and life insurance products. The company offers a range of insurance plans including voluntary health insurance under the VHIS, life insurance, critical illness, accident, and cancer coverage, as well as children's eye care and women's health programs, all accessible through its online platform. Bowtie's services cater to both individual and corporate clients, providing them with health risk assessments and preventive healthcare services. Bowtie was formerly known as Bowtie Limited. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Hong Kong.

name: Kevala
cb_description: Kevala is a company that designs sustainable, premium, athletic ecoluxe apparel.

name: Treeswift
cb_description: Treeswift builds a forest monitoring system. The company provides forest stakeholders with data and analyses. Its services are used in carbon capture estimation, timber value estimation, deforestation monitoring, advanced growth forecasting, and forest management. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Gamurs Group
cb_description: Gamurs Group is a leading entity in the esports media network, focusing on the gaming, esports, and entertainment sectors. The company owns and operates a network of digital publications and social media communities, providing content about games, esports news, and popular shows. Their services primarily cater to the gaming and entertainment industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: Bear Robotics
cb_description: Bear Robotics develops Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) within the hospitality and food service industry. Its robots assist in tasks such as running orders and bussing tables, thus improving operational efficiency and service quality. The company's robots are designed to work alongside human staff, enhancing the customer and staff experience in various sectors including restaurants, senior living facilities, and entertainment venues. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Bend Health
cb_description: Bend Health is a provider of pediatric mental health services, focusing on resilience and coping strategies for kids, teens, and their families. The company offers virtual mental health care, including access to coaches, therapists, and psychiatrists, as well as personalized treatment plans and peer-to-peer support. Bend Health primarily serves the healthcare industry, partnering with pediatricians, health plans, and employers to provide accessible mental health care. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Madison, Wisconsin.

name: threatER
cb_description: threatER focuses on automating network defense and threat analysis. The company offers solutions for aggregating and managing threat intelligence, enforcing network-wide threat exclusion in real-time, and providing a marketplace for third-party cyber intelligence services. threatER products are designed to enhance the efficacy of existing security stacks by proactively blocking known threats. It was founded in 2019 and is based in McLean, Virginia.

name: Curio
cb_description: Curio seeks to simplify clinical trial participant sourcing, while connecting users to research that they can engage with.

name: MEGVII
cb_description: MEGVII is a company that specializes in artificial intelligence, with a particular focus on deep learning. The company offers full-stack solutions that integrate algorithms, software, hardware, and AI-empowered IoT devices, aiming to help customers optimize costs, improve efficiency, and address business challenges. MEGVII's solutions are primarily used in personal IoT to enhance user experience on personal devices, city IoT to enhance public safety and optimize city management, and supply chain IoT to improve efficiency through AI-empowered robots and sensors. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: BenchPrep
cb_description: BenchPrep is an award-winning provider of digital learning solutions, specializing in the education and test preparation sector. The company offers a learning management system that supports the entire lifelong learning journey, from pre-assessment to post-assessment, with a focus on preparing learners for certification exams and enabling ongoing professional development. BenchPrep's platform is utilized by associations, credentialing bodies, and training companies to deliver interactive, data-driven learning experiences that facilitate professional growth and revenue expansion. BenchPrep was formerly known as Watermelon Express. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Oasis Security
cb_description: Oasis Security specializes in non-human identity management within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a platform that empowers security and engineering teams to manage and secure the lifecycle of non-human identities such as service accounts, API keys, and certificates. Oasis Security's platform is designed to provide visibility, automate provisioning, and facilitate compliance and governance for organizations. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: MaxRewards
cb_description: MaxRewards is a company focused on financial technology, specifically in the credit card rewards and benefits sector. The company offers a digital wallet service that helps users maximize their credit card rewards and cash back, by showing them which card to use at different businesses. It also provides a clear view of users' finances, including account balances, reward earnings, and credit utilization ratios. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Sunbit
cb_description: Sunbit serves as a financial technology company operating in the credit and lending industry. Its main service is providing a pay-over-time technology that allows customers to spread the cost of everyday needs such as auto repairs, dental care, eye care, and veterinary care. It primarily serves sectors such as the automotive industry, healthcare services, and retail. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Util
cb_description: Util operates as a data provider specializing in sustainability assessment within the financial sector. The company offers an artificial intelligence (AI) driven service that quantifies sustainability using evidence from peer-reviewed academic research, aiding clients in achieving their sustainability goals. Util's services are primarily utilized by the investment community for portfolio construction, client reporting, fund creation, and risk assessment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Forge Biologics
cb_description: Forge Biologics is a gene therapy development company operating in the biotechnology industry. The company's main services include the manufacturing of gene therapies, with a focus on accelerating programs from the preclinical stage through to clinical and commercial manufacturing. Forge Biologics primarily serves the healthcare sector, partnering with scientists, physicians, biotech and pharma companies, and patient groups. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Grove City, Ohio. In November 2023, Forge Biologics was acquired by Ajinomoto.

name: CareBridge
cb_description: CareBridge is a value-based care provider focused on maximizing health, independence, and quality of life for individuals receiving home and community-based services. The company offers a virtual care model that includes 24/7 member support from an interdisciplinary medical team, decision support for personalized care plans, and electronic visit verification to ensure service delivery. CareBridge's solutions are designed to improve health outcomes, increase independence, and reduce healthcare costs for high-risk individuals. CareBridge was formerly known as Main Street Health Medical Group. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: Faume
cb_description: Faume is a company focused on the second-hand market within the retail industry. It provides a white label solution for brands, enabling them to enter the second-hand market by managing all aspects of the process, from product collection and quality control to sales and shipping. The company primarily serves the retail industry, particularly brands looking to expand into the second-hand market. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Ubitus
cb_description: Ubitus specializes in GPU virtualization, cloud solutions, and streaming platforms within the AI and cloud gaming sectors. The company provides cloud gaming solutions, GPU virtualization technology, and AI solutions for language model deployment and media content generation. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Clearstep
cb_description: Clearstep specializes in AI-powered virtual healthcare assistants within the healthcare industry. The company offers solutions that enable patients to self-triage, access care guidance, and automate various patient interactions, thereby reducing administrative burdens for healthcare providers. Clearstep's technology primarily serves health systems, hospitals, medical groups, retail pharmacies, and digital health companies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Alife
cb_description: Alife is a lifestyle driven company, operating in the retail and arts sectors. The company is known for its curatorial work, branded products, experiential retail concepts, art exhibitions, and live music events. Alife primarily caters to the retail and arts industries. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Fable
cb_description: Fable offers plant-based meat alternative products made from shiitake mushrooms, coconut oil and sugar.

name: Lumigo
cb_description: Lumigo provides monitoring and troubleshooting for microservice environments. It offers a platform that allows developers to identify and resolve critical issues in their distributed environments using smart monitoring, alerting, and automated tracing. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Salasa
cb_description: Salasa is a company focused on providing e-commerce fulfillment solutions within the logistics and supply chain industry. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including order management, shipping, and inventory management, designed to enhance efficiency and customer satisfaction for online retailers. Salasa primarily serves the e-commerce industry, offering technology-driven logistics solutions to help businesses scale and improve their customer experience. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Cable
cb_description: Cable specializes in financial crime effectiveness testing solutions. The company offers a platform that provides automated assurance, risk assessments, quality assurance, and management information and reporting to help businesses comply with financial crime requirements. It primarily serves the financial technology industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: NomadGo
cb_description: NomadGo focuses on inventory management in the technology sector. It offers a platform that automates inventory counts and aids in decision-making, using computer vision and augmented reality to digitize inventory environments. The company primarily serves the retail and food service industries. NomadGo was formerly known as NOMAD Technologies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: WaitWhat
cb_description: WaitWhat is a media organization focused on creating a portfolio of content intellectual property that seeks to enhance human potential across various sectors. The company offers educational podcasts that provide insights into business, wellness, creativity, and technology, aiming to share wisdom from various figures and new voices. WaitWhat also explores business models and partnerships to scale its content beyond audio, into technology products, live experiences, and other media formats. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Convizit
cb_description: Convizit is a company focused on AI-driven data services within the technology sector. The company's main service involves automatically capturing user events and delivering enriched behavioral data to various platforms, eliminating the need for manual coding or tagging of events. Convizit primarily serves the SaaS and E-commerce industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: AccuKnox
cb_description: AccuKnox develops a cloud-native application security (CNAPP) platform. The platform delivers security for networks, applications, and data across the cloud, Internet of Things (IoT),  and fifth-generation (5G) environments. It offers network segmentation, firewalling, anomaly detection, cloud workload protection, security observability, vulnerability scanning, and data security. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Califia Farms
cb_description: Califia Farms is a natural beverage company in the U.S. Known for offering the plant-based beverages artfully packaged in disruptive curvy bottles, Califia is a refrigerated nutmilk, non-dairy creamer and ready-to-drink coffee brand in the natural and specialty channels. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: VoxPopMe
cb_description: VoxPopMe is a centralized insights platform operating in the market research industry. The company offers services such as video surveys, live interviews, and AI-powered analysis, all aimed at helping qualitative research teams build better products through fast, scalable consumer conversations. VoxPopMe primarily serves the market research sector. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Birmingham, England.

name: MeUndies
cb_description: MeUndies is a company that focuses on disrupting the underwear industry. The company offers a range of products including underwear, loungewear, and socks for both men and women, with a focus on comfort and quality. It primarily sells to consumers in the retail industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: GajiGesa
cb_description: GajiGesa is a financial wellness platform that provides fintech solutions to improve the financial health of employees in Indonesia. The company offers Earned Wage Access, financial education, and a suite of financial management tools to help employees manage their finances responsibly. Additionally, GajiGesa provides an enterprise-grade HR analytics platform to employers, aiming to boost employee productivity and retention by alleviating financial stress. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Homeward
cb_description: Homeward offers a real estate technology platform aimed at facilitating the buying and selling process. The company partners with agents to help its customers overcome the limitations of traditional mortgages. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Upkeep
cb_description: Connect users to local stylists. Never have to worry about a bad hair day.

name: Addepar
cb_description: Addepar operates as a technology and data company specializing in investment management software for the financial services sector. The company offers a platform that aggregates portfolio, market, and client data to facilitate informed investment decisions and reporting. Addepar's solutions cater to wealth managers, family offices, private banks, and broker-dealers, providing tools for scenario modeling, financial forecasting, trade rebalancing, and billing and fee tracking. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: SEngine
cb_description: SEngine Precision Medicine specializes in personalized cancer treatment and drug development within the healthcare sector. The company offers the PARIS Test, a high-throughput technology that tests a patient's tumor organoid with various cancer drugs to identify the most effective and least toxic treatment options. SEngine primarily serves oncologists, patients, research partners, and pharmaceutical companies with actionable insights for cancer care. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: GalaxEye
cb_description: GalaxEye is a space tech startup focused on developing advanced earth observation technologies. The company is creating a multi-sensor imaging satellite, known as The Drishti Mission, which is designed to provide, weather imagery capable of penetrating cloud cover and providing insights during nighttime. These satellites aim to serve a variety of sectors by enabling detailed geospatial analysis for governments, defense, and various industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Socotra
cb_description: Socotra operates as a company providing technology solutions in the insurance industry. The company offers a range of products that help insurers accelerate product development, reduce maintenance costs, and improve customer experiences. It primarily serves the insurance industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: 3T Biosciences
cb_description: 3T Biosciences operates as an immunotherapy company. The company focuses on developing transformative therapies for the treatment of solid tumors and other immune-mediated diseases. It specializes in immune system's ability to recognize, target, and destroy cancer cells. It aims to advance the development of safer treatments for difficult-to-treat cancers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Azra Games
cb_description: Azra Games specializes in the development of collectible combat role-playing games (RPGs) within the gaming industry. Their flagship product is a reimagined classic sword and sorcery RPG, offering a dark fantasy world for players to explore, enhanced by Web3 technology. Azra Games targets the gaming community, providing interactive quests, digital collectibles, and a unique Play Forever Pass. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Sacramento, California.

name: Canvas
cb_description: Canvas is a line of plant-based beverages made from Saved Grain.

name: Climatize
cb_description: Climatize is a company focused on facilitating investments in renewable energy projects, specifically within the solar energy sector. It offers a platform where individuals can invest in solar energy projects with the potential to earn financial returns, catering to both accredited and non-accredited investors. Climatize operates as a crowdfunding platform, allowing users to contribute to various renewable energy initiatives and providing educational resources to inform investment decisions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Santa Cruz, California.

name: Zinc
cb_description: Zinc is a company focused on investing in and supporting the development of mission-driven businesses, primarily in the health and environmental sectors. The company offers venture building programs, providing support and resources to founders who are passionate about creating innovative solutions to complex challenges related to human and planetary health. Zinc primarily serves the start-up industry, with a particular focus on businesses aiming to make a significant social impact. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Homebase
cb_description: Homebase provides a real estate syndication CRM and admin platform. It offers a suite of tools to simplify deal administration and investor relations for real estate syndications. The platform serves real estate fund managers and syndicators to streamline their operations. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: AlayaCare
cb_description: AlayaCare focuses on providing cloud-based software solutions in the home health-care sector. The company offers solutions that includes clinical documentation, back office functionality, client and family portals, and mobile care worker functionality, all designed to streamline home-based care agencies and health outcomes. AlayaCare primarily serves home care agencies, home health agencies, infusion operations, and hospice and palliative care providers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: Kubik
cb_description: Kubik focuses on creating low-carbon buildings utilizing plastic waste within the construction industry. The company's main offerings include the transformation of hard-to-recycle plastic waste for residential, commercial, and public facilities. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Solarise Africa
cb_description: Solarise Africa provides an energy-as-a-service in the renewable energy sector. The company offers full-service solutions that include designing, building, financing, and maintaining renewable energy installations, with a focus on decentralized energy solutions. It serves businesses across various sectors in Africa. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Sparrow Quantum
cb_description: Sparrow Quantum specializes in the development of deterministic single-photon components for the quantum technology sector. The company designs, develops, and produces photonic components that serve as building blocks for quantum computing, communication, sensing, and metrology applications. Sparrow Quantum's products are essential for experiments and applications that utilize single photons to carry quantum information. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: ShipHawk
cb_description: ShipHawk develops a shipping software designed to automate shipping and logistics operations. The company offers a range of services including warehouse management systems, shipping software, packing optimization, and shipping data analytics. It primarily serves the logistics industry. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Santa Barbara, California.

name: House Numbers
cb_description: House Numbers specializes in home wealth management, focusing on leveraging home equity to improve financial health. The company offers a range of services including home equity loans, HELOCs, home equity investments, reverse mortgages, and cash-out refinancing, all designed to help homeowners reduce high-interest debt and access cash. House Numbers primarily serves homeowners looking to manage and optimize their home equity. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sparks, Nevada.

name: Relectrify
cb_description: Relectrify specializes in battery control technology within the energy storage sector. The company's offerings include proprietary electronics and software, enabling direct alternating current output from batteries and enhancing overall battery performance. Its technology is primarily utilized in the energy storage industry, offering solutions for battery life. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in West Melbourne, Australia.

name: CreatorUp
cb_description: CreatorUp is a company specializing in content creation services within the digital media industry. They offer a 'Studio as a Service' model that provides live-action video, animation, extended reality (XR), live-streaming, interactive media, and consulting services, leveraging AI-enabled teams for efficient content production. CreatorUp primarily serves sectors such as marketing, business communications, education, events, and social impact. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: KoinX
cb_description: KoinX operates a crypto tax platform. The platform helps retail crypto investors automate their taxes by integrating their portfolios and transactions with a single platform and providing a dashboard. KoinX formerly known as Taxnest. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Bhubaneshwar, India.

name: Hyperexponential
cb_description: Hyperexponential focuses on decision intelligence in the insurance industry. The company offers a pricing system that transforms insurance pricing engines by creating a feedback loop between data, insights, and decisions. Hyperexponential primarily serves the insurance industry, including specialty insurance, reinsurance, and small business insurance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: DemandJump
cb_description: DemandJump is a marketing strategy platform focused on content creation and search engine optimization within the digital marketing industry. The company provides tools for content marketing, SEO strategy, and pillar-based marketing to help businesses increase their online visibility and drive customer engagement. DemandJump's services are primarily utilized by agencies and businesses looking to enhance their content marketing efforts and improve their search engine rankings. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Bodyguard
cb_description: Bodyguard specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) driven content moderation and audience analysis within the technology sector. It offers curated user-generated content across various platforms and social media. The company primarily serves sectors requiring online presence management, such as sports, gaming, and brand marketing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Nice, France.

name: ABEJA
cb_description: ABEJA is a technology company focused on digital platform services in the domain of artificial intelligence and big data analytics. The company offers a suite of software that facilitates digital transformation (DX) and stable operations, including services for retail store analysis based on customer behavior data analytics. ABEJA primarily serves sectors that require AI-driven process transformation and data-driven insights. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Vention
cb_description: Vention is a private investment & property development firm. Our mission is to buy and build next-generation business & real-estate ventures, that empower people to experience the highest enjoyment of life. We believe in turning big ideas into reality-driving for excellence, innovation & invention everyday.

name: Triumph
cb_description: Triumph is a privately held provider of intermodal, drayage and related services headquartered in Cudahy, Wisconsin

name: Haruko
cb_description: Haruko specializes in digital asset management solutions. The company provides an integrated platform for portfolio management, risk control, and proprietary data insights tailored for institutional investors in digital assets. Haruko's platform caters to the needs of digital asset funds, asset managers, and large institutions seeking to manage their digital asset portfolios and risks effectively. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: OnePointOne
cb_description: OnePointOne is the developer of a fully automated indoor farming system. The company develops an indoor farming system that combines robotics, deep learning, AI, vision processing, and growth configuration. It aims to develop a product to deliver highly nutritious, fresh food to rapidly urbanizing populations.

name: Gardin
cb_description: Gardin focuses on agricultural technology, providing advanced solutions for optimizing farm operations across various sectors. The company offers optical remote sensing technology, machine vision, and analytics to measure plant physiology, enabling food producers to enhance yield, quality, and nutrition while reducing resource usage. Gardin's technology serves the vertical and indoor farming sectors, aiding in the growth of nutritious food in a sustainable and cost-effective manner. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Abingdon, England.

name: Billogram
cb_description: Billogram focuses on providing an intelligent platform for invoicing and payments within the financial technology sector. The company's services automate customer management, prevent churn, and enhance revenue through a payment process that benefits both the company and its customers. The platform caters to various industries including telecommunications, insurance, energy, home security, digital healthcare, and unions. Billogram was formerly known as Atlas Invoice. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: DreamCraft
cb_description: DreamCraft is a company focused on democratizing game development in the entertainment industry. The company offers a platform that simplifies the process of creating, publishing, and monetizing video games, particularly for individuals who are passionate about game creation but lack programming or art skills. DreamCraft primarily serves the gaming industry, enabling individual developers to create commercially successful games. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: NomadGo
cb_description: NomadGo focuses on inventory management in the technology sector. It offers a platform that automates inventory counts and aids in decision-making, using computer vision and augmented reality to digitize inventory environments. The company primarily serves the retail and food service industries. NomadGo was formerly known as NOMAD Technologies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: Greenely
cb_description: Greenely operates within the smart technology and energy sectors. The company offers a mobile app that provides households with an overview of their energy consumption, personalized feedback, and the ability to optimize energy use. Greenely's platform enables customers to reduce energy costs, contribute to sustainable consumption, and earn money by stabilizing the power grid. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Civil Maps
cb_description: Civil Maps provides third-dimensional (3D) mapping technology for fully autonomous vehicles. It utilizes artificial intelligence and vehicle-based local processing to convert raw sensor data into meaningful map information built specifically to direct fully autonomous vehicles. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California. In January 2023, Civil Maps was acquired by Luminar Technologies.

name: Enable
cb_description: Enable specializes in rebate management software designed to facilitate B2B growth across various industries. The company offers a comprehensive platform that manages, tracks, and optimizes rebate programs, including annual rebates, special pricing agreements, commissions, promotions, and more, with advanced reporting and AI-driven insights. Enable's solutions cater to sectors such as construction, distribution, electrical, pharmaceutical, and HVAC, among others. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Envoy Technologies
cb_description: Envoy provides onsite mobility services including electric car-sharing and electric vehicle (EV) charging for apartments, offices, and hotels. It offers shared electric vehicles located in dedicated parking spaces at apartment complexes, hotels, workplaces, and more. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Beverly Hills, California. In April 2023, Envoy Technologies was acquired by Blink Charging.

name: Outdoorsy
cb_description: Outdoorsy is a peer-to-peer RV rental marketplace focused on providing outdoor travel experiences. The company connects RV owners with individuals looking to rent motorhomes, campervans, and travel trailers for vacations and adventures. Outdoorsy also offers resources for trip planning and supports RV owners with tools to earn income from their vehicles. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Hubble Network
cb_description: Hubble Network focuses on providing a satellite network for the Internet of Things (IoT) sector. The company offers global connectivity solutions that enable Bluetooth-enabled devices to communicate even in the absence of cellular reception. Hubble Network primarily serves the IoT industry by facilitating non-cellular device communication. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Las Vegas, Nevada.

name: Backer
cb_description: Backer focuses on financial planning and investment in the education sector. It offers a platform for setting up and managing 529 savings plans, which are tax-advantaged plans designed to encourage saving for future education costs. The platform also facilitates contributions from family and friends, enhancing the savings potential. Backer was formerly known as CollegeBacker. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Noteworthy AI
cb_description: Noteworthy AI provides a fully integrated hardware and software solution. It leverages proprietary computer vision models to provide grid asset inspection and inventory, offering an artificial intelligence(AI)-powered smart camera that can be mounted on fleet vehicles to automatically identify and monitor the condition of energy distribution grids, including identifying defects and inventorying components. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

name: Aiden
cb_description: Aiden is an AI powered virtual colleague for marketers. Aiden provides mobile app marketers with an analytics platform that uses machine reading to analyze large sets of paid advertising data, and proactively make changes to improve ROI of their manage multichannel paid acquisition campaigns. On November 21, 2019, Aiden was acquired by Twitter. Terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

name: Terremoto Biosciences
cb_description: Terremoto Biosciences focuses on drug discovery and development in the biotechnology industry. The company's main service is the development of small molecule medicines using a novel covalent chemistry approach, which aims to deliver superior therapeutic benefits. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Edocate
cb_description: Edocate provides training and education for healthcare professionals. The company offers a medical simulation platform that simulates disease progression and the impact of diagnostic and therapeutic decisions, providing healthcare practitioners with a risk-free environment to improve their long-term care skills. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, including continuing medical education providers, pharmaceutical companies, health systems, and medical associations. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: WHILL
cb_description: WHILL specializes in personal mobility, focusing on electric power chairs and mobility-as-a-service within the personal transportation industry. It offers a range of electric power chairs designed to enhance freedom for individuals with mobility limitations, as well as autonomous transportation services and on-site fleet management for public spaces. WHILL's products and services cater to various sectors, including healthcare facilities, airports, and tourist destinations. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Wanderu
cb_description: Wanderu is a travel search platform specializing in ground transportation within the bus and train travel sectors. The company enables users to compare and book bus and train tickets across North America and Europe through its website and mobile applications. Wanderu partners with over 500 carriers, including Amtrak and Greyhound, to provide a comprehensive range of travel options and itineraries for travelers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Spacejoy
cb_description: Spacejoy specializes in online interior design services, offering a unique blend of art and interactive 3D technology within the home decor industry. The company provides personalized design consultations, enabling customers to visualize their spaces in 3D and shop for handpicked products from top brands to bring their vision to life. Spacejoy caters to individuals seeking a tailored home design experience, with services that include creating comprehensive shopping lists and offering various design packages to suit different needs and budgets. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Spark Neuro
cb_description: Spark Neuro specializes in dementia assessment through advanced screening technology in the healthcare sector. The company offers a dementia screening tool called the SPARK Scan, which utilizes EEG and AI algorithms for accurate, safe, and non-invasive neurological analysis. The technology is designed to improve early diagnosis and reduce false positives in dementia screening, making it accessible for use both at home and in clinical settings. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Homemove
cb_description: Homemove is a platform focused on facilitating the home moving process within the real estate industry. The company offers a range of services including free home valuations, estate agent comparisons, mortgage comparisons, conveyancing, property surveys, and assistance with removals and home setup. Homemove primarily serves individuals in the process of selling, buying, or moving homes. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Norwich, United Kingdom.

name: Algorithmiq
cb_description: Algorithmiq focuses on revolutionizing life sciences through the potential of quantum computing within the life sciences and technology sectors. The company specializes in developing algorithms that address complex problems in life sciences, particularly for molecular structure prediction, drug discovery, and drug design, utilizing quantum computing. Algorithmiq's solutions are aimed at enhancing the capabilities of near-term quantum computers to tackle challenges in the life sciences field. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: UniUni
cb_description: UniUni operates as a logistics company that focuses on the delivery landscape. The company offers last-mile delivery services, moving parcels from businesses directly to customers' doors. UniUni primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Richmond, Canada.

name: Kytopen
cb_description: Kytopen specializes in genome engineering platforms for the cell therapy sector. The company offers a non-viral gene delivery platform designed to enhance drug discovery, optimization, and biomanufacturing scaling. Kytopen's technology primarily serves the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industries, focusing on cell therapy discovery and manufacturing. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

222 focuses on facilitating chance social encounters within the technology services industry. The company offers a platform for individuals to engage in group public experiences without the need for profiles, direct messages, or swiping, emphasizing in-person interactions. 222 primarily caters to individuals seeking to connect with local communities and explore hyperlocal venues. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Barakah
cb_description: Barakah operates as a technology company focused on reducing food waste in the food service industry. It offers a platform that connects consumers with restaurants to purchase unsold fresh food at discounted prices, aiming to generate more revenue for businesses while contributing to environmental sustainability. The company primarily serves the food service sector and environmentally conscious consumers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

name: SIMBA Chain
cb_description: SIMBA Chain specializes in decentralized data exchange solutions within the blockchain technology sector. The company offers secure, reliable, and verifiable data interactions across various systems, focusing on identity management, multi-vendor data sharing, and third-party data verification. SIMBA Chain primarily serves government and enterprise sectors with its blockchain-based data exchange and verification services. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Plymouth, Indiana.

name: BioLoomics
cb_description: BioLoomics is a biotechnology company focused on revolutionizing antibody-drug conjugates (ADCs) for safer cancer therapies. The company offers a unique process for discovering antibody-peptide chimeras that target specific subcellular organelles and leverages synthetic biology, artificial intelligence, imaging, and robotics to build a robust therapeutic pipeline. BioLoomics primarily serves the healthcare sector, particularly in the development of anti-cancer therapies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: MarginEdge
cb_description: MarginEdge operates as a company specializing in restaurant management software within the technology and hospitality sectors. The company offers a range of services including invoice processing, cost management, inventory and food usage tracking, menu analysis, and back-office efficiencies. Its services aim to provide real-time insights into restaurant operations and automate data entry, and back-office tasks. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Arlington, Virginia.

name: Slerp
cb_description: Slerp is a technology company specializing in online food ordering systems within the hospitality industry. The company provides a platform for end-to-end delivery tracking, catering production planning, queue-free click & collect services, and integration with Google Business Profile, along with a dedicated app for brand enhancement and a custom rewards program. Slerp's solutions are tailored to the needs of hospitality brands, enabling them to sell directly to consumers and manage a variety of order types, including on-demand and scheduled deliveries, through a customizable online checkout. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Ledn
cb_description: Ledn operates as a financial service company specializing in Bitcoin and digital assets. The company offers products such as savings accounts, bitcoin-backed loans, and trading services to enable users to manage their digital assets without selling them. Ledn primarily serves individual and institutional clients in the digital asset space. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Loop Health
cb_description: Loop Health, dba Pictrition, makes health tracking easy, fun, and rewarding. The company creates a simple to use food journal through pictures to track and get real-time feedback on what you eat.

name: MagrowTec
cb_description: MagrowTec specializes in agricultural technology with a focus on spray optimization and efficiency. The company offers a magnetic assist technology that can be added to any sprayer, enabling growers to reduce chemical usage, minimize drift, and improve crop coverage. MagrowTec primarily serves the agriculture industry, helping farmers to increase yields while reducing costs and environmental impact. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Vectara
cb_description: Vectara develops a generative artificial intelligence platform specializing in retrieval augmented generation for various business domains. The company offers a suite of services that enable businesses to integrate conversational AI, semantic search, and question-answering capabilities into their applications. It primarily serves the technology industry. Vectara was formerly known as ZIR AI. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: LiveLike
cb_description: LiveLike is an audience engagement platform specializing in gamification and fan interaction within various digital domains. The company offers a suite of tools that enable interactive experiences, loyalty programs, and community building, aimed at increasing user engagement and monetizing first-party data. LiveLike primarily serves sectors such as sports, fintech, entertainment, and e-commerce. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Mimosa
cb_description: Mimosa is a company focused on healthcare technology, providing imaging solutions for the medical sector. Its primary product is the MIMOSA Pro, a handheld device that uses multispectral imaging to assess tissue health by measuring oximetry and temperature, allowing for remote monitoring and decision-making for clinicians. The device is supported by a HIPAA-compliant web portal for secure communication and tracking of patient physiology over time. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Aiven
cb_description: Aiven is a trusted data and AI platform company that specializes in cloud data infrastructure management across various industries. The company offers a suite of services to stream, store, and serve data, utilizing open-source technologies and providing a unified experience across major cloud providers. Aiven's platform is designed to simplify the management of data infrastructure, enabling organizations to focus on innovation and value creation. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Mach9
cb_description: Mach9 is an internet-based company in stealth mode.

name: Exoticca
cb_description: Exoticca operates in the travel tech sector. The company offers vacation packages that include flights, hotels, tours, and transfers, providing customers with a travel experience. The packages are designed to make travel to destinations more accessible, with partial and guided tour options. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Azura Ophthalmics
cb_description: Azura Ophthalmics operates as a clinical-stage biotechnology company focusing on the development of ophthalmic therapeutics in the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include the development of a new therapeutic class of ophthalmic keratolytics, which are designed to treat underserved ophthalmic conditions by harnessing the unique properties of keratolytics. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically the ophthalmology sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Valid8 Financial
cb_description: Valid8 Financial provides verified financial intelligence and forensic accounting software, operating in the financial technology and software industry. The company offers a platform that allows users to upload bank statements and generate financial intelligence at scale, conduct lifestyle analysis, uncover undisclosed assets, and resolve cases efficiently. The platform leverages automation and AI to provide these services, primarily catering to the accounting, legal, and government sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Alianza
cb_description: Alianza provides hosted voice solutions for the wireless broadband industry. Alianza's platform allows broadband service providers to add a white-label, branded voice offering to broadband services - with no capital expenditure. It also offers business cloud communications, business lines, business text messaging, managed specialty lines, and more. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Pleasant Grove, Utah.

name: Dusty Robotics
cb_description: Dusty Robotics is a company that focuses on the development of robot-powered tools, operating within the construction industry. The company's main offerings include automated construction layout solutions that enhance accuracy, communication, and efficiency in construction projects. These solutions are primarily targeted towards the modern construction workforce. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Mighty
cb_description: Mighty provides a safe space for sharing personal health stories, crowdsourced tips, and resources to help members navigate their health conditions. It primarily serves individuals seeking peer support and information across various health communities, including mental health, chronic illness, rare diseases, and disability. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Glendale, California.

name: Epic CleanTec
cb_description: Epic CleanTec specializes in sustainable water recycling technology for the built environment sector. The company provides onsite water treatment and reuse systems that convert wastewater into non-potable water, recover energy, and produce soil amendments. Epic CleanTec primarily serves sectors such as real estate developments, corporate campuses, and community-scale projects. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Tvori
cb_description: Tvori specializes in virtual reality content creation, focusing on animation and prototyping within the technology sector. It offers a platform for creating animated stories, prototyping ideas, and producing complete animated films, all within a virtual reality environment. Its services cater to animators, storyboard artists, and designers, providing tools that simplify the animation process and reduce technical barriers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in St. Petersburg, Florida.

name: Frubana
cb_description: Frubana provides online marketplace services for producers of agro-products. It allows its users to sell directly to retailers, food services, and other consumers. Its products traded include fruits, vegetables, meat, groceries, and dairy products. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: AVIA
cb_description: AVIA is a company focused on facilitating digital transformation within the healthcare sector. It offers services such as digital strategy consulting, market intelligence, and tools for operational and care transformation. AVIA primarily serves healthcare organizations looking to implement digital solutions and strategies. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Rattle
cb_description: Rattle is a company focused on process automation for modern revenue teams within the technology sector. Its platform offers a suite of tools designed to enhance workflow efficiency, provide real-time alerts, and improve forecast accuracy for revenue teams. Rattle's solutions are tailored to increase transparency and growth across revenue funnels, enabling teams to update and manage their revenue data seamlessly through integrations with Slack and MS Teams. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Quilt
cb_description: Quilt operates as a technology company. It focuses on making the insurance-buying process digital and user-friendly. It was founded in 2015 and is based ion Boston, Massachusetts. It was acquired by Haven.

name: Amity
cb_description: Amity provides customer success software. The company offers SaaS, account management, customer engagement, reducing churn, increasing conversions, and customer and revenue retention. It is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: LinKinVax
cb_description: LinKinVax is a biotechnology startup that focuses on accelerating the development of vaccines in the healthcare industry. The company's main offerings include the rapid development of versatile and efficient vaccines for various diseases, including infectious diseases and oncology. LinKinVax primarily serves the healthcare and biotechnology sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Databento
cb_description: Databento is a company focused on providing market data solutions within the financial technology sector. They offer real-time and historical market data APIs for equities, futures, options, and more, with a self-service model that allows users to pay only for the data they use. The company primarily serves finance and fintech institutions, as well as startups seeking accessible data solutions. Databento was formerly known as Elisify, Inc.. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: Arrcus
cb_description: Arrcus focuses on networking software. The company offers a network operating system, a route reflector, a visibility, and an analytics platform. Arrcus aims to improve network connectivity and efficiency. It primarily serves the cloud computing industry, with an emphasis on multi-cloud networking. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Dots
cb_description: Dots is a specialty store offering women's fashion apparel and accessories operating over 400 off-mall stores in 28 states, primarily in the Midwest, East and Southeast.

name: Cycode
cb_description: Cycode is a leader in Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a comprehensive platform that integrates with or replaces existing application security testing tools, providing visibility, risk-driven prioritization, and just-in-time remediation of code vulnerabilities at scale. Cycode primarily serves sectors that require robust application security solutions, such as the finance, software, retail, banking, and telecommunications industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Dexai Robotics
cb_description: Dexai Robotics focuses on revolutionizing the food industry through automation technology. The company's main product is a collaborative robot, Alfred, which is designed to autonomously prepare recipes in commercial kitchens, offering an affordable, fast, and accurate solution. It primarily serves the food industry, aiming to improve the lives of kitchen staff and enhance culinary experiences for customers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Ecologi
cb_description: Ecologi operates in the environmental sustainability sector. The company offers services to businesses for calculating their carbon footprint, reducing emissions, and funding high-quality climate projects. It primarily sells to businesses looking to enhance their sustainability practices and improve their environmental impact. Ecologi was formerly known as Offset Earth. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bristol, United Kingdom.

name: Skyline Robotics
cb_description: Skyline Robotics focuses on automation technology in the building maintenance industry. The company offers automated window cleaning services, utilizing robotics to optimize cleaning processes, enhance safety, and reduce costs. Skyline Robotics primarily serves maintenance companies, property managers, and building owners. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Cookin
cb_description: Provider of a curated grocery shopping list and delivery service. The company provides an on-demand service that allows users to choose between various meal kits that produce three meals each, totaling six plates. Each meal kit is accompanied by a curated list of groceries that can be delivered to the customer's home, with the option to take off grocery items that the customer already has.

name: Amini
cb_description: Amini focuses on building environmental data infrastructure for Africa and the tropical belt within the geospatial data and machine learning sectors. The company specializes in addressing environmental data scarcity for countries in the global south by providing a platform that combines satellite and ground truth data. It primarily serves sectors that require environmental data for sustainable development and decision-making. Th company was founded in 2023 and is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: Type One Energy
cb_description: Type One Energy is focused on developing stellarator fusion technology within the clean energy sector. The company leverages manufacturing methods, computational physics, and superconducting magnets to create a fusion energy system. Type One Energy's FusionDirect program aims to design and construct a fusion pilot plant for electricity generation. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Oak Ridge, Tennessee.

name: Valar Labs
cb_description: Valar Labs focuses on oncology diagnostics, utilizing artificial intelligence to analyze solid tumors for the healthcare sector. The company provides AI-powered diagnostics that interpret solid tumors, offering evidence-based insights to assist physicians and patients in making informed cancer treatment decisions. Valar Labs primarily serves the healthcare industry by partnering with pharmaceutical companies. It was formerly known as GloFlow. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: AnswersNow
cb_description: AnswersNow focuses on providing virtual applied behavior analysis (ABA) therapy. The company offers personalized, evidence-based autism therapy services, delivered through an engaging virtual platform. Its service primarily aims at families dealing with autism. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Richmond, Virginia.

name: Viva Wallet
cb_description: Viva Wallet is a cloud-based neo-bank using Microsoft Azure with branches in twenty-three countries in Europe. It is a principal member of Visa and Mastercard for acquiring and issuing services with direct connectivity to the card schemes, providing processing services through its own platform. Viva Wallet provides businesses of all sizes with card acceptance services through POS terminals and the new Android Viva Wallet POS app, as well as through advanced payment gateways in online stores. It also offers business accounts with local IBAN and business Viva Wallet Mastercard cards. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Athens, Greece.

name: Tia
cb_description: Tia focuses on women's health across various domains, including gynecology, primary care, and mental health. The company offers comprehensive in-person and virtual care services tailored to individual health needs and integrates a collaborative care model to support physical, mental, and reproductive health. Tia primarily serves the women's healthcare sector, providing a 'Whole Woman, Whole Life' care approach. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Braavo Capital
cb_description: Braavo Capital operates in the financial and mobile application sectors. It provides on-demand, non-dilutive, performance-based funding for mobile application businesses, including games and subscription applications, using data, integrations, and automation. This funding allows businesses to scale without dilution or personal guarantees, primarily serving the mobile app industry. It was formerly known as Aprenita. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Apperio
cb_description: Apperio develops a legal spend management and analytics platform designed to track legal spending. Its platform dashboard makes work-in-progress visible and gives general counsels and financial legal insights, catering to both legal firms and large corporates. Apperio was formerly known as Legal Tender. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Somatus
cb_description: Somatus focuses on value-based kidney care. The company offers integrated care services for patients with or at risk of developing kidney disease, utilizing technology and clinical services to delay or prevent disease progression, decrease hospital utilization, improve quality and care coordination, and increase the use of home dialysis modalities and kidney transplantation rates. Somatus primarily serves the healthcare sector, partnering with health plans, health systems, nephrology, and primary care groups. It was founded in 2016 and is based in McLean, Virginia.

name: Pair Eyewear
cb_description: Pair Eyewear provides customizable prescription and non-prescription glasses and sunglasses. Its products are primarily sold to consumers in the retail industry. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Namogoo
cb_description: Namogoo focuses on digital journey continuity in the e-commerce industry. The company offers a platform that manages and acts upon journey data in real-time, prevents customer hijacking, manages shopping affiliates, delivers intent-based promotions, and provides personalized email and short message service (SMS) services. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

name: Datavant
cb_description: Datavant operates as a company focused on health data connectivity in the healthcare industry. It offers services that securely and compliantly connect patient-level health data, providing solutions for data and analytics, life sciences, providers, government agencies, research networks, and health plans. Its primary customers are organizations within the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: BioAge Labs
cb_description: BioAge Labs is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing therapies for metabolic diseases by targeting the biology of human aging. The company's main offerings include a proprietary discovery platform for identifying molecular mediators of aging and disease, and a lead program, azelaprag, which is an oral weight loss therapy currently in Phase 2 trials. BioAge Labs primarily serves the healthcare sector with a focus on age-related metabolic diseases. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Richmond, California.

name: Mimica
cb_description: Mimica is an AI-powered task mining platform focused on automating repetitive computer tasks across various business sectors. The company offers a suite of tools that analyze employee activity to identify and prioritize processes for automation, generating detailed blueprints for robotic process automation (RPA) without manual intervention. Mimica's solutions cater to sectors seeking to enhance process optimization, digital transformation, and workforce efficiency through automation. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Mews
cb_description: Mews is a cloud-native hospitality management system focused on automating hotel operations, maximizing revenue, and enhancing guest experiences. The company offers a property management system that streamlines front office, back office, and housekeeping operations, as well as integrated payment processing and point of sale solutions. Mews serves a diverse range of property types, including hotels, hostels, serviced apartments, and hybrid spaces. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Modular
cb_description: Modular is a website builder.

name: Flip
cb_description: Flip is a company that specializes in the auction and sale of popular, limited edition sneakers within the ecommerce industry. The company offers a platform for super-fast sneaker auctions, guaranteeing that every approved item will sell within 90 minutes or Flip will buy it, and allows buyers to set their own prices with all transactions handled within the Flip app. Flip's services are currently available exclusively in the U.S. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Cann
cb_description: Cann is a company that focuses on the production of non-alcoholic beverages infused with THC and CBD, operating in the cannabis industry. The company's main products are microdosed drinks that provide a light, uplifting buzz, similar to the effect of a beer or glass of wine, without the hangovers. These beverages are primarily sold to consumers looking for alternatives to alcoholic drinks. Cann was formerly known as SOCALI Manufacturing, Inc. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: Anagram
cb_description: Anagram is a programmatic marketing agency, with a focus on customers taking an insourced operating model.

name: Reap
cb_description: Reap develops a digital payments platform to automate invoice management, reporting, and reconciliation processes.  The company offers payment solutions and a Visa corporate card to manage financial operations. It primarily serves the payment service sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Hong Kong.

name: Callia
cb_description: Callia is a tech-enabled company specializing in the delivery of floral arrangements and gifts within the ecommerce industry. They offer a streamlined online ordering process for a selection of bouquets, which are delivered in a signature blue box, ensuring the product matches the customer's expectations in terms of freshness and appearance. The company primarily serves the ecommerce industry, delivering to customers across Canada and the United States. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

name: Overstory
cb_description: Overstory is a contemporary cocktail bar. It is an elegant and elevated rooftop cocktail bar with a 360-degree view over the NYC skyline. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Burro
cb_description: Burro offers a local professionally trained delivery driver that gets goods transported and delivered in an hour or less.

name: Raseedi
cb_description: Raseedi provides financial solutions and telecom expense optimization for the underbanked. It offers a smart dialer app that enables free calls among users, aggregates offers and promo codes for savings, and provides no-document financing options. Raseedi primarily serves individuals looking for cost-effective communication, savings on daily expenses, and easy access to financial services without traditional banking requirements. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Cairo, Egypt. In October 2024, Raseedi was acquired by Nana.

name: Accent Therapeutics
cb_description: Accent Therapeutics focuses on the development of new therapies in the healthcare and biotechnology sector. The company's main offerings include the development of small molecule precision cancer therapies that target critical intracellular dependencies across various types of cancer. Accent Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lexington, Massachusetts.

name: TypingDNA
cb_description: TypingDNA specializes in biometric verification solutions. The company offers products that provide continuous endpoint authentication and smart two-factor authentication (2FA), using typing patterns to verify user identities. These services are primarily used in sectors such as workforce authentication, customer authentication, and student authentication. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Mappo
cb_description: Mappo is a technology start-up in the entertainment sector. The company offers a location-based service that provides users with a unique way to explore their surroundings through a combination of stories, trivia, and riddles related to their current location. This service is primarily targeted towards drivers, passengers, and pedestrians. Mappo was formerly known as BooksOnMap. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Insify
cb_description: Insify is a company that specializes in providing insurance solutions for freelancers and entrepreneurs within the insurance industry. The company offers a range of customizable insurance policies, including liability and disability insurance, which can be managed entirely online. Insify's platform allows customers to tailor their insurance coverage to their specific needs without the need for advisory fees, and offers the flexibility of a monthly subscription model with a daily cancellation policy. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Quiver Quantitative
cb_description: Quiver Quantitative specializes in alternative data analysis for the financial sector, providing a next-generation stock research platform. The company offers insights into congressional trading, insider trading, government contracts, and corporate lobbying, as well as tools for stock screening, strategy backtesting, and real-time market data. Quiver Quantitative primarily serves individual investors, financial analysts, and investment firms seeking data-driven decision-making tools. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Spring Green, Wisconsin.

name: NeuraLight
cb_description: NeuraLight provides an artificial intelligence (AI)-driven platform focused on the healthcare and technology sectors, specifically within the domain of neurology. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence to improve and accelerate drug development and patient monitoring, and to provide precision care for patients with neurological disorders. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly in the areas of clinical development, diagnostics, and precision medicine. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Getaway
cb_description: Getaway operates as a company focused on providing unique accommodation experiences in the hospitality industry. The company offers tiny cabin vacation rentals that are equipped with essential amenities such as a kitchenette, a private bathroom, and outdoor cooking facilities. Its cabins are designed to provide a peaceful retreat in nature for individuals, couples, and families. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: GlossGenius
cb_description: GlossGenius is a company that provides business software for the beauty and wellness industry.
