Their platform includes online booking, client management, payment processing, financial reporting, inventory management, and marketing tools. GlossGenius serves professionals such as salons, spas, and independent practitioners. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Seon
cb_description: Seon is a company that focuses on emergency response technology in the security industry. The company offers a cloud-based platform that enables faster response times by automating dispatch processes, providing data analytics, and facilitating efficient navigation through GPS tracking. The primary customers of Seon are businesses in the emergency services sector.

name: WSC Sports Technologies
cb_description: WSC Sports Technologies is a company that focuses on the sports technology industry. The company offers an AI-driven platform that automatically generates personalized sports videos in real-time, enabling sports media rights owners to maximize the use of their content. The company primarily sells to the sports media industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Givatayim, Israel.

name: Handshake
cb_description: Handshake is a career development platform that operates in the job placement and career services industry. The company offers a comprehensive suite of tools for students and recent graduates to find jobs, internships, and connect with potential employers. Handshake primarily serves the higher education sector, facilitating connections between students, universities, and employers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: OneRail
cb_description: OneRail specializes in last mile delivery solutions within the logistics and supply chain sector. The company offers a suite of services including delivery order automation, multimodal optimization, and real-time visibility to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency. OneRail primarily serves industries such as retail, healthcare, food and grocery, and third-party logistics providers. OneRail was formerly known as Zapt. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Orlando, Florida.

name: Airbase
cb_description: Airbase is a comprehensive procure-to-pay software solution provider in the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform that streamlines purchasing, accounts payable automation, expense management, and corporate card programs to control and manage company spending. Airbase's platform is designed to integrate with over 70 enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems, enhancing financial operations for businesses. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California. In September 2024, Airbase was acquired by Paylocity.

name: Toopi Organics
cb_description: Toopi Organics specializes in the biotechnological sector with a focus on transforming human urine into products for agriculture. The company's main offerings include the collection and valorization of human urine to create biostimulants and microbial fertilizers that serve as eco-friendly alternatives to traditional mineral fertilizers and inorganic nutrients. Toopi Organics primarily serves the agricultural industry with its innovative, urino-sourced biostimulants and fertilizers. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Loupiac-de-la-Reole, France.

name: Descript
cb_description: Descript is an AI-powered video editor that simplifies video and podcast production. The company specializes in providing a text-based editing interface that allows users to edit audio and video content as easily as editing a document. Descript offers a suite of features including multitrack audio editing, automatic transcription, AI voice cloning, and tools for captioning and screen recording. The platform is designed to serve creators and businesses, facilitating marketing, sales, and learning and development through video content. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ShipIn
cb_description: ShipIn is a company specializing in AI-powered ship operations within the maritime industry. Its main offerings include the FleetVision platform, which uses AI-powered cameras and real-time visual analytics to detect onboard anomalies and improve operational efficiency. The company primarily serves the maritime fleet sector, enhancing ship-to-shore collaboration and fleet management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Newton, Massachusetts.

name: Constructor
cb_description: Constructor is an all-in-one platform for education and research. The company caters to the needs of schools, higher education, corporate training, alternative credentials, and sports teams, offering solutions for teaching and administration, learning, and research. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Schaffhausen, Switzerland.

name: Unispectral
cb_description: Unispectral provides hyperspectral imaging capabilities to any camera. It utilizes hyperspectral sensors to look at objects using a vast portion of the electromagnetic spectrum, enabling a wide range of applications such as astronomy, agriculture, biomedical imaging, mineralogy, physics, and surveillance, including smartphone cameras, wearables, and more. Unispectral was founded in 2016 and is based in Ramat Gen, Israel.

name: Petcube
cb_description: Petcube provides interactive pet monitors that allow pet owners to watch, talk to, and play with their pets from their smartphones, regardless of their location. These products primarily cater to pet owners. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: JupiterOne
cb_description: JupiterOne is a cyber asset analysis platform that specializes in providing total enterprise visibility for the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a comprehensive solution for security teams to gain complete visibility into their attack surface by aggregating and analyzing asset data from various sources, including cloud and on-premises infrastructure. JupiterOne's platform enables organizations to map out and understand the relationships between their cyber assets, facilitating better risk management and compliance with industry standards. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Morrisville, North Carolina.

name: Jupiter
cb_description: Jupiter is a creator-driven recipe and grocery shopping platform that specializes in influencer marketing within the food industry. The platform facilitates the monetization of recipe content for creators, while enabling brands to connect with millions of potential customers through shoppable recipes and influencer partnerships. Jupiter primarily serves the food and beverage sector, offering services such as campaign management, analytics, and creator-brand collaborations. It was founded in 2019.

name: Opopop
cb_description: Opopop focuses on its reusable and deposit-based packaging solutions. The company offers a system where consumers can choose reusable packages for their online purchases, which can be returned, cleaned, and reused, alongside consulting services. It primarily serves the electronic commerce industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Saint-Sorlin-en-Bugey, France.

name: Healium
cb_description: Healium is developing advanced clinical tools that address the productivity drag of current generation electronic medical records, while allowing providers attention to stay focused where it belongs - on patients. The company leverages advanced user interface design running on next-generation wearable and mobile tech, augmented reality, voice interaction, speech-to-text, clinical language understanding, and context awareness to provide an effortless and intuitive user experience.

name: Findable
cb_description: Findable provides home delivery services from any store or mall in a customer's city.

name: HappyOrNot
cb_description: HappyOrNot is a company specializing in customer feedback management within various business sectors. The company offers a range of feedback solutions, including physical and digital smiley-faced terminals and analytics services, to capture and analyze customer and employee satisfaction data. HappyOrNot primarily serves the retail, healthcare, and service industries. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Tampere, Finland.

name: Argus
cb_description: Argus is a publisher.

name: Monese
cb_description: Monese is a financial technology company offering a money app as an alternative to traditional banking. The company provides mobile money accounts, multi-currency spending options, and international money transfers. Monese's main services include account setup, budgeting tools, and a contactless Mastercard debit card. Additionally, the company offers credit-building services and insurance options for its customers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom. In October 2024, Monese was acquired by Pockit.

name: Veralox Therapeutics
cb_description: Veralox Therapeutics is a clinical stage biotechnology company focused on developing new therapies for life-threatening immuno-inflammatory diseases. The company's main offerings include drug products that target the 12-Lipoxygenase pathway to treat conditions such as Heparin-Induced Thrombocytopenia and Type 1 Diabetes. Veralox Therapeutics' therapies aim to inhibit proinflammatory metabolites, thereby addressing the underlying causes of these immune-driven conditions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Frederick, Maryland.

name: Cachet
cb_description: Cachet specializes in providing digital insurance products tailored for the platform economy, focusing on the mobility and insurance sectors. The company offers personalized insurance solutions for ride-hailing drivers, couriers, and micromobility users, as well as comprehensive fleet management services for businesses. Cachet's products are designed to reflect customers' actual usage and driving habits, ensuring fair and flexible coverage. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tallinn, Estonia.

name: HistoWiz
cb_description: HistoWiz is a company focused on accelerating pathology-based research in the medical and scientific research industry. The company offers services such as routine histology, immunostaining, slide archiving, pathology consultation, and quantitative image analysis, all aimed at transforming tissue specimens into high-quality digital slides for analysis by certified pathologists. Primarily, HistoWiz caters to the medical research and scientific community. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Crimson Education
cb_description: Crimson Education is a company that focuses on providing college admissions counseling and tutoring services in the education sector. The company offers a range of services including college admissions counseling for US, UK, and EU universities, online tutoring, essay review, and college athletic recruitment. They primarily cater to the education industry, assisting students in their journey to gain admission into top universities. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Auckland Central, New Zealand.

name: Syntiant
cb_description: Syntiant focuses on delivering end-to-end deep learning solutions for always-on applications in the semiconductor industry. The company offers neural decision processors and machine learning models designed for power-constrained devices, enabling efficient edge AI capabilities. Syntiant's products primarily cater to sectors such as smart home, automotive, personal devices, government, and industrial & commercial applications. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: BeeHero
cb_description: BeeHero provides precision pollination services within the agriculture sector, utilizing advanced sensor technology and machine learning algorithms to optimize pollination for various crops. The company serves commercial growers seeking to improve their crop production through efficient pollination. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Del Rey, California.

name: Onsitego
cb_description: Onsitego is a customer service company specializing in protection, repair, and maintenance plans for personal devices and home appliances. The company offers services such as instant repairs, damage protection, and annual maintenance contracts to enhance the longevity and performance of electronic devices. Onsitego primarily caters to individual device owners and households seeking reliable service solutions for their electronic products. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Mambu
cb_description: Mambu is a software-as-a-service (SaaS) company focused on providing a cloud banking platform within the financial services industry. The company offers a composable banking infrastructure that enables clients to create and manage lending and deposit services, as well as integrate with various application programming interfaces (APIs) for a customizable financial experience. Mambu primarily serves sectors such as banks, credit unions, and retailers looking to offer digital financial products. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Jacobi
cb_description: Jacobi focuses on technology for multi-asset portfolio design, analytics, and client engagement within the investment management sector. The company offers a platform that streamlines investment workflows, supports dynamic modeling and analytics, and facilitates effective client engagement through intuitive reporting tools. Jacobi's technology is primarily utilized by asset managers, wealth managers, asset owners, and investment consultants. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cure Hydration
cb_description: Cure Hydration specializes in functional beverage products within the health and wellness sector. The company offers a range of electrolyte drink mixes that are designed to hydrate effectively using a science-backed blend of ingredients. Cure Hydration primarily targets individuals seeking health-conscious hydration solutions, including a pediatric line for children and energizing mixes for adults. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Amboss
cb_description: Amboss operates a medical technology company. It provides a knowledge platform for medical students and clinicians, offering a library and a question bank for study and exam preparation, as well as a clinical reference tool for evidence-based decision-making in patient care, primarily serving the healthcare and education industries. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Ilara Health
cb_description: Ilara Health focuses on equipping healthcare providers in Africa with medical products and solutions to improve patient care in the healthcare industry. The company offers financing for diagnostic equipment, pharmaceutical supplies, and digital solutions to facilitate healthcare services at community medical centers. Ilara Health's end-to-end solutions support clinics in delivering complete care, from diagnostics to fully digitizing operations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Westlands, Kenya.

name: Ibex
cb_description: Ibex is a company specializing in AI-based cancer diagnostics within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers AI-powered diagnostic solutions that assist pathologists in providing accurate and efficient cancer diagnoses. These solutions are developed using advanced algorithms and digital workflows to detect cancer with clinical-grade accuracy. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Fitplan
cb_description: Fitplan is a company operating in the fitness and wellness industry. The company offers a range of services including personalized training, group fitness classes, aquatic classes, and specialized programs such as golf fitness and running programs. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mashpee, Massachusetts.

name: Alloy Enterprises
cb_description: Alloy Enterprises focuses on aluminum fabrication within the manufacturing industry. The company offers services such as the production of aluminum components, including thermal management solutions like cold plates with internal channels, and other intricate parts for various applications. It primarily serves the automotive, heavy equipment, and industrial sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Burlington, Massachusetts.

name: Ninox
cb_description: Ninox is a company that focuses on providing a low-code platform for all business processes, operating in the software as a service (SaaS) and platform as a service (PaaS) sectors. The company offers a platform that allows businesses to digitize their processes, including resource planning, customer management, and project management, without the need for extensive coding knowledge. Ninox primarily serves small and medium-sized enterprises across various sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: DNSFilter
cb_description: DNSFilter is a company specializing in cybersecurity, focusing on protective DNS, content filtering, and website blocking. The company offers solutions that block malicious site content in real-time and provide visibility for IT teams, ensuring network security across various devices and locations. DNSFilter primarily serves mid-sized and enterprise companies, as well as managed service providers (MSPs). It was founded in 2015 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Rad AI
cb_description: Rad AI provides artificial intelligence solutions for the radiology sector, focusing on helping physician workflows and patient care. It offers a suite of products that automate radiology reporting, impressions, worklist prioritization, and patient follow-ups, aiming to save time for radiologists and reduce burnout. It serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Garden
cb_description: Garden helps users to save for their financial goals and to invest their savings.

name: Pattern Brands
cb_description: Pattern Brands is a company that focuses on acquiring and growing a portfolio of home-life brands within the home goods industry. The company offers a variety of products for home organization, kitchen tools, bathroom essentials, and stationery, all designed to enhance everyday routines and turn them into joyful rituals. Pattern Brands primarily sells to the home goods sector. Pattern Brands was formerly known as Gin Lane. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Leaf Agriculture
cb_description: Leaf Agriculture provides a single Application Programming Interface (API) platform. It offers solutions such as farm management information systems, agricultural financing, and crop insurance. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Claremont, California.

name: Zenity
cb_description: Zenity provides security for low-code and no-code development in cybersecurity and software development. The company offers a platform that enables continuous protection and management of all low-code and no-code development, allowing users to discover, mitigate, govern, and protect their applications. It primarily serves firms utilizing business applications and automation. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Veego
cb_description: Veego delivers device and network performance information to service teams, developers, and integrators. It automatically solves connected-home problems, such as hardware and software, configuration and setup, integration, load on devices and networks, and environmental effects. The company primarily serves the telecommunications industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Graphite
cb_description: Graphite specializes in no-code AI tools for predictive analytics in the data analysis and performance agency sectors. It offers a platform that enables users to generate, visualize, and share business predictions without the need for coding, as well as providing pre-built AI models and templates for various business use cases. The company primarily serves data analysts and business intelligence professionals, as well as digital and performance agencies seeking for service offerings with AI capabilities. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Kerry, Ireland.

name: Gridium
cb_description: Gridium specializes in data-driven sustainability and decarbonization solutions within the energy sector. The company offers AI-driven energy performance analytics and project development services to help building owners and operators reduce energy consumption and costs. Gridium primarily serves the real estate and building management sectors, providing tools for energy savings, operational efficiency, and tenant satisfaction. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Sabbar
cb_description: Sabbar is a leading employment platform focused on connecting employers with job seekers in various sectors. The company offers services that facilitate the job search and hiring process, including job matching, CV creation, and streamlined application processes for full-time and part-time positions. Sabbar primarily serves sectors such as tourism, restaurants, cafes, retail, and service industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: sweetgreen
cb_description: Sweetgreen is a company focused on providing healthy meal options, operating within the fast-casual dining sector. The company offers a variety of seasonal salads and grain bowls made from scratch daily using whole produce delivered that morning. Sweetgreen also provides catering services and workplace meal programs, aiming to support healthier communities through real food. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: NorthOne
cb_description: NorthOne operates in banking. The company provides an online business account with integrated features designed to simplify business banking, including real-time money transfers, automatic budgeting tools, and connections to accounting, payment, and payroll tools, primarily serving small businesses across various sectors. NorthOne was formerly known as Ferst Digital. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Airmeet
cb_description: Airmeet focuses on providing an event experience platform. The company offers a platform for hosting virtual and hybrid events, including webinars, workshops, and meetups, aiming to deliver immersive and interactive experiences to attendees. Its primary customers are in the education, information technology and software as a service, and marketing sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Covina, California.

name: MycoTechnology
cb_description: MycoTechnology specializes in food ingredient innovation using fungal fermentation, operating within the food technology and culinary science sectors. The company offers natural flavor enhancers, plant-based proteins, and sweeteners developed through mushroom mycelia fermentation for taste, texture, and nutritional value of foods. MycoTechnology primarily serves the food and beverage industry, providing solutions for flavor modulation, sugar reduction, and the creation of plant-based alternatives. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Aurora, Colorado.

name: First Dollar
cb_description: First Dollar is a technology company that focuses on providing infrastructure for health spending benefits. The company offers a suite of software tools and APIs that enable organizations to launch and manage pre-tax accounts, lifestyle benefits, rewards programs, and supplemental benefits. It primarily serves sectors such as third-party administrators, health plans, benefits administrators, and financial institutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Apollo Agriculture
cb_description: Apollo Agriculture focuses on the productivity and profitability of small-scale farmers in the agricultural sector. It offers a suite of services including access to financing, farming inputs, insurance, and training designed to optimize the entire agricultural value chain from seed to sale. The company primarily serves the agricultural industry, with a focus on enabling farmers to scale their agribusinesses and improve food security. Apollo Agriculture was formerly known as Eschaton. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Swarmia
cb_description: Swarmia is a productivity platform operating in the software industry. The company provides insights and tools to engineering leaders, managers, and teams to identify and resolve issues that slow down their work. It primarily serves the software development industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Exotel
cb_description: Exotel is a company focused on AI-powered customer engagement and experience within the cloud communication sector. The company offers a suite of products that facilitate omnichannel communication, including cloud contact centers, intelligent virtual agents, and conversation intelligence tools. Exotel's solutions are designed to enhance customer interactions across various channels, improve operational efficiency, and support seamless integrations with CRM and other systems. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Legends of Learning
cb_description: Legends of Learning focuses on education, specifically in the domain of math and science. The company offers a range of curriculum-aligned, research-driven educational games designed to enhance subject mastery and classroom engagement. It primarily cater to the education sector, with a focus on teachers, students, and families. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Samunnati
cb_description: Samunnati focuses on smallholder farmers and agri enterprises in the agriculture sector. The company offers a range of services including aggregation, market linkages, advisory services, and customized agri finance solutions to support the growth and transformation of farmer collectives and agri enterprises. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: Aalo Atomics
cb_description: Aalo Atomics is a nuclear engineering company focused on creating small-scale, modular nuclear reactors for clean energy production. Their main product is a compact nuclear reactor capable of powering anything from a small data center to a large city, with a goal to achieve cost-effective electricity at 3 / kWh. Aalo Atomics' reactors are designed for simplified safety, utilizing UZrH fuel and liquid metal coolant to enhance performance and reduce costs. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: OpenSesame
cb_description: OpenSesame is a company focused on workforce development in the eLearning industry. The company offers a wide range of online learning programs, providing access to a comprehensive catalog of courses from various publishers. These courses cover a multitude of areas including compliance, business skills, safety, technology, certifications, diversity, equity and inclusion, leadership and management, and wellness. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Hint Health
cb_description: Hint Health is a technology company focused on the healthcare sector. The company provides a comprehensive practice management system, offering software automation that streamlines operations, enabling healthcare providers to focus on patient care. Its services are primarily utilized by direct care provider organizations, including primary care, urgent care, and specialty practices. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Work Truck Solutions
cb_description: Work Truck Solutions is a company that focuses on providing software as a service (SaaS) solutions for commercial vehicle dealerships. The company offers a platform that helps dealers manage their commercial inventory and connect with business buyers, essentially streamlining the transaction process. Their services primarily cater to the automotive industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Chico, California.

name: Productboard
cb_description: Productboard operates as a product management platform. It specializes in helping organizations streamline their product development process. The company offers a suite of tools to centralize customer feedback, enable data-driven prioritization, and facilitate cross-team collaboration. Productboard's platform is designed to support various teams, including product management, operations, engineering, and sales. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: HomeLane
cb_description: HomeLane specializes in providing custom home interior design solutions within the home decor and furnishings industry. Their services encompass a range of offerings including personalized living spaces, modular kitchen setups, and space-saving furniture, all tailored to fit the homeowner's lifestyle and preferences. HomeLane caters to individuals seeking a blend of functionality and aesthetics for their residential interiors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Nucleus RadioPharma
cb_description: Nucleus RadioPharma operates as a Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization (CDMO) focused on creating clinical and commercial supply chains for targeted radiotherapies. The company offers product development, regulatory expertise, and manufacturing infrastructure to facilitate the delivery of radiopharmaceutical treatments. Nucleus RadioPharma primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on the development and supply of radioligand therapies for cancer treatment. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Rochester, Minnesota.

name: Flock
cb_description: Flock is a company that focuses on providing online collaboration and team communication solutions in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that facilitates team messaging, project management, video conferencing, file sharing, and other productivity tools. It primarily serves sectors such as engineering, sales, marketing, product development, human resources, and customer support. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: PeakMetrics
cb_description: PeakMetrics specializes in media analysis and narrative intelligence within the media monitoring and analytics sector. The company offers a platform that utilizes machine learning to analyze media sources and social media platforms, providing insights into media manipulation and adversarial attacks. PeakMetrics primarily serves governments and enterprises looking to protect their brand and reputation. PeakMetrics was formerly known as CivicFeed. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Acurable
cb_description: Acurable is a company that focuses on the development of wearable medical devices in the healthcare sector. The company's main products are user-friendly wearable devices designed for home use by patients, which record internal body sounds and wirelessly transfer them to a mobile device for the diagnosis and management of chronic conditions. Acurable primarily sells to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Beta Technologies
cb_description: Beta Technologies is an electric aerospace company focused on the development of vertical take-off and landing (eVTOL) aircraft and supporting charging infrastructure. The company's main offerings include technologically advanced electric vertical aircraft and an extensive charging infrastructure for commercial electric flight. Beta Technologies primarily serves the aerospace and transportation industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in South Burlington, Vermont.

name: Microverse
cb_description: Microverse is an educational institution focused on providing remote software engineering training. The company offers a Full-Stack Web Development Program that enables students to become remote software engineers and an online English school, Leap, designed to help developers gain language proficiency. Microverse primarily serves individuals seeking software development skills and career opportunities in the technology sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: IMMI
cb_description: Immi pays for your cellphone in exchange for the ability to listen in on a user's life throughout the day.  The goal of IMMI is that this allow them to make advertising more tailored and efficient.

name: Actionfigure
cb_description: Actionfigure is a company focused on providing transportation intelligence solutions in the real estate and employment sectors. The company offers products such as real-time transportation information displays and mobile applications that assist in trip planning, aiming to make commuting easier and more comfortable for employees and commercial real estate tenants. Actionfigure primarily serves the commercial real estate industry and employers, providing solutions to overcome transportation and commuting challenges. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Boombox
cb_description: Boombox is a company focused on providing a music collaboration platform within the cloud storage and file-sharing industry. The company offers secure audio file storage, collaborative project tools, and features for managing song splits and version history, designed to facilitate remote music production and songwriting. Boombox primarily serves the music industry, offering solutions tailored to the needs of producers, songwriters, and musicians. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Specsmakers
cb_description: Specsmakers is a provider of prescription eyewear and fashionable sunglasses in the optical retail industry. The company offers a variety of eyeglasses, sunglasses, computer glasses, reading glasses, and contact lenses designed for vision correction and style enhancement. Specsmakers also provides expert optometry services for personalized eye care and accurate prescriptions. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: rAInbow
cb_description: rAInbow is a company focused on providing relationship advice and support through its AI-powered chatbot in the personal development sector. The chatbot offers emotional support, relationship guidance, communication skill enhancement, and conflict resolution advice to help users improve their interpersonal relationships. Additionally, rAInbow provides financial advice and entertainment information, catering to a broader range of personal needs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in South Africa.

name: Tilled
cb_description: Tilled provides a payment facilitator-as-a-service platform. It allows software companies to accept credit card payments. The platform offers a range of features such as payments, billing, analytics, protection, and more. Tilled was formerly known as Get Tilled. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Ascent360
cb_description: Ascent360 is a company that focuses on data-driven marketing in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to understand their customer base, segment their audience based on various factors such as purchase history and demographics, and send personalized marketing messages across multiple channels. The platform also provides reporting tools to measure the success of marketing campaigns. Ascent360 primarily serves the hospitality and eCommerce industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Golden, Colorado.

name: Mixpanel
cb_description: Mixpanel is an event analytics platform focused on providing insights into digital product interactions and customer behavior. The company offers services that enable real-time visualization of data, analysis of user behavior, and tracking of key metrics such as conversion and retention, accessible to a wide range of users regardless of technical expertise. Mixpanel primarily serves customers across various industries looking to make data-driven decisions. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: trii
cb_description: Trii is a mobile investment platform focused on equity trading in the Colombian financial market. The company offers a user-friendly application that enables retail investors to trade Colombian and international stocks, manage investment funds, and access financial market insights with ease. Trii's services cater to individuals seeking to invest in the stock market without the need for physical paperwork or high transaction costs. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: OmniChat
cb_description: OmniChat is a company focused on providing chat-commerce solutions within the online retail and sales sector. The company offers a platform that centralizes various chat channels to facilitate sales conversations, including features like chatbot lead filtering, omnichannel sales journeys, and integrated payment checkouts. OmniChat primarily serves the e-commerce industry, enhancing the online shopping experience through conversational engagement and social commerce strategies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Curitiba, Brazil.

name: Octopus Energy
cb_description: Octopus Energy is a electricity company focused on providing green energy solutions. The company offers renewable energy plans, customer-centric services, and initiatives for energy cost savings. The company cater to various customer needs with plans for solar panel-equipped homes, surplus energy buyback, and electric vehicle owners. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Bsense Bio Therapeutics
cb_description: Bsense Bio Therapeutics focuses on developing small molecules for the treatment of sensory hyperexcitability related disorders within the biopharmaceutical industry. The company's main offerings include therapeutics that target multiple mechanisms of hyperexcitability using a single compound to improve efficacy and safety. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Ness-ziona, Namibia.

name: Tea Drops
cb_description: Tea Drops is a company focused on the production and distribution of organic whole leaf tea in the food and beverage industry. The company offers a unique product, tea drops, which are premium loose-leaf teas compressed into a single-serve drop that dissolves in seconds to create a flavorful beverage. The company primarily sells to consumers in the food and beverage industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Tesseract
cb_description: Tesseract is specialized in computer security solutions, providing accessibility to cloud services at a low cost.

name: LOOP
cb_description: LOOP is a  free career development platform. It allows users to build a career path, get relevant news, jobs, and events, and connect with real-life mentors. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Kryptomon
cb_description: Kryptomon is a company focused on providing a play-to-earn gaming experience within the NFT and blockchain gaming sector. The company offers a platform where users can collect, breed, and train unique digital creatures known as Kryptomons, which are NFTs with mutable genetic codes that influence their abilities and behaviors. Kryptomon's platform is designed for gamers and NFT enthusiasts who enjoy MMORPGs and tactical turn-based RPGs, with additional features like AR treasure hunts and trading of digital and phygital collectibles. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Seafair
cb_description: Seafair is a technology-driven company specializing in maritime crewing within the shipping industry. The company offers a digital platform for maritime recruitment and manning services that facilitate the hiring of qualified seafarers for shipping companies, ensuring compliance with industry standards. Seafair primarily serves the maritime shipping industry by connecting seafarers with job opportunities and providing shipping companies with crew management solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BizAway
cb_description: BizAway is a company that specializes in business travel management within the corporate travel sector. They offer an intuitive platform that enables one-click booking and management of business trips, aiming to save time and reduce travel expenses for companies. BizAway's services cater to various corporate needs, including automated travel policies, cost control, invoice management, and platform customization. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Spilimbergo, Italy.

name: Lightrun
cb_description: Lightrun focuses on developer observability in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that allows developers to dynamically instrument logs, metrics, and traces from their integrated development environment (IDE) to understand the behavior of live applications at runtime, without needing code changes, redeployments, and restarts. It primarily serves the software development industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Nivoda
cb_description: Nivoda focuses on providing a business-to-business (B2B) marketplace for jewelry. It offers a platform that allows jewelry businesses to source diamonds and gemstones at competitive prices. It primarily serves the jewelry retail industry. Nivoda was formerly known as World Gem Centre Limited. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: norbloc
cb_description: Norbloc is a company that specializes in Know Your Customer (KYC) and Anti-Money Laundering (AML) software solutions, operating in the financial technology sector. The company offers products that facilitate digital onboarding, internal and external data sharing for KYC processes, aiming to enhance customer experience, reduce KYC costs, and save time. Norbloc primarily serves the financial services industry, legal firms, and marketplaces. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Cloudian
cb_description: Cloudian specializes in data management software and object storage solutions for the hybrid cloud sector. The company offers S3-compatible storage platforms designed for scalability, security, and seamless cloud integration, catering to capacity-intensive workloads. It offer products include object storage systems, file services, data observability and analytics tools, managed services, and load balancing solutions. Cloudian was formerly known as Gemini Mobile Technologies. It was founded in 2001 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Taxfyle
cb_description: Taxfyle specializes in online tax preparation and accounting services for individuals and businesses. Its main offerings include tax filing, consultations, and bookkeeping services, designed to help with savings and ensure accurate financial management. It caters to a diverse clientele, including small businesses, accounting firms, and individual taxpayers seeking professional tax assistance. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Tibber
cb_description: Tibber serves as a digital energy company focused on electricity consumption within the energy sector. The company offers services that enable customers to reduce energy bills and consumption through digital tools and insights, without specifying any particular products. Tibber primarily serves the residential energy market with a platform designed to make energy consumption. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Forde, Norway.

name: Productiv
cb_description: Productiv specializes in SaaS management, providing a platform that facilitates better decision-making across various business sectors. The company offers a comprehensive solution for managing the entire SaaS lifecycle, including procurement, usage monitoring, access management, and renewal processes, all enhanced by AI-powered insights. Productiv primarily serves sectors that require collaborative software procurement and management, such as IT, finance, and procurement departments. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Cider
cb_description: Cider is a globally-minded fashion brand that caters to the apparel industry. The company offers a diverse range of clothing styles for women, including everyday wear, swimwear, and accessories, with a focus on inclusivity from sizes XXS to 4XL. Cider primarily sells to the ecommerce industry, targeting young trendsetters and the Gen Z demographic. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

name: Sanity Group
cb_description: Sanity Group focuses on the medicinal and health use of cannabinoids within the cannabis industry. The company offers a range of products including medicinal cannabis, cannabinoid-based pharmaceuticals, and consumer health and wellbeing products, as well as digital health applications. It primarily serves sectors such as the medical cannabis industry and the broader consumer health market. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Brut
cb_description: Brut is a global media company specializing in the creation and distribution of short-form video content across various domains including politics, society, and culture. The company offers daily news coverage, insights into social issues, and features on entertainment, health, science, technology, economy, and sports. Brut serves a diverse audience with content published in multiple languages and distributed across several social platforms, reaching over 1.5 billion views per month. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Augtera Networks
cb_description: Augtera Networks specializes in network artificial intelligence and machine learning, focusing on the technology sector. The company offers a platform that provides autonomous anomaly detection, dynamic learning, and automated workflows for network operations, aiming to prevent network incidents and enhance operational efficiency. Augtera Networks primarily serves sectors that require advanced network monitoring and management, such as telecommunications and enterprise IT infrastructures. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Datasembly
cb_description: Datasembly provides access to grocery and retail pricing records from every store from a wide range of retailers. The company provides real-time, hyper-local data on retail pricing, promotions, and product assortment, enabling brands and retailers to make informed business decisions. It primarily serves the consumer packaged goods (CPG) and retail industries. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in McLean, Virginia.

name: Monitaur
cb_description: Monitaur specializes in governance software, focusing on ethical and responsible management across various industries. The company offers a comprehensive platform that guides and governs the entire lifecycle of artificial intelligence, providing solutions for risk management, documentation, monitoring, and auditing of artificial intelligence systems. Monitaur primarily serves sectors that require robust artificial intelligence governance, such as financial services, healthcare, and technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Duxbury, Massachusetts.

name: Black Sheep Foods
cb_description: Black Sheep Foods specializes in the creation of plant-based meat alternatives, focusing on a lamb substitute within the food industry. Their main offerings include a range of products designed to mimic the taste and texture of traditional lamb, utilizing proprietary processes and analytical chemistry to ensure a high-quality, environmentally friendly alternative. These products cater to both individual consumers and the foodservice industry, providing plant-based options for menus and retail. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Rider
cb_description: Rider is an e-commerce logistics company providing solutions for product delivery in Pakistan. The company offers seamless integration with merchants for product pickup, transportation, and delivery, including after-hour pickups and real-time tracking through a user-friendly portal and app. Rider primarily serves the e-commerce industry, facilitating transactions and deliveries for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). It was founded in 2019 and is based in Karachi, Pakistan.

name: Solarcycle
cb_description: Solarcycle provides recycling of solar panels and operates within the renewable energy sector. The company offers a comprehensive service for decommissioning end-of-life solar panels and repurposing the materials for new uses. It serves the solar industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Mesa, Arizona.

name: Kyash
cb_description: Kyash is a mobile payment application. It secures and automates the process of online transactions. The company provides an automated system for cash payments and enables businesses to collect digital payments. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: BabySparks
cb_description: BabySparks is a company focused on providing parenting resources and tools in the child development industry. The company offers an online platform with live and on-demand classes taught by parenting experts, as well as a development program app that provides daily play activities, comprehensive milestones, and tools to track growth and progress for children in their first three years. The company primarily serves the parenting and early childhood education sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pembroke Pines, Florida.

name: Revv
cb_description: Revv operates as a self-drive car company in the automotive industry. The company offers a variety of services including hourly rental, annual and monthly car subscriptions, and one-way outstation rental. These services are designed to meet a range of self-drive needs. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Gurgaon, Haryana. In December 2023, CarDekho has acquired a majority stake in Revv.

name: Yottaa
cb_description: Yottaa focuses on improving the performance of eCommerce websites. The company offers services such as enhancing page load times, managing and analyzing third-party load times, and securing eCommerce sites from threats. It primarily serves the eCommerce industry. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Finmo
cb_description: Finmo enables digital payments for offline retail merchants. Finmo's core product, DigiBharat, enables peer-to-merchant payments from over 60 apps including Bharat Interface for Money (BHIM), Flipkart's PhonePe, ICICI Bank's Pockets, HDFC Bank's Chillr, Samsung Pay, SBI Pay, and Axis Pay. Consumers can scan the QR code that is present at the store and pay instantly, directly from their bank account to the merchant's bank account.

name: Uplift Labs
cb_description: Uplift Labs specializes in artificial intelligence-powered motion capture and three dimensional analysis within the sports performance, medicine, and media sectors. The company offers solutions to optimize human movement performance, enhance sports medicine practices, and sports broadcasting experiences with advanced analytics. It primarily serves professional sports teams, elite performance coaches, and sports broadcasters. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Bedrock Analytics
cb_description: Bedrock Analytics is a company focused on data analytics and artificial intelligence in the consumer packaged goods (CPG) industry. The company offers a cloud-based data analytics platform that transforms complex data into simple visuals for sales presentations, and provides consultation services for custom analysis, competitive intelligence, and category insights. Its primary customers are in the CPG industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Oakland, California.

name: NS1
cb_description: NS1 develops an internet traffic management platform. It provides domain name system (DNS) services and solutions. It offers services such as traffic steering, data insights, and more. It serves digital media, financial services, and other industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York. In March 2023, NS1 was acquired by IBM.

name: Funraise
cb_description: Funraise is a company that focuses on providing innovative fundraising technology solutions in the nonprofit sector. The company offers a comprehensive platform that includes features such as donation forms, recurring giving programs, peer-to-peer fundraising, campaign websites, and data reporting tools, all designed to simplify and enhance the fundraising process. The primary market for Funraise's services is the nonprofit industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Long Beach, California.

name: Grain
cb_description: Grain is a multi-brand online restaurant operating in the food service industry. The company offers a range of services including on-demand meal delivery, wedding catering, and general event catering. Grain primarily serves to individuals and businesses requiring food delivery and catering services. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Singapore.

name: Soundmind
cb_description: Soundmind is a web platform that lets senior care providers centrally manage and customize voice assistants like Alexa. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York. On January 7th, 2022, Soundmind was acquired by Speak2. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Pixaera
cb_description: Pixaera is a company focused on professional development in the technology sector, specifically in the domain of virtual reality (VR) and game-based learning. The company offers a VR training platform that provides immersive, interactive learning experiences for professional development. These experiences are designed to engage employees, change behavior, and increase knowledge retention. The platform is used by teams in various industries for training purposes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: AgVend
cb_description: AgVend is a company specializing in digital engagement software for the agriculture distribution channel. Their main offerings include white-labeled information and commerce portals designed to enhance the relationship between agribusinesses and their grower-customers. AgVend's solutions facilitate various aspects of agribusiness operations, such as customer experience, team efficiency, revenue growth, and cost reduction. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: RAIN
cb_description: RAIN focuses on providing plastic-free natural spring water, primarily in the beverage industry. Their main product is natural spring water that is sustainably sourced and packaged in infinitely recyclable aluminum bottles designed for minimal environmental impact. RAIN's offerings cater to consumers seeking eco-friendly alternatives to single-use plastic water bottles. RAIN was formerly known as Simply Rain Water. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tiger, Georgia.

name: Cleanlab
cb_description: Cleanlab specializes in data-centric artificial intelligence and offers a suite of software solutions designed to improve data quality and machine learning model reliability. The company's main offerings include automated data curation, machine learning model training, and model deployment, all provided through a no-code platform. Cleanlab's software is utilized across various sectors such as financial services, healthcare, e-commerce, and more. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Lambda
cb_description: Lambda is a technology company that specializes in the development and production of laser technology, operating in the electronics and optics industry. The company's main offerings include the production of electronic and laser equipment for various uses such as medical, dental, veterinary, art restoration, and cultural heritage preservation. Lambda primarily serves sectors such as the medical and dental industries, the art restoration sector, and the veterinary industry. It was founded in 1996 and is based in Brendola, Italy.

name: RenalSense
cb_description: RenalSense is a medical device company focused on real-time renal diagnostics within the healthcare sector. The company's flagship product, Clarity RMS, is a renal function monitoring system designed to continuously measure urine flow, providing critical data for the early detection and prevention of Acute Kidney Injury (AKI) in ICU patients. RenalSense's technology is aimed at improving patient care by enabling timely interventions and better management of fluid balance in critical care settings. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: TradeDepot
cb_description: TradeDepot is a company that focuses on streamlining the supply chain between manufacturers, distributors, and retail stores in emerging markets. The company offers a B2B eCommerce platform that ensures products are consistently available to retailers, facilitating the management and maintenance of delivery assets, and providing a subscription service for bulk deliveries. TradeDepot primarily serves the retail industry by keeping brands stocked on shelves and enabling growth through increased store reach. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Hooked Foods
cb_description: Hooked Foods is a company focused on creating plant-based seafood alternatives within the food industry. Their main offerings include a variety of vegan substitutes for traditional seafood products such as tuna and salmon, designed to mimic the taste and texture of their marine counterparts. Hooked Foods primarily serves the retail and restaurant sectors with their sustainable seafood substitutes. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Nacka, Sweden.

name: Xiaohongshu
cb_description: Xiaohongshu operates a lifestyle platform in the social media and e-commerce sectors. It enables users to discover, share, and connect through lifestyle content such as cosmetics, fashion, food, and travel, integrating user-generated content with commerce. The platform primarily serves individuals looking for inspiration and guidance in various aspects of their daily lives. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Huangpu, China.

name: AssemblyAI
cb_description: AssemblyAI develops artificial intelligence (AI) powered models to transcribe and understand speech. The company's product allows users to automatically convert audio, video, and live audio streams to text with a speech-to-text application programming interface (API). It primarily serves the technology industry. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Edda
cb_description: Edda is a collaborative platform specializing in tools for venture capital and private equity sectors. The company provides a suite of products designed to manage dealflow, portfolio, and investor relations all in one place. Edda's solutions are tailored to enhance the investment process by offering features such as real-time data on investments, customizable reporting, and streamlined communication between limited and general partners. Edda was formerly known as Kushim VC. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Filtered
cb_description: Filtered is commercializing deep learning technology which uncovers insights into emerging technology and trends.

name: Clark
cb_description: Clark is a not-for-profit senior living community offering a spectrum of services within the retirement living sector. The company provides independent living, assisted living, memory care, and skilled nursing services, designed to support the various needs of seniors. Clark primarily serves the senior population seeking long-term residence and a comprehensive life plan community. It is based in Grand Rapids, Michigan.

name: Daily Harvest
cb_description: Daily Harvest focuses on providing nourishing, plant-based foods within the food industry. It offers a variety of ready-in-minute meals and snacks made from organic fruits and vegetables, designed for convenience and health. The company primarily serves individuals seeking healthy meal options. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: YouScribe
cb_description: YouScribe is a digital library that operates in the online publishing industry. The company offers a wide range of services including access to millions of documents and hundreds of thousands of E-books, which can be read on various devices such as computers, smartphones, and tablets. YouScribe primarily serves the digital publishing industry. It is based in Paris, France.

name: Aura
cb_description: Aura harnesses the power of geolocation, image recognition, big data, and social networking to empower users to experience art like never before. Whether one is exploring a metropolitan art museum or just happens to stumble upon a provocative piece of art, Aura is the ultimate tool for documenting and preserving great works of art.

name: Sundose
cb_description: Sundose is a company that focuses on personalized dietary supplementation in the health and wellness industry. The company offers custom-made nutrient mixes tailored to individual health and lifestyle needs, including vitamins, minerals, probiotics, adaptogens, antioxidants, and omega-3 fatty acids. These products are primarily sold to individuals seeking to improve their health and wellbeing. Sundose was formerly known as RECOVER.TECHNOLOGY Sp. z o.o.. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Lublin, Poland.

name: Skin Analytics
cb_description: Skin Analytics specializes in AI-driven medical diagnostics for dermatology, focusing on the early detection and management of skin cancer. The company offers a UKCA Class IIa AI as a Medical Device (AIaMD) named DERM, which is designed to assist healthcare providers in triaging patients and conserving dermatologist capacity by accurately identifying skin cancers and benign lesions. Skin Analytics primarily serves healthcare organizations, with a significant focus on partnerships with NHS Trusts to improve skin cancer pathways. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: Done Properly
cb_description: Done Properly specializes in the development of sustainable bioprocessed ingredients for the food industry. The company offers a range of products including a versatile and sustainable micelio protein, an umami flavor enhancer that also reduces sodium and sugar, and a plant-based burger alternative. It primarily serves the food industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Macul, Chile.

name: Neighborly
cb_description: Neighborly is a community investment marketplace. By providing better ways for people to invest directly in the places and civic projects they care about, the company creates new options for communities to approach civic capital formation. Neighborly is democratizing the municipal securities market, aiming to thereby foster a healthier relationship between global banks and the nation's places.

name: Secfix
cb_description: Secfix specializes in automating security and compliance processes for small and medium-sized businesses within the information security sector. The company offers solutions to streamline the attainment and maintenance of standards like ISO 27001 and TISAX, including risk management, policy management, and integration with existing tech stacks for evidence collection and documentation. Secfix primarily serves businesses seeking to enhance their information security and compliance stature in industries where data protection and security standards are critical. Secfix was formerly known as Requestee. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: AvantStay
cb_description: AvanStay develops a technology-enabled hospitality platform. The platform offers curated vacation and short-term rental experiences, utilizing a proprietary technology suite to manage bookings and provide elevated consumer touchpoints. It primarily serves the travel industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Clickup
cb_description: Clickup is a centralized inventory management platform operating in the business productivity and management software sector. The company specializes in providing solutions for multichannel sales and inventory tracking tailored to local businesses.  It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Juan, Puerto Rico.

name: Nabta Health
cb_description: Nabta Health is a company that focuses on providing holistic and hybrid healthcare, specifically for women. The company offers a unique, membership-based model of care that includes personalized support for complex female health issues, preventive care, and services designed to complement health insurance. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Hark
cb_description: Hark prioritizes who needs to do what, where and when across all aspects of hospital life. Using this data medical experts can transform the way they deliver healthcare within their organization, saving time, money, paperwork and ultimately, lives.

name: Extend
cb_description: Extend is a company that specializes in document processing solutions for modern software companies. Their platform enables the deployment of an in-house AI workforce to transform messy documents into structured data, offering no-code AI training and custom workflow automation. Extend primarily serves sectors such as real estate, financial services, supply chain, and healthcare. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: DNA Script
cb_description: DNA Script specializes in enzymatic DNA (deoxyribonucleic acid) synthesis technology within the biotechnology sector. The company offers the SYNTAX System, a benchtop DNA printer that enables on-demand production of custom DNA oligos using Enzymatic DNA Synthesis (EDS) technology. Its technology is primarily utilized in the fields of genomics, molecular biology, and personalized medicine. DNA Script was founded in 2014 and is based in Le Kremlin-Bicetre, France.

name: Bitso
cb_description: Bitso is a financial services company specializing in cryptocurrency transactions and borderless payments. The company offers a platform for buying, selling, and trading a variety of cryptocurrencies, as well as facilitating crypto-based international transfers. Bitso primarily serves individuals and businesses looking to utilize cryptocurrencies for investment, trading, and payment solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Nexite
cb_description: Nexite operates as a retail technology company focusing on enabling online and offline retail experiences. The company offers a connected retail platform that transforms passive products into active digital communicators, providing retailers with a continuous stream of data about their merchandise. This data includes information about the merchandise's location, availability, and customer interactions, enabling retailers to optimize revenue based on insights. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: JigSpace
cb_description: JigSpace specializes in interactive 3D presentation software within the augmented reality (AR) technology sector. The company offers a platform for creating and sharing augmented reality presentations to showcase products and concepts in an immersive way. JigSpace primarily serves sectors that benefit from spatial computing, such as technical sales, marketing, and product education. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Fitzroy, Australia.

name: VulcanForms
cb_description: VulcanForms is a digital manufacturing company operating in the industrial sector. The company offers services such as additive manufacturing, precision machining, and digital thread technology to build metal parts at an industrial scale. VulcanForms primarily serves sectors such as the medical, defense, aerospace, and semiconductor industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Burlington, Massachusetts.

name: Ydata
cb_description: YData specializes in enhancing data quality for data science and artificial intelligence applications within the technology sector. The company offers a platform for synthetic data generation, data quality profiling, and data-centric AI to improve AI model performance and ensure data privacy. It primarily serves sectors such as financial services, telecommunications, healthcare, and retail. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Verbit
cb_description: Verbit specializes in artificial intelligence-based transcription and captioning services. The company offers a range of services including live captioning, transcription, video and audio transcription, closed captioning, audio description, translation, and legal transcription. It primarily serves sectors such as corporate and general business, media production, education, digital and online learning, and legal. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: BioIntelliSense
cb_description: BioIntelliSense is a company focused on continuous health monitoring and clinical intelligence in the healthcare sector. The company offers a comprehensive portfolio of continuous patient monitoring solutions, including wearable devices and advanced data services, that capture vital signs and physiological biometrics for both in-hospital and home use. These solutions primarily cater to the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Golden, Colorado.

name: terminus
cb_description: Terminus provides new business software in the technology sector. The company offers enterprise-level software platforms, full-link solutions, and services, helping businesses achieve digital transformation. It primarily serves large-scale enterprises across various sectors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

name: Tapcart
cb_description: Tapcart operates as a mobile application builder for Shopify. It provides support in building custom applications with different product grids and search functionality. The company serves the fashion, beauty, food, health, and wellness sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: InstaAstro
cb_description: InstaAstro specializes in astrology and related esoteric services, operating within the wellness and spiritual sectors. It offers services including horoscope predictions, kundli analysis, and matchmaking, as well as consultations in Vedic astrology, numerology, and tarot card reading. InstaAstro caters to individuals seeking guidance on personal and professional matters such as love, career, and financial decisions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Noida, India.

name: Cityfurnish
cb_description: Cityfurnish is a rental brand specializing in home furniture and appliances within the furniture rental industry. The company offers a variety of furniture packages for bedrooms, dining rooms, and living rooms, as well as home appliances, all available on flexible rental contracts with easy payment options. They provide expert delivery and installation services at no additional cost. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Be My Eyes
cb_description: Be My Eyes is a technology company focused on assisting individuals who are blind or have low vision. The company offers a suite of products that establish a live video connection between blind and low-vision users and sighted volunteers, company representatives, or sighted co-workers, enabling them to lead more independent lives. Be My Eyes primarily serves the visually impaired community. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Midtjylland, Denmark.

name: WorkHound
cb_description: WorkHound is a company focused on enhancing employee engagement and retention within various industries through its anonymous feedback platform. The company provides a suite of tools for real-time employee feedback, actionable insights, and operational intelligence to help businesses reduce turnover and improve workforce satisfaction. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chattanooga, Tennessee.

name: Kriptos
cb_description: Kriptos specializes in cybersecurity and information management, focusing on the automatic classification and labeling of sensitive documents using artificial intelligence. The company offers a cloud-based platform that provides real-time analytics and vulnerability scanning to help businesses manage non-structured data and ensure compliance with data protection standards. Kriptos primarily serves sectors that handle sensitive information and are in need of cybersecurity solutions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Hollywood, Florida.

name: HungryRoot
cb_description: HungryRoot is a company focused on the food and grocery delivery industry. It offers a service that provides customers with groceries and simple recipes, personalized based on their dietary needs and preferences. The company primarily serves individuals and families looking for convenient and healthy meal solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Lolli
cb_description: Lolli operates as an online reward offering application. It is a Bitcoin rewards application that lets users earn and own Bitcoin when they shop online. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: LUCA
cb_description: LUCA provides alternative investment solutions. The company offers a digital platform that simplifies the complex investment process, providing access to world-class funds for a wide range of investors. It serves the financial sector. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Atoms
cb_description: Atoms is a company focused on the footwear industry, specifically in the domain of everyday wear shoes. The company offers comfortable shoes designed for daily use, featuring elastic laces, copper lining, and breathable materials. Their products are primarily targeted towards the consumer goods sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: PathFactory
cb_description: PathFactory is a company that focuses on content intelligence in the technology marketing sector. The company offers an AI-powered platform that generates personalized content experiences for buyers, helping to accelerate deal velocity and grow business pipelines. It primarily serves the B2B marketing industry. PathFactory was formerly known as LookBookHQ. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Cloud Paper
cb_description: Cloud Paper specializes in eco-friendly paper products, focusing on the personal care and cleaning supplies sectors. The company offers a range of products including bamboo toilet paper, paper towels, facial tissues, and cleaning cloths, all made from sustainable bamboo and packaged in plastic-free, recyclable, and compostable materials. Cloud Paper primarily serves environmentally conscious consumers and businesses looking for sustainable alternatives to traditional paper products. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Zelt
cb_description: Zelt is a company that specializes in providing an integrated platform for HR, finance, and IT operations within various business sectors. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including an employee system of record, payroll automation, benefits administration, and tools for managing performance and engagement. Zelt's platform is designed to streamline operations and reduce administrative workload through automation and self-service capabilities. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

name: Prodly
cb_description: Prodly specializes in Salesforce DevOps solutions, focusing on data and metadata management within the software industry. The company offers a suite of services that streamline the management, deployment, and migration of data and metadata, as well as sandbox management, all designed to enhance efficiency and compliance for Salesforce environments. Prodly's solutions cater to various sectors, including high-growth and Fortune 100 companies across diverse industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: P0 Security
cb_description: P0 Security specializes in cloud-native observability, security, and networking, focusing on cloud security in the technology industry. It offers services that help manage cloud entitlements, providing secure access for engineers and identifying potential vulnerabilities. Their solutions also facilitate the automation of privileged access workflows and the auditing of cloud IAM. P0 Security was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Game Theory
cb_description: Game Theory focuses on playing sports, and operating in the sports and technology sectors. The company offers services such as video highlights of sports events, matchmaking for players, and providing a platform for communities and tournaments. Game Theory also offers coaching services for various sports. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Eezee
cb_description: Eezee is a company specializing in modern procurement and operates as a business supplies marketplace in the MRO (Maintenance, Repair, and Operations) sector. The company offers an online platform that connects businesses with a network of accredited suppliers for efficient sourcing and procurement of industrial and business supplies. Eezee's services cater to enterprises looking to streamline their supply chain management, offering features like visual track and trace, ERP integration, and pre-negotiated pricing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: CAMP4 Therapeutics
cb_description: CAMP4 Therapeutics is a biotechnology company focused on developing programmable therapeutics for various diseases. The company's main offerings include a platform that leverages regulatory RNA and gene expression to upregulate genes, aiming to create treatments for a wide range of conditions. CAMP4 Therapeutics primarily serves the biopharmaceutical industry with its innovative RNA-based therapies. CAMP4 Therapeutics was formerly known as Marauder Therapeutics Inc.. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Desaisiv
cb_description: Desaisiv offers artificial intelligence (AI) based software-as-a-Service (SaaS) insurance platform for healthcare sections and health insurers and third-party administrators (TPAs). It optimizes underwriting and automates medical approvals using predictive AI models. The technology detects fraud and policy abuses while providing insurers with improved visibility into various risk factors. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Pico Mes
cb_description: Pico Mes specializes in manufacturing execution systems (MES) software, focusing on error-proofing and efficiency for the manufacturing industry. Their software provides digital work instructions, data analytics, and supply chain monitoring to streamline production processes and enhance quality control. Pico Mes primarily serves mid-sized factories in sectors such as battery manufacturing, automotive, and aerospace. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Wheelhouse
cb_description: Wheelhouse runs a company specializing in revenue management software, primarily serving the short-term rental industry.
