The company offers a suite of products including dynamic pricing, competition tracking, booking insights, and market reports, all designed to help accommodation providers maximize their revenue and minimize effort. Wheelhouse primarily sells to the short-term rental industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Seer
cb_description: Seer is a company focused on advancing proteomics research within the biotechnology sector. Its main offerings include the Proteograph Product Suite, which enables deep, rapid, and unbiased proteomics at scale, and the Proteograph Analysis Suite, designed for the efficient analysis of proteomics data. Seer also provides a range of services through its Technology Access Center, catering to the needs of the scientific community in proteomics and genomics research. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Everest Fleet
cb_description: Everest Fleet specializes in fleet management and transportation services within the logistics and mobility sectors. The company offers a range of services including logistics solutions, employee mobility, and intercity transportation, utilizing a fleet of CNG and electric vehicles. Everest Fleet primarily caters to the shared mobility and logistics industries, providing transportation options and supporting unorganized sector entrepreneurship. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Orkestra
cb_description: Orkestra provides a renewable energy platform that offers tools to help energy companies plan, sell, and optimize the rollout of new energy deployments. It was formerly known as Vippy. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Melbourne, Australia.

name: Workato
cb_description: Workato specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) powered enterprise automation. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to automate their processes by integrating their applications, data, and experiences, all in a low-code, no-code environment, primarily serving sectors such as information technology, human resources, sales, marketing, finance, and support. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Rivet Work
cb_description: Rivet Work focuses on workforce management in the construction industry. It offers a platform that aids in labor forecasting, scheduling, and field communication, enabling construction teams to build accurate labor plans and meet customer timelines. The company primarily serves the construction industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: About You
cb_description: About You is an online fashion retailer specializing in offering a personalized shopping experience in the fashion and lifestyle sector. The company provides a wide range of clothing, footwear, and accessories through its smartphone app and website, catering to diverse customer tastes with over 600,000 items from around 3,800 brands. Additionally, About You's business-to-business arm, SCAYLE GmbH, delivers cloud-based enterprise shop systems for brands and retailers to scale their digital business. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

name: mybacs
cb_description: mybacs offers synbiotic supplements, which are a combination of probiotics and prebiotics, along with minerals and vitamins, tailored to the individual needs of customers. Its products focus on human microbiome research and aim to contribute to the daily well-being of customers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Zevoy
cb_description: Zevoy is a company that focuses on expense management solutions in the financial services industry. Its main offerings include a business card combined with a receipt scanning app and administration portal, which together form a comprehensive expense management solution. This service is designed to automate receipt and expense management, saving companies significant time. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Espoo, Finland.

name: Gooroo
cb_description: Gooroo is a company specializing in automated advertising solutions within the social media domain, particularly for Telegram. The company offers services that automate the creation, launch, and analysis of advertising campaigns, with features such as audience analysis, channel matching, and performance tracking. Gooroo caters primarily to small and medium business owners and marketing departments, providing tools for efficient campaign management and data-driven decision-making. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Moscow, Russian Federation.

name: Kita
cb_description: Kita specializes in carbon insurance, operating within the insurance and carbon markets. The company offers a range of carbon insurance products designed to reduce risk and encourage investment in the carbon removal sector. These products provide a level of confidence to both carbon projects and buyers of carbon credits. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Worcestershire, United Kingdom.

name: Biospectal
cb_description: Biospectal is a company focused on the development and commercialization of medical grade optical biosensing solutions in the healthcare industry. The company's main offerings include a smartphone application and data platform for remote blood pressure monitoring, aiming to democratize access to this vital health metric. Biospectal primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a particular emphasis on remote patient monitoring. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: Foodmap
cb_description: Foodmap develops an e-commerce website for grocery and food products. The company primarily offers a platform that connects farmers and food producers with both business and individual consumers. It primarily serves the ecommerce industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

name: Manifest Climate
cb_description: Manifest Climate specializes in Climate Risk Planning solutions within the climate technology sector. The company offers software that helps organizations understand, manage, and communicate their climate risks and opportunities, utilizing AI and climate expertise to align with reporting requirements and investor expectations. Manifest Climate's software is designed to provide actionable climate roadmaps and competitive benchmarks for businesses. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: WorkWhile
cb_description: WorkWhile is an hourly labor technology platform that operates in the workforce solutions sector, focusing on providing flexible work opportunities. The company matches workers with shifts that align with their skills, schedule, and location, and offers businesses a scalable, reliable workforce. WorkWhile's services cater to various industries, including warehousing, hospitality, logistics, and event services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: OpenLoop
cb_description: OpenLoop is a health tech company focused on providing comprehensive telehealth support services and solutions. The company offers white-label clinical support, technology platforms, and a suite of services including provider staffing, payer coverage, revenue cycle management, licensing and credentialing, diagnostic imaging, and regulatory and legal compliance to facilitate virtual care delivery. OpenLoop primarily serves digital health companies, healthcare providers, and various sectors within the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Des Moines, Iowa.

name: Agricool
cb_description: Agricool aims to grow fruits and vegetables inside of shipping containers in order to bring more fresh, local food to big cities. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in La Courneuve, France.

name: Humaans
cb_description: Humaans is a company that focuses on human resources management in the business sector. The company offers a range of services including employee database management, document storage, absence tracking, workflow building, and data analytics. These services are designed to simplify complex processes such as employee onboarding, offboarding, and compensation management. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Odore
cb_description: Odore specializes in customer engagement solutions for consumer brands within the marketing and advertising sector. The company offers a suite of services including brand advocacy, digital product sampling, targeted customer acquisition campaigns, and advanced analytics to build communities and enhance customer engagement. Odore's platform is designed to increase conversions, brand awareness, and customer loyalty by providing end-to-end campaign management and optimization. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: PrizeOut
cb_description: PrizeOut is an ad-tech company specializing in enhancing the withdrawal process across various sectors including gaming, banking, cryptocurrency, and finance. The company provides a platform that converts withdrawals into growth opportunities for e-commerce and retail businesses, offering bonus offers and a curated shopping experience. PrizeOut primarily serves industries that require innovative payment solutions and customer rewards programs. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: McMakler
cb_description: McMakler focuses on real estate transactions and services within the real estate industry. It offers property valuation, sales, purchasing, and financing services, utilizing a digital and automated process. The company primarily serves individuals and businesses looking to engage in real estate transactions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Paceline
cb_description: Paceline operates as a wellness platform in the health and wellness industry. The company offers a mobile application that incentivizes physical activity by providing financial rewards and offers from partner brands. The platform also features a cashback credit card that offers benefits based on the user's physical activity. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mill Valley, California.

name: Glydways
cb_description: Glydways serves as a transportation system company that specializes in the design, manufacture, installation, and operation of autonomous mobility solutions. Its personal vehicle is designed for urban mobility services. It serves the public transportation sector. Glydways was formerly known as Wayfarer. Glydways was founded in 2016 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Betterway
cb_description: Betterway is a company that focuses on providing mobility solutions for businesses. The company offers a range of services including sustainable mobility packages, fuel allowances, public transport reimbursement, parking expenses, and mobility credits. These services are primarily targeted at businesses looking to manage their employees' mobility needs in a more sustainable and efficient manner. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Suresnes, France.

name: Centivo
cb_description: Centivo is a healthcare company that specializes in providing affordable health plans for self-funded employers. The company offers a primary care-centered health plan that aims to reduce healthcare costs and improve care quality, featuring free primary care, low copays, and no deductibles. Centivo's health plans are designed to benefit both employers and employees by lowering the total cost of care and providing predictable healthcare expenses. Centivo was formerly known as Creche. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Buffalo, New York.

name: Grow Credit
cb_description: Grow Credit offers a financial service focused on helping individuals build or improve their credit scores through a virtual Mastercard used to manage subscription payments. The company provides an interest-free credit line that reports payment history to major credit bureaus, potentially aiding in credit score enhancement. Grow Credit's services are designed to cater to individuals with no credit or poor credit, offering free access to financial literacy resources and FICO scores. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Inkitt
cb_description: Inkitt is a reader-powered book publisher operating within the literary and publishing industry. The company provides a platform for writers to publish their manuscripts and retain full copyright, while readers can access all books for free and provide feedback. Inkitt utilizes an approach to identify and publish books on their Galatea application, focusing on reader engagement as a metric for success. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Strive Health
cb_description: Strive Health focuses on kidney care and operates within the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of services including management of chronic kidney disease and end-stage renal disease, dialysis, and support for kidney transplants, utilizing a combination of high-touch care teams and advanced technology to improve patient outcomes and reduce costs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Fortis Therapeutics
cb_description: Fortis Therapeutics is a company focused on the development of novel, first-in-class therapeutics in the healthcare and biotechnology industry. The company's main offerings include precision therapies that target CD46 proteins in cancer cells, while sparing normal tissues. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically the oncology sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: Metalenz
cb_description: Metalenz specializes in the development and commercialization of meta-optics technology within the consumer electronics, automotive, and smart robotics industries. The company offers products such as pattern projectors and polarization imaging systems that 3D depth sensing and biometric authentication. Metalenz primarily serves sectors such as consumer electronics, automotive industry, and smart robotics. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Disco
cb_description:
Disco is a manufacturer and distributor of cleaning and specialty products for the restaurant and food service industries including fryer filters. This company extends Continental Commercial Products' maintenance products line into the restaurant and food service market. 

In October 2011, Disco was acquired by Cellucap. The valuation of Disco was $19 million.

name: PIXEVIA
cb_description: PIXEVIA is a company that focuses on retail technology, specifically in the domain of autonomous and unmanned stores. The company offers an AI-powered platform that enables automated store operations, including item recognition, virtual shopping basket creation, and payment processes. The platform is primarily used in the retail industry, with applications in convenience stores and gas stations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Vilnius, Lithuania.

name: KONG
cb_description: KONG is a company that focuses on the pet care industry, specifically in the domain of pet toys. The company's main offerings include a variety of innovative and safe toys for dogs and cats, designed to facilitate play and interaction between pets and their owners. KONG primarily sells to the pet care sector. It was founded in 1976 and is based in Golden, Colorado.

name: PayRange
cb_description: PayRange focuses on providing cashless payment solutions and connected services for unattended retail. The company offers a range of products including mobile payment systems, business management suites, vending management solutions, and secured access control for various industries such as laundry, food and beverage, hospitality, and transportation. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: Xtype
cb_description: Xtype provides a ServiceNow platform operating in the technology and software industry. It offers a product that provides multi-environment visibility, controlled instance synchronization, and accelerated delivery. It primarily serves businesses that utilize the ServiceNow platform. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: AND Global
cb_description: AND Global is a fintech company that operates in the financial technology sector. The company's main service is its proprietary platform that uses artificial intelligence to provide instant credit scoring and access to unsecured personal loans and payment options on mobile devices. AND Global primarily sells to the financial and alternative financial technology sectors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: Sequential
cb_description: SeQuential is a biofuel service station and market cafe that operates in the renewable energy and food service sectors. The company offers biofuel options such as ethanol and renewable diesel, alongside a variety of local and organic food and beverages, including a menu for online ordering and pickup. SeQuential primarily serves the renewable fuel consumers and the local community looking for organic and eco-friendly food options. It is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: SarvaGram
cb_description: SarvaGram is a rural household-focused platform operating in the financial services sector. The company offers a range of financial products including loans and insurance services, as well as capacity enhancing products, all tailored to the needs of rural households. SarvaGram primarily serves the rural finance industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Hydromea
cb_description: Hydromea is a company focused on underwater robotics and wireless communication networks within the offshore and onshore industries. The company offers autonomous underwater drones and wireless communication products designed for remote inspection and monitoring of submerged assets. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Renens, Switzerland.

name: Prognos Health
cb_description: Prognos Health is a real-world data company specializing in the healthcare analytics sector. The company offers a managed marketplace for clinical and genomic laboratory data, providing integrated and harmonized lab and health records to support the development and delivery of innovative therapies. Prognos Health primarily serves sectors such as life sciences, healthcare providers, and payers with actionable insights for patient care and commercial analytics. It was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ottopia
cb_description: Ottopia operates as a software company. It specializes in the design, development, and commercialization of teleoperation systems in the automotive, transportation, logistics, last-mile delivery, construction, mining, and agriculture industries. Its main offerings include remote monitoring, remote assistance, and remote driving services for autonomous vehicles, using artificial intelligence and network optimization to ensure safety and cyber-security. It primarily sells to sectors such as automotive original equipment manufacturers (OEMs), suppliers, and commercial fleet managers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: Arya
cb_description: Arya is an AI Cloud provider specializing in services for the banking, insurance, and financial sectors. The company offers AI APIs, machine learning observability tools, and a decisioning platform to facilitate the deployment of responsible, accurate, and auditable AI solutions. Arya's products are designed to enhance processes such as KYC data extraction, bank statement analysis, and fraud detection, and are tailored to the specific needs of life and health insurance, property and casualty insurance, lending, and banking industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Mumbai, India. In April 2024, Aurionpro Solutions acquired a majority stake in Arya for $16.5M.

name: Aereo
cb_description: Aereo specializes in drone solutions within the technology sector, focusing on aerial intelligence for commercial applications. The company offers end-to-end drone services that include deployment, data collection, and analytics for business intelligence. Aereo primarily serves industries such as mining, urban and rural development, and large-scale construction. Aereo was formerly known as Aarav Unmanned Systems. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: StradVision
cb_description: StradVision specializes in AI-based camera perception technology for the automotive industry. The company offers deep learning perception software, SVNet, which utilizes camera sensor data to provide object recognition capabilities for Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) and autonomous driving. StradVision's products cater to a variety of automotive safety and navigation needs, including multi-camera systems, augmented reality, and hazard detection. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Pohang-si, South Korea.

name: Optiwatt
cb_description: Optiwatt focuses on integrating home electricity rate data with electric vehicle (EV) battery metrics to provide insights into the cost of EV charging within the energy sector. The company offers services that allow users to securely connect their EV app, track their electric utility costs, and analyze the impact of EV charging on their electric bills. It provides charge forecasting and compares gas prices to calculate savings from driving electric. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Birdie
cb_description: Birdie is a company that operates in the iGaming industry, focusing on providing online casino gaming experiences. The company offers a wide range of licensed slot games with high Return to Player (RTP) values, as well as a variety of table games like roulette, blackjack, and baccarat, catering to users looking for real-money gaming options. Birdie's platform is designed to serve the online gambling community with features such as bonuses, promotional codes, and a loyalty program. It is based in Moscow, Russian Federation.

name: RapidDeploy
cb_description: RapidDeploy focuses on providing cloud-native solutions for public safety. The company offers a range of services including mapping, analytics, and dispatch applications, all aimed at improving emergency response times and outcomes. Its services are primarily used in the public safety sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Newco
cb_description: Newco is a company that specializes in the non-destructive testing (NDT) equipment sector. The company offers a range of NDT supplies and equipment for various testing methods including radiography, penetrant, ultrasonic, magnetic particle, eddy current, and visual testing. They also provide custom systems, used and rental equipment, and in-house services such as calibrations, repairs, and support. It was founded in 1977 and is based in Florence, South Carolina.

name: Loadsure
cb_description: Loadsure is an InsurTech company specializing in freight insurance solutions. The company offers dynamic, on-demand cargo insurance products that leverage data and AI to provide accurate pricing and quick insurance certificate issuance. These products cater to the needs of insurance brokers, shippers, and carriers within the freight and shipping industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Warmly
cb_description: Warmly specializes in sales orchestration. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence to monitor buying intent signals across a client's website, outbound, and customer relationship management (CRM), and helps to progress these opportunities. It primarily serves the business-to-business (B2B) software as a service (SaaS) industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Commure
cb_description: Commure provides a healthcare technology platform. It helps to boost its users' clinical and financial performance with applications designed to streamline care delivery ensuring revenue integrity and also keep its users' workforce safe from violence with a discreet badge designed to call for help. Commure was formerly known as PatientKeeper. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Dataiku
cb_description: Dataiku develops a centralized data platform. Its solutions include data preparation, visualization, machine learning, analytic applications, and more. The company serves the banking sector, pharmaceuticals, manufacturing telecommunication sector, and more. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Covatic
cb_description: Covatic specializes in providing private-by-design, addressable advertising solutions within the ad-tech industry. The company offers a unique ID-less technology that enables media companies to deliver targeted advertising without relying on personal data or third-party cookies. Covatic's services cater to various sectors, including media companies seeking to enhance audience reach and engagement while maintaining privacy and compliance standards. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Birmingham, England.

name: MightyFly
cb_description: MightyFly provides logistics and supply chain services. It connects remote locations with heavy cargo aircraft, and customized aerial drone delivery services. The company builds logistics infrastructure to enable end-to-end autonomous delivery of goods, perishables, and medical supplies. It serves the medical, spare parts, mining, defense, and oil and gas industries. MightyFly was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Joe Coffee
cb_description: Joe Coffee is a technology company that operates in the coffee industry. The company provides an all-in-one platform for coffee shops, offering services such as point of sale systems, mobile ordering and payment processing, and loyalty and rewards programs. Joe Coffee primarily serves the food and beverage industry, with a specific focus on independent coffee shops. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Vendict
cb_description: Vendict specializes in AI-led solutions that automate the process of responding to security questionnaires within the compliance, security, and risk management sectors. The company offers a platform that enables users to complete security questionnaires quickly and accurately by leveraging a comprehensive knowledge base, with features such as multi-lingual support and collaboration tools for subject matter experts. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Cyble
cb_description: Cyble provides a cyber intelligence platform. It offers attack surface management, brand intelligence, cyber threat intelligence, dark web and deep web, vulnerability management. It allows companies to manage cyber-secure workflows with their vendors using an artificial intelligence (AI) security scoring mechanism. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Alpharetta, Georgia.

name: Plaid
cb_description: Plaid is a technology company focused on maximizing human value through data. The company offers a customer experience platform, KARTE, and various services such as CX strategy design, organizational development, DX support, and digital marketing efficiency tools. Plaid's products are primarily aimed at enhancing service experiences across various industries. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Oshi Health
cb_description: Oshi Health is a virtual center specializing in digestive healthcare within the healthcare industry. The company provides gastroenterology services, including diagnosis and treatment of GI symptoms and conditions, supported by a team of specialists. Oshi Health serves members of health plans, providing care that integrates dietary and behavioral health support. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York

name: 1upHealth
cb_description:
1upHealth develops a data aggregation platform. The company uses cloud development tools to enable Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIR) application program interface (APIs) to patient data at an individual and population level. It offers quality measures, population health analytics, and healthcare contracts. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

.

name: Spintly
cb_description: Spintly specializes in wireless access control systems within the security and building management sectors. The company offers keyless entry solutions that enable smartphone-based unlocking of doors, along with systems for visitor, tenant, and time and attendance management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Datacy
cb_description: Datacy specializes in marketing analytics software within the digital commerce and consumer behavior analysis sectors. The company offers insights into online consumer behavior by tracking and analyzing clicks, views, posts, and purchase journeys to help businesses understand and optimize their online strategies. Datacy primarily serves brands looking to enhance their digital commerce strategies through data-driven insights. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Sapia
cb_description:
Sapia is a local provider of information technology solutions in Per.

On October 27th, 2021, Sapia was acquired by Stefanini. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Teal Health
cb_description: Teal Health focuses on women's health, specifically by providing an at-home cervical cancer screening solution. The company offers a self-collection kit for cervical cancer screening, which includes support and guidance through live text, phone, and video, and aims to deliver accurate and trustworthy results. The product is designed to be convenient, comfortable, and covered by insurance, aligning with government-funded screening initiatives. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Airhouse
cb_description: Airhouse is a fulfillment and logistics provider specializing in ecommerce operations for high-growth direct-to-consumer (DTC) brands. The company offers a suite of services including fulfillment software, a managed network of high-performance warehouses, and comprehensive operations reporting and data management. Airhouse's solutions are designed to optimize delivery costs and speeds, leveraging data insights and technology to scale with the efficiency of large brands. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Akeneo
cb_description: Akeneo operates a company focused on product information management. It offers a cloud-based solution that normalizes, enriches, and categorizes product data, aiming to enhance product experiences and drive customer conversion, primarily serving the e-commerce industry, with a particular emphasis on brands, manufacturers, distributors, and retailers. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Nantes, France.

name: Magic Spoon
cb_description: Magic Spoon is a food company specializing in high-protein, keto-friendly cereals. Their products are designed to offer a healthier alternative to traditional cereals, with a focus on low sugar and high protein content. The company primarily caters to health-conscious consumers looking for nutritious breakfast options. Magic Spoon was formerly known as Discos. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bosta
cb_description: Bosta is a technology-driven company specializing in logistics and delivery services for the e-commerce sector. The company offers overnight delivery services, leveraging advanced technology to enable businesses to track orders and connect with couriers through an integrated system. Bosta primarily serves the e-commerce industry with its delivery solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Kyron Learning
cb_description: Kyron Learning provides education and training services. It offers interactive video lessons with teachers, facilitated by conversational AI. These lessons provide students with one-on-one support, allowing them to learn at their own pace and receive feedback. It serves the education sector. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Los Altos, California.

name: Ivy Homes
cb_description: Ivy Homes is a company that operates in the real estate industry, with a focus on home buying and selling. The company offers a streamlined process for homeowners to sell their homes, providing instant home valuations, scheduling free house inspections, and managing all the paperwork to complete the sale within 15 days. Ivy Homes primarily serves the real estate industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Got It AI
cb_description: Got It AI specializes in conversational AI within the enterprise technology sector, focusing on the development and deployment of generative AI with safety measures. The company offers AI-driven solutions for customer service and sales operations, including knowledge retrieval, process guidance, and response verification. Got It AI primarily serves industries such as financial services, insurance, and consumer product manufacturing, enhancing customer experience and sales operations with their AI technology. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Burlingame, California.

name: Smartcar
cb_description: Smartcar is a technology company focused on providing a vehicle API platform for connected vehicle data across various industries. The company offers a suite of APIs that enable apps and services to interact with connected cars, allowing for functionalities such as vehicle location tracking, mileage verification, remote locking and unlocking, electric vehicle battery management, and more. Smartcar primarily serves sectors such as energy management, repair and maintenance, EV charging networks, auto insurance, car sharing, and fleet management. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Alto
cb_description: Alto specializes in enhancing commercial efficiency through its suite of training and analytics tools within the sales enablement technology sector. The company offers solutions for analyzing customer interactions and providing customized training to improve sales team performance. These tools are designed to accelerate onboarding, increase sales conversions, and enhance customer satisfaction. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Colombes, France.

name: Edgegap
cb_description: Edgegap is a company that focuses on providing cloud network services in the gaming industry. The company offers automated and distributed server orchestration services on a global scale, aiming to reduce latency and handle any volume of traffic. These services primarily cater to the gaming industry, helping game developers to manage traffic, ensure low latency, and maintain high availability. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Enable Injections
cb_description: Enable Injections is a company that focuses on the development and manufacturing of on-body delivery systems in the healthcare sector. The company's main offerings include high-volume wearable drug delivery systems designed to improve the patient experience. These systems allow for a range of flexible delivery options, including different viscosities, volumes, delivery times, and administration sites. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Cincinnati, Ohio.

name: The Logic
cb_description: The Logic is a media company focused on in-depth reporting within the economy sector. It offers premium, award-winning journalism that covers news and analysis on business, technology, and policies. The company primarily serves professionals and policymakers in the innovation and technology sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Dfns
cb_description: Dfns focuses on providing secure and scalable digital asset management solutions. The company offers a suite of services including the creation, embedding, and management of programmable wallets, leveraging advanced multi-party computation technology to ensure high security. Dfns primarily caters to startups, enterprises, and financial institutions in the financial technology sector. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Tenzo
cb_description: Tenzo specializes in restaurant performance operations within the restaurant management and technology sector. The company offers a platform that aggregates data from various operational sources, analyzes business insights, and provides recommendations for performance improvement. Tenzo primarily serves the restaurant industry, including single sites, small chains, and large enterprise chains. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Gerrards Cross, United Kingdom.

name: DELLI
cb_description: DELLI is an online marketplace focused on independently made food and drink products. The company offers a curated selection of artisanal goods, including pantry essentials, snacks, bakes, and beverages, all sourced from small-batch producers and local makers. The platform primarily caters to consumers looking for food items and gifts. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Momentum
cb_description: Momentum is a health and performance service provider in the sports medicine and physiotherapy sector. The company offers a range of services including physiotherapy, sports massage, injury rehabilitation, strength and conditioning, bike fitting, and custom orthotics. Momentum primarily caters to individuals seeking to improve their physical health and performance, whether they are athletes or those looking to enjoy an active lifestyle without pain. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.

name: Gumball
cb_description: Gumball focuses on creating interactive notification devices for various applications. Its main product is a mechanical light that illuminates and plays custom sounds when users receive digital notifications. Its product is compatible with a wide range of online services and applications. Its devices are designed for both personal and professional environments, aiming to add a fun and engaging element to receiving notifications. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Billie
cb_description: Billie is a leading provider of Buy Now, Pay Later (BNPL) payment methods for the B2B sector, offering innovative digital payment services. The company's main offerings include modern checkout solutions that enable businesses to pay and get paid on their terms, with features such as upfront payment for sellers and flexible payment terms for buyers. Billie's services cater to a variety of sectors, including e-commerce, telesales, and in-person sales channels. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Klar
cb_description: Klar is a financial services company offering credit card services, personal savings, and investment products. The company provides credit cards with no annual fees, savings accounts with daily growth, and flexible investment options with competitive returns. Klar's offerings are designed to cater to individuals seeking accessible financial products and tools for managing their finances. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Consensus
cb_description: Consensus is an independent provider specializing in support and accommodation for individuals with learning disabilities, autism, and additional complex needs, including Prader-Willi Syndrome. The company offers residential support and supported living services, focusing on person-centred support plans to promote a happy, meaningful, and fulfilling life within local communities. Consensus is dedicated to professional development, offering training and recognition programs to foster an inclusive workplace culture. It is based in Colchester, England.

name: Vidyard
cb_description: Vidyard provides a video marketing platform. The company allows users to add videos to their websites. It integrates marketing automation and customer relationship management (CRM) tools to deliver user-level video engagement data. Vidyard was formerly known as Redwoods Media. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Kitchener, Canada.

name: Copper
cb_description: Copper operates as a financial technology company in the banking and education sectors. The company provides a platform that teaches kids and teens about money management, offering services such as a debit card, savings rewards, and financial literacy resources. It primarily serves the family and education sectors. It was formerly known as Copper Banking. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Aktiia
cb_description: Aktiia is a company focused on health technology, specifically in the domain of blood pressure monitoring. The company's main offering is a cuffless optical Blood Pressure Monitoring technology, designed to assist in the prevention of high blood pressure and to provide data that can help doctors determine the effectiveness of medication and patients to observe the impact of lifestyle changes on their health. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Neuchatel, Switzerland.

name: TaskHuman
cb_description: Taskhuman provides a real-time digital coaching platform. It allows users to amplify their daily work and personal lives with personalized guidance from specialists over video calls. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: LeanData
cb_description: LeanData is a company that specializes in revenue orchestration and workflow automation within the B2B sector. Their main offerings include a platform that integrates various revenue tools to streamline sales, marketing, and operations, enhancing the buyer experience and accelerating time-to-revenue. LeanData's solutions are designed to improve operational efficiency, facilitate lead-to-account matching, and automate scheduling without the need for coding. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Qbrain
cb_description: Qbrain is a company focused on accelerating quantum computing through its AI-powered middleware solutions within the technology sector. The company offers a suite of SaaS products designed to optimize quantum algorithms and hardware, making quantum computing more accessible to enterprises across various industries. Qortex, their main offering, is a hardware and software agnostic platform that interfaces with major quantum computing platforms to enhance performance. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Caribou
cb_description:
Caribou is an England-based company that provides parcel delivery and courier services internationally and domestically.

On August 4th, 2021, Caribou was acquired by Inc & Co. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Elementor
cb_description: Elementor is a website builder platform that operates in the web development and design industry. The company offers a range of services including a drag-and-drop page builder plugin for WordPress, managed hosting for WordPress websites, and a static site generator for websites built with WordPress. Its primary customers are web professionals such as developers, designers, and marketers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Monarx
cb_description: Monarx is a cybersecurity company specializing in server protection for Linux web hosting environments. The company offers real-time malicious script detection, proactive prevention, and an integrated hunting and remediation engine to harden servers and applications. Monarx primarily serves the web hosting industry by providing security solutions that reduce the attack surface and offer actionable intelligence on web security posture. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: Pipe
cb_description: Pipe provides financial services specializing in non-dilutive capital solutions for businesses. It offers a modern capital platform that allows entrepreneurs to access funding based on their revenue, with payment terms. It primarily serves the financial needs of small to mid-size businesses and entrepreneurs seeking growth without equity dilution. It was formerly known as Third Base Pipe. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Wirelane
cb_description: Wirelane is a full-service provider focused on electric vehicle charging solutions within the e-mobility infrastructure sector. The company offers a range of products including eichrechtskonforme charging stations, software for managing charging infrastructure, and comprehensive services for installation, operation, and maintenance. Wirelane primarily serves sectors such as the hotel industry, real estate, and public municipalities with their charging infrastructure needs. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Sarwa
cb_description: Sarwa provides a hybrid automated investment platform. The company enables users to trade stocks and exchange-traded funds (ETF), buy and sell cryptocurrencies, save and invest money, and more. It primarily caters to individual investors operating in the financial markets. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Brightside
cb_description: Brightside is a mobile banking app company that operates in the financial sector. The company offers a free app that provides unique spend card and savings features, such as Round Ups and Save Automagically, to help users manage their spending and savings. The company primarily serves the financial technology industry. It is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: Footprint
cb_description: Footprint is a company that focuses on the invention of technology, operating within the sectors of energy, computing, and decentralization. The company's main offerings involve the development of innovative solutions in these areas, with a particular emphasis on research and development. It is based in Walnut, California.

name: AELER
cb_description: AELER is a company focused on logistics technology within the shipping industry. The company offers a smart, robust, and insulated container service designed to increase efficiency, visibility, and sustainability in global logistics operations. These containers are equipped with real-time tracking and tracing capabilities, and are designed to reduce CO2 emissions and increase cargo capacity, catering primarily to the maritime logistics industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: Ecto
cb_description: Ecto is a digital biology company developing technology to make protein production more efficient and sustainable. It is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Parcl
cb_description: Parcl is a decentralized platform specializing in real estate market speculation within the financial technology sector. The company offers a trading platform that allows users to speculate on the price movements of real estate markets globally, using city indexes that reflect the median price per square foot or meter. Parcl's services cater to individual investors seeking liquid exposure to real estate markets without the need to trade individual properties. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tortola, Virgin Islands (British).

name: Vay
cb_description: Vay is a company focused on revolutionizing mobility through teledriving technology in the transportation industry. The company offers a service where customers order an electric vehicle via an app, and a teledriver remotely controls the vehicle to bring it to the customer's location. After the customer's journey, the teledriver takes over the vehicle again, eliminating the need for the customer to find a parking spot. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: FloQast
cb_description: FloQast specializes in accounting workflow automation and financial close management within the finance and accounting industry. The company offers a suite of products that streamline and automate financial processes, such as month-end close, account reconciliations, and compliance management, for accounting teams. FloQast's platform integrates AI and machine learning for the efficiency and accuracy of financial operations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Alodokter
cb_description: Alodokter focuses on providing medical services through an integrated mobile solution. The company offers a platform for patient-doctor interactions, online booking of doctors and hospitals, and a comprehensive medical content database. Alodokter primarily serves the healthcare sector by connecting patients with healthcare providers and facilitating access to medical information. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Prisma
cb_description: Prisma is a company that focuses on providing an open-source Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) solution for Node.js and TypeScript in the technology sector. The company's main services include offering an intuitive data model, automated migrations, and type-safety for developers working with databases. Prisma primarily serves the software development industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Evernest
cb_description: Evernest is a real estate company that modernizes the process of buying and selling properties through digital innovation. The company offers a digital platform that simplifies transactions, providing accurate price assessments and matching properties with potential buyers, alongside personalized consulting based on extensive local market knowledge. Evernest primarily serves the residential real estate market, offering services such as property valuation, marketing, and energy efficiency consulting. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Hamburg, Germany.

name: Wellthy
cb_description: Wellthy focuses on providing care coordination services through a digital platform in the healthcare industry. The company offers personalized support to families and caregivers by helping them manage the logistical and administrative tasks of caring for loved ones, utilizing a combination of technology and expert guidance. Wellthy primarily serves the healthcare sector, offering services to individuals, employers, and health plans. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Gridspace
cb_description: Gridspace specializes in conversational AI and virtual call center software within the technology sector. The company offers virtual agents that can handle calls with the tone and skill of top-performing human agents, and provides real-time analytics for live calls to improve customer service and operational efficiency. Gridspace's solutions are primarily utilized by businesses seeking to enhance their contact center capabilities and customer interaction. Gridspace was formerly known as Dossier Systems. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ThinkSono
cb_description: ThinkSono provides the diagnosis of deep vein thrombosis (DVT) at the point of care. The company's main service is providing a platform that enables healthcare professionals to learn and practice point-of-care ultrasound through artificial intelligence (AI) guidance, interactive training modules, and expert feedback. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was formerly known as Khirop Diagnostics. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Potsdam, Germany.

name: Huuva
cb_description: Huuva is a food delivery platform that aggregates offerings from various local restaurants, allowing customers to mix-and-match dishes in a single order. The company provides a service that enables users to order a variety of meals from multiple restaurants simultaneously, without the need for separate transactions. Huuva primarily serves the food delivery industry, catering to individuals who wish to enjoy a diverse selection of restaurant foods in one delivery. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: Owl Labs
cb_description: Owl Labs is a company that specializes in smart video conferencing technology. The company offers a range of smart devices that facilitate immersive hybrid meetings, with features such as center-of-room and front-of-room cameras, microphones, and speakers that capture every angle, participant, and sound for dynamic discussions. These devices intelligently alternate between cameras for the best view of participants, detect and zoom in on the active speaker for a face-to-face experience, and modulate volume so everyone in the room sounds loud and clear. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Somerville, Massachusetts.

name: Blaize
cb_description: Blaize is a company that focuses on providing monetization solutions in the business sector. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to manage and grow their revenue streams, particularly those based on subscriptions, consumption, or hybrid models. Their services primarily cater to a variety of industries including manufacturing, software, high tech, and media and entertainment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Infostellar
cb_description: Infostellar provides cloud-based satellite ground segment services. It is a space communications infrastructure firm that is developing StellarStation, a cloud-based satellite antenna-sharing platform. Its services include satellite downlinks for remote sensing and space science applications, satellite uplinks for spacecraft commanding operations, and telemetry, tracking, and control (TT&C) services for spacecraft health and welfare operations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Skoove
cb_description: Skoove specializes in music education technology, offering interactive online piano lessons. The company provides a platform where users can learn piano through step-by-step lessons that include real-time feedback, music theory, and note reading, all integrated into a self-paced learning experience. Skoove's services cater to a range of customers, from beginners to advanced players, seeking to improve their piano skills through a structured and interactive method. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Phytoform
cb_description: Phytoform operates as a biotechnology company focusing on improving agricultural sustainability. The company develops technology to create diverse and resilient crops by utilizing artificial intelligence and genome editing. It primarily serves the agricultural industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Harpenden, United Kingdom.

name: InBolt
cb_description: InBolt specializes in industrial automation through AI-driven real-time robot guidance systems. The company offers a product called GuideNOW, which allows industrial robots to adapt their operations dynamically using AI and 3D vision technology to various manufacturing environments. InBolt's solutions are primarily utilized in the manufacturing sector to improve in automation processes. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Otoklix
cb_description: Otoklix is a company focused on providing high-quality automotive maintenance services within the vehicle servicing industry. The company offers a range of services including oil changes, tire services, tune-ups, battery replacements, air conditioning services, car detailing, and routine maintenance, all with transparent pricing and a 14-day service warranty. Otoklix primarily serves the automotive vehicle owners looking for reliable and professional maintenance services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: Flex
cb_description: Flex offers an API that turns video game achievements into real-life skill badges, which can be used on CV or job applications. The company operates in the gaming industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: remberg
cb_description: Remberg is a company focused on providing asset and equipment management solutions within the service and maintenance industry. Their main offerings include a mobile-first software platform that integrates artificial intelligence to manage tickets, work orders, maintenance plans, and documentation for improved operational efficiency and collaboration. The company primarily serves sectors that require asset and equipment management, such as manufacturing, energy, healthcare, construction, and IT infrastructure. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Vaayu
cb_description: Vaayu is a provider of automated AI software focused on carbon and environmental impact management within the retail sector. The company offers a platform that enables retail brands to track and reduce their environmental footprint, including emissions, water, and waste, in real-time using AI and machine learning. Vaayu's services cater to the retail industry, assisting businesses in navigating sustainability regulations and setting environmental goals. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Carrot Fertility
cb_description: Carrot Fertility provides global fertility care services in the healthcare sector. The company offers services including fertility education, egg and sperm freezing, in vitro fertilization (IVF), pregnancy and postpartum support, gestational surrogacy, adoption, menopause, and low testosterone care. Its services are primarily offered to employers, benefit consultants, and health plans. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Looper Insights
cb_description: Looper Insights offers a connected TV intelligence platform that utilizes machine learning and smart image recognition to track where, when, and how TV shows, movies, and OTT apps are being promoted across digital storefronts on smart TVs, app stores, games consoles, streaming boxes, and MVPD services. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: MedAware
cb_description: MedAware develops artificial intelligence(AI)-enabled decision support solutions. The platform utilizes artificial intelligence for the early identification and prevention of medication errors, evolving adverse events (ADEs) and contraindications, and other medication-related risks, such as opioid dependency. It protects providers and patients in both inpatient and ambulatory care settings and continuously monitors patients post-encounter to ensure medication safety throughout the continuum of care. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Ra'anana, Israel.

name: Vareto
cb_description: Vareto develops a strategic finance platform for company planning, reporting, and operational decision-making for enterprise-scale businesses. It provides data analytics and business intelligence finance tools and automates routine work for financial planning and analysis. The company serves a wide range of industries such as retail, finance, healthcare, and others. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Breinify
cb_description: Breinify is a company specializing in AI-powered personalization for the e-commerce, retail, and consumer packaged goods (CPG) sectors. The company offers a personalization engine that enables brands to create individualized digital experiences across web, email, SMS, and app channels. Breinify's platform provides data-driven insights and strategic guidance to enhance customer engagement and drive revenue growth. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Wthn
cb_description: Wthn operates as a company focusing on modern wellness and operates in the healthcare industry. The company offers services such as acupuncture, and acupressure, and also provides organic supplements. These services are primarily targeted towards individuals seeking relief from everyday stress and pain. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Arcana Network
cb_description: Arcana Network focuses on web3 infrastructure within the blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors, providing tools to enhance user experience for decentralized applications (dApps). The company offers software development kits (SDKs) that enable seamless user onboarding with features like social authentication and passwordless login, while ensuring user data privacy and ownership through encryption and blockchain technology. Arcana Network was formerly known as Newfang. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Airwallex
cb_description: Airwallex develops a global financial platform focusing on providing business payment solutions within the financial technology domain. The company offers an array of services including global business accounts for managing finances,  international transfers, multi-currency corporate cards, and online payment processing capabilities. It primarily serves the payment industry. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Melbourne, Australia.

name: WellSheet
cb_description: WellSheet is a company focused on improving the Electronic Health Record (EHR) experience in the healthcare industry. The company offers a predictive clinical workflow platform that integrates with existing EHR systems to provide clinicians with relevant and prioritized content, thereby reducing time spent in the EHR and improving patient care. The platform primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Newark, New Jersey.

name: Spruce
cb_description: Spruce is a fintech company that operates in the financial services industry. The company offers a mobile banking app that provides a range of services including budget tracking, early access to tax refunds and paychecks, cash back rewards, and savings goals. It primarily serves individuals seeking to manage their personal finances. It is based in Kansas City, Missouri.

name: Rocket
cb_description: Rocket.im helps you manage your email inbox. Create todos, events, news messages, or simply share an email with your team. Communication is meant to be social and we are integrating task management with email.

name: Floyd
cb_description: Floyd is a digitally native furniture brand that focuses on creating sustainable and easy-to-assemble furniture. The company offers a range of products including modular bed frames, sectionals, sofas, tables, chairs, storage solutions, and accessories designed for modern living. Floyd primarily serves the home furniture market with products that cater to both aesthetic appeal and functional design. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Detroit, Michigan.

name: Qualiti
cb_description: Qualiti focuses on artificial intelligence (AI) in the software testing industry. The company offers an AI-powered platform that automates the testing of software products, eliminating the need for human input and providing results. The primary customers of Qualiti are generally in the software development and IT industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Lehi, Utah.

name: Yosi Health
cb_description: Yosi Health specializes in advanced patient intake and management systems within the healthcare sector. The company offers a suite of services including workflow automation, patient engagement, and EMR system integration, designed to streamline the patient experience from pre-arrival to post-visit. Yosi Health's platform caters to a variety of healthcare providers, such as primary care, urgent care, and specialty practices, as well as health systems, independent practices, and community health centers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: onomondo
cb_description: Onomondo is a company that focuses on providing global Internet of Things (IoT) connectivity solutions, operating within the telecommunications and technology sectors. The company offers a range of products and services, including flexible global IoT SIM cards, software-based SIMs, and IoT connectivity platforms, all designed to enhance network control, improve signal quality, and provide secure connections for IoT devices. Onomondo primarily serves industries such as automotive and telematics, energy and utilities, logistics and transportation, micromobility, smart cities, and asset tracking. onomondo was formerly known as Hello World Mobile. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Replicated
cb_description: Replicated focuses on commercial software distribution. The company offers a platform that allows software vendors to distribute their applications to customer-managed environments, including on-premises, virtual private clouds, and even air-gapped Kubernetes clusters. It primarily serves software vendors, software as a service (SaaS) companies, and open-core vendors. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in West Hollywood, California.

name: Super.cc
cb_description: Super.cc is an online service allowing its users to add events to their calendars by forwarding an email with the date and time to the server.

name: Ubeya
cb_description: Ubeya is a company that provides workforce management solutions in the staffing and temporary employment industry. Its platform includes tools for scheduling, communication, payroll, compliance, and reporting for businesses managing temporary workers. Ubeya serves sectors that require staffing solutions, including hospitality, events, healthcare, and logistics. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Tiko
cb_description: Tiko is a company that focuses on the real estate sector, specifically in the PropTech industry. The company offers services that facilitate the buying and selling of homes, using technology to streamline the process and make it more efficient. Tiko primarily serves the real estate industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: PractiFI
cb_description: PractiFI operates as a performance optimization platform focused on reinventing customer relationship management (CRM) for the wealth management sector. The company offers a suite of services that includes workflow automation, compliance management, analytics, and a unified experience for creating rich client records. PractiFI's platform is built on Salesforce, providing an open application programming interface (API) and a range of wealth industry integrations to centralize data and improve visibility across organizations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Scandit
cb_description: Scandit specializes in smart data capture solutions for various industries, focusing on automating and streamlining end-to-end processes. The company offers a platform that transforms smart devices into powerful tools for scanning barcodes, text, IDs, and objects, providing fast and accurate data capture capabilities. Scandit's technology is utilized across multiple sectors, including retail, logistics, healthcare, and manufacturing, to enhance operational efficiency and customer experiences. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Zum
cb_description: Zum offers transportation services using an integrated platform that includes electric vehicle fleets, analytics-driven operations, and apps for tracking and management. Zum primarily serves the education sector, catering to the needs of schools, districts, and parents. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: HomeTouch
cb_description: HomeTouch is a company that specializes in providing live-in care services, with a particular focus on dementia care, in the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of services including elderly care, disability care, end of life care, and companionship care, all delivered in the client's own home. Their primary customers are individuals and families seeking in-home care solutions. It is based in London, England.

name: Paxafe
cb_description: Paxafe specializes in AI-enabled supply chain visibility and risk management within the logistics and transportation sector. The company offers a platform that contextualizes supply chain data, predicts on-time in-full (OTIF) delivery, quantifies shipment risk, and automates temperature management for shipments. Paxafe primarily serves industries such as pharmaceuticals, food and beverage, and cold chain logistics. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Pomelo Care
cb_description: Pomelo Care focuses on providing virtual maternity and neonatal care services within the healthcare sector. The company offers support for pregnancy and newborn care through text, phone, or video, supplementing traditional in-person OB-GYN or midwife care. Pomelo Care primarily serves the healthcare industry, partnering with health plans and employers to deliver its services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Jersey City, New Jersey.

name: Rabot
cb_description: Rabot specializes in Vision AI technology for the fulfillment sector, focusing on enhancing packing operations and introducing automation into workflows. It offers a platform that provides data and insights to improve accuracy and productivity in warehouse operations. Its solutions are designed to digitize quality assurance, provide video evidence for fraud defense, and eliminate redundant tasks to streamline operator activities. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: CereTax
cb_description: CereTax specializes in automating sales tax for complex industries within the tax automation and compliance sector. The company offers a platform for the sales tax process through technology that supports hyper-scaling, provides granular visibility into analytics, and reduces IT team demands. CereTax primarily serves sectors that require sales and use tax compliance solutions, including communications, digital goods, SaaS, manufacturing, and retail and e-commerce. CereTax was formerly known as ProTax Systems. It was founded in 1998 and is based in Alpharetta, Georgia.

name: Avi Medical
cb_description: Avi Medical is a primary care provider in the healthcare sector. The company offers primary care services, preventive health checkups, management of chronic diseases, vaccinations, travel medicine, and laboratory services. Avi Medical leverages technology to enhance patient care, offering features like digital sick notes and online medical consultations through their healthcare mobile application. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Trainual
cb_description: Trainual is a company that focuses on providing employee onboarding, training, and standard operating procedures (SOP) software solutions in the business services sector. The company offers a platform that allows businesses to document training processes, policies, and roles, centralize knowledge, automate onboarding and training, and track training completion. It primarily serves sectors such as real estate, construction, healthcare, technology, marketing agencies, law firms, and cleaning companies. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Plum
cb_description: Plum is a company that operates in the real estate sector, focusing on facilitating co-ownership of vacation homes. The company's main service involves helping individuals form co-ownership groups, assisting them in purchasing a vacation home together, and providing ongoing management services for the property. This includes creating legal agreements, setting up budgets, scheduling vacation days, and offering dispute resolution services. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Mattilda
cb_description: Mattilda is a financial services provider specializing in the education sector, offering solutions for schools to manage their finances more effectively. The company provides a platform for automating tuition collections, offering credit facilities for school growth, and ensuring secure financial transactions without the need for collateral. Mattilda primarily serves educational institutions looking to streamline their financial operations and secure their income. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Arcade
cb_description: Arcade is a social-gaming startup focused on mobile gaming with friends.

name: Viz
cb_description:
Viz is a British comic magazine publisher, creating comic satires and cartoons in the UK. The company has been publishing since 1979 and only releases ten times a year.

On January 13th, 2022, Viz was acquired by Metropolis Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Luma
cb_description: Luma sets parents up with tutors to meet their child's specific education needs.

name: Roam
cb_description: Roam is a global co-living provider operating in the hospitality industry. The company offers a unique service where customers sign a single lease and gain access to various properties across three continents, each equipped with co-working spaces, commercial-grade kitchens, media and laundry rooms, and diverse programming. Roam primarily caters to the needs of digital nomads and individuals seeking flexible housing solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Breedr
cb_description: Breedr is an agriculture technology company. It offers a livestock management application and an online livestock marketplace aiming to make the process of buying and selling livestock easier. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Honiton, United Kingdom.

name: Rho
cb_description: Rho focuses on providing financial services, operating within the finance and technology sectors. The company offers a financial platform that includes services such as commercial banking, corporate cards, expense management, and accounts payable automation. Rho primarily serves organizations looking to manage their finances. Rho was formerly known as Rho Business Banking. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CellFE
cb_description: CellFE is a biotechnology company focused on advancing cell therapy manufacturing through microfluidic technology. The company offers the Infinity MTx platform, a benchtop device designed to enhance research and process development in cell therapies by improving gene-editing molecule delivery, maintaining cell health, and enabling high yields. CellFE primarily serves advanced cell therapy researchers and developers, aiming to overcome challenges in scalability, cost, and manufacturing time. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: Obsidian Therapeutics
cb_description: Obsidian Therapeutics operates as a biotechnology company focused on the development of engineered therapeutics in the field of cell and gene therapy. It offers a proprietary platform called cytoDRiVE which is used to create controllable cell and gene therapy products, and a lead clinical program, OBX-115, designed to enhance the efficacy of tumor-infiltrating lymphocytes (TILs) for cancer treatment. Obsidian Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on providing innovative treatments for intractable diseases. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Wonder Brands
cb_description: Wonder Brands is a company focused on developing digital brands, operating primarily in the e-commerce industry. The company offers marketing, e-commerce, design, operations, finance and investment banking expertise. It provides a centralized hub that each brand benefits from and a platform where each brand can collaborate and learn from the unique talents and experiences of the other brands in the portfolio. Wonder Brands primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Fireside
cb_description: Fireside offers a platform for podcasting and conversing with listeners. It assists to enable live audio between creators and their fans and provides them the ability to natively record conversations. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: GuardSquare
cb_description: GuardSquare is a company focused on mobile application security within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a suite of products that provide multi-layered protection for Android and iOS apps, including code hardening, runtime application self-protection (RASP), and security testing tools. GuardSquare's solutions are designed to protect mobile applications from reverse engineering and tampering, while also offering real-time threat monitoring and automated recommendations for security improvements. GuardSquare was formerly known as Saikoa. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Leuven, Belgium.

name: Spocket
cb_description: Spocket is a company that operates in the dropshipping market, providing services in the ecommerce industry. The company offers a platform that allows online retailers to select products from a variety of dropshipping suppliers worldwide, without the need to hold inventory. This platform integrates with various ecommerce platforms, making it easier for businesses to manage their online stores. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

name: Carta Healthcare
cb_description: Carta Healthcare specializes in clinical data abstraction solutions within the healthcare sector. They offer AI-driven technology to convert structured and unstructured healthcare data into standardized datasets for various organizational uses. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, focusing on improving data quality and efficiency for patient care, quality, operational, and research initiatives. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: REBBL
cb_description: As of June 15th, 2022, REBBL was acquired by SYSTM. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed. REBBL is a line of organic, functional, super-herb, adaptogen-powered Elixirs and Proteins helping users to de-stress and re-energize naturally. Every bottle of REBBL is based on coconut milk, certified organic, soy and dairy-free, gluten-free, GMO-free, and made without cane sugar, carrageenan, thickeners, gums, natural flavors, or agave. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Emeryville, California.

name: Vendr
cb_description: Vendr specializes in software procurement and software-as-a-service (SaaS) management. The company offers a platform that provides services such as contract analysis, negotiation advisory, and management of software renewals and suppliers. It primarily serves sectors that require SaaS solutions, including finance, procurement, information technology (IT) and security, and legal sectors. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Netomnia
cb_description: Netomnia is a telecommunications company focused on constructing and providing full-fiber broadband networks. The company builds full fiber networks, offering broadband services. Netomnia primarily serves the telecommunications industry by partnering with internet service providers to deliver high-speed internet access to homes and businesses. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Gloucestershire, United Kingdom. In August 2024, Netomnia was acquired by The Fibre Caf.

name: Cerby
cb_description: Cerby is a company focused on identity management within the cybersecurity sector. Its platform offers passwordless authentication, lifecycle management automation, and secure access management for nonstandard applications.
