Cerby primarily serves marketing, IT, and security teams by providing secure access to applications and automating key security tasks. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: Octagos Health
cb_description: Octagos Health specializes in remote cardiac monitoring and data analytics within the healthcare sector. Its platform offers services for managing patient data from implantable devices, external monitors, and sleep studies, aiming to improve patient outcomes and reduce the workload on medical staff. Octagos Health primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a focus on cardiology practices and cardiac device patients. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Cerebras Systems
cb_description: Cerebras Systems specializes in artificial intelligence computing and operates within the technology sector. The company offers AI supercomputers and services for training AI models, as well as cloud solutions to facilitate advanced computing tasks. It primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, energy, government, finance, and scientific research. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: PayHippo
cb_description: PayHippo provides loans intended to finance merchants. The company offers processes, fast loans, and reliable client relationships, enabling small businesses to get collateral-free loans. It primarily serves the financial service sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: CognitOps
cb_description: CognitOps specializes in warehouse labor optimization within the supply chain management sector. The company offers cloud-native software that provides machine-learning powered analytics and real-time tracking to enhance order and warehouse management systems. CognitOps primarily serves the retail industry with solutions aimed at improving labor productivity, reducing costs, and optimizing service level agreement (SLA) performance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Bolt
cb_description: Bolt was a Internet/Internet Software & Services company based in New York, New York.  Bolt was acquired in 2004.

name: Crux
cb_description: Provider of a messaging application for college students. The company's social platform allows users to share, discover and chat about things happening on campus. Its goal is to provide a private and public channel for users to communicate and organize activities with their friends and peers.

name: Ikas
cb_description: Ikas is a new-generation e-commerce platform that specializes in providing solutions for SMEs and large companies within the e-commerce sector. The platform offers tools for creating online stores, managing sales channels, and automating marketing processes to facilitate global sales. Ikas primarily serves businesses looking to expand their online presence and sales capabilities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Aalen, Germany.

name: Mainstreet
cb_description: Mainstreet is  a developer of short-stay rehabilitation properties, known for acquiring and developing concierge-based healthcare properties.

name: VulnCheck
cb_description: VulnCheck specializes in cyber threat intelligence, focusing on vulnerability and exploit intelligence within the cybersecurity sector. The company offers a platform that provides insights into potential vulnerabilities and prioritizes them to help organizations respond to threats more effectively. VulnCheck's services are utilized by government agencies, large enterprises, and cybersecurity solutions providers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Lexington, Massachusetts.

name: Repertoire Immune Medicines
cb_description: Repertoire Immune Medicines is a biotechnology company that focuses on harnessing the power of the human T cell repertoire to create treatments for diseases. The company's main offerings include the development of novel immune medicines, primarily aimed at eliminating cancer cells, targeting pathogens, and regulating immune function in autoimmune diseases. Repertoire Immune Medicines primarily serves the healthcare and biotechnology industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Polly
cb_description: Polly is a company that focuses on providing life insurance services in the financial sector. The company offers life insurance policies designed to provide financial protection for families, particularly targeting mothers, by paying out a lump sum in the event of the policyholder's death. Polly primarily serves the financial services industry. It is based in Bristol, England.

name: Zaapi
cb_description: Zaapi is a digital commerce company that operates in the e-commerce industry. The company provides a unified chat system for businesses and online stores, offering services such as chat management, order management, customer data management, workflow management, and team management. Primarily, Zaapi caters to the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: Twill
cb_description: Twill is a digital health company focused on delivering consumer-centric health solutions across various sectors. The company offers a unified care platform that provides mental health and wellness tools, therapeutic applications, and community support to improve healthcare outcomes. Twill was formerly known as Happify Health. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York. In February 2024, Twill was acquired by DarioHealth.

name: Kindra
cb_description: Kindra specializes in vaginal health and sexual wellness, focusing on women's health and personal care. The company offers a range of products designed to address issues related to menopause, postpartum recovery, and contraceptive use, such as vaginal lotions, relief serums, and supplements. These products are formulated to provide relief from symptoms associated with hormonal changes in women. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Render
cb_description: Rende focuses on the digitization and management of fiber network deployment. The company offers a platform to transform network design into task-level scope, automates and streamlines construction to operations, and provides real-time visibility for all stakeholders. It primarily sells to the telecommunications industry, including network builders and operators, as well as utility operators. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Glen Iris, Australia.

name: Lendo
cb_description: Lendo is a company that focuses on loan comparison services, operating in the financial services industry. The company's main service is to provide a platform for comparing loans from up to 40 lenders, including private loans, business loans, and mortgages. This service is designed to help customers make informed loan decisions by providing transparency in the loan market. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Fliff
cb_description: Fliff is a company that focuses on social sports predictions, operating within the gaming and sports industries. The company offers a play-for-fun game where users can make sports predictions, earn rewards, and compete for prizes in a social setting. Primarily, Fliff caters to the sports gaming and fantasy sports sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: iotaMotion
cb_description: iotaMotion specializes in advancing cochlear implant surgery with a focus on medical technology. The company offers the iotaSOFT Insertion System, a robotic-assisted platform designed to standardize cochlear implant procedures by controlling the speed and acceleration of electrode insertion, aiming to reduce surgical variability and improve outcomes for patients with hearing loss. While the company's primary product serves the medical sector, particularly in surgeries for hearing loss, it also provides resources and support for surgeons, patients, and hospitals. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Iowa City, Iowa.

name: Kobo360
cb_description: Kobo360 is a technology company specializing in integrated logistics solutions and truck brokerage services within the supply chain industry. The company offers a robust platform that connects cargo owners with truck owners and drivers, providing end-to-end haulage operations and real-time visibility to facilitate an efficient supply chain framework. Kobo360's services cater to various sectors including agro & agro-allied, chemical, oil & gas, FMCG, manufacturing, construction & mining, maritime, and special project logistics. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Garner
cb_description: Garner focuses on healthcare analytics in the health sector. The company offers solutions to help individuals, families, and employers find  healthcare providers within their network, and also provides a reimbursement service for out-of-pocket medical costs. Garner primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: MainStreaming
cb_description: MainStreaming is a company that focuses on intelligent media delivery in the broadcasting and enterprise sectors. The company offers services that include the delivery of live and on-demand video, integrating all operative phases for ingest, encoding, management, and distribution. MainStreaming primarily sells to the media, enterprise, and telecommunications sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Maze
cb_description: Maze is a user research platform focused on accelerating product development by providing rapid user insights. The company offers tools for prototype testing, surveys, card sorting, and live website testing, enabling businesses to gather and analyze user feedback efficiently. Maze primarily serves sectors such as financial services, insurance, tech and software, and agencies, catering to roles like product designers, product managers, and user researchers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Journey Clinical
cb_description:
Journey Clinical is a health technology company focusing on the mental health sector. The company provides a platform for psychotherapists to offer ketamine-assisted psychotherapy (KAP), a treatment modality that combines the use of ketamine with psychotherapy for conditions such as depression, anxiety, and post-traumatic stress disorder 
(PTSD). Journey Clinical primarily serves the mental health industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Naborforce
cb_description: Naborforce is a company that connects aging adults with a network of community members for on-demand support and social engagement. The company offers non-medical services such as assistance with errands, transportation, and help around the home to promote independent living for seniors. Naborforce primarily serves the aging population who require occasional assistance and companionship. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Richmond, Virginia.

name: Gryphon
cb_description: Gryphon specializes in fund administration and back-office services for the investment management industry. The company offers a suite of services including fund accounting, tax compliance, regulatory compliance, and investor reporting. Gryphon primarily serves private and registered investment funds, management companies, general partners, and sponsors. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Beachwood, Ohio.

name: Anthill
cb_description: Anthill is a company specializing in frontline workforce automation using artificial intelligence within the human resources technology sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies the automation of workflows for recruiting, onboarding, managing, and retaining frontline employees. Anthill's products include an engagement platform for scalable communication and a tool for creating custom no-code AI assistants for frontline management. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Relay
cb_description: Relay specializes in providing workflow solutions for school-based Medicaid services within the education sector. The company offers a comprehensive platform that streamlines documentation, claims processing, and compliance for K12 school districts to enhance Medicaid reimbursements. Relay primarily serves the education technology industry, focusing on financial and administrative processes for schools. It was founded in 1993 and is based in Bristol, Rhode Island.

name: Coherence
cb_description: Coherence is a company that specializes in the development of multiplayer game software, operating within the gaming industry. The company provides a software development kit (SDK) for Unity, which enables developers to create multiplayer experiences for their games. The company primarily caters to the gaming industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Malmo, Sweden.

name: Liquity
cb_description: Liquity provides a private company share-market for savvy investors. Liquity offers a solution and service for private UK companies, their shareholders and investors who are looking for liquidity by matching buyers and sellers of private UK company shares.

name: Livepeer
cb_description: Livepeer is a decentralized video infrastructure network focused on live and on-demand streaming within the technology sector. The company provides a platform that enables developers to integrate live and on-demand video streaming into its applications, offering tools for transcoding video on graphics processing units for broadcasting fees and network rewards. Livepeer Studio, a part of the company, offers a full-featured video streaming platform for developers, promising significant cost savings and ease of use with its Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) and Software Development Kits (SDK). It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CO.CO
cb_description: CO.CO is a sustainable and social crowd-funding based fashion brand in the apparel industry. The company offers pre-order purchasing of fashion items at a significant discount, allowing customers to contribute to the environment and community. CO.CO primarily sells to the eco-conscious consumer segment within the fashion retail industry. It is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: CASAFARI
cb_description: CASAFARI is a real estate data intelligence platform that operates within the real estate industry. The company offers a comprehensive database and AI-powered analytics tools for property sourcing, valuation, and market trend analysis. CASAFARI's services are primarily utilized by professionals in the real estate sector, including agents, brokers, and investors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

name: Vital Interaction
cb_description: Vital Interaction specializes in automating patient communication and workflow processes within the healthcare industry. The company offers solutions that integrate healthcare data and business intelligence to improve practice profitability, streamline front-office tasks, and enhance patient satisfaction. Vital Interaction primarily serves the healthcare sector, providing tools and services to medical practices aiming to optimize their operations and patient engagement. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: LeafLink
cb_description: LeafLink is a technology company specializing in streamlining wholesale commerce within the cannabis industry. Their platform offers a marketplace for cannabis brands and retailers to buy and sell products, alongside features for payments, logistics, advertising, and analytics. LeafLink's solutions cater to the unique needs of the licensed cannabis market, providing tools for compliance, transaction management, and business growth. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Vinterior
cb_description: Vinterior is a company focused on providing a marketplace for vintage furniture and sustainable homeware within the e-commerce sector. The company offers a platform for buying and selling a wide range of pre-owned furniture, lighting, art, and home decor items, catering to various styles including mid-century modern, art deco, and Scandinavian design. Vinterior primarily serves individuals looking for unique, vintage, and antique pieces for their homes. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Much Better Adventures
cb_description: Much Better Adventures specializes in active adventure holidays, operating within the travel and tourism industry. The company offers a variety of outdoor activities and experiences, such as hiking, kayaking, and wildlife watching, facilitated by expert local guides. Much Better Adventures caters primarily to solo travelers and groups looking for sustainable and culturally immersive travel experiences. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, England.

name: Onward
cb_description: Onward created a visual bot builder to allow users to quickly build chat decision trees that could help address their customers requests while also knowing when it was time to hand things off to a human.

name: NotCo
cb_description: NotCo is a Chilean food-tech company. The company produces plant-based alternatives to animal-based food products. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

name: Peregrine Technologies
cb_description: Peregrine Technologies specializes in visual intelligence solutions in the mobility ecosystem. The company offers artificial intelligence (AI) enabled perception software that transforms dashboard cameras (dashcams) into advanced video telematics, providing valuable insights into traffic and road conditions. Its primary market is the mobility data space, with a particular emphasis on vehicle fleet coverage. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Zeni
cb_description: Zeni offers startups an AI-powered finance team and real-time dashboard to automate all financial functions, including bookkeeping and accounting, bill pay and invoicing, yearly taxes, expense and receipt management, financial projections and budgeting, reporting, cash flow management, and CFO services. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Transfix
cb_description: Transfix operates a touring experience of large-scale illuminated art, design, and technology. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Dobbs Ferry, New York.

name: Mammoth Biosciences
cb_description: Mammoth Biosciences is a biotechnology company specializing in the development of in vivo gene editing therapeutics and diagnostics using CRISPR technology. The company offers a range of services including precision gene editing with novel CRISPR-Cas enzymes, protein discovery and engineering, and a revolutionary molecular diagnostics platform. Mammoth Biosciences primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on genetic medicine and collaborations with leading pharmaceutical companies. Mammoth Biosciences was formerly known as Apheleia Diagnostics. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Brisbane, California.

name: dopay
cb_description: Dopay operates as a financial technology company focusing on providing cashless payroll solutions. The company offers a virtual banking platform and prepaid debit cards, enabling businesses to transition from physical cash to electronic payments for their employees. These services primarily cater to businesses of all sizes in frontier economies. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Cognite
cb_description: Cognite is a healthcare communications agency focused on transformative therapies and complex diseases within the healthcare sector. The company offers services that make science meaningful to audiences, including healthcare professionals, patients, and life science companies, without using overly technical language or promotional claims. Cognite primarily serves life science companies, healthcare professionals, and patients by providing communication and educational materials. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Partior
cb_description: Partior engages in financial market infrastructure within the financial technology sector. It offers a unified ledger platform for cross-border multi-currency payments, settlements, and trade finance functions. It primarily serves financial institutions looking to optimize liquidity access and improve transaction processes. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Everphone
cb_description: Everphone serves as a device-as-a-service provider operating in the technology sector. The company's main services include procurement, configuration, management, security, and replacement of corporate smartphones and tablets. Everphone primarily serves businesses and organizations, including international management consultancies and several DAX companies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Gourmey
cb_description: Gourmey focuses on the food industry, specifically in the cultivated meat sector. It offers the production of meat products through cell cultivation, aiming to provide a sustainable and environmentally friendly alternative to traditional meat production. Gourmey primarily sells to the food industry. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Tackle
cb_description: Tackle is a company that provides construction management software, focusing on the estimating and bidding process for the construction industry. Their offerings include tools for generating estimates, creating proposals, and managing invoicing and payments. These services are aimed at businesses within the construction sector. It is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Gaussion
cb_description: Gaussion specializes in battery charging technology within the electric vehicle (EV) sector. The company offers MagLiB charging technology designed to significantly for the charging speed and lifespan of EV batteries. Gaussion's technology is compatible with various battery chemistries and aims to make fast-charging batteries more affordable and accessible. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Howler
cb_description: Howler specializes in real-time data technology solutions within the Internet of Things (IoT) sector. The company offers a standardized platform that provides universal location-based services for IoT devices, focusing on tracking location and movement. Howler's platform is designed to enable systems to react to location-based event data for IoT devices, facilitating the development of responsive IoT applications. It is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: DataRobot
cb_description: DataRobot specializes in artificial intelligence, offering an open, end-to-end AI lifecycle platform within the technology sector. The company provides solutions for scaling AI applications, monitoring and governing AI models, and driving business value through predictive and generative AI. DataRobot serves various industries, including healthcare, manufacturing, retail, and financial services, with its AI platform. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Mainframe
cb_description: Mainframe operates as an independent, venture-backed game studio. It offers massively multiplayer online (MMO) game development. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Helsinki, Finland.

name: GitGuardian
cb_description: GitGuardian is a cybersecurity startup. It operates in the technology industry, focusing on the issue of secrets sprawling through source code. The company offers services that automate secret detection for application security and data loss prevention, helping developers, operations, security, and compliance professionals secure software development and enforce policies across all their systems. GitGuardian's solutions monitor both public and private repositories, detect secrets, and alert users to allow for quick investigation and remediation. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Cognism
cb_description: Cognism is a company that specializes in international sales intelligence within the data quality and compliance industry. The company provides premium company and contact information, including firmographics, technographics, sales trigger events, intent data, verified business emails, and phone-verified mobile numbers. Cognism primarily serves the sales and marketing sectors of the economy. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Richmond, England.

name: Tessera Therapeutics
cb_description: Tessera Therapeutics is a life sciences company with a focus on genetic medicine and biotechnology. The company's main service is Gene Writing, a new genome engineering technology that writes therapeutic messages into the genome to treat diseases at their source. Tessera Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare and medical research sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: FieldProxy
cb_description: FieldProxy specializes in field service management software, focusing on digitizing and automating operations for service teams across various sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for workflow automation, route optimization, live location tracking, and work order management to streamline field team activities. FieldProxy primarily serves sectors such as HVAC, solar energy, telecommunications, pest control, cleaning services, banking, financial services, construction, and facilities management. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Chennai, India.

name: Droit
cb_description: Droit specializes in regulatory compliance and real-time decision-making within the financial sector. The company offers a suite of products that facilitate pre-trade and post-trade controls, transaction permissibility evaluations, and compliant regulatory reporting. Droit's solutions cater to financial institutions looking to navigate complex regulatory environments. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Futureswap
cb_description: Futureswap is a decentralized leverage trading platform specializing in crypto assets. It offers users the ability to trade with high leverage, participate in low-risk liquidity pools, and benefit from a secure, non-custodial trading environment. The platform primarily caters to the cryptocurrency trading community. It is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Populus
cb_description: Populus focuses on residential energy efficiency and climate adaptation program implementation with a focus on customer engagement and high levels of homeowner adoption. The company's approach is built upon a foundation of building science expertise and a commitment to bring real-time data tracking and actionable program insights to our clients. Populus achieves success leveraging a unique model that bridges building science, behavioral science, big data analysis and good old-fashioned human relationships.

name: Mudrex
cb_description: Mudrex is a cryptocurrency investment platform focused on providing a secure environment for managing digital assets. The company offers a range of products including systematic investment plans, theme-based crypto baskets, and educational resources to help individuals and institutions invest in cryptocurrencies. Mudrex also facilitates fiat to crypto transactions, ensuring funds are insured and providing tools for effective crypto asset management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Maximus
cb_description: Maximus is located in the North-western part of Denmark. The facility focuses on producing high quality marine fingerlings.

name: Lunchbox
cb_description: Lunchbox is a technology company focused on modernizing order management and B2B catering for the restaurant industry. The company offers a suite of products that enable app and web ordering, loyalty programs, marketing, and order aggregation to help restaurant chains increase their online revenue and enhance guest engagement. Lunchbox primarily serves enterprise restaurant operations, providing scalable solutions to streamline their digital growth strategy. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Point
cb_description: Point is a company that specializes in health and fitness technology. The company provides an API and SDK solution that integrates with wearable devices to collect and analyze biometric data. This data is then used to provide insights and recommendations for improving user health and wellness. It was founded in 2020 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Upload
cb_description: Upload is a digital media company focused on virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) content within the technology sector. The company provides news, reviews, guides, and industry analysis related to VR and AR technologies and products.  It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: CheckSammy
cb_description: CheckSammy is a company that focuses on waste management and sustainability in the environmental services industry. The company offers a range of services including waste removal, power washing, and sustainability initiatives, as well as providing open top containers for waste flexibility. They primarily cater to both commercial and residential sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Addison, Texas.

name: Strigo
cb_description: Strigo provides education solutions in the software training industry. The company offers services such as simulating software for hands-on learning experiences, providing a virtual classroom environment, and delivering professional information technology (IT) training. Its services are primarily targeted towards the software and software-as-a-service (SaaS) industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Intrinsic
cb_description: Intrinsic specializes in advanced memory technology within the semiconductor industry. The company offers silicon oxide-based RRAM designed to enhance memory performance in embedded systems and hardware for AI, while also focusing on low power consumption and cost-effectiveness. Intrinsic primarily caters to the microcontroller and edge AI sectors with its memory solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Strivr
cb_description: Strivr specializes in immersive learning experiences for workforce performance enhancement within the extended reality (XR) technology sector. The company offers a platform for creating, delivering, managing, and measuring virtual reality-based learning to optimize employee engagement, performance, and productivity. Strivr's services cater to a diverse range of industries including financial services, retail, hospitality, logistics, manufacturing, healthcare, travel, transportation, energy, and utilities. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Listia
cb_description: Listia is a web and mobile marketplace that operates in the ecommerce industry. The company provides a platform where users can exchange goods for free, giving away items they no longer want or need in exchange for credits, which can then be redeemed for goods offered by other users. The company primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Finout
cb_description: Finout provides cloud cost management and optimization in financial operations (FinOps). The company offers a suite of tools that help businesses monitor, manage, and optimize their cloud spending across various cloud providers and services. Its tools provide features such as cost anomaly detection, automatic commitment management, and waste reduction. It offers anomaly detection, a cost optimization suite, custom dashboards, virtual tags, and more. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Fintoc
cb_description: Fintoc serves as a financial technology company specializing in digital payment solutions. The company offers services that enable users to initiate payments and set up recurring charges directly from bank accounts, as well as automating bank reconciliation and credit evaluations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

name: Evisort
cb_description: Evisort specializes in AI-powered contract intelligence and operates within the contract lifecycle management and analysis software industry. The company provides a platform that connects contract data, enhances productivity, and delivers digital workflows across legal, finance, sales, procurement, and IT departments. Its platform is designed to manage and analyze contracts, offering features such as automated workflows, risk analysis, and compliance management. Evisort was formerly known as Evisit. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California. In September 2024, Evisort was acquired by Workday.

name: Chaayos
cb_description: Chaayos is a company that focuses on the beverage industry, specifically the tea sector. The company offers a variety of tea products, including masala tea, instant tea, and green teas, as well as tea-related gifts. These products are designed to cater to the diverse tastes of tea lovers, offering a wide range of flavors and blends. It was founded in 2012 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Axelera AI
cb_description: Axelera AI specializes in AI hardware acceleration for generative AI and computer vision inference within the technology sector. The company offers products such as AI acceleration hardware and software solutions that facilitate advanced computer vision and AI capabilities at the edge. It offer products that are designed to enhance the performance of AI applications, providing a cost-effective and user-friendly platform for innovation in AI. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Eindhoven, Netherlands.

name: Sensome
cb_description: Sensome focuses on the development of sensor technology for the healthcare sector. The company's main offering is a sensor technology to transform invasive medical devices into connected healthcare devices, using impedance-based micro-sensors and machine learning algorithms to identify biological tissues with high predictive reliability. This technology is primarily used in the medical fields such as interventional cardiology and oncology. Sensome was formerly known as Insent. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Massy, France.

name: Postman
cb_description: Postman serves as an API platform in the technology sector, focusing on streamlining the API development process. The company offers a suite of tools that simplify building, testing, and collaborating on APIs, making it accessible for developers and organizations to create and manage APIs efficiently. Postman primarily serves the software development industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: GEM
cb_description: GEM (Gaming & Entertainment Management) is a video gaming terminal route operator. GEM's VGTs are found in bars, restaurants, truck stops, fraternal organizations and other locations.

name: Kondukto
cb_description: Kondukto operates as a company focused on application security orchestration and posture management in the cybersecurity industry. It offers a platform that integrates security data, automates vulnerability remediation workflows, and manages risks with key security performance indicators. It primarily serves the cybersecurity sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: Coda
cb_description: Coda, also known as Coda Labs, is a company that focuses on the intersection of creative technology and mobile gaming, specifically within the blockchain technology sector. The company's main offerings include the development and publishing of mobile games that utilize blockchain technology, aiming to bring a large number of players into the blockchain space while also creating new economic opportunities for both game developers and players. Coda primarily serves the mobile gaming industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: SwiftConnect
cb_description: SwiftConnect is a company that focuses on providing connected access enablement solutions in the building operations and office management industry. The company offers a software system that manages physical access credentials and permissions in real-time, enabling users to control access through their mobile devices. This system also supports centralized office management, making hybrid and flexible workplaces possible. SwiftConnect primarily sells to the real estate tech industry. SwiftConnect was formerly known as SwiftCTRL. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

name: CEEK
cb_description: CEEK is a company that specializes in providing immersive virtual reality experiences and live streaming concerts in the entertainment and education sectors. The company offers a virtual reality platform where users can enjoy live concerts, sports events, educational content, and more in a fully immersive environment. CEEK also provides a marketplace for digital collectibles and NFTs, catering to music artists, sports teams, and content creators. CEEK was formerly known as Galaxy Next Generation Inc.. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Miami Beach, Florida.

name: Omnipresent
cb_description: Omnipresent is a technology company focused on computer engineering, pervasive computing, computer vision, and machine learning. The company offers enterprise electronics and computer software solutions designed to optimize operational visibility for public and private organizations with medium to large asset portfolios. Their primary customer segments include the telecommunications sector, as well as the mining, construction, agriculture, and energy sectors. It is based in South Africa.

name: NALA
cb_description: NALA is a company that focuses on financial technology, specifically in the domain of international money transfers. The company offers a mobile application that enables individuals and businesses to send money securely and affordably from the UK, US, and EU to various African countries. The primary sectors NALA serves are the financial services and technology industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania, United Republic of.

name: Stratio
cb_description: Stratio is a company focused on infrared sensing technology within the sensor and imaging industry. It specializes in the design and manufacture of low-cost, high-sensitivity shortwave infrared (SWIR) sensors using proprietary germanium-based technology. Stratio's products are utilized in various sectors, including autonomous driving, home appliances, smartphones, security, military defense, and agriculture, to enhance visual capabilities beyond human limits. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Writer Corporation
cb_description: Writer is a multi-business enterprise. The company provides global relocations, information management, automated teller machines (ATM), cash management, hospitality, lifestyle, and premium real estate. It was founded in 1953 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Buynomics
cb_description: Buynomics specializes in end-to-end revenue optimization within the consumer goods, retail, telecom, internet, and software industries. The company offers a suite of tools that leverage artificial intelligence to simulate virtual shoppers, providing precise consumer insights for informed decision-making on pricing, promotions, and product portfolios. Buynomics serves sectors that require sophisticated revenue growth management and decision-making support, such as consumer goods and retail, telecom, and software industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cologne, Germany.

name: Drip Capital
cb_description: Drip Capital focuses on providing working capital solutions within the trade finance sector. The company offers collateral-free financing options for both domestic and international transactions, aiming to simplify the process for businesses of all sizes with minimal documentation and quick access to funds. Drip Capital primarily serves businesses seeking financial services to manage their cash flow and sustain growth. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: SleekFlow
cb_description: SleekFlow is an AI-powered omnichannel conversation suite focused on customer engagement across various messaging channels. The company offers a platform that centralizes conversations, automates workflows, and manages customer relationships to business operations and customer service. SleekFlow primarily serves sectors such as retail, e-commerce, finance, education, real estate, and technology. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Hong Kong.

name: Ellipsis Health
cb_description: Ellipsis Health focuses on mental health care by utilizing the human voice as a biomarker, operating within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a clinical-grade assessment tool that measures and monitors the severity of mental health conditions such as stress, anxiety, and depression through voice analysis. Ellipsis Health's technology serves as a clinical decision support tool for various sectors including healthcare providers, insurance payers, employers, and digital health platforms. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Birdies
cb_description: Birdies specializes in the production of straight rolls within the tobacco industry. Its products are designed to provide a smoking experience with different intensity levels. It primarily serves the tobacco market with a focus on consumers looking for a modern take on the classic joint. It was formerly known as LITES. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Payengine
cb_description: Payengine is a company

name: Cortilia
cb_description: Cortilia is an online retailer specializing in fresh food and sustainable grocery shopping. The company offers a wide range of artisanal and locally sourced products, including fresh produce, meat, fish, dairy, baked goods, pantry staples, and personal and home care items. Cortilia primarily serves the sustainable ecommerce industry, connecting consumers with small local producers and artisans. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Engine Biosciences
cb_description: Engine Biosciences is a biotech company that operates in the biomedicine sector. The company's main focus is on digitizing and deciphering complex biology through machine learning and high-throughput experimental systems, to discover and develop medicines. These services primarily cater to the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Singapore.

name: Medmain
cb_description: Medmain develops and operates systems for pathological image diagnosis using deep learning and artificial intelligence, and also provides cloud services for medical students. Its product, PidPort, enables pathological diagnosis through analysis and offers remote pathological diagnosis capabilities. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Fukuoka, Japan.

name: Nourish Ingredients
cb_description: Nourish Ingredients is a deep-tech company that specializes in fermentation within the food industry. It develops animal-free fats that aim to replicate the taste and texture of traditional fats in food products. It caters to both alternative and traditional food companies looking to reduce or eliminate animal ingredients without compromising on flavor. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Canberra, Australia.

name: Hermeus
cb_description: Hermeus develops hypersonic aircraft within the aerospace and defense industry. Their main offerings include the creation of aircraft capable of achieving Mach 5 speeds, designed to significantly reduce travel time for transatlantic flights, and to provide solutions for national security challenges. The company's hybrid engine technology is a foundational element in achieving these high-speed capabilities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: CodeHS
cb_description: CodeHS is a company focused on computer science education. It offers a comprehensive platform that includes a customizable K-12 computer science curriculum, an online integrated development environment (IDE) for writing, running, and debugging code, and professional development resources for teachers. The company primarily serves the education sector, with its products being used by districts, schools, and teachers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Seso
cb_description: Seso provides a workforce management software provider specializing in the agricultural sector. The company offers a comprehensive employee management platform that facilitates human resource (HR) processes, onboarding, payroll, and H-2A visa compliance. Seso primarily serves the agricultural industry, providing solutions to help employers manage their workforce and comply with relevant regulations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Culture Amp
cb_description: Culture Amp is a market-leading employee experience platform focused on transforming organizational culture within various business sectors. The company offers a suite of tools for employee engagement, performance management, and employee development, designed to help organizations build competitive advantages by prioritizing their culture. Culture Amp's solutions are utilized by companies across different industries to manage and improve their workforce experience. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Richmond, Victoria.

name: Moveworks
cb_description: Moveworks operates as a company specializing in automating employee support through a conversational artificial intelligence (AI) platform. The company offers solutions that enable users to interact with business systems using natural language for tasks such as information search, task automation, and content creation. Moveworks primarily serves sectors that require information technology (IT) service management, employee onboarding, and identity access management. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Forecast
cb_description: Forecast is a Spanish menswear brand.

name: Precision Neuroscience
cb_description: Precision Neuroscience specializes in developing brain-computer interface technology within the biotechnology and medical device industry. Its main product, the Layer 7 Cortical Interface, is an implantable device designed to capture brain signals. The company's technology is primarily aimed at the healthcare sector, particularly for patients with neurological conditions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Matera
cb_description: Matera specializes in payment processing, core banking technology, and mobile wallet services within the financial technology sector. The company offers solutions such as real-time transaction authorizations, balance updates for financial accounts, and QR code payment systems that facilitate transactions for consumers and businesses. Matera primarily serves the financial industry, including global banks, credit unions, and digital banks. It was founded in 1987 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Unbound
cb_description: Unbound provides an online publishing platform that allows authors to pitch their ideas for books. Supporters then can pledge their financial backing in return for rewards.

name: Goldsky
cb_description: Goldsky specializes in providing real-time blockchain data services for the Web3 development sector. The company offers a suite of tools that enable developers to build decentralized applications (dApps) by offering real-time blockchain indexing, instant subgraphs, and flexible data streaming pipelines. Goldsky's products are designed to simplify the creation of data-driven experiences in the cryptocurrency domain, catering to crypto businesses and developers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Finkargo
cb_description: Finkargo is a platform offering foreign trade services to facilitate the growth of importers in the commerce and finance sectors. The company provides evaluation of products and suppliers, import planning, management of transportation and distribution, coordination of arrival and storage, and alternative financing solutions for business operations. Finkargo's digital platform and financial services are designed for operations and provide financial solutions to importers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: StashAway
cb_description: StashAway is an investment platform. The platform offers investment options that include general investing, responsible investing with ESG, thematic portfolios, and flexible portfolios. StashAway provides financial education through courses, blogs, podcasts, and videos. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Infinidat
cb_description: Infinidat focuses on providing enterprise data and cloud solutions. The company offers primary and secondary storage platforms that provide storage for mixed application workloads, data protection with cyber resilience, and high performance for heavy workloads. It primarily sells to sectors such as banking/financial services, retail, education, telecom, government, healthcare, managed service providers, and manufacturing. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Herzliya Pituach, Israel.

name: Join
cb_description: Join is a company that operates in the influencer marketing sector, providing a platform for creator marketing. The company's main services include facilitating collaborations between brands, agencies, and influencers, offering features such as influencer discovery, campaign management, and performance reports. The primary sectors that Join caters to include brands, influencers, agencies, and talent management. It is based in Haarlem, Netherlands.

name: Petra
cb_description: Petra is a wholesale distributor specializing in consumer electronics and related products across multiple categories. The company offers a variety of order fulfillment and product distribution solutions, catering to ecommerce platforms, independent retailers, and manufacturers. Petra's extensive product selection spans over 60 categories, including smart home technology, housewares, outdoor tech, and home and office accessories. It is based in Edmond, Oklahoma.

name: Tinvio
cb_description: Tinvio focuses on streamlining B2B transactions within the supply chain sector. The company offers a platform that facilitates the management of orders, invoices, and payments through a chat-led user interface. Tinvio primarily serves small to medium-sized merchants and suppliers looking to enhance productivity and profitability. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Qargo
cb_description: Qargo provides transport management software in the logistics industry. It offers a cloud-based transport management system that helps logistics businesses by optimizing workflows from order to invoice. Its system integrates with existing solutions, provides visibility of all trips and equipment, and enables faster invoicing. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: IDnow
cb_description: IDnow specializes in identity verification solutions within the financial technology, banking, mobility, gaming, crypto, travel, telecommunication, and human resources sectors. The company offers automated and expert-led identity verification, in-person verification, and digital signature services to ensure secure and compliant transactions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: GT Medical Technologies
cb_description: GT Medical Technologies specializes in treatments for brain tumors, focusing on medical devices within the healthcare sector. The company's product, GammaTile Therapy, is a surgically targeted radiation therapy that neurosurgeons place at the time of tumor resection to delay tumor recurrence and minimize radiation exposure to healthy tissue. GT Medical Technologies primarily serves the healthcare industry, offering solutions to improve patient outcomes and reduce treatment burdens. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tempe, Arizona.

name: Hathora
cb_description: Hathora specializes in server orchestration for the multiplayer gaming industry. The company offers a cloud platform optimized for deploying and scaling multiplayer games, featuring global server distribution, zero-downtime upgrades, and built-in monitoring. Hathora primarily caters to game studios and developers seeking to enhance their multiplayer gaming experiences. It was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Coinshift
cb_description: Coinshift specializes in treasury management solutions for decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) and other organizations within the blockchain industry. The company provides a platform that simplifies treasury operations, offers financial insights, and enhances transparency for communities and investors. Coinshift's services cater to the needs of organizations operating within the blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors. Coinshift was formerly known as Multisafe. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sheridan, Wyoming.

name: Kudo
cb_description: Kudo is an online-to-offline ecommerce platform offering kiosks placed at various strategic and easily accessible locations at malls, universities, office buildings, and convenience stores. Users can shop for many things, from buying game vouchers, discount vouchers, or even refilling our cellphone balances and applying for university.

name: Cala
cb_description: Cala is a bioelectronic medicine company focused on developing wearable neuromodulation therapies for chronic diseases within the healthcare sector. The company's flagship product is an FDA-cleared wearable device designed to alleviate action hand tremors in individuals with essential tremor and Parkinson's disease through peripheral nerve stimulation. Cala's therapies are clinically proven and prescribed by physicians, offering patients the ability to manage their tremors with on-demand therapy. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Elmenus
cb_description: Elmenus develops a food discovery and ordering platform. The company's main services include providing an online platform where customers can discover and order food from various restaurants. It also offers features such as order tracking and a personalized experience based on the user's preferences. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Deepdub
cb_description: Deepdub is a company specializing in AI-powered dubbing and localization solutions for audiovisual content across various sectors. The company offers services such as emotion-based text-to-speech, speech-to-speech translation, and voice cloning to create authentic and human-like audio experiences for a global audience. Deepdub primarily serves the media and entertainment industry, corporate sectors, and eLearning platforms, providing them with tools to localize content efficiently and effectively. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Tailscale
cb_description: Tailscale operates as a company focused on providing secure networking solutions. The company offers a zero-configuration virtual private network (VPN) service that allows teams and individuals to securely access shared resources and connect internal environments. Its services are primarily used by teams and businesses seeking secure, low-latency connections to their internal resources. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Take Command Health
cb_description: Take Command Health specializes in health reimbursement arrangements (HRAs) within the financial technology sector. The company provides HRA administration software that enables businesses of various sizes to reimburse employees for health insurance tax-free. Take Command Health's main offerings include QSEHRA administration for small businesses and ICHRA administration for companies of any size, aiming to offer flexible and affordable health benefits. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Dallas, Texas.

name: VoiceOps
cb_description: VoiceOps specializes in coaching enablement software for call centers across various industries. The company offers a platform that transforms call data into actionable insights for effective coaching, aiming to improve conversion rates and reduce team ramp time and attrition. VoiceOps primarily serves sectors such as financial services, consumer lending, insurance, education, travel, and hospitality. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ViralGains
cb_description: ViralGains is a marketing platform operating in the advertising industry. The company's main service involves creating interactive advertisements that collect zero-party data, which includes preferences and sentiments that consumers intentionally share, to help brands understand and engage with their customers. ViralGains primarily serves sectors such as the automotive, banking, telecom, and consumer packaged goods industries. It is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: BioSerenity
cb_description: BioSerenity is a company that focuses on neurology and sleep research within the healthcare sector. The company offers end-to-end software for sleep and EEG lab management, as well as innovative connected medical devices for electroencephalograms. It primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Cape Analytics
cb_description:
Cape Analytics specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) 
enabled property intelligence, focusing on the insurance and real estate sectors. The company provides geospatial imagery analytics and risk assessment tools to support underwriting in the insurance industry and valuation in real estate. Cape Analytics serves clients in sectors such as home insurance, commercial insurance, real estate, and reinsurance. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: CredShields
cb_description: CredShields specializes in cybersecurity solutions, focusing on the protection of web3 applications and smart contracts. The company offers a suite of security tools and services, including smart contract audits, vulnerability scanning, and threat monitoring, to ensure the safety of applications from development to post-deployment. CredShields primarily serves the blockchain and web3 sectors, providing security for companies operating with cryptocurrencies and decentralized applications. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Singapore.

name: Higharc
cb_description: Higharc is a company that specializes in providing a cloud-based platform for the homebuilding industry. Its main offerings include tools for automated home design, real-time generation of construction documents, and online customization for buyers. Higharc's platform streamlines the design, sales, estimating, and building processes for production homebuilders. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Writesonic
cb_description: Writesonic is a generative AI platform focused on content creation, SEO optimization, and AI chatbot development. The company offers tools for crafting factually accurate content with real-time data, optimizing content for search engines, and building custom AI chatbots trained on user data. Writesonic primarily serves marketers, agencies, and enterprises looking to enhance their digital content and customer engagement strategies. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Precirix
cb_description: Precirix is a clinical-stage biotechnology company that operates in the healthcare sector, with a specific focus on cancer treatment. The company develops targeted radiopharmaceuticals using camelid single domain antibody fragments, which are used for both patient selection (imaging) and therapy. Its primary market is the healthcare industry, specifically the oncology sector. Precirix was formerly known as Camel-IDS. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Jette, Belgium.

name: Affogata
cb_description: Affogata is a company that focuses on customer intelligence in the technology sector. The company offers an AI-driven platform that collects and analyzes data from various sources such as the web, review sites, social channels, and customer conversation platforms, providing actionable insights for businesses. Affogata primarily serves sectors such as fintech, consumer brands, and mobile game developers. Affogata was formerly known as Communit360. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bnei Brak, Israel.

name: Spinergie
cb_description: Spinergie is a company focused on making the maritime industry smarter and greener. It offers two main services: Smart Fleet Management and Market Intelligence. The former combines various data sources from marine operations to provide real-time visibility, facilitate workflows, and optimize operational efficiency, while the latter provides clear, real-time, multi-sourced data to inform market strategy. The company primarily serves the offshore, bulk, and general cargo sectors of the maritime industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: HealthifyMe
cb_description: HealthifyMe focuses on health and fitness, operating in the wellness industry. The company offers various services including personalized diet and workout plans, health-tracking tools, and coaching services to help individuals achieve their fitness goals. The company primarily serves individuals seeking to improve their health and fitness. It was formerly known as Caeruz Ventures. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Cursor
cb_description: Cursor is a company focused on enhancing software engineering productivity through its AI-powered code editor. The company offers a platform that allows developers to write code using predictive typing, natural language instructions, and integrates seamlessly with their existing codebase, while ensuring privacy and security with SOC 2 certification. Cursor primarily serves the software development industry, offering tools that cater to individual programmers and engineering teams. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Buffalo, New York.

name: Zoop
cb_description: Zoop is a financial technology company operating in the financial services sector. The company offers a platform that allows businesses to integrate payment and banking services under their own brand, including the ability to process and manage payments online and in person and to create and offer digital banking services to their customers. Zoop primarily serves businesses across various sectors looking to innovate their payment solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. In June 2024, Zoop was acquired by iFood.

name: Thyme Care
cb_description: Thyme Care is a company focused on value-based oncology care management, operating within the healthcare sector. The company offers personalized, clinically coordinated cancer support services, leveraging human guidance alongside software and analytics to connect members with appropriate care and provide continuous support through targeted, evidence-based interventions. Thyme Care primarily serves health insurance plans, oncology groups, and primary care groups through flexible value-based payment arrangements. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: Avarni
cb_description: Avarni focuses on carbon management in the software industry. The company offers a platform that allows organizations to identify and measure Scope 1-3 emissions across their entire organization using their financial data, and to develop robust carbon emission management plans and strategies. Avarni primarily sells to the private sector, public sector, and professional services industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Huboo
cb_description: Huboo is an eCommerce fulfilment partner specializing in leveraging technology and human expertise to assist businesses in their growth within the logistics and supply chain sector. The company offers comprehensive services including inventory management, order processing, and shipping through a global courier network, tailored to meet the needs of startups, SMEs, and large enterprises. Huboo's solutions are designed to integrate seamlessly with multiple sales channels, providing a technology-driven approach to streamline fulfilment operations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bristol, England.

name: Zageno
cb_description: Zageno is a company focused on accelerating scientific innovation by optimizing biotech purchasing processes within the e-commerce platform domain. The company offers a multi-supplier marketplace with over 25 million product SKUs from more than 5,000 unique product brands, designed to make shopping for research materials convenient, efficient, and reliable. Zageno primarily serves the biotechnology and scientific research sectors with its e-commerce solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Snafu Records
cb_description: Snafu Records is a music company focused on innovation and artist empowerment within the music industry. It offers a platform for undervalued talent, utilizing AI algorithms to discover new artists and provides services to help these artists grow their fanbase and manage their music distribution. Snafu Records caters to the needs of independent artists seeking to navigate the complexities of the modern music landscape. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: SLAMcore
cb_description: SLAMcore specializes in spatial intelligence and operates in the technology sector, focusing on real-time location systems (RTLS) and autonomous vehicle operation. The company offers products like Slamcore Aware and Slamcore software development kit (SDK), which provide vision-based positioning and spatial understanding using stereo cameras, inertial sensors, and advanced artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms. Its solutions are designed for tracking and situational awareness in various environments, catering to industries that require robust vehicle and robot localization. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Verusen
cb_description: Verusen focuses on materials intelligence and the digitalization of the supply ecosystem, operating in the supply chain sectors. The company offers an AI-powered platform that harmonizes disparate material data across systems and processes, providing trusted data across the enterprise for supplier and operational risk. This platform is primarily used by the manufacturing and operations sectors. It was formerly known as Autit. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: RentSpree
cb_description: RentSpree is a company specializing in rental process automation, focusing on tenant screening and rent payment solutions within the real estate sector. The company offers a suite of services including tenant background checks, online rent collection, and digital application processing for rentals. RentSpree primarily serves real estate agents, landlords, property managers, and renters. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Sherman Oaks, California.

name: Open Raven
cb_description: Open Raven focuses on data security posture management within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform for multi-cloud data discovery, classification, and posture management, as well as data loss prevention and detection and response services. These services enable organizations to maintain visibility and control over their sensitive data across various cloud environments. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California. In June 2024, Open Raven was acquired by Formstack.

name: Mojio
cb_description: Mojio is a connected mobility solutions provider specializing in the automotive and telecommunications industries. The company offers a platform and SaaS solutions that leverage telematics data and machine learning to enhance the vehicle ownership experience and provide actionable insights. Mojio primarily serves mobile network operators and automakers with its scalable and secure services. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Recode Therapeutics
cb_description: ReCode Therapeutics operates as a genetic medicines company in the biotechnology industry. The company's main services include the development of mRNA and gene correction therapeutics, utilizing their selective organ targeting (SORT) lipid nanoparticle (LNP) platform. This platform enables highly targeted delivery of genetic medicines to organs, tissues, and cells beyond the liver. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Isaac Health
cb_description: Isaac Health focuses on brain health and dementia care in the healthcare domain. The company offers a range of services including risk reduction, assessment, and treatment for brain health and memory issues, including Alzheimer's and other dementias. Its services are primarily targeted towards individuals and healthcare partners. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Nativo
cb_description: Nativo is a technology company focused on content-based advertising within the digital marketing industry. They offer a platform that automates the distribution of branded content to engage audiences, utilizing machine learning and artificial intelligence for non-interruptive integration in trusted environments. Nativo's services cater to advertisers looking to bridge the gap between awareness and action by providing tools for content activation, scaling, measurement, and audience insights. Nativo was formerly known as PostRelease. It was founded in 2010 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Zigazoo
cb_description: Zigazoo is a company that focuses on providing a safe and positive social media platform, operating in the social media and digital communication industry. The company offers two main services: a social network for children under 13, which is moderated and designed to foster positive interactions, and a social media platform for individuals aged 13 and up, which promotes non-toxic interactions and provides access to brands and celebrities. Zigazoo primarily serves the digital communication and social media industry. It was founded in 2000 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Chai
cb_description:
Weve created a social networking platform for content creators and consumers, enabling interaction, discovery, statistics tools and more. Free for most options, with payment processors for premium feeds.
We want to be the biggest and easiest option for the content creators who want to spend their time and resources creating quality content, and not worry about technical details, dealing with payment providers and marketing.
In other words: one-click self publishing.

name: Kalibrr
cb_description: Kalibrr is a technology company focused on transforming the recruitment process within the job search and employment industry. The company provides an online platform that leverages AI-powered search to connect job seekers with career opportunities and helps employers find suitable candidates. Kalibrr's services cater to a wide range of job categories including IT, sales, marketing, finance, and more. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: ViSenze
cb_description: ViSenze is an AI-powered search and recommendations platform focused on the retail industry. The company offers a suite of solutions that enable retailers to enhance product discovery through visual search technology, personalized recommendations, and automated product tagging, aimed at increasing conversions and revenue. ViSenze primarily serves the ecommerce sector, providing tools that cater to fast fashion, luxury goods, marketplaces, home decor, and eyewear retailers. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Small Door Veterinary
cb_description: Small Door Veterinary focuses on providing membership-based veterinary services in the pet healthcare industry. Their services include wellness and preventative care, sick patient care, 24/7 veterinary telemedicine, diagnostic testing, radiology, pharmacy, and various surgical procedures. The company primarily caters to pet owners seeking comprehensive and convenient veterinary care. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Popl
cb_description: Popl is a company that specializes in the digital business card industry. The company offers a platform for creating and managing digital business cards, which are a modern, eco-friendly alternative to traditional paper business cards. These digital cards can be shared via QR codes or website links, and can be customized with multimedia content such as links to websites and social media profiles. The company primarily serves professionals and teams across various sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Cohesity
cb_description: Cohesity provides data security and data management solutions. The company offers a platform to secure, manage, and extract value from data, providing services such as data protection, threat detection, data mobility, and data insights. It serves sectors such as financial services, healthcare, and government. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Breef
cb_description: Breef offers a digital platform that connects  brands with agencies for their digital and creative needs. Its platform allows users to work on projects, receive agency pitches and manage payments. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: FintechOS
cb_description: FintechOS specializes in financial technology and insurance, focusing on streamlining the creation and management of banking and insurance products. It offers a platform that enables businesses to design, launch, and service financial and insurance products. It serves the banking and insurance sectors, offering solutions that cater to retail banking, small business banking, general insurance, and embedded finance, among others. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: goTenna
cb_description: goTenna operates as a company in mobile mesh networking technology and off-grid connectivity solutions for smartphones and other devices. Its main offerings include devices and mobile applications that enable communication without reliance on cell, wifi, or satellite networks. The company primarily serves sectors such as emergency management, law enforcement, military, and wildland firefighting. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Jersey City, New Jersey.

name: BitPay
cb_description: BitPay is a company focused on bitcoin payments and cryptocurrency transaction services within the financial technology sector. The company provides solutions for buying, storing, swapping, and spending cryptocurrencies, as well as services for businesses to accept crypto payments and manage crypto payroll. BitPay's offerings cater to both individual consumers and businesses, with a range of tools designed to facilitate the use of cryptocurrencies in various transactions. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Alpharetta, Georgia.

name: Avisi Technologies
cb_description: Avisi Technologies specializes in the development of medical devices for the ophthalmology sector, with a focus on treating glaucoma. The company's main offering is VisiPlate, an investigational implant designed to lower intraocular pressure in patients with open-angle glaucoma by utilizing a network of microchannels. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, offering solutions for the management and treatment of glaucoma. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: SeedLegals
cb_description: SeedLegals is a platform that specializes in legal automation for startups and small businesses, focusing on investment, talent acquisition, and growth acceleration. The company provides a suite of legal tools and services designed to streamline the process of raising investment, creating contracts, managing equity, and ensuring compliance with tax incentive schemes. SeedLegals primarily serves the startup ecosystem, offering solutions tailored to the needs of founders, investors, and growing companies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Moglix
cb_description: Moglix is a B2B e-commerce platform focused on the procurement of industrial supplies across various sectors. The company offers a wide range of products including safety gear, power tools, office supplies, electrical equipment, and healthcare and lab supplies. Moglix caters primarily to the needs of the manufacturing, industrial, and business sectors by providing essential tools, equipment, and supplies necessary for their operations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Intercom
cb_description: Intercom specializes in customer support technology within the tech industry. It offers a range of products, including a help desk, an AI chatbot, proactive support tools, and a platform for delivering personalized support at scale. The company primarily serves sectors such as eCommerce, education, healthcare, and financial services. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Unifimoney
cb_description: Unifimoney is a digital wealth management partner that operates in the financial technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive suite of investment services including high-yield interest accounts, self-managed investing, precious metals trading, and robo-advisory. Unifimoney primarily serves community banks, credit unions, and other financial institutions looking to enhance their digital offerings. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Artifact
cb_description: Artifact focused on providing a news reading application within the technology sector. The main service offered by Artifact is a digital platform for users to read and engage with news content. It is based in San Francisco, California. In January 2024, Artifact ceased its operations.

name: 3DEO
cb_description: 3DEO specializes in manufacturing, specifically in the domain of metal 3D printing. The company offers services such as designing and producing metal parts at scale, with a focus on transitioning from prototype to volume production. 3DEO primarily serves sectors such as the medical, aerospace, industrial, and consumer products industries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Torrance, California.

name: Glorify
cb_description: Glorify is a Christian daily worship app focused on personal spiritual growth and wellbeing. The app provides users with daily devotionals, Christian meditations, and tools for learning and reflecting on Bible verses, as well as features for prayer and journaling. Glorify primarily serves individuals seeking to enhance their daily spiritual practice and connect with their faith. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Lev
cb_description:
Lev is a marketing-focused consultancy that specializes in Salesforce and other digital solutions.

On March 23rd, 2020, Lev was acquired by Cognizant Technology Solutions. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Doctify
