cb_description: Doctify is a health technology company provides patient feedback and review platform. The company offers a software as a service (SaaS) product that enables healthcare providers to collect, digitize, and publish patient feedback, as well as gain insights and analytics to drive improvements in patient care. Doctify primarily serves healthcare professionals, clinics, and hospitals seeking to understand and improve patient experiences. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Dash Hudson
cb_description: Dash Hudson is a social media management platform operating in the digital marketing industry. The company provides sophisticated insights and workflow tools that help brands manage their social media presence, predict the performance of their content, analyze trends, and accelerate growth across various marketing channels. Dash Hudson primarily serves sectors such as fashion and luxury, beauty, media and publishing, food and beverage, and retail. It is based in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

name: TrueCar
cb_description: TrueCar is an online platform focused on providing transparent pricing and tools for new and used car purchases within the automotive industry. The company offers services such as vehicle listings, pricing information, financing calculators, and trade-in options to facilitate the car buying process. TrueCar primarily serves individuals looking to purchase or sell vehicles, including electric vehicles, and provides research resources to inform their decisions. TrueCar was formerly known as Zag.com. It was founded in 2005 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Coinme
cb_description: Coinme is a digital currency exchange specializing in cryptocurrency transactions and financial services. The company provides a platform for buying, selling, storing, and managing digital currencies, with a focus on facilitating cash to crypto transactions through a vast network of Bitcoin ATMs. Coinme's services cater to individuals looking to engage with digital currencies through easy-to-use consumer products and an enterprise-grade API for integrating cryptocurrencies into traditional financial systems. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: It's Electric
cb_description: It's Electric provides curbside electric vehicle (EV) charging solutions, operating within the electric vehicle infrastructure domain. It engages in partnering with city property owners to unlock access to untapped electricity supply for EV charging, thereby providing a more accessible and convenient charging infrastructure for EV drivers. It primarily caters to the urban transportation sector. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Biolinq
cb_description: Biolinq operates as a technology company focused on the health sector. The company develops a wearable platform that uses an array of electrochemical sensors to monitor metabolic health, including glucose levels, just below the skin's surface. The primary market for Biolinq's products is the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Minio
cb_description: MinIO specializes in high-performance, Kubernetes-native object storage with a focus on AI/ML data infrastructure. The company offers a software-defined, S3 compatible object storage system that is designed to run on any cloud or on-premises infrastructure. MinIO's main offerings include scalable object storage solutions with enterprise features such as inline erasure coding, bit-rot detection, encryption, and active-active replication, catering to a variety of use cases including AI/ML, analytics, backup, and archival workloads. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Flock
cb_description: Flock specializes in transforming individual rental properties into diversified real estate investments and operates within the real estate sector. The company offers a service that allows property owners to sell their rental properties in exchange for shares in a real estate fund, thereby exiting landlord responsibilities and potentially deferring taxes. Flock primarily caters to individuals looking to retire from active property management. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Giftbit
cb_description: Giftbit is a digital rewards and incentives platform that operates in the digital gift card industry. The company specializes in providing businesses with tools to send and track digital gift cards, prepaid credit cards, and charitable options, aiming to streamline reward and incentive programs. Giftbit's services are primarily utilized by sectors that require customer engagement, employee rewards, and marketing incentives. It is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Orbem
cb_description: Orbem specializes in artificial intelligence (AI)-powered imaging technology within the industrial scanning and classification sector. It offers imaging solutions to utilize magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) combined with deep learning algorithms to scan, classify, and sort a variety of items such as eggs, nuts, seeds, and plants. The solutions cater to industries that require precise sorting and defect detection in food processing and agriculture. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Validus
cb_description: Validus is a wholesale company operating in the health and medical sectors. The company primarily serves customers in the health food, bandages, pharmacies, and hospitals, offering health food products, ostomy products, and medical equipment. It works both ways in the value chain, sourcing products from suppliers and distributing them to the sales level. It is based in Mjondalen, Norway.

name: Leapwork
cb_description: Leapwork operates as an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered visual test automation platform. It offers application monitoring, functional user interface (UI) testing, continuous testing, transformation, regression testing, and more. Leapwork can help with software testing, data migration, and robotic process automation in finance and healthcare. It was formerly known as Leaptest. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: MindMaze
cb_description: MindMaze provides digital neuro-therapeutics services, focusing on the healthcare sector with an emphasis on brain health and recovery. The company offers a suite of medical-grade software, tailored interactive content, and proprietary peripherals designed to restore motor, cognitive, and cardiovascular functions following neural injuries, degeneration, and aging. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: Wealthfront
cb_description: Wealthfront is a financial services company that focuses on automated investing and wealth building for individuals. The company offers a range of services including high-yield savings accounts, investment in US Treasury bonds, and diversified portfolio management using automated technology. Wealthfront's products are designed to cater to both seasoned and novice investors, aiming to simplify the investment process and maximize returns over the long term. Wealthfront was formerly known as kaChing. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: IntelinAir
cb_description: IntelinAir specializes in providing actionable intelligence from aerial data within the agricultural sector. The company offers services that include monitoring crop health, managing nitrogen levels, and analyzing field performance to support farmers and agribusinesses in making informed decisions. IntelinAir's platform, AGMRI, delivers insights and analytics to help optimize agricultural production. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Prose
cb_description: Prose specializes in personalized haircare and skincare products within the beauty industry. The company offers custom-formulated products that leverage lab innovation, natural ingredients, and patent-pending AI to cater to individual needs. Prose primarily serves the personal care sector with a focus on sustainability and ethical business practices. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Shelf
cb_description: Shelf is a financial technology company specializing in shared payment solutions. The company offers a platform for pooling money and managing group expenses, facilitating easy and trackable shared payments for various purposes. Shelf primarily serves individuals and groups looking for efficient ways to manage shared financial transactions. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Karnataka, India.

name: SalaryBox
cb_description: SalaryBox specializes in employee attendance and payroll software within the human resources technology sector. The company provides a comprehensive suite of tools for tracking employee time, managing leave, processing payroll, and ensuring compliance with labor laws. SalaryBox's software is designed to cater to businesses of various sizes, streamlining HR processes and enhancing workforce management. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Osano
cb_description: Osano is a data privacy management platform that specializes in simplifying compliance across various industries. The company offers a suite of tools designed to automate and streamline consent management, data subject rights processing, data mapping, and vendor risk assessments. Osano primarily serves businesses looking to manage their data privacy obligations effectively. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Compa
cb_description: Compa specializes in providing real-time, offers-based market data for compensation teams within the technology sector. Their main product, Compa Index, delivers compensation market data fueled by applicant tracking systems, offering insights into current compensation trends and enabling companies to make informed decisions on competitive offers. It primarily serves enterprise technology companies with tools for compensation benchmarking and pay transparency. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Fountain Valley, California.

name: Payflow
cb_description: Payflow is a financial wellness application that operates in the employee benefits sector. The company offers a mobile application that allows employees to access their earned salary and provides a platform for flexible compensation management. Payflow also includes a virtual savings tool and a financial education platform to help employees manage their personal finances. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

name: Syantra
cb_description: Syantra is a precision healthcare company focused on the detection and treatment of cancer, with an emphasis on breast cancer within the biotechnology sector. The company offers a blood test for breast cancer screening that utilizes a panel of gene expression biomarkers and machine learning software to provide accurate results. Syantra's products are designed for healthcare providers and patients, aiming to improve early detection and treatment outcomes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Calgary, Alberta.

name: Ninja Van
cb_description: Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company specializing in e-commerce express logistics. The company offers a suite of solutions for parcel delivery, including digital and full-funnel marketing services to enhance shippers' sales. Ninja Van's network extends to various sectors, including e-commerce and business-to-business inventory restocking. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Singapore.

name: Terra Drone
cb_description: Terra Drone operates as an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) operator. It provides a wide range of services, including aerial surveying, inspection, and mapping, as well as drone delivery and logistics. It offers solutions such as land surveying, forest surveying, oil and gas inspection, and more. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: ResortPass
cb_description: ResortPass operates as an online hotel booking platform. The company's main service is offering day passes to amenities such as pools, private beaches, spas, and fitness facilities at hotels and resorts. It primarily serves the hospitality industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Carlsbad, California.

name: Kigen
cb_description: Kigen focuses on providing secure connectivity solutions in the Internet of Things (IoT) and telecommunications industry. The company offers a range of products and services including subscriber identity module (SIM) operating systems, embedded SIM (eSIM), integrated SIM (iSIM), and remote SIM provisioning, all designed to simplify the manufacturing supply chain and provide end-to-end security for IoT applications and the data they transmit. Kigen primarily serves sectors such as cellular IoT industries, chip makers, original equipment manufacturers (OEMs), IoT service providers, and mobile network operators. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Belfast, United Kingdom.

name: Agtonomy
cb_description: Agtonom focuses on transforming farming through advanced autonomous and AI solutions within the agriculture technology sector. They offer a product called TeleFarmer, which is a solution designed to control various farming tasks through a simple and intuitive app, enabling planning, monitoring, and reporting of field missions. The company primarily serves the agriculture industry by providing tools to increase efficiency and productivity for farmers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Guidesly
cb_description: Guidesly is a next-generation marketplace operating in the outdoor activities industry. The company's main service is connecting users with expert guides for a variety of outdoor activities, primarily focusing on fishing. These services are offered through their website and app, allowing users to compare, book, and plan outdoor adventures. It is based in Topsfield, Massachusetts.

name: Whop
cb_description: Whop is a platform that facilitates the internet economy by providing a marketplace for digital products and services. The company offers a range of services including payment processing, digital product delivery, and a storefront for sellers to reach customers. Whop primarily serves creators, entrepreneurs, and digital product merchants. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Meroxa
cb_description: Meroxa focuses on providing a code-first data application platform. The company offers a platform that enables developers to build, test, and deploy stream-processing data applications using coding languages. It primarily serves the technology and software development industries. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: DayTwo
cb_description: DayTwo specializes in precision health, focusing on personalized nutrition and chronic disease management within the healthcare sector. The company offers microbiome analysis to provide dietary recommendations aimed at managing conditions like type 2 diabetes. DayTwo's services are designed to predict individual blood sugar responses and create tailored nutrition plans based on microbiome data. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Brentwood, Tennessee. DayTwo ceased operations in August 2024.

name: Mosaic Foods
cb_description: Mosaic Foods is a Benefit Corporation that focuses on facilitating the transition to plant-centric eating, operating in the food industry. The company offers a variety of plant-based meals, including veggie bowls, family meals, pizzas, and soups, all of which are prepared by chefs and delivered frozen to customers for easy preparation. Mosaic Foods primarily serves to individuals seeking convenient, healthy meal options. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Gunzilla Games
cb_description: Gunzilla Games is a game developer focused on creating  gaming experiences within the video game industry. The company specializes in developing engaging games, with a current project being a cyberpunk-themed Battle Royale game. Gunzilla Games targets the gaming community. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

name: Webacy
cb_description: Webacy specializes in digital asset protection and risk management within the Web3 and cryptocurrency sectors. The company offers a suite of tools that assess risks, monitor transactions, and provide emergency response features for digital asset security. Webacy's services cater to individual and institutional users who require robust security measures in the rapidly evolving Web3 space. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: The Cool Down
cb_description: The Cool Down is a company focused on climate awareness and sustainability, operating in the environmental and digital content sectors. The company primarily offers content that showcases progress and products in the climate space, aiming to make climate content relatable, accessible, actionable, and fun. The Cool Down primarily serves the environmental sector, with a particular focus on mainstream culture and social media trends. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bend, Oregon.

name: Magnolia Medical Technologies
cb_description: Magnolia Medical Technologies is a company focused on advancing diagnostic accuracy in the healthcare industry. The company's main offering is a technology platform, Steripath, which is designed to reduce contamination and misdiagnosis in blood culture testing, thereby improving patient outcomes and reducing unnecessary treatment costs. Magnolia Medical Technologies primarily serves the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Stockly
cb_description: Stockly is a company focused on e-commerce inventory management, operating within the retail and technology sectors. It offers a platform that allows e-retailers to sell products they do not have in stock by sourcing these products from other official resellers and brands within its network. The service aims to fill inventory gaps in real time, ensuring that e-shops can maintain sales continuity without the need to hold all products in stock. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Buoyant
cb_description: Buoyant specializes in service mesh technology, focusing on providing modern, cloud-native network security and reliability for enterprises. Their main offerings include zero-trust network security, cross-cluster failover, and cost-aware multicluster routing, all designed to enhance network performance and efficiency without requiring changes to application code. Buoyant primarily serves organizations looking to implement robust security and reliability features into their cloud-native applications. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Metafy
cb_description: Metafy is a company that focuses on the gaming industry, providing a platform for professional gamers to monetize their skills. The company offers services such as live coaching, courses, and content related to various popular games, all aimed at helping users improve their gaming abilities. Metafy primarily caters to the gaming industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Codat
cb_description: Codat specializes in providing financial data integration services within the banking and fintech sectors. The company offers products that enable access, synchronization, and interpretation of financial data from business customers' accounting software, facilitating various use cases such as small business lending and supplier onboarding for commercial card programs. Codat's solutions are designed to help clients grow their share of wallet, reduce churn, and scale their operations efficiently. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Creator
cb_description: Creator is a developer of card readers, card issuers, bill validators and so on.

name: The Student Hub
cb_description: The Student Hub, also known as Black Ubuntu Technologies, is a social impact technology company operating in the education sector. The company offers a range of technology and services aimed at making tertiary education more accessible and affordable, improving academic performance, and facilitating job placement for students. Its main offerings include a learning platform that employs data-driven personalised learning, a transformative educational programme that promotes peer-to-peer learning and mentorship, and an upcoming employment platform that matches students with jobs based on their validated skills. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Hadrian
cb_description:
Hadrian provides toilet partition and locker products that include powder-coated metal, stainless steel, embossed stainless steel, and plastic. It is based in Burlington, Ontario.

On December 4, 2020 Hadrian was acquired by Rexnord. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: ClimateAi
cb_description: ClimateAi specializes in providing climate resilience solutions for the agriculture, food, and beverage industries. The company offers an enterprise climate resilience platform that leverages artificial intelligence (AI) and patented models to deliver actionable climate insights and risk forecasting. ClimateAi's platform serves businesses looking to optimize its operations, and manage supply chains. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sendoso
cb_description: Sendoso offers a mail-sending service and management platform. The company helps businesses send personalized items, branded merchandise, electronic gifts, and more to their customers, partners, and employees. It primarily serves sectors such as marketing, sales, customer experience, and human resources. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: VOI
cb_description: VOI is a micro-mobility company focused on providing shared transportation solutions. The company offers electric scooters and electric bikes for rent, which can be accessed and operated via a mobile application, aiming to provide a way for city navigation. VOI primarily serves urban residents and partners with cities to integrate its services with existing public transportation systems. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Ismaning, Germany.

name: GoodTrust
cb_description: GoodTrust specializes in estate planning and digital legacy services within the legal technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools for creating wills, revocable living trusts, and various directives to help individuals secure their family, assets, and last wishes. GoodTrust also provides a secure digital vault for organizing and storing important documents and information. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Keyway
cb_description: Keyway is a technology company specializing in AI-powered tools for the real estate industry. They offer a suite of products that provide market insights, asset management, and investment decision support for real estate professionals. Their services cater to the needs of real estate teams looking to enhance productivity and make data-driven decisions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Causal
cb_description: Causal is a modern business planning platform that operates in the financial technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools for financial modeling, reporting, budgeting, forecasting, and scenario planning, designed to replace traditional spreadsheets. Causal's software enables businesses to integrate real-time data from various sources such as accounting systems and CRMs, facilitating collaborative and streamlined financial planning. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Claymont, Delaware.

name: Grata
cb_description: Grata is a company specializing in Smart Living Operating Systems within the property technology sector. It offers an integrated platform combining smart devices, property management software, and mobile applications to enhance the living experience and operational efficiency in multifamily and student housing. The company primarily serves the real estate technology industry, focusing on improving multifamily living through advanced connectivity and management solutions. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Wyze
cb_description: Wyze is a technology company focused on providing high-quality, affordable smart home cameras and devices. The company offers a range of products including smart cameras with high-resolution video, AI features, and seamless integration with smart home systems. Wyze also provides solutions for home monitoring, lighting, locks, thermostats, vacuums, watches, scales, and headphones. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Kirkland, Washington.

name: Socure
cb_description: Socure focuses on digital identity verification and fraud prediction, operating within the technology and financial services sectors. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) to verify identities in real-time, analyzing various elements such as email, phone, address, and device risk. This service is primarily used by industries such as financial services, government, gaming, healthcare, telecom, and e-commerce. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Incline Village, Nevada.

name: C2Sense
cb_description: C2Sense is a developer of advanced optical sensing systems within the technology sector. The company offers solutions for rapid diagnostics, authentication, and product viability assurance using fluorescence and optical-based sensing. C2Sense primarily serves the medical space and supply chain industries with its innovative diagnostic tests and anti-counterfeiting solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Watertown, Massachusetts.

name: CARMA
cb_description: CARMA manufactures utilities sub-metering equipment and provides utility billings solutions to multi-residential, condominium, commercial and institutional clients.

name: Casted
cb_description: Casted is a company that focuses on providing a platform for B2B podcast and video content marketing. It offers services that allow businesses to plan, create, amplify, and measure their marketing efforts, as well as host, syndicate, and distribute audio and video content. They also provide tools for content ROI, understanding audience engagement, and extending the life of existing content. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Indianapolis, Indiana.

name: Airspace Systems
cb_description: Airspace Systems is a company focused on airspace security within the technology and defense sectors. The company offers solutions that detect, classify, and respond to drone activity, using artificial intelligence and advanced robotics to ensure airspace security. These services are primarily utilized by businesses, law enforcement, and the military. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Leandro, California.

name: Instacrops
cb_description: Instacrops specializes in providing a full stack platform for the agriculture sector, focusing on real-time monitoring and management of crops. The company offers an AI-based application that assists farmers with irrigation, nutrient optimization, and the detection of pests and diseases, enabling comprehensive real-time monitoring of fields. Instacrops primarily serves the agricultural industry with technology solutions aimed at improving crop yield and resource efficiency. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

name: Medkitdoc
cb_description: MedKitDoc is a telemedicine company providing remote medical care through a platform that integrates connected medical devices and certified video consultations. The company offers a suite of tools for real-time health monitoring and virtual clinician services, designed to reduce unnecessary hospitalizations and improve patient care. MedKitDoc primarily serves home care agencies, home health agencies, assisted living facilities, mobile physician groups, and accountable care organizations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Hannoversch Munden, Germany.

name: Lygos
cb_description: Lygos specializes in specialty chemicals within various sectors including agronomy, home care, personal care, water treatment, and fragrances. The company offers solutions designed to enhance performance across the supply chain. Lygos primarily serves industries that require ingredients for their products. Lygos was formerly known as KFK. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Hayward, California.

name: ASAPP
cb_description: ASAPP specializes in social media marketing and audience engagement within the digital marketing industry. The company offers services to enhance follower counts on Instagram, increase views on YouTube, and optimize overall engagement across social platforms. These services are designed to improve the visibility and influence of social media profiles without requiring account access or password information. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Babson Diagnostics
cb_description: Babson Diagnostics serves as a healthcare technology company focused on reinventing the blood testing process. It offers a service that provides medically accurate blood tests. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, partnering with clinicians, retailers, and payers to facilitate accessible blood testing. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Rappi
cb_description: Rappi is a technology company that operates in the marketplace sector, focusing on enabling local commerce. The company provides a platform that connects businesses and consumers, facilitating e-commerce and delivery services. It primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Shippit
cb_description: Shippit is a company that focuses on providing multi-carrier shipping software solutions, operating within the ecommerce and logistics industries. The company offers services such as shipping and delivery, fulfilment and optimisation, and post-purchase experiences, all aimed at helping online retailers streamline their operations. Shippit primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: SCYTHE
cb_description: SCYTHE specializes in cybersecurity solutions, focusing on adversarial emulation and enterprise risk assessments. The company offers a BAS+ adversarial emulation platform that enables organizations to conduct realistic enterprise risk assessments and mimic real-world cyber threats. SCYTHE's services include threat analysis, controls validation, and purple teaming, designed to enhance cybersecurity preparedness and response capabilities. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Arlington, Virginia.

name: Aerobotics
cb_description: Aerobotics is a data analytics company focused on optimizing crop performance for the agricultural sector using aerial imagery and machine learning algorithms. The company provides insights for precision growing and crop insurance, enabling farmers to make data-driven decisions through mobile and web applications. Aerobotics primarily serves the agriculture industry, offering solutions to growers and crop insurers. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: Innerspace
cb_description: Innerspace is a nonprofit that takes best practices for how to build resilient teams and make them available for founders in the form of workshops for free. They range from communication, providing feedback, among other positive activities. The goal is to help startup employees basically stay happier and help companies better retain employees.

name: Chinova Bioworks
cb_description: Chinova Bioworks specializes in the development of natural, clean-label shelf-life extenders for the food and beverage industry. Their main product, Chiber, is a mushroom fiber extract that functions as a natural preservative to improve the quality, freshness, and shelf-life of various food products. The company's offerings cater to the needs of food manufacturers seeking eco-friendly and health-conscious ingredients. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Fredericton, New Brunswick.

name: Zadara
cb_description: Zadara specializes in providing fully-managed enterprise edge cloud services, focusing on compute, networking, and storage solutions for the modern enterprise. The company offers a range of services including autoscaling groups, Kubernetes support, block storage, file storage, and object storage, all designed to be scalable, secure, and flexible to meet various workload demands. Zadara primarily serves industries such as finance, government, healthcare, manufacturing, media, and telecommunications. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Irvine, California.

name: Tesorio
cb_description: Tesorio develops financial technology for cash flow management and accounts receivable automation. The company offers a suite of services that streamline cash collection processes, automate accounts receivable, and provide cash flow forecasts powered by artificial intelligence and machine learning predictions. Its services primarily cater to the finance sector, particularly business-to-business (B2B) finance teams. Tesorio was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Eyelights
cb_description: Eyelights specializes in augmented reality technologies and head-up display solutions for the motorcycle industry. The company offers products that provide riders with navigation assistance, safety features, and audio communication capabilities through a head-up display integrated into motorcycle helmets. These products are designed to enhance the riding experience by projecting essential information in the rider's line of sight. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Labege, France.

name: nPlan
cb_description: nPlan specializes in forecasting and de-risking construction projects using artificial intelligence within the construction industry. The company offers a suite of software products that leverage a large dataset and advanced machine learning techniques to provide insights for project and portfolio management, risk analysis, and reporting. nPlan's technology is designed to serve the construction sector, including commercial and public buildings, energy, and transportation projects, and caters to various roles such as Portfolio Directors, PMO Managers, Planners, and Risk Managers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Techwolf
cb_description: TechWolf focuses on providing an AI-driven skills intelligence platform within the human resources technology sector. The company offers solution that automatically monitors and updates an enterprise's workforce skills by analyzing HR information and employees' digital footprints. TechWolf's platform is designed to assist in workforce planning, skill gap identification, and learning and development strategies by leveraging labor market data and natural language processing. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Ghent, Belgium.

name: Dashbot
cb_description: Dashbot is an AI-powered platform specializing in conversational data analysis within the data management industry. The company offers a suite of tools for extracting and analyzing insights from customer interactions across multiple channels, transforming conversational data into strategic assets for businesses. Dashbot primarily serves sectors such as customer experience (CX) teams, conversational AI teams, and digital teams across various industries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Baseimmune
cb_description: Baseimmune operates in the antigen discovery and vaccine development industry. The company's main service is the development of vaccines using a computational platform that models pathogen evolution and immune responses, aiming to create vaccines that remain effective even when the pathogen mutates. The company primarily serves the healthcare and biotech industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Adore Me
cb_description: Adore Me provides an online, subscription-based lingerie and swimwear platform. Its products include lingerie, swimwear, sleepwear, and related accessories in sizes ranging from petite to plus size. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York. In November 2022, Adore Me was acquired by Victoria's Secret.

name: LexCheck
cb_description: LexCheck specializes in legal technology, focusing on AI-powered contract review and management within the legal sector. The company offers a platform that leverages artificial intelligence to enhance the speed and accuracy of contract negotiations, as well as tools for tracking non-disclosure agreements and implementing contract playbooks. LexCheck's solutions cater to various departments and industries, including legal, sales, procurement, global enterprises, high-growth businesses, private equity, and law firms. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Queen of Raw
cb_description: Queen of Raw is a technology company specializing in supply chain software solutions within the sustainability sector. Their main product, Materia MX, is a SaaS platform designed to manage excess inventory by facilitating reuse, resale, and recycling, while also providing impact reporting tools. The company primarily serves the fashion and textile industries, helping businesses reduce waste and improve their environmental footprint. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Binti
cb_description: Binti is a company specializes in foster care system through its software solutions within the child welfare sector. The company offers a comprehensive, mobile-friendly platform that enables processes for social workers, promotes partnerships, and aims to improve outcomes for children and families. Binti's software suite includes tools for licensing, placements, case management, intake, investigations, eligibility, payments, and family finding and engagement. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Fleetio
cb_description: Fleetio provides a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform which helps companies track and optimize their fleets in real-time. It helps organizations track, analyze, and improve their fleet operations. Its software offers centralization of information and provides features such as the process of ordering and purchasing fleet supplies to contact and fuel management. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Birmingham, Alabama.

name: Astraveus
cb_description: Astraveus specializes in the development of biotechnological equipment for the cell and gene therapy sector. The company's main offerings include a benchtop cell factory designed to streamline and optimize the process of cell therapy development and manufacturing. Astraveus' products are utilized by sectors that focus on biotechnology research and the advancement of cell therapies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: WP Engine
cb_description: WP Engine operates as a technology company specializing in word press hosting and related services. The company offers a range of services including managed word press hosting, e-commerce solutions, and headless word press solutions. It aims to facilitate effortless site management, performance, security, and support. It primarily serves sectors such as small businesses, agencies, developers, and enterprises. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Pepper
cb_description: Pepper is a company that focuses on developing software solutions for the hospitality industry. The company's main offerings include digital ordering, loyalty programs, and payment solutions that aim to streamline service and increase profitability for businesses such as restaurants, pubs, bars, and coffee shops. Primarily, Pepper sells to the hospitality sector, including the restaurant and quick service restaurant industry, pubs and bars, and coffee shops. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: WAVE
cb_description: WAVE is developing an audience interactive entertainment platform, providing film & content media, AR solutions, and more for the 16 to 25-year-old market.

name: Switchboard
cb_description:
Switchboard is a community-building classifieds platform. On Switchboard, members of close-knit networks ask for what they need and offer what they have to give. There are only two types of posts: asks and offers.

On June 29th, 2020, Switchboard was merged with Hearken.

name: CardiacSense
cb_description: CardiacSense is a privately-owned startup that develops bio-sensing technology, operating in the healthcare and technology sectors. The company's main offerings include a wearable device that monitors heart arrhythmias, utilizing PPG technology for continuous monitoring and ECG for instantaneous Electro Cardiogram readings. The primary sectors that CardiacSense sells to include the healthcare industry and wristwatch manufacturing industry. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Caesarea, Israel.

name: PurposeMed
cb_description: PurposeMed is a healthcare company focused on improving access to complex care for underserved communities. The company connects patients with specialized clinicians for personalized treatment plans and ongoing care, including pharmacy delivery and integration with the public healthcare system, all from the comfort of the patient's home. PurposeMed primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a focus on providing compassionate, judgement-free healthcare quickly and efficiently. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Calgary, Canada.

name: Baubap
cb_description: Baubap offers a mobile microlending platform for personal loans. Its platform offers loans to customers through its application without the need for documents or convoluted processes. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

name: Andros
cb_description: Provider of gas analysis components for use primarily in medical and automotive diagnostic applications. The company develops and manufactures infrared and fuel cell gas analyzer products for the original equipment manufacturer (OEM) markets. [Keywords: cleantech, energy efficiency, industrial products]

name: Brightseed
cb_description: Brightseed operates in the biosciences and artificial intelligence sectors, with a focus on discovering compounds in nature that can contribute to human health. The company's main service involves using its artificial intelligence platform, Forager, to identify bioactive compounds in plants and microbes and understand their health benefits. These bioactive compounds are then used to create dietary fibers and other health solutions for food, beverage, and supplement applications. The company was formerly known as Minotaur Bio. It was founded in 2017 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Cellink
cb_description: Cellink is a manufacturer of Bluetooth products for cellular technology and consumer electronics markets. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

name: Beanstock
cb_description: Beanstock is a company focused on simplifying real estate investment, particularly in the rental property sector. The company offers a comprehensive service that includes selecting profitable investment projects, financing assistance, property renovation, and rental management, all designed to facilitate a seamless investment experience for clients. Beanstock's services are primarily tailored to individual investors looking to enter or expand within the real estate market. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Figur8
cb_description: Figur8 is a company that focuses on musculoskeletal (MSK) health, operating in the healthcare and technology sectors. The company offers a diagnostic decision support system that uses sensor technology and artificial intelligence to accurately identify the source and severity of musculoskeletal injuries and provides real-time recovery visibility. Figur8 primarily serves the healthcare industry, including providers and payers. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Axiom Cloud
cb_description: Axiom Cloud focuses on refrigeration management in the software industry. The company offers software solutions that enhance the efficiency of refrigeration systems, predict maintenance needs, detect leaks early, and manage energy demand. Its services primarily cater to the grocery and cold storage sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Jose, California.

cb_description: Help Lightning is a company that specializes in remote assistance, operating within the software as a service (SaaS) industry. This service utilizes augmented reality features to improve real-time communication and problem-solving, particularly for the installation, inspection, training, servicing, and repair of complex equipment and products. Help Lightning was formerly known as VIPAAR LLC. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Birmingham, Alabama.

Vesta primarily serves multinational firms in diverse sectors including aerospace, food and beverage, logistics, electronics, automotive, renewable energy, and medical equipment. It is based in Mexico City, Mexico.

The company offers AI-enabled robots that provide a new way for food companies to enhance their production capabilities and meet growing demand. Chef Robotics primarily serves the food service and food production sectors, offering solutions to improve labor efficiency and maintain onshore supply chains. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

It primarily serves sectors such as events, heavy equipment, industrial, motion picture, sporting goods, storage, and tools. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

Octave primarily serves individuals seeking mental health support, with services tailored to meet the needs of each client. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Stark
cb_description: Stark Mobility develops smart electric mobility solutions for modern consumers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Trengo

Trengo primarily serves sectors such as financial services, hospitality, travel, automotive, energy, utilities, and retail, particularly e-commerce. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Utrecht, Netherlands.

Its humanoid robots are engineered to support sectors such as manufacturing, logistics, warehousing, and retail. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Sote

name: Reify Health

Reify Health primarily serves the biopharmaceutical industry, research clinics, and healthcare organizations involved in clinical research. Reify Health was formerly known as ZeroSum Health. The company offers a variety of products including memory foam and orthopedic mattresses, ergonomic furniture, and home decor items designed to enhance comfort and well-being. Wakefit caters to the needs of modern Indian households, providing ergonomic solutions and a range of furniture for different rooms in the home. The company's automated managed account platform uses technology and algorithms to advise, manage, and service clients who want next-generation investment services from their investment advisors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California. On February 2015, Upside was acquired by Envestnet.

name: One AI

name: Plex
cb_description: Plexinc is a multinational software development house, which aims to provide cost effective solutions to its customers by using rock solid experience in software engineering combined with open source and industrial standard solutions.

Airworks primarily serves sectors such as aviation, defense, energy, hi-tech systems, and space. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Rome, Italy.

name: alva
cb_description: alva uses Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology with sector analysts to provide an integrated intelligence solution to public companies covering their ESG, risk, reputation, and media profiles. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in London, U.K. In September 2022, alva merged with Ballast Research, Hamilton Place Strategies, Flag Media Analytics, Gotham Research Group, and Decode_M have merged to form Penta.

Adela was formerly known as DNAMx. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Foster City, California.

These technologies are designed to replace conventional chemical and energy-intensive water treatment processes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

CarSwitch operates primarily in the automotive industry, focusing on facilitating transactions between private sellers and buyers seeking used vehicles. VergeSense's solutions are built upon advanced occupancy sensors and AI analytics, catering to the needs of facilities operations and real estate teams. Its products are designed to align with key requirements and provide assurance across enterprises. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

The company's proprietary platforms and biomarkers enable the design and development of precision medicines to act directly on disease-causing genetic alterations. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

These services ensure that data stays protected at all times, with advanced encryption technologies that are resistant to quantum computing threats. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly health payers and third-party administrators. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

cb_description: CyVers provides detection and prevention of crypto attacks for web three and a decentralized economy. The company offers real-time detection and prevention of cryptocurrency attacks, using machine-learning technologies to identify suspicious behavior and automate corrective actions. It primarily serves sectors such as financial institutions, exchanges, and custodians. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Yokne'am Illit, Israel.

The company's main offerings include the supply chain management of natural rubber, from plantations and processing to distribution, catering to various industries that require rubber for products. Halcyon primarily serves sectors that demand sustainable rubber, such as the tire industry and other commercial and industrial sectors. It was founded in 1934 and is based in Singapore.

The company offers services such as project management, business analysis, software development, testing, AI, information security, and data analytics resourcing. Grayce primarily serves businesses looking to build sustainable talent pipelines in change and transformation, data analysis, and tech. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Manchester, England.

name: Dispatch
cb_description: Dispatch is developing an email product with project management features.  Dispatch aims to give team discussions a place to live outside of the inbox, so there is no need to hoard messages just to avoid losing track of things.

cb_description: Shipium is a leading shipping platform specializing in ecommerce and retail logistics. The company offers a suite of products that integrate with carrier networks to optimize shipping decisions, track shipments, and orchestrate orders, ensuring cost-effective and timely delivery. Shipium's platform is designed to improve the customer experience by providing accurate delivery promises and leveraging data modeling for informed shipping strategies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

The company's main services include the development of gene therapies and genome editing techniques to create innovative treatments for Inherited Retinal Diseases (IRDs), regardless of their genetic cause. These treatments primarily target the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

TradingView offers a suite of market analysis tools, including access to an economic calendar, collaborative trading ideas, and a custom scripting language for advanced charting. This technology primarily serves financial institutions, ranging from FinTechs to globally operating banks. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

The company offers safe and expert ear-piercing services, along with a wide assortment of high-quality earrings, aimed at enabling customers to express themselves through unique 'earscapes'. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

The company offers solutions that include real-time crime deterrence, remote guarding services, and video analytics for various sectors. Cloudastructure primarily serves the multifamily, office and commercial, and education sectors with its security solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Miami, Florida.

YardLink's platform serves as a centralized digital marketplace that connects construction sites with a network of local suppliers, aiming to improve organization, increase visibility, and reduce costs. name: Hornet
cb_description:
Hornet: a HTML5 mobile web application that facilitates the meeting of gay male escorts & their clients. 

Technologies such as GPS will be utilised. 

Hornet available through mobile browsers, will not have App store fees and restrictions.

Revenue through escort subscriptions advertising, client premium app functions, app downloads & mobile display advertising. 

Currently no such app in the market so Hornet has the opportunity to be first to market. 

Full business plan available.

name: Daye

The company offers a range of period care products and services such as organic tampons, menstrual pads, and vaginal health screenings, as well as a period pain clinic. Daye primarily serves the healthcare and wellness industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

The company offers a personalized sleep program, available through a mobile app, designed to help individuals improve their sleep and reduce sleep anxiety. The program, developed in partnership with leading sleep experts, uses strategies based on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy for Insomnia (CBT-i) and pairs each member with a dedicated sleep coach for personalized guidance. Watershed primarily serves the life sciences sector, enabling researchers and organizations to advance their studies and development pipelines. These insights assist individuals and organizations in planning for the future. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

cb_description: The Goodship sells top-shelf infused marijuana edibles to recreational marijuana stores across Washington.

name: UP
cb_description: Hybrid mode conference allows you attend both in person and online.

Its solutions cater to various sectors within the creator economy, including YouTube channels, marketing agencies, and independent creators. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

The company offers virtual assistants that understand and process natural language, enabling customers to perform banking transactions and receive personalized support without human intervention. Clinc's AI solutions are designed to reduce operational costs, improve customer satisfaction, and decrease reliance on live agents. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Ann Arbor, Michigan.

At the same time, churches and nonprofits are able to fully comply with the latest federal, state and industry laws while potentially reducing overhead and providing instant tax-deductable receipts. FlowPay is a cloud-based mobile payment platform designed specifically for the tax exempt non-profit market.

name: Choco
cb_description: Choco provides a free ordering platform connecting restaurants and their suppliers. It offers a messenger application that allows suppliers and restaurants to communicate via text to manage order mishaps. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

Simpplr primarily serves sectors that require robust internal communication and employee engagement tools, such as human resources, internal communications, and information technology. Simplified Financial primarily caters to business owners, families, and individuals preparing for retirement. It is based in Maple Ridge, British Columbia.

name: Calico
cb_description: Provider of software for communication management.

name: Vytalize Health

The company offers data-driven support and a virtual clinic to enhance patient care and facilitate physicians' participation in value-based care arrangements with Medicare. Vytalize Health primarily serves private practices, group practices, community health centers, and existing ACOs, aiming to improve patient outcomes and practice efficiency. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Hoboken, New Jersey.

name: Acin
cb_description: Acin specializes in operational risk solutions for the financial services industry. The company offers a platform that provides data quality assessment, risk management analytics, and access to a data network for peer comparison and regulatory compliance. Acin primarily serves sectors such as corporate investment banking, retail and private banking, asset management, and insurance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Inbox Health
cb_description: Inbox Health is a company that specializes in patient billing solutions within the healthcare sector. The company offers a platform that automates patient billing processes, facilitates patient payments, and provides HIPAA-compliant communication tools for enhanced patient engagement. Inbox Health primarily serves the healthcare industry, including medical billing companies and healthcare practices. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New Haven, Connecticut.

name: Abett
cb_description: Abett specializes in data solutions for healthcare. The company offers software and services designed to streamline data sharing, analysis, and management, enabling operations and better healthcare outcomes. It serves employers and digital health solutions providers in the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Refeyn
cb_description: Refeyn is a company that focuses on the development of analytical instruments, specifically in the life sciences and biopharma sectors. The company's main offerings include mass photometry instruments and consumables, which allow scientists to measure the mass of individual molecules in solution, providing insights into their function, structural composition, and dynamics. The primary customers of Refeyn are in the academic and industrial sectors, where its technology is used for biomolecular characterization. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Oxford, England.

name: Alkeus Pharmaceuticals
cb_description: Alkeus Pharmaceuticals operates as a biopharmaceutical company to focuses on the development of treatments for eye diseases. The company's main product is a selectively deuterated form of Vitamin A, which is being developed to treat Stargardt disease and Geographic Atrophy, two conditions that can lead to blindness. This product works by slowing the dimerization of Vitamin A, a process implicated in these diseases. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Knit

The company offers services that enable insights professionals to conduct research efficiently, providing both quantitative and qualitative data analysis, as well as video insights from a large Gen Z panel. Knit's platform is designed to assist in various research tasks, from survey design to data analysis and reporting, catering to the needs of brands seeking to understand their target audience. Knit was formerly known as PurPics. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Hearth
cb_description: Hearth has a smart-vent system that allows homeowners to control airflow and room temperature.

name: Bluevine
cb_description: Bluevine is a financial technology company that specializes in providing business banking solutions. The company offers business checking accounts with high-yield interest, accounts payable automation, and extensive FDIC insurance, as well as business loans and credit cards designed to meet the needs of small businesses. Bluevine primarily serves the small business sector with its suite of financial products. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Jersey City, New Jersey.

name: Evonetix
cb_description: Evonetix develops a desktop, short-latency solution to synthesize DNA to facilitate the field of synthetic biology, with applications across industries including healthcare, pharma, biotech, food and agriculture, and data storage. It leverages semiconductor-controlled synthesis on silicon which enables ultra-parallel DNA preparation, and moving capacity from remote service centers. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

name: Anchor
cb_description: Anchor operates in the boat rental and yacht charter industry. It provides a platform for private yacht owners to rent out their boats, facilitated by professional captains. The company primarily serves the luxury travel and tourism industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in St. Petersburg, Florida.

name: Lyra Health
cb_description: Lyra Health specializes in providing workforce mental health care solutions within the healthcare industry. The company offers evidence-based mental health care, utilizing AI-powered provider matching and a digital platform to deliver personalized support and treatment. Lyra Health's services cater to a diverse range of mental health needs, ensuring accessible and effective care for individuals and teams. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Burlingame, California.

name: SmartHelio
cb_description: SmartHelio specializes in solar assets through advanced analytics in the renewable energy sector. The company provides predictive analytics for optimizing solar photovoltaics (PV) plant performance and a climate risk assessment tool for long-term forecasting and investment de-risking in the solar industry. It primarily serves the renewable energy sector. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Prilly, Switzerland.

name: Novidea
cb_description: Novidea provides cloud-native, data-driven insurance management platform for the insurance industry. The company offers a solution that integrates front, middle, and back office processes to streamline the insurance distribution lifecycle, from quotes and upselling to accounting and claims, while providing actionable intelligence for business growth. Its platform is designed to serve insurance brokers, MGAs, and coverholders with access to data and insights. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Netanya, Israel.

name: Huel
cb_description: Huel manufactures and distributes nutritional powdered food. The base product, Huel Powder, aims to provide all of the body's daily needs in terms of vitamins, minerals, fats, proteins, and carbohydrates. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Hertfordshire, United Kingdom.

name: iECURE
cb_description: iECURE operates as a gene editing company. The company focuses on in vivo gene editing, a process that involves inserting healthy copies of disease-causing genes into patients' genomes, offering long-term, stable expression of those genes. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, specifically targeting rare, monogenic liver diseases. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Blue Bell, Pennsylvania.

name: JOOR
cb_description: JOOR is a digital wholesale management platform specializing in the fashion e-commerce sector. The company offers virtual showrooms, line sheet software, a B2B order management system, and reporting and analytics tools to facilitate wholesale transactions between brands and retailers. JOOR also provides financial services like JOOR Pay and access to digital trade shows through JOOR Passport. It was founded in 2010 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ledger Investing
cb_description: Ledger Investing is a marketplace for casualty insurance-linked securities within the financial services sector. The company offers a platform that connects risk to capital, utilizing proprietary software and data analytics to enable insurers to securitize risk efficiently and provides institutional investors with investment opportunities in a new asset class. Ledger Investing primarily serves the financial services industry, catering to institutional investors, insurers, and program administrators. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Extend
cb_description: Extend is a company that specializes in document processing solutions for modern software companies. Their platform enables the deployment of an in-house AI workforce to transform messy documents into structured data, offering no-code AI training and custom workflow automation. Extend primarily serves sectors such as real estate, financial services, supply chain, and healthcare. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Leucine
cb_description: Leucine specializes in artificial intelligence (AI) enabled compliance and quality assurance solutions for the pharmaceutical manufacturing industry. The company offers a suite of products that streamline manufacturing execution, quality management, and ensure adherence to regulatory standards. Leucine's platform is designed to increase productivity, reduce deviations, and maintain high compliance standards across various pharmaceutical manufacturing processes. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Zyla
cb_description: Zyla provides access to healthcare in India. Its platform offers personalized care across a wide spectrum of medical, physical, and mental health needs. These include health risk assessment and personalized care journeys ranging from chronic disease management to wellness programs. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Grafana Labs
cb_description: Grafana Labs specializes in open observability platforms for monitoring and visualizing operational data across various industries. The company offers solutions for log aggregation, data visualization, distributed tracing, and metrics backend, enabling users to monitor and analyze their operational performance. Grafana Labs provides both fully managed cloud services and self-managed enterprise solutions to cater to different customer needs. Grafana Labs was formerly known as Raintank. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Deepcell
cb_description: Deepcell specializes in single cell analysis within the biotechnology sector, focusing on innovations in microfluidics, optics, and artificial intelligence. The company offers the REM-I platform, which combines label-free imaging, deep learning, and gentle sorting to provide high-dimensional quantitative analysis of single cell morphology. Deepcell primarily serves the biomedical research industry, where its technology aids in the diagnosis and treatment of diseases. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Terramera
cb_description: Terramera operates as a clean technology company to focuses on sustainable agriculture. The company offers biological crop protection formulations and advanced soil intelligence technologies, aiming to increase global yields while decreasing synthetic chemical loads. Its main services include the development of natural products for consumers and farmers, using data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. Primarily it caters to the agriculture industry. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

name: Shoreline
cb_description: Shoreline is a company that focuses on providing intelligent simulation and optimization solutions for the wind energy sector. The company's main services include the development of software that simulates complex supply chain, field service, workflow, and asset performance scenarios for wind energy projects. This software aids in project development, construction and maintenance work scheduling, resource management, and reporting, ultimately aiming to reduce risk and increase efficiency and production in wind energy operations. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stavanger, Norway.

name: Snappr
cb_description: Snappr is a company specializing in on-demand photography and visual content creation services within the photography and technology sectors. The company offers a platform for booking professional photoshoots, editing services, and tools for automating visual content production at scale. Snappr caters to a diverse clientele, including large corporations and marketplace companies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Cylus
cb_description: Cylus specializes in rail cybersecurity. The company offers a cybersecurity solution that provides continuous monitoring and real-time protection for the global railway industry, ensuring the security of all rail systems and enabling real-time threat detection, advanced forensics, and mitigation. It primarily serves the railway industry, including rail, freight, and metro companies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: 51World
cb_description: 51World provides a digital twin platform dedicated to creating a real, complete, and permanent digital twin world. It offers an enterprise metaverse, a simulation test system for autonomous driving, a world developers platform for digital twins, and more. It serves various industries like smart cities, parks, automobiles and transportation, water, port, aviation, energy, real estate, and more. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Beijing, China.

name: Galena
cb_description: Galena is a pioneer in the distribution of pharmaceutical ingredients and functional actives within the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers exclusive and innovative solutions that cater to the demanding sectors of nutrition, pharmaceuticals, veterinary, and cosmetics. Galena Industrial represents top laboratories from various countries, providing a broad portfolio of ingredients to the Brazilian market, ensuring maximum reliability and access to the latest and most advanced active principles. It is based in Campinas, Brazil.

name: Contraline
cb_description: Contraline is a clinical-stage biotechnology company focused on developing the first long-lasting, non-hormonal, and reversible male contraceptive. The company's main offering is a contraceptive technology designed to provide a non-hormonal option for male birth control that can be reversed. This product is intended for individuals seeking alternatives to traditional male contraceptives such as condoms or vasectomy. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Charlottesville, Virginia.

name: OneTrust
cb_description: OneTrust specializes in trust intelligence cloud solutions within the privacy and data governance, GRC, ethics, and ESG sectors. The company offers a platform that provides visibility, action, and automation across various domains including privacy management, data discovery and security, and compliance with regulatory requirements. OneTrust's platform is designed to help organizations manage data sprawl, ensure compliance, and foster a culture of trust and transparency. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: QphoX
cb_description: QphoX operates in the quantum technology industry. The company's main offering is a quantum transducer, a device that enables the conversion of quantum information between different frequencies. This technology primarily serves the quantum computing industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Delft, Netherlands.

name: Trialbee
cb_description: Trialbee focuses on streamlining patient recruitment for clinical trials within the healthcare sector. It offers a suite of solutions including a centralized recruitment platform, precision recruitment services, and omnichannel patient engagement strategies. Its main clientele includes organizations conducting clinical trials seeking efficient and effective patient enrollment. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Malmo, Sweden.

name: Pando
cb_description: Pando is a tech news site that aims to be a site-of-record for the startup root-system and everything that springs up from it, cycle-after-cycle.  In November 2013, PandoDaily was renamed Pando after acquiring the talent of NSFW Corp which was founded by Paul Carr.

name: Anine Bing
cb_description: Anine Bing operates a fashion and lifestyle company. It offers luxurious clothing and accessories made with leather, silk, linen, cashmere, 14karat gold, and more. It offers accessories such as shoes, handbags, jewelry, sunglasses, and more, and apparel including dresses, tops, denim, sweaters, pants, jumpsuits, skirts, outerwear, sportware, and more. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Grid
cb_description: Grid is a sandbox for ideas.

name: Flexciton
cb_description: Flexciton is a company that focuses on optimizing semiconductor wafer fabrication, operating within the technology and manufacturing sectors. The company offers an intelligent platform that analyzes and selects the best manufacturing options from a multitude of possibilities, taking into account unique characteristics and constraints of the fabrication facility to provide an optimized schedule. Flexciton primarily serves the semiconductor manufacturing industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, England.

name: Unique
cb_description: Unique is a startup that develops cell therapies for cancer.

name: Hertility
cb_description: Hertility is a women's health company focusing on reproductive healthcare and diagnostics. The company offers at-home hormone and fertility tests, personalized health assessments, and access to specialist gynecological care. Hertility primarily serves individuals seeking insights into their reproductive health, fertility options, and hormonal well-being. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Machinations
cb_description: Machinations specializes in creating digital twins for various systems and processes across multiple sectors, with a focus on game design and balancing. The company offers a cloud-based platform that enables users to design, predict, and balance systems using tools like Monte Carlo simulations and AI optimization without the need for coding. While originally developed for the gaming industry, Machinations' services are now utilized in fields such as finance, healthcare, and e-commerce. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mamer, Luxembourg.

name: Libre Foods
cb_description: Libre Foods focuses on the food industry. The company develops food alternatives using fermentation technologies to create fibers from filamentous fungi that resemble the muscle fibers in animal meat. Its fungi-based products are designed to offer a sustainable and regenerative approach to food production. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Pixalate
cb_description: Pixalate is a market-leading company focused on fraud protection, privacy, and compliance analytics in the advertising industry. The company offers services that detect and eliminate ad fraud across various platforms including Connected TV (CTV), Mobile Apps, and Websites, providing transparency, quality, and trust to the open web. Pixalate primarily serves sectors such as the programmatic advertising industry. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Qonto
cb_description: Qonto is a business finance solution specializing in banking, financing, bookkeeping, and spend management for small and medium enterprises (SMEs) and freelancers. The company offers an online platform that includes business accounts with Mastercard debit cards, invoice management, and tools for expense and cash flow management. Qonto primarily serves the needs of small and medium-sized enterprises, freelancers, and various associations seeking efficient financial management solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Payment24
cb_description: Payment24  focuses on providing fuel payment solutions in the financial services and technology sectors. The company offers a range of services including mobile payments, loyalty and rewards programs, and fleet fuel management systems. These services are targeted towards sectors such as the fuel industry, banking, retail and convenience, and transport and fleet owners. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.

name: SmartCoin
cb_description: SmartCoin operates as an application-based consumer lending financial platform. It offers instant personal loans, gold rewards, gold savings, and credit scores. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Reejig
cb_description: Reejig is an award-winning workforce intelligence platform that specializes in optimizing talent decisions across various industries. The company offers a suite of tools for gaining visibility into workforce capabilities, mobilizing, reskilling, and retaining talent, underpinned by the worlds first independently audited Ethical Talent AI. Reejig primarily serves sectors that require advanced workforce planning and talent management solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sydney, New South Wales.

name: SuperAnnotate
cb_description: SuperAnnotate focuses on artificial intelligence and data management. The company offers a platform for building, iterating, and managing AI models using training data. It provides advanced annotation and quality assurance tools, data curation, automation features, and data governance. SuperAnnotate primarily serves sectors such as agriculture, healthcare, insurance, sports, autonomous driving, robotics, aerial imagery, natural language processing, and security and surveillance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: rready
cb_description: rready provides education solutions. The company offers an end-to-end solution for employee engagement, idea management, and execution, using gamified tools, proven methods, and software solutions. It expert network for employee coaching and upskilling. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Bruvi
cb_description: Bruvi is a company focused on providing single-serve coffee brewing solutions within the beverage industry. Their main offerings include a coffee brewer capable of making a variety of coffee beverages and biodegradable coffee pods designed for easy disposal and minimal environmental impact. The company caters to consumers seeking convenient, sustainable, and high-quality coffee experiences at home. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: GoJoe
cb_description: GoJoe is a health and fitness app focused on employee engagement and corporate wellness. The app offers inclusive team challenges, health insights, and resources for physical, mental, and social well-being to improve workplace culture and reduce health-related costs. It serves HR departments, business owners, managers, employees, and resellers in the corporate sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Liverpool, United Kingdom.

name: Group1
