cb_description: Group1 is an engineered materials company specializing in the development and commercialization of potassium-ion batteries within the energy storage sector. Their main offerings include the production of Kristonite, a high-voltage cathode material that enables potassium-ion batteries to deliver faster charging, enhanced safety, and higher energy density compared to existing battery technologies. Group1's products are primarily sold to sectors requiring advanced energy storage solutions, such as electric mobility and grid storage. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Jupiter Intelligence
cb_description: Jupiter Intelligence focuses on climate risk analytics. The company provides data derived from climate science, helping organizations manage, mitigate, and disclose their climate risk. It primarily serves sectors such as banking, insurance, real estate, and energy, among others. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Happl
cb_description: Happl is an employee benefits and engagement platform operating in the human resources technology sector. The company offers a suite of services including management of compliance and tax-related tasks, personalized insurance products, flexible spending allowances, and tools for managers to engage with their teams. Happl primarily serves sectors such as startups, scale-ups, and enterprises with a focus on automating and consolidating global employee benefits. Happl was formerly known as Tahora. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: INERATEC
cb_description: INERATEC focuses on sustainable energy and the chemical industry. It offers sustainable e-fuels and synthetic chemicals, which are produced in modular power-to-X plants that convert renewable hydrogen and greenhouse gases into substances like CO2-neutral diesel, synthetic waxes, or methanol. The company primarily serves the energy sector. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Karlsruhe, Germany.

name: SeeTree
cb_description: SeeTree operates as a company focusing on agricultural technology, specifically in the domain of tree health and productivity. It offers services that provide per-tree intelligence to growers, using advanced technologies such as machine learning and aerial data collection tools like drones and satellites, to monitor tree health and productivity. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Alma
cb_description: Alma is a platform that allows users to discover, engage and invest in non-profits that make a difference in their community. For non-profits, the Alma platform allows fundraising in a completely measured, quantifiable and ROI positive way.

name: DMC
cb_description: DMC Biotechnologies specializes in the production of bio-based chemicals within the biotechnology sector. The company offers a technology platform for the supply of environmentally friendly chemicals for various markets. It primarily serves sectors that require sustainable and affordable chemical products, such as the animal feed and personal care industries. DMC Biotechnologies was founded in 2014 and is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: Virtuoso Surgical
cb_description: Virtuoso Surgical specializes in the development of robotic systems for the medical sector, focusing on enhancing endoscopic surgery. The company offers a robotic surgery system that provides surgeons with dexterous, accurate, and cost-effective tools designed to improve the precision and effectiveness of minimally invasive surgeries. These robotic systems are equipped with needle-sized arms that facilitate operations in challenging areas of the body. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Nashville, Tennessee.

name: BuildUp
cb_description: BuildUp offers an on-site construction management mobile application. The company's main services include providing software solutions that help manage tasks, create and manage issues, and conduct inspections. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California. In June 2021, BuildUp was acquired by Stanley Black & Decker.

name: Hood
cb_description: Hood is a new-age social network focusing on pseudonymous interactions within the social media industry. The platform allows users to express themselves and discover truths without revealing their identities.  Hood was formerly known as Zorro. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: LingoAce
cb_description: LingoAce provides online language classes for students aged 6-15 years. The platform offers Chinese and English courses. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Evervault
cb_description: Evervault is a company focused on securing sensitive payment data within the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to tokenize payment information, achieve PCI compliance, and optimize payment processing, all while maintaining control and flexibility over their payment infrastructure. Evervault's solutions cater to a range of needs including card issuing, payment optimization, and secure data handling for developers and businesses. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Dublin 2, Ireland.

name: Abacum
cb_description: Abacum is a financial planning and analysis platform focused on automating and streamlining business growth processes. The company offers solutions for revenue forecasting, headcount planning, operational expenditure analysis, performance management, and investor reporting, all designed to enhance efficiency and strategic decision-making for finance teams. Abacum primarily serves sectors that require robust financial planning and analysis, such as SaaS, fintech, mobility, marketplaces, and martech industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Honorlock
cb_description: Honorlock is a company that specializes in online proctoring software and services, operating in the education technology sector. The company offers a solution that monitors exam sessions and alerts a human proctor if any issues are detected, providing features such as device detection, browser lockdown, ID verification, test content protection, and voice detection. Honorlock primarily serves the higher education and professional education sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boca Raton, Florida.

name: Inshur
cb_description: Inshur is an Insurtech company that provides digital commercial auto insurance. The company offers insurance for taxi, TLC, ride-share, private fleet, and private hire drivers, with a focus on insurance protection. Inshur operates as a managing general agent (MGA), pricing, underwriting, and managing insurance policies while also handling claims. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Hireology
cb_description: Hireology is a company specializing in recruitment automation and applicant tracking within the HR technology sector. The company offers a platform that streamlines the hiring process, from job postings and applicant tracking to new hire onboarding and employee referral programs, designed to attract and manage talent efficiently. Hireology primarily serves industries such as retail automotive, healthcare, hospitality, and professional services. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Veera
cb_description: Veera offers mobile focused internet browser designed to provide a safe, and private browsing experience. The browser offers an ad-free environment, tailored content, and features like a reward points system and in browser gaming, all for mobile users. Veera emphasizes user privacy with tools like incognito mode and kavach, a feature that safeguards user data from trackers. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: Ruedata
cb_description: Ruedata specializes in tire management software for the transportation sector, focusing on optimizing tire usage and maintenance. The company offers a data-driven solution that leverages analytics and machine learning to enhance tire lifecycle, reduce costs, and streamline fleet operations. Ruedata's software is designed to provide maintenance plans, centralize fleet data, and reduce tire-related thefts. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Hivebrite
cb_description: Hivebrite develops a community management and engagement platform in the technology domain. The company offers a customizable platform that provides tools for organizations to launch, manage, and grow their private communities, facilitating user engagement, independent networking, and revenue generation. It primarily serves sectors such as commercial enterprises, non-profit organizations, educational institutions, and professional associations. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Code Climate
cb_description: Code Climate focuses on software engineering intelligence in the technology sector. The company offers a platform called Velocity, which provides leaders with insights into various aspects of software engineering, including efficiency, code quality, and developer retention. The company primarily serves the software development and tech industries. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Hydrostor
cb_description: Hydrostor is a leading developer and operator of long-duration energy storage systems within the renewable energy sector. The company specializes in Advanced Compressed Air Energy Storage (A-CAES) technology, which provides a reliable solution for storing energy for eight hours or more, enabling grid operators to maintain power supply even without solar or wind energy input. Hydrostor's technology is primarily utilized in the renewable energy industry to enhance grid stability and support the integration of renewable energy sources. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: BigHat Biosciences
cb_description: BigHat Biosciences focuses on the development of advanced antibody therapeutics within the biotechnology sector. The company offers a platform that combines machine learning and synthetic biology to accelerate the antibody engineering process, aiming to produce safer and more effective treatments. BigHat Biosciences primarily serves sectors that require therapeutic antibodies, such as the healthcare and pharmaceutical industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: Nocion Therapeutics
cb_description: Nocion Therapeutics serves as a biopharmaceutical company focused on developing treatments for conditions arising from neurogenic inflammation. The company's main offerings include therapies that selectively target and silence inflamed nociceptors, aiming to provide relief for serious conditions such as cough, itch, pain, and inflammation without causing numbness or paralysis and minimizing systemic off-target effects. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Watertown, Massachusetts.

name: Crisp
cb_description: A small team working on RTB for Mobile Ads. More details soon to follow.

name: Mural Health
cb_description: Mural Health is a clinical trials technology company that simplifies the process for participants by managing payments, travel, and communication with trial sites. Mural Health was formerly known as Every Neighbor Deserves Kindness. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Berwyn, Pennsylvania.

name: Dispatch
cb_description: Dispatch is developing an email product with project management features.  Dispatch aims to give team discussions a place to live outside of the inbox, so there is no need to hoard messages just to avoid losing track of things.

name: Acalvio
cb_description: Acalvio is a company specializing in cyber deception technology within the cybersecurity sector. Its main offerings include an Active Defense Platform that provides advanced threat defense and identity threat detection and response, utilizing autonomous deception technology and artificial intelligence. The company primarily serves the IT, OT, and cloud security sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Porter
cb_description: Porter, now known as Finta, specializes in financial management software for startups. The company offers a comprehensive platform that simplifies taxes, bookkeeping, and financial insights for its users. Finta primarily serves founders and operators from inception to scale, providing tools to manage financial metrics without the need for extensive accounting knowledge. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: iCOMAT
cb_description: iCOMAT is a company focused on advanced manufacturing processes for the production of carbon fibre composites in the aerospace, automotive, and marine sectors. The company offers a patented manufacturing process featuring their Rapid Tow Shearing (RTS) technology, which enables the creation of defect-free, lightweight composite structures with optimised mechanical properties. iCOMAT's technology allows for the steering of carbon fibre tapes along curved paths without generating defects, resulting in more efficient components and reduced production costs. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bristol, United Kingdom.

name: LangChain
cb_description: LangChain specializes in the development of large language model (LLM) applications, providing a suite of products that support developers throughout the application lifecycle. It offers a framework for building context-aware, reasoning applications, tools for debugging, testing, and monitoring app performance, and solutions for deploying APIs with ease. It was founded in 2022 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Caramel
cb_description: Caramel provides a platform that facilitates private used car sales within the automotive industry. It facilitates the transaction process by handling DMV paperwork, offering identity verification, and providing secure payment services. It also offers optional services such as financing, insurance, vehicle protection plans, and delivery options to buyers and sellers in the private car market. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Encino, California.

name: Bayzat
cb_description: Bayzat offers a human resource (HR) and employee benefits platform. The company helps organizations deliver employee experiences by automating their insurance, payroll, and human resource administration processes. It also provides medical policies and manages group health insurance for companies. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Invisible
cb_description: Invisible is an operations innovation company that specializes in integrating artificial intelligence and human intelligence to enhance business operations. The company offers a process orchestration platform that combines generative AI, numerous integrations, and a global network of trained experts to provide managed services for operational challenges. Invisible primarily serves sectors such as artificial intelligence, financial services, healthcare, insurance, eCommerce, and technology. Invisible was formerly known as Socrates X. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Resistant AI
cb_description: Resistant AI deals with automated financial risk and compliance systems. It offers products such as document forensics, which authenticates documents with artificial intelligence (AI) to detect fraud, and transactions forensics, which helps simplify fraud detection, algebraic modeling language (AML), and scoring system. Resistant AI was formerly known as Bulletproof AI. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Prague, Czech Republic.

name: Mango Sciences
cb_description: Mango Sciences is a data science company focused on precision medicine within the healthcare sector. The company offers a data analytics platform that simplifies complex patient data to enable better patient care through advanced analytics and collaboration between healthcare stakeholders. Mango Sciences primarily serves healthcare providers, life science companies, and financial institutions with solutions aimed at improving patient welfare and healthcare delivery. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Vivid Vision
cb_description: Vivid Vision specializes in virtual reality software for vision care, focusing on the treatment of binocular vision dysfunctions such as amblyopia, strabismus, and convergence insufficiency. The company offers a range of products including in-clinic and at-home vision training systems designed to improve stereo depth perception and assist in the management of various visual disorders. Vivid Vision's solutions are used by eye care professionals and patients to conduct interactive exercises and assessments, with the aim of enhancing visual function and depth perception. Vivid Vision was formerly known as Diplopia. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Perception Point
cb_description: Perception Point provides cybersecurity solutions. The company offers advanced threat protection services, focusing on the detection, investigation, and remediation of threats across various digital channels such as email, web browsers, and cloud collaboration applications. Its services are primarily utilized by sectors such as telecommunication, food and beverage, technology, healthcare, finance, and insurance. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Button
cb_description: Button focuses on mobile commerce. The company offers two main services: Tap, which helps businesses build their mobile commerce strategies, and PostTap, which enhances mobile marketing across various channels. Button primarily serves the e-commerce industry, with a particular focus on affiliate and influencer marketing strategies. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Greenwich, Connecticut.

name: Coro
cb_description: Coro is a cybersecurity company. It offers a modular platform designed for information technology (IT) teams in various sectors. The company provides a suite of security modules that protect endpoints, emails, and cloud applications, and automate the resolution of security events. Coro's solutions cater to industries such as healthcare, finance, education, government, and more. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Wakeo
cb_description: Wakeo provides visibility for multimodal transport flows in the logistics and supply chain industry. The company offers a platform that consolidates all transport providers into one digital platform, using machine learning algorithms to calculate predictive Estimated Times of Arrival (ETAs) to anticipate and manage deviations or delays. It helps shippers, freight forwarders, and carriers improve customer experience and performance. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: ZeroAvia
cb_description: ZeroAvia specializes in hydrogen-electric propulsion systems for the aviation industry, aiming to deliver zero-emission flight technology. The company's main offerings include retrofitting existing aircraft with hydrogen-electric powertrains and providing the necessary infrastructure for hydrogen fuel production, storage, and refueling. ZeroAvia primarily serves the commercial aviation sector, offering solutions that cover a range of aircraft sizes and distances. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Hollister, California.

name: Reverion
cb_description: Reverion focuses on renewable energy and the decarbonization of power generation. Reverion's solutions are aimed at the renewable energy sector, particularly for use in agriculture and industry. Reverion was formerly known as BioCORE. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Eresing, Germany.

name: Side
cb_description: Side is a company that focuses on the real estate sector, providing a brokerage platform for top agents. The company's main service is to empower top-producing agents, team leads, independent brokers, and high-potential agents to create and grow their own businesses without the burdens of operating a brokerage. Side primarily serves the real estate industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Temporal
cb_description: Temporal develops an open-source programming model. It enables developers to build scalable and reliable applications. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Coverflex
cb_description: Coverflex focuses on providing flexible compensation solutions for modern businesses. The company offers a digital platform that helps businesses manage various aspects of compensation beyond salary, including benefits, insurance, meal allowances, and exclusive discounts. It primarily serves sectors such as technology, management and consulting, marketing, finance, accounting, hospitality and tourism, and health and well-being. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Braga, Portugal.

name: Finta
cb_description: Finta is a financial management platform specializing in accounting and tax services for startups. The company offers automated bookkeeping, tax filing, and a real-time financial dashboard to track key metrics. Finta primarily serves US-based, Delaware C-Corp startups. It was founded in 2023 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: HATCH Collection
cb_description: HATCH Collection is a brand that focuses on maternity and post-pregnancy clothing and wellness products. The company offers a range of maternity wear, nursing essentials, and beauty products designed to support women through pregnancy and motherhood. HATCH Collection caters to mothers looking for comfortable, fashionable options that adapt to their changing bodies. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York. In October 2024, HATCH Collection was acquired by Go Global Retail.

name: UpCodes
cb_description: UpCodes is a comprehensive platform specializing in building code visibility and access within the construction and design industry. The company offers a searchable platform that facilitates structured code research, compliance management, and project management tools to streamline the workflow for professionals like architects, engineers, and contractors. UpCodes serves as a centralized source for accessing jurisdiction-specific building codes, understanding code amendments, and enhancing team expertise in code requirements. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Revent
cb_description: Revent focuses on the resale of refurbished electronics, operating within the e-commerce industry. The company offers a range of products including mobile phones, laptops, tablets, wearables, and home appliances, all of which have been refurbished and certified for resale. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: AAZZUR
cb_description: AAZZUR is a company focused on facilitating the embedded banking revolution within the financial technology sector. It offers an open banking platform that enables enterprises, financial-service companies, and startups to integrate a variety of financial services through APIs and customizable front-end solutions. AAZZUR's main offerings include API integration for financial services, white-label solutions for branding, and a suite of Smart Finance Blocks for a seamless financial experience. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Spiral
cb_description: Spiral is a low-level messaging platform ready for the future of digital communication. One username. One protocol. All platforms.

name: Anyscale
cb_description: Anyscale operates as a unified computing platform. It develops, deploys, and manages artificial intelligence (AI) and Python applications using ray. It provides an open-source framework to scale machine learning (ML) and Python workloads such as data ingest, preprocessing, hyperparameter tuning, training, and model serving at scale. Anyscale was formerly known as Indigostack. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Impossible Foods
cb_description: Impossible Foods specializes in creating plant-based meat alternatives within the food industry. Their products include a variety of meat substitutes such as beef, sausage, chicken, and pork that are designed to mimic the taste and texture of animal meat. Impossible Foods primarily targets the foodservice industry, offering their products to restaurants, schools, and grocery stores. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: VideoAmp
cb_description: VideoAmp is a software and data company specializing in media measurement and optimization within the advertising industry. The company offers tools for planning and optimizing video plans, measuring cross-platform media performance, and enhancing return on investment for advertisers. VideoAmp primarily serves agencies, brands, and publishers looking to deploy media budgets more efficiently and generate more advertising revenue. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Snyk
cb_description: Snyk focuses on developer security within the technology industry. The company offers services that help developers build secure applications and allow security teams to meet the demands of the digital world. Its services include finding and fixing vulnerabilities in code, dependencies, containers, and infrastructure as code. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Reading, United Kingdom.

name: Viable
cb_description: Viable aims to provide next-generation video and text relay services for deaf and hard of hearing persons that are accessible wherever there is Internet

name: GoGuardian
cb_description: GoGuardian is a company that focuses on creating safe and effective digital learning environments in the K-12 education sector. The company offers a range of technology products that help educators engage students, support student mental health, and protect students from harmful or distracting online content. These services primarily cater to the education industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Crayon Data
cb_description: Crayon Data is a global leader in B2B AI solutions, focusing on revenue acceleration and data management across various industries. The company offers a full-stack, AI-native platform, maya.ai, which provides enterprises with tools for customer lifecycle management, data analytics, and personalized customer experiences. Crayon Data primarily serves sectors such as consumer banking, digital payments, travel, and consumer products. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Singapore.

name: FilmHedge
cb_description: FilmHedge provides credit and financing solutions. The company offers short-term loans for film, television, and other media productions, as well as data to track film and TV production financial data, interest rates, and the gurantee of producers and production companies and automate the performance reports for content investors. FilmHedge was founded in 2020 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Papercup
cb_description: Papercup specializes in AI dubbing technology within the media industry, offering solutions that enable video content to be watchable in multiple languages. The company provides human-like synthetic speech for videos, expert translation services, and facilitates distribution on major streaming platforms. Papercup's services are primarily utilized by content creators and media companies looking to expand their global reach and monetize existing content. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Sila
cb_description: Sila operates as a financial technology company focused on providing a payment platform. The company offers a range of services including fast money transfers, identity verification, fraud prevention, and bank account linking. These services are primarily targeted towards the fintech industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: LifeQ
cb_description: LifeQ specializes in health technology, focusing on biometrics and health information derived from wearable devices. The company offers solutions that provide real-time biometric feedback and non-invasive disease screening to promote wellness and disease prevention. LifeQ's technology is utilized across various sectors, including telemedicine, corporate health, insurance, and consumer wellness. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Alpharetta, Georgia.

name: Kaia Health
cb_description: Kaia Health specializes in digital therapeutics for musculoskeletal pain management. The company offers a platform that combines artificial intelligence, computer vision technology, and human medical expertise to provide personalized therapy and pain management solutions. Kaia Health primarily serves employers, healthcare providers, and health plans with its digital therapy solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Taskbase
cb_description: Taskbase specializes in informative feedback technologies within the edtech industry. The company offers AI-powered tools that enable personalized feedback, intelligent tutoring, and automated content creation to enhance digital learning experiences. Taskbase's solutions are designed to support adaptive learning for educational developers, publishers, and organizations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Plastomics
cb_description: Plastomics specializes in advanced trait delivery technology for the agricultural sector, focusing on genetic modifications that enhance plant resilience and yield. The company's main offerings include a chloroplast-based platform for inserting beneficial traits into crops, which allows for the expression of traits and the development of plants with increased resistance to environmental stressors. Plastomics' technology also facilitates product development for seed companies, with benefits such as trait insertion and trait stacking in the breeding cycle. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Zomentum
cb_description: Zomentum is a company focused on providing a comprehensive sales CRM platform with integrated quoting and e-signature capabilities for the managed service provider (MSP) industry. The company offers a suite of tools for recurring payments collection and management, vendor license management, and billing reconciliations, designed to streamline the sales process and enhance revenue growth for technology service providers. Zomentum's platform is tailored to support various sectors within the technology service industry, including MSPs, MSSPs, VARs, SIs, CSPs, UCaaS and CCaaS providers, IT solution providers, and break-fix services. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: VIA
cb_description: VIA is recognized for offering solutions in the areas of legal contracts, cross-border litigation and eDiscovery, healthcare compliance, learning localization, and global product and brand management.

name: Kaiko
cb_description: Kaiko is a leading provider in the cryptocurrency industry, focusing on market data, analytics, and indices. The company offers a suite of products including trade data, order book data, derivatives data, and DeFi and blockchain analytics, designed to empower businesses with crypto data solutions. Kaiko's services cater to a diverse clientele, including financial institutions, crypto-native enterprises, and regulatory bodies. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Meatable
cb_description: Meatable develops a phygital platform focused on gated communities. It solves the convenience and freshness challenge in a meaningful manner by procuring directly from the fishermen/ farmers. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Faire
cb_description: Faire is a seller of ethically sourced items online. Its site works like other major online marketplaces--it's user-friendly and worldwide--but it exclusively sells ethically sourced merchandise. And, instead of being in competition with Fair and Ethical Trade retailers, producers, or wholesalers, it is trying to build a powerful platform designed to be the reliable "go to" for Fair and Ethical Traders everywhere.

name: Appetise
cb_description: Appetise serves as a meal planning and smart shopping solution that operates within the food and technology sectors. The company offers a platform where users can plan meals with curated recipes, generate customizable grocery lists, and shop for ingredients online. Appetise primarily serves individuals and households looking for meal preparation and grocery shopping process. Appetise was formerly known as MenuAid. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Christchurch, New Zealand.

name: Udaan
cb_description: Udaan focuses on the trade ecosystem. It operates in the e-commerce and B2B sector. The company offers a platform for small and medium businesses, traders, wholesalers, retailers, and manufacturers, providing them with insights into trends and helping them to scale their businesses. Udaan primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Venn
cb_description: Venn operates as a company focusing on providing digital solutions for real estate process management. The company offers a platform that automates every aspect of the resident lifecycle, from pre-lease to move-outs and provides tools for managing these processes in one central platform. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: M2X Energy
cb_description: M2X Energy focuses on addressing climate change and reducing greenhouse gas emissions in the energy sector. The company's main service involves converting natural gas that is typically flared into environmentally economically viable chemical products, specifically through the production of green methanol. M2X Energy primarily serves the energy industry, with a particular focus on mitigating the environmental impact of natural gas flaring. M2X Energy was formerly known as Obantarla. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Rockledge, Florida.

name: Sdui
cb_description: Sdui specializes in digital education technologies for schools and daycare centers. The company offers general data protection regulation (GDPR) compliant communication and organization solutions that facilitate interaction among teachers, parents, and children, and support the infrastructure for digital learning. Sdui primarily serves the education technology sector with its products and services. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Koblenz, Germany.

name: Marpipe
cb_description: Marpipe focuses on creative automation and multivariate testing in the advertising industry. The company offers services that transform product feeds into dynamic advertisement creatives and provide tools for extensive creative testing at a large scale. It primarily serves the advertising and marketing sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Pixellot
cb_description: Pixellot focuses on automated sports production solutions. The company offers products to use artificial intelligence to automatically capture, produce, and distribute sports events. It aims to track the flow of play, identify highlights, create replays, and insert advertisements without human intervention. Pixellot provides an analytics and video editing platform that allows coaches to analyze games and obtain detailed statistics. The company primarily serves sports organizations, leagues, clubs, venues, and coaching solution providers. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Petah Tikva, Israel.

name: Metric
cb_description: Metric is a company that focuses on providing financial analytics and operational software for digital agencies. Its main services include resource planning, project budgeting, and financial analytics, all powered by artificial intelligence. The software offers real-time insights on various metrics such as revenue forecasts, profitability, and utilization, and it also includes features for sales, resource management, time-tracking, and invoicing. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Locad
cb_description: Locad delivers a cloud logistics platform for warehouses and local carriers. The company runs the storage, packing, shipping, and tracking of products through an international network of warehouses and local carriers. It primarily serves the logistics industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore.

name: Abode
cb_description: Abode, also known as Moved, specializes in streamlining the resident onboarding process for the multifamily real estate sector. The company offers a platform that automates move-ins, provides a property-branded portal for residents, and facilitates a hospitality-driven experience to enhance customer satisfaction and drive ancillary revenue for property managers. While primarily serving the multifamily real estate industry, Moved's solutions are designed to improve efficiency for property management teams and to offer a seamless move-in experience for residents. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Armalytix
cb_description: Armalytix is a data intelligence firm operating in the financial sector. The company provides services that allow consumers to safely share Open Banking and other data, delivering financial insights to firms. These insights assist firms in conducting efficient and effective financial crime and social responsibility checks. Armalytix primarily serves sectors such as legal and property, financial services, betting and gaming, accounting, and crypto and blockchain. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Orca Security
cb_description: Orca Security focuses on cloud security. It offers a cloud security platform that provides services such as identifying and remediating misconfigurations across clouds, protecting virtual machines, containers, and serverless functions, and monitoring and responding to threats across the cloud attack surface. The company primarily sells to sectors such as financial services, technology, government, retail, healthcare, and media & entertainment. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: AuDigent
cb_description: Audigent serves as a data activation, curation, and identity platform in the programmatic advertising sector. The company specializes in maximizing addressability and monetization of media for publishers and advertisers using privacy-safe, first-party data without reliance on cookies. Its services are utilized by various sectors including the ecommerce industry, real estate tech industry, and cloud computing industry. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CData
cb_description: CData Software specializes in data connectivity and integration solutions across various enterprise applications and infrastructures. The company offers a platform that facilitates data access and integration for enterprise apps, ensuring seamless connectivity and data flow. It offers a connectivity platform that provides views of data sources, governance, security, and query execution, alongside tools for automated data movement and replication across cloud, on-premises, and hybrid environments. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Chapel Hill, North Carolina.

name: Shardeum
cb_description: Shardeum is an autoscaling Layer 1 blockchain focused on decentralization. The platform offers dynamic state sharding to increase transaction throughput as new nodes join the network. Shardeum's ecosystem includes a variety of upcoming projects such as decentralized exchanges, file-sharing protocols, and gaming platforms, catering to developers and participants in the decentralized application space. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.

name: Aclaimant
cb_description: Aclaimant is a company that focuses on Active Risk Management in the risk management industry. The company offers a centralized system that enables businesses to manage risk more effectively by connecting risk management offices to incidents in the field, reducing the total cost of risk, and empowering employees with modern technology and automation. Aclaimant primarily serves sectors such as construction, hospitality, manufacturing, real estate, staffing, and transportation & logistics. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Diligent Robotics
cb_description: Diligent Robotics specializes in the development of autonomous service robots for the healthcare sector. Its primary product, Moxi, is designed to assist hospital staff by automating routine logistical tasks, enabling them to dedicate more time to direct patient care. Moxi operates securely and autonomously, providing services such as medication and supply delivery, lab sample transport, and other operational efficiencies around the clock. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Myro
cb_description: Myro is a company focused on sustainable personal care products in the consumer goods industry. The company offers refillable, plant-powered body care products such as deodorants and body washes that aim to reduce single-use plastic waste. Myro primarily sells to the consumer goods sector. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Qoala
cb_description: Qoala provides an omnichannel company in the insurance industry. The company offers a digital insurance marketplace that provides coverage for various areas such as health, life, tropical diseases, and vehicles, and also provides corporate insurance solutions. It serves the financial services industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

name: TPaga
cb_description: TPaga focuses on digital transactions, operating in the financial technology sector. The company offers a mobile wallet service that enables users to recharge their mobile phones, pay bills, make digital purchases, and invest in collective investment funds and cryptocurrencies. It also provides digital disbursement services for businesses, facilitating digital payments and immediate transfers. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Gaviti
cb_description: Gaviti is a company specializing in accounts receivable management and automation within the financial technology sector. It offers a cloud-based platform that streamlines the invoice-to-cash process, including automated collections, cash application, and credit management. The platform primarily serves businesses looking to enhance their financial operations and cash flow management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Senser
cb_description: Senser provides an artificial intelligence (AI) for information technology operations platform. The company offers services such as rapid incident resolution, infrastructure and application observability, service level objective (SLO) management, and change impact analysis. These services primarily cater to the tech industry, assisting teams in identifying and resolving service issues in distributed environments. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Fingerprint
cb_description: Fingerprint provides compliance automation technology. It specializes in the supervision and compliance platform for regulated businesses. The company offers a unified platform that enables regulated firms and compliance service providers to manage electronic communications data and voice surveillance and ensures adherence to legal and regulatory obligations. Fingerprint's platform is designed to support directly regulated businesses of various sizes and their compliance service providers and offers tools for risk detection, monitoring, and case management. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Haywards Heath, United Kingdom.

name: PropReturns
cb_description: PropReturns is a commercial real estate marketplace focused on facilitating investment, selling, and renting of properties. The company offers a platform for investors and businesses to make informed decisions on commercial real estate transactions, backed by verified data and detailed rental analysis. PropReturns provides a range of services including listing of pre-leased properties for investment, offering office and retail spaces for rent, and delivering comprehensive financial tools to calculate investment returns. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: AcadArena
cb_description: AcadArena builds student gaming communities to develop electronic sports games. The company offers scholarships for students, hosts electronic sports leagues for athletes, and provides a platform for community building among student gamers. Primarily it caters to the education and gaming industries. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Makati, Philippines.

name: LambdaTest
cb_description: LambdaTest is an AI-powered testing cloud platform that specializes in cross browser and mobile app testing. The company offers a range of testing solutions including manual and automated cross browser testing, Selenium script execution on a cloud-based infrastructure, and live-interactive app testing on Android and iOS devices. LambdaTest provides AI-powered visual regression testing and test intelligence insights, along with a unified test manager for enterprise clients. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Fixposition
cb_description: Fixposition specializes in global positioning technology for various domains, including agriculture, landscaping, and utility robots. The company offers products that enable real-time, accurate positioning by combining sensor fusion technology and global navigation satellite system (GNSS) ensuring operational reliability. It primarily serves the technology industry. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: BRCK
cb_description: BRCK is a company that focuses on telecommunications infrastructure, specifically in the domain of cloud-based solutions. The company offers enterprise-grade telecommunications services, including developer tools for integrating telecommunications capabilities into products and services, and SIP trunking services that provide high-quality calling at scale. BRCK primarily sells to small to medium enterprises in the telecommunications industry. It is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Origin
cb_description: Origin specializes in Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and Decentralized Finance (DeFi) solutions. The company's main offerings include a platform for NFT ecosystems, a yield-generating stablecoin, and a governance token that enables holders to earn fees from the growth of its DeFi products. It primarily serves the cryptocurrency industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands.

name: Mangomint
cb_description: Mangomint provides software solutions for the salon and spa. The company's main services include scheduling software that helps businesses manage and automate day-to-day operations such as appointment booking, client management, retail sales, staff management, and payment processing. It caters to the beauty and wellness industry, including hair salons, spas, nail salons, barbershops, and tattoo studios. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Zighra
cb_description: Zighra is a company that focuses on security solutions, specifically in the domain of continuous authentication and fraud detection. The company offers products that utilize artificial intelligence, behavioral biometrics, sensor analytics, and environmental intelligence to provide continuous multi-factor authentication, eliminating the need for passwords and securing user identities. Zighra primarily serves businesses looking to enhance their security measures and protect against various threat vectors such as remote attacks and phishing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Ottawa, Ontario.

name: TenureX
cb_description: TenureX offers a marketplace for financial institutions to trade in cross-border transactions. The company's platform offers banks and financial institutions together in a collaborative, technology-based, and business-oriented fashion, enabling clients to operate wire transfers. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. In February 2023 TenureX ceased its operation.

name: Incepto Medical
cb_description: Incepto Medical is a company focused on the intersection of artificial intelligence and medical imaging within the healthcare industry. The company offers a unified platform that integrates AI applications for radiology, assisting in diagnostics, image quantification, characterization, and reconstruction. These AI solutions are primarily used in the medical imaging sector, aiding healthcare professionals in managing the volume of patients and images. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Paris, France.

name: OQmented
cb_description: OQmented specializes in MEMS-based laser scanning technology within the augmented reality and 3D sensing sectors. The company offers integrated laser beam scanning projection display systems and 3D sensing solutions that are compact, high-performing, and energy-efficient. These technologies are primarily utilized in consumer AR glasses, automotive applications, and robotics. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Itzehoe, Germany.

name: Rightfoot
cb_description: Rightfoot is a provider of passwordless, consumer-permissioned financial data for the fintech industry. The company offers services that enable access to banking and credit data, such as account balances, transactions, and credit card information, without requiring customers to share sensitive login details. Rightfoot primarily serves the financial services sector, including lenders and fintech companies, by facilitating compliance, fraud monitoring, and enhancing customer financial management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Metomic
cb_description: Metomic is a company specializing in data security software for SaaS, GenAI, and cloud platforms. The company offers solutions for sensitive data discovery, data loss prevention, and automated policy enforcement to protect against insider threats and ensure compliance with data protection regulations. Metomic's software integrates with popular SaaS applications such as Slack, Jira, Microsoft Teams, and ChatGPT, providing a human-centric approach to data security. Metomic was formerly known as Flipstash Ltd.. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, England.

name: Juni
cb_description: Juni is a financial technology company specializing in modern banking solutions for finance teams within the ecommerce sector. The company offers a suite of services including business banking, spend management, financing, and accounting, all integrated into a single platform designed to streamline financial operations and enhance growth. Juni's platform caters primarily to ecommerce businesses, providing tools for real-time financial control and operational efficiency. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Blueland
cb_description: Blueland focuses on eco-friendly cleaning and personal care products within the sustainability and consumer goods industry. The company offers reusable and refillable products to reduce single-use plastic waste, including cleaning sprays, hand soaps, and other household cleaning items. Blueland primarily serves the eco-conscious consumer market, offering solutions for a clean home without environmental compromise. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: anywell
cb_description: anywell provides solutions to work remotely. It integrates enterprise and hospitality partner ecosystems to provide basic office amenities. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Ramat Hasharon, Israel.

name: ECO
cb_description: ECO ceased operations. ECO offers a carbon marketplace. ECO enables offset purchasers to select and bid on specific carbon avoidance projects, bringing complete transparency to the carbon market. It is based in New York, New York.

name: Ossium Health
cb_description: Ossium Health operates as a bioengineering company. It focuses on developing cell therapies to combat diseases of the blood and immune systems, using a new paradigm that involves the deceased donor transplant ecosystem. Its OssiGraft is a cryopreserved, viable bone matrix allograft containing cells in their native bone niche. It primarily serves healthcare providers, life science companies, and organ procurement organizations. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Simetrik
cb_description: Simetrik specializes in automating financial operations and accounting reconciliation processes within the financial technology sector. Its main offerings include a no-code platform that integrates and reconciles financial data from various sources, streamlining operations and business intelligence. The platform is designed to handle transactions and provides tools for reporting, monitoring, and compliance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Contractbook
cb_description: Contractbook is a company focused on transforming contract management through its software solutions within the legal tech industry. The company offers a centralized platform for creating, signing, and managing contracts, as well as tools for collaboration, tracking, and data extraction to streamline contract-related processes. Contractbook's solutions cater to various sectors, including sales, human resources, and compliance, by providing integrations with CRM systems, HRIS, and other tools to facilitate seamless data flow and improve operational efficiency. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Kbenhavn, Denmark.

name: Intigriti
cb_description: Intigriti is a global crowdsourced security provider specializing in continuous, realistic security testing within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform that connects organizations with a community of ethical hackers to identify security vulnerabilities through bug bounty programs and agile penetration testing. Intigriti's services are designed to integrate with existing security and development workflows, providing a cost-effective and simple solution for digital asset protection. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Antwerp, Belgium.

name: Arcatron Mobility
cb_description: Arcatron Mobility specializes in assisted living devices within the healthcare sector. The company offers a range of wheelchairs, including foldable, commode, shower commode, and travel wheelchairs, as well as related accessories, designed to enhance the lives of individuals with limited mobility. These products are engineered to provide independence and safety to the elderly and those with mobility challenges. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pune, India.

name: Gozem
cb_description: GoZem provides transport services. The company provides various on-demand transportation, delivery, and cashless payment solutions. It offers diverse ride-hailing services, including motorcycle taxis, car taxis, and tricycle taxis, as well as grocery and food delivery, logistics, and other e-commerce services. Gozem was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: Safehouse
cb_description: Safehouse specializes in digital security and privacy, offering solutions to protect users online. The company provides a suite of services that include real-time protection against threats, privacy enhancements through VPN services, and tools for monitoring and improving online safety. Safehouse caters to individuals seeking to safeguard their digital presence and personal information. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: PatientPartner
cb_description: PatientPartner operates as a healthcare-focused company. The company provides a platform that connects patients with physicians and other patients experiencing similar health issues, surgeries, or treatments. Its primary market is the healthcare industry. PatientPartner was formerly known as Rightdevice. It was founded in 2017 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: ID Finance
cb_description: ID Finance is a leading fintech company that specializes in providing sustainable and responsible financial solutions. The company offers smart financial solutions that enable individuals to manage their finances more effectively, including personal finance management, credit scoring services, and a Mastercard debit card with cashback rewards. ID Finance primarily serves the retail customer sector with a focus on personal finance management and credit solutions. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

name: Culture
cb_description: Culture specializes in bioprocess development and operates within the biotechnology sector. The company offers cloud-connected bioreactor services that facilitate cell culture experiments, enabling scientists to design, monitor, and analyze their experiments remotely. Culture primarily serves the biotechnology industry, focusing on applications such as protein therapeutics, viral vectors, and synthetic biology. Culture was formerly known as Culture Robotics. It was founded in 2016 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: flitter
cb_description: Flitter provides auto insurance services in the insurance industry. The company offers pay-per-mile auto insurance, meaning the less you drive, the less you pay. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France.

name: Rapyuta Robotics
cb_description: Rapyuta Robotics specializes in cloud robotics and logistics automation within the robotics and artificial intelligence sectors. It offers a platform that enables the development, delivery, monitoring, and scaling of robotics applications, as well as solutions that helps warehousing management through autonomous mobile robots and data visualization. Rapyuta Robotics primarily serves the logistics industry, offering technologies that streamline operations and improve productivity. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: Amp
cb_description:
Amp is the only completely open-access place to discover and share the best sustainability resources  links, media and documents  for students, professionals and social entrepreneurs.  

Amps mission is to organize the best information and resources available within the ever-growing sustainability sector, and be the starting point for individuals interested in harnessing the power of business to drive social and environmental progress.

Amps vision is to become the largest peer-reviewed sustainability resource directory in the world, dramatically increasing efficiencies and reducing duplicated efforts at a time when solutions are desperately needed.

We raised just over $30K on Indiegogo to build the beta version of our platform, which was released to the public August, 2013.

name: Abstract
cb_description: Abstract is a company that focuses on design collaboration and version control in the technology sector. It offers a platform for managing, versioning, and documenting design files, enabling designers to collaborate in real-time without losing the original work. The company primarily serves the technology and design industries. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California. In January 2022, Abstract was acquired by Adobe.  Abstract's valuation was not disclosed.

name: Juni Learning
cb_description: Juni Learning is a company focused on online education, specifically in the technology and STEM sectors. The company offers a range of services including online tutoring and courses in subjects such as coding, math, and college preparation. These courses are designed to be accessible and engaging for children, with a personalized approach that matches each student with an instructor based on their learning style and background. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: PassiveLogic
cb_description: PassiveLogic is a company focused on generative autonomy within the building automation sector. It offers a platform for the creation and management of autonomous systems for buildings, utilizing digital twins and artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance building management systems. PassiveLogic primarily serves sectors that require advanced building automation and energy management solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

name: Atropos Health
cb_description: Atropos Health specializes in transforming healthcare data into actionable evidence for the healthcare and life sciences sectors. The company offers solutions that support clinical decisions, optimize health systems, and accelerate clinical research by leveraging a vast network of patient records and analytics tools. Atropos Health primarily serves the healthcare industry, including health systems and life science companies, by providing insights for formulary design, quality improvement programs, and clinical trial emulations. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: AI Clearing
cb_description: AI Clearing specializes in construction progress monitoring within the construction industry. The company offers a SaaS platform that utilizes machine learning and drone-captured data to provide digital field construction progress tracking and 3D site reports. AI Clearing's solutions are designed to integrate seamlessly with existing systems, offering advanced 4D geospatial analytics and actionable insights through interactive dashboards and PDF reports. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Grain
cb_description: Grain is a multi-brand online restaurant operating in the food service industry. The company offers a range of services including on-demand meal delivery, wedding catering, and general event catering. Grain primarily serves to individuals and businesses requiring food delivery and catering services. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Singapore.

name: Studytube
cb_description: Studytube is a company that focuses on learning and development in the education technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive learning platform that allows businesses to consolidate, enhance, and manage their learning offerings in one central location. It provides services such as automated workflow, knowledge sharing and retention, employee development, and training organization. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Pass The Keys
cb_description: Pass the Keys specializes in short-let property management within the hospitality sector. The company offers services that include optimizing rental income, managing guest communications, and ensuring properties are listed across multiple platforms. Pass the Keys primarily serves property owners looking to maximize their earnings from short-term rentals. It is based in London, England.

name: Leena AI
cb_description: Leena AI specializes in providing an autonomous agent for enterprises, focusing on enhancing productivity and efficiency across IT, HR, and Finance departments. The company's main offering includes a Gen AI-powered agent that reduces the volume of support tickets by enabling a 70% self-service ratio for enterprise employees. Leena AI's solutions integrate with existing knowledge bases to centralize information access, identify knowledge gaps, and create content to address recurring issues. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Paige
cb_description: Paige is a technology company focused on enhancing braille literacy and communication for the visually impaired. They offer an innovative device, Paige Connect, which allows braille writers to share print translations with sighted individuals, facilitating collaboration and learning. The company primarily serves the assistive technology sector, catering to the needs of blind and partially sighted people as well as educational institutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, England.

name: Ondorse
cb_description: Ondorse is a compliance automation platform that specializes in KYC/B due diligence and AML risk scoring within the regulatory technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive solution that transforms manual compliance operations into automated workflows, including AI-driven remediation and smart onboarding processes. Ondorse primarily serves compliance and operations teams across various sectors, providing tools for risk management and client lifecycle management. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Paris, France.

name: what3words
cb_description: what3words is a geocoding system that simplifies location sharing by dividing the world into 3m x 3m squares, each with a unique three-word identifier. The company's main offering is a global addressing system that allows for precise location communication without the need for complex coordinates. what3words primarily serves sectors that require accurate location data, such as e-commerce and delivery, navigation, emergency services, and government operations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: PowerPlay
cb_description: PowerPlay is a family entertainment center focusing on indoor and outdoor recreational activities. The company offers a variety of attractions including arcade games, rides, laser tag, and go-karting designed for family fun and entertainment. PowerPlay caters to events such as children's birthday parties, corporate events, and group gatherings. It is based in Shawnee, Kansas.

name: Handoff AI
cb_description: Handoff AI specializes in artificial intelligence solutions for the residential construction industry. It offers a suite of tools that includes instant AI-generated estimates, a client management system, and the creation of proposals to streamline operations for remodelers, handymen, and fix-and-flip businesses. Its tools primarily cater to professionals in the residential construction and real estate investment sectors. It is based in Miami, Florida.

name: Haulio
cb_description: Haulio is a technology company specializing in the haulage industry, focusing on digital container trucking and first-mile transportation solutions. The company offers a smart digital platform that addresses operational inefficiencies by facilitating easy connection and collaboration among businesses in real-time. Haulio primarily serves the logistics and transportation sectors, enhancing fleet visibility and optimizing logistical processes for trucking and haulage companies. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Ultivue
cb_description: Ultivue specializes in spatial phenomics for the biotechnology sector, focusing on tumor profiling technologies. The company offers InSituPlex assays and AI-driven spatial image analysis to facilitate the development of precision cancer therapies, providing scientists with quantitative insights into the tumor microenvironment. Its main offerings include custom assay development, pre-optimized biomarker panels, and specialized image analysis tools. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts. In October 2024, Ultivue merged with Vizgen.

name: VRChat
cb_description: VRChat is a virtual world platform that operates within the social VR experiences industry. The company provides an environment where users can create, share, and engage in a wide array of interactive activities using custom avatars and worlds. VRChat primarily caters to individuals seeking social interaction and creative expression in a virtual space. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Habito
cb_description: Habito specializes in providing mortgage advisory services and operates in the financial services industry. The company offers unbiased mortgage advice, processes applications online, and uses technology to compare mortgages from over 70 lenders to find the best fit for customers. Habito also coordinates legal work and property surveys as part of its complete home-buying services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Berkshire, England.

name: Bamboo
cb_description: Bamboo is a food ordering application that allows users to order lunch and coffee in advance to beat the queue and have the goods waiting to be collected. The application also has a business-to-business (B2B) component in that it lets businesses supplement employees' lunches with credit to buy and collect from nearby food and coffee outlets. On January 10th, 2021, Bamboo was acquired by Fetchmyorder.

name: GOQii
cb_description: GOQii is a preventive health company that operates within the health and wellness technology sector. The company offers a smart health ecosystem comprising wearable health trackers, a mobile application, and personalized health coaching services. GOQii primarily serves individuals seeking to manage their health through technology and personalized guidance. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: Repeat
cb_description: Repeat is a digital platform specializing in the restaurant industry, offering a comprehensive guide and rewards program for dining. The company provides a mobile app that allows users to discover restaurants, access exclusive offers, and enjoy secure payment options. Repeat also offers services to help restaurant businesses grow and attract more customers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Jiko
cb_description: Jiko is a financial institution that specializes in leveraging US Treasury bills to provide banking and investment services. The company offers high-yield cash accounts, wallets, and 24/7 payment services, with a focus on safety and scalability. Jiko primarily serves businesses and individuals seeking modern cash management and investment solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: HeartFlow
cb_description: HeartFlow provides a digital health service platform for heart disease diagnosis and treatments. It offers a non-invasive personalized cardiac test that provides unprecedented visualization of each patients coronary arteries, enabling physicians to create treatment plans for their patients. The company was formerly known as Cardiovascular Simulation. It was founded in 2007 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Tylko
cb_description: Tylko serves as a furniture company, specializing in the domain of premium, customized storage furniture. The company's main offerings include personalized shelving, which customers can customize to their specific needs using advanced tech tools and proprietary software. Tylko primarily sells to the home furnishing and interior design industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

name: Kern Tec
cb_description: Kern Tec is a company focused on upcycling and food technology, operating within the food & beverage, cosmetic, and industrial sectors. The company specializes in transforming industrial byproducts, specifically fruit pits from apricots, cherries, and plums, into high-value ingredients and products such as sustainable oils, protein powders, spreads, and dairy alternatives. Kern Tec's offerings cater to businesses seeking innovative and sustainable ingredient solutions for their products. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: Purely Capital
cb_description: Purely Capital provides an entertainment payments platform. It focuses on the entire financial reporting, payments, and receivables processes to benefit all stakeholders. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom. In February 2022, Purely Capital was acquired by Pipe.

name: Juno Journey
cb_description: Juno Journey is an award-winning platform specializing in employee development within the learning and development (L&D) sector. The company offers a suite of tools designed to automate and enhance the professional growth of employees, including a learning management system and an AI-based learning experience platform. Juno Journey provides solutions for onboarding, training, compliance, and knowledge management, aiming to help organizations increase productivity and innovation. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Herzliya, Israel.

name: TMRW Life Sciences
cb_description: TMRW Life Sciences specializes in fertility technology, focusing on the automation of IVF laboratories. The company offers an FDA-cleared automated platform for the safe management and storage of frozen eggs and embryos, designed to provide traceability, accuracy, and security. TMRW's solutions cater to the needs of fertility clinics and their patients, ensuring the highest standards of care for reproductive cells. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: 3E Nano
cb_description: 3E Nano focuses on developing nano-thin coatings for energy and solar control within the materials industry. The company specializes in creating high-performance, non-toxic coatings designed to manage thermal properties and light transmission for various applications. These coatings are primarily utilized in the infrastructure and transportation sectors, as well as in custom product solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Mesh
cb_description: MESH is a house for entrepreneurs and creative minds in the heart of Oslo. It provides working and meeting spaces for today's innovators in 2 floor coworking and office spaces, a fully equipped prototyping workshop, 2 floor event spaces and cafes/bars.

name: Kwara
cb_description: Kwara is a financial technology company that specializes in providing a core banking platform tailored for Savings and Credit Cooperative Societies (SACCOs). The company offers a suite of digital tools that enable SACCOs to manage financial transactions, member services, and operational efficiency, all while ensuring compliance with regulatory standards. Kwara's solutions are designed to help SACCOs digitize their operations, maintain full control over their activities, and enhance member engagement through modern mobile channels. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: EngineEars
cb_description: EngineEars focuses on streamlining operations within the music industry through a vertical software platform. Their main offerings include facilitating discovery, managing payments, and organizing projects for artists, engineers, producers, and labels. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Gardena, California.

name: Fetcher
cb_description: Fetcher is a company specializing in AI-driven talent sourcing and recruitment process automation. The company offers advanced AI technology to source high-quality candidate profiles, personalized and automated email campaigns for candidate engagement, and smart analytics to track recruitment efforts. Fetcher primarily serves sectors that require knowledge workers, such as engineering, finance, product, operations, marketing, sales, and customer service. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Evvy
cb_description: Evvy is a healthcare company that focuses on women's health, specifically in the domain of vaginal microbiome. The company offers an at-home vaginal microbiome test that provides comprehensive answers from a single swab, and also provides integrative clinical care, including custom treatment plans, science-backed education, and one-on-one coaching. Evvy primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a specific focus on women's health. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Public
cb_description: Public operates in the media and entertainment industry. It provides news and updates on celebrities, pop culture, fashion, beauty, and other related topics. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Courbevoie, France. In January 2024, Public was acquired by Heroes Media.

name: Habi
cb_description: Habi develops a technology-driven real estate platform. Its platform reduces sales time, mitigates the risks facing sellers in traditional transactions, and eliminates the need for intermediaries by combining advanced analytical tools with human insight enabling clients to buy, sell, and improve homes. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: ENpower
cb_description: ENpower focuses on entrepreneurship education for children and operates within the educational services industry. The company offers a range of services including design thinking workshops, innovation bootcamps, and mentorship programs aimed at developing an entrepreneurial mindset and life skills among young adults. ENpower's offerings are designed to equip students with the tools to identify real-world problems and create innovative solutions, fostering a culture of innovation and entrepreneurship. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Maharashtra, India.

name: Shippo
cb_description: Shippo focuses on providing multi-carrier shipping software solutions in the e-commerce industry. The company offers services such as connecting to multiple shipping carriers, getting shipping rates, printing labels, automating international documents, tracking shipments, and facilitating returns. Shippo primarily sells to the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sift
cb_description: We write and curate news about the apps that change your life.

name: Iktos
cb_description: Iktos is an innovative company specializing in artificial intelligence solutions for medicinal chemistry and new drug design within the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers a technology platform that enhances productivity in drug discovery by providing AI-driven software for chemical research, including ligand and structure-based de novo drug design, synthesis planning, and multi-parametric optimization of lead compounds. Iktos primarily serves the pharmaceutical, biotech companies, and research institutes. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Ecomedes
cb_description: Ecomedes focuses on simplifying sustainable decision-making within the building and construction industry. The company offers an enterprise-grade SaaS platform that facilitates the selection of cost-effective, sustainable building products and ensures compliance with various green building standards. Ecomedes serves manufacturers, commercial real estate owners, and construction professionals by providing a comprehensive database for green certifications and automated tools for sustainability criteria search and compliance checks. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Watsi
cb_description: Watsi is a non-profit organization focused on funding healthcare for individuals worldwide through a transparent donation platform. The company enables donors to directly fund life-changing surgeries and medical care for patients, ensuring that 100% of donations go towards the intended healthcare services. Watsi's platform allows for one-time donations to specific patients, monthly contributions, and the initiation of personal fundraising campaigns. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: PathogenDx
cb_description: PathogenDx is a company focused on the development of pathogen testing technology, operating within the life sciences, food, and cannabis industries.
