The company offers testing kits, automation, and software designed to rapidly and accurately detect bacterial, fungal, and viral pathogens in plants, food, and human bodies. PathogenDx primarily serves the agriculture, food processing, and clinical diagnostics sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Selector
cb_description: Selector is a company focused on AIOps network monitoring and analytics in the technology industry. It offers a platform that provides real-time insights for managing multi-domain network and application infrastructures, including features such as anomaly detection, event correlation, smart alerting, and log analytics. The company primarily serves the IT operations sector. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: Radionetics Oncology
cb_description: Radionetics Oncology is a pharmaceutical company specializing in precision radiopharmaceuticals for the oncology sector. The company's main offerings include targeted small molecule radiopharmaceuticals that deliver radiation directly to tumors, leveraging their expertise in drug discovery and development to create new cancer treatments. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: FirmPilot
cb_description: FirmPilot provides artificial intelligence-enabled solutions to analyze competing law firms and automatically generate online marketing strategies such as various marketing content. It primarily serves the legal industry. The company was founded in 2023 and is based in Miami, Florida.

name: OTO
cb_description: OTO provides a two-wheeler digital commerce and finance platform for two-wheeler purchases, either on loan or by paying the entire amount outright. It offers an electric two-wheeler platform for those looking to buy electric scooters and bikes. It enables customers to buy vehicles and provides a scheme of monthly installments with a monthly rate of interest. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Primary
cb_description: Primary is a coworking and shared office space provider focused on combining wellness and work. The company offers flexible workspace solutions including private offices, coworking spaces, virtual offices, day passes, meeting rooms, and event spaces, all designed with wellness in mind. Primary caters to entrepreneurs and businesses looking for a sophisticated workspace that promotes productivity and well-being. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ripcord
cb_description: Ripcord specializes in document intelligence services within the technology sector, focusing on transforming documents into actionable data. The company offers digitization, data extraction, and data management services using robotics and AI to convert paper and digital documents into accessible and actionable information. Ripcord primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, finance, energy, and real estate with its document intelligence solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Hayward, California.

name: SumUp
cb_description: SumUp is a financial technology company specializing in payment processing solutions and point-of-sale systems for small businesses. The company offers a range of products including mobile payment applications, card readers, and business bank accounts, designed to facilitate transactions and manage sales. SumUp's services cater to various sectors such as restaurants, salons, spas, and retail, providing tools for appointment management, loyalty rewards, and inventory management. SumUp was formerly known as Ka-Ching Payments. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Terminal
cb_description: Terminal specializes in building remote teams by connecting companies with top-tier software developers. The company offers a platform for hiring elite engineers for full-time or contract roles, providing access to a global talent pool and streamlining the recruitment process. Terminal also manages payroll, benefits, and HR for the hired teams, allowing businesses to focus on their core operations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Waldo
cb_description: Waldo provides a mobile application to collect a holistic data set. The platform tracks users' time spent without any user input. It is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Shabodi
cb_description: Shabodi specializes in advanced network integration, focusing on the development of network-aware applications across various industries. The company offers an Application Enablement Platform (AEP) that facilitates the creation of vendor-agnostic applications capable of real-time interaction with advanced networks such as LTE, 5G, and WiFi 6. Shabodi primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, mining, public sector, and warehousing, providing solutions that enhance productivity, safety, and operational efficiency. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mississauga, Ontario.

name: Givebutter
cb_description: Givebutter operates as a fundraising platform that specializes in providing comprehensive solutions for the nonprofit sector. The company offers a suite of tools for donor management, fundraising campaigns, and donor engagement, all designed to help organizations raise funds more effectively. Its platform includes features such as customizable donation forms, fundraising event management, auctions, a mobile app for on-the-go fundraising, and integrations with various third-party applications. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: LiveFlow
cb_description: LiveFlow is a financial planning and analysis platform that specializes in integrating online data with spreadsheet applications. The company offers solutions that transform Google Sheets and Excel into live FP&A dashboards, enabling financial reporting. LiveFlow primarily serves sectors such as technology, construction, and franchises with its advanced reporting and consolidation tools. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Zenlytic
cb_description: Zenlytic is a company specializing in business intelligence and data analytics. They offer a fully-featured BI tool that includes dashboards, self-serve data exploration, and a GPT-powered chatbot for easy and fast data analysis. Their products are designed for both data professionals and non-experts, providing accurate and quick insights for better decision-making. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: XYZ Reality
cb_description: XYZ Reality provides engineering-grade augmented reality systems and project management solutions within the construction industry. The company offers a suite of services including quality inspections, progress tracking, onsite deployment, and managed solutions for construction projects. XYZ Reality primarily serves sectors such as data centers, mission-critical infrastructure, pharmaceutical facilities, and general construction. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Transcend Packaging
cb_description: Transcend Packaging focuses on providing sustainable packaging solutions within the packaging industry. The company offers products such as wet moulded fiber for replacing single-use plastics, digitally printed cartons for flexible supply chains, and takeaway containers. Transcend Packaging primarily serves sectors like the food service, food packaging, and health and beauty industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in South Wales, United Kingdom.

name: Cashflo
cb_description: Cashflo specializes in accounts payable automation and supply chain financing within the financial technology sector. The company offers a platform that streamlines vendor payments, ensures tax compliance, and provides supply chain financing solutions. Its services cater to large Indian businesses seeking to optimize their accounts payable processes and working capital. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Philo
cb_description: Philo focuses on providing a modern television experience in the entertainment industry. The company offers live and on-demand streaming services, allowing users to access a variety of popular television channels without a traditional cable subscription. It primarily serves the digital entertainment and streaming industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Amber Therapeutics
cb_description: Amber Therapeutics focuses on the development of intelligent bioelectrical therapies in the medical technology industry. The company's main product is a fully implantable closed-loop bioelectrical therapy designed to improve clinical outcomes in patients with functional disorders of the peripheral nervous system, specifically those suffering from both urge and mixed urinary incontinence. The company primarily serves the healthcare sector, particularly in areas with major unmet medical conditions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Instagrid
cb_description: Instagrid specializes in advanced portable power systems within the energy sector. The company offers portable power supplies designed to replace traditional generators with sustainable and reliable power solutions. These power systems are utilized across various sectors including construction, events, emergency services, and film and media. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Ludwigsburg, Germany.

name: LICK
cb_description: LICK specializes in premium pet apparel and accessories within the pet products industry. The company offers a range of items including dog bandanas, pet care essentials, walking accessories, and various pet-related merchandise designed for the comfort and style of pets. LICK primarily caters to pet owners looking for high-quality, fashionable pet goods. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Juan, Puerto Rico.

name: Lofty
cb_description: Hammerless, dba Lofty, is an expert-curated, online marketplace for valuable fine and decorative arts, antiques, and collectibles. Each Lofty item is reviewed and valued by Lofty's carefully selected network of experts, which includes qualified appraisers, current and former auction house specialists, reputable dealers, and other art world professionals.

name: Pitchly
cb_description: Pitchly provides a data enablement platform that transforms business data into actionable content within the professional services sector. The company offers a suite of applications and integrations to facilitate collaboration, automation, and productivity by leveraging data to create dynamic content. It serves industries such as banking and finance, law firms, executive search, and accounting. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Des Moines, Iowa.

name: LifeScore
cb_description: LifeScore focuses on the intersection of music and technology, operating within the music and artificial intelligence industries. The company offers a generative music platform that uses patented artificial intelligence algorithms to create personalized, endlessly varying streams of music based on studio-quality compositions and recordings. The experiences are tailored to assist with activities like sleep, energy, relaxation, and focus, and retain each artists unique fingerprint. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Wiltshire, United Kingdom.

name: Relevance AI
cb_description: Relevance AI focuses on enabling the creation of autonomous artificial intelligence teams and helping in business processes through its no-code platform. The company offers a suite of tools that allow users to build custom AI agents capable of automating tasks across sales, marketing, customer support, research, and operations without the need for coding skills. It primarily serves the business industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Surry Hills, Australia.

name: Hackajob
cb_description:
Hackajob offers a recruitment platform that matches people with jobs relevant to their skillsets and expectations. It provides a hiring platform for companies to grow their permanent tech teams. The platform mainly caters its services and offerings to technical-based companies and professionals. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in London, United Kingdom.
.

name: Convious
cb_description: Convious is a company specializing in attraction management with a focus on optimizing visitor experiences and dynamic pricing within the attractions industry. Their platform offers solutions for increasing online traffic, enhancing customer experiences, and implementing real-time dynamic pricing. Convious primarily serves sectors such as theme parks, zoos, museums, and wellness centers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.

name: Unified
cb_description:
Unified is an IT company providing outsourcing, fallback services, hosted backup, and more.

On August 18th, 2021, Unified was acquired by Previder. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: City Transformer
cb_description: City Transformer is a company focused on reshaping urban mobility through the development of transformable electric vehicles. The company's main product is an all-electric vehicle that can adjust its width and riding behavior to navigate complex urban environments, functioning like a car for safe and convenient rides, while also having the ability to park and maneuver through traffic like a motorcycle. City Transformer primarily targets city residents and shared and commercial fleets, aiming to revolutionize urban transportation. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Ritual
cb_description: Ritual is a health and wellness company focused on the development of daily essential supplements. The company offers a range of multivitamins and health products that are non-GMO, vegan, and third-party tested, designed to support daily health, pregnancy, sleep, stress relief, gut health, and skin. Ritual primarily sells to individuals seeking transparent and traceable health supplements. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Culver City, California.

name: KaiPod Learning
cb_description: KaiPod Learning is an educational organization that specializes in providing alternative learning environments for a variety of students. The company offers in-person learning pods that support online learners, homeschoolers, and traditional school students by combining personalized education with socialization opportunities. KaiPod Learning also extends support to educators through a national network of independent microschools, offering resources to start or manage learning centers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Fox Robotics
cb_description: Fox Robotics runs a company focusing on warehouse automation. The company's main offerings include automated forklifts that are designed to perform tasks such as trailer unloading, with the ability to install quickly and operate without the need for information technology (IT) integration. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Interlune
cb_description: Interlune specializes in harvesting natural resources from space, focusing on the space industry and the development of a universal economy. The company's main offerings include the extraction of Helium-3, a valuable resource for applications in quantum computing, national security, clean energy, and medical imaging. Interlune also plans to expand its operations to include the extraction of industrial metals, rare Earth elements, and water to support long-term lunar presence and in-space economic activities. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: TMRW Sports
cb_description: TMRW Sports specializes in integrating technology within the sports, media, and entertainment sectors. The company focuses on creating digital experiences that modernize how sports are played, enjoyed, and consumed, aiming to make sports more accessible and engaging for fans. TMRW Sports targets various sectors within the economy that intersect with sports and technology, such as digital media and entertainment industries. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Winter Park, Florida.

name: Spatial
cb_description: Spatial specializes in modern customer segmentation systems within the data analytics and marketing sectors. The company offers products that analyze social, mobile, and web behaviors to provide insights into consumer patterns and preferences. Spatial's datasets are utilized by industries such as retail, restaurants, marketing, advertising, commercial and residential real estate, financial services, and consumer packaged goods. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cincinnati, Ohio.

name: Deep North
cb_description: Deep North specializes in the creation of artisan doughnuts within the food and beverage industry. They offer a rotating menu of handcrafted doughnuts featuring sweet and savory flavor combinations. It provides specialty coffee to complement its doughnut offerings. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Tyne & Wear, United Kingdom.

name: Evabot
cb_description: Evabot specializes in sales enablement and gifting solutions within the sales and marketing industry. The company offers AI-driven tools that provide sales professionals with proactive triggers, personalized messaging frameworks, and multichannel outreach capabilities to enhance customer engagement and efficiency. Evabot also provides tailored gifting programs for employees, customers, and special occasions. Evabot was formerly known as Vizzi. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Carrollton, Texas.

name: One More Game
cb_description: One More Game is a fully remote startup focused on developing online games within the gaming industry. The company specializes in creating engaging social gaming experiences, leveraging a development process that emphasizes rapid iteration and player enjoyment. One More Game's products are designed to be fun and delightful, with a focus on playing with friends. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Preply
cb_description: Preply is a company that specializes in online language tutoring and personalized learning experiences within the education sector. The company offers a platform where learners can connect with tutors from around the world for live language classes, utilizing AI-powered tools to enhance the learning process. Preply also provides corporate language training programs tailored for businesses seeking to improve their team's language skills. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Brookline, Massachusetts.

name: Zero Networks
cb_description: Zero Networks operates as a company focusing on providing network security solutions in the information technology (IT) industry. The company offers a unified platform for secure remote connectivity and software-defined segmentation for on-premises, or in the cloud. This includes services such as blocking ransomware, segmenting assets, and applying multi-factor authentication. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: B12
cb_description: B12 is a company that specializes in AI-powered website building within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to quickly launch a professional online presence, complete with tools for website conversion, client engagement, and efficient business operations. B12 primarily serves professionals across various industries such as legal, consulting, and financial services. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Atsena Therapeutics
cb_description: Atsena Therapeutics is a clinical-stage gene therapy company focused on developing treatments to reverse or prevent blindness within the biotechnology sector. The company's main offerings include gene therapies using adeno-associated virus (AAV) technology to address inherited retinal diseases, with ongoing clinical trials for conditions such as X-linked retinoschisis and Leber congenital amaurosis. Atsena's pipeline also explores therapies for Usher syndrome, aiming to prevent blindness associated with this inherited condition. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Durham, North Carolina.

name: Darrow
cb_description: Darrow operates as a legal data security platform. It develops an artificial intelligence (AI) based data engine that ingests large amounts of publicly-available documents to search for class action litigation potential across areas like data privacy violations and environmental contamination. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: TreetoScope
cb_description: Treetoscope provides precision irrigation management. It offers an Irrigation Management Platform with advanced sensors and AI to provide data on crop water usage. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Mikveh, Israel.

name: Edgecortix
cb_description: EdgeCortix specializes in energy-efficient artificial intelligence processors and software for edge computing applications across various sectors. The company offers AI accelerators and a software platform that enables AI inference on heterogeneous systems, focusing on generative AI and dynamic neural acceleration. EdgeCortix primarily serves industries such as automotive, defense and security, robotics and drones, smart cities, and smart manufacturing. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: BlueSemi
cb_description: BlueSemi is a company focused on the HealthTech sector, leveraging Artificial Intelligence and the Internet of Things. The company offers a non-invasive gadget that provides key health vitals in 60 seconds, aiming to transform the way people monitor their health on a daily basis. BlueSemi primarily serves the consumer health technology industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in India.

name: dbt Labs
cb_description: dbt Labs focuses on data management and analytics in the technology sector. The company offers a cloud-based platform that enables data practitioners to build data models featuring version control, automated documentation, and integrated testing. dbt Labs primarily serves the data cloud platforms industry. dbt Labs was formerly known as Fishtown Analytics. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: proteanTecs
cb_description: proteanTecs focuses on enhancing the reliability of electronics through a cloud-based platform in the electronics industry. The company offers a solution that monitors the health and performance of chips by utilizing machine learning and embedded agents to provide insights and predict potential faults. This technology serves chip vendors, system vendors, and digital service providers by offering continuous visibility and predictive capabilities throughout the electronics value chain. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Haifa, Israel.

name: Pursu.it
cb_description:
Pursu.it is a platform devoted to micro funding for amateur athletes. 

It is a vehicle offering the world of fans and supporters a personal connection to amateur athletes on their journey to success.

The online platform is a collection of athlete driven projects looking for support for everything from the purchase of a new track bicycle, travel to their next competition, or support for altitude training in a remote part of the world. 

Each project has a personalized video and ask outlining the effect it will have on the athletes ability to achieve in their sport. Each project has a fundraising target and deadline.

We launched Pursu.it in October 2012 with five athletes from across Canada. To date weve featured 15 athletes and in total funded $120,000 to help make their dreams a reality. In July 2013 the platform will be open for international use.

name: Darmiyan
cb_description: Darmiyan is a deep-tech company specializing in brain health screening and monitoring within the healthcare sector. Its main offerings include AI-powered brain imaging software designed to detect neurodegenerative diseases at early stages and monitor patient-specific responses to interventions. The company primarily serves healthcare providers and pharmaceutical companies with tools for precise, personalized patient care. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Geomiq
cb_description: Geomiq is a company that focuses on digital manufacturing in the industrial sector. The company offers online manufacturing services such as CNC machining, injection moulding, sheet metal fabrication, and 3D printing. Geomiq primarily serves the engineering industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in London, England.

name: Coinsquare
cb_description: Coinsquare is a company operating a cryptocurrency trading platform. It enables users to buy and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies. Its products include Coinsquare Trade, coinsquare Pro, and Coinsquare Wealth. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Toronto, Canada. In July 2023, Coinsquare merged with WonderFi.

name: MedArrive
cb_description: MedArrive is a healthcare company that specializes in delivering in-home healthcare services and bridging the gap between virtual care and hands-on patient support. The company offers a range of services including chronic condition management, transitional care, and urgent care, all facilitated by a network of EMS professionals and integrated with telemedicine. MedArrive primarily serves health plans, healthcare providers, and patients, focusing on improving health outcomes and reducing healthcare costs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: LawVu
cb_description: LawVu is a legal operations platform that specializes in providing software solutions for in-house legal teams across various industries. The company offers a suite of tools for matter management, contract lifecycle management, and legal spend management, designed to streamline legal processes and enhance team productivity. LawVu's platform is utilized by legal professionals in sectors such as software/technology, financial services, healthcare, and education. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Tauranga, New Zealand.

name: MioTech
cb_description: MioTech specializes in artificial intelligence solutions for sustainability and Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) within the financial and corporate sectors. The company provides ESG data analysis, carbon emissions tracking, and energy efficiency management for financial institutions, corporations, and governments. MioTech's software and services are designed to assist in ESG reporting, carbon asset management, and advising on carbon neutrality strategies. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Pudong, China.

name: Section4
cb_description: Section4 is a company focused on providing business education in the e-learning industry. It offers a variety of online courses and programs, including business strategy, leadership, marketing, product management, and artificial intelligence, designed to upskill professionals in various fields. The company primarily serves knowledge workers across various sectors who require business upskilling. Section4 was formerly known as reb-media, Inc.. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Elevian
cb_description: Elevian is a company focused on the development of new medicines in the healthcare and pharmaceutical industry. The company's main offerings include medicines that promote recovery and regeneration, particularly a recombinant protein designed for the treatment of stroke in the days following the event. These medicines have the potential to treat and prevent many aging-associated diseases. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Allston, Massachusetts.

name: Sensibo
cb_description: Sensibo is a company that focuses on indoor climate and air quality, operating within the smart home technology industry. The company offers products that enable smart control of air conditioning and heating systems, as well as devices for monitoring indoor air quality. These products are designed to increase comfort, improve health, and promote energy efficiency. Sensibo primarily sells to the consumer market, but also offers solutions for businesses such as hotels, schools, and energy companies. It is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Misfits Market
cb_description: Misfits Market focuses on delivering organic produce and sustainable groceries, operating within the online grocery delivery industry. The company offers a service that delivers organic produce boxes, high-quality meats, seafood, dairy products, and other sustainably sourced groceries directly to customers' doors. These offerings aim to reduce food waste and provide a more affordable alternative to traditional grocery store prices. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Clackamas, Oregon.

name: VIPKid
cb_description: VIPKid is a global education technology company that operates in the online education industry. The company provides real-time online English immersion learning, connecting children with highly qualified teachers for personalized and interactive language instruction. VIPKid primarily serves the global education sector. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: Haus
cb_description: Haus ceased operations. Haus provides a social network app for neighbors. The application allows users to vote in neighborly polls, meet new people around them, and use their mobile phones as panic buttons. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santiago, Chile.

name: Pharmacierge
cb_description: Pharmacierge is an e-prescribing service provider operating in the healthcare sector, offering medication delivery solutions for private clinicians. The company facilitates the secure electronic creation and transfer of prescriptions, followed by discreet and reliable delivery of medication to patients. Pharmacierge primarily serves the private healthcare sector, with a focus on enhancing the prescription and delivery process for clinicians and their patients. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: Transit
cb_description: Transit provides financial support solutions within the transportation sector. The company's main service is offering transit cards to truck drivers to help them manage liquidity for essential expenses such as diesel, toll tax, and food, especially when they face delayed payments. It primarily serves the trucking and logistics industry. The company is based in Hyderabad, India.

name: Vizgen
cb_description: Vizgen focuses on pioneering the next generation of genomics The company provides tools for in situ single-cell spatial genomics, enabling researchers to gain insights into biological systems that govern human health and disease with spatial context. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Tenchi Security
cb_description: Tenchi Security specializes in cybersecurity risk management, focusing on third-party security posture management within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform named Zanshin, designed to provide enterprises with visibility into and management of cybersecurity risks associated with their third-party partners. Zanshin enables continuous monitoring and automated security testing to facilitate a cooperative and less confrontational approach to risk management, aiming to reduce vulnerabilities and improve overall security for both the contracting company and their third parties. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: GameTime
cb_description:
Game Time Play is basically a user-submitted database of games (things like tag, hide-n-seek, horse).

You can either search directly for a game, you can click the random button to have it suggest one for you, or you can click around in the various tags that are associated with each game (to perform pre-built searches basically).

Each game shows rules, the objective, tags, number of required players, and many other details (basically whatever we can gather around helping you to understand, try, and enjoy the game).

You can also favorite games that you like, which makes it quick and easy to find and view them again whenever you want.

name: Darwinium
cb_description: Darwinium offers a decision control platform that assists analysts and developers who work in fraud, trust, and safety and anti-abuse with customer interaction. The company serves various industries such as fintech and eCommerce. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Chime
cb_description: Chime is a social media platform that connects users with the people they care about. It allows users to create videos for conversations with family, friends, teams, and small groups. It is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Ladder
cb_description: Ladder focuses on fitness and wellness, operating in the health and fitness industry. The company provides daily workout plans and strength training programs, designed by coaches, that can be accessed through an app. These plans are tailored to fit into the user's schedule and can be done from anywhere, making fitness more accessible and convenient. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Elliptic
cb_description: Elliptic is a company specializing in blockchain analytics and crypto compliance solutions within the financial technology sector. The company offers products and services designed to prevent financial crime in cryptoassets, including real-time wallet screening, automated transaction monitoring, and cross-chain investigations. Elliptic primarily serves financial institutions, crypto businesses, regulators, and law enforcement agencies. Elliptic was formerly known as Bitxchange. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Syrup Tech
cb_description: Syrup Tech develops machine learning models predicting demand and optimizing inventory. The company offers an omnichannel decision support engine powered by artificial intelligence and machine learning using advanced machine learning models for demand forecasting and probabilistic optimizations of inventory. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Minka
cb_description: Minka focuses on providing design and consulting services in the real estate and community planning industries. The company offers services that range from home design to large-scale site planning and the integration of supportive services in the community. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lansing, New York.

name: Agicap
cb_description: Agicap focuses on cash flow management in the financial technology sector. The company offers a comprehensive software solution that enables businesses to monitor and forecast their cash flow, consolidate data from various bank accounts, and automate tasks related to financial management. Agicap primarily serves sectors such as manufacturing, restaurants, construction, real estate, agencies, retail, and private equity. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Lyon, France.

name: Lifebit
cb_description: Lifebit is a company that operates in the social media and personal development sectors. It offers a community-based personal diary platform with features such as challenges, quests, points, and badges, providing a social format for documenting life experiences online. The company primarily serves the social media industry. It is based in Philippines.

name: Durable
cb_description: Durable is a technology company in stealth mode. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Louisville, Colorado.

name: Notch
cb_description: Notch is a company focused on fitness technology. It offers a product that uses wearable sensors to analyze and track exercise form, providing real-time feedback to help users optimize their workouts and achieve their fitness goals. The company primarily serves the fitness and health industry. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Calm
cb_description: Calm offers healthcare devices to influence the brain and de-escalate rising stress. The company offers portable, fast-acting, and user-friendly tools that utilize pulses of vibration to influence the electrical activity in the brain, enabling patients to combat anxiety attacks and regain control. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

name: Mad Mobile
cb_description: Mad Mobile provides a platform that helps businesses digitize their customer experiences and increase sales, offering services such as mobile point-of-sale systems and customer relationship tools. Mad Mobile primarily serves the retail and restaurant industries. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Tampa, Florida.

name: Coreshell Technologies
cb_description: Coreshell Technologies operates as an battery solutions company focused on enhancing the performance of batteries in the clean energy sector. The company offers technology that improves electric vehicle range, battery safety, and overall performance, while also aiming to reduce costs without disrupting current battery manufacturing processes. Coreshell's solutions cater to various sectors including automotive, micromobility, urban infrastructure, industrial applications, and energy storage. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Leandro, California.

name: Sword Health
cb_description: Sword Health specializes in digital health solutions within the physical therapy and pain management domain. The company offers a suite of products that leverage artificial intelligence to provide personalized physical therapy, pain management, and health education, aiming to reduce the need for surgeries and pain medication. Sword Health primarily serves employers, health plans, and individuals seeking to manage musculoskeletal (MSK) conditions and improve overall physical health. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Draper, Utah.

name: Recess
cb_description: Recess specializes in internal marketing communications software within the business technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools for creating internal newsletters, conducting surveys, automating communications, and analyzing engagement within organizations. Recess primarily serves sectors that require robust internal communication tools, such as human resources, leadership management, and remote team operations. It is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Scribe
cb_description: Scribe provides configurable migration and integration software solutions. The company helps people within an organization share customer data so it can take action on critical business events. It was founded in 1996 and is based in Manchester, New Hampshire. In June 2018, Scribe was acquired by TIBCO Software.

name: Gynger
cb_description: Gynger serves as an AI payments platform that specializes in embedded financing for the technology sector. The company offers financing solutions that enable businesses to pay, manage, and finance technology-related expenses through a unified dashboard. Gynger primarily serves businesses looking to manage technology spending. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Omni Creator Products
cb_description: Omni Creator Products focuses on empowering individuals in the gaming sector by providing tools for game creation and interactive storytelling. Their main offerings include a platform that allows players to become creators, enabling them to build and share their own game worlds and narratives in an accessible and intuitive manner. The company primarily caters to the gaming industry, with a special emphasis on user-generated content and community-driven development. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Peddlr
cb_description: Peddlr is a Smart POS App that helps small and micro business in recording sales, log expenses and understand business performance. The app generates an easy to understand accounting reports. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Eastern Visayas, Philippines.

name: Appcues
cb_description: Appcues provides users with the designs and tools to educate customers about products via its user onboarding software.  It aims to allow teams to measure and improve product adoption without engineering effort by its clients. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Nawy
cb_description: Nawy operates as a technology-based information and services hub operating in the real estate industry. The company provides a platform for prospective buyers, sellers, and investors to search, compare, and transact properties, offering a seamless experience in the real estate space. It primarily serves the real estate industry. It was formerly known as Cooing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: Evercloak
cb_description: Evercloak focuses on material manufacturing, specifically in the cleantech and climate tech sectors. The company's main offerings include ultra-thin nanofilms that can reduce energy consumption in air conditioning and, transform seawater into drinking water, improve batteries and solar cells, and potentially help stop the spread of diseases like COVID-19. Evercloak primarily sells to sectors that are concerned with environmental issues and renewable energy. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Kitchener, Canada.

name: Doccla
cb_description: Doccla is a virtual hospital, specializing in the healthcare technology sector. The company offers remote patient monitoring services, utilizing medical IoT devices to monitor patients outside of traditional hospital settings, and integrates with electronic health records to streamline patient data management. Doccla primarily serves the healthcare industry, providing solutions to hospitals, clinics, and other medical institutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Educative
cb_description: Educative is a company focused on continuing education for software developers. It offers interactive courses that provide pre-configured learning environments which adapt to a developer's skill level. The company primarily serves the tech industry, specifically targeting software developers. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.

name: Jomboy Media
cb_description: Jomboy Media is a multimedia sports and entertainment company, operating primarily in the media and entertainment industry. The company focuses on creating and distributing original content such as podcasts, digital series, and television shows, with a particular emphasis on baseball-related content. It primarily serves the sports media sector. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Bronx, New York.

name: weka
cb_description: weka works in the garden world segment, which includes garden houses, terrace roofing, children's play equipment, swimming pools, and carports, and the wellness sector, which includes high-quality saunas and infrared heat cabins.

name: Dizzion
cb_description: Dizzion is a company that focuses on providing digital workspace solutions, operating within the technology and cloud computing industry. The company offers Managed Desktop-as-a-Service (DaaS), which allows organizations to engage hybrid, distributed, and third-party teams at scale, enabling employees to work from anywhere. Dizzion primarily serves sectors such as contact centers, healthcare, financial services, insurance, and retail. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Everstream Analytics
cb_description: Everstream Analytics is a leader in supply chain risk management, operating within the supply chain and logistics industry. The company offers predictive insights and risk analytics to enhance supply chain intelligence and sustainability, integrating with various business platforms. Everstream Analytics primarily serves sectors such as automotive, chemicals, energy, food and beverage, and high-tech industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Troisdorf, Germany.

name: Populix
cb_description: Populix operates a go-to-platform for research and data. The platform helps researchers to launch studies, grant ad-hoc projects, and subscribe to a curated and niche panel of respondents. It was founded in 2018 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

name: MakerSights
cb_description: MakerSights is a company that focuses on providing a Voice of Consumer platform in the retail industry. The company offers services that enable apparel, footwear, and accessories brands to collect and analyze consumer feedback at scale, aiding in confident product creation, investment, and go-to-market decisions. Primarily, MakerSights caters to the needs of the retail industry, including product, merchandising, and consumer insights teams. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Open Payments
cb_description: Open Payments is a financial technology company specializing in open banking solutions. The company offers a unified application programming interface (API) that enables businesses to connect with multiple banks, facilitating payment processing, access to account data, and cross-border payments. Open Payments primarily serves businesses looking to integrate financial services into their operations, offering tools for account reconciliation, compliance, and enhanced user experiences. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Thalamus
cb_description:
Thalamus is a destination for brands and agencies to source, evaluate, and connect with potential digital and mobile advertising vendors in the world.

On November 9th, 2020, Thalamus was acquired by Kochava. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Cyera
cb_description: Cyera is a data security company specializing in data security posture management (DSPM) within the cybersecurity industry. It offers a platform that provides visibility, risk context, and automated remediation for sensitive data across various environments. Its solutions cater to industries such as financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, retail & travel, and technology services. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Albert
cb_description: Albert is a financial services company specializing in automated banking, savings, and investment solutions. The company offers a banking app that provides services such as automated savings, investment portfolio building, financial monitoring, and budget tracking, all with the assistance of human financial experts. Albert's financial products are designed to be intuitive and affordable, catering to a broad customer base seeking to manage their finances more effectively. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Caresyntax
cb_description: Caresyntax focuses on surgical outcomes through its AI-powered, vendor-neutral surgical data platform. The company offers a suite of services that include operational analytics, clinical outcomes improvement, and financial optimization for healthcare providers. Caresyntax primarily serves hospitals, surgery centers, surgeons, perioperative leaders, insurers, risk managers, and medtech partners. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Larkspur, California.

name: Evreka
cb_description: Evreka operates a waste management company. It provides customizable solutions for the entire waste management steps with a service vision. It offers a waste dashboard and Evereka 360 platform for digital solutions for waste, recycling, route management, and waste material traceability solutions for sustainable companies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.

name: Kiva Confections
cb_description: Kiva Confections is a company that focuses on the production of cannabis edibles, operating within the cannabis industry. The company offers a range of cannabis-infused products such as gummies, chocolates, mints, and chews, all designed to provide a variety of effects tailored to different tastes and tolerances. Kiva Confections primarily sells to the legal cannabis market across multiple states. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Leandro, California.

name: Nectin Therapeutics
cb_description: Nectin Therapeutics operates as a biotech company focused on the development of immunotherapy agents for cancer treatment. It offers a diverse pipeline of targeted immunotherapies, such as novel immuno-oncology antibodies and antibody-drug conjugates (ADCs), designed to overcome resistance to current therapies. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus on oncology and immuno-oncology. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

name: SidelineSwap
cb_description: SidelineSwap is an online marketplace specializing in the buying and selling of new and used sports equipment across various sports. The platform offers a wide range of products, including gear for hockey, baseball, lacrosse, golf, skiing, snowboarding, football, and racquet sports, as well as athletic apparel and memorabilia. SidelineSwap caters to individual athletes, parents, coaches, and small businesses, providing a space to sell sports equipment, thereby promoting sustainability by keeping products in use and out of landfills. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Ecobean
cb_description: Ecobean focuses on sustainability and waste management in the coffee industry. The company's main service involves collecting spent coffee grounds and processing them into usable products, thereby promoting a circular economy and reducing CO2 emissions. Ecobean primarily serves the coffee industry, partnering with businesses to manage their coffee waste. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

name: Copado
cb_description: Copado is a company that specializes in providing a unified DevOps platform for Salesforce application development. Their main offerings include tools for continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD), automated testing, and agile project management, designed to help teams build, test, and deploy applications efficiently. Copado also offers solutions for compliance automation, data deployment, and security governance, catering to the needs of various roles within the Salesforce ecosystem, such as developers, testers, and release managers. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: RBC Signals
cb_description: RBC Signals specializes in satellite data communications within the technology sector. The company provides services such as global connectivity, spectrum services, and engineering services, managing communications and monitoring across various frequency bands. It primarily serves the commercial low earth orbit (LEO), government, and commercial geostationary orbit (GEO) sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Redmond, Washington.

name: Instrumental
cb_description: Instrumental specializes in the application of artificial intelligence (AI) and data. The company offers a platform that optimizes assembly, operations, and quality control processes in manufacturing, primarily for electronics. This platform uses AI to detect defects, analyze failures, and oversee factory operations, thereby accelerating time-to-market, improving yields, and reducing rework. Instrumental primarily serves the consumer electronics, industrial and communication electronics, and aerospace and defense industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Tazah Technologies
cb_description: Tazah Technologies provides an agriculture marketplace connecting farmers to businesses. It builds products to digitize the agriculture value chain, empowering farmers, suppliers, and retailers to grow their businesses. It offers Tazha Global, a platform for connecting buyers with Pakistani producers, and Taza Karobar a platform for digitalizing the agricultural value chain. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Lahore, Pakistan.

name: Julaya
cb_description: Julaya is a company that specializes in providing an online financial account designed to handle a variety of business transactions. The company offers services such as mobile money transfers, bank transfers, cash deposit collections, and features for real-time transaction tracking and financial management. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Abidjan, Cote D'Ivoire.

name: Hammock
cb_description: Hammock specializes in financial management software for landlords within the real estate sector. The company offers automated bookkeeping, real-time financial monitoring, and property tax statement preparation services. Hammock's platform is designed to track rental income and expenses, provide investment insights, and facilitate tax compliance for property owners. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Manchester, United Kingdom.

name: Grab Financial Group
cb_description: Grab Financial Group is the fintech platform providing digital financing solutions. It offers services including micro-investment, payment, insurance, and loans for merchants, consumers, and drivers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Singapore.

name: BRYTER
cb_description: BRYTER operates as a no-code automation platform sector, focusing on legal and compliance services. The company offers a suite of tools that enable professionals to automate conditional, and scenario-based decision-making processes without the need for programming skills. BRYTER primarily serves law firms, in-house legal teams, compliance departments, and procurement teams across various industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: PatPat
cb_description: PatPat is a company focused on the retail industry, specifically in the domain of children's and family clothing. The company offers a wide range of products including newborn baby clothes, toddler and kids designer clothes, family matching outfits, and home accessories. Their primary market is the retail industry, with a specific focus on the children's clothing sector. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: deepwatch
cb_description: Deepwatch is a leading provider of managed security services focused on cyber resilience within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers advanced threat detection and response capabilities, 24/7 monitoring, and optimization of security operations to enhance cyber resilience and reduce risk. Deepwatch leverages AI-powered technology and a team of expert security practitioners to improve clients' security posture and minimize alert volume and false positives. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tampa, Florida.

name: Puffer Finance
cb_description: Puffer Finance provides decentralized financing (DeFi) validation services. It uses anti-slashing technology to offer a liquid staking protocol with a focus on stake pools on Ethereum. It helps the DeFi member community with buffer pool node operations. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Cayman Islands.

name: Aligned
cb_description: Aligned is a company that focuses on providing high-performance computing solutions, operating within the technology and data processing industry. The company offers integrated hardware and software solutions that leverage proprietary architecture and technology, enabling organizations to process large data sets with unmatched speed and efficiency. Aligned primarily serves sectors that require heavy data processing and high computational power. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: NIRAMAI
cb_description: NIRAMAI focuses on the early detection of breast cancer using its proprietary artificial intelligence-based technique known as Thermalytix. The company offers a non-invasive, privacy-aware breast health screening test that utilizes machine learning algorithms to analyze thermal images for signs of abnormal lesions. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Institute for Future Education, Entrepreneurship, and Leadership
cb_description: Institute for Future Education, Entrepreneurship, and Leadership (iFEEL) is a business school that focuses on postgraduate management education. It offers a PGDM program with industry-certified specializations in marketing, finance, operations, and human resource management, designed to equip students with vital entrepreneurship and leadership skills. iFEEL's comprehensive education approach includes international study tours, corporate internships, and a Global Citizen Leadership program to enhance students' global exposure and employability. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Pune, India.

name: Retrocausal
cb_description: Retrocausal focuses on manufacturing assembly optimization through artificial intelligence in the manufacturing industry. The company offers a software platform that provides digital work instructions with step verification to reduce mistakes, enables continuous time studies and analysis to optimize processes, and captures every step of assembly for quality analysis and recall support. Retrocausal primarily sells to sectors such as automotive, medical devices, appliances and hardware, electronics, and defense. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Redmond, Washington.

name: Furhat Robotics
cb_description: Furhat Robotics specializes in the development of social robots and conversational artificial intelligence (AI) within the robotics industry. The company offers a range of social robots that can display human-like expressions and engage in advanced conversations, along with a software development kit (SDK) for programming these robots. Furhat Robotics provides solutions primarily to the research and innovation sectors, including academia and various industries seeking to integrate social robotics into their operations. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Contentsquare
cb_description: ContentSquare monitors touch and mouse movements on websites and apps to understand how these services are used. The company helps brands everywhere transform the way they do business, allowing them to take action at an enterprise scale and build customer trust with security, privacy, and accessibility. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Sensei
cb_description: Sensei specializes in autonomous retail solutions, providing AI-powered systems for efficient store operations within the retail industry. The company offers autonomous stores, pods, and cabinets that enable a seamless shopping experience without the need for scanning items or waiting in lines. Sensei's technology includes a proprietary platform and app that facilitate the operation of AI-driven retail chains and enhance the customer shopping experience. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

name: Torii
cb_description: Torii focuses on SaaS management in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that automates the discovery, spend optimization, operations, and compliance of SaaS applications, helping organizations reduce spend, manage SaaS sprawl, and free IT time from manual tasks. Its primary customers are in the IT industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: VIVID
cb_description: VIVID provides affordable homes and extensive support services in the housing sector. The company offers the development of affordable housing, various rental options, and tailored support services to sustain tenancies and promote tenant wellbeing. VIVID primarily serves individuals and families in need of affordable housing and support services. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Portsmouth, United Kingdom.

name: BayaniPay
cb_description: BayaniPay develops banking software to facilitate the remittance process for Filipino households. The company offers mobile services and provides global professionals working abroad to take financial care of their families and communities back in their home countries, enabling users to make cross-border payments. It was founded in 2021 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Scailyte
cb_description: Scailyte is a company focused on advancing precision medicine through single-cell science within the biotechnology sector. The company specializes in discovering biomarkers and designing companion diagnostics for immuno-oncology and cell therapies, utilizing artificial intelligence to analyze single-cell omics data for clinical insights. Scailyte's solutions are aimed at improving drug efficacy and personalizing patient treatment in the healthcare industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Basel, Switzerland.

name: Lightning Labs
cb_description: Lightning Labs operates as a software development company. It includes open-source, secure systems that enable users to send and receive money, as well as a series of verifiable, non-custodial Lightning-based financial services. It primarily serves the financial software sector. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: beek
cb_description: Beek specializes in handcrafted leather footwear with a focus on sandals, shoes, and boots within the fashion industry. The company offers a range of products featuring vegetable-tanned leather, molded footbeds for arch support, and timeless designs intended to improve with age. Beek's products are designed for individuals seeking comfortable, durable, and stylish leather footwear. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Newport Beach, California.

name: Opal
cb_description: Opal specializes in fitness technology, focusing on workout optimization and injury prevention. The company offers a unique thin film sensor product that collects data from sweat to provide insights into muscle fatigue, aerobic to anaerobic transitions, and hydration levels. Opal's products are designed for individuals seeking to enhance their workout experience through data-driven insights. It is based in Boulder, Colorado.

name: ROH
cb_description: ROH is a leading proptech company focused on providing software solutions for the hospitality industry. The company offers a platform that automates back-office work, facilitates event and group sales, and provides financial dashboards and data analytics to enhance revenue management and customer experiences. ROH primarily serves hospitality brands and property groups looking to optimize sales and finance operations. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Calendly
cb_description: Calendly operates as a scheduling automation platform that focuses on streamlining the meeting lifecycle for individuals, teams, and organizations. The company offers a solution that automates the process of scheduling meetings, eliminating the need for back-and-forth emails to find suitable times, and integrates with calendars to reflect real-time availability. Calendly primarily serves sectors such as sales, marketing, customer success, recruiting, information technology (IT), and education. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: OneOrder
cb_description: OneOrder provides business-to-business (B2B) technology-enabled supply and wholesale distribution services. It partners with local ranchers and producers to support farm-to-table initiatives. Its services aim to help reduce supply chain costs and related overheads for companies. It serves hotels, restaurants, and cafes (HoReCa). The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Cairo, Egypt.

name: BillionToOne
cb_description: BillionToOne is a diagnostics company specializing in molecular diagnostics within the healthcare sector. The company offers proprietary molecular counting technology that enables accurate detection and quantification of disease-related deoxyribonucleic acid at the single base-pair level, primarily for prenatal screening and oncology testing. BillionToOne's technology serves the healthcare industry, with a focus on improving prenatal care and cancer treatment through diagnostic tests. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: SustainCERT
cb_description: SustainCERT is a climate impact verification company focusing on carbon markets and value chains. The company offers services such as impact validation and verification for emission reductions and removals, ensuring that climate claims are accurate and trustworthy. SustainCERT primarily serves sectors like Apparel, and Food & Agriculture, providing them with tools to report on their value chain decarbonization efforts. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Luxembourg, Luxembourg.

name: Emma
cb_description: Emma is a provider of email marketing software and services that help organizations of all sizes get more from their marketing. Through tailored editions of its platform for businesses, franchises, retailers, universities and agencies, Emma aims to offer enterprise-level capabilities in a team-friendly experience that's simple and enjoyable. Key features include mobile-ready design templates, email automation, audience segmenting and dynamic content, plus integration with top CRM solutions, ecommerce platforms and social networks. Headquartered in Nashville, and with offices in Portland, New York and Melbourne, Emma powers the emails of more than 45,000 organizations worldwide, including Mario Batali, Bridgestone and Sylvan Learning Center.

name: HOMMA
cb_description: HOMMA focuses on creating residential living experiences through innovative design and technology. The company offers homes that combine architecture and technology to provide energy-efficient, comfortable, and modern living spaces. HOMMA primarily serves the residential real estate sector with a focus on healthy urban lifestyles. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Carro
cb_description: Carro provides an online marketplace for used cars. The company offers aspects of car ownership and uses artificial intelligence (AI) enabled technology for the car ownership lifecycle, including buying, selling, and leasing second-hand cars, all facilitated through an online platform. It primarily serves the automotive industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Midview CIty, Singapore.

name: Virtuoso
cb_description: Virtuoso is building a cryptocurrency exchange that will support ether futures, creating a more robust Ethereum trading market for institutional investors.

name: illumex
cb_description: illumex specializes in generative semantic fabric, operating in artificial intelligence (AI) and data analytics. The company offers a platform that streamlines the process of data and analytics interpretation and rationalization, enabling businesses to automate their unified business data language. Its platform helps data-intensive enterprises to support their data culture and digital transformation initiatives. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Shield AI
cb_description: Shield AI specializes in artificial intelligence for aviation, focusing on developing autonomous artificial intelligence (AI) pilots for various aircraft within the defense technology sector. The company's flagship product, Hivemind, enables drones and aircraft to operate autonomously without the need for global positioning system (GPS), communications, or human pilots, and is designed to adapt and react to dynamic environments in both military and commercial settings. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: SpinDrive
cb_description: SpinDrive specializes in the design and production of active magnetic bearings (AMBs). Its AMBs levitate the rotational parts of machinery, reducing energy losses and mechanical friction, and enabling maintenance-free operations. The company primarily serves the manufacturing sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Lappeenranta, Finland.

name: Pointivo
cb_description: Pointivo specializes in AI-driven asset inspection and data analytics within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that utilizes drone technology, computer vision, and machine learning to provide detailed inspections and actionable insights for various industries. Pointivo primarily serves sectors such as commercial and residential roofing, telecom, energy, and construction with its innovative inspection and analytics solutions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Avataar
cb_description: Avataar specializes in providing AI for spatial storytelling within the technology sector. It offers a platform for building 3D stories and videos. It serves the furniture, electronics, footwear, and marketplace sectors. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: BeatO
cb_description: BeatO is a healthcare company focused on diabetes management and care. The company offers a range of services including consultations with certified diabetologists, a digital diabetes care program, and tools for continuous health monitoring and management. BeatO also provides diabetes-friendly products and resources such as nutritionist-approved recipes and health-related blog content. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Fresh Bus
cb_description: Fresh Bus provides road transportation services to customers. The company offers a modern-age smart bus service, aiming to enhance the bus journey and customer experience in India through the use of technology. It serves the sustainable mobility market. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Doctolib
cb_description: Doctolib offers services in the field of the digital healthcare market. The company operates on both mobile and online platforms and helps users make reservations with doctors. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Levallois-Perret, France.

name: Arctoris
cb_description: Arctoris is a tech-enabled Partnership Research Organization specializing in drug discovery services. The company offers automated laboratory and data science platform services to enhance drug discovery experimentation, from target validation to preclinical studies. Arctoris primarily serves the biotech and pharmaceutical industries with its drug discovery and development services. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Oxfordshire, England.

name: buk
cb_description:
On May 10, 2022, buk was acquired by MAXST. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

buk is an online platform that enables users to share ebooks on social media. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in San Jose, CA.

name: Halp
cb_description: Halp is an ed-tech company focused on making international college and university admissions accessible. The company offers a free study abroad coaching platform, providing 1:1 coaching to help international students navigate the application process, find suitable universities, apply for visas, and access financing and banking services. Halp primarily serves the education sector, assisting students from various countries in their pursuit of post-secondary education in Canada, UK, US, and Australia. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Pretzel Therapeutics
cb_description: Pretzel Therapeutics is focused on developing life-changing medicines within the biotechnology sector, specifically targeting mitochondrial diseases. The company's main offerings include therapies designed to upregulate mitochondrial DNA and address the genetic roots of mitochondrial dysfunction, aiming to improve survival, function, and quality of life for patients. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Waltham, Massachusetts.

name: Lightforge Games
cb_description: Lightforge Games operates as a video game studio with a focus on role-playing games (RPGs). It offers the development of RPGs that aim to blur the line between the creator and the player, primarily selling to the video gaming industry. Lightforge Games was formerly known as Double 20 Games. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: Rondo Energy
cb_description: Rondo Energy enables industrial decarbonization through the utilization of a heat battery. The company's main offering is a thermal battery, which stores renewable-energy heat in bricks, providing a low-cost, zero-emission heat solution for industrial processes. It primarily serves the energy sector. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Alameda, California.

name: Medium
cb_description: Medium is a digital publishing platform that operates in the online media and content distribution industry. The company provides an open platform where individuals can write and share stories, ideas, and gain a deeper understanding of various topics. Medium primarily serves the content creation and consumption sector, with a focus on user-generated content and community engagement. Medium was formerly known as The Obvious. It was founded in 2012 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Mawingu Networks
cb_description: Mawingu Networks is a local internet service provider focused on delivering unlimited high-speed internet. The company offers internet packages for both home and office use, designed to support work, learning, streaming, and staying connected. Mawingu Networks primarily serves the home and office sectors with its internet solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Nanyuki, Kenya.

name: YieldStreet
cb_description: YieldStreet is a leading platform in the alternative investment domain, focusing on providing access to private market investments. The company offers a range of investment opportunities, including real estate, venture capital, private equity, and art, all curated and vetted to generate income streams for investors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Georgiamune
cb_description: Georgiamune is a biotechnology company focused on reprogramming immune responses to combat cancer and autoimmune diseases within the healthcare sector. The company develops novel drugs that regulate immune signaling pathways to restore immune homeostasis and provide therapeutic solutions. Georgiamune's portfolio includes a robust pipeline of immunomodulators and first-in-class assets targeting large indications with high unmet need. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Gaithersburg, Maryland.

name: SkillCycle
cb_description: SkillCycle operates as a performance development platform specializing in human capital development within the enterprise sectors. The company offers a suite of services that include learning and upskilling, performance management, and certified coaching, all designed to align employee goals with organizational objectives. SkillCycle primarily serves the human resources and enterprise sectors, providing tools and coaching to enhance employee development and performance. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Genie
cb_description: White Innovation, dba Genie, is an Israeli foodtech firm that has developed a computer-controlled cooking device capable of producing affordable, tasty and preservative-free dishes from pre-sealed pods within minutes.

name: TAG
cb_description: TAG is specialized in app and web development.

name: Sequin
cb_description: Sequin is a financial services company that focuses on empowering women with financial education and tools. The company offers high-interest checking accounts, credit building tools, and financial education workshops. It primarily serves the financial services industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Diego, California.

name: Sesame
cb_description: Sesame is an online food delivery platform that offers restaurants a flat-fee cost structure for delivery services.

name: AI Insurance
cb_description: AI Insurance is a company that focuses on providing an insurance management platform, operating within the insurance industry. The company offers a cloud-based solution that allows for the management of policies, claims, and insureds all in one place, as well as the tracking of finances, including collecting premiums and paying invoices. This service primarily caters to the insurance industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Imprint Social
cb_description: Imprint Social focuses on digital communication in the social media industry. The company offers services that help clients identify their key audience, understand it in depth, and engage with them in an authentic, organic way to create lasting impact. The company primarily serves clients who need to reach specific audiences through social media. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Understory
cb_description: Understory provides a weather data and analytics platform. It offers datasets and graphical views of the movement and intensity of weather events, which leads to insight and early detection of risks. Understory was formerly known as Winstruments. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Madison, Wisconsin.

name: Apollo Group
cb_description: Apollo Group is a textile group that supplies products for automotive interiors, as well as for buses, trains, airplanes, and ships.

name: GRVT
cb_description: GRVT provides a platform for trading derivatives such as perpetual contracts and options, with a focus on self-custody, privacy, and security. GRVT caters to both institutional and retail clients, providing features like decentralized settlement, role-based access control, and risk management. The compay was founded in 2022 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Starfish Space
cb_description: Starfish Space develops an orbital transportation infrastructure designed to provide in-space transportation and maintenance solutions. Its proximity operations software uses orbital mechanics and a low-thrust electric propulsion system to enable satellite companies to relocate, deorbit, and extend the life of satellites. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: CardFlight
cb_description: CardFlight is a company focused on creating payment acceptance solutions, operating within the financial technology sector. The company's main offering is a software product that enables small businesses to accept payments in various settings, such as on the go, in their store, or at their computer. CardFlight primarily serves the small business sector. It was founded in 2013 and is based in New York, New York.

name: PHINXT Robotics
cb_description: PHINXT Robotics specializes in mobile robotics automation for the warehousing and logistics sector. The company offers a platform that allows for the integration and coordination of autonomous mobile robots (AMRs) for tasks such as goods transportation, material handling, and parcel sorting. PHINXT's solutions cater primarily to small and medium-sized warehousing, third-party logistics (3PLs), distribution, and manufacturing sectors. It was founded in 2022 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: LatticeFlow
cb_description: LatticeFlow is a company that focuses on the development and deployment of robust and trustworthy artificial intelligence (AI), operating within the AI industry. The company offers services that help in diagnosing and fixing data and model issues, enabling teams to build, deploy, and operate AI models at scale. LatticeFlow primarily serves sectors such as defense, manufacturing, insurance, and healthcare. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Loyal
cb_description: Loyal is a biotechnology company focused on developing drugs to extend the health span and lifespan of dogs. Its products are designed to prevent and address the underlying causes of age-associated diseases in canines, aiming to delay onset and reduce impact.
