The company primarily serves the veterinary healthcare sector with its longevity therapies. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Preimage
cb_description: Preimage is a company that focuses on photogrammetry in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that simplifies the process of creating 3D digital twins of real-world environments and assets, providing photorealistic 3D models with high accuracy and speed. Preimage primarily serves sectors that require large to medium scale mapping, surveying, and inspections. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Lumachain
cb_description: Lumachain is a company focused on transforming the food supply chain through technology, operating within the food industry. The company offers a comprehensive end-to-end solution that leverages artificial intelligence and computer vision to enhance food safety, quality, efficiency, and traceability. Lumachain's solutions are primarily targeted at primary and secondary processing plants for beef, chicken, lamb, and pork, aiming to serve the needs of protein processors, quick-service restaurants, and retailers. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: Colu
cb_description: Colu is a company focused on transforming urban transportation through blockchain technology within the public transit sector. The company offers blockchain-based solutions to optimize municipal government expenditure and enhance public transit systems. Its main services include the implementation of digital reward systems to promote local economic engagement and support community development. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel. In July 2024, Colu was acquired by QRyde.

name: Trint
cb_description: Trint is a company that focuses on providing AI-powered transcription and translation services, operating in the software as a service (SaaS) industry. The company offers a platform that transcribes audio and video files into text, allowing for editing and collaboration in a single workflow. This service is primarily used by sectors that require transcription and translation of audio and video content, such as media and research industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in London, England.

name: UltraSense Systems
cb_description: UltraSense Systems is a company focused on the development of SmartSurface Human Machine Interface (HMI) controllers and system software in the automotive industry. The company's main offerings include touch interfaces that integrate multi-mode sensing, illumination, haptic feedback, and AI/ML algorithms, providing a modern touch experience on various surfaces. These products are primarily sold to the automotive industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: NoMad Data
cb_description: NoMad Data is a company specializing in data relationship management and discovery within the enterprise software industry. Their main offerings include a platform for tracking interactions and relationships around data, akin to a CRM, and tools for enterprise data discovery to connect knowledge workers with essential data. They primarily serve sectors such as consulting & advisory, corporate businesses, and asset management. NoMad Data was formerly known as NoMad Data LLC. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: 9T Labs
cb_description: 9T Labs specializes in the manufacturing of strong, lightweight, and sustainable composite materials within various industries. The company offers an Additive Fusion Technology solution that enables the production of structural parts with a significant reduction in weight and cost compared to metal, while maintaining high performance in demanding environments. 9T Labs primarily serves sectors such as aerospace, automotive, medical, sporting goods, and education & research. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Associazione Italiana del Private Equity, Venture Capital e Private Debt
cb_description: Associazione Italiana del Private Equity, Venture Capital e Private Debt (AIFI) focuses on the development, coordination, and representation of active market participants in the private equity, venture capital, and private debt sectors. AIFI provides market analysis, regulatory guidance, and organizes events for networking and knowledge sharing among industry professionals. The association also engages in advocacy and educational initiatives to support the growth and regulation of alternative investments in Italy. It was founded in 1986 and is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Virgil Security
cb_description: Virgil Security runs a company focusing on providing security solutions. The company offers a range of products to provide end-to-end encryption for communications, security for user data and passwords, and toolkits for secure internet of things (IoT) development and management. It primarily serves sectors such as healthcare, financial services, automotive, cloud storage, IoT, and industrial ecosystems. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Manassas, Virginia.

name: TaTiO
cb_description: TaTiO specializes in recruitment process innovation, offering virtual job simulations and artificial intelligence (AI)-driven candidate matching services within the human resources technology sector. The company provides immersive experiences for candidates to engage with potential job roles, along with tools for employers to screen and match candidates based on their skills and potential. TaTiO's solutions cater to various industries, including logistics, healthcare, retail, sales, customer support, transportation, and finance & insurance. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: Flume
cb_description: Flume is a company focused on water monitoring and conservation within the smart home technology sector. Its main offerings include a smart home water monitor that provides real-time water usage data, leak detection, and water conservation insights. The company primarily sells to homeowners looking to manage and reduce their water consumption. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Luis Obispo, California.

name: Greenly
cb_description: Greenly is a fast casual retail chain focused on providing healthy food and beverages in the F&B sector. The company offers a variety of fresh, natural food options including salads, wraps, and plant-based beverages, aimed at promoting healthier eating habits. Greenly primarily serves the health-conscious consumer market. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Jawa Timur, Indonesia.

name: RASA
cb_description: RASA is a fast casual restaurant focused on the food and beverage industry. The company offers healthful, delicious, and flavorful meals inspired from the Indian subcontinent, including warming grain bowls, fresh salads, and fluffy naan bread. It primarily serves to the fast food industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Washington, DC.

name: Alaan
cb_description: Alaan operates as a financial technology company. It focuses on spend management and expense management in the corporate sector. The company offers a platform that provides real-time visibility and control over spending, corporate cards with smart controls, and automation for finance teams. Alaan primarily serves industries such as real estate, facilities management, healthcare, and logistics and transportation. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

name: Pinwheel
cb_description: Pinwheel provides financial technology solutions in income data engineering. The company offers a range of services including the facilitation of direct deposit switching, income and employment verification, and simplification of tax form retrieval processes. Its services primarily cater to the banking, lending, and credit union sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: CrowdStreet
cb_description: CrowdStreet is a company that focuses on commercial real estate investing within the financial services industry. The company provides an online platform where investors can invest in large-scale real estate projects alongside other investors, without having to fully fund the entire project themselves. The company primarily serves the real estate tech industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Betterfly
cb_description: Betterfly is a New York-based company that operates a website that allows people who want to learn, look and feel better to find tutors, coaches, stylists, trainers who offer these services. Betterfly is a community where individuals can connect with experts in a safe, convienent and affordable way to transform their abilities and achieve their goals.

name: FUSE Autotech
cb_description: FUSE Autotech is a company that focuses on finance management and technology integration in the automotive industry. The company offers a comprehensive software solution that streamlines the process of buying, selling, and financing cars, both online and in-store, by automating the entire process and eliminating operational inefficiencies. This service primarily caters to the automotive dealership industry. It is based in Bloomington, Minnesota.

name: InSoundz
cb_description: InSoundz focuses on generative AI audio enhancement within the technology sector. Its main offerings include transforming streamed or pre-recorded audio and video into sound by using AI signal processing to remove unwanted noise and enhance clarity. The company primarily serves content creators, learning and development platforms, and SaaS platforms. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Ketch
cb_description: Early-stage & iterating fast with our first 100 customers.

name: Arise
cb_description: Arise is a company that focuses on customer service outsourcing in the business services industry. The company offers a range of services including contact center outsourcing, omnichannel contact center support, business continuity consulting, and learning solutions. Arise primarily serves sectors such as eCommerce, retail, healthcare, travel and hospitality, telecommunications, gaming, technology, energy and utilities, insurance, and banking and financial services. It was founded in 1994 and is based in Hollywood, Florida.

name: HopSkipDrive
cb_description: HopSkipDrive specializes in providing safe and reliable transportation solutions for the education sector. The company offers services such as alternative transportation for students with special needs, compliance with individualized education plans (IEPs), and mobility for foster care students, utilizing a network of rigorously vetted drivers and AI-powered route optimization. HopSkipDrive primarily caters to the needs of school districts, counties, and families seeking specialized transportation services. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: vFunction
cb_description: vFunction focuses on providing a continuous modernization platform in the technology sector. The company offers a platform that uses artificial intelligence to provide architectural observability and automation, enabling the management of technical debt and the continuous modernization of applications. vFunction primarily sells to sectors such as the cloud computing industry and the software development industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Menlo Park, California.

name: kiwi
cb_description: kiwi is a natural gas manufacturing company. The company produces green hydrogen for mobility and industrial usage and also renewable natural gas (RNG) and liquified renewable natural gas (R-LNG) in combination with CO2 capture and utilization (CCU) to rapidly decarbonize sectors and applications connected to the existing natural gas and LNG infrastructure. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Kosching, Germany. In December 2023, kiwi was acquired by Hy2gen.

name: BillGO
cb_description: BillGO focuses on financial technology, specifically in the domain of bill management and payments. The company offers a platform that enables consumers, financial institutions, and billers to manage and pay bills and subscriptions, providing a way to send and receive payments. It primarily serves the financial services sector, including banks, fintech companies, and billers. BillGO was formerly known as BillHero. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Fort Collins, Colorado.

name: Roll
cb_description: Roll is a comprehensive project management platform designed for service-based businesses. The software centralizes project tracking, task management, time reporting, sales and customer relationship management, as well as business performance analytics. Roll's main offerings include tools for managing sales pipelines, generating financial projections, tracking time and tasks, and providing business visibility through dashboards. The platform is tailored to meet the needs of consultancies, engineering firms, digital studios, creative agencies, and copywriters. It is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: Micruity
cb_description: Micruity specializes in creating financial infrastructure for retirement income products within the retirement planning sector. The company offers a platform that facilitates data sharing and communication between various stakeholders in the retirement savings ecosystem, such as insurers, record keepers, and plan sponsors. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Deepnote
cb_description: Deepnote specializes in collaborative, cloud-based analytics. The company offers a suite of tools for real-time collaboration on data analysis, including the creation of interactive dashboards and data apps, with support for Python, structured query language (SQL), and R within a secure and compliant environment. Deepnote serves various sectors, including education and business. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: KONUX
cb_description: KONUX is an AI scale-up focused on transforming railway operations for a sustainable future within the railway industry. The company offers predictive maintenance solutions for rail infrastructure, leveraging machine learning and industrial IoT to enhance network capacity, reliability, and cost-efficiency. KONUX's solutions cater to the needs of infrastructure managers by providing tools for asset health monitoring, maintenance planning, and traffic optimization. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: kubit
cb_description: kubit develops field-proven software products to enable and simplify the use of real world objects in CAD applications. The company provides tools to integrate 3D laser scan data with CAD environments such as Autodesk Revit and AutoCAD.  kubit's software is hardware independent, giving customers the flexibility to utilize any hardware offering, thus ensuring maximum productivity.

name: Shelf Engine
cb_description: Shelf Engine develops an automated prediction platform. It uses machine learning to help grocery stores generate orders of perishables for retail stores to eliminate food waste. It facilitates automated ordering, forecasting, and reporting. It serves grocery and food retailers. It was formerly known as Shelfbot. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Vivet Therapeutics
cb_description: Vivet Therapeutics focuses on the development of innovative gene therapy treatments, primarily in the healthcare and biotechnology sectors. The company's main offerings include gene therapy treatments for orphan diseases, with a particular emphasis on liver-targeted treatments. The treatments aim to correct malfunctioning genes in patients affected by various diseases. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Phytech
cb_description: Phytech is a company that focuses on agricultural technology, specifically in the domain of irrigation and crop health management. The company offers services that include monitoring, planning, and automating irrigation, nutrition, pest, and disease management, based on data directly from trees, fruits, and irrigation systems. Phytech primarily serves the agricultural sector, with a particular emphasis on helping growers optimize their production. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Flexe
cb_description: Flexe focuses on omnichannel logistics. The company offers technology-powered logistics programs that help solve challenges in distribution, capacity, fulfillment, and same-day delivery. These services primarily cater to the e-commerce and retail sectors. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Whispli
cb_description: Whispli provides a secure, anonymous, and cost-effective whistleblower platform and case management solution. Whispli enables employees to easily and anonymously report fraud, harassment, discrimination and unethical behavior, helping to uncover blind spots within organizations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Sydney, Australia.

name: ESGgo
cb_description: ESGgo operates as an artificial intelligence (AI) powered platform specializing in sustainability and environmental, social, and governance (ESG) solutions. The company offers tools for data collection, corporate sustainability reporting directive (CSRD) readiness, data analysis, automated sustainability reporting, and competition benchmarking. It primarily serves enterprises, startups, and consulting firms seeking to manage and improve their sustainability practices. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Arist
cb_description: Arist is a microlearning platform that specializes in delivering training and educational content within the corporate learning sector. The company offers a suite of services that facilitate learning and behavior change through short, actionable lessons delivered via messaging tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and SMS, designed to be completed in under five minutes a day. Arist's solutions are utilized by a diverse range of sectors, including self-driving car companies and government organizations, to improve employee performance and drive business impact. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Sense
cb_description: Sense is a professional services firm that specializes in digital transformation and modernization within the IT and business consulting sectors. The company offers a range of services including business consulting, IT modernization, digital transformation, application services, and managed services, all designed to help organizations navigate complex challenges and maximize their potential. Sense primarily serves sectors such as banking, healthcare, government, and utilities, among others. It was founded in 1996 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Mable
cb_description: Mable specializes in sustainable bathroom products within the personal care industry. The company offers a range of items including compostable bamboo toothbrushes, refillable floss containers, and bamboo cotton swabs, all designed with sustainability and ethical production practices in mind. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Pivotal Commware
cb_description: Pivotal Commware is a company focused on developing advanced antenna and radio communication technologies within the telecommunications sector. They offer software-defined antennas and radios that leverage Holographic Beam Forming to enhance network speed, capacity, and spectral efficiency. Pivotal Commware's ecosystem includes tools for network planning, precision beamforming repeaters for extending network coverage, and systems for network status and optimization. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bothell, Washington.

name: Hepster
cb_description: Hepster is a company specializing in providing online insurance services across various sectors. Their main offerings include insurance for bicycles, electronic devices, pets, sports equipment, travel, and personal liability, all managed digitally for ease of use. Hepster primarily caters to individual consumers seeking situational lifestyle insurance and businesses looking for corporate insurance solutions. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Rostock, Germany.

name: Largo
cb_description: Largo is a group fundamentally involved in the circular economy. With close to 40 staff based in Nantes, Western France, Largo refurbishes smartphones, tablets, and laptops. Positioned along the entire value chain, from sourcing to refurbishment and distribution, Largo wants to become a benchmark player in the field of responsible refurbishment.

name: Brave Care
cb_description: Brave Care delivers a technology-enabled platform for care solutions through virtual and brick-and-mortar clinics. The company provides primary, urgent, and virtual care in a single consumer experience. It also offers treatments for cough and whooping cough, fever, rashes, stomach aches, ear aches, and more. Primarily it serves the healthcare industry. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Portland, Oregon.

name: ThisThat
cb_description: ThisThat specializes in influencer marketing measurement within the advertising sector. The company offers technology to measure, learn from, and optimize influencer marketing campaigns, providing real-time insights into campaign effectiveness. It primarily serves the advertising and marketing industries, with a focus on brand lift and ROI for influencer campaigns. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Edinburgh, United Kingdom.

name: BeeWise
cb_description: BeeWise is a boutique consulting firm operating in the human capital management sector. The company offers services to both corporations and individuals, focusing on areas such as organization design, people strategy, talent management, leadership development, and HR systems design for corporations, and career transition coaching, personal branding, performance optimization, and executive presence for individuals. BeeWise primarily serves the corporate sector, assisting businesses with their talent and HR challenges. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Caraway
cb_description: Caraway is a company that focuses on the design and production of non-toxic, ceramic-coated cookware and bakeware in the home goods industry. The company offers a range of products including cookware sets, bakeware sets, food storage containers, and kitchen linens, all designed to facilitate healthier and more convenient cooking and baking experiences. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Snapdocs
cb_description: Snapdocs provides digital solutions in the mortgage. The company offers a platform that facilitates electronic closings for mortgages, utilizing artificial intelligence technology to streamline the process and reduce errors. Its services are primarily used by lenders, title companies, and notaries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Covina, California.

name: Scaler
cb_description: Scaler specializes in career acceleration programs for software professionals in the technology sector. The company offers a range of educational services including personalized mentorship, coding skills development, and interview preparation, all designed to enhance the careers of tech enthusiasts at various stages. Scaler's programs cater to university students, early-tenure professionals, and those aspiring to become tech leaders or entrepreneurs. Scaler was formerly known as InterviewBit Academy. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Bangalore, India.

name: Krave Mart
cb_description: Krave Mart is an e-commerce company focused on providing instant online grocery delivery services. They offer a wide selection of over 2200 unique SKUs, including groceries, mother and baby products, health and beauty items, electronics, stationery, toys, games, and pharmacy products, with a promise of delivery within minutes. Krave Mart primarily serves the consumer market with a need for quick and convenient shopping solutions. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Karachi, Pakistan.

name: Goodbill
cb_description: Goodbill focuses on reducing hospital bills for both patients and payers, operating within the healthcare sector. The company's main service involves auditing hospital claims and bills to identify inaccuracies and unnecessary charges, with the aim of achieving an average savings of 30% for its users. Goodbill primarily serves the healthcare industry, with key customer segments including patients, payers, brokers, and employers. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Alcove
cb_description: Developer of Linux and Open Source software. The company provides assistance in finding the software which meets the client's needs, assures open source software integration and customization and  provides assistance in the design and implementation of the client's system. The company also provides software engineering services. It aims to work on large scale projects involving extensive use of open source software.

name: Scale
cb_description: Scale provides a data engine platform. The platform provides generative artificial intelligence (AI) strategy including fine-tuning, prompt engineering, security, model safety, model evaluation, and enterprise applications. It serves industries such as retail, electronic commerce, logistics, and more. Scale was formerly known as Scale Labs. It was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Fave Group
cb_description: Fave is a mobile application that lets users stack rewards on cashback, savings, and rewards. It helps offline merchants connect and retain customers by using gift cards and vouchers. The startup allows merchants to accept digital payments. Customers receive cashback/loyalty points after making payments, through the Fave application that can only be redeemed during future transactions. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. On April 13th, 2021, Fave was acquired by Pine Labs.

name: API3
cb_description: API3 serves as a blockchain technology company focused on providing decentralized API services for the Web3 ecosystem. The company offers secure, transparent, and accurate data feeds, quantum random number generation, and on-demand Web3 APIs through its Airnode oracle technology, aiming to bridge the gap between off-chain data and on-chain applications. API3's solutions cater to developers and data providers within the decentralized finance (DeFi) and blockchain industries. It was founded in 2020 and is based in George Town, Cayman Islands.

name: InterPrice
cb_description: InterPrice delivers a corporate treasury capital markets data platform. It provides a central hub for all data related to the treasury capital markets financing workflow. The platform offers a pricing aggregation tool that automatically aggregates hedging, bond, commercial paper, and loan indications into intuitive dashboards. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Bayes Holding
cb_description: Bayes Holding focuses on gaming and esports data within the technology sector. The company provides analytics and services designed to support businesses in the gaming industry by leveraging market data and trends. It helps companies to make informed decisions and improve their operations in the competitive gaming market. Bayes Holding was formerly known as DOJO Madness. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Playbook
cb_description: Playbook provides a worker training solution for gig-economy businesses. It offers in-app training and engagement solution by creating step-by-step, story-like guides for operational tasks using images, videos, and text. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey. In March 2023, Playbook was acquired by EduMe. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Atmosic
cb_description: Atmosic is a fabless semiconductor company that focuses on designing ultra-low power wireless solutions, operating in the Internet of Things (IoT) industry. The company's main offerings include wireless technologies that significantly reduce device dependency on batteries, aiming to provide extended battery life or even battery-free operation. These technologies are primarily used in various sectors of the economy including Personal, Home, Auto, Healthcare, Industrial, Enterprise, and Smart Cities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Campbell, California.

name: ShiraTronics
cb_description: ShiraTronics is a medtech company focused on developing neuromodulation therapies for the treatment of chronic migraine. The company offers a migraine-specific device designed to provide continuous stimulation to targeted nerves, which may relieve and prevent chronic migraine symptoms. Its device is intended for individuals for whom traditional medications are not effective in reducing the frequency or severity of migraine attacks. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

name: Mixlab
cb_description: Mixlab operates as a pet pharmacy company. It focuses on creating compounded veterinary medications and wellness products for pets, their parents, and prescribers. It provides delivery of medicines the next day once the order is placed, enabling pet owners to have custom medicines as per the requirements of their pets. It was founded in 2017 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Certa
cb_description: Certa specializes in third-party lifecycle management within the compliance, risk management, and ESG sectors. The company offers a suite of products that automate and streamline workflow processes, enhance compliance and risk oversight, and track ESG performance using an AI-powered platform. Certa's solutions are designed to integrate with existing systems, providing a unified approach to managing third-party relationships. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.

name: i2x
cb_description: i2x specializes in augmenting telephonic communications with artificial intelligence (AI) driven solutions within the technology sector. The company offers real-time speech recognition, call transcription, comprehensive quality and performance analysis, and live digital coaching to enhance the efficiency and quality of customer interactions. i2x primarily serves businesses looking to improve their customer service operations and sales conversions through advanced communication tools. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Berlin, Germany. In March 2023, i2x was acquired by Demmach and SSF Technologies.

name: PredictionStrike
cb_description: PredictionStrike is a fantasy sports stock market platform that allows users to trade virtual shares of athletes. The platform operates as a game of skill, enabling participants to invest in the performance of their favorite sports figures and potentially earn real money. PredictionStrike caters to sports enthusiasts who wish to leverage their knowledge of athletes' performance in a market-like environment. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Claymont, Delaware.

name: NeueHouse
cb_description:
NeueHouse offers a place for creatives, artists, and entrepreneurs to come together and share ideas on culture. The NeueHouse membership comprises a collective of creators across two locations in New York and Los Angeles.

On March 10th, 2021, NeueHouse merged with Fotografiska under the new holding company CultureWorks.

name: Qapita
cb_description: Qapita specializes in the automation of workflows for captables, ESOPs, due diligence, and transactions. The company offers a suite of services including management of ownership stakes, issuance of equity awards and valuation for accounting and tax compliance. Qapita primarily serves unlisted and listed companies, providing solutions for shareholder and employee liquidity, as well as board and investor management. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore.

name: SHIFT EV
cb_description: SHIFT EV specializes in custom electric vehicle solutions and operates within the electric vehicle conversion industry. The company offers services for converting gasoline-powered vehicles to electric, as well as providing repairs, upgrades, and a parts catalog for electric vehicle builders. SHIFT EV primarily caters to the custom automotive industry, offering technical support and parts for classic and custom electric vehicles. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Albany, Oregon.

name: Animaj
cb_description: Animaj provides children's entertainment services. The company transforms intellectual properties into multi-platform franchises, using a digital-first approach and artificial intelligence (AI)-driven animation production to create inspiring content for kids. It caters to the children's entertainment industry. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Chptr
cb_description: Chptr is a mobile-first memorialization platform operating in the digital services industry. The company provides a platform for users to gather, share, and hold memories of their loved ones, enabling them to create a lasting legacy. Chptr primarily serves individuals seeking to memorialize and share the stories of their loved ones. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Battleface
cb_description: Battleface is a company specializing in travel insurance and assistance services within the insurance industry. The company offers a range of products including single-trip and multi-trip policies, coverage for space tourism, and a suite of related services such as emergency medical and trip cancellation. Battleface primarily serves the travel and tourism sector, providing insurance products to adventurers and travelers globally. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Columbus, Ohio.

name: EchoPixel
cb_description: EchoPixel specializes in interactive 3D medical visualization software within the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a platform that allows physicians to interact with a digital twin of a patient's anatomy as a 4D interactive hologram, enhancing the understanding of complex anatomical relationships without the need for headgear or glasses. EchoPixel's solutions are primarily utilized in the healthcare industry for surgical planning, intra-operative guidance, and support of minimally invasive therapies. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Santa Clara, California.

name: ZenHub
cb_description: ZenHub is a project management platform with a focus on agile methodologies and software development. The company offers a suite of tools that facilitate planning, tracking, and prioritization of work, with features such as AI-powered insights, real-time roadmaps, and seamless GitHub integration. ZenHub primarily serves software development teams looking to enhance collaboration and efficiency within their agile workflows. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Aleph
cb_description: Aleph offers a platform enabling spreadsheets to have specialized financial tools built in and updated. It helps in financial planning and analysis using its integrated tools and helps to manage the company's information. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: SimScale
cb_description: SimScale is a cloud-native engineering simulation platform that offers a broad range of physics capabilities for computational fluid dynamics, finite element analysis, and thermal simulations. The company provides a comprehensive suite of tools for real-time collaboration, AI-enhanced simulation, and seamless integration with CAD models, enabling engineers to innovate faster and more efficiently. SimScale primarily serves industries such as architecture, engineering, construction, automotive, electronics, and energy, among others. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Munich, Germany.

name: Anthropic
cb_description: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that specializes in developing advanced AI systems. The company's main offerings include AI research and products that prioritize safety, with a focus on creating conversational AI assistants for enterprise use. Anthropic primarily serves sectors that require reliable and interpretable AI technology. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Ceros
cb_description: Ceros specializes in interactive content creation within the digital marketing and design sectors. The company offers a suite of tools that enable users to create, edit, and publish interactive designs without the need for coding. Ceros primarily serves sectors that require dynamic digital content, such as marketing and advertising industries. It was founded in 2007 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Stylitics
cb_description: Stylitics specializes in AI-driven styling and outfitting solutions within the retail technology sector. The company offers a range of services including AI-powered product bundling, visual shopping experiences, and personalized product recommendations designed to enhance e-commerce experiences and foster brand loyalty. Stylitics primarily serves the retail industry, delivering innovative commerce solutions to improve customer engagement and sales. It was founded in 2011 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Keenon Robotics
cb_description: Keenon Robotics is a company focused on commercial service robots within the unmanned delivery industry. The company provides intelligent, reliable, and convenient robotic solutions for various scenarios including restaurants, hotels, and healthcare facilities. Keenon Robotics serves sectors such as the hospitality industry, healthcare sector, and industrial logistics. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Shanghai, Shanghai.

name: Talewind
cb_description: Talewind is a metaverse studio specializing in game development within the digital and gaming sectors. The company focuses on creating experiences that maximize reach and revenue, tailored to both the brand and the platform, primarily leveraging Roblox. Talewind is composed of professionals with backgrounds in major mobile studios and top Roblox games, indicating a blend of gaming and marketing expertise. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Bournemouth, England.

name: Bondaval
cb_description: Bondaval is a fintech company focused on providing credit risk protection solutions within the financial services industry. The company offers non-cancellable receivables cover and trade credit insurance, leveraging technology to deliver efficient, insight-driven, and secure credit protection services. Bondaval's products are designed for sophisticated credit professionals seeking to safeguard receivables against non-payment risks. It was founded in 2020 and is based in London, England.

name: Elements
cb_description: Elements focus on renewable energy in the energy sector. The company's main services include the production and supply of green electricity, with a particular emphasis on wind, solar, and hydroelectric power. They develop solutions for the realization of wind, solar, hydroelectric, and storage power plants, aiming to accelerate the energy transition by providing decarbonized electricity from projects developed to local territories and biodiversity. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Montpellier, France.

name: DigitalGenius
cb_description: DigitalGenius is a company focused on AI-powered customer service automation within the ecommerce sector. Their platform offers conversational AI, visual AI, and generative AI to resolve customer inquiries, detect product defects, and provide personalized interactions. DigitalGenius primarily serves the ecommerce industry with solutions that integrate deeply with existing customer service platforms to enhance customer experience and operational efficiency. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, England.

name: Flow Neuroscience
cb_description: Flow Neuroscience specializes in mental health care, focusing on non-invasive treatments for depression within the healthcare sector. The company offers a brain stimulation headset that employs transcranial Direct Current Stimulation (tDCS) technology to alleviate symptoms of depression, which can be used in the comfort of the user's home. Flow Neuroscience's products are designed for individuals seeking alternative or supplementary treatments for Major Depressive Disorder (MDD), with a user-friendly app that provides behavioural therapy courses and guidance. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Malmo, Sweden.

name: Geneoscopy
cb_description: Geneoscopy is a life sciences company focused on gastrointestinal health within the medical diagnostics industry. The company offers innovative diagnostic tests for the detection, prevention, and monitoring of gastrointestinal diseases, including colorectal cancer and inflammatory bowel disease, using noninvasive stool-derived eukaryotic RNA (seRNA) technology. These diagnostics are designed to be safe, effective, convenient, and accessible, aiming to improve patient outcomes and healthcare equity. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Saint Louis, Missouri.

name: Ember
cb_description: Ember develops wireless mesh networking technology - chips, software and tools - for Smart Energy, connected homes, and many other monitoring and control applications enabling greener living and work environments.

name: Elidah
cb_description: Elidah focuses on providing non-invasive solutions for stress incontinence in the healthcare sector. The company's main product is a device for women to exercise their pelvic floor muscles at home, effectively treating stress incontinence without the need for drugs, surgery, or insertion. It primarily sells to the healthcare industry, with key customers including gynecologists, urogynecologists, urologists, and pelvic floor physical therapists. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Monroe, Connecticut.

name: Narmi
cb_description: Narmi specializes in providing digital banking and account opening platforms for the financial sector. The company offers solutions that enable financial institutions to open accounts rapidly, enhance user engagement through intuitive digital channels, and integrate seamlessly with core banking systems. Narmi's platform is designed to support financial institutions in achieving organic growth, improving operational efficiency, and delivering superior customer experiences. It was founded in 2016 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Ostrom
cb_description: Ostrom is a digital energy management company focused on providing green electricity services. The company offers variable pricing tariffs, dynamic energy pricing, and smart technology integrations for efficient energy consumption. Ostrom primarily serves residential customers with a focus on sustainability and digital convenience. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Packhelp
cb_description: Packhelp operates as an online marketplace specializing in custom-branded packaging. The company offers a range of products including mailer boxes, product boxes, and eco-friendly packaging materials, with services such as a three-dimensional (3D) packaging editor for design and express production for quick turnaround. Packhelp primarily caters to e-commerce brands, retailers, and enterprises seeking innovative and sustainable packaging solutions. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

name: SentiLink
cb_description: SentiLink operates as an identity verification technology company. The company offers services that help prevent synthetic fraud, identity theft, and emerging forms of first-party fraud at the point of account application, leveraging machine learning models and insights from a team of risk analysts. It primarily serves the financial services industry, including banks, credit unions, and financial technology companies. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Niio
cb_description: Niio is a digital art platform operating in the art and technology sectors. The company offers a streaming service that allows users to display high-quality digital and video art on any screen, manage their art and non-fungible token (NFT) collections, and create and share playlists. Niio primarily serves the art industry, catering to artists, galleries, collectors, and art enthusiasts. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Wrk
cb_description: Wrk focuses on advanced automation technology. The company offers a platform to combine automation technology and human tasks to streamline business processes, including data entry, research tasks, and complex internal processes. It primarily serves sectors such as marketing, sales, customer support, finance, and human resources. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Montreal, Canada.

name: NeoSensory
cb_description: NeoSensory specializes in sensory augmentation through wearable technology, focusing on solutions for auditory challenges. The company offers wristband devices that translate sound into vibrational patterns, providing alternative ways to process auditory information for individuals with hearing loss, tinnitus, and profound hearing loss. These devices are designed to assist with speech comprehension, management of ringing in the ears, and environmental sound awareness. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: AgomAb Therapeutics
cb_description: AgomAb Therapeutics is a company focused on growth factor biology and the development of treatments for fibrosis and organ failure, operating in the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industry. The company's main offerings include the development of therapies that aim to resolve fibrosis, repair tissue structure, and restore organ function. These products are primarily targeted towards the healthcare industry, specifically in the treatment of severe organ failure and fibrotic diseases. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Ghent, Belgium.

name: VALFIX Medical
cb_description: VALFIX Medical is a company focused on revolutionizing heart valve surgery within the healthcare industry. The company's main service is the development of a comprehensive transcatheter repair solution, which offers a minimally invasive alternative to traditional open-heart surgery, aiming to alleviate heart failure symptoms. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically targeting cardiologists and heart failure patients. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.

name: Stix
cb_description: We have formulated a new model for mobile social games. The model combines classic turn-based game mechanics for groups of friends, direct interaction (where players truly affect each other), and short action-packed gameplay in every single move.

name: Seoul Robotics
cb_description: Seoul Robotics specializes in industrial autonomous driving software within the autonomous driving sector. The company offers an infrastructure-based autonomous driving solution, LV5 CTRL TWR, designed to automate first mile logistics and manage port and yard logistics. Seoul Robotics primarily serves the automotive OEMs and logistics industries. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.

name: Lantum
cb_description: Lantum is a workforce management platform focused on the healthcare sector, providing solutions to improve staffing efficiencies and reduce operational costs. The company offers a Connected Scheduling platform that includes an integrated rota tool, a digital staff bank, and access to a network of vetted clinicians, aimed at streamlining the management of healthcare workforces. Lantum primarily serves healthcare organizations such as Integrated Care Systems and Primary Care Networks. Lantum was formerly known as Network Locum. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, England.

name: Instabug
cb_description: Instabug is a company focused on mobile application performance monitoring and user experience optimization within the software development industry. The company offers solutions for crash reporting, bug reporting, app performance monitoring, and collecting user feedback to improve app stability and quality. Instabug's platform is designed to support mobile teams in monitoring, prioritizing, and debugging performance and stability issues throughout the app development lifecycle. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Carrick Therapeutics
cb_description: Carrick Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on developing innovative oncological therapies. The company specializes in creating novel cancer treatments, including CDK inhibitors, to improve patient outcomes by targeting aggressive and resistant forms of cancer. Carrick Therapeutics collaborates with pharmaceutical partners and a network of clinicians and scientists to develop these therapies for various cancers, including breast, prostate, ovarian, pancreatic, and Ewing's sarcoma. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Dublin 15, Ireland.

name: ECFX
cb_description: ECFX is a company focused on automating electronic court filing notice processes within the legal industry. Their main product, ECFX Notice, is an enterprise notice management system that automates the downloading, profiling, storing, and distribution of court documents for both State and Federal courts. The company's solutions cater to law firms of various sizes, streamlining their operations and saving time on manual processing of legal documents. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Venice, California.

name: Noogata
cb_description: Noogata is an AI-powered eCommerce platform that specializes in providing strategic insights and tools for the consumer packaged goods (CPG) sector, digital brands, and marketing agencies. The company offers a suite of services designed to enhance digital shelf performance, optimize search and content strategies, and provide competitive intelligence to help businesses grow their presence on Amazon. Noogata's solutions cater primarily to the eCommerce industry, leveraging AI to deliver actionable insights for sales, advertising, and pricing strategies. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Canoe
cb_description: Canoe is a startup company focused on delivering fresh food products through an early morning delivery service. They offer a service called 'Morning Express' which provides customers with items such as bread, seasonal fruits, milk, and prepared dishes from bistros, delivered to their doorstep by 7:00 AM. This service leverages the logistics of early morning routes, traditionally used for newspaper and milk delivery, to meet the needs of modern lifestyles. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.

name: StackHawk
cb_description: StackHawk focuses on application and application programming interface (API) security testing in the technology sector. The company provides services that enable developers to find, understand, and fix security vulnerabilities in their software before it is shipped, with a particular emphasis on integrating these services into continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) workflows. It primarily serves the software development and cybersecurity industries. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Spendesk
cb_description: Spendesk is a spend management platform that offers a comprehensive solution for modern finance teams in various business sectors. The company provides corporate cards, invoice payments, expense reimbursements, budgets, approvals, reporting, compliance, and pre-accounting in one integrated system. Spendesk's platform is designed to give businesses complete visibility and control over their spending, with features such as built-in automation and an easily adopted approval process. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Zip
cb_description: Zip provides corvette parts and accessories. It maintains product offerings for iconic C1 through C8 Chevrolet Corvettes. The company provides products in online and retail stores. Zip was founded in 1977 and is based in Mechanicsville, Virginia. In December 2022, Zip was acquired by Legendary Companies. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: The Expert
cb_description: The Expert operates as a company in the interior design and e-commerce sectors. It offers services such as video consultations with top interior designers and a curated marketplace for home decor and furniture. The company primarily serves customers in the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Prewave
cb_description: Prewave is a company focused on supply chain risk intelligence and compliance solutions within the supply chain management industry. The company offers a platform for monitoring suppliers, providing predictive analytics and risk alerts to purchasing, supply chain, and sustainability managers. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: ixLayer
cb_description: ixLayer is a leading provider of cloud-based platforms in the healthcare technology sector. The company offers a virtual care platform that simplifies and accelerates the connection to care, from diagnostic testing to treatment, for biopharma companies, retail pharmacies, and health plans. ixLayer's platform serves to enhance operational efficiency, patient access, and health outcomes through its integrated, configurable solutions. It was founded in 2017 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: HDT Bio
cb_description: HDT Bio is a clinical stage biotechnology company focused on developing advanced RNA vaccine products for infectious diseases and cancers. The company's main offerings include a proprietary LION technology and self-amplifying RNA (repRNA) vaccines designed to activate the immune system and provide enhanced safety, potency, and durability. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Loora
cb_description: Loora is an AI-powered platform focused on personalized English language learning. The company offers an AI English tutor that enables users to engage in real conversations, receive instant feedback, and improve their language fluency. Loora's services are designed to cater to individuals seeking to enhance their English communication skills for personal and professional growth. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Amplify
cb_description: Amplify focuses on providing life insurance policies within the financial services industry. It offers a range of life insurance products including term life, variable universal life, index universal life, and combination life policies that cater to various protection needs and offer tax-advantaged growth. Its products are designed to offer financial protection for beneficiaries and allow policyholders to access funds for personal use while still living. Amplify was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: OrthoFX
cb_description: OrthoFX runs a company specifically focusing on orthodontic solutions. The company's main offerings include clear aligners, which are devices used to adjust and straighten teeth. It treats various dental conditions such as overbite, underbite, crossbite, gap teeth, and crowded teeth. The company primarily serves the healthcare industry, particularly dental professionals and patients seeking orthodontic treatment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Fremont, California.

name: Momenta
cb_description: Momenta is a leading company in the autonomous driving technology domain, focusing on developing software solutions for full vehicle autonomy. The company offers products such as MSD, a fully autonomous driving solution designed for taxis and private cars, and Mpilot, a mass-production-ready software for highly automated driving in private vehicles. Momenta's solutions are built on a unique 'flywheel approach' that combines a data-driven methodology with iterative algorithm enhancements to address complex driving scenarios. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Beijing, Beijing.

name: Tiny Health
cb_description: Tiny Health focuses on microbiome health. The company offers at-home gut health tests for mothers and babies, using next-generation sequencing and artificial technology to detect gut imbalances and provide personalized recommendations to prevent chronic conditions. It primarily serves the healthcare and wellness industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Rook
cb_description: Rook is a company focused on innovating the publishing industry. Its main product is a location-based ebook application that provides free access to its entire catalogue of ebooks when users are in certain predefined locations. The company primarily serves the digital publishing sector. It is based in London, England.

name: AltraTech
cb_description: AltraTech specializes in molecular detection within the nano-bio-technology and semiconductor sectors. The company offers a process for detecting and quantifying molecular targets such as deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) and ribonucleic acid (RNA), antibodies, and antigens, utilizing electronic signal amplification for diagnostics. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Cork, Ireland.

name: Turbine
cb_description: Turbine creates and operates online gaming communities. It helps game developers in the development and creation of a range of Free-To-Play (FTP) games for mobile platforms. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Westwood, Massachusetts. In April 2010, Turbine was acquired by Time Warner.

name: Quantive
cb_description: Quantive develops a strategy execution platform. The platform is based on the objectives and Key Results (OKR) management methodology. It offers solutions to customers across enterprises, not-for-profits, startups, and governments. Quantive was founded in 2015 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Authzed
cb_description: Authzed focuses on providing scalable authorization services in the tech industry. The company offers a range of products including managed services and an open-source permissions database, SpiceDB, which helps manage complex authorization requirements. Authzed primarily serves the tech industry, with a focus on companies that require robust and scalable authorization systems. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, United States.

name: Point Pickup Technologies
cb_description: Point Pickup Technologies is a technology-enabled platform specializing in solving middle and last mile delivery challenges within the logistics sector. The company offers a single platform for both middle-mile and last-mile delivery solutions, utilizing a precision matching system to cater to the same-day delivery market for a diverse range of industries including retail, food and grocery, and pharmaceuticals. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut. In March 2024, Point Pickup Technologies filed for bankruptcy.

name: Vestiaire Collective
cb_description: Vestiaire Collective engages in the fashion industry, specifically in the domain of second-hand luxury items. It offers a platform for buying and selling pre-loved designer fashion items, including clothing, shoes, bags, accessories, and vintage pieces. It primarily serves the ecommerce industry. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Stampli
cb_description: Stampli focuses on accounts payable automation and invoice management. The company offers a range of products to provide efficiency, visibility, and control for payments, employee expenses, corporate credit card spending, and vendor management. Stampli's services are primarily utilized by sectors such as healthcare, hospitality, professional services, construction, retail, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: PotLoc
cb_description: Potloc is a company that focuses on geo-targeted market research, operating within the market research industry. The company offers services such as creating high-end questionnaires, sampling both B2C and B2B audiences, providing an intuitive tool for data visualization, and translating data into personalized, relevant, and actionable insights. Potloc primarily serves businesses seeking market insights to inform their strategic decisions. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Cosmos Innovation
cb_description: Cosmos Innovation specializes in advancing solar cell technology within the renewable energy sector. The company's main offerings include the development of high-efficiency, cost-effective solar cells, and an Artificial Intelligence  (AI) powered optimization platform, Mobius, which enhances recipe development for the solar and semiconductor industries. It primarily serves the renewable energy market, with a focus on leveraging AI to increase the efficiency of solar cells. Cosmos Innovation was formerly known as SQ4.0. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Singapore.

name: Hakbah
cb_description: Hakbah offers a financial technology savings platform. It digitizes financial habits by developing savings products that help increase financial inclusion, support a non-cash society, and bridge the gender gap in savings. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Brigad
cb_description: Brigad is a platform that specializes in connecting freelance professionals with businesses in the hospitality and healthcare sectors for short-term missions. The company offers a mobile application that allows businesses to quickly find and book qualified and vetted professionals for temporary staffing needs, while also enabling freelancers to select missions that align with their skills and schedules. Brigad primarily serves the hospitality and healthcare industries, providing a solution for on-demand staffing and flexible work opportunities. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Layr
cb_description: Layr provides a cloud insurance platform to help in the process of sourcing, purchasing and managing business insurance. The platform offers recommendations, matches companies with the insurance policies and the coverage they need, and predicts carrier pricing. It was formerly known as The Un-Brokerage. Layr was founded in 2016 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Lyten
cb_description: Lyten focuses on decarbonization technologies within various sectors including automotive, aviation, and aerospace. It develops advanced sensing technologies for applications in health, safety, logistics, and manufacturing. It was founded in 2015 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Immunefi
cb_description: Immunefi is a bug bounty platform operating in the cybersecurity industry. The company offers a platform where hackers can review code, identify potential security vulnerabilities, and get paid for their efforts, thereby preventing potential hacks. It primarily serves the cryptocurrency and decentralized finance (DeFi) sectors. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: UptimeHealth
cb_description: UptimeHealth specializes in simplifying equipment management for outpatient healthcare providers, focusing on compliance and operational effectiveness through advanced technology. The company offers a platform for managing medical devices, ensuring proactive maintenance, and leveraging analytics for informed decision-making. UptimeHealth primarily serves the healthcare sector, including dental, urgent care, and other outpatient facilities. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Metadata.io
cb_description: Metadata.io provides marketing solutions in the business-to-business (B2B) sector. The company offers a range of services including automation of paid campaigns, creation of advertising audiences, and delivery of personalized experiences for website visitors. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: TandemAI
cb_description: TandemAI operates as a technology company focusing on reinventing drug discovery infrastructure. The company offers a turnkey drug discovery solution that integrates proprietary artificial intelligence (AI) enabled computation large-scale in-house wet lab operations. Its service is primarily offered to the global scientific community and partners within the pharmaceutical industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Evaneos
cb_description: Evaneos focuses on the travel and tourism industry. It offers tailor-made tours and travel experiences, working with local travel agents to create customized vacations based on individual preferences and interests. It primarily serves the travel and tourism sector. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Gameto
cb_description: Gameto is a biotechnology company focused on developing therapies to improve female reproductive health. The company's main offerings include a platform for producing engineered reproductive cell lines and a therapeutic called Fertilo, which aims to enhance in vitro fertilization (IVF) and egg freezing processes. Gameto's products are designed to address the needs of the healthcare industry, particularly in the areas of fertility, menopause, and reproductive system diseases. It was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Awell Health
cb_description: Awell Health is a company focused on healthcare process optimization through its low-code platform. The company provides tools for designing and automating clinical workflows, facilitating seamless coordination between care teams and patients without the need for extensive technical expertise. Awell Health's platform is utilized across various healthcare sectors, including virtual first care, traditional care, and value-based care. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Brussels, Belgium.

name: Splash Sports
cb_description: Splash Sports is a sports gaming platform specializing in peer-to-peer contests. The company offers a variety of games where users utilize their sports knowledge to compete for real money, including survivor, Pick X, and player tier selection contests. Splash Sports primarily serves the sports gaming community. Splash Sports was formerly known as BetterPool. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Pivot Bio
cb_description: Pivot Bio is a company focused on innovative agricultural solutions, specifically in the domain of microbial nitrogen fertilizers. The company's main product is a microbial fertilizer that transforms the way nitrogen is produced and used by farmers, offering a more efficient and sustainable alternative to synthetic nitrogen. This product is primarily targeted towards the agricultural industry, particularly cereal crop farmers. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Berkeley, California.

name: Digip
cb_description: Digip is a legal technology company specializing in brand protection through digital trademark solutions. The company offers streamlined trademark registration, management, and monitoring services to safeguard intellectual property. Digip primarily serves businesses seeking to protect their brands with trademark solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: SimpliFed
cb_description: SimpliFed focuses on virtual baby feeding and breastfeeding services within the healthcare sector. The company offers evidence-based virtual care, including appointments with lactation and infant feeding experts, group classes, insurance navigation, and a supportive community, all accessible from home and covered by insurance. It primarily serves new and expecting parents, healthcare professionals, and health plans. The company was founded in 2019  and is based in Ithaca, New York.

name: TRAXyL
cb_description: TRAXyL specializes in optical fiber network solutions within the telecommunications industry. The company offers a unique product, FiberTRAX, which allows for the application of optical fiber directly onto pavement surfaces, providing a non-disruptive and efficient method for establishing network connections. TRAXyL's solutions are particularly beneficial for smart city projects and areas requiring rapid deployment of fiber connectivity. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Warrenton, Virginia.

name: LoadShare Networks
cb_description: LoadShare Networks is a technology-driven logistics company specializing in creating an integrated logistics network. The company offers a range of services including intracity and intercity transportation, part truck load, full truck load, warehousing, and supply chain management solutions. LoadShare Networks primarily serves sectors such as e-commerce, quick commerce, hyperlocal delivery, and direct to retail, providing same day and next day delivery options. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Ejari
cb_description: Ejari operates in the real estate technology sector. The company's main service is a 'Rent Now, Pay Later' solution, which allows tenants to manage their budget more effectively by converting their annual rent bill into 12 manageable monthly payments, while landlords receive a full year's rent upfront. Ejari primarily serves the real estate industry. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

name: Qwick
cb_description: Qwick is a professional platform focused on the hospitality industry. The company's main service is to match experienced freelancers with shifts at various hospitality businesses such as restaurants, hotels, caterers, and stadiums. Qwick primarily serves the hospitality industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Asher Bio
cb_description: Asher Bio focuses on developing cis-targeted immunotherapies for cancer and other diseases. The company's main offerings include immunotherapies that selectively activate specific immune cell types to improve therapeutic efficacy and reduce side effects. Asher Bio's approach is designed to direct immune mediators against a range of target immune cell types, creating best-in-class treatments for cancer, autoimmune, and infectious diseases. It was founded in 2019 and is based in South San Francisco, California.

name: Navenio
cb_description: Navenio is a company specializing in intelligent location-based workforce solutions within the technology sector. They offer infrastructure-free indoor location services that leverage existing smartphone technology to accurately localize people in various indoor settings without the need for new hardware installations. The company's solutions are primarily utilized in the healthcare sector to enhance the coordination of hospital care teams. Navenio was formerly known as Inside Tracs. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Oxford, England.

name: Toqio
cb_description: Toqio is a fintech company that specializes in providing a platform for embedded finance solutions. The company offers a SaaS platform that enables businesses to create and launch their own branded banking and financial applications quickly and efficiently. Toqio primarily serves companies looking to integrate financial services into their existing products or launch new finance-related applications. Toqio was formerly known as Lum Fintech. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: Earny
cb_description: Earny focuses on financial technology, specifically in the domain of price protection. The company offers a service that automatically tracks purchases and provides refunds when prices drop, acting as a personal assistant for money saving. It primarily serves the e-commerce industry. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Xepelin
cb_description: Xepelin is a company that focuses on providing digital financial solutions in the business sector. The company offers services that facilitate access to liquidity and centralize financial information, enabling businesses to manage their finances more efficiently. They provide a platform for real-time payments, allowing businesses to pay their obligations, access financing, and organize their finances all in one place. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Las Condes, Chile.

name: Melio
cb_description: Melio develops accounts payable solutions. The company offers services that allow businesses to pay their bills, send invoices, and receive payments online, as well as make international payments and automate their bill pay process. Its accountant dashboard enables integrations, team management, easy bill capture, and more. It primarily serves the business-to-business (B2B) payments in logistics, healthcare, construction, non-profit, and retail industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Vantage Robotics
cb_description: Vantage Robotics specializes in the development and manufacturing of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) and related components for various sectors. The company offers drones equipped with advanced imaging capabilities and secure communication systems, designed to meet the rigorous demands of mission-critical operations. Vantage Robotics primarily serves defense, security, and inspection sectors with its UAV solutions. It was founded in 2013 and is based in San Leandro, California.

name: Peeba
cb_description: Peeba is a B2B wholesale marketplace that specializes in connecting retailers with global brands. The company offers a curated catalog of brands, net 60 payment terms, and free returns for independent retailers, along with a centralized order management system to increase sales. Peeba primarily serves the retail sector, facilitating the sourcing of products for local retailers in Asia. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong.

name: Maqsad
cb_description: Maqsad is a test preparation platform focused on providing educational resources for Pakistani students. The company offers a comprehensive suite of services including practice questions, video solutions, study plans, and academic counselling to help students prepare for major entrance exams like MDCAT, ECAT, and IBA/LUMS admission tests. Maqsad primarily serves students seeking to secure admission to top medical and engineering colleges as well as prestigious business schools. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Karachi, Pakistan.

name: iwoca
cb_description: iwoca is a financial technology company specializing in providing flexible financing solutions to small businesses across various sectors. The company offers a range of products including unsecured and short-term business loans, designed to manage cash flow and invest in growth. iwoca's services are characterized by quick loan approvals, flexible repayment terms, and the option for early repayment without penalties. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: AmazeVR
cb_description: AmazeVR is a company that focuses on immersive technology in the music industry. The company offers virtual reality concerts, providing fans with an immersive experience that brings them closer to their favorite artists. These concerts are captured in stereoscopic live-action videos and integrated with surreal environments that transcend reality. AmazeVR was formerly known as Off2, Inc.. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Drop
cb_description: Drop operates at the nexus of e-commerce and financial technology, offering a rewards program to incentivize shopping. The company provides a platform where users can earn points for purchases made online and offline, which can then be redeemed for gift cards and other rewards. Drop primarily serves the e-commerce industry, engaging Millennials and consumers by offering a tailored shopping experience and rewards for survey participation. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Toronto, Canada.

name: Responsive
cb_description: Responsive is a boutique consulting firm that specializes in digital transformation and customer experience enhancement across various industries. It offers services that leverage insights, data, and technology to drive growth and profitability for its clients. It primarily caters to businesses seeking to improve their digital channels and customer engagement through the application of AI and other technologies. It was founded in 2004 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: Nexoya
cb_description: Nexoya specializes in marketing analytics with a focus on AI-powered budget optimization for the advertising sector. The company offers automated portfolio management services that enable efficient cross-channel budget allocation and performance maximization. Nexoya's software aggregates data from various marketing channels, predicts campaign performance, and reallocates budgets to optimize advertising spend and conversions. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: IndieFlow
cb_description: IndieFlow develops an operating system and marketplace for music creators. The company enables independent musicians, managers, and labels to navigate the industry. It covers distribution to streaming platforms, collecting payments and royalties, tracking data, scheduling, promoting and managing projects, booking gigs, and collaborations. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: CloudFrame
cb_description: CloudFrame is a company focused on modernizing mainframe applications, operating within the technology and software industry. The company offers solutions to automate the transformation of COBOL applications into cloud-native Java, aiming to reduce mainframe costs, mitigate risks, and accelerate modernization outcomes. Its primary market includes businesses and organizations that rely on mainframe COBOL applications. CloudFrame was formerly known as BinaryCodon, Inc.. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Princeton, New Jersey.

name: Quantexa
cb_description: Quantexa operates as a data and analytics software company providing a range of decision intelligence software. It offers solutions for data management, know your customer (KYC), customer intelligence, financial crime, and security throughout the customer lifecycle. It serves the banking, government, insurance, and communication service providers (CSP) sectors. It was founded in 2016 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Mural
cb_description: Mural is a visual work platform that specializes in enhancing collaboration and productivity across various business sectors. The company offers a suite of tools designed to facilitate teamwork, organize ideas, and plan projects, all within a secure and flexible online environment. Mural primarily serves sectors that require collaborative efforts such as engineering, design, product development, and innovation. Mural was formerly known as Murally. It was founded in 2011 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Elvie
cb_description: Elvie operates as a health and lifestyle brand in the technology sector, focusing on developing smarter technology for women. The company offers products such as a wearable breast pump and a kegel trainer, both of which are designed to improve women's health and lifestyle. Its products are primarily sold to the healthcare and wellness industries. It was founded in 2013 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Wandelbots
