cb_description: Wandelbots focuses on human-robot interaction within the automation industry. The company offers a technology platform that enables users to build custom applications for robot automation, ensuring compatibility across different robot brands and facilitating easy operation. Wandelbots' software solutions cater to various stages of the automation lifecycle, including planning, building, and operating robot applications. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dresden, Germany.

name: Cover Whale
cb_description: Cover Whale is an insurtech company specializing in commercial auto insurance for the trucking industry. They offer a comprehensive suite of insurance products including liability, cargo, vehicle, and other coverages for truckers, along with a unique Driver Safety Program that incorporates telematics and real-time coaching to promote safe driving. The company primarily serves the commercial trucking sector, providing innovative insurance solutions to truck drivers and fleets. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Asceneuron
cb_description: Asceneuron operates as a clinical-stage biotech company that focuses on the development of therapeutics for neurodegenerative disorders within the healthcare and biotechnology sectors. The company's main offerings include orally bioavailable therapeutics designed to treat debilitating disorders such as Alzheimer's and Parkinson's disease. Asceneuron primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically the disease treatment sector. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Lausanne, Switzerland.

name: ThreeFlow
cb_description: ThreeFlow is a company specializing in benefits placement systems within the insurance technology sector. The company offers a shared system that automates workflows, facilitates the renewal and RFP process, and aids in data-driven decision-making for brokers and carriers. ThreeFlow's platform is designed to streamline communication and processes between brokers and carriers, enabling more efficient management of employee benefits. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Aimlabs
cb_description: Aimlabs specializes in performance improvement tools for competitive gaming, operating within the esports and gaming industry. The company offers a suite of aim training exercises, personalized learning plans, and AI-driven performance analytics to help players enhance their skills in FPS and MOBA games. Aimlabs primarily serves the competitive gaming community with its training and analytics platform. Aimlabs was formerly known as Statespace. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Boardman, Ohio.

name: Unbox
cb_description: Unbox is an e-commerce platform that provides comprehensive online sales solutions for small and medium-sized enterprises. The company offers a customizable virtual store, integrated payment processing, and tools for selling through social media, all designed to facilitate professional and efficient online retail operations. Unbox also provides services for brand personalization, inventory and sales control, and digital marketing support to help businesses grow their online presence. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: Level AI
cb_description: Level AI focuses on developing artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. It includes AI-native solutions that automate quality assurance, assist agents, and provide strategic insights to business leaders, thereby enhancing the performance of the modern workforce, primarily serving the customer service sector.  It was founded in 2018 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Firehawk Aerospace
cb_description: Firehawk Aerospace focuses on the development and manufacturing of hybrid rocket engines for the aerospace and defense industries. The company offers propulsion solutions that leverage additive manufacturing techniques to create 3D-printed fuel grains, resulting in engines that are customizable combustion ballistics. Firehawk's products are designed to serve the defense systems and commercial space sectors with capabilities such as throttleable engines and reduced development lifecycles. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Addison, Texas.

name: ChowNow
cb_description: ChowNow is a technology company focused on the restaurant industry. It provides online ordering systems for independent restaurants, enabling them to receive takeout and, in some cases, delivery orders without the need for third-party commissions. The company primarily serves the restaurant industry. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Coinhouse
cb_description: Coinhouse is a crypto-asset investment platform specializing in the acquisition, management, and security of digital assets. The company offers services for buying and selling over 50 carefully selected crypto-assets, as well as custody and asset management services. Coinhouse also provides educational content to help clients understand the cryptocurrency ecosystem and offers technical and payment solutions for businesses in web3, NFTs, and the metaverse. Coinhouse was formerly known as La Maison du Bitcoin. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Soundboks
cb_description: Soundboks is a company that focuses on the production of wireless Bluetooth speakers, operating in the consumer electronics industry. The company offers portable speakers that provide high-quality sound and are designed for ease of use with Bluetooth connectivity. The primary market for Soundboks' products is the consumer electronics sector. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

name: OneVest
cb_description: OneVest operates as a financial technology company specializing in wealth management solutions. The company offers an all-in-one wealth management platform that facilitates digital and hybrid wealth experiences, including portfolio management, compliance, analytics, reporting, and client management. It primarily serves sectors such as financial technology, banks, credit unions, wealth managers, insurance companies, dealers, custodians, and asset managers. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Calgary, Canada.

name: Pixels
cb_description: Pixels operates as a gaming platform specializing in blockchain-based interactive experiences. The company offers a virtual world where players can build, explore, and own digital assets, integrating gameplay with digital collectibles. Pixels primarily targets the gaming community and blockchain enthusiasts with its blend of resource management, community building, and exploration in an open-ended environment. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Grosse Ile, Michigan.

name: Nutrisense
cb_description: Nutrisense focuses on improving metabolic health in the healthcare sector. The company offers services that combine insights from continuous glucose monitors (CGMs) and guidance from expert personal nutritionists to help individuals build sustainable lifestyle habits and reach their wellness goals. Nutrisense primarily serves individuals seeking to improve their metabolic health and wellness. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Function of Beauty
cb_description: Function of Beauty specializes in personalized haircare, skincare, and bodycare products within the beauty industry. The company offers made-to-order custom formulas based on individual hair, body, or skin profiles, ensuring tailored solutions for various beauty needs. Its products are vegan, cruelty-free, sulfate-free, paraben-free, and dermatologist tested, focusing on naturally-derived ingredients and plant-derived technology for damage repair. It was founded in 2015 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Branch Energy
cb_description: Branch Energy serves as a technology company focused on intelligent energy management within the renewable energy sector. The company offers solutions that help customers lower energy bills and carbon footprint through data analytics and smart home technology. Branch Energy primarily serves the residential energy market, enabling homeowners to optimize their energy usage and support clean energy initiatives. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Houston, Texas.

name: Paragraph
cb_description: Paragraph is a company that operates in the digital publishing and newsletter platform industry. It provides creators with a platform to build communities, connect with their audience, and monetize their content, offering features such as content creation, audience growth tools, and monetization options. The company primarily serves creators, including artists, writers, podcasters, and others in the digital content creation industry. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Packfleet
cb_description: Packfleet is a technology-driven company specializing in carbon-neutral delivery services for the e-commerce sector. The company offers a suite of services including e-commerce platform integrations, real-time delivery tracking, and customizable tracking pages, all supported by a fleet of electric vehicles. Its commitment to sustainability is further emphasized by its B Corp certification and dedication to paying a real living wage. It was founded in 2021 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Jerry
cb_description: Jerry is an AllCar app focused on simplifying car ownership through technology in the insurance and financial services sectors. The company offers a platform for comparing car insurance policies, refinancing car loans, estimating repair costs, and tracking driving habits. Jerry's services cater to individual car owners looking to manage their automotive expenses and maintenance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Pager
cb_description: Pager operates as an application for capturing screenshots. It enables users to turn screenshots into links and monetize them for engagement. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Cloudwalk
cb_description: Cloudwalk specializes in artificial intelligence solutions and operates within the technology sector. The company offers a human-machine collaborative operating system and AI solutions that integrate data-driven practices across vision, speech, and natural language processing to bridge the digital and physical worlds. Cloudwalk's AI services and industry solutions cater to sectors such as smart finance, smart cities, smart governance, and smart business. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Pudong, Shanghai.

name: Livescale
cb_description: Livescale is a social commerce platform focused on enhancing digital commerce through live shopping experiences. The company offers an all-in-one solution that includes a live shopping platform, along with strategy, production, and talent services to help businesses plan and execute live events. Livescale primarily serves clients ranging from small businesses to large enterprises, offering personalized approaches to increase sales, engagement, and conversion rates. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: mimik
cb_description: mimik is a company specializing in hybrid edge cloud computing within the technology sector. Its main offerings include an application development platform that enables the creation of edge-native applications compatible across various ecosystems and devices, with a focus on data privacy, security, and minimal central cloud dependency. The company primarily serves sectors such as automotive, healthcare, industrial automation, and more, providing solutions that facilitate digital transformation and interoperability. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: VineSight
cb_description: VineSight focuses on combating disinformation and toxic attacks, operating in the technology and digital security sectors. The company offers services that use artificial intelligence to detect suspicious share patterns across various platforms, enabling early identification of potentially damaging narratives. VineSight's services are primarily utilized by brands, causes, and campaigns seeking to maintain control of their narratives in the face of disinformation. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Haifa, Israel.

name: Nitricity
cb_description: Nitricity operates as an agriculture technology (agtech) company. It is focused on the production of nitrogen fertilizer. It provides a climate-smart nitrogen fertilizer, produced using a technology that combines air, water, and electricity, mimicking a naturally occurring process to fix nitrogen. It was founded in 2018 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Solsten
cb_description: Solsten focuses on audience understanding and customer experience. The company offers a suite of products that provide deep insights into user motivations, values, and communication styles, enabling businesses to tailor their products and services to resonate with their audience. Solsten primarily serves the gaming industry, as well as the health and web3 sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Manhattan Beach, California.

name: Epica International
cb_description: Epica International specializes in advanced medical imaging platforms and robotic systems within the healthcare and industrial sectors. The company provides mobile, multi-modality imaging platforms for human and animal health and robotics for various industrial applications. Epica International's products are designed to have diagnostic capabilities and improve production processes. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Landrum, South Carolina.

name: Haven
cb_description:
Haven provides a full-service automated freight procurement platform and marketplace. The company features an online booking platform for ocean and air services and track-and-trace tools that use AIS (Automatic Identification System) technology to bring real-time location data directly to customers who need increased supply chain visibility. It was founded in 2014 and is based in San Francisco, California. 
On April 7th, 2021, Haven was acquired by FourKites. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Empatica
cb_description: Empatica is an affective computing company that specializes in medical quality sensing and human data analytics within the health monitoring and research sector. The company offers FDA-cleared wearable devices and a health monitoring platform that provides accurate, continuous health insights for researchers and clinicians, collected in real-world settings. Empatica's technology is utilized by pharmaceutical companies to monitor treatment impacts and develop novel digital biomarkers. Empatica was formerly known as Physiio International,Inc.. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts.

name: Lukka
cb_description: Lukka specializes in enterprise crypto data and financial software, catering to the financial sector. The company offers a suite of services including SaaS data management, tax and business reporting, blockchain analytics, compliance solutions, and valuation services for crypto assets. Lukka was formerly known as Libra Services. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Character Biosciences
cb_description: Character Biosciences is a precision medicine company focusing on the development of targeted therapies for ophthalmology. The company specializes in unlocking the patterns of progressive polygenic diseases, particularly macular degeneration, by integrating human genetics, clinical data, and machine learning to develop novel therapeutics and patient biomarkers. Character Biosciences primarily serves the healthcare sector, partnering with patients, providers, and other stakeholders to advance clinical genomic research and drug development. Character Biosciences was formerly known as Clover Therapeutics. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Carlos, California.

name: LISNR
cb_description: LISNR focuses on providing ultrasonic data transmission solutions within the technology sector. The company offers a software development kit (SDK) that enables secure, contactless data transfer and authentication for various applications, including payments and mobility services. LISNR's technology is designed to facilitate seamless and secure transactions without the need for internet connectivity, catering primarily to the financial services and mobility industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Cincinnati, Ohio.

name: Open Bionics
cb_description: Open Bionics specializes in developing assistive devices, particularly in the prosthetics industry. The company's product, the Hero Arm, is a custom-built, multi-grip bionic arm designed for individuals with below-elbow limb differences, including children as young as nine. It primarily serves the prosthetics industry. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Bristol, United Kingdom.

name: Reachdesk
cb_description: Reachdesk is a company that focuses on corporate gifting and direct mail, operating within the marketing and sales industry. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to send gifts and direct mail to customers, prospects, and employees, aiming to build deeper connections and enhance customer experience. Reachdesk primarily serves the marketing and sales sectors of the economy. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Outreach
cb_description: Outreach specializes in providing marketing and outreach products and services tailored for churches. The company offers a range of customizable items such as banners, postcards, bulletins, and sermon kits designed to help churches engage with their communities and promote their events and services. Outreach primarily serves the religious sector, offering tools for churches to reach out to potential members and communicate their message. It was founded in 1996 and is based in Colorado Springs, Colorado. In July 2024, Outreach Media Group was acquired by Gloo.

name: Foodology
cb_description: Foodology operates as a cloud-based cooking and virtual restaurant group. It provides technology and infrastructure solutions to promote and scale virtual restaurant brands. It helps, creates, and operates virtual restaurant brands designed for delivery. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Bogota, Colombia.

name: Finary
cb_description: Finary is a social investing platform building group chats for Gen Z and Millennials. Users can chat with friends about their portfolio, discover new investing communities, and make trades with their brokerage.

name: Safi
cb_description: Safi is a company that focuses on providing technological solutions in the business sector. The company offers a range of software services that help businesses improve their internal and external processes, including resource and process planning, customer relationship management, real-time data for managerial decision-making, and cloud-based business management. These services primarily cater to the needs of businesses seeking to optimize their administrative processes. It is based in Quito, Ecuador.

name: Ledgy
cb_description: Ledgy is an equity management platform that specializes in streamlining equity-related processes for businesses. The company offers solutions for cap table management, equity plan automation, and financial reporting, designed to simplify workflows, ensure compliance, and enhance employee engagement through intuitive dashboards. Ledgy's platform is tailored to serve various sectors, including HR and compensation, finance and accounting, and legal and operations. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Indifi
cb_description: Indifi is a technology platform that specializes in providing unsecured loans to small businesses across various industries. The company offers a range of financial products designed to facilitate growth without the need for collateral, leveraging data analysis to assess creditworthiness. Indifi's main offerings include term loans, lines of credit, invoice discounting, and merchant cash advances, tailored to meet the unique needs of businesses in sectors such as travel, e-commerce, hotels, retail, and restaurants. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Gurgaon, India.

name: DraftWise
cb_description: DraftWise specializes in contract drafting and negotiation solutions. The company offers a secure drafting and negotiation platform that integrates with a firm's data sources to enhance legal document creation and analysis. DraftWise primarily serves transactional lawyers and law firms, institutional knowledge, and client preferences for efficient and accurate contract drafting. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Releaf
cb_description: Releaf is a technology company focused on industrializing food processing in Africa. The company offers proprietary hardware and digital solutions to improve agricultural supply chains, enhance deshelling efficiency, and facilitate the construction of smart factories. Releaf primarily serves the agricultural and food processing industries by providing technology that supports smallholder farmers and food factories. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Uyo, Nigeria.

name: Enveil
cb_description: Enveil is a pioneering Privacy Enhancing Technology company focused on protecting Data in Use across various sectors. The company offers ZeroReveal solutions that enable secure data usage, collaboration, and monetization without compromising data privacy or security. Enveil's products are designed to allow organizations to extract insights and analyze data across boundaries and silos while maintaining the confidentiality and ownership of the underlying data. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Fulton, Maryland.

name: KorrAI
cb_description: KorrAI is creating artificial intelligence software to analyze drilling samples and other mining exploration data.

name: Pico
cb_description: Pico is a global leader in total brand activation, operating in the marketing and advertising industry. The company's main services include experience design, brand engagement, and digital enablement, which are used to create engaging experiences that connect with audiences. Pico primarily serves a wide range of industries, offering solutions that support marketing efficacy across all channels. It is based in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.

name: Procurify
cb_description: Procurify is a company focused on intelligent spend management within the procurement and financial software sectors. It offers a comprehensive procure-to-pay platform that automates purchasing and accounts payable processes, providing real-time visibility and control over business spend. Procurify's platform serves various sectors, including technology, healthcare, biotech, manufacturing, cannabis, education, and nonprofit industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: CompanyCam
cb_description: CompanyCam specializes in photo documentation and project management solutions for the contracting industry. The company offers a platform for contractors to capture, organize, and share job site photos and information, facilitating better communication and project oversight. CompanyCam's services are primarily utilized by various trades within the construction sector, including general contractors, HVAC, landscaping, restoration, roofing, and solar industries. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Lincoln, Nebraska.

name: Pietra
cb_description: Pietra is an e-commerce platform that specializes in providing tools and services for brand development and online retail. The company offers a suite of services including product design, sourcing from vetted suppliers, order fulfillment, and storefront creation to facilitate the operation of e-commerce brands. Pietra primarily serves entrepreneurs and brands looking to start or scale their online retail presence. Pietra was formerly known as Carbon Club. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Nossa Data
cb_description: Nossa Data is a technology company. It focuses on supporting companies with their environmental, social, and governance (ESG) data management, analytics, and reporting. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Wisor
cb_description: Wisor is a mortgage portfolio management platform. The company provides optimization software as a service in the financial sector and specializes in loan optimization such as mortgages, residential, and commercial loans. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Fertifa
cb_description: Fertifa is a leading provider of reproductive health benefits, focusing on services for employers in the healthcare sector. The company offers a comprehensive suite of support services, including fertility and family-forming assistance, menopause support, and men's and women's health programs, all facilitated by an in-house clinical team. Fertifa primarily serves the human resources sector, offering solutions that aid in talent attraction, retention, and overall employee wellbeing. It was founded in 2019 and is based in London, England.

name: New School Foods
cb_description: New School Foods specializes in the creation of plant-based seafood alternatives, focusing on the food technology sector. The company offers a proprietary whole-cut salmon filet that mimics the look, cook, taste, and flake of wild salmon using advanced muscle fiber and scaffolding technologies. New School Foods targets the alternative protein market with its innovative products designed to appeal to both consumers and culinary professionals. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Toronto, Ontario.

name: Depixus
cb_description: Depixus is a company focused on the development of innovative technology in the biotechnology sector. The company's main offering is a single molecular analysis platform that uses magnetic force spectroscopy to probe complex biomolecular interactions, providing critical and unique structural insights. This technology primarily serves the healthcare and research sectors, aiding in the decoding of disease mechanisms and the development of more effective therapies. Depixus was formerly known as PicoSeq. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Paris, France.

name: Quantum Circuits
cb_description: Quantum Circuits focuses on developing quantum computing technology. It offers quantum computers designed to solve complex problems that classical computers cannot handle, leveraging quantum phenomena such as superposition and entanglement for massive parallelism and exponential scaling of computational power. It primarily serves sectors requiring high computational power, such as the finance, pharmaceutical, machine learning, and artificial intelligence (AI) industries. The company was founded in 2015 and is based in New Haven, Connecticut.

name: Mattermost
cb_description: Mattermost focuses on providing collaboration solutions for technical teams. The company offers a platform that facilitates team communication, task and project management, and workflow orchestration. The primary sectors that it serves include the software development industry and various technical teams across different sectors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Jellatech
cb_description: Jellatech is a biotechnology company focused on producing animal-free collagen and gelatin for various industries. The company specializes in developing technologies to harvest high-quality, pure collagen and gelatin from cells, offering an alternative to traditional animal-derived sources. Jellatech primarily serves sectors that require collagen and gelatin, such as the food industry, cosmetics, and pharmaceuticals. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: CRS
cb_description: Acquirer of Australian mining services.

name: StyleSeat
cb_description: StyleSeat provides a digital marketplace focused on the beauty, grooming, and wellness industry. The company provides a platform for independent professionals in these sectors to grow their businesses, and for clients to discover and book their services. It primarily serves the beauty and wellness industry. It was founded in 2009 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Geniebook
cb_description: Geniebook is an EdTech company specializing in online learning for primary and secondary school students. The company offers a suite of products including AI-personalised worksheets, live online classes, and real-time teacher chats, designed to support English, Mathematics, Science, and Chinese subjects. Geniebook's proprietary AI technology personalizes learning experiences by adapting to individual student needs, while its live classes and teacher support aim to enhance academic understanding and performance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore, Singapore.

name: Enlaza Therapeutics
cb_description: Enlaza Therapeutics focuses on the development of covalent protein therapeutics within the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industry. The company specializes in creating a new class of protein therapeutics that utilize proprietary technology to deliver treatments aimed at improving efficacy and safety for patients with cancer and other serious diseases. Enlaza Therapeutics' proprietary War-Lock technology enables the engineering of biologic drugs that form irreversible bonds with disease targets, potentially enhancing therapeutic outcomes. It was founded in 2020 and is based in La Jolla, California.

name: Heyday
cb_description: Heyday is an AI copilot that specializes in personal knowledge management and productivity enhancement. The company provides a platform that transforms documents, notes, and conversations into a searchable database, shareable content, and actionable insights. Heyday primarily serves professionals who require efficient information management and content creation, such as executive coaches, management consultants, and researchers. Heyday was formerly known as Journal. It was founded in 2021 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Roon
cb_description: Roon is a content management and publishing platform designed for creators, publishers, and businesses. It offers tools for website creation, content publication, email newsletters, and paid subscriptions. The company primarily serves the digital publishing and content marketing sectors.

name: Aspire
cb_description: Aspire specializes in security solutions for the retail sector, offering products and services designed to enhance the safety and efficiency of commercial environments. The company's main offerings include a universal locking system known as the OneKEY ecosystem, which simplifies access control with a single key solution, and various theft prevention products that protect merchandise without compromising the customer experience. Aspire also provides point of sale systems that facilitate personalized customer service and seamless transactions. It is based in Washington, DC.

name: Topl
cb_description: Topl specializes in enhancing Bitcoin's capabilities through its Layer 2 protocol, focusing on the cryptocurrency and blockchain industry. The company offers a scalable solution that provides compatibility with Bitcoin's architecture, supports various token types without smart contracts, and facilitates easier development with API calls. Topl's protocol is designed to serve the evolving needs of developers and projects within the cryptocurrency ecosystem. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Aembit
cb_description: Aembit focuses on Workload Access Management for non-human identities within various business sectors. It offers a platform that manages and enforces access between workloads through automated, policy-based, and identity-driven controls without the need for traditional secrets. It primarily serves sectors that require automated access management for cloud, on-premises, and SaaS environments. The company was founded in 2021 and is based in Silver Spring, Maryland.

name: OkCredit
cb_description: OkCredit focuses on providing digital ledger solutions in the financial technology sector. The company offers a mobile application that allows small business owners and their customers to record credit and payment transactions digitally, making the process of managing accounts simpler and more efficient. It serves various sectors, including mobile recharge and repair shops, medical and pharmacy stores, grocery stores, cloth and garment stores, wholesalers and distributors, and more. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Comet
cb_description: Comet connects large companies with freelance tech and data specialists.

name: Orbit Fab
cb_description: Orbit Fab focuses on providing in-space refueling services for spacecraft within the aerospace industry. The company's main offerings include delivering fuel directly to spacecraft equipped with its proprietary RAFTI refueling interface and optimizing refueling logistics through its UMPIRE mission planning software. It primarily serves government space programs and commercial spacecraft operators. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Lafayette, Colorado.

name: Epidemic Sound
cb_description: Epidemic Sound is a MusicTech company that operates in the music and technology sectors. The company provides high-quality music and sound effects for content creators, allowing them to add soundtracks to their videos across various platforms without the concern of hidden fees or takedowns. Epidemic Sound primarily serves the content creation industry, including YouTubers, production companies, broadcasters, and global brands. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

name: Kindbody
cb_description: Kindbody is a fertility clinic network. It operates in the healthcare sector, providing a comprehensive range of reproductive health services. The company offers fertility assessments, testing, egg freezing, in vitro fertilization (IVF), and virtual fertility telemedicine, as well as women's wellness services. Kindbody is also a family-building benefits provider for employers, aiming to make fertility care more affordable and accessible to a broader population. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Avicena Tech
cb_description: Avicena Tech specializes in the development of micro light-emitting diode (LED) based bandwidth interconnects for the semiconductor industry. The company's main offerings include optical chip-to-chip communication technologies that address data bottlenecks in cloud computing. Avicena Tech's products are designed to enable efficient communication and compute capabilities across various sectors, including computing, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and memory disaggregation. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Parloa
cb_description: Parloa specializes in conversational artificial intelligence within the customer service sector. The company's main offerings include a platform for automating contact centers, enhancing customer experiences, and providing real-time agent assistance through AI. It primarily serves the customer service sector. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Berlin, Germany.

name: Payload
cb_description: Payload is a FinTech platform that operates in the digital payment industry. The company offers a suite of payment products that automate inbound and outbound payments, allowing businesses to accept payments from any card or bank account in the U.S. and Canada, and send payments to individuals and other businesses. Payload primarily serves software providers and merchants across various industries. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cincinnati, Ohio.

name: g7
cb_description: As of June 2nd, 2022, g7 was acquired by Wavecrest. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed. g7 is a provider of retail marketing offering services such as Retail Execution, and Retail Experience. Retail Experience service creates a more engaging experience for shoppers by offering rewards and more. The Retail Execution service provides protection of products and fights for potential shoppers. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Bucharest, Romania.

name: Edge Delta
cb_description: Edge Delta is an automated observability platform that specializes in monitoring services and guiding root-cause analysis within the tech industry. The company offers AI-driven anomaly detection, log search and analytics, and observability pipelines to manage and analyze large volumes of data in real-time. Edge Delta's solutions cater to businesses looking to enhance their monitoring capabilities and reduce observability costs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Maev
cb_description: Maev is a wellness company that operates in the pet care industry, with a specific focus on dogs. The company offers a range of products including raw food, daily vitamins, and bone broth, all of which are human-grade and formulated by veterinary nutritionists. These products are designed to address common nutritional gaps and promote overall health in dogs. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Emrgy
cb_description: Emrgy operates as a new technology company focused on renewable energy within the hydropower sector. It offers modular, scalable hydroelectric solutions that can be integrated into existing water infrastructures to generate clean energy without the need for construction or dams. The company primarily serves sectors that have access to water conveyance infrastructure, such as water treatment, irrigation, and industrial cooling systems. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Kidato
cb_description: Kidato offers live online academic and after-school classes for kids ages 4 to 18.

name: Enjin
cb_description: Enjin is a blockchain technology company that operates in the gaming and digital asset industries. The company's main offerings include the creation, distribution, and integration of non-fungible tokens (NFTs), as well as tools and services for managing and trading these digital assets. Enjin primarily serves the gaming industry, but its products are also used by businesses of all sizes seeking to utilize tokenized digital assets. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Singapore.

name: Clari
cb_description: Clari operates as a company focused on improving efficiency, predictability, and growth in the revenue process, operating in the technology and business services sectors. The company offers a revenue platform that provides total visibility into businesses, driving process rigor, spotting risk and opportunity in the pipeline, increasing forecast accuracy, and enhancing overall efficiency. It primarily serves sales, marketing, and customer success teams across various industries. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Sunnyvale, California.

name: Greenzie
cb_description: Greenzie is a company that focuses on the development of software for the outdoor power equipment industry. The company's main offering is a self-driving technology for commercial mowers, designed to enhance safety, productivity, and profitability. This technology primarily serves the commercial landscaping industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

name: Flieber
cb_description: Flieber specializes in inventory planning and management for e-commerce brands, operating within the supply chain and logistics industry. It offers a multichannel inventory planning platform that provides insights, smart decision-making tools, and growth opportunities for Shopify and Amazon sellers. Flieber's platform is designed for inventory planning with data across various sales channels and inventory locations, offering features like inventory forecast, replenishment simulation, and direct integrations with major online marketplaces. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Rabbit
cb_description: Rabbit develops a video chat application sharing content and connects people. It allows users to create rooms, join friends, have a group chat, meet new people, and discover content together. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in San Mateo, California.

name: WindBorne Systems
cb_description: WindBorne Systems specializes in advanced weather forecasting and atmospheric data collection within the meteorological technology sector. The company offers AI-powered weather forecasts and operates a constellation of smart, long-duration balloons that collect atmospheric data across the globe. WindBorne's technology serves sectors that require precise meteorological data, such as governmental research agencies and defense organizations. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: Mapped
cb_description: Mapped is an AI-powered data infrastructure company specializing in the commercial and industrial IoT sector. The company provides a platform that automates data discovery, normalization, and enrichment, enabling secure access to real-time data from various sources such as building systems, sensors, and devices. Mapped primarily serves sectors such as commercial real estate, retail, warehouse, manufacturing, and other industries requiring integrated building systems and IoT solutions. It was founded in 2019 and is based in El Segundo, California.

name: Plentific
cb_description: Plentific is a company that focuses on property management, maintenance, and repairs in the real estate sector. The company offers a software-as-a-service (SaaS) platform that provides property managers and landlords with tools for managing property repairs, maintenance, compliance, resident engagement, and inspections. The company primarily serves the real estate industry, including social housing, private landlords, property managers, and contractors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in London, England.

name: Gokada
cb_description: Gokada is a technology company focused on changing the face of transportation in Nigeria starting with an on-demand motorcycle taxi service in order to solve some of the country's challenging problems in logistics and transportation. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Lagos, Nigeria.

name: Kognitos
cb_description: Kognitos develops an artificial intelligence (AI) platform that helps organizations with business processes. The company offers products such as language processing automation (NLPA) and Large language models (LLMs) to help business users in analyzing everyday workflows. Kognitos was founded in 2020 and is based in San Jose, California.

name: Twiga
cb_description: Twiga is a technology-driven company that operates in the retail and e-commerce sectors. The company provides a business-to-business supply platform that connects consumers, vendors, and suppliers, offering access to a variety of goods including fresh produce, groceries, and other retail products. Twiga primarily serves the retail industry, with a focus on small and medium-sized vendors in urban markets. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Nairobi, Kenya.

name: Voiceitt
cb_description: Voiceitt is a company focused on inclusive voice AI, specializing in the development of speech recognition technology for individuals with speech disabilities. The company offers a proprietary automatic speech recognition (ASR) technology that translates non-standard speech patterns into clear speech in real time, enabling access to voice-activated devices and technologies. Voiceitt's technology is designed to serve individuals with speech impairments, aging adults, and accented speakers through customizable API integrations for a range of applications. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.

name: Condoit
cb_description: Condoit specializes in cloud-based software for electrical system standardization and analysis within the electrical industry. The company offers a suite of tools for real-time electrical data collection, site assessments, and collaborative project management, aimed at electricians, engineers, and other professionals in the field. Condoit's products are designed to streamline electrical design, reduce installation times for EV chargers, and facilitate efficient project collaboration. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Birmingham, Alabama.

name: SkyHawk Security
cb_description: SkyHawk Security is a cloud-native protector (CNP) business that offers cloud threat detection services. The company provides comprehensive protection for workloads and applications hosted in public cloud environments and uses a multi-layered approach that covers the overall security posture of the cloud and threats to individual workloads. The company was founded in 2022 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Araris Biotech
cb_description: Araris Biotech AG specializes in the development of a novel antibody-drug conjugate (ADC) linker technology within the biopharmaceutical sector. The company's main offerings include a proprietary platform that allows for the attachment of therapeutic payloads to antibodies in a single step, without the need for antibody re-engineering, resulting in stable, potent, and homogenous ADC therapies for cancer treatment. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Zurich, Switzerland.

name: Unbounce
cb_description: Unbounce is a tech company that operates in the digital marketing industry. The company provides a platform that allows users to create and optimize landing pages, popups, and sticky bars, and also offers AI-powered features for generating and optimizing copy for various marketing materials. Unbounce primarily serves sectors such as ecommerce, SaaS, small businesses, and B2B marketing. It was founded in 2009 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Apptopia
cb_description: Apptopia provides competitive intelligence for the mobile app economy. It provides downloads, active users, revenue, demographics, audience intelligence, and SDK data for every mobile app and publisher in the world. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Uplevel
cb_description: Uplevel provides an engineering effectiveness platform. The company uses machine learning and organizational science to bring insights from behavioral change. It helps engineering teams analyze the effectiveness of their developers by pulling data from various software tools. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Expel
cb_description: Expel operates as a security operations company and specializes in managed detection and response (MDR) within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers various services such as 24/7 monitoring, threat detection, incident response, and security infrastructure optimization. Expel was formerly known as The Concern. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Herndon, Virginia.

name: Aclarity
cb_description: Aclarity specializes in the destruction of per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) contaminants within the environmental remediation sector. The company offers an electrochemical oxidation system that effectively breaks down PFAS compounds in water and liquid waste, providing a solution for various industries. Aclarity primarily serves sectors that require regulatory compliance and environmental management, such as landfills, industrial wastewater, and municipal drinking water facilities. Aclarity was formerly known as ElectroPure. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Hadley, Massachusetts.

name: TechsoMed
cb_description: TechsoMed focuses on the development of ultrasound-based real-time monitoring systems for thermal ablation procedures. The company produces, BioTrace, an image analysis system that predicts and visualizes the post-treatment ablation morphology in real-time, allowing physicians to optimize the level of control and accuracy during the procedure. It primarily sells to the healthcare industry, with a particular focus on the oncology and cardiovascular sectors. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Rehovot, Israel.

name: TOLREMO
cb_description: TOLREMO is a biopharmaceutical company focused on preventing non-genetic cancer drug resistance. The company develops small molecule inhibitors, such as TT125-802, that target critical mechanisms governing transcriptional resistance pathways in cancer cells, aiming to improve the efficacy and durability of existing cancer therapies. TOLREMO's products are designed to be combined with targeted therapeutic agents to prevent therapeutic escape mechanisms in cancer treatment. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Basel, Switzerland.

name: NodeSource
cb_description: NodeSource specializes in Node.js runtime security and performance optimization within the software industry. The company offers a secure and extensible Node.js platform, observability tools, and services including vulnerability scanning, application monitoring, and anomaly detection. NodeSource primarily serves organizations looking to enhance their Node.js applications' security and efficiency. It is based in San Francisco, California. In October 2019, NodeSource was acquired by Interactive Insights.

name: Nostra
cb_description: Nostra is a technology company that operates in the ecommerce industry. The company offers products that focus on improving site performance and speed, reducing latency, and conversion rates. These products are designed to help businesses optimize their ecommerce stores, improve their site performance scores, and increase their conversion rates. Nostra primarily serves the ecommerce industry. Nostra was formerly known as FlashTryp. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Volition
cb_description: Volition is a video game development studio. The studio is known for the Saints Row series and many others. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Champaign, Illinois. In August 2023, Volition Games ceased its operations.

name: HoneyLove
cb_description: HoneyLove specializes in the design and retail of shapewear and intimate apparel. The company offers a range of products including bras, bodysuits, tops, bottoms, and underwear that incorporate shaping and support features. HoneyLove primarily serves the fashion and apparel industry, focusing on garments that combine functionality with style. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Voatz
cb_description: Voatz is a company that focuses on leveraging technology to enhance the voting process, operating within the domain of election technology. The company offers a secure and accessible mobile voting platform, which uses smartphone security, remote identity verification, biometrics, and blockchain technology to ensure the integrity of votes. Voatz primarily serves governments and political parties, facilitating various voting events such as overseas citizen absentee voting, state political party conventions, and university student government elections. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Appsmith
cb_description: Appsmith is a low-code application platform focused on simplifying custom application development for businesses within the software development industry. The company offers a suite of tools that enable rapid building, deployment, and management of internal software applications, with features such as drag-and-drop UI building, database and API integration, and JavaScript customization. Appsmith primarily serves sectors that require internal business tools, such as operations, sales, and engineering. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: BCB Group
cb_description: BCB Group provides regulated financial services. It offers a range of services including compliance, trade execution, and settlement, consolidated reporting, digital custody, payment services, and business banking. It primarily serves businesses in the digital asset space. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: liV
cb_description: liV is a medical education agency focused on providing continuing professional development and education within the healthcare sector. Their services include developing and executing educational strategies based on clinical evidence to improve patient and public health outcomes. They cater primarily to professionals within the health professions education industry. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Montreal, Quebec. liV operates as a subsidiary of AlliancePharma.

name: Heex Technologies
cb_description: Heex Technologies specializes in data management solutions for the development and operation of autonomous systems within the technology sector. The company offers a platform that transforms large volumes of data into actionable insights, facilitating the development of AI and autonomous technologies by focusing on the most relevant data, termed 'Smart-Data'. Heex Technologies primarily serves industries that require advanced data analysis and management, such as the automotive, transportation, and smart city sectors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Paris, France.

name: NeoMagic
cb_description: NeoMagic is a diversified technology company with a focus on semiconductors, e-commerce, and RF & microwave components. The company offers innovative semiconductors under the 'MiMagic' brand, operates an e-commerce platform called MercadoMagico, and designs high-performance microwave components and subsystems through its Advanced Microwave division. NeoMagic primarily serves sectors such as military electronics, commercial wireless communication, and consumer electronics. It was founded in 1993 and is based in Milpitas, California.

name: Lucky Energy
cb_description: Lucky Energy specializes in the production and distribution of energy drinks within the beverage industry. Its products are formulated with zero sugar, five super ingredients, and contain only five calories, catering to health-conscious consumers seeking an energy boost. The company primarily targets individuals looking for better-for-you beverage options. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: Mio Games
cb_description: Mio Games is a gaming company. The company provides mobile gaming experiences to its fellow gamers. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Avant-garde Health
cb_description: Avant-garde Health specializes in healthcare data analytics, focusing on the improvement of care value in the healthcare industry. The company offers solutions for surgical cost management, clinical operations evaluation, and patient outcomes optimization, utilizing data to drive cost reduction and operational efficiency. Avant-garde Health primarily serves hospitals, ASCs, and physicians, providing them with detailed insights to inform better decision-making and improve financial and clinical performance. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: ella Health
cb_description: ella health is committed to improving women's health through breast cancer screening and other services that promote the early detection and diagnosis of disease. Designed with extensive input from women, the company\'s clinical approach combines expert and compassionate staff with patient-centered exam features such as cushioned image detectors to decrease mammogram discomfort and results reporting within 24 hours.

name: Day Zero Diagnostics
cb_description: Day Zero Diagnostics specializes in genomic sequencing and machine learning to advance the field of infectious disease diagnostics. The company offers rapid, whole genome sequencing-based diagnostics that enable precise organism identification and antimicrobial resistance profiling, aiming to improve the treatment of infectious diseases. Day Zero Diagnostics primarily serves the healthcare sector, focusing on improving outcomes for patients with severe infections like sepsis. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Brighton, Massachusetts.

name: Equipt Health
cb_description: Equipt Health specializes in providing home medical equipment for sleep apnea testing and treatment. The company offers FDA-approved home sleep apnea tests, oral appliances, and positional devices to manage and treat sleep apnea. Equipt Health primarily serves individuals seeking sleep apnea solutions outside of traditional clinical settings. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Seattle, Washington.

name: Carbonfact

name: Blue Wireless
cb_description: Blue Wireless is a Burlingame, California-based Mobile & Telecommunications company.

name: Scriptick
cb_description:
Scriptick brings social technologies to personal storytelling.  We foster multimedia storytelling, and empower our users to create ad hoc social networks and exchange/document life experiences in a more meaningful way.

Scriptick is a social network that empowers you to add context, organization, and beauty to your lifes moments.  Its a place to privately document your world, reflect on memories with family and friends, and preserve these moments in a new format that tells a cogent story  the story of you.  Think memoir, social network, and biography in one.

Amberlo serves a broad range of clients within the legal sector, offering features such as a client portal, trust accounting, and robust security measures to ensure data protection and compliance. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: influData
cb_description: InfluData focuses on influencer marketing in the digital marketing industry. The company provides services that allow users to search for and analyze influencers, offering insights into audience demographics, platform performance, and content analysis. It primarily serves the social media marketing industry. InfluData was founded in 2020 and is based in Vienna, Austria.

name: MPA Technologies
cb_description: Mpa Technologies is a company that received a SBIR Phase I grant for a project entitled: Asymmetrical Tetrapyrroles for Two-Photon Volumetric Optical Memory. Their proposal defines a new paradigm for 3D optical storage which relies on two-photon write and read mechanisms based on rapid, reversible proton photo-isomerization in asymmetric phthalocyanine molecules specifically designed to operate via a proton switching mechanism that eschews molecular motion and depends only on electron reorganization. This work will clearly delineate a new figure-of-merit that identifies molecular structures capable of enhanced optical memory characteristics. It is anticipated that such structure-property relationships will result in new ultra-fast terabit storage capabilities at least one order of magnitude better than the best contemporary materials. The operational temperature limit for these new materials is predicted to be in the range of electronic (Peltier) cooling to, at best, room temperature operation. This model will result in a radically new paradigm for an ultra-fast organic memory material, and a new benchmark for optical computing. Modern optical information storage (OIS) technology is shifting rapidly towards ultra-fast, multilayer, three-dimensional (3D) carriers of information. This technology could empower the average citizen with the capability of manipulating vast amounts of stored data, whether in text or visual format. Current technology cannot possibly meet this demand due to the inherent limitations on memory based on nuclear motion.

name: Haichuan Intelligence
cb_description: Manufacturer of weighing machines in China.

The technology can also be adapted for clinical use for personalized medicine applications.
