name: Sightfull
cb_description: Sightfull is an end-to-end analytics solution focused on providing a governed metric store for the SaaS industry. The company offers a platform that enables self-service analytics and report building without the need for coding, facilitated by a semantic modeling layer designed for data teams. Sightfull's products are tailored to serve various business functions such as revenue operations, marketing operations, sales operations, and finance teams, with a focus on automating and enhancing the accuracy and insight of revenue reporting, campaign attribution, and performance analysis. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Defactor
cb_description: Defactor focuses on developing an ecosystem for the tokenisation of real-world and digital assets within the decentralised finance sector. The company offers a comprehensive toolkit for businesses to create and manage lending pools, represent real-world assets digitally, and engage in community governance and staking. Defactor primarily serves the blockchain and cryptocurrency markets, enabling liquidity and fostering global accessibility through its platform. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Dublin, Ireland.

name: Audiens
cb_description: Audiens is a company that focuses on data analytics and marketing optimization in the ecommerce industry. The company offers a Shopify app that uses data science to analyze customer behavior, predict future purchases, and provide recommendations for targeted email campaigns. The app also integrates with Klaviyo, allowing users to create and manage their email campaigns more effectively. It is based in Milan, Italy.

name: Topigen Pharmaceuticals
cb_description: Topigen Pharmaceuticals is a company focused on respiratory research within the pharmaceutical industry. The company's main offerings include the development and distribution of various biological research products such as antibodies, assay kits, biology cells, and DNA testing kits. These products are primarily used in the research and development sector of the pharmaceutical industry. It was founded in 2000 and is based in Montreal, Quebec.

name: Seaplane
cb_description: Seaplane offers a cloud-based platform. It helps developers build and scale applications globally without the complexity of managing cloud infrastructure. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Re(source) Energy
cb_description: Re(source) Energy is a social enterprise focused on the development of carbon offset credits within the renewable energy sector. The company facilitates the creation and sale of solar carbon offset credits for owners of grid-tied solar PV systems, enabling them to earn payments by displacing grid electricity with solar production in Alberta's regulated carbon market. Re(source) Energy primarily serves individuals, businesses, and communities in Alberta looking to reduce the cost of owning solar panels and participate in the carbon market. It is based in Edmonton, Alberta.

name: Immune-Onc Therapeutics
cb_description: Immune-Onc Therapeutics is a clinical-stage company that focuses on the development of novel myeloid checkpoint inhibitors in the healthcare and biotechnology industry. The company's main offerings include the development of immunotherapies for cancer, harnessing the body's own immune system to fight against disease, with a particular focus on blood cancers and solid tumors. Immune-Onc primarily sells to the healthcare industry, specifically in the field of cancer treatment. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Palo Alto, California.

name: TripleA
cb_description: TripleA focuses on enabling cryptocurrency transactions in the financial technology sector. The company provides services that allow businesses to accept and make payments in cryptocurrencies without having to hold or convert the crypto themselves, ensuring zero volatility. TripleA serves sectors such as ecommerce, gaming, luxury, travel and hospitality, real estate, and fintech. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Singapore.

name: Gross-Wen Technologies
cb_description: Gross-Wen Technologies specializes in algae-based wastewater treatment solutions within the environmental technology domain. The company offers a patented revolving algal biofilm (RAB) system designed to sustainably recover nutrients from wastewater, while also producing a valuable algae byproduct. It primarily serves municipal and industrial sectors with its wastewater treatment solutions. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Slater, Iowa.

name: ShopAble.in
cb_description: DaaZ operates as a domain marketplace, specializing in the sale and transfer of domain names. The company offers secure domain name transactions, including sales, leasing options, and a lease to own program, with a variety of payment methods and a moneyback guarantee. DaaZ primarily serves individuals and businesses looking to purchase or sell domain names online. It is based in Delhi, India.

name: Lightyear
cb_description: Lightyear Technology is a provider of the dental industry's most advanced imaging technologies, including digital x-ray equipment, imaging software and peripherals.

name: Horizon Biotechnology
cb_description: Horizon Biotechnology is a Mountain View, California-based Healthcare company.

name: Vista Healthcare
cb_description: Vista Healthcare is a healthcare facility in the United Kingdom.

name: Turbo Tenant
cb_description: Turbo Tenant is a company that focuses on providing rental property management software in the real estate industry. The company offers a range of services including advertising rental properties, facilitating rental applications, tenant screening, lease agreement creation, rent collection, and integrated accounting. Its services primarily cater to landlords and real estate investors. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Fort Collins, Colorado.

name: insiders
cb_description: insiders specialize in the automated development and processing of knowledge in business processes. It focuses on artificial intelligence, rules, and knowledge-based systems. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Mainz, Germany. It is a subsidiary of Schufa Holding AG.

name: COGOS Technologies
cb_description: COGOS Technologies focuses on digitally transforming city logistics within the commercial transportation sector. The company offers a smart-tech-enabled platform that serves as a one-stop destination for intra-city link-supply chain solutions, utilizing advanced sensors, IoT technology, and third-party applications to support truckers. The company primarily sells to the B2B logistics solution market. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

name: Whoop
cb_description: Whoop focuses on wearable technology designed to enhance human performance within the health and fitness industry. The company offers a wearable device that tracks sleep, strain, recovery, and health metrics to provide personalized insights and recommendations. Whoop primarily serves individuals seeking to improve their personal health and athletic performance. Whoop was formerly known as Bobo Analytics. It was founded in 2012 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.

name: Avia Games
cb_description: Avia Games is a company that focuses on the mobile gaming industry. The company offers a variety of online games that users can play on their mobile devices, including card games, bingo games, and pool games. These games are designed to be fun and engaging, and they offer users the opportunity to win real money prizes. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Mountain View, California.

name: Luminos
cb_description: Luminos is a content marketing agency with a focus on SEO-driven strategies. The company specializes in creating content designed to improve site traffic and online sales through search engine optimization. It primarily serves businesses looking to enhance their online presence and grow their brand through effective digital marketing. It is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Sentant
cb_description: Sentant is a cybersecurity and IT services firm. It specializes in security and compliance for fast-growing companies. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California. In November 2022, Sentant was acquired by Westwood Technology Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: HEPHAISTOS Pharma
cb_description: HEPHAISTOS Pharma serves a preclinical stage biotech company focused on developing immunotherapies for oncology. Its main product, ONCO-Boost, is an immunostimulant designed to treat metastatic cancers by stimulating the immune system to recognize and attack tumors. The company primarily serves the healthcare sector, with a focus for existing cancer treatments and addressing the unmet need for more effective immunotherapies. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Orsay, France.

name: IMsystem
cb_description: IMsystem develops magnetic micro medical robot systems for targeted treatment and precision vascular intervention. The company offers three-dimensional vascular simulators, electrophysiological platforms, and more. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Daegu, South Korea.

name: Green Places
cb_description: Green Places provides sustainability-focused solutions. The company offers a platform that enables businesses to meet their sustainability goals, offering services such as carbon reporting, emission reductions, and the identification of return on investment opportunities in sustainability. The company primarily serves businesses across various sectors looking to enhance their sustainability practices. It was founded in 2021 and is based in Raleigh, North Carolina.

name: wCopilot
cb_description: wCopilot is a no-code development agency that specializes in Webflow design and development services. The agency offers comprehensive solutions for creating, updating, and maintaining Webflow websites, ensuring responsive design and speed optimization for a seamless user experience. wCopilot caters primarily to marketing teams, venture capital firms, agencies, and startups, providing them with unlimited Webflow development and technical work through a monthly, flat-rate subscription. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Akure, Nigeria.

name: Elementary
cb_description: Elementary specializes in AI and quality platforms for the manufacturing sector. The company offers machine learning-driven visual inspections and tools for analyzing real-time production quality data, aimed at improving manufacturing processes and maximizing yield. Elementary's solutions are designed to identify and classify defects, provide actionable insights through data analysis, and support sustainable manufacturing by reducing scrap and waste. It was founded in 2017 and is based in South Pasadena, California.

name: GoZayaan
cb_description: GoZayaan (GZ) is a travel company. It focuses on simplifying travel experiences through technology-enabled solutions. The company offers an online platform that allows users to plan and manage their travel journeys. It primarily serves the travel and tourism industry. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

name: Flowcarbon
cb_description: Flowcarbon specializes in carbon finance and engineered carbon removal solutions within the environmental services sector. The company offers a range of services including project finance, development, and management of carbon credit portfolios, as well as sales and trading of carbon credits. Flowcarbon primarily caters to organizations looking to invest in or develop carbon removal projects and those seeking to manage their carbon credit assets. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Robin Food
cb_description: Robin Food offers marine products and supports the sustainable development of the local community. It offers crabs, lobsters, fishes, octopus, and more. It is based in Valparaiso, Chile.

name: Huddle 01
cb_description: Huddle 01 focuses on democratizing digital connectivity through its decentralized real-time communication network within the telecommunications sector. The company offers a platform for peer-to-peer sharing of unused internet bandwidth to power audio and video calls, providing enhanced security, ultra-low latency, and significant cost savings. Huddle 01 also provides developer-friendly software development kits (SDKs) to enable live audio and video experiences for various applications. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Middletown, Delaware.

name: Terray Therapeutics
cb_description: Terray Therapeutics operates as a biotechnology company. The company has developed a novel screening and optimization platform to develop and invent treatments for intractable causes of human disease. Terray Therapeutics was founded in 2018 and is based in Monrovia, California.

name: Vectorly
cb_description: Vectorly is a company focused on providing AI solutions in the engineering leadership domain. Its main product, Ace, offers services such as performance tracking, motivation enhancement, and growth insights for both managers and developers. The company primarily serves the tech industry, particularly sectors that require engineering leadership. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Delaware, United States.

name: Avalon Technologies
cb_description: Avalon Technologies specializes in IT solutions and services within the technology sector. They offer managed solutions, technology consulting, and implementation services to address a range of IT challenges. The company primarily serves sectors such as law firms, professional sports teams, higher education institutions, and various other industries. It is based in Bloomfield Hills, Michigan.

name: Kaskada
cb_description: Kaskada is a machine learning (ML) company that focuses on managing, storing , and accessing time-based data to train behavioral ML models and deliver the instant, actionable insights that fuel artificial intelligence (AI). It caters mainly to the data science and machine learning industries. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Seattle, Washington. In January 2023, Kaskada was acquired by DataStax. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Forum Energy
cb_description: Forum Energy is an upstream oil and gas company. It explores oil, natural gas, and coal. The company is based in London, U.K. In December 2022, PXP Energy acquired a majority stake in Forum Energy. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Side-Kick Games
cb_description: Side-Kick Games focuses on developing casual and mid-core games for mobile devices and emerging platforms within the gaming industry. Their main offerings include games that utilize Virtual Reality, Motion Controls, Augmented Reality, and touch technologies, catering to a diverse audience across various age groups. The company primarily serves the gaming and entertainment sectors with its innovative technology-driven gaming experiences. It was founded in 2010 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Lyra Therapeutics
cb_description: Lyra Therapeutics is a clinical-stage biotechnology company with a focus on developing innovative therapies in the healthcare sector. The company's main service is the creation of therapies for the localized treatment of chronic rhinosinusitis (CRS), a debilitating inflammatory disease, with the aim of providing long-lasting treatment options. Lyra Therapeutics primarily serves the healthcare industry, specifically targeting patients suffering from CRS. Lyra Therapeutics was formerly known as 480 Biomedical. It was founded in 2005 and is based in Watertown, Massachusetts.

name: Snorkel AI
cb_description: Snorkel AI specializes in data-centric artificial intelligence solutions for the enterprise domain. The company offers an AI data development platform that enables development of AI applications by programmatically labeling and curating data, fine-tuning large language models, and building specialized AI models. It primarily serves sectors such as banking, healthcare, government, insurance, and telecom with its AI technology. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Redwood City, California.

name: Blocksteam
cb_description: Blocksteam is a blockchain gaming development platform.

name: ThriveAgric
cb_description: ThriveAgric is an agricultural technology company focused on empowering smallholder farmers and promoting food security. They provide technology-driven services that link farmers to finance, best practices, and markets for their commodities. ThriveAgric primarily serves the agriculture value chain, including food producers, financiers, processors, and consumers. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Abuja, Nigeria.

name: Legible
cb_description: Legible is a company focused on providing digital reading experiences across various genres and formats. It offers unlimited access to a vast library of eBooks and audiobooks, along with interactive multimedia books enhanced by artificial intelligence. Legible primarily serves the digital content consumption sector, catering to readers and listeners seeking a seamless and customizable reading experience on multiple devices. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Health Assure
cb_description: Health Assure is a healthcare organization focused on simplifying access to primary care services. The company offers a variety of health plans that provide cashless access to doctors, diagnostics, and wellness services. Health Assure primarily serves individuals and families seeking comprehensive healthcare coverage. It was founded in 2011 and is based in Mumbai, India.

name: Mercury
cb_description: Mercury focuses on providing energy and telecommunications services and operates within the renewable energy, utilities, and telecom sectors. The company offers electricity generated from renewable sources, gas services, broadband internet, and mobile telecommunications, as well as customer rewards programs. Mercury primarily serves residential and business customers with their utility and telecommunications needs. Mercury was formerly known as Mighty River Power. It was founded in 1999 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.

name: Altor Solutions
cb_description: Altor Solutions specializes in engineered transport solutions within the packaging, insulation, and componentry sectors. The company offers a range of custom and stocked products designed for cushioning, thermal protection, and structural support, as well as engineering design services and value-added secondary operations. Altor Solutions primarily serves industries that require specialized packaging and insulation solutions for their products. It was founded in 1957 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.

name: Argon Technologies
cb_description: Argon Technologies specializes in providing high-speed internet services and technical support for small business and enterprise companies. Their main offerings include broadband internet access, VoIP services, and dedicated technical support for businesses. The company primarily serves the internet service sector, offering solutions for connectivity and communication. It is based in Ogden, Utah.

name: Hour One
cb_description: Hour One specializes in AI-powered content creation within the enterprise software industry. The company offers a platform for generating lifelike avatar videos from text, streamlining the production of personalized content for various business needs. Hour One's services cater to sectors such as learning and development, product marketing, and customer success, among others. It was founded in 2019 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

name: Rivet
cb_description: Rivet is a company that focuses on providing node infrastructure services in the technology sector. The company offers cloud-based services for Ethereum and Ethereum Classic node infrastructure, making it easier for users to manage and scale their operations. Rivet primarily serves the cryptocurrency industry. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Lenexa, Kansas.

name: ClimateTrade
cb_description: ClimateTrade focuses on carbon offsetting and fostering a transition within various business sectors. The company offers a marketplace for carbon credits and renewable energy projects, utilizing blockchain technology aiming at transparency and traceability in climate action. ClimateTrade provides tools and solutions such as carbon footprint calculators, application programming interfaces (APIs), and white-label services to enable businesses and individuals to measure, manage, and offset their carbon emissions. ClimateTrade was formerly known as Climate Blockchain Initiatives. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Valencia, Spain.

name: eXMeritus
cb_description: eXMeritus provides hardware and software to federal government and law enforcement organizations for sharing information securely across classified and unclassified networks and systems.

name: LEVION Technologies
cb_description: LEVION Technologies is a start-up company focused on the development of holistic software and hardware solutions in the technology sector. The company offers a range of services including the creation of integrated technology systems and providing expert consulting services. It is based in Graz, Austria.

name: Securit
cb_description: Securit is a premier security company offering corporate and personal security services, as well as private investigation. The company provides a range of services including background investigations, executive protection, security guard services, and electronic security solutions, tailored to meet the unique needs of each client. Securit primarily serves industries such as corporate offices, commercial real estate, financial institutions, educational campuses, healthcare facilities, manufacturing and industrial sites, retail centers, residential communities, and government facilities. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Flushing, New York.

name: TurinTech
cb_description: TurinTech provides code optimization for machine learning and other data-heavy applications. The company offers products that help businesses build machine-learning model code from raw data, optimize the performance of existing machine-learning model code, and enhance the speed of performance-critical code. Its products are Artemis AI and evoML. It primarily serves businesses in the data science and machine learning sectors. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Moorgate, United Kingdom.

name: SISU Clinic
cb_description: SISU Clinic specializes in cosmetic medicine and non-invasive aesthetic treatments. The clinic offers a variety of services including anti-wrinkle injections, dermal fillers, lip enhancements, and skin hydration treatments, all designed to enhance appearance and boost confidence without surgery. SISU Clinic primarily serves individuals seeking cosmetic improvements. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Cork, Ireland.

name: Pet Friendly
cb_description: Pet Friendly specializes in pet care subscription boxes for dogs and cats within the pet care industry. The company offers a range of vet products, including flea and tick treatments, calming products, supplements, and dental care, all tailored to meet the specific needs of pets. The products are designed to maintain the health and happiness of pets. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Omaha, Nebraska.

name: Jetstream
cb_description: Jetstream operates as a supply chain and electronic logistics company. The company's platform automates the procurement process by using data, market coordination, and a network of freight carriers, customs agents, and ground transporters. It primarily serves the supply chain and logistics industry. The company was founded in 2018 and is based in Tema, Ghana.

name: Orbit Technologies
cb_description: Orbit Technologies provides immersive neurotechnologies for gaming and virtual reality. It develops non-invasive brain-computer interfaces to enhance gaming and virtual reality. Orbit Technologies was founded in 2022 and is based in New York, New York.

name: floLIVE
cb_description: floLIVE specializes in advanced IoT connectivity solutions and services within the telecommunications sector. The company provides a comprehensive suite of products including a global IoT connectivity service, cloud-based connectivity management, device management, and a full GSM IoT-oriented core network. floLIVE caters primarily to global enterprises, IoT service providers, and mobile operators. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: evolutionQ
cb_description: evolutionQ is a company that focuses on quantum-safe cybersecurity in the technology industry. The company offers products and services that help customers build and maintain secure networks that are resistant to threats posed by quantum computing. These include software for simulating and deploying quantum delivery networks, as well as advisory services for identifying quantum vulnerabilities and developing quantum-safe strategies. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Kitchener, Ontario.

name: Meet Cute
cb_description: Meet Cute focuses on the creation and distribution of scripted romantic comedies. The company's main offerings include a vast library of scripted romantic comedies and a global network of creative professionals such as writers, actors, and directors. It was founded in 2019 and is based in New York, New York.

name: ReWorked
cb_description: ReWorked is a company focused on creating circular solutions for recycling waste within the environmental and sustainability sector. The company specializes in transforming hard-to-recycle materials, particularly plastics and textiles, into new, sustainable products without using overly technical language. ReWorked primarily serves sectors such as the commercial waste industry and consumer goods sector, offering a transparent marketplace for recycled products and a comprehensive return and recycle system. It is based in Hull, England.

name: ChatBook
cb_description: ChatBook develops a customizable action-based chatbot to automate marketing, sales, and generate leads. The platform offers messaging, data analysis, and customer relationship management (CRM) solutions. It was formerly known as Hecto. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Tokyo, Japan. In July 2022, ChatBook was acquired by Monex Group.

name: KMX Technologies
cb_description: KMX Technologies engages in the extraction and securing of critical minerals and lithium, as well as the development of water treatment technologies. Its services include the extraction of lithium, the recovery of valuable critical minerals from various waste streams, and the treatment of water. It primarily serves sectors such as the electric vehicle industry, defense industry, and communications industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Mississauga, Canada.

name: Spark Minda
cb_description: Spark Minda is a leading manufacturer in the automotive components industry with a focus on mechatronics, information and connected systems, and plastics and interiors. The company offers a wide range of products including electronic and mechanical security systems, die casting components, starter motors and alternators, wiring harnesses, instrument clusters, and sensors, designed to enhance vehicle safety, performance, and comfort. Spark Minda primarily serves original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and the aftermarket in the automotive sector. Spark Minda was formerly known as Minda Huf Ltd.. It was founded in 1958 and is based in Gurugram, India.

name: Zo Financial
cb_description: Zo Financial is a lease-to-own company that provides alternative financing options for consumers, particularly in the retail sector. The company offers services that allow customers to acquire items immediately with the flexibility to make payments over time, including options for early purchase to gain ownership. Zo Financial primarily caters to individuals with less than perfect credit, offering them a pathway to purchase necessary goods while potentially building their credit history. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Wasilla, Alaska.

name: Valchemy
cb_description: Valchemy offers M&A process applications for the enterprise

name: Synchrony
cb_description: Synchrony specializes in consumer financing solutions and is an issuer of retail credit cards. The company offers a range of products including promotional financing, healthcare financing, savings accounts, money market accounts, and certificates of deposit. Synchrony provides payment options and credit card rewards, catering to both individual consumers and businesses with financing tools and savings products. Synchrony was formerly known as GE Capital Retail Finance. It was founded in 1932 and is based in Stamford, Connecticut.

name: Junction Health
cb_description: Junction Health provides healthcare delivery services. The company offers a suite of services including market analysis, capital funding, facilities design, construction oversight, staffing, clinic operations, and revenue cycle management. Its solutions help healthcare sectors. It was founded in 2024 and is based in Denver, Colorado.

name: Kabillion
cb_description: Kabillion is a digital entertainment network focusing on children's content within the media and entertainment industry. The company offers a video-on-demand service that streams a variety of children's shows, including animated series and family-friendly programming. Kabillion primarily serves content producers seeking US television distribution and children as the end audience through various platforms. It was founded in 2006 and is based in Woodland Hills, California.

name: Landytech
cb_description: Landytech is a company that specializes in investment management solutions, focusing on data consolidation, analytics, and reporting within the financial sector. The company offers a platform that provides asset managers, family offices, and trust companies with tools for consolidated investment data, portfolio analytics, and automated reporting to streamline their reporting processes and support investment decision-making. Landytech primarily serves the asset management industry, family office sector, and trust management domain. It was founded in 2018 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Artable
cb_description: Artable is a crowdfunding platform for independent artists, designers and cultural lovers.

name: Stream.Security
cb_description: Stream.Security specializes in cloud detection and response, as well as posture management within the cybersecurity industry. The company offers real-time detection of security exposures and threats, along with analysis of security and compliance implications due to configuration changes. Stream.Security's solutions are designed to detect critical exposures before attackers do, using machine learning to analyze threats across networks, identity and access management, and Kubernetes environments. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Austin, Texas.

name: D-Fend Solutions
cb_description: D-Fend Solutions specializes in counter-drone technology in security and defense. The company offers services and products that detect and mitigate rogue drones, ensuring safety and operational continuity in various environments. It facilitates multi-sensor command and control systems and EnforceAir solutions. It primarily serves sectors such as military and special forces, national security and homeland security, law enforcement, airport safety and security, and critical infrastructure. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Raanana, Israel.

name: Flxpoint
cb_description: Flxpoint is a company that focuses on providing solutions for enterprise dropship and marketplace management in the ecommerce industry. The company offers services such as distributed inventory management, distributed order management, and multi-channel listing management, which help retailers, distributors, and brands automate and optimize their operations. Flxpoint primarily sells to the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Jacksonville Beach, Florida.

name: Vivense
cb_description: Vivense operates as an interior design platform designed to assist in selling furniture and decoration products. It offers a wide variety of furniture items such as sofas, chairs, tables, beds, dining tables, and more. The company allows clients to order their preferred furniture items online and offers free delivery for certain products. It was founded in 2013 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

name: Myelo Therapeutics
cb_description: Myelo Therapeutics develops medical countermeasure drugs for the treatment of acute radiation syndrome. It offers a small molecule-based oral therapy that assists in reducing the risk of chemotherapy-induced myelosuppression (CIM) and radiation in patients across various cancer types and radio-chemotherapy regimens. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Berlin, Germany. In December 2022, Myelo Therapeutics was acquired by Eckert & Ziegler. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Colorifix
cb_description: Colorifix focuses on revolutionizing the textile dyeing process within the textile industry. The company offers a biological dyeing process that eliminates the use of harsh chemicals and reduces environmental impact. This innovative solution meets key industry standards while promoting sustainability in textile production. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Norwich, England.

name: Valchemy
cb_description: Valchemy offers M&A process applications for the enterprise

name: Zepz
cb_description: ZEPZ focuses on providing digital payment solutions. The company offers services enabling users to send money securely with options for bank deposit, cash collection, mobile airtime top-up, and mobile money. ZEPZ primarily serves the global payments industry. Zepz was formerly known as WorldRemit. It was founded in 2010 and is based in London, United Kingdom.

name: Numerate
cb_description:
Numerate is a privately held biotechnology company that applies machine-learning algorithms, at cloud scale, to overcome major challenges in small molecule drug discovery. Numerate's drug design platform combines advances in computer science and statistics with traditional medicinal chemistry approaches to address, in parallel, the factors that determine the success and failure of a drug candidate. Numerate is using this platform to develop a pipeline of drug programs in the cardiovascular, metabolic and neurodegenerative disease areas, focused on targets not typically addressed by computer-aided drug discovery.

On September 25, 2020, Numerate was acquired by Valo Health. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: Sitetracker
cb_description: Sitetracker provides a project management platform to help organizations build, deploy, and maintain infrastructure. The company provides a wide range of services such as work management, financial asset management, reporting, analytics, and tracking. It provides its service in various industries such as energy, real estate, construction, and media. It was formerly known as SiteTraker. It was founded in  2013 and is based in Montclair, New Jersey.

name: Streetbees
cb_description: Streetbees is a company specializing in market research with a focus on conversational research and AI integration. The company offers AI-powered tools that facilitate the collection and analysis of both qualitative and quantitative market data, providing insights through an interactive dashboard. Streetbees primarily serves sectors that require in-depth consumer behavior understanding and market trend analysis. It was founded in 2015 and is based in London, England.

name: LucidLink
cb_description: LucidLink provides a collaboration storage platform. It offers a service that allows remote teams to collaborate on creative projects, providing access to files of any size from any location without the need for local downloads or syncing, primarily serving teams working on large media projects. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: 180 Insuarance
cb_description: 180 Insurance specializes in integrating insurance solutions into the customer journey within the technology sector. The company offers a range of insurance products including personal accident, extended warranty, residential, credit protection, real estate, and digital and financial transaction protection. 180 Insurance primarily serves sectors that require integrated insurance services, such as fintechs, real estate tech, and e-commerce platforms. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

name: BioT
cb_description: BioT focuses on the domain of connected medical devices. The company offers a cloud-based platform that transforms medical devices into connected care solutions, enabling interaction between medical devices, patients, and caregivers. It primarily serves the healthcare industry, with a particular emphasis on medical device manufacturers and healthcare providers. BioT was formerly known as bio-T Medical. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Petach Tikva, Israel.

name: Centrica
cb_description: Centrica (LSE: CNA) provides energy services and solutions. The company offers a range of services including the retail of zero-carbon electricity. The company is active in each stage of the energy lifecycle, from sourcing and generating to processing and storing, from trading and supplying to servicing. It was founded in 1997 and is based in Windsor, United Kingdom.

name: Vgenomics
cb_description: Vgenomics specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of rare genetic diseases within the biotechnology sector. The company offers blood tests for diagnosing rare diseases, genomic sequencing services to aid neonatologists and pediatricians, and also developing therapeutic solutions for the conditions. It primarily serves the healthcare sector, focusing on newborn and pediatric care. It was founded in 2021 and is based in New Delhi, India.

name: Wave Sports + Entertainment
cb_description: Wave Sports + Entertainment is a media company. It creates and distributes sports content for digital platforms. It specializes in short-form sports storytelling and advertising services, targeting the Gen-Z audience. The company partners with leagues and rights holders to deliver content to engaged social communities on the internet. Wave Sports + Entertainment was founded in 2017 and is based in Santa Monica, California.

name: Scanlytics
cb_description: Scanalytics is the centerpiece for understanding consumer behavior in the offline world.

name: Vive Solutions
cb_description: Vive Solutions operates in the insurance technology sector, with a focus on term life insurance. The company offers a platform that allows users to quote, compare, and submit term life insurance orders in a quick and efficient manner. The platform also features accelerated underwriting, a scoring system for consumer value, and real-time case status updates. It was founded in 2018 and is based in Providence, Rhode Island. In September 2023, Vive Solution was acquired by Hexure. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: HyperSciences
cb_description: HyperSciences operates as a platform technology company focused on solving complex problems in various sectors such as tunneling, energy drilling, transportation, aerospace, and materials production. The company offers a range of hypervelocity technologies, including a hypersonic accelerator for tunneling and mining, and a commercial launch system for aerospace applications. These technologies are primarily used in the energy drilling, tunneling, and aerospace industries. It was founded in 2014 and is based in Spokane, Washington.

name: CoolPlanet
cb_description: CoolPlanet focuses on industrial-scale decarbonization in the environmental services industry. The company offers a decarbonization management system that combines technology and engineering expertise to help complex organizations reduce their carbon emissions. CoolPlanet serves sectors such as manufacturing, pharmaceuticals, food and beverages, commercial real estate, mining, and shipping. It was founded in 2008 and is based in Wicklow, Ireland.

name: Command AI
cb_description:
CommandAI (fka CommandBar) is an AI-powered user assistance platform within the technology sector. The company offers a suite of tools including an in-app assistant, search capabilities, and interactive guidance features designed to improve user experience and facilitate task completion. CommandBar's solutions cater to product, marketing, and customer service teams looking to enhance user activation and retention. It was founded in 2020 and is based in San Francisco, California.

It was acquired by Amplitude in October 2023. Command AI was acquired for $45 million (valuation).

name: Return Logic
cb_description: Return Logic specializes in returns management software for the e-commerce sector. The company offers a suite of tools that automate the returns process, provide visibility and analytics for warehouse operations and management, and optimize returns strategies. Its solutions cater to e-commerce platforms. It was founded in 2015  and is based in Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania.

name: Sports One
cb_description: Sports One is a company focused on creating immersive brand experiences within the event marketing industry. They offer services such as venue layout, design, production, installation, staging, and logistics, as well as live events, hospitality, and branded environments. The company also provides strategic consulting and sponsorship sales to enhance brand engagement. It is based in Beaverton, Oregon.

name: ChargerHelp
cb_description: ChargerHelp focuses on the operation and maintenance of electric vehicle charging stations. The company offers a service known as reliability as a service (RaaS), which provides technician support for a monthly fee, ensuring electric vehicle charging. Additionally, it provides workforce development, offering community development, reskilling, and electric vehicle service equipment (EVSE) technician certification training. It primarily serves the automotive industry. The company was founded in 2020 and is based in Los Angeles, California.

name: Airspace
cb_description: Airspace is a company that focuses on time-critical logistics in the shipping and delivery industry. The company offers services such as next flight out, on-demand ground, charter, and specialty services, all powered by AI tools for efficient routing and dispatching. Their primary customers are in industries such as aerospace, healthcare, life sciences, high-tech, and automotive & manufacturing. It was founded in 2016 and is based in Carlsbad, California.

name: Hyphens Pharma
cb_description: Hyphens Pharma is a company that focuses on the pharmaceutical industry. The company offers premium quality pharmaceuticals, enabling patients to live a better quality of life. It primarily serves the healthcare sector. It is based in Singapore.

name: Careerlist
cb_description: Careerlist is an innovative executive search firm that specializes in modernizing the recruiting process for companies. They offer services that include executive search, content production and distribution, and technology-driven candidate sourcing and relationship management. Their primary clientele consists of top global brands seeking to attract and retain executive talent. It was founded in 2018 and is based in New York, New York.

name: HappyCow
cb_description: HappyCow is a guide that focuses on the discovery of vegan and vegetarian-friendly food and businesses operating in the food and hospitality industries. The company's main service is providing a platform that features over 150,000 businesses worldwide, offering vegan and vegetarian-friendly options to its users. It was founded in 1999 and is based in Venice, California.

name: Infinite
cb_description: Infinite provides financial data services for financial institutions such as insurance, brokerages, banks, etc.

name: Eat Appy
cb_description:
Eat Appy is an Australian owned and operated ordering app platform for business owners who offer takeaway or home delivery and want their own branded app to attract new and repeat customers.

On February 3rd, 2021, Eat Appy was acquired by Foodhub. The terms of the transactions were not disclosed.

name: Pipedream
cb_description: Pipedream is a workflow automation platform that specializes in connecting APIs for developers across various industries. The company provides a serverless infrastructure where developers can integrate APIs using both code and no-code options, manage authentication, and eliminate the need for managing infrastructure. Pipedream's platform is designed to process events, execute custom logic in multiple programming languages, and offer a suite of pre-built components for rapid development. It was founded in 2019 and is based in San Francisco, California.

name: Kulira Technologies
cb_description: Kulira Technologies is an advanced biomedical engineering firm that creates solutions for surgical oncology through the use and development of state-of-the-art biomaterials.

name: SpeedSize
cb_description: SpeedSize focuses on optimizing website media through artificial intelligence (AI). The company offers a platform that uses AI to compress and deliver website images and videos, ensuring a high-quality media experience for online brands. It primarily serves the ecommerce industry. It was founded in 2019 and is based is based in Netanya, Israel.

name: Nimblex
cb_description:
Nimblex develops low-code procurement software for businesses.

On July 6th, 2021, Nimblex was acquired by VendorPanel. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

name: The Farmer's Dog
cb_description: The Farmer's Dog is an online pet food company focused on the pet care industry. The company offers freshly-made, human-grade dog food that is delivered directly to customers' doors. The Farmer's Dog primarily serves the pet care industry. It was founded in 2014 and is based in New York, New York.

name: Terminal 49
cb_description: Terminal 49 is a company specializing in container tracking and ocean freight tracking within the logistics and supply chain management sector. Their main offerings include a dashboard for real-time cargo visibility and risk management, and an API for automated container tracking and data integration. Terminal 49 primarily serves the logistics industry, providing solutions to operational and streamlined supply chain management. It was founded in 2017 and is based in Walnut, California.

name: RedSense
cb_description: RedSense provides intelligence services, adversary space interaction and monitoring, net flow monitoring and interpretation, and the development of custom threat intelligence programs. It monitors and tracks events and forces within the industry space in order to provide its customers with deep insight into the myriad of new technologies. It offers vendor-agnostic and objective counsel to help address the evolving security space. It is based in Cheyenne, Wyoming.

name: A&K Robotics
cb_description: A&K Robotics is a company focused on robotics and automation. The company develops intelligent navigation systems that transform manual machines into self-driving robots. These robots are primarily used in sectors such as education, retail, airports, and healthcare. It was founded in 2015 and is based in Vancouver, British Columbia.

name: Workpays
cb_description: Workpays.me operates an e-commerce website with over 50,000 brand name items and enables the gainfully employed to make big-ticket purchases of computers, furniture, and other goods with no financing charges or fees. Instead, consumers make direct payments from their bank account or through payroll deductions for their online purchases.

name: Gravite
cb_description: Gravite specializes in AI-driven product insights. The company offers a platform that captures and analyzes customer interactions to provide businesses with product insights. Gravite primarily serves user-centric companies looking to enhance their product development and customer experience strategies. It was founded in 2022 and is based in Paris, France.
